A glacier cave is a गुफा formed भीतर the ice of a glacier.
Glacier caves are often पुकारा ice caves, लकिन this term is properly used to describe bedrock caves that contain year-round ice.
In physics, गोलाकार motion is a movement of an object along the परिधि of a circle or rotation along a circular path.
It can be वर्दी, with निरंतर angular rate of rotation ( and constant speed ), or non-uniform साथ a changing rate of rotation.
The रोटेशन around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional body involves circular motion of its parts.
The equations of गति describe the गति of the center of mass of a देह.
उदाहरण of circular motion include : an artificial उपग्रह orbiting the Earth at constant height, a stone जिससे is tied to a rope और is being swung in circles, a car turning through a curve in a race track, an electron moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field, and a gear turning inside a mechanism.
Since the ऑब्जेक्ट 's velocity vector is constantly changing direction, the चलती object is undergoing त्वरण by a centripetal force in the direction of the center of rotation.
Without this acceleration, the ऑब्जेक्ट होता move in a straight line, according to Newton 's कानून of motion.
Apollo Creed is a fictional character from the Rocky films, initially portrayed as the Undisputed हेवीवेट Champion of the संसार.
He was played by Carl weathers.
Creed had multiple nicknames, सहित The Master of Disaster, the किंग of स्टिंग, The Dancing Destroyer, The Prince of Punch, The One and तभी और The Count of Monte fisto.
Urban legend states that Apollo Creed 's नाम is a wordplay on the Apostles ' पंथ, a statement of belief used in Christian churches.
All of अपोलो 's चैंपियनशिप झगड़े were scheduled for the 15 round अलहदा.
Championship fights did नहीं convert from 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987.
रॉकी Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red, white, and blue trunks ; Creed was the पहला man to पहनें them ( latterly worn by Rocky Balboa in the 3rd and 4th किश्तों and आखिरकार by Tommy `` the Machine '' Gunn ( Tommy Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) हालांकि सामान्यतः he wore red and white, as देखी in Rocky II.
Balboa 's signature रंगों were black और gold—colors he used in the latest movie.
In the United States, the शीर्षक of federal न्यायधीश प्रायः means a न्यायधीश appointed by the President of the United States and confirmed by the United States सीनेट pursuant to the Appointments Clause in आलेख II of the United States Constitution.
In जोड to the Supreme अदालत of the United राज्य, whose existence and some aspects of जिनकी jurisdiction are beyond the संवैधानिक शक्ति of Congress to alter, acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United राज्य, and 94 United States district courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a संघीय judge ; such positions शामिल the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the परम् अदालत, Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals, and district judges of the संयुक्त States district न्यायालयों.
All of these न्यायाधीशों described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` आलेख III judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal सरकारी by Article III of the u.S. Constitution.
In जोड, न्यायाधीशों of the Court of अंतरराष्ट्रीय Trade exercise न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal न्यायालयों, including magistrate judges and दिवालियापन judges, are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, they हैं neither appointed by the President nor पुष्टि by the Senate, and their शक्ति derives from Article I instead.
देखिए Article i and आलेख III tribunals.

It is a further development of the Beretta Model 20, whose production ended in 1985.
Variable Universal जीवन Insurance ( प्रायः shortened to VUL ) is a type of life insurance that builds a नकदी मान.
In a VUL, the cash value can be invested in a wide variety of separate accounts, similar to mutual funds, and the choice of which of the available separate accounts to उपयोग is entirely up to the contract owner.
The 'variable ' component in the name refers to this ability to invest in separate accounts whose values vary—they vary because they are invested in भण्डार and/or बंध markets.
The 'universal ' component in the name refers to the flexibility the owner has in making premium payments.
The premiums can vary इससे nothing in a given month up to maximums defined by the Internal Revenue Code for life insurance.
इस लचीलापन is in contrast to whole life बीमे that रै fixed premium payments कि typically can not be missed without lapsing the policy ( although one may exercise an स्वचालित Premium Loan feature, or surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ).
Variable universal life is a प्रकार of स्थाई life insurance, because the मौत लाभ will be paid if the insured dies any time as long as there is sufficient cash मान to pay the costs of insurance in the policy.
With most if not all VULs, नापसंद whole life, there is no endowment age ( the age at which the cash value equals the death benefit amount, which for पूरे life is typically 100 ).
This is yet another key advantage of VUL over Whole जीवन.
With a typical whole life policy, the death benefit is limited to the face amount निर्दिष्ट in the policy, और at endowment age, the face amount is all that is paid out.
Thus with either death or endowment, the insurance कम्पनी keeps any cash value built up over the years.
However, some participating whole life policies offer राइडर्स which specify that any dividends paid on the policy be used to purchase `` paid up परिवर्धन '' to the नीति which increase both the cash value और the death benefit over समय.
If investments made in the पृथक accounts out-perform the general account of the insurance company, a higher rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life.
The combination over the years of no endowment आयु, continually increasing death benefit, and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate खाते of a VUL नीति, इस could result in higher value to the owner or beneficiary than that of a whole life नीति साथ the same amounts of money paid in as premiums.

As of 2007, sales were estimated at about 200 million बाक्स per साल.

Purdue विश्वविद्यालयों, स्तिथ in वेस्ट Lafayette, इंडियाना, is the flagship university of the six-campus Purdue University प्रणाली.
Purdue was founded on may 6, 1869, as a land-grant university when the Indiana General Assembly, taking advantage of the Morrill अधिनियम, accepted a donation of land और money इससे Lafayette बिजनेसमैन John Purdue to स्थापित a college of विज्ञान, technology, and agriculture in उसके name.
The first classes were held on September 16, 1874, with six instructors and 39 students.
आज, Purdue is a सदस्य of the Big Ten Conference, and is a well known world-class research institution.
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any विश्वविद्यालयों in Indiana as खूब as the fourth largest international छात्र population of any university in the United States.
purdue offers both undergraduate and graduate programs in over 211 major areas of study, और is well ज्ञात for इसके competitive अभियान्त्रिकी curricula.
The विश्वविद्यालयों has भी been highly influential in अमेरिका 's history of विमानन, having established the first college credit offered in flight training, the first four-year bachelor 's degree in aviation, and the first विश्वविद्यालयों airport ( purdue University Airport ).
Purdue 's aviation technology program remains one of the most competitive aviation-specific programs in the world.
in the mid-20th century, Purdue 's aviation कार्यक्रम expanded to encompass उन्नत spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving rise to purdue 's nickname, पालना of Astronauts.
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts, including Gus Grissom ( one of the original पारा Seven astronauts ), Neil Armstrong ( the first person to walk on the moon ), and Eugene cernan ( the most हाल person to चलना on the moon ).
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a term that loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( भी known as epidermal cysts ; l72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
Because an epidermoid cyst originates in the epidermis and a pilar cyst originates from बाल follicles, by परिभाषा, neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst.
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty, white, semi-solid material in both of these cyst entities is not sebum, but keratin.
Furthermore, अंतर्गत the microscope neither entity contains sebaceous glands.
in practice, however, the terms are often used interchangeably.
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and हैं known as steatocystomas or, if अनेक, as steatocystoma multiplex.
Modern pointe shoes.
The edge of the toe pad, जिससे is inserted between the foot and toe box for cushioning, can be seen on the right पैर.
A pointe जूता is a प्रकार of shoe worn by बैले dancers when performing pointe work.
Pointe shoes developed इससे the ख्वाहिश लिये dancers to appear weightless and sylph -like and have evolved to enable dancers to dance en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of समय.
वे हैं normally worn by मादा dancers, though male dancers may पहनें them लिये अपरंपरागत roles such as the ugly stepsisters in सिंडरेला, Bottom in A Midsummer Night 's Dream, or men performing as women in dance companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero और Grandiva.
वे are manufactured in a किस्में of colors, most commonly in shades of light pink.
This tablespoon has a capacity of परिचय 15 mL.
Measuring spoons
In the US and parts of Canada, a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for eating from a कटोरी.
In the UK, Europe and most Commonwealth countries, a tablespoon is a type of large spoon usually used लिये serving.
In countries where a tablespoon is a serving spoon, the nearest समतुल्य to the US tablespoon is either the dessert spoon or the soup spoon.
A tablespoonful, nominally the capacity of one tablespoon, is commonly प्रयुक्त as a measure of आवाज़ in cooking.
It is abbreviated as T, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated by law and is विषय to considerable variation.
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is approximately 15 mL ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( dining utensil ) ranges इससे 7 mL to 14 ml.
In Australia one tablespoon ( measurement ईकाई ) is 20 mL.
Harry Potter is a series of seven fantasy novels written by the British author J. K. Rowling.
The books chronicle the adventures of a wizard, Harry Potter, and his मित्रों Ronald वीज़्ली and Hermione Granger, all of whom are students at Hogwarts स्कूल of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
The main story arc concerns हैरी 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard रब Voldemort, whose aims are to become immortal, conquer the wizarding संसार, subjugate non-magical लोगों, and destroy all those who स्टैंड in his way, विशेषकर हैरी कुम्हार.
Since the रिलीज of the first अनोखा Harry कुम्हार और the Philosopher 's Stone on 30 जून 1997, the किताबे have gained immense popularity, critical acclaim और commercial success worldwide.
the series रै also था some share of criticism, including चिंता for the increasingly dark tone.
, the book series has sold about 450 million नक़ल, making it the best-selling किताब series in इतिहास, and has been translated into 67 languages.
The last चार books consecutively set records as the fastest-selling books in history.
A series of many genres, including fantasy and coming of आयु ( with elements of रहस्य, thriller, adventure, and romance ), it has many cultural meanings and references.
According to Rowling, the main theme is death.
There are also many other विषयवस्तु in the series, such as पूर्वाग्रह and corruption.
The initial प्रमुख प्रकाशक of the किताबे were Bloomsbury in the United Kingdom and scholastic Press in the United States.
the books have since been published by अनेक publishers worldwide.
The books, with the seventh book split into दो parts, have been made into an eight-part film series by warner भाईs. Pictures, the highest-grossing film series of सब समय.
the series also originated much tie-in merchandise, making the Harry कुम्हार brand worth in excess of $ 15 अरब.
Also due to the success of the किताबे and films, Harry कुम्हार has been प्रयुक्त for a theme park, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter in सार्वभौमिक Parks & Resorts 's Islands of एडवेंचर.

A rocket engine, or simply `` rocket '', is a jet engine that uses only stored propellant द्रव्यमान लिये forming its high speed propulsive jet.
Rocket इंजन हैं reaction engines and obtain thrust in accordance with Newton 's तीसरा law.
Since they need no बाह्य सामग्री to रूप उनके जेट, rocket engines can be used for spacecraft propulsion as खूब as terrestrial uses, ऐसे as missiles.
Most rocket इंजन हैं आतंरिक combustion engines, although non-combusting forms also exist.
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust velocities, are by दूर the lightest, लकिन are the least propellant efficient of all types of jet engines.
``... baby One More समय '' is a सोंग by American recording artist britney Spears.
it served as स्पीयर्स 's debut single and शीर्षक track from her debut स्टुडियो album,... baby One More समय ( 1999 ).
Written by Max Martin and produced by Martin and Rami, ``... Baby One More Time '' was released on September 30, 1998, by jive Records.
After recording and sending a demo टेप with an unused song from Toni Braxton, Spears signed a multi-album deal with Jive.
``... Baby One More समय '' is a teen pop and dance-pop song कि refers to a लड़की who regrets तोड़कर up with her boyfriend.
The song प्राप्त generally favorable reviews from critics, जो praised its composition.
``... Baby One More Time '' attained global success, reaching क्रमांक one in प्रत्येक देश it charted.
It also प्राप्त numerous certifications around the world, and is one of the best-selling singles of all time, with over 10 million copies बेची.
An accompanying music video, directed by Nigel Dick, portrays Spears as a छात्र from a Catholic high school, जो starts to daydream that वो is गायन and dancing around the school, while watching her love interest from अफ़ार.
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ), जहाँ Spears 's fictional बेटी is dressed with a similar schoolgirl outfit while wearing गुलाबी ribbons in her hair.
In 2010, the music video for ``... Baby One More Time '' was voted the third most influential video in the history of pop music, in a poll held by Jam !.
स्पीयर्स has performed ``... Baby One अधिक Time '' in a number of live appearances and in all of उसके कॉन्सर्ट टुर.
It थी the encore of the... Baby One अधिक Time दौरे ( 1999 ) and Dream Within a Dream Tour ( 2001 ) ; Spears also performed remixed versions of the song during the Oops !...

It was also the final song to be played on the BBC 's music कार्यक्रम Top of the Pops.
हैजा is an infection in the small आंत caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
The main symptoms हैं watery diarrhea and vomiting.
Transmission occurs primarily by पीने water or eating food that has महरूम contaminated by the मल ( waste product ) of an infected person, including one साथ no apparent लक्षण.
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can lead to rapid dehydration and electrolyte असंतुलन, और death in some cases.
The primary treatment is oral पुनर्जलीकरण therapy, typically with मौखिक rehydration solution, to replace water and electrolytes.
If this is not tolerated or does not provide improvement fast enough, intravenous fluids can also be used.
Antibacterial drugs are beneficial in those with severe disease to shorten its duration and severity.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 million people and causes 100,000–130,000 मौतों a साल.
हैजा was one of the earliest infections to be studied by epidemiological methods.
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only published novel by Oscar Wilde, appearing as the lead story in lippincott 's Monthly Magazine on 20 June 1890, printed as the जुलाई 1890 issue of this पत्रिका.
The magazine 's सम्पादक feared the story was indecent as submitted, so they censored roughly 500 words, without Wilde 's knowledge, before publication.
But even with कि, the story was स्टिल greeted साथ outrage by अंग्रेजों reviewers, some of whom suggested that Wilde चाहिए be prosecuted on moral grounds, leading Wilde to बचाव the novel aggressively in letters to the British press.
Wilde later revised the story for book प्रकाशन, making substantial alterations, deleting विवादास्पद passages, adding new chapters and सहित an aphoristic Preface which has since become famous in its own सही.
The amended संस्करण was published by वार्ड, Lock and Company in अप्रैल 1891.
Some scholars believe that वाइल्ड would today have wanted us to read the version he originally submitted to Lippincott 's.
The novel tells of a यंग man named Dorian Gray, the subject of a पेंटिंग by कलाकार Basil Hallward.
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's beauty and becomes infatuated with उसे, believing his beauty is responsible for a new mode in उसके art.
Dorian meets Lord हेनरी Wotton, a friend of Basil 's, and becomes enthralled by Lord हेनरी 's world view.
Espousing a new hedonism, Lord Henry suggests the only things worth pursuing in जीवन are beauty and fulfilment of the senses.
Realizing that one day his beauty will fade, डोरियन ( whimsically ) expresses a desire to sell his soul to ensure the पोर्ट्रेट Basil has painted would age rather than he.
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled, and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery, the portrait serves as a reminder of the प्रभाव each act has upon his आत्मा, with each sin displayed as a disfigurement of his form, or through a चिह्न of aging.
The Picture of डोरियन Gray is considered a work of classic Gothic fiction with a strong Faustian theme.
Sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ), known as ज़ा Zsa Gabor ( ), is a Hungarian -born American actress who acted in supporting roles in फिल्मों, on Broadway, and occasionally on television.
गैबर was also a socialite.
वो began her stage career in वियना at age 15, and was crowned Miss Hungary in 1936.
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and became a sought-after actress with `` European फ्लेयर and style '', with a व्यक्तित्व that `` exuded आकर्षण और grace ''.
Her first movie role was as supporting actress in Lovely to dekh At.
She बाद acted in We 're नहीं Married !
और played one of her few leading roles in moulin Rouge ( 1952 ), निर्देशित by John Huston, who described her as a `` creditable '' अभिनेत्री.
Besides उसके film और television appearances, वो is best known लिये having nine husbands, including hotel magnate Conrad Hilton and actor George Sanders.
She once stated, `` मेन have always liked me और i have always liked men.
But I जैसे a mannish man, a man who knows how to talk to and treat a स्त्री – not just a man with muscles. ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20 July 1973 ) was a Chinese American martial artist, actor, martial arts प्रशिक्षक, philosopher, and फिल्मकार.
The founder of Jeet Kune Do, Lee was the son of cantonese ओपेरा star ली Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely considered by commentators, आलोचकों, media और other martial कलाकारों to be one of the most influential martial artists of all time, and a pop culture प्रतीक of the 20th century.
He is often credited with helping to change the way Asians were presented in अमरीकी films.
Lee was born in Chinatown, सैन फ्रांसिस्को on 27 नवम्बर 1940 to अभिभावक from हांग Kong और was उठाया in कोलून साथ his family until his late teens.
he थी introduced to the film industry by his पिता और appeared in अनेक films as a child actor.
Lee moved to the संयुक्त राज्य at the age of 18 to receive his higher education, and it was during this time कि he began teaching martial arts.
His हांग Kong और Hollywood -उपजd films elevated the traditional हांग Kong martial arts film to a new level of popularity and acclaim, sparking a surge of ब्याज in Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s.
The direction and tone of उसके films changed and influenced martial arts और martial arts films in Hong Kong and the rest of the world.
he is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : lo Wei 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) और Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; Way of the Dragon ( 1972 ), directed और लिखा by Lee ; Warner भाइयो ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of मौत ( 1978 ), both directed by Robert Clouse.
Lee became an iconic फिगर ज्ञात throughout the world, विशेषकर among the Chinese, as he portrayed Chinese राष्ट्रवाद in उसके films.
he initially trained in Wing chun, लकिन later अस्वीकृत well-defined martial art styles, favouring instead the use of तकनीकों from विभिन्न sources, in the spirit of उसके personal martial arts philosophy, which he dubbed Jeet Kune do ( The Way of the intercepting Fist ).
Lee held dual citizenship of Hong Kong and the United States.
he died in कोलून Tong on 20 July 1973 at आयु 32.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ), also known as chronic obstructive lung disease ( COLD ), chronic obstructive airway disease ( coad ), chronic airflow limitation ( CAL ) और chronic obstructive respiratory disease ( CORD ), is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema, a जोड़ी of commonly co-existing रोगों of the lungs in which the एयरवेज़ narrow over time.
This limits airflow to and इससे the lungs, causing shortness of breath ( dyspnea ).
In clinical practice, COPD is पारिभाषित by its characteristically low airflow on lung function tests.
In contrast to दमा, इस limitation is poorly reversible और usually gets progressively worse over time.
copd is caused by noxious particles or gas, सबसे commonly from tobacco धूम्रपान, which triggers an abnormal जलन जवाब in the फेफड़ों.
The निदान of COPD requires lung function tests.
Important management रणनीति are smoking cessation, vaccinations, rehabilitation, and ड्रग therapy ( often using inhalers ).
कुछ patients go on to require long-term oxygen therapy or फेफड़ों transplantation.
विश्वव्यापी, COPD ranked as the sixth leading cause of death in 1990.
It is प्रक्षिप्त to become the fourth leading कारण of death worldwide by 2030, due to an increase in smoking दरों और demographic changes in अनेक countries.
COPD is the third leading cause of death in the U.S., and the आर्थिक burden of COPD in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in health care costs और lost productivity.
annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank (, ?, ; 12 जून 1929early March 1945 ) is one of the most discussed यहूदी victims of the Holocaust.
उसके diary has महरूम the basis for अनेक plays and films.
Born in the city of फ्रैंकफर्ट am Main in Weimar Germany, वो lived most of उसके life in or near Amsterdam, in the नीदरलैंड्स.
Born a German national, फ़्रैंक lost उसके citizenship in 1941.
She gained international fame posthumously after her diary was published.
It documents her अनुभवों hiding दौरान the German occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स in World War II.
The Frank family moved from Germany to एम्सटर्डम in 1933, the year the Nazis gained control over Germany.
By the beginning of 1940, वे were trapped in Amsterdam by the Nazi occupation of the Netherlands.
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in July 1942, the परिवार went into hiding in the hidden rooms of Anne 's father, Otto Frank 's, office building.
After दो years, the group was betrayed और transported to concentration camps.
Anne फ़्रैंक and her सिस्टर, Margot, were eventually transferred to the Bergen-Belsen विशेषज्ञता camp, जहाँ they died of सन्निपात in March 1945.
Otto Frank, the only उत्तरजीवी of the परिवार, returned to Amsterdam after the war to find that Anne 's diary had been saved, and his efforts led to its publication in 1947.
It was translated इससे its original Dutch and first published in English in 1952 as the डायरी of a Young लड़की.
It has since been translated into many languages.
The diary, which थी given to ऐनी on उसके 13th birthday, chronicles her life इससे 12 June 1942 जबतक 1 अगस्त 1944.
Kurt 's signature
Kurt Donald Cobain ( फ़रवरी 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) was an American musician and artist, best known as the lead singer, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the Seattle म्यूज़िक scene, having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record लेबल Sub पॉप in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the band found breakthrough success साथ `` खुश्बू Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of Nevermind, Nirvana was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X, and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, थी often uncomfortable और frustrated, believing his message and artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public, साथ his personal issues प्रायः subject to media attention.
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio album In utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of उसके life, Cobain struggled with हेरोइन addiction, illness और अवसाद.
He also had परेशानी coping with his fame and public चित्र, and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his बीवी, संगीतकार Courtney Love.
On April 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his home in Seattle, the victim of कया was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
The circumstances of his मौत at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
चूंकि their debut, Nirvana, with Cobain as a songwriter, has sold over 25 million एल्बम in the u.S., और over 50 million worldwide.

The radial engine is a reciprocating प्रकार internal combustion engine configuration in which the cylinders point outward from a सेंट्रल crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel.
It resembles a stylized star when viewed from the front, and is called a `` star engine '' ( German Sternmotor ) in some भाषाएं.
The radial configuration was very commonly used in aircraft इंजन before turbine engines became predominant.
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom, निर्मित by सुसान हैरिस, that originally aired on NBC from September 13, 1985, to May 9, 1992.
अभिनीत bea Arthur, Betty White, Rue McClanahan and Estelle Getty, the show centers on four पुरानी women sharing a घर in Miami, फ्लोरिडा.
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris Productions, in association with Touchstone Television, and Paul Junger witt, Tony Thomas, and Harris served as the original executive producers.
The सुनहरी Girls received critical acclaim throughout most of its चलाएं and won several पुरस्कार, सहित the प्राइमटाइम एमी Award for Outstanding Comedy Series twice.
It also won three Golden Globe पुरस्कार for Best Television Series – Musical or Comedy.
All चार stars each received an Emmy Award throughout the श्रेणी ' run and had multiple nominations.
The series also ranked among the top टेन highest-rated programs for six out of इसके seven seasons.
Deepwater drilling is the प्रक्रम of oil and gas exploration and उत्पादन in depths of more than 500 feet.
By this definition, there हैं approximately 600 deepwater wells in the Gulf of Mexico.
It has been economically infeasible for many years, but with rising oil prices, more companies are investing in this क्षेत्रफल.
Major companies working in this sector include Diamond Offshore, TransOcean, and Baker Hughes.
वहीँ are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater drilling rigs : semi-submersible drilling rigs and drillships.
Drilling can also be performed from a fixed-position installation such as a floating spar ( platform ) or tension-leg platform.
Recent उद्योग analysis रै estimated that the total expenditure in the वैश्विक deepwater infrastructure market होगा reach $ 145bn in 2011.
“Not all आयल is accessible on land or in उथले water.
You can find some oil deposits buried deep under the ocean floor.”... Using sonic equipment, आयल companies determine the drilling sites most likely to उपज आयल.
Then they use a mobile offshore drilling unit ( MODU ) to dig the initial well.
Some units are converted into production rigs, meaning they switch from खुदाई for oil to capturing oil once it 's found.
Most of the time, the आयल कम्पनी will replace the MODU with a more स्थाई oil production rig to capture oil.”... the MODU 's job is to drill down into the ocean 's floor to find oil deposits.
The भाग of the drill कि extends below the deck and through the water is called the riser.
The riser allows for drilling fluids to move between the floor और the rig.
Engineers lower a drill string -- a श्रेणी of pipes designed to drill bas to the oil deposit -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater drilling is happening despite accidents in offshore fields... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred killing 11 मजदूर and spilling millions of gallons of oil into the Gulf of Mexico जबकि a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters.
“... Despite the risks, the deepwater drilling trend is spreading in the भूमध्यसागरीय और off the coast of ईस्ट Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such drilling, analyst say, is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the आयल so it is almost necessary to फेस the high risks that come with deepwater drilling in order लिये Americans to continue to carry on their रोज जीवनदान.
“The Energy Department recently projected that gulf oil production would expand from its 2011 स्तर of 1.3 million barrels a day, स्टिल nearly a quarter of total घरेलू production, to 2 लाख barrels a day by 2020.”
deepwater खुदाई affects the environment in दोनो negative and positive ways.
Although Deepwater drilling rarely कल्याणकारी oil spills it is still a hazardous possible outcome.
Oil spills परिणाम in oil sinking to the नीचे of the ocean smothering plant life leaving fish without food and shelter to जीवित.
On the other hand deepwater drilling effects the environment in a positive तरीके too.
in time once the deepwater oil well is not in use anymore पौधे will grow on and around the well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal लिये पशु to thrive in.
Deepwater खुदाई also lets us see the depths of the समंदर floor कि are hardly कभी seen.
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record footage and take photos of rare fish that हैं in there प्राकृतिक habitat, giving वैज्ञानिक a dekh at animals they rarely seen” ( Chevron निगम ). ''

The affair and its repercussions ( which शामिल Clinton 's महाभियोग ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
फ्रांसिस अल्बर्ट `` Frank '' Sinatra,, ( December 12, 1915 – May 14, 1998 ) was an American singer and फिल्मी actor.
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry जेम्स और टॉमी Dorsey, Sinatra found unprecedented कामयाबी as a solo artist from the early to mid-1940s after being signed to Columbia Records in 1943.
Being the idol of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released उसके first एल्बम, The Voice of Frank Sinatra in 1946.
His पेशेवर करियर had stalled by the 1950s, but it was पुनर्जन्म in 1953 after he जीती the Academy Award for बेहतरीन Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to शाश्वत.
He signed with Capitol रिकॉर्ड in 1953 and released several critically lauded albums ( such as In the Wee Small Hours, Songs for swingin ' प्रेमियों !, Come Fly साथ Me, Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ).
सिनात्रा left Capitol to मिला his own record label, Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding कामयाबी with albums ऐसे as Ring-a-Ding-Ding !, Sinatra at the sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & अंतोनियो Carlos Jobim ), toured internationally, was a founding member of the Rat पैक और fraternized साथ celebrities and statesmen, including John F. Kennedy.
सिनात्रा turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective September of my Years, starred in the Emmy -winning television special Frank Sinatra : a Man and His Music, and scored hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way ``.
साथ बिक्री of उसके music dwindling and बाद appearing in several poorly received films, Sinatra retired for the first time in 1971.
दो सालो later, however, he came आउट of retirement and in 1973 recorded several albums, scoring a Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme From ) New York, New यॉर्क `` in 1980.
using his Las Vegas shows as a home base, he toured दोनो भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य और internationally, until a short time before his death in 1998.
Sinatra भी forged a highly कामयाब career as a film actor.
After winning Best Supporting कर्ता in 1953, he also garnered a nomination for Best Actor for The man with the Golden भुजा, and critical acclaim for his performance in The Manchurian Candidate.
He भी starred in such musicals as High Society, pal Joey, Guys and Dolls and On the Town.
Sinatra was honored at the कैनेडी Center Honors in 1983 और was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by Ronald Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997.
He was the recipient of ग्यारह Grammy Awards, including the Grammy Trustees Award, Grammy Legend पुरस्कार and the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award.
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling artists of सब time, having sold more than 150 million copies worldwide.
Typical cornhole board
Cornhole, भी known as bean bag toss, corn टॉस, baggo or bags, is a लॉन खेल in which players लो turns throwing मकई छेद bags at a raised platform साथ a hole in the far end.
A bag in the hole scores 3 points, while एक on the platform स्कोर 1 point.
Play continues until a team or खिलाड़ी reaches the score of 21.
The अमरीकी Gold Eagle is an official gold bullion सिक्का of the United States.
Authorized अंतर्गत the सुनहरा Bullion Coin Act of 1985, it was first released by the संयुक्त राज्य Mint in 1986.
बिक्रम Yoga is a प्रणाली of yoga that बिक्रम Choudhury synthesized from traditional hatha yoga techniques and popularized beginning in the early 1970s.
All Bikram Yoga classes run for 90 minutes and consist of the same series of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises.
Bikram योग is ideally practiced in a room heated to 105°f ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 %,.

A teaspoon is an मद of cutlery and/or a measuring instrument, as well as a unit of measurement of volume in कुछ countries and customs.
A फर्न is कोई one or more of a समूह of about 12,000 प्रजाति of plants belonging to the botanical group known as Pteridophyta.
Unlike mosses, वे have xylem and phloem ( making them vascular पौधे ).
They have stems, leaves, और roots like other vascular plants.
Ferns reproduce via spores and have neither seeds nor flowers.
By far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, लकिन ferns as defined here ( also called monilophytes ) include horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, और ophioglossoid ferns.
the term pteridophyte also refers to ferns and a few other seedless vascular plants ( see classification section below ).
ferns first appear in the fossil record 360 million years ago in the carboniferous but many of the current families and species did not appear until roughly 145 लाख years ago in the early Cretaceous ( after flowering plants came to dominate many environments ).
ferns are not of major economic importance, लकिन some are grown or gathered लिये food, as ornamental plants, for remediating contaminated soils, और have been the subject of research for उनके ability to remove कुछ chemical pollutants from the एयर.
Some हैं significant weeds.
They also play a भूमिका in mythology, medicine, and आर्ट.
Flat roofs in Israel
Flat roof in Los Angeles
a flat roof is a type of covering for a building.
In contrast to the more sloped form of roof, a चपटा roof is horizontal or nearly horizontal.
The slope of a roof is properly known as its pitch : roofs जिससे are nearly flat हैं ज्ञात as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases, so the pitch is कहा to बढ़ाएँ ).
Any sheet of material used to cover a flat or low-pitched roof is usually known as a membrane और the प्राथमिक purpose of these membranes is to waterproof the roof area.
Materials that cover flat roofs typically allow the water to run off from a slight inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water from some flat roofs ऐसे as on garden sheds sometimes flows freely बंद the edge of a roof, though gutter systems are of advantage in keeping both walls and foundations dry.
Gutters on smaller roofs प्रायः lead water directly onto the ground, or बेहतर, into a specially made soakaway.
Gutters on larger roofs प्रायः सीसे जल into the rainwater drainage system of any built up area.
occasionally चपटा roofs though are designed to collect जल in a pool, usually for aesthetic उद्देश्य, or for rainwater buffering.
Flat roofs exist सब over the world and each area has its अपना परंपरा or preference for materials used.
In warmer climes where rainfall is कम and freezing is असंभावित to occur, many चपटा roofs हैं simply built of masonry or कंक्रीट and this is good at keeping out the heat of the sun and cheap and easy to build जहाँ timber is नहीं readily available.
In areas where the roof could become saturated by rain and leak, or where water soaked into the brickwork could freeze to ice and thus lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) ये roofs are not suitable.
traditionally most चपटा roofs in the western world make use of तारकोल or more usually tar paper applied over roof अलंकार to keep a building watertight.
The तारकोल or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to keep the sun 's heat, UV किरणें and मौसम off it and helps protect it from cracking or blistering and degradation.
Roof अलंकार is usually of plywood, chipboard or osb boards ( OSB = Oriented Strand Board, also known as Sterling board ) of around 18mm thickness.
the tar कोटिंग is applied in one or more coats as a hot liquid, heated in a तारकोल kettle, or as sheets of tar impregnated 'paper ' glued down and sealed together at joints by hot tar - once it रै cooled, the gravel is spread evenly over it.
A main reason for विफलता of these traditional roofs is ignorance or lack of मेंटेनेंस where people or events cause the gravel to be स्थानांतरित or removed from the tar or tarpaper waterproofing, thus exposing it to weather and sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in.
Tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or fibre material soaked or impregnated in tar.
as बजरी can नहीं protect tarpaper surfaces where they rise vertically from the roof such as on parapet दीवारें or upstands, tarpaper variants are उत्पादित with ठीक gravel applied to the hot tar during the process of manufacture ऐसे that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection.
Tarpapers vary in विशेषता as करता the workmanship and training of those applying it to उपज अधिक or less successful results.
In some micro climates or shaded क्षेत्रों these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in relation to the cost of materials purchase and cost of laying them, however the लागत of modern membranes ऐसे as EPDM रै come down over recent years to make them more और more affordable.
There are now अधिक firms supplying modern alternatives and there is generally a growing जागरूकता of their performance और availability.
if a लीक does occur on a flat roof then damage often goes unnoticed for long periods of time during which water penetrates and soaks the decking और कोई insulation and/or structure beneath it.
This can lead to expensive damage from the rot which प्रायः develops and if left can weaken the roof structure.
There हैं also various health risks to people and animals breathing the mould बीजाणुओं : the गंभीरता of इस health risk remains a debated point.
One problem with maintaining चपटा roofs is that if water does penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a आधुनिक झिल्ली ) it can सफर a long रास्ता before causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can be देखी.
Thus it is नहीं आसान to see where it is leaking in अनुक्रम to repair it.
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a further collection or puddling of water in कि area and the problem worsens.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed compact डिस्क which contains data.
The नाम is an acronym which stands for `` Compact Disc Read-only memory ``.
Computers can read CD-ROMs, but can not write on उन्हें.
cd-roms are popularly used to distribute computer software, including video games and multimedia अनुप्रयोग, though any data can be stored ( up to the क्षमता सीमा of a disc ).
कुछ CDs, called enhanced CDs, hold दोनो computer data और audio साथ the latter सक्षम of होने played on a CD player, while data ( ऐसे as software or digital video ) is only usable on a कंप्यूटर ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the technical standard that defines the स्वरूप of CD-ROMs.
One of a नियत of color-bound किताबे that contain the technical विशेषताएँ for सब cd formats, the Yellow किताब, created by Sony and Philips, was the first extension of Compact डिस्क Digital Audio.
It adapted the format to hold any form of data.
Joanne `` Jo '' रोलिंग ( ), ( born 31 July 1965 ), pen नाम J. K. Rowling, is a British novelist, best known as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series.
The कुम्हार किताबे have gained विश्वव्यापी ध्यान, जीती multiple awards, and बेची more than 400 लाख copies.
They have become the best-selling किताब series in इतिहास, and been the basis for a series of films जिससे रै become the highest-grossing film series in history.
Rowling had overall स्वीकृति on the scripts as well as maintaining creative control by serving as a producer on the final instalment.
Born in Yate, ग्लॉस्टरशायर, रोलिंग was working as a researcher and bilingual secretary for Amnesty International when she conceived the विचार for the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990.
the seven-year period that followed entailed the मौत of her mother, divorce from उसके पहला husband and poverty until Rowling finished the first novel in the series, Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ).
Rowling subsequently published 6 sequels—the last, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as well as 3 supplements to the series.
In 2012, Rowling parted with her agency and resumed writing in the रूप of a tragicomedy novel aimed at वयस्क readership, entitled The Casual Vacancy.
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed लिये वयस्कों, the other for children younger than the Harry Potter audience, and she expects the latter to be published first.
Rowling has led a `` rags to अमीरी `` life story, in which she progressed from living on state benefits to multi-millionaire status भीतर five years.
She is the United Kingdom 's best-selling लेखक since records began, साथ बिक्री in excess of £238m.
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich List estimated Rowling 's fortune at £560 million ( $ 798 लाख ), ranking her as the बारहवीं richest woman in the United Kingdom.
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth सबसे powerful हस्ती of 2007, and समय magazine named उसके as a runner-up लिये its 2007 Person of the Year, noting the social, moral, और राजनैतिक inspiration she has given her प्रशंसक.
In October 2010, Rowling थी named the `` Most Influential Woman in Britain '' by leading magazine editors.
She रै become a notable philanthropist, supporting such charities as Comic Relief, एक Parent Families, Multiple Sclerosis Society of Great Britain and Lumos ( formerly the Children 's High Level समूह ).

the population was 11,032 at the 2000 census.

Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen from orbit दौरान Expedition 7 of the International Space Station.
The eye, eyewall, and surrounding rainbands, characteristics of tropical cyclones, हैं clearly visible in इस view from space.
A तीव्र cyclone is a storm system characterized by a low-pressure बीच surrounded by a spiral व्यवस्था of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy बरसात.
Tropical cyclones strengthen जब जल evaporated from the ocean is released as the saturated air rises, resulting in condensation of water वाष्प contained in the moist air.
They are fueled by a different ऊष्मा mechanism than other cyclonic windstorms such as nor'easters, यूरोपीय windstorms, and polar चढ़ाव.
The characteristic कि separates tropical cyclones from other cyclonic systems is that at कोई height in the atmosphere, the center of a tropical cyclone होगा be warmer than its surroundings ; a घटना called `` गरम core `` storm systems.
the term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical उत्पत्ति of these systems, which usually form in tropical regions of the globe, and to their formation in मेरीटाइम तीव्र एयर masses.
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms ' cyclonic nature, साथ counterclockwise wind flow in the Northern Hemisphere and clockwise wind flow in the Southern Hemisphere.
The opposite दिशा of the wind flow is a result of the Coriolis force.
Depending on its location and strength, a tropical cyclone is referred to by names such as hurricane (, ), तूफ़ान ( ), tropical storm, cyclonic storm, तीव्र अवसाद, और simply cyclone.
While tropical cyclones can उपज अत्यधिक powerful winds and torrential rain, they are also समर्थ to produce high लहरें, damaging तूफ़ान surge, and tornadoes.
वे develop over large लाशें of warm जल, and lose their strength if they move over land due to increased surface friction and loss of the गरम ocean as an energy source.
This is क्यों तटीय regions can receive significant damage from a tropical cyclone, while inland regions are अपेक्षाकृत सुरक्षित from receiving strong winds.
Heavy rains, however, can produce significant बाढ़ अंतर्देशीय, और storm surges can उपज extensive coastal flooding up to इससे the coastline.
हालांकि उनके effects on इंसान populations can be devastating, tropical cyclones can relieve drought conditions.
वे also carry heat energy away from the tropics और transport it toward temperate latitudes, which makes उन्हें an important part of the global वायुमंडलीय circulation mechanism.
As a result, tropical cyclones help to maintain equilibrium in the Earth 's troposphere, और to maintain a अपेक्षाकृत stable and warm temperature worldwide.
Many tropical cyclones develop when the atmospheric conditions around a weak disturbance in the atmosphere are अनुकूल.
The background environment is modulated by climatological cycles and patterns such as the Madden-Julian oscillation, El Niño-Southern Oscillation, and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation.
अन्य form when other types of cyclones acquire tropical characteristics.
तीव्र systems are then moved by steering winds in the troposphere ; if the conditions remain favorable, the tropical disturbance intensifies, and can even develop an नजर.
On the other end of the spectrum, if the conditions around the system deteriorate or the tropical cyclone makes landfall, the system weakens और आखिरकार dissipates.
It is not possible to artificially induce the dissipation of these systems with वर्तमान technology.
Kirk डगलस ( born Issur Danielovitch, ; December 9, 1916 ) is an American स्टेज and film actor, film producer and author.
His लोकप्रिय films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ), Champion ( 1949 ), Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ), The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952 ), 20,000 लीग Under the Sea ( 1954 ), Lust लिये Life ( 1956 ), Paths of Glory ( 1957 ), Gunfight at the O.K. Corral ( 1957 ), The Vikings ( 1958 ), Spartacus ( 1960 ), निर्जन Are the Brave ( 1962 ), Seven Days in May ( 1964 ), The Heroes of Telemark ( 1965 ) and Tough Guys ( 1986 ).
He is No.17 on the American Film Institute 's list of the महानतम male American screen legends of all time, making him the highest-ranked living person on the list.
In 1996, he प्राप्त the अकादमी Honorary Award `` for 50 सालो as a creative and moral फ़ोर्स in the motion picture community. ''
He is one of the last surviving actors from हॉलीवुड 's `` golden age ''.
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born May 6, 1945 ) is an American rock and roll singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist, he performed and recorded as Bob Seger and the Last Heard and Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s.
By the early 1970s, he had dropped the `` System '' from उसके recordings and जारी to strive for broader success with other various bands.
In 1973, he put together The Silver Bullet बैंड, a group of Detroit-area musicians, साथ whom he became सबसे successful on the नेशनल level with the album सजीव Bullet, recorded live साथ the Silver Bullet Band in 1975 at Cobo हॉल in Detroit, Michigan.
In 1976, he achieved a national breakout with the studio एल्बम Night चालें.
On his स्टुडियो albums, he also worked extensively with the Alabama-based Muscle Shoals Rhythm Section, जिससे appeared on अनेक of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums.
a roots rocker साथ a classic raspy, चिल्लाना voice, Seger wrote and recorded songs that dealt with love, women, blue-collar विषयवस्तु and was an exemplar of heartland rock.
Seger has recorded अनेक hits, including `` रात्रि Moves, '' `` फेरे the Page, '' `` We 've मिला Tonight, '' `` विरूद्ध the Wind, '' and Shakedown that was लिखा for Beverly Hills Cop ii और `` Like a Rock, '' and also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
His iconic recording of `` Old समय Rock and Roll `` was named one of the Songs of the Century in 2001.
साथ a करियर spanning five decades, seger continues to perform and record today.
Seger was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2004 और the Songwriters हॉल of Fame in 2012.
Richard milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th अध्यक्ष of the United States, serving from 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to इस्तीफा the office.
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from California and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in Yorba Linda, California.
He graduated इससे whittier College in 1934 और Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to California to अभ्यास law.
He and his wife, Pat Nixon, स्थानांतरित to Washington to work for the federal government in 1942.
He subsequently served in the संयुक्त States नेवी during World युद्ध II.
निक्सन was elected in California to the House of Representatives in 1946 and to the सीनेट in 1950.
His pursuit of the alger Hiss case established his reputation as a leading anti-communist, and elevated him to national prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican पार्टी presidential nominee in the 1952 election.
निक्सन served for eight years as vice अध्यक्ष.
he waged an unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय campaign in 1960, narrowly खोने to John F. Kennedy, and खोया a race for Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again for the presidency and was elected.
हालांकि Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam युद्ध, he subsequently ended U.S. भागीदारी in 1973.
निक्सन 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations, and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced policies that transferred power from Washington to the states.
among other things, he launched initiatives to fight cancer और illegal दवाएँ, imposed wage and price controls, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, और स्थापित the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning साथ Apollo 11, he scaled back manned space exploration.
he was re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's second पद देखी an Arab oil embargo, the इस्तीफा of his वाइस president, Spiro agnew, and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate कांड and other misconduct by members of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of उसके political support, और on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office.
After his resignation, he controversially received a pardon issued by his successor, Gerald Ford.
in retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring several books and undertaking many foreign trips, helped to rehabilitate his public चित्र.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, and died four days later at the age of 81.

The Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused bitter contention between President Grant and Sen. Sumner.
Brady 1869 ] ]
sen. Sumner, opposed to American imperialism in the Caribbean and fearful that annexation would सीसे to the conquest of the neighboring black republic of Haiti, became convinced that भ्रष्टाचार lay behind the treaty, and that men बंद to the president shared in the corruption.
as अध्यक्ष of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, Sen. sumner initially withheld his opinion on the treaty on January 18, 1870.
Sen. Sumner had महरूम leaked information from सहायक Secretary of राज्य, Bancroft Davis, that u.s. Naval ships were being प्रयुक्त to protect President Báez.
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted विरूद्ध annexation and at Sen. Sumner’s सुझाव और quite possibly to save the party from an ugly लड़ो or the अध्यक्ष from embarrassment, the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind बंद doors in कार्यपालिका session.
President Grant persisted और sent messages to Congress in एहसान of annexation on March 14, 1870, और May 31, 1870.
In closed session, Sen. Sumner spoke out विरूद्ध the treaty ; warnng that there would be difficulty with the foreign nationals, noting the chronic rebellion that took place on the island, and the risk that the independence of हैती, पहचाना by the United States in 1862, होता be lost.
Sumner stated that ग्रान्ट 's use of the u.S. Navy as a protectorate was a violation of International law और unconstitutional.
Finally, on June 30, 1870 the treaty was voted on by the Senate और failed to gain the required 2/3 majority for treaty passage.
the following day, President Grant, feeling betrayed by Sen. Sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley, Ambassador to Britain.
By autumn, Sumner 's personal hostility to the president was public knowledge, and he blamed the Secretary of State for failing to have resigned, बल्कि than let Grant have उसके रास्ता.
the two men, friends until तब, cooled into bitter enemies.
in December, 1870, still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo Domingo somehow, Sumner gave a fiercely नाजुक वाक accusing the president of usurpation and babcock of unethical conduct.
Already, President ग्रान्ट, supported by his Secretary of State Hamilton Fish, had initiated a अभियान to depose sumner from the chairmanship of the Senate विदेशी Relations Committee.
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '', in addition to having रोका Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt, Sumner had defeated Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of Office Act, अवरोधित Grant 's nomination of Alexander स्टीवर्ट to U.S. Secretary of Treasury, और been a constant harassing force pushing पुनर्निर्माण नीतियों faster than Grant had been willing to go.
Grant resented Sumner 's superiority of manner, as well.
Told once that Sumner did नहीं believe in the Bible, the president is supposed to have कहा that he was नहीं surprised : `` he किया n't write it. ''
As the rift between Grant and Sumner increased, Sumner’s health began to decline.
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4, 1871, Senators affiliated with President Grant, known as ‘’New Radicals’’ voted to oust sen. sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship.
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a form of applied ethics or professional ethics that examines ethical principles and moral or ethical problems कि arise in a business environment.
it applies to all aspects of business conduct and is प्रासंगिक to the conduct of individuals and entire संगठन.
Business ethics has both normative and descriptive आयाम.
As a कॉरपोरेट practice और a career specialization, the field is primarily normative.
Academics attempting to understand business behavior employ descriptive methods.
The range and quantity of business ethical issues reflects the बातचीत of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns.
Interest in business ethics accelerated dramatically during the 1980s और 1990s, both within major corporations and within academia.
For उदाहरण, आज most प्रमुख corporations promote उनके commitment to non-economic values under headings ऐसे as आचार codes and सोशल responsibility charters.
Adam Smith कहा, `` People of the same trade seldom मिलें together, भी for merriment and diversion, लकिन the वार्तालाप ends in a conspiracy against the public, or in कुछ contrivance to उठाएँ prices. ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point business behavior in कया they perceive to be beneficial directions.
Ethics implicitly regulates areas and details of behavior that lie beyond governmental control.
The emergence of large corporations साथ limited संबंध और sensitivity to the communities in जिससे they operate accelerated the विकास of formal ethics regimes.
A burn is a type of injury to flesh or skin caused by heat, electricity, रसायन, friction, or radiation.
Most burns affect only the superficial skin ( ज्ञात as superficial or first degree ) or extend into the deeper skin but do not involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second degree ).
Rarely सब layers of the skin or deeper tissues, such as muscle or अस्थि can be injured in which मामला the burn is either full thickness ( third degree ) or fourth degree.
The treatment required depends on the गंभीरता of the burn.
Superficial burns maybe managed with little more than simple पीड़ा killers while major burns may आवश्यकता prolonged treatment in specialized बर्न centers.
Cooling with tap water may aid pain and decrease damage however if exposure is prolonged it may result in कम body temperature.
Partial मोटाई burns may require cleaning साथ soap और water followed by dressings.
Blisters चाहिए typically be left unbroken.
Full thickness burns usually आवश्यकता surgical उपचार such as skin grafting and extensive burns प्रायः require large amount of intravenous fluids.
the most common complications of burns हैं related to infection.
While large burns can be fatal, आधुनिक treatments developed in the last 50 years have significantly improved the outcomes, विशेषकर in children and young वयस्कों.
Globally about 11 million people seek medical treatment and 300,000 people die from burns.
In the United States, of those admitted to a burn बीच, लगभग 4 % die from their injuries.
The long पद निष्कर्ष is primarily related to the size of burn and the age of the person effected.
The Atlantic समंदर, not including Arctic and Antarctic regions
इस video was taken by the crew of Expedition 29 on board the ISS.
The pass starts from just north-east of the Island of Newfoundland over the उत्तर Atlantic Ocean to central Africa, over South Sudan.
the Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the world 's oceanic divisions.
With a total area of about, it covers लगभग 20 प्रतिशत of the धरती 's surface and परिचय 29 percent of its water सतह area.
the पहला part of इसके name refers to Atlas of Greek mythology, making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas ''.
The oldest known mention of `` Atlantic '' is in The Histories of Herodotus around 450 BC ( hdt. 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa ( Greek : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : Sea of Atlas ).
The term Ethiopic Ocean, derived from Ethiopia, was applied to the southern Atlantic as late as the mid-19th century.
Before Europeans खोजा other oceans, the term `` ocean '' itself was synonymous साथ the waters beyond the Strait of Gibraltar that we now know as the अटलांटिक.
the early Greeks believed this ocean to be a gigantic river encircling the world.
the अटलांटिक Ocean occupies an elongated, S-shaped जलाशय extending longitudinally between Eurasia and Africa to the east, and the americas to the west.
As one component of the interconnected global ocean, it is कनेक्ट in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( which is sometimes considered a समुद्र of the Atlantic ), to the Pacific Ocean in the दक्षिणपश्चिम, the Indian Ocean in the southeast, and the Southern Ocean in the south.
( Other definitions describe the Atlantic as extending southward to अंटार्कटिक. )
the equator subdivides it into the उत्तर Atlantic समंदर and दक्षिण अटलांटिक Ocean.
Due to their long-term persistence, and the need for a अद्वितीय identifier in issuing forecasts and warnings, तीव्र cyclones and subtropical cyclones are given names according to policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ).
The following are lists from which these tropical and उपोष्ण cyclone names are निकला.
श्वेत light is dispersed by a प्रिज़्म into the colors of the optical spectrum.
The visible spectrum is the portion of the electromagnetic spectrum that is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human eye.
इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation in this range of wavelengths is पुकारा दृश्य light or simply light.
A typical human eye होगा respond to wavelengths from about 390 to 700 nm.
In शर्तें of frequency, this corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 THz.
A light-adapted eye generally रै its अधिकतम sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 thz ), in the ग्रीन region of the optical spectrum ( see : दीप्ति function ).
the वर्णक्रम करता not, however, contain all the colors that the human eyes और दिमाग can distinguish.
Unsaturated colors such as pink, or purple variations ऐसे as magenta, are absent, for example, because they can be बना तभी by a मिक्सर of multiple wavelengths.
Colors containing only one wavelength are also called pure रंगों.
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical खिड़की ``, the region of the electromagnetic spectrum which allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's माहौल.
an example of this phenomenon is that clean air scatters blue light more than red wavelengths, and so the midday sky appears blue.
The optical window is also पुकारा the visible window क्युकी it overlaps the human visible जवाब spectrum.
The निकट infrared ( NIR ) window lies just out of the इंसान vision, as well as the मीडियम Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) खिड़की and the long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them.
अनेक species can देखिए लाइट with frequencies outside the `` visible spectrum, '' which is defined in terms of इंसान vision.
Bees and many other insects can detect ultraviolet light, which helps them find nectar in flowers.
Plant species कि depend on insect pollination may owe reproductive success to their appearance in ultraviolet light, rather than how colorful वे appear to humans.
पक्षियों, too, can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ), and some have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range.
Many animals कि can see into the पराबैंगनी range, however, can not see red light or कोई other reddish wavelengths.
Bees ' visible वर्णक्रम ends at about 590nm, just before the orange wavelengths प्रारंभ.
Birds, however, can see some red wavelengths, but not as many as humans.
Zebras ( or ) are अनेक species of अफ़्रीकी equids ( घोड़ा family ) संयुक्त by their distinctive black and श्वेत stripes.
Their stripes come in different patterns, unique to प्रत्येक individual.
वे are generally social animals that सजीव in small harems to विशाल herds.
Unlike their closest relatives, horses and asses, zebras have never been truly domesticated.
There are three species of zebras : the मैदान zebra, the Grévy 's zebra and the पहाड़ zebra.
the मैदान zebra and the mountain zebra belong to the subgenus hippotigris, लकिन grévy 's zebra is the sole species of subgenus Dolichohippus.
The latter resembles an ass, to which it is closely related, while the former दो are more horse-like.
सब three belong to the genus Equus, along with other living equids.
The अद्वितीय stripes of zebras make उन्हें one of the animals most familiar to people.
They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, woodlands, thorny scrublands, mountains, and coastal hills.
However, various anthropogenic factors have had a severe प्रभाव on zebra populations, in particular hunting लिये skins और habitat destruction.
Grévy 's zebra और the पहाड़ zebra are endangered.
While plains zebras are much more plentiful, एक subspecies, the quagga, became extinct in the late 19th century – though there is currently a plan, called the Quagga Project, that aims to breed zebras that are phenotypically similar to the quagga in a प्रक्रम called प्रजनन back.
Barry श्वेत, born Barry Eugene Carter ( – ), was an American composer and singer-songwriter.
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive बास आवाज़ and romantic image, White 's greatest success came in the 1970s as a solo सिंगर and with the Love असीमित ऑर्केस्ट्रा, crafting many enduring soul, funk, and डिस्को गीतों such as his two biggest हिट्स, `` तुम 're the First, the Last, My Everything `` and `` ca n't Get Enough of Your Love, Babe. ''
Along with Isaac Hayes, White is considered by Allmusic.com as a pioneer of disco music in the early 1970s.
दौरान the course of his करियर in the music business, White achieved 106 सुनहरा albums विश्वव्यापी, 41 of which also attained platinum status.
White had 20 सुनहरा and 10 platinum singles, साथ worldwide sales in excess of 100 million, according to critics ed Hogan and वेड Kergan.
His influences included Rev. James क्लीवलैंड, रे Charles, Aretha Franklin प्लस motown artists The Supremes, The Four Tops and मारविन gaye.
Angelina Jolie (, born Angelina Jolie Voight ; June 4, 1975 ) is an American actress, film director, and screenwriter.
She has received an Academy Award, दो Screen Actors गिल्ड Awards, and three सुनहरी Globe Awards, और was named Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes in 2009 and 2011.
Jolie promotes humanitarian causes, and is noted for her work with refugees as a Special Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador for the United राष्ट्र High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ).
She has प्रायः महरूम cited as the world 's `` most beautiful '' woman, a title for which she has प्राप्त substantial मीडिया attention.
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside उसके father Jon Voight in lookin ' to Get Out ( 1982 ), लकिन उसके film career began in सच्चाई a decade बाद with the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ).
उसके first leading role in a major film was in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ).
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television films जार्ज Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 ), and won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama लड़की, बाधित ( 1999 ).
जोली achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video game heroine Lara Croft in Lara Croft : Tomb रेडर ( 2001 ), and established herself among the highest-paid actresses in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ).
She continued her action star career with Mr. & Mrs. Smith ( 2005 ) and Wanted ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated commercial successes to date—and received further critical acclaim for her performances in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and changeling ( 2008 ), जिससे earned her a नामांकन लिये an Academy पुरस्कार for Best Actress.
Jolie made her directorial debut with the wartime drama In the जमीन of Blood और Honey ( 2011 ).
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller and Billy Bob Thornton, Jolie अभी lives with actor Brad Pitt, in a relationship notable for fervent मीडिया attention.
Jolie and pitt have three biological children and three adopted children.
A natural arch produced by the erosion of differentially weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz, Jordan
Erosion is the process by which soil and rock हैं removed from the Earth 's surface by exogenetic processes such as हवा or जल प्रवाह, and then transported और deposited in other locations.
जबकि erosion is a natural प्रक्रम, human activities have increased by 10-40 times the rate at which erosion is occurring globally.
excessive erosion causes problems such as मरुस्थलीकरण, decreases in agricultural productivity due to land degradation, sedimentation of waterways, and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers.
Water और हवा erosion are now the two primary causes of land degradation ; combined, they are responsible for 84 % of degraded acreage, making excessive erosion one of the most significant global पर्यावरणीय problems.
Industrial agriculture, वनों, roads, anthropogenic climate change and शहरी sprawl हैं amongst the most significant human क्रियाएँ in regard to their effect on stimulating अपरदन.
However, there are अनेक available alternative land use practices that can curtail or सीमा erosion, such as terrace -building, no-till agriculture, and revegetation of denuded soils.
Jersey Shore is an American reality television series which भागा on MTV from December 3, 2009 to December 20, 2012 in the United States.
The series follows the lives of eight housemates बिता their गर्मियाँ at the जर्सी Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey.
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the ठंडा northeast शीत to Miami बीच, with Season 3 returning to the Jersey Shore.
the fourth ऋतु, filmed in इटली, premiered on August 4, 2011.
The show लौटे लिये a पांचवां season, at Seaside हाइट्स on January 5, 2012.
The fifth ऋतु finale aired on कूच 15, 2012.
on March 19, 2012, MTV पुष्टि that the series would वापसी for their sixth season.
On August 30, 2012, MTV announced that the series होगा end after the sixth season, which premiered on October 4.
The series finale aired on December 20, 2012.
the show debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words `` Guido / Guidette, '' portrayals of Italian-American stereotypes, और scrutiny from locals because the cast members were not निवासियों of the area.
The श्रेणी garnered record ratings for MTV, making it the संजाल 's most viewed series telecast ever.
The series ' cast have also been credited साथ introducing unique lexicon और वाक्यांश into American popular culture.
The University of Chicago और the University of Oklahoma are among the शैक्षणिक संस्थानों कि have had classes or conferences about the show.
In 2010, the cast of Jersey Shore was named on Barbara Walters ' 10 सबसे Fascinating People list, and the series has since been exported to dozens of countries worldwide.
There are several remakes of the show in other देशों, with two set in the संयुक्त Kingdom ; the well known Geordie shore, set in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.
The अन्य is the घाटियों, the Welsh equivalent, जिससे is फिल्माया and set in Cardiff.

United States territory is any extent of region under the jurisdiction of the संघीय सरकारी of the United States, including all waters ( around islands or continental tracts ) and all U.S. Naval vessels.
The संयुक्त States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign rights for exploring, exploiting, conserving, और मैनेजिंग its territory.
This extent of territory is all the area belonging to, और under the dominion of, the United राज्य federal government ( which includes tracts lying at a distance इससे the देश ) लिये administrative and other उद्देश्य.
The United राज्य कुल territory includes a उपसमुच्चय of political divisions.
The U.S. सरकारी is a government साथ प्रतिनिधित्व शक्तियां under the United States Constitution.
`` the powers not delegated to the संयुक्त राज्य by the Constitution, nor prohibited by it to the States, हैं reserved to the States respectively, or to the people '' by the दसवाँ Amendment.
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated as T3 ) is a 2003 science fiction कार्रवाई फिल्मी directed by Jonathan mostow and अभिनीत Arnold Schwarzenegger, उपनाम Stahl, Claire Danes and kristanna Loken.
It is the second sequel to The Terminator ( 1984 ).
After Skynet fails to kill सारा Connor before her बेटे is born और to kill John himself as a child, it sends back another Terminator, the t-x, in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as संभावित.
This includes John 's भविष्य wife, but not जॉन खुद as उसके whereabouts are unknown to Skynet.
John 's जीवन is placed in danger when the T-X accidentally finds उसे.
A cord of wood
The cord is a unit of माप of dry volume used in Canada and the United States to measure ईधन and pulpwood.
A cord is the राशि of wood कि, when `` ranked and well stowed '' ( arranged so pieces हैं aligned, parallel, touching and compact ), occupies a आवाज़ of.
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile high, long, and deep ; or any other arrangement of linear measurements that yields the same volume.
The name cord probably comes from the use of a cord or string to measure it.
The, is an 8-bit handheld वीडियो खेल device developed and manufactured by Nintendo.
It थी released in Japan on, in North अमेरिका in, and in Europe on.
It is the first हैंडहेल्ड console in the Game Boy लकीर, and was created by Gunpei Yokoi और Nintendo Research & Development 1 —the same staff who had designed the Game & Watch series as well as several popular games लिये the Nintendo Entertainment System.
redesigned संस्करण were released in 1996 and 1998, in the form of Game Boy Pocket, and Game Boy लाइट ( जापानी तभी ), respectively.
The खेल Boy is निन्टेंडो 's second handheld system following the Game & Watch श्रेणी introduced in, and it combined features इससे both the Nintendo Entertainment प्रणाली and Game & Watch.
It was originally bundled with the puzzle game टेट्रिस.
As part of the fourth generation of gaming, the खेल Boy competed with the Sega Game गियर, Atari Lynx, and the TurboExpress.
Despite ये other technologically श्रेष्ठ handheld consoles, the Game Boy was a tremendous कामयाबी.
The Game Boy and its successor, the Game Boy Color, have both combined बेची 118.69 million units worldwide.
upon its release in the United States, it sold its entire shipment of one million units within weeks.
The World Trade Center is a complex of buildings under construction in निम्नतर मैनहटन, New York City, संयुक्त States, replacing an earlier जटिल of seven buildings with the वही name on the same site.
The original World Trade बीच featured landmark जुड़वा towers, which खोली on April 4, 1973 और यहूद destroyed in the September 11 attacks of 2001, along with 7 संसार Trade Center.
The other buildings in the complex were damaged in the attacks, and their ruins were eventually demolished.
the site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers and a मेमोरियल to those killed in the attacks.
, only one skyscraper has been समाप्त ; the अन्य four are अपेक्षित to be समाप्त before 2020.
One World Trade बीच will be the lead building for the new complex, reaching more than 100 कहानियां at its completion.
It became the tallest भवन in नई York City on April 30, 2012, and is expected to be finished by 2013.
a sixth tower is awaiting confirmation.
At the time of their completion, the original 1 संसार Trade बीच ( the North मीनार ) and 2 World Trade Center ( the South Tower ), known collectively as the `` Twin Towers '', were the tallest buildings in the world.
The other buildings included 3 WTC ( the Marriott संसार Trade बीच ), 4 WTC, 5 WTC, 6 wtc, and 7 WTC.
All of these इमारतें were built between 1975 and 1985.
The cost for the निर्माण was $ 400 million ( $ in dollars ).
the complex was located in the heart of New York City 's downtown financial district and contained 13.4 million वर्गाकार feet ( 1.24 लाख m2 ) of office space.
The World Trade Center experienced a fire on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 and a डकैती on, 1998.
in 1998, the Port Authority decided to privatize the World व्यापार Center, leasing the buildings to a private company to manage, और awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in.
On the morning of सितंबर 11, 2001, Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers उड़ाया दो बोइंग 767 jets into the complex, one into each tower, in a समन्वित terrorist आक्रमण.
After burning लिये 56 minutes, the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour बाद by the North Tower ( 1 ), with the attacks on the World Trade Center resulting in 2,753 deaths.
गिरना मलबा from the towers, combined with फ़ायर that the debris initiated in several surrounding इमारतें, led to the partial or complete collapse of सब the other इमारतें in the जटिल and caused catastrophic damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area.
the प्रक्रम of क्लीनअप और recovery at the World व्यापार Center site took eight months.
Over the following years, योजनाएँ लिये a rebuilt World Trade Center took form.
The first new building at the साईट थी 7 World Trade Center, which opened in.
The Lower Manhattan Development Corporation ( LMDC ), स्थापित in to oversee the rebuilding process, व्यवस्थित competitions to चुनें a site plan and memorial design.
Memory Foundations, designed by Daniel Libeskind, थी selected as the master plan, but this went through substantial changes in डिज़ाइन.
the new World Trade Center complex will शामिल एक World Trade Center, तीन other high-rise office towers, and the नेशनल September 11 Memorial & Museum.
