The अनुप्रस्थ Ranges are a group of mountain सीमाएँ of southern California, in the प्रशांत Coast Ranges physiographic region in North America.
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया Coast Ranges और lie between Santa Barbara और San Diego counties.
They derive the name अनुप्रस्थ Ranges due to their East-West orientation, making them transverse to the general North-South orientation of most of California 's coastal mountains.
आवधिक table with इलेक्ट्रॉन shells
An electron शेल may be thought of as an orbit followed by electrons around an अणु 's nucleus.
The closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( भी called `` k shell '' ), followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or `` L शेल '' ), then the `` 3 शेल '' ( or `` M शेल '' ), and so on farther and farther from the nucleus.
The shell letters k, L, m,..., used in the X-ray notation, are alphabetical.
Each shell can contain only a फिक्स्ड number of electrons : The 1st शेल can थाम up to two electrons, the 2nd shell can थाम up to आठ electrons, the 3rd शेल can hold up to 18, और 4th शेल can hold up to 32 and so on.
Since electrons are electrically attracted to the केंद्रक, an atom 's electrons will generally occupy outer shells only if the more inner शेल have already been completely filled by other electrons.
However, इस is not a सख्त requirement : Atoms may have two or even three incomplete outer शेल.
( See Madelung rule for more विवरण. )
For an explanation of why electrons exist in these shells see electron विन्यास.
The electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or shells ) determine the chemical गुण of the atom ; it is called the valence shell.
Each shell consists of one or more subshells, and each subshell consists of one or more atomic orbitals.
Vickie Lynn Marshall ( née Hogan ; November 28, 1967 – February 8, 2007 ), known by her moniker Anna निकोल Smith, was an American model, अभिनेत्री, and television personality.
Smith first gained popularity in Playboy, becoming the 1993 Playmate of the Year.
She modeled for clothing कंपनियाँ, including Guess जीन्स and Lane Bryant.
Smith dropped out of high स्कूल and was married in 1985.
Her अत्यधिक publicized second marriage to oil business mogul, J. Howard Marshall, 62 years उसके senior, resulted in speculation that she married the octogenarian for उसके money, which she अस्वीकृत.
Following Marshall 's death, Smith began a lengthy विधिक battle over a share of his एस्टेट.
Her मामला, मार्शल v. Marshall, reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a सवाल of federal jurisdiction, and again on a question of bankruptcy court प्राधिकार ( अभी called Stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on February 8, 2007 in a Hollywood, Florida hotel रूम as a result of an overdose of नुस्खा दवाएँ.
Within the final छह months of her life, Smith was the focus of a नवीनीकृत press coverage surrounding the मौत of her son, Daniel, and the paternity and कस्टडी battle over her newborn daughter, Dannielynn.
The is one denomination of Japanese yen.
The वर्तमान design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese वर्ण known as the `` new स्क्रिप्ट ``, and were also minted from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters.
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( when, due to the much higher value of the येन, वे यहूद minted in सुनहरा ).
the front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing आउट of the जल, with `` five yen '' written in kanji ; the back is stamped with `` Japan '' and the year of issue, भी in kanji, separated by sprouts of a पेड़.
The three graphic तत्व of the सिक्का represent agriculture और fisheries, the कुंजी elements of the Japanese first-sector economy.
Around a hole, there is a gear that represents उद्योग.
It is the only Japanese coin in परिसंचरण to कमी Arabic numerals on either फेस.
tlc is an अमरीकी girl group whose रंगमंडल spanned r & B, hip hop, soul, funk, and new jack झूले.
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins, rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes and singer rozonda `` chilli '' Thomas, the समूह मिला unprecedented success in the 1990s while भी enduring a series of spats with the law, each अन्य, and the group 's record label.
Initially, TLC achieved commercial success following the release of their debut album ooooooohhh...
On the TLC Tip, which sold 6 million copies विश्वव्यापी.
However, it was their दूसरी album, crazysexycool, that catapulted the group to superstar status.
CrazySexyCool गई on to be certified diamond by the RIAA — a first for a female group, और eventually sold 23 million नक़ल worldwide.
Five years later, the group released their third एल्बम FanMail, which became the group 's first एल्बम to debut at number one और बेची more than 11 million नक़ल worldwide.
The subsequent tour following FanMails release became the highest grossing tour of all time by a female बैंड.
In 2002, Lisa `` बाएँ Eye '' Lopes died in a car accident in Honduras.
सात months later, T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's fourth album 3D, which sold 2 million copies worldwide, it featured unreleased vocals from Left Eye.
बिलबोर्ड magazine ranked tlc as one of the greatest musical trios.
Between 1992 and 2003, the band accumulated ten top ten singles, four number one singles, four multi-platinum एल्बम, and four Grammy Awards.
At the end of 1999, TLC थी क्रमित as the seventh most कामयाब act of the 1990s by Billboard.
In 2008, the group थी inducted into the All Time Hot 100 Artist Hall of Fame by the same magazine, at 56th place.
That साल it was also सूचीबद्ध as the # 25 R & b/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 years.
TLC has sold more than 65 million records worldwide and वे are ranked as the second बेहतरीन selling मादा group of all time, and the best selling female R & B group of all time.
In 2012, TLC ranked 12th on VH1 's 100 Greatest महिलाओं in Music, being ranked the number एक all girl group on that list.
Tarzan is a 1999 अमरीकी animated adventure film उत्पादित by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
the 37th फिल्मी in the Walt Disney Animated Classics, it is based on the story Tarzan of the Apes by Edgar Rice Burroughs, and is the only प्रमुख गति picture version of the story Tarzan property to be animated.
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima with a screenplay by tab मर्फी, Bob tzudiker, और Noni White, टार्ज़न features the voices of टोनी Goldwyn, Minnie Driver, ग्लेन Close, and Rosie O'Donnell with Brian Blessed, Lance Henriksen, Wayne Knight, and Nigel Hawthorne.
It was the last bona fide hit पहले the Disney slump of the जल्दी 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically और $ 448,191,819 worldwide, outgrossing its पूर्ववर्तियों Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ).
At the time of its release, इसके production budget of $ 130 million made it the सबसे expensive एनिमेटेड film ever made, until topped by डिज़्नी 's own $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002.
It was also the first Disney animated विशेषता to open at # 1 चूंकि pocahontas.
This थी the पिछला major बक्सा office success of the डिज़्नी Renaissance.
Oil Platform P-51 off the Brazilian coast is a semi-submersible platform.
Oil मंच mittelplate in the North sea
An oil platform, ( offshore platform or colloquially oil rig ) is a large structure with facilities to drill wells, to निकालें and प्रक्रम आयल और natural gas, and to temporarily स्टोर उत्पाद until it can be brought to shore लिये refining and marketing.
In many मामले, the platform contains facilities to house the workforce as well.
Depending on the circumstances, the platform may be फिक्स्ड to the ocean floor, may consist of an artificial island, or may float.
Remote subsea wells may also be connected to a platform by प्रवाह lines and by umbilical connections.
These subsea solutions may consist of एक or more subsea wells, or of one or more manifold centres for multiple कुएं.
Slaughter is the killing of animals, usually that of domestic livestock लिये food.
the animals most commonly slaughtered for food हैं cattle, जल भैंस ( for beef and veal ), sheep, बकरियों ( for मेमने and mutton ), pigs ( for पोर्क ), horses ( for horse मांस ), और fowl, largely chickens, turkeys, and ducks and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish खेती ).
the White House, the president 's official निवास and center of the administration
Under the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, the President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the highest political office in the United States by influence and मान्यता.
The president is also the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
the president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives चाहिए the Electoral College fail to award an absolute majority of मत to any person ).
Since the अनुसमर्थन of the Twenty-second Amendment to the संयुक्त States Constitution in 1951, no व्यक्ति may be elected President more than twice, and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, इस्तीफा, or removal इससे office of an लाज़िम President, the वाइस अध्यक्ष assumes the office.
The अध्यक्ष must be at least 35 years of age and a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the United States.
This list includes only those व्यक्तियों who were sworn into दफ्तर as president following the ratification of the United States Constitution, which took effect on March 4, 1789.
For American leaders before इस ratification, see President of the Continental Congress.
The list does not शामिल any Acting Presidents under the twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States संविधान.
There have महरूम 43 people sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as Grover क्लीवलैंड परोसा two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as president, चार died in office of natural causes ( William Henry हैरिसन, Zachary Taylor, Warren G. Harding, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. गारफ़ील्ड, William McKinley, और जॉन F. Kennedy ) and एक resigned ( रिचर्ड Nixon ).
George Washington, the पहला president, was inaugurated in 1789 after a unanimous vote of the Electoral College.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest समय in office with 32 दिनों in 1841, and Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years, but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than two terms, और a संवैधानिक amendment, affecting presidents after Harry Truman, was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be elected by मेन of all वर्ग in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
Warren Harding was the first elected after महिलाओं gained मतदान rights in 1920.
History रिकॉर्ड चार presidents – John Q एडम्स, Rutherford B. हेज़, Benjamin Harrison and George W. Bush – who lost the लोकप्रिय vote but assumed दफ्तर.
जॉन F. Kennedy रै been the तभी president of Roman Catholic faith, and the current president, बराक ओबामा, is the first president of African descent.

A suppressor, ध्वनि suppressor, or sound moderator, is a device संलग्न to or part of the barrel of a firearm which reduces the राशि of रव, and usually the amount of muzzle flash, generated by firing the weapon.
A suppressor can be used both with a firearm and with compressed air गन.
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, this पद is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the ध्वनि of a projectile, especially one moving faster than the speed of sound, through the air can not be eliminated.
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e. greater than 300 meters ) can lessen, or retard, the report at the पल of impact, and create the impression of silence near the निशाना.
the noise सुना near the muzzle as a projectile leaves the barrel, though subdued, is not silent at all.
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal mechanisms to reduce the sound of firing by slowing the escaping propellant gas and sometimes by reducing the गति of the bullet.
Early suppressors यहूद created around the beginning of the 20th century by several inventors.
अमरीकी inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens कहावत, Hiram पर्सी 's father, and the inventor of the Maxim Machine गन ), is credited with inventing and selling the first commercially कामयाब models circa 1902 ( patented 30 कूच 1909 ).
Maxim gave his device the trademarked name Maxim Silencer.
The मफलर लिये internal combustion engines was developed in parallel साथ the firearm suppressor by Maxim in the early 20th century, using many of the वही techniques to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries ऑटोमोबाइल mufflers हैं still called silencers ).
The शब्द silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in widespread उपयोग, although it has since गिरे out of favor with some, especially among the firearms उद्योग, being replaced with the more literally accurate term sound suppressor or just suppressor, because a `` sound suppressor '' does नहीं `` silence '' any weapon, rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the सोनिक pressure of a firearm discharging.
Common usage and U.S. विधान भाषा favor the historically earlier term, silencer.
In U.S. law, the terms `` firearm muffler '' and `` firearm silencer '' are synonymous.
Suppressors were regularly used by agents of the United राज्य दफ्तर of Strategic Services, who favored the newly designed High Standard HDM.22 Long Rifle pistol during World War ii.
OSS Director William Joseph `` Wild Bill '' Donovan demonstrated the pistol for President Franklin D. Roosevelt at the श्वेत House.
According to oss research chief Stanley Lovell, Donovan ( an old और trusted friend of the अध्यक्ष ) was waved into the Oval Office, जहाँ Roosevelt was dictating a letter.
While Roosevelt finished उसके message, Donovan turned his back और fired ten shots into a sandbag he had brought with उसे, announced what he had किया and handed the smoking गन to the astonished president.
The British SOE ( Special Operations कार्यपालिका ) welrod assassination पिस्टल with an integral suppressor was भी used by the American oss on clandestine परिचालन in नाजी occupied Europe दौरान the Second संसार War.
beatrice `` Bea '' आर्थर ( May 13, 1922 – April 25, 2009 ) थी an American actress, comedienne, and singer whose career spanned seven decades.
Arthur achieved fame as the अक्षर Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms All in the Family और Maude, and as Dorothy Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The सुनहरी लड़कियों, winning Emmy Awards लिये both roles.
A stage actress both before and बाद her television success, she won the Tony Award for Best Featured Actress in a Musical for उसके performance as वीरा चार्ल्स in the original cast of Mame ( 1966 ).

For a discussion of nonprofit, voluntary neighborhood advocacy groups, see neighborhood association.
In the United States, a homeowner association is a निगम formed by a रियल estate developer for the purpose of विपणन, managing, and selling of घरों and lots in a residential subdivision.
it अनुदान the developer privileged मतदान अधिकारों in governing the संघ, while allowing the developer to निकास financial and legal responsibility of the organization, typically by transferring स्वामित्व of the association to the homeowners बाद selling off a predetermined number of lots.
Membership in the homeowners association by a residential buyer is typically a condition of purchase ; a buyer is n't given an option to reject it.
सबसे homeowner एसोसिएशन are incorporated, and are subject to state statutes that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations.
State oversight of homeowner associations is minimal, and mainly takes the form of laws जिससे are inconsistent from state to state.
Some states, ऐसे as फ्लोरिडा and California, have a large body of homeowner association law, and some states, such as Massachusetts, have virtually no homeowner association law.
The fastest growing रूप of housing in the United राज्य today is common-interest developments ( CIDs ), a category that includes planned-unit developments of single-family homes, condominiums, and cooperative apartments.
Since 1964, homeowner associations have become increasingly common in the USA.
The Community Associations Institute trade association estimated that HOAs governed 24.8 million American homes और 62 million residents in 2010.
A prize-winning lilac-and-white Silkie
वहीँ are अनेक breeds of Guinea pig which have महरूम विकसित since इसके domestication ca. 5000 BC.
Breeds vary widely in रूप and purpose, ranging from show breeds with long, बहती hair to those in use as model organisms by science.
इससे ca. 1200 ad to the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532, चयनात्मक प्रजनन by indigenous South American peoples resulted in many varieties of घरेलू Guinea pigs, which form the basis for some of the आधुनिक domestic breeds.
Early andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural stock for food, and efforts at improving the Guinea सुअर as a food source continue to the modern era.
With the export of गिनी pigs to Europe in the 15th century, the लक्ष्य in breeding shifted to focus on the विकास of appealing pets.
To this समाप्त, various competitive breeding organizations were संस्थापित by fanciers.
The American Cavy Breeders Association, an adjunct to the American Rabbit Breeders Association, is the governing body in the United States and Canada.
The British Cavy Council governs cavy clubs in the United Kingdom.
Similar organizations exist in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( Australian नेशनल Cavy Council ) और नई Zealand ( New Zealand cavy Club ).
Each club publishes its own Standard of पूर्णता और determines which breeds are योग्य for showing.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st century.
Though there are many breeds of गिनी सुअर, only a few breeds are commonly found on the show table as pets.
सबसे Guinea pigs found as pets यहूद either found undesirable by breeders or यहूद bred to be pleasant पालतु regardless of how well they meet the breed standard of perfection.
the short hair, Abyssinian, Peruvian और Sheltie ( aka Silkie ) breeds हैं those सबसे frequently seen as pets, and the former three are the कोर breeds in the history of the competitive showing of गिनी pigs.
In जोड to their standard form, nearly all breeds come in a Satin variant.
Satins, due to their hollow hair shafts, possess coats of a special gloss और shine.
However, there is growing evidence कि the genes responsible for the Satin coat also can cause severe bone problems, including Osteodystrophy and पेजेट 's disease.
Showing साटन variations is prohibited by some cavy breeders ' एसोसिएशन because of एनिमल welfare reasons.
सब cavy breeds have some shared general standards : the head profile should be rounded, साथ large eyes and large, smooth कानों.
The देह should be strong and of compact निर्माण.
Coat colour चाहिए in all variations be clearly defined and thorough from root to tip.
These मानकों are best met by long established, commonly bred breeds, as their breeders have had enough time and animals to effectively नस्ल लिये these qualities.
The coat रंग आदर्श of good definition and thoroughness is rarely met by other than the चिकना coated breeds, जिससे have had खूब established, separate breeding lines for अलग colours.
राज्य schools ( also known as public स्कूलों or government schools ) generally refer to primary or secondary schools mandated for or offered to all children without charge paid for, in whole or in part, by taxation.
The term may also refer to institutions of post-secondary education funded, in whole or in part, और overseen by government.
The ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules whose अनुक्रम is controlled by the अनुक्रम of messenger RNA molecules.
इस is required by all living कोशिकाएं और associated वाइरस.
the राइबोसोम ( from ribonucleic acid and the Greek soma, meaning `` देह '' ) is a large and complex molecular machine, found within all living cells, that serves as the प्राथमिक साईट of biological प्रोटीन synthesis ( अनुवाद ).
Ribosomes link amino acids साथ in the order specified by messenger rna ( mRNA ) अणुओं.
ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the small ribosomal subunit reads the mRNA, जबकि the large subunit joins amino acids to form a polypeptide कड़ी.
Each subunit is composed of एक or more ribosomal RNA ( rrna ) molecules and a variety of proteins.
The sequence of DNA encoding for a protein may be copied many टाइम्स into messenger RNA ( mRNA ) chains of a similar sequence.
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA chain and उपयोग it as a template for determining the correct sequence of amino acids in a particular protein.
Amino acids are चयनित, collected and carried to the ribosome by ट्रांसफ़र RNA ( tRNA molecules ), which डालें एक भाग of the राइबोसोम and bind to the मेसेंजर RNA chain.
The attached अमीनो acids are then linked together by another part of the ribosome.
Once the protein is produced, it can तब 'fold ' to produce a specific functional three-dimensional ढांचा.
A ribosome is made इससे complexes of RNAs and proteins and is therefore a ribonucleoprotein.
Each ribosome is विभाजित into two subunits : the छोटी subunit binds to the mRNA pattern, while the larger subunit binds to the tRNA और the amino acids.
When a ribosome finishes reading an mRNA molecule, these दो subunits split apart.
Ribosomes हैं ribozymes, because the catalytic peptidyl transferase activity that links amino acids साथ is performed by the ribosomal rna.
Ribosomes from bacteria, archaea and eukaryotes ( the तीन domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size, sequence, structure, और the ratio of protein to rna.
The differences in structure allow some antibiotics to मार जीवाणु by inhibiting their ribosomes, while leaving human ribosomes unaffected.
In bacteria and archaea, more than एक राइबोसोम may move साथ a single mRNA chain at one time, each `` reading '' its sequence और producing a corresponding protein molecule.
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally resemble many सुविधाएँ of those in bacteria, reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria.
Albert Claude, Christian de duve, and George Emil Palade यहूद jointly awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or आयुर्विज्ञान, in 1974, for the discovery of the ribosomes.
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009 was awarded to venkatraman रामकृष्णन, थामस A. Steitz and Ada E. Yonath for determining the विस्तृत structure and mechanism of the ribosome.
The simplified internal structure of a chloroplast
अवलोकन of the Calvin cycle and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are रासायनिक reactions that convert carbon dioxide और अन्य compounds into glucose.
These प्रतिक्रियाएँ occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast बाहर of the thylakoid झिल्लियों.
ये reactions take the light-dependent reactions and perform further chemical processes on उन्हें.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the calvin cycle : कार्बन fixation, कटौती प्रतिक्रियाएँ, और ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, this process occurs only when light is available.
Plants do not carry out the Calvin cycle by रात्रि.
वे, instead, release sucrose into the phloem from their starch reserves.
This प्रक्रम happens when लाइट is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation, C4 carbon fixation, and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM पौधे store malic acid in their vacuoles प्रत्येक night and रिलीज it by day in order to make this process work.
In गणित, a square क्रमांक or perfect square is an integer कि is the square of an integer ; in other words, it is the product of कुछ integer with itself.
For example, 9 is a square number, since it can be written as.
The usual notation for the formula for the square of a number is not the product, but the समतुल्य exponentiation, usually pronounced as `` squared ''.
The नाम square number comes from the name of the shape ; देखिए below.
वर्गाकार numbers are non-negative.
Another way of saying that a ( non-negative ) number is a square number, is that its square जड़ें are again integers.
लिये example, = ±3, so 9 is a square number.
A positive integer that रै no perfect square divisors मगर 1 is पुकारा square-free.
For a non-negative integer, the th square number is, साथ being the zeroth square.
the अवधारणा of square can be extended to some other क्रमांक systems.
If rational numbers are included, then a square is the अनुपात of two square integers, and, conversely, the अनुपात of two square integers is a वर्गाकार ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
starting साथ 1, वहीँ are square numbers up to और सहित, where the अभिव्यक्ति represents the मंजिल of the number.
The era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political history of the United States that reflected a sense of नेशनल purpose and a desire for unity among Americans in the aftermath of the napoleonic Wars.
the era saw the collapse of the Federalist Party और an end to the bitter partisan disputes between it and the dominant Democratic-Republican party during the First Party System.
President जेम्स Monroe endeavored to downplay partisan affiliation in making his nominations, with the ultimate goal of national unity and eliminating parties altogether from national politics.
The period is so closely संबद्ध with Monroe 's presidency ( 1817–1825 ) and his administrative goals that his name and the era are virtually synonymous.
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in American राजनीती with the end of the Federalist Party as America began to develop after the युद्ध of 1812.
While अमेरिका was experiencing growth और prosperity बाद the war with Britain, this era also marks the first instance of economic परेशानियों in the growing United States.
Mirroring the American System प्रस्तावित by हेनरी Clay, protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second बैंको of the United States complicated the tension between the North and South with the coming of the first financial crisis.
While the पद “Era of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with irony because of the political turmoil, economic factors caused animosity between the North and दक्षिण.
the नामांकन of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism, as the history of the era was one in जिससे the राजनैतिक माहौल was strained and divisive, especially among factions भीतर the Monroe administration and the Republican Party.
The phrase “Era of शुभ Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell, in the Boston Federalist newspaper, Columbian centinel, on जुलाई 12, 1817, following Monroe 's visit to Boston, Massachusetts as part of his good will tour of America.
Mariel मार्गरेट `` मिया '' hamm ( born कूच 17, 1972 ) is a retired American professional सॉकर player.
Hamm played अनेक years as a forward for the United States women 's national सॉकर team और was a founding member of the Washington Freedom.
Hamm scored 158 international goals, more than any other player, male or female, in the इतिहास of soccer and is the तीसरा most capped मादा player in soccer history behind kristine लिली and Christie Rampone, appearing in 275 international मिलान.
Hamm was नामित the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the first दो टाइम्स that award थी given ( in 2001 and 2002 ), and is listed as one of FIFA 's 125 best जीना players ( as chosen by Pelé ).
She was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame as well as the Alabama Sports Hall of Fame and टेक्सास Sports Hall of Fame.
She is the author of go For the Goal : A चैंपियन 's Guide to Winning in सॉकर and Life and appeared in the HBO वृत्तचित्र Dare to Dream : The Story of the U.S. Women 's Soccer Team.
Washington Post columnist माइकल wilbon called Hamm, `` Perhaps the most महत्वपूर्ण athlete of the last 15 years. ''

The New York Red Bulls is an अमरीकी professional soccer team based in Harrison, New Jersey, representing the New York metropolitan area.
The टोली competes in the Eastern सम्मेलन of Major League Soccer ( MLS ).
it is एक of the टेन charter clubs of MLS, having competed in the league since its inception.
The team was a founding सदस्य of MLS ( 1996 ), but has gone through several name changes.
The team was originally ज्ञात as the New York/New Jersey MetroStars through 1997.
From the 1998 season through the 2005 season, the team was known as the MetroStars.
on कूच 9, 2006, the टोली was sold to रेड Bull GmbH, leading to the team 's current name.
वे are the only original mls franchise not to have won any significant ट्रॉफी ( including नियमित season, playoffs, and नॉकआउट competition ) चूंकि inception.
the team 's best result in the mls was the MLS Cup final in 2008.
In the US खोलें Cup, the MetroStars पहुँचे three semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), before reaching their पहला final in 2003, losing 1–0 to the शिकागो Fire.
On August 26, 2000, the Metros ' Clint Mathis नियत an mls रिकार्ड by scoring five goals in a खेल against the Dallas Burn.
Some well-known खिलाड़ी that have played for the team include Giovanni savarese, Tim Howard, Tony Meola, Tab Ramos, Alexi Lalas, Clint Mathis, Jozy altidore, माइकल Bradley, Claudio Reyna, Eddie Pope, Roberto donadoni, Lothar Matthäus, Adolfo Valencia, youri Djorkaeff, amado Guevara, Juan Pablo Ángel, Thierry Henry, Juninho pernambucano, Jan Gunnar solli, Rafael Márquez, and Tim Cahill.

confucianism, Taoism, and Buddhism are one, a पेंटिंग in the litang style portraying three men laughing by a नदी stream, 12th century, Song Dynasty.
estimating the क्रमांक of Buddhists in the संसार, or in अनेक countries, is मुश्किल due to definitional issues as खूब as व्यावहारिक problems of enumeration.
To begin with, the धार्मिक beliefs, practices, and identities of East Asians ( who comprise the majority of the संसार 's Buddhists by any measure ) often blend Buddhism with other traditions including Confucianism, the Chinese folk religion, daoism, Shinto, और Korean shamanism.
सबसे followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations, or observe a definite ritual of adherence such as taking Refuge, making it difficult to accurately estimate the number of practitioners.
An additional challenge is the hostility of अनेक national governments ( often Communist ones such as China or North Korea ) to religion generally or to Buddhism specifically.
Government policies in these countries may encourage the under-reporting or non-reporting of religious adherence, resulting in official totals that may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries.
Estimate of the विश्वव्यापी Buddhist population range from 350 million to over one अरब, but cluster nearer to the first figure.
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a figure of 397 million.
By major branches, the numbers are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism, including ईस्ट Asian Buddhism, with no fewer than 185 लाख adherents, and संभवतः several टाइम्स that many ( again, depending on definitional issues ).
इस is the predominant रूप of Buddhism practiced in China, South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, and Vietnam.
( 2 ) Theravada Buddhism, with no fewer than 125 million adherents.
This is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in कंबोडिया, Thailand, Laos, Sri Lanka, and Burma.
( 3 ) Vajrayana Buddhism, with लगभग 20 million adherents.
This रूप predominates in the वृहद Tibetan and Mongolian regions, as well as in the Himalayas.
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia और Bhutan, and various territories within what is अभी western China, Vajrayana is traditional to certain regions of Russia ( e.g. Kalmykia, बुर्यातिया ), India ( e.g. Ladakh, Sikkim ), and Nepal ( e.g. Khumbu ).
Vajrayana, also known as Tibetan buddhism, is often conflated with तांत्रिक Buddhism, but this is imprecise, as Shingon and other forms of East Asian Buddhism also practice तन्त्र.
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, बर्मा, Bhutan, और Mongolia ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities.
Depending on how one calculates चाइनीज and other East Asian adherents, this figure might expand to include several more countries.
In addition, Buddhism is the राज्य धर्म of कंबोडिया and Bhutan, and receives prominent mention in the constitutions of Thailand and श्री Lanka.
in northern India and नेपाल, the जमीन जहाँ Buddhism was born, the धर्म severely declined during the first millennium.
whether इस decline was due to the इस्लामी conquest of northern India, or to other कारकों, remains विवादास्पद.
See the आलेख मनाही of Buddhism in India.
जेम्स Butler hickok ( May 27, 1837 – अगस्त 2, 1876 ), better known as Wild Bill Hickok, थी a लोक hero of the American Old West.
His skills as a gunfighter और scout, along with उसके reputation as a lawman, provided the basis लिये his fame, although some of his reported कारनामे हैं fictionalized.
Born and उठाया on a farm in rural इलिनोइस, Hickok went वेस्ट at age 18 as a fugitive इससे justice, first working as a stagecoach driver, before he became a lawman in the frontier territories of कान्सास और Nebraska.
He fought लिये the Union Army during the American Civil War, and gained publicity बाद the war as a स्काउट, marksman, actor, and professional जुआरी.
Between his law-enforcement duties and जुए, which easily overlapped, Hickok थी involved in several notable shootouts.
He थी shot and killed जबकि playing पोकर in the Nuttal & Mann 's सैलून in deadwood, Dakota Territory ( अभी दक्षिण डकोटा ).
Artist 's conception of the Curiosity rover vaporizing rock on Mars.
the rover landed on मंगल in अगस्त 2012.
A Mars rover is an स्वचालित motor vehicle which propels itself across the surface of the planet Mars after landing.
रोवर्स have several advantages over stationary landers : they examine more territory, they can be directed to interesting features, वे can place themselves in sunny positions to weather winter months and they can advance the knowledge of how to perform very रिमोट रोबोटिक vehicle control.
There have been four कामयाब robotically operated Mars rovers.
The Jet Propulsion Laboratory managed the Mars Pathfinder मिशन and its now inactive Sojourner rover.
It currently manages the Mars खोजी Rover मिशन 's active Opportunity रोवर and निष्क्रिय Spirit, and, as part of the मंगल Science Laboratory mission, the Curiosity रोवर.
A financial audit, or more accurately, an audit of financial statements, is the सत्यापन of the वित्तीय statements of a legal entity, with a दृश्य to express an audit राय.
the ऑडिट राय is intended to provide reasonable assurance, but not absolute परख, कि the financial statements are प्रस्तुत fairly, in all material respects, and/or दे a true and fair view in accordance साथ the financial reporting फ्रेमवर्क.
The purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent examination of the financial statements, which increases the मान and विश्वसनीयता of the financial statements produced by management, thus बढ़ाएँ user confidence in the financial statement, reduce निवेशकों risk and नतीजतन reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the financial statements.
वित्तीय audits हैं typically performed by firms of practicing accountants who are experts in वित्तीय reporting.
The वित्तीय audit is one of many assurance functions provided by accounting firms.
Many organizations separately employ or hire internal auditors, who do नहीं attest to वित्तीय reports but focus mainly on the internal नियंत्रण of the organization.
External auditors may choose to place limited reliance on the work of internal auditors.
Auditing promotes transparency और accuracy in the financial disclosures बना by an organization, therefore would likely to reduce of such corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings.
Internationally, the International मानकों on auditing ( ISA ) issued by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय auditing and Assurance Standards फलक ( iaasb ) is considered as the benchmark लिये audit process.
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors to follow the ISA or a local variation of the isa.
Dollar coins have been minted in the United States in gold, चांदी, and base metal संस्करण.
The term silver dollar is प्रायः used for any विशाल white metal coin issued by the United States with a face value of one dollar, although purists जिद that a डालर is not silver unless it contains some of that मेटल.
Silver dollars, the first dollar सिक्का issue, यहूद minted beginning in 1794.
Gold dollars and gold-colored dollars have भी महरूम produced by the United राज्य.
The sacagawea and Presidential dollars are often referred to as `` सुनहरी dollars ''.
In modern times, dollar coins have not been very popular in the United राज्य.
Despite efforts by the सरकारी to promote उनके use, सबसे अमेरिकी currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins.
In straight and level flight lift ( L ) equals weight ( W ).
in a banked turn of 60°, lift equals double the वज़न ( L=2W ).
the pilot experiences 2g और a doubled weight.
The steeper the bank, the greater the g-forces.
This top-fuel dragster can accelerate from zero to in 0.86 seconds.
This is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. Combined with the vertical g-force in the stationary case the Pythagorean theorem yields a g force of 5.4 g.
g-force ( with g from गुरुत्वाकर्षक ) is a term लिये accelerations felt as weight and measurable by accelerometers.
It is not a force, per se, but a force per unit mass.
Since such a force is perceived as a weight, any g-force can be described as a `` वज़न per ईकाई mass '' ( देखिए the पर्याय specific वज़न ).
The g-force acceleration acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an object 's mass, and ( save for certain electromagnetic force influences ) is the cause of an object 's acceleration in relation to free-fall.
This acceleration अनुभवी by an object is due to the vector sum of non-gravitational forces एक्टिंग on an object free to move.
The accelerations that are not produced by gravity are termed proper accelerations, and it is only these that are measured in g-force units.
They कारण stresses and strains on objects.
Because of these strains, large g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a g-force, even though g-forces हैं expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a मानक gravity.
Thus, the standard gravitational acceleration at the Earth 's surface produces g-force तभी indirectly, as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces.
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's surface is caused by mechanical force exerted in the upward direction by the ground, keeping the object from going into free-fall.
The upward force इससे the मैदान ensures कि an object at rest on the Earth 's surface is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition, which is the path that the object would follow when गिरना freely toward the Earth 's center.
Objects allowed to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only, feel no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' शर्तें inside a freely falling elevator गिरना toward the Earth 's center ( in वैक्यूम ), or ( to good approximation ) conditions inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit.
ये are उदाहरण of coordinate त्वरण ( a change in velocity ) without a सनसनी of weight.
the experience of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is उत्पादित, is synonymous with weightlessness.
in the absence of gravitational fields, or in दिशानिर्देश at सही angles to them, proper and coordinate accelerations are the same, and any coordinate acceleration must be उत्पादित by a सम्बन्धित g-force acceleration.
An example here is a rocket in फ़्री space, in which simple changes in velocity are उत्पादित by the engines, and उपज g-forces on the rocket and passengers.
An augur holding a lituus, the curved wand often used as a symbol of augury on रोमन coins
The augur was a priest and official in the classical संसार, especially ancient Rome and Etruria.
His main role was to interpret the will of the देवताओं by studying the flight of birds : whether वे are flying in groups or alone, what noises they make as they fly, direction of flight and what दयालु of birds they हैं.
This was known as `` taking the auspices. ''
the रस्म और function of the augur was सेंट्रल to any प्रमुख undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters of war, कॉमर्स, और धर्म.
The Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` Who does not know that this city थी founded only after लेने the auspices, that everything in war and in peace, at home और abroad, was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington Hills is an affluent community in southeastern Michigan.
It is the second largest city in Oakland County in the U.S. state of Michigan.
Its population was 79,740 at the 2010 census.
It is भाग of the upscale northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan डेट्रॉयट and is also northeast of downtown Ann arbor.
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest cities in the United States, as well as in the state of Michigan.
In 2010, the क्षेत्रफल ranked as the 30th safest city in America.
हालांकि the दो cities have separate services and पता, Farmington and Farmington Hills are often thought of as the same जातियाँ.
सुविधाएँ of the community include a recently संवर शहर, boutiques, a vintage cinema, numerous restaurants, exotic car dealerships, art गैलरी, और पब्लिक पार्क including Heritage Park.
There are अनेक historical sites including the Longacre House and the राज्यपाल Warner Mansion.
दोनो cities are served by Farmington Public Schools.
Farmington Hills serves as a major business center लिये the वृहद Detroit area.
Present-day impression of a लेट Bronze Age seal
कस्बा seal ( मेट्रिक्स ) of Náchod इससे 1570
A मुहर is a device लिये बनाना an impression in मोम, मिट्टी, paper, or कुछ other medium, including an embossment on paper, और is भी the impression thus made.
the original purpose was to authenticate a दस्तावेज़, a wrapper for one such as a modern envelope, or the cover of a container or पैकेज holding valuables or अन्य objects.
the sealing process is essentially that of a mould, with the फाइनल image represented on the device for making the impression by a mirror-image design, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making यंत्र is also referred to as the seal मेट्रिक्स or die ; the imprint it creates as the seal impression ( or, more rarely, the sealing ).
If the impression is made purely as a relief resulting from the greater pressure on the paper where the ऊँची भाग of the matrix टच, the seal is known as a dry seal ; in all other cases a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used, usually in another रंग than the paper.
For legal purposes, the परिभाषा of a seal may be extended to शामिल rubber stamps, or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S. `` ).
In the United States, the word `` मुहर '' is sometimes आबंटित to a facsimile of the seal design ( in monochrome or color ), which may be प्रयुक्त in a variety of contexts including architectural जमावट, on ध्वज, or on आधिकारिक letterheads.
Thus, for example, the Great Seal of the United States, among other uses, appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; and several of the seals of the U.S. राज्य appear on their respective state flags.
In Europe, although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as खूब as on seals, the मुहर design in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
The study of seals is known as sigillography or sphragistics.
Groundhog Day ( Pennsylvania German : grundsaudaag, Murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2.
according to folklore, if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges इससे its burrow on this day, then spring will come early ; if it is sunny, the groundhog will supposedly see its shadow and retreat back into its burrow, and the शीत मौसम will continue for छह more weeks.
आधुनिक कस्टम of the holiday involve celebrations जहाँ early morning festivals are held to watch the groundhog emerging from its burrow.
In southeastern Pennsylvania, Groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the holiday with fersommlinge, social events in which food is served, speeches are made, and एक or अधिक g'spiel ( plays or skits ) हैं performed for entertainment.
the Pennsylvania जर्मनी dialect is the only भाषा spoken at the event, और those who speak अंग्रेज़ी pay a penalty, usually in the रूप of a nickel, dime, or quarter प्रति word बोला, साथ the money put into a bowl in the center of the तालिका.
the largest groundhog Day जश्न is held in Punxsutawney, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
Groundhog Day, already a widely recognized and popular tradition, received widespread ध्यान as a result of the 1993 film Groundhog Day, जिससे was set in Punxsutawney, PA ( though filmed primarily in Woodstock, il ) and portrayed punxsutawney Phil.
High resolution image of Tampa Bay प्रदेश
The Tampa Bay area has a आर्द्र subtropical climate ( Koppen cfa ), with warm and humid summers with frequent thunderstorms and drier सर्दियों with freezing temperatures occurring every 2–3 years.
The area experiences a significant summer wet season, as nearly two-thirds of the annual precipitation falls in the महीने of June through September.
The क्षेत्रफल is सूचीबद्ध by the United States Department of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) as होने in hardiness zone 10, which is about the northern limit of where नारियल palms और royal palms can be grown.
Highs usually range between 65 and 95 °f ( 18 and 35 °C ) year round.
Though ज्ञात for hot summers, Tampa 's official high has never reached 100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the नगर 's all-time record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ).
St. Petersburg 's all-time record high is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °c ).
Pinellas काउंटी lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico, and much of the city of Tampa lies on a smaller peninsula jutting आउट into Tampa Bay.
इस proximity to large लाशें of water both moderates temperatures and introduces विशाल amounts of आर्द्रता into the atmosphere.
in general, the local communities farthest इससे the coast have larger तापमान ranges, both दौरान a सिंगल day and throughout the seasons of the साल.
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum, showing various properties across the range of frequencies और wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all possible बारंबारता of electromagnetic radiation.
The `` इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम '' of an object रै a different meaning, and is बजाय the characteristic वितरण of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from नीचे the low बारंबारता प्रयुक्त for modern radio संचार to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths from हज़ारों of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an अणु.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is विचार that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length, हालांकि in principle the spectrum is infinite और निरन्तर.
Most भाग of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum are used in science लिये spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as ways to study और characterize matter.
in जोड, radiation इससे विभिन्न भाग of the spectrum रै found many other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ).
लेजेंड
Franklin delano रूज़वेल्ट ( or ; January 30, 1882 – अप्रैल 12, 1945 ), also known by his initials, FDR, was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central फिगर in world events during the mid-20th सदी, leading the United States दौरान a time of विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक depression and total war.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms, he built a New सौदे Coalition कि realigned अमरीकी politics बाद 1932, as his domestic policies defined अमरीकी liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century.
साथ the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme, FDR defeated incumbent Republican हर्बर्ट Hoover in नवम्बर 1932, at the गहराई of the ग्रेट Depression.
Energized by his personal victory over पोलियो, FDR 's unfailing आशावाद and सक्रियता contributed to a renewal of the national spirit.
He worked closely with British Prime मंत्री Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the allies विरूद्ध Germany and Japan in World War II, और restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation और issued a profusion of executive आदेश that instituted the नई सौदे —a किस्में of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ), रिकवरी ( economic growth ), and सुधार ( through विनियमन of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, लकिन then relapsed into a deep recession.
the bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his पैकिंग the Supreme अदालत or passing any considerable legislation ; it abolished many of the relief कार्यक्रम when unemployment diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on कारोबार were ended about 1975–85, except for the regulation of वॉल Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission, which still exists.
Along with several smaller programs, major surviving programs include the संघीय Deposit Insurance Corporation, which was created in 1933, and Social Security, which Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the Japanese invasion of China और the aggression of Nazi Germany, fdr gave strong diplomatic and financial support to China and Great ब्रिटेन, while remaining officially neutral.
His लक्ष्य was to मेक अमेरिका the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` which होता सप्लाई munitions to the allies.
in March 1941, Roosevelt, साथ Congressional approval, provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany साथ ब्रिटेन.
With बहुत strong नेशनल support, he बना युद्ध on Japan और Germany after the Japanese attack on पर्ल हार्बर on December 7, 1941, calling it a `` date which will live in infamy ``.
he supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied युद्ध प्रयत्न.
As an active सैन्य leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts that ended in the defeat of the Axis शक्तियां and the development of the world 's first अणु bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 जापानी American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new हाइट्स as millions of लोगों moved to new jobs in युद्ध centers, and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered लिये military service.
Roosevelt वर्चस्व the American political scene not तभी during the बारह सालो of उसके presidency, but भी for दशकों afterward.
he orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System.
FDR 's New सौदे Coalition united labor संघ, big city मशीने, श्वेत ethnics, African अमेरिकी and ग्रामीण white Southerners.
He भी influenced the later creation of the United Nations and Bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently रेटेड by scholars as one of the top तीन U.S. Presidents, along with अब्राहम Lincoln and George वॉशिंगटन.
A liberal Democrat, रूज़वेल्ट पारिभाषित his ideological position as `` a छोटी left of center. ''
A Joint Committee is a पद in politics that is प्रयुक्त to refer to a कमेटी made up of सदस्यों of both chambers of a bicameral legislature.
In other contexts, it refers to a committee साथ members from more than एक organization.
the regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated शक्तियां of the federal सरकारी ; अंतर्गत the दसवाँ amendment to the United States Constitution, it is therefore exclusively the डोमेन of the states to permit, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, मगर insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate कॉमर्स with laws like the Mann Act.
In most states, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of पब्लिक order crime, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It थी at एक time माना to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow brothel prostitution, the शर्तें of which हैं stipulated in the Nevada संशोधित Statutes.
तभी 8 counties currently contain active brothels.
सब forms of वेश्यावृति are illegal in Clark काउंटी ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ), Washoe County ( which contains Reno ), Carson City, Douglas County, और Lincoln काउंटी.
the other counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution, but some of ये काउंटी currently have no क्रियाशील brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal अंतर्गत Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
as with other countries, prostitution in the United States can be विभाजित into तीन broad श्रेणी : street prostitution, वेश्यालय prostitution, और escort prostitution.
The national ध्वज of the United States of America, प्रायः simply referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen equal आड़ा stripes of रेड ( top और नीचे ) alternating साथ white, with a blue rectangle in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` संघ '' ) bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine ऑफसेट आड़ा rows of six सितारों ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars.
the 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the Union.
Nicknames लिये the flag include the `` Stars and Stripes '', `` Old महिमा ``, और `` The Star-Spangled Banner. ''
India is a federal union of राज्य comprising twenty-eight states and seven संघ territories.
The states and territories हैं further subdivided into districts और so on.
Congressional districts for the 113th United States Congress
2010 Census change:
बदलें in apportionment of congressional districts, starting in 2013, as a result of the 2010 census.
2000 Census change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts, from 2003 to 2013, as a परिणाम of the 2000 census.
This is a complete list of congressional districts for प्रतिनिधित्व in the United States House of Representatives.
The quantity ( apportionment ) और सीमाएँ ( redistricting ) of districts are determined after each census, although in some cases states have changed the boundaries more than once per census.
This सूची includes the 435 वर्तमान and over 200 obsolete districts.
For example, since the 2000 census, Nebraska has had three जिले, but it प्रयुक्त to have as many as छह.
In the first दशक of the twenty-first century, Texas था 32 जिले, but has since added चार due to reapportionment as a परिणाम of the 2010 census.
अन्य राज्य have lost जिले since the number of congressional seats has been नियत at 435 by statute.
Also included here हैं non-voting delegations : six current and four obsolete.
The boundaries of जिले प्रायः shift साथ each redistricting.
Over time, the प्रदेश and demographics represented in a district can change substantially.
Furthermore, districts sometimes retain the same boundaries while बदलना their district numbers.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an American singer, songwriter, record producer, actress, and लोकसेवक.
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola, Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records भाव ( 1991 ), म्यूज़िक Box ( 1993 ), and मैरी Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey थी established as Columbia 's highest-selling अधिनियम.
daydream ( 1995 ) made म्यूज़िक history when its second single `` One Sweet Day ``, a duet with Boyz ii Men, spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the बिलबोर्ड hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in u.S. chart history.
दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग of the एल्बम, Carey began to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop.
This musical change became evident साथ the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at which समय Carey had अलग from Mottola.
Carey left कोलंबिया in 2000, and signed a record-breaking $ 100 million रिकॉर्डिंग contract with Virgin रिकॉर्ड.
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a शारीरिक and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor रिसेप्शन, she was bought out of her रिकॉर्डिंग contract लिये $ 50 million, which led to a मनाही in her career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal साथ Island Records in 2002, and after an unsuccessful period, लौटे to the शीर्ष of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second सिंगल `` we belong साथ `` became उसके most successful single of the 2000s, and was बाद नामित `` सोंग of the Decade '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ Springs International Film Festival, and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over दो दशकों, कैरी has sold more than 200 लाख records worldwide, making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music पुरस्कार.
Carey थी also नामित the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000.
According to the Recording Industry Association of America, she is the third best-selling female artist in the संयुक्त States, साथ 63.5 million certified albums.
With the रिलीज of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained her eighteenth number one single in the United States, more than any अन्य solo artist.
in 2012, कैरी was ranked second on VH1 's सूची of the `` 100 Greatest Women in म्यूज़िक ''.
Aside from her commercial accomplishments, Carey has won पाँच Grammy Awards, 17 World म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard म्यूज़िक Awards.
referred to as the `` songbird परम् '' by the Guinness World Records, she is famed for her five-octave vocal range, power, melismatic style and signature use of the सीटी register.
Stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology, a cloud is a visible mass of liquid droplets or frozen crystals made of water or various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body.
ये निलंबित particles are भी known as aerosols.
Clouds in Earth 's atmosphere हैं studied in the बादल physics branch of meteorology.
Two processes, possibly acting together, can lead to air becoming saturated ; cooling the air or adding water vapor to the एयर.
In सामान्य, precipitation will fall to the surface ; an exception is virga, which evaporates before reaching the surface.
The international cloud classification system is based on the फैक्ट clouds in their most basic forms can show free-convective upward विकास like कपासी, appear in non-convective layered sheets such as stratus, or लो the form of पतला fibrous wisps, as in the case of cirrus.
Prefixes are used in connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in these मौलिक forms or to specify मध्य or high altitude ranges.
These include strato- for low clouds with limited संवहन that form mostly in uneven परतों, cumulo- for जटिल highly-convective storm clouds, nimbo- for thick layered clouds of some complexity that can produce moderate to भारी precipitation, alto- for middle clouds, और cirro- for high बादल ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure.
Whether or not a बादल is low, middle, or high level depends on how far above the मैदान इसके आधार forms.
Cloud प्रकार with significant लंबवत extent can form in the low or middle altitude सीमाएँ depending on the moisture content of the air.
Clouds in the troposphere have Latin names due to the लोकप्रिय अनुकूलन of Luke Howard 's cloud categorization system, which began to स्प्रेड in popularity during December 1802.
Synoptic सतह weather observations use code संख्याएँ to रिकार्ड and report the types of tropospheric cloud दृश्य at each scheduled observation time based on the height और शारीरिक appearance of the clouds.
While a majority of बादल form in Earth 's क्षोभमण्डल, there are occasions when clouds in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed.
These three main layers of the atmosphere जहाँ clouds may be seen are collectively known as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere, which together मेक up the heterosphere that marks the परिवर्तन to outer space.
Clouds have been observed on अन्य planets and moons within the Solar System, but, due to their different तापमान characteristics, they are composed of other substances such as methane, ammonia, and sulfuric acid.
Galveston काउंटी is a काउंटी located in the U.S. राज्य of Texas within the houston–sugar Land–Baytown metropolitan area.
As of the 2010 census, the population was 291,309.
Its county seat is Galveston.
League City is the largest नगर in galveston County in terms of population ; URL_http between 2000 and 2005 it surpassed Galveston as the county 's largest city.
Galveston County was संस्थापित in 1838.

The Big Ten Conference, formerly Western Conference and बिग Nine Conference, is the oldest Division I college athletic conference in the United States.
Its twelve सदस्य institutions ( which are primarily flagship research विश्वविद्यालयों in their respective राज्य, well-regarded academically, और with relatively large student enrollment ) हैं located primarily in the मिडवेस्ट, stretching इससे Nebraska in the वेस्ट to penn State in the east.
The conference competes in the ncaa 's Division I ; its football teams compete in the Football Bowl subdivision ( FBS ), formerly known as Division I-A, the highest level of ncaa competition in that sport.
Member schools of the Big Ten ( or, in two cases, their parent university systems ) भी are members of the Committee on Institutional Cooperation, a leading educational and research consortium.
Despite the conference 's name, the Big टेन दरअसल consists of 12 schools, following the addition of The पेन्सिलवेनिया State University in 1993 and the University of nebraska–lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the conference will विस्तार to 14 members with the additions of the University of Maryland, कॉलेज पार्क and rutgers, The State University of New Jersey.
It is not to be confused with the बिग 12 Conference, which has only ten schools and represents a different प्रदेश of the देश.
Single Malt Scotch is single malt व्हिस्की made in Scotland using a pot still distillation process at a single डिस्टिलरी, with malted barley as the only अनाज संघटक.
As with any स्कॉच whisky, a single malt स्कॉच must be distilled in Scotland और matured in oak casks in Scotland for at तनिक तीन सालो ( सबसे single malts are matured longer ).
`` Malt '' indicates that the whisky is distilled इससे a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of grains can be malted ( for उदाहरण, barley, rye and wheat are all grains which can be malted ) ; however, in the case of single malt Scotch, barley is सदा the तभी grain used.
`` सिंगल '' indicates that all the malts in the bottle come from a single distillery.
Bottlings containing malt व्हिस्की from multiple distilleries are पुकारा `` blended malt ``.
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the word `` blended '' only appeared ( in the context of स्कॉच whisky ) on bottles of whisky that contained a mixture of both जौ और non-barley अनाज whisky, but इस is no longer the case.
Under the शब्दावली established by the SWR 2009, a `` blended malt स्कॉच whisky '' is a mixture of single malt Scotch whiskies, not a mixture of malted जौ whisky and non-barley व्हिस्की ; those हैं called `` blended Scotch whisky '', बगैर the word `` malt ''.
The term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' used under the prior labelling conventions.
The age statement on a bottle of single malt स्कॉच is the number of सालो the whisky spent maturing in cask.
As very few whiskies are बोतलबंद from a सिंगल cask the आयु statement reflects the age of the youngest malt in the mix.
a texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely approach the single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres, for example, the beautiful 'northern lights ' chord..., in a बहुत दिलचस्प वितरण of pitches, produces a fused sound समर्थित by a suspended cymbal roll `` ( एरिक्सन ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
In contrast to more traditional musical textures, sound mass composition `` minimizes the importance of व्यक्तिगत pitches in preference for texture, timbre, and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and impact. ''
Developed from the modernist tone clusters and spread to orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s and 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
Techniques which may create or be used with sound mass include extended techniques such as muted brass or स्ट्रिंग्स, flutter tonguing, wide vibrato, चरम ranges, and glissandos.
Composers और works include Barbara Kolb, Pauline Oliveros ' ध्वनि Patterns लिये chorus ( 1961 ), Norma Beecroft 's From Dreams of Brass for chorus ( 1963–1964 ), and Nancy वैन de Vate.
beecroft `` blurs individual pitches in एहसान of a सामूहिक timbre through the use of vocal and instrumental क्लस्टर, choral speech, narrator, and a wash of sounds from an electronic tape. ''
( ibid )
a very early उदाहरण is the खोलने of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet Les Elémens ( 1737–38 ), where chaos is represented by a gradually cumulating orchestral क्लस्टर of all seven notes of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
A later example is the third movement of Ruth क्रॉफर्ड seeger 's String Quartet 1931 ( nonesuch H-71280 ) while more recently phill Niblock 's multiple drone आधारित music serves as an example.
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy and Edgard Varèse प्रायः carefully scored individual इंस्ट्रूमेंटल भाग so that वे would fuse into एक ensemble timbre or sound mass ( Erickson 1975, pp. 18 and 21 ).
Other उदाहरण include European `` textural '' रचनाएं of the fifties and sixties such as Krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the पीड़ितों of हिरोशिमा ( 1959 ) and György ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ).
Other composers with works using this technique include Henryk Górecki, Karel Husa, Witold Lutosławski, Kazimierz Serocki, and Steven Stucky.
Sound mass techniques also appear in the music of George Crumb ( Anon. n.d. ).

Pupils in rural Sudan, 2002
A student is a learner, or someone who attends an educational institution.
In कुछ nations, the English पद ( or its cognate in another language ) is reserved for those who attend university, while a schoolchild under the आयु of eighteen is called a pupil in English ( or an equivalent in other languages ), although in the United राज्य a person enrolled in grades k–12 is often पुकारा a student.
In its widest use, student is used लिये anyone who is learning.
ऑस्ट्रेलिया is a continent comprising mainland Australia, Tasmania, New Guinea, Seram, possibly Timor, and neighbouring islands.
the continent is sometimes known in तकनीकी contexts by the names sahul, Australinea or Meganesia, to फर्क it from the Australian mainland.
It is the smallest of the सात traditional continents in the English conception.
नई जीलैंड is not part of the continent of ऑस्ट्रेलिया, but of the separate, submerged continent of Zealandia.
Zealandia and Australia are both part of the wider regions known as australasia और महासागरीय.
The continent of Australia lies on a continental shelf overlain by shallow समंदर which divide it into अनेक landmasses — the Arafura Sea and Torres Strait between मेनलैंड Australia and नई गिनी, और Bass Strait between मेनलैंड Australia and Tasmania.
When समुद्र levels were lower during the pleistocene ice आयु, including the last glacial maximum about 18,000 BC, they यहूद कनेक्ट by शुष्क land.
During the past ten thousand years, rising sea levels overflowed the lowlands और separated the continent into आज 's low-lying arid to semi-arid mainland and the दो mountainous islands of New गिनी and Tasmania.
Geologically, a महाद्वीप extends to the किनारे of its continental shelf, so the now-separate islands are considered भाग of the continent.
Due to the spread of पशु, fungi and plants across the सिंगल Pleistocene landmass the separate lands have a related biota.
Central Park is nearly twice as big as the world 's second-smallest country, मोनाको.
Historically its reservoirs were important components of the नगर 's water सप्लाई.
Environmental issues in नई यॉर्क City हैं affected by the city 's size, density, abundant public transportation infrastructure, and location at the mouth of the Hudson River.
नई York 's population घनत्व has environmental pros और ठग.
It facilitates the highest mass transit use in the United States, but also concentrates pollution.
Gasoline consumption in the city is at the रेट the नेशनल औसत was in the 1920s, और ग्रीनहाउस gas emissions are a भिन्न of the national average, at 7.1 metric tons प्रति person per year, below San Francisco, at 11.2 मीट्रिक tons, and the national average, at 24.5 metric tons.
नई York City खाते for तभी 1 % of United States greenhouse gas emissions while housing 2.7 % of its population.
In September 2012, New York थी named the # 1 `` America 's Dirtiest City, '' by a Travel+Leisure readership survey कि रेटेड the environmental quality of 35 prominent cities in the United States.
Atlanta (, stressed, locally ) is the capital of और the most populous नगर in the U.S. state of जॉर्जिया, साथ an estimated 2011 population of 432,427.
Atlanta is the cultural and economic center of the Atlanta metropolitan area, home to 5,457,831 people and the ninth largest metropolitan area in the United States.
Atlanta is the county सीट of Fulton County, and a small portion of the city extends eastward into DeKalb County.
अटलांटा was established in 1837 at the intersection of two railroad लाइनों, and the city rose from the ashes of the सिविल युद्ध to become a national center of commerce.
In the decades following the Civil Rights गति, दौरान which the city अर्जित a प्रतिष्ठा as `` too busy to hate '' for the progressive दृश्य of its नागरिकों and नेताओ, Atlanta attained international prominence.
Atlanta is the primary transportation hub of the Southeastern संयुक्त States, via highway, railroad, and air, with hartsfield–jackson Atlanta International Airport being the संसार 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र since 1998.
Atlanta is considered an `` alpha ( - ) world city, '' और, with a सकल घरेलू product of US $ 270 अरब, Atlanta’s economy बाँधने 15th among world शहरों and sixth in the nation.
Although Atlanta’s अर्थव्यवस्था is माना diverse, dominant sectors include logistics, professional and business services, media परिचालन, government administration, and उच्चतर education.
Topographically, अटलांटा is marked by rolling hills and घना tree कवरेज.
Revitalization of Atlanta 's neighborhoods, initially spurred by the 1996 Olympics, has intensified in the 21st century, altering the city 's demographics, राजनीती, and culture.
A 1947 प्रचार कॉमिक किताब published by the Catechetical Guild Educational Society उठाने the specter of a Communist कब्ज़ा
McCarthyism is the अभ्यास of making accusations of disloyalty, subversion, or treason without proper regard for evidence.
it also means `` the अभ्यास of making unfair allegations or using unfair investigative तकनीकों, especially in order to restrict dissent or political criticism. ''
The पद has its origins in the period in the संयुक्त States known as the Second Red Scare, स्थायी roughly from 1950 to 1956 and characterized by heightened fears of communist influence on American institutions and espionage by सोवियत agents.
Originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of Republican U.S. सीनेटर Joseph McCarthy of विस्कॉन्सिन, `` mccarthyism '' soon took on a broader meaning, describing the excesses of similar प्रयत्न.
The term is भी now used more generally to describe लापरवाह, unsubstantiated accusations, as well as demagogic attacks on the अक्षर or patriotism of political adversaries.
During the McCarthy era, thousands of Americans were accused of being Communists or communist sympathizers और became the subject of aggressive investigations and questioning before government or private-industry panels, committees and agencies.
The primary targets of such suspicions were government employees, those in the entertainment industry, educators and union activists.
suspicions were often given credence despite inconclusive or questionable evidence, and the स्तर of threat posed by a person 's real or supposed leftist associations or beliefs was often greatly exaggerated.
Many people suffered loss of नियुक्ति and/or destruction of their careers ; some even suffered imprisonment.
Most of these punishments came about through विचारण verdicts later overturned, laws that would be घोषित unconstitutional, dismissals for reasons later declared illegal or actionable, or extra-legal procedures कि would come into general disrepute.
The most famous examples of McCarthyism शामिल the speeches, investigations, and hearings of Senator McCarthy himself ; the हॉलीवुड ब्लैकलिस्ट, associated साथ hearings conducted by the हाउस un-american क्रियाएँ Committee ( huac ) ; and the various anti-communist activities of the Federal ब्यूरो of Investigation ( FBI ) under Director J. Edgar Hoover.
McCarthyism थी a फैली social and cultural घटना that प्रभावित all levels of society and was the सोर्स of a great deal of debate and conflict in the United राज्य.

While he is at first a common farm सुअर, he gets rid of Snowball, another सुअर which shares the power.
He तब takes advantage of the animals ' uprising against their मास्टर्स to eventually become the tyrannical `` President of Animal Farm, '' which he turns into a dictatorship.

The NEPTUNE Canada प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s first regional-scale भाटे समंदर observatory that plugs directly into the Internet.
Since December 2009, it has allowed people to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists run deep-water experiments from labs and विश्वविद्यालयों around the world.
Along with its sister प्रोजेक्ट, VENUS, NEPTUNE offers a अद्वितीय approach to समंदर science.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry out उनके research, while the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट uses a remotely operated क्रॉलर.
