It was sampled by Girl Talk on the first track of his एल्बम सब Day, `` Oh No ''.
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the Commonwealth realms, और their territories और dependencies, and सिर of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England और, in some of her realms, carries the title of Defender of the आस्था as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom, कनाडा, Australia, नई Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता and some realms became republics.
at present, in addition to the first four aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint विंसेंट और the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda और Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; only Queen विक्टोरिया has reigned longer at over 63 years.
एलिज़ाबेथ was born in London and educated privately at home.
Her father acceded to the सिंहासन as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII, from which time वो was the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties during the Second World War, in which वो परोसा in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
in 1947, she married Prince फिलिप, Duke of Edinburgh, साथ whom she has four children : Charles, Anne, Andrew, and Edward.
उसके राजतिलक service took place in 1953 and थी the first to be televised.
the Queen 's many ऐतिहासिक visits and meetings include a state visit to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen major संवैधानिक changes in her realms, such as devolution in the United Kingdom और the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of निजी significance have included the births and विवाह of her children, the births of her grandchildren, the प्रतिष्ठापन of the Prince of वेल्स, and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver, Golden, और Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, क्रमशः.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern आयरलैंड, the Falklands War, wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the मौत of her father at 56, the हत्या of प्रिंस Philip 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the विश्लेषण of her children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a year deemed उसके annus horribilis ), the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law, Diana, राजकुमारी of Wales, and the deaths of her mother और सिस्टर in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments, but support for the monarchy and उसके personal popularity remain high.
Christianity is the largest religion सूचीबद्ध by Australians in the national जनसांख्यिकी.
In the 2011 Census, 61.1 % of Australians were listed as Christian.
Australia has no official राज्य religion and the Australian संविधान protects freedom of religion.
the presence of Christianity in Australia began with the arrival of the पहला Fleet of British convicts in 1788.
the religion grew to account for 96.1 % of the national population at the time of the Federation of Australia in 1901.
The Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly known as the Church of England in Australia ) remained the largest denomination until 1986, when it was surpassed by the Roman कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर in ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance among कुछ sections of the population have diversified the जनसांख्यिकी of धर्म in Australia.
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011, the largest denominations were either Roman Catholic ( 25 % ) or Anglican ( 17 % ), with the third largest denomination being the 5 % affiliated साथ the uniting Church in ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
post-war immigration रै grown the numbers belonging to churches जैसे the Greek परंपरागत Archdiocese of ऑस्ट्रेलिया and there are large and growing Pentecostal groups, such as Sydney 's hillsong Church.
The festivals of Easter and Christmas are public holidays in Australia.
Around a quarter of विद्यार्थी attend गिरिजाघर schools and Christian organisations हैं leading non-government providers of health और welfare services through संगठनों like कैथोलिक स्वास्थ्य Australia, anglicare, UnitingCare ऑस्ट्रेलिया, the मोक्ष Army and St Vincent de Paul Society.
Historically significant ऑस्ट्रेलियाई Christians have included Rev Dr John Dunmore Lang, संत Mary MacKillop, कैथरीन Helen Spence, Pastor David Unaipon, the Reverend John flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls.
High प्रोफ़ाइल समकालीन Australian Christians शामिल : Tim Costello Baptist minister and current सीईओ of World दृष्टि Australia, Frank ब्रेनन, Jesuit human rights lawyer, Cardinal George Pell, Catholic Archbishop of Sydney, Phillip Aspinall the current Anglican primate and archbishop of Brisbane, Kevin Rudd, former मजदूर Prime मंत्री, and टोनी Abbott, leader for the Federal Opposition उदार Party.
Charter creating Collegiate School, which became Yale College, October 9, 1701
Yale University is a private Ivy League research university located in New Haven, Connecticut.
Founded in 1701 in the Colony of Connecticut, the university is the third-oldest institution of higher education in the United States.
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate School '', the संस्था traces इसके roots to 17th-century clergymen who sought to स्थापित a college to ट्रैन clergy और political leaders for the colony.
In 1718, the College was renamed `` Yale कॉलेज '' to honor a gift इससे Elihu yale, a राज्यपाल of the British East इण्डिया Company.
In 1861, the Graduate स्कूल of Arts और Sciences became the first U.S. संस्था to award the PhD. Yale became a founding member of the Association of American Universities in 1900.
Yale College was transformed, beginning in the 1930s, through the establishment of residential colleges : 12 अभी मौजूद और two more are planned.
yale employs over 1,100 faculty to सिखा and सलाह about 5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate और professional students.
Almost all tenured professors सिखा undergraduate courses, more than 2,000 of which are offered annually.
The विश्वविद्यालयों 's assets include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion, the second-largest of any academic institution in the world.
Yale 's system of अधिक than दो dozen libraries holds 12.5 million volumes.
49 Nobel Laureates have been संबद्ध with the University as विद्यार्थी, faculty, and स्टाफ.
Yale has produced many notable alumni, including पाँच U.S. Presidents, 19 u.S. परम् Court justices, and several foreign heads of state.
at the graduate level, Yale Law School, Yale School of आर्ट, and Yale School of नाटक are consistently ranked the top programs in their field.
Yale Law School is the most selective law स्कूल in the संयुक्त States.
Yale students compete intercollegiately as the yale bulldogs in the NCAA Division I Ivy League.
the oldest intercollegiate athletic event in the United States is the Yale-Harvard regatta.
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an aromatic shrub from the family Asteraceae, which grows in arid and semi-arid शर्तें, throughout a range of cold desert, steppe, and mountain habitats in the intermountain वेस्ट of North America.
The vernacular name `` sagebrush '' is also used for several related members of the genus Artemisia, such as California sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ).
Big sagebrush and अन्य Artemisia species are the dominant plants across विशाल portions of the Great Basin, covering कुछ 422,000 square miles in 11 western U.S. & Canadian राज्य.
it is the state पुष्प of नेवाडा.
Sagebrush provides food और habitat लिये a variety of species, such as ऋषि grouse, pronghorn antelope, gray vireo, pygmy rabbit, and खच्चर deer.
बिग sagebrush was used as an herbal आयुर्विज्ञान by देशी Americans throughout the Intermountain West of North America—especially for preventing संक्रमण in wounds, stopping आतंरिक bleeding, और treating headaches and colds.
Chemically, the active medicinal constituents include camphor, terpenoids, and tannins.
Several major threats exist to sage ब्रश ecosystems, including human settlements, परिवर्तन to agricultural जमीन, livestock grazing, हृदयरोग plant species, wildfires, and climate change.
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email service offered by the अमरीकी search इंजन company Yahoo !
it was launched in 1997, और, according to comScore, Yahoo ! Mail is the third-largest web-based ईमेल सेवा with 281 million users as of December 2012.
Currently, Yahoo ! offers तीन versions of याहू ! Mail.
The traditional `` Yahoo ! Mail क्लासिक '' continues the availability of the original interface introduced in 1997.
A version introduced in 2005 included a नई Ajax interface, drag-and-drop features, improved ढूंढें functionality, कुंजीपटल shortcuts, पता auto-complete, tabs, और other अद्यतनीकृत features.
In अक्तूबर 2010, याहू ! released a beta संस्करण of Yahoo ! मेल, which included improvements to the design, performance, search कार्यक्षमता, and Facebook integration.
In May 2011, beta testing for the new संस्करण stopped, और it became the default interface for Yahoo ! Mail.
in early 2008, Yahoo ! began offering unlimited मेल storage to its उपयोक्ता in response to heated competition in the free web-mail market segment.
On June 27, 2009, Yahoo ! मेसेंजर was integrated साथ Yahoo ! Mail.
Tacoma (, ) is a mid-sized urban port city and the county सीट of Pierce काउंटी, Washington, United States.
The city is on Washington 's puget ध्वनि, southwest of Seattle, northeast of the state पूंजी, ओलंपिया, और northwest of Mount rainier National Park.
The population was 198,397, according to the 2010 census.
Tacoma is the second-largest city in the puget Sound area and the third largest in the state.
Tacoma भी serves as the center of business activity for the South Sound region, which रै a population of around 1 million लोगों.
Tacoma adopted इसके नाम after the nearby Mount Rainier, originally called Mount Tahoma.
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the area was chosen to be the western terminus of the Northern Pacific Railroad in the late 19th century.
The निर्णय of the रेलरोड was influenced by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water हार्बर, Commencement Bay.
by connecting the खाड़ी with the railroad Tacoma 's motto became `` When rails meet sails. ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the बंदरगाहों of Tacoma, a बीच of international व्यापार on the प्रशांत Coast and वॉशिंगटन state 's largest port.
Like सबसे central cities, टकोमा suffered a prolonged decline in the mid-20th century as a result of suburbanization and divestment.
Since the 1990s, developments in the शहर core शामिल the University of वॉशिंगटन Tacoma ; Tacoma कड़ी, the first modern electric light रेल सेवा in the state ; the state 's उच्चतम density of art and history museums ; और a लौटी urban waterfront, the Thea Foss Waterway.
With a long history of blue-collar मजदूर politics — इससे the railroad workers of the 19th century, to the longshoremen of the 20th century, to the मजदूर Ready workers of today — Tacoma has long been known लिये इसके अशिष्ट, gritty image.
A song परिचय Tacoma, `` Thrice All American '', by American singer-songwriter and former resident Neko Case, describes it as `` a dusty बूढ़ा गहना in the दक्षिण Puget ध्वनि / where the factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down ''.
Tacoma-Pierce काउंटी has been named one of the most livable areas in the country.
Tacoma थी भी recently listed as the 19th most walkable city in the country.
In contrast, the city is भी ranked as the most stressed-out city in the country in a 2004 survey.
In 2006, महिलाओं 's magazine Self नामित Tacoma the `` Most Sexually Healthy City '' in the संयुक्त States.
In 2012, The Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` Gayest City in America '', in part because of the विशाल diversity of public offices held, और Washington State passing a विधेयक in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry.
Tacoma is प्रसिद्ध for the 1940 collapse of the Tacoma Narrows Bridge.
chula Vista ( ; ) is the second largest city in the सैन डिएगो metropolitan area, the seventh largest नगर in Southern California, the fourteenth largest नगर in the राज्य of California, और the 77th-largest नगर in the United States.
The जनसांख्यिकी was 243,916 as of the 2010 census.
स्तिथ just from downtown San Diego and from the मैक्सिकन border in the South खाड़ी region of the metropolitan area, the city is at the center of one of the richest economic and culturally diverse zones in the संयुक्त States.
Chula Vista is so named because of its scenic स्थान between the San Diego Bay and coastal mountain foothills.
Founded in the early 19th century, fast population growth has recently been observed in the नगर.
as the second largest city in San Diego County, Chula विस्टा has quickly become a destination popular to many tourists.
Located in the city is एक of America 's few year-round United States Olympic Training centers and popular tourist गंतव्यों include Cricket बेतार amphitheater, the chula विस्टा marina, and the Chula Vista Nature Center.
Metes and bounds is a प्रणाली or method of describing land, real property ( in contrast to निजी property ) or real estate.
The system has been used in इंग्लैण्ड for many centuries, and is still used there in the definition of सामान्य boundaries.
By custom, it was applied in the original Thirteen colonies that became the United States, and in many अन्य land jurisdictions आधारित on English common law.
Typically the system uses physical features of the local geography, along with directions and distances, to define और describe the सीमाएँ of a पार्सल of land.
the boundaries हैं described in a running prose style, working around the parcel in sequence, from a point of beginning, returning back to the same point ; compare साथ the oral ritual of beating the bounds.
It may include सन्दर्भ to अन्य adjoining parcels ( and their owners ), और it, in turn, could also be referred to in later surveys.
At the time the description is compiled, it may have been marked on the ground with permanent monuments placed where there यहूद no suitable natural monuments.
the term `` metes '' refers to a boundary defined by the measurement of each straight run, निर्दिष्ट by a distance between the terminal points, and an orientation or direction.
A direction may be a सरल compass bearing, or a precise orientation determined by accurate सर्वेक्षण methods.
The term `` bounds '' refers to a more general boundary वर्णन, such as साथ a निश्चित watercourse, a stone wall, an adjoining public सड़क way, or an existing building.
The system is often used to define larger pieces of property ( e.g. खेतो ), and political subdivisions ( e.g. town boundaries ) where precise definition is not required or होता be far too expensive, or previously designated सीमाएँ can be incorporated into the description.
Sir इसहाक़ Newton ( 25 दिसम्बर 164220 March 1727 ) was an English physicist and गणितज्ञ who is widely regarded as एक of the most influential scientists of all time and as a key figure in the scientific revolution.
His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy '' ), first published in 1687, रखी the मूलाधार for most of classical mechanics.
न्यूटन also made seminal योगदान to optics और साझा credit with Gottfried Leibniz for the आविष्कार of the infinitesimal कलन.
Newton 's प्रिन्सिपिया formulated the कानून of motion and universal gravitation that dominated scientists ' view of the physical universe for the next three centuries.
it also demonstrated that the motion of objects on the Earth and कि of celestial bodies could be described by the वही principles.
By deriving Kepler 's laws of planetary गति from his mathematical description of gravity, Newton removed the last doubts परिचय the वैध of the heliocentric model of the cosmos.
Newton built the first practical reflecting telescope और developed a theory of colour based on the observation that a prism decomposes white light into the many colours of the visible spectrum.
He also formulated an अनुभवजन्य law of cooling and पढ़ाई the speed of sound.
In addition to his work on the calculus, as a गणितज्ञ Newton contributed to the study of power series, generalised the binomial theorem to non-integer exponents, और developed Newton 's method लिये approximating the roots of a फलन.
Newton थी a fellow of Trinity कॉलेज और the second Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge.
he was a devout but unorthodox Christian और, unusually for a member of the Cambridge faculty, he refused to take holy आदेश in the गिरिजाघर of England, perhaps because he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In addition to his कार्य on the mathematical sciences, न्यूटन also dedicated much of his time to the पढ़ाई of alchemy and biblical chronology, but most of his work in those areas remained unpublished until long बाद his death.
In his later life, Newton became अध्यक्ष of the Royal समाज.
He also परोसा the British government as वार्डन and Master of the Royal Mint.
Prof. वाल्टर lewin explains Newton 's law of gravitation in एमआईटी course 8.01
Satellites और projectiles all obey Newton 's law of gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation राज्य that every point द्रव्यमान in the universe attracts every अन्य point mass with a फ़ोर्स that is सीधे proportional to the product of their masses और inversely proportional to the वर्गाकार of the distance between उन्हें.
( Separately it was shown कि large spherically symmetrical masses attract and हैं आकर्षित as if all their mass यहूद concentrated at their centers. )
इस is a general शारीरिक law derived from empirical observations by what Newton पुकारा induction.
it is a part of classical यांत्रिकी और was प्रतिपादित in Newton 's work Philosophiæ Naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया Mathematica ( `` the Principia '' ), first published on 5 जुलाई 1687.
( जब Newton 's book was presented in 1686 to the royal Society, रॉबर्ट Hooke made a अर्जी कि न्यूटन had obtained the inverse square law from him – see History section below. )
In modern language, the law states the following:
Assuming SI इकाई, F is measured in newtons ( N ), m1 and m2 in kilograms ( kg ), r in meters ( m ), and the निरंतर G is approximately बराबर to.
The value of the निरंतर G was first accurately संकल्पित इससे the results of the कैवेंडिश experiment conducted by the British scientist Henry कैवेंडिश in 1798, although Cavendish किया not himself calculate a numerical मान for G.
This experiment was also the first test of Newton 's सिद्धान्त of gravitation between masses in the laboratory.
It took place 111 years after the publication of Newton 's Principia और 71 सालो after न्यूटन 's मौत, so none of न्यूटन 's calculations could use the value of g ; instead he could only calculate a force सापेक्ष to another force.
Newton 's विधि of gravitation resembles कूलम्ब 's law of electrical forces, which is used to calculate the magnitude of electrical force between दो charged लाशें.
Both are inverse-square laws, in जिससे force is inversely आंशिक to the square of the distance between the bodies.
कूलम्ब 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product of the masses, और the electrostatic निरंतर in place of the gravitational constant.
Newton 's law रै since been superseded by Einstein 's theory of सामान्य relativity, but it continues to be used as an excellent approximation of the effects of gravity.
Relativity is required only when there is a need for extreme precision, or जब dealing with gravitation for extremely massive and dense objects.
White और red flags, representing Iraqi and American मौतों, sit in the grass quadrangle of The Valley Library on the Corvallis, Oregon, campus of Oregon State विश्वविद्यालयों.
As part of the traveling Iraq देह Count exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( नहीं related to Iraq Body Count project ), the ध्वज aim to `` raise जागरूकता of the human cost of the इराकी War. ''
( May 2008 )
Casualties of the विरोध in Iraq चूंकि 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of Iraq, and continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq, as well as the क्रियाएँ of the विभिन्न armed groups operating in the country ) have come in many forms, और the accuracy of the information available on अलग प्रकार of इराकी War casualties varies greatly.
The table below summarizes various estimates of the इराकी casualty figures.
For troops in the U.S.-led multinational गठबन्धन, the death टोल is carefully tracked and अद्यतनीकृत रोज़, and the names and photographs of those मारे in action as well as in accidents have been published widely.
A कुल of 4,486 U.S. soldiers यहूद killed in इराकी between 2003 and 2012.
Regarding the Iraqis, however, information on both military and civilian casualties is दोनो less precise and less consistent.
Estimates of casualty levels are available from reporters on the scene, from officials of शामिल organizations, and from groups that summarize information on incidents reported in the न्यूज media.
The शब्द `` casualties `` in its most सामान्य sense includes the injured as well as the मुर्दे.
खाते of the क्रमांक of गठबन्धन wounded vary widely, partly because it is not स्पष्ट what चाहिए be counted : चाहिए only those injuries गंभीर enough to put a soldier out of आयोग be included ?
Do बीमारियों or injuries caused by accidents गिनती, or should the focus be restricted to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
स्त्रोत using different definitions may arrive at very अलग numbers, and sometimes the precise परिभाषा is not clearly specified.
Asalto al coche ( Robbery of the coach ), by Francisco de Goya
A highwayman was a thief and brigand who preyed on travellers.
इस type of outlaw प्रायः travelled and robbed by घोड़ा, as compared to a footpad who travelled और robbed on पैर.
Mounted robbers were widely माना to be socially superior to footpads.
Such robbers संचालित in ग्रेट Britain and Ireland from the Elizabethan era until the early 19th century.
the शब्द highwayman is पहला known to be used in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms included `` knights of the road '' and `` gentlemen of the road. ''
Two शर्तें applied to 19th-century उत्तर American highwaymen were road agents in some instances for mountain डाकुओं जबकि in other cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians.
in the same time period in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, they were known as bushrangers.
Earvin `` जादू '' जॉनसन, Jr. ( born अगस्त 14, 1959 ) is a retired American पेशेवर basketball player जो played पाइंट guard for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ).
After winning championships in high school और कॉलेज, Johnson was selected पहला overall in the 1979 NBA ड्राफ्ट by the Lakers.
He won a चैंपियनशिप and an NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award in his rookie season, and won four अधिक championships with the Lakers during the 1980s.
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing that he had contracted HIV, but returned to play in the 1992 All-Star खेल, winning the All-Star MVP Award.
After protests from उसके fellow players, he retired again लिये four years, but returned in 1996, at age 36, to play 32 games for the Lakers before retiring for the तीसरा and फाइनल time.
Johnson 's करियर achievements include three NBA MVP Awards, nine एनबीए Finals appearances, twelve All-Star games, and ten All-NBA First and Second Team nominations.
He led the league in regular-season assists four times, and is the एनबीए 's all-time नेता in average assists per खेल, at 11.2.
Johnson was a सदस्य of the `` Dream टोली ``, the U.S. basketball team that won the ओलम्पिक gold medal in 1992.
After leaving the NBA in 1992, Johnson formed the Magic जॉनसन All-Stars, a barnstorming टोली कि travelled around the world playing exhibition games.
जॉनसन was सम्मानित as one of the 50 Greatest खिलाड़ी in NBA इतिहास in 1996, and enshrined in the Basketball हॉल of Fame in 2002.
He was rated the greatest एनबीए पाइंट गार्ड of all समय by ESPN in 2007.
His friendship and rivalry with बोस्टन Celtics star Larry Bird, whom he faced in the 1979 NCAA finals and three NBA championship series, यहूद खूब प्रलेखित.
चूंकि his retirement, Johnson रै been an एडवोकेट for HIV/ एड्स रोकथाम and safe sex, as well as an entrepreneur, philanthropist, broadcaster and प्रेरक speaker.
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers लिये अनेक years, and was part of a समूह that खरीदा the लॉस एंजिल्स डॉजर्स in 2012.
allium cells in different phases of the cell cycle
The cells of eukaryotes ( left ) and prokaryotes ( right )
the cell is the basic structural, functional and biological unit of all ज्ञात living organisms.
It is the smallest unit of life that is classified as a living thing ( except virus, which consists तभी from DNA/RNA covered by protein और lipids ), and is often पुकारा the building block of life.
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a झिल्ली, which contains many biomolecules such as proteins and nucleic acids.
जीवों can be वर्गीकृत as unicellular ( consisting of a सिंगल cell ; including सबसे जीवाणु ) or multicellular ( including पौधे and animals ).
While the number of cells in पौधे and animals varies from प्रजाति to species, Humans contain about 100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells.
Most plant और animal कोशिकाएं हैं between 1 and 100 micrometres and therefore are visible only under the microscope.
The cell was discovered by Robert Hooke in 1665.
The cell theory, first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob Schleiden और Theodor schwann, states कि all organisms हैं composed of one or अधिक कोशिकाएं, कि all cells come from preexisting cells, that vital functions of an organism occur भीतर कोशिकाएं, and that all cells contain the hereditary information necessary for regulating cell functions and for transmitting information to the next generation of cells.
Cells उभरा on planet धरती at least 4.0–4.3 billion years ago.
the word कोशिका आता from the Latin cella, meaning `` small room ''.
the descriptive term for the smallest जीना biological structure was coined by Robert Hooke in a किताब he published in 1665 when he compared the cork cells he देखी through his सूक्ष्मदर्शी to the small कक्ष monks lived in.
Grecian Formula is a men 's hair coloring product in the United States.
Canada and Europe previously banned the product क्युकी of its use of lead acetate.
A मोटर scooter 's सामने with an अव्यवहारिक number and variety of headlamps, added for decorative उद्देश्य
A headlamp is a lamp attached to the front of a vehicle to light the road ahead.
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age, spurred by the great disparity between daytime और nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety प्रशासन states कि nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark, despite only 25 % of traffic यात्राएं during darkness.
While it is common लिये the पद हेडलाइट to be used interchangeably in informal चर्चा, headlamp is the term for the device itself, while headlight properly refers to the beam of light produced and distributed by the device.
अन्य vehicles, such as trains and aircraft, are required to have headlamps.
Bicycle headlamps are often used on साइकिल, and are जरूरी in some jurisdictions.
They can be powered by a बैटरी or a small electrical सृजनकर्ता on the wheel.
Additionally automotive night vision systems work to supplement headlamps.
Women 's rights are the अधिकारों and entitlements claimed for women और girls of many societies worldwide.
In some places ये rights are institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, and behaviour, whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed.
They differ इससे broader notions of human rights through claims of an inherent historical and traditional bias against the exercise of rights by women and लड़कियों in favour of men और लड़कों.
Issues commonly associated साथ notions of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the right : to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ; to मेला wages or equal अदा ; to अपना property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into विधिक contracts ; and to have वैवाहिक, parental and religious rights.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, best known as Whoopi Goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, लेखक and talk show host.
Goldberg made her film debut in The रंग Purple ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She received a nomination for the अकादमी Award for Best अभिनेत्री and won her first सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार for उसके role in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda Mae Brown, a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) सहेजें his lover ( Demi मूर ) in the blockbuster भुत.
This performance won उसके a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this बना Goldberg only the दूसरी black woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an एक्टिंग oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won लिये Gone With the Wind in 1939.
notable बाद films include सिस्टर अधिनियम and Sister Act 2, The Player, बना in America, कैसा स्टेला Got Her नाली Back, लड़की, बाधित and Rat Race.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation, as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack फ्लैश, and as Carmen Tibideaux in Glee, as well as the आवाज़ of shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
Goldberg has महरूम nominated for 13 Emmy Awards लिये her कार्य in television.
She was co-producer of the popular game दिखाएँ Hollywood वर्गों from 1998 to 2004.
वो रै been the moderator of the daytime talk show The View since 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, two दिन Emmys, two सुनहरी Globes, a Tony ( for production, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award, four People 's Choice Awards, and रै been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
वो is one of the few entertainers who have won an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, और Tony Award.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a major पेशेवर ice hockey league of 30 franchised सदस्य clubs, of which सात are फिलहाल स्तिथ in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in नई York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the प्रीमियर professional ice हॉकी league in the world, and one of the major professional खेल leagues in the United States and Canada.
the स्टेनली Cup, the oldest पेशेवर sports trophy in उत्तर America, is awarded annually to the लीग playoff champion at the end of प्रत्येक season.
The league थी organized on November 26, 1917, in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, after the suspension of operations of its predecessor संगठन, the National Hockey Association ( NHA ), जिससे had been founded in 1909.
It started साथ four टीमों and, through a series of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is now रचित of 30 active franchises.
The स्वदेश to which the name of the लीग originally referred was Canada, although the league has now been binational चूंकि 1924 when it expanded into the United राज्य.
After a श्रमिक dispute कि led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 ऋतु, the लीग resumed play under a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
In 2009, the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
the NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the world and currently has players from about 20 different countries.
हालांकि Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the past four प्लस decades the percentages of US and European players have increased both क्युकी of the एनएचएल 's continued expansion from six to तीस क्लब since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European खिलाड़ी.
Maggots feeding on carrion.
A maggot is the लार्वा of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is applied in particular to the लार्वे of Brachyceran flies, such as houseflies, cheese flies, and blowflies, rather than larvae of the Nematocera, such as mosquitoes and क्रेन flies.
`` Maggot '' is नहीं a technical term और should नहीं be taken as ऐसे ; in अनेक standard textbooks of entomology it does not appear in the अनुक्रमणिका at सब.
in many non-technical texts the term is प्रयुक्त for insect larvae in general.
Other sources have coined their own definitions ; for example : ``...
The पद applies to a grub when all trace of limbs has disappeared... '' and ``... Applied to the footless larvae of Dipters. ''
Maggot-like मक्खी larvae are of wide importance in ecology and आयुर्विज्ञान ; among other roles, various species are prominent in recycling carrion and garbage, attacking crops and foodstuffs, spreading microbial infections, and causing myiasis.
Herod (, Hordos, Greek :, Hērōdēs ), also known as Herod the Great ( 73/74 BCE – 4 BCE in Jericho ), was a Roman client king of Judea.
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed as he is described as `` a madman who murdered his own family और a ग्रेट many rabbis ``.
He is also known लिये his colossal भवन projects in Jerusalem and elsewhere, including his expansion of the Second Temple in Jerusalem ( sometimes referred to as Herod 's Temple ) और the construction of the port at Caesarea maritima.
Important details of उसके biography are gleaned from the works of the 1st century CE Roman–Jewish historian josephus Flavius.
The Romans बना Herod 's son, Herod Archelaus, ethnarch of Judea, Samaria, and Idumea ( biblical Edom ) from 4 BCE to 6 ce, referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea.
Archelaus was judged incompetent by the Roman emperor Augustus who तब combined Samaria, Judea proper and Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until आयु 41.
Herod 's अन्य son Herod Antipas थी tetrarch of Galilee from 4 BCE–39 CE.
abo blood group antigens present on red blood cells and IgM antibodies present in the सीरम
The abo रक्त group system is the most महत्वपूर्ण blood type system ( or blood group प्रणाली ) in human blood transfusion.
The संबद्ध anti-A and anti-B antibodies are usually IgM antibodies, which हैं usually produced in the first years of life by sensitization to environmental substances such as food, bacteria, and वाइरस.
ABO blood types हैं also present in some other animals, लिये उदाहरण apes such as chimpanzees, bonobos, and gorillas.
Year 1907 ( MCMVII ) was a आम year starting on मंगलवार ( link will display the पूरा calendar ) of the Gregorian पंचांग और a common year starting on Monday of the 13-day-slower Julian calendar.
Northville is an affluent city located in and विभाजित by Oakland and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan.
The area is a उपनगरीय of Metropolitan डेट्रॉयट.
The population थी 5,970 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.

Misfits is a British science fiction comedy-drama टेलीविज़न show about a group of young offenders sentenced to work in a जातियाँ service programme, where they obtain supernatural powers after a strange electrical storm.
the series खोली in 2009 and is currently ongoing.
Antonia थामस, ईवान Rheon, Lauren Socha, Nathan stewart-jarrett, and Robert Sheehan are introduced as अलीशा Daniels, Simon Bellamy, Kelly बेली, Curtis Donovan, and Nathan Young respectively.

ब्रेट Lorenzo Favre ( born अक्तूबर 10, 1969 ) is a former American फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक जो खर्च the majority of his career with the Green Bay Packers of the National Football लीग ( NFL ).
He was a 20-year veteran of the एनएफएल, having played quarterback for the Atlanta falcons ( 1991 ), Green खाड़ी Packers ( 1992 – 2007 ), नई यॉर्क Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL history to throw for over 70,000 गज, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, और over 10,000 pass attempts.
Favre started at the quarterback position for the University of Southern Mississippi for four years before होने selected in the second round of the 1991 NFL ड्राफ्ट by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ).
He was traded to Green Bay on February 10, 1992, for the 19th pick in the 1992 NFL ड्राफ्ट.
Favre became the Packers ' starting क्वार्टरबैक in the fourth game of the 1992 ऋतु, stepping in for घायल quarterback Don Majkowski, and started every खेल through the 2007 season.
He थी traded to the New York Jets और started at quarterback for the 2008 season before हस्ताक्षर with the Vikings on अगस्त 18, 2009 as their starting quarterback.
He बना an NFL record 297 consecutive starts ( 321 including playoffs ).
He is the only player to win the ap Most Valuable Player three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ).
He रै led टीमों to eight division championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), five NFC चैंपियनशिप खेल ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), and two Super Bowl appearances ( Super कटोरी XXXI, सुपर Bowl xxxii ), winning one ( Super Bowl XXXI ).
He holds many NFL records, including सबसे career touchdown passes, most करियर passing yards, most करियर pass completions, most career pass attempts, सबसे career interceptions thrown, most लगातार starts by a player, most consecutive starts by a क्वार्टरबैक, most career victories as a starting quarterback, most sacked, और सबसे fumbles.
He is also referred to by उसके उपनाम `` the Gunslinger ''.

The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3, commonly known as the web ), is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the अंतरजाल.
With a वेब ब्राउजर, one can view web pages that may contain text, images, वीडियो, and other multimedia, and navigate between them via hyperlinks.
using अवधारणाओं from उसके earlier hypertext systems जैसे ENQUIRE, British engineer, computer scientist and at that time employee of the CERN, Sir Tim berners-lee, now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ), लिखा a proposal in कूच 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, Berners-Lee and belgian computer वैज्ञानिक Robert cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the उपयोक्ता can browse at होगा '', and they सरेआम introduced the प्रोजेक्ट in December of the same year.
Wayne lyman Morse ( अक्तूबर 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) was a politician and attorney from ऑरेगॉन, United States, ज्ञात for his proclivity for opposing his parties ' नेतृत्व, and specifically for his opposition to the Vietnam युद्ध on constitutional grounds.
Born in Madison, Wisconsin, and शिक्षित at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and the University of Minnesota Law School, Morse moved to Oregon in 1930 and began शिक्षण at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Oregon स्कूल of Law.
During World युद्ध II he was elected to the United States सीनेट as a Republican ; he became an Independent after Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in 1952.
While an independent, he set a record for performing the second longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate.
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955, and was reelected twice while a member of that party.
मोर्स made a brief run for the Democratic Party 's अध्यक्षीय nomination in 1960.
A few years later, मोर्स was one of only two Senators जो opposed the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution, which authorized the president to लो military कार्रवाई in वियतनाम without a declaration of युद्ध.
he जारी to speak out against the war in the ensuing years, and lost his 1968 बोली for reelection to bob Packwood, who criticized his strong opposition to the war.
Morse made दो अधिक bids for reelection to the Senate before his death in 1974.
In parliamentary procedure, a motion to table रै two different and contradictory meanings:
In the United States, to table usually अर्थात् the to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to move for postponement of विचार ; a proposal to suspend consideration of a स्थगित motion.
Much less often, it means a motion to `` put on the table '' : a proposal to begin विचार ( or reconsideration ), a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world.
In the rest of the English-speaking संसार such as the United किंगडम, to table means to move to place [ the topic ] upon the table ( or to move to प्लेस on the table ) : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal.
Both the American और the अंग्रेजों dialects have the sense of `` to table '' as to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to cause [ the topic ] to lie on the तालिका.
The difference is the idea of what the table is for, कि of a shelf off to the पक्ष, or an active कार्य bench.
The British meaning has the sense of the तालिका as being an क्रियाशील कार्य बेंच, with the topic being the center of attention, considered और discussed by all until it can be resolved, at which point it is taken off the 'table '.
The American भाव is that the table is like that of a shelf, archive, or long-term storage यंत्र, where the topic has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' and leaving it there.
Toy Story 3 is a 2010 American 3D कंप्यूटर animated comedy-drama prison फिल्मी, and the third installment in the Toy Story series.
It was produced by Pixar Animation studios and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
निर्देशित by Lee Unkrich, the film was released worldwide from June through October in Disney Digital 3-D, RealD, and IMAX 3D.
Toy Story 3 was also the पहला film to be released theatrically with dolby Surround 7.1 sound.
The screenplay was लिखा by Michael Arndt, जबकि Unkrich wrote the story along साथ John lasseter and Andrew Stanton, respectively director and co-writer of the two first films.
the plot focuses on the toys Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and उनके friends dealing with an uncertain future as their owner, Andy, prepares to leave for college.
Actors Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, डॉन Rickles, estelle Harris, John Ratzenberger, Wallace Shawn, Jeff pidgeon, Jodi Benson, R. ली Ermey, जॉन मॉरिस, and Laurie Metcalf reprised their voice-over roles from the previous films.
Jim Varney, who निभाई Slinky Dog in the first two films, and Joe Ranft, who portrayed Lenny and Wheezy, both died before production began on Toy Story 3.
The role of Slinky Dog was taken over by Blake Clark ( a dost of Varney ), while Ranft 's characters and various others were written out of the story.
New वर्ण include performances by Ned Beatty, Timothy Dalton, क्रिस्टन schaal, Bonnie हंट, Whoopi Goldberg, जेफ़ Garlin, Richard दयालु, and Michael Keaton.
The feature broke shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening दिन North American सकल for an animated film unadjusted for inflation, और a big खोलने with an unadjusted सकल of $ 110,307,189.
It is also the highest-grossing खोलने weekend लिये a पिक्चर्स फिल्मी, as well as the highest-grossing opening weekend for a film to have opened in the month of June.
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010, both in the संयुक्त States और Canada, and worldwide.
In early August, it became Pixar 's highest-grossing film at the उत्तर American बक्सा office ( surpassing Finding Nemo ), और the highest-grossing animated film of all time विश्वव्यापी ( surpassing Shrek 2 ) ; later that month, Toy Story 3 became the पहला कभी animated फिल्मी in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide.
It is फिलहाल the 10th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of all time.
खिलौना Story 3 was मनोनीत लिये five Academy Awards, including Best Picture, Best Adapted Screenplay, और Best Sound संपादन.
It was the third animated film ( after Beauty और the Beast और Up ) to be मनोनीत for Academy Award for Best Picture.
It won the awards for Best Animated Feature and Best Original Song.

Starks was listed at 6'5 '' and 190 pounds during his NBA playing career.
Although he was not drafted in the 1988 NBA Draft after attending four कॉलेजों in his native Oklahoma, सहित Oklahoma State विश्वविद्यालयों, he gained fame while playing for the New यॉर्क knicks of the National बास्केट Association in the 1990s.
Secure Digital or ( sd ) is a non-volatile मेमोरी कार्ड format for use in portable devices, such as mobile phones, digital cameras, GPS नेविगेशन devices, and tablet computers.
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the SD कार्ड Association ( SDA ).
SD technologies have महरूम implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens of उत्पाद categories and more than 8,000 models.
the Secure Digital format includes चार card families available in तीन different form factors.
the चार परिवारों are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ), और the SDIO, जिससे combines input/output functions with data storage.
The three form factors are the original size, the `` mini '' आकार, and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are अनेक combinations of form factors and device families.
electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a smaller card in a मेजबान device built to hold a larger card.
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward compatibility और accept older SD ताश, but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A नए कार्ड may offer greater capacity than the host device can handle.
A newer card may use a file प्रणाली the host device can not navigate.
Use of an sdio card requires the मेजबान device be designed लिये the input/output functions the card provides.
the organization of the card was changed starting साथ the SDHC family.
Some vendors produced SDSC ताश above 1 GB before the SDA था standardized a method of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with इसके विशेषताएँ and assure users of compatibility.
Hugh जॉन Mungo Grant ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a अंग्रेजों actor and film producer.
He has received a Golden ग्लोब, a BAFTA, and an Honorary César.
उसके films have earned more than US $ 2.4 billion from 25 नाट्य releases worldwide.
Grant achieved international stardom after appearing in Richard Curtis 's successful Four Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ).
He used this भेदन role as a बारंबार cinematic persona दौरान the 1990s, delivering कॉमिक performances in mainstream films like Mickey Blue आँखें ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ).
by the turn of the 21st century, he था established himself as a leading man skilled with a satirical comic talent.
Grant रै expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), About A Boy ( 2002 ), Love Actually ( 2003 ), and अमरीकी Dreamz ( 2006 ).
He later निभाई against type with multiple cameo roles in the epic drama film Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ).
Within the film industry, Grant is cited as an anti-film star who approaches his roles जैसे a character actor, और attempts to मेक his acting appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of उसके comic skills include a nonchalant touch of irony / sarcasm and पढ़ाई physical mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed संवाद डिलीवरी और फेशियल expressions.
The entertainment media 's coverage of Grant 's life बंद the big screen has प्रायः overshadowed his कार्य as a thespian.
He has been vocal about his disrespect for the व्यवसायिक of acting, and in his disdain towards the संस्कृति of celebrity and hostility towards the media.
in a career spanning 30 years, Grant has repeatedly claimed that एक्टिंग is not a true calling but just a job he fell into.
the Han राजवंश ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 ad ) was an इम्पीरियल dynasty of चीन, preceded by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ).
It was founded by the rebel leader Liu Bang, ज्ञात posthumously as सम्राट Gaozu of Han.
It थी briefly बाधित by the xin राजवंश ( 9–23 AD ) of the पूर्व regent Wang Mang.
This interregnum separates the हान into two अवधि : the Western Han ( 206 BC – 9 AD ) and Eastern Han ( 25–220 ad ).
spanning over four centuries, the period of the हान Dynasty is considered a golden age in चाइनीज history.
To this day, China 's majority ethnic समूह refers to itself as the `` हान people '' and the Chinese स्क्रिप्ट is referred to as `` Han characters ``.
The Han Empire थी divided into areas directly controlled by the सेंट्रल government, ज्ञात as commanderies, and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
ये kingdoms gradually lost all vestiges of their independence, particularly following the विद्रोह of the Seven States.
the Xiongnu, a nomadic confederation which dominated the पूर्वी Eurasian Steppe, defeated the Han army in battle in 200 bc.
Following the defeat, a political विवाह alliance was negotiated in जिससे the Han became the de facto inferior संगी.
When, despite the treaty, the Xiongnu जारी to raid Han borders, Emperor Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 BC ) शुभारम्भ several military campaigns against them.
The ultimate हान victory in these wars आखिरकार forced the Xiongnu to accept vassal status as Han tributaries.
These campaigns expanded Han प्रभुता into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped establish the विशाल trade network known as the Silk सड़क, which reached as far as the Mediterranean world.
हान forces managed to divide the Xiongnu into two competing nations, the Southern and Northern Xiongnu, and forced the Northern Xiongnu आरपार the Ili River.
despite these victories, the territories north of Han 's borders were जल्दी overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation.
After 92 ad, the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in अदालत politics, engaging in violent power struggles between the various consort clans of the empresses and empress dowagers, causing the Han 's ultimate downfall.
Imperial authority was also seriously challenged by large Daoist religious societies which instigated the पीला Turban Rebellion and the Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion.
following the death of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 AD ), the palace eunuchs suffered होलसेल massacre by military officers, allowing सदस्यों of the aristocracy and military governors to become warlords and divide the साम्राज्य.
जब Cao Pi, King of Wei, usurped the throne from Emperor Xian, the Han Dynasty ceased to exist.
The Han Dynasty थी an age of economic prosperity and saw a significant growth of the money अर्थव्यवस्था first established during the Zhou राजवंश ( c. 1050–256 bc ).
The coinage issued by the central government mint in 119 BC remained the standard coinage of China until the तंग Dynasty ( 618–907 ad ).
To pay for its military campaigns and the settlement of newly conquered frontier territories, the सरकारी राष्ट्रीयकृत the निजी नमक and iron industries in 117 bc.
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han period, and the खोया revenue was recouped through heavily taxing निजी entrepreneurs.
The emperor थी at the pinnacle of Han society.
He presided over the हान government but shared power with दोनो the धामों and appointed ministers who came largely from the scholarly gentry क्लास.
इससे the शासनकाल of Emperor Wu onward, the Chinese court officially sponsored confucianism in education and court politics, synthesized साथ the cosmology of later विद्वानों such as Dong zhongshu.
This policy endured until the fall of the Qing राजवंश in 1911 AD.
Science and technology दौरान the Han period saw significant advances, including papermaking, the nautical steering rudder, the use of negative संख्याएँ in mathematics, the raised-relief मैप, the hydraulic -powered armillary sphere for astronomy, and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum.
tourette syndrome ( also पुकारा Tourette 's syndrome, Tourette 's disorder, Gilles de la tourette syndrome, GTS or, more commonly, simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with onset in childhood, characterized by अनेक physical ( motor ) tics और at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic.
These tics characteristically wax and wane, can be suppressed temporarily, and are preceded by a premonitory urge.
Tourette 's is defined as part of a spectrum of tic disorders, which शामिल transient and दीर्घकालिक tics.
Tourette 's was once considered a rare and bizarre syndrome, most often संबद्ध with the मुँह of obscene words or socially inappropriate and अपमानजनक remarks ( coprolalia ), but this लक्षण is उपस्थित in only a small minority of लोगों with Tourette 's.
Tourette 's is no longer माना a विरल condition, but it is not always correctly identified क्युकी most मामले are mild and the severity of tics decreases for सबसे children as they pass through किशोरावस्था.
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children आयु 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the prevalence of transient और chronic tics in school-age children is उच्चतर, with the more common tics of eye blinking, coughing, throat clearing, sniffing, and facial movements.
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, and Tourette 's does नहीं adversely affect प्रज्ञा or life expectancy.
Genetic और environmental factors play a भूमिका in the etiology of tourette 's, but the सटीक causes are unknown.
In most cases, medication is unnecessary.
There is no प्रभावी उपचार लिये every case of tics, but certain medications और therapies can help when their use is warranted.
शिक्षा is an महत्वपूर्ण part of कोई treatment plan, and explanation and reassurance alone हैं often sufficient treatment.
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses other than Tourette 's ) such as attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) and obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are उपस्थित in many patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics.
These other शर्तें often cause more functional पुतलियों to the individual than the tics that are the hallmark of Tourette 's, hence it is important to correctly identify comorbid conditions and दावत उन्हें.
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of his resident, Georges Albert Édouard Brutus Gilles de la Tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a French physician and neurologist, who प्रकाशित an खाता of nine patients with tourette 's in 1885.
Sunbeam बैज.
Sunbeam was a marque registered by John Marston Co. ltd of Wolverhampton, इंग्लैण्ड, in 1888.
The company पहला made साइकिल, then motorcycles and cars from the late 19th सदी until about 1936, and applied the marque to all three forms of transportation.
the company also manufactured एयरो engines in the First World War and 647 aircraft during the Second World War.
A सनबीम थी the first British car to जीत a Grand Prix रेस, और set a number of land speed records.
The company गई into receivership in 1935 and was खरीदा by the Rootes Group, which continued to use the Sunbeam marque.
Fox News Channel ( fnc ), also known as Fox News, is a cable न्यूज चैनल owned by the फॉक्स Entertainment समूह, a subsidiary of News निगम.
As of April 2009, the channel थी उपलब्धियाँ to 102 million households in the United States and to viewers internationally, broadcasting primarily from its New York studios.
The channel was created by Australian-American media mogul Rupert Murdoch, who hired former NBC executive रोजर Ailes as its founding CEO.
It शुभारम्भ on October 7, 1996 to 17 million cable subscribers.
It grew during the late 1990s और 2000s to become the dominant cable न्यूज network in the United राज्य.
Critics have stated कि फॉक्स News Channel promotes conservative political positions and पक्षपातपूर्ण reporting.
Commentators, news anchors, और reporters at फॉक्स News Channel have responded that news reporting and political commentary operate independently of each अन्य, and have denied any bias in news reporting.
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( away इससे the midline of the face ) from दोनो the mandibular second premolars of the मुँह but mesial ( toward the midline of the फेस ) from both mandibular second molars.
It is located on the mandibular ( lower ) arch of the मुँह, and generally opposes the maxillary ( upper ) first molars and the maxillary 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion.
The function of this molar is similar to कि of all molars in regard to grinding being the प्रिंसिपल action during mastication, commonly known as chewing.
वहीँ are usually five well-developed पुलिन on mandibular पहला molars : two on the buccal ( side निकटतम the cheek ), two lingual ( side nearest the tongue ), and one distal.
There are great differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars and those of the permanent mandibular molars, even though their फलन हैं similar.
the permanent mandibular molars are नहीं considered to have any teeth that precede it.
Despite being named molars, the deciduous molars are followed by permanent premolars.
In the universal system of संकेतन, the पतझड़ी mandibular first molars are designated by a letter written in uppercase.
The सही deciduous mandibular पहला molar is known as `` s '', and the left एक is ज्ञात as `` L ''.
The international notation has a अलग प्रणाली of notation.
Thus, the right deciduous mandibular first molar is ज्ञात as `` 84 '', and the left one is known as `` 74 ''.
In the universal system of notation, the permanent mandibular first molars are designated by a number.
The right permanent mandibular first molar is known as `` 30 '', और the left one is ज्ञात as `` 19 ''.
The Palmer notation uses a number in conjunction साथ a symbol designating in which quadrant the दाँत is found.
For this tooth, the left and right first molars would have the same number, `` 6 '', but the right one होता have the symbol, `` ┐ '', over it, while the बाएँ एक would have, `` ┌ ''.
The international संकेतन has a different numbering system than the previous two, and the right permanent mandibular first molar is known as `` 46 '', and the left one is known as `` 36 ''.
mandibular primary first molars usually have four pulp horns.
The first molar is usually the first स्थाई tooth to erupt and has adult undertones.
Anatomy : The mandibular first molar has five cusps : the mesiobuccal ( MB, toward midline and cheek ), mesiolingual ( ML, toward midline and tongue ), distolingual ( DL, दूर from midline and towards tongue ), distobuccal ( DB, away from midline and toward cheek ), and distal ( D, दूर इससे midline ), listed in order of अवरोहण size.
Listed in order of अवरोहण height they हैं : ML, DL, DF, MF, और D. An आठवीं cusp was मिला in a primary second lower molar in an Argentinean child.
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ), the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( five तरफा ) in shape और tapers toward the lingual, with the sides being the buccal सतह, the mesial surface, the lingual surface, distal surface, और the distobuccal surface.
the occlusal सतह has four grooves.
The central groove is not straight but रनों down the center of the tooth mesially to distally and contains four pits ( mesial, central, सेंट्रल, और distal ).
The distobuccal groove runs इससे the distal pit in the central groove distobuccally separating the distal और distobuccal cusps.
The lingual groove runs इससे the more distal of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the central groove toward the lingual surface between the mesiolingual and distolingual पुलिन.
The buccal नाली runs इससे the more mesial of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the central groove toward the buccal सतह between the mesiobuccal and distobuccal cusps ending in the buccal pit.
The portion of the सेंट्रल groove between the central pits is termed the Lewis offset and is mandatory to account लिये the locations of the buccal and lingual grooves ( buccal groove being more mesial than the lingual groove while they are समानांतर ).
From the buccal ( buccal दृश्य ), दो roots are present.
The distal root is generally straighter, although both प्रायः have a slight distal curvature.
The heights of contour on the mesial and distal contact the adjacent दांत and हैं located at the junction of the occlusal and मध्य thirds of the crown.
The Florida Legislature is the two घरों कि act as the state legislature of the U.S. state of Florida.
The Florida Constitution states that `` The legislative power of the state shall be vested in a legislature of the राज्य of Florida, '' composed of a Senate and House of Representatives.
the legislature is seated at the Florida State Capitol in Tallahassee.

Arioch था महरूम charged with killing all the wise men after they were not able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
Daniel 2 is the second chapter of the Book of Daniel in the Hebrew Bible.
The chapter 's source text is predominantly written in Aramaic.
According to the text, Nebuchadnezzar is the king of Babylon who is troubled by his dreams.
He demands an interpretation for his dreams or होगा have his mystic interpreters executed.
डेनियल seeks Divine अक्ल to interpret the king 's dreams और praises God साथ a short psalm.
परमेश्वर gives Daniel a vision in the night to खुलासा the king 's dream.
Able to satisfy the king, डेनियल is promoted over the whole प्रांत of Babylon.
एक comcast Center, the headquarters of Comcast in Philadelphia, PA.
The old Comcast logo इससे 1969 to 1999, when it was replaced साथ the crescent logo.
The comcast Corporation is an American प्रदाता of entertainment, information and communications products and services.
it is the largest केबल operator, one of the biggest mass media, home Internet service provider, and third largest home टेलीफोन service प्रदाता in the United States, providing केबल television, broadband अंतरजाल, telephone service and in some areas home security ( including burglar alarms, surveillance cameras, fire alarm systems and home स्वचालन ) to both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the District of Columbia.
The company is headquartered in फिलाडेल्फिया, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
In 2011, comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media conglomerate NBCUniversal from ge in January 2011, and began the process of purchasing the बाकी 49 % on February 12, 2013, at a cost of $ 16.7 billion.
It completed the purchase on कूच 19, 2013.
Comcast also has significant पकड़कर in several केबल संजाल ( including E !
Entertainment Television, Style Network, G4, the Golf Channel and NBC खेल संजाल ), distribution ( ThePlatform ), और related businesses.
Comcast has been the subject of आलोचना for activities including its stance on net neutrality, as खूब as ग़रीब परिणाम on ग्राहक संतोष surveys.
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of sharp spines, or quills, that defend and camouflage them इससे परभक्षी.
They are indigenous to the americas, southern Asia, and Africa.
Porcupines are the third largest of the rodents, पीछे the capybara and the beaver.
Most porcupines are about long, with an long tail.
Weighing, they हैं rounded, large and slow.
porcupines come in various shades of brown, धूसर, and the unusual white.
porcupines ' spiny protection resembles कि of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs and monotreme echidnas.
The common साही is a herbivore.
It eats leaves, herbs, twigs and green plants like skunk गोभी and क्लोवर and in the winter it may eat छाल.
The उत्तर American porcupine often climbs trees to find food.
The African porcupine is not a climber and forages on the ground.
It is mostly nocturnal, but will sometimes forage लिये खाना in the day.
porcupines have become a pest in Kenya and हैं eaten as a delicacy.
The name porcupine comes from Middle French porc espin ( spined pig ).
A क्षेत्रीय American name for the animal is quill pig.

Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2, 1844 – October 10, 1929 ) was a ब्लैक Canadian-American inventor and इंजीनियर, who थी notable लिये उसके 57 u.S. patents, most to do with lubrication of steam engines.
Born free in Canada, he returned as a five-year-old child साथ उसके family to the संयुक्त States in 1847, where he lived for the rest of his life and became a US citizen.
Honda FCX Clarity, a हाइड्रोजन fuel cell demonstration vehicle introduced in 2008
A hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle that uses hydrogen as its onboard fuel for motive शक्ति.
Hydrogen vehicles शामिल hydrogen fueled space rockets, as well as ऑटोमोबाइल और other परिवहन वाहनों.
The power plants of such vehicles convert the रासायनिक energy of hydrogen to mechanical उर्जा either by burning hydrogen in an आतंरिक combustion engine, or by reacting hydrogen with ऑक्सीजन in a fuel cell to run electric मोटर्स.
Widespread use of हाइड्रोजन for fueling transportation is a key element of a proposed hydrogen economy.
Hydrogen fuel does not occur naturally on Earth and thus is not an energy सोर्स ; बल्कि it is an energy carrier.
It is सबसे frequently made from methane or other चट्टान fuels, but it can be produced using स्त्रोत ( such as wind, solar, or nuclear ) कि are intermittent, too व्याप्त or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen plants, using electrolysis of water, are exploring technologies to deliver costs कम enough, और quantities great enough, to compete with traditional energy sources.
Many companies are working to develop technologies that might efficiently exploit the संभावित of हाइड्रोजन energy for mobile uses.
the attraction of using hydrogen as an उर्जा currency is that, if hydrogen is prepared without using चट्टान fuel inputs, गाडी propulsion होता not contribute to carbon dioxide emissions.
The drawbacks of हाइड्रोजन use हैं ऊँची capital cost, low energy content per unit आवाज़, ऊँची tankage weights, बहुत high storage पोत pressures, the storage, transportation and भरना of gaseous or liquid hydrogen in वाहनों, the large investment in infrastructure that would be जरूरी to fuel वाहनों, and the inefficiency of उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं.
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of California और the seat of government of Sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in the northern portion of California 's expansive Central घाटी.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest city in कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the 35th largest नगर in the United States.
Sacramento is the core सांस्कृतिक and economic center of the Sacramento महानगर area which includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 जनसांख्यिकी of 2,527,123.
Its महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the fourth largest in California बाद the Greater Los एंजिल्स Area, San Francisco Bay Area, and the San Diego metropolitan area, as well as the 25th largest in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as अमेरिका 's most ethnically और racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a नगर through the efforts of the Swiss अप्रवासी John Sutter, Sr., उसके son John Sutter, Jr., and James W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's Fort, जिससे was established by Sutter in 1839.
During the कैलिफ़ोर्निया Gold Rush, Sacramento was a major distribution पाइंट, a commercial और agricultural center, और a terminus for wagon trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California राज्य University, Sacramento, अधिक commonly ज्ञात as Sacramento राज्य or Sac State, is the largest local विश्वविद्यालयों.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University प्रणाली.
Drexel University Sacramento is located in Downtown, Sacramento.
विश्वविद्यालयों of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of विधि is located in the Oak Park neighborhood.
In जोड, the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Davis is located in nearby Davis, west of the capital.
The UC Davis Medical Center, a world-renowned शोध hospital, is स्तिथ in the नगर of Sacramento.
The ठहराना Store is a chain of retail stores owned and operated by Apple Inc., dealing in computers and consumer electronics.
The stores sell मैकिंटोश personal computers, तन्त्र, iPods, iPads, iPhones, third-party accessories, और other consumer electronics such as ठहराना TV.
Some high प्रोफ़ाइल stores feature a Theatre for presentations and workshops and a Studio for training with Apple products ; all stores offer a Genius Bar for technical support and मरम्मत, as well as फ़्री workshops available to the public.
अंतर्गत the नेतृत्व of Ron Johnson, the former Senior Vice President of Retail Operations, the ठहराना Stores have, according to an article in the New York टाइम्स, been responsible for `` [ turning ] the उबाऊ computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets ''.
, Apple has 405 stores worldwide, with global sales of billion in merchandise in 2011, and वे lead the United States retail market in terms of sales per ईकाई area.
Steven Paul `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24, 1955 – अक्तूबर 5, 2011 ) थी an अमरीकी entrepreneur and inventor, best known as the co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Apple inc.
Through Apple, he was widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer revolution and for his influential career in the computer and consumer electronics fields, transforming `` one industry after another, from computers and smartphones to music and movies... ''
Jobs also co-founded और served as chief executive of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became a member of the board of directors of The Walt Disney Company in 2006, when Disney acquired पिक्चर्स.
Jobs was among the first to see the वाणिज्यिक potential of Xerox PARC 's चूहा -driven आलेखीय user interface, which led to the creation of the ठहराना Lisa and, एक year later, the Macintosh.
He also played a role in introducing the LaserWriter, one of the first widely available laser printers, to the मार्केट.
After a power struggle with the board of directors in 1985, Jobs left ठहराना and founded अगला, a computer platform विकास company specializing in the higher-education and business markets.
In 1986, he acquired the computer graphics प्रभाग of Lucasfilm, which थी spun off as Pixar.
He was credited in Toy स्टोरी ( 1995 ) as an executive producer.
He served as CEO and majority shareholder until Disney 's खरीदें of Pixar in 2006.
in 1996, after Apple had failed to deliver its operating system, Copland, Gil amelio turned to NeXT Computer, और the NeXTSTEP platform became the foundation for the Mac os x.
Jobs returned to Apple as an advisor, and took control of the company as an interim CEO.
Jobs brought Apple from near दिवालियापन to profitability by 1998.
As the new CEO of the company, Jobs oversaw the development of the iMac, iTunes, iPod, iphone, and iPad, और on the services side, the company 's ठहराना Retail Stores, itunes Store and the App Store.
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable financial returns, and propelled Apple to become the world 's most मूल्यवान सरेआम traded company in 2011.
the reinvigoration of the कम्पनी is regarded by many commentators as one of the greatest turnarounds in business history.
In 2003, कार्य थी diagnosed with a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor.
Though it was initially treated, he reported a hormone imbalance, underwent a liver transplant in 2009, और appeared progressively thinner as his health declined.
On medical leave for most of 2011, Jobs resigned in August that year, and was निर्वाचित Chairman of the Board.
He died of respiratory arrest related to उसके metastatic tumor on अक्तूबर 5, 2011.
कार्य received a number of honors and public recognition for his influence in the technology और music industries.
He has been referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or simply `` visionary '', and has been described as the `` Father of the डिजिटल Revolution '', a `` निपुण of innovation '', और a `` design perfectionist ''.

रोमन numerals, the numeric system in प्राचीन Rome, उपयोग combinations of letters इससे the Latin alphabet to signify मान.
the numbers 1 to 10 can be expressed in Roman numerals as follows:
and.
the Roman numeral system is a cousin of Etruscan numerals.
Use of रोमन numerals continued after the decline of the Roman Empire.
From the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in सबसे contexts by more सुविधाजनक hindu-arabic numerals ; however this process was gradual, and the use of रोमन numerals in some minor अनुप्रयोग continues to this day.
Effective Nuclear Charge आरेख
The effective nuclear charge ( often symbolize as or Z* ) is the net धनात्मक charge experienced by an electron in a multi-electron atom.
the पद `` effective '' is used because the shielding effect of negatively charged electrons prevents higher orbital electrons इससे experiencing the पूरा nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons.
The effective nuclear charge experienced by the outer शेल electron is also called the core charge.
It is possible to determine the strength of the nuclear चार्ज by looking at the oxidation number of the अणु.
