the Dwight D. Eisenhower National प्रणाली of Interstate and Defense Highways ( commonly known as the Interstate राजमार्ग प्रणाली, Interstate Freeway System, अंतरराज्यीय प्रणाली, or simply the Interstate ) is a संजाल of freeways that forms a part of the National Highway System of the United राज्य.
The system is named for President Dwight D. आइज़नहावर, जो championed its गठन.
Construction was authorized by the संघीय Aid Highway Act of 1956, and the original portion was completed 35 years बाद.
The network has since been extended, and, it had a total length of, making it the संसार 's दूसरी longest after China 's., about one-quarter of all vehicle miles driven in the country use the Interstate प्रणाली.
the cost of construction has been estimated at $ 425 अरब ( in 2006 dollars ), making it the `` largest public works कार्यक्रम since the Pyramids ``.
The system has contributed in shaping the United States into a world आर्थिक महाशक्ति और a अत्यधिक industrialized nation.
.eu is the देश code top-level domain ( ccTLD ) for the European Union ( eu ).
Launched on 7 December 2005, the domain is available for organisations in और residents of eu member राज्य.
the TLD is administered by EURid, a consortium originally consisting of the national ccTLD registry operators of Belgium, Sweden, and इटली, joined later by the national registry operator of the Czech Republic.
Trademark स्वामी were समर्थ to submit registrations through a sunrise काल, in an effort to prevent cybersquatting.
Full registration started on 7 April 2006.
Meister means master in German ( as in master craftsman, or as an honorific title such as Meister Eckhart ).
the शब्द is akin to maestro.
In sports, Meister is used for the current नेशनल, European or world champion ( Deutscher Meister, *Europameister, Weltmeister ).
Many modern day जर्मनी police forces use the title meister.
During the Second World War, Meister was the उच्चतम आयोजिक रैंक of the Ordnungspolizei.
meister has been borrowed into अंग्रेज़ी slang, जहाँ it is प्रयुक्त in compound nouns.
A person referred to as “meister” is one who has extensive theoretical ज्ञान and practical skills in his profession, business, or कुछ other दयालु of work or activity.
For example, a “puzzle-meister” होता be someone highly skilled at solving puzzles.
ये neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for example, “stubble-meister” for किसी with a short, neat beard or “crier-meister” for someone who often cries ).
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an American live-action children 's television series about teenagers with super-powers, based on the 16th installment of the Japanese Super Sentai मताधिकार, Kyōryū sentai Zyuranger.
Both the show और its related merchandise saw unbridled overnight कामयाबी, becoming a staple of 1990s pop culture in mere महीने.
Under the असली name, `` Mighty Morphin शक्ति Rangers '' the श्रेणी ran from 1993 to 1995 और spawned the feature film Mighty Morphin Power Rangers : The Movie.
the second and third seasons of the show खींचा on footage और elements from the Super Sentai श्रेणी Gosei sentai dairanger and Ninja sentai Kakuranger respectively, though the zyuranger costumes were still प्रयुक्त for the five main Rangers और अनेक नियमित villains.
तभी the mecha and the Kiba रेंजर costume ( worn by the White Ranger ) यहूद retained from Dairanger for the second season, जबकि only the mecha from Kakuranger यहूद featured in the third season.
However the Kakuranger costumes were later प्रयुक्त for the title characters of the mini-series, mighty morphin एलियन Rangers.
The series was produced by mmpr प्रोडक्शन्स, distributed by Saban Entertainment, और aired on Fox Kids.
The show 's merchandise was उत्पादित and distributed by Bandai Entertainment.
In 1996, the series was rebranded as the Power Rangers franchise ; renaming the series every year after, and using costumes, props, and footage from subsequent Super sentai श्रेणी, as well as changing the डाल और storyline.
While an overarching storyline would continue until Power Rangers Lost Galaxy, subsequent series after MMPR हैं not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional भाव.
in 2010, a re-version of mighty Morphin Power रेंजरों, साथ a new लोगो, कॉमिक book-referenced ग्राफिक्स, और extra alternative special effects, was broadcast on एबीसी बच्चे, and Bandai produced brand नई खिलौने to coincide with the series.
Edgar Allan Poe ( born Edgar Poe ; January 19, 1809 – अक्तूबर 7, 1849 ) was an American author, poet, editor and literary critic, considered part of the अमरीकी Romantic Movement.
Best known for his tales of mystery और the macabre, Poe was one of the earliest American practitioners of the short story और is generally माना the inventor of the detective fiction genre.
he is further credited साथ contributing to the उभरते genre of science fiction.
He was the first well-known अमरीकी writer to try to earn a living through writing alone, resulting in a financially मुश्किल जीवन और career.
He थी born as Edgar Poe in Boston, Massachusetts ; he थी orphaned young जब his mother died shortly after उसके father abandoned the family.
Poe थी taken in by John and Frances allan, of Richmond, Virginia, but they never formally adopted him.
He attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of Virginia for एक सेमेस्टर but left due to कमी of money.
बाद enlisting in the फौज and later failing as an अधिकारी 's cadet at West Point, Poe parted तरीके with the allans.
His publishing करियर began humbly, with an anonymous collection of poems, Tamerlane and Other कविताएं ( 1827 ), credited only to `` a Bostonian ''.
Poe switched his focus to prose and spent the next several सालो working for literary जर्नल्स and periodicals, becoming known for his अपना style of literary criticism.
His कार्य forced उसे to move among several cities, including Baltimore, Philadelphia, and New York City.
In Baltimore in 1835, he married Virginia Clemm, his 13-year-old cousin.
In January 1845 Poe प्रकाशित उसके poem, `` the Raven ``, to instant success.
His बीवी died of tuberculosis two years after its publication.
He began नियोजन to उपज his own journal, The Penn ( later renamed The Stylus ), हालांकि he died पहले it could be produced.
On October 7, 1849, at age 40, Poe died in Baltimore ; the कारण of उसके death is unknown and has been variously attributed to दारू, brain congestion, हैजा, drugs, heart disease, rabies, आत्महत्या, tuberculosis, and other agents.
Poe and his works बहकावे literature in the United States and around the world, as well as in specialized fields, such as cosmology और cryptography.
Poe and his work appear throughout लोकप्रिय culture in literature, म्यूज़िक, films, and television.
A number of his homes are dedicated संग्रहालय today.
The Mystery Writers of America उपस्थित an annual award known as the Edgar Award for distinguished work in the mystery विधा.
Lions are obligate carnivores ; वे आवश्यकता up to seven गामा ( 15 lbs ) of मांस per day.
a major घटक of their diet is the flesh of large mammals, like this African buffalo.
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat भक्षक ' ( Latin, caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' और vorare meaning 'to devour ' ) is an organism that derives इसके energy and nutrient आवश्यकताएँ from a आहार consisting मुख्यतः or exclusively of animal tissue, whether through predation or scavenging.
पशु that depend solely on animal flesh for their nutrient requirements are considered carnivores while those that also consume non-animal food are considered carnivores.
Omnivores also consume both एनिमल and non-animal food, and apart from the more general definition, there is no clearly defined अनुपात of plant to animal material that would distinguish a facultative carnivore from an omnivore.
A carnivore कि sits at the शीर्ष of the foodchain is an apex परभक्षी.
Plants that कैप्चर and digest कीट are पुकारा carnivorous पौधे.
similarly, fungi कि capture microscopic पशु are often called carnivorous fungi.
The FIFA संसार Cup, often बस the World Cup, is an international association football competition contested by the senior men 's national teams of the सदस्यों of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The चैंपियनशिप has been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War.
The current champions are Spain, who won the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 teams competing for the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the host स्वदेश ( s ) over a period of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup फाइनल.
A qualification phase, जिससे currently takes place over the preceding तीन years, is used to determine जिससे teams qualify लिये the tournament साथ साथ the host nation ( s ).
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been जीती by eight different national टीमों.
Brazil have won five times, और वे are the only team to have played in every टूर्नामेंट.
The अन्य World कप विजेता are Italy, साथ four titles ; Germany, with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural विजेता Uruguay, with two शीर्षक each ; and इंग्लैण्ड, France, और Spain, with one title each.
the World कप is the संसार 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people देखी the फाइनल match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
Heroes is an American science fiction television drama श्रेणी created by Tim क्रिंग that appeared on NBC for four सीज़न from September 25, 2006 through फ़रवरी 8, 2010.
The series tells the कहानियां of ordinary people who discover superhuman abilities, और how these abilities take effect in the characters ' जीवनदान.
The श्रेणी emulates the aesthetic style और storytelling of American comic books, using multi-episode story arcs that build upon a larger, more encompassing चाप.
the series थी उत्पादित by tailwind Productions in संघ with Universal Media Studios.
It was filmed primarily in लॉस Angeles, California.
Four complete seasons aired, समाप्ति on February 8, 2010.
the critically acclaimed first season had a चलाएं of 23 episodes and garnered an average of 14.3 million viewers in the United States, receiving the highest rating for an NBC drama premiere in five years.
The second season of नायक आकर्षित an average of 13.1 लाख दर्शक in the U.S., and चिह्नित NBC 's sole series among the top 20 ranked programs in total viewership for the 2007–2008 ऋतु.
Heroes has earned a number of पुरस्कार and nominations, including Primetime Emmy Awards, Golden Globes, People 's चुनाव Awards and अंग्रेजों अकादमी Television Awards.
An ऑनलाइन extension of the series, Heroes 360 Experience, बाद rebranded as Heroes evolutions, थी created to explore the Heroes universe and provides insight into the show 's mythology.
Other official Heroes media शामिल magazines, action आंकड़े, tie-in and interactive websites, a mobile game, a novel, clothing और other merchandise.
In the fall of 2008, एनबीसी Digital Entertainment released a series of online content लिये the summer, including more original web content, बेतार iTV interactivity, graphic novels available for mobile viewing और webisodes.
NBC announced Heroes cancellation on May 14, 2010.
afterward, the network considered making a television special event to conclude the series ; however, on September 9, 2010, NBC announced the decision to stop any further development of the नायक मताधिकार.
Tim Kring then suggested कि the broad premise of नायक storylines allowed for the मताधिकार to return for fans, but he did नहीं बताएँ जब or in what media format.
On April 17, 2013, tv Line reported that MSN was in talks to revive the series with a new cast.
John Pierpont `` J. p. ''
मॉर्गन ( April 17, 1837 – March 31, 1913 ) थी an American financier, banker, philanthropist और आर्ट collector who dominated corporate वित्त and industrial consolidation during his समय.
In 1892 Morgan arranged the विलय of Edison General Electric और Thomson-Houston Electric Company to form सामान्य Electric.
After financing the creation of the Federal स्टील Company, he merged in 1901 with the कार्नेगी Steel Company and several other स्टील and iron businesses, सहित संचित Steel and Wire कम्पनी स्वामित्व by William Edenborn, to form the United States Steel Corporation.
Morgan died in Rome, Italy, in his sleep in 1913 at the age of 75, leaving his fortune और business to his son, जॉन Pierpont `` Jack '' Morgan, Jr., और bequeathing his mansion and large book collections to the Morgan Library & Museum in New York.
At the height of Morgan 's career during the early 1900s, he और his partners had financial investments in many large corporations and were accused by critics of controlling the nation 's high finance.
He directed the बैंकिंग coalition that stopped the Panic of 1907.
He was the leading financier of the Progressive Era, and his dedication to दक्षता and modernization helped transform American business.

The प्लाट of the episodes is set in Tokyo and revolves around Rin Asōgi, an immortal private investigator, as she explores the secrets of modern and near-future world और the supernatural events कि घेर the fictional society of immortals जैसे herself.
There are large time gaps in the internal कालक्रम between the पहला five episodes, ranging from one to तीस years.
The छह episodes were broadcast मासिक on AT-X चैनल in Japan, between February 3 and July 6, 2008.
Each episode is 45 minutes long.

Aerial फ़ोटो of FLETC, जहाँ us digital forensics standards were developed in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes ज्ञात as digital forensic science ) is a शाखा of forensic science encompassing the रिकवरी and investigation of material found in digital devices, often in relation to computer crime.
The term digital forensics was originally used as a पर्याय for computer forensics लकिन has expanded to cover investigation of सब devices सक्षम of storing digital data.
साथ roots in the निजी computing revolution of the late 1970s and early '80s, the discipline evolved in a haphazard manner during the 1990s, and it was not जबतक the early 21st century कि national policies emerged.
Digital forensics investigations have a किस्में of applications.
The most आम is to support or refute a परिकल्पना before दण्ड or civil ( as part of the electronic discovery process ) courts.
forensics may भी विशेषता in the private sector ; such as during internal कॉरपोरेट investigations or intrusion investigation ( a specialist जांच into the nature और extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ).
The technical aspect of an investigation is divided into several sub-branches, relating to the प्रकार of digital devices involved ; computer forensics, network forensics, forensic data analysis और mobile device forensics.
The typical forensic process encompasses the seizure, forensic imaging ( acquisition ) and analysis of digital media and the production of a report into collected प्रमाण.
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime, डिजिटल forensics can be प्रयुक्त to attribute evidence to विशिष्ट suspects, confirm alibis or statements, determine intent, identify sources ( for example, in copyright मामले ), or authenticate दस्तावेज़.
investigations are much broader in scope than अन्य areas of forensic analysis ( where the usual उद्देश्य is to provide answers to a श्रेणी of simpler questions ) often involving complex time-lines or hypotheses.
a comparison of the chromaticities enclosed by some रंग spaces.
A color model is an abstract mathematical मॉडल describing the way colors can be represented as tuples of numbers, typically as three or चार values or color components ( e.g. RGB and CMYK are रंग models ).
However, a रंग model with no संबद्ध मानचित्रण फलन to an absolute color space is a more or less arbitrary color system with no कनेक्शन to any globally समझा system of रंग interpretation.
Adding a निश्चित mapping function between the color model and a certain reference color space results in a definite `` footprint '' within the reference color स्पेस.
This `` footprint '' is known as a gamut, and, in combination with the color मॉडल, defines a new color space.
For example, adobe RGB and sRGB are two अलग absolute color स्पेसेस, both based on the आरजीबी model.
In the most generic भाव of the definition above, color spaces can be defined without the उपयोग of a color model.
These spaces, such as Pantone, are in effect a given set of names or numbers which are defined by the existence of a corresponding set of शारीरिक रंग swatches.
This article focuses on the mathematical model concept.
Labor Day is an American federal अवकाश observed on the first Monday in September, कि celebrates the economic and social contributions of workers.
Life insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy holder ) और an insurer, जहाँ the insurer promises to pay a designated beneficiary a sum of धन ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the death of the insured person.
Depending on the contract, other कार्यक्रम such as terminal बीमारी or critical illness may भी ट्रिगर payment.
The policy holder typically pays a premium, either regularly or as a lump sum.
अन्य expenses ( such as funeral expenses ) are also sometimes शामिल in the benefits.
जीवन policies हैं legal contracts and the terms of the contract describe the limitations of the insured events.
Specific exclusions are प्रायः written into the contract to limit the liability of the insurer ; common examples are claims relating to suicide, fraud, war, riot और सिविल commotion.
Life-based contracts tend to fall into दो major categories:
सुरक्षा policies – designed to provide a benefit in the event of specified event, typically a lump योग भुगतान.
a common रूप of this design is term बीमे.
Investment नीतियों – where the main objective is to facilitate the growth of capital by regular or single premiums.
Common forms ( in the US ) हैं whole life, universal जीवन and variable life policies.

Mitzi gaynor Donahue ( born May 2, 1962 in yorba Linda, नारंगी County, कैलिफ़ोर्निया ) is an American अभिनेत्री, also credited और more popularly ज्ञात as Mitzi Kapture.
kapture began उसके career in films, सबसे of which were नहीं विशाल वाणिज्यिक successes.
She went on to make a few television guest appearances ( MacGyver, 1st & Ten, और as a contestant on The $ 100,000 Pyramid ) पहले she gained international exposure साथ उसके first major television भूमिका as Sergeant Rita Lee Lance in the television series Silk stalkings.
Kapture 's role as Rita, the other हाफ of the two `` Sams '' for almost 5 years, cemented her popularity.
Paired with रोब Estes जो played Sergeant Chris Lorenzo, Kapture gained global recognition along साथ her costar since the show was broadcast in several countries.
Sergeant Lance eventually became Lieutenant Lance by the time Kapture बाएँ the series in 1995 to have her first child Madison.
During her time साथ the series, Kapture briefly sat in the director 's chair, लिये two episodes.
She was interviewed for the Silk stalkings Season 1 DVD which थी distributed by Anchor Bay entertainment and released in September 2004.
After a छोटी hiatus इससे the screen following उसके exit इससे Silk Stalkings, Kapture returned in 1997 to the small screen and USA Network.
वो played सीसे roles in two USA Pictures Originals telemovies, Perfect अपराधों ( based on a true story, also called Hide and तलाश : the Joanne Jensen Story ), which भी starred Jasmine guy and His Bodyguard.
She later starred in a few other independent film projects and थिएटर productions and had several television guest appearances.
Kapture also था a recurring role on Baywatch as Alexis ryker.
She played Anita Hodges on the यंग and the बेचैन from 2002 through 2004, where वो थी credited as Mitzi kapture Donahue, and starred in the made-for-tv फिल्म Night of Terror which premiered कूच 26, 2006 on Lifetime Network.
Her latest is a supporting role in God 's Ears, released in 2007.
kapture is the official हस्ती प्रवक्ता for the Xeroderma pigmentosum Society.
The Xbox 360 is the second video game console developed by and produced for microsoft and the successor to the Xbox.
The Xbox 360 competes with Sony 's प्लेस्टेशन 3 and Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles.
as of September 30, 2012, 70 million Xbox 360 consoles have been sold worldwide.
The Xbox 360 थी officially unveiled on एमटीवी on May 12, 2005, साथ detailed launch and game information divulged later that month at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक entertainment Expo ( E3 ).
The कंसोल sold out completely upon release in सब regions मगर in Japan.
Several major features of the Xbox 360 are its integrated Xbox Live service कि allows players to compete online ; डाउनलोड arcade games, game demos, trailers, TV shows, music and movies ; and its Windows Media बीच multimedia capabilities.
The Xbox सजीव also offers access to various ( often region-specific ) third-party media streaming applications.
At उनके e3 presentation on June 14, 2010, Microsoft announced a redesigned Xbox 360 that would ship on the same दिन.
The redesigned कंसोल is slimmer than the previous Xbox 360 model and features integrated 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi, TOSLINK S/PDIF optical ऑडियो output, five USB 2.0 ports ( compared to the three from older versions ) और a special AUX port.
Older models of the Xbox 360 have since been discontinued.
the first new console to be released features a 250 gb hard drive, जबकि a later, कम expensive SKU features 4 GB आतंरिक storage.
Backpack may also refer to a 2001 novel by Emily Barr
A modern backpack
Swiss army backpack ca. 1960
Integrated bearer frame.
A backpack ( also called rucksack, knapsack, packsack, पैक ) is, in its simplest form, a cloth sack carried on एक 's back and secured with दो straps that go over the shoulders, but there can be अपवाद.
Lightweight types of backpacks are sometimes worn on only एक shoulder डोरी.
Backpacks are प्रायः preferred to handbags for carrying heavy loads or carrying any sort of equipment, because of the limited capacity to carry heavy weights for long अवधि of समय in the hands.
Large backpacks, used to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 lbs ), usually offload the largest part ( up to परिचय 90 % ) of उनके weight onto padded hip belts, leaving the shoulder straps mainly for stabilising the load.
This improves the potential to carry heavy loads, as the hips are stronger than the shoulders, and भी increases चपलता and balance, since the लोड rides nearer the wearer 's own center of mass.
In प्राचीन टाइम्स, the backpack was प्रयुक्त as a means to carry the hunter 's larger game and other types of शिकार and as a way of easier हस्तांतरण लिये other materials.
In the cases of larger hunts, the hunters would dismember their prey and distribute the pieces of the animal around, each one पैकिंग the meat into many wrappings and then into bags जिससे they placed on to their backs.
The थैला itself थी made up of different animal hide और स्किन ( depending on what sorts of पशु were in the area ) और sewn together by the आंतों of said animals, which were woven साथ tightly to make a sturdy thread-like material.
Mexico ( ; ; ), officially the संयुक्त मैक्सिकन States ( ), is a संघीय constitutional गणतंत्र in North America.
It is bordered on the उत्तर by the United States ; on the दक्षिण और west by the प्रशांत Ocean ; on the southeast by Guatemala, Belize, and the Caribbean समुद्र ; and on the east by the Gulf of Mexico.
Covering almost two million square kilometres ( over 760,000 sq mi ), Mexico is the पांचवां largest country in the Americas by total area and the 13th largest स्वतंत्र nation in the world.
With an estimated population of over 113 million, it is the world 's eleventh सबसे populous country and the most populous Spanish-speaking country.
Mexico is a federation comprising thirty-one states and a Federal District, the capital नगर.
In pre-Columbian Mexico many cultures matured into उन्नत सभ्यताओं such as the Olmec, the Toltec, the teotihuacan, the Zapotec, the Maya and the Aztec पहले first contact with europeans.
in 1521, Spain conquered and colonized the territory इससे its base in México-Tenochtitlan, जिससे was administered as the Viceroyalty of New Spain.
इस territory होता eventually become मैक्सिको following recognition of the colony 's independence in 1821.
The post-independence period थी characterized by आर्थिक instability, the Mexican-American War and territorial cession to the United राज्य, a civil war, two empires and a domestic dictatorship.
The latter led to the Mexican Revolution in 1910, जिससे culminated with the promulgation of the 1917 Constitution and the emergence of the देश 's current political प्रणाली.
Elections held in July 2000 marked the first time कि an विपक्ष party won the presidency from the Institutional Revolutionary Party.
Since 2006 the country has been in the midst of a drug war which रै caused 60,000 मौतों.
Mexico has एक of the संसार 's largest economies, and is considered both a क्षेत्रीय शक्ति and middle power.
In जोड, Mexico was the पहला लैटिन American member of the Organisation for आर्थिक Co-operation and विकास OECD ( since 1994 ), and considered an upper-middle income country by the World बैंको.
मैक्सिको is considered a newly industrialized country and an emerging power.
It has the fourteenth largest nominal GDP and the eleventh largest GDP by purchasing power parity.
The economy is strongly linked to those of its North अमरीकी Free Trade अनुबंध ( NAFTA ) partners, विशेषकर the United राज्य of अमेरिका.
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and first in the Americas by number of UNESCO World विरासत साइट with 31, and in 2007 was the tenth most visited country in the संसार with 21.4 million international arrivals per year.
Babe रुथ holds the एमएलबी करियर slugging percentage record (.690 ).
in baseball statistics, slugging प्रतिशत ( abbreviated SLG ) is a लोकप्रिय measure of the power of a hitter.
it is calculated as total bases विभाजित by at bats :
where AB is the number of at-bats for a दिए player, and 1b, 2B, 3B, and HR are the number of singles, युगल, triples, और home runs, respectively.
Walks are specifically excluded from इस calculation.
For उदाहरण, in 1920, Babe Ruth played his first season for the New York Yankees.
In 458 at bats, Ruth had 172 hits, comprising 73 singles, 36 युगल, 9 तिगुना, and 54 home runs, which brings the total base गिनती to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388.
His total number of bases ( 388 ) divided by his total at-bats ( 458 ) is.847, his slugging प्रतिशत लिये the season.
The अगला year he slugged.846, and these records went unbroken until 2001, जब Barry bonds achieved 411 bases in 476 at-bats, bringing his slugging percentage to.863, बेमेल since.
is a role-playing video game developed and published by Square ( now वर्गाकार Enix ) for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1995.
Chrono Trigger 's विकास team शामिल three designers that Square dubbed the `` Dream Team '' : Hironobu sakaguchi, the creator of Square 's Final Fantasy series ; Yuji Horii, a freelance designer and creator of Enix 's popular ड्रैगन Quest series ; and Akira Toriyama, a freelance manga artist famed for his work with ड्रैगन Quest and Dragon Ball.
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game, Masato Kato wrote सबसे of the plot, while composer Yasunori Mitsuda scored सबसे of the खेल before गिरना ill और deferring बाकी tracks to Final Fantasy composer nobuo Uematsu.
The game 's story फ़ॉलो a group of adventurers who travel through time to prevent a global catastrophe.
Square re-released a ported version by Tose in Japan for Sony 's PlayStation in 1999, later repackaged with a Final Fantasy IV port as Final काल्पनिक क्रॉनिकल्स in 2001 for the North American मार्केट.
A slightly enhanced chrono Trigger was released for the Nintendo DS on नवम्बर 25, 2008, in North America and Japan, and went on sale in Australia on February 3, 2009 और in Europe on February 6, 2009.
The game was never released in pal territories before the निन्टेंडो DS version.
Chrono ट्रिगर was a critical और commercial success upon रिलीज and is considered today to be one of the महानतम वीडियो खेल of all time.
Nintendo शक्ति magazine described aspects of Chrono Trigger as क्रांतिकारी, सहित its अनेक endings, plot-related sidequests focusing on अक्षर विकास, unique battle system, and detailed graphics.
Chrono Trigger was the third best-selling game of 1995, और the game 's snes और PlayStation iterations have shipped 2.65 million copies as of March 2003.
The version for the Nintendo DS बेची 790,000 copies as of March 2009.
Chrono Trigger was भी ported to mobile फोन, Virtual कंसोल, the PlayStation Network ( तभी in the USA ), iOS devices, and एंड्रॉइड डिवाइस.

बकरी cheese, or chèvre ( from the French word for बकरी ), is cheese made out of the milk of बकरियों.
Hyperthermia is elevated body तापमान due to failed thermoregulation that occurs when a देह produces or absorbs अधिक ऊष्मा than it dissipates.
Extreme temperature elevation then becomes a medical emergency requiring तात्कालिक treatment to prevent विकलांगता or मौत.
The most common causes शामिल ऊष्मा stroke और adverse reactions to drugs.
The former is an acute temperature elevation caused by exposure to excessive ऊष्मा, or संयोजन of heat और humidity, कि overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms.
The latter is a relatively rare side प्रभाव of अनेक drugs, particularly those that affect the central nervous system.
malignant hyperthermia is a rare complication of some प्रकार of general एनेस्थीसिया.
अतिताप can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices और may be used in the treatment of some kinds of cancer and अन्य शर्तें, most commonly in संयोजन with radiotherapy.
Hyperthermia differs from fever in that the body 's temperature नियत point remains unchanged.
The opposite is hypothermia, which occurs when the तापमान drops below कि required to maintain normal metabolism.
Belize, is a country located on the northeastern coast of Central America.
It is the only country in the क्षेत्रफल where English is the official language, although Kriol and स्पेनी are more commonly spoken.
Belize is bordered on the north by मैक्सिको, to the दक्षिण and west by Guatemala and to the ईस्ट by the Caribbean Sea.
Its mainland is about long and wide.
With of land and a population of only 312,698 निवासियों ( 2010 जनसांख्यिकी ), बेलीज़ possesses the न्यूनतम population density in Central America.
The country 's population growth rate of 3.15 % ( 2012 est. ) is the second उच्चतम in the region and एक of the highest in the पश्चिमी hemisphere.
Belize 's abundance of terrestrial and समुद्री species, and its diversity of ecosystems give it a key place within the globally significant Mesoamerican biological Corridor.
Belize has a diverse society, comprising many cultures and languages.
it is the only nation in the region with a अंग्रेजों औपनिवेशिक heritage, but as a part of the Western caribbean Zone, it भी shares a common heritage with the fellow Anglophone Caribbean देशों.
In सामान्य, Belize is considered to be a Central American और Caribbean nation with strong ties to both the Caribbean and Latin America.
Belize is a member of the caribbean Community ( CARICOM ), the Community of Latin अमरीकी and Caribbean States ( CELAC ), and सेंट्रल अमरीकी संयोजन प्रणाली ( SICA ).
Belize is ज्ञात for its September Celebrations, and is the birthplace of चबाने gum and punta Rock.
the `` Betsy Ross '' flag
A `` Betsy Ross '' flag flying outside San Francisco City Hall
The Betsy Ross flag is an early design of the ध्वज of the संयुक्त States, popularly attributed to Betsy रॉस, using the common motifs of alternating red-and-white striped field with five-pointed stars in a blue canton.
The flag was designed दौरान the American क्रान्ति and सुविधाएँ 13 stars to represent the original 13 colonies.
The distinctive विशेषता of the Ross flag is the arrangement of the stars in a circle.
Although the Betsy Ross story is accepted by most Americans, कुछ flag historians and revisionists do not accept the Betsy रॉस design as the first American flag.
According to the traditional account, the original ध्वज was made in June 1776, when a small committee—including George वॉशिंगटन, Robert Morris और relative George Ross —visited Betsy and discussed the need लिये a new American flag.
Betsy accepted the job to manufacture the flag, altering the committee 's design by replacing the six-pointed सितारों with five-pointed stars.
जबकि the Betsy रॉस legend is questionable, the flag design is known to have been in उपयोग by 1777 ; Alfred B. Street described it at the आत्मसमर्पण of General Burgoyne and understood the circle of stars to represent equality among the American states.
It is one of the oldest versions of U.S. ध्वज known to exist ; जबकि it is not the oldest surviving flag centuries in cloth रूप, its likeness appears on older physical अरबिंदो, namely, the contemporary battlefield paintings by John Trumbull and Charles Willson Peale.
They depict the circular स्टार arrangement being flown from ship masts and many other places, and thus provide the first ज्ञात historical documentation of the flag 's appearance.
The seal of the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs उपयोग the बेट्सी Ross flag to represent सेवा to all veterans from the American Revolution to the present day.
The Betsy Ross design of 13-star us flags has been featured in many popular artworks ( sometimes inaccurately, as in Washington क्रासिंग the Delaware ) and films, such as the 1960 version of Pollyanna.
the flag continues to be one of the most popular प्रतीकों of the American Revolution.
A purr is a sound made by all species of felids and is a part of cat communication.
It varies between बिल्लियों ( for उदाहरण by loudness and tone ), and from species to species, but can be characterized as a tonal buzzing.
the पद `` purring '' has been used liberally in literature, and it रै been claimed that viverrids ( civet, mongoose, genet ), bears, badgers, hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr.
Other animals कि have been said to purr are rabbits, squirrels, guinea सूअर, tapirs, ring-tailed lemurs, elephants, raccoons and gorillas while eating.
however, using a strict definition of purring that continuous sound production must वैकल्पिक between pulmonic egressive and ingressive airstream ( and usually go on for minutes ), Peters ( 2002 ), in an exhaustive पुनर्विलोकन of the scientific literature, पहुँचे the conclusion that until then only ‘purring cats’ ( फ़ेलिडाए ) और two species of genets, Genetta tigrina, and most likely also Genetta genetta, had been documented to purr.
the platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern Australia, सहित Tasmania.
साथ with the four species of echidna, it is one of the five extant species of monotremes, the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth.
It is the sole living प्रतिनिधि of इसके परिवार ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ), though a number of related प्रजाति have been मिला in the चट्टान record.
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying, duck -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed mammal baffled European naturalists जब they first encountered it, साथ some considering it an विस्तृत fraud.
It is one of the few venomous स्तनधारियों, the male platypus having a spur on the हिन्द foot कि delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the पढ़ाई of evolutionary biology और a recognisable and iconic symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a शुभंकर at नेशनल events और is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
the platypus is the animal emblem of the state of New दक्षिण Wales.
Until the early 20th century, it was hunted for its फर, लकिन it is अभी protected throughout its दायरा.
Although captive breeding programmes have था only सीमित कामयाबी and the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of प्रदूषण, it is not under any immediate threat.

The population was 336 at the 2010 census.

In human-computer interaction, cut and paste and copy and paste are related commands that प्रस्ताव a user-interface interaction technique for transferring text, data, files or वस्तुएँ from a source to a destination.
Most ubiquitously, users आवश्यकता the क्षमता to cut and paste भाग of plain text.
The cut command removes the चयनित data from its original position, while the copy command creates a duplicate ; in both cases the selected data is placed in a clipboard.
The आंकड़ा in the clipboard is later inserted in the position जहाँ the paste कमांड is issued.
the command names are an interface metaphor आधारित on the शारीरिक procedure used in manuscript editing to create a पेज layout.
This interaction technique has close एसोसिएशन साथ related तकनीकों in graphical user अंतरफलक कि use इंगित devices such as a computer mouse ( by खीचें और drop, for उदाहरण ).
Economic अनुक्रम मात्रा is the order quantity that minimizes total inventory पकड़कर costs और ordering लागत.
It is एक of the oldest शास्त्रीय production scheduling models.
The framework used to determine this अनुक्रम मात्रा is also known as Barabas EOQ Model or Barabas Formula.
The मॉडल was विकसित by Ford W. Harris in 1913, but R. H. Wilson, a consultant who लागू it extensively, is given credit for his in-depth analysis.
स्टीफन `` स्टीवी '' रे Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) थी an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, और record निर्माता.
Often referred to by his initials SRV, Vaughan is बेहतरीन known as a founding member and leader of दोगुना ट्रबल.
Together with drummer Chris layton और bassist Tommy Shannon, they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
साथ a career spanning seven years, vaughan and Double ट्रबल consistently sold आउट concerts while their albums अक्सर went gold.
He थी born और raised in Dallas, Texas, and for a short period of समय lived in ग्राहम, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan started playing the गिटार at age seven और formed अनेक bands कि occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical career, joining groups ऐसे as Krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
in 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a band that eventually evolved into Double ट्रबल and regularly performed around Austin.
In 1982, Vaughan और Double Trouble performed at the Montreux जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and जैक्सन browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to खेल on his upcoming studio एल्बम Let 's नृत्य, while Browne offered the band free use of his personal studio in Los एंजिल्स to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran रिकार्ड producer जॉन Hammond Sr. और released their debut album, Texas बाढ़ in June of that साल.
बाद successful touring, the group released the एल्बम, Could n't Stand the Weather ( 1984 ) और Soul to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of जिससे प्रदर्शित new keyboardist रीज़ Wynans.
Although उसके career had progressed सफलतापूर्वक, Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in अटलांटा, Georgia to give up a cocaine और दारू habit and लौटे to touring with the band.
In June 1989, in Step was released and earned them a Grammy Award for बेहतरीन Contemporary ब्लूज़ Performance.
on August 27, 1990, Vaughan was मारे in a helicopter crash following a performance in East Troy, Wisconsin.
vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense style was derived from a variety of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues संगीतकारों including अल्बर्ट किंग, Freddie King, ओटिस Rush, and Muddy Waters, और rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and lonnie Mack.
उसके guitar playing reflected the classic blues and pentatonic scales.
He has प्राप्त wide critical मान्यता for his गिटार playing, ranking at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 महानतम guitarists '' in 2011.
he was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of कीर्ति in 2000 and a memorial प्रतिमा was erected in Austin 's ऑडिटोरियम Shores park.
स्टीवी Ray vaughan is widely considered to be one of the महानतम musicians to come from the state of Texas.
The Las Vegas Strip World of Coca-Cola museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft पेय sold in stores, restaurants, और vending machines in every country except क्यूबा and उत्तर Korea.
It is produced by the Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, और is प्रायः referred to simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of The coca-cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent आयुर्विज्ञान when it was invented in the late 19th century by John pemberton, Coca-Cola was bought आउट by businessman Asa Griggs Candler, whose marketing tactics led Coke to इसके dominance of the संसार soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
the company produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, जो hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company, produce finished product in डिब्बे और bottles इससे the concentrate in combination with filtered water और sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail स्टोर्स और vending machines.
ऐसे bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises, which is the largest सिंगल Coca-Cola bottler in North अमेरिका and western Europe.
the Coca-Cola Company भी sells concentrate for soda fountains to major restaurants and food service वितरकों.
The coca-cola Company has, on अवसर, introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand name.
the most common of these is Diet Coke, with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, आहार Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and खास संस्करण with नीबू, lime or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, Coca-Cola थी the world 's most valuable brand.
Barry लुई larkin ( born April 28, 1964 ) is a retired Major League Baseball खिलाड़ी.
Larkin played shortstop for the Cincinnati Reds from 1986 to 2004 and was एक of the pivotal players on the 1990 Reds ' संसार Series championship team.
Larkin was elected to the नेशनल Baseball Hall of Fame in January 2012 and थी inducted on July 22.
Larkin is considered एक of the शीर्ष players of his era, winning nine Silver Slugger awards and three Gold Glove awards.
he was selected to the Major लीग All-Star Game twelve times, and थी elected the 1995 National लीग सबसे मूल्यवान Player.
brasília ( ) is the संघीय capital of Brazil और the seat of government of the Federal District.
Administratively, the city is located in the Federal District जिससे is in the Central-West Region.
physically, it is located in the Brazilian Highlands.
It has a population of about 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the metropolitan area ) as of the 2008 IBGE estimate, making it the fourth largest city in Brazil.
However, as a metropolitan area, it ranks lower at छठे in population.
Brasília is the largest नगर in the world that did not मौजूद at the शुरूआत of the 20th century.
Brasília रै the fifth largest जीडीपी among लैटिन अमरीकी cities और the third in Brazil.
At around R $ 62,000 Brazilian reais ( equal to approximately $ 30,900 US dollars or €23,000 euros ), the नगर 's per capita income is the highest among ब्राज़ील 's largest cities.
as the national capital, brasília is the seat of all three branches of the federal सरकारी of Brazil.
The city भी hosts the headquarters of many Brazilian companies.
Planning नीतियों such as the location of residential buildings around expansive शहरी क्षेत्रों, as खूब as building the city around विशाल avenues and dividing it into sectors, have sparked a debate and reflection on life in big शहरों in the 20th सदी.
the city 's डिज़ाइन divides it into numbered blocks as खूब as सेक्टर for specified activities, such as the Hotel Sector, the Banking Sector or the Embassy सेक्टर.
Brasília hosts 124 विदेशी embassies.
The city थी planned and developed in 1956 with Lúcio Costa as the principal urban planner, ऑस्कर Niemeyer as the principal architect and Roberto Burle Marx as the landscape पंक्तियां.
Brasilia is in the Unesco 's संसार hertitage List due to its architecture.
On April 22, 1960, it formally became Brazil 's national capital.
Viewed from above, the प्रमुख portion of the city resembles an airplane or a butterfly.
The city is commonly referred to as Capital Federal, or simply bsb.
Residents of Brasília are known as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those नहीं born in the city but who migrated there बाद it was established ).
In local usage, the शब्द `` Brasília '' usually refers तभी to the First प्रशासनिक Region ( RA I ) within the Federal ज़िला ( Distrito Federal ), where the most important government buildings are located.
Brasília रै a unique status in ब्राज़ील, as it is an administrative division rather than a legal municipality like nearly all cities in Brazil.
Nationally, the term is almost always used synonymously साथ the Federal District, which constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit, analogous to a state.
Several `` satellite cities '' exist which are also part of the Federal District.
Brasília International Airport is the प्रमुख विमानक्षेत्र in brasília, connecting the capital to all major Brazilian cities और many international destinations.
it is the third सबसे important airport in Brazil, in terms of passengers and वायुयान movements.
Personifications of Germany, France, Russia, Austria-Hungary, and the United Kingdom attempting to keep the lid on the simmering cauldron of imperialist and nationalist tensions in the Balkans to prevent a general यूरोपीय war.
वे were successful in 1912 and 1913 but किया not सफल in in 1914.
The causes of World War I, which began in central Europe in late July 1914 and finished in 1918, included many factors, such as the conflicts और दुश्मनी of the four दशकों leading up to the war.
सैन्यवाद, alliances, imperialism, and nationalism played प्रमुख roles in the conflict as well.
The immediate origins of the war, however, lay in the decisions taken by कूटनीतिज्ञों और सेनापतियों during the संकट of 1914, casus belli for which was the assassination of Archduke फ्रांज Ferdinand ( the archduke of Austria Hungary ) and his बीवी Sophie by Gavrilo princip, an irredentist Serb.
The संकट came after a long and मुश्किल series of diplomatic clashes between the Great शक्तियां ( Italy, France, Germany, the British Empire, the Austria-Hungarian साम्राज्य and रूस ) over European और colonial issues in the decade before 1914 that had left tensions high.
In turn these राजनयिक clashes can be traced to changes in the संतुलन of power in Europe since 1867.
The more immediate cause for the war was tensions over territory in the Balkans.
Austria-Hungary competed with सर्बिया and Russia for territory and influence in the प्रदेश and they pulled the rest of the Great Powers into the conflict through their various alliances and treaties.
Although the chain of events unleashed by the हत्या triggered the war, the war 's origins go deeper, involving नेशनल राजनीती, cultures, economics, and a complex वेब of alliances and counterbalances that had developed between the various European powers since 1870.
Some of the most important long term or structural कल्याणकारी are : the growth of nationalism आरपार Europe, unresolved territorial disputes, an intricate system of alliances, the perceived breakdown of the balance of शक्ति in Europe, convoluted and fragmented governance, the arms races of the previous decades, previous military planning, imperial and colonial फंसने for माल, power and prestige, and आर्थिक and सैन्य फंसने in उद्योग and trade – e.g., the Pig War between Austria and Serbia.
अन्य causes that came into play दौरान the राजनयिक crisis कि preceded the war included misperceptions of intent ( e.g., the German belief that the संयुक्त किंगडम would remain neutral ) and देरी और misunderstandings in diplomatic communications.
the various categories of स्पष्टीकरण for World War i correspond to different historians ' overall methods.
Most historians and popular commentators include causes from more than one category of स्पष्टीकरण to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war.
the deepest distinction among ये खाते is between stories that see it as the inevitable and predictable outcome of certain factors, and those that describe it as an arbitrary और unfortunate mistake.
In attributing कल्याणकारी लिये the war, historians और academics था to सौदे with an unprecedented बाढ़ of memoirs और official documents, released as each country शामिल आजमाया to avoid blame for starting the war.
Early रिलीज of सूचना by governments, विशेषकर those released for use by the `` Commission on the Responsibility of the लेखक of the War '' were shown to be incomplete and biased.
in addition some दस्तावेज़, especially diplomatic cables between Russia and France, were found to have been doctored.
Even in later decades however, when much अधिक information had been released, historians from the same culture have महरूम shown to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war.
Johnson 's new चार्ट of national emblems, published c. 1868.
The large flags shown in the corners हैं the 37-star ध्वज of the संयुक्त States ( flown 1867-1877 ), the Royal Standard of the United Kingdom, the Russian इम्पीरियल Standard, and the French tricolore with inset इम्पीरियल Eagle.
Various other ध्वज flown by ships are shown.
The ध्वज of Cuba is labelled `` Cuban ( so called ) ``.
The Chinese dragon on the Flag of China was drawn mistakenly as a western dragon.
A नेशनल flag is a flag that symbolizes a country.
The ध्वज is flown by the सरकारी, but usually can also be flown by citizens of the country.
दोनो पब्लिक और private buildings such as schools and courthouses may fly the नेशनल flag.
In some countries, the national flags are only flown from non-military buildings on निश्चित ध्वज days.
There हैं three distinct types of national flag for use on land, और three for use at sea, though many countries use एकसमान designs लिये अनेक ( and sometimes all ) of these प्रकार of flag.
The अमरीकी Civil युद्ध ( acw ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil युद्ध ( see नामकरण ), was a civil war लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) और several Southern slave राज्य that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The युद्ध had its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
Foreign powers did not intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national एकता and guaranteeing rights to the freed स्लेव began.
in the 1860 अध्यक्षीय election, Republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
Outgoing लोकतांत्रिक President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता declared उसके administration would not initiate सिविल war.
Eight remaining स्लेव states continued to reject calls for secession.
Confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a सुलह, और both sides prepared for युद्ध.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` किंग Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none किया and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब Confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South कैरोलिना.
Lincoln पुकारा for each state to provide सैनिकों to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
the Union soon controlled the border states और established a naval blockade that crippled the दक्षिणी economy.
The पूर्वी Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended साथ Confederate retreat at the Battle of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, तब much of their western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the पश्चिमी Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure साथ the way.
The Union marshaled the संसाधन and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, और could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate फौज failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The American Civil War थी one of the earliest true industrial wars.
railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation और खाना supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of सब Southern white males aged 18–40.
Norrie disease is a genetic disorder that primarily affects the eye and almost सदा लीड to blindness.
In addition to the जन्मजात ocular symptoms, some patients suffer from a progressive hearing loss starting mostly in their 2nd decade of life, while another portion may be mentally challenged.
मरीजों साथ Norrie disease may develop cataracts, leukocoria ( a condition where the विद्यार्थियों appear white when लाइट is shone on them ), along with other developmental issues in the eye, such as shrinking of the globe and the wasting दूर of the iris.
around 30–50 % of them will also have developmental delay/ mental retardation, psychotic-like सुविधाएँ, incoordination of movements or behavioral abnormalities.
सबसे patients are born with normal hearing ; however, the onset of hearing loss is very आम in early adolescence.
About 15 % of the मरीजों हैं estimated to develop all the सुविधाएँ of the बीमारी.
The बीमारी affects almost only male infants at birth or soon after birth, because the disease is inherited x-linked recessive.
Only in very rare cases, females have been diagnosed साथ Norrie बीमारी as well.
The exact incidence क्रमांक is unknown ; only a few सौ cases have been reported so far.
It is a very rare disorder that is नहीं associated with any specific ethnic or racial groups.
A contract is an agreement having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो or more parties, each of whom intends to create one or more legal दायित्वों between them.
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal क्षमता who exchange `` consideration '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be किया in writing, though contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
the remedy लिये breach of contract can be `` damages '' in the form of compensation of money or विशिष्ट performance enforced through an injunction.
Both of these remedies award the पार्टी at loss the `` benefit of the bargain '' or expectation damages, which are greater than mere reliance क्षतिपूर्ति, as in promissory estoppel.
The पार्टियों may be natural persons or juristic persons.
A contract is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking that something will or होगा not occur.
The word promise can be used as a विधिक synonym लिये contract, although care is required as a वादा may not have the full standing of a अनुबंध, as when it is an अनुबंध बगैर विचार.
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another, including differences in common law compared to civil law, the impact of received law, विशेषकर from England in common विधि countries, and of law codified in regional legislation.
Regarding Australian Contract विधि for example, there are 40 relevant acts which impact on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( Federal / national ) level, और an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW.
In addition there हैं 6 international instruments or conventions which हैं applicable लिये international dealings, ऐसे as the United Nations Convention on Contracts लिये the International बिक्री of Goods.
ASP.NET is a server-side Web application framework designed for वेब development to उपज dynamic Web पृष्ठों.
It was developed by microsoft to allow programmers to build dynamic web sites, web अनुप्रयोग और web सेवाएं.
It was first released in January 2002 with version 1.0 of the.NET Framework, and is the successor to Microsoft 's Active Server Pages ( ASP ) technology.
ASP.NET is built on the Common Language runtime ( CLR ), allowing प्रोग्रामर्स to लिखें ASP.NET code using any समर्थित.NET भाषा.
The ASP.NET SOAP एक्सटेंशन फ्रेमवर्क allows ASP.NET components to process SOAP messages.
Lysergic acid diethylamide, abbreviated LSD or LSD-25, also known as lysergide ( INN ) and colloquially as acid, is a semisynthetic psychedelic drug of the ergoline family, well known for इसके psychological effects which can शामिल altered thinking processes, closed and खोलें eye visuals, synesthesia, an altered sense of time and spiritual experiences, as खूब as for its key role in 1960s counterculture.
It is प्रयुक्त mainly as an entheogen, recreational drug, और as an agent in psychedelic therapy.
LSD is non-addictive, is नहीं known to कारण brain damage, और has अत्यधिक low toxicity relative to dose.
however, adverse psychiatric प्रतिक्रियाएँ such as anxiety, paranoia, and delusions are possible.
एलएसडी was first synthesized by अल्बर्ट Hofmann in 1938 from ergotamine, a chemical derived by Arthur stoll from ergot, a grain fungus that typically grows on rye.
The short form `` LSD '' comes इससे its early कोड name LSD-25, which is an abbreviation for the German `` lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number.
LSD is संवेदनशील to oxygen, ultraviolet light, and chlorine, especially in solution, हालांकि its potency may last for years if it is stored away from light and नमी at low temperature.
In pure रूप it is a colorless, odorless, tasteless solid.
LSD is typically वितरित orally, प्रायः on a substrate such as absorbent blotter paper, a sugar cube, or gelatin.
In its liquid form, it can भी be administered by intramuscular or intravenous injection.
एलएसडी is very potent, साथ 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) being the threshold dose.
New experiments साथ LSD started in 2009 for the first time in 40 years.
introduced by Sandoz Laboratories, with trade-name Delysid, as a ड्रग with various psychiatric uses in 1947, LSD quickly became a therapeutic agent कि appeared to show great promise.
In the 1950s, officials at the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency ( सीआईए ) thought the drug might be applicable to mind control and chemical warfare ; the agency 's mkultra research program propagated the drug among young servicemen और students.
The subsequent recreational use of the drug by youth culture in the Western world during the 1960s led to a political firestorm that resulted in इसके निषेध.
Currently, a number of organizations—including the Beckley Foundation, MAPS, Heffter Research Institute और the Albert Hofmann Foundation—exist to fund, प्रोत्साहित और coordinate शोध into the औषधीय and spiritual uses of एलएसडी and सम्बन्धित psychedelics.
The United States Navy 's Sea, Air, जमीन Teams, commonly known as the Navy SEALs, are the U.S. नेवी 's principal special operations force और a भाग of the Naval खास Warfare Command and United States Special Operations Command.
`` मुहर '' is always capitalized in reference to सदस्यों of the Naval Special warfare community.
the acronym is derived from their capacity to operate at sea, in the एयर, and on land.
SEALs are male members of the United States Navy.
An exchange कार्यक्रम with the Coast गार्ड, which graduated तीन coast guardsmen as SEALs, was suspended in 2011.
The CIA 's अत्यधिक गुपचुप Special Activities प्रभाग ( SAD ) and अधिक specifically its elite खास परिचालन Group ( SOG ) recruits operators from the SEAL Teams.
Joint Navy seals and CIA operations go back to the famed MACV-SOG during the Vietnam War.
This सहयोग still exists today and is seen in the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, and in the finding and killing of Osama bin Laden in Pakistan.
World population estimates इससे 1800 to 2100, आधारित on UN 2010 projections ( red, orange, ग्रीन ) and US Census ब्यूरो historical estimates ( black ).
वास्तविक recorded जनसांख्यिकी figures are in blue.
According to the highest estimate, the world population may rise to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The world population is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना humans on धरती.
As of today, it is estimated to number billion by the United States जनसांख्यिकी Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a पृथक estimate by the United राष्ट्र Population निधि, it reached this milestone on अक्तूबर 31, 2011.
the world जनसांख्यिकी रै experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The उच्चतम rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly दौरान the 1950s, and for a longer period दौरान the 1960s and 1970s.
the growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
कुल annual births यहूद highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and are now expected to remain essentially निरंतर at their 2011 level of 134 million, while deaths क्रमांक 56 million प्रति year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near भविष्य ( but a steady decline in the population विकास rate ), with the global जनसांख्यिकी expected to पहुँचें between 7.5 और 10.5 billion by 2050.
विभिन्न longer-term estimates predict further विकास, stagnation, or even overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food supplies, and energy resources.
Memphis is a नगर in the southwestern corner of the U.S. राज्य of Tennessee, और the county seat of Shelby County.
The city is located on the 4th Chickasaw Bluff, south of the संगम of the Wolf and Mississippi नदियाँ.
Memphis था a population of 672,277 in 2011 बनाना it the largest city in the state of Tennessee, the largest city on the Mississippi River, the third largest in the Southeastern संयुक्त States, and the 20th largest in the United States.
The greater Memphis metropolitan area, सहित adjacent counties in Mississippi और अरकंसास, था a 2010 population of 1,316,100.
This makes Memphis the second largest महानगर area in Tennessee, surpassed only by metropolitan Nashville, which has overtaken मेम्फिस in recent years.
Memphis is the youngest of Tennessee 's प्रमुख शहरों.
A निवासी of Memphis is referred to as a Memphian, and the Memphis region is known, particularly to media outlets, as `` Memphis & the Mid-South ``.

France produces around three quarters of its electricity by नाभिकीय power.
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power Plant in Germany.
Chancellor एंजेला Merkel 's coalition घोषित on May 30, 2011, that Germany’s 17 nuclear power stations will be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear विपत्ति.
Currently, 68 reactors are under construction in 15 countries.
Nuclear power स्टेशन operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year, although according to the World Nuclear Association, of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 और 2009, only five दरअसल आए on stream.
As of June 2011, Germany and Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power.
As of जून 2011, countries such as Australia, Austria, Denmark, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, liechtenstein, ध्वज, Malaysia, माल्टा, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
Skeletal muscles homo sapiens
इस is a तालिका of muscles of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles, मिला on both sides, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the सटीक number is difficult to define because different sources समूह muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as different parts of a सिंगल muscle or as several muscles.
Examples range इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of groups which include muscles relating to the head and गर्दन, muscles of the धड़ or trunk, muscles of the अपर limbs, and मांसपेशियां of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of each मांसपेशी from the मानक anatomical position.
In other positions, other actions may be performed.

The Seminole Wars, also known as the Florida Wars, were three conflicts in Florida between the Seminole — the collective name given to the amalgamation of various groups of native Americans और ब्लैक people who settled in Florida in the early 18th century — and the संयुक्त राज्य फौज.
The First Seminole War was from 1814 to 1819 ( although sources differ ), the Second seminole War from 1835 to 1842, और the Third Seminole War from 1855 to 1858.
The first conflict with the Seminoles arose out of tensions relating to सामान्य एंड्रयू Jackson 's attack and destruction of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816.
Jackson भी attacked the Spanish at Pensacola.
Ultimately, the Spanish Crown ceded the colony to United States rule.

It was first settled in 1774 and named in honor of Chief Joseph Orono of the Penobscot Nation.
it is home to The University of Maine.

Luxor Las Vegas is a hotel and casino on the Las Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada.
The 30-story hotel, स्वामित्व और operated by MGM Resorts International, has a casino with over 2,000 स्लॉट machines और 87 table games.
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation, it has a new, अत्यधिक modernized, and contemporary डिज़ाइन and contains a total of 4,400 rooms, including 442 suites, lining the आंतरिक walls of a pyramid style tower और within twin 22-story ziggurat towers that were निर्मित as later additions.
The होटल is named after the city of Luxor ( ancient Thebes ) in Egypt.
लक्सर is the second largest hotel in Las Vegas ( the largest being the MGM Grand ) और the eighth largest in the world.
as of 2010, the Luxor रै a 4 Key rating इससे the ग्रीन Key Eco-Rating Program, which evaluates `` sustainable '' hotel operations.
A pilot experiment, also called a पायलट study, is a small scale preliminary study conducted in order to evaluate feasibility, time, लागत, प्रतिकूल events, and effect आकार ( सांख्यिकीय variability ) in an attempt to predict an appropriate sample size and improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale research project.
Pilot अध्ययन, therefore, may not be appropriate for मामला studies.

it may be unofficially referred to as the Los Angeles City Fire Department to फर्क it from the Los Angeles County Fire विभाग.
The एकड़ is a ईकाई of area used in the इम्पीरियल and u.S. customary systems.
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly smaller than an American football field.
The acre is no longer commonly used, although a few notable exceptions include the United States, Australia, Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially used in the United किंगडम, though is still used in real estate descriptions ).
it is still used, to some extent, in Canada.
The international प्रतीक of the acre is ac, and is defined as 1/640 of a square mile.
The most commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़ आज is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre.
In the United States both the international एकड़ and the slightly different US survey acre are in use.
The most common use of the acre is to माप tracts of जमीन.
One international acre is defined as 4046.8564224 square metres.
During the Middle आयु, an acre थी the amount of land that could be plowed in one दिन with a yoke of oxen.

Language processing refers to the way human beings use शब्द to communicate ideas and feelings, और how ऐसे संचार are processed and understood.
यूँ it is कैसा the brain creates and understands language.
Most recent theories consider that this process is carried out entirely by and inside the brain.
This is considered one of the most characteristic abilities of the इंसान species - perhaps the सबसे characteristic.
However very little is known about it and there is huge पैमाना for research on it.
Most of the knowledge acquired to तिथि on the विषय रै come from patients who have suffered कुछ type of significant head injury, whether external ( wounds, bullets ) or internal ( strokes, tumors, degenerative diseases ).
Studies have shown that most of the language प्रसंस्करण functions are carried आउट in the cerebral cortex.
The essential फलन of the cortical भाषा areas is symbolic प्रतिनिधित्व.
Even though language exists in different forms, all of them are based on सांकेतिक representation.
The Bugatti veyron eb 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed and developed by the volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim, फ़्रांस by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The Super Sport version of the veyron is the fastest street-legal production car in the world, साथ a top speed of.
The original संस्करण has a शीर्ष गति of.
it was named car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear.

The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss, and the exterior was designed by Jozef kabaň of Volkswagen, with much of the engineering work being conducted अंतर्गत the guidance of engineering chief वुल्फगांग Schreiber.
A number of special variants have been produced.

DVD is an optical डिस्क भंडार format, invented and developed by Philips, सोनी, Toshiba, and Panasonic in 1995.
DVDs प्रस्ताव higher भंडार क्षमता than compact discs while having the same dimensions.
Pre-recorded DVDs are mass-produced using सांचा machines that physically stamp data onto the DVD.
Such discs are ज्ञात as dvD- ROM, because data can तभी be पढ़ा और not written nor erased.
रिक्त recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using a dvd recorder and then function as a DVD-ROM. rewritable DVDs ( DVD-RW, DVD+RW, and DVD-RAM ) can be recorded and erased multiple times.
DVDs are used in DVD-Video consumer digital video format and in DVD-Audio consumer digital audio format, as well as for authoring AVCHD discs.
DVDs containing other प्रकार of information may be referred to as DVD data discs.

Peter Gene Hernandez ( born अक्तूबर 8, 1985 ), known by his stage name Bruno Mars, is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter and record producer.
Raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, by a family of musicians, Mars began making music at a young age and performed in विभिन्न musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood.
He graduated इससे high school and then moved to Los Angeles, California, to pursue a musical career.
Mars produced songs for other artists, joining production team The Smeezingtons.
Mars had an unsuccessful stint with Motown रिकॉर्ड, but तब signed साथ Atlantic in 2009.
He became recognized as a सोलो artist after lending his vocals and co-writing the hooks for the songs `` Nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B, and `` Billionaire `` by travie McCoy.
He also co-wrote the hits `` Right Round `` by Flo Rida featuring Ke $ ha, और `` Wavin ' Flag `` by K'naan.
In October 2010, he released his debut album, doo-wops & Hooligans.
Anchored by the विश्वव्यापी number-one singles `` Just the Way You Are `` and `` ग्रेनेड ``, the album peaked at number three on the Billboard 200.
Mars was nominated for seven Grammys at the 53rd Grammy पुरस्कार, winning Best Male Pop गायन Performance for `` Just the Way You Are ''.
His second studio album, Unorthodox Jukebox, was released on December 11, 2012.
Mars ' music is noted for displaying a wide variety of styles and influences, and contains elements of अनेक musical genres.
he रै worked with an assortment of artists from various genres.
As a child, he was highly influenced by कलाकारों such as Little Richard, Elvis प्रेस्ली and Michael जैक्सन and would often impersonate these artists from a young age.
Mars also incorporates रेगी - and Motown -inspired sounds into उसके work.
Worldwide, मंगल became the best-selling digital कलाकार in 2011.
he had three singles in the top ten, सहित first place with `` बस the Way You Are '', which sold 12.5 million copies.
Mars जीती Best International पुरूष Solo Artist at the 2012 BRIT Awards.
Bruno Mars रै sold 6 लाख albums and 40 million singles worldwide as a singer.
Althought as a song-writer, producer and singer उसके total single download बिक्री surpass 100 लाख worldwide.

Greek mythology is the देह of myths और teachings कि belong to the ancient Greeks, concerning their gods and नायक, the nature of the world, and the origins and significance of their own cult and ritual practices.
It was a part of the religion in ancient Greece and is part of religion in आधुनिक Greece and around the world, known as Hellenismos.
Modern scholars refer to and study the myths in an attempt to throw light on the धार्मिक and political institutions of Ancient Greece और इसके civilization, and to लाभ understanding of the nature of myth-making itself.
यूनानी mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives, and implicitly in Greek representational arts, ऐसे as vase-paintings and votive उपहार.
Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of the world, and details the lives and adventures of a wide variety of gods, goddesses, नायक, heroines, and पौराणिक creatures.
These accounts initially were disseminated in an oral-poetic tradition ; today the यूनानी myths are ज्ञात primarily इससे Greek literature.
The oldest known Greek साहित्यिक स्त्रोत, होमर 's epic poems Iliad and ओडिसी, focus on कार्यक्रम surrounding the Trojan War.
दो poems by Homer 's near contemporary hesiod, the theogony और the Works and Days, contain accounts of the genesis of the world, the succession of दैवी rulers, the succession of human ages, the origin of human woes, and the उत्पत्ति of sacrificial practices.
Myths are also preserved in the Homeric Hymns, in fragments of epic poems of the Epic साईकिल, in lyric poems, in the works of the tragedians of the पांचवां सदी BC, in writings of विद्वानों और poets of the Hellenistic Age, and in texts from the time of the Roman Empire by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias.
Archaeological findings provide a principal सोर्स of विवरण about Greek mythology, with gods और नायक featured prominently in the decoration of many artifacts.
ज्यामितीय designs on pottery of the आठवीं सदी BC depict scenes from the Trojan cycle as well as the adventures of Heracles.
In the succeeding Archaic, Classical, and Hellenistic अवधि, Homeric and various other mythological scenes appear, supplementing the existing साहित्यिक प्रमाण.
Greek mythology रै had an extensive influence on the culture, arts, and literature of Western civilization and remains part of Western heritage and language.
कवियों and कलाकारों from ancient times to the present have derived प्रेरणा इससे Greek mythology and have discovered contemporary significance और प्रासंगिकता in the themes.

They हैं best known लिये their million selling recording of `` How Do You Do ``.
