They हैं currently led by head coach Chris Petersen and खेल their home games at Bronco Stadium.
The franc ( sign : Fr. or SFr. ; German : Franken, French and Romansh : franc, इतालवी : franco ; code : CHF ) is the करेंसी and legal tender of स्विट्ज़रलैंड और liechtenstein ; it is भी legal tender in the इतालवी exclave Campione d'Italia.
Although not formally विधिक tender in the German exclave Büsingen ( the sole legal currency is the euro ), it is in wide daily use there.
The स्विस नेशनल Bank issues banknotes और the federal mint Swissmint issues coins.
the Swiss franc is the only version of the franc still issued in यूरोपीय.
The छोटी denomination, a hundredth of a franc, is a Rappen ( Rp. ) in German, centime ( c. ) in French, centesimo ( ct. ) in Italian, and rap ( rp. ) in Romansh.
The ISO code of the currency प्रयुक्त by banks and financial institutions is CHF, although `` Fr. '' is used by most businesses and advertisers ; some use SFr. ; the Latinate `` ch '' stands for Confoederatio Helvetica.
दिए the different languages used in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, Latin is used for language-neutral inscriptions on the coins.
Sir Charles Spencer `` Charlie '' Chaplin, ( 16 April 188925 दिसम्बर 1977 ) was a British comic actor और filmmaker जो rose to fame in the silent era.
Chaplin became a worldwide icon through उसके screen persona `` the ट्रैम्प `` and is considered one of the most important figures of the फिल्मी industry.
His career spanned अधिक than 75 years, from a child in the Victorian era to close to his death at the आयु of 88, और encompassed both adulation और विवाद.
Raised in London, Chaplin 's childhood was defined by गरीबी and hardship.
He थी sent to a workhouse twice पहले the age of nine ; his father was absent, and his mother was committed to a mental asylum.
Chaplin began performing इससे a young age, touring म्यूज़िक halls and later working as a stage actor and comedian.
at 19 he थी हस्ताक्षरित to the prestigious Fred Karno company, which took him to America.
Chaplin was scouted by the film industry, and made his first appearances in 1914 with keystone Studios.
He soon developed the Tramp persona and formed a विशाल प्रशंसक base.
Chaplin directed his films from an early stage, and जारी to hone उसके craft as he moved to the Essanay, Mutual, and पहला नेशनल corporations.
By 1918, he was one of the most famous men in the world.
in 1919, Chaplin co-founded the वितरण company United Artists, giving उसे complete control over his films.
His first feature-length picture was The Kid ( 1921 ), followed by A Woman of Paris ( 1923 ), The Gold Rush ( 1925 ), और The सर्कस ( 1928 ).
He refused to move to sound films in the 1930s, instead producing City Lights ( 1931 ) and आधुनिक Times ( 1936 ) बगैर dialogue.
Chaplin became increasingly राजनैतिक and his next film, The Great Dictator ( 1940 ), satirised एडोल्फ Hitler.
The 1940s थी a decade marked with विवाद for चैपलिन, and his popularity declined rapidly.
he was accused of communist sympathies, while his involvement in a paternity suit and marriages to much younger women यहूद considered scandalous.
an FBI investigation was opened on Chaplin, और he was eventually forced to छोड़ the संयुक्त States and settle in स्विट्ज़रलैंड.
He abandoned the Tramp लिये his later films, which include Monsieur Verdoux ( 1947 ), limelight ( 1952 ), A King in New York ( 1957 ), and A Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ).
चैपलिन लिखा, निर्देशित, produced, edited, scored, and स्ट्रक्चर in most of उसके films.
He was a perfectionist, and his वित्तीय स्वतंत्रता meant he often खर्च years on the development and production of a चित्र.
उसके films are characterised by slapstick combined साथ pathos, and often feature the Tramp struggling against adversity.
Many contain social and political themes, as well as autobiographical elements.
In 1972, as भाग of a renewed appreciation for उसके work, Chaplin received an Honorary Academy Award for `` the incalculable प्रभाव he has had in बनाना गति तस्वीरें the art form of इस सदी ''.
He continues to be आयोजित in high regard, with The Gold फटाफट, नगर Lights, Modern Times, and The Great तानाशाह प्रायः ranked among the greatest films of all time.
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA ), commonly shortened to Planned Parenthood, is the U.S. affiliate of the International Planned parenthood संघ ( IPPF ) and one of its larger members.
PPFA is a non-profit organization providing reproductive health and maternal and child health services.
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund, Inc. ( ppaf ) is a related संगठन which lobbies for pro-choice legislation, व्यापक sex education, and access to affordable health care in the United States.
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S. प्रदाता of reproductive स्वास्थ्य services, including cancer screening, hiv screening और counseling, contraception, and abortion.
Contraception accounts लिये 35 % of PPFA 's total सेवाएं and abortions account for 3 % ; PPFA conducts roughly 300,000 abortions each साल, among 3 million लोगों served.
The organization रै its roots in Brooklyn, New York, जहाँ Margaret Sanger opened the देश 's first birth-control clinic.
Sanger founded the अमरीकी Birth Control लीग in 1921, which in 1942 became part of the Planned parenthood Federation of America.
Since then, Planned Parenthood has grown to have over 820 clinic locations in the U.S., साथ a total बजट of US $ 1 billion.
PPFA provides an सरणी of services to over three million people in the United राज्य, and supports services for over one million clients outside the United States.
Mens rea is लैटिन for `` अपराधी mind ''.
in criminal law, it is viewed as one of the necessary elements of some crimes.
The standard common law test of criminal liability is प्रायः expressed in the Latin phrase, actus non facit reum nisi mens sit rea, जिससे means `` the act is not culpable जबतक the दिमाग is guilty ''.
Thus, in jurisdictions with due प्रक्रम, there जरूर be an actus reus, or `` guilty act, '' accompanied by some स्तर of mens rea to constitute the crime साथ which the defendant is charged ( see the technical requirement of concurrence ).
As a general rule, criminal liability does not attach to a व्यक्ति who acted with the absence of mental fault.
The एक्सेप्शन is strict liability crimes.
In civil law, it is usually not necessary to prove a subjective mental element to स्थापित liability for breach of contract or tort, for उदाहरण.
However, if a tort is intentionally committed or a अनुबंध is intentionally breached, such intent may increase the scope of liability as well as the माप of damages payable to the plaintiff.
Therefore, पुरुषों rea refers to the mental element of the offence that accompanies the actus reus.
In some jurisdictions, the terms पुरुषों rea and actus reus have been replaced by alternative शब्दावली.
In Australia, लिये example, the elements of the federal offences are now designated as `` fault elements '' or `` mental elements '' ( mens rea ) and `` physical तत्व '' or `` external elements '' ( actus reus ).
This terminology थी adopted to replace the obscurity of the Latin terms with simple and accurate phrasing.
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ; April 27, 1822 – जुलाई 23, 1885 ) was the 18th President of the United States ( 1869–1877 ) following his highly successful role as a war general in the second half of the Civil युद्ध.
Under Grant, the Union Army पराजित the Confederate military ; having effectively ended the युद्ध and secession with the आत्मसमर्पण of Robert E. Lee 's army at appomattox.
As president he led the Radical republicans in their effort to eliminate सब vestiges of confederate nationalism and slavery.
परेशान over uncontrolled हिंसा in the South and having desired to protect African American citizenship, President Grant effectively destroyed the Ku Klux Klan in 1871.
ग्रान्ट was the first President to establish Civil Service reform having created a two-year federally funded Civil सेवा Commission in 1871.
In terms of foreign policy, Grant revealed an `` unexpected capacity for deliberation and consultation '' that promoted the national interest.
उसके प्रतिष्ठा was marred by उसके repeated defense of corrupt appointees, and by America 's first industrial age economic depression ( called the `` Panic of 1873 `` ) कि dominated उसके second पद.
Although उसके Republican Party split in 1872 with reformers denouncing him, Grant was easily reelected.
By 1875 the conservative white Southern opposition regained control of every state in the दक्षिण और as he left the White House in March 1877 उसके policies were होने undone.
A career soldier, he graduated from the United राज्य Military Academy at West Point और served in the Mexican–American War.
When the Civil War began in 1861, Grant trained Union volunteer regiments in Illinois.
In 1862, as a general he fought a series of battles and थी promoted to major general after forcing the आत्मसमर्पण of a large Confederate army and gaining control of केंटकी और most of Tennessee.
he then led संघ शक्तियां to victory after initial setbacks in the बैटल of Shiloh, कमाई a reputation as an aggressive commander.
In July 1863, after a long, complex campaign, Grant defeated five uncoordinated confederate सेना ( capturing one of उन्हें ) और seized vicksburg.
इस प्रसिद्ध victory gave the Union full control of the Mississippi नदी, split बंद the western Confederacy, and opened the way for अधिक Union triumphs.
After another win at the Battle of चट्टानूगा in late 1863, President Abraham lincoln made him lieutenant सामान्य and commander of all of the Union Armies.
As commanding सामान्य of the फौज, Grant confronted Robert E. Lee in a series of very bloody battles in 1864 known as the Overland अभियान that ended साथ the bottling up of Lee at Petersburg, बाहर the Confederate capital of Richmond.
During the siege, Grant coordinated a series of विनाशकारी अभियान launched by William Tecumseh Sherman, Philip Sheridan, and George Thomas.
Finally breaking through ली 's trenches, the Union Army captured रिचमंड in April 1865.
Lee surrendered his depleted शक्तियां to Grant at Appomattox as the Confederacy collapsed.
हालांकि pro-confederate इतिहासकारों attacked ग्रान्ट as a ruthless butcher who won by brute force, most historians have hailed उसके सैन्य genius.
Grant 's two consecutive terms as President stabilized the nation after the American Civil War and during the turbulent Reconstruction period that followed.
As president, he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil rights laws और लड़ Ku Klux Klan violence.
Grant won passage of the पंद्रहवीं Amendment ; giving constitutional protection for African-American मतदान अधिकारों.
He used the फौज to build the Republican पार्टी in the South, based on black voters, Northern newcomers ( `` Carpetbaggers `` ) and native white supporters ( `` Scalawags. '' )
As a परिणाम, African अमेरिकी were represented in the U.S. Congress for the पहला समय in American history in 1870.
Reformers praised Grant 's भारतीय सलाम policy by having broken the deadlock on Indian appropriations in Congress, the creation of the Board of भारतीय Commissioners to make reform recommendations, and his enlistment of Quaker Protestants who controlled mid पश्चिमी Indian एजेंसियों, that effectively curbed Congressional patronage.
Grant remained संकल्पित in keeping Indians from being exterminated इससे white settler encroachment or by the u.S. military.
Grant 's reputation as अध्यक्ष by 1875 थी at an all-time high for his previous veto of the Inflation Bill, the ड्योढ़ी of the Resumption of Specie Act, and Secretary bristow 's successful raids that shut bas the Whiskey Ring.
Grant 's foreign policy, led by Secretary of राज्य Hamilton मछली, implemented International Arbitration, settled the Alabama Claims with ब्रिटेन और avoided war with Spain over the Virginius Affair.
a jukebox is a partially स्वचालित music-playing device, usually a coin-operated यंत्र, कि will play a संरक्षक 's selection from self-contained media.
the classic jukebox रै buttons साथ letters and numbers on them that, when डाला in combination, are used to play a specific selection.
A ड्रग परीक्षण is a तकनीकी विश्लेषण of a biological specimen – for example urine, hair, blood, स्वेद, or oral fluid / saliva – to determine the presence or absence of specified parent drugs or their metabolites.
Major uses of drug testing are to detect the presence of performance enhancing steroids in sport or for drugs prohibited by laws, such as cannabis, कोका and heroin.
A `` 10-panel urine screen '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines ( including methamphetamine )
Barbiturates
Benzodiazepines
Cannabinoids ( THC )
Cocaine
Methadone
Methaqualone
Opiates ( Codeine, Morphine, Heroin, Oxycodone, hydrocodone, etc. )
Phencyclidine ( PCP )
Propoxyphene
Saturn v rocket, प्रयुक्त for the अमरीकी manned चंद्र landing मिशन
स्पेस exploration is the discovery and खोजी of outer space by means of space technology.
Physical exploration of space is conducted both by इंसान spaceflights and by robotic spacecraft.
जबकि the observation of objects in space, known as खगोलशास्त्र, predates विश्वसनीय recorded history, it was the विकास of large and relatively efficient rockets दौरान the early 20th century that allowed physical space खोजी to become a reality.
Common rationales for exploring स्पेस include advancing scientific research, uniting different राष्ट्र, ensuring the future survival of humanity और developing सैन्य and रणनीतिक advantages against other countries.
Various criticisms of space exploration हैं sometimes made.
Space exploration has often been प्रयुक्त as a प्रॉक्सी competition for geopolitical rivalries such as the ठंडा War.
The early era of स्पेस exploration was चलित by a `` Space Race `` between the Soviet Union and the United States, the लॉन्च of the first man-made object to कक्षा the धरती, the USSR 's Sputnik 1, on 4 अक्तूबर 1957, and the first Moon landing by the अमरीकी Apollo 11 craft on 20 July 1969 are often लिया as the boundaries for this initial period.
The Soviet स्पेस program achieved many of the first milestones, including the first living being in orbit in 1957, the first human spaceflight ( यूरी Gagarin सवार Vostok 1 ) in 1961, the first spacewalk ( by aleksei Leonov ) on 18 कूच 1965, the first automatic लैंडिंग on another celestial body in 1966, and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971.
After the first 20 years of exploration, फ़ोकस shifted from one-off flights to renewable हार्डवेयर, such as the Space शटल program, और from competition to cooperation as with the International Space Station ( ISS ).
With the substantial completion of the iss following STS-133 in कूच 2011, plans for space exploration by the यूएसए remain in flux.
नक्षत्र, a Bush Administration program for a return to the Moon by 2020 थी judged inadequately funded and unrealistic by an expert review panel reporting in 2009.
The Obama Administration proposed a revision of Constellation in 2010 to focus on the development of the काबिलियत for crewed मिशन beyond low धरती कक्षा ( leo ), envisioning extending the operation of the iss beyond 2020, transferring the development of launch vehicles for human crews from NASA to the private sector, and developing technology to enable missions to परे leo, such as Earth/Moon L1, the Moon, Earth/Sun L2, near-earth asteroids, and Phobos or मंगल orbit.
as of March 2011, the US Senate and House of Representatives are स्टिल working towards a compromise NASA funding bill, which होगा संभवतः terminate Constellation and fund development of a भारी लिफ्ट launch vehicle ( HLLV ).
In the 2000s, the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of China initiated a successful manned spaceflight program, while the यूरोपीय संघ, Japan, and India have also planned future मानवयुक्त space missions.
China, Russia, Japan, and India have advocated manned missions to the Moon during the 21st century, while the European Union has advocated manned missions to दोनो the Moon and Mars during the 21st century.
From the 1990s onwards, private interests began promoting space tourism and तब private space exploration of the Moon ( see google चंद्र X Prize ).
John Calvin Coolidge, Jr. ( July 4, 1872January 5, 1933 ) was the 30th President of the United States ( 1923–1929 ).
A रिपब्लिकन lawyer इससे Vermont, Coolidge worked his रास्ता up the सीढ़ियाँ of मैसाचुसेट्स state politics, आखिरकार बनने राज्यपाल of that state.
उसके conduct during the Boston Police Strike of 1919 thrust him into the नेशनल spotlight and gave him a reputation as a man of निर्णायक कार्रवाई.
Soon after, he थी elected as the 29th Vice अध्यक्ष in 1920 and succeeded to the Presidency upon the अचानक death of Warren G. Harding in 1923.
Elected in his अपना right in 1924, he gained a reputation as a small-government conservative, और भी as a man who said बहुत little.
Coolidge लौटी public confidence in the White हाउस after the scandals of उसके predecessor 's administration, and left office साथ considerable popularity.
As a Coolidge biographer put it, `` He embodied the स्पिरिट and hopes of the middle class, could interpret their longings और express their opinions.
That he did represent the genius of the average is the सबसे convincing proof of his strength. ''
कुछ later criticized Coolidge as part of a general criticism of laissez-faire government.
His reputation underwent a renaissance during the Ronald Reagan प्रशासन, but the परम assessment of his presidency is still divided between those who approve of उसके reduction of the size of government programs and those who believe the संघीय government चाहिए be more involved in regulating and controlling the economy.
Espresso is a concentrated beverage brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water अंतर्गत pressure through finely मैदान coffee beans.
Espresso often रै a thicker consistency than coffee brewed by other methods, a higher concentration of suspended and dissolved solids, and crema ( meaning cream, but being a सन्दर्भ to the foam with a creamy texture कि फ़ॉर्म as a result of the दबाव ).
As a result of the pressurized brewing process the flavors and chemicals in a typical cup of espresso are बहुत concentrated.
Espresso is the base for other drinks, ऐसे as a latte, cappuccino, macchiato, mocha, or americano.
Espresso has more कैफीन per unit आवाज़ than most beverages, but the usual serving size is smaller—a ठेठ 60 mL ( 2 us fluid ounce ) of espresso has 80 to 150 mg of caffeine, little less than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) कप of drip-brewed coffee.
ब्रायन कैथ Kelly ( born अक्तूबर 25, 1961 ) is an American football coach and former player.
He is currently the head football coach लिये the Notre Dame Fighting आयरिश, a position he has held चूंकि दिसम्बर 2009.
Kelly was previously सिर coach at Grand Valley State University ( 1991–2003 ), सेंट्रल Michigan University ( 2004–2006 ), and विश्वविद्यालयों of Cincinnati ( 2006–2009 ).
A अनुबंध is an agreement having a lawful object entered into voluntarily by two or more parties, each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them.
The elements of a contract are `` प्रस्ताव '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal capacity जो exchange `` विचार '' to create `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of कुछ or all of these elements may be done in writing, though contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for उल्लंघन of contract can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the form of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction.
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the `` benefit of the bargain '' or expectation damages, which are greater than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be natural persons or juristic persons.
A contract is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking that something होगा or will not occur.
the word promise can be प्रयुक्त as a legal पर्याय लिये contract, although care is required as a promise may नहीं have the full standing of a contract, as when it is an अनुबंध बगैर consideration.
Contract law varies greatly from एक jurisdiction to another, including differences in आम law compared to civil law, the impact of received law, विशेषकर from England in common law countries, and of विधि codified in regional legislation.
Regarding Australian अनुबंध Law for example, वहीँ are 40 relevant acts which प्रभाव on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( Federal / national ) स्तर, and an additional 26 acts at the level of the राज्य of NSW.
In जोड there are 6 international instruments or conventions जिससे हैं applicable for international dealings, ऐसे as the United Nations सम्मेलन on Contracts for the International Sale of goods.
Sidney Patrick crosby, ONS ( born August 7, 1987 ) is a Canadian professional ice hockey player who is captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins of the National हॉकी League ( NHL ).
Crosby was drafted first overall by the Penguins out of the क्यूबेक प्रमुख Junior Hockey League ( QMJHL ).
दौरान his two-year major junior career with the Rimouski Océanic, he earned back-to-back CHL Player of the Year awards and led his club to the 2005 Memorial Cup फाइनल.
Nicknamed `` The Next One ``, he was one of the most highly regarded ड्राफ्ट picks in hockey history, leading अनेक to refer to the 2005 Draft Lottery as the `` sidney Crosby Sweepstakes ''.
in his first NHL season, Crosby finished sixth in लीग स्कोरिंग with 102 points ( 39 goals, 63 assists ) and was a runner-up for the calder Memorial Trophy ( जीती by सिकंदर Ovechkin ).
By his दूसरी season, he led the NHL साथ 120 points ( 36 goals, 84 assists ) to capture the Art रॉस Trophy, becoming the youngest player and the only teenager to win a scoring title in any major उत्तर American sports league.
That same ऋतु, Crosby also won the हार्ट Memorial Trophy as the पेशेवर Hockey Writers Association 's choice for most valuable खिलाड़ी and the Lester B. पियर्सन Award as the एनएचएल Players Association 's चुनाव for most outstanding player, becoming the seventh player in एनएचएल history to earn सब three awards in एक साल.
Crosby started the 2007–08 ऋतु साथ the team 's captaincy and subsequently led them to the 2008 Stanley Cup फाइनल, जहाँ वे were defeated by the Detroit Red Wings in छह games.
The Penguins लौटे to the फाइनल विरूद्ध Detroit the following year and won in seven games ; Crosby became the youngest captain in NHL history to win the Stanley Cup.
In the 2009–10 season, crosby scored a career-high 51 goals, tying उसे साथ स्टीवन Stamkos for the प्रक्षेपास्त्र Richard Trophy as the league-leader ; with 58 assists, he totaled 109 points, second in the NHL.
During the off-season, Crosby received the Mark Messier Leadership Award.
in 2010–11, Crosby sustained a concussion as a result of hits to the head in back-to-back games.
the injury left उसे sidelined for ten and a half months.
However, after playing eight games in the 2011–12 season, crosby 's concussion-like symptoms लौटे in December 2011, and he did नहीं return until mid-march 2012.
Internationally, Crosby has represented Canada in numerous tournaments लिये the country 's junior and men 's teams.
After competing in the 2003 U-18 Junior World कप, he represented Canada in back-to-back IIHF World u20 Championships, जीतना silver in 2004 and gold in 2005.
At the 2006 iihf World Championship, he led the tournament in scoring, while also earning शीर्ष Forward and All-Star Team honours.
चार years later, Crosby was named to Team कनाडा for the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver.
playing the United राज्य in the gold medal game, he scored the game-winning लक्ष्य in overtime.
a United States cent, also known as a पैनी.
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) और its longer संस्करण `` put my two सेंट in '' is an United States ( US ) idiomatic अभिव्यक्ति, taken from the original English मुहावरा expression : to put in `` my दो pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth. ''
It is प्रयुक्त to preface the tentative stating of one’s राय.
By deprecating the opinion to follow – suggesting इसके मान is only two cents, a very small amount – the user of the phrase hopes to lessen the प्रभाव of a possibly statement, प्रर्दशित politeness and humility.
However, it is also sometimes used with irony when expressing a strongly लगा opinion.
The phrase is also प्रयुक्त out of habit to preface uncontentious opinions.

The Chinese सिविल War was a civil war in China fought between शक्तियां loyal to the government of the Republic of China led by the Kuomintang ( KMT ) and forces of the Communist Party of चीन ( CPC ).
the war began in April 1927, amidst the Northern Expedition, and essentially ended when major क्रियाशील battles ceased in 1950.
The conflict eventually resulted in दो de facto states, the Republic of चीन ( ROC ) in Taiwan and the लोगों 's Republic of चीन ( PRC ) in mainland China, both claiming to be the legitimate government of China.
The war represented an वैचारिक split ( Left vs. Right ) between the Communist cpc, and the kmt 's brand of Nationalism.
The civil war continued intermittently until late 1937, when the two parties formed a Second United सामने to counter a जापानी invasion.
China 's full-scale civil war resumed in 1946, a साल बाद the end of hostilities with जापानी.
After four more years, 1950 saw the cessation of major military hostilities—with the newly founded People 's गणतंत्र of China controlling मेनलैंड China ( including हाइनान ), और the गणतंत्र of चीन 's jurisdiction being प्रतिबंधित to Taiwan, Penghu, Quemoy, Matsu और several outlying islands.
the Kuomintang defeat is attributed to several factors : Corruption - Chiang wrote in his diary on June 1948 कि the KMT had विफल, नहीं because of external enemies but because of rot from within.
Strong initial support इससे the U.S. diminished, and तब, stopped.
( partly because of KMT भ्रष्टाचार and anti-democratic regime, and partly because of the uncertain U.S. foreign policy towards Communism between 1945 and 1950 ) ; Communist land reform policy promised ग़रीब peasants farmland from their landlords.
This ensured PLA popular support.
बाद the surrender of जापानी at the end of World War II, Soviet forces turned over उनके captured जापानी हथियार to the CPC and allowed the CPC to take कंट्रोल of territory in Manchuria.
To this day, no armistice or peace सन्धि has ever been signed, and it is debated as to the whether the Civil युद्ध has legally ended.
Cross-Strait संबंध have been hindered by military threats and political और economic pressure, विशेषकर over Taiwan 's political status, with दोनो सरकारें officially adhering to a `` One-China policy. ''
The PRC still actively claims Taiwan as part of इसके territory and continues to threaten the ROC with a military आक्रमण if the ROC officially declares independence by changing its name to and gaining अंतरराष्ट्रीय recognition as the Republic of Taiwan.
the ROC mutually claims मेनलैंड China, and they both continue the लड़ो over diplomatic recognition.
आज, the war as such occurs on the political and आर्थिक fronts in the form of cross-strait संबंध ; however, the two separate de facto राज्य have बंद economic ties.
The One Hundred Twelfth United States Congress was the meeting of the legislative branch of the United States federal government, from January 3, 2011 until January 3, 2013.
it convened in Washington, D.C. on January 3, 2011, और ended on January 3, 2013, 17 days before the end of the अध्यक्षीय term to which Barack Obama was elected in 2008.
Senators elected to regular terms in 2006 completed those terms in this कॉंग्रेस.
This Congress included the last House of Representatives elected from congressional districts that were apportioned based on the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
In the 2010 मध्यावधि elections, the रिपब्लिकन Party won the majority in the House of Representatives.
While the डेमोक्रेट kept their सीनेट majority, it was reduced from the previous Congress.
इस was the first Congress in which the हाउस and Senate were controlled by different parties since the 107th Congress ( 2001–2003 ), and the first Congress to begin that way चूंकि the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ).
in इस कॉंग्रेस, the House of Representatives had the largest number of Republican members, 242, since the 80th कॉंग्रेस ( 1947–1949 ).
it was also the first कॉंग्रेस since 1947 in which no member of the Kennedy परिवार served, as खूब as the most politically polarized Congress since Reconstruction, साथ रिकार्ड low approval ratings.
Wealth in the संयुक्त States is commonly measured in terms of net लायक, which is the sum of all एसेट, सहित घर equity, minus all liabilities.
The total net worth of US households and nonprofit organizations 1945–2009, unadjusted for महंगाई or population change.
For example, a household in possession of an $ 800,000 house, $ 5,000 in mutual funds, $ 30,000 in cars, $ 20,000 worth of stock in their own company, and a $ 45,000 ira would have assets totaling $ 900,000.
Assuming that इस household would have a $ 250,000 mortgage, $ 40,000 in car loans, और $ 10,000 in credit कार्ड debt, इसके debts होता total $ 300,000.
Subtracting the debts from the worth of this household 's assets ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ), this household होता have a net worth of $ 600,000.
Net worth can vary साथ fluctuations in value of the underlying एसेट.
the wealth —more specifically, the median net worth—of households in the संयुक्त States is varied साथ संबंध to रेस, education, geographic location and gender.
As एक होता expect, households with greater आय feature the highest net worths, though ऊँची आय can not be taken as an always accurate indicator of net लायक.
Overall the number of wealthier households is on the rise, साथ baby boomers hitting the highs of their careers.
In addition, wealth is unevenly distributed, with the wealthiest 25 % of US households owning 87 % of the wealth in the संयुक्त States, which was $ 54.2 trillion in 2009.
Including human पूंजी such as skills, the United Nations अनुमानित the total माल of the United राज्य in 2008 to be $ 118 खरब.
This article deals with Selective Dorsal Rhizotomy ( SDR ) rather than the rhizotomy procedures for pain राहत ; for those procedures, which have begun to लो the name `` rhizotomy '' in certain उदाहरण, see facet rhizotomy और similar.
a rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure that selectively destroys problematic nerve roots in the spinal cord, most often to relieve the symptoms of neuromuscular conditions such as spastic diplegia और other फ़ॉर्म of spastic दिमागी palsy.
the चयनात्मक dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) for spastic cerebral palsy has been the main use of rhizotomy लिये neurosurgeons specialising in spastic CP since the 1980s ; in this सर्जरी, the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and then targeted and destroyed.
the sensory nerve roots, where spasticity is स्तिथ, are first separated from the motor ones, and the तंत्रिका मछली to be cut are then identified via electromyographic stimulation.
The ones producing spasticity हैं then selectively lesioned with tiny electrical pulses.
in spasticity, rhizotomy precisely targets and destroys the damaged nerves that don’t receive gamma amino butyric acid, which is the core प्रॉब्लम for people साथ spastic दिमागी palsy.
These over-firing, non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual electrical activity during the emg testing phase in SDR and are thus considered to be the सोर्स of the रोगी 's hypertonia ; they are eliminated with the electrical pulses once पहचाना, while the remaining nerves और nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully बरकरार and untouched.
This अर्थात् that the spasticity is permanently dissolved, and कि इस is done बगैर affecting nervous system संवेदनशीलता or function in other areas, क्युकी the तभी nerves नष्ट are the over-firing ones जिम्मेदार लिये the muscle tightness.
The terms rhizotomy and neurotomy हैं also increasingly becoming interchangeable in the treatment of chronic back पीड़ा from अपक्षयी disc disease.
This is a procedure called a facet rhizotomy और is not a surgical procedure but is बजाय done on an outpatient basis using a simple probe to apply radiofrequency waves to the impinged pain-causing nerve root lying between the facet joint and the vertebral body.
Such रेडियो frequency nerve lesioning results in पाँच to आठ or more months of pain relief पहले the nerve regenerates and another round of the procedure needs to be performed.
A facet rhizotomy is just one of many different फ़ॉर्म of radiofrequency ablation, and its use of the `` rhizotomy '' नाम should नहीं be confused साथ the SDR कार्यविधि.

The पद migrant worker has अलग आधिकारिक meanings और connotations in different parts of the world.
The संयुक्त Nations ' definition is broad, including any लोगों working outside of their home देश.
The term can भी be used to describe someone who migrates within a country, possibly their own, in अनुक्रम to pursue work ऐसे as seasonal कार्य.

The teardrop tattoo or आंसू tattoo is a symbolic टैटू that is लगाई underneath the eye.
It रै no fixed meaning but almost सब meanings ( see below ) have some कनेक्शन to prison.
U.S. Route 75 is a north–south u.S. Highway.
The highway 's northern terminus is in Kittson काउंटी, मिनेसोटा, at the Canadian किनारा, where it once continued as Manitoba राजमार्ग 75 on the other side of the now-closed border crossing.
Its southern terminus is at Interstate 30 and Interstate 45 in Dallas, टेक्सास, जहाँ it is ज्ञात as North Central एक्सप्रेसवे.
U.S. 75 was a border-to-border route, from कनाडा to the Gulf of Mexico at galveston, Texas.
However, the entire segment south of Dallas, Texas रै been decommissioned in favor of Interstate 45, a cutoff खण्ड of town-to-town सतह road having become State Highway 75.
Lower Ninth Ward is a neighborhood of the city of नई Orleans.
As the name implies, it is part of the नवीं Ward of New ऑरलियन्स.
The Lower Ninth Ward is प्रायः thought of as the entire क्षेत्रफल within New Orleans downriver of the औद्योगिक Canal ; however, the City Planning Commission divides this क्षेत्रफल into the Lower Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods.
the term `` निम्नतर '' refers to its स्थान farther towards the mouth of the Mississippi River, `` down '' or `` below '' the rest of the city in local geographic terminology.
But the 9th Ward, like all Wards in New Orleans, is a voting district.
The 9th Ward was added as a voting ज़िला in 1852.
The `` lower '' 9th Ward is रचित of वार्ड 9 Districts 1, 2, 4, and 7 which मेक up the Holy Cross Area and Ward 9 Districts 3, 5, 6, and 8.
Higher मतदान ज़िला संख्याएँ in the 9th वार्ड ( 8-27 ) are on the upriver side of the औद्योगिक कनाल.
the क्षेत्रफल came to national attention for its devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane कैटरीना in 2005.

The Moon is the only प्राकृतिक satellite of the धरती, and the fifth largest satellite in the Solar System.
It is the largest natural उपग्रह of a planet in the सौर System relative to the size of its primary, having 27 % the व्यास and 60 % the density of Earth, resulting in its mass.
The चंद्रमा is the second densest satellite बाद Io, a उपग्रह of Jupiter.
The Moon is in तुल्यकालिक rotation साथ Earth, always showing the वही face with इसके near पक्ष marked by dark volcanic maria that fill between the bright प्राचीन crustal highlands and the prominent impact craters.
It is the brightest object in the आसमान after the सूर्य, although its surface is actually very dark, with a reflectance similar to that of कोयले.
Its prominence in the sky और its regular cycle of phases have, since ancient times, made the चंद्रमा an important cultural influence on language, पंचांग, art and mythology.
The Moon 's gravitational influence produces the ocean tides and the minute lengthening of the day.
the Moon 's current कक्षीय distance, about तीस times the व्यास of the धरती, causes it to appear almost the same आकार in the sky as the सूर्य, allowing it to cover the Sun nearly precisely in total solar eclipses.
इस matching of apparent विज़ुअल आकार is a संयोग.
The Moon 's linear distance from the Earth is currently increasing at a रेट of 3.82±0.07cm per year, but this rate is नहीं निरंतर.
The Moon is thought to have formed nearly 4.5 billion सालो ago, not long after the Earth.
Although there have been several hypotheses for its origin in the पास्ट, the वर्तमान सबसे widely accepted स्पष्टीकरण is that the Moon formed from the debris left over after a giant impact between Earth and a Mars -sized देह.
The Moon is the only celestial body other than धरती on जिससे इंसानो have set foot.
The सोवियत Union 's Luna programme was the पहला to reach the Moon with unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the United States ' NASA अपोलो program achieved the only मानवयुक्त मिशन to date, beginning with the पहला manned चंद्र orbiting mission by Apollo 8 in 1968, and छह manned lunar landings between 1969 और 1972, with the पहला being Apollo 11.
These missions लौटे over 380 kg of lunar rocks, which have been used to develop a geological understanding of the Moon 's origins, the formation of its आतंरिक structure, and its subsequent history.
बाद the Apollo 17 mission in 1972, the चंद्रमा has been visited तभी by unmanned spacecraft, notably by the final Soviet Lunokhod rover.
Since 2004, Japan, China, India, the United States, and the यूरोपीय Space Agency have each sent lunar orbiters.
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the discovery of lunar water बर्फ in permanently shadowed craters at the डंडे and bound into the lunar regolith.
Future manned missions to the Moon have महरूम planned, including government as well as privately funded efforts.
the Moon remains, under the Outer Space सन्धि, free to all nations to explore for peaceful purposes.
Ronald Wilson Reagan ( ; February 6, 1911 – June 5, 2004 ) was the 40th President of the United States ( 1981–1989 ).
Prior to that, he थी the 33rd Governor of California ( 1967–1975 ), and a रेडियो, फिल्मी and television actor.
Born in tampico, Illinois, and raised in Dixon, Reagan was educated at Eureka कॉलेज, earning a स्नातक of Arts degree in अर्थशास्त्र and sociology.
After graduating, Reagan moved first to Iowa to work as a रेडियो broadcaster and then, in 1937, to Los एंजिल्स where he began a career as an actor, first in films and बाद television.
कुछ of उसके most notable films include knute Rockne, All अमरीकी ( 1940 ), Kings Row ( 1942 ), and Bedtime लिये Bonzo ( 1951 ).
Reagan परोसा as President of the Screen Actors Guild and later as a प्रवक्ता for General Electric ( GE ) ; his start in politics occurred during उसके work लिये GE.
Originally a सदस्य of the Democratic पार्टी, उसके positions began shifting rightward in the 1950s, and he switched to the Republican Party in 1962.
After delivering a rousing speech in support of Barry goldwater 's presidential candidacy in 1964, he was persuaded to seek the California governorship, winning two सालो later and again in 1970.
He was defeated in his चलाएं for the Republican presidential nomination in 1968 and in 1976, but won both the nomination and सामान्य election in 1980, defeating लाज़िम jimmy Carter.
As अध्यक्ष, Reagan implemented sweeping new political and economic initiatives.
His supply-side economic policies, dubbed `` reaganomics ``, advocated reducing tax दरों to spur आर्थिक विकास, controlling the money supply to reduce inflation, deregulation of the economy, and reducing सरकारी spending.
in his first term he survived an assassination attempt, took a मुश्किल line against मजदूर unions, announced a new War on Drugs, and ordered an आक्रमण of Grenada.
he was re-elected in a landslide in 1984, proclaiming that it was `` Morning in America ``.
His second term was primarily marked by विदेशी matters, ऐसे as the ending of the ठंडा युद्ध, the 1986 bombing of Libya, and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair.
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil empire ``, he supported anti-communist movements worldwide and spent his first term forgoing the strategy of détente by ordering a massive military buildup in an arms race with the USSR.
Reagan negotiated साथ Soviet सामान्य Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev, culminating in the inf Treaty and the decrease of दोनो countries ' नाभिकीय arsenals.
reagan left office in 1989.
In 1994, the पूर्व president disclosed that he had been diagnosed with Alzheimer 's disease earlier in the year ; he died टेन years बाद at the age of 93.
A conservative icon, he ranks अत्यधिक in public opinion polls of u.S. Presidents और is credited for generating an वैचारिक renaissance on the American political right.
Complete set of scrolls, constituting the संपूर्ण Tanakh.
the Tanakh (, or ; also Tenakh, tenak, Tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
The Tanakh is also known as the Masoretic टेक्स्ट or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the आरंभिक Hebrew letters of the Masoretic टेक्स्ट 's three traditional subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching '', भी known as the Five Books of Moses ), Nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` कृतियाँ '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), meaning `` that which is read '', is an alternative Hebrew पद for the tanakh.
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral tradition passed on by each generation, called the Oral Torah.
The कावासाकी Ninja ZX-6R is a Kawasaki 600 cc क्लास sport motorcycle.
It थी introduced in 1995, and has been constantly updated throughout the years in response to new उत्पाद from Honda, Suzuki, and Yamaha.
The ZX श्रेणी is what थी known as the Ninja line of Kawasaki motorcycles in the 1980s and still carries the name today.
Assassination attempts and plots on Presidents of the संयुक्त राज्य have महरूम numerous : more than 20 attempts to kill sitting and पूर्व राष्ट्रपतियों, as well as the presidents-elect, are known.
Four sitting राष्ट्रपतियों have been killed : Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th President ), जेम्स A. Garfield ( the 20th President ), William mckinley ( the 25th President ) and जॉन F. Kennedy ( the 35th President ).
Two presidents यहूद injured in attempted assassinations : पूर्व President Theodore Roosevelt ( the 26th President ), and President रोनाल्ड Reagan ( the 40th President ).
Although the इतिहासकार J.W. Clarke has सुझाया that most American assassinations were politically प्रेरित actions, carried out by rational men, not सब ऐसे attacks have महरूम undertaken लिये political reasons.
Some attackers had questionable दिमागी स्थिरता, and a few were judged legally insane.
Since the Vice President of the संयुक्त राज्य has for more than a सदी been elected from the same political party as the President, the assassination of the अध्यक्ष is unlikely to result in major policy परिवर्तन.
This may बताइये why political groups typically do not make ऐसे attacks.
Where the Red Fern Grows is a novel written by Wilson Rawls in 1961 about a boy who खरीदता and trains दो Redbone Coonhound hunting dogs.
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, cay : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in वेस्ट South सेंट्रल United States.
ओक्लाहोमा is the 20th सबसे extensive and the 28th सबसे populous of the 50 संयुक्त States.
The state 's name is निकला from the Choctaw words okla और humma, meaning `` रेड people '', और it is known informally by its nickname, The Sooner राज्य.
Formed by the संयोजन of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory on November 16, 1907, Oklahoma was the 46th state to enter the union.
Its residents are ज्ञात as Oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', और its capital and largest city is ओक्लाहोमा City.
A प्रमुख producer of प्राकृतिक gas, oil, और agriculture, Oklahoma relies on an economic base of aviation, energy, telecommunications, and जैवप्रौद्योगिकी.
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the nation, ranking among the top states in per capita income growth and gross domestic उत्पाद विकास.
ओक्लाहोमा City and Tulsa serve as ओक्लाहोमा 's primary economic anchors, साथ nearly दो thirds of Oklahomans living within their metropolitan सांख्यिकीय areas.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, and eastern वनों, most of Oklahoma झूठ in the ग्रेट Plains and the U.S. Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to कठोर मौसम.
In जोड to having a prevalence of English, German, स्कॉटिश, Irish और Native अमरीकी ancestry, अधिक than 25 Native American languages are spoken in Oklahoma, second only to California.
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक regions and historically served as a route for cattle drives, a destination for southern settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for देशी Americans.
Redwall, by ब्रायन Jacques, is a series of children 's काल्पनिक novels.
It is the title of the first book of the series, प्रकाशित in 1986, as खूब as the name of the Abbey featured in the किताब and the name of an animated TV श्रेणी आधारित on तीन of the novels ( Redwall, Mattimeo, and मार्टिन the Warrior ), which first aired in 1999.
the किताबे are primarily aimed at older children, but have fans of all ages.
There have been twenty-two novels and two picture books published.
The twenty-second, और final, अनोखा, the Rogue Crew, थी posthumously released on May 3, 2011.
Natural Gas is usually measured by volume in the संयुक्त राज्य and is stated in cubic feet.
A cubic foot of gas is the राशि of gas needed to fill a आवाज़ of one cubic foot under set conditions of pressure and temperature.To माप larger amounts of natural gas, a `` therm '' is used to denote 100 cubic feet, and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 cubic feet.
To provide greater सटीकता in comparing fuels, energy content is measured in शर्तें of `` अंग्रेजों Thermal इकाई ( BTU 's ). ''
A BTU is the amount of heat required to raise one pound of water ( approximately a pint ), एक degree Fahrenheit at or close to its पाइंट of maximum density.
One British therm ( symbol thm ) is a non- SI unit of ऊष्मा energy equal to 100,000 British thermal units ( BTU ).
It is approximately the energy समतुल्य of burning 100 cubic feet ( often referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas.
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume and not energy content, a therm factor is used by ( Natural ) गैस companies to convert the volume of gas used to its heat equivalent, and thus गणना the actual energy use.
the therm factor is usually in the units therms/CCF.
it will vary साथ the mix of hydrocarbons in the natural gas.
Natural gas with a higher than average concentration of ethane, propane or butane होगा have a higher therm factor.
Impurities, such as carbon dioxide or nitrogen, lower the therm factor.
The volume of the गैस is calculated as if measured at standard temperature और pressure ( STP ).
The ऊष्मा content of प्राकृतिक गैस is solely निर्भर on the composition of the gas, and is स्वतंत्र of temperature and pressure.
One therm is equal to about 105.5 megajoules, 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours.
One therm can also be provided by about of natural gas.
The therm sometimes has been confused with the thermie ( see below ).
The names of both units come इससे the Greek शब्द for heat.
A thermie ( th ) is a मीट्रिक unit of heat energy, part of the meter-tonne-second system sometimes used by European engineers.
the thermie is equal to the राशि of उर्जा required to raise the temperature of 1 tonne of water by 1 °c.
The thermie is equivalent to 1,000 kilocalories, 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 btu.
the American Civil War ( acw ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern स्लेव states कि declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The युद्ध had its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
विदेशी powers did not intervene.
After four years of खूनी combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery थी abolished, और the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring नेशनल unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
in the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave राज्य formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing लोकतांत्रिक President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration होता not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining स्लेव states continued to reject काल्स लिये secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous संघीय forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to ढूँढें a compromise, and दोनो sides prepared लिये war.
the Confederates assumed that European countries यहूद so dependent on `` King Cotton `` कि वे would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide सैनिकों to retake the fort ; consequently, four अधिक slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
the Union जल्द controlled the border states and established a नवल blockade that अबोध the southern अर्थव्यवस्था.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with confederate retreat at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों intervention.
lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, और the संघ at vicksburg split the Confederacy in दो at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. ली 's Confederate incursion north ended at the बैटल of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the समुद्र, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The संघ marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards रिचमंड, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was एक of the earliest सच्चा industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced weapons यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death टोल at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, और 30 प्रतिशत of all Southern श्वेत males aged 18–40.
William Bruce Jenner ( born October 28, 1949 ) is a former U.S. track and field athlete, motivational speaker, socialite, television personality and businessman.
He won the gold medal for decathlon in the मॉन्ट्रियल 1976 Summer Olympics.
Following his Olympic win and the related मान्यता, he married क्रिस कार्दशियन, and his professional career evolved into being a टेलीविज़न celebrity.
By 1981, he had स्ट्रक्चर in several made-for-tv movies और was Erik एस्ट्राडा 's replacement on the top रेटेड TV series CHiPs.
he रै six children : बर्ट, Casey, ब्रैंडन, Brody, Kendall and काइली.
Since his 1991 विवाह to Kris Jenner, he is the stepfather to Kourtney, किम, Khloe and Rob Kardashian.
Since 2007, he रै appeared साथ his blended family on Keeping Up with the Kardashians.
Escherichia कोलाई ( ; commonly abbreviated E. coli ) is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped bacterium that is commonly found in the lower intestine of warm-blooded जीवों ( endotherms ).
Most E. coli strains are harmless, लकिन some serotypes can कारण serious food विषाक्तता in humans, and are occasionally जिम्मेदार for product recalls due to food contamination.
The हानिरहित strains हैं part of the सामान्य flora of the gut, and can benefit their hosts by producing vitamin K2, and by preventing the establishment of pathogenic जीवाणु within the आंत.
E. coli और related जीवाणु constitute about 0.1 % of gut फ्लोरा, and fecal–oral transmission is the major route through which रोगजनक strains of the bacterium cause disease.
Cells are able to survive outside the body for a limited amount of time, जिससे makes them ideal indicator organisms to test environmental samples for fecal contamination.
There is, however, a growing body of research that has examined environmentally persistent E. coli which can survive लिये extended periods outside of the host.
The bacterium can also be grown easily and inexpensively in a laboratory setting, and रै been intensively investigated for over 60 सालो.
E. coli is the most widely studied prokaryotic model organism, and an important species in the fields of biotechnology and microbiology, where it has परोसा as the host organism for the majority of कार्य with recombinant DNA.
Area code 217 is the North अमरीकी टेलीफोन area code for much of western और central Illinois.
the 217 क्षेत्रफल includes Illinois ' capital, Springfield, plus Champaign, urbana, Decatur, Danville, Quincy, and Rantoul.
217 was one of the original क्षेत्रफल codes, जिससे were created in 1947.
The only significant change in 217 's boundaries was in 1957, when इसके northern portion was combined with part of क्षेत्रफल कोड 815 to form area कोड 309.

Layers of the atmosphere ( not to स्केल )
Ozone depletion describes two distinct but related phenomena observed since the late 1970s : a steady decline of about 4 % प्रति decade in the कुल volume of ozone in Earth 's stratosphere ( the ozone layer ), and a much larger springtime decrease in stratospheric ओज़ोन over Earth 's polar regions.
The latter phenomenon is referred to as the ozone hole.
In addition to these well-known stratospheric phenomena, वहीँ are also springtime polar tropospheric ozone depletion कार्यक्रम.
The details of polar ozone hole formation differ from that of mid-latitude thinning, but the सबसे important process in both is catalytic destruction of ozone by atomic halogens.
The प्रमुख source of these हैलोजन atoms in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( cfcs, freons, halons ).
ये compounds are transported into the stratosphere after being emitted at the surface.
Both types of ozone depletion were observed to increase as emissions of halo-carbons increased.
cfcs और other contributory substances are referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ).
Since the ozone layer prevents most harmful uvb wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of ultraviolet light ( UV light ) from passing through the Earth 's माहौल, observed and प्रक्षिप्त decreases in ozone have generated worldwide चिंता leading to adoption of the Montreal Protocol that bans the production of CFCs, halons, and other ozone-depleting chemicals such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane.
It is suspected कि a variety of biological consequences such as increases in skin कर्कट, cataracts, damage to plants, and कटौती of प्लवक populations in the समंदर 's photic zone may result from the increased uv exposure due to ozone depletion.
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is a brief परिचयात्मक statement of the Constitution 's fundamental उद्देश्य and guiding principles.
It states in general terms, and न्यायालयों have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the संविधान 's meaning और कया they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the people of the संयुक्त राज्य and it सेट into motion a question as it pertains to that विशाल population concerning the व्यक्तिगत rights and equality among all people ; इस can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism और social democracy.
