The shot put ( pronounced ) is a track and field इवेंट involving `` फेंकना '' / '' putting '' ( throwing in a pushing गति ) a heavy spherical object —the shot—as far as possible.
The shot put competition for men has been a part of the modern Olympics चूंकि उनके पुनरुद्धार in 1896, women 's competition began in 1948.
Map of the संयुक्त Nations ( UN ) member states, with उनके territories ( including dependent territories ) recognized by the UN in blue
There are United राष्ट्र ( un ) सदस्य states, and each of them is a member of the United Nations General Assembly.
The criteria for admission of new members हैं set out in the United राष्ट्र Charter, अध्याय II, आलेख 4:
A recommendation for प्रवेश from the Security परिषद requires affirmative votes from at least nine of the council 's fifteen members, with none of the five permanent members मतदान against.
The Security परिषद 's recommendation जरूर then be subsequently approved in the General Assembly by a two-thirds majority vote.
In principle, only sovereign राज्य can become un members, and फिलहाल all UN सदस्यों हैं sovereign states ( although a few members were not sovereign when वे joined the UN ).
क्युकी a state can only be admitted to the UN by the approval of the Security Council and the General Assembly, a क्रमांक of states that may be माना sovereign states according to the Montevideo Convention criteria are not members because the UN does नहीं consider them to possess sovereignty, mainly due to the lack of अंतरराष्ट्रीय recognition or opposition from certain members.
in addition to the member states, the UN भी invites non-member states ( currently two : the Holy See and Palestine ), intergovernmental organizations, and अन्य international organizations and entities whose statehood or sovereignty हैं नहीं precisely defined, to become observers at the General Assembly, allowing them to participate and बोलो, but not vote, in General Assembly meetings.
The Eiffel Tower (, ) is an iron lattice tower located on the Champ de Mars in Paris, named बाद the engineer Gustave एफिल, whose company designed and built the tower.
Erected in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 World 's Fair, it has become दोनो a global cultural icon of France and one of the सबसे recognizable structures in the संसार.
the tower is the tallest structure in Paris और the most-visited paid monument in the संसार ; 7.1 लाख people ascended it in 2011.
the third level observatory 's upper platform is at the highest accessible to public in the European Union and the उच्चतम in Europe as long as the platform of the Ostankino Tower, at, remains closed as a result of the fire of August 2000.
The tower received इसके 250 millionth visitor in 2010.
The tower stands लम्बा, परिचय the same height as an 81-storey building.
During its निर्माण, the Eiffel Tower surpassed the Washington Monument to assume the title of the tallest man-made structure in the world, a title it held for 41 years, जबतक the क्रिसलर भवन in New York City was built in 1930.
Because of the addition, in 1957, of the antenna atop the एफिल Tower, it is now taller than the Chrysler Building.
Not including ब्रॉडकास्ट एन्टेना, it is the second-tallest structure in France, बाद the Millau Viaduct.
The tower has three levels for visitors.
Tickets can be purchased to ascend, by stairs or lift ( elevator ), to the first and second levels.
The walk from ground level to the first level is over 300 steps, as is the walk from the first to the दूसरी level.
The third and highest level is accessible only by lift—stairs do exist but are usually closed to the public.
The first और दूसरी levels have restaurants.
The tower has become the most prominent symbol of both Paris and France, often in the establishing shot of films set in the city.
केनेथ Wayne `` केन '' Jennings III ( born may 23, 1974 ) is an American game show contestant and author.
Jennings is noted लिये holding the record for the longest winning streak on the u.S. syndicated game show Jeopardy !
और as being the all-time leading money winner on American खेल shows.
In 2004, Jennings won 74 Jeopardy !
खेल before he was defeated by challenger नैंसी Zerg on his 75th appearance.
His total earnings on jeopardy !
are $ 3,172,700, consisting of $ 2,520,700 over his 74 wins, a $ 2,000 second-place prize in his 75th appearance, a $ 500,000 second-place prize in the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions, as well as half of a $ 300,000 prize in the IBM Challenge.
During उसके पहला चलाएं of Jeopardy !
दिखावे, Jennings earned the रिकार्ड for the highest American game show winnings.
His total was surpassed by Brad Rutter, who defeated जेनिंग्स in the finals of the Jeopardy !
परम टूर्नामेंट of Champions ( first aired on May 25, 2005 ), adding $ 2,000,000 to Rutter 's existing Jeopardy !
winnings.
Jennings regained the record after appearing on अनेक other खेल shows, culminating in an appearance on Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader ?
( first aired on October 10, 2008 ), though Rutter retains the Jeopardy !
record.
After his कामयाबी on Jeopardy !, Jennings wrote परिचय his experience और explored American trivia इतिहास और culture in his किताब Brainiac : Adventures in the जिज्ञासु, Competitive, Compulsive World of Trivia Buffs, प्रकाशित in 2006.
The Canadian Football लीग or cfl ( ' [ LCF ] in French ) is a professional खेल league located in Canada.
The CFL is the highest level of प्रतियोगिता in Canadian football, a रूप of gridiron football closely related to American football.
इसके आठ current teams, which are located in eight separate cities, are विभाजित into दो divisions of four teams each — the East प्रभाग and the West Division.
The लीग 's 19-week regular season runs from late June to early November ; each team plays 18 games with one bye week.
Following the regular ऋतु, the three teams with the best रिकॉर्ड in their division ( except if the fourth place टोली in एक division has a बेहतर रिकार्ड than the third place team in the other प्रभाग, when the team with the better record makes the playoffs and `` crosses over '' to the अन्य division 's playoff ) compete in the league 's three-week divisional playoffs, which culminate in the late-november Grey Cup championship, the country 's largest annual sports and television event.
The CFL was officially founded on जनवरी 19, 1958, making it the second oldest gridiron football लीग in North America still in operation, although all its teams long predate the modern formation of the लीग.
It is the highest level of खेल in Canadian football, the most popular football league in कनाडा, and the second-most popular major sports league in Canada, after the National Hockey लीग.
Although बर्फ hockey is Canada 's most popular खेल, the CFL has increased the popularity of Canadian फ़ुटबॉल in Quebec and पश्चिमी Canada.
कनाडाई football is also played at amateur levels ( i.e. youth, ऊँची school, CJFL, QJFL, CIS and senior leagues such as the Alberta Football League ).
The 2010s will be a significant दशक लिये the CFL in terms of growth, as टीमों have renovated, expanded स्टेडियम, or plan to build entirely नई stadiums.
the Montreal Alouettes संपन्नता this first, adding 5,000 seats to Percival Molson Memorial Stadium in time for the 2010 CFL season.
the Edmonton एस्किमोस and Calgary Stampeders also renovated their respective स्टेडियम and सुविधाएं लिये the 2010 season.
In 2011, the BC Lions played under a new, retractable roof in bc प्लेस after spending one और a हाफ seasons at Empire Field.
तब the Winnipeg Blue Bombers will play in an entirely नई stadium at the University of मनिटोबा, scheduled to open in time for the 2013 season.
The Hamilton tiger-cats, Saskatchewan Roughriders and the new Ottawa franchise are also looking at new or extensively-renovated stadiums in the following सालो.
There हैं also hopes of expanding the लीग to Atlantic Canada ( ideally basing a टोली in either the more populated Halifax, or the more centralized Moncton ), as 2010 and 2011 had regular season games hosted in Moncton.
According to खेल इतिहासकार Douglas Brei, the Canadian Football League holds the distinction of being the only professional sports लीग in North America, major or minor league, in which each existing franchise has won at least one league title while in their current location.
Each एंटीबॉडी binds to a specific antigen ; an interaction similar to a lock and key.
An antibody ( Ab ), also known as an immunoglobulin ( Ig ), is a large Y-shaped प्रोटीन produced by B-cells that is used by the immune system to identify and neutralize विदेशी objects such as bacteria and viruses.
The antibody recognizes a अद्वितीय part of the foreign target, called an antigen.
Each tip of the `` y '' of an antibody contains a paratope ( a ढांचा analogous to a lock ) that is विशिष्ट लिये one particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a key ) on an प्रतिजन, allowing these two structures to bind साथ with precision.
using this binding यांत्रिकी, an antibody can tag a microbe or an infected cell for attack by other भाग of the immune system, or can neutralize its target directly ( for example, by ब्लॉकिंग a part of a microbe कि is अनिवार्य लिये its invasion and survival ).
The production of antibodies is the main function of the humoral immune system.
Antibodies हैं secreted by a type of श्वेत blood cell called a plasma cell.
Antibodies can occur in दो physical forms, a soluble रूप that is secreted from the cell, और a membrane -bound form that is attached to the surface of a b cell and is referred to as the B cell receptor ( BCR ).
The bcr is only मिला on the surface of b cells and facilitates the activation of ये cells and their subsequent differentiation into either antibody कारखानों called plasma cells, or मेमोरी B cells कि will survive in the body and remember कि same antigen so the B cells can respond faster upon future exposure.
In most cases, interaction of the B कोशिका साथ a t helper कोशिका is necessary to produce full activation of the B cell and, इसलिए, antibody generation following प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग.
Soluble antibodies हैं released into the blood and tissue fluids, as well as many secretions to continue to सर्वेक्षण for invading microorganisms.
Antibodies are glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the terms antibody and immunoglobulin are प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
Antibodies are typically made of basic संरचनात्मक units—each with two large heavy chains और two छोटी light जंजीरों.
There are several different प्रकार of antibody heavy जंजीरों, and several different kinds of antibodies, which are grouped into अलग isotypes based on which heavy chain they possess.
पाँच different antibody isotypes are known in स्तनधारियों, which perform अलग roles, and help direct the appropriate immune response लिये प्रत्येक different type of विदेशी object वे encounter.
Though the general structure of all antibodies is बहुत समान, a small region at the tip of the protein is extremely variable, allowing millions of antibodies साथ slightly different tip structures, or प्रतिजन binding साइट, to exist.
This region is ज्ञात as the hypervariable region.
Each of these variants can bind to a different antigen.
This enormous विविधता of antibodies allows the immune system to recognize an बराबर wide किस्में of antigens.
the विशाल and विविध population of antibodies is generated by random combinations of a set of gene segments that encode different प्रतिजन binding sites ( or paratopes ), followed by random mutations in this area of the antibody gene, which create further diversity.
Antibody genes also re-organize in a प्रक्रम called क्लास switching that changes the base of the heavy chain to another, बनाना a different isotype of the antibody that retains the antigen specific variable प्रदेश.
This allows a single antibody to be used by several different parts of the immune प्रणाली.
The symbol used by the Zodiac Killer to sign his correspondence
The Zodiac Killer was a serial कातिल who operated in Northern California in the late 1960s and जल्दी 1970s.
The killer 's identity remains unknown.
the Zodiac murdered victims in Benicia, Vallejo, Lake berryessa, and San Francisco between December 1968 and October 1969.
Four men and three women between the ages of 16 और 29 were targeted.
the killer originated the name `` Zodiac '' in a series of taunting letters भेजा to the local Bay Area press.
These अक्षर included चार cryptograms ( or ciphers ).
Of the चार cryptograms sent, only one has been definitively solved.
Suspects have been नामित by विधि enforcement and amateur जांचकर्ताओं, but no conclusive evidence has surfaced.
In April 2004, the San Francisco Police Department marked the case `` निष्क्रिय '', yet re-opened the case at some point prior to कूच 2007.
The case also remains खोलें in the city of Vallejo, as well as in Napa काउंटी and solano County.
the California Department of Justice has maintained an खोलें case file on the zodiac हत्याएं चूंकि 1969.
Jennings is a small city in और the parish सीट of Jefferson डेविस Parish, Louisiana, United States, near Lake Charles.
The जनसांख्यिकी was 10,383 at the 2010 census, a small decline from the 2000 tabulation.
The city is 68 percent white.
Jennings is the principal city of the Jennings micropolitan सांख्यिकीय Area, which includes all of Jefferson Davis Parish.
it is also part of the larger झील Charles-Jennings Combined Statistical Area.
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the manipulation of matter on an परमाणु and molecular scale.
the earliest, widespread description of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological goal of precisely manipulating अणु and molecules for fabrication of macroscale products, also now referred to as molecular nanotechnology.
A more generalized description of nanotechnology was subsequently established by the National Nanotechnology Initiative, जिससे defines nanotechnology as the हेरफेर of पदार्थ with at least one dimension sized from 1 to 100 nanometers.
This definition reflects the फैक्ट that quantum mechanical effects are महत्वपूर्ण at this quantum-realm scale, and so the परिभाषा shifted from a particular technological goal to a research category inclusive of all types of research और technologies कि सौदे with the special properties of matter that occur below the given आकार दहलीज.
It is therefore common to see the बहुवचन form `` nanotechnologies '' as well as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the व्यापक दायरा of research and applications whose common trait is size.
क्युकी of the variety of potential applications ( including औद्योगिक and सैन्य ), governments have invested billions of dollars in nanotechnology शोध.
Through इसके National Nanotechnology Initiative, the यूएसए रै invested 3.7 billion dollars.
The European संघ has invested 1.2 billion और Japan 750 million dollars.
Nanotechnology as defined by size is naturally very broad, including fields of science as diverse as surface science, सशुल्क chemistry, molecular biology, semiconductor physics, microfabrication, etc.
The associated शोध and applications हैं equally diverse, ranging from extensions of conventional device physics to completely new approaches based upon molecular self-assembly, इससे developing new materials with dimensions on the nanoscale to सीधा control of matter on the atomic scale.
Scientists currently बहस the future implications of nanotechnology.
Nanotechnology may be समर्थ to बनाएँ many new materials and डिवाइस with a vast range of applications, ऐसे as in medicine, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, biomaterials और energy production.
On the other hand, nanotechnology raises many of the same issues as कोई new technology, सहित concerns about the toxicity and environmental प्रभाव of nanomaterials, and their संभावित effects on global economics, as well as speculation about various doomsday scenarios.
These चिंताएं have led to a debate among advocacy groups and governments on whether special regulation of nanotechnology is warranted.
मैप of the Eastern bloc
The term पूर्वी Bloc or Communist bloc refers to the पूर्व communist राज्य of Central और Eastern Europe, generally the Soviet Union and the countries of the Warsaw Pact.
The terms Communist Bloc and Soviet Bloc were also used to denote groupings of राज्य aligned with the Soviet Union, although these terms might include राज्य बाहर Central और Eastern Europe.
The New Jersey gubernatorial election of 2009 took place on नवम्बर 3, 2009.
Democratic Governor Jon Corzine was running for a second term और was being challenged by Republican क्रिस क्रिस्टी, Independent Christopher Daggett and नौ others, in जोड to अनेक write-in candidates.
Christie जीती the election, with परिचय 48.5 percent of the vote, to 44.9 percent लिये corzine and 5.8 प्रतिशत for Daggett.
Christie जीती the largest margin for a first पद Republican चूंकि 1969.
Christie assumed office on January 19, 2010.
This थी the first election to fill the newly created office of Lieutenant Governor.
the candidates for governor and lieutenant governor were joined साथ as a single choice, so that voters किया not have the opportunity to split the ticket.
Kim guadagno, Christie 's running mate, became नई Jersey 's first lieutenant governor following her inauguration.
Health care in the United States is provided by अनेक distinct संगठन.
Health care facilities are largely owned और operated by private sector businesses.
स्वास्थ्य insurance for public sector employees is primarily provided by the government.
60-65 % of healthcare provision and बिता आता from programs such as medicare, Medicaid, TRICARE, the Children 's Health Insurance Program, and the Veterans Health Administration.
Most of the population under 65 is insured by उनके or a family member 's employer, some buy health insurance on उनके own, and the शेष are uninsured.
Of 17 high-income देशों studied by the नेशनल Institutes of Health in 2013, the United States was at or near the bottom in infant mortality, heart and lung disease, sexually transmitted infections, adolescent pregnancies, injuries, homicides, and rates of disability.
Together, such मुद्दे प्लेस the U.S. at the नीचे of the list लिये life प्रत्याशा.
on औसत, a U.S. male can be expected to live almost four fewer years than those in the top-ranked country.
According to the World स्वास्थ्य Organization ( जो ), the United States spent more on health care per capita ( $ 7,146 ), and अधिक on health care as percentage of its GDP ( 15.2 % ), than any other स्वदेश in 2008.
The Commonwealth Fund ranked the United States last in the quality of health care among similar countries, and notes U.S. care costs the सबसे.
The u.S. Census Bureau reported that 49.9 million residents, 16.3 % of the population, यहूद uninsured in 2010 ( up इससे 49.0 million residents, 16.1 % of the population, in 2009 ).
A 2004 संस्थान of Medicine ( IOM ) report said : `` the United States is among the few industrialized राष्ट्र in the world that does नहीं guarantee access to health care लिये its जनसांख्यिकी. ''
a 2004 oecd report said : `` With the exception of Mexico, तुर्कों, and the United States, all OECD देशों had achieved universal or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured ) coverage of their populations by 1990. ''
A 2010 report observed that lack of health insurance causes roughly 48,000 unnecessary मौतों every year in the United States.
In 2007, 62.1 % of filers for bankruptcies claimed high चिकित्सा expenses.
A 2013 पढ़ाई found कि about 25 % of सब senior citizens घोषित bankruptcy due to medical expenses, और 43 % are forced to mortgage or sell their प्राथमिक residence.
On March 23, 2010, the Patient सुरक्षा और Affordable Care Act ( PPACA ) became law, providing for major changes in health insurance.
In physiology, body जल is the water सामग्री of the human देह.
a significant fraction of the human body is water.
Arthur guyton 's textbook of Medical Physiology states that `` the total राशि of water in a man of average वज़न ( 70 kilograms ) is approximately 40 litres, averaging 57 प्रतिशत of his कुल body weight.
In a newborn infant, this may be as ऊँची as 75 प्रतिशत of the body वज़न, but it progressively decreases from birth to old आयु, most of the decrease occurring during the पहला 10 years of life.
Also, obesity decreases the प्रतिशत of जल in the body, sometimes to as low as 45 percent ''.
ये figures are सांख्यिकीय averages, so are illustrative, and like सब biostatistics, will vary with things like प्रकार of population, age और क्रमांक of people sampled, और methodology.
So there is not, और can not be, a figure that is exactly the वही for सब लोगों, for this or कोई other physiological measure.
For उदाहरण, Jackson 's ( 1985 ) Anatomy & Physiology लिये Nurses gives a फिगर of 60 % for the proportion of body-weight attributable to water, which approximates Guyton 's 57 %.
in diseased states where देह जल is affected, the compartment or compartments that have changed can दे clues to the प्रकृति of the problem.
Body water is regulated by hormones, including anti-diuretic हार्मोन ( अध ), aldosterone और atrial natriuretic peptide.
Per Netter 's Atlas of Human Physiology, body water is broken down into the following कम्पार्टमेंटs:
intracellular fluid ( 2/3 of देह जल ).
Per Guyton, in a body containing 40 लीटर of fluid, about 25 litres is intracellular, जिससे amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ), close enough to the 2/3 rule of अंगूठा.
Jackson 's ग्रन्थ states 70 % of body fluid is intracellular.
Extracellular द्रव ( 1/3 of body water ).
Per Guyton 's illustration, for a 40 litre body, about 15 litres is extracellular, which amounts to 37.5 % Again, this is close to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited here.
Plasma ( 1/5 of extracellular fluid ).
Per Guyton 's illustration, of the 15 लीटर of extracellular fluid, plasma volume averages 3 लीटर.
इस amounts to 20 %, the same as per Netter 's Atlas.
Interstitial fluid ( 4/5 of extracellular fluid )
Transcellular द्रव ( a.k.a. `` third space, '' normally ignored in calculations )
contained inside organs, such as the gastrointestinal, cerebrospinal, peritoneal, and ocular fluids.
Self-esteem is a term प्रयुक्त in psychology to reflect a व्यक्ति 's overall emotional evaluation of his or her own worth.
It is a निर्णय of oneself as well as an attitude toward the स्वः.
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( for example, `` I am competent, '' `` I am worthy '' ) and emotions such as triumph, despair, pride and shame.
Smith and Mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is what we think about the self ; self-esteem, is the positive or negative evaluations of the self, as in how we feel परिचय it. ''
Self-esteem is also known as the evaluative आयाम of the self कि includes feelings of worthiness, prides and discouragement.
One 's self-esteem is भी closely संबद्ध with self-consciousness.
Self-esteem is a disposition that a person has which represents their judgements of उनके own worthiness.
In the mid-1960s, Morris rosenberg और social-learning theorists defined self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness.
Nathaniel Branden in 1969 defined self-esteem as `` the experience of being competent to cope with the basic challenges of life and होने worthy of happiness. ''
According to Branden, self-esteem is the sum of self-confidence ( a अहसास of निजी क्षमता ) और self-respect ( a feeling of personal worth ).
It exists as a consequence of the implicit निर्णय that प्रत्येक person रै of their ability to फेस जीवन 's challenges, to understand and solve problems, and their right to achieve happiness, और be given आदर.
as a social psychological construct, self-esteem is attractive because researchers have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of relevant outcomes, ऐसे as academic achievement ( Marsh 1990 ) or exercise behavior ( Hagger et al. 1998 ).
In addition, self-esteem has भी महरूम treated as an important outcome due to its close संबंध with psychological well-being ( दलदल 1989 ).
Self-esteem can लागू specifically to a particular dimension ( लिये example, `` I believe I am a good writer and I महसूस happy about कि '' ) or a global extent ( for example, `` I believe I am a bad व्यक्ति, and feel ख़राब about myself in सामान्य '' ).
Psychologists usually regard self-esteem as an enduring personality characteristic ( `` trait '' self-esteem ), though normal, short-term variations ( `` state '' self-esteem ) भी exist.
Synonyms or near-synonyms of self-esteem include : self-worth, self-regard, self-respect, और self-integrity.
a Masonic आवास, often termed a निजी Lodge or Constituent Lodge, is the मौलिक organisational unit of Freemasonry.
प्रत्येक नई Lodge must be warranted or chartered by a Grand Lodge, but is subject to its direction only in enforcing the published Constitution of the jurisdiction.
By exception the three surviving lodges that formed the संसार 's first known Grand आवास in London ( today पुकारा the संयुक्त Grand Lodge of England ) have the अद्वितीय विशेषाधिकार to operate as समय immemorial i.e. without such warrant ; only one other lodge operates without a warrant - this is the Grand Stewards ' आवास in लंदन, although it is नहीं also entitled to the `` time immemorial '' title.
A freemason is generally entitled to visit any Lodge, in कोई jurisdiction ( i.e. under any ग्रैंड Lodge ) in amity with उसके own.
In some jurisdictions this privilege is restricted to निपुण Masons ( that is, freemasons who have attained the Order 's third degree ).
He is पहला usually required to check, और certify, the regularity of the relationship of the Lodge - and be able to satisfy कि Lodge of his regularity of membership.
Freemasons gather together as a आवास to कार्य the three मौलिक डिग्री of Entered Apprentice, Fellowcraft और Master Mason.
Pilkington समूह सीमित is a multinational glass manufacturing कम्पनी headquartered in St Helens, United Kingdom और a wholly owned subsidiary of the Japan-based NSG समूह.
Prior to its acquisition by NSG in 2006 it was an independent company listed on the London भण्डार Exchange and लिये a समय was a constituent of the ftse 100 अनुक्रमणिका.
A quotation is the repetition of one expression as part of another one, particularly when the quoted expression is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to its original source, and it is indicated by ( punctuated with ) quotation marks.
A quotation can also refer to the दोहराया use of units of any other form of expression, विशेषकर parts of artistic works : तत्व of a painting, scenes इससे a movie or भाग इससे a musical composition.
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was a आम साल starting on Monday ( कड़ी will प्रदर्शक the full calendar ) of the Gregorian calendar और a आम year starting on Saturday of the 12-day slower Julian calendar.
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering बेल in the family Piperaceae, cultivated for इसके fruit, which is प्रायः dried और used as a spice और seasoning.
the fruit, known as a peppercorn when dried, is approximately in diameter, dark red when fully mature, and, जैसे all drupes, contains a single seed.
peppercorns, और the ground pepper derived from them, may be described simply as pepper, or more precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( cooked and dried unripe फल ), green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) और white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ).
Black pepper is native to दक्षिण India, and is extensively cultivated there and elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper, producing 34 % of the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried ground pepper has been used चूंकि antiquity for both इसके flavour and as a medicine.
Black pepper is the संसार 's most traded spice.
It is one of the most common spices added to European cuisine और its descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine, नहीं to be confused with the capsaicin कि gives fleshy peppers theirs.
It is in the modern संसार, often paired with salt.
Fire hydrant in Charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, USA
A fire hydrant ( also known colloquially as a fire plug in the संयुक्त राज्य or as a johnny pump in New York City ), is an active fire protection measure, and a सोर्स of water provided in most urban, suburban और rural areas with municipal water service to enable अग्निशमन to tap into the नगरपालिका जल सप्लाई to assist in extinguishing a fire.
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify लिये an insurance discount since firefighters should be able to more rapidly extinguish a fire on the insured property.
The concept of fire plugs dates to at least the 17th century.
This was a समय when firefighters responding to a कॉल would dig down to the wooden water mains और hastily bore a hole to secure water to fight fires.
The water would भरण the hole creating a अस्थाई well, और be transported from the well to the fire by bucket brigades or, later, by hand-pumped fire engines.
The holes were then plugged with stoppers, normally redwood, which over time came to be known as fire plugs.
The location of the plug would often be recorded or marked so that it could be reused in भविष्य fires.
इस is the सोर्स of the colloquial term fire प्लग स्टिल used for fire hydrants आज.
After the Great Fire of London in 1666, the city installed water mains with holes drilled at intervals, equipped साथ risers, allowing an access point to the wooden fire plugs इससे street level.
The invention of a post- or pillar-type fire hydrant is generally credited to फ्रेडरिक Graff Sr., Chief Engineer of the Philadelphia Water Works around the year 1801.
It had a combination hose/faucet outlet और थी of `` wet barrel '' डिज़ाइन with the valve in the top.
It is said that Graff held the first patent लिये a fire hydrant, but this can not be verified because the patent office in Washington D.C. caught on fire in 1836 destroying many पेटेंट records इससे that period in the process.
the President of the गणतंत्र of South Africa is the सिर of state और head of government under South Africa 's संविधान.
From 1961 to 1994, the head of राज्य was called the State अध्यक्ष.
The President is elected by सदस्यों of the National Assembly, the निम्नतर house of पार्लियामेंट, and is usually the leader of the largest party, which has महरूम the African National Congress since the पहला non-racial elections were held on 27 April 1994.
The role was originally founded to be distinct from the now defunct भूमिका of prime मंत्री, but the two roles were merged in the 1983 संविधान जिससे निर्दिष्ट a four-year पद of दफ्तर.
the 1993 and बाद constitutions limits the president 's time in office to two five-year terms.
The first President to be elected under the नई constitution was Nelson Mandela, and the लाज़िम president is Jacob zuma.
Under the interim Constitution ( मान्य from 1994 to 1996 ), there was a Government of National Unity, in which an mp इससे the largest opposition पार्टी was entitled to a position as Deputy अध्यक्ष.
Along with Thabo Mbeki, the last State President, F.W. De Klerk also served as Deputy President, in his capacity as the leader of the National पार्टी जिससे was the second-largest party in the new Parliament.
लकिन De Klerk later resigned and went into विपक्ष with his party.
A voluntary गठबन्धन government continues to exist under the new constitution ( adopted in 1996 ), हालांकि वहीँ have been no appointments of opposition politicians to the post of डिप्टी president.
Special education or special needs शिक्षा is the education of विद्यार्थी with special needs in a रास्ता कि पता the students ' व्यक्तिगत differences and needs.
Ideally, this प्रक्रम involves the individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of teaching प्रक्रियाओं, adapted उपकरण और materials, accessible settings, और other interventions designed to help learners with special needs achieve a उच्चतर level of personal self-sufficiency and success in school and community than would be available if the छात्र were तभी given access to a typical classroom education.
Common special needs include challenges with learning, communication challenges, emotional and behavioral disorders, physical disabilities, and developmental disorders.
विद्यार्थी with these kinds of special needs हैं likely to benefit from additional educational services such as different approaches to teaching, use of technology, a specifically adapted teaching area, or संसाधन रूम.
Intellectual giftedness is a difference in learning and can also लाभ इससे specialized teaching techniques or different educational programs, लकिन the term `` special education '' is generally used to specifically indicate instruction of students whose special needs reduce their ability to learn independently or in an ordinary classroom, and gifted education is handled separately.
In most developed countries, educators are modifying शिक्षण methods and environments so that the maximum number of students are served in general education environments.
Special education in developed देशों is प्रायः regarded less as a `` प्लेस '' and अधिक as `` a दायरा of सेवाएं, available in every school. ''
संयोजन can reduce social stigmas and improve academic achievement for many students.
The opposite of खास education is general education.
General education is the मानक curriculum presented with standard teaching methods और without additional supports.
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born August 12, 1930, as Schwartz györgy ) is a Hungarian-American कारोबार महारथी, निवेशकों, and philanthropist.
He is the अध्यक्ष of Soros Fund Management.
Soros supports progressive-liberal causes.
he is known as `` The Man जो Broke the Bank of England `` because of his in निवेश profits during the 1992 Black बुधवार UK currency crisis.
Between 1979 and 2011, Soros gave away over $ 8 billion to human rights, public health, and शिक्षा causes.
He played a significant भूमिका in the शांतिपूर्ण transition from communism to पूंजीवाद in Hungary ( 1984–89 ) और provided one of Europe 's largest उच्चतर education endowments to Central European University in बुडापेस्ट.
सोरोस is also the chairman of the Open Society संस्थान.
An कर्ता portraying सिकंदर ग्राहम Bell speaking into an early model telephone.
the invention of the telephone is the culmination of work done by many individuals, the history of which involves a collection of claims and counterclaims.
The विकास of the modern electrical telephone involved an array of lawsuits संस्थापित upon the patent दावा of several individuals and numerous companies.
This आलेख कवर the early सालो from 1844 to 1898, from conception of the idea of an electric voice-transmission device, to failed attempts to use `` make-and-break '' current, to कामयाब experiments with electromagnetic telephones by Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas Watson, and finally to commercially successful telephones in the late 19th सदी.
A निपुण of ठीक कला ( MFA, M.F.A. ) is a graduate degree typically requiring 2–3 सालो of postgraduate study beyond the bachelor 's degree ( BFA ), although the term of पढ़ाई होगा vary by country or by विश्वविद्यालयों.
the mfa is a creative उपाधि usually awarded as a terminal degree in visual arts, creative writing, filmmaking, dance, or theatre और other performing arts.
coursework is primarily of an applied or performing nature with the कार्यक्रम प्रायः culminating in a major कार्य or performance.
Master of ठीक Arts कार्यक्रम have generally जरूरी a bachelor 's degree prior to admission, but many do not require कि the undergraduate major be the वही as the mfa field of study.
The most महत्वपूर्ण admissions requirement has often been a sample portfolio or a performance audition.
The Master of Fine Arts differs इससे the Master of Arts in that the mfa, while an academic कार्यक्रम, centers around practice in the particular field, whereas programs leading to the ma usually center on the scholarly, academic, or critical study of the field.
additionally, in the United States, an MFA is recognized as a terminal degree for practitioners of Visual आर्ट, Design, Dance, Theatre, Film/Video, New Media, and Creative लिखने - meaning कि it is considered to be the highest उपाधि in its field, and is प्रयुक्त as a minimum qualification to be able to apply to become a full-time प्राध्यापक teaching at the विश्वविद्यालयों level in these disciplines.
There हैं exceptions to this standard in the कला, notably in the case of music performance, where the mfa is not seen as a terminal degree in the context of the more standardized DMA degree.
It is also critical to note that in the interest of extending the connection between रचनात्मक production and जारी academic शोध, some universities have established practice-based Ph.D programs in fields such as रचनात्मक writing, visual कला, new मीडिया, design and theater.
While this has had an effect in Creative Writing, and to a lesser extent in डिज़ाइन और new media, the influx of graduates from practice-based phd programs has not appreciably changed the standard लिये the MFA as the terminal उपाधि in most Arts disciplines yet.
This is an जारी contentious topic, and is the frequent subject of academic panels, especially at the annual College Art Association सम्मेलन.
the CAA 2008 दिशानिर्देश regarding the MFA strongly re-affirms कि the PhD is not जरूरी as a टर्मिनल degree in the विज़ुअल arts.
the atomic bombings of the cities of Hiroshima और Nagasaki in Japan were conducted by the United States during the फाइनल stages of World War II in 1945.
The two events are the तभी use of nuclear weapons in war to तिथि.
Following a firebombing campaign that destroyed many Japanese cities, the Allies prepared for a costly invasion of Japan.
The war in Europe ended when नाजी Germany signed its instrument of surrender on 8 May, but the Pacific War continued.
साथ with the United Kingdom and the Republic of चीन, the United राज्य called for a आत्मसमर्पण of Japan in the Potsdam घोषणा on 26 July 1945, threatening Japan साथ `` prompt and utter destruction ''.
The Japanese government ignored this ultimatum, और the United States deployed two nuclear weapons developed by the Manhattan प्रोजेक्ट.
American airmen dropped Little लड़के on the city of Hiroshima on 6 August 1945, followed by Fat Man over Nagasaki on 9 August.
भीतर the first two to four months of the bombings, the acute effects killed 90,000–166,000 लोगों in Hiroshima and 60,000–80,000 in Nagasaki, with roughly half of the deaths in each city occurring on the पहला दिन.
The Hiroshima prefecture health department estimated that, of the people who died on the day of the विस्फोट, 60 % died from flash or flame burns, 30 % from falling debris and 10 % इससे other causes.
दौरान the following months, large numbers died from the प्रभाव of burns, विकिरण sickness, and other injuries, compounded by illness.
in a US estimate of the कुल immediate and short term cause of death, 15–20 % died from radiation sickness, 20–30 % from burns, और 50–60 % इससे अन्य injuries, compounded by illness.
In दोनो cities, most of the dead were civilians, although Hiroshima had a sizeable garrison.
On 15 अगस्त, six days after the bombing of Nagasaki, Japan घोषित its surrender to the Allies, signing the Instrument of आत्मसमर्पण on 2 September, officially ending World War II.
The bombings led, in part, to post-war Japan 's adopting तीन Non-Nuclear Principles, forbidding the स्वदेश इससे nuclear armament.
The role of the bombings in जापानी 's surrender और उनके ethical औचित्य are still debated.
Mohandas करमचंद गांधी ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 January 1948 ), commonly ज्ञात as Mahatma Gandhi, थी the preeminent leader of Indian nationalism in british-ruled India.
Employing non-violent सिविल disobedience, गांधी led India to independence and inspired movements for non-violence, civil rights and freedom across the world.
The son of a वरिष्ठ government official, Gandhi was born and raised in a Hindu Bania community in तटीय Gujarat, and trained in विधि in London.
गांधी became famous by fighting for the civil rights of मुस्लिम and Hindu Indians in South Africa, using new techniques of non-violent civil disobedience कि he developed.
Returning to India in 1915, he set परिचय organising peasants to protest excessive land-taxes.
A lifelong opponent of `` सांप्रदायिकता `` ( i.e. basing politics on religion ) he reached आउट widely to सब religious groups.
he became a leader of मुसलमान protesting the declining status of the Caliphate.
Assuming नेतृत्व of the भारतीय National Congress in 1921, Gandhi led देशभर campaigns for easing poverty, expanding women 's rights, building religious and ethnic amity, ending अस्पृश्यता, increasing economic self-reliance, and ऊपर all for achieving Swaraj —the independence of India from British हुकूमत.
Gandhi led Indians in protesting the national salt tax with the dandi Salt कूच in 1930, and later in demanding the British to immediately Quit India in 1942, during संसार War II.
he was imprisoned for that and लिये numerous अन्य political offenses over the years.
Gandhi sought to practice non-violence and truth in सब situations, and advocated that others do the same.
He देखी the villages as the कोर of the true इण्डिया and promoted self-sufficiency ; he did not support the industrialization कार्यक्रम of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru.
He lived modestly in a self-sufficient residential जातियाँ और wore the traditional Indian dhoti and shawl, woven with धागे he had hand spun on a charkha.
His chief political दुश्मन in Britain was विंस्टन Churchill, who ridiculed him as a `` half-naked fakir. ''
he was a समर्पित शाकाहारी, and undertook long fasts as means of both self-purification and राजनैतिक mobilization.
In his last year, अप्रसन्न at the partition of India, Gandhi worked to stop the carnage between Muslims, Hindus और Sikhs that raged in the किनारा क्षेत्रफल between India and Pakistan.
He was assassinated on 30 January 1948 by Nathuram Godse who thought Gandhi was too sympathetic to India 's Muslims.
30 January is observed as शहीदो ' Day in इण्डिया.
The honorific महात्मा ( `` Great Soul '' ) थी applied to him by 1914.
In India he थी also called Bapu ( `` पिता '' ).
He is known in इण्डिया as the Father of the स्वदेश ; his birthday, 2 अक्तूबर, is commemorated there as Gandhi Jayanti, a national holiday, and world-wide as the International Day of Non-Violence.
Gandhi 's philosophy was not theoretical but एक of pragmatism, that is, practicing उसके principles in the moment.
Asked to give a संदेश to the people, he would respond, `` My life is my संदेश. ''
Joan Crawford ( March 23, ca. 1904 – may 10, 1977 ), born Lucille Fay lesueur, was an American अभिनेत्री in film, television and theatre.
starting as a नर्तकी in traveling नाट्य कंपनियाँ पहले debuting on Broadway, Crawford was signed to a motion चित्र contract by metro-goldwyn-mayer in 1925.
Initially frustrated by the size and quality of उसके parts, Crawford began a campaign of self-publicity and became nationally ज्ञात as a flapper by the end of the 1920s.
In the 1930s, Crawford 's fame rivaled, and later outlasted, MGM colleagues Norma Shearer and greta Garbo.
Crawford often निभाई hardworking young women who find रोमांस and financial success.
These `` rags-to-riches '' stories were well received by Depression -era ऑडियंस and were popular with women.
Crawford became one of हॉलीवुड 's most prominent movie stars and one of the highest सशुल्क women in the United States, but उसके films began losing money and by the end of the 1930s she थी labeled `` box दफ्तर poison ''.
After an absence of nearly two years from the screen, क्रॉफर्ड staged a comeback by starring in Mildred Pierce ( 1945 ), for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress.
In 1955, she became involved साथ the Pepsi-Cola Company through her marriage to company Chairman Alfred Steele.
बाद his death in 1959, Crawford was elected to fill उसके vacancy on the board of निर्देशकों लकिन was forcibly retired in 1973.
वो continued acting in फिल्मी and television regularly through the 1960s, जब her performances became fewer ; बाद the रिलीज of the British horror film Trog in 1970, Crawford retired from the screen.
Following a public appearance in 1974, after which unflattering photographs were published, क्रॉफर्ड withdrew from public life और became increasingly reclusive until her मौत in 1977.
Crawford married four टाइम्स.
Her पहला तीन marriages ended in divorce ; the last ended with the death of husband अल्फ्रेड Steele.
She अपनाया five children, one of whom was reclaimed by उसके birth mother.
क्रॉफर्ड 's relationships with her two पुरानी children, क्रिस्टीना and Christopher, were acrimonious.
Crawford disinherited the two and, बाद क्रॉफर्ड 's death, Christina लिखा a `` tell-all '' संस्मरण, Mommie Dearest, in which वो alleged a lifelong pattern of physical and emotional abuse perpetrated by क्रॉफर्ड.
She थी voted the tenth महानतम female स्टार in the history of American cinema by the American फिल्मी Institute.

Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a hard or soft cover used to protect unoccupied passenger seats in a convertible or roadster, or the cargo bed in a pickup truck.
मुश्किल tonneau covers open by a hinging or फोल्डिंग mechanism जबकि soft covers open by rolling up.
The tonneau cover is used to conceal cargo.
जब the cover is pulled out, it keeps items out of the sun and provides अतिरिक्त security by keeping निजी items out of sight, as well as shielding the driver from view.
Twitter is an online social networking service and microblogging service that enables its users to send and read text-based messages of up to 140 वर्ण, ज्ञात as `` tweets ''.
ट्विटर was created in March 2006 by Jack Dorsey and by July, the social networking site was launched.
the service rapidly gained worldwide लोकप्रियता, with over 500 million registered users as of 2012, generating over 340 million tweets daily and handling over 1.6 अरब search queries प्रति दिन.
Since its launch, Twitter has become एक of the ten most visited websites on the Internet, and has been described as `` the SMS of the Internet. ''
Unregistered उपयोक्ता can read tweets, while registered users can post tweets through the website इंटरफ़ेस, SMS, or a range of apps for mobile devices.
Twitter Inc. is based in San Francisco, with additional servers and offices in नई York नगर, Boston, and San Antonio.
the Hangover is a 2009 अमरीकी comedy film, co-produced और निर्देशित by Todd Phillips and written by Jon Lucas और Scott Moore.
It is the first film of The hangover franchise.The फिल्मी stars ब्राडली Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Heather Graham, जस्टिन Bartha, and Jeffrey Tambor.
The Hangover tells the story of Phil wenneck, Stu Price and एलन Garner, जो travel to Las Vegas लिये a bachelor party to celebrate their friend Doug Billings ' impending विवाह.
However, Phil, stu and एलन have no memory of the previous night 's events और must find Doug before the wedding can take place.
Lucas and मूर wrote the script after executive producer Chris Bender 's friend disappeared and had a large bill after being भेजा to a strip club.
बाद लुकास and Moore बेची it to the studio for $ 2 million, Philips and Jeremy Garelick rewrote the script to include a बाघ as well as a subplot involving a baby और a police cruiser, and also including boxer Mike Tyson.
Filming took place in Nevada for 15 दिनों, और दौरान filming, the तीन main actors ( Cooper, Helms और Galifianakis ) formed a friendship.
The hangover was released on June 5, 2009, बनने a critical and commercial success.
it became the tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009, साथ a worldwide gross of over US $ 467 million.
Critics praised the फिल्मी 's comedic दृष्टिकोण लकिन criticized it for इसके vulgarity.
The film won the Golden Globe Award लिये Best Motion चित्र – Musical or Comedy, and received multiple other accolades.
It is the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 in the संसार, as well as the second highest-grossing R-rated comedy कभी in the United राज्य, surpassing a रिकार्ड previously आयोजित by Beverly Hills cop for almost 25 years and बाद being surpassed by Ted in 2012.
Out of all R-rated films, it is the third highest-grossing कभी in the U.S., behind only the जुनून of the Christ and The मेट्रिक्स Reloaded.
a sequel, The Hangover Part II, थी released in 2011, and a third और फाइनल फिल्मी, The Hangover Part III, is set लिये release in 2013.
Events involving meiosis, showing chromosomal crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a special प्रकार of cell division necessary for यौन जनन in eukaryotes.
The cells produced by meiosis are gametes or spores.
in many जीवों, including all पशु and land पौधे ( but not some other groups ऐसे as fungi ), गैमीट are called sperm and egg कोशिकाएं.
Whilst the process of meiosis bears a क्रमांक of similarities with the 'life-cycle ' कोशिका division process of mitosis, it differs in two important respects:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination जिससे shuffles the genes producing a different genetic संयोजन in each gamete, compared with the co-existence of each of the two separate pairs of each chromosome ( एक प्राप्त from each जनक ) in each cell which results from mitosis.
the outcome of meiosis is potentially four ( genetically unique ) haploid cells, compared with the two ( genetically identical ) द्विगुणित कोशिकाएं produced from समसूत्रण.
Meiosis begins with one diploid cell containing two copies of प्रत्येक chromosome —one from the organism 's mother और one इससे its पिता.
The cell divides twice, potentially producing up to four haploid cells containing one copy of प्रत्येक chromosome.
( `` Potentially '' because in some cases, such as the गठन of oocytes in स्तनधारियों, only one of the possible four अगुणित cells survives. )
In पशु the अगुणित cell resulting from meiosis is a male or female gamete.
Each of the resulting chromosomes in the gamete cells is a unique mixture of maternal and पैतृक डीएनए, resulting in औलाद that हैं genetically पृथक इससे either parent.
This gives rise to जेनेटिक diversity in sexually reproducing populations.
This जेनेटिक diversity can provide the variation of physical and behavioural attributes ( phenotypes ) upon which natural selection can अधिनियम, but, as वर्णित below in Section 6, Origin and function of meiosis, the genetic diversity may be largely a by-product of the समजात recombination that is primarily employed for its डीएनए मरम्मत function during meiosis.
It is भी noteworthy that during meiosis, specific genes are more highly transcribed, and ये are पुकारा the meiome, the term used in functional genomics लिये the meiotic transcriptome.
Meiosis is a कुंजी feature for सब sexually reproducing eukaryotes in which homologous chromosome pairing, synapse and recombination occur.
In addition to strong meiotic stage-specific expression of mRNA ( the meiome ), however, वहीँ are also pervasive translational controls ( e.g. selective उपयोग of preformed mRNA ), regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein expression of genes during meiosis.
Thus, both the meiome and translational controls determine the broad restructuring of meiotic cells needed to carry out meiosis.
Prior to the meiosis process the cell 's chromosomes are duplicated by a round of DNA replication, creating from the maternal and paternal versions of each chromosome ( homologs ) two exact नक़ल, sister chromatids, attached at the centromere region.
in the beginning of meiosis the maternal and paternal homologs pair to प्रत्येक other.
तब they typically exchange भाग by homologous recombination अग्रणी to crossovers of डीएनए between the maternal and पैतृक versions of the chromosome.
Spindle fibers bind to the centromeres of प्रत्येक pair of homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator.
Then the fibers pull the recombined homologs to opposite डंडे of the कोशिका.
As the chromosomes move दूर from the center the cell divides into दो daughter cells, each containing a haploid number of chromosomes composed of two chromatids.
After the recombined maternal and paternal homologs have separated into the two daughter कोशिकाएं, a second round of cell प्रभाग occurs.
There meiosis ends as the two सिस्टर chromatids making up each homolog are separated and move into one of the four resulting gamete कोशिकाएं.
Upon fertilization, for example when a sperm enters an अंडा cell, दो gamete cells produced by meiosis fuse.
The gamete from the mother and the gamete from the father each contribute one हाफ of the set of chromosomes that make up the new औलाद 's genome.
Meiosis उपयोग many of the same mechanisms as mitosis, a type of cell division used by eukaryotes like plants and animals to split one cell into two identical daughter cells.
in all पौधे and in अनेक protists meiosis results in the formation of spores : haploid cells that can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization.
मुक्केबाज़ी ( pugilism, prize fighting, the sweet science or in Greek pygmachia ) is a martial art and combat sport in which two people engage in a contest of शक्ति, speed, reflexes, endurance और will by throwing punches साथ gloved hands.
Amateur मुक्केबाज़ी is an Olympic और Commonwealth sport और is a common fixture in most of the major international games - it also रै its own World Championships.
मुक्केबाज़ी is supervised by a referee over a series of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds.
The result is decided when an opponent is deemed incapable to continue by a रेफरी, is disqualified for breaking a rule, resigns by throwing in a towel, or is pronounced the winner or loser based on the judges ' scorecards at the end of the contest.
The birth hour of boxing as a sport may be इसके acceptance by the प्राचीन Greeks as an Olympic game as early as 688 BC.
Boxing evolved from 16th- and 18th-century prizefights, largely in Great Britain, to the forerunner of modern boxing in the mid-19th century, again initially in Great Britain और later in the संयुक्त States.
In 2004, ESPN ranked boxing as the most difficult खेल in the world.
Agreement or concord happens when a word changes रूप depending on the other words to which it relates.
it is an instance of inflection, and usually involves making the value of some व्याकरणिक category ( such as लिंग or person ) `` agree '' between different words or parts of the sentence.
For उदाहरण, in Standard English, एक may say i am or he is, but not `` i is '' or `` he am ''.
इस is because the grammar of the language requires that the verb and its subject agree in person.
The pronouns I और he are पहला and third person respectively, as are the verb forms am and is.
The verb form जरूर be selected so कि it has the same व्यक्ति as the subject.
The agreement आधारित on overt व्याकरणिक categories as above is formal agreement, in contrast to notional agreement, which is based on meaning.
For instance, the phrase The संयुक्त States is treated as singular for purposes of agreement, even though it is formally plural.
इस is a list of places below औसत sea level that are on land.
Places in tunnels, खानों, basements, खोदा holes ( भी with open sky ), under water, under बर्फ, or existing temporarily as a result of ebbing of sea tide etc. are not included.
All figures are in meters below sea level:
Debbie Macomber ( born October 22, 1948 in Yakima, Washington ) is a best-selling अमरीकी author of over 150 romance novels and contemporary महिलाओं 's fiction.
Over 140 लाख copies of her किताबे are in छपाई throughout the world, and four have become made-for-TV-movies.
Macomber थी the inaugural winner of the fan-voted quill Award for romance in 2005 and रै been awarded both a Romance Writers of America RITA and a lifetime achievement पुरस्कार by the Romance Writers of America.
Catonsville is a census-designated place ( cdp ) in Baltimore County, Maryland, United States.
The population was 41,567 at the 2010 census.
The जातियाँ lies to the west of Baltimore along the city 's border.
catonsville is the home of the University of Maryland, Baltimore County ( UMBC ), a public research विश्वविद्यालयों with over 12,000 students.
A lawyer, according to Black 's Law Dictionary, is `` a person learned in the law ; as an attorney, counsel or solicitor ; a person जो is practicing विधि. ''
Law is the system of rules of conduct स्थापित by the sovereign government of a society to correct wrongs, maintain the stability of political and social authority, and उद्धार justice.
working as a lawyer involves the practical अनुप्रयोग of abstract legal theories and knowledge to solve specific individualized समस्याएं, or to advance the interests of those who retain ( i.e., hire ) lawyers to perform legal services.
The role of the lawyer varies significantly across legal jurisdictions, and so it can be treated here in only the सबसे general शर्तें.
Vector Marketing is the domestic बिक्री भुजा of Cutco Corporation, an Olean, New York based cutlery manufacturer.
The Family and Medical Leave अधिनियम of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a संयुक्त States federal law requiring covered employers to provide कर्मचारी job-protected and unpaid leave for qualified medical और family reasons.
Qualified चिकित्सा and family कारण include : personal or family illness, family सैन्य छोड़, pregnancy, adoption, or the foster care placement of a child.
The FMLA is administered by the मजदूरी and Hour Division of the United राज्य Department of Labor.
The bill was a major part of President Bill Clinton 's agenda in his first term.
President Clinton signed the विधेयक into विधि on February 5, 1993 ( ; 29 U.S.C. sec. 2601 ; 29 CFR 825 ) and it took effect on अगस्त 5, 1993, six months later.
The FMLA was intended `` to संतुलन the demands of the workplace with the needs of families. ''
The अधिनियम allows eligible employees to take up to 12 कार्य weeks of unpaid leave during any 12-month period to attend to the serious health condition of the employee, parent, spouse or child, or for pregnancy or परवाह of a newborn child, or for adoption or फोस्टर परवाह of a child.
in अनुक्रम to be eligible for FMLA leave, an employee must have been at the business at तनिक 12 months, and worked at least 1,250 hours over the past 12 महीने, and कार्य at a location where the कम्पनी employs 50 or more employees within 75 मील.
The FMLA कवर both public- and private-sector employees, but निश्चित categories of employees are excluded, including elected officials और their personal staff members.
the Vietnam War ( ) was a ठंडा War -era military conflict that occurred in Vietnam, Laos, and Cambodia from 1 November 1955 to the fall of साइगॉन on 30 April 1975.
This war followed the First Indochina War and was लड़ा between North Vietnam, supported by its communist allies, और the government of South Vietnam, supported by the United States and other anti-communist countries.
The Viet Cong ( also ज्ञात as the National Liberation Front, or nlf ), a lightly हथियारबंद South वियतनामी communist आम front directed by the North, largely लड़ा a guerrilla war against anti-communist forces in the region.
The Vietnam People 's Army ( North Vietnamese Army ) engaged in a more conventional war, at टाइम्स committing large units into battle.
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied on air superiority and overwhelming firepower to conduct search and destroy operations, involving ground forces, तोपखाने, and airstrikes.
The U.S. government viewed involvement in the war as a way to prevent a communist takeover of South वियतनाम as part of उनके wider strategy of containment.
the North Vietnamese government और Viet Cong यहूद fighting to reunify Vietnam under communist rule.
They viewed the conflict as a colonial युद्ध, लड़ा initially against France, backed by the U.S., and later against South वियतनाम, which it regarded as a U.S. puppet state.
American military advisors arrived in what was तब फ्रेंच Indochina beginning in 1950.
U.S. involvement escalated in the early 1960s, with troop levels tripling in 1961 and tripling again in 1962.
U.S. combat units were deployed beginning in 1965.
Operations spanned international borders, with Laos and Cambodia heavily bombed.
American involvement in the war peaked in 1968, at the time of the tet Offensive.
After this, u.S. ground शक्तियां were gradually withdrawn as part of a policy known as Vietnamization.
Despite the Paris सलाम Accords, signed by all parties in January 1973, fighting continued.
u.S. military involvement ended on 15 August 1973 as a result of the Case–Church Amendment passed by the U.S. Congress.
The कैप्चर of साइगॉन by the Vietnam People 's Army in April 1975 marked the end of the war, और North and South Vietnam यहूद reunified the following year.
The युद्ध exacted a huge human cost in terms of fatalities ( देखिए Vietnam War casualties ).
Estimates of the number of Vietnamese सैनिको और नागरिकों मारे vary from 800,000 to 3.1 million.
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians, 20,000–200,000 Laotians, और 58,220 U.S. service सदस्यों भी died in the विरोध.

a volcano is an opening, or rupture, in a planet 's surface or crust, जिससे allows hot magma, volcanic राख and gases to escape from the magma chamber below the surface.
Volcanoes are generally found where tectonic plates are diverging or converging.
A mid-oceanic ridge, for उदाहरण the Mid-Atlantic Ridge, has उदाहरण of volcanoes caused by divergent tectonic प्लेटों pulling apart ; the प्रशांत Ring of Fire has examples of volcanoes caused by अभिसारी tectonic प्लेटों coming together.
by contrast, volcanoes are usually नहीं निर्मित where two tectonic plates slide past one another.
Volcanoes can also form where there is stretching और thinning of the Earth 's क्रस्ट in the interiors of plates, e.g., in the ईस्ट African Rift, the Wells Gray-Clearwater volcanic field and the Rio Grande Rift in उत्तर America.
This type of volcanism falls under the umbrella of `` Plate परिकल्पना '' volcanism.
Volcanism away from plate सीमाएँ रै also been explained as mantle plumes.
ये so-called `` हॉटस्पॉट ``, for example Hawaii, are postulated to arise from upwelling diapirs with magma from the core–mantle boundary, 3,000 km deep in the Earth.
erupting volcanoes can pose many hazards, not only in the immediate vicinity of the eruption.
Volcanic ash can be a threat to aircraft, in particular those with jet इंजन where ash particles can be melted by the high operating temperature.
Large eruptions can affect temperature as ash and droplets of sulfuric acid obscure the sun and cool the Earth 's lower atmosphere or troposphere ; however, they also absorb heat radiated up इससे the धरती, thereby warming the stratosphere.
Historically, so-called volcanic सर्दियों have caused catastrophic famines.
A deep pothole on नई यॉर्क City 's Second Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes called a केतली and known in parts of the Western United States as a chuckhole ) is a type of disruption in the surface of a roadway where a portion of the सड़क सामग्री रै broken away, leaving a hole.
Renal कोशिका carcinoma ( RCC, भी ज्ञात as hypernephroma ) is a kidney कर्कट that originates in the lining of the proximal convoluted tubule, the very small tubes in the kidney that transport GF ( glomerular filtrate ) from the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron.
RCC is the most common type of kidney cancer in वयस्कों, responsible for लगभग 80 % of मामले.
It is also known to be the most lethal of all the genitourinary tumors.
Initial treatment is most commonly a कट्टरपंथी or partial nephrectomy और remains the mainstay of curative treatment.
Where the tumor is confined to the renal parenchyma, the 5-year अस्तित्व rate is 60-70 %, but this is lowered considerably where metastases have spread.
It is relatively resistant to radiation चिकित्सा and chemotherapy, although some cases respond to immunotherapy.
Targeted कर्कट therapies ऐसे as sunitinib, temsirolimus, bevacizumab, interferon-alpha, और sorafenib have improved the outlook लिये rcc.

the company रै its headquarters in Midtown Manhattan, नई York City.
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous membrane that forms the अस्तर of the abdominal cavity or the coelom —it कवर most of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes and कुछ invertebrates ( annelids, for instance ).
It is composed of a layer of mesothelium समर्थित by a thin layer of connective tissue.
the peritoneum both supports the abdominal organs and serves as a conduit for their blood और lymph बरतन और nerves.
The abdominal cavity ( the space bounded by the vertebrae, abdominal muscles, diaphragm और pelvic floor ) should not be confused with the intraperitoneal space ( स्तिथ within the abdominal cavity, but लपेटा in peritoneum ).
The structures भीतर the intraperitoneal space are पुकारा `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the stomach ), the structures in the abdominal cavity that हैं स्तिथ पीछे the intraperitoneal space are called `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g. the गुर्दे ), और those structures below the intraperitoneal space are called `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the bladder ).
Modern 2.5 '' SSD used in consumer laptops और desktop कंप्यूटर.
ddr sdram आधारित SSD.
अधिकतम and.
पीसीआई attached IO Accelerator SSD
PCI-E, DRAM, and NAND based ssd.
It uses an external power supply to make the DRAM non-volatile.
A solid-state drive ( SSD ) ( भी known as a solid-state disk or electronic disk, हालांकि it contains no actual `` disk '' of any kind ) is a data भंडार device using integrated सर्किट assemblies as मेमोरी to स्टोर आंकड़ा persistently.
ssd प्रौद्योगिकी uses electronic interfaces compatible with traditional block input/output ( I/O ) hard disk drives.
SSDs have no moving mechanical components, which distinguish them from परंपरागत electromechanical चुम्बकीय disks ऐसे as hard disk drives ( hdds ) or फ्लॉपी disks, which contain spinning disks and movable read/write heads.
Compared साथ electromechanical डिस्क, SSDs are typically कम susceptible to physical shock, much quieter, have lower access time, and कम latency.
However, while the price of SSDs has continued to decline in 2012, ssds are still about 7 to 8 times more expensive per unit of storage than HDDs.
Many SSDs use I/O अंतरफलक developed for hard disk drives, thus permitting सरल replacement in आम applications.
, most SSDs उपयोग NAND-based flash memory, which retains data without power.
For applications requiring fast access, but not necessarily आंकड़ा persistence after शक्ति loss, SSDs may be constructed from random-access मेमोरी ( RAM ).
Such devices may employ separate शक्ति sources, such as batteries, to maintain data बाद power loss.
Hybrid ड्राइव or solid state संकर drives ( sshd ) combine the सुविधाएँ of SSDs and HDDs in the same unit, containing a large hard disk drive and an SSD cache to improve प्रदर्शन of frequently accessed data.
These devices may प्रस्ताव near-SSD performance for many अनुप्रयोग.
