caviar, according to the Food and Agriculture Organization, is a product बना from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family.
The roe can be `` fresh '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized, with pasteurization reducing its culinary and economic value.
Traditionally the पद caviar refers only to roe इससे जंगली sturgeon in the कैस्पियन and Black Seas ( Beluga, Ossetra and sevruga caviars ).
Depending on the country, caviar may also be used to describe the roe of other मछली such as salmon, steelhead, trout, lumpfish, whitefish, और अन्य प्रजाति of sturgeon.
Caviar is माना a luxury कोमलता और is eaten as a गार्निश or a spread.
In 2012, caviar बेची for $ 2,500 per pound, or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 प्रति kilo.
the SEC Network is a टेलीविज़न syndication network featuring सजीव broadcasts of कॉलेज football and basketball events from the southeastern Conference.
it is owned और operated by ईएसपीएन Plus and is दिखाया in more than 50 percent of households in the United States, mostly Southeastern संयुक्त States markets.
The SEC Network typically airs in the noon eastern slot कि थी former home to the Raycom खेल SEC game of the week.
खेल are shown locally on broadcast stations, regional खेल networks, as well as on ESPN GamePlan, ESPN Full Court, and ESPN3.com.
the सेक Network is भी available in Canada via अटलांटा 's wpch-tv.
The सेक Network uses the same on-screen graphics currently used by ESPN on ABC, a संस्करण of ESPN 's graphics package.
SEC Network 's football programming still uses a title safe area because most of its affiliates do नहीं Letterbox their Standard Definition फ़ीड्स, while ESPN 's television networks have अनुमत their graphics to abandon the title सुरक्षित, but letterbox for SD viewers.
Starting with the SEC 2012 Basketball season, SEC Network 's graphics have been converted to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format.
This is also होने प्रयुक्त लिये the 2013 Basketball season, लकिन had still adapted the पूर्व 4:3-safe graphics format for the 2012 SEC football season.
The 1990s, pronounced और also ज्ञात as `` the Nineteen-Nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the Nineties '' or `` the '90s '', was a decade that began on January 1, 1990, and ended on December 31, 1999.
It was the 10th और last decade of the 20th century and the 100th and last decade of the 2nd millennium.
the decade is best ज्ञात for the समाप्त of the Cold War at the beginning of the decade and the expansion and commercialization of the Internet during the second half of the decade.
in much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a period of unprecedented peace and prosperity, हालांकि many भाग of the so-called Third World faced विभिन्न problems including genocide, AIDS and new or continuing जातीय tensions and civil युद्धों.
Culturally speaking the decade was characterized by the rise of multiculturalism and alternative media.
Movements ऐसे as grunge, the rave scene और hip hop spread around the संसार to young people during the decade, aided by then-new technology such as cable television and the Internet.
A संयोजन of factors, including the mass mobilization of capital markets through neoliberalism, the beginning of the widespread proliferation of new मीडिया ऐसे as the Internet, and the dissolution of the Soviet Union led to a realignment and reconsolidation of आर्थिक and राजनैतिक शक्ति across the world, and within countries.
Income inequality among countries in the world रोज़ sharply between the 1980s and the mid-1990s, पहले levelling off and तब falling after 2000.
New जातीय विरोध emerged in Africa, the Balkans and the Caucasus, the पूर्व दो which led to the Rwandan नरसंहार और Bosnian genocide, respectively.
The United States began its current military occupation of the Middle ईस्ट during the summer of 1990 with मरुस्थल शील्ड after it काटें off a large portion of the world 's पेट्रोलियम supply.
Signs of कोई resolution of tensions between Israel and the Arab world remained elusive, though the Irish Troubles came to a standstill in 1998 with the Good शुक्रवार अनुबंध बाद 30 सालो of हिंसा.
The धूसर wolf or grey wolf ( Canis lupus ) is a species of canid native to the wilderness and remote क्षेत्रों of North America, यूरेशिया, and North Africa.
It is the largest सदस्य of its family, साथ males averaging, and females.
It is similar in general appearance और proportions to a German shepherd, or sled dog, but has a larger head, narrower chest, longer legs, straighter tail and bigger paws.
इसके winter fur is long and bushy, and predominantly a mottled धूसर in colour, although nearly pure श्वेत, red, or brown to ब्लैक also occur.
Within the genus Canis, the धूसर wolf represents a more specialised and progressive form than its smaller cousins ( the coyote and golden jackal ), as demonstrated by its morphological adaptations to hunting विशाल शिकार, its more मिलनसार nature और its highly advanced expressive behavior.
It is a social animal, travelling in nuclear families consisting of a mated pair, accompanied by the pair 's adult offspring.
The धूसर wolf is typically an apex परभक्षी throughout इसके range, with only humans and tigers posing a serious threat to it.
It फ़ीड्स primarily on large ungulates, though it also eats smaller animals, livestock, carrion, और garbage.
The gray wolf is one of the world 's most खूब researched animals, with probably more books written about it than any other wildlife प्रजाति.
It has a long history of association with इंसानो, having been despised and hunted in most agricultural communities due to its attacks on livestock, while conversely being respected by some Native American tribes.
it is the sole ancestor of the श्वान, which was first domesticated in the मध्य East.
Although the fear of wolves is prevalent in many इंसान societies, the बहुमत of recorded attacks on people have महरूम attributed to animals suffering from rabies.
non-rabid wolves have attacked and मारे people, mainly children, लकिन इस is असामान्य, as wolves are relatively few, सजीव away from people, and have been taught to fear humans by hunters and shepherds.
Hunting and trapping has घटाया the species ' range to, though its still relatively widespread range and stable population means that the species is not threatened at a global level, and is therefore वर्गीकृत by the IUCN as तनिक Concern.
the Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization, characterised by an निरंकुश form of government and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman Republic, which preceded it, had been destabilized through a series of civil युद्धों.
Several events marked the transition इससे Republic to Empire, including Julius सीज़र 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the रोमन Senate ( 27 bc ).
The first two सदियां of the साम्राज्य were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` रोमन Peace '' ).
It पहुँचे its महानतम expanse during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its अस्तित्व, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th century, during which time a system of डुअल rule थी developed in the लैटिन West और Greek East.
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century, the eastern हाफ continued as what would later be known as the बीज़ान्टिन साम्राज्य.
Because of the Empire 's विशाल extent and long endurance, the institutions and culture of रोम had a profound and lasting influence on the development of भाषा, religion, architecture, दर्शनशास्त्र, law, and forms of सरकारी in the territory it governed, particularly यूरोपीय, and by अर्थात् of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Education in the संयुक्त States is mainly provided by the public sector, with कंट्रोल और funding coming from three levels : local, state, and federal, in कि order.
Child शिक्षा is अनिवार्य, and there are also a large number and wide किस्में of उच्चतर शिक्षा institutions throughout the country that one can choose to attend, both सरेआम and privately administered.
Public शिक्षा is universally available.
School curricula, funding, teaching, employment, and अन्य नीतियों are set through locally elected school boards साथ jurisdiction over school districts with many directives from state विधानमंडलों.
School districts are usually separate इससे other लोकल jurisdictions, with independent officials and budgets.
Educational standards and मानकीकृत testing decisions are usually बना by राज्य governments.
The आयु for अनिवार्य education vary by state.
It begins from ages five to eight और ends from आयु fourteen to eighteen.
Compulsory education requirements can generally be satisfied by educating children in public schools, state-certified private schools, or an approved home स्कूल program.
In most पब्लिक and private schools, education is divided into three levels : elementary स्कूल, middle school ( sometimes पुकारा junior high school ), and high school ( sometimes referred to as secondary शिक्षा ).
In almost all schools at these स्तर, children हैं divided by आयु समूह into ग्रेड, ranging from kindergarten ( followed by first grade ) for the youngest children in elementary school, up to twelfth grade, the final year of high school.
The exact age दायरा of विद्यार्थी in these grade स्तर varies slightly from क्षेत्रफल to area.
post-secondary education, better known as `` college `` in the United States, is generally governed separately from the elementary and high school system, and is वर्णित in a पृथक section below.
Government supported, free public schools for all started being established after the revolution, and expanded in the 19th century, as the results of efforts of men like Horace Mann and Booker T. Washington.
By 1870, all states था free elementary schools, albeit तभी in urban centers.
As the 20th century drew nearer, states प्रारंभ गुजर laws to make schooling अनिवार्य, and by 1910, 72 percent of children attended school.
Private schools जारी to स्प्रेड during this time, as well as colleges and—in the rural centers— जमीन ग्रान्ट colleges.
The year of 1910 also देखी the पहला true high schools.
During the बाकी of the 20th century, educational प्रयत्न centered on reducing the inequality of the schooling system.
The landmark Supreme Court मामला Brown v. फलक of Education made the desegregation of elementary and high schools a national priority, while the pell Grant program helped ग़रीब minorities gain अभिगम to कॉलेज.
Special शिक्षा was बना into federal law in 1975.
The Elementary and Secondary Education अधिनियम of 1965 made standardized testing a requirement, and in 1983, a commission was established to evaluate their results and propose a कोर्स of action.
The resulting No Child बाएँ Behind Act of 2001 was controversial and its goals proved to be unrealistic.
A commission स्थापित in 2006 evaluated higher education, लकिन इसके recommendations have yet to be fully implemented.
पॉल ब्रैग ( February 6, 1895 – December 7, 1976 ), nutritionist, was a pioneer in America’s wellness movement.
स्वास्थ्य spending per capita, in $ US ppp-adjusted, with the US and Canada compared amongst अन्य first संसार nations.
Comparison of the health परवाह systems in कनाडा and the United States are often made by government, public health and public नीति विश्लेषकों.
The दो देशों had similar health care systems before Canada reformed its system in the 1960s and 1970s.
the United राज्य spends much more धन on health परवाह than कनाडा, on both a per-capita basis and as a percentage of GDP.
In 2006, per-capita spending for health care in Canada was US $ 3,678 ; in the U.S., US $ 6,714.
The U.S. spent 15.3 % of GDP on health care in that year ; Canada spent 10.0 %.
In 2006, 70 % of health care spending in Canada was financed by government, versus 46 % in the United States.
Total government spending प्रति capita in the U.S. on health परवाह was 23 % higher than Canadian government spending, and U.S. government expenditure on health care थी just under 83 % of total Canadian spending ( पब्लिक and private ) though ये आंकडे do n't take into account population differences.
अध्ययन have come to different conclusions परिचय the result of this disparity in spending.
A 2007 पुनर्विलोकन of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada और the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed चिकित्सा जर्नल found that `` health outcomes may be superior in patients cared for in Canada versus the United States, but मतभेद are not सतत. ''
Life expectancy is longer in कनाडा, और its शिशु mortality rate is lower than कि of the U.S., but there is debate about the underlying causes of these differences.
One commonly cited comparison, the 2000 World Health Organization 's ratings of `` overall स्वास्थ्य सेवा performance '', which used a `` कम्पोजिट measure of achievement in the level of स्वास्थ्य, the distribution of health, the level of responsiveness and fairness of financial योगदान '', क्रमित Canada 30th and the US 37th among 191 member nations.
This study rated the US `` responsiveness '', or quality of service लिये individuals receiving उपचार, as 1st, compared with 7th for Canada.
While the average life expectancy लिये Canadians थी 80.34 सालो compared with 78.6 years for residents of the us, simply comparing the life expectancy of two समूह साथ different racial मेकअप and different obesity rates is संभावित not an प्रभावी way of determining which healthcare प्रणाली is श्रेष्ठ.
The जो 's study विधि were criticized by some analyses.
Although there is a measure of consensus that life-expectancy और शिशु mortality mark the most reliable ways to compare nation-wide health care, assuming the population makeup is similar, a recent report by the Congressional Research Service carefully summarizes some recent आंकड़ा and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons.
The sound source has now broken through the sound speed barrier, और is traveling at 1.4 times the speed of ध्वनि, ( Mach 1.4 ).
Since the source is moving faster ( with a speed ) than the sound waves it creates, it दरअसल leads the advancing wavefront.
The sound source will pass by a stationary observer ( with a speed ) before the observer actually hears the sound it creates.
As a result, an observer in सामने of the source होगा detect
and an observer behind the सोर्स.
A sonic बूम produced by an aircraft moving at M=2.92, calculated from the कोन कोण of 20 डिग्री.
An observer hears the boom जब the shock wave, on the edges of the cone, crosses his or her स्थान.
Mach cone angle
A sonic boom is the sound associated with the शॉक लहरें created by an object traveling through the air faster than the speed of sound.
Sonic booms generate enormous amounts of sound energy, sounding much like an explosion.
The crack of a supersonic गोली passing ओवरहेड is an example of a sonic boom in miniature.
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an अमरीकी late-night talk show hosted by Jay Leno कि initially aired इससे May 25, 1992 to May 29, 2009, and resumed production on March 1, 2010.
The fourth incarnation of the Tonight Show franchise made इसके debut on may 25, 1992, तीन days following जॉनी Carson 's retirement as host of the program.
The program originates from NBC Studios in burbank, California, and is broadcast Monday through Friday at 11:35 PM in the Eastern और Pacific time zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ).
Unlike Carson or उसके पूर्ववर्ती Jack Paar, लीनो only once utilized a guest host, preferring to host the series by खुद.
On अप्रैल 26, 1999, the दिखाएँ began broadcasting in 1080i HDTV, becoming the first American nightly talk show to be shot in high definition.
The show is shot in 16:9 aspect अनुपात.
the series, which followed the same मौलिक स्वरूप as कि of his predecessors ( an opening monologue followed by comedy routines, interviews and performances ), ran until May 29, 2009, बाद which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien.
NBC signed Leno to a नई deal लिये a nightly talk show in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot.
The primetime series, titled the Jay Leno Show, debuted on September 14, 2009, following a similar format to the Leno अवतार of Tonight.
neither O'Brien 's संस्करण of the program, जिससे premiered June 1, 2009, nor The Jay Leno Show उत्पन्न the ratings that NBC था expected.
the network decided to move a condensed 30-minute version of Leno 's show to O'Brien 's time slot, and O'Brien 's tonight Show a half-hour later.
This decision मिले साथ opposition इससे O'Brien, whose stint on The Tonight Show ended January 22, 2010, after which he began his own talk show on TBS.
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno तब began its second and current अवतार, the छठे of the franchise, on March 1, 2010.
RFID chip next to a grain of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil कि modulates an external चुम्बकीय field to ट्रांसफ़र a coded identification क्रमांक when queried by a रीडर device.
This small type is incorporated in consumer उत्पाद, and implanted in पालतु, for identification उद्देश्य.
radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा, for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects.
The tags contain electronically stored सूचना.
कुछ टैग are powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via चुम्बकीय fields ( electromagnetic induction ).
Others उपयोग a local power source such as a बैटरी, or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM field, and तब act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ).
Battery संचालित tags may operate at सैंकड़ों of meters.
नापसंद a bar code, the टैग does not necessarily need to be within line of sight of the reader, और may be embedded in the tracked object.
RFID tags are used in many industries.
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during production can be प्रयुक्त to track its progress through the assembly लकीर.
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses.
पशुधन और pets may have टैग injected, allowing positive identification of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or even implanted within people, the possibility of reading personally-linked information without consent has उठाया privacy concerns.
Id, ego and super-ego are the three parts of the psychic apparatus defined in Sigmund फ्रायड 's structural model of the psyche ; they are the three theoretical constructs in terms of जिनकी activity and interaction दिमागी life is described.
According to this मॉडल of the psyche, the id is the नियत of uncoordinated instinctual रुझान ; the super-ego plays the critical and moralizing भूमिका ; and the अहंकार is the organized, realistic part that mediates between the desires of the id और the super-ego.
The super-ego can stop you इससे doing certain things कि your id may want you to do.
Even though the model is structural and makes reference to an apparatus, the id, ego और super-ego हैं functions of the दिमाग rather than parts of the brain and do not correspond one-to-one साथ actual somatic structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience.
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the विकास of Freud 's विचार : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` आर्थिक मॉडल '' और `` topographical model '' ) was first discussed in his 1920 essay `` Beyond the Pleasure Principle `` और थी formalized and elaborated upon three सालो later in his `` The Ego and the Id ``.
Freud 's proposal was influenced by the ambiguity of the term `` unconscious `` and its अनेक conflicting उपयोग.
Air फ़ोर्स ROTC emblem
the Air Force Reserve Officer Training Corps ( AFROTC ) is one of the three primary commissioning sources for officers in the United States Air Force, the अन्य two being the United States Air फ़ोर्स Academy ( USAFA ) and Air Force अधिकारी Training School ( OTS ).
A subordinate command of the Air University within the एयर Education and Training कमांड ( aetc ), AFROTC is aligned under the Jeanne M. Holm Center for Officer accessions and Citizen Development at Maxwell AFB, अलबामा.
The Holm Center, formerly known as the Air Force Officer Accession and Training Schools ( AFOATS ), retains direct responsibility for both AFROTC and OTS.
AFROTC is the largest और oldest सोर्स of commissioned officers for the U.S. एयर Force.
AFROTC 's stated mission is to produce quality leaders for the U.S. Air फ़ोर्स.
AFROTC इकाई are located on 144 कॉलेज और university campuses with 984 अतिरिक्त institutions of higher learning participating in cross-town agreements that allow their students to attend AFROTC classes at a nearby `` host '' कॉलेज or university.
According to AFOATS HQ, in 2006, AFROTC commissioned 2,083 USAF Second Lieutenants, with AFROTC नामांकन ranging from 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993, and around 13,000 enrolled today.
AFROTC units at colleges and विश्वविद्यालयों are called `` detachments, '' and हैं typically headed by an active duty USAF officer in the रैंक of colonel or लेफ्टिनेंट कर्नल जो कृत्यों as both the Detachment कमांडर for यूएसएएफ purposes and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( pas ) within the institution 's academic जातियाँ.
Most colleges and विश्वविद्यालयों will designate the AFROTC detachment as the Department of aerospace Studies.
The PAS is assisted by three to four Assistant Professors of Aerospace Studies ( APAS ), सब active duty USAF officers in the बाँधने of major or captain.
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and one senior non-commissioned officer will typically provide military administrative support and are often augmented by one to two civilian staff support employees of the अकादमिक संस्था.
Within AFROTC detachments, the students ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) are organized into wings, groups, squadrons, और flights, mirroring the USAF functional wing structure.
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into दो divisions : the General Military Course ( GMC ) consisting of the first two years of training, and the Professional Officer Course ( POC ) consisting of the last two years of प्रशिक्षण.
The AFROTC program is also divided into दो training functions : the Academic Classroom Program ( Aerospace Studies classes ) और cadet Activities ( i.e., Leadership Laboratory, शारीरिक Training, and other training ).
Paper घनत्व ( also known as basis weight and grammage ) is a term used in the pulp and paper उद्योग और भी for कपड़ा उद्योग to denote a माप of mass of the उत्पाद प्रति unit of area लिये a type of fabric, paper or paperboard.
The term `` density '' is not used in its traditional sense of mass per unit आवाज़.
`` Paper density '', rather, is a measure of the area density.
Paper products that let little or no light pass through ( e.g. पोस्टर board ) are considered घना or heavy.
Paper products that allow कुछ light to pass through ( e.g. tissue paper ) are माना lightweight.
in the pulp और पेपर industry, it is common to set a commercial paper machine to उपज paper to a target paper density.
Paper density can also be used to distinguish paper from paperboard as the latter usually has a grammage greater than 134 g/m2.
Two ways of expressing paper density are commonly used:
expressed in grams per वर्गाकार meter ( g/m2 ), paper density is also known as grammage.
This is the measure used in most भाग of the world.
Expressed in terms of the mass ( expressed as weight ) per number of चादरें, it is ज्ञात as basis वज़न.
The convention प्रयुक्त in the United States and a few other देशों using US पेपर sizes is pounds of a ream of 500 ( or in some cases 1000 ) sheets of a given ( raw, still uncut ) basis size.
जापानी paper is expressed as the weight in kg of 1000 sheets.
Candace Nicole Parker ( born April 19, 1986 ) is an American basketball खिलाड़ी for the WNBA 's Los Angeles Sparks और UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia.
She is the younger sister of NBA player एंथोनी Parker.
वो attended the University of Tennessee and was drafted by the Sparks in 2008.
She may be best known for being the पहला woman to dunk in an NCAA tournament game और the first स्त्री to dunk twice in a college game—she set both milestones as a redshirt freshman on March 19, 2006.
She भी became only the दूसरी player to dunk in a wnba खेल on June 22, 2008.
A बहुमुखी player, she is मुख्यतः a आगे, but was listed on Tennessee 's रोस्टर as a forward, center, and guard.
She was a starter on the Lady Vols basketball team, winners of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships.
Parker won the 2009 Nickelodeon बच्चे ' Choice award as the favorite female athlete in the sports श्रेणी.
And she was a guest star on Figure It Out.
A food मार्गदर्शिका पिरामिड is a पिरामिड तराशा guide of healthy foods divided into sections to show the recommended intake for each food group.
The first food pyramid was published in स्वीडन in 1974.
The most widely ज्ञात food pyramid was introduced by the United States Department of कृषि in the year 1992, was updated in 2005, and then replaced in 2011.
over 25 अन्य countries and organisations have also published food पिरामिडों.
hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred to in Scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ; अप्रैल 2, 1805august 4, 1875 ) was a Danish लेखक और poet.
Although a prolific writer of plays, travelogues, novels, and poems, Andersen is best remembered लिये his fairy tales, a साहित्यिक विधा he so mastered that he खुद रै become as mythical as the किस्से he wrote.
andersen 's popularity is not limited to children ; his stories—called, or `` fantastic tales '' —express विषयवस्तु that transcend age and nationality.
During his आजीवन he थी acclaimed for having प्रसन्न children worldwide और was feted by royalty.
andersen 's fairy tales, which have been translated into अधिक than 125 भाषाएं, have become culturally embedded in the वेस्ट 's सामूहिक consciousness, readily accessible to children, but पेश lessons of virtue and resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as well.
They have inspired गति pictures, plays, नाटिकाओं, and एनिमेटेड films.
Two figures locking eyes in Caravaggio 's The सौभाग्य Teller
Eye contact occurs when `` two लोगों look at प्रत्येक other 's eyes at the same time. ''
in human beings, eye सम्पर्क is a form of nonverbal communication and is thought to have a large influence on social behavior.
Coined in the जल्दी to mid-1960s, the पद has आइये in the West to often define the अधिनियम as a meaningful and important sign of confidence and social communication.
the customs and significance of eye contact vary widely between cultures, with religious and सोशल differences often altering its meaning greatly.
The study of eye सम्पर्क is sometimes known as oculesics.
Bed bugs हैं parasitic insects of the cimicid family that feed exclusively on blood.
The term सबसे commonly refers to सदस्यों of the genus Cimex of which Cimex lectularius, the common bed bug, is the best known as it prefers to feed on human blood although other cimex species are specialized to other animals, e.g., चमगादड़ bugs, C. pipistrelli ( Europe ), C. pilosellus ( western us ), and C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ).
The नाम of the `` bed bug '' is derived from the preferred आवास of Cimex lectularius : warm houses and विशेषकर आसपास or अंदर of beds and bedding or other sleep areas.
bed bugs are mainly active at night, but हैं not exclusively nocturnal.
वे usually feed on their hosts without होने noticed.
A number of adverse health effects may result इससे bed bug bites, including skin rashes, psychological effects, and allergic symptoms.
Diagnosis involves both finding bed bugs and the occurrence of संगत symptoms.
Bed bugs have been ज्ञात as human parasites for thousands of सालो.
At a point in the early 1940s, they were mostly eradicated in the विकसित world, लकिन have increased in prevalence since 1995.
Because infestation of इंसान habitats has been on the increase, bed bug bites और related शर्तें have been on the rise as well.
The किताब of Isaiah ( ) is the first of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible, preceding Ezekiel, Jeremiah और the Book of the Twelve.
( the order of the subsequent books differs somewhat in the Christian Old वसीयत ).
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom for a गुनाहगार Judah and for all the nations of the world that oppose God, while the last 27 prophesy the restoration of the nation of Israel and a नई creation in God 's glorious future kingdom ; this section शामिल the Songs of the कष्ट Servant, four separate passages referring to the nation of Israel, interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ.
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to Isaiah बेटे of Amoz, but now scholars widely agree कि the book is the कार्य of तीन different लेखक - few scholars इनकार this view, and those that do, do so लिये theological reasons.
the first, termed Proto-Isaiah ( अध्याय 1–39 ), contains the words of the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century BCE expansions ; the दूसरी, Deutero-Isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ), is the work of a 6th-century BCE author writing near the end of the babylonian captivity ; and the third, the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ), थी composed in Jerusalem shortly after the return from निर्वासन, probably by अनेक authors.
Oregon State University ( OSU ) is a coeducational, public research विश्वविद्यालयों located in Corvallis, Oregon, United States.
The विश्वविद्यालयों offers undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees and a multitude of research opportunities.
There हैं more than 200 academic degree कार्यक्रम offered through the university.
OSU 's programs in microbiology, nuclear engineering, ecology, forestry, पब्लिक health, biochemistry, zoology, oceanography, खाना science and pharmacy are recognized nationally as top tier कार्यक्रम.
The osu 's liberal arts programs have also grown significantly and the department is considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution.
More than 200,000 people have attended OSU चूंकि its founding.
the Carnegie Foundation classifies Oregon State University as part of its top tier of research institutions.
As of 2008, OSU is one of only seventy-three land-grant universities.
The school is also recognized as a sea-grant, space-grant and sun-grant institution, making it one of only two US institutions to retain all four designations and the only public university to do so ( कॉर्नेल is the तभी other with similar designations ).
As one of the दो flagship universities of the ऑरेगॉन University System, osu receives more funding for research, annually, than all अन्य पब्लिक higher education institutions in Oregon combined.
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is भी known colloquially as gushing or squirting, हालांकि ये are माना to be different phenomena in some research publications.
The exact सोर्स and nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among medical professionals, which is also सम्बन्धित to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot.
The Kanab ambersnail, scientific name Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or oxyloma kanabense, is a critically endangered subspecies or species of small, air-breathing जमीन snail, a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the परिवार Succineidae, the amber snails.
the common name of the amber snails is based on the शेल, which is translucent और when empty usually resembles amber in color.
This प्रजाति is endemic to the United States, specifically the state of Arizona और यूटा, जहाँ it was पहला collected in the early 20th century.
It has महरूम listed as endangered on the United States Fish and Wildlife Service list of endangered species since 8 August 1991.
इस snail lives in wetlands, springs, and seeps, and only two of इसके natural habitats are known to exist : Three Lakes, a meadow near Kanab, यूटा, and Vasey 's स्वर्ग, a spring along the Colorado River भीतर Grand Canyon National पार्क.
In its natural habitat it is बल्कि polyphagous, feeding mainly on bacteria, plants और fungi, and reproduces during the summer.
Now माना a Critically Endangered species on the IUCN रेड List of Threatened Species due to a series of factors ( including influence ), the Kanab ambersnail has been reintroduced to three springs above the ऐतिहासिक ऊँची water level along the Colorado River.
The Spanish language is the second most used language in the United States.
There are more स्पेनी अध्यक्षों in the United States than there हैं speakers of चाइनीज, French, German, इतालवी, Hawaiian, और the Native American languages combined.
According to the 2010 American Community Survey conducted by the U.S. Census Bureau, Spanish is the primary language बोला at home by almost 37 million people aged five or पुरानी, a figure more than double that of 1990.
There are 45 million Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or दूसरी language, as well as six लाख Spanish language students, composing the largest national Spanish-speaking जातियाँ outside of Mexico and बनाना Spanish the Romance language and the Indo-European language with largest number of native speakers in the world.
Roughly half of सब U.S. स्पेनी speakers also speak English `` very खूब, '' based on the self-assessment Census question respondents.
the language came to the देश since the 16th and 17th centuries with the आगमन of Spanish colonists in क्षेत्रों that would later become the states of Florida, टेक्सास, Colorado, New Mexico, एरिज़ोना, नेवाडा, Utah, and कैलिफ़ोर्निया and of the स्पेनी explorers - who explored क्षेत्रों of 42 states-.
Also वेस्ट of Louisiana Territory was Spanish between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the French recovery of territory ), बाद the French और Indian युद्ध.
After of the incorporation of ये states to the U.S. in पहला half of 19th century, the Spanish language was later reinforced by the acquisition of Puerto Rico in 1898 and by later waves of the Hispanic emigration, basically from Hispanic America, to the United राज्य beginning in the दूसरी हाफ of 19th century जबतक आज.

The Tokyo Mew Mew manga and दुश्मनी series features a cast of characters designed by Mia Ikumi.
The series takes प्लेस in Tokyo, जापानी, where five adolescent girls, पुकारा mew Mews, are infused with the DNA of endangered species to combat aliens attempting to take over the धरती.
The manga series is followed by a छोटी sequel series, Tokyo Mew Mew a la Mode, which introduces a new mew Mew and a new threat.
The Mew mews are led by the प्रमुख character, Ichigo Momomiya, whose first task is to एकत्रित the other four Mew Mews : Mint Aizawa, Lettuce Midorikawa, Pudding फोंग, and zakuro Fujiwara.
As the series progresses, Ichigo goes from having a crush on Masaya aoyama to becoming उसके girlfriend जबकि trying to hide her secret double life from उसे.
The series antagonists शामिल तीन aliens, Kish, Pie, and Tart, and their नेता, Deep ब्लू.
Originally from Earth, the aliens were forced to leave long ago due to deadly environmental changes.
They have returned to kill the humans, जो वे feel are destroying their ग्रह, and reclaim the planet.
In a la Mode, middle school छात्र बेरी Shirayuki is introduced as the sixth Mew mew and, in the अनुपस्थिति of ichigo, the temporary leader of the Mew Mews.
A la विधि भी introduces new set of antagonists, the Saint Rose Crusaders, a group of human teenagers with various psychic abilities with a desire to create their own utopia.
Led by ड्यूक, they make several attempts to kill Berry, eventually turning the local populace against the mew Mews.
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo mew mew was a स्टोरी called Tokyo Black बिल्ली Girl कि featured a cat-girl battling एलियन invaders.
After the story was transitioned to a अधिक upbeat स्टोरी of पाँच female superheroes, the character designs were redone to have a lighter, more colorful feel.
The प्रमुख श्रेणी characters were praised for being a perfect fit for the overall story, as well as for their cute appearances.
The वर्ण introduced in a la Mode were also praised लिये their विज़ुअल दिखावे, but criticized as being दोहराव of the original श्रेणी.
The character Duke was also criticized लिये having a design reminiscent of the white सर्वोच्चता group, the ku Klux Klan.

Sedimentary rocks are types of चट्टान that are formed by the deposition of सामग्री at the Earth 's सतह and within bodies of water.
Sedimentation is the collective name for प्रक्रियाओं that cause mineral and/or सशुल्क particles ( detritus ) to settle and accumulate or minerals to precipitate इससे a solution.
अणु that form a sedimentary rock by accumulating हैं called sediment.
Before being deposited, sediment was formed by weathering और erosion in a सोर्स area, and then transported to the place of deposition by water, हवा, ice, mass movement or glaciers which are पुकारा agents of denudation.
The sedimentary rock cover of the महाद्वीपों of the Earth 's क्रस्ट is extensive, but the कुल contribution of sedimentary rocks is estimated to be only 8 % of the total volume of the crust.
Sedimentary rocks are only a thin veneer over a crust consisting mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks.
Sedimentary रॉक्स are deposited in परतों as strata, forming a structure पुकारा bedding.
The पढ़ाई of sedimentary rocks and rock strata provides information about the subsurface that is useful for civil engineering, for उदाहरण in the construction of roads, houses, tunnels, canals or other constructions.
Sedimentary रॉक्स are भी important sources of natural resources like coal, चट्टान fuels, पीने water or ores.
The study of the sequence of sedimentary rock strata is the main source for scientific ज्ञान about the Earth 's history, including palaeogeography, paleoclimatology and the history of life.
the scientific discipline कि studies the properties and origin of sedimentary रॉक्स is called sedimentology.
Sedimentology is both भाग of भूविज्ञान और physical geography and overlaps partly with other disciplines in the Earth sciences, ऐसे as pedology, geomorphology, geochemistry or structural geology.

Humans are born with over 270 bones, some of which fuse साथ into a longitudinal axis, the axial skeleton, to which the appendicular skeleton is attached.
Saint पैट्रिक ( ; ; Modern ; ; c. 387 – 17 March c. 460 or c. 492 ) थी a romano-british Christian missionary and bishop in Ireland.
Known as the `` apostle of Ireland '', he is the primary patron संत of the island साथ with Saints Brigid and columba.
दो authentic letters from him survive, इससे which आइये the only generally accepted details of his life.
When he थी about 16, he was captured इससे उसके घर और लिया as a slave to आयरलैंड, जहाँ he lived for छह years before escaping and returning to his family.
After becoming a cleric, he returned to northern and पश्चिमी Ireland as an ordained बिशप, but little is ज्ञात about the स्थान where he worked.
By the seventh century, he had already come to be revered as the patron saint of आयरलैंड.
Most उपलब्धियाँ details of his जीवन are from subsequent hagiographies, and ये are अभी not accepted without detailed criticism.
The Annals of Ulster state that he arrived in Ireland in 432, ministered in Ulster around 443, and died in 457 or 461.
The टेक्स्ट, however, distinguishes between `` Old Patrick '' ( thought to mean palladius ) and `` Patrick, archapostle of the Scots, '' जो died in 492.
The actual dates of Patrick 's life can not be fixed with certainty but, on a widespread interpretation, he was active as a missionary in आयरलैंड during the second हाफ of the 5th सदी.
He is generally credited with being the पहला bishop of Armagh, Primate of सब Ireland.
संत Patrick 's Day is observed on March 17, the date of उसके मौत.
it is celebrated both inside and outside आयरलैंड, as both a religious and, especially बाहर Ireland, धर्मनिरपेक्ष holiday.
In the dioceses of Ireland, it is both a solemnity and a पावन day of obligation ; outside Ireland, it can be a celebration of Ireland itself.
लकीर segments in the golden ratio
A golden rectangle साथ longer side a and shorter side b, when placed adjacent to a वर्गाकार with sides of length a, will produce a similar सुनहरी rectangle with longer side a + b और shorter side a.
इस illustrates the relationship.
In mathematics और the arts, two quantities are in the golden ratio if the ratio of the sum of the quantities to the larger quantity is equal to the ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller one.
The figure on the right illustrates the geometric संबंध.
Expressed algebraically:
जहाँ the Greek letter phi ( ) represents the golden ratio.
Its value is:
The सुनहरी ratio is also called the सुनहरी section ( Latin : sectio ओरिया ) or golden mean.
Other names शामिल extreme and mean ratio, medial section, divine proportion, divine खण्ड ( Latin : sectio divina ), golden proportion, golden cut, and golden number.
Many 20th century artists और architects have proportioned their works to approximate the golden ratio—especially in the form of the golden आयताकार, in which the अनुपात of the longer side to the shorter is the golden ratio—believing this proportion to be aesthetically pleasing ( see Applications and observations below ).
mathematicians since Euclid have studied the गुण of the golden ratio, सहित its appearance in the dimensions of a नियमित pentagon and in a golden आयताकार, which can be cut into a square and a छोटी rectangle with the वही aspect ratio.
The golden ratio has also been used to analyze the proportions of natural objects as खूब as man-made systems such as financial बाज़ार, in some cases based on dubious fits to data.
North Myrtle Beach is a coastal resort city in Horry County, South कैरोलिना, संयुक्त States.
It थी created in 1968 from चार existing municipalities north of Myrtle Beach, and serves as one of the primary tourist towns along the ग्रैंड Strand.
the जनसांख्यिकी was 13,752 at the 2010 census.
World War I ( wwi ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 जुलाई 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It थी predominantly called the World War or the ग्रेट War from इसके occurrence until the start of संसार War ii in 1939, और the First World War or World युद्ध I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, जिससे were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, फ़्रांस and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of जर्मनी, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as austria–hungary had लिया the offensive against the agreement, Italy did नहीं enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
ultimately, अधिक than 70 million military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 लाख combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements कि led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world इतिहास, subsequently paving the way लिये various राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the पुनरुत्थान of imperialism in the विदेशी policies of the great powers of यूरोपीय.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of ऑस्ट्रिया, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by यूगोस्लाव nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when austria-hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
on 28 जुलाई, the austro-hungarians fired the first shots of the war as तैयारी for the invasion of Serbia.
जबकि the Russians mobilised, the germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli for ब्रिटेन 's declaration of war विरूद्ध Germany.
After the German march on Paris थी brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the पश्चिमी Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a गर्त line that changed little until 1917.
on the Eastern Front, the Russian फौज was कामयाब against the austro-hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
in नवम्बर the उस्मानी Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia और the Sinai.
Italy और Bulgaria गई to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had इसके own trouble with revolutionaries, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory for the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and आर्थिक resources to fight a total war.
by the समाप्त of the war, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the German, Russian, austro-hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former दो lost a great amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
the map of central Europe थी redrawn into several smaller states.
the League of Nations was formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war और the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are सहमत to be factors contributing to World War II.
camden is a city in Camden County, New Jersey, संयुक्त States.
it is the county seat, located across the Delaware River from फिलाडेल्फिया.
as of the 2010 United States Census the city had a total population of 77,344, representing a decline of 2,560 ( 3.2 % ) इससे the 79,904 residents enumerated during the 2000 Census, जिससे था in turn declined by 7,588 ( 8.7 % ) इससे the 87,492 counted in the 1990 Census.
camden ranked as the 12th-most populous municipality in the state in 2010 after having been ranked 10th in 2000.
Camden was originally incorporated as a city on February 13, 1828, from portions of the now-defunct Newton Township, while the area was स्टिल part of Gloucester County.
on March 13, 1844, Camden became part of the newly formed Camden काउंटी.
हालांकि once a thriving center for manufacturing and industry, Camden is perhaps best known for इसके struggles साथ urban dysfunction.
Three Camden mayors have been jailed for corruption, the most recent being Milton Milan in 2000.
Since 2005 the school प्रणाली and police department have been operated by the state of New Jersey ; the takeover expired in 2012.
In 2008, Camden था the उच्चतम crime rate in the U.S. साथ 2,333 violent crimes per 100,000 people while the national average थी 455 per 100,000.
Camden public schools spent $ 23,770 per student ( $ 19,118 on a budgetary per-pupil आधार ) in the 2009–10 school year and two-thirds of the students graduate.
Two out of प्रत्येक five residents हैं below the national गरीबी line.
Amitriptyline ( tryptomer, Elavil, Tryptizol, Laroxyl, Saroten, sarotex, Lentizol, Endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ).
it is the सबसे widely used TCA and has at least equal efficacy विरूद्ध अवसाद as the newer क्लास of ssris according to a पढ़ाई from जल्दी 2001.
as well as reducing depressive symptoms, these प्रकार of tricyclics भी ease migraines, टेंशन headaches, चिंता हमले and some schizophrenic symptoms.
It is also known to reduce aggression और violent बर्ताव.
a computer is a सामान्य purpose device that can be प्रोग्रामित to carry आउट a finite set of गणित or लॉजिकल operations.
Since a sequence of operations can be readily changed, the computer can solve more than one kind of problem.
Conventionally, a computer consists of at least one processing element, typically a सेंट्रल processing ईकाई ( CPU ) and some form of memory.
The प्रसंस्करण तत्व carries आउट arithmetic and logic operations, and a sequencing and control unit that can change the order of परिचालन based on stored information.
Peripheral devices allow सूचना to be retrieved from an external source, and the result of operations saved and retrieved.
The first electronic digital कंप्यूटर यहूद developed between 1940 and 1945 in the United Kingdom और United States.
Originally they were the size of a large room, consuming as much power as अनेक hundred modern personal computers ( PCs ).
In this era mechanical analog computers were used for military applications.
Modern कंप्यूटर based on integrated circuits are लाखो to billions of times more capable than the early मशीने, and occupy a भिन्न of the space.
Simple computers हैं small enough to fit into mobile devices, and mobile computers can be powered by small batteries.
निजी computers in their विभिन्न forms are icons of the Information Age and are what most people think of as “computers.”
However, the embedded computers found in अनेक डिवाइस from MP3 players to fighter aircraft and इससे toys to industrial robots हैं the सबसे numerous.
`` Barefoot and गर्भवती '' is a phrase most commonly संबद्ध with the controversial idea that women चाहिए नहीं work outside the home and चाहिए have many children during उनके reproductive सालो.
it has several other meanings as खूब.
It is a फिगर of speech.
The phrase `` barefoot and pregnant '' was probably first used sometime before 1950.
an article from 1949 states, `` By जल्दी 1949, TWA was—in the शब्द of its new president, Ralph S. damon—both 'barefoot and pregnant. ' ''
Its usage may date as जल्दी as the 1910s.
An article published in 1958 states the phrase was first used by a `` Dr. Hertzler '' 40 सालो earlier.
`` Some forty सालो ago, Dr. Hertzler उन्नत a hypothesis जिससे young women of today seem bent on proving correct. '
The only way to keep a woman happy, ' he said, 'is to keep her barefoot and pregnant. ' ''
oakhurst is a census-designated place और unincorporated जातियाँ within Ocean Township, in Monmouth County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2010 United States Census, the CDP 's population was 3,995.
University of Phoenix Stadium, opened August 1, 2006, is a multipurpose फ़ुटबॉल stadium located in Glendale, Arizona.
It is the home of the Arizona Cardinals of the National Football League ( NFL ) and the annual पर्व Bowl.
The stadium is located next door to the jobing.com एरिना and it features the first fully retractable natural grass playing surface built in the United राज्य on top of an AirField Systems drainage system.
An opening on one पक्ष of the stadium allows the playing फ़ील्ड to मूव to the exterior of the भवन, allowing the संपूर्ण natural turf playing surface to be exposed to daylight.
The stadium has hosted Super Bowl XLII, and the 2011 BCS National Championship Game, a game that it hosts every four years, which set the venue 's entertainment attendance record of 78,603 on January 11, 2011.
It will again host Super कटोरी XLIX in 2015.
The University of Phoenix acquired the naming rights in September 2006, shortly after the stadium had opened अंतर्गत the name कार्डिनल्स Stadium.
The `` University of Phoenix `` नाम is applied as a corporate sponsor, and नहीं as the home stadium of the विश्वविद्यालयों ( which रै no intercollegiate athletics program ).
The स्टेडियम has also hosted the WWE event WrestleMania XXVI with 72,219 fans in attendance.
The इवेंट was held in the stadium on March 28th 2010.
Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain ( September 8, 1828 – February 24, 1914 ), born as Lawrence Joshua Chamberlain, was an अमरीकी college professor from the State of maine, who volunteered during the अमरीकी Civil War to join the Union Army.
Although having no पहले education in military strategies, he became a highly respected and decorated Union officer, reaching the rank of ब्रिगेडियर general ( and brevet प्रमुख general ).
लिये उसके gallantry at Gettysburg, he was awarded the Medal of Honor.
He was given the honor of commanding the Union troops at the surrender ceremony for the infantry of Robert E. Lee 's Army at Appomattox, वर्जिनिया.
After the war, he entered politics as a Republican and served चार one-year terms of office as the 32nd Governor of Maine.
he served on the faculty, and as president, of his alma मेटर, Bowdoin College.
An inning, or पारी, is a fixed-length segment of a game in any of a variety of sports – most notably cricket और बेसबॉल during which one team attempts to score while the other team attempts to prevent the first from स्कोरिंग.
In cricket, the term innings is both singular and plural and is always spelled and pronounced with the terminal `` s ''.
In baseball and सॉफ्टबॉल, the singular form is inning and तभी the plural takes an `` s ''.
in many other sports, the length of the game is लिखवाई by a clock और teams swap offensive and रक्षात्मक roles dynamically by taking possession of a ball or similar item.
In baseball और क्रिकेट, however, एक टोली, said to be `` batting '', attempts to score `` runs '' —see run ( baseball ) और run ( क्रिकेट ) —while the other टोली, said to be `` fielding '', कोशिशें to prevent the scoring of रनों and get members of the बल्लेबाजी team out.
the teams switch places बाद the fielding team has succeeded in getting a fixed क्रमांक of players out, making a clock unnecessary.
in cricket, the term पारी is also प्रयुक्त to refer to the खेल of one particular player ( Smith had a poor innings, scoring तभी 12 ).
by extension, इस term can be used in British English for almost कोई activity जिससे takes a period of time ( The Liberal government had a good innings, but finally lost office in 1972, or You 've had a fair innings, now it 's my turn, meaning `` you have spoken for long enough, अभी let me speak '' ).
It is also प्रयुक्त in reference to someone जो has died at a reasonably old age or lived a rich and rewarding life ( Ah, well.
जॉन was 89.
At least he था a good innings ).
The baseball-derived parallel to इस in American अंग्रेज़ी is the term at bat.
according to the Oxford English Dictionary, the term पारी has महरूम used in reference to क्रिकेट since at least 1735.
As cricket was a mature, highly व्यवस्थित sport in the 1600s in England, the term 's origin could well precede इस first recorded usage.
The word inning meaning 'a gathering in ' is first अंकित in 1522, and could be related.
Adenosine deaminase deficiency, also called ADA कमियां or ADA-SCID, is an autosomal recessive metabolic disorder that causes immunodeficiency.
It occurs in fewer than one in 100,000 live births worldwide.
It खाते for परिचय 15 % of सब मामले of कठोर combined immunodeficiency ( SCID ).
It is very rare, you have a 3 % chance of getting this जीन.
एडीए कमियां may be present in infancy, childhood, adolescense, or adulthood.
Age of onset और severity is related to some 29 known genotypes associated with the disorder.
An example of शहरी poverty in this slum in Jakarta, Indonesia
Poverty is the state of एक who lacks a certain amount of material possessions or money.
Absolute गरीबी or destitution refers to the deprivation of basic इंसान needs, which commonly includes खाना, जल, स्वच्छता, कपडे, shelter, स्वास्थ्य care and education.
Relative poverty is पारिभाषित contextually as economic असमानता in the location or society in which people live.
For much of history, poverty was considered largely unavoidable as traditional modes of production were insufficient to give an entire population a comfortable standard of living.
After the industrial क्रान्ति, mass उत्पादन in factories made wealth increasingly more inexpensive and accessible.
of more importance is the modernization of agriculture, such as fertilizers, in अनुक्रम to provide enough yield to feed the population.
The supply of basic needs can be प्रतिबंधित by constraints on government services such as corruption, tax avoidance, debt and loan conditionalities and by the brain drain of health care and educational professionals.
Strategies of increasing income to मेक basic needs more affordable typically include welfare, आर्थिक freedoms, और providing financial services.
Poverty reduction is a major goal and issue for many international organizations such as the United Nations and the संसार Bank.
The World बैंको estimated 1.29 billion people were living in absolute poverty in 2008.
Of these, about 400 million people in absolute poverty lived in India and 173 लाख people in China.
In यूएसए 1 in 5 children जीवनदान in poverty.
In terms of प्रतिशत of regional populations, sub-saharan Africa at 47 % had the highest incidence rate of absolute poverty in 2008.
between 1990 and 2010, about 663 million people moved above the absolute poverty level.
Still, चरम poverty is a global चुनौती ; it is observed in all parts of the world, including the developed economies.
Mushroom poisoning ( also known as mycetism ) refers to harmful effects from ingestion of toxic substances present in a mushroom.
ये लक्षण can vary from slight gastrointestinal तकलीफ to मौत.
The toxins present are secondary metabolites produced in specific biochemical pathways in the fungal cells.
Mushroom विषाक्तता is usually the result of ingestion of wild mushrooms after misidentification of a विषाक्त mushroom as an edible species.
The most common कारण for this misidentification is close resemblance in terms of colour and general morphology of the toxic mushrooms species with edible प्रजाति.
Even very experienced wild mushroom gatherers are upon rare occasion poisoned by खाने toxic species, despite being खूब aware of the risks, through carelessness.
To prevent mushroom poisoning, mushroom gatherers need to be very familiar with the mushrooms they intend to collect as well as with कोई similar-looking विषाक्त species.
In addition, edibility of mushrooms may depend on methods of preparation for cooking.
Collectors भी need to be well जागरूक that edibility or toxicity of some species varies with geographic location.
Human height is the distance from the bottom of the फीट to the top of the head in a human body, standing erect.
जब populations share genetic background and पर्यावरणीय कारकों, average height is frequently characteristic within the group.
असाधारण ऊँचाई variation ( around 20 % deviation from average ) within such a population is sometimes due to gigantism or dwarfism, which are medical conditions caused by specific genes or endocrine abnormalities.
In regions of चरम गरीबी or prolonged warfare, environmental factors जैसे chronic malnutrition दौरान बाल्यकाल or adolescence may account for delayed growth and/or ( in severe cases ) चिह्नित reductions in adult stature even without the presence of any of these medical conditions.
Apollo 11 was the spaceflight that landed the first humans, अमेरिकी neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin, on the Moon on July 20, 1969, at 20:18 UTC.
Armstrong became the पहला to कदम onto the lunar surface 6 घंटों later on July 21 at 02:56 UTC.
Armstrong spent about दो and a half hours outside the spacecraft, Aldrin slightly less ; और together they collected of lunar सामग्री for return to Earth.
a तीसरा सदस्य of the mission, Michael Collins, piloted the command spacecraft alone in चंद्र orbit जबतक Armstrong और एल्ड्रिन returned to it just under a day later लिये the trip back to Earth.
Launched by a Saturn V rocket from Kennedy स्पेस Center in Merritt Island, Florida on July 16, Apollo 11 was the पांचवां मानवयुक्त mission of NASA 's Apollo program.
The Apollo spacecraft था three parts : a Command Module with a cabin लिये the three astronauts which was the only part which landed back on Earth ; a Service Module which supported the Command Module with propulsion, electrical शक्ति, oxygen and water ; and a Lunar Module लिये लैंडिंग on the Moon.
After being भेजा to the चंद्रमा by the शनि v 's upper stage, the astronauts separated the spacecraft from it and travelled for three days जबतक वे entered into lunar orbit.
Armstrong and Aldrin तब moved into the Lunar मोड्यूल and landed in the Sea of Tranquility.
वे stayed a total of about 21 and a half घंटों on the lunar surface.
बाद lifting बंद in the upper part of the Lunar मोड्यूल and rejoining Collins in the Command Module, they returned to Earth and landed in the प्रशांत Ocean on July 24.
Broadcast on live TV to a world-wide audience, Armstrong stepped onto the lunar surface and described the event as `` one small step for [ a ] man, one giant leap for mankind. ''
अपोलो 11 effectively ended the Space रेस and fulfilled a नेशनल goal प्रस्तावित in 1961 by the late U.S. President John F. Kennedy in a speech before the United States कॉंग्रेस, `` before this decade is आउट, of landing a man on the चंद्रमा and returning him safely to the Earth. ''
The FIFA संसार Cup, often बस the World कप, is an international association football प्रतियोगिता लडे by the senior men 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has महरूम awarded प्रत्येक चार years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War.
The current champions are Spain, who won the 2010 टूर्नामेंट.
The current format of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 टीमों competing for the title at venues within the host nation ( s ) over a period of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
a qualification phase, जिससे currently takes place over the preceding three सालो, is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
The 19 संसार Cup tournaments have been जीती by आठ different national teams.
Brazil have won five times, and they are the only team to have played in every टूर्नामेंट.
the other World कप winners are Italy, साथ four titles ; Germany, with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay, साथ two titles each ; और England, France, and Spain, with one title प्रत्येक.
The World कप is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an अनुमानित 715.1 million people देखी the final match of the 2006 FIFA संसार Cup held in Germany.
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
Genocide is a term coined in 1944 by Raphael Lemkin to describe the deliberate and systematic destruction, in whole or in part, of an ethnic, racial, religious, or national group.
It is पारिभाषित in Article 2 of the Convention on the Prevention and दंड of the Crime of Genocide ( CPPCG ) of 1948 as `` any of the following अधिनियमों committed with intent to destroy, in whole or in भाग, a national, ethnical, racial or religious group, as ऐसे : हत्या सदस्यों of the group ; causing serious bodily or mental harm to members of the समूह ; deliberately inflicting on the groups conditions of life, calculated to लाओ about its physical destruction in whole or in part ; imposing उपायों intended to prevent births within the समूह ; [ and ] forcibly transferring children of the समूह to another समूह. ''
Skulls of victims of the Rwandan Genocide
The preamble to the CPPCG not only states that `` genocide is a crime under अंतरराष्ट्रीय law, contrary to the spirit and aims of the United Nations and condemned by the civilized world '', लकिन also कि `` at all periods of history genocide has inflicted great losses on humanity ''.
Determining कया historical events constitute a genocide and which are merely criminal or inhuman behavior is not a clear-cut matter.
In nearly every case where accusations of नरसंहार have circulated, partisans of विभिन्न पहलू have fiercely disputed the interpretation and details of the event, often to the point of promoting wildly different versions of the facts.
An accusation of genocide is certainly not taken lightly और will almost always be controversial.
The following list of genocides and alleged genocides चाहिए be understood in this context and can नहीं be regarded as the फाइनल word on these subjects.
A timing बेल्ट is a non-slipping mechanical drive belt and the term may refer to either:
Toothed belt, a flexible belt with दांत moulded onto इसके inner surface
समय belt ( camshaft ), a toothed बेल्ट प्रयुक्त to ड्राइव the camshaft ( s ) within an internal combustion engine
the culture of the United States is primarily a पश्चिमी culture, लकिन is also influenced by Native American, अफ़्रीकी, Asian, Polynesian, and Latin American संस्कृतियों.
American culture started its formation over 10,000 सालो ago with the माइग्रेशन of Paleo-Indians from एशिया into the region that is today the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त States.
It has इसके own unique सोशल and cultural characteristics such as dialect, music, कला, social आदतें, cuisine, and लोकगीत.
The संयुक्त States of America is an ethnically and racially विविध country as a result of large-scale आव्रजन from अनेक different देशों throughout its history.
Its chief early European influences came from अंग्रेज़ी, Scottish, Welsh और Irish settlers of colonial America during British rule.
British culture, due to colonial ties with Britain that स्प्रेड the English language, legal प्रणाली and other cultural inheritances, था a formative influence.
अन्य महत्वपूर्ण influences came from other parts of western Europe, especially Germany, France, और इटली.
असली तत्व also play a strong role, such as the invention of Jeffersonian democracy.
Thomas Jefferson 's Notes on the State of वर्जिनिया was perhaps the पहला influential domestic cultural critique by an अमरीकी और a reactionary piece to the prevailing यूरोपीय consensus that America 's domestic originality was degenerate.
प्रचलित विचार and ideals that evolved domestically, such as national holidays, uniquely अमरीकी sports, military tradition, and नवप्रवर्तनों in the arts and entertainment दे a दमदार sense of नेशनल अभिमान among the जनसांख्यिकी as a whole.
American culture includes both रूढ़िवादी and liberal तत्व, scientific and religious competitiveness, राजनैतिक structures, risk taking और free अभिव्यक्ति, भौतिकवादी and moral elements.
Despite निश्चित सतत ideological principles ( e.g. individualism, समतावाद, and faith in freedom and democracy ), American culture has a variety of expressions due to इसके भौगोलिक scale and demographic diversity.
The flexibility of U.S. culture and its highly सांकेतिक nature lead some researchers to categorize American culture as a mythic पहचान ; others see it as American exceptionalism.
It also includes elements that evolved from Indigenous Americans, और other जातीय cultures—most prominently the culture of African Americans, cultures from लैटिन America, और Asian American cultures.
अनेक American cultural elements, विशेषकर from popular culture, have spread आरपार the globe through modern mass media.
The United States has often महरूम thought of as a melting pot, लकिन beginning in the late 1990s and early 2000s, it trends towards सांस्कृतिक diversity, pluralism and the चित्र of a salad bowl instead.
Due to the extent of American culture, वहीँ are many एकीकृत but unique social subcultures within the संयुक्त राज्य.
The cultural affiliations an individual in the United States may have commonly depend on social class, राजनैतिक orientation and a multitude of demographic characteristics such as religious background, occupation and ethnic group membership.
Samoan ( Gagana fa'a Sāmoa or Gagana Sāmoa — IPA : ) is the language of the Samoan Islands, comprising the independent country of Samoa and the United States territory of American Samoa.
It is an आधिकारिक language—alongside English —in both jurisdictions.
Samoan, a Polynesian language, is the first language for most of the Samoa Islands ' जनसांख्यिकी of परिचय 246,000.
With many Samoan people जीना in other countries, the total क्रमांक of speakers worldwide is estimated at 370,000.
The language is notable for the phonological differences between formal and informal speech as well as a ceremonial form used in samoan oratory.
a glucose tolerance परीक्षण is a medical test in which glucose is given और blood नमूने taken afterward to determine how जल्दी it is cleared इससे the रक्त.
The test is प्रायः used to test for diabetes, insulin resistance, and sometimes reactive hypoglycemia and acromegaly, or rarer disorders of carbohydrate metabolism.
In the most commonly performed version of the परीक्षण, an oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ), a standard dose of glucose is ingested by mouth and blood स्तर are checked two hours later.
Many variations of the GTT have महरूम devised over the सालो for various purposes, with different standard doses of glucose, different रूट of प्रशासन, different intervals and durations of sampling, and various substances measured in addition to blood glucose.
`` What About Me '' is a song लिखा by Garry Frost और Frances Swan, first recorded by Australian rock बैंड Moving Pictures from their album दिनों of Innocence.
It थी the बैंड 's first number-one सिंगल in Australia spending six consecutive weeks on the top ; there, it was the second-highest selling single of 1982.
The success of the song led them to America where it became a hit, reaching # 29 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 चार्ट.
The song stayed in the U.S. charts for such a long समय कि it प्रबंधित to make Billboards top 100 पॉप Singles of 1983, at # 88, a rare feat for a single with ऐसे a low peak position.
The song made an unusual comeback in 1989, peaking at # 46.
on the left a chicken अंडा, the egg most commonly eaten by humans, and on the right two quail eggs
Eggs are laid by females of many अलग species, including पक्षियों, सरीसृपों, amphibians, and fish, और have been खाया by mankind for thousands of years.
Bird and reptile eggs consist of a protective eggshell, albumen ( egg white ), और vitellus ( egg yolk ), contained within various thin membranes.
Popular चुनाव for egg consumption are chicken, duck, quail, roe, and caviar, but the egg most प्रायः खपत by humans is the chicken egg, by a wide margin.
Egg yolks and whole eggs store significant amounts of protein and choline, and are widely used in cookery.
Due to their प्रोटीन content, the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) categorizes eggs as Meats within the Food Guide Pyramid.
Despite the nutritional value of eggs, there are some संभावित स्वास्थ्य मुद्दे arising from अंडा quality, भंडार, and individual allergies.
Chickens and अन्य egg-laying creatures हैं widely kept throughout the संसार, और mass production of chicken eggs is a global उद्योग.
in 2009, an estimated 62.1 million मीट्रिक tons of eggs यहूद produced worldwide इससे a total laying flock of approximately 6.4 अरब hens.
There are issues of regional variation in माँग and expectation, as well as वर्तमान debates concerning methods of mass production, साथ the European Union 's ban on battery farming of chickens.
Major League Soccer ( MLS ) is a professional soccer league representing the खेल 's highest level in the United States and Canada.
Sanctioned by the United States Soccer Federation ( U.S. Soccer ), the league is composed of 19 teams — 16 in the U.S. and 3 in कनाडा.
Seasons presently run from March to December, with each team playing 34 games in the regular ऋतु.
Ten teams compete in the postseason MLS Cup Playoffs culminating in the championship game, the MLS Cup.
Major League सॉकर was संस्थापित in 1993 as part of the संयुक्त राज्य ' bid to host the 1994 FIFA World Cup.
The first season took place in 1996 beginning with ten teams.
Instead of ऑपरेटिंग as an association of independently owned teams, MLS is a सिंगल entity where each team is owned and controlled by the league 's investors.
The league 's बंद सदस्यता makes it one of the world 's few soccer leagues not using promotion and relegation.
The वैधता of cannabis varies from country to country.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most countries and has been since the beginning of widespread cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s.
However, many देशों have decriminalized the possession of small quantities of cannabis, particularly in उत्तर अमेरिका, South अमेरिका और यूरोपीय.
Furthermore, possession is legal or effectively legal in the नीदरलैंड्स, North कोरियाई and would be in the u.S. states of Colorado and Washington if it were not लिये संघीय law, which governs persons in all states.
The औषधीय use of cannabis is legal in a number of देशों, including Canada, the चेक गणतंत्र and Israel.
While संघीय law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis, enforcement varies widely at the state level और some states have established औषधीय marijuana programs in that contradict federal law ; दो states ( Colorado and Washington ) have repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis और replaced them with a regulatory regime, also contrary to federal statute.
Some countries have laws that are नहीं as vigorously prosecuted as others but, apart from the countries that प्रस्ताव access to चिकित्सा marijuana, most countries have विभिन्न penalties ranging from lenient to बहुत severe.
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than others in लिहाज़ to the cultivation, use, possession or transfer of cannabis for recreational उपयोग.
A few jurisdictions have lessened दंड for possession of small quantities of कैनबिस, making it punishable by confiscation and a fine, rather than imprisonment.
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory treatment programs for यंग or frequent users, with freedom from narcotic drugs as the लक्ष्य and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal purposes.
There are भी परिवर्तन in a more restrictive direction as in Canada.
ड्रग परीक्षण to detect cannabis are increasingly आम in many countries और have resulted in jail sentences and लोगों losing उनके कार्य.
However, सरल कब्ज़ा can carry long jail sentences in some countries, particularly in parts of East Asia and southeast Asia where the sale of cannabis may lead to a sentence of life in prison or even निष्पादन.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection fraction ( EF ) represents the आयतनी fraction of blood pumped आउट of the ventricle ( heart ) with each heart beat or cardiac cycle.
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary वाल्व into the pulmonary circulation or the left ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the प्रणालीगत circulation.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art कि allows meaningful mathematical expression defining EF.
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a विश्वव्यापी utility enabling study of हृदय performance reproducibly and inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection fraction is a mathematical product allowed by हृदय इमेजिंग.
As a mathematical term, Ejection Fraction is an extension of the work of Adolph Fick in cardiac output.
Dedicated technology such as इकोकार्डियोग्राफी, Computed Tomography, चुम्बकीय Resonance इमेजिंग and muga स्कैनिंग have definitively allowed clinically प्रासंगिक mathematics regarding Ischemia, जन्मजात Heart Disease और Heart Failure.
State Route 14 ( SR 14 ) is a north–south राज्य highway in the U.S. state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, largely in the Mojave मरुस्थल.
The southern portion of the highway is signed as the Antelope Valley Freeway.
The route connects अंतरराज्यीय 5, or Golden State Freeway, near Santa Clarita and with u.S. Route 395 निकट inyokern.
Legislatively, the रूट extends south of i-5 to State Route 1 in the Pacific Palisades area of Los Angeles, however the portion south of the junction साथ I-5 has not been constructed.
The दक्षिणी part of the constructed route is a busy commuter freeway serving and connecting the समुदायों of Santa clarita, Palmdale और Lancaster with the rest of the Greater Los Angeles area.
the उत्तरी portion, from Vincent ( दक्षिण of Palmdale ) to रूट 395, is legislatively नामित the Aerospace Highway, as the राजमार्ग serves Edwards Air Force Base, once one of the primary landing strips for NASA 's स्पेस Shuttle.
This section is rural, following the line between the hot Mojave desert and the forming Sierra Nevada पहाड़ range.
Most of रूट 14 is loosely paralleled by a main line of the Southern Pacific Railroad, used लिये the Antelope घाटी लकीर of the Metrolink commuter rail system as well as a connection between Los Angeles and the कैलिफ़ोर्निया Central Valley via Tehachapi Pass.
Linked साथ us 395, this सड़क connects Los एंजिल्स with such places as मैमथ Mountain, Mono Lake, Yosemite National Park and Reno, Nevada.
Route 14 थी part of U.S. Route 6 prior to truncation in 1964, जब U.S. 6 was a coast-to-coast route from Long Beach to Provincetown, Massachusetts.
The non-freeway segment of SR 14 from चांदी महारानी सड़क उत्तर of rosamond to Mojave is known as Sierra राजमार्ग, as is the old routing between अंतरराज्यीय 5 and चांदी Queen Road where SR 14 has been स्थानांतरित to a newer freeway alignment.
Portions of Route 14 remain हस्ताक्षरित with names संबद्ध साथ US 6, including Midland Trail, Theodore Roosevelt Highway and Grand Army of the Republic Highway.
This route is भाग of the California Freeway and Expressway प्रणाली.
Blindness is the कंडीशन of lacking visual perception due to physiological or neurological factors.
Various scales have been developed to describe the extent of दृष्टि loss and define blindness.
Total blindness is the complete lack of form और visual light perception and is clinically recorded as NLP, an abbreviation for `` no light perception. ''
Blindness is अक्सर used to describe कठोर visual पुतलियों with vision.
Those described as having तभी लाइट perception have no more sight than the क्षमता to बताना लाइट from dark and the सामान्य direction of a लाइट source.
To determine which people may need खास assistance क्युकी of their visual disabilities, various governmental jurisdictions have formulated अधिक complex definitions referred to as विधिक blindness.
In North America and most of Europe, legal blindness is पारिभाषित as visual तीक्ष्णता ( vision ) of 20/200 ( 6/60 ) or less in the better नजर साथ best correction possible.
This अर्थात् कि a legally blind individual would have to stand from an object to see it—with corrective lenses —with the same degree of clarity as a normally sighted person could from.
In many areas, people with average acuity who nonetheless have a visual field of कम than 20 degrees ( the norm being 180 degrees ) are also classified as being legally blind.
Approximately ten प्रतिशत of those deemed legally blind, by any measure, have no दृष्टि.
the rest have some vision, from लाइट perception alone to relatively good acuity.
Low vision is sometimes प्रयुक्त to describe visual acuities from 20/70 to 20/200.
By the 10th Revision of the WHO International सांख्यिकीय Classification of Diseases, Injuries and Causes of Death, low दृष्टि is defined as visual acuity of less than 20/60 ( 6/18 ), but equal to or better than 20/200 ( 6/60 ), or corresponding visual फ़ील्ड loss to less than 20 degrees, in the बेहतर eye साथ best संभावित correction.
Blindness is defined as visual acuity of less than 20/400 ( 6/120 ), or सम्बन्धित विज़ुअल field loss to less than 10 degrees, in the better eye with बेहतरीन possible correction.
Blind लोगों with undamaged eyes may स्टिल register light non-visually for the purpose of circadian entrainment to the 24-hour light/dark साईकिल.
Light signals लिये this purpose travel through the retinohypothalamic tract and are not affected by ऑप्टिक nerve damage beyond where the retinohypothalamic tract exits.
