In 1999, DMX released his best-selling album... And Then There Was X, which featured the hit single `` Party up ( Up in Here ) ``.
He रै acted in films such as Belly, Romeo Must Die, Exit wounds, Cradle 2 The Grave, और Last Hour.
In 2006, he starred in the reality टेलीविज़न series, जिससे was primarily aired on the BET cable television संजाल.
In 2003, DMX प्रकाशित a book of उसके memoirs entitled, e.a.r.l. : The आत्मकथा of DMX.
dmx released a mixtape The Weigh In as a prelude/promotion towards his album undisputed ( 2012 ).
dmx has sold over 30 million रिकॉर्ड worldwide, बनाना him one of the best-selling hip-hop artists of all time.
Professional प्रमाणन, व्यापार certification, or professional designation, प्रायः called simply प्रमाणन or qualification, is a नामांकन earned by a person to assure qualification to perform a job or task.
Not all certifications that use post-nominal letters are an acknowledgement of educational achievement, or an agency नियुक्त to safeguard the public interest.
Bugs Bunny is a funny animal cartoon character, best remembered for उसके starring roles in the Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies series of theatrical short films उत्पादित by warner Bros. during the सुनहरी आयु of American animation.
His popularity during this era led to his becoming a corporate mascot of Warner Bros. Entertainment.
Bugs is an anthropomorphic gray hare or rabbit who is famous लिये his flippant, personality, a pronounced New York accent, उसके portrayal as a छलिया, and his catch phrase `` Eh...
What 's up, दस्तावेज़ ? ''
( usually said while chewing a carrot ).
बग has appeared in more films than any other कार्टून अक्षर and is the ninth most portrayed film personality in the world.
according to उसके 1990 `` biography '' Bugs Bunny : 50 Years and Only एक Grey Hare, Bugs was born on July 27, 1940 in ब्रुकलीन, नई York in a warren under ebbets Field, home of the Brooklyn Dodgers.
in वास्तविकता, he थी brought to life by the animators और staff of Leon schlesinger Productions ( later Warner Bros. cartoons ) : सहित Tex Avery, जो directed Bugs ' early definitive short A जंगली Hare ( 1940 ) ; रॉबर्ट McKimson, who created Bugs ' definitive character design ; and Mel Blanc, who originated the voice of Bugs.
The mucous membranes ( or mucosae or mucosas ; singular mucosa ) are linings of mostly endodermal origin, covered in epithelium, which are involved in absorption and secretion.
They line कैविटी that are exposed to the external environment और internal organs.
They are at several places contiguous साथ skin : at the नथुनों, the lips of the मुँह, the eyelids, the ears, the genital area, and the anus.
the sticky, thick fluid secreted by the श्लेष्मक membranes और ग्रंथियों is termed mucus.
The term mucous membrane refers to where वे are मिला in the देह and not every mucous membrane secretes mucus.
the glans clitoridis, glans penis ( सिर of the शिश्न ), along with the inside of the अग्रत्वचा and the clitoral हुड, are mucous membranes.
The urethra is also a श्लेष्मक membrane.
the secreted mucus traps the pathogens in the body, preventing any further activities of diseases.

Cake is a रूप of bread or bread-like खाना.
in इसके आधुनिक forms, it is typically a sweet baked मिठाई.
In its oldest forms, cakes were सामान्यतः fried breads or cheesecakes, and normally had a disk shape.
Determining whether a given खाना चाहिए be classified as ब्रैड, cake, or pastry can be मुश्किल.
Modern cake, especially layer cakes, सामान्यतः contain a संयोजन of flour, शुगर, eggs, and butter or आयल, साथ some varieties भी requiring liquid ( typically milk or water ) and leavening agents ( such as yeast or baking powder ).
Flavorful ingredients like fruit purées, nuts, dried or candied fruit, or extracts are often added, और numerous substitutions for the primary संघटक are possible.
Cakes are often filled with फल preserves or dessert sauces ( like pastry cream ), iced with buttercream or other icings, and decorated साथ marzipan, piped borders or candied fruit.
Cake is often the dessert of choice for meals at ceremonial occasions, particularly weddings, वर्षगांठ, and birthdays.
There are countless cake recipes ; some are bread-like, some rich and elaborate, और many are सदियां बूढ़ा.
Cake बनाना is no longer a complicated procedure ; while at one time considerable labor went into cake making ( particularly the whisking of egg foams ), baking equipment and directions have been सरलीकृत so that even the most amateur cook may bake a केक.

The population was 767 at the 2010 census.

Public नीति is the principled guide to कार्रवाई taken by the administrative executive branches of the राज्य with regard to a class of issues in a manner consistent साथ law and institutional customs.
In general, the न्यास is the pertinent national और substantial constitutional law and implementing legislation ऐसे as the US Federal कोड.
Further substrates include both judicial interpretations and regulations which are generally authorized by विधान.
अन्य scholars define it as a system of `` courses of action, regulatory measures, कानून, and funding priorities concerning a दिए topic promulgated by a governmental entity or its representatives. ''
Public नीति is commonly embodied `` in constitutions, विधान अधिनियमों, and judicial निर्णय. ''
In the संयुक्त राज्य, इस concept refers नहीं only to the result of नीतियों, लकिन more broadly to the decision-making and analysis of governmental decisions.
As an academic discipline, public नीति is पढ़ाई by professors और students at public policy schools of major universities throughout the country.
the u.S. professional association of public policy practitioners, researchers, scholars, और students is the संघ for Public Policy Analysis and Management.
Digestion is the mechanical and chemical breakdown of food into smaller components that are more easily absorbed into a रक्त stream, for instance.
Digestion is a form of catabolism : a breakdown of विशाल खाना अणुओं to smaller ones.
When food enters the mouth, digestion of the food starts by the action of mastication, a form of mechanical digestion, और the wetting contact of लार.
Saliva, a liquid स्रावित by the salivary ग्रंथियों, contains salivary amylase, an एंजाइम which starts the पाचन of मंड in the food.
After undergoing mastication and मंड digestion, the food will be in the form of a छोटी, round slurry द्रव्यमान called a bolus.
It will then travel down the esophagus and into the stomach by the action of peristalsis.
Gastric juice in the stomach starts protein digestion.
Gastric रस मुख्यतः contains हाइड्रोक्लोरिक acid and pepsin.
As these दो chemicals may damage the पेट wall, mucus is secreted by the stomach, providing a slimy परत that acts as a shield against the damaging प्रभाव of the chemicals.
At the same time प्रोटीन digestion is occurring, mechanical mixing occurs by peristalsis, जिससे हैं लहरें of muscular contractions कि मूव along the stomach wall.
इस allows the द्रव्यमान of food to further mix with the digestive एंजाइमों.
After some समय ( typically an hour or two in humans, 4–6 hours in dogs, somewhat shorter अवधि in हाउस cats ), the resulting thick द्रव is called chyme.
When the pyloric sphincter valve opens, chyme enters the duodenum जहाँ it mixes with digestive एंजाइमों from the pancreas, and then passes through the small intestine, in which पाचन continues.
When the chyme is fully digested, it is absorbed into the blood.
95 % of absorption of nutrients occurs in the small intestine.
Water and खनिज are reabsorbed back into the blood in the colon ( large intestine ) where the ph is थोड़ा acidic about 5.6 ~ 6.9.
Some vitamins, such as biotin और vitamin K ( k2mk7 ) produced by bacteria in the colon are भी absorbed into the blood in the colon.
Waste material is eliminated from the rectum during defecation.
Henry VIII ( 28 जून 1491 – 28 January 1547 ) थी king of England from 21 अप्रैल 1509 until his death.
He थी lord, and बाद किंग, of Ireland, as well as continuing the nominal claim by the अंग्रेज़ी monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry was the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty, succeeding his father, Henry VII.
Besides उसके six marriages, हेनरी VIII is known for his role in the separation of the Church of England इससे the Roman Catholic Church.
हेनरी 's struggles with Rome led to the विरह of the Church of England from papal authority, the विच्छेद of the Monasteries, and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a आस्तिक in कोर Catholic theological teachings, even after उसके excommunication from the Roman कैथोलिक Church.
Henry oversaw the legal संघ of England और Wales with the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new किंग allied with the Holy Roman Emperor, Maximillian I, and invaded France in 1513 with a large, well-equipped army, but achieved little at a considerable financial cost.
Maximillian, for his भाग, used the English invasion to his own ends, and this prejudiced England 's ability to defeat the French.
इस foray होता prove the start of an obsession for Henry, who invaded again in 1544.
This समय, Henry 's forces captured the important नगर of Boulogne, but again the Holy Roman Emperor, Charles V, समर्थित Henry only as long as he needed to और England, strained by the enormous cost of the युद्ध, ransomed the city back for peace.
His contemporaries considered Henry in his prime to be an attractive, educated और accomplished किंग, and he has been described as `` एक of the सबसे charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne ''.
Besides ruling with absolute power, he also engaged himself as an author and composer.
His desire to provide England with a male वारिस – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a daughter would be unable to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that existed following the Wars of the गुलाब – led to the two बाते for which हेनरी is most remembered : his six विवाह and the अंग्रेज़ी Reformation.
Henry became रुग्ण obese and his health suffered, contributing to his मौत in 1547.
he is frequently characterised in उसके later life as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, and insecure king.
bongos ( Spanish : bongó ) are an Afro-Cuban percussion यंत्र.
The ड्रम are of different size : the larger drum is called in स्पेनी the hembra ( female ) and the smaller the मर्दाना ( male ).
वे are membranophones, or instruments that create sound by a स्पंदन of a stretched झिल्ली.
Different religious groups include different books in their Biblical canons, in varying orders, and sometimes divide or combine books, or चरितार्थ additional सामग्री into canonical books.
Christian Bibles range from the sixty-six किताबे of the Protestant canon to the eighty-one किताबे of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church canon.
The Hebrew Bible, or Tanakh, contains twenty-four books divided into तीन parts ; the पाँच books of the तोरा ( `` teaching '' or `` law '' ), the Nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ), and the Ketuvim ( `` writings '' ).
The first part of Christian Bibles is the बूढ़ा Testament, which contains, at minimum, the twenty-four books of the Hebrew Bible divided into thirty-nine किताबे and ordered differently from the Hebrew बाइबल.
The Catholic गिरिजाघर and Eastern Christian churches also hold certain deuterocanonical books और passages to be part of the Old Testament canon.
The second भाग is the New Testament, containing twenty-seven books ; the four Canonical gospels, अधिनियमों of the Apostles, twenty-one Epistles or letters and the Book of Revelation.
The Eastern Orthodox, Oriental Orthodox and Eastern कैथोलिक churches may have नाबालिग differences in उनके lists of accepted books.
The list given यहाँ लिये ये churches is the most समावेशी : if at least one Eastern गिरिजाघर स्वीकृत the book it is included here.
The national flag of the United States of America, often simply referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen बराबर horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom ) प्रत्यावर्ती with श्वेत, with a blue rectangle in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in नौ offset horizontal rows of six stars ( शीर्ष and bottom ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ rows of five सितारों.
the 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America और the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that घोषित independence इससे the Kingdom of Great Britain और became the पहला states in the Union.
Nicknames for the ध्वज include the `` Stars and Stripes '', `` Old Glory ``, and `` the Star-Spangled Banner. ''
Dred स्कॉट v. sandford,, also known as the Dred Scott Decision, was a लैंडमार्क decision by the u.S. Supreme Court.
It made दो main rulings.
The पहला सत्ताधारी was कि African-Americans were not citizens, and therefore had no standing to sue in federal court.
The second ruling was that the संघीय government had no शक्ति to regulate slavery in any territory acquired subsequent to the creation of the United राज्य.
Given the first ruling, most scholars और many contemporary political figures ( including the नेतृत्व of the then-new Republican Party ) considered that the दूसरी ruling was नहीं binding यही, लकिन mere dictum.
the rationale of the Supreme Court regarding the jurisdictional ruling implied that people of African descent ( दोनो slave and free ) were not protected by the Constitution and were not U.S. citizens.
Since passage of the 14th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution, both rulings are superseded and no longer valid यही.
Nonetheless, the case retains ऐतिहासिक significance as it is widely regarded as the worst decision ever made by the Supreme Court.
The opinion of the court, written by मुख्य Justice Roger B. Taney, stirred debate.
The decision was 7–2, and every Justice besides Taney wrote a separate concurrence or dissent.
लिये the first time since marbury v. मैडिसन, the Court held an Act of Congress to be unconstitutional.
Dred Scott, an African-American स्लेव, had asked a United States Circuit Court to award him his freedom because he और his master had resided in a राज्य ( Illinois ) and a territory ( Wisconsin territory ) where slavery had महरूम banned.
Chief Justice Roger Taney, writing लिये the court, held that Scott, as a person of African ancestry, was नहीं a citizen of the United States and therefore था no right to मुकदमा in federal court.
This holding was contrary to the practice of numerous राज्य at the time, particularly Free states, where फ़्री blacks did in fact enjoy the rights of citizens, such as the right to vote and hold public office.
In कया is sometimes माना mere obiter dictum, the Court went on to hold कि Congress had no authority to prohibit गुलामी in federal territories because slaves are personal प्रॉपर्टी और the Fifth Amendment to the संविधान protects property owners against deprivation of उनके property बगैर due प्रक्रम of law.
In reaching this decision, Taney had hoped to settle the growing controversy surrounding slavery in the United राज्य, but it had the opposite प्रभाव.
The decision was fiercely debated आरपार the country, as perhaps best सरंचनाओं by the lincoln–douglas debates of 1858.
Abraham Lincoln, the second-ever Republican nominee for President, was able to win the presidential election in 1860 ; the stopping of the further expansion of slavery was a key Republican party यों.
The decision played an important role in the timing of state secession और the Civil War, although it is extreme to say the decision `` caused '' the war.
The निर्णय is acknowledged for the influential role it played in altering the national political लैंडस्केप : it is credited साथ launching Abraham lincoln’s national political करियर and ultimately allowing for his election.
Although the परम् Court has never explicitly overruled the Dred Scott मामला, the Court stated in the Slaughter-House मामले that at least one part of it had already been overruled by the Fourteenth Amendment in 1868, जिससे begins by stating, `` All persons born or naturalized in the United राज्य, and subject to the क्षेत्राधिकार thereof, are citizens of the United States and of the State wherein they reside. ''
To which the Court noted:
The पहला observation we have to make on this clause is, that it puts at rest दोनो the questions जिससे we stated to have been the subject of मतभेद of opinion.
It declares that persons may be citizens of the संयुक्त States without लिहाज़ to their citizenship of a particular State, and it overturns the Dred Scott decision by making all व्यक्तियों born within the United States and subject to its jurisdiction citizens of the United राज्य.

Some are hard to define, as they encompass large क्षेत्रों developed at different times—often साथ sub-neighborhoods भीतर them.
Borders can also change based on popular understanding of the area, as खूब as the whims of the residents.

excerpts and border information are drawn directly इससे the main articles.
A biologist is a scientist जो studies living organisms and their relationship to उनके environment.
Biologists involved in मौलिक शोध attempt to discover underlying mechanisms that govern how organisms work.
Biologists शामिल in लागू research attempt to develop or improve medical, industrial or agricultural processes.

आधार jumping, also sometimes written as B.A.S.E. कूद, is an activity where participants jump from fixed objects और use a पैराशूट to ब्रेक their fall.
`` आधार '' is an acronym that stands लिये four categories of fixed objects from जिससे एक can जम्प : buildings, एन्टेना, spans ( bridges ), and earth ( cliffs ).
The British Shorthair is a domesticated बिल्ली whose features make it a popular breed in cat shows.
It रै been the most popular breed of cat registered by the UK 's Governing Council of the Cat Fancy ( GCCF ) since 2001, जब it overtook the Persian नस्ल.
the USA Basketball Men 's Senior नेशनल Team, commonly known as the United States men 's national basketball team, represents the United States of America in international men 's basketball.
The यूएसए is the सबसे successful team in international प्रतियोगिता, winning medals in all seventeen Olympic tournaments it has entered, coming away with fourteen golds.
Two of its gold medal-winning squads यहूद inducted to the Naismith Memorial Basketball हॉल of Fame as teams in August 2010—the 1960 team, जिससे featured छह हॉल of Famers ( 4 players, 2 coaches ), and the 1992 `` Dream Team '', featuring 14 Hall of famers ( 11 खिलाड़ी, 3 coaches ).
the United States is फिलहाल ranked first in the FIBA World Rankings.
traditionally composed of amateur players, a 1989 नियम change by fiba allowed यूएसए Basketball to field teams with professional players.
The first ऐसे team, ज्ञात as the `` Dream Team '', won the gold medal at the 1992 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक in Barcelona, स्पेन, playing in the final against Croatia.
With the परिचय of पेशेवर, the team was able to spark a second run of dominance after capturing तभी a bronze medal in 1988.
a टोली of professional players competed at the 1994 FIBA World Championship, finishing first.
In 1996, 2000, 2008, and 2012 the USA again captured gold medals.
Facing increased प्रतियोगिता, the USA failed to जीत a medal at the 2002 FIBA World चैंपियनशिप, finishing sixth.
The 2004 Summer Olympic team lost three games on its way to a bronze medal, a record कि represented more losses in a single year than the country 's Olympic टीमों था suffered in all previous Olympiads combined.
Determined to put an समाप्त to these failures, USA Basketball initiated a long-term project aimed at creating better, more cohesive teams.
The USA won its first seven games at the 2006 fiba संसार Championship in Japan before losing against Greece in the semi-finals, समाप्ति the प्रतियोगिता with the bronze medal.
The यूएसए won सुनहरा two सालो later, though, at the 2008 Summer Olympics with a dominant प्रदर्शन.
This कामयाबी was followed up at the 2010 FIBA संसार चैंपियनशिप, where despite fielding a roster featuring no players from the 2008 Olympic team, the USA did not lose a single खेल en route to defeating host Turkey लिये the gold medal.
the USA continued this streak of dominance by going undefeated and capturing सुनहरा एकबार more at the 2012 Summer Olympics.

The Super Bowl ring is an पुरस्कार in the National Football League दिए to the winners of the league 's सालाना World Championship game, the Super Bowl.
Since only one विंस Lombardi Trophy is awarded to the team ( ownership ) itself, the Super Bowl रिंग offers a collectible memento for the actual खिलाड़ी and team members to keep for themselves to symbolize the victory.

The Witch 's उंगली in the Carlsbad Caverns
A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês, इससे σταλαγμίας - stalagmias, `` dropping, trickling '' ) is a type of speleothem that rises इससे the floor of a limestone cave due to the dripping of mineralized solutions और the deposition of calcium कार्बोनेट.
This stalagmite formation occurs only under certain pH conditions within the underground cavern.
The corresponding formation on the ceiling of a गुफा is known as a stalactite.
If these formations grow together, the result is known as a column.
The हॉल of Giants in the Carlsbad Caverns
Stalagmites should सामान्यतः not be छुआ, since the rock buildup is formed by खनिज precipitating out of the water समाधान onto the old सतह ; skin oils can alter the surface where the mineral water will cling, thus affecting the विकास of the formation.
Oils and dirt from इंसान contact can भी दाग the formation and change its color permanently.
Similar structures can also form in lava tubes, associated with कुछ types of lavacicles, although the mechanism of गठन is very different.
Stalactites and stalagmites can also रूप on concrete ceilings and floors, हालांकि they रूप much more rapidly there than in the प्राकृतिक cave environment.
The largest stalagmite in the world is high और is located in the cave of Cueva Martin Infierno, Cuba.
In the Zagros Mountains of south Iran, approximately from the ancient city of bishapur, in the shapur cave on the fourth of five terraces stands the 3rd century CE statue of Shapur i, second ruler of the Sassanid Empire.
The statue, carved from one stalagmite, is nearly high.
How i Met Your Mother is an American sitcom that premiered on CBS on September 19, 2005.
The दिखाएँ was created by Craig Thomas and Carter Bays.
How i Met Your Mother is framed by the year 2030, when Ted mosby ( voiced by Bob Saget ) gathers his daughter ( Lyndsy Fonseca ) and son ( दाउद Henrie ) to tell them the story of how he met their माँ.
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a सिंगल, 27-year-old architect living with his two best friends from Wesleyan विश्वविद्यालयों, मार्शल Eriksen ( जेसन Segel ), a law student, और लिली Aldrin ( Alyson हनिंगन ), a kindergarten teacher, who have been डेटिंग for almost nine years when Marshall proposes.
Their engagement कल्याणकारी Ted to think about finding his own soul mate, much to the disgust of his friend Barney Stinson ( Neil Patrick Harris ), a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job.
And thus, Ted begins उसके search for his पूर्ण mate, and meets Robin scherbatsky ( Cobie Smulders ), whom he also befriends.
The 100th episode of कैसा I Met Your Mother aired on January 11, 2010.
On December 21, 2012, the series was renewed for a नवीं season.
On January 30, 2013, it was announced that Season 9 will be its final ऋतु.
gringo (,, ) is a slang स्पेनी and Portuguese word used in Ibero-America, to denote foreigners, often from the United States.
The term can be applied to someone who is actually a foreigner, or it can denote a strong संघ or assimilation into विदेशी ( particularly us ) society and संस्कृति.
In स्पेनी it does नहीं have a negative connotation.
Roger Axtell, a सफर etiquette expert, notes कि `` [ t ] he word gringo is not necessarily a bad word.
It is कठबोली but is derogatory only in its use and कॉन्टेक्स्ट. ''
The word was प्रयुक्त in स्पेन long before it crossed the Atlantic to denote विदेशी, non-native speakers of Spanish.
The great white शार्क, Carcharodon carcharias, also known as the great white, श्वेत सूचक, white shark, or white मौत, is a species of large lamniform shark which can be found in the coastal surface waters of all the major oceans.
the great white shark is मुख्यतः known for its size, with the largest individuals known to have approached or exceeded in length, and in weight.
This shark reaches its maturity around 15 years of age and can have a जीवन span of over 30 सालो.
The great white शार्क is arguably the world 's largest known extant macropredatory fish, and is one of the primary परभक्षी of marine mammals.
It is also known to prey upon a किस्में of other marine animals, including fish और seabirds.
It is the तभी known surviving species of its genus Carcharodon, and is ranked first in having the सबसे attacks on humans.
The IUCN list the great white shark as a vulnerable प्रजाति, जबकि it is included in Appendix II of CITES.
the bestselling अनोखा Jaws by Peter Benchley and the subsequent blockbuster film by Steven स्पिलबर्ग depicted the ग्रेट श्वेत शार्क as a `` ferocious man भक्षक ``.
In वास्तविकता, humans are not the preferred prey of the great white shark.
The United States Armed Forces are the सैन्य शक्तियां of the संयुक्त States of America.
They consist of the Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and Coast Guard.
The u.S. रै a strong tradition of civilian कंट्रोल of the military.
The अध्यक्ष is the military 's overall head, और helps form military policy with the U.S. Department of Defense ( DoD ), a संघीय कार्यपालिका विभाग, एक्टिंग as the principal organ by which military policy is carried आउट.
The DoD is headed by the Secretary of Defense, who is a civilian and Cabinet member.
The Defense Secretary is second in the military 's chain of command, just नीचे the President, और serves as the principal assistant to the President in all dod-related matters.
To निर्देशांक military action साथ diplomacy, the President रै an advisory National Security Council headed by a नेशनल Security Advisor.
दोनो the President and Secretary of Defense are advised by a seven-member संयुक्त Chiefs of Staff, which includes the head of प्रत्येक of the Defense Department 's service branches as खूब as the chief of the National Guard Bureau.
Leadership is provided by the Chairman of the Joint chiefs of Staff and the Vice अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त Chiefs of Staff.
The Commandant of the Coast Guard is not a member of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
All of the branches work together during operations and joint missions, under the Unified Combatant Commands, under the authority of the Secretary of Defense with the exception of the Coast Guard.
The Coast Guard falls under the administration of the Department of मातृभूमि Security and receives its operational orders from the Secretary of Homeland Security.
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the विभाग of the Navy by the President or Congress दौरान a time of war.
All five हथियारबंद services हैं among the seven uniformed services of the United States ; the others हैं the U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned corps और the National Oceanic और Atmospheric प्रशासन Commissioned Corps.
इससे the time of its inception, the military निभाई a decisive role in the history of the United राज्य.
A sense of national unity और पहचान was forged as a result of victory in the First Barbary War and the Second Barbary War.
Even so, the Founders were suspicious of a permanent military force and नहीं until the outbreak of World युद्ध II did a large खड़ा army become officially established.
The National सुरक्षा Act of 1947, अपनाया following संसार युद्ध II और during the Cold युद्ध 's onset, created the modern U.S. military फ्रेमवर्क ; the अधिनियम मिलाया previously Cabinet-level Department of War and the Department of the Navy into the नेशनल Military स्थापना ( renamed the Department of रक्षा in 1949 ), headed by the सचिव of Defense ; and created the Department of the एयर फ़ोर्स and National Security Council.
the U.S. military is one of the largest militaries in terms of number of personnel.
It draws इसके manpower from a large pool of paid स्वयंसेवक ; although conscription रै महरूम used in the past in विभिन्न times of दोनो युद्ध and peace, it has not महरूम used since 1972.
As of 2013, the U.S. spends about $ 554.2 billion annually to fund इसके सैन्य forces, and appropriates approximately $ 88.5 billion to fund विदेशी Contingency Operations.
Put together, the U.S. constitutes roughly 43 percent of the संसार 's सैन्य expenditures.
The u.S. हथियारबंद Forces as a whole possess विशाल quantities of advanced and powerful equipment, साथ with widespread placement of forces around the संसार, giving them significant सामर्थ्य in both defense और शक्ति projection.
Freedom of speech is the राजनैतिक सही to communicate एक 's opinions and ideas using one 's देह and property to anyone who is willing to receive उन्हें.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously, but includes any act of seeking, receiving और imparting information or विचार, regardless of the मीडियम used.
In practice, the right to freedom of speech is नहीं निरपेक्ष in any country and the right is commonly subject to limitations, as with libel, बदनामी, obscenity, sedition ( including, लिये example inciting ethnic hatred ), copyright violation, revelation of सूचना that is classified or otherwise.
The सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति is recognized as a इंसान right अंतर्गत Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in international इंसान rights law in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Covenant on Civil and Political अधिकारों ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to तलाश, receive और impart information and ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in छपाई, in the form of art, or through any अन्य media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties और responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to certain restrictions '' when जरुरी `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public अनुक्रम ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is मिला to cause religious offense, such as the अंग्रेजों Racial और Religious Hatred Act 2006.
The Big Bang Theory logo.
The Big Bang Theory is an American comedy television series निर्मित and कार्यपालिका produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady.
Like the name of the श्रेणी itself, with the exception of the first episode— '' पायलट '' —episode titles of The Big Bang सिद्धान्त सदा प्रारंभ with `` The '' and resemble the name of a scientific principle, theory or experiment, whimsically referencing a plot point or quirk.
, 133 episodes have aired.
The Big Bang Theory has been renewed लिये a seventh season.
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced, ; अक्तूबर 14, 1890 – कूच 28, 1969 ) was the 34th President of the United States इससे 1953 जबतक 1961.
he had previously been a five-star general in the United States Army during संसार War II और परोसा as Supreme Commander of the Allied Forces in Europe ; he had responsibility लिये planning and supervising the आक्रमण of North Africa in Operation Torch in 1942–43 and the successful invasion of France and Germany in 1944–45 इससे the Western Front.
In 1951, he became the पहला supreme commander of NATO.
Eisenhower was of Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry और थी reared in a large family in कान्सास by अभिभावक with a robust work ethic and धार्मिक पृष्ठभूमि.
As one of six sons, he was conditioned by a competitive माहौल which instilled self-reliance.
He attended and graduated from West Point and later married and had two sons.
After World युद्ध II, आइज़नहावर served as Army Chief of Staff under President Harry S. Truman, then assumed the पोस्ट of President at Columbia University.
Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential race as a रिपब्लिकन to counter the non-interventionism of Senator Robert A. Taft और to crusade against `` Communism, Korea and corruption ''.
He जीती by a landslide, defeating Democrat Adlai Stevenson and ending two decades of the New सौदे Coalition.
In the पहला year of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी, Eisenhower deposed the leader of इरान in the 1953 Iranian coup d'état और used nuclear threats to conclude the कोरियाई War साथ China.
His New Look नीति of nuclear deterrence दिया priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons while reducing the funding for conventional सैन्य forces ; the लक्ष्य was to keep pressure on the Soviet Union and reduce federal deficits.
In 1954, Eisenhower first articulated the domino theory in his वर्णन of the threat presented by the स्प्रेड of communism.
the Congress सहमत to उसके request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution, which सक्रिय him to prevent Chinese communist आक्रामकता against चाइनीज nationalists and established the U.S. policy of defending ताईवान.
When the Soviets launched Sputnik in 1957, he had to play catch-up in the space race.
Eisenhower forced Israel, the UK, and France to end their invasion of मिश्र दौरान the स्वेज Crisis of 1956.
In 1958, he sent 15,000 US सैनिकों to लेबनान to prevent the pro-Western सरकारी इससे falling to a Nasser -inspired revolution.
निकट the end of his term, उसके प्रयत्न to set up a समिट बैठक साथ the Soviets collapsed because of the u-2 incident.
on the domestic सामने, he covertly opposed Joseph McCarthy and contributed to the end of mccarthyism by openly invoking the आधुनिक expanded संस्करण of executive privilege.
He otherwise left most political activity to his Vice President, रिचर्ड Nixon.
He थी a moderate conservative who continued नई Deal agencies and expanded Social Security.
Among his enduring innovations, he launched the Interstate Highway System ; the रक्षा Advanced Research Projects Agency ( darpa ), जिससे led to the internet, among अनेक invaluable outputs ; the National Aeronautics and Space Administration ( NASA ), driving शांतिपूर्ण discovery in space ; the establishment of दमदार science education via the National Defense Education Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear शक्ति via amendments to the Atomic Energy अधिनियम.
In social नीति, he sent federal troops to Little Rock, अरकंसास, for the first time since पुनर्निर्माण to enforce federal court orders to desegregate पब्लिक स्कूलों.
He भी हस्ताक्षरित civil rights legislation in 1957 and 1960 to protect the right to vote.
He implemented desegregation of the armed forces in two years and made five appointments to the Supreme Court.
He was the first term-limited president in accordance with the 22nd Amendment.
Eisenhower 's two terms were शांतिपूर्ण ones लिये the most भाग और saw considerable economic prosperity except for a sharp recession in 1958–59.
आइज़नहावर is प्रायः ranked highly among the U.S. Presidents.
Air Force एक is the official air traffic control call चिह्न of a संयुक्त States Air फ़ोर्स वायुयान carrying the President of the United States.
In common parlance the पद refers to those एयर Force aircraft specifically designed, built, and used for the purpose of transporting the president.
The Presidential aircraft is a prominent symbol of the American प्रेसिडेंसी and its power.
The idea of designating specific military वायुयान to transport the President arose in 1943, जब officials of the United States Army Air Forces – the predecessor to the U.S. Air फ़ोर्स – became concerned with relying on वाणिज्यिक airlines to transport the President.
A C-87 Liberator Express थी reconfigured for use as a presidential transport ; however, it थी rejected by the Secret Service amid concerns over the aircraft 's safety record.
A c-54 Skymaster was then परिवर्तित for अध्यक्षीय use ; this aircraft, dubbed the Sacred गाय, transported अध्यक्ष Franklin D. Roosevelt to the yalta सम्मेलन in February 1945, and थी subsequently used लिये another two years by President Harry S. Truman.
the `` Air Force One '' call sign was created after a 1953 घटना during which a flight carrying अध्यक्ष Dwight D. Eisenhower entered the same airspace as a वाणिज्यिक airline flight using the same call sign.
Several वायुयान have been used as Air फ़ोर्स One since the सृष्टि of the presidential fleet, including two Boeing 707s introduced in the 1960s and 1970s, respectively ; since 1990, the presidential fleet has consisted of two Boeing VC-25As – specifically configured, highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft.
The Air Force is looking into replacing the two vc-25 aircraft साथ three replacement aircraft beginning in 2017.
A विवाह anniversary is the anniversary of the date a wedding took place.
Traditional names exist लिये most of them : for instance, 50 years of marriage is called a `` सुनहरी wedding anniversary '' or simply a `` golden anniversary ''.
a स्कैनर with duplexing Automatic Document Feeder.
In multifunction or all-in-one printers, fax machines, photocopiers और scanners, an automatic दस्तावेज़ feeder or adf is a feature which takes अनेक pages और feeds the paper एक पेज at a समय into a scanner or copier, allowing the user to scan, and thereby नक़ल, print, or fax, multiple-page documents without having to हस्तचालित replace प्रत्येक page.
Most copiers allow स्कैनिंग on the फ्लैटबेड or platen ( the `` glass '' ) or through a document feeder.
the vast majority of फैक्स machines have an ADF, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines, कुछ fax machine owners use the fax machine as a scanner, faxing multi-page दस्तावेज़ to themselves.
Document feeders are वर्णित by speed, in पृष्ठों per minute or ppm, and capacity, usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200.
वहीँ are two kinds of document feeders सक्षम of two-sided ( duplex ) स्कैनिंग : a reversing automatic document feeder or RADF scans one side of a page, then flips it and scans the other पक्ष.
a duplexing automatic document feeder or dadf scans both sides in one pass.
The advantage of the DADF is faster speed for two-sided originals.
radfs and dadfs are rated in images per minute ( IPM ), the number of sides they can scan each minute.
Fair Park is a recreational and educational complex located in डलास, Texas ( USA ).
The complex is registered as a Dallas Landmark, National Historic Landmark and is home to nine museums, six performance सुविधाएं, a lagoon, and the largest Ferris व्हील in North America.
Many of the buildings on the complex यहूद constructed for the Texas Centennial Exposition in 1936 जिससे drew over six लाख visitors.
Most of the buildings built for the exposition still survive and it is recognized as a significant example of Art Deco वास्तुकला.
Fair Park has been designated a Great Place in America by the American Planning Association.
the अमरीकी Planning संघ ( APA ) “is an independent, not-for-profit educational organization that provides नेतृत्व in the विकास of vital communities.”
The Great Places in American program helps to celebrate areas with “exemplary character, विशेषता, और planning.”
होने designated as a Great Place in America, Fair Park थी one of तभी ten cities chosen in 2011.
San जोस ( ; Spanish : St. Joseph ) is the third-largest नगर in California, the tenth-largest in the U.S., and the county seat of Santa Clara County जिससे is located at the southern end of सैन Francisco Bay.
San जोस is the largest city within Silicon Valley, जिससे is a major component of the वृहद San Francisco खाड़ी Area, a प्रदेश of 8.4 million people and the fifth largest महानगर area ( CSA ) in the United States.
It is the largest city in उत्तरी California.
San Jose was founded on November 29, 1777, as El Pueblo de San José de guadalupe, the first civilian town in the Spanish colony of Nueva California, which later became Alta California.
The city served as a farming community to support Spanish military installations at San फ्रांसिस्को and Monterey.
When California gained statehood in 1850, San Jose served as its first capital.
After अधिक than 150 years as a छोटी farming नगर, San Jose and the surrounding Santa Clara Valley became the last ( and largest ) contiguous area of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay.
San Jose experienced increased demand for housing from soldiers and veterans returning from World War ii.
San Jose then जारी इसके aggressive expansion दौरान the 1950s and 1960s by annexing more जमीन area.
The rapid growth of the high-technology and electronics industries further accelerated the transition from an agricultural center, to an urbanized metropolitan area.
By the 1990s, San Jose 's स्थान within the booming local technology industry earned the नगर its nickname, पूंजी of सिलिकॉन Valley.
San Jose now maintains वैश्विक city औकात और is the largest city in the San Francisco Bay Area in terms of population, land क्षेत्रफल, and औद्योगिक विकास.
the U.S. Census Bureau reported the population of the city to be 945,942 as of the 2010 Census.
As of April 2013, the अनुमानित population of San जोस was 984,000.
San Jose, along साथ the Santa Clara Valley, experienced about half a century of spectacular suburban sprawl, with characteristics of intense urbanization समान to the Los एंजिल्स area of Southern California.
The city has taken definite steps to avoid becoming `` l.A. North ''.
However, the sprawl in San जोस is worse than in Los Angeles by measures such as population density and public transit safety, investment, and ridership.
Europe depicted by antwerp cartographer Abraham Ortelius in 1595
The history of यूरोपीय covers the people inhabiting the European महाद्वीप since it was पहला populated in prehistoric times to उपस्थित, with the first Homo sapiens arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 BC.
The earliest settlers to Prehistoric Europe came during the paleolithic era.
The आगमन of agriculture around 7000 BC ushered in the neolithic age.
पाषाणकालीन Europe lasted for 4000 years, overlapping with metal-using cultures that gradually spread throughout the महाद्वीप.
Technological advances दौरान the prehistoric age tended to arrive from the Middle East, spreading gradually to the उत्तरपश्चिम.
Some of the best-known civilizations of prehistoric Europe were Minoan और माइसीनियाई, which flourished during the Bronze Age until they collapsed in a short काल of time around 1200 BC.
The period known as शास्त्रीय antiquity began with the वृद्धि of the city-states of प्राचीन Greece.
Greek influence reached its zenith under the expansive empire of Alexander the Great, spreading throughout Asia.
Northern and western Europe were वर्चस्व by the la Tène संस्कृति, a precursor to the Celts.
रोम, a small city-state traditionally founded in 753 bc, would grow to become the रोमन Republic in 509 BC and होता सफल Greek culture as the प्रबल Mediterranean civilization.
The कार्यक्रम of the rule of Julius Caesar led to reorganization of the Republic into the Roman Empire.
the empire was later divided by the emperor diocletian into the Western and Eastern empires.
During the later years of the Roman साम्राज्य, the germanic peoples of northern Europe grew in strength and repeated हमले led to the Fall of the Western Roman Empire in ad 476, a date जिससे traditionally marks the end of the classical काल and the start of the Middle Ages.
During the Middle Ages, the Eastern Roman साम्राज्य survived, हालांकि modern historians refer to इस state as the Byzantine Empire.
In Western Europe, germanic peoples moved into स्थितियाँ of power in the remnants of the former पश्चिमी Roman Empire and established kingdoms and empires of their own.
Of सब of the Germanic peoples, the franks would rise to a position of आधिपत्य over पश्चिमी यूरोपीय, the frankish Empire reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800.
Francia was divided into several parts ; West Francia would evolve into the Kingdom of France, while East francia would evolve into the Holy Roman Empire, a precursor to modern Germany.
The British Isles were the site of several large-scale migrations.
Native सेल्टिक peoples had महरूम marginalized during the period of Roman Britain, and when the Romans abandoned the अंग्रेजों Isles during the 400s, लहरें of germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern Britain और established a series of petty kingdoms in what होता आखिरकार develop into the Kingdom of England by AD 927.
During this period, the Kingdom of Poland and Kingdom of Hungary ( 1000–1945 ) were organized as well.
The Viking आयु, a period of migrations of Scandinavian peoples, dominated the period from the late 700s to the मध्य 1000s.
Chief among the Viking राज्य थी the साम्राज्य of Cnut the ग्रेट, a Danish leader who होता become king of England, Denmark, और Norway.
the Normans, a Viking people who settled in उत्तरी France and founded the duchy of Normandy, would have a significant impact on many parts of Europe, from the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily.
Another Scandinavian people, the Rus ' people, होता go on to मिला kievan rus ', an early state जिससे was a precursor for the modern country of रूस.
As the Viking आयु drew to a close, the period known as the क्रूसेड, a series of religiously-motivated military expeditions originally intended to लाओ the Levant back into Christian rule, began.
Several Crusader states यहूद founded in the eastern Mediterranean.
These were all short-lived.
The Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of यूरोपीय.
Their Sack of कुस्तुंतुनिया in 1204 brought an abrupt end to the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
Extinct श्वान breeds is a संकलन of dog breeds that have become extinct.
Wii बोलो is a माइक्रोफोन accessory for निन्टेंडो 's वी video खेल console.
Connected to the console via usb, the device can be placed near the video प्रदर्शक, allowing आवाज़ chat to be conducted with the entire room.
The device सुविधाएँ an LED to indicate जब the microphone is active.
वी बोलो was announced at Nintendo 's 2008 E3 media drug.
It was released separately and bundled साथ Animal Crossing : City Folk on November 16, 2008, in North America, and थी released on December 5, 2008, in यूरोपीय.
The Wii बोलो accessory is succeeded by the embedded microphone on the Wii U 's gamepad controller.
निसान Intelligent Key®
A smart key is an electronic access and authorization प्रणाली which is available as an option or मानक in several गाड़ियाँ.
it was first developed by siemens in the mid-1990s and introduced by Mercedes-Benz under the नाम `` Keyless go '' in 1998 on the W220 S-Class following its design patent filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17, 1997.
univisión ( ) is a spanish-language television network in the United States.
The network is primarily dedicated for लैटिन अमरीकी families जो reside in the United States.
It रै the largest audience of Spanish-language television दर्शक in the world according to nielsen ratings.
Randy falco, ( सीईओ as of June 29, 2011 ) coo, रै been in charge of the कम्पनी चूंकि the departure of Univision Communications president and CEO जो Uva in April 2010.
In recent years the network रै पहुँचे पैरिटी with the U.S. 's five major English-language television संजाल, and is often a strong fifth, outranking The cw, with some fourth-place weekly placings, and as of 2012, even first place rankings लिये individual programs over all five English networks due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year.
Univisión is headquartered in New York, and has its major studios, production facilities, and operations in Doral, Florida, a suburb of Miami.
In 2009, another television studio was announced, Univision Studios, to be built in doral.
univision is available on cable and उपग्रह in सबसे of the country, with local stations in over 50 markets with large हिस्पैनिक and Latino populations and a national केबल संजाल feed distributed in markets without either the availability or the demand for a locally-based station.
सबसे of these stations air full local news and other local programming in जोड to network shows, and in major markets such as लॉस Angeles, New York, and Miami the local newscasts carried by the network 's owned-and-operated स्टेशन ( O & O ) stations are equally competitive with their English-language counterparts ratings-wise.
univisión was acquired on March 29, 2007 by a consortium led by Haim saban 's Saban पूंजी Group ( who had previously owned the entity Saban Entertainment ), TPG पूंजी, L.P., Providence Equity Partners, Madison dearborn Partners, and थामस H. Lee Partners लिये $ 13.7 अरब or $ 36.25 per share plus $ 1.4 अरब in acquired debt.
The buyout left the कम्पनी with a debt level of बारह टाइम्स its annual cash flow, which was twice the norm in buyouts done over the पिछला two सालो.
Artist 's conception of a protoplanetary disk
the formation और of the Solar System is estimated to have begun 4.6 अरब years ago साथ the gravitational collapse of a small भाग of a giant molecular cloud.
Most of the collapsing mass एकत्रित in the centre, forming the Sun, while the rest flattened into a protoplanetary disk आउट of which the ग्रह, moons, asteroids, and other small Solar System bodies formed.
इस widely स्वीकृत model, known as the nebular hypothesis, थी first developed in the 18th century by emanuel Swedenborg, immanuel Kant, and Pierre-Simon Laplace.
Its subsequent development has interwoven a किस्में of scientific disciplines सहित खगोलशास्त्र, physics, geology, और planetary science.
Since the भोर of the स्पेस age in the 1950s and the discovery of extrasolar ग्रह in the 1990s, the model has been both challenged and refined to खाता for new observations.
The Solar System has evolved considerably since its initial गठन.
Many moons have formed from घूमना discs of gas and dust around their parent planets, जबकि other moons are thought to have formed independently and बाद been captured by their planets.
Still others, as the Earth 's चंद्रमा, may be the result of giant collisions.
Collisions between लाशें have occurred continually up to the present day and have been central to the evolution of the Solar प्रणाली.
The positions of the planets often shifted, और planets have switched places.
This ग्रहीय migration is now thought to have महरूम responsible लिये much of the Solar System 's early evolution.
In roughly 5 billion years, the Sun will cool and expand outward अनेक times its वर्तमान diameter ( becoming a रेड giant ), पहले casting off इसके outer layers as a planetary nebula and leaving behind a stellar remnant known as a white बौना.
In the far distant future, the gravity of गुजर stars will gradually reduce the Sun 's retinue of planets.
Some planets होगा be destroyed, others ejected into interstellar स्पेस.
Ultimately, over the course of tens of billions of years, it is likely that the Sun होगा be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it.
The विचारण ( Kafka 's original German शीर्षक :, later as, and ) is a novel written by Franz Kafka in 1914 and 1915 but not published until 1925.
एक of Kafka 's best-known works, it tells the स्टोरी of a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote, inaccessible authority, with the nature of his crime नाज़िल to neither him nor the reader.
Like Kafka 's अन्य novels, The विचारण was never completed, although it करता include a अध्याय which brings the story to an end.
क्युकी of this there are निश्चित inconsistencies जिससे मौजूद भीतर the novel, such as असमानताओं in समय in addition to अन्य discontinuities in narration.
After Kafka 's death in 1924 his dost and साहित्यिक executor Max Brod edited the text for प्रकाशन by Verlag die Schmiede.
The original manuscript is आयोजित at the Museum of Modern Literature, Marbach am Neckar, Germany.
In 1999, the किताब थी listed in Le Mondes 100 Books of the Century and as no. 2 of the Best German Novels of the बीसवीं Century.
लिसा ऐनी Loeb ( born March 11, 1968 ) is an American singer-songwriter and actress.
She launched her career in 1994 with the song, `` Stay ( I छूटी तुम ) ``, जिससे was included in the film Reality Bites.
She थी the first artist to have a number one single in the United राज्य while not signed to a recording अनुबंध.
Her पाँच studio CDs include her major label debut, the gold-selling Tails and its follow-up, the Grammy-nominated, gold-selling पटाखा.
Loeb has also worked in film, टेलीविज़न, voice-over work and children’s रिकार्डिंग.
लोएब has appeared in दो television series, Dweezil & Lisa, a weekly culinary adventure for the खाना संजाल and Number 1 Single, a reality show on the E !
Network in 2006 focused on her quest for love, success, career, and परिवार.
उसके children 's music includes the एल्बम Catch the चंद्रमा ( 2003 ), and Camp लिसा ( 2008 ).
Her first joint children 's book and album Lisa लोएब 's Silly Sing-Along : The निराशाजनक Pancake and Other Zany Songs थी published in 2011.
In 2010 she founded the लिसा Loeb Eyewear Collection, which is आधारित on her अपना designs.
The Coat of arms of the राज्य of New Jersey includes:
A shield with तीन plows emblazoned, representative of नई Jersey 's agricultural tradition.
A forward-facing knight 's helmet.
A घोड़ा 's head as the crest of the helmet.
The female figures Liberty and Ceres, representative of the state 's motto ( देखिए next मद ).
स्वतंत्रता is holding a staff supporting a `` liberty cap `` ; Ceres is holding an overflowing cornucopia.
The streamer at the foot of the emblem contains the State Motto of New Jersey, `` Liberty और समृद्धि '', and the साल of statehood, 1776.
it was originally designed by Pierre यूजीन du Simitiere in 1777 and was modified थोड़ा in 1928.
The seal is the central motif in the flag of New Jersey and the Great मुहर of the State of नई Jersey.
The Coat of arms contains a horse 's head.
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself तदनुसार और three plows on a शील्ड referring to the State 's agriculture tradition, giving it the nickname `` Garden State ''.
The two Goddesses represent the State motto, `` Liberty और Prosperity ''.
Liberty is on the left.
She is पकड़कर a स्टाफ साथ a liberty cap on it, and the word liberty underneath her.
The goddess on the right is Ceres, goddess of agriculture.
She is holding a cornucopia with prosperity written below उसके.
according to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly for March 11, 1896, the date in which the Assembly officially approved the flag as the state emblem, the buff color is due indirectly to George Washington, जो had ordered on October 2, 1779, that the uniform coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be अंधेरा ( Jersey ) blue, with buff facings.
Buff-colored facings had until then been सुरक्षित तभी लिये his own uniform और those of other महाद्वीपीय generals and their aides.
तब, on February 28, 1780, the महाद्वीपीय युद्ध Officers in Philadelphia directed that the uniform coat facings of all regiments were to be the same as the background रंग of the regiments ' state flag.

`` We can कार्य It आउट '' is a song by the Beatles, लिखा by Paul McCartney and John Lennon.
It was released as a `` double A-sided `` सिंगल with `` Day Tripper ``, the first time both sides of a single यहूद so designated in an आरंभिक release.
Both songs यहूद recorded दौरान the रबर आत्मा sessions.
The song is an उदाहरण of Lennon–McCartney collaboration at a गहराई that happened only rarely after they wrote the hit singles of 1963.
This सोंग, `` A दिन in the Life ``, `` Baby, You 're a Rich man `` and `` I 've Got a Feeling ``, are among the notable अपवाद.
As a medical diagnosis, pedophilia or paedophilia is a psychiatric disorder in persons 16 years of age or older typically characterized by a प्राथमिक or exclusive sexual ब्याज toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger, though specific diagnosis मापदण्ड for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to आयु 13 ).
An adolescent who is 16 years of age or older must be at least पाँच years पुरानी than the prepubescent चाइल्ड before the आकर्षण can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The term has a range of definitions, as found in psychiatry, psychology, the vernacular, and law enforcement.
The International वर्गीकरण of Diseases ( आईसीडी ) defines pedophilia as a `` disorder of adult personality और behaviour '' in which there is a यौन preference for children of prepubertal or early pubertal age.
According to the Diagnostic और सांख्यिकीय हस्तचालित of Mental Disorders ( DSM ), it is a paraphilia in which adults or adolescents 16 years of age or older have intense and recurrent sexual प्रेरणाएं towards and fantasies about prepubescent children that they have either acted on or which cause them distress or interpersonal difficulty.
In popular उपयोग, pedophilia अर्थात् any sexual interest in children or the act of child यौन abuse, often termed `` pedophilic बर्ताव ''.
For example, the American Heritage Stedman 's Medical Dictionary states, `` Pedophilia is the act or fantasy on the part of an adult of engaging in sexual activity with a child or children. ''
This common use अनुप्रयोग also extends to the sexual interest in and sexual सम्पर्क साथ pubescent or post-pubescent minors.
शोधकर्ताओं recommend कि these imprecise uses be avoided because हालांकि people who commit चाइल्ड sexual abuse commonly exhibit the disorder, some offenders do not मिलें the clinical diagnosis standards for pedophilia and these standards pertain to prepubescents.
Additionally, not all pedophiles actually commit such abuse.
Pedophilia was पहला formally recognized और named in the late 19th century.
A significant amount of research in the क्षेत्रफल has लिया प्लेस since the 1980s.
Although mostly documented in men, there are भी women who exhibit the disorder, and researchers assume available estimates underrepresent the true क्रमांक of female pedophiles.
No cure for pedophilia has been developed, but there are therapies that can reduce the incidence of a व्यक्ति committing child sexual abuse.
In the United States, following Kansas v. hendricks, sex offenders who हैं diagnosed with certain mental विकार, particularly pedophilia, can be subject to indefinite civil commitment, under various state कानून ( generically called SVP कानून ) और the federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006.
At present, the exact causes of pedophilia have not been conclusively established.
Research suggests कि pedophilia may be correlated with अनेक different neurological abnormalities, and often co-exists with other personality disorders and मनोवैज्ञानिक pathologies.
In the contexts of forensic मनोविज्ञान और law प्रवर्तन, a variety of typologies have been suggested to categorize pedophiles according to behavior and motivations.
Julio César Chávez ( born Julio César Chávez González on जुलाई 12, 1962 ) is a retired Mexican पेशेवर boxer.
Chávez is माना by many लोगों लिये their sport statistics the greatest fighter ever to come out of Mexico.
He is a six-time संसार champion in three weight विभाजन, and for several years he थी considered एक of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world.
In a करियर that spanned over 25 years, Chávez won five world titles in three weight विभाजन : WBC Super Featherweight in 1984, WBA Lightweight in 1987, WBC lightweight in 1988, WBC लाइट Welterweight in 1989, ibf Light Welterweight in 1990, and wbc Light Welterweight in 1994.
he holds रिकॉर्ड for most successful consecutive defenses of world titles ( 27 ), most title fights ( 37 ), most title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is after जो Louis साथ ( 23 ) लिये most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ).
chávez भी has the longest undefeated streak in boxing history, 13 years.
His रिकार्ड was 89-0-1 going into his first loss to फ्रेंकी Randall and had an 87 fight win streak until his `` चित्रण '' साथ Whitaker.
Julio César Chávez was known for his outstanding पंचिंग power, devastating देह attack, remarkably strong chin and the relentless stalking of his opponents.
He ranks # 24 on ESPN 's 50 Greatest Boxers Of सब Time.
on December 7, 2010, he was inducted in the prestigious International Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011.
He is the father of prospect Omar Chávez and पूर्व WBC Middleweight Champion Julio César Chávez, Jr.

To be sent to the सही meant slave labor ; to the left, the गैस chamber.
This चित्र shows the arrival of Hungarian Jews इससे Carpatho-Ruthenia, many of उन्हें from the Berehov ghetto.

The Holocaust ( इससे the Greek ' : hólos, `` whole '' and kaustós, `` burnt '' ) also known as the Shoah ( Hebrew :, hashoah, `` catastrophe '' ; Yiddish :, Churben or Hurban, from the Hebrew for `` destruction '' ), was the mass murder or genocide of लगभग छह million यहूदियों during World War II, a programme of व्यवस्थित state-sponsored हत्या by Nazi Germany, led by Adolf Hitler और the Nazi पार्टी, throughout German-occupied territory.
Of the nine million Jews who had resided in यूरोपीय before the Holocaust, approximately two-thirds were killed.
Over one लाख Jewish children were killed in the Holocaust, as were approximately दो लाख Jewish women and three million Jewish men.
A network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany और German-occupied territory were used to concentrate, hold, and kill Jews और other victims.
Some scholars argue that the mass हत्या of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the परिभाषा, and some use the आम noun `` holocaust '' to describe other Nazi द्रव्यमान हत्याएं, सहित those of सोवियत prisoners of war, पॉलिश और सोवियत civilians, और homosexuals.
Recent estimates based on figures obtained since the fall of the Soviet Union indicates कुछ ten to eleven million civilians and बंदियों of war यहूद intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime.
The persecution and genocide were carried out in stages.
Various laws to remove the Jews from सिविल society, most prominently the Nuremberg Laws, were enacted in Germany सालो before the outbreak of World युद्ध II.
Concentration camps were established in which inmates were subjected to slave labor until they died of exhaustion or बीमारी.
Where Germany conquered नई territory in eastern Europe, specialized units पुकारा Einsatzgruppen murdered Jews and political opponents in mass shootings.
The occupiers required Jews और Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos before being transported by freight train to extermination camps where, if वे बच the journey, most were systematically killed in gas chambers.
Every भुजा of जर्मनी 's bureaucracy was शामिल in the logistics that led to the genocides, turning the Third Reich into what one Holocaust scholar has called `` a genocidal state ''.
4-H in the संयुक्त States is a youth organization administered by the National संस्थान of Food and Agriculture of the United States Department of Agriculture ( यूएसडीए ), with the mission of `` engaging युवावस्था to पहुँचें उनके fullest potential while advancing the field of युवावस्था development. ''
The नाम represents four personal विकास क्षेत्रों of फ़ोकस for the organization : head, दिल, हैंड्स, और health.
The organization रै over 6.5 million members in the संयुक्त States, from ages five to twenty-one, in लगभग 90,000 clubs.
The goal of 4-h is to develop citizenship, leadership, responsibility and life skills of youth through experiential learning programs and a positive युवावस्था development approach.
Though typically विचार of as an agriculturally focused organization as a result of its history, 4-H today focuses on citizenship, healthy living, science, engineering, and technology कार्यक्रम.
Today, 4-H and related कार्यक्रम exist in over eighty देशों around the world ; the संगठन and administration varies from देश to country.
प्रत्येक of these programs operates independently, but cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges, वैश्विक education programs, and संचार.
The 4-H motto is `` To मेक the बेहतरीन better '', while इसके slogan is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ).
The national flag of Chile, consists of two unequal horizontal bands of श्वेत और red और a blue square the same height as the श्वेत band in the canton, which bears a white five-pointed स्टार in the बीच.
It was अपनाया on 18 October 1817.
the Chilean flag is also known in Spanish as La Estrella Solitaria ( The Lone Star ).
The star represents a guide to progress and सम्मान ; blue symbolizes the sky and the Pacific Ocean, white is for the snow-covered Andes, and red stands for the blood spilled to achieve independence.
According to the epic poem La Araucana, the colors यहूद derived from those from the flag flown by the Mapuche during the arauco War.
`` Flag Day '' is held each year on the ninth of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers जो died in the 1882 Battle of La Concepción.
Generation Y, also known as the Millennial पीढी, is the demographic cohort following पीढी X.
वहीँ are no precise dates for when Generation y starts and ends.
Commentators use beginning birth dates from the latter 1970s, or from the early 1980s to the early 2000s.

Virginia ( ), officially the राष्ट्रमंडल of Virginia, is a U.S. state located in the South Atlantic region of the United States.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old डोमिनियन '' and the `` Mother of राष्ट्रपतियों '' after the eight U.S. presidents born वहीँ.
the geography और climate of the Commonwealth are तराशा by the ब्लू लकीरें Mountains and the Chesapeake Bay, जिससे provide आवास for much of its flora and fauna.
The capital of the Commonwealth is Richmond ; और वर्जिनिया बीच is the most populous नगर.
Fairfax County is the most populous political subdivision.
The wealthiest is Loudoun County.
The Commonwealth 's population is over eight million.
the area 's history begins with several indigenous groups, including the powhatan.
in 1607 the London Company स्थापित the उपनिवेश of Virginia as the first permanent New World English colony.
Slave मजदूर and the land acquired from विस्थापित Native American tribes each played a significant role in the उपनिवेश 's early politics and plantation economy.
Virginia was one of the 13 Colonies in the American Revolution and joined the confederacy in the American Civil युद्ध, during जिससे Richmond थी made the Confederate capital and Virginia 's northwestern counties seceded to form the राज्य of वेस्ट वर्जिनिया.
Although the Commonwealth was under conservative single-party rule for nearly a century following Reconstruction, both major national parties are competitive in modern Virginia.
The Virginia General Assembly is the oldest legislature in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध.
The state government has महरूम repeatedly ranked सबसे प्रभावी by the Pew बीच on the States.
it is unique in कैसा it treats शहरों and counties equally, manages local roads, और prohibits इसके राज्यपालों from serving consecutive शर्तें.
वर्जिनिया 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal एजेंसियों in Northern वर्जिनिया, including the headquarters of the Department of Defense और सीआईए ; and military facilities in Hampton Roads, the site of the प्रदेश 's main seaport.
वर्जिनिया 's पब्लिक schools and many colleges and universities have contributed to growing media and technology sectors.
As a परिणाम, computer chips have become the state 's leading export.
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known as Windows Live Movie Maker, codenamed Sundance ) is a freeware video editing software by Microsoft.
It is a भाग of खिड़कियाँ Essentials तन्त्र सुइट and offers the ability to create और edit वीडियो as well as to प्रकाशित them on SkyDrive, Facebook, YouTube, and Flickr.
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut सिंगल by Tupac Shakur, and tenth track from his डेब्यू एल्बम, 2pacalypse Now.
the सोंग, which features R & B singer Dave Hollister, is परिचय a twelve year-old girl named Brenda who जीवनदान in a ghetto, रै a baby, and is incapable of supporting it.
The song explores the issue of teen pregnancy and its effect on the यंग माताओं and उनके families.
Like अनेक of shakur 's songs, `` Brenda 's मिला a baby '' draws from the plight of the impoverished.
Using Brenda to represent यंग mothers in general, Shakur criticises the low level of support from the baby 's father, the सरकारी, and society in general.
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who got pregnant from her cousin and, because she did not want उसके parents to know about the baby, threw it in a trash can.
the official लोगो of Pokémon for its international रिलीज ; `` Pokémon '' is short for the असली Japanese title of `` Pocket Monsters ''.
is a media franchise प्रकाशित and स्वामित्व by Japanese video game company Nintendo and निर्मित by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996.
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game Boy role-playing video games developed by खेल freak, Pokémon has since become the second-most कामयाब और lucrative वीडियो game-based मीडिया मताधिकार in the world, behind only Nintendo 's own Mario मताधिकार.
Pokémon properties have since been merchandised into anime, manga, trading cards, खिलौने, books, और other मीडिया.
The franchise celebrated in 2006, और, संचयी बिक्री of the वीडियो games ( including घर console versions, such as the `` pikachu '' निन्टेंडो 64 ) have पहुँचे more than 200 million नक़ल.
In November 2005, 4kids Entertainment, which had managed the non-game related licensing of Pokémon, announced कि it had agreed not to renew the Pokémon representation अनुबंध.
पोकीमॉन यूएसए Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company International ), a subsidiary of Japan 's Pokémon Co., now oversees all Pokémon licensing outside of Asia.
The नाम Pokémon is the romanized contraction of the जापानी brand.
The पद पोकीमॉन, in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself, also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made appearances in Pokémon media as of the release of the fifth generation titles Pokémon ब्लैक 2 and White 2 ; साथ the आगामी रिलीज of Pokémon x and y, 6 नई Pokémon have महरूम प्रदर्शित in promotions लिये the games.
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the singular and बहुवचन, as is each individual species नाम ; it is grammatically correct to कह `` one Pokémon '' और `` many पोकीमॉन '', as well as `` one Pikachu `` और `` many Pikachu ''.
कवर of the first edition of the publication दादा by ट्रिस्टन Tzara ; Zurich, 1917
दादा ( ) or Dadaism थी an art movement of the European avant-garde in the early 20th century.
Many claim Dada began in Zurich, Switzerland in 1916, spreading to Berlin shortly thereafter but the ऊँचाई of नई York दादा was the year before in 1915.
To quote Dona Budd 's the Language of Art ज्ञान, Dada थी born आउट of negative reaction to the horrors of संसार War I.
This international movement was begun by a group of artist and कवियों associated with the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich.
Dada rejected reason and logic, prizing nonsense, irrationality and intuition.
The origin of the name Dada is unclear ; some believe that it is a nonsensical word.
Others maintain that it originates from the Romanian कलाकारों Tristan tzara और Marcel Janco 's बारंबार use of the words da, da, meaning yes, यस in the Romanian भाषा.
Another theory says that the नाम `` Dada '' came during a बैठक of the group when a पेपर चाकू stuck into a French-German शब्दकोष happened to point to 'dada ', a French word for 'hobbyhorse '.
The movement primarily involved visual arts, literature, poetry, art manifestoes, art theory, theatre, and ग्राफिक design, and concentrated its anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works.
In addition to होने anti-war, Dada was भी anti- bourgeois and had political affinities with the कट्टरपंथी बाएँ.
Dada activities included public gatherings, demonstrations, और publication of art/literary journals ; passionate coverage of art, politics, और culture were विषय often discussed in a variety of मीडिया.
Key आंकड़े in the गति included Hugo Ball, Emmy Hennings, Hans Arp, Raoul hausmann, Hannah Höch, Johannes Baader, ट्रिस्टन Tzara, Francis Picabia, रिचर्ड huelsenbeck, Georg Grosz, John Heartfield, Marcel Duchamp, Beatrice लकडी, Kurt Schwitters, and hans Richter, among others.
the गति influenced later styles like the avant-garde and downtown music movements, and समूह including surrealism, देवानंद réalisme, pop art and Fluxus.
Dada is the groundwork to अमूर्त आर्ट and ध्वनि poetry, a starting पाइंट for performance art, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on pop आर्ट, a celebration of antiart to be बाद embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the गति that lay the foundation for surrealism.
First trophic level.
The plants in इस image, and the शैवाल and phytoplankton in the lake, are primary producers.
They take nutrients from the मृदा or the water, and manufacture उनके own food by photosynthesis, using energy from the sun.
The trophic स्तर of an सजीव is the position it occupies in a food chain.
The word trophic गर्भाशयी from the यूनानी τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding.
a food chain represents a succession of जीवों that eat another organism और are, in turn, eaten themselves.
The क्रमांक of steps an सजीव is from the प्रारंभ of the chain is a माप of its trophic level.
खाना chains प्रारंभ at trophic level 1 with primary producers such as plants, move to herbivores at level 2, परभक्षी at level 3 and typically finish with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5.
The path along the chain can form either a one-way प्रवाह, or a food `` web. ''
ecological समुदायों with higher biodiversity form अधिक जटिल trophic paths.
Four of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण domesticated silk moths.
शीर्ष to bottom : Bombyx mori, hyalophora cecropia, Antheraea pernyi, Samia cynthia.

a silk-producing raspy cricket.
रेशा is a natural protein fibre, some forms of which can be woven into textiles.
the protein fibre of silk is composed mainly of fibroin and produced by certain insect larvae to form cocoons.
The best-known type of रेशा is obtained from the cocoons of the लार्वे of the शहतूत silkworm Bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
the shimmering रूप of silk is due to the triangular प्रिज़्म -like structure of the silk fibre, जिससे allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at अलग कोण, thus producing different colors.
Silks are उत्पादित by several अन्य insects, but generally तभी the silk of शलभ caterpillars has been used for textile manufacturing.
वहीँ has been some research into other silks, which differ at the molecular level.
अनेक silks are mainly produced by the लार्वे of कीट undergoing complete metamorphosis, but some adult insects such as webspinners produce silk, और some insects such as raspy crickets produce रेशा throughout their lives.
Silk production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees, wasps, और ants ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, beetles, lacewings, fleas, flies and midges.
अन्य प्रकार of arthropod produce silk, most notably various arachnids such as spiders ( देखिए spider रेशा ).
Late Show with दाउद Letterman is an American late-night talk show hosted by David Letterman on CBS.
The दिखाएँ debuted on August 30, 1993, and is उत्पादित by Letterman 's production company, Worldwide Pants Incorporated.
The show 's music director and band-leader of the house band, the सीबीएस Orchestra, is Paul Shaffer.
The head writer is Matt Roberts and the announcer is Alan Kalter.
Of the major U.S. late-night programs, Late Show ranks second in संचयी average viewers over समय and third in क्रमांक of episodes over time.
The show लीड other late रात्रि shows in ad आय with $ 271 million in 2009.
In most U.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m. Eastern/Pacific time, but is recorded Monday through Wednesday at 4:30 p.m., and Thursdays at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m.
The second Thursday एपीसोड usually airs on Friday of that week.
In 2002, Late Show with David Letterman was ranked No. 7 on TV Guide 's 50 Greatest tv shows of All Time.
CBS has a contract with Worldwide Pants to continue the show through 2014 ; by then, Letterman will surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk दिखाएँ host.

the श्रेणी is a voyeuristic dekh into the wealthy lives of these housewives, as they shop, get प्लास्टिक सर्जरी, gossip, लड़ो and live lavishly.
The वित्तीय crisis, the beginning of which coincided लगभग exactly with the पहला ऋतु 's broadcast, रै since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with job losses, evictions, mortgage defaults, foreclosures, and marital stress—all recorded in progressive seasons of the show.
cyberstalking is the उपयोग of the अंतरजाल or other electronic अर्थात् to stalk or harass an individual, a group of individuals, or an organization.
It may शामिल the making of false आरोपों or कथन of फैक्ट ( as in defamation ), monitoring, making threats, identity theft, damage to data or equipment, the solicitation of minors for sex, or gathering information that may be used to harass.
The definition of `` उत्पीड़न '' जरूर meet the मानदंड that a उचित person, in कब्ज़ा of the वही information, would regard it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person तकलीफ.
Cyberstalking is अलग from spatial or offline stalking in कि it occurs through the उपयोग of electronic संचार technology such as the internet.
However, it sometimes leads to it, or is accompanied by it.
Both are criminal offenses.
Cyberstalking shares important characteristics with offline stalking.
Many stalkers – online or off – are motivated by a desire to control their victims.
A cyberstalker may be an online stranger or a person whom the target knows.
A cyberstalker may be anonymous और may solicit involvement of अन्य people ऑनलाइन who do not even know the target.
Cyberstalking is a criminal offense that comes into play under state anti-stalking laws, slander laws, and उत्पीड़न laws.
A cyberstalking conviction can result in a restraining order, probation, or even criminal penalties against the assailant, including jail.
A business letter is usually used when writing from one company to another, or लिये correspondence between such organizations and their customers, clients and other external parties.
The overall style of letter will निर्भर on the relationship between the parties concerned.
There are अनेक reasons to write a business letter.
it could be to निवेदन सीधा information or action from another party, to order supplies from a supplier, to identify a mistake that was committed, to reply directly to a request, to apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill.
भी today, the business अक्षर is still very उपयोगी because it produces a permanent रिकार्ड, is confidential, formal and delivers persuasive, well-considered messages.
tilapia ( ) is the common name for nearly a hundred species of cichlid fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe.
tilapia are मुख्यतः freshwater fish, inhabiting shallow streams, ponds, rivers and lakes, and less commonly found जीना in brackish water.
Historically, they have been of प्रमुख importance in कारीगर fishing in Africa and the Levant, and are of increasing महत्व in aquaculture.
Tilapia can become problematic invasive प्रजाति in new warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, but generally not in temperate climates due to their inability to survive in cooler waters below about.
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 comedy drama crime फिल्मी starring tom Hanks and Beasley the Dog as the eponymous characters, Turner and Hooch respectively.
The film also stars घोड़ी winningham, Craig T. Nelson, and Reginald VelJohnson.
