एडोल्फ Hitler ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an आस्ट्रिया -born German राजनेता and the leader of the Nazi Party ( ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist जर्मनी Workers पार्टी ).
He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 और तानाशाह of Nazi Germany ( as führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945.
Hitler was at the centre of Nazi Germany, संसार War II in Europe, and the Holocaust.
Hitler was a decorated veteran of संसार War i.
He joined the German Workers ' पार्टी ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919, and became नेता of the NSDAP in 1921.
in 1923, he attempted a coup d'état in म्यूनिख, known as the Beer हॉल putsch.
The विफल तख्तापलट resulted in Hitler 's कारावास, during which time he wrote उसके memoir, Mein Kampf ( My Struggle ).
After his release in 1924, Hitler gained popular support by attacking the सन्धि of versailles and promoting Pan-Germanism, antisemitism, and anti-communism साथ charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda.
After his appointment as chancellor in 1933, he रूपांतरित the Weimar Republic into the तीसरा reich, a single-party dictatorship based on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of Nazism.
Hitler 's aim was to establish a नई Order of absolute Nazi German hegemony in continental यूरोपीय.
to this end, his foreign और domestic policies had the aim of seizing Lebensraum ( `` living space '' ) for the Germanic people.
He directed the rearmament of Germany और the invasion of कैंडल by the Wehrmacht in September 1939, resulting in the outbreak of World युद्ध II in Europe.
अंतर्गत Hitler 's rule, in 1941 German forces and their यूरोपीय allies occupied most of Europe और North Africa.
In 1943, जर्मनी had been मजबूर onto the defensive and suffered a series of escalating defeats.
In the final days of the war, during the Battle of Berlin in 1945, Hitler married उसके long-time partner, Eva Braun.
on 30 April 1945, less than two days later, the two committed suicide to avoid capture by the Red फौज, and their शवों यहूद burned.
Hitler 's aggressive foreign नीति is considered the main कारण of the outbreak of संसार War II in Europe.
His antisemitic policies and racially motivated विचारधारा resulted in the deaths of at least 5.5 लाख Jews, and millions of अन्य people deemed racially अवर.

A domain name is an पहचान string that defines a realm of प्रशासनिक autonomy, प्राधिकार, or control on the Internet.
डोमेन names are formed by the rules and प्रक्रियाओं of the Domain Name System ( DNS ).
Technically, any नाम पंजीकृत in the डीएनएस is a domain नाम.
Domain names are used in various networking contexts और application-specific naming and addressing purposes.
In सामान्य, a domain name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource, such as a personal कंप्यूटर used to access the Internet, a सर्वर computer होस्टिंग a वेब site, or the web site itself or कोई other service communicated via the Internet.
डोमेन names are organized in subordinate levels ( subdomains ) of the DNS root domain, which is nameless.
The first-level set of domain names are the top-level domains ( TLDs ), including the generic top-level domains ( gTLDs ), ऐसे as the prominent डोमेन com, info, net and org, and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ).
Below ये top-level डोमेन in the डीएनएस hierarchy हैं the second-level and third-level डोमेन names कि हैं typically खोलें लिये reservation by end-users who wish to connect local area networks to the Internet, create other सरेआम accessible Internet resources or run web sites.
The पंजीकरण of these domain names is प्रायः administered by domain नाम registrars who sell their services to the public.
A fully qualified domain name ( FQDN ) is a domain name that is completely specified in the hierarchy of the DNS, having no omitted parts.
Domain names are प्रायः लिखा in lowercase, although labels in the Domain Name System are case-insensitive.
नाइट्रेट is a polyatomic ion with the आणविक सूत्र NO3− और a molecular mass of 62.0049 g/mol. Nitrates also describe the organic functional group RONO2.
ये nitrate esters are a specialized class of explosives.

कृषि is a major उद्योग in the United राज्य और the country is a net exporter of food.
As of the last जनसांख्यिकी of agriculture in 2007, there were 2.2 million farms, covering an area of, an average of per farm.
हालांकि agricultural activity occurs in most states, it is particularly concentrated in the vast expanse of flat, arable land ज्ञात as the Great Plains, which encompasses the central region of the nation.
The Mpemba effect, named after Tanzanian student Erasto Mpemba, is the assertion that warmer water can freeze faster than colder जल.
Although there is anecdotal support for the effect, there is no agreement on exactly what the effect is and under what circumstances it occurs.
There have been reports of similar phenomena since प्राचीन times, although with insufficient detail for the claims to be replicated.
The phenomenon seems contrary to thermodynamics, but a number of संभावित explanations for the effect have been proposed.
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise परिभाषा of `` freezing '' and control a vast number of starting parameters in order to confirm or explain the प्रभाव.
the Siamese (, ) is one of the first distinctly recognized breeds of Oriental बिल्ली.
The breed originated in थाईलैंड ( formerly known as Siam ), where they are one of several native breeds and are called wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a नाम meaning `` moon diamond '' ).
in the 20th century the Siamese बिल्ली became एक of the सबसे popular breeds in Europe and उत्तर America.

In economics, the धन supply or money भण्डार, is the total amount of monetary assets available in an economy at a specific time.
वहीँ are several ways to define `` money, '' but मानक measures usually include currency in परिसंचरण and demand deposits ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily accessed assets on the books of financial institutions ).
धन supply data are recorded and published, usually by the government or the central bank of the country.
Public and निजी सेक्टर analysts have long monitored changes in money supply because of इसके effects on the price level, inflation, the exchange rate और the business cycle.
That relation between money and prices is historically associated with the quantity सिद्धान्त of money.
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct संबंध between money-supply growth and long-term price inflation, at least for rapid increases in the amount of money in the economy.
That is, a country such as Zimbabwe which saw rapid increases in its धन supply also saw rapid increases in prices ( hyperinflation ).
This is एक reason for the reliance on monetary policy as a means of controlling inflation.
The nature of इस causal chain is the subject of contention.
Some heterodox economists argue कि the money सप्लाई is endogenous ( determined by the workings of the अर्थव्यवस्था, not by the central bank ) and that the sources of महंगाई जरूर be मिला in the distributional ढांचा of the economy.
In addition, those अर्थशास्त्रियों seeing the central bank 's control over the money सप्लाई as feeble कह that there are two weak links between the growth of the money सप्लाई and the inflation rate.
First, in the aftermath of a मंदी, when many resources are underutilized, an increase in the money supply can cause a sustained increase in real production instead of inflation.
दूसरी, if the velocity of धन, i.e., the ratio between nominal जीडीपी and money supply, changes, an increase in the money supply could have either no effect, an अतिरंजित effect, or an unpredictable प्रभाव on the विकास of नाममात्र GDP.

IMAX ( an abbreviation for चित्र Maximum ) is a motion picture film format and a set of cinema projection मानकों created by the Canadian कम्पनी IMAX Corporation.
IMAX has the capacity to record and display images of far greater size and resolution than conventional फिल्मी systems.
Since 2002, some feature films have been परिवर्तित ( or upgraded ) into imax format for प्रदर्शक in IMAX theatres and some have also been partially shot in IMAX.
IMAX is the most widely used system for special-venue film प्रस्तुतियों.
, there हैं 697 IMAX theatres in 52 देशों.

अनेक sequences लिये it were शॉट at the Queen Street West और Yonge Street स्टोर after घंटों.
संविधानवाद, in इसके most general meaning, is `` a complex of ideas, attitudes, and patterns of behavior elaborating the principle that the authority of सरकारी गर्भाशयी from and is limited by a body of आधारभूत law ''.
a राजनैतिक organization is संवैधानिक to the extent कि it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of शक्ति control for the protection of the interests and liberties of the citizenry, including those that may be in the minority ``.
As वर्णित by राजनैतिक scientist and constitutional scholar David fellman :
An ice-cream headache, also ज्ञात as brain freeze, cold-stimulus headache, or its given scientific name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( अर्थ `` nerve pain of the sphenopalatine ganglion `` ), is a रूप of ब्रैड cranial pain or सिरदर्द commonly associated with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold पेय or भोजन such as ice cream and ice pops.
It is caused by having something cold touch the छत of the मुँह ( palate ), and is believed to परिणाम from a nerve जवाब causing rapid constriction and swelling of रक्त vessels or a `` referring `` of पीड़ा इससे the roof of the mouth to the head.
The rate of intake for ठंडा foods रै been studied as a contributing factor.
There are people who can not experience `` brain freeze '' or similar symptoms.
The term ice-cream headache has been in उपयोग since at least 31 January 1937, contained in a journal entry by रेबेका Timbres published in the 1939 book We did n't पूछो Utopia : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia.
The पहला प्रकाशित use of the पद brain freeze, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, थी on 27 May 1991.
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : नोट `` s '' rather than `` z '' ) is a स्कॉट्स poem written by Robert burns in 1788 and set to the tune of a traditional folk song ( Roud # 6294 ).
It is well known in many countries, especially in the English-speaking world ; its traditional use being to celebrate the start of the New Year at the स्ट्रोक of midnight.
By extension, it is also sung at funerals, graduations and as a farewell or ending to अन्य अवसरों.
The international लड़के Scout youth गति, in many countries, uses it as a close to jamborees और other functions.
The song 's Scots title may be translated into English वस्तुतः as `` बूढ़ा long since '', or more idiomatically, `` long long ago '', `` दिनों gone by '' or `` बूढ़ा times ''.
Consequently `` For auld lang syne '', as it appears in the first line of the chorus, might be loosely translated as `` for ( the sake of ) old times ''.
The phrase `` Auld Lang syne '' is भी used in समान poems by रॉबर्ट Ayton ( 1570–1638 ), Allan ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), and James Watson ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating Burns.
Matthew Fitt uses the phrase `` In the days of auld lang syne '' as the equivalent of `` Once upon a time...
`` in उसके retelling of fairy किस्से in the स्कॉट्स भाषा.

Leeroy Jenkins, sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins and प्रायः elongated with numerous additional अक्षर, is an अंतरजाल मीम नामित for a player अक्षर created by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's mmorpg, संसार of Warcraft.
the character became popular due to a video of the खेल that circulated around the Internet.
The phenomenon has since spread beyond the सीमाएँ of the gaming जातियाँ into other ऑनलाइन and mainstream media.
Oscar Grant was fatally shot by BART police अधिकारी Johannes mehserle in Oakland, California, United States, in the early morning hours of New साल 's दिन 2009.
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded Bay Area Rapid Transit ट्रैन returning from San Francisco, BART Police officers detained ऑस्कर Grant and several other passengers on the मंच at the Fruitvale BART Station.
Officer Johannes Mehserle and another officer were restraining Grant, who थी prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest.
Officer mehserle stood and, according to witnesses, कहा : `` Get back, I 'm gon na tase him. ''
Then Mehserle drew his गन और shot Grant once in the back ; Mehserle appeared stunned, put his hands to his head and exclaimed, `` Oh, my God ! ''
दौरान उसके अदालत testimony, Mehserle कहा that Grant then exclaimed, `` You शॉट me ! ''
Grant turned आउट to be unarmed ; he was pronounced dead the अगला morning at Highland Hospital in ओकलैंड.
The events were captured on अनेक डिजिटल video and cell phone cameras.
The फुटेज was disseminated to media outlets and to विभिन्न websites, जहाँ it was watched millions of टाइम्स.
The following days देखी दोनो peaceful और violent विरोध.
The shooting रै been variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter और a summary execution.
On January 13, Alameda County prosecutors charged Mehserle with murder for the shooting.
He resigned his position and pleaded not guilty.
the विचारण began on June 10, 2010.
Michael rains, Mehserle 's criminal defense attorney, argued that Mehserle mistakenly shot Grant with his pistol, intending to उपयोग his Taser जब he saw Grant reaching for उसके waistband.
Pretrial filings argue that his client did not commit first-degree murder and asked a Los Angeles न्यायधीश to instruct the jury to limit its deliberations to either second-degree murder or acquittal.
Oakland civil rights attorney John burris filed a $ 25 million wrongful मौत claim विरूद्ध BART on behalf of ग्रान्ट 's family.
On July 8, 2010, the jury लौटे इसके verdict : Mehserle was found guilty of involuntary manslaughter और नहीं guilty of second-degree हत्या और voluntary manslaughter.
आरंभिक protests against the ruling यहूद peacefully organized ; looting, arson, destruction of property, and small दंगे broke out बाद dark.
Nearly 80 people यहूद eventually arrested.
on Friday, जुलाई 9, 2010, the u.S. Justice Department खोली a सिविल rights case against mehserle ; the संघीय government can prosecute him independently for the वही अधिनियम under the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy.
the Department of Justice होगा be working with the u.S. Attorney 's office in सैन Francisco and the एफबीआई.
on नवम्बर 5, 2010, mehserle was sentenced to two years, minus time served.
He served his समय in the Los एंजिल्स County कारावास, occupying a private cell away from other prisoners.
He was released on June 13, 2011 and is now on parole.
Major प्रतिनिधि of the Harlem Renaissance.
The हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण थी a सांस्कृतिक movement that spanned the 1920s.
At the time, it was known as the `` New Negro Movement '', named after the 1925 anthology by Alain Locke.
Though it was centered in the Harlem पड़ोस of New York City, many French-speaking black लेखक इससे African and caribbean colonies who जिया in Paris were also बहकावे by the Harlem Renaissance.
The Harlem Renaissance is unofficially recognized to have spanned from परिचय 1919 जबतक the early or mid-1930s.
Many of its ideas lived on much longer.
The zenith of this `` flowering of नीग्रो literature '', as James Weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance, was placed between 1924 ( the year that Opportunity : A Journal of Negro Life hosted a party for black writers जहाँ many white publishers were in attendance ) and 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ).

The history of Africa begins with the prehistory of Africa and the emergence of Homo sapiens in ईस्ट Africa, continuing into the present as a patchwork of diverse and politically developing nation राज्य.
Some जल्दी evidence of agriculture in अफ़्रीकी dates from 16,000 bce, and metallurgy इससे परिचय 4000 BCE.
The recorded history of early civilization arose in Egypt, और later in Nubia, the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa.
During the Middle Ages, Islam spread through the regions.
Crossing the Maghreb and the Sahel, a major center of Muslim culture was Timbuktu.
Some notable pre-colonial states और societies in Africa include the Nok culture, Mali Empire, Ashanti Empire, Kingdom of Mapungubwe, Kingdom of Sine, Kingdom of saloum, Kingdom of Baol, Kingdom of Zimbabwe, Kingdom of Kongo, Ancient Carthage, Numidia, Mauretania, the Aksumite Empire, the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate.
From the late 15th century, Europeans and Arabs took slaves from वेस्ट, Central and Southeast Africa overseas in the African slave trade.
European colonization of Africa developed rapidly in the हाथापाई for Africa of the लेट 19th and early 20th centuries.
Following struggles for independence in many parts of the महाद्वीप, as well as a weakened Europe बाद the Second World War ; decolonization took place.
Africa 's history has been challenging for researchers in the field of African studies क्युकी of the scarcity of लिखा sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa.
Scholarly तकनीकों such as the recording of oral history, ऐतिहासिक linguistics, archaeology and आनुवंशिकी have महरूम crucial.
Curry Foley was the first खिलाड़ी in Major League बेसबॉल इतिहास to hit for the cycle.
In baseball, hitting लिये the cycle is the accomplishment of एक बैटर hitting a single, a double, a triple, and a home run in the वही game.
Collecting the हिट्स in that order is known as a `` natural cycle ''.
चक्र हैं uncommon in Major League Baseball ( MLB ), and have occurred 294 times since the first by Curry Foley in 1882.
The cycle is roughly as आम as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in MLB history ) ; it रै been called `` one of the rarest '' and `` most मुश्किल feats '' in baseball.
Based on 2009 offensive स्तर, the probability of an average MLB player hitting for a cycle विरूद्ध an average team in a game is approximately 0.00590 % ; इस corresponds to about 2.5 चक्र in a 162-game season with 30 teams.
In other baseball leagues, the cycle is achieved less frequently.
Through September 4, 2008, 62 players in निप्पन Professional Baseball ( NPB ), the top-level baseball संगठन in जापानी, have hit for the cycle, the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara.
दो players have hit for the cycle on the वही day once in NPB history ; this has occurred twice in MLB history.
एक npb player has भी hit लिये the cycle in an npb All-Star game.
No player has कभी hit for the cycle in the MLB All-Star Game or the postseason.
The main slave routes in medieval Africa.
This आलेख discusses systems, इतिहास, and effects of slavery within Africa.
See Arab slave trade, Atlantic slave trade, Maafa, और Slavery in contemporary Africa for other discussions.
`` Slave transport in Africa ''.
europeans usually did not enter the interior regions.
गुलामी in Africa has existed throughout the continent for many centuries, and continues in the वर्तमान day.
Systems of servitude and गुलामी were common in many parts of the continent, as वे were in much of the ancient संसार.
In most African समाजों where slavery was प्रचलित, the enslaved people were largely treated as indentured servants and not treated as chattel slaves.
जब the Arab slave trade and अटलांटिक slave trade began, many of the लोकल स्लेव systems changed and began supplying captives for slave markets outside of Africa.
गुलामी in historical अफ़्रीकी was practiced in many different forms and some of these do नहीं clearly fit the definitions of slavery elsewhere in the world.
Debt slavery, enslavement of war captives, military slavery, और criminal गुलामी were all practiced in various parts of Africa.
Although वहीँ had been कुछ trans-Saharan trade इससे the आंतरिक of sub-saharan Africa to other regions, slavery थी a small part of the economic life of many societies in Africa until the परिचय of transcontinental slave trades ( अरब और Atlantic ).
स्लेव practices were again transformed with European colonization of Africa and the formal abolition of slavery in the जल्दी 1900s.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included साथ the Microsoft Windows NT family of ऑपरेटिंग systems कि provides limited information about computer performance और running applications, प्रक्रियाओं and CPU usage, commit charge and memory information, network activity and statistics, logged-in users, and system services ( and as प्रायः is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft for खिड़कियाँ, 3rd party software is available जिससे fills the requirements more thoroughly, e.g, `` Process Explorer '', `` Extended Task Manager '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` प्रणाली Explorer '' ).
The Task Manager can also be प्रयुक्त to set process प्राथमिकताएं, प्रोसेसर affinity, forcibly terminate processes, और shut down, restart, hibernate or log off from खिड़कियाँ.
Windows Task Manager was introduced with Windows NT 4.0.
Previous versions of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the कार्य List अनुप्रयोग, जिससे had far fewer features.
The task list was capable of listing currently running प्रक्रियाओं and killing them, or creating a नई process.
in Windows XP only, a shutdown menu is also present that allows अभिगम to Standby, hibernate, फेरे बंद, Restart, Log Off and Switch User.
Earlier versions of microsoft खिड़कियाँ ( microsoft Windows 3.x, Windows 95, Windows 98 ) था a program known as tasks to display the कार्यक्रम currently कार्यशील.
This file was executed by running the taskman.exe file from the c : \Windows निर्देशिका.

Sparsely आबादी in relation to its क्षेत्रफल, the Democratic गणतंत्र of the Congo ( drc ) is home to a vast potential of natural resources and mineral wealth, its untapped deposits of raw minerals are estimated to be worth in excess of US $ 24 trillion, yet the economy of the DRC has declined drastically since the mid-1980s.
At the time of its independence in 1960, DRC was the second most industrialized देश in अफ़्रीकी after दक्षिण Africa ; it boasted a thriving mining सेक्टर and its agriculture सेक्टर was relatively productive.
If the दर्शक stares at this image for 20–60 seconds and stares at a white object, a negative afterimage होगा appear ( in this case, it होगा be cyan on magenta ).
This can also be achieved by the दर्शक closing his/her eyes और tilting उनके head up.
An afterimage or ghost image or image burn-in is an optical illusion that refers to an image continuing to appear in one 's दृष्टि after the exposure to the original image has ceased.
एक of the most common afterimages is the bright glow that seems to फ्लैश before one 's eyes after looking into a लाइट source for a few seconds.
Closing the नजर can help achieve a better sense of the color in इसके own aspect.
Afterimages come in two forms, negative ( उलट ) and positive ( retaining original color ).
The process behind positive afterimages is unknown, हालांकि thought to be सम्बन्धित to neural adaptation.
On the अन्य hand, ऋणात्मक afterimages are a retinal phenomenon and are well understood.
Lost is an American सीरियल नाटक television series that premiered on September 22, 2004 on the अमरीकी प्रसारण Company ( ABC ).
The series थी created by J. J. Abrams और Damon Lindelof, based upon an original pilot script titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber.
छह seasons of the show aired, in addition to numerous clip shows to recap previous episodes.
ABC announced कि खोया would end after six seasons, having produced a total of 121 episodes.
The series फ़ॉलो the past, present, and future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a plane crash on a passenger jet, oceanic उड़ान 815, flying from Sydney to Los Angeles बाद it crashes on a tropical island in the दक्षिण Pacific.
The series भी includes stories of the lives of people already living on the island — they शामिल the `` Others ``, who initially antagonize the survivors, as well as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana.
Each episode typically features action on the island as खूब as a secondary storyline from another point in a character 's life.
Season 6 सुविधाएँ a detailing of the जीवनदान of the survivors in a अलग reality, as if the flight had never crashed.
In the following list, the term `` featured character ( s ) '' refers to the अक्षर or characters जो हैं featured in the secondary storyline of प्रत्येक episode.
`` no.
in series '' refers to the एपीसोड 's number in the overall श्रेणी, whereas `` No.
in season '' refers to the episode 's number in each particular ऋतु.

Flat feet ( also पुकारा pes planus or fallen arches ) is a औपचारिक reference to a medical condition in which the arch of the पैर collapses, with the entire एकमात्र of the foot coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground.
in some individuals ( an estimated 20–30 % of the general population ) the arch simply never develops in one foot ( unilaterally ) or both feet ( bilaterally ).
Three studies ( see citations below in military section ) of military recruits have दिखाया no evidence of later increased चोट, or पैर problems, due to चपटा फीट, in a population of people who reach सैन्य सेवा आयु without prior foot problems.
however, these अध्ययन can not be used to judge possible भविष्य damage from this condition when diagnosed at younger ages.
They also can not be applied to persons whose flat feet are associated साथ foot symptoms, or certain symptoms in other parts of the body ( such as the लेग or back ) possibly referable to the foot.
Generation X, commonly abbreviated to Gen X, is the generation born बाद the Western post-World युद्ध ii baby boom.
Demographers, इतिहासकारों and commentators use beginning birth तिथियाँ from the जल्दी 1960s to the early 1980s.
The पद was popularized by Douglas coupland 's 1991 novel Generation X : Tales for an Accelerated संस्कृति.
Before that, it had been used लिये विभिन्न subcultures or countercultures after the 1950s.
दबाव ulcers, also known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores, are localized injuries to the skin and/or underlying ऊतक usually over a bony prominence, as a result of pressure, or pressure in combination with shear and/or friction.
Most commonly this will be the sacrum, coccyx, heels or the hips, but other sites such as the elbows, knees, ankles or the वापस of the cranium can be affected.
The cause of pressure ulcers is pressure applied to soft tissue so that blood flow to the soft tissue is completely or partially obstructed.
Shear is also a cause ; shear pulls on blood बरतन that feed the स्किन.
Pressure छाले सबसे commonly develop in persons who are not चलती about or are confined to wheelchairs.
It is widely believed that other factors can influence the सहिष्णुता of skin for pressure and shear thereby increasing the risk of दबाव अल्सर development.
These कारकों are protein-calorie malnutrition, microclimate ( skin wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ), diseases that reduce blood flow to the skin, such as arteriosclerosis or रोगों that reduce the feeling in the skin, such as paralysis or न्यूरोपैथी.
The healing of pressure ulcers may be slowed by the आयु of the person, medical conditions ( such as arteriosclerosis, diabetes or infection ), smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory दवाएँ.
Although often prevented and treatable if found early, pressure ulcers can be very difficult to prevent in critically ill patients, frail elders, wheelchair users ( especially where spinal injury is involved ) and terminally ill मरीजों.
Primary prevention is to redistribute दबाव by turning the patient regularly.
The benefit of turning to avoid further sores is well documented since at तनिक the 19th सदी.
In addition to turning and re-positioning the patient in bed or wheelchair, खाने a balanced diet with adequate protein and keeping the स्किन free इससे exposure to urine and स्टूल is very important.
the prevalence of pressure ulcers in hospital जमावट is high, but improvements are being बना.
According to the 2010 IPUP ( International दबाव Ulcer Prevalence Survey ) conducted in Canada, there was a significant decrease in the overall facility-acquired prevalence of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010.
Ulcers were most commonly पहचाना at the sacral/coccyx ulcer location ; however, एड़ी ulcers were the most common facility-acquired location in the survey.

Green Bay is a city in और the county seat of Brown County in the u.S. state of Wisconsin, located at the head of Green Bay, a sub-basin of Lake Michigan, at the mouth of the Fox River.
It has an उन्नयन of above sea level and is located north of Milwaukee.
The population was 104,057 at the 2010 census.
It is the third-largest city in the state of Wisconsin, after Milwaukee and मैडिसन.
It is also the third-largest city on the वेस्ट shore of Lake मिशिगन, after Chicago और Milwaukee.
Green Bay is घर to the Green खाड़ी Packers of the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग, making it by far the smallest metropolitan क्षेत्रफल in the USA to host a major professional sports franchise.
ग्रीन Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय Area, जिससे कवर Brown, Kewaunee, and Oconto काउंटी and had a combined population of 282,599 at the 2000 census.
ग्रीन Bay is an industrial city with several meatpacking and paper plants, and a port on Green Bay, an arm of Lake Michigan that locals call the Bay of Green खाड़ी, to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city.
It is घर to the National Railroad Museum ; the Neville Public Museum, with प्रदर्शनियों of art, history, and विज्ञान ; and the University of Wisconsin–Green Bay.
Luteinizing hormone ( LH, also ज्ञात as lutropin and sometimes lutrophin ) is a hormone उत्पादित by gonadotroph cells in the anterior pituitary gland.
In females, an acute वृद्धि of lh ( `` lh surge '' ) triggers ovulation and development of the कॉर्पस luteum.
In males, where LH had भी been called अंतरालीय cell-stimulating hormone ( ICSH ), it stimulates Leydig cell production of टेस्टोस्टेरोन.
it acts synergistically with FSH.
Selena Quintanilla-Pérez ( April 16, 1971 – March 31, 1995 ), known simply as Selena, was an American singer-songwriter.
She was named the `` top लैटिन artist of the '90s '' and `` बेहतरीन selling Latin artist of the decade '' by Billboard for her fourteen top-ten singles in the Top लैटिन गीतों chart, including seven number-one hits.
Selena had the सबसे successful singles of 1994 and 1995, `` Amor Prohibido `` और `` No Me Queda Más ``.
She was called `` The Queen of Tejano म्यूज़िक `` and the मैक्सिकन equivalent of मैडोना.
Selena released her first album, Selena y Los Dinos, at the age of बारह.
She जीती Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 tejano Music पुरस्कार and landed a recording contract with EMI a few years later.
Her कीर्ति grew throughout the early 1990s, especially in Spanish-speaking countries, and she had begun रिकॉर्डिंग in English as well.
सेलिना थी murdered at the age of 23 on March 31, 1995 by yolanda Saldívar, the former president of her प्रशंसक club.
On April 12, 1995, two weeks बाद her death, George W. बुश, governor of Texas at the समय, declared उसके birthday `` Selena Day '' in टेक्सास.
Warner Bros. produced सेलिना, a film based on उसके life starring Jennifer Lopez, in 1997.
Selena 's life was भी the आधार of the musical Selena Forever starring Veronica Vazquez as सेलिना.
In June 2006 Selena थी commemorated with a life-sized bronze statue ( Mirador de la Flor in कॉर्पस Christi, Texas ) and a सेलिना museum opened there.
वो रै sold over 60 लाख एल्बम worldwide, making her एक of the best-selling artists of all time.
She is also the only female artist to have five albums in U.S. Billboard 200 at the same time.
German Stahlhelm इससे World War II
Insignia of the bolivian फौज Colorados regiment, showing a Stahlhelm और दो crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( plural, Stahlhelme ) is जर्मनी for `` स्टील helmet ''.
The Imperial German Army began to replace the traditional boiled-leather Pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) with the stahlhelm during World War I in 1916.
The term stahlhelm refers both to a जेनेरिक steel helmet, and अधिक specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) जर्मनी design.
The Stahlhelm, with its distinctive `` कोयले scuttle `` आकार, was an instantly recognizable icon लिये सैन्य imagery and became a common element of सैन्य propaganda on दोनो sides, बस like the Pickelhaube before it.
इसके name थी also used by the Stahlhelm, a paramilitary nationalist संगठन स्थापित at the समाप्त of 1918.
Glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence, the production और उत्सर्जन of light by a जीना organism
Chemiluminescence, is the emission of light ( luminescence ) without emission of heat
Phosphorescence, a specific type of photoluminescence related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence, production of luminescence in a material by the बमबारी of ionizing विकिरण

Frankfurt Airport serves as a hub city लिये Lufthansa और receives flights इससे Star Alliance carriers.
Airline hubs are airports क्रमित as विशाल, medium, छोटी, and non-hubs as एक of the faa airport categories which are re-evaluated every year based on number of commercial यात्री.
The more common but informal use for the phrase airline hub is an विमानक्षेत्र that an airline uses as a transfer point to get यात्री to उनके intended गंतव्य.
It is part of a हब और spoke model, where travelers moving between airports not served by direct flights change planes en रूट to their destinations.
इस is as opposed to the Point to Point model.
Many hubs of the एयरलाइंस हैं also situated at airports in the cities of the respective head कार्यालयों.
कुछ airlines may use only a single hub, while other airlines use multiple hubs.
Hubs are used for both passenger flights as well as cargo flights.
Many एयरलाइंस also use फ़ोकस cities, which फलन much the same as hubs.
Airlines may also use secondary hubs, a non-technical पद for large focus cities.
A hub in the middle of a route is more effective than at either end as connecting traffic more easily fills the plane - passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route.
Hollow lacedaemon.
Site of the Menelaion, the shrine to Helen and Menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze Age city that stood on the hill of Therapne on the left bank of the Eurotas River overlooking the future site of डोरियन Sparta.
Across the घाटी the successive ridges of Mount Taygetus are in evidence.
स्पार्टा ( Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ), or Lacedaemon, थी a prominent city-state in ancient Greece, situated on the banks of the Eurotas River in Laconia, in south-eastern Peloponnese.
It emerged as a political entity around the 10th century bc, when the invading Dorians subjugated the लोकल, non-Dorian population.
Around 650 BC, it rose to become the dominant military land-power in ancient Greece.
दिए इसके military pre-eminence, Sparta was recognized as the overall leader of the combined Greek forces during the greco-persian Wars.
Between 431 and 404 BC, स्पार्टा was the प्रिंसिपल enemy of Athens during the Peloponnesian War, from which it emerged victorious, though at great लागत.
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in the Battle of Leuctra in 371 BC ended Sparta 's prominent role in Greece.
However, it maintained its political independence until the Roman conquest of Greece in 146 BC.
it तब underwent a long period of decline, विशेषकर in the मध्य Ages, when many Spartans moved to live in Mystras.
Modern Sparta is the capital of the Greek regional ईकाई of laconia and a center for the प्रसंस्करण of goods such as citrus and olives.
Sparta थी unique in ancient Greece for its social system और संविधान, which completely focused on सैन्य प्रशिक्षण and excellence.
Its inhabitants were classified as spartiates ( spartan नागरिकों, जो enjoyed full अधिकारों ), Mothakes ( non-Spartan फ़्री men raised as Spartans ), Perioikoi ( freedmen ), and Helots ( state-owned serfs, enslaved non-Spartan local population ).
spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge training and education regimen, and Spartan phalanges were widely considered to be among the best in बैटल.
Spartan women enjoyed considerably more rights and equality to men than elsewhere in the classical world.
Sparta थी the विषय of fascination in its अपना दिन, as खूब as in the West following the revival of classical learning.
This प्रेम or admiration of Sparta is known as Laconism or Laconophilia.
Fantasy football is an interactive competition in which users compete against each other as general managers of virtual teams.
the players that an individual is able to मैनेज are professional अमरीकी football खिलाड़ी in the National Football League.
The different क्रियाएँ people are able to make are drafting, trading, adding or छोड़ने players, and changing rosters.
Due to the growth of the Internet, Fantasy football has vastly increased in popularity, particularly because काल्पनिक फ़ुटबॉल providers ऐसे as ESPN, याहू, CBS, and the NFL itself are able to keep track of आंकडे entirely online, eliminating the need to जाँच box scores and अखबारों regularly to keep track of players.
सबसे leagues have a सिंगल week championship in Week 16 of the NFL ऋतु.
संसार population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, orange, green ) and US Census ब्यूरो historical estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded population figures are in blue.
According to the highest अनुमान, the संसार population may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may मनाही to 6 billion.
The world population is the total number of living humans on Earth.
As of today, it is अनुमानित to number billion by the United States Census Bureau ( uscb ).
the USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 अरब on कूच 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population निधि, it reached this पड़ाव on October 31, 2011.
The world जनसांख्यिकी has experienced continuous विकास since the end of the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly during the 1950s, और for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The विकास rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births यहूद highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and are now expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million, while deaths क्रमांक 56 लाख per साल, and हैं expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued बढ़ाएँ in जनसांख्यिकी in the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth, stagnation, or भी overall decline in the global जनसांख्यिकी by 2150.
Some विश्लेषकों have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food आपूर्तियाँ, and energy संसाधन.
skeletal muscles homo sapiens
This is a table of muscles of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and almost प्रत्येक muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral मांसपेशियां, found on both sides, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this आलेख.
Nevertheless, the सटीक number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles differently, e.g. regarding कया is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as अनेक muscles.
Examples range from 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human देह can be categorized into a number of groups which include muscles relating to the head और गर्दन, muscles of the torso or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and मांसपेशियां of the lower limbs.
the action refers to the action of each muscle इससे the standard anatomical position.
In other positions, अन्य actions may be performed.
A gold bar is a quantity of refined metallic gold of कोई shape that is made by a बार producer meeting standard conditions of manufacture, labeling, and record keeping.
Larger gold bars that are produced by pouring the molten metal into molds are called ingots.
Smaller bars may be manufactured by minting or stamping from appropriately rolled gold sheets.
the standard सुनहरा bar held as gold reserves by central बैंको और traded among bullion डीलर is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good डिलीवरी gold bar.
the kilobar, which is to say 1000 grams in mass, is the बार that is more manageable and is used extensively for trading and investment.
The premium on these bars when traded is very low over the spot value of the सुनहरा बनाना it ideal for small transfers between banks and traders.
Most kilobars हैं flat, although some investors, particularly in Europe, prefer the brick आकार.
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19, 1949 ) is a former American football क्वार्टरबैक in the National Football League, playing for the नई Orleans संतो from 1971 to 1982, then for the Houston Oilers and मिनेसोटा Vikings.
he is the father of वर्तमान डेनवर Broncos quarterback Peyton मैनिंग, current New York दिग्गज starting quarterback Eli मैनिंग, and former Ole Miss receiver Cooper Manning.
Advocacy is a political process by an individual or समूह जिससे aims to influence public-policy and resource आवंटन निर्णय within political, आर्थिक, and social systems and संस्थानों.
वकालत can include many क्रियाएँ that a व्यक्ति or organization undertakes सहित media अभियान, public speaking, commissioning और publishing research or polls or the दाखिल of an amicus ब्रैड.
Lobbying ( often by लॉबी groups ) is a form of advocacy जहाँ a direct approach is made to legislators on an issue जिससे plays a significant role in modern politics.
Research is beginning to explore how advocacy groups in the u.S. and Canada are using social media to facilitate civic engagement and collective action.
The ध्वज of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de México ) is a vertical tricolor of green, white, and रेड with the national कोट of बाहें चार्ज in the बीच of the white stripe.
While the meaning of the colors रै changed over time, these three colors were adopted by Mexico following independence इससे स्पेन during the country 's War of Independence, and subsequent First Mexican Empire.
the वर्तमान ध्वज थी adopted in 1968, but the overall design has महरूम used since 1821, when the First National Flag was created.
The current विधि of national symbols, विधि on the National Arms, Flag, and गान, that governs the use of the national flag has been in प्लेस since 1984.
Red, white, and green are the colors of the नेशनल liberation army in Mexico.
The सेंट्रल emblem is the Aztec pictogram for Tenochtitlan ( now Mexico City ), the center of their empire.
It recalls the लेजेंड that inspired the Aztecs to settle on what थी originally a lake-island.
the form of the coat of arms was most recently revised in 1968.
A ribbon in the नेशनल रंगों is at the bottom of the coat of arms.
Throughout history, the flag has changed four टाइम्स, as the design of the कोट of arms and the length-width ratios of the flag have महरूम परिवर्धित.
however, the coat of arms has had the वही सुविधाएँ throughout : an eagle, holding a serpent in its talon, is perched on top of a prickly pear cactus ; the कैक्टस is situated on a rock that उदय above a lake.
The coat of arms is derived from an Aztec legend that their gods बताई उन्हें to निर्माण a नगर where they spot an eagle on a nopal eating a serpent, which is now Mexico नगर.
The current नेशनल ध्वज, the Fourth National ध्वज, is भी used as the मैक्सिकन naval ensign by ships registered in Mexico.
A गंतव्य marketing संगठन or convention and visitor bureau promotes a town, city, region, or country in order to बढ़ाएँ the number of visitors.
It promotes the development and marketing of a destination, focusing on सम्मेलन sales, पर्यटन marketing, and सेवाएं.
Such organizations promote economic development of a गंतव्य by increasing visits from पर्यटकों and business travelers, which generates overnight lodging for a गंतव्य, visits to रेस्तरां, and shopping revenues.
Convention और visitor bureaus हैं the most महत्वपूर्ण tourism विपणन organizations in their respective पर्यटक गंतव्यों, as वे are directly जिम्मेदार for marketing the destination brand through travel and tourism `` product जागरूकता '' to visitors.
DMOs उपज अरबों of dollars in direct and indirect revenue and taxes लिये उनके destinations ' economies with their marketing and sales expertise.
Destination marketing organizations are often called travel, सम्मेलन, visitors, or tourism bureaux, welcome centers, information centers and more.
regardless of the name, ये organizations offer many services to the traveling पब्लिक.
The elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis ) is one of the largest species of deer in the world, और one of the largest जमीन स्तनधारियों in North America and पूर्वी Asia.
It थी long believed to be a subspecies of the European red deer ( Cervus elaphus ), but प्रमाण from a 2004 पढ़ाई of the mitochondrial DNA indicates that the दो are distinct species.
This एनिमल चाहिए नहीं be confused with the larger मूस ( alces alces ), to which the name `` नीलगाय '' applies in Eurasia.
अलावा from the moose, the only other member of the deer family to प्रतिद्वंद्वी the elk in size is the south एशियाई sambar ( Rusa unicolor ).
Elk range in वन and forest-edge habitat, feeding on grasses, पौधे, leaves, और bark.
हालांकि native to North America and eastern Asia, they have adapted well to countries where they have been introduced, including Argentina, Australia, और New Zealand.
Their ग्रेट adaptability may threaten endemic species and ecosystems into which वे have been introduced.
Male elk have विशाल antlers which are shed each year.
Males भी engage in ritualized समागम behaviors during the rut, including posturing, antler wrestling ( sparring ), and bugling, a loud श्रेणी of vocalizations जिससे establishes dominance over other males और attracts females.
Elk are susceptible to a number of infectious diseases, some of which can be transmitted to livestock.
Efforts to eliminate संक्रामक diseases from elk populations, largely through vaccination, have had mixed success.
Some संस्कृतियों revere the elk as a spiritual force.
in भाग of Asia, antlers and their मखमल हैं used in परंपरागत medicines.
Elk are hunted as a game species ; the meat is leaner और higher in protein than beef or chicken.
The George Washington University ( gw, GWU, or George Washington ) is a comprehensive private, coeducational research university located in वॉशिंगटन, D.C..
It awards प्रमाणपत्र, Bachelor degrees, Masters degrees, and PhDs across अनेक dozen disciplines.

the lion ( Panthera leo ) is one of the four big cats in the genus पेंथेरा and a member of the family फ़ेलिडाए.
With कुछ males exceeding in weight, it is the second-largest living cat after the tiger.
Wild lions currently exist in sub-Saharan अफ़्रीकी और in एशिया ( जहाँ an endangered remnant population resides in Gir Forest National Park in India ) while other types of lions have disappeared from North अफ़्रीकी और दक्षिणपश्चिम Asia in historic times.
Until the late Pleistocene, about 10,000 years ago, the lion थी the सबसे widespread विशाल land mammal after humans.
They were मिला in most of Africa, across Eurasia इससे western Europe to India, and in the Americas इससे the Yukon to Peru.
The lion is a vulnerable species, having seen a major population decline of 30–50 % over the past two decades in its African दायरा.
Lion populations are untenable outside designated reserves और national parks.
Although the कारण of the मनाही is नहीं fully समझा, habitat loss और conflicts with humans are currently the greatest causes of concern.
Within Africa, the वेस्ट African lion population is particularly endangered.
Lions live for 10–14 years in the जंगली, while in captivity they can live longer than 20 years.
In the wild, males seldom live longer than 10 years, as injuries sustained from continual fighting with rival males greatly reduce their longevity.
वे typically inhabit savanna and grassland, although they may take to bush and वन.
Lions are unusually social compared to other cats.
a pride of शेर consists of सम्बन्धित females and offspring and a small number of adult males.
Groups of female lions typically हंट together, preying mostly on विशाल ungulates.
शेर are apex and keystone predators, हालांकि they scavenge as opportunity allows.
While lions do not typically हंट humans, some have been known to do so.
Sleeping mainly during the day, lions are primarily nocturnal, हालांकि bordering on crepuscular in nature.
Highly distinctive, the male lion is easily recognised by its mane, and its face is एक of the most widely recognised animal symbols in human संस्कृति.
depictions have existed from the अपर Paleolithic period, with carvings and paintings from the Lascaux and Chauvet गुफाएं, through virtually सब ancient और medieval cultures where they once occurred.
It has महरूम extensively चित्रित in sculptures, in paintings, on national flags, and in contemporary films and literature.
Lions have been kept in menageries since the समय of the Roman Empire, और have been a key species sought for प्रदर्शनी in zoos over the world since the late 18th century.
Zoos are cooperating worldwide in breeding programs for the endangered Asiatic subspecies.
In the इतिहास of वीडियो games, the सातवाँ generation of consoles is the previous generation, and includes consoles released चूंकि late by Nintendo, Microsoft, and Sony.
For घर consoles, the seventh generation began on 22 November 2005 with the रिलीज of Xbox 360 and continued with the release of प्लेस्टेशन 3 on 11 November 2006, and Wii on 19 नवम्बर 2006.
Each new console introduced a new type of breakthrough in technology.
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at HD resolutions, the प्लेस्टेशन 3 offered, in addition to FHD गेमिंग, HD movie playback via a built-in 3D Blu-ray Disc खिलाड़ी, and the वी focused on integrating controllers साथ गति sensors as well as joysticks.
Joining Nintendo in the motion market, Sony released the PlayStation Move in September 2010.
The PlayStation मूव features motion sensing gaming, similar to that of the Wii.
microsoft also joined सोनी and Nintendo, साथ its Kinect.
Unlike the other two systems ( PlayStation 3 and Wii ), kinect does नहीं use any controllers of any sort और makes the users the `` नियंत्रक. ''
Having sold 8 million units in its first 60 days on the market, Kinect has claimed the Guinness World Record of being the `` fastest selling उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स यंत्र ''.
जबकि the Xbox 360 offers wired controllers as a standalone product, all PlayStation 3 controllers can be used in wired and wireless configurations.
starting with handheld consoles, the seventh generation began on 21 November 2004 with the North American introduction of the Nintendo DS as a `` third pillar '', alongside निन्टेंडो 's मौजूदा Game Boy Advance और gamecube consoles.
The Nintendo DS ( NDS ) features a touch screen and built-in microphone, and supports wireless IEEE 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards.
Additionally, the revised version of the NDS, the DSi, features two built in cameras, the ability to download खेल from the DSi store, and a web ब्राउजर.
The PlayStation पोर्टेबल, or PSP, released later the same साल on 12 December 2004, followed a different pattern.
It became the first handheld video game console to उपयोग an optical disc format, सार्वभौमिक Media Disc ( UMD ), as its primary storage media.
Sony also दिया the psp robust multi-media capability, connectivity with the PlayStation 3 and other PSPs, और Internet कनेक्टिविटी.
The Nintendo DS likewise has connectivity to the internet through the Nintendo wi-fi Connection और Nintendo DS Browser, as well as wireless connectivity to अन्य DS प्रणालियों and वी consoles.
Despite high sales numbers for both consoles, PlayStation Portable बिक्री have consistently lagged पीछे those of the Nintendo DS ; nevertheless, the प्लेस्टेशन Portable रै the distinction of being the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming system.
Sgt. Pepper 's Lonely दिल Club Band ( प्रायः shortened to Sgt. Pepper ) is the eighth studio album by अंग्रेज़ी rock बैंड the Beatles.
Released in जून 1967, the album included गीतों such as `` साथ a Little Help from my Friends ``, `` Lucy in the आसमान with Diamonds ``, and `` A Day in the Life ``.
Continuing the artistic maturation seen on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ), Sgt. Pepper further departed from the conventional pop rock idiom of the time और incorporated balladry, psychedelic, म्यूज़िक hall, और symphonic प्रभाव.
During the Sgt. Pepper sessions, the group improved upon the quality of their music 's production while exploring experimental recording techniques.
Producer George Martin 's अभिनव approach included the use of an orchestra.
Widely acclaimed and imitated, the album cover, designed by English पॉप artists Peter Blake and jann Haworth, was inspired by a स्केच by Paul McCartney that depicted the band पोज़ in front of a collage of some of their पसंदीदा celebrities.
Sgt. pepper was a worldwide critical and commercial success, बिता 27 weeks at the top of the UK Album Chart and 15 weeks at number एक on the US Billboard 200.
A seminal work in the emerging psychedelic rock style, the album थी critically acclaimed upon release and won four Grammy Awards in 1968.
With an estimated 32 million copies sold, it is one of the world 's बेहतरीन selling albums.
Sgt. Pepper is considered by many to be the most influential and famous rock album कभी, और has been नामित the greatest album of all time by both सब Time Top 1000 Albums और Rolling Stone.
The temporal lobe is a region of the दिमागी cortex that is located beneath the lateral फिशर on both cerebral hemispheres of the mammalian brain.
The temporal lobes are शामिल in the retention of विज़ुअल memories, processing sensory input, comprehending language, storing new memories, emotion, and deriving meaning.
The human lungs हैं the organs of respiration in इंसानो.
इंसानो have two फेफड़े, a right फेफड़ों and a left lung.
The right फेफड़ों consists of three lobes while the left lung is slightly smaller consisting of तभी two lobes ( the left फेफड़ों has a `` cardiac notch '' allowing space लिये the heart भीतर the छाती ).
Together, the lungs contain approximately of airways and 300 to 500 million alveoli, having a total surface area of about ( ) in adults — roughly the वही area as one पक्ष of a टेनिस अदालत.
Furthermore, if all of the capillaries that surround the alveoli were unwound and laid end to end, they would extend for about.
Each फेफड़ों weighs, therefore making the entire organ about.
Human lungs
The trachea divides into two bronchi ( one for each side ) at the स्तर of T4.
This junction is also known as the carina.
The conducting zone contains the trachea, the bronchi, the bronchioles, and the terminal bronchioles The respiratory zone contains the respiratory bronchioles, the alveolar ducts, and the alveoli.
the conducting zone and the respiratory stuffers ( but not the alveoli ) हैं made up of एयरवेज़.
the conducting zone has no गैस exchange with the blood, and is reinforced साथ cartilage in order to hold open the airways.
The conducting zone warms the एयर to and humidifies the air.
It also cleanses the air by removing particles via cilia located on the walls of all the passageways.
The lungs are surrounded by the rib cage.
The respiratory zone is the site of gas एक्सचेंज with रक्त.
The sympathetic nervous system via noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the beta receptors कल्याणकारी bronchodilation.
The parasympathetic बेचैन system via acetylcholine, which acts on the m-3 muscarinic receptors, maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar चिकना मांसपेशी.
इस action is related, although considered distinct from bronchoconstriction.
अनेक अन्य non-autonomic nervous and biochemical stimuli, including carbon dioxide and ऑक्सीजन, are भी involved in the regulation process.
The pleural cavity is the potential space between the parietal pleura, lining the inner वॉल of the thoracic cage, and the visceral pleura lining the lungs.
The lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer solely to alveolar tissue साथ respiratory bronchioles, alveolar ducts and terminal bronchioles.
However, it often includes any form of lung tissue, भी including bronchioles, bronchi, blood vessels और lung interstitium.
The margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of tequila मिश्रित with Cointreau or similar orange -flavoured liqueur और lime or lemon juice, often served with salt on the glass rim.
It is the most common tequila-based cocktail in the United States.
the drink is परोसा shaken with ice ( on the rocks ), blended साथ ice ( frozen मार्गरिटा ), or बगैर बर्फ ( straight up ).

बरगंडी is a dark रेड color associated with the Burgundy wine of the same name, which in turn is नामित after the बरगंडी region of France.
The color burgundy is similar to other shades of dark red ऐसे as maroon.
When referring to the color, `` burgundy '' is usually not capitalized.
the first recorded use of `` burgundy '' as a color name in English was in 1881.

Missing in action ( MIA ) is a casualty श्रेणी assigned under the Status of Missing to armed services personnel जो हैं reported missing during active service.
They may have been मारे, wounded, become a prisoner of war, or deserted.
If मृतक, neither उनके remains nor grave can be positively identified.
Becoming MIA has been an occupational risk for service personnel for as long as there has been warfare.

तीव्र red-eye effect in blue eyes साथ dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in photography is the common appearance of red pupils in color छायाचित्र of eyes.
It occurs when using a photographic flash very close to the camera लेंस ( as with most कॉम्पैक्ट cameras ), in ambient कम light.
The effect appears in the eyes of humans and पशु that have tapetum lucidum.
नाट्य followspot ऑपरेटर, positioned nearly coincidentally साथ a very bright light और somewhat दूर from the actors, occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage.
The effect is नहीं visible to the बाकी of the audience because it is reliant on the very small angle between the followspot operator and the light.
The विश्वविद्यालयों of California, Santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as UC Santa बारबरा or UCSB ) is a public शोध university and one of the टेन general campuses of the University of California system.
the main campus is located on a साईट in Goleta, California, संयुक्त States, from सांता Barbara and उत्तरपश्चिम of Los Angeles.
Tracing its जड़ें back to 1891 as an independent शिक्षक ' college, UCSB joined the University of California system in 1944 और is the third-oldest general-education कैम्पस in the प्रणाली.
UCSB is एक of America 's पब्लिक Ivy universities, which recognizes top public research universities in the United States.
The university is a व्यापक doctoral university और is organized into five colleges and schools offering 87 undergraduate degrees and 55 graduate degrees.
the campus is the 6th-largest in the UC system by enrollment with 18,977 undergraduate और 2,950 graduate students.
in 2012, UCSB was ranked 41st among `` National Universities '' and 10th among public विश्वविद्यालयों by U.S. न्यूज & World Report.
The university was also ranked 35th worldwide by the टाइम्स Higher Education World University Rankings and 34th worldwide ( 6th worldwide for engineering ) by the Academic Ranking of World Universities in 2012. < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is a `` बहुत high कार्यकलाप '' research university and खर्च $ 191.2 लाख on research expenditures in the 2007 fiscal year, 97th-largest in the संयुक्त States.
UCSB houses twelve national research centers, including the renowned Kavli संस्थान for Theoretical Physics.
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates, एक Fields Medalist, 29 सदस्यों of the National अकादमी of Sciences, 27 members of the नेशनल Academy of Engineering, और 31 members of the American अकादमी of Arts and Sciences.
UCSB was the No. 3 host on the ARPAnet and was elected to the Association of अमरीकी विश्वविद्यालयों in 1995.
The UC सांता Barbara Gauchos compete in the NCAA Division I बिग West सम्मेलन.
The Gauchos have जीती NCAA national championships in मेन 's soccer और men 's water पोलो.
Saint Joseph साथ the Infant यीशु by Guido Reni
Saint Joseph 's Day, March 19, the Feast of st. Joseph is in Western Christianity the principal feast दिन of Saint Joseph, Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary.
he is also the step-father of Jesus of Nazareth /jesus Christ.
It रै the rank of a solemnity in the Roman Catholic Church ; catholics who follow the Missal of 1962 celebrate it as a first class feast.
Previous to 1962 it was celebrated as a feast of the rank of double of the first class.
It is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of the Anglican Communion, and a feast or festival in the Lutheran Church.
Saint Joseph 's दिन is the Patronal Feast day for Poland as well as लिये Canada, व्यक्तियों named Joseph, Josephine, etc., for धार्मिक institutes, schools and parishes bearing his name, and for बढ़ई.
It is also Father 's Day in some Catholic countries, mainly Spain, Portugal, and Italy.
March 19 was dedicated to Saint Joseph in several Western calendars by the tenth सदी, and this custom was established in Rome by 1479.
Pope St. Pius V extended its use to the संपूर्ण Roman Rite by his Apostolic Constitution quo primum ( July 14, 1570 ).
Since 1969, एपिस्कोपल Conferences may, if they wish, transfer it to a date outside Lent.
Between 1870 and 1955, a feast was celebrated in सम्मान of St. Joseph as Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary और संरक्षक of the Universal Church, the latter title having been given to उसे by Pope Pius IX.
originally celebrated on the third Sunday बाद ईस्टर साथ an octave, बाद divino afflatu of St. Pius X ( see सुधार of the Roman Breviary by Pope Pius x ), it was moved to the preceding Wednesday.
the feast थी also retitled the Solemnity of संत जोसेफ.
This celebration and इसके accompanying octave थी abolished दौरान the modernisation और simplification of rubrics under Pope Pius XII in 1955.
it is still maintained by catholics who follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals.
As the परंपरागत अवकाश of the Apostles ss. Philip and जेम्स, May 1, had धुंधली from the मेमोरी of most Catholics by the mid-twentieth century, that of Joseph the Worker was निर्मित in order to coincide with the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries.
The feast of Ss. Philip and James, which था been celebrated on that date since the sixth century, थी स्थानांतरित इससे इसके traditional place.
In the new calendar published in 1969, the feast, which at one time occupied the highest possible rank in the Church पंचांग, was reduced to an optional Memorial, the न्यूनतम rank for a saint 's day.
The Eastern परंपरागत Church मनाता Saint Joseph on the Sunday after Christmas.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an अमरीकी singer, songwriter, रिकार्ड producer, actress, and philanthropist.
Under the guidance of Columbia Records कार्यपालिका Tommy Mottola, Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and शाखित four लगातार number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 और success with hit records भाव ( 1991 ), Music बक्सा ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling अधिनियम.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` One Sweet Day ``, a duet with Boyz II Men, spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in u.S. चार्ट इतिहास.
During the recording of the album, Carey began to deviate from her r & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop.
This musical change became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at which time Carey had separated इससे Mottola.
Carey बाएँ Columbia in 2000, और signed a record-breaking $ 100 million recording अनुबंध with Virgin Records.
पहले the release of her पहला feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a physical और emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the फिल्मी 's ग़रीब reception, she was bought out of उसके recording contract लिये $ 50 million, which led to a decline in उसके career.
She हस्ताक्षरित a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002, and after an unsuccessful काल, returned to the top of music charts साथ the Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second single `` We belong Together `` became her सबसे successful single of the 2000s, and थी later named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard.
कैरी once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; वो was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival, and Black रील and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two दशकों, Carey रै बेची more than 200 million records worldwide, making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the world 's best-selling recording कलाकार of the 1990s at the संसार Music Awards.
Carey was भी named the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000.
According to the Recording Industry Association of America, she is the third best-selling मादा कलाकार in the संयुक्त राज्य, with 63.5 million certified albums.
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained उसके eighteenth number one single in the United राज्य, more than any other solo artist.
In 2012, Carey was क्रमित second on VH1 's सूची of the `` 100 महानतम महिलाओं in Music ''.
aside इससे उसके commercial accomplishments, Carey has won five Grammy Awards, 17 World Music Awards, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World रिकॉर्ड, she is famed for her five-octave vocal दायरा, power, melismatic स्टाइल and हस्ताक्षर use of the सीटी register.
A bumblebee is any member of the bee genus Bombus, in the परिवार apidae.
There are over 250 known species, existing primarily in the Northern Hemisphere although वे also occur in South America.
They have been introduced to नई Zealand and the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई state of Tasmania.
Bumblebees are सोशल insects that are characterised by ब्लैक and yellow body hairs, often in bands.
However, some प्रजाति have orange or red on their bodies, or may be entirely black.
Another स्पष्ट ( लकिन not unique ) characteristic is the soft nature of the बाल ( long, branched setae ), पुकारा pile, कि covers उनके entire body, बनाना them appear and feel फजी.
They हैं बेहतरीन distinguished from similarly large, फजी मधुमक्खियों by the form of the मादा हिन्द लेग, which is modified to form a corbicula : a shiny concave surface that is bare, but घिरी by a fringe of hairs used to transport pollen ( in similar bees, the hind leg is completely hairy, और pollen grains are wedged into the hairs for transport ).
Like their relatives the मधु मधुमक्खियों, bumblebees feed on nectar and gather पराग to feed their यंग.
a man openly carrying a handgun in a Burger किंग in त्रिभुज, Colorado.
In the संयुक्त States, खोलें carry is shorthand terminology for `` openly carrying a firearm in public '', as distinguished from concealed carry, where firearms can नहीं be seen by the casual observer.
The practice of open carry, जहाँ gun owners openly carry firearms while they go about their daily business, has seen an increase in the U.S. in recent years.
इस has been marked by a number of व्यवस्थित events intended to increase the visibility of खोलें carry और public awareness about the practice.
Proponents of open carry point to history and statistics, noting that criminals usually छिपाते their हथियार.
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org, georgiacarry.org and some participants of the Free State Project, open carry has seen a revival in recent years, but it is नहीं yet clear if this represents just a short-term trend.
The gun rights community has महरूम mixed in its जवाब.
Alan gottlieb of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA have been cautious in expressing support, जबकि special-interest groups such as the aforementioned OpenCarry.org and georgiacarry.org, and certain national groups such as the Gun स्वामी of America ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice.
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun control groups such as the Brady Campaign और the Coalition to Stop गन Violence.
the Cattenom Nuclear Power Plant in France.
France produces around three quarters of its electricity by nuclear power.
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power Plant in Germany.
Chancellor Angela मार्केल 's coalition announced on may 30, 2011, that Germany’s 17 nuclear power stations will be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following जापानी 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster.
फिलहाल, 68 reactors are अंतर्गत construction in 15 countries.
Nuclear power stations operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it was reported that an औसत of about 10 nuclear reactors यहूद expected to become operational per year, although according to the World नाभिकीय संघ, of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009, only five actually came on stream.
As of June 2011, Germany and Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear शक्ति.
As of जून 2011, countries such as Australia, Austria, Denmark, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Malta, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
Color motion picture film refers दोनो to unexposed color photographic film in a format suitable for use in a motion चित्र कैमरा, and to समाप्त motion picture film, तैयार for use in a projector, which bears images in color.
The first color cinematography थी by अर्थात् of additive color systems such as the एक patented in England by Edward रेमंड Turner in 1899 and tested in 1902.
A simplified additive system was developed by George अल्बर्ट Smith और successfully commercialized in 1909 as kinemacolor.
These जल्दी systems used black-and-white film to photograph and प्रोजेक्ट two or more component images through different रंग filters.
Still from footage recorded by एडवर्ड Turner in 1902
With the present-day technology, there are two distinct प्रक्रियाओं : eastman Color ऋणात्मक 2 chemistry ( camera negative stocks, duplicating interpositive and internegative स्टॉक्स ) and eastman रंग Positive 2 रसायन ( positive prints for direct projection ), usually abbreviated as ECN-2 and ECP-2.
Fuji 's products are संगत साथ ecn-2 and ECP-2.
Ashanti shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter, record निर्माता, and actress.
ashanti is most प्रसिद्ध for her eponymous debut album, जिससे featured the hit song `` Foolish ``, and sold over 503,000 copies in its पहला week of release throughout the U.S. in April 2002.
the album set a Soundscan record as the biggest खोलने week sales for a new female कलाकार, outselling debuts by एलिसिया Keys and Lauryn Hill.
In the same week, she became the first female performer to simultaneously hold the top two स्थान on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 singles chart with `` Foolish '', और `` What 's Luv ? ``
( with मोटे जो ).
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten songs, `` Foolish, '' `` What 's Luv ? '' and `` सदा on Time ``, on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 चार्ट in the वही week, being the first स्त्री to accomplish this feat और being second only to the बीटल्स.
In 2003, the self-titled debut album won Ashanti her first Grammy पुरस्कार लिये Best समकालीन R & b album.
as of April 1st 2013, Ashanti has sold over 27.7 million records विश्वव्यापी.
Ashanti ended the दशक ( 2000–09 ) as the third शीर्ष new R & B artist पीछे Alicia Keys and बेयोंस.
She भी ended the decade at number 38 on the Top Artist of the Decade list.
She is currently on the list of The Twenty Best Selling म्यूज़िक singles चूंकि 1990 लिये her single Foolish for selling 7.2 million copies to-date.

भीतर seven सालो of Ashanti 's career, she has scored 16 शीर्ष 40 हिट्स on the hot 100.

She is currently working on her own प्रकाशन company हकदार Written Entertainment.
