She also performed the charity tune `` Just Stand Up `` alongside 15 other female गायकों लिये the `` Stand up to Cancer '' सजीव television खास which helped raise $ 100 million dollars for cancer research.
The United States Army Air Forces ( USAAF or aaf ) was the military विमानन भुजा of the United राज्य of America during और immediately after World War II, and the direct predecessor of the United States Air Force.
The AAF was a component of the संयुक्त States Army, which in 1942 थी divided functionally by executive order into three autonomous forces : the फौज मैदान Forces, the Services of Supply ( which in 1943 became the Army Service Forces ), and the AAF.
Each of these forces had a commanding general who reported directly to the Chief of Staff of the United States फौज.
The AAF administered all parts of military aviation formerly वितरित among the फौज Air corps, General मुख्यालय Air Force, और मैदान forces corps area commanders, और यूँ became the first air संगठन of the U.S. Army to कंट्रोल its own installations and support personnel.
In practice, the AAF was virtually autonomous inside the Army.
The शिखर size of the AAF was over 2.4 million मेन and women in service and nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944, and 783 domestic bases in दिसम्बर 1943.
by VE Day it था 1.25 million men stationed overseas and operated from more than 1,600 airfields worldwide.
The Air Corps became the Army Air Forces in जून 1941 to provide the air arm a greater स्वायत्तता in which to विस्तार अधिक efficiently, and to provide a structure for the additional command echelons जरूरी by a vastly increased force.
Although other nations already had separate air forces स्वतंत्र of the फौज or navy ( such as the British royal Air Force and the German Luftwaffe ), the aaf remained a part of the United राज्य फौज जबतक the United States Air Force came into being in September 1947.
However, in its expansion and conduct of the war, the AAF became more than just an arm of the greater organization.
By the end of World War II the AAF had become virtually an स्वतंत्र service.
By विनियमन and executive order, the AAF was a subordinate agency of the युद्ध Department tasked तभी with आयोजन, training, and equipping कॉम्बैट units, सीमित in जिम्मेदारी to the continental संयुक्त States, as were the Army मैदान Forces and the फौज सेवा Forces.
in reality, मुख्यालय AAF controlled the conduct of all aspects of the एयर war in every part of the world, determining air policy और issuing orders without transmitting उन्हें through the Chief of Staff.
This `` कंट्रास्ट between theory and fact is... आधारभूत to an understanding of the AAF. ''
the स्वतंत्रता of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of information law that allows for the full or partial disclosure of previously unreleased information and documents controlled by the United States सरकारी.
The Act defines एजेंसी records subject to disclosure, outlines mandatory प्रकटीकरण प्रक्रियाओं and grants nine exemptions to the statute.
it थी originally signed into law by President Lyndon B. Johnson, despite his misgivings, on July 4, 1966 as and went into effect the following year.
The Federal Government 's Freedom of Information Act should not be उलझन with the different and varying Freedom of Information Acts passed by the व्यक्तिगत states.
अनेक of those state acts may be similar but नहीं identical to the federal act.
The European Union ( eu ) is an economic और political union of 27 सदस्य states कि are located primarily in Europe.
The EU operates through a system of supranational स्वतंत्र संस्थानों and intergovernmental negotiated निर्णय by the member राज्य.
Institutions of the EU include the European आयोग, the Council of the European Union, the यूरोपीय Council, the Court of इंसाफ of the European Union, the European Central Bank, the Court of Auditors, and the यूरोपीय Parliament.
The European पार्लियामेंट is elected every five सालो by EU citizens.
The EU 's de facto capital is ब्रसेल्स.
The EU traces its origins from the European Coal and Steel जातियाँ ( ECSC ) and the European Economic जातियाँ ( eec ), formed by the Inner Six countries in 1951 and 1958 क्रमशः.
In the intervening years the community and its successors have grown in size by the accession of नई member states और in power by the addition of policy areas to its remit.
the Maastricht Treaty स्थापित the European Union under इसके current name in 1993.
The नवीनतम major amendment to the constitutional basis of the eu, the Treaty of Lisbon, came into force in 2009.
the EU has developed a single market through a standardised system of laws that apply in all member states.
Within the Schengen Area ( which includes 22 eu and 4 non-EU states ) पासपोर्ट controls have been abolished.
eu policies aim to ensure the free movement of लोगों, goods, services, and capital, enact legislation in justice and home affairs, and maintain आम policies on व्यापार, agriculture, fisheries और क्षेत्रीय development.
A मौद्रिक संघ, the eurozone, was स्थापित in 1999 and is composed of 17 member राज्य.
Through the Common Foreign and Security Policy the EU has developed a भूमिका in external relations and defence.
Permanent राजनयिक missions have महरूम स्थापित around the world.
The eu is represented at the United राष्ट्र, the WTO, the g8 and the G-20.
साथ a संयुक्त population of over 500 million inhabitants, or 7.3 % of the world population, the EU, in 2012, उत्पन्न a नाममात्र gross domestic product ( GDP ) of 16.584 trillion US dollars, representing approximately 20 % of the global GDP जब measured in terms of purchasing power parity, and represents the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world.
The EU was the प्राप्तकर्ता of the 2012 Nobel Peace पुरस्कार.
The Wales national रग्बी लीग team represent वेल्स in अंतरराष्ट्रीय rugby league फ़ुटबॉल matches.
Currently the team is seventh in the RLIF संसार Rankings.
The team were run अंतर्गत the auspices of the Rugby Football League, but an independent body, वेल्स Rugby League, now runs the टोली from Cardiff.
a total of three वेल्श players have been entered into the Rugby लीग Hall of Fame.
Similar to many other Welsh national sporting टीमों, Wales strip has been primarily red for many years, सहित now.
However in their last संसार Cup अभियान in 2000 they did पहनें a shirt featuring the Welsh flag, adding a touch of green and white.
The team is known as `` The Dragons '' और so the teams logo on the कमीज़ is a red dragon.
The team date वापस to 1907, making them the third oldest national side after इंग्लैण्ड और New Zealand.
और it थी a touring New Zealand side that वेल्स first निभाई against in 1908, winning 9-8 at Aberdare.
Since then Wales have regularly निभाई England, चूंकि 1935 France, as well as welcomed the touring Australia and नई Zealand टीमों, although they rarely toured themselves, नहीं playing a मैच in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere जबतक 1975.
लिये twenty-six years Wales competed against their two biggest rivals, England and France, in the European Nations Cup, winning the trophy four times.
वेल्स have भी competed in the World Cup on three अवसरों, the first time होने in 1975.
In 1995 and 2000 they had their सबसे successful tournaments to date, surprisingly making the Semi-Finals on both अवसरों before being beaten by इंग्लैण्ड and Australia respectively.
Wales failed to qualify for the 2008 World Cup, being the second highest ranked side not to do so, having lost to Scotland on points difference over two matches.
In 2008 Australian जॉन डिक्सन became the new head coach and appointed Lee briers as कप्तान, having played for Wales since 1998.
In recent seasons Wales have taken massive strides under former player Iestyn Harris who has coached Wales to back to back European Cup सफलताओं, which culminated in a Four Nations appearance in 2011.
cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the दिल muscle ) for any reason, usually leading to heart failure ; आम symptoms are dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and परिधीय edema ( swelling of the legs ).
People with cardiomyopathy हैं often at risk of dangerous forms of irregular heart ताल and sudden cardiac मौत.
The most common form of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy.
Fuck in its शाब्दिक meaning refers to the अधिनियम of sexual intercourse.
it is an English word that is प्रायः used as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
The origin of the शब्द is obscure.
It is usually considered to be first attested to around 1475, लकिन it may be considerably older.
In modern usage, fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker और fucking ) can be used in the position of a noun, a verb, an adjective or an क्रियाविशेषण.
There are अनेक common phrases which make उपयोग of the word, as well as a number of compounds incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Note : this आलेख adopts the U.S. Department of Transportation 's परिभाषा of a passenger vehicle, to mean a car or truck, used for passengers, excluding buses and trains.
The United States is home to the largest passenger गाडी market of any country in the world.
Overall, वहीँ were an estimated 254.4 million registered passenger वाहनों in the United राज्य according to a 2007 DOT study.
This क्रमांक, along with the औसत age of vehicles, has increased steadily since 1960, indicating a growing number of vehicles per capita.
the Chinese car मार्केट, however, is poised to जल्द exceed the United States ; by the end of 2012, there were over 240 million cars on the road in China.
The United States is also home to three विशाल vehicle manufacturers : सामान्य मोटर्स, घाट Motor कम्पनी and Chrysler, which have historically been referred to as the `` Big Three. ''
Chrysler however is no longer among the top three ; लकिन is number five, behind Toyota और होंडा.
the motor car has clearly become an अभिन्न part of American life, with vehicles outnumbering licensed drivers.
Clinical प्रयोगशाला in a Hospital setting showing several automated analysers.
A चिकित्सा प्रयोगशाला or नैदानिक laboratory is a प्रयोगशाला where परीक्षण are किया on नैदानिक नमूनों in order to get information about the health of a patient as pertaining to the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of बीमारी.
in poker, खिलाड़ी construct hands of five cards according to predetermined rules, which vary according to which variant of poker is being played.
ये हैंड्स are compared using a हाथ ranking system that is standard across all variants of poker, the खिलाड़ी with the highest-ranking hand winning that particular deal in most variants of poker.
In कुछ variants, the lowest-ranking hand can win or tie.
These hand rankings are also used in some other कार्ड games, and in poker dice.
The ranking of a particular hand is increased by including multiple cards of the वही card rank, by सब five cards being इससे the same सूट, or by all five cards होने of consecutive rank.
The relative ranking of the various hand categories is based on the probability of होने randomly dealt such a हाथ from a well- shuffled deck.
Bruce रान्डेल Hornsby ( born November 23, 1954 ) is an American virtuoso ; a सिंगर, pianist, synthesizer, accordion, and dulcimer player, and songwriter.
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of उसके live performances, Hornsby draws frequently from classical, jazz, bluegrass, लोक, motown, gospel, rock, blues, and jam band musical traditions with his songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained within.
hornsby 's रिकार्डिंग have been recognised on a number of occasions with industry awards, सहित the Best New Artist Grammy in 1987 with Bruce Hornsby और the Range, the Best Bluegrass रिकॉर्डिंग Grammy in 1990, and the Best पॉप Instrumental Grammy in 1993.
Hornsby रै also achieved recognition for his सोलो एल्बम and performances, his touring band Bruce hornsby and the noisemakers, his ब्लूग्रास प्रोजेक्ट with Ricky Skaggs and his appearances as a session- और guest-musician.
He भी collaborated with Grateful Dead and थी a सदस्य of the band from September 1990 to March 1992, playing at over एक hundred shows during that period.
Sugarcane plantation in rural Cuba
कृषि in Cuba has निभाई an important part in the economy for several hundred years.
Agriculture contributes less than 10 प्रतिशत to the सकल domestic product ( जीडीपी ), लकिन it employs roughly 20 percent of the working population.
About 30 प्रतिशत of the country 's जमीन is used for crop cultivation.
The inefficient agricultural industry in Cuba has led to the need to import large amounts of foods.
Cuba अभी imports about 80 % of the food it rations to the पब्लिक.
the rationing program accounts for about a third of the food energy the औसत Cuban consumes.
Overall, however, Cuba is निर्भर on imports for तभी 16 % of its food.

Mega Millions ( initially called the Big Game Mega Millions as the successor of The Big Game ) is an अमरीकी multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game.
The first ( The Big खेल ) Mega Millions drawing was in 2002 ( see below ).
the minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000, paid in 26 equal वार्षिक installments ( unless the cash विकल्प is chosen ) ; usually, the jackpot increases जब there is no top-prize winner.
However, despite no jackpot winner for the $ 12,000,000 December 18, 2012 आरेखण, the जैकपॉट remained at $ 12,000,000 लिये the drawing to be आयोजित on December 21.
( See below for information on how the game 's jackpot is funded. )
Reflecting common practice among अमरीकी lotteries, the jackpot is advertised as a नाममात्र value of annual installments.
A नकदी value option ( the usual चुनाव ), when chosen by a jackpot winner ( see below ), pays the approximate उपस्थित value of the installments.
Mega Millions फिलहाल uses a 5/56 ( श्वेत balls ) plus 1/46 ( the Mega बॉल ) double मेट्रिक्स to select its winning numbers.
Each game लागत $ 1.
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( California is the exception ), there is an option, called Megaplier ( such games are $ 2 each ) where non-jackpot prizes are multiplied by 2, 3, or 4.
The Megaplier थी made available to all Mega Millions jurisdictions in January 2011 ; it began as a टेक्सास -only option.
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. Eastern time Tuesdays and Fridays, including holidays.
Mega Millions is administered by a consortium of its 12 original lotteries and the drawings हैं held at WSB-TV in अटलांटा, Georgia.
पर्यवेक्षित by the Georgia Lottery.
The largest jackpot in आचमन Millions, as well as in American lottery history, was $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( with a cash option of $ 474,000,000 ) for the कूच 30, 2012 drawing in which there were three jackpot-winning tickets ; one each in Illinois, Kansas, and मेरीलैंड.
All three tickets had been claimed as of April 18, साथ each नियत of winners choosing the cash option.
is a जापानी manga series created by writer Tsugumi Ohba and manga artist Takeshi Obata.
The main character is Light Yagami, a high school छात्र who discovers a supernatural कोपी, the `` Death नोट '', dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of death ) named Ryuk.
The Death Note grants its उपयोक्ता the ability to kill anyone whose name and face they know, by writing the name in the notebook while picturing उनके फेस.
the series centers around लाइट 's attempt to create and rule a world `` cleansed of दुष्ट '' as `` परमेश्वर '' using the notebook, and the प्रयत्न of a detective known as L to stop him.
Death नोट was first serialized in 108 chapters by shueisha in the जापानी manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from दिसम्बर 2003 to May 2006.

Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ), also known as All Hallows ' Eve, is a yearly celebration observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of सब Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
according to many scholars, All hallows ' Eve is a christianised feast originally बहकावे by western European harvest festivals, और festivals of the मुर्दे साथ possible pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of Samhain और has solely Christian roots.
Typical त्यौहार Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( भी known as `` guising `` ), attending costume parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.

the taxicabs of New York City, with their distinctive yellow paint, are a widely recognized icon of the city.
taxicabs हैं operated by private companies और licensed by the नई York City टैक्सी and Limousine Commission ( TLC ).
It भी oversees over 40,000 other for-hire vehicles, सहित `` black गाड़ियाँ '', commuter vans and ambulettes.
`` Medallion taxis, '' the familiar yellow cabs, are the only vehicles in the city permitted to pick up passengers in response to a street hail.
Schematic cross section of भाग of leaf, xylem shown as red circles at figure 8.
जाइलम is one of the two types of transport tissue in vascular plants ( फ्लोएम is the other ).
The word xylem is derived इससे the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is लकडी, though it is found throughout the संयंत्र.
इसके मौलिक function is to transport water, but it भी transports some nutrients through the plant.
U.S. women suffragists demonstrating for the right to vote, February 1913.
Women 's suffrage also known as woman suffrage is the right of women to vote and to चलाएं लिये दफ्तर.
Limited voting rights were gained by महिलाओं in Sweden, Finland and कुछ western U.S. states in the लेट 19th century.
अंतरराष्ट्रीय organizations were formed to निर्देशांक efforts, especially the International Council of महिलाओं ( 1888 ) and the International Woman suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ).
In 1893, New जीलैंड, तब a self-governing अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश, granted adult women the right to vote and the self-governing British colony of South Australia did the same in 1895, but also permitted women to run लिये office.
Australia federated in 1901, and women acquired the right to vote and stand in federal elections from 1902, though uneven restrictions on aboriginal women voting in नेशनल elections were not completely removed until 1962.
the first European country to introduce women 's suffrage थी the Grand Duchy of Finland, then part of the रूसी Empire, which also produced the world 's पहला female members of parliament in the 1907 parliamentary elections.
नार्वे followed, granting पूरा women 's suffrage in 1913.
In most Western देशों, women 's suffrage आए after World I युद्ध I i, with some महत्वपूर्ण late adopters होने France in 1944 and Switzerland in 1971.
Women 's suffrage रै generally been recognized after political campaigns to obtain it were waged.
In many countries it was granted पहले सार्वभौमिक suffrage.
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right अंतर्गत the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women, adopted by the संयुक्त Nations in 1979.

Jehovah 's Witnesses is a millenarian restorationist Christian denomination with nontrinitarian मान्यताओं distinct from mainstream Christianity.Sources for descriptors : • millenarian : • Restorationist : • Christian : • Denomination : The organization reports worldwide membership of over 7.78 million adherents शामिल in इंजीलवाद, convention उपस्थिति of over 12 लाख, और annual Memorial उपस्थिति of over 19 लाख.
They हैं directed by the Governing Body of Jehovah 's Witnesses, a group of बड़ो in Brooklyn, New यॉर्क, that establishes सब doctrines.
यहोवा 's Witnesses ' beliefs are based on उनके interpretations of the Bible and they prefer to use their own translation, the New World अनुवाद of the Holy Scriptures.
वे believe that the destruction of the उपस्थित संसार system at Armageddon is imminent, and that the establishment of God 's किंगडम on earth is the only solution लिये सब problems faced by mankind.
the समूह emerged इससे the Bible Student गति —founded in the late 1870s by चार्ल्स Taze Russell with the formation of zion 's देखें मीनार Tract Society —with significant organizational और doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford.
The name Jehovah 's witnesses, based on Isaiah 43:10–12, थी adopted in 1931 to distinguish themselves from other बाइबल Student समूह and symbolize a break with the legacy of Russell 's traditions.
Jehovah 's Witnesses are best known for उनके door-to-door उपदेश, distributing literature ऐसे as The Watchtower and Awake !
, and refusing military सेवा and blood transfusions.
They consider उपयोग of the नाम Jehovah vital for proper worship.
They अस्वीकृत Trinitarianism, inherent immortality of the soul, and hellfire, which they consider to be unscriptural doctrines.
They do not observe Christmas, Easter, birthdays, or अन्य छुट्टियाँ and कस्टम they consider to have pagan origins असंगत with Christianity.
adherents commonly refer to their body of beliefs as `` the truth '' and consider themselves to be `` in the truth ''.
They consider secular society to be morally corrupt and under the influence of शैतानी, and most limit उनके social interaction with non-Witnesses.
Congregational अनुशासनात्मक actions include disfellowshipping, उनके पद लिये formal expulsion and shunning.
Baptized individuals who formally leave are considered disassociated and are also shunned.
Disfellowshipped and disassociated individuals may eventually be reinstated if deemed repentant.
The religion 's position regarding conscientious objection to military service and refusal to salute नेशनल flags has brought it into conflict with some सरकारें.
Consequently, Jehovah 's Witnesses have been persecuted and their activities are बैन or restricted in some देशों.
Persistent legal चुनौतियां by Jehovah 's Witnesses have influenced legislation related to civil rights in several देशों.
Last Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian romantic Drama film directed by Bernardo Bertolucci which portrays a recent American widower who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a young, betrothed Parisian woman.
It सितारों Marlon Brando, मरिया Schneider, और Jean-Pierre Léaud.
The film 's raw portrayal of sexual violence and emotional turmoil led to international controversy और drew विभिन्न स्तर of government censorship.
The MPAA gave the film an x दरजा upon रिलीज in the संयुक्त States.
After revisions यहूद made to the MPAA दरजा code, it was classified as an NC-17 in 1997.
MGM released a censored R-rated काटें in 1981.
the film has its NC-17 rating लिये `` some explicit यौन content. ''
Windows XP is an operating system उत्पादित by Microsoft for use on personal computers, including home and business desktops, लैपटॉप and media centers.
First released to computer manufacturers on August 24, 2001, it is the second most popular version of Windows, आधारित on installed user आधार.
The name `` XP '' is छोटी for `` eXPerience '', highlighting the enhanced user experience.
Windows XP, the successor to खिड़कियाँ 2000 and खिड़कियाँ ME, थी the first consumer-oriented operating system उत्पादित by Microsoft to be निर्मित on the खिड़कियाँ NT kernel.
Windows XP थी released worldwide for retail sale on अक्तूबर 25, 2001, and over 400 million नक़ल यहूद in use in January 2006.
It थी succeeded by Windows Vista in January 2007.
Direct OEM and खुदरा बिक्री of Windows XP ceased on जून 30, 2008.
Microsoft continued to sell Windows XP through उनके प्रणाली Builders ( smaller OEMs who sell समवेत computers ) कार्यक्रम until January 31, 2009.
On April 10, 2012, Microsoft reaffirmed that extended support for Windows XP और Office 2003 would end on April 8, 2014 and suggested that administrators begin preparing to migrate to a नए OS.
the NT -based संस्करण of Windows, which हैं प्रोग्रामित in C, C++, and assembly, हैं known for their improved stability and दक्षता over the 9x versions of microsoft Windows.
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical user interface, a change microsoft promoted as more user-friendly than previous versions of Windows.
In an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL नरक `` that plagued the past versions of Windows, improved side-by-side assembly technology in Windows xp allows side-by-side installation, registration और servicing of अनेक versions of globally shared software components in full isolation.
It is also the first version of Windows to उपयोग product activation to combat illegal copying.
During Windows XP 's development, the project was codenamed `` whistler '', बाद Whistler, British Columbia, as many Microsoft employees skied at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort.
According to web analytics आंकड़ा generated by Net अनुप्रयोग, खिड़कियाँ XP was the most widely प्रयुक्त operating प्रणाली until अगस्त 2012, when Windows 7 overtook it.
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 %, having decreased almost every month since at least नवम्बर 2007, the first month for which statistics are सरेआम available from Net Applications.
`` Por ऊना Cabeza '' is an Argentine tango with music and lyrics लिखा in 1935 by Carlos Gardel and Alfredo Le Pera respectively.
The name is a Spanish horse-racing phrase meaning `` by a head '', जिससे refers to a horse जीतना a race by the length of one head.
The lyrics speak of a compulsive horse-track gambler who compares his addiction for horses with his attraction to women.
Alfredo Le Pera was a Brazilian इससे São Paulo, a much Italian-influenced area in Brazil, और also the जन्मस्थान of Zequinha de Abreu, composer of Tico-Tico no Fubá.
Le प्रभा and Gardel died in an airplane crash in Medellín, ( Colombia ), on जून 24, 1935.
पोर una Cabeza
the tango has since been performed by numerous tango orchestras.

The baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is one of the body 's homeostatic mechanisms for maintaining blood pressure.
It provides a negative feedback loop in which an elevated रक्त pressure reflexively causes heart rate to decrease therefore causing blood दबाव to decrease ; likewise, decreased blood pressure activates the baroreflex, causing heart rate to increase thus causing an बढ़ाएँ in blood pressure.
The system relies on specialized न्यूरॉन्स, known as baroreceptors, in the aortic arch, carotid sinuses, and elsewhere to monitor changes in blood pressure and relay them to the brainstem.
Subsequent changes in blood pressure हैं mediated by the autonomic nervous system.
अलिंदी natriuretic पेप्टाइड फ़ॉर्म a parallel negative feedback लूप in an endocrinological contrast to the renin-angiotensin system.
The Loma Prieta earthquake, also known as the भूकंप of '89 and the World Series Earthquake, was a major earthquake that struck the San फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी Area of कैलिफ़ोर्निया on October 17, 1989, at 5:04 pm local time.
Caused by a स्लिप along the San andreas Fault, the quake lasted 10–15 सेकेंड और measured 6.9 on both the moment magnitude scale ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 ) और on the open-ended Richter Scale.
The quake killed 63 people throughout northern California, injured 3,757 and left some 3,000–12,000 people homeless.
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up practice for the third game of the 1989 World Series, featuring दोनो of the खाड़ी Area 's प्रमुख League बेसबॉल teams, the Oakland Athletics and the San फ्रांसिस्को Giants.
Because of game-related sports coverage, this थी the first प्रमुख earthquake in the United States to have इसके initial jolt broadcast सजीव on television.

The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the सबसे numerous and in most circumstances the weakest टुकड़ा in the game of chess, historically representing infantry or, अधिक particularly, हथियारबंद peasants or pikemen.
in chess, each player begins the खेल with eight pawns, one on each square of the rank immediately in front of the अन्य टुकड़े.
( In बीजीय notation, the white pawns start on a2, b2, c2,..., h2, while black pawns start on a7, b7, c7,..., h7. )
Individual प्यादे are referred to by the file on which they stand.
For example, one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn '' or `` ब्लैक 's b-pawn '', or less commonly ( using descriptive संकेतन ), `` श्वेत 's king 's bishop pawn '' or `` Black 's queen 's knight साहूकार ''.
It is भी common to refer to a rook pawn, meaning any pawn on the a- or h-file, a नाईट pawn ( on the b- or g-file ), a bishop pawn ( on the c- or f-file ), a महारानी pawn ( on the d-file ), a किंग pawn ( on the e-file ), and a central साहूकार ( on either the d- or e-file ).
the military forces of the world have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and lesbian ) and bisexual individuals.
the armed forces of most developed countries have now removed policies excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( साथ strict policies on sexual उत्पीड़न ).
Nations that permit gay लोगों to serve खुलकर in the military include the 4 of the 5 members of the UN सुरक्षा Council ( United राज्य, संयुक्त किंगडम, France, और Russia ), the Republic of China ( ताईवान ), ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Israel, South Africa, अर्जेंटीना, and all NATO members excluding Turkey.
Hydrogen production is the परिवार of industrial methods लिये generating hydrogen.
Currently the dominant technology for direct production is steam reforming इससे hydrocarbons.
Many other methods are known including electrolysis and thermolysis.
In 2006, the United States was estimated to have a production capacity of 11 million tonnes of hydrogen.
5 million tonnes of hydrogen यहूद consumed on-site in आयल refining, and in the production of ammonia ( Haber process ) and methanol ( कटौती of carbon monoxide ).
0.4 million tonnes यहूद an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali process.
हाइड्रोजन production is an estimated $ 100 अरब industry.
A basis point ( प्रायः denoted as bp, colloquially referred to in the plural as `` bips '', also known as a `` beep '' ) is a unit equal to one hundredth of a percentage point, or one भाग per ten हजार, 1/10000.
The same unit is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad, literally meaning 'for ( every ) myriad ( ten thousand ) ', and in that context is written with which looks like a percent sign ( % ) with two extra zeroes at the end ( like a stylized रूप of the four zeros in the denominator, although it originates as a natural extension of the प्रतिशत ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ).
A basis point is defined as:
1 basis point = 1 permyriad = one one-hundredth percent
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp = 100
Basis अंक are प्रयुक्त as a convenient unit of measurement in contexts where percentage differences of कम than 1 % are discussed.
The most common example is interest दरों, where मतभेद in interest rates of कम than 1 % per year are usually meaningful to talk about.
For example, a difference of 0.10 percentage points is equivalent to a change of 10 basis अंक ( e.g. a 4.67 % रेट increases by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ).
Like percentage points, आधार points avoid the ambiguity between relative और absolute discussions about interest rates by dealing only with the absolute बदलें in numeric value of a रेट.
For example, if a report says वहीँ रै been a `` 1 % बढ़ाएँ '' from a 10 % interest rate, this could refer to an increase either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative, 1 % of 10 % ), or from 10 % to 11 % ( absolute, 1 % plus 10 % ).
If, however, the report says there has been a `` 10 basis point increase '' from a 10 % interest रेट, then we जान कि the ब्याज rate of 10 % has increased by 0.10 % ( the absolute change ) to a 10.1 % rate.
It is common practice in the financial industry to उपयोग basis points to denote a rate change in a वित्तीय instrument, or the difference ( spread ) between two interest rates, including the yields of fixed-income securities.
Since certain लोन and bonds may commonly be quoted in relation to some index or underlying सुरक्षा, they will often be quoted as a spread over ( or अंतर्गत ) the अनुक्रमणिका.
For example, a loan that bears interest of 0.50 % per annum above the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) is said to be 50 basis points over LIBOR, which is commonly expressed as `` l+50bps '' or बस `` L+50 ''.
The term `` आधार point '' has its origins in trading the `` basis '' or the spread between दो interest rates.
Since the basis is usually small, these are quoted multiplied up by 10000, and hence a `` पूरा point '' गति in the `` basis '' is a basis point.
Contrast साथ pips in FX forward बाज़ार.
The relationship between percentage परिवर्तन और basis अंक can be summarized as follows : 1 percentage पाइंट change = 100 basis points, and 0.01 प्रतिशत points = 1 आधार पाइंट.
So, a बंध जिनकी yield increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is said to increase by 50 आधार points ; or interest rates that have risen 1 percentage point are said to have increased by 100 basis अंक.
The British Royal Family is the group of close relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom.
The term is also commonly applied to the same समूह of people who are the relations of the monarch in उसके or his भूमिका as sovereign of कोई of the other Commonwealth realms, thus sometimes at variance with आधिकारिक national terms लिये the family.
Members of the Royal Family belong to, either by birth or marriage, the House of विंडसर, since 1917, when जार्ज v changed the name of the royal house इससे Saxe-Coburg and Gotha.
This निर्णय was primarily taken because Britain और her साम्राज्य were at war with Germany and given the British Royal परिवार 's strong German ancestry ; it was felt that its public image could be improved by choosing a more अंग्रेजों house name.
The new name chosen, Windsor, had absolutely no connection अन्य than as the name of the castle which was and continues to be a royal निवास.
Although in the संयुक्त Kingdom वहीँ is no strict विधिक or formal definition of जो is or is नहीं a member of the Royal Family, and different lists will include अलग people, those carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( HM ), or Her or His royal Highness ( HRH ) are always considered members, which usually results in the application of the term to the monarch, the consort of the monarch, the विधवा consorts of previous monarchs, the children of the monarch और previous monarchs, the male-line grandchildren of the monarch और previous monarchs, और the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons.
On 30 November 1917, King जार्ज V issued अक्षर पेटेंट धमक who are members of the royal Family ; the text of the notice इससे the London Gazette is as follows:
In 1996, उसके Majesty The Queen modified ये Letters Patent, as थी evidenced by this सूचना from the London Gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a title और a style borne by members of the Royal Family to additional व्यक्तियों to be born, evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
सदस्यों and रिश्तेदारों of the अंग्रेजों Royal Family historically represented the monarch in various places throughout the अंग्रेजों Empire, sometimes लिये extended periods as viceroys, or for विशिष्ट ceremonies or events.
Today, they often perform ceremonial and social duties throughout the United Kingdom and abroad on निमित्त of the United Kingdom.
Aside इससे the monarch, their only संवैधानिक भूमिका in the अफेयर्स of government is to serve, if eligible and when appointed by अक्षर patent, as a Counsellor of State, दो or अधिक of whom exercise the authority of the Crown ( within stipulated limits ) in the indisposal or absence from the British realm of the monarch.
In the other realms of the Commonwealth रॉयल्टी do नहीं serve as Counsellors of State.
however in प्रत्येक such फ्रेम the monarch 's परिवार सदस्यों may act on behalf of, are funded by, and represent the sovereign of that particular state, and not the संयुक्त Kingdom.
the Queen, उसके consort, उसके children और grandchildren, as well as all former अधिपति ' children and grandchildren hold places in the first sections of the official orders of पूर्वता in इंग्लैण्ड और Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland.
पत्नियां of the said enjoy their पतियों ' पूर्वता, और husbands of princesses हैं unofficially but habitually placed with their wives as खूब.
However, the Queen changed the private order of precedence in the Royal Family in favour of Princesses Anne and Alexandra, जो henceforth लो private पूर्वता over the Duchess of Cornwall, who is otherwise the realm 's highest ranking woman after the Queen herself.
वो किया not alter the relative precedence of other born-princesses, such as the daughters of her younger sons.
हैती ( ; Haitian Creole ayiti ), officially the Republic of Haiti ( ; ), is a Caribbean country.
It occupies the western, smaller portion of the द्वीप of Hispaniola, in the Greater Antillean द्वीपसमूह, which it shares साथ the Dominican Republic.
Ayiti ( land of ऊँची mountains ) was the indigenous taíno or Amerindian name for the island.
The country 's उच्चतम point is Pic la Selle, at.
The total area of Haiti is and इसके capital is Port-au-Prince.
haitian Creole and French are the आधिकारिक languages.
Haiti 's regional, historical, and ethno-linguistic position is unique for several reasons.
It was the first independent nation of Latin America और the Caribbean, the first black -led गणतंत्र in the world, and the second गणतंत्र in the Americas when it gained स्वतंत्रता in 1804 as part of a successful slave क्रान्ति lasting nearly a decade.
In 2012, Haiti announced its intention to तलाश associate सदस्यता status in the African संघ.
Haiti is the most populous of the predominantly Francophone स्वतंत्र राष्ट्र in the Americas.
it is one of only दो independent nations in the Americas ( साथ with Canada ) to designate French as an आधिकारिक language ; the other french-speaking क्षेत्रों हैं all overseas départements, or collectivités, of France.
Haiti is the most populous full member-state of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ).
It is the poorest country in the americas as measured by the Human Development Index.
राजनैतिक हिंसा रै occurred regularly throughout its history, अग्रणी to government instability.
सबसे recently, in February 2004, a coup d'état originating in the north of the country forced the इस्तीफा और exile of President Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
A provisional government took control with security provided by the United Nations Stabilization Mission in हैती ( MINUSTAH ).
Michel Martelly, the current president, was elected in the haitian general election, 2011.
The island has had a history of destructive earthquakes.
a 7.0 magnitude भूकंप struck Haiti on 12 January 2010 and devastated Port-au-Prince.
The highest reliable death count थी estimated at 220,000.
Haitian government estimates यहूद higher.
The Presidential palace, Parliament और many other important structures were destroyed, along साथ countless homes and businesses, leaving सैंकड़ों of हज़ारों of people homeless.
The country रै yet to recover from the 2010 भूकंप ( और subsequent incidents ) due to दोनो the severity of the damage Haiti endured in 2010, as well as a सरकारी that was ineffective well before the earthquake.
United States सहायता organizations have donated $ 2 billion.
संयुक्त with अन्य international दान, these funds are intended to योगदान to the rebuilding of the country.
the Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo, the Italian electro house and dance-punk music producer, DJ and photographer.
the Bloody Beetroots is well-known for the black venom mask he wears during performances.
In fact, the only identifying पब्लिक feature of rifo is the year `` 1977 '' tattooed across his chest, which is दोनो the year that the producer and punk-rock was born.
`` the Bloody beetroots DJ set '' contains Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo and टॉमी Tea.
A Motorola Advisor alphanumeric pager used in Brazil in the 1990s, संचालित by Teletrim
A पेजर is a wireless दूरसंचार यंत्र that receives and displays numeric or text messages, or receives and announces voice संदेश.
One-way pagers can only receive messages, while response pagers और two-way pagers can also acknowledge, reply to, and originate messages using an internal ट्रांसमीटर.
Pagers operate as part of a paging system which includes one or more fixed transmitters ( or in the case of response pagers and two-way pagers, one or more base स्टेशन ), as well as a number of pagers carried by मोबाईल users.
These systems can range from a restaurant system with a सिंगल low-power ट्रांसमीटर, to a nationwide system with thousands of high-power base stations.
One of the first practical paging services was launched in 1950 for physicians in the New York City area.
physicians paid US $ 12 per month for the सेवा and carried a ( 6 oz ) pager that would receive phone messages within ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower.
the system was manufactured by the reevesound Company और संचालित by Telanswerphone.
In 1960, John Francis मिशेल संयुक्त elements of Motorola 's walkie Talkie and automobile रेडियो technologies to create the first transistorized pager, and from this पाइंट, paging technology continued to advance, and pager adoption continued to विस्तार, until the early 1990s.
However, by the mid-1990s, as cellular technologies became cheaper and more widely available, advanced services began to displace paging as a वाणिज्यिक product.
Today, pagers exist largely as niche products, finding preferential use in अनुप्रयोग such as hospitals, public safety, and retail locations where उनके सादगी, high विश्वसनीयता, and low cost represent significant लाभ.
Reevesville is a town in Dorchester County, South कैरोलिना, United States.
the population थी 196 at the 2010 census.
as पारिभाषित by the U.S. Office of Management and बजट, and used by the U.S. Census Bureau लिये statistical purposes only, reevesville is included भीतर the Charleston-North Charleston-Summerville metropolitan area.
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena Carmen Frieda kahlo y calderón ; जुलाई 6, 1907 – July 13, 1954 ) was a मैक्सिकन painter, born in Coyoacán, who is बेहतरीन ज्ञात for her self-portraits.
kahlo 's जीवन began and ended in Mexico City, in her home known as the Blue House.
She gave her birth date as July 7, 1910, लकिन her birth certificate shows July 6, 1907.
Kahlo had allegedly wanted the year of her birth to coincide with the year of the beginning of the Mexican क्रान्ति so that उसके life होता शुरू with the birth of आधुनिक मैक्सिको.
Her कार्य has been celebrated in Mexico as emblematic of national and indigenous tradition, और by feminists लिये its uncompromising depiction of the मादा अनुभव and form.
Mexican culture और Amerindian cultural परंपरा are important in her work, which has been sometimes characterized as Naïve art or लोक art.
Her work has also been described as `` surrealist '', and in 1938 André ब्रेटन, principal initiator of the surrealist movement, described kahlo 's art as a `` ribbon around a बमबारी ''.
Kahlo had a volatile marriage with the famous Mexican artist Diego रिवेरा.
She suffered lifelong health समस्याएं.
Many of her health problems were the result of a traffic accident वो survived as a teenager.
Recovering from her injuries isolated उसके from अन्य people और this अलगाव influenced her works, many of which are self-portraits of one sort or another.
Kahlo suggested, `` I paint myself because I am so often alone and because I am the subject I know बेहतरीन. ''
She also stated, `` I was born a bitch.
I was born a चित्रकार. ''

Theresienwiese on the दिन before Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer held annually in Munich, Bavaria, जर्मनी, running from late September to the first weekend in अक्तूबर.
It is एक of the most famous events in Germany and is the संसार 's largest fair, with अधिक than 6 लाख people इससे around the संसार attending the event प्रत्येक year.
To the स्थानीय, it is not called Oktoberfest, but `` die Wiesn '', after the colloquial नाम of the fairgrounds themselves.
the Oktoberfest is an important part of bar culture, having been आयोजित since 1810.
Other cities across the world also hold Oktoberfest celebrations, modeled after the original म्यूनिख event.
The Munich Oktoberfest originally took place during the sixteen days up to, and सहित, the first Sunday in October.
In 1994, the अनुसूची was modified in response to German reunification so that if the first Sunday in October falls on the 1st or 2nd, then the festival would go on until अक्तूबर 3 ( German Unity Day ).
Thus, the festival is now 17 days when the first Sunday is अक्तूबर 2 and 18 days when it is अक्तूबर 1.
In 2010, the पर्व lasted until the first Monday in October, to mark the वर्षगांठ of the इवेंट.
The festival is held in an area named the Theresienwiese ( field, or meadow, of Therese ), often पुकारा Wiesn for short, located निकट Munich 's center.
Large quantities of oktoberfest Beer are consumed, with almost 7 million liters served during the 16 day festival in 2007.
Visitors may also आनंद a चौड़ी किस्में of traditional food such as hendl ( chicken ), Schweinebraten ( roast pork ), Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock ), steckerlfisch ( grilled fish on a stick ), Würstl ( sausages ) साथ साथ brezeln ( Pretzel ), Knödel ( potato or bread dumplings ), Käsespätzle ( cheese noodles ), reiberdatschi ( potato pancakes ), Sauerkraut or rotkohl/blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white सॉसेज ).

Wheels of Gouda
Cheese is a generic term for a diverse group of milk-based food products.
Cheese is produced in wide-ranging flavors, textures, and फ़ॉर्म.
Cheese consists of proteins and fat इससे milk, usually the milk of cows, buffalo, goats, or sheep.
It is produced by coagulation of the milk protein casein.
typically, the milk is acidified and addition of the एंजाइम rennet causes coagulation.
The solids हैं separated and pressed into फाइनल form.
Some cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout.
Most cheeses melt at cooking तापमान.
सैंकड़ों of types of cheese from various देशों are produced.
Their styles, textures and flavors depend on the उत्पत्ति of the milk ( including the animal 's diet ), whether वे have been pasteurized, the butterfat content, the bacteria और mold, the processing, and aging.
herbs, मसाले, or wood smoke may be used as flavoring agents.
The yellow to red color of many cheeses, ऐसे as Red लीसेस्टर, is normally formed from adding annatto.
For a few cheeses, the milk is curdled by adding acids ऐसे as vinegar or नीबू juice.
सबसे cheeses are acidified to a lesser degree by bacteria, which फेरे milk sugars into lactic acid, then the जोड of rennet completes the curdling.
Vegetarian विकल्प to rennet are available ; most are produced by fermentation of the fungus Mucor miehei, लकिन अन्य have been extracted from various species of the Cynara thistle family.
Cheese is valued for its पोर्टेबिलिटी, long life, and high content of fat, protein, calcium, and phosphorus.
Cheese is more compact and रै a longer शेल्फ life than milk, although how long a cheese will keep may depend on the प्रकार of cheese ; labels on पैकेट्स of cheese प्रायः अर्जी कि a cheese should be consumed within तीन to five दिनों of opening.
Generally speaking, hard cheeses last longer than soft cheeses, such as brie or बकरी 's milk cheese.
cheesemakers निकट a dairy प्रदेश may benefit from fresher, lower-priced मिल्क, and निम्नतर shipping costs.
The long भंडार life of कुछ cheese, especially if it is encased in a सुरक्षात्मक rind, allows selling when markets are favorable.
Additional संघटक may be added to some cheeses, such as ब्लैक peppers, garlic, chives or जमाया.
A specialist विक्रेता of cheese is sometimes known as a cheesemonger.
To become an expert in this field, जैसे wine or cooking, requires some formal education and years of tasting and hands-on experience.
इस स्थिति is typically responsible लिये all पहलुओं of the cheese inventory ; selecting the cheese menu, purchasing, receiving, storage, and ripening.
Legal citation signals are a नियत of brief abbreviated phrases or words used to clarify the प्राधिकार or significance of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition.
सिग्नल सहायता a reader quickly discern meaning or usefulness of a particular reference when the reference itself does not provide adequate information.
Most citation signals are placed in front of the citation to which they apply.
For example, in the paragraph When writing a legal argument, it is important to refer to primary sources.
To assist readers in locating these sources, it is desirable to use a standardized citation format.
देखिए generally Harvard Law Review Association, The Bluebook : A Uniform System of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ).
Note, however, that some न्यायालयों may require any legal papers कि are submitted to उन्हें to conform to a different citation स्वरूप.
the signal is the phrase `` देखिए generally, '' which indicates that the citation `` The bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ) '' provides general background information on the topic.
Neil Alden Armstrong ( अगस्त 5, 1930 – August 25, 2012 ) was an American astronaut और the first person to walk on the Moon.
He was also an aerospace engineer, naval aviator, test pilot, and university professor.
Before becoming an astronaut, आर्मस्ट्रांग was an officer in the U.S. नेवी and परोसा in the Korean War.
After the war, he earned his bachelor 's degree at Purdue University and served as a test pilot at the National Advisory Committee लिये Aeronautics high-speed उड़ान Station, now known as the Dryden Flight Research Center, जहाँ he logged over 900 flights.
He later समाप्त graduate studies at the University of Southern California.
A participant in the U.S. Air Force 's man in Space Soonest and x-20 dyna-soar human spaceflight programs, Armstrong joined the NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962.
he made his first space flight, as command pilot of Gemini 8, in 1966, becoming NASA 's first civilian astronaut to fly in space.
On इस mission, he performed the first docking of two spacecraft, साथ पायलट David स्कॉट.
Armstrong 's दूसरी and last spaceflight थी as mission commander of the Apollo 11 चंद्रमा लैंडिंग, in July 1969.
On this मिशन, Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin descended to the चंद्र सतह and खर्च two और a half घंटों exploring, while Michael Collins remained in चंद्र orbit in the Command मोड्यूल.
Along with Collins and एल्ड्रिन, Armstrong was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by अध्यक्ष Richard निक्सन ; in 1978, President Jimmy कार्टर presented Armstrong the congressional Space पदक of Honor in 1978 ; he and his former crewmates received the congressional Gold Medal in 2009.
Armstrong died in सिनसिनाटी, Ohio, on अगस्त 25, 2012, at the age of 82, after complications from coronary artery bypass सर्जरी.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand आज.
He is considered to be one of the greatest Thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN क्रमित Secretariat the 35th बेहतरीन athlete of the 20th century, the highest रैंकिंग racehorse on the सूची URL_http.
He ranked दूसरी behind man o ' War in the blood-horse 's सूची of the Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th सदी.
Secretariat was sired by Bold शासक out of Somethingroyal, by princequillo.
He was foaled at The Meadow in Caroline County, Virginia.
Like उसके famous पूर्ववर्ती Man o ' युद्ध, सचिवालय was a विशाल chestnut colt and was दिए the same उपनाम, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte, साथ साथ apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ), and दिग्गज Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and white checkered colors and his groom was एडी Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, and weighed, with a 75-inch girth, in his रेसिंग prime.
Madrid (, ) is the capital and largest city of स्पेन.
The population of the नगर is roughly 3.3 million and the संपूर्ण population of the Madrid महानगर area is calculated to be around 6.5 million.
it is the third-largest city in the European Union, after London and Berlin, and its महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the third-largest in the European Union after London and पेरिस.
The city spans a total of.
The city is located on the Manzanares नदी in the centre of both the country और the Community of Madrid ( which comprises the नगर of Madrid, its conurbation and extended suburbs and villages ) ; this community is bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha.
As the capital नगर of स्पेन, seat of government, and residence of the Spanish monarch, Madrid is also the political, economic और cultural centre of Spain.
the current mayor is ana botella from the People 's Party ( pp ).
The Madrid urban agglomeration रै the third-largest GDP in the European Union and its प्रभाव in politics, education, entertainment, पर्यावरण, media, फ़ैशन, science, culture, और the arts सब contribute to its status as one of the world 's प्रमुख वैश्विक cities.
Due to its आर्थिक output, high standard of living, and market size, Madrid is considered the major financial centre of Southern Europe और the Iberian Peninsula ; it होस्ट the सिर कार्यालयों of the vast majority of the major स्पेनी companies, such as Telefónica, Iberia or Repsol.
Madrid is the most touristic city of Spain, the fourth-most touristic of the continent, and the seventh most visited नगर in the world according to Forbes.
Is the 10th most livable city in the world according to Monocle magazine, in its 2010 अनुक्रमणिका.
मैड्रिड also बाँधने among the 12 greenest यूरोपीय cities in 2010. < ref name= '' http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > Madrid is currently a प्रत्याशी City for the 2020 Summer Olympics.
मैड्रिड houses the मुख्यालय of the World पर्यटन Organization ( WTO ), belonging to the United राष्ट्र Organization ( UN ), the SEGIB, the Organization of Ibero-American राज्य ( oei ), and the Public ब्याज Oversight Board ( PIOB ).
it भी hosts major अंतरराष्ट्रीय संस्थानों regulators of Spanish : the Standing कमेटी of the Association of Spanish भाषा Academies, headquarters of the royal Spanish Academy ( rae ), the Cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent स्पेनी ( Fundéu ).
Madrid organizes मेलों as FITUR, ARCO, SIMO TCI and the Cibeles Madrid Fashion Week.
While Madrid possesses a modern infrastructure, it has preserved the look and महसूस of many of its ऐतिहासिक neighbourhoods and streets.
Its landmarks शामिल the Royal Palace of मैड्रिड ; the Teatro Real ( royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen Retiro पार्क, founded in 1631 ; the 19th-century National Library भवन ( founded in 1712 ) containing कुछ of Spain 's historical archives ; a large number of National museums, and the Golden Triangle of Art, स्तिथ along the Paseo del Prado and comprising तीन art museums : Prado संग्रहालय, the museo Nacional centro de arte Reina Sofía, a संग्रहालय of आधुनिक आर्ट, and the thyssen-bornemisza संग्रहालय, which completes the shortcomings of the other two museums.
Cibeles Palace और Fountain have become the monument symbol of the city.
The पाथ of the Via appia and of the Via Appia Traiana.
Remains of the Appian Way in Rome, निकट quarto Miglio
Near Rome.
The Appian Way ( Latin and Italian : Via appia ) was one of the earliest और strategically most important रोमन roads of the ancient republic.
It कनेक्ट Rome to brindisi, Apulia, in southeast Italy.
इसके महत्व is indicated by its common name, recorded by Statius :
Appia teritur regina longarum viarum
`` the Appian way is the queen of the long roads ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus, the Roman censor who began and completed the first खण्ड as a सैन्य road to the south in 312 BC दौरान the samnite Wars.
The Draupner wave, a single giant wave measured on New Year 's Day 1995, finally confirmed the existence of freak waves, which had previously been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( also known as freak waves, दानव waves, killer waves, extreme लहरें, and असामान्य waves ) हैं relatively large and spontaneous ocean surface waves that occur far आउट at sea, and are a threat even to large जहाजों और ocean liners.
in oceanography, they are more precisely defined as लहरें whose height is अधिक than twice the significant wave height ( SWH ), जिससे is itself defined as the mean of the largest third of waves in a wave record.
इसलिए rogue लहरें are not necessarily the biggest waves found at sea ; they are, बल्कि, surprisingly large waves for a given sea state.
Rogue waves seem not to have a single पृथक cause, लकिन occur where शारीरिक factors such as high winds and strong currents कारण waves to merge to create a single exceptionally large wave.
electress Sophia of Hanover ( 1630–1714 )
The line of succession to the British throne is the ordered sequence of all those people eligible to सफल to the throne of the United किंगडम and the अन्य 15 Commonwealth realms.
The अधिनियम of Settlement 1701 bestowed succession on the Electress Sophia of हनोवर और her descendants while excluding Roman Catholics.
The अंग्रेजों government does नहीं publish an official list of सब those in लकीर to succeed, but the work of genealogical authors and amateur researchers suggests that वहीँ are several thousand people potentially in line.
At a summit in पर्थ, पश्चिमी Australia in 2011, the heads of government of all 16 Commonwealth realms सहमत to take कदम to adopt निरपेक्ष primogeniture, end the exclusion of people married to रोमन Catholics, and make other परिवर्तन in the succession नियम.
The line of succession is also used to चुनें the Counsellors of State ( and a regent if the need arises ) अंतर्गत the provisions of the Regency Act 1937.
For earlier versions of the line of succession, देखिए इतिहास of the British line of succession.
एडवर्ड मोंटगोमरी क्लिफ्ट ( October 17, 1920July 23, 1966 ) was an American film and stage actor The New York Times’ obituary noted his portrayal of `` moody, sensitive young men ''.
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the social climber in George स्टीवंस 's a Place in the Sun, the anguished Catholic priest in Hitchcock 's I Confess, the doomed regular soldier Robert E. ली Prewitt in Fred Zinnemann 's From Here to Eternity, and the Jewish gi bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's The Young Lions.
Later, after a disfiguring car crash in 1956, and alcohol and prescription drug abuse, he became erratic.
Nevertheless important roles were still उसके, including `` the लापरवाह, alcoholic, mother-fixated rodeo performer '' in जॉन हस्टन 's The Misfits, the title भूमिका in Huston 's, and the concentration camp victim in Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg. ''
Clift received four Academy Award nominations during his करियर, तीन लिये Best कर्ता and one for Best Supporting Actor.
the War on Terror ( also known as the Global War on Terrorism ) is a term commonly लागू to an international military campaign जिससे started as a result of the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States.
इस resulted in an international military campaign to eliminate al-Qaeda and other militant organizations.
the United Kingdom and many other NATO और non-NATO nations participate in the conflict.
the phrase 'war on Terror ' was first used by US President George W. Bush on 20 सितंबर 2001.
The Bush administration and the Western media have since used the पद to signify a global military, political, lawful, and conceptual struggle—targeting both organizations designated as आतंकवादी and regimes accused of supporting them.
it was typically used with a particular फ़ोकस on militant islamists, al-Qaeda, and other jihadi groups.
Although the term is नहीं officially used by the administration of US President Barack Obama ( which instead uses the term Overseas Contingency Operation ), it is स्टिल commonly used by politicians, in the media and by कुछ aspects of government officially, such as the United States ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal.

The main causes of World War II were nationalistic issues, unresolved issues, and resentments resulting इससे World War i and the interwar period in Europe, in addition to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s.
The culmination of events that led to the outbreak of war are generally understood to be the 1939 invasion of कैंडल by Germany and सोवियत Russia and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of China by the Empire of Japan.
These सैन्य aggressions were the परिणाम of decisions made by the authoritarian ruling Nazi elite in Germany and by the leadership of the Kwantung Army in Japan.
World War ii प्रारंभ after ये aggressive actions were मिले with an आधिकारिक declaration of युद्ध and/or हथियारबंद resistance.

The Mitsubishi galant is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Mitsubishi Motors between 1969 और 2012.
The name was derived from the French शब्द galant, meaning `` chivalrous ''.
वहीँ have महरूम nine पृथक generations, and संचयी sales now exceed five million.
It began as a compact sedan, but over the कोर्स of its जीवन has विकसित into a larger mid-size car.
आरंभिक production was only based in जापानी, but चूंकि 1994 the American market रै been served by vehicles assembled at the former Diamond-Star Motors ( DSM ) facility in Normal, Illinois.
Blood pressure ( BP ), sometimes referred to as arterial blood pressure, is the pressure exerted by circulating blood upon the walls of रक्त vessels, and is one of the principal vital लक्षण.
जब used without further specification, `` blood pressure '' usually refers to the arterial pressure of the systemic circulation.
दौरान each धड़कन, blood pressure varies between a maximum ( systolic ) और a minimum ( diastolic ) pressure.
The रक्त pressure in the परिसंचरण is principally due to the pumping action of the heart.
Differences in औसत रक्त pressure are responsible for blood flow इससे one location to another in the circulation.
The रेट of mean blood प्रवाह depends on the resistance to flow presented by the blood बरतन.
Mean blood दबाव decreases as the circulating blood moves away from the heart through arteries and capillaries due to viscous नुकसान of उर्जा.
Mean blood pressure drops over the whole परिसंचरण, although most of the fall occurs along the small धमनियों और arterioles.
Gravity affects blood pressure via hydrostatic forces ( e.g., दौरान standing ) and valves in veins, breathing, और pumping from contraction of skeletal मांसपेशियां also influence blood pressure in veins.
Blood pressure without further specification usually refers to the systemic arterial pressure measured at a person 's upper arm और is a measure of the pressure in the brachial artery, the major artery in the अपर भुजा.
A person’s blood pressure is usually expressed in terms of the systolic दबाव over diastolic pressure and is measured in millimetres of पारा ( mmhg ), लिये example 120/80.
a वीटो – Latin for `` I forbid '' – is the power ( used by an अधिकारी of the state, लिये example ) to unilaterally stop an official कार्रवाई, especially the enactment of legislation.
A veto can be absolute, as for instance in the United Nations Security Council, whose permanent members ( China, France, रूस, United किंगडम, United राज्य of अमेरिका ) can block any रेज़ोल्यूशन.
Or it can be सीमित, as in the legislative process of the United States, where a two-thirds vote in दोनो the House and Senate may override a Presidential veto of विधान.
A वीटो only gives power to stop परिवर्तन, not to अपनाना them ( except for the rare `` amendatory वीटो '' ).
Thus a veto allows its होल्डर to protect the status quo.
the अवधारणा of a veto body originated with the रोमन consuls and tribunes.
Either of the two consuls holding office in a given year could block a military or civil निर्णय by the other ; any ट्रिब्यून had the power to unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate.
Sulfur dioxide ( भी sulphur dioxide ) is the chemical compound with the सूत्र.
It is a toxic gas with a pungent, irritating smell, that is released by volcanoes and in various industrial processes.
चूंकि coal and petroleum often contain sulfur compounds, their दहन generates गंधक डाइऑक्साइड unless the sulfur compounds are removed before burning the fuel.
Further oxidation of SO2, usually in the presence of a उत्प्रेरक such as NO2, forms H2SO4, and thus acid rain.
गंधक dioxide emissions are भी a precursor to particulates in the atmosphere.
Both of these impacts are cause for concern over the पर्यावरणीय impact of these fuels.
Myasthenia gravis ( from यूनानी μύς `` मांसपेशी '', `` weakness '', and `` गंभीर '' ; abbreviated MG ) is an autoimmune neuromuscular disease leading to fluctuating मांसपेशी कमज़ोरी and fatigability.
It is an autoimmune disorder, in which weakness is caused by circulating antibodies that block acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular junction, inhibiting the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions.
Myasthenia is treated medically with acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants, and, in चयनित cases, thymectomy.
the disease incidence is 3–30 cases per लाख per साल और rising as a result of increased जागरूकता.
MG must be distinguished from congenital myasthenic syndromes that can present similar लक्षण but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments.
परावर्तक twisted nematic liquid crystal display.
Polarizing filter film with a vertical axis to polarize light as it enters.
कांच substrate with ito electrodes.
The shapes of these electrodes will determine the shapes that होगा appear when the LCD is turned on.
Vertical ridges etched on the surface are smooth.
Twisted nematic liquid crystal.
Glass substrate with common एलेक्ट्रोड film ( ITO ) with horizontal ridges to line up with the आड़ा filter.
Polarizing filter film with a horizontal अक्ष to block/pass light.
Reflective surface to send light back to दर्शक.
( in a backlit LCD, this layer is replaced साथ a light source. )
A liquid-crystal display ( LCD ) is a flat panel display, electronic विज़ुअल display, or video display that uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals.
Liquid crystals do not emit light सीधे.
lcds are available to display arbitrary बिंब ( as in a general-purpose computer display ) or fixed images which can be प्रदर्शित or hidden, such as preset words, digits, and 7-segment displays as in a डिजिटल clock.
They use the same मौलिक technology, except that arbitrary बिंब are made up of a large number of छोटी pixels, while other displays have larger elements.
lcds are used in a चौड़ी range of applications सहित computer मॉनीटर, televisions, instrument panels, aircraft cockpit displays, and signage.
They are common in consumer devices such as वीडियो players, gaming devices, clocks, watches, calculators, and telephones, और have replaced cathode ray tube ( CRT ) displays in most applications.
They are available in a wider range of screen sizes than CRT और plasma displays, and since they do नहीं use phosphors, they do not suffer image burn-in.
lcds are, however, susceptible to image persistence.
The LCD screen is more energy efficient और can be disposed of more सकुशल than a CRT.
Its low विद्युत power consumption enables it to be used in battery -powered electronic equipment.
It is an electronically modulated optical device बना up of any क्रमांक of खण्ड filled with liquid crystals and arrayed in front of a light सोर्स ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome.
Liquid crystals were first discovered in 1888.
By 2008, worldwide sales of televisions साथ LCD screens exceeded annual sales of CRT units ; the CRT became obsolete for सबसे purposes.
The Borgata Hotel Casino and Spa is a luxury hotel, कसीनो, and स्पा in Atlantic City, New जर्सी, United States.
It is स्वामित्व by Marina District Development, a संयुक्त venture between Boyd गेमिंग और a divesture विश्वास established by MGM Resorts International.
the $ 1.1 billion casino hotel features 2,002 rooms and is the largest hotel in New Jersey.
The Borgata opened in जुलाई 2003 as a Las Vegas-style megaresort and is the top-grossing casino in Atlantic City.

a vitamin ( or ) is an organic compound required by an organism as a vital nutrient in limited amounts.
An सशुल्क chemical compound ( or related नियत of compounds ) is called a विटामिन when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from the diet.
Thus, the term is conditional both on the circumstances और on the particular organism.
लिये example, ascorbic acid ( vitamin c ) is a vitamin for humans, लकिन not for most other animals, और biotin and vitamin D are required in the इंसान आहार तभी in certain circumstances.
By convention, the term विटामिन includes neither other essential nutrients, such as dietary minerals, essential fatty acids, or अनिवार्य amino acids ( जिससे are needed in larger amounts than vitamins ) nor the विशाल number of other nutrients कि promote health but are otherwise required less प्रायः.
Thirteen विटामिन are universally recognized at present.
Vitamins are classified by their biological और रासायनिक activity, not उनके structure.
Thus, प्रत्येक `` vitamin '' refers to a number of vitamer compounds that सब show the biological activity संबद्ध with a particular vitamin.
Such a set of रसायन is grouped under an alphabetized vitamin `` जेनेरिक वर्णनकर्ता '' title, such as `` विटामिन A ``, which includes the compounds retinal, retinol, and four known carotenoids.
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the active form of the विटामिन in the body, and हैं sometimes inter-convertible to one another, as well.
Vitamins have विविध biochemical functions.
Some have hormone-like functions as regulators of mineral metabolism ( such as vitamin D ), or regulators of cell and tissue growth and differentiation ( ऐसे as कुछ फ़ॉर्म of vitamin A ).
अन्य function as antioxidants ( e.g., vitamin e and sometimes vitamin C ).
The largest number of vitamins ( such as b complex vitamins ) function as precursors for enzyme cofactors, that help enzymes in उनके work as catalysts in चयापचय.
In this role, vitamins may be tightly bound to enzymes as भाग of prosthetic groups : For example, biotin is part of enzymes involved in making fatty acids.
Vitamins may also be कम tightly bound to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes, detachable molecules that function to carry chemical समूह or electrons between molecules.
For example, folic acid may carry methyl, formyl, and methylene groups in the cell.
Although ये भूमिकाएँ in assisting enzyme-substrate reactions are vitamins ' best-known function, the other विटामिन functions are equally महत्वपूर्ण.
जबतक the mid-1930s, जब the first वाणिज्यिक yeast-extract vitamin B complex and semi-synthetic vitamin C supplement टैबलेट were sold, विटामिन were obtained solely through food intake, and changes in आहार ( which, for उदाहरण, could occur during a particular growing ऋतु ) usually greatly altered the types and amounts of vitamins ingested.
however, vitamins have been produced as commodity chemicals and made widely available as inexpensive semisynthetic and synthetic-source multivitamin dietary and खाना supplements और एडिटिव, since the middle of the 20th century.

World मुस्लिम population in millions
islam is the world 's second largest धर्म बाद christianity.
According to a 2010 पढ़ाई, Islam has 1.62 billion adherents, making up over 23 % of the world जनसांख्यिकी.
islam is the predominant religion in the Middle East, in Sahel, in the Horn of अफ़्रीकी and northern Africa, and in some भाग of एशिया.
Large communities of Muslims हैं also found in चीन, the Balkans, and Russia.
Other parts of the संसार host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in पश्चिमी Europe, for उदाहरण, Islam is the second largest religion after Christianity, where it represents 6 % of the total जनसांख्यिकी.
According to the pew Research Center in 2010 there were 49 Muslim-majority countries.
Around 62 % of the world 's Muslims सजीव in दक्षिण और Southeast Asia, with over 1 अरब adherents.
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia, home to 12.7 % of the संसार 's Muslims, followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 % ), India ( 10.9 % ), और Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ).
About 20 % of Muslims live in अरब देशों.
in the Middle East, the non-Arab countries of Turkey and Iran are the largest Muslim-majority देशों ; in Africa, Egypt और Nigeria have the सबसे populous Muslim communities.
A study conducted by the Pew Research Center in 2010 and released January 2011 found that there are 1.62 billion Muslims around the world.
the study found more मुसलमान in the United Kingdom than in Lebanon और more in China than in सीरियाई.
rhode Island ( or ), officially the State of Rhode Island और Providence Plantations, is a state in the New इंग्लैण्ड region of the संयुक्त राज्य.
rhode Island is the smallest in area, the eighth least populous, but the second most densely populated of the 50 US states behind नई Jersey.
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the वेस्ट and मैसाचुसेट्स to the north और east, and it साझा a water boundary with New York 's Long Island to the southwest.
Rhode Island थी the first of the 13 original colonies to घोषित independence from British rule, declaring itself independent on May 4, 1776, दो महीने before कोई अन्य उपनिवेश.
The State was also the last of the thirteen असली colonies to ratify the संयुक्त States Constitution.
Rhode Island 's आधिकारिक nickname is `` The Ocean State '', a reference to the State 's geography, since Rhode Island has several large bays and inlets that amount to परिचय 14 % of its total area.
इसके land area is, but इसके total area is significantly larger.
Dubai ( ; ', ) is a city in the संयुक्त Arab Emirates, स्तिथ भीतर the emirate of the same नाम.
The emirate of Dubai is स्तिथ on the southeast coast of the Persian Gulf on the Arabian Peninsula and is one of the seven emirates कि make up the country.
It रै the largest population in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest land territory by area ( 4,114 km2 ) after Abu Dhabi.
Dubai और Abu Dhabi, the national capital, हैं the तभी two emirates to have veto power over critical matters of national importance in the country 's legislature.
The city of Dubai is located on the emirate 's northern तटरेखा and heads up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived as a देश or city-state and, in some cases, the UAE as a whole has been described as 'Dubai '.
The earliest mention of दुबई is in 1095 ad, and the earliest अंकित settlement in the region dates from 1799.
the Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally established in 1833 by Sheikh maktoum bin Butti Al-Maktoum when he persuaded around 800 members of his tribe of the Bani Yas, living in what was then the Second Saudi State and now भाग of सऊदी Arabia, to follow him to the दुबई क्रीक by the Abu Falasa गोत्र of the bani yas.
It remained under the जनजाति 's control when the United Kingdom assumed protection of the Sheikhdom in 1892 and joined the nascent United Arab Emirates upon स्वतंत्रता in 1971 as the देश 's दूसरी अमीर.
इसके strategic geographic location made the town an important trading hub and by the beginning of the 20th century, Dubai थी already an important regional port.
Today, दुबई has emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis कि has grown steadily to become a global city and a business और cultural hub of the मध्य East and the Persian Gulf region.
हालांकि Dubai 's economy was historically built on the oil industry, the emirate 's Western-style मॉडल of business ड्राइव its economy साथ the main revenues अभी coming from tourism, रियल estate, और financial services.
Dubai has recently attracted world attention through many innovative large construction projects and sports कार्यक्रम.
The city has become symbolic लिये its skyscrapers and high-rise buildings, such as the संसार 's tallest Burj Khalifa, in जोड to महत्वाकांक्षी development प्रोजेक्ट including man-made islands, hotels, and कुछ of the largest shopping मॉल in the region and the world.
इस increased attention has also highlighted मजदूर and human rights issues concerning the city 's largely South Asian सशुल्क workforce.
Dubai 's प्रॉपर्टी मार्केट experienced a प्रमुख deterioration in 2008–2009 as a result of the worldwide economic downturn following the वित्तीय crisis of 2007-2008.
However, Dubai has made a स्थिर and gradual recovery with help coming from neighboring emirates.
The handful of new projects that हैं in the pipeline have been able to help Dubai रियल estate मेक a वापसी.
As of 2012, Dubai is the 22nd सबसे expensive city in the संसार, और the most expensive city in the मध्य East, surpassing Israel 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ).
Dubai रै also been rated as one of the best places to live in the मध्य East, including by US American global consulting कड़ मर्सर who rated the नगर as the बेहतरीन प्लेस to सजीव in the Middle East in 2011.
