An ocean ( ; the संसार समंदर of शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता ) is a body of saline water that composes a large part of a planet 's hydrosphere.
In the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of Earth, it refers to एक or all of the major divisions of the planet 's संसार Ocean – वे are, in descending order of area, the Pacific, अटलांटिक, भारतीय, दक्षिणी ( Antarctic ), and Arctic Oceans.
The word `` sea `` is प्रायः used interchangeably with `` ocean '', but सख्ती speaking a sea is a body of saline water ( possibly a division of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land.
Earth is the only ग्रह ज्ञात to have an ocean ( or कोई विशाल amounts of open द्रव water ).
Approximately 72 % of the planet 's सतह ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline water that is customarily divided into several principal महासागर and छोटी seas, with the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface.
In शर्तें of the hydrosphere of the धरती, the ocean contains 97 % of the Earth 's water.
Oceanographers have stated that out of 97 %, तभी 5 % of the ocean as a whole on Earth has been छान.
क्युकी it is the principal component of Earth 's hydrosphere, the world समंदर is integral to all known life, forms part of the कार्बन साईकिल, and influences climate and weather patterns.
The total volume is approximately 1.3 अरब cubic kilometres ( 310 million cu mi ) with an average depth of.
It is the habitat of 230,000 known species, हालांकि much of the ocean 's depths remain unexplored और it is estimated that over two million marine species exist.
The origin of Earth 's oceans is still unknown, but oceans are believed to have formed in the Hadean period और may have been the impetus for the emergence of जीवन.
Extraterrestrial महासागर may be रचित of a wide range of elements and compounds.
The only पुष्टि विशाल stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the lakes of टाइटन, although there is प्रमाण for the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System.
जल्दी in उनके geologic histories, मंगल and शुक्र हैं theorized to have had large water oceans.
The Mars ocean hypothesis suggests that nearly a third of the surface of Mars was once covered by water, though the जल on Mars is no longer oceanic, and a runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus.
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its freezing point, so that water might exist in large quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting ice.
Unconfirmed oceans are speculated beneath the surface of अनेक dwarf planets and natural satellites ; notably, the ocean of Europa is believed to have over twice the जल volume of Earth.
The Solar System 's गैस giant planets are also believed to possess liquid atmospheric परतों of yet to be confirmed compositions.
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and exomoons, including surface oceans of liquid water भीतर a परितारकीय habitable zone.
Ocean planets are a काल्पनिक प्रकार of planet with a surface completely covered साथ liquid.
एल्विस Aaron प्रेस्ली ( January 8, 1935 – August 16, 1977 ) थी an American singer और कर्ता.
a cultural प्रतीक, he is commonly known by the single name Elvis.
One of the most popular musicians of the 20th century, he is प्रायः referred to as the `` King of Rock and Roll '' or `` the किंग ''.
Born in Tupelo, Mississippi, Presley moved to Memphis, Tennessee, with उसके family at the age of 13.
He began his career there in 1954, working with Sun Records owner Sam Phillips, who wanted to bring the sound of African-American music to a wider audience.
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and bassist Bill Black, Presley was the most important popularizer of rockabilly, an uptempo, backbeat -driven fusion of देश और rhythm and blues.
RCA Victor acquired his अनुबंध in a सौदे arranged by Colonel tom Parker, who गई on to manage the सिंगर for over two decades.
Presley 's first RCA सिंगल, `` Heartbreak Hotel ``, released in January 1956, was a number-one hit.
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of rock and roll with a श्रेणी of network television दिखावे and chart-topping records.
His energized interpretations of songs, many from African-American sources, और his uninhibited प्रदर्शन style made him enormously popular—and controversial.
In November 1956, he made उसके film debut in Love Me टेंडर.
Drafted into military service in 1958, Presley relaunched his रिकॉर्डिंग career two years later साथ some of his most commercially successful कार्य.
He staged few concerts however, और guided by Parker, proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to बनाना Hollywood movies और soundtrack एल्बम, सबसे of them critically derided.
In 1968, after सात years away from the stage, he returned to सजीव performance in a celebrated comeback television special that led to an extended Las Vegas concert residency and a string of profitable tours.
In 1973 प्रेस्ली staged the पहला concert broadcast globally via satellite, Aloha from Hawaii.
Prescription drug गाली severely deteriorated his health, and he died suddenly in 1977 at the age of 42.
प्रेस्ली is regarded as one of the most important figures of 20th-century popular culture.
He था a versatile voice and unusually wide success encompassing many genres, including country, pop ballads, इन्जील, and ब्लूज़.
He is the best-selling solo artist in the history of popular music.
Nominated for 14 प्रतिस्पर्धी Grammys, he won three, और प्राप्त the ग्रैमी आजीवन Achievement Award at आयु 36.
He has been inducted into अनेक music halls of fame.

रूट beer is a carbonated, sweetened beverage, originally made using the root of a sassafras plant ( or the bark of a sassafras tree ) as the primary flavor.
Root beer, popularized in North America, comes in two forms : alcoholic and soft drink.
The historical रूट बियर was analogous to small beer in कि the process provided a drink with a very कम दारू content.
Although roots are used as the source of many soft drinks throughout the world, often अलग names are used.
fluorescent minerals emit visible लाइट when exposed to पराबैंगनी light
Fluorescence is the emission of light by a substance that has अवशोषित light or other electromagnetic विकिरण.
It is a form of luminescence.
In most मामले, the emitted light has a longer wavelength, और इसलिए lower उर्जा, than the absorbed विकिरण.
However, जब the absorbed इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation is intense, it is possible लिये one electron to absorb two photons ; this two-photon अवशोषण can सीसे to उत्सर्जन of radiation having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation.
The emitted radiation may also be of the वही wavelength as the absorbed radiation, termed `` resonance fluorescence ''.
The most striking examples of fluorescence occur when the absorbed विकिरण is in the ultraviolet प्रदेश of the spectrum, and यूँ invisible to the human eye, and the emitted light is in the visible प्रदेश.
Fluorescence has many practical applications, सहित mineralogy, gemology, chemical sensors ( fluorescence स्पेक्ट्रमिकी ), fluorescent labelling, dyes, biological detectors, and, most commonly, fluorescent lamps.
Informal logic, intuitively, refers to the principles of logic and logical thought outside of a औपचारिक setting.
However, perhaps क्युकी of the informal in the title, the precise definition of informal logic is a matter of some dispute.
Ralph H. जॉनसन और J. एंथोनी ब्लेयर define अनौपचारिक logic as `` a शाखा of logic जिनकी task is to develop non-formal standards, criteria, प्रक्रियाओं for the analysis, interpretation, evaluation, criticism and निर्माण of argumentation. ''
This परिभाषा reflects what था been implicit in their practice and what अन्य were doing in their informal logic texts.
Informal logic is संबद्ध with ( अनौपचारिक ) fallacies, critical thinking, the Thinking Skills गति and the interdisciplinary inquiry ज्ञात as argumentation theory.
Frans H. van Eemeren writes कि the label `` informal logic '' कवर a `` collection of normative approaches to the study of reasoning in ordinary language that remain करीब to the practice of argumentation than formal logic. ''
USA annual रियल GDP 1910–60, साथ the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
बेरोजगारी रेट in the US 1910–1960, with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
the Great Depression began in August of 1929, when the United States economy first गई into an economic recession.
Although the देश spent two months साथ declining GDP, it was not until the Wall Street Crash of October, 1929 that the effects of a declining अर्थव्यवस्था were felt, and a major worldwide आर्थिक downturn ensued.
The market crash marked the beginning of a decade of high unemployment, poverty, low profits, deflation, plunging farm incomes, and खोया opportunities for economic growth and personal advancement.
Although its causes are स्टिल अनिश्चित और controversial, the net effect was a sudden and सामान्य loss of confidence in the economic future.
The usual explanations include numerous factors, especially high consumer debt, ill-regulated markets that permitted overoptimistic loans by banks and investors, and the lack of high-growth new industries, सब interacting to बनाएँ a downward आर्थिक spiral of घटाया बिता, falling confidence, and lowered production.
Industries that suffered the most included construction, agriculture as dust-bowl conditions persisted in the agricultural heartland, shipping, mining, और logging as खूब as durable goods like automobiles और appliances that could be postponed.
the economy reached bottom in the शीत of 1932–33 ; then came four years of very rapid विकास जबतक 1937, when the Recession of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment.
The Depression caused major political changes in America.
Three years into the अवसाद, Herbert हूवर lost the 1932 अध्यक्षीय election to फ्रैंकलिन Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide.
Roosevelt 's आर्थिक रिकवरी plan, the New Deal, instituted unprecedented programs for relief, recovery and सुधार, and brought about a major realignment of American politics.
The Depression also resulted in an increase of emigration of people to अन्य countries for the पहला time in अमरीकी history.
For example, some immigrants went back to their देशी countries, और some native US citizens went to Canada, Australia, and South Africa.
It also resulted in the mass migration of लोगों from badly hit areas in the Great Plains and the South to places such as California and the North, क्रमशः ( see Okies and the ग्रेट Migration of African Americans ).
Racial tensions also increased during this time.
by the 1940s immigration had लौटे back to normal, and emigration declined.
A well-known उदाहरण of an emigrant was Frank McCourt, who गई to Ireland, as recounted in his book Angela 's राख.
The memory of the Depression भी shaped modern theories of अर्थशास्त्र and resulted in many changes in how the government dealt with economic downturns, such as the use of stimulus packages, Keynesian economics, and Social Security.
It also shaped modern American literature, resulting in प्रसिद्ध novels such as John steinbeck 's `` The अंगूर of Wrath `` and `` of Mice और Men ``.
The ग्रेट Depression of the 1930s started with the stock मार्केट crash of अक्तूबर 1929.
Turkey ( ), officially the Republic of Turkey, is a transcontinental country, स्तिथ mostly on Anatolia in Western Asia and on East Thrace in Southeastern यूरोपीय.
Turkey is bordered by eight countries : Bulgaria to the northwest ; Greece to the west ; Georgia to the northeast ; Armenia, इरान and the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast.
The Mediterranean Sea is to the south ; the Aegean Sea is to the west ; and the ब्लैक समुद्र is to the उत्तर.
The Sea of Marmara, the Bosphorus and the Dardanelles ( which together form the Turkish Straits ) demarcate the boundary between thrace and Anatolia ; they भी separate Europe and Asia.
Turkey 's location at the crossroads of Europe and Asia makes it a country of significant geostrategic importance.
The country 's official भाषा is Turkish, a turkic भाषा, which is spoken by approximately 85 % of the population as mother tongue.
the most numerous ethnic group is the Turks, जो constitute between 70 % and 75 % of the population according to The World Factbook.
Kurds are the largest जातीय minority and, according to the same source, क्रमांक around 18 % of the population while other ethnic minorities are estimated to be at 7–12 %.
The vast majority of the population is Muslim.
The क्षेत्रफल now called तुर्कों has महरूम inhabited since the Paleolithic, including various Ancient आनातोलियाई civilizations और Thracian peoples.
After Alexander the Great 's conquest, the area was Hellenized, which continued with the Roman rule and the transition into the Byzantine Empire.
The Seljuk turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century, starting the process of Turkification, जिससे was greatly accelerated by the Seljuk विजय over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071.
The Seljuk Sultanate of Rûm ruled आनातोलिया until the Mongol invasion in 1243, upon which it disintegrated into several small तुर्की beyliks.
Starting इससे the लेट 13th सदी, the उस्मानी beylik संयुक्त आनातोलिया और created an empire encompassing much of Southeastern Europe, Western एशिया and North Africa.
After the Ottoman Empire collapsed following its defeat in World War I, parts of it were occupied by the विजयी Allies.
A cadre of young military officers, led by mustafa Kemal Atatürk and उसके colleagues, organized a successful resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 they स्थापित the modern Republic of तुर्कों, with Atatürk as its first president.
Turkey is a democratic, secular, unitary, constitutional republic with a diverse cultural विरासत.
Turkey has become increasingly integrated with the West through membership in संगठनों such as the Council of Europe, नाटो, OECD, OSCE और the G-20 major economies.
Turkey began full सदस्यता negotiations with the European Union in 2005, having been an associate member of the European Economic Community since 1963 और having joined the eu Customs Union in 1995.
Turkey has also fostered close cultural, political and economic relations with the Middle East, काकेशस, the Turkic states of Central एशिया और the African countries through membership in organisations such as the Turkic Council, संयुक्त Administration of Turkic Arts and Culture, Organisation of Islamic Cooperation and the आर्थिक Cooperation Organisation.
Turkey 's growing अर्थव्यवस्था and diplomatic पहलों have led to इसके recognition as a regional power.
तुर्कों is the world 's 17th largest economy by nominal GDP और the 16th largest by purchasing power parity.
caryn Elaine जॉनसन, best known as Whoopi गोल्डबर्ग (, ( born नवम्बर 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, author और talk show मेजबान.
Goldberg made her film debut in The Color Purple ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She received a nomination for the अकादमी Award लिये Best Actress and won her first सुनहरी Globe Award for उसके role in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda Mae Brown, a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) सहेजें his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the ब्लॉकबस्टर Ghost.
This performance won her a दूसरी Golden Globe and an अकादमी Award for Best supporting अभिनेत्री ; this made Goldberg only the second black woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the हवा in 1939.
notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2, The Player, Made in America, How Stella Got Her Groove Back, लड़की, Interrupted and Rat Race.
She is also acclaimed लिये her roles as the बारटेंडर Guinan in Star Trek : The अगला पीढी, as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash, और as कार्मेन Tibideaux in ग्ली, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
Goldberg has been nominated लिये 13 एमी Awards for her कार्य in television.
She थी co-producer of the popular game show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004.
She रै been the moderator of the daytime talk show The View चूंकि 2007.
गोल्डबर्ग has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a Tony ( for production, not एक्टिंग ), and an Oscar.
in addition, Goldberg has a British अकादमी फिल्मी Award, four लोगों 's Choice Awards, and has महरूम honored साथ a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
She is एक of the few entertainers who have जीती an Emmy, ग्रैमी, Oscar, and Tony Award.
Augusta is a संचित city in the u.S. state of Georgia, स्तिथ at the fall लकीर of the Savannah River, at the head of its navigable portion.
As of the 2010 census, the Augusta– रिचमंड काउंटी population was 195,844 not counting the unconsolidated शहरों of Hephzibah and Blythe.
Augusta is the principal city of the Augusta – Richmond County Metropolitan Statistical Area, which as of 2010 had an estimated population of 556,877, making it both the second-largest city और the second-largest metro area in the state after Atlanta.
It is the 116th-largest city in the United राज्य.
Internationally, Augusta is best known लिये hosting the Masters Tournament in golf each spring.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट disc which contains आंकड़ा.
The name is an acronym which stands for `` कॉम्पैक्ट Disc Read-only memory ``.
Computers can पढ़ा CD-ROMs, but can not write on them.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software, सहित video खेल और multimedia अनुप्रयोग, हालांकि any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced CDs, थाम both computer data and ऑडियो with the latter capable of होने निभाई on a CD player, while data ( ऐसे as software or digital video ) is तभी usable on a computer ( such as आईएसओ 9660 format PC cd-roms ).
The Yellow किताब is the technical मानक that defines the स्वरूप of CD-ROMs.
One of a नियत of color-bound books that contain the technical विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप, the Yellow Book, created by Sony और Philips, was the first एक्सटेंशन of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the format to hold any रूप of data.
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as Black Hawks before 1986, and known colloquially as the Hawks ) are a professional बर्फ hockey team based in Chicago, इलिनोइस.
They हैं members of the Central Division of the पश्चिमी Conference of the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
They have जीती four Stanley Cup championships since their founding in 1926, सबसे recently in 2009–10.
The Blackhawks हैं one of the Original Six एनएचएल teams, along with the डेट्रॉयट Red Wings, Montreal Canadiens, Toronto Maple Leafs, Boston Bruins and New York Rangers.
Since the Blackhawks have played their home games at the United Center after having spent 65 years playing at Chicago Stadium.

Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical year of many Christian denominations, lasting for a period of approximately six weeks leading up to Easter Sunday.
In the सामान्य Latin-rite and most Western denominations lent is taken to चलाएं from Ash बुधवार to Maundy Thursday ( Holy Thursday ) morning or to Easter संध्या.
In the Catholic Church, Lent lasts until Holy गुरुवार, while other denominations run until Easter Eve.
The traditional purpose of Lent is the preparation of the believer through prayer, penance, repentance, almsgiving, and self-denial.
Its institutional purpose is heightened in the annual commemoration of पावन Week, marking the death, burial and क़यामत of Jesus, which recalls the events of the Bible जब Jesus is crucified on Good शुक्रवार, which then culminates in the celebration on Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of Jesus मसीह.
During Lent, many of the faithful commit to fasting or giving up certain types of luxuries as a form of penitence.
The स्टेशन of the Cross, a devotional commemoration of मसीह 's carrying the Cross and of उसके execution, are often observed.
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant churches हटाएँ flowers from their altars, while crucifixes, religious statues, and other elaborate religious प्रतीकों are often veiled in violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event.
In certain pious Catholic countries, some adherents mark the season with the traditional abstention from the consumption of meat.
In some countries, grand धार्मिक processions और cultural customs are observed, and the faithful attempt to visit seven churches during Holy Week in honor of Jesus Christ heading to Mount Calvary.
Lent is traditionally described as lasting for forty days, in commemoration of the forty days जिससे, according to the Gospels of Matthew, Mark and ल्यूक, Jesus spent fasting in the मरुस्थल before the शुरूआत of उसके पब्लिक ministry, where he endured temptation by the Devil.
However, अलग Christian denominations गणना the forty days of Lent differently.
in most Western traditions the Sundays are not counted as भाग of Lent ; thus the period from Ash Wednesday जबतक Easter consists of 40 days when the Sundays are excluded.
However in the रोमन Catholic Church Lent is now taken to समाप्त on Holy Thursday बल्कि than Easter Eve, and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays, or 44 days in total.
This event, along with its pious customs हैं observed by Catholics, Lutherans, methodists, presbyterians, and Anglicans.

The Chernobyl disaster (, chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl प्रलय ) was a अनर्थकारी nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl नाभिकीय Power Plant in युक्त ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR ), which was under the direct क्षेत्राधिकार of the central authorities of the Soviet Union.
an explosion and fire released large quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय particles into the atmosphere, which spread over much of the western USSR and यूरोपीय.
the chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst नाभिकीय power plant accident in इतिहास, और is one of only two classified as a level 7 event on the International Nuclear Event Scale ( the other being the फुकुशिमा daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination और avert a वृहद catastrophe ultimately शामिल over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles.
The आधिकारिक Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has been disputed, and long-term effects such as cancers and deformities are स्टिल being accounted for.
In व्याकरण, a subject complement is a predicative expression that follows a linking verb ( copula ) and that complements ( completes ) the विषय of the sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it.
In the पूर्व case, a renaming संज्ञा phrase such as a संज्ञा or pronoun is called a predicative nominal.
An adjective following the copula and describing the subject is called a predicative क्रियाशील.
in either case the predicative complement in effect mirrors the subject.
विषय complements are used साथ a small class of verbs called linking verbs or copula, of which be is the most common.
Since copula are stative verbs, subject complements are नहीं affected by any action of the verb.
Subject complements हैं typically not clause arguments, nor are they clause adjuncts.
Throughout the fifty-five साल history of the Grammy Awards, अनेक significant रिकॉर्ड have been नियत.
इस पेज only includes the competitive पुरस्कार won by various artists.
इस does not शामिल the various खास awards that हैं presented by the National Academy of Recording कला and Sciences such as Lifetime उपलब्धि Awards, Trustees Awards, Technical Awards or Legend Awards.
The पेज however does include other non-performance related Grammys ( known as the Craft & Production Fields ) that may have महरूम presented to the कलाकार ( s ).
मार्शल Bruce Mathers III ( born October 17, 1972 ), better known by his stage name Eminem ( stylized as eminǝm ) and by his alter अहंकार Slim छायादार, is an American rapper, record producer, songwriter और actor.
Eminem, along with his सोलो career, is a member of उसके group D12, and also one हाफ of the hip hop duo Bad Meets दुष्ट, with Royce da 5'9 ''.
Eminem is one of the best-selling artists in the world और is the best-selling artist of the 2000s.
He has been सूचीबद्ध and ranked as एक of the greatest artists of all time by many magazines, including Rolling Stone magazine which ranked उसे 82nd on its सूची of the 100 Greatest Artists of सब Time.
the same magazine declared him The King of हिप Hop.
Including his कार्य साथ D12 और ख़राब Meets Evil, एमिनेम has achieved ten number-one एल्बम on the बिलबोर्ड 200.
He has sold more than 100 million records विश्वव्यापी, सहित 42 million tracks and 49.1 million albums in the United States.
As an underground rapper एमिनेम released his debut solo album, Infinite in 1996.
The एल्बम was a critical and commercial विफलता.
He gained mainstream popularity in 1999 after the release of उसके major-label debut album the Slim छायादार lp.
The LP also अर्जित Eminem his first Grammy Award for Best Rap Album.
उसके अगला two रिकॉर्ड the Marshall Mathers LP, and the एमिनेम Show, also जीती बेहतरीन Rap Album Grammy पुरस्कार, making Eminem the first कलाकार to win Best Rap Album for three consecutive LPs.
This was followed by another studio रिलीज in 2004 titled Encore.
एमिनेम then went on hiatus after touring in 2005.
He released his पहला album in five years titled Relapse, on may 15, 2009.
in 2010, Eminem released his seventh studio album Recovery.
Recovery was an अंतरराष्ट्रीय कामयाबी and was named the best selling album of 2010 worldwide, joining The Eminem Show, which थी the best seller of 2002.
Eminem won Grammy Awards लिये both Relapse and Recovery, giving him a total of 13 Grammys in his career.
Eminem has opened other ventures, including his own record label Shady Records with his manager Paul Rosenberg.
he भी रै his own रेडियो channel, Shade 45 on Sirius XM Radio.
एमिनेम began an acting career in 2002, when he starred in the hip hop drama film 8 Mile.
He won the Academy Award for Best असली Song, becoming the first rap artist ever to win the award.
He has also made कैमियो appearances in The Wash ( 2001 ), Funny People ( 2009 ) and the television श्रेणी Entourage.
The acre is a unit of area used in the imperial and U.S. customary systems.
An एकड़ is about 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – slightly smaller than an American football field.
The acre is no longer commonly प्रयुक्त, हालांकि a few notable exceptions include the United States, Australia, Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the United Kingdom, हालांकि is still used in real एस्टेट descriptions ).
It is स्टिल used, to some extent, in Canada.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय symbol of the acre is ac, and is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a वर्गाकार mile.
The most commonly used acre today is the international acre.
In the United States both the international एकड़ and the slightly अलग us survey acre are in use.
The most common उपयोग of the acre is to measure tracts of land.
One अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 square metres.
During the Middle आयु, an एकड़ was the amount of जमीन that could be plowed in one day साथ a yoke of oxen.
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the Law of Conservation of Mass led to many new findings in the 19th century.
Joseph proust 's विधि of definite proportions and John Dalton 's परमाणु theory branched from the discoveries of Antoine Lavoisier.
Lavoisier 's quantitative experiments revealed that combustion involved oxygen बल्कि than what was previously thought to be phlogiston.
The law of संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान, or principle of mass conservation, states कि for any system बंद to सब transfers of matter और उर्जा ( both of which have mass ), the mass of the system must remain निरंतर over time, as system mass can not change quantity if it is not added or removed.
hence, the मात्रा of mass is `` conserved '' over time.
The law implies that mass can neither be created nor destroyed, although it may be rearranged in space, or the entities associated साथ it may be changed in form, as for उदाहरण when light or physical work is transformed into particles कि contribute the same mass to the system as the लाइट or work had contributed.
the law implies ( requires ) कि during कोई chemical प्रतिक्रिया, nuclear reaction, or रेडियोसक्रिय decay in an पृथक system, the mass of the reactants or starting material must equal the mass of the उत्पाद.
the अवधारणा of mass conservation is widely used in many fields such as रसायन, mechanics, and द्रव dynamics.
Historically, mass conservation थी खोजा in chemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ by Antoine Lavoisier in the late 18th सदी, and was of crucial importance in the progress from alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry.
The closely related concept of matter संरक्षण was मिला to hold good in chemistry to ऐसे high approximation that it failed only for the ऊँची energies treated by the बाद refinements of relativity सिद्धान्त, but otherwise remains useful और sufficiently accurate लिये most chemical calculations, भी in modern अभ्यास.
In special relativity, needed for accuracy when large उर्जा हस्तांतरण between systems is शामिल, the difference between thermodynamically closed और isolated प्रणालियों becomes important, since conservation of द्रव्यमान is strictly and perfectly upheld तभी for so-called isolated प्रणालियों, i.e. those completely isolated इससे all exchanges with the environment.
in this परिस्थिति, the mass-energy equivalence theorem राज्य that mass conservation is equivalent to total energy conservation, which is the first law of thermodynamics.
by contrast, for a thermodynamically closed प्रणाली ( i.e., one जिससे is closed to exchanges of पदार्थ, लकिन open to exchanges of non-material energy, such as ऊष्मा and कार्य, with the परिवेश ) mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved.
The input or output of non-material energy must change the mass of the system in relativity theory, although the change is usually small, since relatively large amounts of such energy ( by comparison with ordinary experience ) carry only a small amount of mass ( again by ordinary standards of measurement ).
In special relativity, द्रव्यमान is not परिवर्तित to energy, since energy in all of its forms always retains इसके equivalent amount of mass throughout any transformation or translocation into, or आउट of, a system.
However, certain types of matter ( a different concept ) may be converted to energy, so long as the mass of the system is unchanged in the process.
However, if ऐसे उर्जा is removed इससे systems, they जरूर खोना the mass that is associated with it.
In general relativity, mass ( and energy ) संरक्षण in expanding volumes of स्पेस is a जटिल concept, subject to different परिभाषाएं, और neither mass nor energy is as strictly and बस conserved as is the case in special relativity और in मिन्कोवस्की space.
For a discussion, देखिए mass in general relativity.
A सुअर is any of the animals in the genus सस, within the Suidae परिवार of even-toed ungulates.
Pigs include the घरेलू pig, इसके पूर्वज the जंगली boar, और अनेक other wild relatives.
Young and small pigs are ज्ञात as piglets.
Pigs हैं omnivores and हैं highly social and बुद्धिमान animals.

A फ्लॉपी disk, or diskette, is a disk storage मीडियम composed of a disk of thin and flexible चुम्बकीय storage medium, sealed in a आयताकार plastic carrier lined साथ fabric that removes dust अणु.
They are read and written by a floppy disk drive ( fdd ).
Floppy disks, initially as मीडिया and बाद in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) sizes, were a ubiquitous form of data storage and exchange from the mid-1970s well into the first decade of the 21st century.
By 2010, computer motherboards were rarely manufactured with floppy drive support ; `` floppies could be प्रयुक्त as an external usb drive, लकिन ``, 8 ``, and non-standard drives could तभी be संभाला by बूढ़ा equipment.
While floppy disk drives still have some limited uses, especially with विरासत औद्योगिक computer equipment, they have been superseded by data भंडार methods with much greater capacity, such as USB flash drives, portable external मुश्किल disk drives, optical discs, memory cards, and computer networks.
An animated diagram of a cutter
In baseball, a cutter, or cut fastball, is a type of fastball which breaks थोड़ा toward the पिचर 's दस्ताने side as it reaches घर थाली.
इस pitch is somewhere between a slider और a fastball, as it is usually thrown faster than a slider but with more motion than a typical fastball.
Some pitchers उपयोग a cutter as a way to prevent hitters from expecting their regular fastballs.
A common technique used to throw a cutter is to use a four-seam fastball grip with the baseball set slightly off center in the hand.
When a batter is able to hit a कटर pitch, it often परिणाम in soft contact and an easy आउट, due to the पिच 's movement keeping the ball away from the चमगादड़ 's sweet spot.
The कटर is typically 2–5 किमी slower than a pitcher 's four-seam fastball.
in 2010, the average pitch classified as a cutter by PITCHf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher was 88.6 किमी ; the average four-seamer was 92.1 किमी.
`` कया It Takes '' is a power ballad by अमरीकी hard rock band Aerosmith.
it थी written by Steven Tyler, जो Perry, and Desmond Child.
It was released in 1990 as the third सिंगल इससे Aerosmith 's critically and commercially successful 1989 एल्बम Pump.
in the video The Making of Pump, A & r man जॉन Kalodner described the सोंग as `` a masterpiece ''.
During live performances, Tyler sings the first verse a cappella and belts out one of उसके signature screams right before the chorus.
The एल्बम संस्करण of the song is followed by an untitled छुपा track.

Odysseus ( or ; Greek :, ), also ज्ञात by the Roman नाम Ulysses ( ; ), was a legendary यूनानी king of Ithaca and a hero of Homer 's epic poem the Odyssey.
odysseus also plays a key role in होमर 's Iliad और other works in कि वही Epic Cycle.
husband of Penelope, father of Telemachus, and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea, Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance, guile, and versatility ( polytropos ), and is hence known by the epithet Odysseus the Cunning ( mētis, or `` cunning प्रज्ञा `` ).
He is most famous for the ten eventful years he took to वापसी home after the decade-long Trojan War and his famous Trojan Horse ploy to capture the city of Troy.
Erie is a statutory Town in Boulder and Weld काउंटी in the U.S. state of Colorado.
the population according to the 2010 census is 18,135 and was recorded as 6,291 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
The Town of Erie is located just वेस्ट of I-25 for easy access to I-70, Denver International विमानक्षेत्र and Colorado 's संपूर्ण Front Range.
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48 square मील, extending from the north side of State राजमार्ग 52 दक्षिण to State राजमार्ग 7, and between US 287 on the west and Interstate 25 to the east.
Erie is approximately 35 मिनट्स इससे डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, 25 minutes to Denver and 20 minutes from Boulder.
The Board of trustees serves as the legislative and शासी body of the कस्बा of erie and is जिम्मेदार for establishing Town policies and goals.
The Board has the प्राधिकार to adopt laws, ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the कारोबार of the Town, and by ordinance may डालें into अनुबंध or intergovernmental agreements to furnish, प्राप्त services or to provide for cooperative service delivery.
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of Trustees, the Town व्यवस्थापक is the chief operating and administrative officer of the Town and is responsible for providing professional leadership in the administration and निष्पादन of policies और objectives formulated by the Board.
The मिशन of the erie Police Department is to communicate and work with the community to maintain a safe environment, prevent crime and enforce the law, while protecting the अधिकारों of all.
Erie Municipal Airport ( EIK ) is स्वामित्व और संचालित by the Town of Erie and is रणनीतिक located in the Denver-Boulder महानगर area on कोलोराडो Highway 7, a little over three मील west of Interstate 25.
the प्रमुख runway is concrete paved and 4,700 feet long.
The is a home वीडियो game कंसोल produced by Sony कंप्यूटर Entertainment.
It is the successor to the प्लेस्टेशन 2, as part of the PlayStation series.
the PlayStation 3 competes with Microsoft 's Xbox 360 और Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh पीढी of video game consoles.
It थी first released on November 11, 2006, in Japan, with international markets following shortly thereafter.
The console was पहला officially announced at E3 2005.
originally set for a spring 2006 release तिथि, it थी delayed several टाइम्स until finally hitting stores at the end of the year.
It was the first and currently तभी कंसोल to use Blu-ray Disc as its primary storage medium.
Major features of the console शामिल its unified online gaming सेवा, the PlayStation संजाल, and इसके connectivity with the PlayStation पोर्टेबल and PlayStation Vita, in September 2009 the updated PlayStation 3 Slim, was released.
This Slim is lighter और thinner than the original version, although it lacks प्लेस्टेशन 2 backwards compatibility ( removed on बाद असली मॉडल ), but notably featured a re-designed logo and विपणन design.
As of November 4, 2012, 70 million PlayStation 3s have been sold worldwide.
Its successor, PlayStation 4, is नियत for a Q4 2013 release.
Salvador डोमिंगो Felipe Jacinto Dalí i Domènech, 1st Marqués de dalí de Pubol ( May 11, 1904January 23, 1989 ), ज्ञात as Salvador Dalí ( ), थी a prominent Spanish surrealist painter born in Figueres, स्पेन.
Dalí was a skilled draftsman, best known for the striking और bizarre images in उसके surrealist work.
उसके painterly skills are प्रायः attributed to the influence of पुनर्जागरण मास्टर्स.
His best-known work, The Persistence of Memory, थी completed in 1931.
Dalí 's expansive कलाकारी रंगमंडल included film, sculpture, and photography, in collaboration with a range of कलाकारों in a variety of मीडिया.
Dalí attributed his `` love of everything that is gilded and excessive, my passion for लक्ज़री and my love of oriental कपडे '' to a self-styled `` Arab lineage '', claiming that his ancestors were descended from the मूर.
Dalí was highly imaginative, and भी enjoyed indulging in unusual and grandiose behavior.
His eccentric manner and attention-grabbing पब्लिक actions sometimes drew more attention than his artwork, to the dismay of those जो held his work in high esteem, और to the जलन of उसके critics.

the humanities are academic disciplines that study human culture, using methods that are primarily analytical, critical, or speculative, and having a significant historical तत्व, as distinguished from the mainly empirical approaches of the natural sciences.
The humanities शामिल ancient and modern languages, literature, philosophy, religion, and visual and performing arts such as music and थिएटर.
The humanities that हैं also regarded as social sciences include history, मानवशास्त्र, area studies, communication अध्ययन, सांस्कृतिक studies, विधि, अर्थशास्त्र और linguistics.
विद्वानों working in the humanities are sometimes described as `` humanists ''.
However, that पद also describes the philosophical position of humanism, जिससे some `` antihumanist `` विद्वानों in the humanities अस्वीकृत.
Some secondary schools प्रस्ताव humanities वर्ग, usually consisting of अंग्रेज़ी literature, global studies, and आर्ट.
Human disciplines like history, cultural anthropology and psychoanalysis study विषय matters to which the experimental method does not apply, and they have access instead to the comparative method and तुलनात्मक research.
The 2005 Blue रूम Christmas Tree
The श्वेत House Christmas पेड़, भी ज्ञात as the Blue Room Christmas पेड़, is the official indoor Christmas tree at the residence of the President of the United States, the श्वेत House.
the पहला indoor Christmas tree was संस्थापित in the श्वेत हाउस sometime in the 19th century ( there are varying claims as to the exact year ) और चूंकि 1961 the tree रै had a themed motif at the discretion of the पहला Lady of the United States.
The President of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
The president लीड the executive शाखा of the संघीय government and is the commander-in-chief of the United राज्य Armed Forces.
Article ii of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive शक्ति of the United States in the president और charges उसे with the execution of federal law, alongside the responsibility of appointing federal executive, राजनयिक, नियामक, and judicial officers, और concluding treaties साथ foreign शक्तियां, with the advice and सहमति of the Senate.
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves, and to convene and adjourn either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the United States, the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially and each modern president, despite possessing no formal विधान powers beyond signing or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely जिम्मेदार for dictating the विधान agenda of his party and the विदेशी और domestic policy of the संयुक्त States.
The president is अक्सर described as the most powerful person in the संसार.
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term, and is one of only two nationally elected संघीय officers, the अन्य being the Vice President of the United राज्य.
The twenty-second Amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone from ever होने elected to the presidency for a तीसरा full term.
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the प्रेसिडेंसी more than एकबार if that person previously had served as president, or acting अध्यक्ष, for more than two years of another person 's term as president.
In all, 43 individuals have served 55 four-year terms.
On January 20, 2009, Barack Obama became the 44th और current president.
On नवम्बर 6, 2012, he was re-elected and is scheduled to serve until जनवरी 20, 2017.
Senses हैं physiological capacities of organisms that provide आंकड़ा for perception.
The senses and उनके operation, classification, and सिद्धान्त are overlapping topics studied by a variety of fields, most notably neuroscience, cognitive psychology ( or संज्ञानात्मक science ), and philosophy of perception.
The nervous system रै a specific sensory प्रणाली or organ, समर्पित to each sense.
Humans have a multitude of senses.
Sight ( ophthalmoception ), hearing ( audioception ), taste ( gustaoception ), smell ( olfacoception or olfacception ), और touch ( tactioception ) are the five traditionally recognized.
While the ability to detect other stimuli beyond those governed by the traditional senses exists, including temperature ( thermoception ), kinesthetic sense ( proprioception ), pain ( nociception ), balance ( equilibrioception ), acceleration ( kinesthesioception ), और various internal stimuli ( e.g. the different chemoreceptors for detecting salt and carbon डाइऑक्साइड concentrations in the blood ), तभी a small number of these can safely be classified as separate senses in and of themselves.
कया constitutes a भाव is a matter of some debate, leading to कठिनाइयों in defining what exactly a sense is.
Animals also have receptors to sense the world around them, with degrees of काबिलियत varying greatly between species.
Humans have a comparatively weak sense of smell, while कुछ पशु may कमी one or more of the traditional five होश.
Some animals may also intake and interpret संवेदी stimuli in very different ways.
Some species of animals are able to sense the world in a way कि humans can not, with some प्रजाति able to sense electrical और magnetic fields, and detect जल pressure और currents.
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that have eight legs and chelicerae with fangs कि इंजेक्ट venom.
वे are the largest order of arachnids और रैंक seventh in total species विविधता among all other groups of organisms.
मकड़ियों are found विश्वव्यापी on every continent मगर for Antarctica, and have become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at least 43,678 spider species, and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however, there has been confusion within the scientific community as to how all ये families should be classified, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed चूंकि 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from अन्य arthropods in कि the usual देह segments are fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax and abdomen, and joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
नापसंद insects, spiders do नहीं have antennae.
In all except the most आदिम group, the Mesothelae, spiders have the most centralized nervous प्रणालियों of all arthropods, as all their ganglia are fused into एक mass in the cephalothorax.
नापसंद सबसे arthropods, spiders have no extensor muscles in their limbs और बजाय extend them by hydraulic दबाव.
Their abdomens भालू appendages that have been परिवर्धित into spinnerets that extrude silk from up to six प्रकार of silk glands within their abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in size, shape and the amount of sticky thread used.
It now appears कि the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest forms, and spiders that produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about, but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have been found in Carboniferous rocks from, and हैं very similar to the सबसे primitive surviving order, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of आधुनिक spiders, mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae, first appeared in the Triassic period, before.
a herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, but all other known species are परभक्षी, mostly preying on insects and on अन्य spiders, although a few large species also take पक्षियों and lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it साथ sticky bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid detection, or running it bas.
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations, but the active hunters have अधि vision, and hunters of the genus Portia show signs of प्रज्ञा in their choice of tactics और ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, and they liquidize their food by flooding it with digestive एंजाइमों and पीस it with the bases of their pedipalps, as they do नहीं have true jaws.
पुरूष spiders identify themselves by a किस्में of complex courtship rituals to avoid being खाया by the महिलाओं.
Males of सबसे species जीवित a few matings, limited mainly by their short life spans.
Females weave silk egg-cases, प्रत्येक of which may contain hundreds of अंडे.
Females of many species care for their young, for example by carrying them around or by sharing खाना with them.
A minority of species are सोशल, building सांप्रदायिक webs that may house anywhere इससे a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior सीमाएँ from precarious toleration, as in the widow मकड़ियों, to co-operative hunting and food-sharing.
Although most spiders live for at most two years, tarantulas and other mygalomorph मकड़ियों can live up to 25 years in captivity.
While the venom of a few species is खतरनाक to इंसानो, वैज्ञानिकों are now researching the use of spider venom in medicine और as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider रेशा provides a combination of lightness, strength and elasticity that is superior to that of synthetic materials, and spider रेशा genes have been inserted into mammals और plants to see if these can be प्रयुक्त as silk factories.
As a result of their wide range of behaviors, spiders have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing various combinations of patience, क्रूरता और creative powers.
धूसर 's anatomy is an American television चिकित्सा drama that premiered on the American Broadcasting Company ( एबीसी ), as a mid-season replacement on March 27, 2005.
the series has aired nine seasons, और focuses on the fictional lives of surgical interns and residents as वे gradually evolve into seasoned doctors, while trying to maintain personal lives.
The show 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes, who serves as an executive producer, along with Betsy Beers, चिह्नित Gordon, क्रिस्टा Vernoff, Rob Corn, Mark Wilding, और Allan heinberg.
The series was created to be racially diverse, utilizing a color-blind casting technique.
It is primarily filmed in Los एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The series ' समर्थक is Dr. Meredith Grey ( Ellen Pompeo ), who originally is स्वीकृत into the residency program at the fictional सिएटल अनुग्रह Hospital.
Meredith is assigned to कार्य under Dr. Miranda Bailey ( Chandra Wilson ), along with Dr. Cristina Yang ( Sandra Oh ), Dr. George o'malley ( T. R. Knight ), Dr. Izzie Stevens ( Katherine heigl ), and Dr. एलेक्स karev ( Justin Chambers ).
Following O'Malley 's death and स्टीवंस ' departure, the hospital 's merger with Mercy वेस्ट brings in dr. Jackson एवेरी ( Jesse Williams ) and Dr. April Kepner ( Sarah Drew ), in the sixth ऋतु.
The सर्जिकल wing is primarily supervised by Dr. Richard Webber ( James Pickens, Jr. ), who is eventually replaced by Dr. Derek Shepherd ( Patrick Dempsey ), and later dr. Owen Hunt ( Kevin mckidd ).
Dr. Preston बुर्के ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the निष्कर्ष of the third season, and is replaced by Dr. Erica hahn ( Brooke Smith ), who leaves the show दौरान the fifth season, and later dr. Teddy Altman ( Kim Raver ), जो departs at the end of the eighth season.
Introduced in the second ऋतु is dr. Addison मोंटगोमरी ( Kate Walsh ), who leaves the show at the end of the third season, in order to launch her own spin-off medical drama Private अभ्यास.
Dr. Callie टोरेस ( Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. चिह्नित Sloan ( Eric Dane ) also enter the दिखाएँ in the second season, while the latter dies in the premiere of the ninth season.
मेरेडिथ 's half-sister, Dr. lexie Grey ( chyler Leigh ), appears from season three and dies at the end of season आठ.
dr. Arizona Robbins ( Jessica Capshaw ) is given series regular status at the beginning of the sixth season.
Grey 's Anatomy is the highest-rated drama in the key 18–49 जनसांख्यिकी.
Previously among the overall top-ten rated shows in the संयुक्त States, Grey 's Anatomy has been well प्राप्त by critics.
माना an impact on संस्कृति, the series has प्राप्त numerous awards, and रै also been included in various आलोचकों ' top ten lists.
The show has produced अनेक specials, as खूब as distributed सब सीज़न to DVD, और released a collection of merchandise.
In 2012, Grey 's Anatomy was named the fifth-highest revenue earning show, in शर्तें of advertising per half-hour.
On May 11, 2012, the series was renewed for a ninth ऋतु, which premiered on September 27, 2012.
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a mental disorder characterized by a breakdown of विचार processes and by a deficit of typical emotional responses.
आम symptoms शामिल auditory hallucinations, paranoid or bizarre delusions, or disorganized speech and thinking, and it is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction.
the onset of symptoms typically occurs in young adulthood, साथ a global lifetime prevalence of about 0.3–0.7 %.
Diagnosis is आधारित on observed behavior and the patient 's reported experiences.
Genetics, early environment, neurobiology, और psychological and social processes appear to be important contributory कारकों ; some recreational and prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms.
Current research is focused on the role of neurobiology, although no single isolated organic cause has been found.
the many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate about whether the diagnosis represents a single disorder or a number of discrete syndromes.
Despite the etymology of the पद from the Greek roots skhizein ( σχίζειν, `` to split '' ) and phrēn, phren- ( φρήν, φρεν- ; `` mind '' ), schizophrenia करता नहीं imply a `` split व्यक्तित्व '', or `` multiple personality disorder '' ( which is known these दिनों as dissociative identity disorder ) —a condition with जिससे it is often उलझन in public बोध.
Rather, the term means a `` splitting of mental functions '', because of the symptomatic presentation of the illness.
the mainstay of उपचार is antipsychotic medication, which primarily suppresses dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity.
Psychotherapy and वोकेशनल and सोशल पुनर्वास are also important in treatment.
In more serious cases—where there is रिस्क to self and others— involuntary hospitalization may be जरुरी, although hospital stays are अभी shorter and less बारंबार than they एकबार were.
The disorder is thought mainly to affect संज्ञान, but it also usually contributes to chronic problems साथ behavior and emotion.
लोगों with schizophrenia are संभावित to have additional ( comorbid ) शर्तें, including प्रमुख depression और चिंता विकार ; the lifetime occurrence of substance use disorder is almost 50 %.
Social problems, ऐसे as long-term unemployment, poverty, and homelessness are common.
The average जीवन expectancy of लोगों with the disorder is 12 to 15 सालो less than those without, the result of increased शारीरिक health समस्याएं और a उच्चतर suicide रेट ( about 5 % ).
Paul Leslie Snider ( April 15, 1951–August 14, 1980 ) was the estranged husband and manager of Playboy model Dorothy Stratten, whom he murdered before killing खुद the वही दिन.
The Epic of Gilgamesh, an epic कविता from Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five स्वतंत्र Sumerian poems about 'bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), किंग of Uruk.
Four of ये were used as source material for a combined epic in Akkadian.
इस first combined epic, known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th century bc and is titled बाद its incipit, Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing सब Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have बच.
The later `` Standard babylonian '' version तिथियाँ from the 13th to the 10th centuries BC and bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` he who Saw the Deep '' ).
fragments of लगभग two thirds of इस longer, twelve-tablet version have महरूम बरामद.
Some of the best नक़ल यहूद discovered in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
The story centers on a friendship between Gilgamesh और Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the लोगों of Uruk.
Together, they journey to the Cedar पहाड़ to defeat humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later वे kill the Bull of स्वर्ग, जिससे the goddess Ishtar sends to punish gilgamesh for spurning her अग्रिम.
As a punishment for ये actions, the gods वाक्य Enkidu to death.
the second हाफ of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death, and his quest for immortality.
In order to learn the secret of eternal जीवन, gilgamesh undertakes a long and perilous यात्रा.
He learns that `` The life that you are seeking you will never find.
When the देवताओं created man वे allotted to him death, लकिन life they retained in their own keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic, and then attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the अक्कादी version of the epic.
Nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death, because of his great building projects, and उसके खाता of what utnapishtim बताई him happened दौरान the flood.
The story has been translated into many different भाषाएं, and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction.
A eukaryote ( or ) is an organism जिनकी कोशिकाएं contain complex structures enclosed within membranes.
eukaryotes may अधिक formally be referred to as the taxon eukarya or Eukaryota.
The defining membrane-bound structure कि sets eukaryotic cells apart from prokaryotic cells is the nucleus, or nuclear envelope, within which the genetic material is carried.
The presence of a nucleus gives eukaryotes their name, which comes इससे the Greek ( eu, `` शुभ '' ) and ( karyon, `` nut '' or `` kernel '' ).
सबसे eukaryotic cells भी contain other membrane-bound organelles ऐसे as mitochondria, chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus.
All विशाल complex जीवों हैं eukaryotes, including animals, plants and fungi.
The group also includes many unicellular organisms.
Cell division in eukaryotes is different from that in organisms without a nucleus ( Prokaryote ).
It involves separating the duplicated chromosomes, through movements directed by microtubules.
वहीँ are two types of division processes.
In समसूत्रण, one cell divides to produce दो genetically identical कोशिकाएं.
In meiosis, जिससे is required in sexual reproduction, one diploid cell ( having दो instances of each chromosome, one from each parent ) undergoes recombination of each pair of parental chromosomes, and then दो चरण of कोशिका प्रभाग, resulting in four haploid कोशिकाएं ( gametes ).
Each gamete has just one complement of chromosomes, each a unique mix of the corresponding pair of parental chromosomes.
Eukaryota appears to be monophyletic, and so makes up one of the three domains of life.
The दो other domains, Bacteria and Archaea, are prokaryotes and have none of the above सुविधाएँ.
Eukaryotes represent a छोटा minority of all जीना things ; भी in a human body there are 10 times अधिक microbes than इंसान कोशिकाएं.
However, due to their much larger size their collective worldwide biomass is अनुमानित at about equal to that of prokaryotes.
वे हैं माना to have first developed approximately 1.6–2.1 billion years ago.
The use of अंतरजाल services or software with अंतरजाल access to defraud victims or to otherwise लो लाभ of them, for उदाहरण by चोरी personal सूचना, which can even सीसे to identity theft.
A very common form of Internet fraud is the distribution of rogue security software.
Internet services can be प्रयुक्त to present बेईमान solicitations to prospective victims, to conduct fraudulent transactions, or to transmit the proceeds of fraud to financial institutions or to others कनेक्ट with the scheme.
Internet fraud can occur in chat कक्ष, email, message boards, or on वेबसाइटों.
The International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) is a NATO -led security मिशन in Afghanistan कि was established by the संयुक्त Nations Security Council in December 2001 by रेज़ोल्यूशन 1386, as envisaged by the Bonn अनुबंध.
Its main purpose is to ट्रैन the Afghan National Security Forces ( ANSF ) and assist Afghanistan in rebuilding key government institutions but is भी engaged in the 2001-present war with बागी groups.
ISAF was initially charged with securing Kabul and surrounding areas from the Taliban, al Qaeda और factional warlords, so as to allow for the establishment of the अफगान Transitional Administration headed by Hamid Karzai.
In October 2003, the UN Security Council authorized the expansion of the isaf mission throughout अफगानिस्तान, and ISAF subsequently expanded the mission in four प्रमुख stages over the whole of the country.
From 2006 to 2011, isaf had महरूम involved in increasingly more intensive कॉम्बैट operations in southern and पूर्वी Afghanistan.
Troop contributors include from the United States, संयुक्त Kingdom, NATO सदस्य states और a क्रमांक of अन्य देशों.
The intensity of the combat faced by contributing nations varies greatly, with the United States, United Kingdom, and कनाडा sustaining the majority of casualties in intensive combat operations, with other contributors sustaining significantly less.
as of early 2010, there were at least 700 military bases inside Afghanistan but more were expected to be built in the coming years.
About 400 of ये यहूद used by American‐led NATO शक्तियां and 300 by ANSF.
कोका ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is a crystalline tropane alkaloid that is obtained इससे the leaves of the coca plant.
The name comes from `` coca '' and the alkaloid प्रत्यय -ine, forming कोका.
it is a stimulant, an appetite suppressant, and a topical anesthetic.
Biologically, cocaine acts as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor, भी known as a triple reuptake inhibitor ( ट्राई ).
it is addictive because of its प्रभाव on the mesolimbic reward pathway.
Unlike सबसे अणुओं, cocaine has pockets साथ both high hydrophilic and lipophilic efficiency, violating the rule of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance.
This causes it to cross the blood–brain barrier far better than other psychoactive chemicals and may even induce blood-brain अवरोध breakdown.
It is illegal to possess, produce, or distribute cocaine लिये non-medicinal and non-government-sanctioned purposes in लगभग every country.

The tri-tip is a cut of beef from the bottom sirloin primal cut.
It is a small triangular muscle, usually 1.5 to 2.5 lbs. ( 675 to 1,150g ) per side of beef.
The scientific नाम of this muscle is tensor fasciae latae, inserted in the fascia lata, the संयोजी tissue covering the quadriceps femoris, भी पुकारा quadriceps extensor, a group of four muscles जिससे in turn insert in the patella, or घुटना cap of the animal.

the जनसांख्यिकी was 19,610 at the 2010 census.

u.s. रूट 12 and 71 and Minnesota State Highways 23 and 40 are four of the main रूट in the city.
The Speaker of the United States House of प्रतिनिधि ( or Speaker of the House ) is the पीठासीन officer of the chamber.
The office was established in 1789 by आलेख i, Section 2 of the United States संविधान, which states in भाग, `` The House of Representatives shall chuse their स्पीकर... ''
The current स्पीकर is जॉन Boehner, a रिपब्लिकन who represents ओहियो 's 8th congressional district.
The संविधान does not require that the Speaker be a Member of Congress, लकिन no non-member रै ever been elected to the office.
The Speaker is second in the United States presidential line of succession, after the वाइस President and ahead of the President pro tempore of the U.S. Senate.
Unlike some Westminster system parliaments, in which the office of Speaker is माना non-partisan, in the United States the Speaker of the House is a leadership position and the office-holder actively works to set the majority पार्टी 's legislative agenda.
The Speaker usually does नहीं personally preside over debates, बजाय delegating the duty to members of the House इससे the बहुमत party.
Aside from कर्तव्य relating to heading the House और the बहुमत political party, the स्पीकर also performs administrative and प्रक्रियात्मक कृत्यों, and represents उसके or her Congressional ज़िला.
A bicycle frame is the main component of a सायकिल, on to which wheels और other components are fitted.
The modern and सबसे common frame design लिये an कतरा bicycle is based on the safety bicycle, और consists of two triangles, a main triangle and a paired rear triangle.
This is known as the diamond फ़्रेम.
Frames हैं required to be strong, stiff and लाइट, which वे do by combining different सामग्री and shapes.
`` सरल gravity pendulum '' मॉडल assumes no friction or air resistance.
an exemplar animation of a pendulum प्रर्दशित the velocity और acceleration vectors
A pendulum is a weight suspended from a so that it can swing freely.
When a pendulum is displaced sideways from its resting equilibrium position, it is subject to a restoring force due to गम्भीरता that will accelerate it वापस toward the equilibrium position.
When released, the restoring force combined with the pendulum 's द्रव्यमान causes it to oscillate about the equilibrium position, swinging back and forth.
The time for one complete cycle, a left swing and a right swing, is called the period.
A pendulum swings साथ a specific period which depends ( mainly ) on इसके length.
इससे इसके डिस्कवरी around 1602 by गैलीलियो Galilei the regular motion of pendulums was used for timekeeping, और थी the संसार 's most accurate timekeeping technology until the 1930s.
Pendulums are used to regulate pendulum clocks, and are used in वैज्ञानिक यंत्र such as accelerometers and seismometers.
Historically they यहूद used as gravimeters to measure the त्वरण of gravity in geophysical surveys, and even as a मानक of length.
the word 'pendulum ' is new Latin, from the Latin pendulus, meaning 'hanging '.
The simple गम्भीरता pendulum is an idealized mathematical model of a pendulum.
This is a weight ( or bob ) on the end of a massless cord suspended from a, without friction.
When दिए an initial push, it होगा swing back और forth at a constant amplitude.
Real pendulums are subject to friction and air drag, so the amplitude of their swings declines.
The First Battle of सांड Run, also known as First Manassas ( the name used by Confederate forces ), was fought on जुलाई 21, 1861, in Prince William County, वर्जिनिया, निकट the city of Manassas.
It थी the पहला major land बैटल of the American सिविल War.
बस months after the start of the war at Fort Sumter, the Northern public clamored for a march against the confederate capital of Richmond, Virginia, which they expected to लाओ an early समाप्त to the rebellion.
Yielding to political pressure, Brig. gen. Irvin McDowell led his unseasoned संघ Army आरपार Bull Run against the equally inexperienced Confederate Army of Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped निकट manassas Junction.
McDowell 's ambitious plan for a surprise flank attack on the Confederate left was poorly चलाया by his officers and मेन ; nevertheless, the Confederates, who had been planning to attack the Union left flank, found themselves at an आरंभिक disadvantage.
Confederate reinforcements under ब्रिगेडियर. Gen. Joseph E. Johnston arrived from the Shenandoah घाटी by रेलरोड और the course of the battle quickly changed.
A brigade of Virginians under a relatively unknown colonel from the Virginia Military Institute, Thomas J. Jackson, stood their ground and जैक्सन received his famous nickname, `` Stonewall Jackson ''.
The Confederates then launched a strong counterattack, और as the संघ सैनिकों began withdrawing अंतर्गत fire, many panicked and it turned into a rout as McDowell 's men frantically ran बगैर अनुक्रम in the direction of Washington, D.C.
Both armies were sobered by the fierce fighting and many casualties, और realized the war was going to be much longer and bloodier than either had anticipated.

Weather is the state of the atmosphere, to the degree that it is hot or cold, wet or शुष्क, calm or stormy, clear or cloudy.
Most मौसम phenomena occur in the troposphere, बस below the stratosphere.
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and precipitation activity, whereas जलवायु is the term for the average atmospheric conditions over longer periods of time.
When used without qualification, `` weather '' is समझा to be the weather of Earth.
Weather is driven by एयर pressure ( temperature and moisture ) differences between एक place and another.
ये दबाव and temperature मतभेद can occur due to the sun angle at any particular spot, which varies by latitude from the tropics.
The strong temperature contrast between polar और तीव्र एयर gives वृद्धि to the जेट stream.
मौसम systems in the mid-latitudes, such as extratropical cyclones, are caused by instabilities of the jet स्ट्रीम flow.
Because the Earth 's axis is tilted relative to its orbital plane, sunlight is incident at different कोण at different times of the year.
On Earth 's surface, temperatures usually दायरा ±40 °c ( −40 °F to 100 °F ) annually.
Over हज़ारों of सालो, परिवर्तन in Earth 's orbit affect the राशि और distribution of solar energy received by the Earth और influence long-term climate और global जलवायु change.
Surface temperature मतभेद in फेरे कारण pressure differences.
Higher altitudes हैं cooler than lower altitudes due to differences in compressional heating.
Weather forecasting is the application of science and technology to predict the state of the atmosphere for a future समय and a given location.
The atmosphere is a chaotic system, so small changes to one part of the system can grow to have large प्रभाव on the system as a whole.
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout इंसान history, and there is evidence that human activity such as कृषि and industry has inadvertently modified weather patterns.
Studying how the weather works on other ग्रह has been helpful in understanding how weather works on Earth.
A famous लैंडमार्क in the Solar System, Jupiter 's Great Red Spot, is an anticyclonic storm known to have existed for at least 300 years.
However, weather is not limited to planetary लाशें.
a star 's corona is constantly being lost to space, creating कया is essentially a very thin atmosphere throughout the Solar System.
The movement of mass ejected from the Sun is known as the solar wind.

वो हस्ताक्षरित with Capitol Records.

the following is a सूची of sovereign states and territories जहाँ English is an official language or language of सरकारी.
In 2012, वहीँ were 88 राज्य in total ( 60 sovereign states और 28 non-sovereign राज्य ).
In many countries English is the प्रबल language, but करता not have आधिकारिक औकात.
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया, English is spoken by the vast majority of the population and is the only language used in government institutions, but Australia does not have an official language.
the मामला is the same in the United Kingdom and the United States, though many states और regions within the U.S. do have English as an official language.
English is the प्रबल language of New जीलैंड and an official भाषा of Canada ( साथ साथ French ), India ( साथ with Hindi and several other languages ), Ireland ( along with Irish ), and the Philippines ( along with Tagalog ).
English is the sole official भाषा of the Commonwealth of Nations and the Commonwealth Games.
English is one of the official भाषाएं of the संयुक्त Nations, the European Union and the International ओलम्पिक Committee.
अनेक of these countries हैं current or former colonies or dependencies of the United किंगडम ( see भी British Empire ), or of the United States, itself a पूर्व colony of the UK.
Notable exceptions शामिल Rwanda, जिससे was a former Belgian colony and Eritrea, which was an Italian उपनिवेश where the अंग्रेजों Empire spanned its control only in World War II and shortly after ( 1941-1952 ).
India 's linguistic picture is complex.
according to the Constitution of India, `` हिंदी in the Devanagari script '' is the आधिकारिक language of the union ; and English the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however, अंग्रेज़ी is mandated for the authoritative texts of all federal laws and Supreme अदालत decisions and ( along with Hindi ) is one of the two languages of the Indian Parliament.
English is प्रयुक्त almost exclusively for higher शिक्षा, business और विज्ञान.
पाठ्यक्रम in majority of the schools are सिखाया exclusively in अंग्रेज़ी.
अंग्रेज़ी is extensively प्रयुक्त for administrative purposes in India.
India is the second-largest english-speaking देश in the world by number of speakers, बाद the United States.
As such, many consider English to be the de facto आधिकारिक language of India.
See Official languages of India.
The linguistic makeup of Pakistan is similarly complex.
While the national language is Urdu, English is an आधिकारिक language and used in कारोबार, government and law.
English is a compulsory भाषा in schools.
All स्कूल पाठ्यक्रम are taught in English.
Pakistan is the 9th largest English-speaking देश in the संसार by population.
Southern Cone (, ) is a geographic region composed of the southernmost areas of South America, south of the Tropic of मकर.
Although geographically this includes Southern and part of Southeast ( São Paulo ) of Brazil, in terms of political geography the Southern cone has traditionally comprised Argentina, Chile, Paraguay, and Uruguay.
In the narrowest sense, it only covers Argentina, चिली और Uruguay, bounded on the north by the states of ब्राज़ील, Paraguay, Bolivia and Peru, on the वेस्ट by the प्रशांत Ocean, and south to the junction between the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans, which it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ).
High life expectancy, the highest Human विकास Index of Latin अमेरिका, high Standard of living, significant participation in the global markets and the emerging economy of its members make the Southern Cone the most prosperous macro-region in South America.
For multi-event athletic competitions see Track और Field Competitions, section `` Meetings ''.
Meetings are sometimes आयोजित around conference टेबल.
in a meeting, two or अधिक people आइये together to discuss one or more विषय, often in a औपचारिक setting.
An official खेल in baseball, also sometimes पुकारा a regulation game, is a game that has progressed परे the point at which it can be considered complete if necessary.
This is approximately the halfway point of the game.
In the case of inclement weather, कोई game which रै reached this point may be stopped and shortened as needed, साथ the परिणाम being final, and all records and आंकडे counted.
A game which has not reached this point before होने stopped is either considered a suspended game ( to be जारी at a later date from the point of stoppage ), or is simply canceled and replayed from the प्रारंभ.
( This depends on the rules of each व्यक्तिगत league. )
In either case, no statistics are counted जबतक the खेल becomes official.
Since सबसे professional baseball खेल are nine पारी long, the पांचवां inning is प्रयुक्त as the दहलीज for an official game.
If the visiting team is अग्रणी, or the game is tied, the end of the fifth inning marks this पाइंट.
If the घर team ( which bats last ) is already ahead in the score, and theoretically would not need its half of the fifth inning, तब 41⁄2 पारी ( i.e., the मध्य of the fifth ) is considered an official game.
The game is भी considered official if the घर team scores to take the lead in the bottom of the पांचवां inning, since the game would end immediately if the same thing happened in the ninth.
In nearly all cases, the `` official game '' औकात is used to determine whether a rain check होगा be सम्मानित लिये fans holding टिकटें.
If a game is प्रारंभ लकिन करता not reach the point of becoming आधिकारिक, fans हैं entitled to a new ticket for the make-up game or ( in most cases ) कोई other available game of उनके choice.
If a game is halted after it becomes official, the game is simply shortened and no बरसात check is given.
The `` आधिकारिक game '' statistic received some attention during the 1995 season, when Cal Ripken, Jr. was approaching the record for consecutive खेल played, previously held by Lou gehrig.
विशाल numbers were hung on the side of the b & O Warehouse at Oriole Park at camden गज to show the number of games in Ripken 's streak.
प्रत्येक day, a new number was unfurled during the fifth inning after each game had become official ( since the statistic would नहीं have counted if the game had been stopped before that पाइंट ).
A similar practice has been used to गिनती down toward the demolition of अनेक stadiums ( सहित Veterans Stadium in Philadelphia in 2003, Busch Memorial स्टेडियम in St. Louis in 2005, and the original Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium in New York City in 2008 ) ; as each game became official, the team would unveil a नई ( lower ) number showing the number of games left to be निभाई in the स्टेडियम.
A telephone number or फोन number is a अनुक्रम of अंक used to call from एक telephone line to another in a public switched टेलीफोन network.
When telephone numbers were invented, they were short — as few as एक, two or three digits — and were given orally to a switchboard operator.
As फोन प्रणालियों have grown and interconnected to encompass the world, telephone numbers have become longer.
In addition to telephones, they now access other devices, such as computers and फैक्स machines.
The number contains the information necessary to identify uniquely the intended endpoint लिये the telephone call.
Each such endpoint must have a unique number within the public switched telephone network.
सबसे countries उपयोग fixed length numbers ( लिये normal lines at least ) and इसलिए the number of endpoints determines the necessary length of the telephone number.
It is also possible for each subscriber to have a set of shorter संख्याएँ for the endpoints most often प्रयुक्त.
These `` shorthand '' or `` speed calling '' numbers are automatically अनूदित to unique telephone संख्याएँ before the call can be connected.
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, and 1-1-2 होने the Emergency Services संख्याएँ for China, Japan, South Korea, Taiwan and श्री Lanka ; Canada और the United States ; Australia ; the United Kingdom, Ireland, South Africa, Poland, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, मोरक्को, Macao, Bahrain, Qatar, Bangladesh, Botswana, Ghana, Kenya, हांग Kong, Malaysia, Mauritius, सिंगापुर, Zimbabwe, Trinidad, Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union, respectively. )
Many systems also allow calls within a local area to be made without dialing the local area code.
For example, a phone number in North America होगा start साथ three numbers ( such as 661 ), which is the area कोड, followed by seven digits split into sections of three and four ( such as 550-1212 ), which is the local number.
Some areas अभी have अनिवार्य ten-digit dialing in place, even for local calls.
Most टेलीफोन networks today ( exceptions being private intercom and secure phone networks ) हैं interconnected in the international telephone network, where the format of telephone संख्याएँ is standardized by itu-t in the recommendation E.164.
This specifies that the entire number should be 15 digits or shorter, and begin with a देश prefix.
For सबसे countries, इस is followed by an area code or city code and the सदस्य number, which might consist of the code for a particular telephone exchange.
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an international telephone number in लिखने or print, starting with a plus चिह्न ( `` + '' ) and the country code.
जब calling an international number from a fixed line phone, the + must be replaced with the international call prefix chosen by the country the call is being made from.
Some mobile phones allow the + to be entered directly.
the format and allocation of local phone numbers are controlled by each nation 's respective government, either सीधे or by sponsored organizations ( such as nanpa overseen by NeuStar inc. ).
Before a टेलीफोन call is connected, the telephone number must be dialed by the calling पार्टी or Caller.
The पुकारा party might have equipment कि presents कॉलर ID before the call is answered.
A संग्रहण agency is a business that pursues भुगतान of debts owed by individuals or व्यवसायों.
Most collection एजेंसियों operate as agents of लेनदारों and collect debts for a fee or percentage of the total amount owed.
There are many types of संग्रहण agencies.
First-party agencies हैं oftentimes subsidiaries of the original कम्पनी the कर्ज़ is owed to.
Third-party agencies are separate companies contracted by a company to collect debts on their निमित्त for a शुल्क.
Debt खरीदार खरीदें the कर्ज़ at a percentage of its मान, then attempt to collect it.
Each country रै its own rules and regulations regarding them.

Cannabis, also ज्ञात as marijuana ( from the Mexican Spanish marihuana ), और by अन्य names, is a preparation of the Cannabis plant intended for use as a psychoactive drug and as medicine.
Pharmacologically, the principal psychoactive constituent of cannabis is tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) ; it is one of 483 known compounds in the संयंत्र, including at तनिक 84 other cannabinoids, such as cannabidiol ( सीबीडी ), cannabinol ( CBN ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ).
and cannabigerol ( cbg ).

The Washington Redskins franchise थी originally founded in बोस्टन, Massachusetts as the Boston Braves, named after the local baseball franchise.
