1st Special Forces Operational Detachment-Delta ( 1st SFOD-D ), popularly known as Delta Force, is one of the United States ' चार गुपचुप tier-one counter-terrorism and Special मिशन इकाई.
It was formerly listed as the Combat Applications Group by the Department of Defense but has since महरूम officially re-designated the फौज Compartmented Elements ( इक्का ).
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively supported by USASOC, it falls under the operational control of the Joint खास Operations कमांड.
Delta Force and its Navy बंटवारा, the Naval Special Warfare Development Group, हैं the संयुक्त States military 's primary counter-terrorism units.
Delta Force 's primary tasks are counter-terrorism, direct action, and national intervention operations, although it is an extremely versatile group capable of conducting many types of covert missions, including, लकिन not limited to, hostage rescues and छापे.
the Central Intelligence Agency 's highly गुपचुप Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and more specifically its elite Special Operations Group ( SOG ) often works with – और रंगरूटों – operators इससे Delta फ़ोर्स.
अल्फा decay is one example type of radioactive decay, in जिससे an atomic nucleus emits an alpha particle, और thereby transforms ( or 'decays ' ) into an atom with a mass number 4 less and atomic क्रमांक 2 less.
Many अन्य types of decays are possible.
Radioactive decay, also known as नाभिकीय क्षय or radioactivity, is the process by जिससे a केंद्रक of an unstable अणु loses energy by emitting particles of ionizing विकिरण.
a material that spontaneously emits this kind of radiation — which includes the emission of energetic अल्फा particles, beta particles, और गामा rays — is considered रेडियोसक्रिय.
There are many different types of radioactive decay ( देखिए table नीचे ).
A decay, or loss of उर्जा, results when an atom with one type of nucleus, पुकारा the parent radionuclide, transforms to an atom साथ a केंद्रक in a different राज्य, or to a different nucleus containing अलग संख्याएँ of protons and neutrons.
Either of these products is named the daughter nuclide.
in some decays the parent and daughter are अलग chemical elements, और thus the decay process results in nuclear transmutation ( creation of an atom of a new element ).
The first decay processes to be discovered यहूद अल्फा decay, beta decay, and gamma decay.
अल्फा decay occurs when the nucleus ejects an alpha particle ( helium nucleus ).
इस is the most आम process of emitting nucleons, but in rarer प्रकार of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or specific nuclei of other elements ( in the process called cluster decay ).
Beta क्षय occurs when the केंद्रक emits an electron or positron और a प्रकार of न्यूट्रिनो, in a process that changes a proton to a neutron or the other way around.
The nucleus may capture an orbiting electron, converting a प्रोटॉन into a neutron ( electron capture ).
All of these प्रक्रियाओं result in nuclear transmutation.
by contrast, there मौजूद radioactive decay processes that do not result in transmutation.
The उर्जा of an उत्साहित केंद्रक may be emitted as a gamma ray in गामा decay, or used to eject an orbital electron by interaction with the excited केंद्रक in a process called internal conversion.
Radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, और this परिणाम in a change in an तत्व from one समस्थानिक to another.
One type of radioactive decay results in उत्पाद which are not defined, लकिन appear in a range of `` pieces '' of the original nucleus.
This decay is called spontaneous fission.
This क्षय happens when a विशाल unstable nucleus spontaneously splits into two ( and occasionally three ) smaller daughter nuclei, and usually emits gamma rays, neutrons, or other particles as a consequence.
रेडियोसक्रिय decay is a stochastic ( i.e., random ) process at the स्तर of single अणु, in that, according to quantum theory, it is impossible to predict when a particular atom होगा decay.
However, the chance कि a given atom होगा क्षय is constant over time.
For a large number of atoms, the decay रेट लिये the collection is computable from the measured decay constants of the न्यूक्लाइड ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ).
Waxing is a form of semi-permanent बाल removal which removes the hair from the root.
New बाल will नहीं grow back in the previously waxed area for two to eight सप्ताह, हालांकि some people होगा start to see regrowth in only a week.
Almost any area of the body can be waxed, including eyebrows, face, बिकिनी area, legs, arms, back, abdomen और feet.
There are many प्रकार of waxing suitable for removing unwanted hair.
Strip waxing is accomplished by spreading a wax thinly over the skin.
A cloth or paper strip is then pressed on the top और ripped off the दिशा of बाल growth.
इस removes the wax साथ with the hair.
Strip मोम can also be made at home using lemon रस, जल, शुगर and honey.
hot waxing utilizes Hot wax ( as opposed to strip wax ).
In this case, the मोम is applied somewhat thickly and साथ no cloth or paper स्ट्रिप्स.
The wax तब hardens जब it cools, thus allowing the easy removal by a therapist without the सहायता of cloths.
इस waxing method is very beneficial to people who have sensitive skin.
Wall painting ( 1st century ad ) from Pompeii depicting a multigenerational banquet
प्राचीन Roman culture existed throughout the almost 1200-year history of the civilization of Ancient Rome.
The term refers to the culture of the Roman Republic, later the रोमन Empire, which, at its peak, covered an area from Lowland Scotland और मोरक्को to the euphrates.
Life in ancient रोम revolved around the city of रोम, its famed seven पहाड़ियाँ, and its स्मारकीय structures such as the Flavian Amphitheatre ( now called the कोलोसियम ), the Forum of Trajan, and the Pantheon.
The नगर also had several theaters, gymnasiums, and अनेक taverns, baths, and brothels.
Throughout the territory under ancient Rome 's control, आवासीय वास्तुकला ranged from very modest houses to country villas, and in the capital city of रोम, वहीँ were imperial residences on the elegant Palatine Hill, from which the word palace is derived.
The vast majority of the population lived in the city center, packed into insulae ( apartment blocks ).
The city of Rome थी the largest megalopolis of कि time, with a population कि may well have exceeded one million people, with a high end estimate of 3.6 million and a low समाप्त estimate of 450,000.
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 percent of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the city 's jurisdiction lived in innumerable शहरी centers, with population of at least 10,000 and अनेक military settlements, a very ऊँची रेट of urbanization by pre-industrial standards.
The most urbanized part of the Empire was Italy, which था an estimated rate of urbanization of 32 %, the same rate of urbanization of England in 1800.
Most Roman towns and cities had a forum, मंदिरों and the same type of buildings, on a smaller scale, as मिला in Rome.
The विशाल urban जनसांख्यिकी required an endless supply of food which was a complex logistical task, including acquiring, transporting, storing and distribution of food for रोम और other urban centers.
Italian खेतो supplied vegetables and fruits, but fish and मांस were luxuries.
Aqueducts were निर्मित to bring जल to urban centers और wine and oil were imported from hispania, Gaul and Africa.
वहीँ was a बहुत large amount of कॉमर्स between the provinces of the Roman Empire, चूंकि its transportation technology थी very efficient.
The average costs of हस्तांतरण and the technology were comparable with 18th-century Europe.
The later city of Rome did not fill the स्पेस within its ancient Aurelian walls until after 1870.
अस्सी प्रतिशत of the जनसांख्यिकी under the jurisdiction of ancient रोम lived in the countryside in settlements साथ less than 10 thousand निवासियों.
जमींदार generally resided in cities and their estates were left in the परवाह of farm managers.
The दुर्दशा of ग्रामीण स्लेव was generally worse than their counterparts working in urban aristocratic households.
to stimulate a higher labor productivity most जमींदार freed a विशाल number of slaves and many received wages.
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 people जिया in one small farm hut in Egypt, while six families owned a single olive tree. ''.
Such a rural पर्यावरण continued to induce migration of जनसांख्यिकी to urban centers until the early 2nd century, when the urban population रोका growing और started to decline.
Starting in the middle of the 2nd century BC, private यूनानी संस्कृति was increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades against the `` softening '' effects of Hellenized culture from the conservative moralists.
by the time of Augustus, cultured Greek household slaves taught the Roman young ( sometimes even the girls ) ; chefs, decorators, secretaries, doctors, and hairdressers—all came from the Greek East.
यूनानी sculptures adorned Hellenistic landscape gardening on the Palatine or in the विला, or were imitated in रोमन sculpture yards by Greek slaves.
the रोमन cuisine preserved in the cookery books ascribed to apicius is essentially Greek.
रोमन लेखक disdained लैटिन for a cultured यूनानी style.
Only in law and governance was the Italic nature of रोम 's accretive culture supreme.
Against इस human background, both the urban and rural setting, one of history 's most influential civilizations took आकार, leaving behind a cultural विरासत that survives in भाग today.

Glass production involves दो main विधि – the float glass process, which produces sheet कांच, और glassblowing which produces बोतलों and other containers.
a ऋतु is a subdivision of the year, marked by परिवर्तन in weather, ecology, और hours of daylight.
Seasons परिणाम from the yearly क्रान्ति of the Earth around the सूर्य और the tilt of the धरती 's axis relative to the प्लेन of revolution.
in temperate and polar regions, the seasons are marked by परिवर्तन in the intensity of sunlight कि reaches the धरती 's सतह, विसंगतियाँ of जिससे may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and पौधे to be dormant.
During May, June and July, the northern गोलार्ध is exposed to more direct sunlight because the hemisphere faces the सूर्य.
The same is true of the southern hemisphere in November, दिसम्बर and January.
It is the tilt of the Earth कि causes the Sun to be उच्चतर in the sky during the summer months which increases the solar flux.
However, due to मौसमी lag, June, July and August हैं the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December, January और February are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
in temperate और subpolar regions, generally चार calendar -based सीज़न ( with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) और winter ( hibernal ).
however, ecologists mostly use a six season model for शीतोष्ण जलवायु regions कि includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) और late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons साथ साथ the traditional four.
hot regions have two or तीन seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or monsoon ) season and the शुष्क season, and in some तीव्र areas, a cool or mild season.
in कुछ parts of the world, खास `` seasons '' are loosely defined based on महत्वपूर्ण events such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
The six ecological seasons
The four calendar seasons, depicted in an ancient Roman mosaic इससे Tunisia
The Battle of Fort Sumter ( April 12–14, 1861 ) was the bombardment and आत्मसमर्पण of Fort Sumter, near Charleston, South Carolina, that started the American Civil युद्ध.
following declarations of secession by seven Southern states, South Carolina demanded that the U.S. Army लापरवाही its facilities in Charleston Harbor.
On दिसम्बर 26, 1860, U.S. प्रमुख Robert Anderson surreptitiously moved his small command from the indefensible फोर्ट Moultrie on Sullivan 's Island to Fort Sumter, a substantial fortress controlling the entrance of चार्ल्सटन हार्बर.
an attempt by u.S. President James Buchanan to reinforce and resupply Anderson, using the निहत्थे merchant ship Star of the West, failed when it was fired upon by shore batteries on January 9, 1861.
दक्षिण Carolina authorities then seized all संघीय प्रॉपर्टी in the Charleston area, मगर for फोर्ट Sumter.
During the early महीने of 1861, the हालात around Fort Sumter increasingly began to resemble a siege.
In March, Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard, the first general अधिकारी of the newly formed Confederate States of America, was placed in command of Confederate forces in चार्ल्सटन.
Beauregard energetically directed the strengthening of बैटरी around Charleston harbor aimed at फोर्ट Sumter.
Conditions in the fort grew dire as the संघ soldiers rushed to complete the installation of additional guns.
Anderson थी short of men, food, और supplies.
the resupply of Fort Sumter became the first crisis of the administration of President अब्राहम lincoln.
He notified the Governor of दक्षिण Carolina, Francis W. Pickens, that he was sending supply ships, which resulted in an ultimatum from the confederate government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately.
Major Anderson refused to surrender.
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on April 12, the Confederates bombarded the fort from तोपखाने batteries surrounding the harbor.
Although the Union garrison returned fire, वे were significantly outgunned and, after 34 hours, प्रमुख Anderson सहमत to evacuate.
There was no loss of life on either side as a direct result of this engagement, हालांकि a gun explosion during the आत्मसमर्पण ceremonies on April 14 caused two Union deaths.
Following the battle, there was widespread support from both North and South for further military action.
Lincoln 's immediate call for 75,000 स्वयंसेवक to suppress the विद्रोह resulted in an अतिरिक्त four southern slave states also declaring their secession and joining the Confederacy.
The Civil युद्ध had begun.
3G, short for third पीढी, is the third generation of मोबाईल दूरसंचार technology.
3G telecommunication networks support services that provide an information transfer rate of at least 200 kbit/s.
However, many सेवाएं advertised as 3G provide higher speed than the minimum technical requirements for a 3g service.
Recent 3G releases, often denoted 3.5G and 3.75g, also provide मोबाईल broadband अभिगम of several Mbit/s to smartphones and mobile modems in laptop computers.
3G पाता application in wireless voice telephony, mobile Internet access, fixed बेतार Internet अभिगम, video calls and mobile TV.

Traditionally, after the groom breaks the glass, the guests चिल्लाओ `` Mazel Tov ! ``.
A जन्मदिवस cake, iced with the words `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is प्रायः done in Israel.
Here the phrase is written in Hebrew cursive.
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( Hebrew / Yiddish : `` מזל טוב '', Hebrew : `` mazal tov '' ; Yiddish : `` mazel tov '' ; lit.
`` शुभ luck '' ) is a phrase used to express congratulations for a happy and significant अवसर or event.
Hepatitis C is an infectious disease affecting primarily the liver, caused by the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ).
The infection is often asymptomatic, but chronic infection can lead to scarring of the liver and ultimately to cirrhosis, which is generally apparent after many years.
In some cases, those with cirrhosis होगा go on to develop liver विफलता, जिगर कर्कट or life-threatening esophageal और gastric varices.
HCV is spread primarily by blood-to-blood contact associated with intravenous ड्रग use, poorly sterilized medical equipment and transfusions.
An estimated 130–200 million people विश्वव्यापी are संक्रमित with.
the existence of ( originally `` non- A non- B hepatitis '' ) was postulated in the 1970s and proven in 1989.
तभी infects इंसानो और chimpanzees.
The virus persists in the liver in about 85 % of those संक्रमित.
This persistent infection can be treated साथ दवा : the standard therapy is a combination of peginterferon and ribavirin, with either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases.
Overall, 50–80 % of लोगों treated are cured.
Those जो develop cirrhosis or liver cancer may require a जिगर प्रत्यारोपण.
is the अग्रणी कारण of liver transplantation, though the वायरस प्रायः recurs after transplantation.
no vaccine against is उपलब्धियाँ.
A flexible spending account ( fsa ), also known as a flexible बिता arrangement, is एक of a number of tax-advantaged financial accounts that can be set up through a cafeteria plan of an employer in the United States.
An fsa allows an कर्मचारी to set aside a portion of earnings to अदा for qualified expenses as established in the cafeteria plan, most commonly for medical खर्च but often लिये dependent care or अन्य expenses.
Money deducted from an employee 's pay into an FSA is not subject to payroll taxes, resulting in substantial payroll tax savings.
One significant disadvantage to using an FSA is that funds not प्रयुक्त by the end of the plan year are lost to the employee, known as the `` use it or lose it '' rule.
The most common type of flexible spending account, the medical expense FSA ( also medical FSA or health FSA ), is similar to a health बचत account ( hsa ) or a health reimbursement account ( HRA ).
However, while HSAs and HRAs हैं almost exclusively used as components of a उपभोक्ता driven health care plan, medical FSAs are commonly offered with more traditional health plans as well.
In addition, funds in a health savings account are नहीं खोया जब the plan year is over, unlike funds in an FSA.
Paper forms or an FSA डेबिट कार्ड, also known as a Flexcard, may be प्रयुक्त to access the account funds.
टेनेसी ( ) ( ) is a U.S. state located in the Southeastern United राज्य.
Tennessee is the 36th most extensive and the 17th सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky and Virginia to the north, North Carolina to the east, Georgia, Alabama, और Mississippi to the दक्षिण, and Arkansas और Missouri to the west.
The Appalachian Mountains dominate the eastern part of the state, and the Mississippi River forms the राज्य 's western border.
Tennessee 's पूंजी and second largest नगर is Nashville, which has a population of 609,644.
Memphis is the state 's largest city, with a population of 652,050.
the state of Tennessee is rooted in the Watauga संघ, a 1772 frontier pact generally regarded as the first constitutional government west of the Appalachians.
What is now Tennessee was initially भाग of North Carolina, and later part of the Southwest Territory.
Tennessee थी admitted to the Union as the 16th state on June 1, 1796.
टेनेसी was the पिछला राज्य to leave the संघ and join the confederacy at the outbreak of the u.S. Civil War in 1861, and the first state to be readmitted to the Union at the end of the युद्ध.
टेनेसी furnished more soldiers for the confederate Army than any other state, and more soldiers for the Union Army than any अन्य Southern state.
In the 20th century, Tennessee transitioned from an agrarian economy to a more diversified अर्थव्यवस्था, aided at times by federal entities ऐसे as the Tennessee Valley Authority.
In the early 1940s, the city of Oak Ridge was established to house the Manhattan प्रोजेक्ट 's uranium enrichment facilities, helping to build the world 's first atomic bomb.
Tennessee has played a critical role in the development of many forms of American popular music, including rock and roll, blues, country, and rockabilly.
Beale Street in Memphis is considered by अनेक to be the जन्मस्थान of the blues, with संगीतकारों such as W.C. Handy performing in its clubs as early as 1909.
मेम्फिस was भी घर to Sun Records, where musicians such as Elvis Presley, Isaac हेज़, जॉनी Cash, Carl Perkins, Jerry Lee Lewis, Roy Orbison, and Charlie Rich began their recording careers, and where rock and roll took shape in the 1950s.
The 1927 Victor recording सत्र in Bristol generally mark the beginning of the country music genre और the rise of the Grand Ole Opry in the 1930s helped make Nashville the center of the देश music recording उद्योग.
Three bricks and mortar संग्रहालय recognize Tennessee 's role in nurturing various forms of popular music : the Memphis Rock N ' आत्मा Museum, the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum in Nashville, and the International Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson.
In addition, the Rockabilly हॉल of Fame, an online site recognizing the विकास of rockabilly in which टेनेसी निभाई a crucial role, is based in Nashville.
टेनेसी 's major उद्योग include agriculture, manufacturing, और tourism.
Poultry, soybeans, and चौपायों are the state 's primary agricultural products, and major manufacturing exports include chemicals, transportation equipment, and electrical उपकरण.
The Great Smoky Mountains National Park, the nation 's most visited national park, is headquartered in the eastern part of the राज्य, और a section of the Appalachian Trail roughly follows the tennessee-north Carolina border.
Other प्रमुख पर्यटक attractions शामिल the Tennessee एक्वेरियम in Chattanooga, the Sunsphere in Knoxville, Dollywood in Pigeon Forge, the Parthenon, the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum, and ryman Auditorium in Nashville, and Elvis Presley 's Graceland residence and tomb in Memphis.
एक design रूपांतर of a मुर्गा रिंग.
A cock रिंग is a ring कि can be placed around a man 's penis, usually at the base, primarily to slow the flow of blood इससे the erect penile tissue, thus maintaining an erection for a much longer period of time.
Cock rings can be worn around just the penis or both the penis and scrotum, or just the scrotum अलोन, though this is प्रायः called a testicle cuff.
Rings can be made of a variety of different materials, सबसे commonly leather, रबर, or silicone, though नायलॉन and metal are also used either as the main component or भाग of the closure.
The term cock ring is sometimes used as a synonym for a प्रिंस Albert piercing, a piercing of the penis that is usually, though not always, a metal ring.
जब प्रयुक्त in cases of erectile dysfunction they हैं known by various names such as `` erection ring '' and `` tension ring ''.
The मुख्यालय of Major League Baseball at 245 Park Avenue, Midtown Manhattan, New York City, USA.
Major लीग Baseball ( MLB ) is a professional baseball लीग, consisting of teams that play in the National League और the अमरीकी League.
Dating to 1876 and 1901 respectively, the two leagues merged in 2000 into a single organization led by the Commissioner of Baseball, after 100 years as separate legal entities.
MLB constitutes एक of the major professional sports leagues of the United राज्य and Canada.
It is composed of 30 teams — 29 in the United States and एक in Canada.
Teams in MLB play 162 खेल each season over six months ( April through September ).
Five teams in each लीग advance to a four-round postseason tournament कि culminates in the World Series, a best-of-seven-games championship श्रेणी between the दो league champions which dates to 1903.
The organization oversees many minor-league baseball leagues जिससे operate about 240 teams संबद्ध with the major-league clubs.
With the International Baseball Federation, the लीग भी manages the अंतरराष्ट्रीय World Baseball Classic tournament.
MLB has the highest season attendance of any खेल league in the संसार with nearly 75 million spectators in 2012.
Delaware ( ) is a U.S. state located on the अटलांटिक Coast in the Mid-Atlantic प्रदेश of the United States.
It is bordered to the south and west by मेरीलैंड, to the northeast by New Jersey, और to the उत्तर by पेन्सिलवेनिया.
The state takes its नाम इससे Thomas West, 3rd Baron De La Warr, an English nobleman और Virginia 's पहला colonial governor, after जिसको कया is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named.
Delaware is located in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva Peninsula और is the दूसरी smallest, the छठे least populous, but the sixth most densely populated of the fifty United States.
Delaware is divided into three counties.
इससे north to south, these three counties हैं New Castle, Kent, and Sussex.
While the दक्षिणी two काउंटी have historically महरूम predominantly agricultural, New Castle County has been more industrialized.
पहले its coastline was छान by europeans in the 16th सदी, Delaware was inhabited by several groups of Native Americans, including the lenape in the north and Nanticoke in the south.
It was initially colonized by डच traders at Zwaanendael, located near the उपस्थित town of Lewes, in 1631.
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating in the अमरीकी Revolution and on December 7, 1787, became the first state to ratify the Constitution of the United States, thereby becoming known as The First State.
उर्जा परिवर्तन in Energy Systems Language
Energy transformation or energy conversion is the प्रक्रम of changing one form of उर्जा to another.
In physics, the term energy describes the capacity to उपज certain परिवर्तन within a प्रणाली, without regard to limitations in परिवर्तन imposed by Entropy.
परिवर्तन in total energy of systems can only be accomplished by adding or subtracting उर्जा from them, as energy is a quantity जिससे is conserved, according to the first विधि of thermodynamics.
according to special relativity, changes in the energy of प्रणालियों will भी coincide with परिवर्तन in the system 's mass, and the total amount of द्रव्यमान of a system is a माप of its energy.
Energy in a system may be रूपांतरित so that it resides in a different राज्य, or a different type of energy.
Energy in many states may be प्रयुक्त to do many varieties of शारीरिक कार्य.
Energy may be used in natural processes or मशीने, or else to provide कुछ सेवा to society ( such as heat, light, or गति ).
For example, an internal combustion engine converts the संभावित chemical energy in gasoline and oxygen into heat, which is then transformed into the propulsive energy ( kinetic energy कि moves a vehicle ).
A solar cell converts सौर विकिरण into electrical उर्जा that can then be used to light a बल्ब or power a computer.
The generic name for a यंत्र which converts energy from one form to another, is a transducer.
In general, most types of energy, save for thermal energy, may be converted efficiently to any अन्य kind of उर्जा.
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 %, such as when potential energy is converted to kinetic energy as an object falls in vacuum, or when it orbits nearer or farther from another object, in space.
Conversion of other types of energies to heat may also occurs with nearly perfect efficiency ( many प्रकार of friction do this ).
Exceptions for perfect conversion दक्षता ( even लिये isolated systems ) occur when energy रै already महरूम partly वितरित among many available quantum states for a collection of अणु, which are freely allowed to explore any state of momentum and position ( phase space ).
In ऐसे हालातों, a measure called Entropy, or evening-out of energy distribution in such states, dictates that future states of the system must be of at तनिक equal evenness in energy distribution.
( There is no way, taking the universe as a whole, to collect energy into fewer states, once it has spread to them ).
A consequence of this आवश्यकता is that there हैं limitations to the efficiency with which thermal energy can be परिवर्तित to other kinds of energy, चूंकि thermal energy in equilibrium at a given temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all possible states.
Such energy is sometimes माना `` degraded उर्जा, '' क्युकी it is not entirely usable.
The second law of ऊष्मागतिकी is a way of stating that, for this कारण, thermal उर्जा in a system may be converted to other kinds of energy with efficiencies approaching 100 %, तभी if the entropy ( even-ness or disorder ) of the universe is increased by other means, to compensate for the decrease in entropy associated with the disappearance of the thermal energy and इसके entropy content.
वरना, only a part of thermal energy may be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of energy ( and thus, useful कार्य ), चूंकि the remainder of the heat must be सुरक्षित to be transferred to a thermal reservoir at a lower तापमान, in such a रास्ता that the increase in Entropy for this process more than compensates for the entropy decrease associated with परिवर्तन of the rest of the ऊष्मा into other types of energy.
the National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a प्रमुख professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised member क्लब, of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New यॉर्क City, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier पेशेवर बर्फ hockey league in the संसार, and one of the प्रमुख पेशेवर sports leagues in the United States and Canada.
The स्टेनली Cup, the oldest professional sports trophy in North America, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season.
The league was organized on नवम्बर 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, Quebec, Canada, after the suspension of operations of इसके predecessor संगठन, the National Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been संस्थापित in 1909.
It started साथ four teams and, through a series of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is अभी composed of 30 active franchises.
The स्वदेश to which the नाम of the league originally referred was Canada, although the league has now महरूम binational since 1924 when it expanded into the United States.
After a labour dispute that led to the रद्दीकरण of the entire 2004–05 season, the league resumed play under a new सामूहिक bargaining अनुबंध that included a salary कैप.
In 2009, the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships, attendance, और television ऑडियंस.
The NHL draws many highly skilled players इससे all over the world और फिलहाल रै players इससे about 20 अलग countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the past चार plus decades the percentages of us and यूरोपीय players have increased both because of the NHL 's जारी विस्तार इससे six to thirty क्लब since 1967, और the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
इस is the complete list of the ratified and unratified amendments to the United States संविधान which received the स्वीकृति of the संयुक्त States Congress.
Twenty-seven amendments have been ratified since the original signing of the Constitution, the पहला ten of जिससे हैं known collectively as the Bill of Rights.
The procedure for amending the United States Constitution is governed by Article V of the original text.
There have been many other proposals for amendments to the United राज्य Constitution introduced in Congress, but not submitted to the states.
Before an amendment can take effect, it must be proposed to the states by a two-thirds vote of both घरों of Congress or by a convention ( known as an आलेख V convention ) called by two-thirds of the states, and ratified by three-fourths of the states or by three-fourths of conventions thereof, the method of ratification being determined by Congress at the time of proposal.
To तिथि, no convention लिये proposing amendments has been called by the states, और only once—in 1933 for the ratification of the twenty-first amendment —has the convention method of अनुसमर्थन been employed.
FMR LLC ( Fidelity Management and शोध ) or Fidelity Investments is an American multinational financial services निगम.
It is एक of the largest mutual fund and financial services groups in the world.
It was founded in 1946 and serves North अमरीकी investors.
Fidelity ventures is its venture पूंजी arm.
Fidelity अंतरराष्ट्रीय Limited ( FIL ), थी an international affiliate founded in 1969, serving most countries in the rest of the world.
In सितंबर 2011, फील थी rebranded as 'Fidelity विश्वव्यापी Investment '.
Fidelity Investments manages a large family of mutual funds, provides fund वितरण and निवेश सलाह services, as well as providing discount brokerage services, retirement services, wealth management, securities execution and क्लीयरेंस, life insurance and a क्रमांक of other services.

समाजशास्त्र is the scientific study of human समाज and इसके origins, विकास, organizations, and institutions.
It is a social science which uses various methods of empirical investigation and critical analysis to develop a देह of knowledge about इंसान social activity, structures, and functions.
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct research which may be applied सीधे to सोशल policy और welfare, जबकि others focus primarily on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes.
विषय पदार्थ ranges from the micro level of व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी and interaction to the मैक्रो level of systems and the social structure.
The traditional focuses of sociology include social स्तरीकरण, सोशल class, culture, race और ethnicity, gender और sexuality, social mobility, धर्म, secularization, law, और deviance.
As all spheres of human activity हैं affected by the interplay between social structure and individual agency, sociology has gradually expanded its focus to further subjects, such as health, medical, military and penal institutions, the अंतरजाल, environmental sociology, political economy and the role of social activity in the development of वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान.
The दायरा of social वैज्ञानिक methods has also विस्तारित.
सोशल researchers draw upon a variety of qualitative and quantitative techniques.
The linguistic and cultural turns of the mid-twentieth century led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, और philosophic approaches to the analysis of society.
Conversely, recent दशकों have देखी the rise of new analytically, mathematically and computationally कठोर techniques, such as agent-based मॉडलिंग and social network analysis.
Sociology चाहिए नहीं be confused with विभिन्न general सोशल studies courses which bear little relation to sociological theory or social science शोध methodology.
Thunder is the sound caused by lightning.
Depending on the nature of the lightning and distance of the listener, thunder can range from a sharp, loud क्रैक to a long, कम rumble ( brontide ).
the अचानक बढ़ाएँ in pressure and temperature from lightning produces रैपिड विस्तार of the एयर surrounding and within a bolt of lightning.
In turn, this expansion of air creates a sonic shock wave, similar to a sonic boom, which produces the sound of thunder, often referred to as a clap, crack, or peal of thunder.
the distance of the lightning can be calculated by the listener based on the time interval from when the lightning is देखी to when the sound is heard.
Palma (,, ), in full Palma de Mallorca, is the major city and port on the island of Majorca ( Mallorca ) and पूंजी city of the autonomous community of the Balearic Islands in Spain.
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( City of Majorca ) और Ciutat ( City ) were प्रयुक्त before the War of the Spanish Succession and are still used by लोगों in Majorca.
however, the official नाम was Mallorca, the same as the island.
It is situated on the south coast of the island on the Bay of Palma.
as of the 2009 census, the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर of Palma proper was 401,270, और the population of the entire urban area was 517,285, ranking as the twelfth largest urban area of Spain.
लगभग हाफ of the total population of Majorca सजीव in Palma.
The Cabrera Archipelago, हालांकि widely separated from Palma proper, is administratively माना part of the municipality.
Its airport, Son Sant Joan, serves over 22 million यात्री each year.
The Marivent Palace was offered by the city to the then प्रिंस Juan Carlos I of Spain.
The royals have since spent their summer holidays in Palma.

Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor is a fictional character, a supervillain appearing in comic किताबे published by DC Comics.
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman, and as a high-status supervillain, has also आइये into conflict with बैटमैन and other superheroes in the DC Universe.
निर्मित by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster, the character first appeared in Action Comics # 23 ( April 1940 ).
Luthor is described as `` a power-mad, दुष्ट scientist '' of ऊँची intelligence and incredible technological prowess.
Luthor 's लक्ष्य typically बीच on हत्या सुपरमैन, the foremost obstacle to achieving the विलेन 's megalomaniacal goals.
despite periodically wearing a powered exoskeleton, Luthor रै traditionally lacked superpowers or a डुअल पहचान.
The character थी originally depicted as a mad scientist who, in the vein of pulp novels, wreaks havoc on the world with his futuristic weaponry.
In उसके earliest appearances, luthor is shown with a full head of रेड hair.
Despite इस, the character later became hairless as the परिणाम of an artist 's mistake.
A 1960 story by जेरी Siegel विस्तारित upon Luthor 's उत्पत्ति and motivations, revealing him to be a childhood dost of Superman 's who lost his hair जब a fire destroyed उसके laboratory ; Luthor vowed revenge.
Following the 1985 limited श्रेणी Crisis on Infinite Earths, the character was re-imagined as a Machiavellian industrialist and white-collar criminal, even briefly सेवारत as President of the United States.
In recent years, विभिन्न writers have revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s.
The character was ranked as the 8th Greatest Villain by Wizard on its 100 Greatest खलनायक of All Time list.
IGN 's list of the शीर्ष 100 Comic Book Villains of All Time ranked Luthor as # 4.
Luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by कॉमिक किताब critic Peter sanderson, one of a few genre-crossing villains जिनकी adventures लो place `` in a world in which the ordinary laws of प्रकृति हैं slightly suspended '' ; characters such as Professor Moriarty, Count Dracula, Hannibal lecter, Doctor Doom, और Darth Vader, also fit this description.
मार्टिन लूथर किंग, Jr. Day is a United States federal holiday marking the birthday of Rev. Dr. Martin लूथर King, Jr.
it is observed on the third Monday of January each year, which is around the time of किंग 's birthday, January 15.
The floating अवकाश is similar to holidays set under the Uniform सोमवार Holiday Act, though the act predated the establishment of Martin Luther King, Jr. Day by 15 सालो.
King was the chief spokesman for nonviolent activism in the civil rights गति, which successfully protested racial discrimination in federal and state law.
The campaign for a संघीय holiday in King 's honor began soon after उसके assassination in 1968.
रोनाल्ड Reagan signed the holiday into law in 1983, and it was पहला observed on January 20, 1986.
At पहला, some states resisted observing the holiday as such, giving it alternative names or combining it with other holidays.
it was officially observed in all 50 राज्य for the first time in 2000.
The camera फोन solution allows instant sharing of तस्वीरें.
As it 's automatic and instant, the user does नहीं have to use a cable or removable media to connect to a personal computer.
a camera फोन is a mobile phone which is able to कैप्चर still photographs ( and usually video ).
चूंकि early in the 21st century the majority of mobile phones in use are कैमरा phones.
Most camera phones are simpler than separate digital cameras.
उनके usual फिक्स्ड focus lenses और smaller sensors limit their performance in poor lighting.
lacking a physical शटर, most have a long shutter lag.
Flash, where present, is usually weak.
Optical जूम and tripod screws are rare.
Some also lack a USB connection, removable memory card, or other way of transferring their pictures more quickly than by the फोन 's inherent communication feature.
Some of the अधिक expensive camera phones have only a few of these technical disadvantages, which apply most acutely in low लाइट शर्तें and in any case have not inhibited their widespread use.
Most model lines improve in these regards every year or two.
Some, such as the Droid Incredible only have a मेनू choice to start an application program to activate the camera.
Others, such as the ब्लैकबेरी तूफ़ान 2, Droid x, Motorola v980 and Nokia 5800 also have a separate camera button लिये quickness and convenience.
Windows Phones can be विन्यस्त to operate as a कैमरा even if the phone is asleep.
Some camera phones are designed to resemble separate low-end digital compact cameras in appearance and to some extent in features and picture quality, and are branded as both mobile फोन और cameras, including निश्चित Sony phones.
The principal advantages of camera phones are cost and compactness ; indeed for a user who carries a मोबाईल phone anyway, the additional आकार and cost हैं negligible.
स्मार्टफ़ोन that are camera phones may run mobile applications to add capabilities such as geotagging और image stitching.
A few high end फोन can use their touch स्क्रीन to direct their camera to फ़ोकस on a particular object in the फ़ील्ड of view, giving even an अनुभवहीन user a degree of focus control exceeded only by seasoned photographers using manual focus.
`` Whatever Happened to the Man of Tomorrow ? '' is a 1986 कॉमिक book story featuring the DC Comics character of Superman.
Written by Alan मूर साथ help from long-time, and soon to be retiring, सुपरमैन एडिटर, जूलियस schwartz, the story was published in two parts, beginning in Superman # 423 and ending in Action Comics # 583, both प्रकाशित in September 1986.
The story थी drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan, in his final प्रमुख योगदान to the सुपरमैन titles, and थी inked by George Pérez in the issue of Superman और Kurt schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics.
The story was an imaginary tale which told the फाइनल story of the Silver Age Superman and his long history, which was होने rebooted following the events of संकट on Infinite earths, before उसके modern introduction in the जॉन Byrne series, The Man of Steel.
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long history of the character and to serve as a पूरा conclusion to his mythology.
The story is a फ़्रेम story set ten years after Superman was last seen, where Lois लेन recounts the tale of the समाप्त of सुपरमैन 's career to a रिपोर्टर from the Daily Planet.
Her story शामिल numerous violent हमले against Superman by उसके enemies, the public revelation of his secret identity of Clark Kent and a number of मौतों of those closest to him.
the स्टोरी has been cited as एक of the best stories of the character of Superman, and आलोचकों and audiences frequently चुनें it as one of the सबसे memorable comics ever published.
it is used as an example of how to बंद the long-time continuity of a comic book अक्षर.
The story 's legacy has endured with similar stories written as श्रद्धांजलि to it.
The title is a reference to one of the nicknames of Superman as the Man of Tomorrow, and थी used in the title of another Superman.
the Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed and विकसित by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim, France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal उत्पादन car in the संसार, साथ a शीर्ष speed of.
The original version has a top गति of.
It was named Car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी television कार्यक्रम Top Gear.
The मानक Veyron जीती Top गियर्स Best Car Driven All Year पुरस्कार in 2005.
on 6 April 2013, bugatti set the record for the fastest roadster in the संसार with the Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse, reaching on average a top speed of.

A number of खास विसंगतियाँ have been produced.
In December 2010, bugatti began offering prospective buyers the ability to customize exterior and interiors रंग by using the Veyron 16.4 configurator application on the marque 's आधिकारिक website.
The संस्था of the Eucharist has महरूम a key theme in the depictions of the पिछला Supper in Christian art, as in this 16th-century Juan de Juanes पेंटिंग.
`` at the Last Supper, on the night he was betrayed, our Savior instituted the Eucharistic sacrifice of his Body and Blood. ''
( Catechism of the कैथोलिक Church 1323 )
Eucharist in the कैथोलिक Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass, that is, the Eucharist liturgy, and the ब्रैड and wine which after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ, रब and God, a घोषणा formulated by the Council of ट्रेंट with an anathema against anyone who denied this.
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional term प्रयुक्त in the Roman Catholic Church to refer to the Eucharistic species ( the देह and रक्त of Christ ).

A short story is a brief work of literature, प्रायः written in narrative prose.
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling traditions in the 17th century, the short story रै grown to encompass a body of work so diverse as to defy easy characterization.
at its most prototypical the short स्टोरी सुविधाएँ a small cast of नामित characters, और focuses on a self-contained incident with the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood.
In so doing, short stories make use of plot, resonance, and other dynamic components to a far greater degree than is typical of an किस्सा, yet to a दूर lesser degree than a अनोखा.
While the short story is largely distinct from the novel, authors of both generally draw from a common pool of literary techniques.
Short कहानियां have no नियत लंबाई.
In terms of word गिनती there is no official demarcation between an anecdote, a छोटी स्टोरी, and a novel.
बल्कि, the form 's parameters are given by the rhetorical and practical context in जिससे a given story is produced and considered, so कि what constitutes a छोटी story may differ between genres, countries, eras, and टीकाकारों.
Like the novel, the short story 's predominant आकार reflects the demands of the उपलब्धियाँ markets for publication, and the evolution of the form seems closely tied to the evolution of the publishing industry and the submission guidelines of its constituent houses.
The short story रै महरूम considered both an apprenticeship रूप preceding more lengthy works, and a crafted form in its अपना right, collected together in किताबे of similar length, price, and distribution as novels.
Short story writers may define their works as part of the artistic and निजी expression of the form.
They may also attempt to resist categorization by genre and फिक्स्ड form.

The raccoon (, Procyon lotor ), sometimes spelled racoon, भी known as the common raccoon, North American raccoon, northern raccoon and colloquially as coon, is a medium-sized mammal native to North अमेरिका.
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid family, having a देह length of and a body वज़न of.
Its grayish कोट ज़्यादातर consists of dense underfur जिससे insulates against cold weather.
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive features are its extremely dexterous front paws and its facial mask, which are विषयवस्तु in the mythology of अनेक Native American tribes.
Raccoons are noted लिये उनके intelligence, with studies प्रर्दशित that they are able to remember the solution to tasks लिये up to three years.
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon, which is usually nocturnal, consists of about 40 % invertebrates, 33 % संयंत्र foods, और 27 % vertebrates.
The असली habitats of the raccoon are पतझड़ी और mixed forests, but due to their adaptability they have extended their range to mountainous areas, coastal marshes, and urban areas, where some homeowners consider them to be pests.
as a result of escapes and deliberate introductions in the mid-20th सदी, raccoons are now also distributed आरपार the European mainland, the काकेशस region and Japan.
Though previously thought to be solitary, वहीँ is अभी evidence that raccoons engage in gender-specific सोशल behavior.
Related females प्रायः share a आम क्षेत्रफल, while unrelated males live together in groups of up to four animals to maintain their positions against foreign males during the mating season, and other potential invaders.
Home range sizes vary anywhere from 3 hectares ( 7 acres ) for females in cities to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) for males in prairies.
After a gestation period of परिचय 65 दिनों, two to five young, known as `` kits '', are born in spring.
The kits are subsequently raised by their mother until dispersion in late fall.
Although खिलाते raccoons have been known to live over 20 सालो, उनके औसत life expectancy in the wild is only 1.8 to 3.1 years.
In अनेक areas, hunting and vehicular चोट are the two most आम causes of death.
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic परिमाण 7.0 mw earthquake, with an epicenter near the town of Léogâne ( Ouest Department ), लगभग west of Port-au-Prince, Haiti 's capital.
The भूकंप occurred at 16:53 लोकल time ( 21:53 utc ) on Tuesday, 12 जनवरी 2010.
By 24 January, at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or greater था महरूम recorded.
An estimated three million लोगों were affected by the भूकंप.
The highest विश्वसनीय death count थी estimated at 220,000.
Haitian government estimates were higher.
The सरकारी of Haiti estimated that 250,000 residences and 30,000 commercial buildings had collapsed or were severely damaged.
The earthquake caused प्रमुख damage in Port-au-Prince, Jacmel and other settlements in the region.
Many notable landmark इमारतें were significantly damaged or destroyed, including the Presidential राजमहल, the National Assembly building, the port-au-prince Cathedral, and the main jail.
Among those मारे were Archbishop of Port-au-Prince जोसेफ Serge Miot, and opposition leader Micha Gaillard.
the headquarters of the United Nations Stabilization Mission in हैती ( MINUSTAH ), located in the capital, collapsed, killing many, सहित the मिशन 's Chief, Hédi Annabi.
Many देशों responded to appeals for humanitarian aid, pledging funds and dispatching बचाव and चिकित्सा teams, engineers and support personnel.
Communication systems, एयर, land, and sea हस्तांतरण facilities, hospitals, and electrical संजाल had been damaged by the earthquake, which hampered rescue and aid प्रयत्न ; confusion over who was in charge, एयर traffic congestion, and problems साथ prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief कार्य.
Port-au-Prince 's morgues were अभिभूत with tens of हज़ारों of bodies.
These had to be buried in द्रव्यमान graves.
As rescues tailed off, आपूर्तियाँ, medical care और sanitation became priorities.
देरी in aid distribution led to angry appeals from सहायता workers and survivors, and looting and sporadic हिंसा were observed.
On 22 January the United Nations noted कि the emergency phase of the relief operation was drawing to a close, and on the following दिन the Haitian सरकारी officially called off the search for survivors.
Mister Ed is a fictional talking horse, originally appearing in short stories by Walter R. ब्रूक्स, and later in an अमरीकी television हालात comedy produced by Filmways कि first aired in syndication from January 5 to जुलाई 2, 1961, and then on CBS from अक्तूबर 1, 1961 to February 6, 1966.
The stars of the show were मिस्टर Ed, a palomino horse who could `` talk '', निभाई by gelding बाँसुरी harvester and voiced by former Western स्टार Allan Lane ( who गई uncredited for the entire length of the series ), and उसके owner, an eccentric and enormously klutzy, yet friendly, architect named Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ).
Much of the कार्यक्रम 's humor stemmed इससे the fact Mister Ed would speak only to Wilbur, as well as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker.
Other running jokes centered on Wilbur 's character होने a huge klutz and inadvertently causing harm to himself or अन्य.
according to the show 's producer, Arthur lubin, यंग was chosen as the सीसे character because he `` just seemed like the sort of guy a horse would बात to ''.
Lubin, a friend of Mae वेस्ट, scored a तख्तापलट by persuading the screen प्रतीक to guest star in one एपीसोड.
In the United States, reruns aired on Nick at नाइट इससे March 3, 1986, to February 1, 1993.
Sister station TV Land also reran the show from 1996–98 and again from 2003-06.
The series is फिलहाल broadcast प्रत्येक morning on इस TV, along with Highway Patrol, and The Patty Duke Show.
It is भी फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट on Hallmark Movie Channel.
As of जनवरी 1, 2011, the first दो seasons of the show are available on Hulu.
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology which refers to the `` being caught up '' discussed in 1 Thessalonians 4:17, जब the `` dead in मसीह '' and `` we who are alive and remain '' will be `` caught up in the clouds '' to meet `` the रब in the एयर ''.
the term `` Rapture '' is used in at तनिक two senses.
In the pre-tribulation view, a group of people will be left behind on earth after another group literally leaves `` to मिलें the रब in the air. ''
This is now the most common use of the term, especially among fundamentalist Christians and in the United राज्य.
The other, older उपयोग of the term `` Rapture '' is simply as a synonym लिये the final resurrection generally, without a belief that a group of people is left behind on earth for an extended tribulation period बाद the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
इस distinction is important as some types of Christianity never refer to `` the Rapture '' in religious education, लकिन might use the older and more general sense of the word `` rapture '' in referring to what happens during the फाइनल resurrection.
There are अनेक दृश्य among Christians regarding the timing of Christ 's return ( including whether it will occur in एक event or two ), and various views regarding the destination of the aerial gathering वर्णित in 1 Thessalonians 4.
Denominations such as Roman catholics, Orthodox Christians, Lutheran Christians, and Reformed ईसाइयों believe in a rapture only in the sense of a general final resurrection, when Christ returns a single time.
They do not believe that a group of people is left behind on धरती for an extended tribulation period after the कार्यक्रम of 1 thessalonians 4:17.
Pre-tribulation rapture धर्मशास्त्र was विकसित in the 1830s by John Nelson Darby और the plymouth brethren, and popularized in the United States in the early 20th सदी by the wide परिसंचरण of the Scofield Reference Bible.
