The philistine cities of Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Ekron, and Gath
The Philistines (,,, or ;, plištim ), Pleshet or Peleset, were a लोगों who as part of the Sea Peoples appeared in the southern coastal area of Canaan at the beginning of the आयरन Age ( circa 1175 BC ), most probably from the ईजियन region.
According to the Bible, they ruled the पाँच city-states ( the `` philistine Pentapolis '' ) of Gaza, Ashkelon, Ashdod, ekron and gath, from Wadi Gaza in the south to the Yarqon River in the north, but with no fixed border to the east.
The Bible paints them as the Kingdom of इसराईल 's सबसे खतरनाक दुश्मन.
Originating somewhere in the Aegean, their जनसांख्यिकी was around 25,000 in the 12th सदी bc, उठती to a शिखर of 30,000 in the 11th century BC, of which the Aegean element was not more than half the total, और perhaps much less.
Nothing is known for certain about the असली language or languages of the Philistines, however they were not भाग of the Semitic Canaanite जनसांख्यिकी.
There is some सीमित evidence in favour of the assumption that the Philistines यहूद Indo-European-speakers either इससे Greece and/or Luwian अध्यक्षों from the coast of एशिया नाबालिग.
Philistine-related words found in the Bible are not Semitic, and can in some cases, with रिज़र्वेशन, be traced वापस to Proto-Indo-European roots.
By the beginning of the 1st मिलेनियम BCE they had अपनाया the सामान्य Canaanite language of the region.
the हथियारबंद सेवाएं Vocational Aptitude बैटरी ( ASVAB ) is a अनेक choice test, administered by the United States Military Entrance Processing Command, used to determine qualification for enlistment in the संयुक्त States armed forces.
It is often offered to American high school students when they are in the 10th, 11th and 12th grade, though anyone eligible for enlistment may take it.
हालांकि the test is administered by the सैन्य, it is not ( और never has been ) a requirement that a test-taker साथ a qualifying स्कोर enlist in the armed forces.
In financial accounting, a balance sheet or statement of financial position is a summary of the financial balances of a sole बंदोबस्त, a business partnership, a corporation or other कारोबार organization, such as an LLC or an llp.
Assets, liabilities and ownership equity are listed as of a specific date, such as the समाप्त of its financial year.
A संतुलन चादर is often described as a `` snapshot of a company 's financial condition ''.
Of the four basic financial statements, the balance sheet is the तभी statement which applies to a single point in time of a business ' calendar year.
A standard कम्पनी balance sheet has three भाग : assets, liabilities and स्वामित्व equity.
The main categories of एसेट हैं usually listed first, and typically in अनुक्रम of liquidity.
Assets are followed by the liabilities.
the difference between the एसेट and the liabilities is known as equity or the जाल assets or the जाल worth or capital of the company and according to the हिसाब equation, net worth must equal assets ऋण देनदारी.
Another way to look at the same equation is that assets equals liabilities प्लस मालिक 's equity.
Looking at the equation in इस way shows कैसा assets were financed : either by borrowing money ( liability ) or by using the owner 's धन ( owner 's equity ).
संतुलन sheets are usually presented with assets in one section and liabilities and net worth in the other section साथ the दो sections `` balancing. ''
A business operating entirely in cash can माप इसके profits by withdrawing the entire bank balance at the end of the काल, plus any cash in हाथ.
However, many businesses are not paid immediately ; they build up inventories of goods and they acquire buildings and equipment.
In other words : व्यवसायों have assets and so they can not, भी if they want to, immediately turn these into cash at the end of each काल.
Often, these businesses owe money to आपूर्तिकर्ता और to tax authorities, और the proprietors do not withdraw all their original capital and profits at the end of each period.
In other words व्यवसायों also have liabilities.
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire, commonly known as the.17 HMR, is a rimfire राइफल cartridge developed by the ammunition company Hornady in 2002.
it descended from the.22 Magnum by necking down the.22 मैग्नम मामला to लो a.17 caliber ( 4.5 mm ) गोली, and it is अधिक costly to shoot than traditional.22 caliber rimfire cartridges.
Commonly loaded with a 17 grain ( 1.1 g ) bullet, it can deliver muzzle velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ).
The Schaumburg Flyers were a professional baseball team based in Schaumburg, Illinois, in the United States.
The Flyers were to be a चार्टर member of the North American League, which is not संबद्ध with Major League बेसबॉल, however, the team folded in March 2011, before they began play in the nal.
इससे the 1999 season to the 2010 season, the flyers played their home games at Alexian Field, near the Elgin O'Hare Expressway.
The टोली formerly played in Thunder Bay, ओंटारियो, where they were known as the Thunder Bay whiskey jacks.
The team was originally a member of the Northern League from 1993 to 2010.
on July 27, 2009, the flyers played host to Battle of the Sexes II, which pitted the flyers against the नेशनल Pro Fastpitch Softball Champions, the शिकागो Bandits.
Played by आधिकारिक softball rules, the game was seen by an overflow record crowd of 8,918, और was won by the Bandits 4-2.
In 1999, the Flyers hired their पहला मैनेजर, Ron Kittle.
kittle is best known for his playing days with the Chicago White Sox, and पूर्व Chicago शावक and श्वेत Sox खिलाड़ी Greg Hibbard was the pitching coach.
During the early years of the मताधिकार, Kittle did a श्रेणी of tv commercials to promote the team, using the gimmick `` Ma kittle. '' where he played both himself and his `` ma. ''
The विज्ञापन यहूद कामयाब at sparking कुछ initial interest in the टोली as the Flyers hoped to चोरी away fans from the nearby Kane County Cougars.
The ad mimicked the highly successful Converse विज्ञापन where लैरी Johnson starred as both himself and `` Gramama. ''
at the end of the 2001 season, however, Kittle resigned from उसके managerial position, and Jim Boynewicz was hired to replace उसे.
In 2004, the Flyers made it to the Northern League Championship Series against the st. Paul Saints.
Despite leading the five-game series 2-1, schaumburg आखिरकार lost the series.
In Game 5, flyers relief pitcher Lyle Prempas allowed a खेल winning grand स्लैम by St. Paul infielder Marc Mirizzi in the ninth inning.
the Flyers appeared in the Northern League playoffs four times ( 1999, 2003, 2004, 2006 ) but never won the championship.
Some famous players जो निभाई for the Flyers were former Oakland A 's outfielder Ozzie Canseco and former शिकागो Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith.
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice / ; born 7 March 1970 ) is an English film and थिएटर actress and पूर्व फ़ैशन model.
Weisz began her acting career at Trinity Hall, Cambridge in the early 1990s, then started working in television, appearing in Inspector Morse, the British mini-series Scarlet and Black, and the television फिल्मी Advocates ii.
She made her फिल्मी début in the film Death यंत्र ( 1994 ), but her breakthrough role आए in the film कड़ी Reaction ( 1996 ), leading to a high-profile role as Evelyn Carnahan-O'Connell in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) and the Mummy Returns ( 2001 ).
Other notable films featuring Weisz are Enemy at the गेट्स, About a Boy, Constantine, The Fountain और the Constant माली, for which she received an Academy Award, a Golden ग्लोब और a Screen Actors ' Guild award for her supporting role as Tessa quayle.
वो has been labelled an `` English rose '' चूंकि her minor role in Stealing Beauty ( 1996 ).
Weisz भी works in theatre.
Her stage breakthrough थी the 1994 revival of Noël Coward 's play Design लिये Living, which earned her the London आलोचकों Circle Award for the most promising newcomer.
Weisz 's performances also include the 1999 Donmar Warehouse production of टेनेसी विलियम्स ' एकाएक, Last Summer, and their 2009 revival of A स्ट्रीटकार Named Desire.
उसके portrayal of blanche DuBois in the latter play earned her the Critics ' Circle Theatre Award लिये Best Actress.
She has recently played Evanora in Oz the ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली.
the अमरीकी Civil War ( ACW ), भी known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a civil युद्ध fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign शक्तियां did not intervene.
बाद four years of bloody कॉम्बैट that बाएँ over 600,000 soldiers मुर्दे and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 presidential चुनाव, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration होता नहीं initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave states जारी to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise, and both sides prepared लिये war.
the Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none पहचाना the new Confederate States of America.
hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in दक्षिण Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, चार अधिक slave राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
the Union जल्द controlled the border states and established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The पूर्वी Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, which made ending गुलामी a war goal.
To the वेस्ट, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate नदी navy, then much of their western सेना, and the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. Grant command of सब Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture अटलांटा and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure साथ the way.
the Union marshaled the संसाधन और manpower to attack the Confederacy from सब directions, and could afford to लड़ो battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate फौज failed, leading to ली 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at appomattox Court House on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी Civil युद्ध was one of the earliest true industrial युद्धों.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed संसार War I.
It remains the deadliest war in अमरीकी history, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John huddleston estimates the death टोल at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of सब Southern श्वेत males aged 18–40.
आलू bread is a form of bread in which potato replaces a portion of the regular गेहूं आटा.
It is cooked in a variety of methods, including by baking it on a hot griddle or pan, or in an ओवन.
It may be leavened or unleavened, and may have a variety of other ingredients baked into it.
The ratio of potato to wheat flour varies significantly from रेसिपी to recipe, साथ कुछ recipes having a majority of आलू, and others having a majority of गेहूं flour.
Some recipes कॉल for mashed potatoes, with others calling for dehydrated potato flakes.
It is उपलब्धियाँ as a commercial product in many countries, with similar variations in ingredients, cooking method, and अन्य variables.
The Pacific Time Zone observes standard time by subtracting eight hours from समन्वित Universal समय ( ).
The clock time in this zone is based on the mean solar time of the 120th meridian west of the Greenwich वेधशाला.
During daylight saving time, its time offset is.
In the संयुक्त राज्य and Canada, this time zone is generically पुकारा प्रशांत Time ( pt ).
Specifically, it is प्रशांत मानक Time ( PST ) when observing standard समय ( winter ), and Pacific daylight Time ( PDT ) when observing daylight saving समय ( summer ).
Most of Canada उपयोग daylight saving time.
In Mexico the UTC−8 time zone is known as the Northwest Zone, which is synchronized with the U.S. पीडीटी daylight saving schedule.
The largest city in the Pacific Time Zone is Los Angeles in California from USA ; the city 's metropolitan area is the largest in the zone.
The zone is one hour ahead of the अलास्का Time Zone, one hour पीछे the Mountain समय मण्डल and three घंटों behind the Eastern Time Zone.
स्टीरियो 8, commonly known as the eight-track कार्ट्रिज, eight-track tape, or बस eight-track, is a magnetic tape sound recording technology.
It was popular in the United States इससे the mid-1960s through to the जल्दी 1980s, लकिन was relatively अनजान in many European countries.
It was, however, very popular in the United Kingdom during this काल.
Stereo 8 was created in 1964 by a consortium led by Bill lear of lear Jet Corporation, along साथ Ampex, Ford Motor कम्पनी, General मोटर्स, Motorola, and RCA विक्टर Records ( RCA ).
It was a further development of the similar Stereo-Pak four-track cartridge created by अर्ल `` madman '' Muntz.
A बाद quadraphonic version of the स्वरूप was announced by RCA in April 1970 and first known as Quad-8, then later changed to just Q8.
Ramesses II ( 1303 bc – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian :, alternatively transcribed as Rameses and Ramses or ), referred to as Ramesses the Great, was the तीसरा मिश्र pharaoh ( reigned 1279 BC – 1213 bc ) of the Nineteenth dynasty.
He is प्रायः regarded as the greatest, most celebrated, and most शक्तिशाली pharaoh of the Egyptian साम्राज्य.
His successors and later Egyptians called him the `` ग्रेट पूर्वज. ''
रामेसेस II led several military expeditions into the Levant, re-asserting Egyptian control over Canaan.
He also led expeditions to the south, into Nubia, commemorated in inscriptions at Beit el-Wali and Gerf Hussein.
At आयु चौदह, Ramesses थी appointed Prince Regent by his father Seti I.
he is believed to have taken the throne in उसके late teens and is known to have शासित Egypt इससे 1279 BC to 1213 bc लिये 66 years and 2 months, according to both Manetho and Egypt 's समकालीन historical रिकॉर्ड.
He थी once said to have lived to be 99 years old, but it is more likely that he died in उसके 90th or 91st year.
If he became pharaoh in 1279 BC as सबसे egyptologists today believe, he would have assumed the throne on May 31, 1279 BC, based on उसके known accession date of iii shemu day 27.
रामेसेस II celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed festivals ( the first held after thirty years of a pharaoh 's शासनकाल, और then every three सालो ) during his reign—more than कोई other pharaoh.
On his death, he was buried in a tomb in the Valley of the Kings ; his body was later moved to a royal cache where it was discovered in 1881, and is now on display in the Cairo Museum.
The early part of his reign was focused on building cities, temples and monuments.
He established the नगर of pi-ramesses in the Nile Delta as his new capital और main base for his campaigns in सीरियाई.
This city was built on the remains of the city of avaris, the capital of the Hyksos when वे took over, and was the location of the main Temple of Set.
He is also ज्ञात as Ozymandias in the Greek sources, इससे a transliteration into Greek of a भाग of रामेसेस 's throne name,, `` Ra 's mighty truth, chosen of Ra ''.
the टेक्सास Rangers are a professional baseball team located in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, based in Arlington, Texas.
The रेंजरों franchise is currently a सदस्य of the Western Division of प्रमुख लीग Baseball 's American League.
Since, the Rangers have played in Rangers Ballpark in Arlington in Arlington, Texas.
The team 's नाम is borrowed from the famous विधि प्रवर्तन agency of the same name.
The franchise was established in 1961 by the name of the वॉशिंगटन Senators, an expansion टोली awarded to Washington, D.C., after the city 's पहला ballclub, the original वॉशिंगटन Senators, moved to Minnesota and became the Twins.
After the season, the new Senators moved to Arlington, Texas, और debuted as the रेंजरों the following वसन्त.
The टेक्सास रेंजरों Baseball Club has बना six appearances in the MLB postseason, all following division championships, in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2010, 2011 and 2012.
In 2010, the Rangers उन्नत past the प्रभाग Series for the first time, defeating the Tampa Bay Rays.
Texas then brought घर their first American League Pennant after धड़कन the New York Yankees in six games.
in the 2010 World श्रेणी, the franchise 's first, the Rangers fell to the San Francisco Giants in five खेल.
उनके लोन victory made them the first Texas team to win a संसार Series game, the Houston एस्टर्स having been swept in their 2005 संसार Series appearance.
They repeated as American League champions the following साल, then lost the 2011 World Series to the st. Louis कार्डिनल्स in seven games.
Gaius Julius Caesar (, July 100 BC – 15 March 44 BC ) was a रोमन general, statesman, Consul and notable लेखक of Latin गद्य.
He played a critical भूमिका in the कार्यक्रम that led to the demise of the Roman Republic और the rise of the Roman Empire.
in 60 BC, Caesar, Crassus and Pompey formed a political alliance that was to dominate Roman politics for several years.
Their attempts to amass शक्ति through populist tactics यहूद opposed by the conservative elite भीतर the Roman Senate, among them Cato the Younger with the frequent support of Cicero.
Caesar 's conquest of gaul, completed by 51 BC, extended Rome 's territory to the English Channel and the Rhine.
Caesar became the पहला Roman सामान्य to cross both when he built a bridge across the राइन और conducted the first invasion of ब्रिटेन.
These achievements granted him unmatched सैन्य शक्ति and threatened to eclipse the standing of Pompey, जो था realigned himself with the Senate after the death of crassus in 53 BC.
With the gallic Wars concluded, the सीनेट ordered सीज़र to lay down his military command and return to Rome.
Caesar refused, and marked his defiance in 49 BC by crossing the Rubicon with a legion, leaving his province और illegally entering Roman territory under arms.
Civil युद्ध resulted, from which he emerged as the unrivaled नेता of Rome.
After assuming control of government, Caesar began a program of social and सरकारी reforms, including the creation of the जूलियन पंचांग.
He centralised the bureaucracy of the Republic and was eventually proclaimed `` dictator in perpetuity ''.
But the underlying political conflicts had not been resolved, and on the Ides of March ( 15 March ) 44 BC, Caesar was assassinated by a group of senators led by Marcus Junius ब्रूटस.
A new श्रेणी of civil wars broke आउट, and the constitutional सरकारी of the गणतंत्र was never restored.
Caesar 's adopted heir octavian, later known as Augustus, रोज़ to sole power, and the era of the Roman Empire began.
much of Caesar 's life is ज्ञात from his own accounts of his military अभियान, और इससे other contemporary sources, mainly the अक्षर and speeches of Cicero and the ऐतिहासिक कृतियाँ of Sallust.
The later biographies of Caesar by Suetonius और Plutarch are भी major sources.
Caesar is deemed to be one of the greatest military कमांडरों of इतिहास.
भाषाई map of Nigeria, Cameroon, और Benin.
Sign in अंग्रेज़ी, outside the University of Lagos
There are hundreds of languages spoken in Nigeria.
The major languages are Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, Edo, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
The official भाषा of Nigeria, English, the former colonial language, was chosen to facilitate the cultural and linguistic एकता of the देश.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the country 's urban elite, and is नहीं widely spoken in ग्रामीण areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic विविधता is a microcosm of Africa as a पूरे, encompassing three major African languages families : Afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified भाषाएं, such as cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an even वृहद diversity prior to the spread of the current language families.
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot, ( UK ) bird 's nest, बिशप 's lace, and Queen Anne 's lace ( North अमेरिका ) ) is a flowering plant in the family Apiaceae, native to temperate regions of Europe, दक्षिणपश्चिम Asia and naturalised to उत्तर America and Australia.
Domesticated carrots are cultivars of a subspecies, Daucus carota subsp. sativus.
in the United States, the शीर्षक of federal judge usually अर्थात् a न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the President of the United राज्य और confirmed by the United राज्य Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article ii of the United राज्य Constitution.
In addition to the परम् Court of the संयुक्त States, whose अस्तित्व and some पहलुओं of जिनकी jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of कॉंग्रेस to alter, acts of कॉंग्रेस have स्थापित 13 courts of appeals ( भी called `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States, and 94 United States ज़िला courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a संघीय judge ; such स्थितियाँ include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court, Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals, and district न्यायाधीशों of the United राज्य district courts.
सब of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` आलेख III न्यायाधीशों '' because वे कसरत the judicial power vested in the न्यायिक branch of the federal government by आलेख III of the U.S. संविधान.
In जोड, judges of the Court of International Trade exercise judicial शक्ति pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal courts, including magistrate न्यायाधीशों and bankruptcy judges, are भी sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, they are neither appointed by the President nor पुष्टि by the सीनेट, और their शक्ति derives इससे Article I instead.
See Article I and Article III tribunals.
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born December 2, 1978 ) is a Canadian singer, songwriter and अभिनेत्री.
She has sold 20 million एल्बम worldwide and more 20 million singles, bringing her total sales to over 40 million records around the world.
फ़र्टाडो first gained fame with her debut album, Whoa, Nelly !
, which spawned two successful singles, `` I 'm Like a Bird `` and `` Turn बंद the Light ``. ``
i 'm Like A बर्ड '' won a 2001 Juno Award लिये Single of the Year and a 2002 ग्रैमी Award लिये Best Female Pop गायन Performance.
in 2003, Furtado released लोकगीत, which produced three international singles— `` Powerless ( Say What You Want ) ``, `` Try `` and `` Força ``.
Three सालो later she released Loose, a worldwide वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी.
The album शाखित four number-one hits : `` promiscuous ``, `` Maneater ``, `` Say It Right `` and `` All शुभ Things ( Come to an End ) ``.
After a three-year ब्रेक, वो released her first full-length Spanish album, Mi Plan, and Furtado received a Latin Grammy for Best Female Pop Vocal एल्बम.
In 2012, Furtado 's fourth English-language studio album, The Spirit अविनाशी was released.
Furtado 's work has अर्जित her numerous पुरस्कार and accolades, including 2 Grammy पुरस्कार, 10 Juno Awards, 3 MuchMusic Video पुरस्कार और a star on Canada 's Walk of Fame.
जीव of the Night is the tenth स्टुडियो album by Kiss.
it is the band 's पिछला album for Casablanca Records, the only label the समूह had कभी recorded for at that point.
the album was समर्पित to the memory of कासाब्लांका founder और early Kiss supporter Neil Bogart, जो had died of कर्कट during the recording सत्र.
It is भी the band 's last album recorded with Ace frehley credited as an official member ( until 1998 's Psycho Circus ), and its first एल्बम with vinnie Vincent as the initially uncredited lead guitarist ( Vincent would बाद be credited, but not featured pictorially on the cover, of 1985 's reissue of the album ).
टच is a crucial means of receiving information.
This photo shows tactile markings identifying stairs for visually impaired people.
The somatosensory system is a diverse sensory system comprising the receptors and processing centres to produce the sensory modalities such as touch, temperature, proprioception ( body position ), and nociception ( pain ).
The sensory receptors cover the skin और epithelia, skeletal muscles, bones and joints, internal organs, and the cardiovascular प्रणाली.
While touch is considered one of the five परंपरागत senses, the छाप of टच is formed from several modalities.
In आयुर्विज्ञान, the colloquial पद `` touch '' is usually replaced with `` somatic senses '' to better reflect the variety of mechanisms involved.
दैहिक senses are sometimes referred to as somesthetic होश, with the understanding that somesthesis includes टच, proprioception और ( depending on उपयोग ) also haptic perception.
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using different receptors : thermoreceptors, nociceptors, mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors.
Transmission of information from the receptors passes via sensory nerves through tracts in the spinal cord and into the brain.
प्रसंस्करण primarily occurs in the primary somatosensory area in the parietal पालि of the cerebral cortex.
the cortical homunculus was devised by वाइल्डर penfield.
At its simplest, the system works when कार्यकलाप in a sensory neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus such as heat ; this signal eventually गुजरता to an area in the brain uniquely attributed to कि क्षेत्रफल on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location.
the point-to-point mapping of the body surfaces in the brain is पुकारा a homunculus and is essential in the creation of a देह चित्र.
This brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) map is not immutable, however.
नाटकीय shifts can occur in response to स्ट्रोक or injury.
Magnolia is a large genus of about 210 flowering plant प्रजाति in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the परिवार Magnoliaceae.
it is named after फ्रेंच botanist Pierre magnol.
Magnolia is an ancient genus.
Appearing before मधुमक्खियों did, the पुष्प evolved to encourage pollination by beetles.
To avoid damage from pollinating beetles, the carpels of Magnolia flowers are अत्यधिक मुश्किल.
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have been found dating to 20 million सालो ago, and of plants identifiably belonging to the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 million years ago.
Another aspect of Magnolias that is considered to represent an ancestral state is कि the flower bud is enclosed in a bract rather than in sepals ; the perianth parts are undifferentiated और called tepals rather than distinct sepals and petals.
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic साथ several other flowering पौधे near the base of the flowering plant lineage such as Amborella and Nymphaea ( as well as with many more recently derived plants such as Lilium ).
The प्राकृतिक range of Magnolia species is a disjunct वितरण, with a प्रमुख centre in east and southeast Asia and a secondary centre in eastern North अमेरिका, Central America, the West इंडीज, and some species in South अमेरिका.

`` White क्रिसमस '' is an Irving Berlin song reminiscing about an old-fashioned Christmas सेटिंग.
according to the Guinness Book of संसार Records, the version sung by Bing Crosby is the best-selling single of all time, with अनुमानित sales in excess of 50 million copies worldwide.
Accounts vary as to जब and where Berlin wrote the song.
One स्टोरी is that he wrote it in 1940, in warm La Quinta, California, while रहकर at the La Quinta Hotel, a frequent Hollywood retreat also favored by writer-producer Frank Capra, हालांकि the Arizona Biltmore also claims the song was written there.
He often ठहरे up all night writing — he told his secretary, `` पकड़ें your pen और take down this song.
I just लिखा the best song I 've ever written — heck, I just wrote the best song that anybody 's ever written ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or XC skiing ) is a रूप of ski touring in which participants propel themselves across snow-covered मैदान using skis and poles.
The कार्यकलाप is popular in many places with large snowfields, primarily Northern Europe, Canada, and Alaska.
Cross-country skiing is भाग of the Nordic स्कीइंग sport family, which includes ski jumping, nordic संयुक्त ( cross-country skiing and ski jumping ), biathlon ( skiing and rifle marksmanship ) और ski-orienteering ( which includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ).
cross-country skiing is the आधुनिक style of स्कीइंग कि most resembles prehistoric skiing, particularly when done in the backcountry.
It is also related to telemark स्कीइंग.
A use कर in संयुक्त States is complementary to sales tax which अर्थात्, if तुम ख़रीदे a taxable product/services without paying any Sales tax to विक्रेता, you owe use tax.
You जरूर self assess use कर and pay it directly to the state where the products यहूद consumed or services यहूद rendered.
उपयोग कर typically is a कर on consumption but if you buy an item ( without paying बिक्री कर ) and store it in your गोदाम initially, उपयोग कर applies to कि location where goods were भंडारित.
Later on when the final consumption takes place at some अन्य location, you are required to pay the अवकल of tax रेट to the jurisdiction of ultimate place of consumption.
This really means that you do n't have to अदा both Sales Tax as well as Use Tax on one transaction.
It is only one or the other that you हैं required to pay on खरीदें of taxable products/services.
If विक्रेता does n't charge any Sales tax on its invoice then it is the दायित्व of the buyer to self assess Use tax and pay it to the appropriate Jurisdication.
Use Tax is generally charged at the same tax rate of Sales Tax but in some राज्य the tax rate is अलग.
Use कर is also termed as `` Consumption कर '' or `` Consumer Use Tax ''.
A use tax is a type of excise tax levied in the United States by numerous state सरकारें.
It is assessed upon tangible personal property purchased by a resident of the assessing राज्य for use, storage, or consumption in that state ( not for पुनर्विक्रय ), regardless of where the purchase took place.
If a निवासी of a राज्य makes a purchase within his home राज्य, full sales कर is paid at the समय of the लेनदेन.
the use tax applies when a resident of the assessing state purchases an item that is नहीं subject to his home state 's sales कर.
Usually, इस is due to out-of-state purchases, as well as ordering items through the mail, by फोन, or over the Internet from other states.
The use tax is typically assessed at the same rate as the sales tax कि would have been owed ( if any ) था the same goods been purchased in the state of residence.
For example, a resident of Massachusetts, साथ a 6.25 % `` sales and use कर '' on certain goods and services, purchases non-exempt goods or services in New Hampshire for use, storage or अन्य खपत in Massachusetts.
Under New Hampshire विधि, the New Hampshire विक्रेता collects no बिक्री कर on the goods, लकिन the Massachusetts purchaser/user जरूर still pay 6.25 % of the sales price directly to the Department of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use कर.
If the same goods are purchased in a us state that does collect sales tax for such goods at time of purchase, whatever कर were paid by the purchaser to that state can be deducted ( as a कर credit ) from the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent use, storage or consumption in मैसाचुसेट्स.
साथ few exceptions, no state 's vendors will charge the native state 's sales tax on goods shipped out of state, meaning all goods ordered from out-of-state are essentially free of sales tax.
The purchaser is therefore required to declare and अदा the use tax to his home राज्य on these ordered goods.
The assessing jurisdiction may make the use tax payable annually, but some states require a मासिक payment.
For example, जहाँ a Vermont resident रै नहीं paid at least 6 % बिक्री tax on property brought in for उपयोग in the state, Vermont law requires filing a tax वापसी ( Form SU-452 and payment ) by the 20th day of the माह following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 लेट fee, a 5 % penalty per माह, to a maximum of 25 %, plus statutory interest on the unpaid कर and penalties.
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit organizations or सरकारी agencies, purchases for resale in commerce, and purchases via `` casual बिक्री '' by individuals not in the ordinary course of business.
भी note that there are thousands of tax jurisdictions in the U.S. and many have ever-changing lists of specific types of goods और services that हैं not taxable.
as an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts विधि requires payment of कर on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) तन्त्र purchased and डाउनलोड over the Internet for installation and उपयोग in Massachusetts, regardless of where it originates.
However, the actual use of the same software downloaded by a Massachusetts resident to a server in another state remains a non-taxed `` service ''.
In contrast, अरकंसास generally करता नहीं कर anything वितरित over the Internet ( such as डाउनलोड तन्त्र or music ), except VoIP which is specifically defined as taxable `` दूरसंचार services ''.
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` वितरित thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e., on डिस्क ) in Arkansas is taxable even if ordered online, except `` custom तन्त्र for a particular customer '' which is non-taxable `` programming services '' भी if delivered on a डिस्क.
In most cases, this complexity is भाग of the underlying sales कर laws ; लकिन while a brick-and-mortar store has to deal with only the sales tax laws of इसके own स्थान, remote sellers have to deal साथ the use कर laws of many jurisdictions—up to every us state and locality that assesses them, if the company has a presence or `` nexus '' in every state ( as large `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ).
in medicine, pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an बढ़ाएँ of blood pressure in the pulmonary artery, pulmonary vein, or pulmonary capillaries, together ज्ञात as the lung vasculature, अग्रणी to shortness of breath, dizziness, fainting, and other symptoms, all of which are exacerbated by exertion.
pulmonary hypertension can be a severe disease with a markedly decreased exercise tolerance and heart failure.
It was first identified by Dr. Ernst von romberg in 1891.
According to the most recent वर्गीकरण, it can be one of five different types : arterial, venous, hypoxic, thromboembolic or miscellaneous.

Sanuk, a प्रभाग of Deckers Outdoor Corporation, is a footwear brand आधारित in दक्षिणी California.
Sanuk, the थाई word for fun, थी founded by Southern California native जेफ़ kelley when he started making चप्पल out of indoor-outdoor carpet.
the first product created was green carpeted and हकदार the `` Fur रियल '' बाद एक shop owner asked if the विलक्षणता sandal was `` लिये Real. ''
The Fur Real first became a runaway hit through boutique stores and not the intended लहरे shops.
The novelty act थी followed up by a sandal wrapped in तार mesh, a leopard छपाई version, and शैलियाँ बना out of a poncho material in a variety of colors.
sanuk has grown to include स्टाइल options for men, women and youth and is वितरित across the United राज्य और in over 50 countries throughout यूरोपीय, Asia, South America और Australia.
Sanuk centers itself around a positive lifestyle advocating the slogan, `` Smile, Pass it on ! ``.
In कंप्यूटर science, array programming languages ( also ज्ञात as vector or multidimensional भाषाएं ) generalize operations on scalars to apply transparently to vectors, matrices, और higher dimensional arrays.
Array programming primitives concisely एक्स्प्रेस broad ideas about data manipulation.
The level of conciseness can be dramatic in certain cases : it is not uncommon to find array programming language one-liners that require अधिक than a couple of pages of Java code.
APL, designed by Ken Iverson, was the first प्रोग्रामिंग language to provide array programming capabilities.
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal book `` A Programming Language '' and not to arrays per se. Iverson 's contribution to rigor and स्पष्टता was probably अधिक important than the सरल extension of dimensions to functions.
In the United States an annuity contract is created when an insured party, प्रायः an व्यक्तिगत, pays a life insurance company a single प्रीमियम that will later be distributed वापस to the insured party over समय.
annuity contracts traditionally provide a गारंटी वितरण of income over time, such as via fixed भुगतान, until the death of the person or व्यक्तियों नामित in the contract or until a final date, whichever comes पहला.
However, the majority of modern annuity customers use annuities तभी to accumulate funds free of income and capital gains taxes and to later take lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature.
अध्यक्ष Barack Obama.
Barack Obama with उसके पहला Supreme Court nominee, Sonia Sotomayor.
Following is a list of all संयुक्त राज्य federal judges appointed by President Barack Obama दौरान his presidency.
As of April 30, 2013, 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the संयुक्त States सीनेट, namely two Justices to the Supreme Court of the United States, 35 judges to the United States courts of appeals and 150 judges to the United States district न्यायालयों.
25 further nominations are currently awaiting Senate action.
There are currently 16 vacancies on the United राज्य Courts of Appeals, 67 vacancies on the United States district न्यायालयों और 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies that are anticipated to occur before the समाप्त of Obama 's second पद.
Obama has not made any recess appointments to the federal courts.
Obama has made two nominations to the United States Court of International Trade, an Article III ट्रिब्यूनल.
Obama भी designated sitting judge Emily C. Hewitt of the United राज्य Court of संघीय Claims, an Article I court, to be मुख्य Judge of that court.

Agency debt also known as an Agency bond is a security, usually a bond, issued by a u.S. government-sponsored agency.
The offerings of these agencies are backed but नहीं guaranteed by the us सरकारी since the agencies हैं private entities.
कुछ prominent issuers of these securities are Student Loan विपणन Association ( Sallie mae ), Federal National बंधक Association ( Fannie Mae ) and Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation ( Freddie मैक ).
Agency securities are usually exempt from state और local taxes, but not संघीय tax.
Agency कर्ज़ is also पुकारा an एजेंसी security.

Nuclear power is the use of sustained nuclear fission to generate heat and electricity.
नाभिकीय शक्ति plants provided about 5.7 % of the world 's उर्जा and 13 % of the world 's electricity, in 2012.
In 2013, the IAEA report that there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors ( हालांकि not all are producing electricity ), in 31 countries.
In जोड, there are approximately 140 naval बरतन using nuclear propulsion in operation, संचालित by some 180 reactors.
There is an ongoing debate about the उपयोग of nuclear energy.
Proponents, such as the World Nuclear Association, the IAEA and Environmentalists for Nuclear Energy contend that नाभिकीय power is a चिरस्थायी energy source that reduces carbon emissions.
Opponents, ऐसे as ग्रीनपीस International and NIRS, मानना कि nuclear power poses many खतरे to people and the environment.
नाभिकीय power plant accidents include the Chernobyl विपत्ति ( 1986 ), Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster ( 2011 ), and the Three Mile Island दुर्घटना ( 1979 ).
There have also been कुछ nuclear-powered submarine mishaps.
Research into सुरक्षा सुधार is continuing and nuclear fusion, believed to be safer, may be used in the future.
As of 2012, according to the iaea, worldwide there were 68 सिविल nuclear power reactors अंतर्गत construction in 15 देशों.
In the US the licenses of almost हाफ इसके reactors have been extended to 60 years, and योजनाएँ to build another dozen हैं under serious consideration.
However, Japan 's 2011 फुकुशिमा Daiichi nuclear disaster prompted a rethink of nuclear उर्जा नीति in many देशों.
Germany decided to बंद all its reactors by 2022, and Italy has banned नाभिकीय power.
Following Fukushima, the International Energy Agency halved its अनुमान of additional nuclear generating capacity to be निर्मित by 2035.
Photograph of the Berlin Wall taken इससे the West side.
The Wall थी built in 1961 to prevent ईस्ट Germans from fleeing from Communism.
It was an iconic symbol of the ठंडा War and its fall in 1989 marked the end of the War.
The Cold War, often dated from 1947 to 1991, was a sustained राज्य of political and military tension between powers in the पश्चिमी bloc, वर्चस्व by the United States साथ NATO among इसके allies, and powers in the पूर्वी bloc, dominated by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw अनुबंध.
इस began after the कामयाबी of their temporary wartime alliance against Nazi जर्मनी, leaving the USSR and the US as two superpowers with profound economic and political मतभेद.
A neutral गुट arose with the Non-Aligned गति founded by Egypt, India, and Yugoslavia ; this faction rejected association with either the US-led वेस्ट or the Soviet-led ईस्ट.
The Cold War was so named because the दो प्रमुख powers—each possessing nuclear हथियार और thereby threatened with mutual assured destruction —never met in direct सैन्य कॉम्बैट.
Instead, in their struggle for वैश्विक influence वे engaged in जारी psychological warfare and in नियमित indirect confrontations through proxy युद्धों.
Cycles of relative शांत would be followed by high tension, which could have led to world war.
The tensest टाइम्स यहूद during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ), the कोरियाई War ( 1950–1953 ), the Suez Crisis ( 1956 ), the Berlin Crisis of 1961, the Cuban missile संकट ( 1962 ), the Vietnam War ( 1959–1975 ), the योम Kippur War ( 1973 ), the सोवियत war in अफगानिस्तान ( 1979–1989 ), the Soviet downing of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ), and the `` Able Archer '' नाटो military exercises ( 1983 ).
The conflict was expressed through military coalitions, strategic conventional force deployments, extensive aid to क्लाएंट states, espionage, massive propaganda campaigns, conventional and nuclear arms races, appeals to neutral nations, rivalry at sports events ( in particular the Olympics ), and technological competitions ऐसे as the Space Race.
the US and USSR became involved in political and military conflicts in the Third World countries of Latin अमेरिका, Africa, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia.
To alleviate the रिस्क of a potential nuclear war, both sides sought relief of राजनैतिक tensions through détente in the 1970s.
In the 1980s, the United States increased diplomatic, military, और economic pressures on the Soviet Union, at a time when the कम्युनिस्ट state was already suffering from economic stagnation.
In the mid-1980s, the new सोवियत President Mikhail Gorbachev introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` खुलेपन '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures for national independence grew stronger in Eastern यूरोपीय, especially कैंडल.
They reached a breaking पाइंट when Gorbachev refused to use Soviet सैनिकों to support the faltering government of East Germany in लेट 1989.
Within weeks all the उपग्रह states broke free इससे मास्को in a peaceful wave of revolutions ( there was some violence in Romania ).
the pressures escalated inside the Soviet संघ, where Communism fell और the USSR थी formally dissolved in लेट 1991.
The United States remained as the world 's तभी superpower.
The Cold War and इसके events have left a significant legacy, और it is often referred to in popular culture, especially in media featuring विषयवस्तु of espionage और the threat of नाभिकीय warfare.
pikes Peak State Park is a state पार्क of Iowa, USA, featuring a bluff overlooking the Upper Mississippi River विपरीत the संगम of the Wisconsin नदी.
The park is operated by the Iowa Department of Natural Resources.
It is nearly a thousand acres ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
the निकटतम city is McGregor, Iowa.
Iowa Highway 76 approximately defines its northern boundary.
It gets its name from the Iowa incarnation of Pikes शिखर, a particularly ऊँची point overlooking the gorge of the Upper मिसिसिपी, और like Pikes शिखर in Colorado, is named for Zebulon Pike.
वहीँ are hiking trails, campgrounds और RV facilities.
पहाड़ bikes are permitted in certain portions of the पार्क.
Aside from recreational विकास, the land in the park was never cleared और to a large extent remains as it was before the आगमन of white उपनिवेश.
It is भाग of a larger जटिल of parks, reserves and refuges which include Effigy Mounds National Monument, the various components of the Yellow नदी State Forest, the enormous अपर Mississippi River नेशनल Wildlife and Fish शरण and much छोटी, much less well known Driftless क्षेत्रफल National Wildlife Refuge.
The पूर्वोत्तर Iowa Legacy Trail System is undergoing विकास, and will connect elements of these sites.
zac Brown Band is an American country/folk band based in Atlanta, Georgia.
The lineup consists of Zac Brown ( lead vocals, guitar ), Jimmy De Martini ( fiddle, vocals ), John Driskell हॉपकिंस ( bass guitar, vocals ), Coy Bowles ( गिटार, keyboards ), क्रिस Fryar ( drums ), Clay Cook ( guitar, keyboards, mandolin, steel guitar, vocals ), and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ).
The band has toured throughout the United States, including a slot on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music पर्व.
They have भी recorded five studio albums, and charted नौ क्रमांक One singles on the Billboard country charts : `` Chicken fried ``, `` Toes ``, `` Highway 20 Ride ``, `` फ़्री ``, `` As She 's Walking Away ``, `` colder Weather ``, `` Knee गहन ``, `` Keep Me In Mind ``, and `` Goodbye in Her Eyes `` in addition to the singles `` whatever it Is `` and `` No Hurry ``, which peaked at number 2 on the same चार्ट.
Talk radio is a radio स्वरूप containing discussion about topical मुद्दे.
Most shows are regularly hosted by a single individual, और प्रायः feature interviews with a number of different guests.
बात radio typically includes an element of listener participation, usually by broadcasting live conversations between the मेजबान and listeners who `` कॉल in '' ( प्रायः via telephone ) to the show.
श्रोता contributions हैं usually screened by a show 's producer ( s ) in order to maximize audience interest and, in the case of commercial talk रेडियो, attract advertisers.
Generally, the shows are organized into segments, each separated by a pause for advertisements ; however, in पब्लिक or non-commercial radio, music is sometimes played in place of commercials to separate the program segments.
Variations of talk radio include conservative talk, hot talk, liberal talk and sports talk.
जबकि talk radio has historically been associated with AM/FM, starting around 2005 the technology for Internet-based talk-radio shows became cost effective in the form of podcasts.
अभी, it is possible लिये an individual to use a variety of services to host an internet-based talk-radio show without carriage by a traditional रेडियो स्टेशन.
In addition TV प्रोग्रामिंग इससे talk and न्यूज outlets such as BBC, CNN, Bloomberg and Fox are अभी प्रायः available expanding the world of talk radio further.
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed नहीं only on radios, but a wide variety of other devices and services including PCs using itunes, station directories ऐसे as Tunein, show directory स्मार्टफ़ोन with apps ऐसे as Stitcher.
Hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the परिवार Hippidae, containing the following species:
Hippa adactyla Fabricius, 1787
hippa admirabilis ( Thallwitz, 1892 )
Hippa alcimede ( De Man, 1902 )
hippa australis Hale, 1927
Hippa carcineutes Holthuis & Manning, 1970
hippa celaeno ( de Man, 1896 )
Hippa granulatus ( Borradaile, 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes ( Dana, 1852 )
Hippa indica haig, Murugan & बालकृष्णन Nair, 1986
Hippa marmorata ( Hombron & Jacquinot, 1846 )
hippa ovalis ( A. Milne-Edwards, 1862 )
Hippa picta ( heller, 1861 )
Hippa strigillata ( Stimpson, 1860 )
Hippa testudinaria ( herbst, 1791 )
Hippa truncatifrons ( miers, 1878 )
It is closely सम्बन्धित to the genus Emerita, and species have often महरूम transferred between the two genera.
Jakarta ( ), officially known as the Special पूंजी Region of जकार्ता ( ), is the capital और largest city of Indonesia.
Located on the northwest coast of जावा, Jakarta is the country 's economic, cultural and political केन्द्र, and with a जनसांख्यिकी of 10,187,595 as of नवम्बर 2011, it is the most populous city in Indonesia और in Southeast Asia, and is the thirteenth most populated city in the world.
The official metropolitan area, known as Jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining the initial syllables of Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang and Bekasi ), is the दूसरी largest in the world, yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it.
Jakarta is सूचीबद्ध as a global city in the 2008 Globalization and World Cities Study Group और Network ( GaWC ) शोध.
and रै an area of.
इस area has population of well over 28 million, making it one of the world 's largest conurbations in terms of number of inhabitants.
In 2011, Jakarta ranked 17th among the संसार 's 200 largest शहरों, a jump from its 2007 ranking of 171.
Jakarta has grown अधिक rapidly than Kuala lumpur, Beijing and Bangkok.
Established in the चौथी century, the city became an important trading port for the किंगडम of Sunda.
It was the de facto पूंजी of the Dutch East Indies ( जब it was known as Batavia ) and has जारी as the पूंजी of Indonesia since the देश 's independence was declared in 1945.
The city is the seat of the ASEAN सचिवालय.
Jakarta is served by the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport, हलीम Perdanakusuma अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, and Tanjung Priok harbour ; it is connected by several intercity and commuter railways, and परोसा by several bus lines running on reserved busways.
A typical घर air कंडीशनिंग window unit.
Air conditioning is the process of altering the properties of एयर ( primarily temperature और humidity ) to more favourable conditions.
More generally, air conditioning can refer to कोई form of technological cooling, heating, ventilation, or disinfection that modifies the condition of air.
An एयर conditioner ( प्रायः referred to as air con, AC or A/C, and not to be confused with the abbreviation for alternating current ) is a major or home appliance, system, or mechanism designed to change the air temperature and humidity within an क्षेत्रफल ( प्रयुक्त for cooling and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ).
The cooling is typically done using a simple refrigeration cycle, but sometimes वाष्पीकरण is used, commonly for comfort cooling in buildings and motor वाहनों.
In construction, a पूरा प्रणाली of हीटिंग, ventilation and air conditioning is referred to as `` HVAC ``.
`` 6 Foot 7 पैर '' ( also styled as `` 6'7 '' ) is a song by American rapper Lil Wayne featuring लेबल mate, Cory Gunz.

DC बात ( styled as dc Talk ), is a Grammy -winning Christian rap trio.
The समूह was formed in Lynchburg, Virginia in 1987 by Toby mckeehan, Michael Tait, and Kevin Max Smith.
They have released पाँच major studio albums together : DC Talk ( 1989 ), Nu Thang ( 1990 ), Free at Last ( 1992 ), Jesus Freak ( 1995 ), and अलौकिक ( 1998 ).
In 2002, the Encyclopedia of Contemporary Christian Music called DC Talk `` the सबसे popular overtly ईसाई act of all time. ''
in 2000, the group released an EP titled Solo which contained two solo songs इससे each सदस्य.
चूंकि that time, DC Talk has been on an indefinite hiatus, and the तीन band सदस्यों have each led सोलो careers.
They have performed and recorded individual songs together अनेक times during the 2000s, although the group never officially reunited or disbanded.
The समूह 's musical style विकसित significantly throughout उनके career.
Their पहला दो रिलीज, dc Talk and nu Thang, were of the hip hop genre.
DC Talk 's third album, फ़्री at पिछला, also मुख्यतः took influence from the hip hop style, although their म्यूज़िक began taking on a rock sound.
the trio 's last two albums, Jesus freak and अलौकिक, यहूद predominantly pop चट्टान.
The Bible is a compilation of many shorter books written at different times and later assembled into the biblical canon.
सब but the shortest of these किताबे have been divided into chapters, generally a page or so in length, चूंकि the early 13th century.
Since the mid-16th century, प्रत्येक chapter has been further divided into `` आयतें '' of a few छोटी लाइनों or sentences.
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one verse, as in the case of, and sometimes वहीँ is more than one sentence in a single verse, as in the case of.
As the chapter and verse divisions were not part of the original texts, they form part of the paratext of the बाइबल.
The यहूदी विभाजन of the यहूदी text differ at various points from those used by Christians.
For instance, in Jewish tradition, the ascriptions to many Psalms are regarded as independent verses, बनाना 116 more verses, whereas the established Christian practice is to count and number each psalm ascription together with the first श्लोक following it.
कुछ chapter divisions भी occur in different places, e.g. in Hebrew Bibles is numbered as in Christian translations.
An अनुक्रमणिका ( बहुवचन : indexes ) is a list of शब्द or phrases ( 'headings ' ) and associated pointers ( 'लोकेटरs ' ) to where useful material relating to that heading can be found in a document.
In a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings होगा शामिल names of लोगों, places and events, और concepts selected by a person as being relevant और of interest to a possible reader of the किताब.
The संकेतक are typically page numbers, अनुच्छेद numbers or खण्ड numbers.
in a library catalog the words are authors, titles, विषय headings, etc., और the संकेतक are call संख्याएँ.
Internet search engines, such as Google, और full text searching help provide access to information but are not as selective as an index, as they provide non-relevant links, और may miss relevant information if it is नहीं phrased in exactly the way वे expect.
In United राज्य वित्तीय विनियमन, a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a रपट made by a financial संस्था to the वित्तीय Crimes Enforcement संजाल ( FinCEN ), an agency of the United States विभाग of the राजकोष, regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious activity.
Facebook on the Ad-tech 2010
फेसबुक is an ऑनलाइन social networking service, whose name stems from the colloquial name लिये the book given to students at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help विद्यार्थी get to know प्रत्येक other.
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with उसके कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and क्रिस Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the founders to Harvard students, but was expanded to other कॉलेजों in the बोस्टन area, the Ivy League, and Stanford University.
It gradually added support for विद्यार्थी at various अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों before opening to ऊँची school students, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook now allows any users जो declare themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो old to become registered users of the site.
उपयोक्ता must register before using the साईट, after जिससे वे may create a personal प्रोफ़ाइल, add other users as friends, and exchange messages, including automatic notifications when they update उनके प्रोफ़ाइल.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by workplace, school or college, or other characteristics, and categorize their friends into सूचियाँ such as `` लोगों From Work '' or `` बंद Friends ''.
As of September 2012, Facebook has over one billion active users.
according to a May 2011 Consumer रिपोर्ट्स survey, there are 7.5 million children under 13 with accounts and 5 million under 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
In May 2005, Accel साझेदार invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook, and Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot.
A जनवरी 2009 compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most used सोशल networking service by worldwide मासिक active उपयोक्ता.
entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' सूची, saying, `` How on earth did we stalk our exes, याद our co-workers ' birthdays, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics, ऐसे as फेसबुक Detox, state that Facebook रै turned into a नेशनल obsession in the United States, resulting in vast amounts of समय lost and encouraging आत्ममोह.
quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million monthly unique u.S. विज़िटर in May 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the U.S. population had a फेसबुक account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's मार्केट growth started to stall in some regions, with the site losing 7 million active users in the United राज्य and Canada in May 2011.
Facebook eventually दायर for an initial पब्लिक offering on February 1, 2012, and थी headquartered in Menlo पार्क, California.
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the पब्लिक and trading on the NASDAQ on May 18, 2012.
Sulfonamide functional group
Hydrochlorothiazide is a sulfonamide and a thiazide.
Furosemide is a sulfonamide, but not a thiazide.
Sulfonamide or sulphonamide is the basis of several groups of दवाएँ.
The original जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides ( sometimes called sulfa drugs or sulpha drugs ) are synthetic antimicrobial एजेंटों that contain the sulfonamide group.
कुछ sulfonamides are also devoid of antibacterial activity, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
The sulfonylureas और thiazide diuretics हैं newer ड्रग groups based on the antibacterial sulfonamides.
Sulfa allergies हैं common, hence medications containing sulfonamides are prescribed carefully.
It is important to make a distinction between sulfa drugs and other sulfur-containing दवाएँ and additives, such as sulfates and sulfites, which are chemically unrelated to the sulfonamide group, और do not cause the same hypersensitivity reactions seen in the sulfonamides.

30 सेकेंड to Mars is an American चट्टान band from Los Angeles, formed in 1998.
Since 2007, the band रै consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals, rhythm guitar, songwriter ), शैनन Leto ( drums, percussion ) and Tomo Miličević ( सीसे guitar, keyboards ).

Previously, the group भी प्रदर्शित guitarists Solon Bixler ( अभी of Great Northern ) and Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss ).
To date, 30 सेकेंड to Mars have released तीन studio albums – 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2002 ), A Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ), This Is War ( 2009 ) and three extended plays – AOL Sessions अंडरकवर ( 2007 ), To the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ), and MTV unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ).
30 Seconds to मंगल ' music has महरूम associated mostly with neo-prog, progressive metal and post-grunge, लकिन they have also शामिल emo, screamo, space rock and synthrock into their music.
They have been compared to Pink Floyd ( who were an influence on their work ) and Tool because of their उपयोग of philosophical और spiritual lyrics, concept albums and their उपयोग of experimental म्यूज़िक.
A क्रिसमस Story is a 1983 American Christmas कॉमेडी film आधारित on the short stories and semi-fictional उपाख्यानों of author and raconteur Jean Shepherd, based on his book In God We Trust, सब Others अदा Cash, साथ some elements निकला from Wanda Hickey 's Night of सुनहरी Memories.

The New York Passenger Ship Terminal ( also ज्ञात as the Luxury Liner Row or मैनहटन Cruise टर्मिनल or New York Cruise Terminal ) is a टर्मिनल for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side.
The terminal consists of North नदी Piers 88, 90, 92 and 94 on the हडसन River between वेस्ट 46th and West 54th Street.
( As a general rule, pier numbers in Manhattan can be determined by adding 40 to the corresponding cross-street. )
Ships now dock at Piers 88, 90 और 92.
Pier 94 on the north side is now used for exhibition space.
बांध 86, once used by United States Lines, is now घर to the USS Intrepid.
in 2003, the terminal संभाला 900,000 passengers.
The नगर is forecasting that 1.5 million will use the terminal by 2017.
The piers are long and apart.
वे were first समाप्त in 1935 to replace the Chelsea Piers as the city 's luxury liner terminal.
The new terminal was built to हैंडल bigger ships that had outgrown the Chelsea Piers.
The piers were renovated in 1970 and are फिलहाल undergoing another $ 150 million renovation.
The renovated plans कॉल for it to handle three large ships at a time.
In doing renovations, the city is भी considering decommissioning Pier 92.
Logo of the New York Cruise terminal.for
decades the टर्मिनल was the only ocean-going यात्री terminal in New York हार्बर.
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's ability to हैंडल comfortably तभी three विशाल ships at a time, two new terminals have opened in the हार्बर — the Cape Liberty Cruise बंदरगाहों opened in 2004 in bayonne, New Jersey ( प्रयुक्त by Royal Caribbean Cruise Line, Celebrity क्रूज़ और Azamara Cruises ), and the Brooklyn Cruise टर्मिनल ( used by the Queen मरियम 2 and other जहाजों of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn, New York.
The West Side Highway takes a small jog east from the piers to below वेस्ट 42nd Street because when the टर्मिनल was built land had to be लिया away from Manhattan to allow for longer पियर.
The US Army corps of Engineers, who control the waterfront dimension, would not extend the pierhead line farther into the river, so the city extended the pier by cutting away at the land.
The city earlier किया this for the चेल्सी Piers ; however in Chelsea तभी landfill was taken away.
At the Passenger Terminal actual Manhattan schist थी लिया away.
From downstream in the river
Many major passenger ships have docked वहीँ, सहित the rms महारानी Mary 2 and Freedom of the Seas, before the Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals opened.
The ss Normandie caught fire और subsequently capsized at its Pier 88 berth दौरान World युद्ध II.
The Normandie, renamed uss Lafayette, झूठ capsized in the frozen mud at Pier 88 in the शीत of 1942
Norwegian Cruise Line 's soon to be नवीनतम ship the Norwegian Breakaway will sail year-round out of the New York Passenger Ship Terminal.
The city will spend $ 4 लाख to renovate and upgrade the cruise terminal to accommodate the ship.

Christian right is a term used in the United States to describe right-wing Christian political groups that हैं characterized by their strong support of socially conservative policies.
Christian conservatives प्रधानतया seek to apply their understanding of the शिक्षाओं of Christianity to politics and public policy by proclaiming the value of those teachings and/or by seeking to use those teachings to influence law and public policy.
in the U.S., the Christian सही is an informal coalition formed around a core of धर्मान्तरण Protestants that draws `` support from politically conservative Catholics, Jews, Mormons, and occasionally secularists '' who share उनके goals.
The गति has its roots in American राजनीती going back as far the 1940s and has been especially influential since the 1970s.
Their influence draws, in part, from grassroots activism as खूब as their focus on social issues और क्षमता to motivate the electorate around those issues.
The Christian right is notable आज for advancing socially conservative स्थितियाँ on issues including school prayer, stem cell शोध, homosexuality, contraception, abortion, और pornography.
Although the Christian right is usually associated with the U.S., the गति has been a key factor in the politics of Canada, the नीदरलैंड्स, Northern आयरलैंड and Australia, among others.
Far East गति ( stylized as Far★East गति or abbreviated FM ) is an अमरीकी hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles.
The group formed in 2003 और consists of Kev Nish ( Kevin Nishimura ), prohgress ( James Roh ), J-Splif ( Jae Choung ), and dj Virman ( Virman Coquia ).
Far East Movement 's first claim to कीर्ति was their song `` Round Round '' featured in the हॉलीवुड movie, The तेज़ और the Furious : Tokyo Drift, and its subsequent soundtrack, video खेल and DVD.
Since `` Round Round '', the group रै महरूम featured on विभिन्न network shows including,, Entourage, गपशप Girl, and Finishing the खेल ( a featured film at Sundance 2007 ).
Their single `` Like a g6 `` hit number एक on the Billboard hot 100 चार्ट and on iTunes as well in लेट October 2010.
Far East Movement also रै the भेद of being the first asian-american group to earn a # 1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100 in the संयुक्त States.
lr44 is the IEC designation for an alkaline 1.5 volt बटन कोशिका, commonly used in छोटी LED flashlights, डिजिटल thermometers, calculators, calipers, watches, clocks, toys and laser pointers.
LR44 alkaline cell
The battery nomenclature is defined by the International Electrotechnical आयोग ( IEC ) in इसके 60086-3 standard ( Primary batteries, part 3 Watch batteries ).
The letter L indicates the electrochemical system used ; a zinc negative electrode, manganese dioxide depolarizer and positive electrode, and an alkaline electrolyte.
R44 indicates a round cell 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and 5.2±0.2 mm height as पारिभाषित by the IEC standard 60086.
Manufacturers have their own part संख्याएँ लिये IEC प्रकार LR44 batteries including:
LR44, LR44G, LR44GD, lr44h
LR1154, L1154, L1154C, L1154F, L1154G, L1154H
6135-99-792-8475 ( NSN )
1166A
AG13, A613, AG14, ag-14, G13A, g13-a
157, 303, 357
A76, GDA76, GP76A, GPA7, GPA75, gpa76, GPS76A,
1128mp, 208-904, A-76, CA18, CA19, CR44, D76A, KA, ka76, MS76H, px76a, PX675A, rpx675, RW82, SB-F9, V13GA
4.5-volt, D, C, aa, aaa, AAAA, A23, 9-volt, CR2032 and LR44 batteries
Other types of batteries are or were made in the R44 size.
Formerly, पारा batteries यहूद made as button cells ( types MR44 and NR44 ).
zinc-air batteries प्रकार PR44 require air to work.
silver-oxide batteries प्रकार SR44 may provide extra capacity compared to LR44 types but have slightly different voltage characteristics.
Performance of a device meant to use a silver-oxide बैटरी may be degraded with substitution of LR44 types.
Manufacturer 's numbers for silver oxide R44 आकार cells include:
SR44/SR44W/SR44SW
6135-99-651-3240 ( NSN )
SR1154
