1131SOP
sg13
S76
EPX76 ( Energizer )
303/357 ( D357H )
hurricane Katrina was the deadliest and most destructive Atlantic hurricane of the 2005 Atlantic hurricane season.
It was the costliest प्राकृतिक disaster, as खूब as एक of the five deadliest hurricanes, in the history of the United राज्य.
among recorded अटलांटिक hurricanes, it was the sixth strongest overall.
At least 1,833 people died in the hurricane and subsequent floods, making it the deadliest U.S. hurricane since the 1928 Okeechobee hurricane ; total प्रॉपर्टी damage was अनुमानित at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ), nearly triple the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992.
Hurricane Katrina formed over the बहामा on August 23, 2005 और crossed southern Florida as a moderate श्रेणी 1 hurricane, causing some deaths and flooding there before strengthening rapidly in the Gulf of Mexico.
The hurricane strengthened to a Category 5 hurricane over the warm Gulf water, but weakened before making its second landfall as a Category 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday, August 29 in southeast Louisiana.
It caused severe destruction along the Gulf coast इससे central फ्लोरिडा to Texas, much of it due to the storm surge.
the most significant number of deaths occurred in New Orleans, louisiana, which flooded as the levee system catastrophically failed, in many cases घंटों after the तूफ़ान had moved inland.
Eventually 80 % of the city and large tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, and the floodwaters lingered for weeks.
However, the worst property क्षति occurred in coastal क्षेत्रों, such as all मिसिसिपी beachfront कस्बों, which were flooded over 90 % in hours, as boats and casino barges rammed buildings, pushing गाड़ियाँ and houses inland, with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) इससे the beach.
The hurricane surge सुरक्षा असफलताओं in नई Orleans are माना the worst civil engineering विपत्ति in U.S. history और prompted a lawsuit against the U.S. फौज Corps of Engineers ( USACE ), the designers और builders of the levee प्रणाली as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965.
Responsibility for the failures और flooding was laid squarely on the Army Corps in January 2008 by Judge stanwood Duval, U.S. ज़िला अदालत, but the federal agency could not be held financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928.
There was भी an investigation of the प्रतिक्रियाएँ from federal, state and लोकल governments, resulting in the इस्तीफा of Federal Emergency Management Agency ( FEMA ) director Michael D. Brown, and of नई Orleans Police विभाग ( NOPD ) Superintendent Eddie कम्पास.
अनेक agencies सहित the संयुक्त States Coast Guard ( USCG ), National Hurricane Center ( NHC ), और National Weather Service ( NWS ) यहूद commended for their actions.
They provided accurate hurricane मौसम tracking forecasts with sufficient lead time.
भी the most insistent appeals from national, state and local public officials to residents to evacuate before the तूफ़ान did not warn कि the levees could उल्लंघन और असफल.
U.S. debt इससे 1940 to 2011.
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the public '' and black lines indicate the total नेशनल debt or gross public debt.
The difference is the `` intragovernmental debt, '' which includes obligations to सरकारी programs ऐसे as सोशल Security.
Stated as a formula, National Debt = Debt held by the Public + Intragovernmental Debt.
The second फलक shows the दो debt आंकड़े as a percentage of U.S. GDP ( डालर value of U.S. economic production for कि साल ).
The top panel is deflated so every year is in 2010 dollars.
The United States पब्लिक debt is the money उधार by the federal government of the United States through the issuing of securities by the Treasury और other संघीय government एजेंसियों.
US public debt consists of two components:
Debt आयोजित by the public includes Treasury securities आयोजित by investors outside the संघीय government, सहित कि held by individuals, corporations, the Federal Reserve प्रणाली and foreign, राज्य and local सरकारें.
कर्ज़ held by government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury securities held in accounts administered by the federal सरकारी that are owed to program beneficiaries, such as the सोशल Security विश्वास Fund.
Debt held by सरकारी खाते represents the cumulative surpluses, including ब्याज earnings, of ये खाते that have been invested in Treasury securities.
Public debt increases or decreases as a result of the annual unified budget deficit or surplus.
The federal सरकारी budget deficit or surplus is the difference between government रसीदें and spending, ignoring intra-governmental हस्तांतरण.
However, some spending कि is excluded from the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds to the debt.
Historically, the US public debt as a share of GDP increased during wars and recessions, and subsequently declined.
For example, debt held by the public as a share of GDP peaked बस बाद World War II ( 113 % of GDP in 1945 ), but then fell over the following 30 years.
In recent दशकों, however, large budget deficits and the resulting increases in debt have led to concern about the long-term sustainability of the संघीय सरकारी 's fiscal नीतियों.
On 2 April 2013, कर्ज़ held by the पब्लिक was approximately $ 11.959 trillion or about 75 % of GDP.
Intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 trillion, giving a combined total public debt of $ 16.805 trillion.
As of January 2013, $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47 % of the debt held by the पब्लिक was owned by foreign investors, the largest of जिससे were the People 's Republic of चीन and Japan at just over $ 1.1 trillion each.
In basketball, an assist is attributed to a player who गुजरता the ball to a teammate in a way that लीड to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was `` assisting '' in the basket.
There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
An assist can be scored for the passer even if the player who receives the pass makes a basket after dribbling the ball.
however, the original definition of an assist did not include such परिस्थितियों, so the comparison of assist statistics across eras is a complex matter.
तभी the pass directly before the score may be गिने as an assist, so no more than one assist can be अंकित per field goal ( unlike in other sports, such as बर्फ hockey ).
A pass that leads to a shooting बेईमानी and scoring by free throws करता not count as an assist in the NBA, लकिन does in fiba play ( only एक assist is awarded per set of free throws in which at least one free throw is made ).
Point guards tend to get the most assists per game ( apg ), as their भूमिका is primarily that of a passer and ballhandler.
Centers tend to मिलेंगी fewer assists, but centers with good floor presence and court vision can dominate a team by assisting.
होने inside the key, the बीच often has the best angles and the बेहतरीन स्थिति for `` dishes '' और other short passes in the scoring क्षेत्रफल.
Center Wilt Chamberlain led the NBA in assists in 1968.
A strong बीच with inside-scoring prowess, such as former NBA center Hakeem Olajuwon, can भी be an effective assistor क्युकी the defense 's double-teaming tends to open up ठोकर in the form of shooters.
the NBA single-game assist रिकार्ड is 30, held by Scott Skiles of the Orlando जादू against the Denver Nuggets, on December 30, 1990.
The NBA record for most career assists is held by जॉन Stockton with 15,806.
the mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK, when discussing property taxes in the संयुक्त States, or previously in Cyprus and Malta ) is a now-abstract unit of currency used sometimes in accounting.
In the United States, it is a notional unit equivalent to of a United राज्य डालर ( a tenth of a cent ).
In the United किंगडम it was proposed during the decades of चर्चा on the decimalization of the pound as a division of the pound sterling.
अनेक अन्य मुद्राएँ used the mill, such as the maltese lira.
The पद comes from the Latin `` millesimum '', meaning `` thousandth part ''.
the Greco-Persian Wars ( also often पुकारा the Persian युद्धों ) यहूद a series of conflicts between the Achaemenid Empire of Persia and city-states of the Hellenic world that प्रारंभ in 499 bc and lasted जबतक 449 BC.
The collision between the fractious political world of the Greeks और the enormous साम्राज्य of the Persians began when सायरस the Great conquered Ionia in 547 bc.
Struggling to rule the independent-minded cities of Ionia, the Persians appointed उत्पीड़क to rule each of उन्हें.
This would prove to be the source of much trouble for the Greeks and Persians alike.
In 499 BC, the then tyrant of Miletus, Aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to conquer the island of naxos, with Persian support ; however, the expedition was a क़हर and, pre-empting his dismissal, Aristagoras incited all of Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians.
This was the beginning of the Ionian Revolt, जिससे would last until 493 bc, progressively drawing more regions of एशिया Minor into the विरोध.
aristagoras secured military support from Athens and Eretria, और in 498 BC these forces helped to capture और burn the Persian क्षेत्रीय capital of sardis.
The Persian king Darius the Great vowed to have revenge on Athens और Eretria for this act.
The revolt continued, with the दो sides effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC.
In 494 BC, the Persians regrouped, and attacked the epicentre of the revolt in Miletus.
At the Battle of Lade, the ionians suffered a निर्णायक शिकस्त, and the rebellion collapsed, with the final members being stamped out the following year.
seeking to secure his empire from further revolts and from the interference of the मेनलैंड Greeks, दारा embarked on a scheme to जीतें Greece और to सजा Athens and eretria for burning Sardis.
The first Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 bc, with the Persian सामान्य mardonius conquering thrace and macedon before several mishaps forced an early end to the campaign.
In 490 BC a second force was sent to यूनानियों, this time across the Aegean Sea, under the command of Datis and artaphernes.
This expedition subjugated the Cyclades, before besieging, capturing और razing Eretria.
However, while en route to attack एथेंस, the Persian force was decisively defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of Marathon, ending Persian efforts for the time being.
Darius तब began to plan to complete the conquest of यूनानियों, but died in 486 BC और responsibility for the conquest passed to his बेटे xerxes I.
In 480 BC, xerxes personally led the second Persian आक्रमण of Greece साथ one of the largest ancient armies ever assembled.
Victory over the 'Allied ' यूनानी states ( led by Sparta and एथेंस ) at the Battle of Thermopylae allowed the Persians to torch Athens and overrun most of Greece.
however, while seeking to destroy the combined Greek fleet, the Persians suffered a severe defeat at the Battle of Salamis.
the following साल, the confederated Greeks went on the अप्रिय, defeating the Persian army at the Battle of Plataea, और समाप्ति the invasion of यूनानियों.
The allied Greeks followed up उनके success by destroying the rest of the Persian fleet at the Battle of Mycale, before expelling Persian garrisons from sestos ( 479 BC ) और Byzantium ( 478 BC ).
The actions of the सामान्य Pausanias at the siege of Byzantium alienated many of the Greek states from the spartans, and the anti-Persian alliance was therefore reconstituted around Athenian leadership, as the so-called Delian League.
The Delian लीग continued to campaign against फारस for the next three decades, beginning with the expulsion of the remaining Persian garrisons इससे Europe.
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in 466 BC, the League won a double victory that finally secured freedom लिये the cities of Ionia.
However, the League 's involvement in an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 BC ) resulted in a disastrous defeat, और further campaigning was suspended.
A fleet was sent to Cyprus in 451 BC, लकिन achieved छोटी, and when it withdrew the Greco-Persian Wars drew to a quiet end.
Some ऐतिहासिक sources सुझाएँ the समाप्त of hostilities was marked by a peace treaty between एथेंस and Persia, the so-called Peace of Callias.
hooverville near Portland, Oregon
a `` Hooverville '' is the popular name लिये shanty towns built by homeless people दौरान the Great Depression.
वे were named after Herbert हूवर, who थी President of the संयुक्त राज्य during the onset of the Depression and widely blamed for it.
The term was coined by Charles Michelson, publicity chief of the Democratic National Committee.
Matthew Michael hasselbeck ( born September 25, 1975 ) is an American football quarterback for the Indianapolis Colts of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was drafted in the sixth round of the 1998 NFL ड्राफ्ट by the Green Bay Packers.
After a season on the अभ्यास squad और दो seasons backing up Brett Favre, he was traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001.
hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003, and led Seattle to six playoff appearances and a Super Bowl appearance ; he was selected to three Pro प्याले and an All-Pro selection.
Following ten सीज़न साथ the सीहॉक्स, hasselbeck joined the Tennessee Titans in 2011.
Hasselbeck then signed a contract with the Indianapolis Colts in 2013 less than 24 hours after being released by the Tennessee Titans.
ICT is inevitably related to the कंप्यूटर network.
Information and संचार Technology or ( ICT ), is often used as an विस्तारित synonym for सूचना technology ( IT ), but is a more specific term that stresses the भूमिका of एकीकृत communications and the संयोजन of telecommunications ( telephone lines and बेतार signals ), computers as खूब as necessary enterprise software, middleware, storage, and audio-visual systems, which enable उपयोक्ता to अभिगम, स्टोर, transmit, and manipulate सूचना.
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s, but it became popular after it थी प्रयुक्त in a report to the uk government by Dennis Stevenson in 1997 and in the संशोधित नेशनल curriculum for England, Wales and Northern Ireland in 2000.
The term आईसीटी is now also used to refer to the convergence of audio-visual और टेलीफोन networks with computer संजाल through a single cabling or link प्रणाली.
There are large economic प्रोत्साहन ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the टेलीफोन network ) to merge the audio-visual, भवन management and telephone network with the computer network system using a single unified system of cabling, signal distribution and प्रबन्धन.
the term Infocommunications is used in some मामले as a shorter form of information और communication ( s ) technology.
In fact Infocommunications is the expansion of दूरसंचार साथ information processing and content हैंडलिंग functions on a common digital प्रौद्योगिकी आधार.
For a comparison of these and अन्य terms, देखिए.
लिये ICT Development अनुक्रमणिका around the world, see.

A schematic presentation of the plum pudding model of the atom ; in Thomson 's mathematical मॉडल the `` corpuscles '' ( or modern electrons ) were arranged non-randomly, in rotating rings
The current model of the sub-atomic structure involves a dense nucleus surrounded by a probabilistic `` बादल '' of electrons
The plum pudding model of the atom by J. J. Thomson, जो discovered the इलेक्ट्रॉन in 1897, was प्रस्तावित in 1904 before the discovery of the atomic केंद्रक in order to add the electron to the atomic model.
In this मॉडल, the atom is composed of electrons ( which Thomson still called `` corpuscles '', though G. J. stoney had प्रस्तावित कि atoms of electricity be पुकारा electrons in 1894 ) surrounded by a soup of positive चार्ज to balance the electrons ' negative charges, like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding ``.
The electrons ( as we know them today ) were thought to be positioned throughout the atom, but with many structures संभावित for positioning multiple electrons, particularly rotating rings of electrons ( see below ).
Instead of a soup, the atom was भी sometimes said to have had a `` cloud '' of positive charge.
With this model, Thomson abandoned उसके earlier `` nebular atom '' परिकल्पना in which the अणु was composed of immaterial vortices.
अभी, at least part of the atom was to be रचित of thomson 's particulate negative corpuscles, although the rest of the positively charged part of the अणु remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined.
The 1904 Thomson model was disproved by the 1909 gold foil experiment of Hans Geiger and Ernest Marsden.
This थी interpreted by Ernest रदरफोर्ड in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom containing a very high धनात्मक चार्ज ( in the case of gold, पर्याप्त to balance about 100 electrons ), यूँ leading to the Rutherford model of the atom.
हालांकि gold has an atomic क्रमांक of 79, immediately after Rutherford 's paper appeared in 1911 Antonius Van डेन Broek बना the सहज suggestion that atomic number is nuclear चार्ज.
The पदार्थ required प्रयोग to decide.
हेनरी Moseley 's work showed experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley 's law ) that the प्रभावी nuclear चार्ज थी very बंद to the atomic number ( Moseley found तभी one unit difference ), and Moseley referenced only the papers of Van den Broek and Rutherford.
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) Bohr model of the atom in the वही year, in which a nucleus containing an atomic क्रमांक of positive चार्ज is surrounded by an equal number of electrons in orbital शेल.
Bohr had also प्रेरित Moseley 's work.
Thomson 's model was compared ( though नहीं by thomson ) to a अंग्रेजों dessert called plum खीर, hence the नाम.
thomson 's paper was published in the कूच 1904 edition of the philosophical Magazine, the leading अंग्रेजों science journal of the दिन.
In Thomson 's view :... the atoms of the elements consist of a number of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a sphere of uniform positive electrification,...
In this model, the electrons were free to घूर्णन within the blob or cloud of positive substance.
ये orbits were stabilized in the model by the फैक्ट कि when an इलेक्ट्रॉन moved दूर from the center of the धनात्मक cloud, it felt a larger net positive inward force, because वहीँ was more material of opposite charge, inside its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ).
In Thomson 's मॉडल, electrons were फ़्री to rotate in rings which were further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, and spectra were to be accounted for by energy differences of different ring orbits.
Thomson attempted to मेक his model खाता for कुछ of the प्रमुख spectral लाइनों known for कुछ तत्व, but was not notably successful at this.
Still, Thomson 's model ( साथ साथ a समान Saturnian रिंग model for atomic electrons, also put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka बाद James Clerk Maxwell 's model of Saturn 's rings ), were earlier harbingers of the बाद and अधिक successful solar-system-like bohr model of the अणु.
Typical strip of बेकन.
बेकन is a cured meat prepared from a सुअर.
It is first cured using large quantities of salt, either in a brine or in a शुष्क packing ; the result is भैस bacon ( also ज्ञात as green bacon ).
Fresh bacon may then be further dried for weeks or months in cold एयर, or it may be boiled or smoked.
भैस and dried बेकन is typically cooked before eating.
Boiled bacon is ready to eat, as is some smoked bacon, but may be cooked further before खाने.
Bacon is prepared from several अलग कटौती of meat.
It is प्रायः made from side और back cuts of pork, मगर in the United States, where it is almost always prepared from pork belly ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` fatty '', or `` American style '' outside of the US and Canada ).
the side cut has अधिक meat and less fat than the belly.
Bacon may be prepared from either of two distinct back cuts : fatback, which is almost pure fat, and pork loin, which is very lean.
bacon-cured pork loin is known as back बेकन.
Uncooked pork belly bacon strips.
Bacon may be eaten smoked, boiled, fried, baked, or ग्रील्ड, or used as a minor ingredient to flavor dishes.
Bacon is also used for barding and larding roasts, विशेषकर खेल, e.g. venison, pheasant.
The शब्द is derived from the Old High German bacho, meaning `` buttock '', `` ham '' or `` side of bacon '', and cognate with the Old French bacon.
In continental Europe, this भाग of the सुअर is usually not smoked like bacon is in the संयुक्त States ; it is used primarily in cubes ( lardons ) as a cooking ingredient, valued both as a source of fat and for its flavor.
in Italy, this is called pancetta and is usually पकाया in small cubes or served uncooked और thinly sliced as part of an antipasto.
मांस from other पशु, such as beef, मेमने, मुर्गा, goat, or तुर्कों, may also be cut, cured, or वरना prepared to resemble bacon, and may even be referred to as `` bacon ''.
Such use is common in areas with significant Jewish and Muslim populations.
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured belly of a swine carcass '' ; other cuts and characteristics must be separately योग्य ( e.g., `` smoked पोर्क loin bacon '' ).
For सुरक्षा, bacon must be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by Trichinella, a parasitic roundworm which can be destroyed by heating, जमने, drying, or smoking.
Bacon is distinguished from नमक pork and ham by differences in the brine ( or शुष्क packing ).
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients, most notably sodium नाइट्राइट, और occasionally sodium nitrate or potassium nitrate ( साल्टपीटर ) ; sodium ascorbate or erythorbate are added to accelerate curing and stabilize color.
flavorings such as brown sugar or maple हैं used for some products.
If used, सोडियम polyphosphates are added to improve sliceability and reduce spattering when the बेकन is pan fried.
Today, a brine for ham, लकिन not bacon, शामिल a विशाल amount of शुगर.
Historically, `` हैम '' and `` bacon '' referred to अलग cuts of मांस that were brined or packed identically, often together in the same barrel.
The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 ( erisa ) (, codified in part at ) is a federal law which establishes minimum standards for pension plans in private industry और provides लिये extensive rules on the federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans.
ERISA was enacted to protect the interests of employee benefit plan participants and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring the disclosure of financial and other सूचना concerning the योजना to beneficiaries ;
Establishing standards of conduct for plan fiduciaries ;
providing for appropriate remedies and अभिगम to the federal courts.
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full body of laws regulating employee लाभ plans, जिससे are found mainly in the Internal Revenue Code and ERISA itself.
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA is divided among the विभाग of Labor, the Department of the Treasury ( particularly the आतंरिक Revenue Service ), and the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation.
Illegal immigration to the United States is the अधिनियम of foreign nationals entering the United States, without सरकारी permission and in violation of United States nationality law, or staying beyond the termination date of a visa, also in violation of the law.
A चेतावनी sign at the international boundary between the United States and Canada in पाइंट Roberts, Washington.
A much different approach at the u.s.-mexico border near El पासो, Texas
The undocumented immigrant population of the संयुक्त States in 2008 थी अनुमानित by the Center for Immigration Studies to be about 11 million people, down from 12.5 million people in 2007.
Other estimates range इससे 7 to 20 million.
According to a 2005 Pew Hispanic बीच report, 56 % of undocumented immigrants were from Mexico ; 22 % were from other Latin American countries ; 13 % were from Asia ; 6 % were from Europe और Canada ; and 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world.
Alvin Independent School District is a school ज़िला based in Alvin, Texas ( USA ).
एल्विन ISD is a large suburban school district दक्षिण of Houston in the communities of Alvin, Manvel, Pearland, Hillcrest, Rosharon, Iowa Colony, लिवरपूल, and Amsterdam.
AISD serves Pearland city 's rapidly growing पश्चिमी portion of the city including the new large master-planned communities of Shadow Creek ranch, South Fork, and Southern Trails.
Alvin ISD covers of land.
In इंसान anatomy, the ulnar nerve is a nerve जिससे रनों near the ulna bone.
The ulnar collateral ligament of elbow संयुक्त is in relation with the ulnar nerve.
the nerve is the largest unprotected nerve in the इंसान body ( meaning unprotected by मांसपेशी or अस्थि ), so injury is आम.
इस nerve is सीधे कनेक्ट to the little finger, and the adjacent half of the ring finger, supplying the palmar side of these fingers, including both front और वापस of the tips, perhaps as far वापस as the fingernail beds.
एक method of injuring the nerve is to strike the medial epicondyle of the humerus from posteriorly, or inferiorly with the elbow flexed.
The ulnar nerve is trapped between the bone and the overlying skin at इस पाइंट.
This is commonly referred to as bumping one 's `` funny bone ''.
This name is विचार to be a pun, based on the sound resemblance between the name of the bone of the upper arm, the `` humerus `` and the word `` humorous ``.
alternatively, according to the Oxford English Dictionary it may refer to `` the peculiar सनसनी experienced when it is struck ''.
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft और Wizardry, shortened हॉग्वार्ट्स, is a fictional अंग्रेजों स्कूल of magic लिये students aged ग्यारह to अठारह, and is the प्राथमिक setting for the first six books in j.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
Rowling रै suggested that she may have inadvertently taken the name from the hogwort plant ( Croton capitatus ), which she had seen at Kew Gardens some time before writing the series, although the names `` the Hogwarts '' and `` Hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans.
Hogwarts स्कूल was voted as the 36th बेहतरीन Scottish शैक्षणिक establishment in a 2008 online ranking, outranking Edinburgh 's loretto School.
According to a director of the स्वतंत्र स्कूलों Network Rankings, it was added to the schools listing `` for fun '' and was तब voted on.
The u.S. subprime mortgage संकट was a set of कार्यक्रम and conditions कि led to a financial crisis and subsequent मंदी that began in 2008.
it was characterized by a rise in subprime mortgage delinquencies and foreclosures, and the resulting decline of securities backed by said mortgages.
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September 2008, with significant disruption in the flow of credit to businesses and consumers and the onset of a severe global recession.
There यहूद many causes of the crisis, with टीकाकारों assigning different levels of blame to financial संस्थानों, regulators, credit agencies, government housing policies, and consumers, among others.
A proximate cause was the rise in subprime lending.
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated during a given year रोज़ from the historical 8 % or निम्नतर दायरा to approximately 20 % from 2004 to 2006, with much higher ratios in some parts of the U.S.
a high percentage of these subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 for example, यहूद adjustable-rate mortgages.
These two changes were part of a broader trend of lowered lending standards and higher-risk mortgage products.
Further, U.S. households था become increasingly indebted, with the अनुपात of कर्ज़ to disposable personal income rising from 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the end of 2007, much of this increase mortgage-related.
When U.S. home prices अस्वीकृत steeply after peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' ability to refinance their loans became more मुश्किल.
As adjustable-rate mortgages began to reset at उच्चतर ब्याज rates ( causing higher monthly payments ), mortgage delinquencies soared.
Securities backed with mortgages, including subprime mortgages, widely held by financial firms globally, खोया most of their मान.
Global investors also drastically घटाया purchases of mortgage-backed debt और other securities as part of a decline in the capacity और willingness of the private financial system to support lending.
Concerns about the soundness of U.S. क्रेडिट and वित्तीय markets led to tightening credit around the संसार and slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe.
The संकट had severe, long-lasting consequences for the U.S. and यूरोपीय economies.
The U.S. entered a deep recession, with nearly 9 million jobs lost दौरान 2008 and 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
U.S. housing कीमतें गिरी nearly 30 % on average और the U.S. stock market fell approximately 50 % by early 2009.
As of early 2013, the U.S. stock मार्केट had recovered to its pre-crisis peak but आवास prices remained near their low point and unemployment remained elevated.
Economic growth remained below pre-crisis levels.
Europe also continued to संघर्ष with its own economic संकट.
Carl Jung in 1910.
Myers and Briggs extrapolated their MBTI theory from Jung 's writings in his book Psychological Types.
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( MBTI ) मूल्यांकन is a psychometric questionnaire designed to measure psychological preferences in how people perceive the world और make decisions.
These वरीयताओं were extrapolated from the typological theories proposed by Carl Gustav Jung और first published in his 1921 book मनोवैज्ञानिक Types ( अंग्रेज़ी edition, 1923 ).
Jung theorized कि there हैं चार principal psychological functions by which we experience the संसार : sensation, intuition, feeling, and thinking.
One of these चार functions is dominant most of the समय.
The असली developers of the व्यक्तित्व inventory were Katharine Cook Briggs and her daughter, Isabel briggs Myers ; these two, having studied extensively the work of Jung, turned their interest of human behavior into a devotion of turning the सिद्धान्त of psychological types to practical use.
They began creating the indicator during World War II, believing that a knowledge of व्यक्तित्व वरीयताओं would help women who यहूद entering the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable and effective ''.
The initial questionnaire grew into the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator, which थी first published in 1962.
The MBTI focuses on normal populations and emphasizes the value of naturally occurring differences.
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is that we all have specific preferences in the way we construe our experiences, and these preferences underlie our interests, needs, values, and प्रेरणा '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a song by American रिकॉर्डिंग artist महिला Gaga, from her second स्टुडियो album Born This Way ( 2011 ).
It was released by Interscope Records on April 15, 2011, four दिनों ahead of its scheduled release.
Written and उत्पादित by महिला Gaga and redone, `` Judas '' is a dance and इलेक्ट्रो house song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga in the past, and its core meaning refers to the ऋणात्मक parts of her life that she ca n't एस्केप.
गागा has further explained that the song was also परिचय honoring one 's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the light.
The artwork for the single was designed by Gaga in Microsoft शब्द.
In spite of a polarizing प्रभाव on several धार्मिक groups, the song was generally well received by critics, who likened the song to `` ख़राब Romance `` with कुछ noting it should have been the album 's lead single.
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks, सहित `` पोकर Face ``, `` lovegame ``, `` Bad रोमांस '', और `` Alejandro ``.
It contains तीन distinct hooks और a house -influenced ब्रेक down.
Gaga explained that the लाइनों spoken during the breakdown talk about उसके as beyond redemption, regarding the परंपरागत views of कया a woman should be.
`` Judas '' initially था a strong sales opening, लकिन was less successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles.
The song reached the शीर्ष ten of the चार्ट in सबसे major music markets, and also reached the top of the charts in South Korea.
A music वीडियो for the song was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus.
it has a Biblical storyline where Reedus निभाई Judas Iscariot और Gaga played मरियम Magdalene.
the video portrays them as modern day missionaries going to Jerusalem.
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying यीशु, and ended with गागा as Magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before इसके release, the Catholic League condemned Gaga for the alleged use of religious imagery and her भूमिका in the video.
However, critics generally praised the वीडियो, not finding any offensive content.
The वीडियो was nominated for two पुरस्कार at the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards.
गागा has performed `` यहूदा '' on a क्रमांक of television shows, सहित The ग्राहम Norton Show, Saturday Night Live, Good Morning Americas `` गर्मियाँ Concert Series '', the फ्रेंच x Factor as well as on the Ellen DeGeneres Show.
Marvin gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born Marvin pentz Gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the ध्वनि of motown Records in the 1960s साथ a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( to Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I सुना It through the grapevine `` और duet recordings साथ Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell, later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' और `` Prince of आत्मा ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye अंकित the अवधारणा एल्बम What 's going On and Let 's Get it on and became among the first artists in Motown to break away from the reins of its production company.
Gaye 's later recordings बहकावे several R & B subgenres such as quiet storm और neo-soul.
Following a period in यूरोपीय under a tax exile in the जल्दी 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 Grammy Award-winning hit `` Sexual healing `` and the मध्यरात्रि Love album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye has been मरणोपरांत honored by many institutions, including the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of कीर्ति.
The Academy Award लिये Best चित्र is one of the Academy Awards of मेरिट presented annually by the Academy of Motion चित्र Arts and Sciences ( AMPAS ) to producers working in the motion picture industry and is the only category in which every सदस्य is योग्य to nominate for.
Best Picture is माना the सबसे important of the Academy Awards, as it represents all the directing, acting, music composing, writing, editing and other efforts put forth into a फिल्मी.
Consequently, Best Picture is the final award and the निष्कर्ष of the सालाना Academy Awards ceremony.
The ग्रैंड staircase columns at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, where the Academy Awards ceremonies have been held since 2002, showcase every film that रै won the Best Picture शीर्षक since the award 's inception 85 years ago.
Heavy Rain is an interactive drama action-adventure video खेल created by French developer quantic सपना exclusively for the PlayStation 3.
The game is written और directed by Quantic Dream 's संस्थापक and CEO David Cage.
भारी Rains स्टोरी is a dramatic thriller modelled बाद film noir, featuring four protagonists involved with the mystery of the Origami Killer, a serial killer जो उपयोग extended periods of rainfall to drown his पीड़ितों.
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son इससे being the next victim, जबकि investigative journalist Madison Paige, एफबीआई profiler Norman Jayden, और private detective Scott Shelby are प्रत्येक trying to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity.
the खिलाड़ी interacts with the खेल by performing क्रियाएँ highlighted on screen related to motions on the controller, और in कुछ cases, performing a series of quick time events during fast-paced action sequences.
The player 's decisions and क्रियाएँ during the game will affect the narrative.
The प्रमुख characters can be killed, and certain actions may lead to different scenes and endings.
A playable demo was released on 11 February 2010.
The demo was released prior to इस date for people who took part in a Four Day Challenge on 5 February 2010.
A patch to allow उपयोग of the PlayStation Move controller to play the game was released in सितंबर 2010.
Heavy Rain was critically acclaimed and रै sold over two million copies.
It won 2010 's Game of the Year from CNN and Gaming Union, and Best PS3 Game of 2010 by gamespy और IGN.
A modified version of the game थी released titled Heavy Rain संस्करण Modifiée exclusively in France, aimed towards a younger दर्शक.
in 2010, the game was शामिल in the किताब 1001 Video Games तुम Must Play Before You Die.
Total superannuation industry देनदारी : members funds and reserves ( A $ millions ) since 1988.
Annual कुल superannuation industry एसेट growth 1996-2005.
superannuation in Australia refers to the arrangements which people make in Australia to have निधि उपलब्धियाँ लिये them in retirement.
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया, superannuation इंतजाम are government-supported and encouraged, and minimum प्रावधानों are compulsory for कर्मचारी.
For example, employers are required to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries और मजदूरी ( currently 9 % ) into a superannuation fund, but people are encouraged to put aside additional निधि into superannuation.
The minimum obligation required by employers is set to increase to 12 % धीरे stepping annually from 2013 to 2020.
An individual can withdraw funds out of a superannuation fund when the person meets one of the conditions of release contained in Schedule 1 of the superannuation Industry ( Supervision ) Regulations 1994.

चुनावी College map showing the results of the 2012 U.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव.
President Barack Obama ( D - il ) won the लोकप्रिय vote in 26 states and the District of Columbia ( denoted in ब्लू ) to कैप्चर 332 चुनावी votes.
Former Governor Mitt romney ( R - ma ) won the popular vote in 24 राज्य ( denoted in red ) to capture 206 electoral मत.
Cartogram representation of the Electoral College vote for the 2012 चुनाव, with each square representing one electoral vote.
The United States Electoral College is the संस्था that officially elects the President and Vice President of the United States every four years.
The President और वाइस President are not elected directly by the voters.
Instead, they are elected by `` electors '' who are चुनी by popular vote on a state-by-state आधार.
Electors are apportioned to each राज्य and the District of कोलंबिया, लकिन नहीं to territorial possessions of the United States, such as Puerto Rico and Guam.
The number of electors in each state is बराबर to the number of members of Congress to जिससे the state is entitled.
The Twenty-third Amendment has always resulted in the District of कोलंबिया having तीन electors.
There हैं 538 electors, based on there being 435 representatives and 100 सीनेटरों, plus the three electors from the District of Columbia.
Electors हैं pledged to particular presidential and vice presidential candidates, हालांकि unpledged electors हैं possible.
In all states, मगर Maine and Nebraska, electors are elected on a `` winner-take-all '' basis.
That is, all electors pledged to the presidential candidate who wins the most मत in a state become electors for that state.
Maine and Nebraska उपयोग the `` congressional district method '', selecting one elector within each congressional district by popular vote and selecting the remaining दो electors by a statewide popular vote.
हालांकि no elector is required by संघीय law to honor a pledge, there have only महरूम very few occasions when an elector voted contrary to a pledge.
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how a President और Vice अध्यक्ष are elected and requires each elector to cast one vote लिये अध्यक्ष और another vote लिये Vice President.
Critics argue कि the Electoral कॉलेज is inherently undemocratic and gives swing राज्य अनुपातहीन influence in electing the अध्यक्ष और Vice President.
the Electoral College gives a numeric लाभ in the चुनाव of the president to the smaller states, as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of electors for the small states is three compared to one for the election of representatives.
On the other hand, the winner-take-all method of voting favors the larger states.
A number of constitutional amendments have महरूम proposed seeking to alter the Electoral College or replace it with a direct popular vote.
Barack Hussein ओबामा II ( ; born August 4, 1961 ) is the 44th and current President of the United States, the first अफ़्रीकी American to hold the दफ्तर.
Born in Honolulu, Hawaii, ओबामा is a graduate of Columbia University and Harvard Law School, where he was president of the Harvard विधि Review.
He was a community organizer in Chicago before earning उसके law degree.
He worked as a सिविल अधिकारों attorney in Chicago और taught संवैधानिक law at the University of Chicago Law School from 1992 to 2004.
He served तीन terms representing the 13th District in the Illinois Senate from 1997 to 2004, running unsuccessfully लिये the United राज्य House of प्रतिनिधि in 2000.
In 2004, Obama received नेशनल attention during his अभियान to represent Illinois in the United राज्य सीनेट साथ his victory in the March Democratic Party primary, his keynote address at the Democratic National Convention in जुलाई, और his election to the सीनेट in November.
He began his presidential campaign in 2007, and in 2008, after a close primary अभियान विरूद्ध Hillary Rodham Clinton, he won sufficient delegates in the Democratic Party primaries to receive the presidential नामांकन.
he then defeated रिपब्लिकन nominee John मैक्केन in the general चुनाव, और was उदघाटन as president on जनवरी 20, 2009.
Nine months later, Obama was named the 2009 Nobel Peace Prize laureate.
He was re-elected president in November 2012, defeating रिपब्लिकन nominee Mitt romney, and was sworn in for a दूसरी term on January 20, 2013.
Early in his first term in office, Obama signed into law economic stimulus legislation in response to the Great Recession in the रूप of the American रिकवरी and Reinvestment Act of 2009 and the कर Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job सृष्टि Act of 2010.
Other प्रमुख घरेलू initiatives in his presidency शामिल the Patient सुरक्षा and सस्ती Care Act, often referred to as `` Obamacare '' ; the Dodd–Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer सुरक्षा Act ; the do n't Ask, Do n't Tell Repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget कंट्रोल Act of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer राहत Act of 2012.
In May 2012, he became the first sitting U.S. president to सरेआम support same-sex marriage and in 2013 his administration filed briefs which urged the परम् Court to rule in favor of same-sex couples in two high-profile cases.
In foreign policy, ओबामा ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq युद्ध, increased troop levels in Afghanistan, हस्ताक्षरित the New START बाहें control सन्धि with रूस, ordered U.S. military involvement in Libya, and ordered the सैन्य आपरेशन that resulted in the death of Osama बिन लादेन.

Sample view of an electronic health record
an electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic collection of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य information about individual patients or populations.
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically capable of होने shared across different health care settings.
In कुछ cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information प्रणालियों और अन्य information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may शामिल a range of data, including demographics, medical history, दवा and allergies, immunization status, laboratory test results, radiology बिंब, vital signs, personal stats like age और weight, और billing सूचना.

The Rime of the Ancient Mariner ( originally The Rime of the Ancyent marinere ) is the longest major poem by the अंग्रेज़ी poet Samuel Taylor Coleridge, written in 1797–98 and प्रकाशित in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads.
Modern संस्करण use a later revised version printed in 1817 that featured a gloss.
साथ with other poems in Lyrical Ballads, it was a signal शिफ़्ट to modern poetry and the beginning of British Romantic literature.
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines कैसा web browsers and other user agents can automatically choose the appropriate proxy server ( access method ) for fetching a given URL.
A PAC file contains a JavaScript function “findproxyforurl ( url, host ) ”.
This function returns a string with one or more access विधि specifications.
ये specifications कारण the user agent to उपयोग a particular प्रॉक्सी सर्वर or to connect सीधे.
अनेक specifications provide a fall-back when a proxy fails to respond.
The browser fetches this PAC file पहले requesting other URLs.
The URL of the pac file is either विन्यस्त manually or संकल्पित automatically by the Web Proxy Autodiscovery Protocol.
zendaya कोलमैन ( born September 1, 1996 ), known mononymously as Zendaya, is an American अभिनेत्री, singer and dancer.
she सितारों on the डिज़्नी चैनल sitcom Shake It Up as Rocky Blue.
She has स्ट्रक्चर in दो films और played one of the lead roles in the फिल्मी Frenemies as Halley Brandon.
She voiced Fern in the Pixie खोखला खेल.
वो appeared in Good Luck Charlie as Rocky Blue और in a Good Luck चार्ली and Shake It Up crossover title चार्ली Shake It up.
She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the episode `` चलना The Prank '' and on A.N.T. Farm as Sequoia Jones in the episode `` Creative ConsultANT. ''
zendaya is भी a musician.
वो signed a deal with Hollywood Records on August 8, 2012 and started recording songs for her debut एल्बम on August 12, 2012.
वो released a single from an independent label called `` Swag it आउट `` and another single with Bella Thorne called `` Watch me, '' which is featured on the Break It Down एल्बम.
On March 20, 2012, zendaya और Bella Thorne released an album together called Shake it Up : Live 2 Dance, each have their own song on it, along with a mash-up of दोनो songs together as one.
On August 21, 2012, Zendaya and Bella Thorne released an EP called Shake It Up : Made In जापानी.
Zendaya रै a Christmas song called `` Shake Santa Shake, '' which is on the Disney Channel Holiday Playlist cd, which was released on October 2, 2012.

इस is a list of airports in Pennsylvania ( a u.S. राज्य ), grouped by type and sorted by location.
It contains all public-use and military एयरपोर्ट in the state.
Some private-use and former एयरपोर्ट may be included where notable, such as airports कि were previously public-use, those with commercial enplanements अंकित by the FAA or airports assigned an IATA विमानक्षेत्र code.
iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a मोबाईल operating system developed and वितरित by Apple Inc. Originally released in 2007 for the iPhone and iPod Touch प्लेटफ़ॉर्म, it रै been विस्तारित to support other Apple devices such as the iPad and Apple TV.
Unlike Microsoft 's Windows Phone and google 's एंड्रॉइड, Apple does not अनुज्ञा iOS for installation on non-Apple हार्डवेयर.
, Apple 's app Store contained more than 700,000 आईओएस अनुप्रयोग, which have collectively been downloaded अधिक than 30 billion टाइम्स.
It had a 21 % share of the smartphone mobile operating system units shipped in the fourth quarter of 2012, behind only google 's Android.
In June 2012, it accounted for 65 % of mobile web data consumption ( including use on both the iPod Touch and the iPad ).
At the half of 2012, वहीँ were 410 million devices activated.
According to the special media event held by ठहराना on सितंबर 12, 2012, 400 million devices have महरूम sold through June 2012.
The user interface of iOS is based on the concept of direct हेरफेर, using multi-touch gestures.
Interface कंट्रोल elements consist of sliders, switches, and buttons.
बातचीत with the os includes gestures such as swipe, tap, pinch, and reverse pinch, all of which have specific definitions within the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the आईओएस operating प्रणाली and its multi-touch interface.
आतंरिक accelerometers are प्रयुक्त by some applications to respond to shaking the यंत्र ( one आम परिणाम is the undo command ) or rotating it in three dimensions ( एक common result is switching इससे portrait to लैंडस्केप विधि ).
iOS is derived from OS X, with which it shares the Darwin foundation.
iOS is Apple 's mobile संस्करण of the os X operating system प्रयुक्त on Apple computers.
In iOS, there are four abstraction layers : the Core OS layer, the Core सेवाएं layer, the मीडिया layer, and the Cocoa टच परत.
The current version of the operating प्रणाली ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the device 's फ्लैश memory for the system partition, using roughly 800 MB of that partition ( varying by model ) लिये iOS itself.
iOS currently runs on iPhone, iPad, ipod touch and Apple TV.

a spoiler is an automotive aerodynamic यंत्र जिनकी intended design function is to 'spoil ' unfavorable air movement आरपार a body of a गाडी in motion, usually described as turbulence or drag.
विघ्न on the front of a vehicle are often called air dams, because in addition to directing air flow they also reduce the राशि of air flowing underneath the गाडी which generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag.
Spoilers are often fitted to race और high-performance sports cars, हालांकि वे have become common on passenger vehicles as well.
Some spoilers are added to cars primarily for styling उद्देश्य and have either little aerodynamic benefit or भी make the aerodynamics worse.
Spoilers for गाड़ियाँ हैं often incorrectly confused with, or the term used interchangeably with, wings.
ऑटोमोटिव wings are devices जिनकी intended design is to generate downforce as air passes around them, not simply disrupt existing airflow patterns.
मारियो, who serves as Nintendo 's mascot, is a fictional character created by खेल designer Shigeru Miyamoto and voiced by Charles Martinet.
This is a list of वीडियो games where the character Mario plays a part, either as the protagonist, antagonist, supporting character, as भाग of an ensemble cast, as a cameo, or in a game भीतर a खेल.
It does not include simple references to the character, such as the portraits of Mario मिला in The लेजेंड of Zelda : A कड़ी to the पास्ट.
The साल indicated is the year the game was first released, most commonly in Japan ; games were sometimes released years later in अन्य regions of the world.
The list includes पोर्ट, remakes and compilations.
It करता n't include any आभासी Console re-releases.
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` I Am A Man of निरंतर Sorrow '' ) is a traditional American folk सोंग first अंकित by Dick Burnett, a partially blind fiddler from Kentucky.
The song was originally अंकित by Burnett as `` Farewell Song '' printed in a Richard Burnett songbook, circa 1913.
An जल्दी version was recorded by Emry आर्थर in 1928 ( Vocalion Vo 5208 ).
Public ब्याज in the song was renewed after the रिलीज of the 2000 film O Brother, Where आर्ट Thou ?
, as it plays a central भूमिका in the फिल्मी 's plot.
The song was भी included in the film 's highly successful, multiple-platinum selling soundtrack.
Josephson junction array chip developed by the National Bureau of Standards as a standard volt
The volt ( symbol : V ) is the si derived unit for electric potential ( voltage ), electric potential difference, and electromotive force.
The volt is named in honor of the Italian physicist Alessandro Volta ( 1745–1827 ), जो invented the voltaic pile, possibly the first chemical battery.
A प्लैक commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip ( चित्र taken in 1987, before steps were removed in 1992 and plaque changed इससे cyrillic to Latin script )
a plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination ( image लिया in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, वारिस presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and उसके wife, सोफी, Duchess of Hohenberg, were shot मुर्दे in साराजेवो, by gavrilo princip, one of a group of six बोस्नियाई serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the हत्या was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces so वे could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives were consistent with the movement कि later became ज्ञात as Young Bosnia.
Serbian military officers stood behind the attack.
At the top of ये Serbian सैन्य conspirators was Chief of Serbian सैन्य Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević, his righthand man Major vojislav tankosić, and Masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major tankosić armed the assassins with बम and pistols and trained them.
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses और agents that Rade Malobabić used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the कुंजी members of the clandestine tunnel, and the key सर्बियाई military conspirators जो were still alive were गिरफ्तार, tried, convicted and punished.
Those who यहूद arrested in Bosnia were tried in साराजेवो in October 1914.
The अन्य conspirators were arrested and tried before a सर्बियाई kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the शीर्ष military conspirators.
Much of what is known about the assassinations comes from these दो trials and related रिकॉर्ड.
Assignment of responsibility लिये the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of World युद्ध I one month बाद.
Mission San जुआन Capistrano was a स्पेनी मिशन in दक्षिणी California, located in present-day San Juan capistrano.
It was founded on All Saints ' Day November 1, 1776, by Spanish catholics of the franciscan Order.
Named for Giovanni da capistrano, a 15th century theologian and `` warrior priest '' who resided in the Abruzzo region of Italy, San Juan Capistrano has the distinction of being home to the oldest building in California स्टिल in use, a chapel built in 1782.
Known alternately as `` Serra 's Chapel '' and `` Father Serra 's Church, '' it is the only extant structure where it has been प्रलेखित that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated mass.
एक of the बेहतरीन ज्ञात of the Alta California मिशन ( and one of the few missions to have actually been founded twice—others होने Mission San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission La Purísima concepción ).
The site was originally consecrated on अक्तूबर 30, 1775, by Father fermín Lasuén, but थी quickly abandoned due to unrest among the indigenous population in San Diego.
The कामयाबी of the settlement is evident in its historical records.
Prior to the arrival of the प्रचारकों, some 550 natives were scattered throughout the local area.
By 1790, the number of converted Christians had grown to 700, and just six years बाद nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( recent converts ) lived in or around the Mission compound.
1,649 baptisms were conducted that year अलोन, out of the total 4,639 souls converted between 1776 and 1847.
More than 2,000 former inhabitants ( mostly juaneño Indians ) are buried in unmarked graves in the मिशन 's cemetery ( campo santo ).
The remains of Father ( बाद Monsignor ) St. John O'Sullivan, who recognized the property 's historic value and working tirelessly to conserve and rebuild its structures, are buried at the entrance to the cemetery on the west पक्ष of the property, and a प्रतिमा raised in his honor stands at the head of the crypt.
the surviving chapel also serves as the final resting place of three padres who passed on while सेवारत at the Mission : Fathers José Barona, Vicente fustér, and Vicente Pascual Oliva are all entombed beneath the sanctuary floor.
The Criolla or `` Mission grape, '' was first planted at San Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the first wine produced in Alta California उभरा from the मिशन 's winery.
The Mission डाला a long period of क्रमिक decline बाद secularization in 1833.
Numerous efforts were made over the years to restore the Mission to इसके former glory, but none met साथ ग्रेट success until the आगमन of Father O'Sullivan in 1910.
Restoration efforts continue, and `` Serra 's चैपल '' is still used for religious services.
About half-a-million visitors, सहित 80,000 school children, come to the Mission each साल.
And जबकि the ruins of `` the Great Stone Church '' ( which थी all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake ) are a renowned architectural wonder, the मिशन is perhaps best known for the annual `` Return of the Swallows '' which is traditionally observed every March 19 ( संत Joseph 's Day ).
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a पसंदीदा subject for many notable artists, और has been immortalized in literature and on film numerous times, perhaps more than any other mission.
In 1984, a modern church जटिल थी constructed just north and west of the Mission compound and is अभी known as Mission Basilica San जुआन capistrano.
Today, the mission compound serves as a museum, with the सेरा Chapel भीतर the compound serving as a chapel लिये the मिशन parish.
बेहतर Off Dead is a 1985 American teen रोमांटिक कॉमेडी film starring John cusack and written and directed by Savage Steve Holland.
It tells the story of high school student Lane Myer who is suicidal after his girlfriend breaks up with him.
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally Louisiana superdome और commonly The Superdome ) is a खेल and exhibition stadium, located in the Central कारोबार District of New Orleans, Louisiana, यूएसए.
Plans were drawn up in 1967, by the नई Orleans modernist architectural firm of Curtis और Davis.
Its steel frame covers a expanse.
Its dome is made of a Lamella multi-ringed frame and has a diameter of, making it the largest fixed domed structure in the world.
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints, the ncaa 's प्रभाग I-A Tulane Green Wave football team ( the largest football स्टेडियम in सम्मेलन USA ), the State Farm bayou Classic, the R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl, the Allstate Sugar Bowl and, every fourth year, the BCS National Championship Game.
Because of the size और location in one of the major tourist destinations in the United States, the Superdome routinely makes the `` short list '' of candidates होने considered लिये major sporting events, such as the Super Bowl और the Final Four.
In 2005, the Superdome gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय ध्यान of a different type when it housed हज़ारों of people seeking आश्रय इससे Hurricane Katrina.
the building suffered extensive damage as a result of the तूफ़ान, और थी closed लिये many महीने afterward.
On October 3, 2011, it was announced that German automaker Mercedes-Benz purchased naming rights to the stadium.
The new name took effect on अक्तूबर 23, 2011.
It is the तीसरा stadium that has naming rights from Mercedes-Benz ( and पहला in the United राज्य ), after the Mercedes-Benz एरिना, the stadium of Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart, in Stuttgart, Germany and the mercedes-benz एरिना in Shanghai, China.

Disney 's एनिमल Kingdom Lodge is an African-themed डीलक्स रिज़ॉर्ट at the Walt Disney संसार रिज़ॉर्ट.
It opened on April 16, 2001.
The रिज़ॉर्ट is owned and संचालित by Walt Disney Parks और Resorts.
डिज़्नी 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is located in the Animal किंगडम Resort Area, adjacent to Disney 's Animal Kingdom.
It gives guests the opportunity to view चरने वन्यजीव outside their rooms and public क्षेत्रों in the resort within निकटता of the animals, conveying the feeling of being in an African savanna.
The People 's Party, also known as the `` Populists '', was a short-lived राजनैतिक party in the United States established in 1891 दौरान the Populist movement ( United States, 19th Century ).
it was most important in 1892-96, and then rapidly धुंधली away.
आधारित among poor, white cotton farmers in the South ( especially उत्तर कैरोलिना, अलबामा, और Texas ) and hard-pressed wheat farmers in the plains states ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ), it represented a radical crusading form of agrarianism and hostility to banks, railroads, and elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor संघ, and in 1896 the डेमोक्रेट endorsed their presidential nominee, विलियम Jennings Bryan.
The terms `` populist '' और `` populism `` are commonly used for anti-elitist appeals in opposition to established interests and मुख्यधारा parties.
