There are hundreds of languages spoken in Nigeria.
The प्रमुख भाषाएं हैं Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, ईदो, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
The आधिकारिक language of Nigeria, English, the former colonial language, was chosen to सुकर the cultural and linguistic unity of the country.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the country 's urban elite, और is not widely spoken in rural क्षेत्रों, which comprise तीन quarters of the देशों population.
Nigeria 's भाषाई diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a पूरे, encompassing three प्रमुख अफ़्रीकी भाषाएं परिवारों : afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
सीरियल also has अनेक as-yet unclassified languages, ऐसे as Cen Tuum, जिससे may represent a relic of an even greater विविधता prior to the spread of the वर्तमान language families.
A series of events led to the attack on पर्ल Harbor.
War between Japan and the United States had been a सम्भावना that each स्वदेश 's military forces planned for since the 1920s, हालांकि real tension did not begin जबतक the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by जापानी.
Over the next decade, Japan expanded slowly into चीन, अग्रणी to सब out war between the दो in 1937.
in 1940 Japan invaded French Indochina in an effort to embargo all imports into China, including war supplies खरीदा from the U.S.
This मूव prompted the United States to embargo all oil exports, अग्रणी the Imperial Japanese Navy to estimate that it had less than two years of बंकर oil remaining और to support the मौजूदा योजनाएँ to seize oil resources in the Dutch East Indies.
Planning had been underway for some time on an attack on the `` Southern Resource Area '' to add it to the Greater East एशिया Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific.
The Philippine islands, at कि time an American territory, were also a जापानी निशाना.
The Japanese सैन्य concluded that an invasion of the फिलीपीन would provoke an American military response.
Rather than seize and fortify the islands, and wait for the inevitable US counterattack, Japan 's सैन्य leaders instead decided on the pre-emptive Pearl Harbor attack, which they assumed would negate the American forces needed for the liberation and reconquest of the islands.
Planning लिये the attack had begun in very early 1941, by Admiral isoroku Yamamoto.
He finally won assent from the Naval High Command by, among other things, threatening to इस्तीफा.
The आक्रमण was approved in the गर्मियाँ at an Imperial Conference and again at a second Conference in the पतन.
Simultaneously over the year, pilots were trained, and ships prepared for its execution.
प्राधिकार लिये the attack was granted at the second Imperial Conference if a diplomatic परिणाम satisfactory to Japan was नहीं पहुँचे.
After final approval by सम्राट Hirohito the order to attack थी जारी at the beginning of दिसम्बर.
A common office stapler
A common school stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device that joins चादरें of paper or similar material by ड्राइविंग a thin metal staple through the चादरें and folding the ends.
Staplers are widely used in सरकारी, business, कार्यालयों, घरों और schools.
The word `` stapler '' can actually refer to a number of different devices of varying uses.
In addition to joining पेपर sheets together, staplers can also be used in a सर्जिकल setting to join tissue together with surgical staples to close a surgical wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ).
Typically, most staplers हैं used to join multiple चादरें of paper.
Paper staplers come in two distinct types : manual and electric.
Manual staplers are normally hand-held, हालांकि models that are used while set on a desk or other surface are not uncommon.
Electric staplers exist in a variety of अलग डिजाइन और models.
Their primary operating function is to जुड़ें large numbers of paper sheets together in rapid उत्तराधिकार.
Some electric staplers can जुड़ें up to 20 sheets at a समय.
Swallowing, ज्ञात scientifically as deglutition, is the process in the human or animal body that makes something pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, और into the esophagus, while shutting the epiglottis.
If this fails and the object goes through the trachea, then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
In the human body it is controlled by the swallowing reflex.
thaddeus Stevens ( April 4, 1792 – August 11, 1868 ), of Pennsylvania, was a leader of the कट्टरपंथी Republican faction of the Republican Party and a fierce प्रतिद्वन्दी of slavery.
He was one of the most influential members in the इतिहास of Congress.
As chairman of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee, स्टीवंस, a witty, sarcastic speaker and flamboyant party leader, dominated the हाउस इससे 1861 जबतक his death.
He wrote much of the financial legislation that सशुल्क for the अमरीकी Civil War.
स्टीवंस and Senator Charles Sumner were the prime leaders of the कट्टरपंथी Republicans during the war and पुनर्निर्माण era.
scholarly दृश्य of Stevens have swung sharply since his death as interpretations of Reconstruction have changed.
Historians of the Dunning स्कूल ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible for demanding हर्ष treatment of the white South and violating American traditions of republicanism, depicting स्टीवंस as a villain for his advocacy of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates.
This highly negative characterization held sway into the 1950s.
the rise of the neo-abolitionist school in the 1950s led to a strong positive सराहना of Stevens ' work on सिविल rights for Freedmen.
A recent biographer characterizes him as, `` The Great Commoner, savior of free public education in Pennsylvania, national Republican leader in the struggles against गुलामी in the संयुक्त States and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure racial इंसाफ for the freedmen during Reconstruction, the only member of the House of Representatives ever to have been known as the 'dictator ' of Congress. ''
Overview of the translation of eukaryotic messenger RNA
Diagram showing the translation of mRNA and the synthesis of proteins by a ribosome
In आणविक biology and genetics, translation is the process through which cellular ribosomes manufacture प्रोटीन.
It is part of the process of gene expression.
in translation, messenger RNA ( mRNA ) produced by transcription is decoded by the ribosome to produce a विशिष्ट अमीनो acid chain, or polypeptide, कि will later fold into an active protein.
In bacteria, translation occurs in the cell 's कोशिकाद्रव्य, where the large and small subunits of the ribosome हैं located, and bind to the mRNA.
In eukaryotes, अनुवाद occurs across the झिल्ली of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial संश्लेषण.
The ribosome facilitates decoding by inducing the binding of tRNAs with complementary anticodon sequences to कि of the mrna.
the tRNAs carry विशिष्ट amino acids that हैं chained together into a polypeptide as the mRNA passes through and is `` read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to कि of a stock ticker और ticker tape.
in many instances, the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to the बाहरी membrane of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum और releases the nascent प्रोटीन polypeptide inside लिये later vesicle transport and स्राव outside of the cell.
Many types of transcribed RNA, ऐसे as transfer RNA, ribosomal RNA, और small nuclear RNA, do not undergo translation into प्रोटीन.
Translation proceeds in four phases : initiation, elongation, translocation and termination ( सब describing the विकास of the अमीनो acid chain, or polypeptide that is the product of अनुवाद ).
Amino acids are brought to ribosomes and समवेत into proteins.
in activation, the correct अमीनो acid is covalently bonded to the correct transfer RNA ( tRNA ).
The amino acid is joined by its carboxyl group to the 3 ' oh of the tRNA by an ester bond.
When the tRNA has an amino acid linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
दीक्षा involves the small subunit of the ribosome binding to the 5 ' end of mrna साथ the help of initiation factors ( IF ).
Termination of the polypeptide happens when the a site of the राइबोसोम faces a stop codon ( UAA, UAG, or UGA ).
No trna can recognize or bind to this codon.
बजाय, the stop codon induces the binding of a release factor protein that prompts the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mRNA complex.
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting translation ; these include anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, और puromycin, among others.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure from that of eukaryotic ribosomes, और thus antibiotics can specifically target bacterial infections without any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells.
A multimedia message on a मोबाईल phone.
Multimedia Messaging सेवा ( MMS ) is a standard रास्ता to send messages कि include multimedia content to and from mobile phones.
it extends the core sms ( Short Message सेवा ) capability that allowed exchange of text संदेश only up to 160 characters in length.
The most popular उपयोग is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets, हालांकि it is also popular as a method of delivering news and entertainment सामग्री सहित videos, pictures, text pages और ringtones.
The standard is developed by the Open Mobile Alliance ( OMA ), although दौरान development it was part of the 3GPP and WAP groups.
Smallpox was an infectious disease unique to humans, caused by either of two virus variants, Variola major और variola minor.
the disease is भी ज्ञात by the Latin names Variola or Variola vera, derived इससे varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ).
The disease was originally known in English as the `` pox '' or `` red plague '' ; the पद `` smallpox '' was पहला used in Britain in the 15th सदी to फर्क variola from the `` great pox '' ( उपदंश ).
The पिछला naturally occurring case of smallpox ( Variola minor ) was diagnosed on 26 October 1977.
Smallpox localized in small blood बरतन of the skin and in the mouth and throat.
in the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular rash और, later, raised fluid-filled blisters.
V. major produces a more serious disease and रै an overall mortality rate of 30–35 %.
V. minor कल्याणकारी a milder form of disease ( also known as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, and Cuban itch ) which kills about 1 % of its victims.
Long-term जटिलताओं of V. major संक्रमण include characteristic scars, commonly on the face, which occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
दृष्टिहीनता resulting from corneal ulceration और scarring, and limb deformities due to arthritis and osteomyelitis are less common complications, seen in परिचय 2–5 % of मामले.
Smallpox is believed to have emerged in human populations about 10,000 BC.
The earliest physical evidence of it is probably the pustular खाज on the mummified body of Pharaoh Ramses V of Egypt.
the disease killed an estimated 400,000 Europeans annually दौरान the closing सालो of the 18th century ( including five reigning monarchs ), and was responsible for a third of all blindness.
Of all those infected, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of infected children—died इससे the disease.
Smallpox was responsible for an अनुमानित 300–500 million deaths during the 20th सदी.
As recently as 1967, the संसार Health Organization ( जो ) estimated that 15 million people contracted the बीमारी and that two लाख died in that year.
After vaccination campaigns throughout the 19th and 20th centuries, the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
Smallpox is one of two संक्रामक diseases to have been eradicated, the other being rinderpest, which थी declared eradicated in 2011.
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' is a song by the English rock band the Beatles.
Written by जॉन Lennon and पॉल McCartney, and recorded in October 1963, it was the first Beatles record to be made using four-track equipment.
With advance orders exceeding one million नक़ल in the United Kingdom, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' would साधारणतया have gone सीधा to the top of the British record चार्ट on its दिन of release ( 29 November 1963 ) had it नहीं been अवरोधित by the group 's first लाख विक्रेता `` वो Loves You ``, the Beatles ' previous UK सिंगल, which was having a resurgent spell in the top स्थिति following intense मीडिया coverage of the group.
लेने two weeks to dislodge इसके predecessor, `` I want to Hold Your Hand '' ठहरे at number एक for five सप्ताह and remained in the UK top fifty for twenty-one weeks in total.
It was also the group 's पहला American क्रमांक एक, प्रवेश the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 January 1964 at number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the American music उद्योग.
By 1 February it held the number एक spot — for seven सप्ताह — before being replaced by `` She Loves You '', a रिवर्स scenario of कया had occurred in Britain, and remained in the US चार्ट for a total of fifteen weeks.
`` i Want to Hold Your Hand '' became the Beatles ' best-selling single विश्वव्यापी.
A gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the United States in the late 1950s and continued until the जल्दी 1970s.
gassers were based on production models from the 1930s to mid-1960s, which have महरूम stripped of extraneous weight and jacked up using a truck beam axle to provide better weight distribution on acceleration ( Beam axles are also lighter than an independent सामने suspension ), हालांकि a raised stock front suspension is common as well.
आम weight reduction techniques include fiberglass देह panels, stripped interiors and plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ).
क्युकी वे were primarily built for racing, these cars typically had the engine swapped to a larger or more powerful एक, the existing भण्डार इंजन modified ( प्रायः heavily ) or both.
It थी बहुत common to अनुरूप a Roots supercharger और mechanical ईंधन इंजेक्शन, such as one from Algon, Hilborn, or Crower.
With form being dictated by function, their रूप is often very top भारी and ungainly, largely due to front ends होने raised उच्चतर than stock, to assist in the weight transfer during rapid acceleration ( racing ).
Having their exhaust पाइप exit through the front fender well is a common characteristic of gassers, as is having bodies painted in flamboyant metalflakes, pearls, और candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts.
The name arose because they competed in a gasoline -fueled drag racing class, rather than one using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the पूर्ववर्ती of the modern Funny Car.
Twelve-lead EKG of a 26-year-old male
Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical कार्यकलाप of the heart over a period of time, as detected by electrodes attached to the surface of the स्किन and recorded by a यंत्र external to the body.
The रिकॉर्डिंग produced by इस noninvasive procedure is termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ).
An ECG is प्रयुक्त to measure the rate and नियमितता of heartbeats, as well as the आकार and position of the कक्षों, the presence of any damage to the दिल, and the effects of दवाएँ or devices used to regulate the heart, such as a pacemaker.
Most ECGs are performed for निदान or research purposes on human hearts, but may also be performed on पशु, usually for diagnosis of heart abnormalities or research.
डोनाल्ड John ट्रम्प, sr. ( born June 14, 1946 ) is an American business magnate, television personality और author.
He is the chairman and president of The Trump Organization and the founder of Trump Entertainment Resorts.
ट्रम्प 's हद lifestyle, outspoken manner, and role on the NBC reality दिखाएँ The Apprentice have बना him a well-known celebrity who was No. 14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list.
Trump is the son of Fred Trump, a धनवान नई यॉर्क City real-estate developer.
He worked for उसके father 's firm, एलिज़ाबेथ Trump & Son, while attending the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania, and in 1968 officially joined the कम्पनी.
He थी दिए control of the company in 1971 and renamed it The Trump संगठन.
In 2010, ट्रम्प expressed an ब्याज in becoming a candidate लिये president of the United States in the 2012 election, though in May 2011, he announced he would नहीं be a candidate.
In दिसम्बर 2011, Trump was suggested as a possible vice अध्यक्षीय selection by Michele Bachmann, if वो were to win the Republican nomination.
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & b singer-songwriter Sam Cooke, written और first recorded in 1963 and released अंतर्गत the RCA Victor label shortly बाद his death in late 1964.
हालांकि only a modest hit for cooke in comparison with his previous singles, the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' सिविल अधिकारों Movement.
The song has gained in popularity and critical acclaim in the decades चूंकि इसके release, and is # 12 on Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All समय.
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
Geothermal energy is thermal energy generated and stored in the Earth.
Thermal energy is the उर्जा कि determines the temperature of matter.
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates इससे the original formation of the planet ( 20 % ) और from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
the geothermal अनुपात, which is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and इसके surface, drives a निरन्तर conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek जड़ें γη ( ge ), meaning धरती, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the Earth, thermal उर्जा is created by radioactive decay and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the core to surrounding cooler rock.
the high temperature and pressure कारण some चट्टान to melt, बनाना magma convection upward since it is lighter than the ठोस चट्टान.
the magma heats rock and water in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °f ).
From hot springs, geothermal energy has महरूम used for स्नान since Paleolithic टाइम्स और for space heating since ancient Roman times, but it is अभी better known for electricity generation.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is online in 24 देशों.
An additional 28 gigawatts of सीधा geothermal हीटिंग capacity is संस्थापित for district हीटिंग, स्पेस heating, spas, industrial प्रक्रियाओं, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, sustainable, and environmentally friendly, but has historically महरूम limited to areas निकट tectonic plate सीमाएँ.
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and आकार of viable संसाधन, especially for अनुप्रयोग such as home heating, opening a potential for फैली exploitation.
geothermal wells release greenhouse गैसों trapped deep भीतर the earth, but ये emissions are much निम्नतर per उर्जा unit than those of fossil fuels.
As a परिणाम, geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate global warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal संसाधन are theoretically अधिक than adequate to supply humanity 's उर्जा needs, लकिन only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and exploration for गहन resources is very expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend on assumptions परिचय technology, energy prices, subsidies, और interest rates.
Pilot programs जैसे eweb 's customer opt in Green Power Program दिखाएँ कि customers would be willing to pay a little अधिक for a renewable उर्जा source like geothermal.
But as a result of government assisted research and industry अनुभव, the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two दशकों.
In 2001, geothermal energy cost between two and ten cents प्रति kwh.
Ownership of property may be private, collective, or common and the property may be objects, land/real estate, or intellectual property.
Determining ownership in law involves determining who has certain rights and duties over the property.
These rights and duties, sometimes called a 'bundle of rights ', can be separated and held by different parties.
The question of ownership reaches back to the ancient दार्शनिकों, प्लेटो and अरस्तू, who held different opinions on the subject.
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) विचार private property created divisive inequalities, while Aristotle ( 384 BC – 322 bc ) विचार private property enabled people to receive the full benefit of their labor.
Private property can circumvent कया is now referred to as the “ tragedy of the commons ” problem, जहाँ people tend to degrade common property more than they do निजी property.
Given a short-sighted owner, however, a private प्रॉपर्टी system can make these tragedies worse—for example, a निजी owner of a piece of oil-rich property, depending on उसके worldview, might be more दिलचस्पी in short-term financial gain than incremental use with an eye toward other 's concerns ( e.g., those of future पीढियां, the disenfranchised, etc. ).
While Aristotle justified the existence of private ownership, he left open questions of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate property between what is निजी और आम and ( 2 ) how to allocate the private property भीतर society.
Over the millennia, and across cultures what can be property and how it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
Ownership is the basis for many other concepts that form the foundations of प्राचीन and modern societies ऐसे as money, trade, debt, bankruptcy, the criminality of theft, and private vs. public प्रॉपर्टी.
Ownership is the कुंजी building ब्लाक in the development of the capitalist socio-economic system.
Adam Smith stated that one of the sacred laws of justice was to guard a person 's property and possessions.
the process and mechanics of ownership are fairly complex : one can gain, transfer and lose ownership of property in a number of ways.
To acquire property एक can खरीदें it with money, trade it लिये other property, receive it as a gift, steal it, find it, make, it or homestead it.
One can transfer or खोना ownership of property by selling it लिये money, exchanging it for other property, giving it as a gift, being robbed of it, it, or having it stripped from one 's ownership through legal means ऐसे as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
स्वामित्व is self-propagating in that the owner of कोई property will also own the आर्थिक benefits of that property.
`` What 's My नाम ? '' is a song recorded by barbadian recording artist Rihanna, for उसके fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ).
featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake, the सोंग was released as the second single from Loud on October 29, 2010 through Def Jam Recordings.
The R & b song थी produced by the Norwegian उत्पादन duo स्टारगेट, and थी written by the duo along साथ ester Dean, Traci Hale, and Drake.
Lyrically, it incorporates themes of sexual intercourse and romance.
Music critics gave the song positive reviews, citing it कुछ of रिहाना 's best गायन work to तिथि ; there थी a तारीफ़ regarding इसके romantic nature, as well as its यौन tones.
`` What 's my Name ? '' was a वाणिज्यिक success and topped the us Billboard Hot 100 chart, giving Rihanna her third number-one सिंगल in 2010, as well as her eighth overall on the chart.
The song also topped the charts in हंगेरियाई and the संयुक्त Kingdom and reached the top five in Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, नार्वे and Slovakia.
the song प्राप्त a nomination at the 54th Grammy Awards for Best Rap/Sung Collaboration.
an accompanying म्यूज़िक video, directed by Philip Andelman, portrays a romantic एनकाउंटर between Rihanna and Drake in a grocery store along साथ romantic दृश्यों between the pair and Rihanna walking through Manhattan 's निम्नतर East पक्ष.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was promoted with live प्रदर्शन across both sides of the अटलांटिक, सहित Saturday रात्रि सजीव in America and the series seven finale of The x Factor in the संयुक्त Kingdom.
The latter performance resulted in an investigation from the country 's media regulator, ofcom, for the raunchy nature of Rihanna 's outfit.
a mathematical constant is a खास क्रमांक, प्रायः a real number, that is `` significantly interesting in some रास्ता ''.
स्थिरांक arise in many different areas of mathematics, with स्थिरांक such as e ( गणितीय constant ) | और pi| occurring in such diverse contexts as भूगोल, number theory and कलन.
What it means for a constant to arise `` naturally '', and what makes a constant `` interesting '', is ultimately a पदार्थ of taste, and some mathematical constants हैं notable more for historical कारण than for their intrinsic mathematical interest.
The more popular constants have been studied throughout the ages and computed to अनेक decimal स्थान.
All mathematical constants हैं definable संख्याएँ and usually are also computable numbers ( Chaitin 's constant being a significant exception ).
Elections to the United राज्य Senate were held on November 2, 2010, for 37 of the United राज्य Senate 's 100 seats.
( A special election on जनवरी 19, 2010 in Massachusetts was held earlier in the year. )
Thirty-four of the seats were for six-year शर्तें to the सीनेट 's `` क्लास तीन '', and three were special elections for shorter terms.
Of the 37 elections, 19 प्रदर्शित incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or were defeated in the प्राथमिक ) and 18 featured incumbent Republicans ( eight of जिसको retired or were defeated in the primary ).
After the पिछला elections ( in 2008 ), the संयुक्त States सीनेट was composed of 58 Democrats, 40 Republicans, and 2 independents who caucus with the Democrats.
republicans won four seats held by retiring Democrats and Republicans defeated two incumbent Democrats.
This was the largest number of republicans gains since the 1994 elections और also the first time चूंकि that election that Republicans successfully defended all of their own सीटे.
This was the fourth consecutive चुनाव of `` class 3 '' सीनेटरों where Democrats have विफल to gain seats and the third consecutive mid-term चुनाव held in a अध्यक्ष 's first term where Republicans have picked-up सीटे.
despite these Republican विन्स, however, the Democrats retained a majority of the Senate साथ 51 seats plus 2 independents who caucus with them, compared to the 47 republicans.
A संक्रांति is an astronomical event कि occurs twice each year as the Sun reaches इसके highest or न्यूनतम excursion relative to the celestial equator on the celestial sphere.
As a परिणाम, on the day of the solstice, the Sun appears to have पहुँचे its highest or lowest annual ऊँचाई in the sky above the horizon at local solar noon.
the word solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( सूर्य ) and sistere ( to stand still ), because at the solstices, the सूर्य stands still in declination ; that is, the seasonal movement of the Sun 's पाथ ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction.
The solstices, together with the equinoxes, are connected साथ the seasons.
In many cultures the solstices mark either the beginning or the midpoint of winter and summer.
The term संक्रांति can also be used in a broader sense, as the तिथि ( दिन ) जब this occurs.
The day of the संक्रांति is either the longest day of the year ( in गर्मियाँ ) or the shortest दिन of the year ( in winter ) for कोई place outside of the tropics.
Jerry Lee Lewis ( born September 29, 1935 ) is an American rock and roll and country music singer-songwriter and pianist.
he is known by the nickname `` The Killer '' और is often viewed as “rock & फेंकें 's first great wild man”.
An early pioneer of rock and roll music, in 1956 लुईस made उसके first रिकार्डिंग at Sun Records.
`` क्रेजी Arms `` sold 300,000 copies in the South, लकिन it was उसके 1957 hit `` Whole Lotta Shakin ' Going On `` that shot लुईस to fame worldwide.
लुईस followed इस in that वही year when he recorded गीतों such as `` Great Balls of आग ``, `` breathless `` and `` High School Confidential ``.
Lewis sold अधिक records than Elvis Presley at इस time.
However, लुईस ' rock 'n ' roll career faltered in the wake of his marriage to his young cousin.
He था little कामयाबी in the चार्ट following the कांड and his popularity quickly faded.
His live प्रदर्शन fees plummeted इससे $ 10,000 per रात्रि to $ 250.
In the meantime he was determined to gain back some of उसके popularity.
During the early 60’s he did n't have much chart success with few अपवाद such as `` What 'd I Say ``.
His live performances at this time यहूद increasingly wild and ऊर्जावान.
His album Live at the Star Club, Hamburg इससे 1964 is often regarded by many म्यूज़िक journalists and fans as one of the wildest and महानतम rock और फेंकें concert albums कभी.
After recording songs such as `` i 'm on Fire '' लिये अनेक years with छोटी success, in 1968 Lewis made a परिवर्तन into country music and had hits with गीतों such as `` Another प्लेस, another Time ''.
This reignited his career and throughout the late '60s and '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts.
His # 1 country hits included `` To Make Love Sweeter For You ``, `` There Must Be More to प्रेम Than This ``, `` Would You Take another Chance on Me `` and `` Me And Bobby mcgee ``.
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he embraced his चट्टान 'n ' roll past with songs such as a कवर of the Big bopper 's `` Chantilly फीता `` और `` Rockin ' My Life Away ``.
in the 21st सदी Lewis continues to tour to ऑडियंस around the world and still releases new albums.
One ऐसे album, titled पिछला Man खड़ा, is उसके best selling to date at over a million copies sold worldwide.
This was followed by Mean बूढ़ा Man which has received some of the बेहतरीन बिक्री of Lewis’s career.
लुईस has had a dozen gold records in both rock and country, जीती several Grammy awards, including a Lifetime उपलब्धि Award.
Lewis थी inducted into the Rock and फेंकें Hall of कीर्ति in 1986, and उसके pioneering योगदान to the genre has महरूम recognized by the rockabilly Hall of Fame.
In 1989, his life was chronicled in the movie ग्रेट गेंदें of Fire, starring Dennis quaid.
In 2003, Rolling Stone Magazine listed his box set All Killer, No Filler : The Anthology number 242 on their list of `` 500 महानतम albums of all time ``.
In 2004, वे ranked him number 24 on their सूची of the 100 महानतम Artists of All Time.
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' Million डालर Quartet and the Class of '55 album, which also included जॉनी नकदी, Carl Perkins, Roy Orbison and Elvis प्रेस्ली.
Henry Louis Stephens, untitled watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man reading a समाचारपत्र साथ headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery ''.
The emancipation उदघोषणा was an order issued to all segments of the Executive branch ( including the Army and Navy ) of the United States by President Abraham Lincoln on January 1, 1863, दौरान the American Civil War.
It was based on the अध्यक्ष 's संवैधानिक प्राधिकार as commander in chief of the armed शक्तियां ; it was not a law passed by Congress.
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever free, और ordered the Army ( and all segments of the Executive branch ) to treat as free all those enslaved in ten states that यहूद still in rebellion, यूँ applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the u.s.
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas स्टिल under rebellion, but as the army took कंट्रोल of Confederate regions, the स्लेव in those regions were emancipated rather than returned to their masters.
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion had already been subdued were immediately emancipated, और over 3 million more were emancipated as the Union army उन्नत.
The Proclamation did not apply to the five स्लेव states that यहूद not in rebellion, nor to most regions already controlled by the Union फौज ; emancipation there would come after separate state actions and/or the December 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth amendment, which made slavery illegal everywhere in the U.S.
the उदघोषणा did not compensate the owners, did not itself outlaw slavery, and किया not make the ex-slaves ( पुकारा freedmen ) citizens.
It made the eradication of slavery an explicit war goal, in addition to the goal of reuniting the Union.
On सितंबर 22, 1862, lincoln had जारी a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of सब slaves in कोई state of the Confederate States of America that did नहीं return to Union control by January 1, 1863.
None returned, और the order, हस्ताक्षरित and issued January 1, 1863, took effect except in locations where the Union had already mostly regained control.
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned a race war, angered some उत्तरी डेमोक्रेट, energized anti-slavery शक्तियां, और weakened forces in Europe that चाही to intervene to help the Confederacy.
It also lifted the spirits of African Americans both in the Southern and Northern राज्य, and led to many slaves escaping their मास्टर्स और running behind Union लाइनों in order to have their emancipation enforced.
Sucker पंच is a 2011 American fantasy action film निर्देशित by zack Snyder and co-written by him and Steve Shibuya.
It is Snyder 's पहला film based on an original स्क्रिप्ट.
The film सितारों Emily Browning, Abbie Cornish, Jena Malone, वैनेसा हजेंस, Jamie Chung, and Carla Gugino.
The storyline follows the fantasies of a young woman who is committed to a mental institution, as she makes a plan to एस्केप the hospital before suffering a lobotomy.
the film थी released in both conventional and imax theatres in the United States at midnight on March 25, 2011.
It received generally ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, but was a मॉडरेट बक्सा office success.

A digital camera ( or digicam ) is a camera that takes video or still photographs by recording बिंब on an electronic image sensor.
Most cameras sold आज are digital, और digital कैमरे are incorporated into many devices ranging from PDAs and mobile phones ( called camera phones ) to vehicles.
Digital and film cameras share an ऑप्टिकल system, typically using a लेंस with a variable diaphragm to focus लाइट onto an image pickup यंत्र.
The diaphragm and shutter admit the correct amount of light to the imager, just as with film but the image pickup device is electronic rather than chemical.
However, नापसंद film कैमरे, digital cameras can प्रदर्शक बिंब on a screen immediately after being अंकित, and store and delete images इससे memory.
Many डिजिटल cameras can also रिकार्ड चलती video with sound.
Some digital cameras can crop और stitch pictures and perform other elementary image editing.

Multiple web सर्वर may be used for a ऊँची traffic website, here चार Sun Fire X4200 servers are installed together
वेब सर्वर can refer to either the हार्डवेयर ( the computer ) or the software ( the computer application ) that helps to deliver web content कि can be accessed through the अंतरजाल.
the most common use of वेब सर्वर is to host websites, but there are other uses ऐसे as gaming, data भंडार or कार्यशील enterprise अनुप्रयोग.
The American Red Cross ( चाप ), also known as the American National Red क्रॉस, is a humanitarian organization that provides emergency assistance, disaster relief and education inside the United States.
It is the designated U.S. affiliate of the International Federation of Red Cross और रेड Crescent Societies.
Today, in addition to domestic disaster relief, the American Red Cross offers services in five अन्य क्षेत्रों : community services that help the मोहताज ; communications services और सुकून for military members and उनके family members ; the collection, processing and distribution of रक्त and blood products ; शैक्षणिक programs on preparedness, health, and safety ; and international relief and development programs.
Issued a corporate charter by the United States Congress under Title 36 of the United States कोड, Section 3001, the American National Red Cross is governed by स्वयंसेवक और supported by community दान, आय from health and safety training and products, and income from रक्त products.
The अमरीकी Red Cross is headquartered in Washington, D.C.
The Chairman of the Board of Governors, सेवारत her दूसरी three-year term, is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter.
The वर्तमान President and Chief Executive Officer is गेल J. mcgovern.

A rooster ( also called a cockerel or cock ) is a male gallinaceous बर्ड.
it usually refers to a पुरूष chicken ( Gallus gallus ).
Immature पुरूष chickens less than एक year old are called cockerels.
The term `` rooster '' originates in the United States, and the पद is widely used throughout North America, as well as ऑस्ट्रेलिया and New जीलैंड.
In the United Kingdom और Ireland the older term `` cockerel '' is more commonly प्रयुक्त.
`` मुर्गा '' is in सामान्य उपयोग as the name for a male of अन्य species of bird, for example `` Cock sparrow ''.
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching aloft to sleep at रात्रि, and is done by both sexes.
The rooster is polygamous, but can not guard several nests of eggs at once.
He गार्ड the सामान्य area where his hens are nesting, and will attack other roosters that डालें उसके territory.
During the daytime, he usually sits on a high perch, usually 3–5 feet off the ground to serve as a lookout लिये his flock.
He होगा ध्वनि a distinctive alarm call if predators are आसपास.
The Pokémon Trading कार्ड खेल ( Pokémon TCG ) is a collectible card game based on the Pokémon video खेल series, first published in October 1996 by Media Factory in Japan.
In the us, it was initially published by wizards of the Coast, the कम्पनी that produces, in December 1998.
Nintendo took over publishing in June 2003.
it is एक of Nintendo 's last बाकी strong links to its heritage as a playing कार्ड company.
जमीन Rover is a British car manufacturer with its headquarters in Gaydon, Warwickshire, United Kingdom which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles.
it is part of the Jaguar Land Rover group, a subsidiary of tata मोटर्स of India.
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car ब्रांड in the world ( after Jeep ).
The Land Rover name was originally used by the Rover Company for one specific vehicle model, नामित simply the जमीन Rover, शुभारम्भ by Rover in 1948.
over the following years it developed into a marque encompassing a दायरा of four-wheel-drive मॉडल, including the defender, Discovery, Freelander, Range Rover, Range Rover Sport and दायरा Rover Evoque.
Land रोवर्स are currently समवेत in the company 's Halewood and solihull plants, with research और development taking प्लेस at jlr 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres.
Land Rover sold 194,000 vehicles worldwide in 2009.
Although the brand originates from the original 1948 model, Land Rover as a company has only existed चूंकि 1978.
prior to this, it was a उत्पाद line of the रोवर Company which was subsequently absorbed into the Rover-Triumph division of the British Leyland Motor Corporation ( BL ) following Leyland Motor Corporation ’s takeover of Rover in 1967.
The ongoing commercial कामयाबी of the असली Land Rover series models, and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s well प्रलेखित कारोबार troubles prompted the establishment of a separate जमीन Rover company but still under the BL छतरियाँ, बाकी part of the subsequent Rover समूह in 1988, under the ownership of British Aerospace after the remains of British leyland were broken up और privatised.
In 1994 रोवर Group plc was acquired by BMW.
In 2000, Rover Group was broken-up by BMW and Land रोवर थी sold to घाट Motor Company, becoming part of its Premier Automotive Group.
In 2006 घाट purchased the Rover brand from BMW for around £6 लाख.
इस reunited the Rover and Land Rover brands for the first समय since 2000 when the Rover group थी broken up by BMW.
In June 2008, Ford बेची both Land Rover and Jaguar Cars to Tata Motors.
This sale भी included the dormant रोवर ब्रांड

The ninth ऋतु of the Bleach anime series is named.
The series is आधारित on Tite Kubo 's manga साथ same name.
The एपीसोड are निर्देशित by Noriyuki Abe and produced by TV Tokyo, Dentsu, and Studio Pierrot.
The episodes ' plot focuses on the introduction of a new Soul Reaper कप्तान, Shūsuke Amagai, and the mystery surrounding the kasumiōji clan, one of the families that constitute the nobility of आत्मा Society.
The season began airing on April 23, 2008 in जापानी on tv टोकियो and ended on October 7, 2008.
The अंग्रेज़ी adaptation of the Bleach दुश्मनी is licensed by viz Media, and this चाप began airing on अगस्त 28, 2010 on Cartoon Network 's Adult Swim, and finished on January 29, 2011.
Five DVD compilations, each containing four episodes of the season, have been released by Aniplex ; the first DVD संकलन was released on November 26, 2008 and the पांचवां on March 25, 2009.
A DVD box will be प्रकाशित by Viz मीडिया on दिसम्बर 13, 2011.
The episodes use three pieces of थीम music : one opening theme and two closing themes.

The first closing theme is `` Orange '' by Lil'B, used for episodes 168 to 179, and the second closing theme is `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku, used for the remainder of the episodes.
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; अंतर्गत the Tenth amendment to the United States Constitution, it is therefore exclusively the डोमेन of the states to permit, prohibit, or वरना regulate commercial sex, मगर insofar as कॉंग्रेस may विनियमित it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the मन Act.
in most states, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of public order crime, a crime कि disrupts the order of a community.
it was at one time माना to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow brothel prostitution, the शर्तें of which are stipulated in the Nevada संशोधित Statutes.
Only 8 counties currently contain active brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( जिससे contains the Las vegas–paradise महानगर area ), Washoe County ( which contains Reno ), Carson City, Douglas काउंटी, और Lincoln County.
The other काउंटी theoretically allow brothel prostitution, but some of ये काउंटी फिलहाल have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
As साथ other countries, prostitution in the United राज्य can be विभाजित into three व्यापक categories : street prostitution, brothel prostitution, और escort prostitution.
The East Coast of the United States, भी known as the पूर्वी seaboard or the अटलांटिक Seaboard and commonly shortened to East Coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic Ocean.
The states which have shoreline on the East Coast हैं, from north to south, the U.S. states of Maine, नई Hampshire, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, Connecticut, नई यॉर्क, New Jersey, Delaware, Maryland, Virginia, North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia, and Florida.
रिचर्ड Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – अप्रैल 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States, serving from 1969 to 1974, जब he became the only president to resign the दफ्तर.
Nixon had previously परोसा as a रिपब्लिकन U.S. representative and senator from कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as the 36th Vice अध्यक्ष of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in Yorba Linda, California.
He ग्रैजुएट इससे whittier कॉलेज in 1934 and Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He and his wife, Pat Nixon, स्थानांतरित to Washington to work लिये the federal government in 1942.
He subsequently परोसा in the संयुक्त States Navy during संसार युद्ध II.
Nixon was elected in California to the House of Representatives in 1946 and to the सीनेट in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss मामला established his reputation as a leading anti-communist, and elevated him to national prominence.
He was the running mate of ड्वाइट D. Eisenhower, the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election.
निक्सन served for eight years as vice अध्यक्ष.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly losing to John F. Kennedy, and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he भागा again for the प्रेसिडेंसी और थी elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated अमेरिका 's involvement in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
निक्सन 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 खोली diplomatic relations between the two nations, और he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the सोवियत Union the same साल.
domestically, his administration generally embraced policies कि transferred शक्ति from वॉशिंगटन to the states.
Among other things, he शुभारम्भ initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs, imposed wage and price नियंत्रण, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the चंद्र landings beginning with अपोलो 11, he scaled वापस manned space खोजी.
He थी re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
निक्सन 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo, the resignation of his वाइस president, Spiro Agnew, and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by सदस्यों of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing निक्सन much of his political support, and on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the फेस of almost certain impeachment and हटाना from office.
After his इस्तीफा, he controversially received a pardon issued by his successor, Gerald घाट.
In retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक books and undertaking many विदेशी trips, helped to rehabilitate उसके public image.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, and died four days बाद at the age of 81.
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft, Lustral ) is an antidepressant of the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class.
It was introduced to the market by Pfizer in 1991.
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in adult outpatients as well as obsessive–compulsive, panic, and social anxiety disorders in both adults and children.
In 2011, it was the second-most prescribed antidepressant on the U.S. खुदरा market, with 37,208,000 prescriptions.
the efficacy of sertraline for depression is समान to that of older tricyclic antidepressants, but its side प्रभाव are much less pronounced.
मतभेद with newer antidepressants are subtler और also ज़्यादातर confined to side effects.
Evidence suggests that sertraline may work better than fluoxetine ( Prozac ) for some subtypes of depression.
Treatment of panic disorder with sertraline results in a significant घटी of the number of दहशत attacks and in improved quality of life.
For obsessive-compulsive विकार, sertraline is not as effective as cognitive behavioral therapy ; the best results have been achieved by combining these two उपचार.
Although approved for social phobia and posttraumatic stress disorder, sertraline leads to only modest improvement in these शर्तें.
Sertraline भी alleviates the लक्षण of premenstrual dysphoric disorder और can be used in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment.
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications of other SSRIs, with high rates of nausea, diarrhea, insomnia, और sexual side प्रभाव ; however, it करता not cause वज़न लाभ, and its effects on both cognition और सतर्कता are relatively mild.
In pregnant women taking sertraline, the drug थी present in significant concentrations in fetal blood, और was also संबद्ध with a higher rate of various birth defects.
Similarly to other antidepressants, the use of sertraline for depression may be associated with a higher rate of suicidality.
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama film directed by Robert Townsend, जो co-wrote the script with Keenan Ivory Wayans.
वितरित by 20th सदी Fox, the फिल्मी 's main cast includes Townsend, माइकल Wright, Leon रॉबिन्सन, Harry J. Lennix, Tico Wells, Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers, और diahann Carroll.
The plot of the film ( which is loosely आधारित on the lives of several कलाकारों : The dells, The Temptations, Four टॉप, Wilson पिकेट, James Brown, Frankie lymon, Sam cooke and अन्य ) follows the three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five heartbeats.
the फिल्मी depicts the rise and fall of a Motown inspired soul अधिनियम through the eyes of the film 's प्रमुख protagonist, Donald `` Duck '' Matthews ( portrayed by Townsend ), who serves as a narrator throughout the फिल्मी.
However, a majority of the cinema is presented in a consecutive time line as opposed to traditional flash backs.
the film includes a significant amount of असली music conceived by various artists for the फिल्मी 's soundtrack, including singles such as `` A Heart is a House for Love ``, `` We Have n't Finished Yet '', and `` nothing But Love ''.
the film थी released to most North American audiences March 29, 1991 however it was नहीं बना available to audiences in other continents जबतक 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another DVD release in 2006 लिये the film 's 15th anniversary.
The movie received mixed reviews from critics.
Secretariat ( कूच 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
he set रेस records in all तीन events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand आज.
He is considered to be एक of the greatest Thoroughbreds of all समय.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th century, the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http.
He क्रमित second behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the शीर्ष 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century.
Secretariat was sired by Bold Ruler out of Somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
He was foaled at The Meadow in Caroline County, Virginia.
Like his प्रसिद्ध predecessor Man o ' War, सचिवालय थी a large शाहबलूत colt और थी given the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew.
स्वामित्व by Penny Chenery, he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte, साथ with apprentice jockey Paul फेलिसियानो ( first two races ), and दिग्गज Eddie मेपल ( last race ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and white checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, और weighed, with a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
A ठेठ 12 V, 40 Ah lead-acid car battery
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable battery कि supplies electric उर्जा to an automobile.
Usually this refers to an SLI battery ( starting, lighting, ignition ) to शक्ति the starter motor, the lights, and the ignition system of a vehicle’s engine.
Automotive SLI batteries are usually lead-acid type, and are made of six galvanic cells in series to provide a 12 volt system.
प्रत्येक cell provides 2.1 volts for a कुल of 12.6 volt at full charge.
Heavy vehicles such as highway ट्रक or tractors, often equipped with diesel engines, may have two batteries in series for a 24 volt system, or may have parallel strings of batteries.
Lead-acid batteries are बना up of प्लेटों of lead and separate plates of lead dioxide, which are submerged into an electrolyte solution of परिचय 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % जल.
This causes a रासायनिक reaction that रिलीज electrons, allowing उन्हें to प्रवाह through conductors to produce electricity.
As the बैटरी discharges, the एसिड of the electrolyte reacts with the materials of the plates, changing उनके सतह to सीसे sulfate.
When the battery is recharged, the chemical reaction is reversed : the lead sulfate reforms into lead dioxide and सीसे.
साथ the plates restored to their original condition, the प्रक्रम may अभी be repeated.
Battery recycling of automotive batteries reduces the need for resources required for manufacture of new batteries, diverts toxic lead from landfills, and रोकता रिस्क of improper disposal.
Full-time employment is employment in which a person works a minimum number of hours पारिभाषित as such by his/her employer.
Full-time नियुक्ति often comes with benefits that are नहीं typically offered to part-time, temporary, or flexible workers, such as annual leave, sickleave, and health insurance.
Full-time jobs are प्रायः माना careers.
They generally pay more than part-time jobs, and usually carry अधिक घंटों per week.
The Fair मजदूर Standards Act ( FLSA ) does not define full-time employment or part-time employment.
इस is a पदार्थ generally to be determined by the employer ( US Department of मजदूर ).
The परिभाषा by employer can vary and is generally published in a company 's कर्मचारी Handbook.
Companies commonly आवश्यकता from 30–35 or 40 hours per week to be defined as full-time और therefore eligible for benefits.
Full-Time status varies between company and is often based on the shift the employee must work during each work week.
the `` standard '' कार्य week consists of five eight-hour days, commonly served between 9:00AM to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours.
While a four-day week generally consists of चार ten-hour days ; it may also consist of as छोटी as nine घंटों for a कुल of a 36 hour work week.
Twelve-hour शिफ्ट are often three days प्रति week, unless the company has the intention of paying out the employee overtime.
Overtime is legally paid out anytime an employee works more than 40 hours प्रति week.
The विधिक minimum for overtime starts at Base अदा + One-Half.
The increased payout is माना to compensate slightly for the increased fatigue which a व्यक्ति experiences on ऐसे long shifts.
Shifts can also be very irregular, as in retail, but are still full-time if the required क्रमांक of hours is reached.
There are some situations where a व्यक्ति who needs full-time work is dropped to part-time, which is sometimes a रूप of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker.
seahorse is the शीर्षक given to 54 प्रजाति of marine fish in the genus Hippocampus.
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the Ancient Greek hippos meaning `` horse '' and kampos meaning `` समुद्र monster ''.
The Controlled substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United राज्य as Title ii of the व्यापक ड्रग Abuse Prevention and Control अधिनियम of 1970.
The CSA is the federal u.S. drug policy under which the manufacture, importation, possession, उपयोग and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act भी served as the national implementing legislation for the सिंगल Convention on narcotic Drugs.
the legislation निर्मित five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications लिये a substance to be included in each.
Two federal एजेंसियों, the ड्रग प्रवर्तन Administration and the खाना and Drug प्रशासन, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, और कॉंग्रेस has sometimes scheduled other substances through विधान ऐसे as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000, which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an अपरिभाषित पद ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
Maya numerals
Maya numerals are a vigesimal ( base - twenty ) numeral system used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization.
the numerals हैं made up of three प्रतीकों ; zero ( शेल shape ), one ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ).
For उदाहरण, तेरह is written as तीन dots in a horizontal row above two horizontal lines stacked ऊपर each अन्य.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), often referred to as LBJ, was the 36th President of the United States ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after उसके service as the 37th Vice President of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four लोगों जो served in all four elected federal offices of the United राज्य : Representative, Senator, Vice अध्यक्ष, and President.
Johnson, a डेमोक्रेट from Texas, served as a United States Representative from 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961, सहित six सालो as United States Senate Majority Leader, two as Senate Minority Leader and दो as सीनेट Majority Whip.
बाद campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in 1960, Johnson was पूछा by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate लिये the 1960 presidential चुनाव.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the हत्या of जॉन F. Kennedy on November 22, 1963, समाप्त Kennedy 's पद and was elected अध्यक्ष in उसके own right, winning by a विशाल हाशिया over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
जॉनसन was greatly supported by the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी and as अध्यक्ष, he was जिम्मेदार for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that शामिल laws that upheld civil rights, public broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to education, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
जॉनसन was renowned for his domineering personality and the `` Johnson treatment, '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to अग्रिम legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American भागीदारी in the वियतनाम War, इससे 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968, as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged bas.
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in most major cities बाद 1965, and crime दरों soared, as his opponents raised demands for `` law and order '' policies.
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire प्राथमिक, he ended उसके bid लिये reelection.
रिपब्लिकन Richard Nixon was निर्वाचित to succeed उसे.
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency marked the peak of modern उदारतावाद in the United States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by कुछ इतिहासकारों क्युकी of his domestic policies.

प्रोजेस्टेरोन belongs to a class of hormones पुकारा progestogens, और is the major naturally occurring human progestogen.

he जीवनदान in a large nest behind the 123 तिल Street brownstone और has a teddy bear named Radar.

The दूसरी Crusade ( 1145–1149 ) was the second प्रमुख crusade launched from Europe.
The Second Crusade was प्रारंभ in response to the fall of the County of Edessa the previous year to the forces of Zengi.
The county था महरूम founded दौरान the First Crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by baldwin of Boulogne in 1098.
While it थी the first Crusader state to be संस्थापित, it was also the first to fall.
the Second Crusade थी announced by पोप Eugene iii, and was the पहला of the crusades to be led by European kings, namely Louis VII of France and Conrad III of Germany, with help from a number of अन्य European nobles.
The armies of the two kings marched separately across Europe.
After क्रासिंग Byzantine territory into Anatolia, दोनो armies यहूद separately defeated by the Seljuq Turks.
The main Western ईसाई source, Odo of Deuil, and Syriac Christian sources claim that the Byzantine सम्राट Manuel i comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' प्रगति, particularly in Anatolia where he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them.
लुई and कोनराड and the remnants of their सेना reached Jerusalem and, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised attack on दमिश्क.
The crusade in the ईस्ट was a विफलता for the crusaders and a great victory for the Muslims.
It would ultimately have a key influence on the fall of जेरूसलम and दे rise to the Third crusade at the end of the 12th century.
The only कामयाबी of the दूसरी crusade came to a combined force of 13,000 Flemish, Frisian, Norman, English, स्कॉटिश, and German crusaders in 1147.
Travelling from England, by ship, to the पावन Land, the फौज रोका और helped the smaller ( 7,000 ) Portuguese army in the कैप्चर of Lisbon, expelling its मूरिश occupants.
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. ( ), branded as walmart, is an American बहुराष्ट्रीय retail corporation that runs chains of large discount department stores और गोदाम stores.
The company is the संसार 's third largest public निगम, according to the Fortune Global 500 सूची in 2012, the biggest private employer in the world with over दो million कर्मचारी, and is the largest retailer in the world.
Walmart remains a family-owned business, as the company is नियंत्रित by the वाल्टन परिवार, who own a 48 percent हिस्सेदारी in Walmart.
It is also one of the world 's most valuable companies.
The company was founded by Sam Walton in 1962, incorporated on October 31, 1969, and सरेआम traded on the नई York Stock एक्सचेंज in 1972.
It is headquartered in Bentonville, अरकंसास.
Walmart is also the largest किराना retailer in the संयुक्त States.
In 2009, it generated 51 percent of इसके US $ 258 billion sales in the U.S. from किराना business.
It also owns and operates the sam 's Club retail warehouses in North America.
By 1988, Wal-Mart was the most profitable retailer in the US, and by November 1990, it outsold K-mart.
By 1991 it outsold सियर्स in retail, making it America 's largest retailer, a distinction it still holds.
Walmart has 8,500 stores in 15 countries, अंतर्गत 55 different names.
The company operates अंतर्गत the walmart name in the United States, including the 50 states and Puerto Rico.
it operates in Mexico as Walmex, in the United Kingdom as Asda, in Japan as Seiyu, and in India as Best Price.
It has wholly owned operations in अर्जेंटीना, Brazil, और Canada.
walmart 's investments बाहर North America have had mixed results : its operations in the United किंगडम, दक्षिण America, and चीन हैं highly successful, whereas ventures in Germany and South Korea यहूद unsuccessful.

in a करियर dating back to the 1960s, Moore played साथ artists सहित Phil Lynott and Brian Downey during his teens, अग्रणी him to सदस्यताएँ with the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions.
Moore shared the स्टेज साथ such blues and rock luminaries as B.B. King, Albert किंग, Colosseum II, George Harrison and Greg Lake, as well as having a कामयाब सोलो करियर.
He guested on a number of एल्बम recorded by ऊँची profile musicians, including a cameo appearance playing the lead guitar सोलो on `` She 's My Baby `` from Traveling Wilburys Vol. 3.
An example of rack आरोहित servers
a web होस्टिंग service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web होस्ट are कंपनियाँ that provide space on a server स्वामित्व or leased for use by क्लाइंट, as well as providing अंतरजाल connectivity, typically in a data बीच.
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the Internet लिये अन्य servers स्तिथ in उनके data बीच, called colocation, also known as Housing in Latin America or France.
The scope of web hosting services varies greatly.
The most basic is वेब page and small-scale संचिका hosting, where files can be अपलोड via File ट्रांसफ़र प्रोटोकॉल ( एफटीपी ) or a वेब interface.
The files are प्रायः वितरित to the वेब `` as is '' or with minimal प्रसंस्करण.
Many Internet सेवा providers ( isps ) offer this सेवा free to subscribers.
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web page hosting from alternative service providers.
Personal web site hosting is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense depending upon the size and प्रकार of the website.
सिंगल page hosting is generally sufficient for personal वेब पृष्ठों.
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package कि provides डेटाबेस support and अनुप्रयोग development platforms ( e.g. पीएचपी, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These सुविधाएं allow customers to write or install scripts for applications जैसे forums और content management.
Also, Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The मेजबान may भी provide an इंटरफ़ेस or control panel for managing the Web server और installing scripts, as well as other modules and service applications like e-mail.
कुछ hosts specialize in निश्चित software or सेवाएं ( e.g. e-commerce ), which are commonly used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
obstetrics ( from the Latin obstare, `` to स्टैंड by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the परवाह of सब women 's reproductive tracts and their children दौरान pregnancy ( prenatal period ), childbirth and the postnatal period.
अनेक obstetricians are also स्त्रीरोग, meaning they perform in दोनो specialties.
in the संयुक्त States, these physicians हैं commonly referred to as OB/GYNs.
The Wright brothers, Orville ( August 19, 1871 – जनवरी 30, 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – may 30, 1912 ), were two अमरीकी भाइयो, inventors, and aviation pioneers who were credited साथ inventing and building the world 's पहला कामयाब वायुयान and making the first नियंत्रित, powered and sustained heavier-than-air human उड़ान, on December 17, 1903.
From 1905 to 1907, the brothers विकसित their flying machine into the first practical fixed-wing aircraft.
Although नहीं the first to build and fly experimental aircraft, the Wright भाइयो यहूद the first to invent aircraft controls that बना fixed-wing powered flight possible.
The भाइयो ' fundamental breakthrough was their invention of three-axis control, which enabled the pilot to steer the aircraft effectively and to maintain its equilibrium.
इस विधि became standard and remains standard on fixed-wing वायुयान of सब kinds.
From the शुरूआत of their aeronautical कार्य, the Wright brothers focused on developing a reliable method of pilot control as the key to solving `` the flying problem ''.
This approach differed significantly from other experimenters of the time who put more जोर on developing powerful engines.
Using a छोटी homebuilt wind टनल, the wrights also एकत्रित more accurate data than any before, enabling them to design and build विंग्स and propellers that were more efficient than any पहले.
Their first U.S. patent, 821,393, did नहीं अर्जी invention of a उड़ती यंत्र, but rather, the invention of a system of aerodynamic control that manipulated a flying यंत्र 's surfaces.
They gained the mechanical कौशल essential for their success by working for सालो in उनके shop with printing दबाता, bicycles, motors, and अन्य मशीनरी.
Their work with bicycles in particular influenced their belief that an अस्थिर vehicle जैसे a उड़ती machine could be controlled and balanced with practice.
From 1900 until उनके first powered flights in late 1903, they conducted extensive glider tests that also developed their skills as पायलटों.
Their bicycle shop employee चार्ली टेलर became an important part of the team, building their first वायुयान engine in close collaboration साथ the brothers.
The राइट brothers ' status as inventors of the airplane has महरूम विषय to counter-claims by विभिन्न parties.
Much विवाद persists over the many competing claims of जल्दी aviators.
