exxon Mobil निगम, or exxonmobil, is an American multinational oil and gas निगम headquartered in Irving, Texas, संयुक्त States.
it is a direct descendant of John D. Rockefeller 's Standard Oil company, and थी formed on नवम्बर 30, 1999, by the विलय of Exxon and Mobil.
It is संबद्ध with Imperial Oil which operates in कनाडा.
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest company by revenue और in 2013, became the largest सरेआम traded company by market capitalization in the world.
The company is ranked # 5 globally in Forbes Global 2000 list in 2013.
exxon Mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and, at then ( 2007 ) rates of production, are expected to last over 14 years.
With 37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a संयुक्त daily शोधन capacity of, Exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the world, a title that was also संबद्ध with Standard Oil since its incorporation in 1870.
exxonmobil is the largest of the world 's supermajors with daily production of 3.921 million BOE ( barrels of oil equivalent ).
in 2008, this was approximately 3 % of संसार production, जिससे is less than अनेक of the largest state-owned petroleum कंपनियाँ.
When ranked by आयल and गैस reserves it is 14th in the world with less than 1 % of the total.
a 2012 आलेख in The Daily Telegraph says that exxonmobil has `` grown into one of the planet’s most hated corporations, able to determine अमरीकी foreign नीति and the fate of entire nations ''.
In शर्तें of इसके पर्यावरणीय record, ExxonMobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to them by dictatorships, ऐसे as those in Chad and Equatorial गिनी.
Lee Raymond, the corporation’s chief कार्यपालिका until 2005, was `` notoriously sceptical about climate change and disliked सरकारी interference at any level ''.
The company was widely criticized for इसके slow response to cleaning its 1989 Valdez oil spill in Alaska.
This article is about the Globe Theatre of Shakespeare.
For the modern reconstruction in London, see Shakespeare 's Globe.
लिये other uses, देखिए ग्लोब Theatre ( disambiguation ).
The Globe Theatre थी a theatre in London associated with William Shakespeare.
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company, the Lord Chamberlain 's मेन, on land owned by थामस Brend and inherited by his son, Nicholas Brend and पोता Sir Matthew Brend, and was नष्ट by fire on 29 June 1613.
A second Globe Theatre थी built on the same site by June 1614 और बंद in 1642.
A modern reconstruction of the Globe, नामित `` Shakespeare 's Globe ``, opened in 1997 लगभग from the साईट of the original थिएटर.
It 's a Wonderful जीवन is a 1946 American क्रिसमस drama फिल्मी produced and directed by Frank Capra, based on the short स्टोरी `` The Greatest Gift ``, which Philip Van Doren Stern wrote in 1939 and privately प्रकाशित in 1945.
The film is माना one of the most loved films in American cinema and has become traditional viewing during the क्रिसमस season, alongside popular classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas कैरोल.
The film stars James Stewart as George बेली, a man who has given up his dreams in order to help others and जिनकी imminent suicide on Christmas Eve brings परिचय the हस्तक्षेप of his guardian angel, Clarence Odbody ( Henry Travers ).
Clarence shows George all the जीवनदान he has touched and how different life in his community of Bedford Falls होता be had he never been born.
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to ऊँची production costs and stiff competition at the time of इसके रिलीज, the film has come to be regarded as a classic and is a staple of Christmas television around the world.
Theatrically, the film 's break-even point was actually $ 6.3 million, approximately twice the production cost, a फिगर it never came close to achieving in its initial release.
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` Although it was not the complete बक्सा दफ्तर failure that today everyone believes... it was initially a major disappointment and confirmed, at least to the studios, that Capra was no longer capable of turning out the populist features that made his films the must-see, money-making events they once यहूद. ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and has been recognized by the अमरीकी Film Institute as एक of the 100 best American films ever made, placing number 11 on its initial 1998 greatest movie list, and would भी प्लेस number one on its list of the most inspirational American films of all समय.
Data Warehouse Overview
In computing, a data warehouse or enterprise data warehouse ( DW, DWH, or edw ) is a database used for reporting and data विश्लेषण.
It is a सेंट्रल repository of data which is created by integrating data इससे one or more disparate sources.
Data warehouses store current as well as ऐतिहासिक आंकड़ा and हैं used लिये creating trending reports लिये senior management रिपोर्टिंग such as सालाना and quarterly comparisons.
The data stored in the warehouse are अपलोड from the operational systems ( such as marketing, sales etc., shown in the figure to the right ).
The data may pass through an operational data store for additional operations before they are used in the dw for reporting.
The typical ETL -based data warehouse uses staging, data integration, and access परतों to house its कुंजी functions.
The स्टेजिंग layer or staging database stores raw data निकाली from each of the disparate सोर्स data systems.
The integration layer integrates the disparate data sets by transforming the data from the staging layer प्रायः storing this transformed data in an operational data store ( ODS ) database.
The integrated data हैं then moved to yet another database, प्रायः called the आंकड़ा गोदाम database, जहाँ the data is arranged into hierarchical groups often called आयाम and into facts और कुल facts.
The combination of facts and dimensions is sometimes पुकारा a star schema.
The अभिगम परत helps users retrieve data.
A data गोदाम constructed from an integrated data सोर्स systems does not require ETL, स्टेजिंग databases, or operational data store databases.
the एकीकृत data source systems may be माना to be a part of a distributed operational data store layer.
Data federation methods or data virtualization methods may be used to access the distributed एकीकृत source data systems to consolidate और aggregate आंकड़ा सीधे into the data warehouse डेटाबेस tables.
Unlike the ETL-based data warehouse, the integrated source data systems and the data गोदाम are all integrated चूंकि there is no transformation of dimensional or reference data.
This एकीकृत आंकड़ा warehouse architecture supports the drill down from the aggregate data of the data warehouse to the transactional data of the एकीकृत source data systems.
Data warehouses can be subdivided into आंकड़ा marts.
Data marts store subsets of data from a warehouse.
This definition of the data गोदाम focuses on data storage.
The प्रमुख source of the data is cleaned, transformed, cataloged and बना available for use by managers and other business professionals for data mining, online analytical processing, मार्केट research और निर्णय support ( marakas & o'brien 2009 ).
however, the means to retrieve and analyze data, to extract, transform and load data, and to manage the data शब्दकोष are also माना अनिवार्य components of a आंकड़ा warehousing system.
अनेक references to data warehousing use this broader कॉन्टेक्स्ट.
Thus, an expanded definition for data warehousing includes कारोबार intelligence tools, tools to extract, transform and लोड आंकड़ा into the repository, and tools to manage and retrieve metadata.
Portland stone quarry on the Isle of Portland, England
An abandoned निर्माण aggregate quarry near Adelaide, South Australia
a quarry is a type of open-pit mine from जिससे rock or खनिज are extracted.
Quarries are generally used for extracting building materials, such as आयाम स्टोन, construction aggregate, riprap, sand, and बजरी.
वे हैं often collocated with concrete and डामर पौधे due to the requirement लिये large amounts of aggregate in those materials.
Open mines that produce minerals are typically referred to as open pit mines.
The word quarry can शामिल underground quarrying for स्टोन, such as Bath स्टोन.
mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural group related to Mormonism, the principal branch of the latter Day संत movement of Restorationist christianity, which began with the visions of Joseph स्मिथ in upstate New यॉर्क दौरान the 1820s.
After Smith 's death in 1844 the Mormons followed ब्रिघम Young to what होता become the यूटा Territory.
Today Mormons are समझा to be members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ).
Some Mormons हैं also either स्वतंत्र or non-practicing.
The center of Mormon सांस्कृतिक influence is in यूटा, and North America has अधिक Mormons than any other continent, though the majority of Mormons live outside the United States.
Mormons have developed a दमदार भाव of communality that तना from their doctrine and history.
During the 19th century Mormon converts tended to gather to a central geographic location, and between 1852 and 1890 a minority of Mormons openly practiced plural marriage, a form of religious polygamy.
Mormons dedicate large amounts of समय और resources to serving in their गिरिजाघर, और many young mormons चुनें to serve a full-time proselytizing mission.
Mormons have a स्वास्थ्य code कि eschews alcoholic पेय, tobacco, कॉफी, tea, and अन्य addictive substances.
वे tend to be very family-oriented, and have strong connections आरपार generations and with विस्तारित family, reflective of their belief that families can be sealed together beyond death and throughout eternity.
Mormons also have a strict law of शुद्धता, requiring abstention from sexual संबंध outside of marriage and strict fidelity within marriage.
Mormons self-identify as ईसाई, though some of their beliefs differ from mainstream Christianity.
Mormons believe in the Bible, as खूब as other किताबे of scripture, such as the Book of Mormon.
They have a unique view of cosmology, and मानना that सब people हैं spirit-children of God.
Mormons believe that returning to परमेश्वर requires following the example of Jesus Christ, और accepting his atonement through ordinances ऐसे as baptism.
They believe that Christ 's church was लौटी through Joseph Smith, and is guided by living prophets and रसूलों.
Central to mormon faith is the विश्वास that परमेश्वर speaks to his children और जवाब उनके prayers.
In financial accounting, एसेट हैं economic resources.
anything ठोस or intangible that is capable of being स्वामित्व or controlled to produce value and कि is आयोजित to have positive economic मान is considered an asset.
बस stated, assets represent value of ownership that can be converted into नकदी ( although cash itself is also considered an asset ).
The balance चादर of a firm रिकॉर्ड the monetaryJ.
G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest जेब CPA '', Wiley, 2005.There are different विधि of assessing the मौद्रिक value of the एसेट अंकित on the संतुलन चादर.
In some मामले, the Historical Cost is प्रयुक्त ; ऐसे कि the value of the asset when it was खरीदा in the पास्ट is used as the monetary value.
In other instances, the present मेला market value of the asset is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet.
value of the assets owned by the firm.
It is money and अन्य valuables belonging to an व्यक्तिगत or business.
Two major एसेट वर्ग are ठोस assets and intangible assets.
Tangible assets contain various subclasses, including current assets और fixed assets.J.
Downes, J.E. Goodman, `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 वर्तमान assets include inventory, while fixed assets include such items as buildings and उपकरण.J. Downes, J.E. Goodman, `` शब्दकोष of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial मार्गदर्शिका, 2003 ; और J. G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. shim, `` The Vest Pocket CPA '', wiley, 2005.
Intangible assets are nonphysical resources and अधिकारों that have a value to the firm because they give the firm some kind of advantage in the market place.
Examples of intangible एसेट are goodwill, copyrights, trademarks, patents and computer programs, and financial assets, including such items as accounts receivable, bonds and stocks.
A neuron ( or ; also known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically excitable cell that processes and transmits information through electrical and chemical signals.
a chemical signal occurs via a अन्तर्ग्रथन, a specialized connection with other cells.
Neurons connect to each other to form neural networks.
Neurons are the core components of the nervous system, which includes the दिमाग, spinal cord, और peripheral ganglia.
A number of specialized types of neurons मौजूद : संवेदी neurons respond to touch, ध्वनि, light and numerous other stimuli affecting cells of the sensory organs that then send signals to the spinal cord and दिमाग.
मोटर neurons प्राप्त signals from the brain and spinal cord, कारण मांसपेशी contractions, and affect glands.
Interneurons connect neurons to other न्यूरॉन्स भीतर the same region of the brain or spinal cord.
A ठेठ neuron possesses a cell body ( often called the soma ), dendrites, और an axon.
Dendrites हैं thin structures that arise from the cell body, often extending लिये सैंकड़ों of micrometres and branching multiple times, giving rise to a जटिल `` dendritic tree ''.
An axon is a खास cellular extension that arises इससे the cell body at a साईट called the axon hillock और travels for a distance, as far as 1 मीटर in humans or even more in other species.
The cell देह of a neuron frequently gives rise to अनेक dendrites, but never to more than one axon, हालांकि the axon may branch सैंकड़ों of टाइम्स before it terminates.
At the majority of synapses, signals are भेजा from the axon of one neuron to a dendrite of another.
वहीँ are, however, many exceptions to these rules : neurons that lack dendrites, neurons कि have no axon, synapses that connect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, etc.
All neurons हैं electrically excitable, maintaining voltage gradients across their membranes by means of metabolically चलित ion पंपों, which combine with ion channels अंतःस्थापित in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular विशेषज्ञता differences of ions such as sodium, potassium, chloride, and कैल्सियम.
Changes in the cross-membrane voltage can alter the फलन of voltage-dependent ion channels.
If the voltage परिवर्तन by a विशाल enough amount, an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called an action संभावित is generated, which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon, and activates synaptic connections with other cells when it arrives.
Neurons do नहीं undergo कोशिका division.
In most cases, neurons are generated by special types of स्टेम cells.
Astrocytes, a type of glial cell, have also been observed to turn into neurons by virtue of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency.
In humans, neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but in two brain क्षेत्रों, the hippocampus और olfactory bulb, there is strong evidence for पीढी of substantial numbers of new न्यूरॉन्स.
Super Bowl xliii was an American football game between the American Football सम्मेलन ( AFC ) champion Pittsburgh Steelers and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide the National फ़ुटबॉल League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 ऋतु.
The Steelers defeated the Cardinals by the score of 27–23.
The game was played on फ़रवरी 1, 2009, at रेमंड James Stadium in Tampa, Florida.
With this win, the Steelers became the first team to win six Super प्याले.
Pittsburgh, who finished the regular season with a 12–4 record, भी won their second Super कटोरी in चार सालो after winning सुपर Bowl xl at the end of the 2005 season.
the Cardinals entered the game seeking their first NFL title since 1947, the longest championship सूखा in the league.
The क्लबों became an unexpected winner दौरान the regular ऋतु, compiling a 9–7 record, and the playoffs with the aid of head coach Ken whisenhunt, जो थी the Steelers ' offensive समन्वयक in Super Bowl XL, and the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt warner, who was the सुपर Bowl mvp in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team, St. Louis Rams.
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 halftime सीसे, aided by linebacker James Harrison 's Super Bowl record 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.
Trailing 20–7 at the प्रारंभ of the fourth quarter, Arizona scored 16 unanswered points, सहित wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown रिसेप्शन, to लो the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game.
लकिन the Steelers marched 78 yards to score on wide receiver Santonio Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left.
Holmes, जो caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown, including four receptions लिये 73 yards on that final game-winning drive, was named सुपर कटोरी mvp.
He became the छठे wide receiver to win the award, and also was the third Pittsburgh receiver to win the award, following Lynn swann and Hines Ward.
Despite the वैश्विक financial crisis and limited amount of ancillary festivities that are सामान्यतः held before the खेल, the एनबीसी television network broadcast attracted an औसत U.S. दर्शक of 98.7 million viewers, making it the most देखी Super Bowl in history to कि point.
A diagram of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum, showing various properties across the range of बारंबारता and wavelengths
the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम is the range of all possible frequencies of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning, and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or अवशोषित by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
the limit for long wavelengths is the आकार of the universe itself, while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length, हालांकि in principle the spectrum is infinite and निरन्तर.
सबसे parts of the electromagnetic spectrum हैं used in science लिये spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize matter.
in addition, radiation from various भाग of the spectrum रै found अनेक other उपयोग for communications और manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ).

Marchantia, a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name used to refer to all embryophytes ( land पौधे ) that do नहीं have सच्चा vascular tissue and are therefore called ' non-vascular plants '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the transport of water ; however since these do not contain lignin, they are not considered to be सच्चा vascular tissue.
फिलहाल bryophytes are विचार not to be a natural or monophyletic group ; however the name is convenient and remains in use as a collective term लिये mosses, hornworts, and liverworts.
Bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia and sporangia ), but they produce neither flowers nor seeds, reproducing via बीजाणुओं.
The पद bryophyte comes from Greek βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant ''.
A bank is a financial institution and a financial intermediary that accepts deposits and channels those deposits into lending activities, either सीधे by loaning or indirectly through capital markets.
A बैंको is the connection between customers that have capital deficits and customers with capital surpluses.
Due to their influence within a financial प्रणाली and an economy, banks are generally highly regulated in most countries.
Most banks operate under a प्रणाली ज्ञात as fractional reserve banking where they hold only a small reserve of the funds deposited and lend out the बाकी for profit.
They हैं generally subject to minimum capital आवश्यकताएँ which are आधारित on an international set of capital standards, known as the Basel Accords.
The oldest bank still in existence is Monte dei paschi di Siena, headquartered in Siena, Italy, which has महरूम operating continuously since 1472.
It is followed by Berenberg Bank of Hamburg ( 1590 ) and Sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ).
Banking in its modern sense विकसित in rich cities of Renaissance Italy, such as फ्लोरेंस, Venice and Genoa.
in the history of banking, a number of banking dynasties —among उन्हें notably Medici, Fugger, Welser, Berenberg, Baring and Rothschild —have निभाई a सेंट्रल role over many centuries.
the एक्सबॉक्स is a video game console manufactured by Microsoft.
It थी released on November 15, 2001 in उत्तर America, February 22, 2002 in Japan, and March 14, 2002 in Australia and Europe.
It was Microsoft 's पहला foray into the gaming console market.
as part of the sixth-generation of gaming, the Xbox competed with Sony 's PlayStation 2, Sega 's dreamcast ( which stopped American sales before the Xbox went on बिक्री ), and निन्टेंडो 's GameCube.
The Xbox was the पहला console offered by an अमरीकी company after the Atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996.
The integrated Xbox सजीव service launched in November 2002 allowed players to खेल games online with a ब्रॉडबैंड connection.
It first competed साथ Dreamcast 's online service but बाद primarily competed with PlayStation 2 's ऑनलाइन सेवा.
Although these two are free while Xbox सजीव जरूरी a subscription, as well as broadband-only connection जिससे was not completely adopted yet, Xbox Live was a कामयाबी due to बेहतर servers, features such as a buddy list, and milestone titles like हेलो 2 released in नवम्बर 2004, which is the best-selling Xbox video game and थी by far the most popular online game for years.
Xbox 's successor, the एक्सबॉक्स 360, थी शुभारम्भ in नवम्बर 2005.
The Xbox was discontinued in late 2005 in Japan where sales were poor.
It was discontinued in late 2006 in Europe and early 2007 in North America.
The last Xbox game in Europe was Tony Hawk 's Project 8 released in November 2006, and the पिछला game in North America was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008.
support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was discontinued on March 2, 2009, stating that any in-warranty repair now needed will not be undertaken.
Xbox access to Xbox Live was stopped on अप्रैल 15, 2010.
The इन्जील According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the इन्जील of John or simply John and often referred to in New Testament scholarship as the चौथी इन्जील, is an account of the पब्लिक ministry of यीशु.
It begins साथ the witness and affirmation by John the Baptist and concludes with the मौत, burial, resurrection, and post-resurrection appearances of Jesus.
This account is fourth of the canonical gospels, after the synoptics Matthew, Mark and ल्यूक.
states that the book derives from the testimony of the ' शिष्य जिसको Jesus loved. '
साथ with Peter, the unnamed disciple is especially close to यीशु, and early-church tradition identified him as जॉन the Apostle, one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles.
the gospel is closely सम्बन्धित in style and content to the three surviving Epistles of John such that commentators treat the four books together, yet, according to most modern scholars, जॉन was not the author of any of these books.
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more and अधिक has placed John within a first-century यहूदी context.
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering कार्य to trace the development of the परंपरा from which the इन्जील arose.
The प्रवचन seem to be concerned with the actual issues of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time when the इन्जील was written.
It is notable that, in the gospel, the community still appears to define itself primarily against Judaism, rather than as part of a wider ईसाई church.
Though Christianity started as a movement within Judaism, gradually Christians and यहूदियों became bitterly opposed.
जॉन presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics, meaning that it describes Jesus as the incarnation of the divine लोगो through जिसको all things were made, as the object of veneration, and more explicitly as God incarnate.
तभी in John does Jesus talk at length about himself and उसके divine भूमिका, often shared with the disciples only.
Against the synoptics, John focuses largely on different miracles ( including resurrecting Lazarus ), given as signs meant to engender faith.
Synoptic elements ऐसे as parables and exorcisms are not मिला in John.
It presents a एहसास eschatology in जिससे salvation is already present for the believer.
The Plagues of Egypt ( ), also called the Ten plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues, were ten calamities that, according to the biblical Book of Exodus, Israel 's God, Yahweh, inflicted upon Egypt to राजी Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery.
pharaoh capitulated after the tenth plague, triggering the Exodus of the Jewish people.
The plagues were designed to contrast the शक्ति of Yahweh with the impotence of Egypt 's various देवताओं.
Some टीकाकारों have associated अनेक of the plagues with judgment on विशिष्ट gods associated with the Nile, fertility and प्राकृतिक phenomena.
The plagues of Egypt are भी mentioned in the Quran ( 7,133–136 ).
According to the Book of Exodus, God proclaims that all the देवताओं of Egypt होगा be judged through the दसवाँ and final plague:
John Martin 's painting of the plague of hail and fire ( 1823 ).
A role-playing game ( आरपीजी and sometimes roleplaying game ) is a खेल in which players assume the भूमिकाएँ of characters in a fictional setting.
Players take responsibility for एक्टिंग out these roles within a narrative, either through literal acting or through a process of संरचित decision-making or अक्षर development.
Actions taken within अनेक games सफल or असफल according to a formal system of rules and guidelines.
There are several forms of RPG.
The असली रूप, sometimes called the tabletop RPG, is conducted through discussion, whereas in live action role-playing games ( LARP ) players physically perform their characters ' actions.
In both of these forms, an arranger पुकारा a game निपुण ( GM ) प्रायः decides on the rules और setting to be used and acts as referee, while each of the other players plays the role of a single character.
Several varieties of RPG also exist in electronic media, such as multi-player text-based muds and their graphics-based successors, massively multiplayer online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ).
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing video games in which players control a character or team who undertake quests, and may शामिल capabilities that अग्रिम using statistical mechanics.
These games often share जमावट and नियम साथ tabletop RPGs, but emphasize character उन्नति अधिक than collaborative storytelling.
despite this variety of forms, कुछ खेल फ़ॉर्म such as trading card games और wargames that हैं related to role-playing games may not be included.
Role-playing activity may sometimes be present in ऐसे खेल, but it is not the primary focus.
The term is also sometimes used to describe roleplay simulation games and exercises used in शिक्षण, प्रशिक्षण, और academic research.
the American Civil War ( ACW ), भी known as the युद्ध between the States or बस the Civil War ( see नामकरण ), was a civil war fought इससे 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of गुलामी, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
विदेशी शक्तियां did not intervene.
After four years of bloody कॉम्बैट that left over 600,000 soldiers dead और destroyed much of the दक्षिण 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln won, but पहले his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave राज्य formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would not initiate civil युद्ध.
Eight remaining स्लेव states continued to reject काल्स लिये secession.
confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
a Peace Conference failed to find a सुलह, and both sides prepared for युद्ध.
The Confederates assumed that European देशों were so dependent on `` किंग Cotton `` that वे होता intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of अमेरिका.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब Confederate forces fired upon Fort sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in दक्षिण Carolina.
Lincoln called लिये each राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their कुल to ग्यारह.
The Union जल्द controlled the border states and established a नवल blockade that अबोध the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with confederate retreat at the Battle of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, which बना समाप्ति slavery a war लक्ष्य.
to the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their पश्चिमी armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in दो at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western थिएटर, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy इससे all directions, और could afford to fight लड़ाइयों of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the confederate capital.
the defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox अदालत House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War थी one of the earliest true औद्योगिक wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American इतिहास, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers और an undetermined number of civilian हताहत.
Historian जॉन Huddleston estimates the death टोल at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 प्रतिशत of सब Southern श्वेत males aged 18–40.
The definition of the world 's व्यस्ततम airport रै been specified by the एयरपोर्ट Council अंतरराष्ट्रीय in Geneva, Switzerland.
The ACI defines and measures the following three types of विमानक्षेत्र traffic:
Passenger traffic : total passengers emplaned and deplaned, passengers in पारगमन गिने once
Cargo traffic : loaded and unloaded freight और mail in metric tonnes
Traffic movements : landings और take-offs of aircraft
World War i ( WWI ) थी a वैश्विक war centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from इसके occurrence जबतक the start of World युद्ध II in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved सब the world 's ग्रेट powers, which were समवेत in दो opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) and the सेंट्रल Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary था लिया the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and विस्तारित as more nations entered the war : Italy, जापानी and the संयुक्त States joined the Allies, and the उस्मानी Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
ultimately, अधिक than 70 million military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons बगैर corresponding improvements in protection or गतिशीलता.
It थी the fifth- deadliest conflict in world इतिहास, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the war was the resurgence of साम्राज्यवाद in the foreign policies of the ग्रेट powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic संकट when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at युद्ध and, via their colonies, the conflict जल्द spread around the संसार.
On 28 जुलाई, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the way to France, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
बाद the German march on Paris थी brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition साथ a trench line that changed little जबतक 1917.
On the पूर्वी सामने, the Russian फौज थी successful विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but थी stopped in its आक्रमण of East Prussia by the Germans.
in November the Ottoman Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia और the sinai.
Italy और Bulgaria went to war in 1915 और Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's सरकारी collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the russians to terms with the सेंट्रल Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began प्रवेश the trenches.
Germany, which था its अपना trouble with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory for the Allies.
Events on the घर fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants आजमाया to mobilize their manpower और economic resources to fight a total युद्ध.
by the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the जर्मनी, Russian, austro-hungarian and उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe was redrawn into अनेक smaller states.
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict.
the European nationalism spawned by the war और the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems साथ the सन्धि of Versailles are सहमत to be factors contributing to World War II.
the deepwater Horizon आयल spill ( also referred to as the BP आयल spill, the BP oil disaster, the Gulf of Mexico oil spill, and the Macondo blowout ) was an oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico on the BP -operated Macondo prospect, considered the largest accidental marine oil spill in the इतिहास of the petroleum उद्योग, estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in आवाज़ than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill.
following the विस्फोट और डूब of the Deepwater Horizon oil rig, जिससे claimed 11 lives, a sea-floor oil gusher flowed unabated for 87 days, until it was capped on 15 July 2010.
the total discharge is estimated at.
A massive response ensued to protect beaches, wetlands and estuaries from the spreading oil utilizing skimmer ships, floating booms, controlled burns and of Corexit oil dispersant.
After several failed efforts to contain the flow, the खूब was declared sealed on 19 सितंबर 2010.
कुछ reports indicate the well site continues to leak.
Due to the months-long spill, along with adverse प्रभाव from the response and cleanup activities, extensive क्षति to marine and wildlife habitats, fishing और tourism industries, and human health problems have continued through 2013.Three years after the spill, तारकोल balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast.
Numerous investigations explored the causes of the explosion और record-setting spill.
Notably, the u.S. government 's सितंबर 2011 report pointed to defective cement on the well, faulting mostly BP, but also well operator transocean and ठेकेदार Halliburton.
Earlier in 2011, a White House आयोग likewise blamed BP and its partners लिये a श्रेणी of cost-cutting निर्णय and an insufficient safety प्रणाली, but also concluded that the spill resulted from `` प्रणालीगत '' root causes and `` absent significant reform in both industry practices and government policies, might well recur ''.
In November 2012, BP and the United States Department of Justice settled federal criminal charges with BP pleading guilty to 11 counts of manslaughter, two misdemeanors, and a felony count of lying to कॉंग्रेस.
BP also सहमत to चार सालो of government monitoring of its safety practices और ethics, and the Environmental Protection Agency announced that BP would be temporarily बैन from नई contracts with the US government.
BP और the Department of Justice सहमत to a record-setting $ 4.525 billion in जुर्माना और other भुगतान but further विधिक proceedings not expected to conclude until 2014 are ongoing to determine payouts and fines under the Clean Water Act and the Natural संसाधन Damage Assessment.
As of February 2013, criminal and civil settlements and भुगतान to a trust fund had cost the company $ 42.2 billion.
`` Where the Streets have No Name '' is a सोंग by rock band U2.
It is the opening track from their 1987 एल्बम The Joshua Tree and was released as the album 's third single in अगस्त 1987.
The song 's hook is a repeating गिटार arpeggio using a विलंब effect, निभाई during the सोंग 's introduction and again at the end.
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that it is possible to identify a person 's religion and income based on the गली on which वे lived, particularly in Belfast.
During the band 's difficulties recording the सोंग, producer Brian Eno considered erasing the सोंग 's tapes to have them start इससे scratch.
`` Where the Streets Have no Name '' was praised by आलोचकों and became a commercial success, peaking at number thirteen in the US, number fourteen in Canada, number ten in the Netherlands, and number four in the United Kingdom.
The सोंग has become one of the band 's most लोकप्रिय songs and रै remained a स्टेपल of उनके live act since the song debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour.
The song was notably performed on a Los Angeles rooftop for the filming of its music video, which won a Grammy Award for Best Performance Music Video.Recently the song has been used by the NFL 's Baltimore ravens as their प्रवेश song in Super Bowl xlvii
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks ( born July 9, 1956 ) is an American actor, producer, writer, and निदेशक.
Hanks is known for उसके roles in Apollo 13, बिग, That Thing You Do !
, the Green Mile, You 've Got Mail, Sleepless in Seattle, Charlie विल्सन 's युद्ध, Catch Me If You Can, Forrest Gump, Cast Away, A League of Their Own, The Da Vinci कोड, फ़रिश्ते & Demons, as well as एनिमेटेड films like the Toy Story film series, The Polar Express, and The Simpsons Movie.
He has earned and been nominated for numerous awards दौरान his career, including winning a Golden Globe for Best Actor and an Academy पुरस्कार लिये Best Actor for उसके role in Philadelphia and a सुनहरी Globe, an Academy पुरस्कार, a स्क्रीन Actors Guild पुरस्कार, and a People 's चुनाव पुरस्कार for Best Actor for his भूमिका in Forrest Gump, और earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004.
Hanks is also ज्ञात for his collaboration with film director Steven Spielberg on छायांकन निजी Ryan and the mini-series Band of Brothers, which launched Hanks also as a successful director, निर्माता and writer.
as of 2012, Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 billion at the संयुक्त States बक्सा office alone, and over $ 8.5 billion worldwide making him the highest all-time box दफ्तर star.
The केप is an American सुपरहीरो drama series.
It premiered on NBC दौरान the 2010–2011 television ऋतु as a mid-season replacement beginning with a two-hour पायलट एपीसोड on संडे, January 9, 2011 at 9 pm Eastern and Pacific समय.

Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from धरती every 75–76 years.
हैली is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye from Earth, और यूँ the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime.
अन्य naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be brighter और more spectacular, but will appear only एकबार in thousands of years.
Halley 's रिटर्न to the भीतरी Solar प्रणाली have been observed और recorded by खगोलशास्त्रियों since at least 240 BCE.
साफ records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese, babylonian, and medieval European chroniclers, but यहूद not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the समय.
the comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by English astronomer Edmond Halley, after जिसको it is now named.
Halley 's Comet पिछला appeared in the inner Solar System in 1986 और will next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and टेल formation.
These observations supported a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction, particularly Fred whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model, which correctly predicted कि Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, कार्बन dioxide and ammonia – और dust.
The missions also provided आंकड़ा which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, और कि only a छोटी portion of it is icy.
The following is a list of the most populous incorporated places of the संयुक्त States of अमेरिका.
As defined by the संयुक्त States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations, including city, कस्बा, village, borough, and municipality.
A few exceptional Census Designated स्थान ( CDPs ) are also included in the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a पृथक type of सरकारी that includes the संपूर्ण population of a county, or county equivalent.
Some संचित city-counties, however, include multiple incorporated places.
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a भाग of another incorporated प्लेस.
Note that this सूची refers तभी to the population of व्यक्तिगत municipalities within उनके defined limits, which does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident when considering U.S. metropolitan area populations.

Their story is एक of travail and survival in a हर्ष New World environment.
A New Zealand forward ( in श्वेत ) takes a shot on goal against Cameroon in the 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup.
Forwards, also known as strikers, are the players on a team in association फ़ुटबॉल who play nearest to the opposing team 's goal, और are therefore principally responsible for scoring goals.
This very advanced position और इसके सीमित रक्षात्मक responsibilities औसत forwards normally score more लक्ष्य than अन्य players.
This स्थिति requires intelligence, speed, and power, both of execution and of thought, to perform the भूमिका खूब.
Modern team formations प्रायः include one to three forwards ; two is the most common.
Coaches typically field एक striker who plays in an advanced position ( the centre forward ), and another attacking forward who plays somewhat deeper and assists in making goals as well as scoring ( the second स्ट्राइकर ).
It should be noted that inside forwards develop from attacking midfield positions और hence are naturally midfielders.
Barcelona fc star Lionel Messi is a typical Attacking Midfielder देखी as a forward due to उसके shot accuracy.
A California घरेलू partnership is a legal relationship available to same-sex couples, and to certain opposite-sex युगल in जिससे at least one party is at least 18 years of age.
It affords the couple `` the same rights, protections, and benefits, and... the same responsibilities, obligations, and कर्तव्य under law... '' as married spouses.
Enacted in 1999, the domestic partnership registry थी the first of its kind in the United राज्य created by a विधानमंडल without court intervention.
Initially, domestic partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally just hospital-visitation rights and the right to be claimed as a अगला of kin of the estate of a deceased संगी.
The legislature has since expanded the scope of California घरेलू partnerships to include सब of the rights and responsibilities common to marriage.
As such, California domestic partnerships are functionally equivalent to civil unions offered in several other states.
Although the program enjoys व्यापक support in California, it रै been the सोर्स of some controversy.
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have challenged the विस्तार of domestic partnerships in अदालत.
conversely, advocates of same-sex marriage contend that anything कम than full marriage rights विस्तारित to same-sex partners is analogous to the `` separate but equal '' racial laws of the Jim Crow era.
Mark A. Jackson ( born April 1, 1965 ) is an American basketball कोच, and पूर्व player जो is the current सिर coach of the Golden State Warriors of the NBA.
A पाइंट गार्ड from St. जॉन 's University, he played for the New York Knicks, Indiana Pacers, Los Angeles Clippers, Denver Nuggets, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning इससे 1987 to 2004.
Jackson रै also worked as a commentator for ESPN and ABC alongside his former coach Jeff वैन Gundy and play-by-play man माइक Breen.
He was previously an NBA विश्लेषक लिये The YES Network 's New Jersey Nets games.
South अफ़्रीकी रै eleven आधिकारिक languages : अफ्रीकी, अंग्रेज़ी, Ndebele, Northern Sotho, sotho, swazi, Tswana, Tsonga, Venda, Xhosa और Zulu.
Fewer than दो percent of South africans speak a पहला language other than an official एक.
Most South Africans can speak more than one language.
Dutch and English were the first official languages of दक्षिण Africa from 1910 to 1925.
Afrikaans थी added as a part of Dutch in 1925.
डच थी replaced by अफ्रीकी when South अफ़्रीकी became a republic in 1961, and Dutch was dropped in 1983, so between 1983 और 1994, South अफ़्रीकी had दो आधिकारिक languages : अंग्रेज़ी and Afrikaans.
The English संस्करण of the दक्षिण African संविधान refers to the languages by the names in those languages : isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sepedi ( referring to Northern Sotho ), Setswana, English, Sesotho ( referring to Southern Sotho ), Xitsonga, Siswati, Tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ).
In दक्षिण Africa, दक्षिणी ndebele is known simply as Ndebele, as most speakers of उत्तरी Ndebele live in Zimbabwe.
the 1993 version of the Constitution referred to Northern Sotho as Sesotho sa leboa, लकिन the 1996 version referred to the language as Sepedi.
Different government departments और official bodies use different terms to denote Northern Sotho.
The main language of government is अंग्रेज़ी even if South Africans often take अभिमान in using indigenous languages लिये any purpose.
अफ्रीकी also features prominently in कॉमर्स साथ साथ English as the भाषाएं with the उच्चतम number of fluent अध्यक्षों हैं Afrikaans and अंग्रेज़ी.
In terms of भाषाई वर्गीकरण, the आधिकारिक languages include दो West-Germanic languages ( English and अफ्रीकी ) and nine Bantu languages.
Four of these are Nguni languages ( Zulu, Xhosa, Swati and Ndebele ) और three are sotho–tswana languages ( Northern Sotho, Southern sotho and Tswana ).
Tsonga is a Tswa–Ronga language.
South African Sign Language is a पृथक though incompletely emerged national standard language which also subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects.
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium and nitric acid, existing normally as a crystalline hydrate, most commonly as एल्युमिनियम नाइट्रेट nonahydrate, Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O.
the New York Jets are a पेशेवर football team headquartered in Florham Park, New Jersey, representing the New York महानगर area.
the टोली is a member of the Eastern Division of the American Football Conference ( afc ) in the National Football लीग ( NFL ).
In a unique व्यवस्था for the league, the Jets share MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey with the New यॉर्क Giants.
the franchise is legally and corporately registered as New York Jets, LLC.
The team थी संस्थापित in 1959 as the Titans of New York, an original member of the American Football लीग ; बाद, the मताधिकार joined the NFL in the AFL–NFL merger.
The team began to play in 1960 at the Polo Grounds.
अंतर्गत new ownership, the current नाम was adopted in 1963 and the franchise was relocated to shea Stadium in 1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984.
the Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first time in 1968 and went on to compete in सुपर Bowl III where वे पराजित the Baltimore Colts, becoming the first afl टोली to defeat an एनएफएल club in an afl-nfl World Championship Game.
Since 1968, the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen टाइम्स, और in the AFC Championship Game four times, most recently losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010.
however, the Jets have never returned to the Super Bowl, बनाना them one of three एनएफएल टीमों to win their lone सुपर कटोरी appearance, along with the New Orleans Saints and Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
The team 's training facility, Atlantic Health Jets Training Center, which खोली in 2008, is located in Florham Park.
The team currently holds उनके annual training शिविर सत्र on the campus of the State University of New York at cortland in Cortland, New York while holding occasional sessions at the Florham Park जटिल.
Psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms, also known as psychedelic mushrooms, are fungi that contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
There are multiple colloquial terms for psilocybin mushrooms, the most common being shrooms और magic mushrooms.
Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe, Conocybe, Copelandia, Galerina, Gerronema, gymnopilus, Hypholoma, Inocybe, Mycena, panaeolus, Pluteus, और Psilocybe.
There are लगभग 190 species of psilocybin mushrooms और most of them fall in the genus psilocybe.
psilocybin mushrooms have likely महरूम used since prehistoric times and may have been depicted in rock art.
Many cultures have used these mushrooms in religious rites.
In modern Western समाज they हैं प्रयुक्त recreationally for their psychedelic effects.
हाल studies done at इम्पीरियल College London और जॉन्स Hopkins School of Medicine conclude that when प्रयुक्त properly, psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans.
अलास्का ( ) is a राज्य in the संयुक्त States, situated in the northwest extremity of the North American continent, with the international boundary with Canada to the east, the Arctic Ocean to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the west and दक्षिण, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by area, the 4th least populous and the least densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents live within the Anchorage metropolitan area.
Alaska 's अर्थव्यवस्था is dominated by the oil, natural gas, and fishing industries ; it has these संसाधन in abundance.
Alaska was खरीदा from Russia on March 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 million ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The जमीन went through several administrative परिवर्तन before बनने an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the u.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( аляска ) was already introduced in the रूसी colonial period, जब it थी used only for the peninsula and is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the mainland '' or, more वस्तुतः, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is भी ज्ञात as Alyeska, the `` great land '', an Aleut word निकला इससे the same root.
The 101 French departments are विभाजित into 342 arrondissements, which may be translated into English as districts.
The capital of an arrondissement/district is called a subprefecture.
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( capital ) of the विभाग, that prefecture is the capital of the arrondissement, acting दोनो as a प्रीफ़ेक्चर and as a subprefecture.
Arrondissements are further divided into cantons and communes.
The vagina ( from Latin vāgīna, literally `` sheath '' or `` scabbard `` ) is a tubular tract which is a sex organ and रै two main functions ; sexual intercourse और प्रसव.
in इंसानो, this passage leads from the opening of the vulva to the uterus ( womb ), but the vaginal tract ends at the cervix.
Unlike men, who have तभी one genital orifice, women have two, the urethra और the vagina.
The vaginal opening is much larger than the urethral opening, and both openings are protected by the labia.
the inner mould of the vagina रै a foldy texture which can create friction for the शिश्न during intercourse.
During arousal, the vagina gets नम to facilitate the entrance of the penis.
The latinate plural `` vaginae '' is rarely used in English.
Colloquially, the word योनि is प्रायः used to refer to the vulva or to the female genitals in general.
however, by its dictionary and anatomical definitions, vagina refers exclusively to the specific internal structure.
The Cincinnati Reds हैं a Major League Baseball team based in Cincinnati, ओहियो.
They हैं members of the National लीग सेंट्रल Division.
Established in 1881 as an independent club, the team became a चार्टर सदस्य of the अमरीकी Association in 1882, और joined the नेशनल लीग in 1890.
the क्लबों traditionally traces its origin to baseball 's first openly professional टोली in 1869.
The Reds have won five World Series titles, एक अमरीकी Association pennant, nine National लीग pennants and ten division titles.
The Reds निभाई in the National League वेस्ट between 1969 और 1993 and have been in the National League Central since 1994.
Since 2003, the Reds have played at ग्रेट American बॉल Park, built next to their home from 1970 to 2002, Riverfront Stadium.
bob Castellini has owned the Cincinnati लाल since 2006.
A prank stink bomb.
A बदबू bomb is a यंत्र designed to create an unpleasant smell.
They range in प्रभावकारिता from simple pranks to military grade malodorants or riot control chemical agents.
The Guinness Book of Records lists दो smelliest substances.
One is `` US Government Standard Bathroom Malodor '' ; a mixture of eight रसायन with a stench resembling human मल, only much stronger, designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners.
Another एक, `` Who me ? ``, is a mixture of पाँच sulfur-containing chemicals and smells like rotting food and carcasses.
The adage `` A picture is लायक a thousand शब्द '' refers to the notion that a complex idea can be conveyed साथ बस a single still चित्र.
It also aptly characterizes एक of the main goals of visualization, namely making it possible to absorb विशाल amounts of data quickly.
The expression `` उपयोग a picture.
It 's worth a thousand words. '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper एडिटर Arthur Brisbane discussing journalism and publicity.
1913 newspaper advertisement
A similar phrase, `` One Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '', appears in a 1913 newspaper advertisement लिये the Piqua Auto सप्लाई House of Piqua, Ohio.
An जल्दी use of the exact phrase appears in an 1918 समाचारपत्र advertisement for the सैन Antonio Light which says : One of the Nation 's Greatest Editors Says : One Picture is लायक a Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the युद्ध exemplifies the truth of the above बयान -- judging from the warm reception it has प्राप्त at the hands of the संडे Light पाठक.
It is believed by some that the आधुनिक use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in the विज्ञापन व्यापार journal Printers ' स्याही, promoting the use of images in advertisements that appeared on the sides of streetcars.
the दिसम्बर 8, 1921 issue carries an ad entitled, `` One Look is Worth A Thousand Words. ''
Another ad by बर्नार्ड appears in the March 10, 1927 issue साथ the phrase `` One Picture Worth टेन Thousand Words, '' where it is labeled a चाइनीज कहावत ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
The घर Book of proverbs, Maxims, and Familiar Phrases quotes Barnard as saying he पुकारा it `` a Chinese proverb, so that people would take it seriously. ''
Soon बाद, the proverb would become popularly attributed to Confucius.
the discussion of `` One Picture लायक Thousand शब्द '' versus `` One Picture Worth Ten Thousand Words '' Wan yen I hua and 10.000 miles लायक 10.000 books is cited in Information graphics where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures.
A picture is worth a thousand words
Despite इस आधुनिक origin of the popular phrase, the sentiment has been expressed by earlier writers.
For example the Russian लेखक इवान Turgenev wrote ( in fathers and Sons in 1862 ), `` a picture shows me at a glance what it takes दर्जनों of pages of a book to expound. ''
Computer प्रोग्रामर और author Fred Brooks makes an opposite बयान regarding programming in the Mythical Man-Month : `` Show me your flowcharts and छिपाते your tables, और I shall continue to be mystified.
Show me अपना tables, and I won’t usually need your flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious. ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by John McCarthy, the प्रसिद्ध कंप्यूटर scientist, to मेक the opposite point : `` As the Chinese say, 1001 words is worth more than a picture. ''
A ऋतु is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by changes in weather, ecology, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the वार्षिक revolution of the Earth around the Sun and the झुकाव of the धरती 's axis सापेक्ष to the प्लेन of revolution.
in शीतोष्ण and polar regions, the seasons हैं marked by changes in the intensity of धूप that reaches the Earth 's सतह, variations of which may कारण animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June and July, the northern hemisphere is exposed to more direct sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun.
The same is true of the southern hemisphere in November, December and जनवरी.
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to be higher in the sky during the summer months जिससे increases the सौर फ्लक्स.
However, due to seasonal lag, June, July and August are the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December, जनवरी and February हैं the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate and subpolar regions, generally four calendar -आधारd seasons ( with their adjectives ) हैं recognized : वसन्त ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and शीत ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a छह season model for temperate climate regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late गर्मियाँ ( serotinal ) as distinct सीज़न along with the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or monsoon ) season and the dry ऋतु, और in some तीव्र areas, a cool or mild season.
In कुछ parts of the world, special `` seasons '' are loosely defined based on important events ऐसे as a hurricane season, tornado ऋतु or a wildfire season.
The six ecological seasons
the four calendar सीज़न, depicted in an प्राचीन Roman mosaic from Tunisia
Dutch exports in 2006
At the time of writing the Netherlands is the 17th largest economy of the world.
( see : List of countries by GDP ( nominal ) )
GDP प्रति capita is roughly $ 42,000 जिससे puts it in the top 10 of richest nations in the संसार ( see : List of countries by जीडीपी ( PPP ) per capita ).
Between 1996 and 2000 annual economic growth ( जीडीपी ) averaged over 4 %, well ऊपर the यूरोपीय average.
विकास slowed considerably in 2001-05 as part of the global economic slowdown.
2006 और 2007 however दिखाया economic growth of 3.4 % and 3.9 %.
The डच economy was hit considerably by the ongoing global वित्तीय संकट and the ensuing European कर्ज़ crisis.
Several बैंको went bankrupt, and a number of others had to receive governmental सहायता.
In 2009 the economy declined with 3.5 %, followed by two years of mild growth.
the Dutch economy is फिलहाल in a recession again, with an economic मनाही of 0.5 % in 2012.
Inflation is at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी 2013.
Unemployment has been अपेक्षाकृत low compared to other EU nations for decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it रै hit 7.7 %.
The नीदरलैंड्स managed to maintain its AAA rating at तनिक जबतक कूच 2013 according to the three प्रमुख credit rating agencies.
Historically, the डच introduced and invented the stock मार्केट by the merchandise व्यापार through Dutch West India Company.
The Netherlands is a founding सदस्य of the European Union, the OECD और the World Trade Organization.

Prunus virginiana, commonly called bitter-berry, chokecherry, वर्जिनिया बर्ड cherry and western chokecherry ( also black chokecherry for P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a प्रजाति of bird चेरी ( Prunus subgenus Padus ) native to North America ; the natural historic range of P. virginiana includes most of the continent, except for the far north और far south.
लॉस Angeles अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport is the primary airport सेवारत the Greater Los एंजिल्स Area, the second-most populated metropolitan area in the संयुक्त States.
It is सबसे often referred to by its IATA airport code lax, with the letters pronounced individually.
lax is located in southwestern लॉस Angeles along the Pacific coast in the neighborhood of Westchester, from the downtown core और is the primary airport of Los Angeles World Airports ( LAWA ), an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports.
In 2011, LAX थी the sixth busiest airport in the world after hartsfield-jackson Atlanta International Airport, Beijing Capital International विमानक्षेत्र, London हीथ्रो विमानक्षेत्र, Chicago o'hare International Airport, और Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers.
the airport holds the claim लिये `` the world 's busiest origin और destination ( O & d ) airport '' in 2011 कि involves non-connecting passenger traffic.
It is also the only airport to rank among the top five U.S. airports for both passenger and cargo ट्रैफ़िक.
lax is the व्यस्ततम airport in the Greater Los Angeles Area, but other airports including bob Hope विमानक्षेत्र, John Wayne Airport, Long बीच Airport, LA/Ontario International Airport, और ताड़ Springs International Airport also serve the प्रदेश.
LAX is भी the busiest विमानक्षेत्र in California and the वेस्ट Coast of the United States in terms of flight operations, passenger ट्रैफ़िक and air कार्गो कार्यकलाप, leading it to be referred to as the `` गेटवे to the Pacific Rim ``.
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24, 1976 ) is an अमरीकी football quarterback for the Denver broncos of the नेशनल Football लीग ( एनएफएल ).
he played for the इंडियानापोलिस Colts लिये 14 seasons from 1998 to 2011.
he is the son of former एनएफएल quarterback Archie Manning and an elder brother of New York दिग्गज quarterback Eli Manning.
Manning played college football for the विश्वविद्यालयों of Tennessee, अग्रणी the स्वयंसेवक to the 1997 SEC Championship in his वरिष्ठ season.
However, No. 3 Tennessee खोया to the no. 2 Nebraska cornhuskers 42-17 in the नारंगी Bowl giving Nebraska और Tom Osborne उनके 3rd नेशनल championship in 4 years.
He was chosen by the Indianapolis Colts with the first overall चुनें in the 1998 NFL Draft.
From 1998 to 2010, he led the Colts to आठ ( seven AFC South and one AFC East ) division championships, two AFC championships, and to a Super Bowl चैंपियनशिप ( Super कटोरी XLI ).
he has won a record four लीग सबसे valuable player awards, थी the most valuable player of Super Bowl XLI, रै been named to बारह Pro प्याले, has twelve 4,000-yard passing सीज़न, and is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in गुजर गज ( 54,828 ) and touchdown गुजरता ( 399 ).
In 2009, he was नामित the बेहतरीन player in the NFL and Fox Sports along with Sports Illustrated named him the NFL player of the decade of the 2000s.
In may 2011, he underwent neck सर्जरी to alleviate neck pain and arm weakness he dealt with during the पिछला few seasons before signing a five-year, $ 90 million contract एक्सटेंशन with the Colts in July 2011.
Manning had hoped to play in the 2011 season, but in September 2011, he underwent a much more गंभीर second surgery : a स्तर one cervical fusion procedure.
मैनिंग had never missed an NFL खेल in his करियर, but was forced to miss the entire 2011 season.
He was released by the Colts on March 7, 2012, and बाद an almost two-week काल where he visited with and worked out for अनेक NFL टीमों, he signed with the Denver Broncos on March 20, 2012.
Manning 's pre-snap routine has earned him the उपनाम, `` The Sheriff '' और is one of the most recognizable and parodied in the NFL.
the Indianapolis Colts ' almost exclusive use of the hurry-up offense led to मैनिंग using an array of gestures and verbal commands to call the play at the line of scrimmage rather than in the huddle.
The America Tower of the American General Center, the headquarters of Baker Hughes
Baker Hughes is one of the world 's largest oilfield services companies.
It operates in over 90 देशों, providing the आयल और gas उद्योग with उत्पाद and services लिये खुदाई, formation मूल्यांकन, पूर्णता, उत्पादन and reservoir consulting.
Baker Hughes has its headquarters in the America Tower in the अमरीकी General Center in neartown, Houston.
Baker ह्यूजेस incorporated was formed when Baker International and ह्यूजेस Tool Company merged in 1987.
बेकर ह्यूजेस operates worldwide with major कार्यालयों in Liverpool, United Kingdom ; Singapore ; Dubai ; a research and maintenance facility in celle, Germany ; Lafayette, Louisiana ; Houston, Texas ; Pescara, इटली ; and Kuala Lumpur, मलेशिया.
The company is administered broadly in two hemispheres : the eastern hemisphere with five regions ( Europe, अफ़्रीकी, the Middle East, एशिया प्रशांत and Russia/Caspian ) and the western hemisphere with four regions ( Canada, US जमीन, US गल्फ, and Latin America ).
Each of these regions is subdivided into markets.
the United States one- cent coin, commonly known as a penny, is a unit of currency equaling one one-hundredth of a United States dollar.
the cent 's symbol is ¢.
Its obverse has featured the profile of President Abraham lincoln since 1909, the centennial of his birth.
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of Lincoln 's birth ) to 2008, the reverse featured the Lincoln Memorial.
Four different reverse designs in 2009 honored Lincoln 's 200th birthday and a new, permanent reverse – the Union Shield – was introduced in 2010.
The coin is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm ) in व्यास and 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness.
The u.S. Mint 's आधिकारिक name for a penny is `` '' and the U.S. Treasury 's official नाम is `` एक cent piece ''.
The colloquial term penny derives from the British सिक्का of the वही नाम, the pre-decimal version of which had a similar value.
In अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी, pennies is the plural form, other plural forms pence and pee ( standard use in British अंग्रेज़ी ) हैं not used.
as of 2012, it costs the U.S. Mint 2.00 cents to make a cent because of the cost of materials and production.
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed components for distribution and fabrication, estimated at $ 13 million in FY 2011.
it भी includes Mint ओवरहेड allocated to the पैनी, जिससे थी $ 17.7 लाख for 2011.
Fixed costs और overhead would have to be absorbed by other circulating सिक्के without the penny.
The घाटा in profitability due to producing the one cent coin in the United राज्य for the year of 2012 was $ 58,000,000.
इस was a पतला decrease from 2011, the year before, which had a production loss of $ 60,200,000.

The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the federal government, परिचय 5,000 employees of the District of कोलंबिया, and a few hundred private sector employees, mostly in और around federal facilities.
AFGE is the largest union for civilian, non- postal federal कर्मचारी और the largest संघ for District of Columbia employees who report directly to the mayor ( i.e., बाहर of D.C. public schools ).

The evolution of plants has resulted in increasing levels of complexity, from the earliest algal मैट्स, through bryophytes, lycopods, ferns to the complex gymnosperms and angiosperms of today.
While अनेक of the groups जिससे appeared earlier continue to thrive, विशेषकर in the environments in which they evolved, for a time each नई grade of संगठन became more `` successful '' than its पूर्ववर्तियों.
In the ordovician period, around, the first land plants appeared.
These began to diversify in the late Silurian काल, around, and the results of their diversification हैं displayed in remarkable detail in an early Devonian चट्टान assemblage from the Rhynie chert.
This chert preserved early पौधे in सेल्यूलर detail, petrified in volcanic springs.
By the middle of the devonian Period, most of the सुविधाएँ recognised in plants आज are present, including roots, leaves and secondary wood ; और, by late Devonian times, seeds had विकसित.
Late Devonian plants had thereby पहुँचे a degree of sophistication that अनुमत them to रूप forests of tall trees.
Evolutionary नवीनता जारी into the Carboniferous period and is still ongoing today.
Most plant groups were relatively unscathed by the permo-triassic extinction event, although the structures of communities changed.
This may have set the scene for the रूप of the flowering plants in the triassic ( ~ ), और their बाद diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene.
the latest major group of plants to evolve were the grasses, which became important in the mid-Paleogene, from around.
the grasses, as well as many other groups, evolved new mechanisms of metabolism to जीवित the low और warm, dry conditions of the tropics over the last.
The winning Super Bowl team receives the Vince Lombardi Trophy.
The Super Bowl is an annual American football game that determines the चैंपियन of the National Football League ( NFL ).
the contest is held in an American नगर that is chosen तीन to four सालो beforehand, usually in warm-weather or domed sites.
चूंकि 1971, the विजेता of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) Championship Game has faced the winner of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) Championship खेल in the culmination of the NFL playoffs.
Before the 1970 merger between the अमरीकी Football लीग ( AFL ) और the National Football League ( NFL ), the two leagues met in चार such contests.
the पहला two were known as the `` AFL-NFL World Championship Game. ''
Super Bowl III in 1969 was the first such game कि carried the `` सुपर Bowl '' moniker, the names `` Super Bowl I `` and `` सुपर Bowl II `` were retroactively लागू to the पहला two games.
The NFC /NFL leads in Super कटोरी wins with 25, while the AFC /AFL has won 22.
Eighteen different franchises, including teams that relocated to another city, have won the सुपर Bowl.
The Pittsburgh Steelers have जीती the most Super Bowls with six championships ( record 6–2 ), while both the Dallas Cowboys and San Francisco 49ers have five wins प्रत्येक ( Cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ).
Dallas and Pittsburgh have the most सुपर कटोरी appearances with आठ, जबकि the भैंस Bills have the most consecutive appearances with four losses in a row from 1990 to 1993.
The New England देशप्रेमी, Denver broncos and Minnesota Vikings have भी खोया a record चार सुपर Bowls.
भैंस और Minnesota are both 0–4, डेनवर is 2–4 and New England is 3–4.
The record for consecutive विन्स is two and is shared by seven franchises : the 1966-67 ग्रीन खाड़ी Packers, the 1972-73 Miami Dolphins, the 1974-75 and 1978-79 पिट्सबर्ग Steelers ( the only टोली to accomplish this feat twice ), the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers, the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys, the 1997-98 Denver Broncos, and the 2003-04 New England Patriots.
The तभी team with multiple Super Bowl appearances and no losses is the Baltimore ravens, who in winning Super Bowl XLVII unseated and replaced the 49ers in that position.
Four current NFL teams have never appeared in a Super Bowl, including franchise relocations and renaming : the क्लीवलैंड Browns, Detroit Lions, Jacksonville Jaguars, and Houston Texans, हालांकि both the Browns और Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl.
Martin काउंटी is a काउंटी located in the U.S. state of Texas.
As of the 2010 census, इसके population was 4,799.
Its seat is Stanton.
The काउंटी is named for wylie Martin, an early settler.
