Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP, alkp ) ( ) is a hydrolase एंजाइम responsible for removing phosphate समूह इससे many types of molecules, including nucleotides, proteins, and alkaloids.
The process of removing the phosphate group is called dephosphorylation.
As the name suggests, alkaline phosphatases are most प्रभावी in an क्षारीय environment.
It is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously as basic phosphatase.
Triticale ( × Triticosecale ), ( ) is a hybrid of wheat ( Triticum ) and rye ( Secale ) first bred in laboratories दौरान the late 19th century.
The grain was originally bred in Scotland and स्वीडन.
Commercially available triticale is almost always a second पीढी hybrid, i.e., a cross between two kinds of primary ( पहला क्रॉस ) triticales.
As a rule, triticale combines the yield potential और grain quality of wheat with the बीमारी and environmental tolerance ( सहित soil conditions ) of rye.
तभी recently has it been developed into a commercially viable crop.
Depending on the cultivar, triticale can more or less resemble either of its parents.
It is grown mostly for forage or fodder, although some triticale-based भोजन can be purchased at health food stores or are to be found in some breakfast cereals.
When क्रासिंग गेहूं and rye, wheat is प्रयुक्त as the female parent and rye as the male parent ( पराग donor ).
The resulting hybrid is sterile, and जरूर be treated with colchicine to induce polyploidy and thus the ability to reproduce itself.
The प्राथमिक producers of triticale are Poland, Germany, France, बेलारूस and Australia.
In 2009, according to the Food and Agriculture Organization ( FAO ), 15.0 million tons were harvested in 29 countries across the संसार.
The triticale hybrids are all amphidiploid, जिससे means the plant is diploid for two genomes derived from अलग species.
In अन्य words, triticale is an allotetraploid.
In earlier years, most work was done on octoploid triticale.
अलग ploidy levels have been created और evaluated over time.
The tetraploids showed little promise, but hexaploid triticale was कामयाब enough to find वाणिज्यिक application.
The CIMMYT triticale improvement program wanted to improve food production and nutrition in developing countries.
triticale has potential in the production of ब्रैड and अन्य food products, such as cookies, pasta, pizza dough and नाश्ता cereals.
The protein content is higher than that of wheat, हालांकि the glutenin भिन्न is less.
The grain has also महरूम stated to have उच्चतर levels of lysine than wheat.
Assuming increased स्वीकृति, the milling industry होगा have to adapt to triticale, as the milling techniques employed for wheat are unsuited to triticale.
Sell et al. found triticale could be used as a feed अनाज, and later शोध found its starch was विशेषकर readily digested.
As a feed अनाज, triticale is already well established and of ऊँची आर्थिक importance.
It has received attention as a potential उर्जा crop, and research is currently होने conducted on the use of the क्रॉप 's biomass in bioethanol उत्पादन.
`` Puff, the Magic Dragon '' is a सोंग written by Leonard Lipton and Peter Yarrow, और बना लोकप्रिय by Yarrow 's समूह Peter, पॉल और Mary in a 1963 रिकॉर्डिंग.
the song achieved great popularity.
a college football national championship in the highest level of collegiate play in the संयुक्त States, currently the National कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक Association ( NCAA ) Division i Football Bowl Subdivision ( fbs ), is a designation awarded annually by विभिन्न third-party organizations to उनके चयन ( s ) of the बेहतरीन college football team ( s ).
प्रभाग I fbs ( formerly प्रभाग I-A ) football is the only NCAA खेल in which a yearly champion is नहीं determined by an NCAA sanctioned championship event.
Because the championship टोली is not determined by a NCAA championship or टूर्नामेंट event, it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical national championship ``.
Since the NCAA, the खेल 's governing body, does not determine or declare a नेशनल champion in this field, determination of such रै often engendered विवाद.
A championship team is independently declared by विभिन्न individuals and organizations, often referred to as `` selectors ''.
These choices are sometimes at हालात with each other.
While the NCAA has never officially endorsed an annual चैंपियनशिप team, it has documented the choices of अनेक selectors in the official NCAA Football कटोरी Subdivision Records.
in addition, various third party विश्लेषकों have independently published their own lists of what वे have determined to be the सबसे legitimate selections for each season.
These हैं also often at हालात with प्रत्येक other as well as individual school 's claims on national championships, which, for any particular season, may or may not correlate to the selections published elsewhere.
Currently, two widely पहचाना नेशनल champions selectors हैं the Associated दबायें, which conducts a poll of फ़ुटबॉल sportswriters, और the USA Today Coaches ' Poll, a poll of American Football Coaches Association active coaches कि is contractually obligated to name the winner of the Bowl Championship Series championship game as its national champion.
The मिल्वौकी Brewers are a पेशेवर baseball team based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
The टोली is a member of the Central Division of Major League बेसबॉल 's National League and plays its home games at मिलर पार्क.
The team is so नामित because of the city 's association with the brewing industry.
The Washington Nationals are a professional baseball टोली based in Washington, d.c.
The नागरिकों हैं a member of the East प्रभाग of the National League of Major League बेसबॉल ( MLB ).
The team 's home ballpark is Nationals Park, located on दक्षिण Capitol Street in Southeast D.C., near the Anacostia नदी.
The park खोली in 2008, replacing RFK Stadium, the team 's home from 2005 to 2007.
The Nationals ' name derives from the पूर्व Washington बेसबॉल team that had the same name ( used interchangeably with सीनेटरों ).
Their nickname is `` the Nats '' —a shortened संस्करण कि was also used by the old d.C. teams.
An expansion मताधिकार, the क्लबों was founded in as the मॉन्ट्रियल Expos, the first प्रमुख लीग team in कनाडा.
They were based in Montreal, Quebec, and played their home खेल at jarry Park Stadium and later in Olympic Stadium.
In, the expos जीती a division चैंपियनशिप, won their first-ever playoff series by defeating the Philadelphia Phillies, 3–2, and advanced to the National League चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी, where they होता go on to lose to the Los एंजिल्स Dodgers, 3–2, in their only postseason appearance during the strike-shortened season.
The expos had their उच्चतम winning percentage in the strike-shortened ऋतु of, when the टोली had the बेहतरीन record in baseball.
The team 's subsequent shedding of players caused fan ब्याज to drop off.
After the 2001 season, एमएलबी considered revoking the team 's franchise, along with either the Minnesota जुड़वा or the Tampa Bay Devil Rays.
After होने खरीदा by एमएलबी in 2002, the टोली was moved before the ऋतु to Washington and renamed the नागरिकों, the first relocation since the second Washington Senators moved to Arlington, Texas, and became the Texas रेंजरों in.
The Nationals are one of दो MLB franchises, and the only एक in the National League, that has never played in a World Series ( the Seattle Mariners are the other ).
A contingent fee ( in the United States ) or सशर्त शुल्क ( in England and Wales ) is any fee for services provided where the fee is देय only if there is a favourable result.
In the विधि, it is defined as a `` fee charged for a lawyer 's सेवाएं only if the lawsuit is successful or is favorably settled out of अदालत....
Contingent शुल्क are usually calculated as a percentage of the client 's net recovery. ''
In the English legal system, it is generally referred to as no win no fee.
A conditional fee agreement between a law firm and a क्लाएंट.
The usual form of this अनुबंध is that the solicitor होगा take a law case on the समझना that if lost, no payment is made.
However, if the case is won, the lawyer होगा be entitled to the normal fee based on hourly बिलिंग, plus a success शुल्क.
The कामयाबी fee in England must be as a percentage no greater than 100 % of the normal fee.
This contrasts साथ the contingency शुल्क in the US, which gives the successful attorney a percentage of the damages awarded in एहसान of his client.
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue their सिविल rights since वरना, to sue someone for a tort, one must first be wealthy enough to pursue such वाद in the first place.
however, because of the high रिस्क, few attorneys will take cases on a contingency basis unless they feel the case has good मेरिट.
According to a 2004 book by विधि professor Herbert Kritzer, contingent fees यहूद allowed as of that year in the following countries : ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Brazil, Canada, the डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र, France, Greece, Ireland, Japan, New Zealand, the United Kingdom और the United States.
वे are also अनुमत in personal injury क्रियाएँ in Lithuania.
recently, they have महरूम allowed in Belgium as well.
A Convocation ( Latin 'calling together ', translating the Greek ecclesia ) is a group of people formally समवेत for a special purpose.
Sons of Anarchy is a टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी created by Kurt Sutter about the जीवनदान of a close-knit outlaw motorcycle club operating in आकर्षक, a fictional कस्बा in California 's Central Valley.
the show centers on protagonist Jackson `` Jax '' teller ( Charlie hunnam ), the then-vice president of the club, who begins questioning the club और himself.
Sons of Anarchy premiered on September 3, 2008, on cable संजाल FX.
The third season of the series attracted an average of 4.9 लाख viewers per week, making it FX 's highest rated series ever, surpassing fx 's अन्य hits The Shield, nip/tuck, and Rescue Me.
On February 3, 2012, बेटे of Anarchy was renewed for two additional seasons, a fifth and a छठे.
Those involved in the उत्पादन of the series imply that a सातवाँ and final ऋतु is creator Kurt Sutter 's योजना.
The Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn = `` waters '', singular : ) और the volcano of the same नाम are in South-East Iceland.
They हैं in the highlands of Iceland at the northwestern side of the Vatnajökull ice-cap.
The lakes are at, at an elevation of.
Beneath the lakes is the magma chamber of the Grímsvötn volcano.
Grímsvötn is a basaltic volcano जिससे रै the highest eruption frequency of all the volcanoes in आइसलैंड and has a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system.
The massive climate-impacting Laki fissure eruption of 1783–1784 was a part of the वही फिशर system.
grímsvötn was erupting at the वही time as Laki during 1783, but continued to erupt until 1785.
क्युकी most of the volcano lies underneath Vatnajökull, most of इसके eruptions have been subglacial and the interaction of magma and meltwater from the ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity.
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 utc, an eruption began, with ऊँची plumes accompanied by multiple earthquakes, resulting in cancellation of 900 flights in Iceland, और in the United Kingdom, Greenland, Germany, Ireland and Norway on 22–25 may.
Until 25 may the eruption स्केल had महरूम larger than that of the 2010 eruption of Eyjafjallajökull.
the eruption stopped at 02:40 UTC on 25 May 2011, although there was some explosive activity इससे the tephra vents affecting तभी the area around the crater.

A prospective person or project may be vetted before making a hiring decision.
In addition, in प्रज्ञा gathering, assets are vetted to determine their usefulness.

Caesars entertainment Corporation ( formerly Harrah 's Entertainment इससे 1995 to 2010 ) is an अमरीकी public gaming निगम that owns and operates over 50 casinos, hotels, and seven गोल्फ़ courses under several brands.
The company, based in Paradise, Nevada, is the largest gaming company in the world, with annual revenues of $ 8.9 billion ( 2010 ).

harrah 's remains a key brand in the company.
On नवम्बर 5, 2010, Harrah 's announced an initial पब्लिक offering of 31,250,000 shares but retracted this offering on November 19.
A Permanent Resident in Canada is a व्यक्ति who is not a Canadian citizen लकिन who has been granted permission to live and work in Canada without कोई time limit on उसके or उसके stay.
A permanent resident must live in Canada for two years out of every five or risk losing that status.
A Permanent Resident holds many of the same rights and responsibilities as a Canadian citizen, among others the right to work for any एंटरप्राइज़ as well as for the federal or provincial government ( under प्रतिबंध of access rights to certain regulated व्यवसायों ).
The main differences are that निवासियों can not :
vote in elections in Canada ;
चलाएं for निर्वाचित office ;
थाम Canadian passports ;
In addition, they may be allowed to join Canada 's armed शक्तियां if the national interest would not be prejudiced.
स्थाई residents also risk deportation for गंभीर crimes committed जबकि resident in कनाडा.
स्थाई residents may apply for Canadian citizenship बाद three years in Canada ; however this is not mandatory.

A graph of the US CPI from 1913 to 2006 ( in blue ), and its प्रतिशत annual change ( in red )
A consumer price index ( CPI ) उपायों changes in the price स्तर of a market basket of consumer goods and services purchased by households.
The CPI in the United States is पारिभाषित by the Bureau of Labor Statistics as `` a measure of the औसत change over समय in the prices paid by urban consumers for a market basket of consumer goods and services. ''
The CPI is a statistical अनुमान constructed using the कीमतें of a sample of representative items whose कीमतें are collected periodically.
sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for different categories and sub-categories of goods and services, being combined to produce the overall अनुक्रमणिका साथ weights reflecting their shares in the total of the consumer expenditures covered by the index.
It is एक of several price indices calculated by most national सांख्यिकीय agencies.
The annual percentage change in a cpi is used as a measure of inflation.
A CPI can be used to index ( i.e., adjust लिये the प्रभाव of inflation ) the real value of wages, salaries, pensions, for regulating prices and for deflating monetary magnitudes to show परिवर्तन in रियल values.
in most countries, the CPI is, along with the population census and the USA National Income and Product Accounts, one of the सबसे closely watched national economic statistics.
Knocking on लकडी, or to टच लकडी, refers to the apotropaic tradition in western folklore of literally touching/knocking on wood, or merely stating that you are doing or intend same, in order to avoid `` tempting fate `` बाद making a favourable अवलोकन, a boast, or declaration concerning one 's own death.
Rocker arm
Generally referred to within the context of the internal combustion engine of automotive, marine, motorcycle and reciprocating aviation engines, the rocker arm is an oscillating lever that conveys radial movement from the cam lobe into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it.
एक end is उठाया and lowered by a rotating lobe of the camshaft ( either directly or via a tappet ( lifter ) and pushrod ) जबकि the अन्य end acts on the valve stem.
When the camshaft lobe raises the outside of the arm, the inside presses down on the valve stem, खोलने the valve.
When the बाहर of the arm is permitted to return due to the camshafts rotation, the अंदर rises, allowing the valve spring to close the वाल्व.
The drive cam is driven by the camshaft.
This pushes the रॉकर भुजा up and down about the trunnion pin or rocker shaft.
घर्षण may be reduced at the point of सम्पर्क with the valve stem by a roller cam अनुसरणकर्ता.
a similar arrangement transfers the motion via another रोलर cam अनुसरणकर्ता to a second rocker arm.
This rotates about the रॉकर shaft, and हस्तांतरण the motion via a tappet to the poppet valve.
in this case this opens the intake valve to the cylinder सिर.
The effective leverage of the arm ( और यूँ the force it can exert on the वाल्व stem ) is determined by the rocker arm अनुपात, the ratio of the distance इससे the रॉकर arm 's बीच of rotation to the tip divided by the distance from the center of rotation to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod.
Current automotive design favors rocker arm ratios of about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1.
However, in the past smaller positive ratios ( the valve लिफ्ट is greater than the कैम lift ) and even negative ratios ( valve lift smaller than the cam lift ) have महरूम used.
Many pre-WW2 engines use 1:1 ( neutral ) ratios.
लिये car engines the rocker arms are generally steel stampings, providing a reasonable balance of शक्ति, वज़न and economical cost.
Because the rocker arms are, in part, प्रत्यागमनी weight, excessive mass विशेषकर at the लीवर ends limits the engine 's क्षमता to reach high operating speeds.
`` The Night the Lights Went Out in जॉर्जिया '' is a Southern Gothic song written by songwriter Bobby Russell and performed in 1972 by उसके then-wife vicki Lawrence.
Reba McEntire later covered it in 1991.

In postal मेल, a return पता is an explicit समावेश of the पता of the व्यक्ति sending the message.
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine how to respond to the sender of the संदेश if needed.
The return address need not शामिल a sender 's name, but should include address or p.o. box details in the वही way as the delivery पता should.
In some countries, the return address is conventionally located in the upper left hand corner of the envelope, card, or label.
in the United Kingdom, the वापसी पता is usually placed on the reverse of the लिफाफा, near the top.
Businesses often use envelopes preprinted with a return address.
Many individuals have sheets of adhesive labels preprinted with their घर address to affix to their correspondence.
Charities sometimes include such चादरें in mailshots.
रोल्स of Return Address Labels can be purchased इससे companies that sell personalized labels to provide individuals an easy way to peel and stick return address labels to their लिफाफे.
The वापसी पता is नहीं required on डाक mail.
However, lack of a return address prevents the postal service from being समर्थ to वापसी the item if it proves undeliverable ; such as from क्षति, postage due, or invalid destination.
Such mail may thus become dead letter mail.
Should the return पता be of a different state or country, the मेल may be routed through that location for आसानी of return.
a nerve guidance conduit ( भी referred to as an कृत्रिम nerve conduit or artificial nerve graft, as opposed to an autograft ) is an artificial अर्थात् of guiding axonal regrowth to facilitate nerve regeneration and is one of several clinical उपचार लिये तंत्रिका injuries.
When direct suturing of the two stumps of a severed nerve can not be संपन्नता without tension, the standard नैदानिक treatment for peripheral nerve injuries is autologous तंत्रिका grafting.
due to the सीमित availability of दाता tissue and functional रिकवरी in autologous nerve grafting, neural tissue अभियान्त्रिकी research रै focused on the development of bioartificial nerve guidance conduits as an alternative treatment, विशेषकर लिये विशाल defects.
Similar techniques हैं also being छान for nerve repair in the spinal cord but nerve regeneration in the central nervous system poses a greater challenge because its axons do not regenerate appreciably in their देशी पर्यावरण.
The सृष्टि of कृत्रिम conduits is also known as entubulation because the nerve ends and intervening gap हैं enclosed within a tube रचित of biological or synthetic materials.
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic tube, synthetic ट्यूब or tissue-engineered conduit, it should facilitate neurotropic and neurotrophic communication between the proximal and distal ends of the nerve gap, block external inhibitory factors, and provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth.
The most मौलिक objective of a nerve guidance conduit is to combine physical, chemical, and biological cues under conditions that will foster tissue formation.
Materials that have been used to मेक biologic tubes include रक्त बरतन and skeletal मांसपेशियां, while nonabsorbable और bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have been made from silicone और polyglycolide respectively.
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a combination of many तत्व : scaffold structure, scaffold material, सेल्यूलर therapies, neurotrophic factors and biomimetic materials.
The choice of which शारीरिक, chemical and biological cues to use is based on the properties of the तंत्रिका environment, which is critical in creating the most desirable environment for axon regeneration.
The factors that control material चयन include biocompatibility, biodegradability, mechanical अखंडता, controllability during nerve growth, implantation and sterilization.
Hardcore Pawn is an American reality television श्रेणी उत्पादित by rdf USA ( later Zodiak USA ) and Richard Dominick Productions for trutv about the day-to-day operations of American Jewelry और Loan, a family-owned pawn shop located at 20450 Greenfield सड़क, between 8 Mile Road and the John C. amoxicillin BP
Amoxicillin ( INN ), formerly amoxycillin ( बैन ), and abbreviated amox, is a moderate-spectrum, bacteriolytic, β-lactam antibiotic used to दावत bacterial infections caused by susceptible microorganisms.
It is usually the drug of choice भीतर the class because it is better absorbed, following oral administration, than other β-lactam antibiotics.
Amoxicillin is एक of the most common antibiotics विहित for children.
the drug became available in 1972.
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing bacteria, जिससे are resistant to a व्यापक वर्णक्रम of β-lactam antibiotics, such as penicillin.
लिये this कारण, it is प्रायः संयुक्त with clavulanic acid, a β-lactamase inhibitor.
This increases effectiveness by reducing इसके susceptibility to β-lactamase resistance.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), प्रायः referred to as LBJ, थी the 36th President of the संयुक्त States ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed बाद his service as the 37th वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
he is one of only four people who served in all four elected federal offices of the United States : Representative, Senator, Vice President, and President.
Johnson, a Democrat from Texas, served as a United राज्य Representative from 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961, सहित six years as United States Senate Majority Leader, दो as Senate Minority नेता and two as Senate बहुमत Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the Democratic nomination in 1960, Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 अध्यक्षीय election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the हत्या of जॉन F. कैनेडी on November 22, 1963, completed कैनेडी 's term and थी elected President in his अपना right, winning by a विशाल हाशिया over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
जॉनसन was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as अध्यक्ष, he was responsible for डिजाइनिंग the `` ग्रेट Society `` legislation that included laws that upheld सिविल rights, public broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to education, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
Johnson थी renowned for his domineering personality and the `` Johnson treatment, '' his coercion of powerful politicians in अनुक्रम to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated अमरीकी भागीदारी in the Vietnam War, from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968, as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down.
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar movement based especially on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer दंगे broke out in most प्रमुख शहरों after 1965, and अपराधों दरों soared, as his प्रतिद्वंद्वियों raised demands for `` law और अनुक्रम '' policies.
The लोकतांत्रिक Party split in अनेक feuding factions, and after जॉनसन did poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक, he ended his bid for reelection.
रिपब्लिकन Richard निक्सन was elected to सफल him.
Historians argue that Johnson 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the peak of modern उदारतावाद in the United States बाद the New Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by some इतिहासकारों because of his domestic policies.
The Big Bang Theory cast at Comic Con 2009, from left : Kunal Nayyar, Simon helberg, Kaley Cuoco, Jim पार्सन्स, और Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang सिद्धान्त, निर्मित और executive उत्पादित by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
the show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon कूपर and Leonard hofstadter, two Caltech physicists ; Penny, a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting characters have महरूम promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 guest ), a physicist colleague, and, at different times, a lover of दोनो Leonard and हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; ऋतु 4-present regular ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife, and former part-time वेट्रेस alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; ऋतु 4-present regular ), जो joins the group after होने matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( सीज़न 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also features numerous supporting characters, each of whom plays a prominent role in a small group of episodes.
The American सिविल War ( ACW ), also ज्ञात as the War between the राज्य or simply the सिविल War ( see naming ), was a सिविल war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और several दक्षिणी slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the war had its origin in the issue of slavery, विशेषकर the extension of slavery into the पश्चिमी territories.
विदेशी powers किया not intervene.
After four सालो of खूनी combat that left over 600,000 soldiers मुर्दे and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential चुनाव, republicans, led by Abraham lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त States ' territories.
Lincoln won, लकिन before his उद्घाटन on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James बुकानन और the incoming Republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता declared उसके administration होता not initiate civil war.
आठ remaining slave states जारी to reject काल्स for secession.
Confederate शक्तियां seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise, and both sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so निर्भर on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a key fort आयोजित by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, चार more स्लेव states joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border states और स्थापित a naval blockade कि crippled the southern अर्थव्यवस्था.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The पतझड़ 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union राज्य ) ended with Confederate retreat at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln जारी the Emancipation Proclamation, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the वेस्ट, by summer 1862 the संघ destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the मिसिसिपी River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट command of all Union armies in 1864.
in the पश्चिमी Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the समुद्र, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The संघ marshaled the resources और जनशक्ति to attack the confederacy इससे सब directions, and could afford to लड़ो battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards रिचमंड, the Confederate पूंजी.
The defending Confederate army विफल, leading to Lee 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox Court हाउस on April 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी Civil War was one of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons यहूद employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World युद्ध i.
It remains the deadliest war in American इतिहास, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian जॉन Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten प्रतिशत of सब Northern males 20–45 सालो old, and 30 percent of all दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40.
इंसान एवोल्यूशन refers to the विकासवादी process leading up to the appearance of modern humans.
While it began with the last common ancestor of all life, the टॉपिक usually covers तभी the evolutionary history of primates, in particular the genus Homo, और the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct species of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ).
the study of human evolution involves अनेक scientific disciplines, including physical anthropology, primatology, archaeology, भाषाविज्ञान, evolutionary psychology, embryology and genetics.
According to genetic studies, primates diverged from other mammals about in the Late Cretaceous period, and the earliest fossils appear in the paleocene, around.
the family मानवनुमा diverged from the Hylobatidae ( Gibbon ) family 15-20 million years ago, and around, the Ponginae ( orangutans ), diverged इससे the Hominidae परिवार.
Bipedalism is the basic adaption of the Hominin लकीर, and the earliest bipedal Hominin is considered to be either Sahelanthropus or orrorin, with Ardipithecus, a full bipedal, coming somewhat later.
The gorilla और chimpanzee diverged around the same समय, about 4-6 million years ago, and either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin may be our last shared ancestor with them.
The early bipedals eventually evolved into the australopithecines और later the genus Homo.
the earliest documented members of the genus Homo हैं Homo habilis which evolved around ; the earliest species लिये which there is positive evidence of उपयोग of स्टोन टूल्स.
the दिमाग of these early hominins were about the वही size as that of a chimpanzee.
During the next million सालो a process of encephalization began, and with the arrival of Homo erectus in the चट्टान record, cranial क्षमता had doubled to 850 cm3.
Homo इरेक्टस and Homo ergaster were the first of the hominina to leave Africa, and these प्रजाति spread through Africa, Asia, and यूरोपीय between.
It is believed that these species were the पहला to use fire और complex tools.
According to the Recent African Ancestry theory, modern humans evolved in Africa possibly इससे Homo heidelbergensis, Homo rhodesiensis or Homo antecessor and migrated आउट of the महाद्वीप कुछ 50,000 to 100,000 years ago, replacing local populations of होमो erectus, Homo denisova, Homo floresiensis और Homo neanderthalensis.
Archaic Homo sapiens, the forerunner of anatomically modern humans, evolved between 400,000 and 250,000 सालो पहले.
Recent DNA evidence suggests that several haplotypes of Neanderthal उत्पत्ति are उपस्थित among all non-African populations, and Neanderthals and other hominids, such as denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of their genome to present-day humans. < ref name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > Anatomically आधुनिक humans evolved from archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic, about 200,000 years पहले.
The परिवर्तन to behavioral modernity with the development of सांकेतिक culture, भाषा, and specialized lithic technology happened around 50,000 सालो पहले according to many anthropologists although कुछ suggest a gradual बदलें in बर्ताव over a longer time स्पैन.
Lisa Cuddy, M.D., is a fictional character on the Fox network medical drama House.

Track and field is a sport comprising various competitive athletic contests आधारित on कार्यशील, jumping, and throwing.
The name of the sport derives इससे the competition स्थान : a stadium with an oval running track around a grass field.
The throwing and jumping events generally take place in the central enclosed area.
Track and field जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the umbrella खेल of athletics, which also includes सड़क running, cross country running, and race walking.
the two सबसे prestigious international track and field competitions are held under the banner of athletics : the athletics competition at the Olympic Games and the IAAF World Championships in Athletics.
The International संघ of एथलेटिक्स Federations is the international governing देह लिये track and field.
Track and field events हैं generally व्यक्तिगत sports with athletes challenging each other to decide a single victor.
The racing events are won by the athlete with the fastest समय, while the कूद और फेंकना events are won by the athlete who has achieved the greatest अलहदा or height in the contest.
The running events are categorised as sprints, middle and long-distance कार्यक्रम, relays, and hurdling.
Regular jumping events include long जम्प, triple jump, high jump and pole vault, जबकि the most common throwing events are shot put, javelin, discus and हथौड़ा.
वहीँ are also `` combined events '', such as heptathlon and decathlon, in which athletes compete in a number of the ऊपर events.
Records हैं रखा of the best performances in specific कार्यक्रम, at world and national levels, right down to a personal स्तर.
However, if athletes are deemed to have violated the event 's rules or regulations, they are disqualified इससे the competition and their marks are erased.
In North अमेरिका, the term track and field may be used to refer to athletics in general, rather than specifically track and फ़ील्ड कार्यक्रम.
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ), codenamed Operation Desert Storm ( 17 January 1991 – 28 February 1991 ) थी a war waged by a u.n.-authorized Coalition फ़ोर्स from 34 nations led by the United States, against Iraq in response to इराकी 's invasion and annexation of कुवैत.
The war is भी known under other names, such as the Persian Gulf युद्ध, First Gulf War, Gulf War I, or the पहला इराकी War, before the term `` Iraq War '' became identified instead with the 2003 Iraq युद्ध ( also referred to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ).
कुवैत 's invasion by Iraqi सैनिकों कि began 2 August 1990 was met साथ international condemnation, and brought immediate economic प्रतिबंधों against Iraq by members of the U.N. Security Council.
U.S. President George H. W. Bush deployed U.S. forces into सऊदी Arabia, और urged अन्य countries to भेजें their अपना forces to the scene.
An array of nations joined the Coalition.
The great majority of the Coalition 's military forces were इससे the U.S., with Saudi Arabia, the United Kingdom and मिश्र as leading contributors, in that order.
Saudi Arabia paid around US $ 36 billion of the US $ 60 अरब cost.
The war was चिह्नित by the शुरूआत of live news on the सामने lines of the fight, with the primacy of the U.S. network CNN.
The war has भी earned the nickname Video खेल War after the रोज़ broadcast images on board the U.S. बमवर्षक during आपरेशन Desert Storm.
the initial conflict to expel Iraqi troops इससे Kuwait began with an aerial bombardment on 17 January 1991.
This was followed by a मैदान assault on 24 February.
This was a decisive विजय for the Coalition forces, who liberated Kuwait and advanced into Iraqi territory.
The Coalition ceased their advance, and declared a cease-fire 100 घंटों after the ground campaign started.
Aerial and ground combat was confined to Iraq, कुवैत, and areas on Saudi Arabia 's border.
Iraq launched scud missiles against Coalition सैन्य targets in Saudi Arabia and against Israel.
The nickel, in अमरीकी usage, is a five- cent सिक्का जारी by the United राज्य Mint.
Composed of 75 % copper and 25 % निकल, the टुकड़ा has been struck since 1866.
The silver half dime, बराबर to five cents, had been issued since the 1790s.
The American Civil War caused economic hardship, driving सुनहरा and silver from circulation ; in response, in place of low-value सिक्के, the सरकारी at पहला issued paper currency.
In 1865, Congress abolished the five-cent fractional करेंसी note after Spencer M. क्लार्क, head of the Currency ब्यूरो ( today the Bureau of Engraving और मुद्रण ), लगाई his own portrait on the denomination.
After successful introduction of two-cent and three-cent pieces, without precious मेटल, Congress भी authorized a five-cent piece consisting of base metal ; the Mint began striking this version in 1866.
The initial डिज़ाइन of the Shield nickel थी struck until 1883, then replaced by the Liberty Head nickel.
The Buffalo nickel was introduced in 1913 as part of a drive to increase the सौंदर्य of American coinage ; in 1938, the Jefferson nickel followed.
In 2004 and 2005, special designs in honor of the bicentennial of the लुईस and क्लार्क Expedition यहूद issued.
In 2006, the Mint reverted to using Jefferson nickel designer Felix schlag 's original reverse ( or `` tails '' side ), हालांकि a नई obverse, by जेमी Franki, was substituted.
As of 2013, it costs more than ग्यारह सेंट to उपज a nickel ; the मिंट is exploring the possibility of reducing cost by using less expensive metals.
A poster with flowers or clusters of flowers produced by twelve प्रजाति of flowering plants from different परिवारों
A flower, sometimes ज्ञात as a bloom or blossom, is the reproductive ढांचा found in flowering पौधे ( plants of the division Magnoliophyta, also called angiosperms ).
The biological function of a पुष्प is to प्रभाव reproduction, usually by providing a mechanism for the union of शुक्राणु with eggs.
Flowers may facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of sperm and eggs from different individuals in a population ) or allow selfing ( संलयन of sperm and egg from the same flower ).
Some flowers उपज diaspores without fertilization ( parthenocarpy ).
Flowers contain sporangia and are the site where gametophytes develop.
Flowers give rise to fruit and seeds.
Many flowers have विकसित to be attractive to पशु, so as to cause them to be vectors for the transfer of pollen.
in addition to facilitating the reproduction of flowering plants, पुष्प have long been admired and used by इंसानो to beautify उनके environment, और also as objects of romance, ritual, religion, medicine and as a source of food.
the McDonnell Douglas ( now Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a twin-engine, all-weather tactical सेनानी designed by mcdonnell Douglas to gain and maintain एयर superiority in aerial combat.
it is माना among the most successful modern fighters, with over 100 aerial combat victories साथ no losses in dogfights.
following reviews of proposals, the संयुक्त States Air Force selected McDonnell डगलस ' design in 1967 to मिलें the service 's need for a dedicated air superiority fighter.
The Eagle first उड़ाया in July 1972, and entered service in 1976.
Since the 1970s, the Eagle has महरूम exported to Israel, Japan, Saudi Arabia, and अन्य nations.
The f-15 was originally envisioned as a pure air superiority aircraft.
Its design included a secondary ground-attack capability कि थी largely unused.
The design proved लचीली enough that an all-weather strike डेरिवेटिव, the F-15E Strike Eagle, थी later developed, and entered service in 1989.
The F-15 Eagle is expected to be in service with the U.S. Air फ़ोर्स past 2025.

The प्राथमिक products are focused around computer whiteboard interactive teaching devices.
mimiocapture devices also allow users to capture all of the ink strokes that are लिखा on the whiteboard.

Rahab of जेरिको
Rahab, ( ; ; ) थी, according to the Book of Joshua, a स्त्री who lived in जेरिको in the Promised Land and assisted the Israelites in capturing the city.
nearly all English translations of Joshua describe उसके as a harlot or prostitute.
the संगठन of American राज्य ( Spanish : Organización de लॉस Estados Americanos, Portuguese : Organização dos Estados Americanos, French : संगठन des États américains ), or the OAS, is a regional international organization.
The oas was संस्थापित on 30 अप्रैल 1948, and has its headquarters in Washington, D.C., United States.
Its members are the 35 independent states of the Americas.

Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo Colombo ; Spanish : Cristóbal Colón ; Portuguese : cristóvão Colombo ; before 31 अक्तूबर 145120 May 1506 ) was an इतालवी explorer, नाविक, and colonizer, born in the गणतंत्र of Genoa, in what is today northwestern Italy.
Under the auspices of the Catholic Monarchs of Spain, he completed चार voyages across the Atlantic Ocean that led to general European awareness of the American continents.
Those voyages, and his efforts to establish permanent settlements on the island of Hispaniola, initiated the Spanish colonization of the नई संसार.
in the context of emerging western imperialism and economic competition between European kingdoms seeking माल through the establishment of trade routes and colonies, कोलंबस 's सट्टे proposal, to reach the East Indies by sailing westward, eventually received the support of the Spanish crown, जिससे saw in it a promise, however remote, of gaining the upper hand over rival शक्तियां in the contest for the lucrative spice trade with एशिया.
During उसके first voyage in 1492, बजाय of reaching Japan as he had intended, कोलंबस landed in the बहामा archipelago, at a locale he named San Salvador.
Over the कोर्स of three अधिक voyages, कोलंबस visited the Greater और Lesser Antilles, as well as the caribbean coast of Venezuela and सेंट्रल अमेरिका, claiming them for the Spanish Empire.
हालांकि कोलंबस was not the पहला European explorer to reach the americas ( having been preceded by the Norse expedition led by Leif Ericson in the 11th century ), Columbus 's voyages led to the first lasting European contact with the Americas, inaugurating a period of European exploration, conquest, and colonization that lasted लिये several centuries.
They had, therefore, an enormous impact in the historical विकास of the modern Western world.
कोलंबस himself देखी उसके accomplishments primarily in the light of the spreading of the Christian religion.
never admitting that he had reached a continent previously unknown to Europeans, rather than the East Indies he had set आउट लिये, Columbus called the inhabitants of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ).
Columbus 's strained संबंध with the Spanish crown and its appointed औपनिवेशिक administrators in America led to his गिरफ़्तार and dismissal as राज्यपाल of the settlements on the island of Hispaniola in 1500, and later to protracted litigation over the benefits which Columbus and उसके heirs claimed were owed to them by the crown.
Bred in Germany, the Boxer is a breed of stocky, medium-sized, short-haired dogs.
the coat is smooth और tight-fitting ; रंगों are fawn or brindled, with or without श्वेत markings, which may cover the entire body.
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they have broad, short skulls ), and have a square muzzle, mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ), very दमदार jaws, and a शक्तिशाली bite ideal for फांसी on to large prey.
The Boxer was bred from the Old English Bulldog and the now विलुप्त Bullenbeisser, and is part of the Molosser समूह.
मुक्केबाज यहूद पहला exhibited in a dog show लिये St. bernards in Munich in 1895, the first Boxer club being founded the next year.
Based on 2012 अमरीकी Kennel Club statistics, मुक्केबाज held steady as the seventh most popular breed of dog in the United States लिये the third consecutive साल.
Serial ATA ( SATA ) is a कंप्यूटर bus interface that connects host बस adapters to mass storage devices such as मुश्किल डिस्क drives and optical drives.
Serial ATA replaces the older AT अनुलग्नक standard ( ATA ; बाद referred to as Parallel ATA or PATA ), offering several advantages over the older interface : reduced cable size and cost ( seven conductors instead of 40 ), native hot swapping, faster data transfer through higher signalling दरों, और more efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol.
sata मेजबान adapters और devices communicate via a high-speed serial cable over two pairs of conductors.
In contrast, parallel ata ( the redesignation for the legacy ata specifications ) used a 16-bit wide data बस with many additional support and control signals, सब ऑपरेटिंग at much lower frequency.
To ensure backward compatibility with विरासत ata software and applications, sata uses the same basic ATA and ATAPI command-set as legacy ATA devices.
SATA has replaced parallel ATA in consumer डेस्कटॉप और laptop कंप्यूटर, and has largely replaced PATA in नई embedded अनुप्रयोग.
SATA 's market share in the desktop PC market थी 99 % in 2008.
PATA remains widely used in industrial और embedded applications that use CompactFlash storage, even though the new CFast standard is based on SATA.
सीरियल ATA industry compatibility specifications originate इससे The सीरियल ATA International Organization ( aka.
SATA-IO, serialata.org ).
The sata-io group collaboratively creates, reviews, ratifies, and publishes the interoperability specifications, the test cases, and plug-fests.
as with many other industry compatibility standards, the SATA content ownership is transferred to other industry bodies : primarily the incits T13 subcommittee ATA, the INCITS t10 subcommittee ( scsi ) ; a subgroup of t10 responsible for Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ).
The complete specification इससे SATA-IO.
the शेष of इस article होगा try to use the terminology and specifications of SATA-IO.
The history of the Internet began with the development of electronic computers in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the concepts that होता lead to the अंतरजाल जब a message was sent over the ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at University of California, Los Angeles ( UCLA ), after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford शोध संस्थान ( SRI ).
पैकेट switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark I at NPL in the UK, CYCLADES, Merit Network, Tymnet, and Telenet, यहूद developed in the late 1960s and जल्दी 1970s using a variety of protocols.
the ARPANET in particular led to the development of प्रोटोकॉल for internetworking, in जिससे multiple separate संजाल could be joined साथ into a network of networks.
In 1982, the Internet प्रोटोकॉल suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized, and consequently, the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP संजाल, पुकारा the Internet, was introduced.
अभिगम to the arpanet थी expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the कंप्यूटर विज्ञान Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided अभिगम to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education संगठन.
वाणिज्यिक Internet सेवा providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s.
the ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET थी decommissioned, निकालना the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry वाणिज्यिक traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture और commerce, including the वृद्धि of near-instant communication by electronic mail, instant messaging, Voice over Internet प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन calls '', two-way interactive video calls, and the World Wide Web with its discussion forums, ब्लॉग, social networking, and ऑनलाइन shopping sites.
The research and education community continues to develop and use advanced networks such as NSF 's very high speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher और higher speeds over fiber optic networks ऑपरेटिंग at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or more.
The अंतरजाल 's takeover over the global communication लैंडस्केप was almost instant in historical शर्तें : it only communicated 1 % of the information बहती through two-way telecommunications networks in the साल 1993, already 51 % by 2000, और अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated सूचना by 2007.
Today the अंतरजाल continues to grow, driven by ever वृहद amounts of ऑनलाइन information, कॉमर्स, entertainment, and social networking.

Professor ऐल्बस Percival Wulfric Brian डम्बल्डोर is a major अक्षर और protagonist of J. K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
लिये most of the series, he is the headmaster of the wizarding school Hogwarts.

डम्बल्डोर is portrayed by Richard Harris in the film adaptions of Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone and Harry कुम्हार and the कक्ष of Secrets.
After Harris ' मौत, Michael Gambon portrayed Dumbledore for all of the remaining films.
Rowling stated वो chose the name डम्बल्डोर, जिससे is an जल्दी आधुनिक English शब्द लिये `` bumblebee ``, क्युकी of Dumbledore 's love of music : she imagined him चलना around `` humming to himself a लॉट ''.
Calcitonin ( also known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino acid linear polypeptide hormone that is produced in इंसानो primarily by the parafollicular कोशिकाएं ( also known as C-cells ) of the thyroid, and in many other animals in the ultimobranchial देह.
It acts to reduce blood calcium ( Ca2+ ), opposing the effects of parathyroid hormone ( PTH ).
Calcitonin रै been found in fish, reptiles, birds, and स्तनधारियों.
इसके importance in humans has not महरूम as खूब established as its importance in other animals, as its function is usually not significant in the विनियमन of normal calcium समस्थापन.
It belongs to calcitonin-like protein family.
a mousepad with a padded कलाई rest.
A mousepad ( us ) or mouse mat ( UK ) is a सतह for placing और moving a कंप्यूटर चूहा.
A mousepad enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using a mouse directly on a table by providing a surface to allow the tracking LED or बॉल ( in former मॉडल ) to measure movement accurately and without jitter.
कुछ mousepads increase ergonomics by providing a padded कलाई rest.

Riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ), later known as Cinergy Field ( 1996–2002 ), थी the home of the Cincinnati लाल नेशनल League baseball team and the Cincinnati Bengals National Football League team.
Located on the Ohio नदी in शहर Cincinnati, the stadium was best known as the घर of `` The Big Red Machine ``, as the Reds were often called in the 1970s.
Construction began on फ़रवरी 1, 1968, and was completed at a cost of less than $ 50 million.
on June 30, 1970, the Reds hosted the Atlanta Braves in their grand opening, साथ Hank Aaron hitting the first कभी घर run at riverfront.
Two weeks later on July 14, 1970, Riverfront hosted the 1970 प्रमुख लीग Baseball all-star Game.
This game is best remembered for the often-replayed collision at home थाली between लाल star Pete Rose and catcher Ray Fosse of the Cleveland Indians.
In September 1996, Riverfront Stadium थी renamed `` Cinergy Field '' in a sponsorship deal with Greater Cincinnati 's energy company, Cinergy Corporation.
In 2001, to make room for Great American Ball Park, the seating क्षमता at cinergy Field was reduced to 39,000.
वहीँ was a huge wall in बीच फ़ील्ड visible बाद the renovations, to serve as the batter 's eye.
The स्टेडियम थी demolished by implosion on December 29, 2002.

The silent majority is an unspecified large बहुमत of people in a country or group who do not एक्स्प्रेस their opinions सरेआम.
The term was popularized ( हालांकि not first used ) by U.S. President Richard निक्सन in a November 3, 1969, speech in जिससे he said, `` And so tonight—to तुम, the ग्रेट silent बहुमत of my fellow americans—i ask for your support. ''
In इस उपयोग it referred to those Americans who did not join in the विशाल demonstrations against the Vietnam War at the time, who did not जुड़ें in the counterculture, and who किया not participate in public discourse.
Nixon along साथ many others saw this group of मध्य Americans as being overshadowed in the media by the अधिक vocal minority.
The phrase was प्रयुक्त in the 19th century as a euphemism referring to all the people who have died, और others have used it before and बाद Nixon to refer to groups of voters in various nations of the world.
sam, a rhesus मंकी, उड़ाया to an altitude of 88 km in 1959.

Before humans went into स्पेस, several animals were launched into स्पेस, including numerous monkeys, so कि scientists could investigate the biological effects of space सफर.
The United States launched flights containing primate cargo primarily between 1948-1961 with एक flight in 1969 and one in 1985.
France launched two monkey-carrying फ़्लाइट in 1967.
The Soviet संघ and Russia शुभारम्भ monkeys between 1983 and 1996.
Most बंदरों were anesthetized पहले lift-off.
Overall thirty-two monkeys flew in the space program ; none flew more than once.
Numerous back-up monkeys भी went through the programs but never flew.
Monkeys from several species were used, including rhesus बंदरों, cynomolgus monkeys, squirrel monkeys, और pig-tailed macaques.
Some chimpanzees ( which are apes rather than monkeys ) were भी used.
RAID ( अनावश्यक array of independent disks, originally अनावश्यक array of inexpensive disks ) is a storage technology that combines multiple disk drive components into a logical unit.
Data is distributed आरपार the ड्राइव in one of several ways called `` RAID levels '', depending on the स्तर of redundancy and performance जरूरी.
the term `` रेड '' was first defined by David Patterson, Garth A. गिब्सन, and रैंडी Katz at the University of California, बर्कली in 1987.
Marketers representing industry RAID manufacturers later attempted to reinvent the term to describe a अनावश्यक array of स्वतंत्र disks as a means of disassociating a low-cost expectation इससे RAID technology.
RAID is now used as an umbrella term लिये computer data storage schemes that can divide और replicate आंकड़ा among अनेक physical drives : RAID is an example of storage आभासीकरण and the array can be accessed by the operating system as one single ड्राइव.
The different schemes or architectures are named by the word RAID followed by a number ( e.g. RAID 0, RAID 1 ).
प्रत्येक scheme provides a different balance between the key goals : विश्वसनीयता and availability, performance and capacity.
RAID levels वृहद than RAID 0 provide सुरक्षा against unrecoverable ( sector ) read errors, as well as whole disk failure.
A lymphocyte is a type of white blood cell in the vertebrate immune system.
Under the microscope, lymphocytes can be divided into large lymphocytes and छोटी lymphocytes.
विशाल granular lymphocytes include natural killer cells ( nk cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of T cells and B cells.
The बिग lebowski is a 1998 dark comedy film written and निर्देशित by Joel and Ethan Coen.
Jeff Bridges stars as Jeff Lebowski, an unemployed Los Angeles slacker and avid bowler, nicknamed `` The Dude. ''
After a case of mistaken identity, The Dude is introduced to a millionaire also नामित Jeffrey Lebowski.
When the millionaire Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped, he commissions The Dude to deliver the ransom to secure her release.
The योजना goes awry when The Dude 's friend Walter Sobchak ( John Goodman ) schemes to keep the full ransom.
Steve Buscemi, Philip Seymour Hoffman, David Huddleston, Julianne Moore, Tara reid, and जॉन Turturro also स्टार in the film, which is narrated by a cowboy known only as `` The Stranger '', played by Sam Elliott.
The फिल्मी is loosely inspired by the कार्य of Raymond Chandler.
Joel Coen stated : `` We wanted to do a Chandler kind of story – how it moves episodically, and सौदे with the वर्ण trying to सुलझाना a mystery, as well as having a hopelessly complex प्लाट that 's ultimately unimportant. ''
the original score was composed by Carter Burwell, a longtime collaborator of the Coen Brothers.
The Big Lebowski was a निराशा at the u.S. box office and received mixed reviews at the समय of its release.
Reviews have trended towards the positive over time, and the film has become a cult पसंदीदा, noted for its idiosyncratic characters, dream sequences, unconventional dialogue, and eclectic soundtrack.
Severus Snape is a fictional अक्षर in the Harry Potter किताब श्रेणी written by j.K. Rowling.
in the first novel of the series, he is hostile toward Harry and is built up to be the primary antagonist until the final chapters.
As the series progresses, Snape 's character becomes more परतदार and complex.
Rowling करता not fully reveal the details of his सच्चा loyalties until the समाप्त of the final book, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows.
Over the course of the श्रेणी, Snape 's portrayal evolves from कि of a malicious and partisan teacher to that of a pivotal character of considerable complexity and moral ambiguity.
Snape primarily teaches potions at Hogwarts, though in the sixth novel he teaches Defence Against the Dark कला, a position which he was known to have desired throughout the श्रेणी.
He ultimately becomes Headmaster of हॉग्वार्ट्स in the final novel.
Rowling has described him as `` a gift of a character ''.
Grits refers to a ground-corn food of Native American उत्पत्ति, that is common in the Southern United States and mainly खाया at breakfast.
Modern grits are commonly बना of alkali-treated corn known as hominy.
Grits are similar to other thick maize-based porridges from around the world such as polenta or the thinner farina.
`` तत्काल grits '' have महरूम processed to गति cooking.
The word `` grits '' गर्भाशयी from the Old अंग्रेज़ी word `` grytt, '' अर्थ coarse meal.
इस word originally referred to wheat और other porridges now known as groats in parts of the U.K..
Maize, unknown in Europe in the Middle Ages, is a food निकला from corn ( a New World plant ) and `` corn '' had been used to describe गेहूं products in many European regions.
`` Grits '' may be either singular or बहुवचन ; historically, in the American दक्षिण the शब्द was invariably एकवचन notwithstanding its बहुवचन form ( cf. such food names as `` spaghetti '' or `` linguine '', likewise बहुवचन in form, but singular in use ).
Sometimes, grits are called sofkee or sofkey ( इससे a native अमरीकी Muskogee word ).
In आणविक biology, human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized अंडा after conception.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta, and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast.
कुछ cancerous tumors produce this hormone ; therefore, elevated levels measured जब the patient is not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
However, it is not known whether this production is a contributing कारण or an effect of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hCG, known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ), is produced in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages.
, the FDA has prohibited the sale of `` homeopathic '' और over the counter hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent और illegal.

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores, restaurants, and vending machines in every country except Cuba and North कोरियाई.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola कम्पनी of Atlanta, जॉर्जिया, और is often referred to बस as कोक ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States चूंकि कूच 27, 1944 ).
originally intended as a patent medicine जब it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton, Coca-Cola थी bought out by businessman Asa griggs Candler, जिनकी marketing tactics led Coke to its दबदबा of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The कम्पनी produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the संसार.
the bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the कम्पनी, produce finished product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in संयोजन साथ filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, वितरित and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines.
ऐसे bottlers include coca-cola Enterprises, which is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North America और western Europe.
The coca-cola Company also sells concentrate for सोडा fountains to major restaurants and food सेवा distributors.
the Coca-Cola Company has, on occasion, introduced other कोला drinks अंतर्गत the Coke brand name.
The most common of these is Diet Coke, with others including caffeine-free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and special संस्करण with lemon, लाइम or कॉफी.
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, coca-cola was the world 's most मूल्यवान brand.
An ombudsman is an official, usually appointed by the government or by पार्लियामेंट लकिन with a significant degree of independence, who is charged साथ representing the interests of the public by investigating और addressing शिकायत of maladministration or violation of अधिकारों.
In some देशों an Inspector सामान्य, नागरिक Advocate or other official may have duties similar to those of a national ombudsman, and may also be appointed by the legislature.
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state, local or नगरपालिका government, and unofficial ombudsmen may be appointed by, or even work for, a corporation such as a यूटिलिटी प्रदायक or a newspaper, for an ngo, or for a professional regulatory body.
whether नियुक्त by the legislature, the कार्यपालिका, or an संगठन ( or, less frequently, elected by the constituency कि he or she serves ), the typical duties of an ombudsman are to investigate complaints and attempt to resolve them, usually through recommendations ( बाइंडिंग or not ) or mediation.
ombudsmen sometimes also aim to identify systemic issues leading to ग़रीब service or breaches of people 's rights.
At the national level, most ombudsmen have a wide mandate to deal with the entire पब्लिक sector, और sometimes भी elements of the private sector ( लिये example, contracted service providers ).
In some cases, there is a more restricted जनादेश, for example with particular sectors of society.
More हाल developments have included the creation of specialised Children 's Ombudsman and सूचना Commissioner agencies.
In some jurisdictions an ombudsman चार्ज with the handling of concerns about national सरकारी is more formally referred to as the `` Parliamentary Commissioner '' ( e.g. the United Kingdom संसदीय कमिश्नर for Administration, और the Western Australian राज्य Ombudsman ).
in many countries where the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing with alleged maladministration to promoting and protecting human rights, the ombudsman is recognised as the national इंसान rights institution.
The post of ombudsman had by the end of the 20th century been instituted by most governments and by some intergovernmental organizations such as the European Union.
Making a शिकायत to an ombudsman is usually free of charge.

New England is a प्रदेश in the northeastern corner of the United राज्य consisting of the six states of Maine, New Hampshire, Vermont, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, and कनेक्टिकट.
नई England is bordered by New York राज्य to the southwest, Quebec to the northwest, and New Brunswick and the Atlantic समंदर to the east.
In one of the earliest English settlements in North America, तीर्थयात्रियों from इंग्लैण्ड first settled in New England in 1620, to form Plymouth Colony.
Ten सालो later, the Puritans settled north of Plymouth Colony in बोस्टन, यूँ forming Massachusetts Bay Colony.
Over the अगला 130 सालो, New England लड़ा in चार French and Indian Wars, until the British defeated the फ्रेंच and their native allies in North अमेरिका.
In the late 18th century, the New इंग्लैण्ड Colonies initiated the resistance to the अंग्रेजों Parliament 's efforts to impose नई taxes without the सहमति of the colonists.
the Boston Tea Party was a protest to जिससे Great Britain responded with a series of punitive laws stripping Massachusetts of self-government, which यहूद termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the British authorities from New England in वसन्त 1776, and the घोषणा of Independence in जुलाई 1776.
कुछ of the first आंदोलनों of American साहित्य, philosophy, and education originated in New इंग्लैण्ड.
The region played a prominent role in the गति to abolish गुलामी, and थी the पहला region of the United States to be transformed by the Industrial Revolution.
Today, New England is a major world center of education, high technology, insurance, and medicine.
Boston is इसके cultural, वित्तीय, educational, medical और transportation center.
Each state is प्रधानतया subdivided into small incorporated municipalities known as New England towns, which are प्रायः governed by town meeting.
the only unincorporated territory in New England exists in the sparse, उत्तरी regions of Vermont, New Hampshire, and maine.
Since 1970, voters have अधिक often supported liberal candidates at the राज्य और federal level than those of कोई other region in the United States.
नई England is the only one of the United राज्य Census Bureau 's nine regional divisions whose name does नहीं derive from its geography, and it is the तभी multi-state region with clear, consistent boundaries.
It maintains a strong भाव of cultural identity set apart from the rest of the country, although the terms of इस identity are often contested, combining Puritanism with liberalism, कृषिक जीवन साथ उद्योग, and अलगाव with immigration.
Emergency !
is an American टेलीविज़न series that combines the medical नाटक and action-adventure जाति.
It was produced by Mark सात Limited and वितरित by Universal Studios.
It debuted as a midseason replacement on January 15, 1972, on NBC, replacing the two short-lived series The साझेदार and The शुभ Life, and ran until September 3, 1977, with six अतिरिक्त two-hour television films during the following two सालो.
Emergency !
was created और produced by Jack Webb and रॉबर्ट A. Cinader, both of whom यहूद also responsible लिये the police dramas Adam-12 और Dragnet.
the Eastern Time Zone ( ET ) encompasses 17 U.S. states in the eastern part of the contiguous United States, parts of कनाडा और three countries in South America.
Places that use Eastern मानक Time ( EST ) when observing standard time ( autumn/winter ) are 5 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
Eastern Daylight Time ( EDT ), when observing daylight saving time ( spring/summer ) is 4 hours behind समन्वित Universal समय ( ).
In the northern parts of the समय मण्डल, during the second Sunday in March, at 2:00 a.m. EST, clocks are advanced to 3:00 a.m. edt leaving a one hour `` gap. ''
दौरान the first संडे in नवम्बर, at 2:00 a.m. edt, clocks हैं moved back to 1:00 a.m. EST, thus `` duplicating '' one घंटा.
Southern भाग of the मण्डल ( Panama and the Caribbean ) do not observe daylight saving.
Standard form of the periodic table.
The colors represent different categories of elements explained below.
The periodic table is a tabular प्रदर्शक of the chemical elements, organized on the basis of their atomic numbers, electron configurations, और पुनरावर्ती रासायनिक properties.
Elements are presented in order of increasing atomic क्रमांक ( number of protons ).
the standard रूप of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main body of तत्व, positioned above a smaller double row of elements.
The table can भी be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the middle, और the f-block below कि.
The पंक्ति of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s-, d-, and p-blocks are called groups, with some of these having names such as the halogens or the प्रतिष्ठित gases.
Since, by definition, a periodic table incorporates recurring trends, any such table can be used to derive relationships between the properties of the तत्व और भविष्यवाणी the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, तत्व.
As a परिणाम, a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी framework लिये analyzing chemical behavior, and such tables हैं widely used in chemistry and other sciences.
Although precursors exist, Dmitri mendeleev is generally credited with the publication, in 1869, of the first widely पहचाना periodic table.
He विकसित his table to illustrate periodic trends in the properties of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also पूर्वानुमानित कुछ properties of then-unknown elements that होता be अपेक्षित to fill gaps in this table.
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the elements in सवाल were subsequently discovered.
mendeleev 's periodic table has since महरूम expanded और refined with the discovery or संश्लेषण of further new elements और the development of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior.
All elements from परमाणु numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been खोजा or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally, although some are found only in trace amounts और were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
the elements after 98 have only महरूम synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being धड़ा, with the question of how the आवधिक table may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring elements have also been उत्पादित in laboratories.
minecraft is a sandbox indie खेल originally created by स्वीडिश प्रोग्रामर markus `` पायदान '' Persson and later developed and published by Mojang.
It was publicly released for the PC on May 17, 2009, as a developmental alpha version and, after gradual updates, was published as a पूरा release version on नवम्बर 18, 2011.
a version लिये Android was released a month earlier on October 7, and an iOS version was released on November 17, 2011.
On May 9, 2012, the game was released on Xbox 360 as an Xbox सजीव Arcade game, co-developed by 4J Studios.
सब versions of Minecraft receive periodic updates.
The रचनात्मक and building पहलुओं of Minecraft allow players to build constructions आउट of textured cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world.
Other activities in the game include exploration, महफ़िल resources, crafting और combat.
Gameplay in its commercial release has two principal मोड्स : survival, which requires players to acquire resources and maintain their health और hunger ; and creative, where खिलाड़ी have an असीमित सप्लाई of resources, the ability to fly, और no health or hunger.
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as survival, differing only in difficulty ; it is set to hardest setting और respawning is disabled, forcing players to delete उनके worlds upon death.
Minecraft received five awards from the 2011 Game Developers Conference : it was awarded the Innovation पुरस्कार, Best Downloadable खेल Award, and the बेहतरीन Debut Game Award from the Game डेवलपर Choice पुरस्कार ; and the Audience पुरस्कार, as well as the seumas McNally Grand Prize, from the Independent Games Festival in 2011.
in 2012, Minecraft was awarded a Golden जॉयस्टिक Award in the category Best downloadable Game.
As of April 8, 2013, the game has sold over 10 million copies on PC and as of जनवरी 22, 2013, over 20 लाख copies across all platforms.
The अंधेरा Knight is a 2008 British-American superhero film directed, produced, and co-written by Christopher Nolan.
Based on the DC Comics character Batman, the फिल्मी is the second part of नोलन 's Batman film series and a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins.
Christian Bale reprises the सीसे role of Bruce Wayne/Batman, साथ a returning cast of Michael caine as Alfred pennyworth, Gary Oldman as James Gordon and Morgan Freeman as Lucius फॉक्स.
The film introduces the character of घनघोर Dent ( आरोन Eckhart ), Gotham 's newly elected ज़िला Attorney and the consort of Bruce Wayne 's childhood friend Rachel Dawes ( Maggie जिलएनहॉल ), who joins बैटमैन and the police in combating the new rising threat of a criminal mastermind calling himself `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ).
Nolan 's प्रेरणा for the फिल्मी was the Joker 's कॉमिक book debut in 1940, the 1988 graphic novel, and the 1996 series, which retold Two-Face 's origin.
The nickname `` the अंधेरा Knight '' was first applied to Batman in Batman No. 1 ( 1940 ), in a स्टोरी written by Bill उंगली.
The Dark Knight was filmed primarily in Chicago, as well as in several other locations in the संयुक्त States, the United Kingdom, and Hong Kong.
Nolan used an IMAX camera to film some sequences, including the Joker 's first रूप in the film.
On January 22, 2008, कुछ months after he had समाप्त filming on the अंधेरा Knight and six months पहले the फिल्मी 's release, Heath लेजर died from a toxic combination of नुस्खा दवाएँ, अग्रणी to intense attention from the press and movie-going public.
warner Bros. था initially created a viral marketing अभियान for The अंधेरा नाईट, developing promotional websites and trailers highlighting screen गोलियाँ of लेजर as the Joker, but after Ledger 's मौत, the studio refocused its promotional campaign.
The Dark नाईट was released on July 16, 2008 in Australia, on July 18, 2008 in North America, and on July 24, 2008 in the United Kingdom.
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s and one of the best superhero films ever बना, the फिल्मी received highly positive reviews and set numerous records दौरान its theatrical run.
With over $ 1 billion in revenue विश्वव्यापी, it is the 14th-highest-grossing film of all समय, unadjusted for inflation.
The film प्राप्त eight Academy Award nominations ; it won the award for बेहतरीन Sound Editing and Ledger was मरणोपरांत awarded Best Supporting Actor.
the Dark Knight उदय, the final part of the trilogy, was released on July 20, 2012.
