The Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts centre in New South Wales, Australia.
It थी conceived and largely built by Danish architect Jørn Utzon, opening in 1973 after a long gestation that began with his competition-winning design in 1957.
जोसेफ काहिल 's नई दक्षिण वेल्स सरकारी gave the go-ahead लिये work to शुरू in 1958.
The government 's बिंदास decision to चुनें Utzon 's design is often निष्प्रभ by the scandal that followed.
It is on Bennelong Point in Sydney Harbour, close to the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
It sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central कारोबार district ( the CBD ), surrounded on three sides by the harbour ( सिडनी कोव and फार्म कोव ) and inland by the Royal Botanic Gardens.
Contrary to its name, it houses multiple performance venues.
It is among the busiest performing कला centres in the world, hosting over 1,500 performances प्रत्येक year attended by some 1.2 million लोगों.
it provides a venue लिये many performing-arts companies, including the four key resident companies Opera Australia, The Australian Ballet, the Sydney Theatre कम्पनी and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra, and presents a wide range of प्रोडक्शन्स on its own account.
it is भी one of the most popular visitor attractions in Australia, with more than seven million people visiting प्रत्येक साल, 300,000 of whom लो a हिदायत tour.
It is administered by the Sydney Opera हाउस Trust, under the New South Wales Ministry of the Arts.
On 28 June 2007, it was बना a युनेस्को संसार Heritage Site.
It is one of the 20th century 's most distinctive buildings and एक of the most famous performing कला centres in the world.
A graph of देह mass index as a फलन of body mass and body height is shown above.
The dashed lines represent subdivisions within a प्रमुख क्लास.
For उदाहरण the `` Underweight '' classification is further divided into `` severe '', `` moderate '', and `` mild '' subclasses.
the देह mass अनुक्रमणिका ( BMI ), or Quetelet index, is a measure for human body shape based on an individual 's weight and height.
It was devised between 1830 and 1850 by the belgian बहुश्रुत Adolphe Quetelet दौरान the कोर्स of developing `` सोशल physics ''.
देह mass index is defined as the व्यक्तिगत 's body द्रव्यमान divided by the वर्गाकार of their height.
The formulae universally used in medicine produce a unit of measure of kg/m2.
BMI can भी be संकल्पित using a BMI chart, which displays BMI as a function of weight ( horizontal axis ) and height ( vertical axis ) using contour lines for different मान of BMI or colors for different BMI categories.
† The factor लिये uk/us units is more precisely 703.06957964, but that level of precision is not meaningful for this calculation.
To work इससे स्टोन and pounds पहला multiply the stone by 14 then add the pounds to give the whole द्रव्यमान in pounds ; to work from feet and inches पहला multiply the feet by 12 then add the इंच to give the whole ऊँचाई in inches.
Thomas paine ( January 29, 1737 ( NS February 9, 1737 ) – June 8, 1809 ) was an English-American political activist, author, राजनैतिक theorist and revolutionary.
As the author of दो highly influential pamphlets at the start of the American Revolution, he प्रेरित the देशप्रेमी in 1776 to declare independence from Britain.
His ideas reflected Enlightenment era rhetoric of transnational human rights.
He has been called `` a corsetmaker by trade, a journalist by profession, और a propagandist by inclination. ''
born in Thetford, England, in the county of नॉर्फ़ोक, Paine emigrated to the British अमरीकी colonies in 1774 with the help of Benjamin Franklin and he arrived in time to participate in the अमरीकी Revolution.
His principal contributions were the powerful, widely read pamphlet Common Sense ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling American book that advocated colonial America 's independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain, and The American संकट ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series.
Common Sense थी so influential that जॉन Adams said, `` Without the कलम of the author of Common Sense, the sword of Washington would have been raised in vain.”
Paine जिया in France for सबसे of the 1790s, becoming deeply involved in the French क्रान्ति.
He wrote the Rights of man ( 1791 ), in part a defence of the French क्रान्ति against its आलोचकों.
His attacks on British writer Edmund Burke led to a trial and conviction in absentia in 1792 for the अपराधों of seditious मानहानि.
In 1792, despite not being able to बोलो फ्रेंच, he was elected to the French National Convention.
The girondists regarded him as an ally.
Consequently, the Montagnards, especially Robespierre, regarded him as an enemy.
In दिसम्बर 1793, he was arrested and imprisoned in Paris, तब released in 1794.
He became notorious because of The Age of Reason ( 1793–94 ), his किताब कि advocates deism, promotes reason and freethinking, and argues against institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular.
He भी wrote the pamphlet Agrarian Justice ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of property, and introduced the concept of a गारंटी minimum income.
In 1802, he returned to America जहाँ he died on June 8, 1809.
तभी छह people attended his funeral as he था been ostracized लिये his ridicule of Christianity.
Clinical trials हैं sets of परीक्षण in medical research and drug development कि generate safety and efficacy data ( or अधिक specifically, information about प्रतिकूल drug reactions and adverse effects of other treatments ) for health interventions ( e.g., drugs, diagnostics, devices, therapy protocols ).
They are conducted only after satisfactory information has been gathered on the quality of the non clinical safety, and health authority/ethics committee approval is granted in the country जहाँ स्वीकृति of the drug or device is sought.
Previously, many emerging देशों did not आवश्यकता local trials for product approvals.
Now, though emerging countries still accept आंकड़ा from U.S./Europe, they also require some local trials.
Depending on the प्रकार of उत्पाद and the stage of its development, जांचकर्ताओं initially enroll volunteers and/or patients into small pilot अध्ययन, and subsequently conduct larger scale अध्ययन in patients that often compare the new product with अन्य already स्वीकृत for the affliction of interest.
As धनात्मक सुरक्षा और efficacy data are gathered, the number of मरीजों is typically increased.
Clinical trials can vary in आकार, and can involve a single शोध entity in one country or many such entities in अनेक देशों.
A full श्रेणी of trials may incur sizable costs, and the burden of paying for all the necessary people and services is usually borne by the sponsor, which may be a governmental organization or a pharmaceutical, biotechnology or medical device company.
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the resources of the sponsor, a clinical trial is प्रबंधित by an outsourced partner, ऐसे as a contract research organization or a clinical trials unit in the अकादमिक sector.
The ग्रीन Bay Packers are an American football team based in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
They हैं members of the North Division of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
ग्रीन Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the एनएफएल, having been organized और playing in 1919.
The Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned major league professional sports टोली in the संयुक्त States.
The Packers हैं the last vestige of `` small town teams '' that were एकबार common in the एनएफएल during the 1920s और 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by अर्ल `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on जिससे the team plays ) और George Whitney Calhoun, the Green Bay पैकर्स can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in ग्रीन Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football team against क्लब from around विस्कॉन्सिन and the Midwest.
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known आज as the National Football League ( एनएफएल ).
हालांकि Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' टोली, its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected घर games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( अधिक than any other team in the NFL ), including nine NFL championships prior to the Super कटोरी era and four Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ), 1968 ( Super Bowl ii ), 1997 ( सुपर Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries with उनके NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents, the Chicago bears, Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions.
The Bears-Packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL history, dating back to 1921.
इथेनॉल fuel is ethanol ( ethyl alcohol ), the same प्रकार of दारू found in alcoholic beverages.
It is most often used as a motor ईंधन, mainly as a biofuel additive for gasoline.
World इथेनॉल उत्पादन लिये हस्तांतरण fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007 from 17 billion to more than 52 billion liters.
From 2007 to 2008, the share of ethanol in global gasoline type ईंधन use increased from 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
In 2011 worldwide इथेनॉल fuel उत्पादन reached 22.36 अरब U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ), with the संयुक्त States as the top producer with 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ), accounting for 62.2 % of global production, followed by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ).
Ethanol fuel has a `` gasoline gallon equivalency `` ( gge ) मान of, which means 1.5 gallons of ethanol उपज the energy of one gallon of गैसोलीन.
Ethanol ईंधन is widely used in Brazil and in the United States, and together both countries were responsible for 87.1 % of the world 's ethanol fuel production in 2011.
Most cars on the सड़क today in the U.S. can run on blends of up to 10 % इथेनॉल, and ethanol represented 10 % of the U.S. gasoline fuel supply derived from घरेलू sources in 2011.
Since 1976 the Brazilian government has made it mandatory to blend इथेनॉल साथ gasoline, and चूंकि 2007 the legal blend is around 25 % ethanol and 75 % gasoline ( E25 ).
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 million flex-fuel automobiles and light trucks and 1.5 million flex-fuel मोटरसाइकिल that regularly उपयोग neat इथेनॉल fuel ( known as E100 ).
bioethanol is a form of renewable उर्जा that can be produced from agricultural feedstocks.
It can be बना from very common फसलों such as sugar cane, potato, manioc and corn.
There has been considerable बहस about how उपयोगी bioethanol will be in replacing gasoline.
Concerns about its production और उपयोग सुनाना to increased food prices due to the large amount of arable land required for फसलों, as well as the energy और pollution संतुलन of the whole cycle of ethanol production, especially from corn.
हाल developments साथ cellulosic ethanol उत्पादन और commercialization may allay some of these concerns.
Cellulosic ethanol offers promise क्युकी cellulose fibers, a major and universal component in संयंत्र cells walls, can be used to produce ethanol.
according to the International उर्जा Agency, cellulosic ethanol could allow ethanol fuels to play a much bigger role in the future than previously thought.

the second E85 flexifuel model introduced by Saab in the Swedish market.
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987, before steps were removed in 1992 and plaque बदला from Cyrillic to Latin script )
a plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, वारिस presumptive to the austro-hungarian सिंहासन, and his wife, Sophie, Duchess of Hohenberg, were shot dead in Sarajevo, by Gavrilo Princip, one of a group of छह Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces so they could be combined into a वृहद Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives यहूद consistent with the movement that later became ज्ञात as Young Bosnia.
Serbian military officers stood behind the attack.
at the top of ये Serbian सैन्य conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military प्रज्ञा Dragutin Dimitrijević, his righthand man प्रमुख Vojislav Tankosić, और masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major tankosić armed the हत्यारे with bombs and pistols और trained them.
the assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and agents कि Rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the infiltration of हथियार और operatives into Austria-Hungary.
the assassins, the key members of the clandestine tunnel, and the कुंजी Serbian सैन्य conspirators who were still alive were arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
Those जो were arrested in Bosnia were tried in साराजेवो in October 1914.
The other षड्यंत्रकारियों were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo अदालत on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया तीन of the top military conspirators.
much of what is known about the assassinations comes from these two trials and related records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and हत्याएं of 28 June is highly controversial because the आक्रमण led to the outbreak of संसार War I one माह later.
Renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born April 25, 1969 ) is an American actress and producer.
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her भूमिका in the film Jerry मैग्वायर ( 1996 ), और subsequently प्राप्त two nominations for the अकादमी पुरस्कार for Best अभिनेत्री for उसके roles as ब्रिजेट Jones in the comedy Bridget जोन्स 's Diary ( 2001 ), और as Roxie Hart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ).
वो won the Academy Award for Best Supporting अभिनेत्री for उसके प्रदर्शन in the drama Cold Mountain ( 2003 ).
She has won an Academy पुरस्कार, three Golden Globe Awards, तीन स्क्रीन Actors Guild पुरस्कार, and a BAFTA Award ; was नामित Hasty Pudding 's Woman of the Year in 2009 ; and established herself as one of the highest-paid Hollywood अभिनेत्रियों as of 2007.
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) हैं the three smallest bones in the human body, the malleus, the incus and the stapes.
They are contained within the middle कान space and serve to transmit ध्वनि from the air to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ).
The absence of the auditory ossicles would constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing loss.
The term `` ossicles '' literally means `` tiny bones '' and commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, though the term may refer to any small bone throughout the body.
the New वचन ( Hebrew • • — Greek • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical interpretation originally निकला from a phrase in the Book of Jeremiah, in the Hebrew शास्त्रों.
It is often thought of as an eschatological मुक्तिदाता आयु or संसार to come और is related to the biblical अवधारणा of the Kingdom of God.
Generally, ईसाइयों believe that the New Covenant was instituted at the Last Supper as भाग of the Eucharist, which in the इन्जील of John शामिल the नई Commandment.
There are several Christian eschatologies that further define the New Covenant, as an example an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the New Covenant as an ongoing relationship between Christian believers और God that will be in पूरा फलीभूत बाद the Second Coming of Christ ; कि is, it will not तभी be in full fruition in believing hearts, but in the future बाह्य संसार as well.
the connection between the Blood of Christ और the New Covenant is seen in सबसे modern English translations of the New Testament with the saying : `` this cup that is poured out for तुम is the new covenant in my blood ''.
Christians believe कि यीशु is the mediator of the New Covenant, and that the Blood of मसीह शेड at his crucifixion is the जरूरी blood of the covenant.
As with all covenants between God and man described in the Bible, the New वचन is माना `` a bond in blood sovereignly administered by God. ''
It रै been theorized that the नई Covenant is the Law of Christ as spoken during his Sermon on the Mount.
The following List of people pardoned or granted दया by the अध्यक्ष of the United States documents the most prominent cases of प्रत्येक presidency.
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II, Section 2, clause 1 ), Presidents have the power to ग्रान्ट clemency in one or more of the following तरीके : the ability to grant a full pardon, to commute a sentence, or to तोड़ना a fine.
u.S. Presidents have no power to ग्रान्ट clemency लिये crimes prosecuted अंतर्गत state विधि.
as to the difference between a pardon and a commutation:
a pardon is an executive अनुक्रम vacating a conviction.
a commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of किसी currently सेवारत a sentence लिये a crime pursuant to a conviction, बगैर vacating the conviction itself.
लगभग 20,000 pardons and clemencies were issued by u.S. presidents in the 20th century alone.
The रिकॉर्ड of acts of दया यहूद public until 1934.
In 1981 the Office of the Pardon Attorney was निर्मित and रिकॉर्ड from President H. W. Bush आगे are now सूचीबद्ध.
This सूची includes pardons and commutations.
Tampa ( ) is a city in the U.S. state of Florida.
It serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County and is located on the west coast of Florida, on Tampa Bay निकट the Gulf of Mexico.
The जनसांख्यिकी of Tampa in 2011 was 346,037.
The current location of tampa was once inhabited by indigenous peoples of the सुरक्षा Harbor culture, most notably the tocobaga and the Pohoy, who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay.
It थी briefly explored by Spanish explorers in the early 16th century, लकिन there यहूद no permanent अमरीकी or European settlements within today 's city limits जबतक after the United States था acquired Florida from Spain in 1819.
In 1824, the संयुक्त States Army स्थापित a frontier outpost called फोर्ट ब्रुक at the मुँह of the Hillsborough River, near the site of today 's Tampa सम्मेलन Center.
The पहला civilian residents were pioneers who settled near the fort लिये protection from the आसपास Seminole population.
The कस्बा grew slowly until the 1880s, जब railroad कड़ी, the discovery of phosphate, and the arrival of the सिगार industry jump-started Tampa 's development and helped it to grow into an important city by the early 1900s.
Today, Tampa is a part of the metropolitan area सबसे commonly referred to as the Tampa Bay Area.
For U.S. जनसांख्यिकी purposes, Tampa is part of the tampa-st. Petersburg-Clearwater, Florida Metropolitan Statistical Area.
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 लाख residents, making it the दूसरी largest metropolitan statistical क्षेत्रफल ( MSA ) in the state, and the चौथी largest in the Southeastern United States, behind Miami, Washington, d.C., and Atlanta.
The Greater Tampa Bay क्षेत्रफल has just over 4 million निवासियों और generally शामिल the Tampa and Sarasota metro areas.
the Tampa Bay Partnership and U.S. Census data दिखाया an औसत annual growth of 2.47 percent, or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per year.
Between 2000 and 2006, the Greater Tampa Bay Market अनुभवी a combined growth rate of 14.8 percent, growing from 3.4 million to 3.9 लाख and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1, 2007.
a 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay area population to have 4,310,524 people and a 2017 projection of 4,536,854 लोगों.
Tampa has a number of sports teams, such as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the National Football League, the Tampa खाड़ी Lightning of the National हॉकी League, and the Tampa खाड़ी Storm of the Arena Football League.
The Tampa Bay Rays in प्रमुख League Baseball and the Tampa Bay rowdies of the North अमरीकी Soccer League खेल their घर games in neighboring st. पीटर्सबर्ग, Florida.
In 2008, tampa was ranked as the 5th बेहतरीन बाहरी नगर by Forbes.
A 2004 survey by the NYU newspaper Washington Square News ranked Tampa as a top city for `` twenty-somethings. ''
Tampa is अभी ranked as a `` Gamma '' world city by loughborough University.
according to loughborough, tampa बाँधने alongside other world cities ऐसे as Phoenix, सेंटो डोमिंगो, and Osaka.
In recent years Tampa रै seen a notable upsurge in high-market demand इससे consumers, signaling more wealth concentrated in the क्षेत्रफल.
Tampa hosted the 2012 रिपब्लिकन National Convention.
The शेवरलेट cavalier was a compact automobile उत्पादित from 1982 to 2005 by General Motors.
Built on the कम्पनी 's J platform, the Cavalier produced the highest sales in 1984.
AT & T गतिशीलता LLC branded and referred to as AT & t ( formerly cingular Wireless LLC ), is a wholly owned subsidiary of AT & T Inc. that provides wireless services to 107 million subscribers in the संयुक्त States, including Puerto रीको and the U.S. वर्जिन Islands.
AT & T Mobility is the दूसरी largest बेतार telecommunications provider in the United States and Puerto रीको, behind Verizon Wireless, which serves 115.78 लाख customers as of the fourth quarter of 2012.
AT & T Mobility is headquartered in the Lenox Park area of DeKalb Co. जॉर्जिया, बस outside Atlanta.
Originally Cingular Wireless LLC इससे 2000 to 2007, a joint venture between SBC Communications and BellSouth, the company acquired the old AT & T Wireless in 2004 ; SBC later acquired the original AT & t and re-branded as `` AT & T ''.
Cingular became wholly owned by AT & T in December 2006 as a परिणाम of AT & t 's acquisition of bellsouth.
in January 2007, Cingular confirmed it would re-brand itself under the AT & T नाम.
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately, for both regulatory and brand-awareness कारण दोनो brands were used in the company 's signage and विज्ञापन दौरान a परिवर्तन period.
the transition concluded in लेट June, just prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone.
On March 20, 2011, at & T Mobility announced its intention to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche telekom for $ 39 billion.
If it had प्राप्त government and regulatory approval, at & T would have था more than 130 million सदस्य.
However, the U.S. Department of Justice, the Federal Communications Commission, और AT & t गतिशीलता 's competitors ( such as Sprint Nextel ) opposed the move on the grounds that it would reduce competition in the cellular communications market.
in दिसम्बर 2011, in the face of both सरकारी and फैली consumer opposition, AT & t withdrew their प्रस्ताव to complete the merger.
Martin Luther King, Jr. ( January 15, 1929 – April 4, 1968 ) थी an American clergyman, activist, and leader in the African-American Civil Rights Movement.
He is best known for his भूमिका in the advancement of सिविल अधिकारों using nonviolent civil disobedience.
King has become a national icon in the history of American progressivism.
A Baptist minister, King became a सिविल rights activist early in his career.
He led the 1955 Montgomery बस Boycott and helped found the Southern Christian Leadership Conference ( sclc ) in 1957, सेवारत as इसके first president.
With the SCLC, किंग led an unsuccessful struggle against segregation in Albany, जॉर्जिया, in 1962, and organized nonviolent protests in Birmingham, अलबामा, कि attracted national attention following television news coverage of the brutal पुलिस response.
King also helped to व्यवस्थित the 1963 March on वॉशिंगटन, where he वितरित his `` I Have a सपना `` वाक.
There, he established उसके reputation as one of the महानतम orators in अमरीकी इतिहास.
he also established his प्रतिष्ठा as a radical, and became an object of the Federal ब्यूरो of Investigation 's cointelpro for the rest of his life.
FBI agents investigated him for possible communist ties, recorded उसके extramarital liaisons and reported on them to government officials, and on एक occasion, mailed King a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him कमिट suicide.
On October 14, 1964, King received the Nobel Peace Prize for combating जातिगत inequality through nonviolence.
In 1965, he and the sclc helped to organize the Selma to Montgomery marches and the following year, he took the movement north to Chicago.
In the final सालो of his life, किंग expanded his फ़ोकस to शामिल poverty और the Vietnam War, alienating अनेक of his liberal allies साथ a 1967 वाक titled `` Beyond Vietnam ''.
किंग थी नियोजन a national occupation of Washington, D.C., पुकारा the Poor People 's Campaign.
King was assassinated on April 4, 1968, in मेम्फिस, Tennessee.
His death was followed by riots in many u.S. cities.
Allegations that James Earl Ray, the man convicted of killing King, had महरूम framed or acted in कॉन्सर्ट साथ government agents persisted for decades after the shooting, and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against किंग.
King थी awarded the Presidential पदक of Freedom and the Congressional Gold पदक posthumously.
Martin Luther किंग, Jr. दिन was established as a U.S. federal holiday in 1986.
Hundreds of streets in the U.S. have been renamed in his honor.
A memorial statue on the National Mall was खोली to the public in 2011.
The tiger ( Panthera tigris ) is the largest cat species, reaching a total देह length of up to and weighing up to.
it is the third largest land carnivore ( behind only the polar bear and the भूरा bear ).
Its most recognizable feature is a pattern of dark vertical stripes on reddish-orange fur साथ a lighter underside.
It has exceptionally stout teeth, and the canines हैं the longest among living felids with a crown ऊँचाई of as much as or even.
In zoos, टाइगर्स have जिया for 20 to 26 years, which also seems to be their longevity in the wild.
वे are territorial and generally solitary but social पशु, often requiring large संलग्न areas of आवास कि support their prey requirements.
इस, coupled with the fact कि वे are स्वदेशी to some of the more densely populated places on Earth, रै caused significant विरोध साथ humans.
Tigers once ranged widely across एशिया, from तुर्कों in the west to the eastern coast of Russia.
Over the past 100 years, they have lost 93 % of their historic range, and have महरूम extirpated from southwest and central Asia, from the आइलैंड्स of Java and Bali, and from large areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia.
Today, वे range from the Siberian taiga to open grasslands and tropical mangrove swamps.
The remaining six tiger subspecies have been classified as endangered by आईयूसीएन.
The global population in the wild is estimated to number between 3,062 and 3,948 individuals, down from around 100,000 at the प्रारंभ of the 20th सदी, with most remaining populations occurring in छोटी pockets isolated from each other.
Major reasons for population decline include habitat विनाश, आवास fragmentation and poaching.
the extent of area occupied by tigers is estimated at less than, a 41 % decline from the क्षेत्रफल estimated in the mid-1990s.
Tigers are among the most recognisable और popular of the world 's charismatic megafauna.
वे have featured prominently in ancient mythology and लोकगीत, and continue to be depicted in modern films and literature.
Tigers appear on many flags, coats of arms, and as mascots for sporting teams.
The Bengal tiger is the national animal of both India और Bangladesh.
The simplified internal structure of a chloroplast
अवलोकन of the Calvin cycle and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis हैं chemical reactions that convert carbon dioxide और other compounds into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes.
These प्रतिक्रियाएँ take the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ and perform further chemical processes on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation, reduction प्रतिक्रियाएँ, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, this प्रक्रम occurs तभी when light is available.
Plants do not carry out the Calvin cycle by रात्रि.
They, instead, रिलीज sucrose into the phloem from their मंड reserves.
This process happens when light is उपलब्धियाँ independent of the दयालु of photosynthesis ( C3 कार्बन fixation, C4 कार्बन fixation, and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and रिलीज it by day in order to make this process कार्य.
A linen handkerchief with pulled लड़ी embroidery around the edges
Linen cloth recovered from Qumran गुफा 1 near the Dead Sea.
Linen ( ) is a textile made from the fibers of the flax संयंत्र, Linum usitatissimum.
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture, लकिन when it is made into garments, it is valued for its exceptional coolness and ताजगी in hot weather.
The word `` लिनेन '' is of वेस्ट Germanic origin और cognates with the Latin नाम for the flax plant linum, and the पहले यूनानी λινόν ( linon ).
This word history has given वृद्धि to a number of other terms in English, the most notable of which is the English word line, निकला from the use of a linen ( flax ) लड़ी to determine a सीधा line.
Textiles in a linen weave texture, even when made of cotton, hemp and other non-flax fibers are also loosely referred to as `` linen ''.
ऐसे fabrics generally have उनके own specific names अन्य than linen ; for example, fine cotton yarn in a linen-style weave is called madapolam.
The collective term `` linens `` is still often used generically to describe a class of woven and even knitted bed, bath, table और kitchen वस्त्र.
The नाम linens is retained because traditionally, linen was प्रयुक्त for many of these वस्तुएं.
in the past, the word `` linens '' थी भी used to mean lightweight undergarments such as shirts, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a शब्द also cognate with लिनेन ), and detachable shirt collars and cuffs, which यहूद historically बना almost exclusively out of लिनेन.
The inside cloth परत of fine composite clothing garments ( as for example jackets ) was traditionally made of linen, and this is the origin of the word lining.
Linen textiles appear to be some of the oldest in the संसार : their इतिहास goes back many thousands of years.
Fragments of straw, seeds, मछली, yarns, और various types of fabrics which date back to about 8000 bc have महरूम मिला in Swiss lake dwellings.
Dyed flax fibers found in a prehistoric cave in जॉर्जिया suggest the use of woven लिनेन fabrics इससे wild flax may date back even earlier to 36,000 BP.
Linen was sometimes used as currency in प्राचीन Egypt.
Egyptian mummies were wrapped in linen क्युकी it was seen as a symbol of light and पवित्रता, and as a display of wealth.
Some of these fabrics, woven from hand spun yarns, were very fine लिये उनके day, but are coarse compared to modern linen.
Today, linen is प्रायः an expensive textile, and is produced in अपेक्षाकृत small quantities.
It has a long `` staple '' ( individual fiber length ) relative to cotton and other natural fibers.
अनेक products are बना of लिनेन : aprons, बैग, towels ( swimmers, bath, बीच, body and wash towels ), napkins, bed linens, linen tablecloths, runners, कुर्सी covers, और मेन 's & women 's wear.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World कप, is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय association football competition contested by the senior मेन 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship रै महरूम awarded every four सालो since the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World युद्ध.
The current champions are Spain, जो won the 2010 tournament.
the current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within the host nation ( s ) over a period of परिचय a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the preceding three years, is used to determine which टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट together with the host nation ( s ).
the 19 World Cup tournaments have महरूम won by eight different national teams.
Brazil have won पाँच टाइम्स, and they are the only team to have played in every टूर्नामेंट.
the other World Cup winners हैं Italy, with चार शीर्षक ; Germany, with three titles ; Argentina और inaugural winners Uruguay, with दो titles each ; and England, France, and Spain, with one title प्रत्येक.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup आयोजित in Germany.
The next three World cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.

The Wii 's successor console, the Wii U, supports the Wii MotionPlus and इसके peripherals in games where उपयोग of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary.
Majulah Singapura ( Onward Singapore ) is the national गान of सिंगापुर.
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a theme सोंग लिये आधिकारिक functions of the City Council of Singapore, the सोंग was चयनित in 1959 as the island 's गान when it attained self-government.
Upon full independence in 1965, Majulah singapura was formally adopted as Singapore 's national anthem.
By law the anthem may only be sung साथ its original Malay गीत, हालांकि there exist authorized translations of the lyrics of the गान in Singapore 's three other official languages : English, Mandarin and Tamil.
Originally composed in the key of G major, in 2001 the national anthem was officially relaunched in the lower key of F major as इस थी said to allow लिये a `` grander और more inspiring arrangement ''.
The national anthem is regularly performed or sung in schools and हथियारबंद forces camps at ceremonies held at the शुरूआत and/or the end of each day, during which the national ध्वज is also raised and lowered and the national pledge is taken.
Singaporeans are especially encouraged to गाओ the national anthem on अवसरों of national जश्न or national significance such as at the नेशनल Day Parade, at National Day observance ceremonies conducted by educational institutions और government departments, and at sporting events at जिससे Singapore teams are participating.
An expedition 's shipwrights building a brigantine, 1541.
Shipbuilding is the construction of ships and floating vessels.
It normally takes प्लेस in a specialized facility ज्ञात as a shipyard.
Shipbuilders, also पुकारा shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation that traces its roots to before recorded history.
Shipbuilding and ship मरम्मत, both commercial and military, are referred to as `` naval engineering ''.
The निर्माण of boats is a similar कार्यकलाप पुकारा boat building.
The dismantling of ships is called ship breaking.

The following is a list of the most populous incorporated places of the United States of America.
As defined by the United States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated place `` शामिल a variety of designations, सहित city, town, village, borough, और municipality.
A few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also शामिल in the Census ब्यूरो 's listing of incorporated places.
संचित city-counties represent a distinct type of government that includes the entire population of a county, or county equivalent.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, include multiple incorporated places.
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a भाग of another incorporated place.
Note कि this सूची refers only to the population of individual municipalities within their पारिभाषित limits, which does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident when considering U.S. metropolitan क्षेत्रफल populations.

Nintendo DS storage devices are डिवाइस प्रयुक्त to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress बिंब, homebrew video games and डाउनलोड commercial games ( since the Nintendo DS is नहीं sold with a rewritable storage medium ).
Licensed डेवलपर, however, can use a ब्लू Intelligent प्रणालियों Nitro Emulator बक्सा to flash cards.
These devices are also ज्ञात as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
There are two main classes of flashcarts : older devices which fit in Slot-2 ( the Game Boy अग्रिम Game Pak slot ) और newer devices that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card स्लॉट ).
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically cheaper due to economies of scale ( inherited from their use with Game Boy Advance ), but require a booting tool in Slot-1 in order to उपयोग the touch screen and अन्य DS features.
Second-generation devices ( those which only उपयोग Slot-1 ) do नहीं work साथ gba homebrew, but became less महंगी and easier to use, rivaling many slot-2 डिवाइस in दाम.
First-generation devices शामिल GBA flash cartridges, GBAMP CF, SuperCard, and M3.
Second-generation devices include R4 क्रान्ति, CycloDS, G6 Real and DS-X.
The भंडार device either contains flash memory or a स्लॉट for a memory card to store homebrew.
Storage devices with a memory-card slot प्रायः have अधिक storage capacity than flash-memory devices.
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured in megabits ( Mb ), memory-card capacity is प्रायः measured in megabytes ( MB ) ( जहाँ 8 Mb is 1 mb ).
Storage-device brands differ in their support for homebrew ; ds and Game लड़के Advance ROMs ; special features ( such as ability to play media files ) ; physical size and cost.
Strictly speaking, a storage device is not जरुरी for DS with flashme installed क्युकी homebrew can be sent to the ds using WMB.
However, इस is not an easily-portable method because the DS needs to be भीतर range of a suitable Wi-Fi card.

Japanese Americans have historically been among the तीन largest Asian American communities, but in recent decades, it has become the sixth largest group at roughly 1,304,286, सहित those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
in the 2010 census, the largest Japanese American communities were मिला in California with 272,528, Hawaii with 185,502, नई York with 37,780, Washington with 35,008, and Illinois with 17,542.

This is a व्यापक listing which highlights significant achievements और माइलस्टोन based upon Billboard magazine 's singles चार्ट, most notably the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100.
This सूची spans from the issue dated January 1, 1955 to present.
The बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 began with the समस्या dated August 4, 1958, and is currently the मानक popular music chart in the United States.
Prior to the सृष्टि of the Hot 100, Billboard published four singles charts : `` Best Sellers in Stores '', `` Most निभाई by Jockeys '', `` Most Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The शीर्ष 100 ''.
These charts, जिससे ranged इससे 20 to 100 slots, यहूद phased out at different टाइम्स between 1957 and 1958.
Though technically not part of the hot 100 चार्ट history, their आंकड़ा is included for computational purposes, and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations.
सब items listed नीचे are from the Hot 100 era, unless otherwise noted ( pre-Hot 100 charts ).
V is an American science fiction television series that ran for दो seasons on ABC, from November 3, 2009 to March 15, 2011.
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created by Kenneth Johnson, the नई series chronicles the arrival on Earth of a technologically advanced एलियन species जिससे ostensibly comes in peace, but actually has sinister motives.

geocaching is an outdoor recreational activity, in which the participants use a Global Positioning System ( GPS ) receiver or mobile device और other navigational techniques to hide and seek containers, called `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the संसार.
A typical cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook where the geocacher enters the date they found it और लक्षण it with उनके established code name.
After signing into the log, the संचय must be placed back exactly where the person found it.
Larger containers ऐसे as plastic storage containers ( tupperware or similar ) or ammunition boxes can also contain वस्तुएं लिये trading, usually toys or trinkets of little value.
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, and waymarking.
Boogie bas Productions थी a हिप hop group that was originally composed of KRS-One, D-Nice, and dj स्कॉट La Rock.
DJ Scott La Rock was murdered on अगस्त 27, 1987, months बाद the release of BDP 's डेब्यू album, Criminal Minded.
The name of the समूह, Boogie Down, derives इससे a nickname for the South bronx section of the Bronx, one of the five boroughs of New York City.
The group pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae and हिप hop music और their debut LP Criminal minded contained frank descriptions of life in the South Bronx of the late 1980s thus setting the stage for कया होता eventually become gangsta rap.
a municipal bond is a bond issued by a local government, or उनके agencies.
Potential issuers of municipal bonds शामिल states, cities, counties, redevelopment एजेंसियों, special-purpose districts, school districts, public utility districts, सरेआम owned airports and seaports, and any other सरकारी एंटिटी ( or समूह of governments ) at or below the state level.
Municipal bonds may be general दायित्वों of the issuer or secured by specified revenues.
In the United States, interest income प्राप्त by धारकों of नगरपालिका bonds is often exempt from the संघीय आय tax and इससे the आय tax of the state in which they are issued, हालांकि नगरपालिका bonds issued लिये निश्चित purposes may not be tax exempt.
Unlike new issue stocks that हैं brought to market with दाम restrictions until the deal is sold, municipal bonds हैं फ़्री to trade at any time once they हैं purchased by the investor.
Professional traders regularly trade and retrade the same bonds several times a सप्ताह.
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a सोंग written by Steve Winwood, Spencer Davis and Muff winwood, and originally performed by The Spencer Davis Group.
The basic riff of the सोंग was borrowed from the Homer बैंको song `` ( ai n't That ) A लॉट of Love '', written by Banks and Willie Dean `` Deanie '' पार्कर.
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' was a UK # 2 in the पतझड़ of 1966 and a US # 7.
The song is ranked # 247 on the Rolling Stone magazine 's list of the 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.

( The US संस्करण has more often महरूम used on reissue CDs, even those coming from Europe. )
The single features the sound of the Hammond b-3 अंग.
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of information related to films, टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम, and video games.
इस शामिल अभिनेताओं, production क्रू personnel, और fictional वर्ण featured in ये three visual entertainment media.
It is one of the most popular online entertainment गंतव्यों, with over 100 million unique users प्रत्येक month and a ठोस and rapidly growing mobile presence.
IMDb was launched on October 17, 1990, and in 1998 थी acquired by Amazon.com.

fibre Channel Host Bus एडाप्टर ( 64-bit PCI-X card )
SCSI Host बस Adapter ( 16-bit ISA कार्ड )
In computer hardware, a host controller, host adapter, or host bus adapter ( HBA ) connects a host system ( the computer ) to अन्य network और storage devices.
The शर्तें are primarily प्रयुक्त to refer to devices for connecting SCSI, Fibre Channel and eSATA devices.
However, devices for connecting to IDE, Ethernet, firewire, USB and other systems may also be called host adapters.
Recently, the advent of iSCSI and Fibre Channel over Ethernet has brought about Ethernet HBAs, which हैं different from Ethernet NICs in that they include TCP Offload Engines.
There are also converged HBAs that support दोनो ईथरनेट और Fibre Channel called converged Network adapters ( CNAs ).
Cashmere Scarves
Modern मेन 's cashmere sweaters for sale.
Cashmere wool, usually simply known as cashmere, is a रेशा प्राप्त from cashmere goats and other प्रकार of बकरी.
The word cashmere derives from an old स्पेलिंग of Kashmir.
Cashmere is fine in texture, strong, light, and नरम.
Garments made from it provide excellent insulation.
In the United राज्य, under the U.S. Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939, as amended, ( 15 Uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), states that a wool or वस्त्र product may not be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such ऊन उत्पाद is the ठीक ( dehaired ) undercoat fibers उत्पादित by a cashmere goat ( capra hircus laniger ) ;
the औसत diameter of the fiber of such ऊन product करता not exceed 19 microns ; and
such wool product does not contain more than 3 percent ( by weight ) of cashmere fibers with औसत diameters that exceed 30 माइक्रोन.
The average fiber diameter may be subject to a coefficient of विभिन्नता around the mean that shall not exceed 24 percent.
Jennifer Convertibles Inc. is the owner and licensor of sofabed and leather specialty retail stores in the United States, with stores located throughout the Eastern seaboard, in the Midwest, on the West coast और in the Southwest.

It subsequently emerged from Chapter 11 under the control of its major supplier, the Haining Mengnu समूह.
Egg roll is a term used for many अलग foods around the संसार.
2__Egg_roll __ Varieties of egg rolls हैं found in mainland चीन, many Chinese-speaking regions of एशिया, and Chinese immigrant समुदायों around the world.
Egg rolls as referred to in China.
In Guangdong and Hong Kong, egg roll usually refers to biscuit roll.
This is a type of biscuit.
The ingredient शामिल egg, flour and शुगर.
Egg फेंकें also is a dish in Canton और Hong Kong, इस is usually बना with vegetable.
भीतर China egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast and are नहीं as commonly खपत in the north and पश्चिमी parts of China.
In American Chinese cuisine, an egg roll is a savory dish typically served as an appetizer.
It is usually stuffed with chicken, pork or shrimp, cabbage, carrots, tomatoes, bean sprouts and other सब्जियां, and then गहन fried.
इस variety of the egg roll is very common and popular, across भी regional varieties of अमरीकी Chinese food, और is often included as part of a `` combination platter ''.
In Montreal, Canada, open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese संलयन डिश.
They can be either kosher certified or merely kosher style.
Pain और suffering is the legal term for the physical and emotional stress caused from an injury ( see also pain and suffering ).
Some damages that might be under this category would be : aches, temporary and permanent limitations on activity, potential shortening of life, depression or scarring.
When filing a lawsuit as a result of an injury, it is common for someone to seek धन both in compensation for actual money कि is lost और for the pain and stress associated with virtually any injury.
In a सूट, pain and suffering is part of the `` general damages '' section of the claimant 's अर्जी, or, alternatively, it is an element of `` compensatory '' non-economic क्षतिपूर्ति कि allows recovery for the mental anguish and/or physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of चोट for which the plaintiff seeks redress.
Apart from money damages awarded in trial, money damages are also given informally outside the judicial system in mediations, arbitration ( both of which may be court annexed or non litigated दावा ) as well as in routine बीमे settlements.
Individual claimants or those represented by lawyers प्रायः present demands to insurers to settle for money.
ये माँग for bodily injury compensation monies often set out damages that are similarly प्रयुक्त in the अदालत litigated pleadings.
Demands हैं प्रायः written summaries of a claimant 's medical परवाह और the facts which resulted in the injury.
Sample of a Medallion signature guarantee stampIn
the United States and Canada, a medallion signature guarantee is a special हस्ताक्षर गारंटी for the transfer of securities.
It is a guarantee by the transferring financial institution that the signature is वास्तविक and the financial institution accepts liability for any forgery.
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by preventing unauthorized transfers and possible निवेशकों नुकसान.
They also limit the देयता of the ट्रांसफ़र agent who स्वीकृत the certificates.
अलग संस्थानों have अलग policies as to what type of identification they require to provide the गारंटी and whether they charge a fee लिये such service ( usually nominal if any ).
Most institutions will not guarantee a signature of किसी who रै नहीं already been उनके customer.
A medallion signature guarantee is नहीं the same as an acknowledgment by a notary public, in the sense that a `` हस्ताक्षर guarantee '' is a certification by the संस्था that the signature is authentic, and an acknowledgment is a certification by a notary public attesting कि the signer signed a दस्तावेज़ voluntarily.
Some बैंको may no longer provide this service, however, many still do as well as अन्य financial institutions such as a Savings and लोन and क्रेडिट Unions.
At उनके sole discretion, these institutions may still decline to provide the Medallion Signature guarantees.
When US citizens हैं abroad, कुछ financial संस्थानों may accept United राज्य Embassy Seals, in place of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp.
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars stacked at a junkyard on Terminal Island, Los Angeles काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, March 1956
the General Motors स्ट्रीटकार conspiracy ( भी known as the ग्रेट American streetcar कांड ) refers to allegations and convictions in relation to a program by General मोटर्स ( GM ) and other companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric ट्रैन systems in अनेक American cities.
between 1936 and 1950, National City Lines and Pacific नगर Lines —with निवेश from GM, Firestone Tire, Standard Oil of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Phillips Petroleum, Mack Trucks, और the संघीय Engineering Corporation—bought over 100 इलेक्ट्रिक surface-traction systems in 45 cities including Baltimore, Newark, Los एंजिल्स, New York City, Oakland और San डिएगो and converted उन्हें into bus operation.
अनेक of the companies involved were convicted in 1949 of षड्यंत्र to monopolize interstate commerce लकिन were acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the स्वामित्व of these companies.
Some सुझाएँ that this program played a key भूमिका in the decline of पब्लिक transit in शहरों across the United States ; notably एडविन J. Quinby, who first खींचा attention to the program in 1946, and then Bradford C. Snell, an anti-trust attorney for the United States Senate whose controversial 1974 testimony to a सीनेट पूछताछ brought the issue to नेशनल awareness.
दोनो Quinby और Snell argued that the deliberate destruction of streetcars was part of a larger strategy to push the United States into automobile dependency.
अन्य say that independent आर्थिक factors brought about changes in the पारगमन प्रणाली, including the Great Depression, the Public Utility Holding कम्पनी अधिनियम of 1935, मजदूर unrest, market शक्तियां, rapidly increasing traffic congestion, urban sprawl, taxation policies that favored private vehicle ownership, and general enthusiasm for the ऑटोमोबाइल.
One writer on the subject has suggested that snell और others गिरी into simplistic conspiracy theory thinking, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly, GM waged a war on electric कर्षण.
It थी indeed an all out assault, but by no means the single reason for the failure of rapid transit.
Also, it is just as clear that actions और inactions by government contributed significantly to the elimination of electric traction. ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving effective rail-based शहरी हस्तांतरण प्रणालियों based on streetcars or trams, including न्यूर्क, Philadelphia, San फ्रांसिस्को, Pittsburgh, और Boston ; अन्य are re-introducing them.
The story रै been छान several times in print, film and अन्य media, notably in Who framed Roger खरगोश, Taken for a Ride and The End of Suburbia.
Corwin House, सलेम, Massachusetts, निर्मित ca. 1660, पहला Period English
अमरीकी colonial architecture includes several building design styles associated with the औपनिवेशिक period of the United States, including First Period English ( late-medieval ), French Colonial, Spanish Colonial, Dutch Colonial और Georgian.
ये styles are संबद्ध साथ the घरों, churches and government buildings of the period from about 1600 through the 19th century.

it topped the charts in 1940 in the U.S. and one year later was featured in the movie Sun घाटी serenade.

NEPTUNE logo
The NEPTUNE Canada प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s first regional-scale underwater ocean observatory कि plugs सीधे into the Internet.
चूंकि December 2009, it has allowed people to `` surf '' the seafloor while समंदर scientists run deep-water experiments from labs and universities around the world.
Along with its sister project, VENUS, NEPTUNE offers a unique दृष्टिकोण to समंदर science.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry out their शोध, while the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely operated crawler.
A gramophone record, commonly ज्ञात as a phonograph record ( in American English ), विनाइल record ( in reference to विनाइल, the material most commonly used after about 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a record '', is an एनालॉग sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed, modulated spiral नाली.
The groove usually starts near the periphery and ends near the बीच of the disc.
Phonograph records are generally described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, etc. ), the rotational गति at which they are played ( `` 33 rpm ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', इत्यादि. ), their समय capacity ( `` long playing '' ), their reproductive accuracy, or `` fidelity `` ( `` high fidelity '', `` Orthophonic '', `` full-range '', etc. ), और the number of channels of audio provided ( `` mono ``, `` stereo ``, `` quadraphonic ``, इत्यादि. ).
Phonograph रिकॉर्ड were the प्राथमिक medium used लिये music reproduction लिये सबसे of the 20th century, replacing the phonograph cylinder, साथ which it था co-existed, by the 1920s.
by the late 1980s, digital media had gained a larger market share, and the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991.
They continue to be manufactured and sold in the 21st century.
In 2008, nearly 2.9 million units shipped, the most in any year since 1998 and the format has continued to धीरे regain popularity.
They हैं especially प्रयुक्त by djs and audiophiles for many प्रकार of म्यूज़िक.
As of 2013, vinyl records continue to be used for distribution.

Grasslands are areas where the vegetation is वर्चस्व by grasses ( Poaceae ), however sedge ( Cyperaceae ) and rush ( Juncaceae ) परिवारों can also be found.
Grasslands occur naturally on all महाद्वीपों except Antarctica.
In temperate latitudes, such as northwestern Europe and the Great Plains and California in उत्तर America, native grasslands are dominated by perennial bunch grass species, whereas in warmer climates annual species रूप a वृहद component of the vegetation.
Grasslands are found in most ecoregions of the Earth.
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the temperate grasslands, savannas, and shrublands biome ( ' ecosystem ' ), which is one of आठ स्थलीय ecozones of the Earth 's surface.
Henna ( Lawsonia inermis, also called henna tree ) or Hina is a flowering plant, the sole प्रजाति in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae.
The English name `` henna '' comes from the Arabic ( ALA-LC : ḥinnāʾ / pronounced ) or colloquially, loosely pronounced.
The name is also used for dye preparations derived from the plant, and for the art of temporary tattooing आधारित on those dyes.
Henna has been used चूंकि antiquity to dye skin, hair, and fingernails, as खूब as fabrics including Silk, wool and leather.
Additionally, the name is misused for other skin and hair dyes, ऐसे as black henna or न्यूट्रल henna, which हैं not derived from the plant.
a thin फिल्मी is a परत of material ranging इससे fractions of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in thickness.
Electronic semiconductor डिवाइस और optical coatings are the प्रमुख applications benefiting इससे thin-film construction.
A परिचित application of thin films is the household दर्पण, which typically रै a पतला मेटल coating on the वापस of a sheet of glass to form a reflective interface.
The प्रक्रम of silvering was once commonly प्रयुक्त to produce mirrors.
A very-thin-film coating ( less than a nanometer thick ) is used to produce two-way mirrors.
The performance of ऑप्टिकल coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or AR, coatings ) are typically enhanced when the thin-film कोटिंग consists of multiple layers having varying thicknesses and refractive indices.
Similarly, a periodic structure of alternating thin films of different materials may collectively form a so-called superlattice which exploits the phenomenon of quantum confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is being किया with ferromagnetic and ferroelectric thin films for use as computer memory.
It is also being applied to pharmaceuticals, via thin-film drug डिलीवरी.
Thin-films हैं used to उपज thin-film batteries.
Thin films are also used in dye-sensitized सौर cells.
सिरेमिक thin films are in wide use.
The relatively high hardness और inertness of ceramic materials make this प्रकार of thin coating of interest for protection of substrate सामग्री against corrosion, oxidation and wear.
In particular, the use of such coatings on cutting tools can extend the life of these items by several आदेश of परिमाण.
Research is being done on a new class of thin-film inorganic ऑक्साइड materials, पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent oxides, जिससे could be used to मेक transparent transistors that हैं inexpensive, stable, and environmentally benign.
Gears of युद्ध is a military science fiction third-person shooter वीडियो game developed by Epic खेल और published by Microsoft खेल studios.
it was initially released as an exclusive शीर्षक for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in उत्तर अमेरिका, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, and most of यूरोपीय and included a `` सीमित Collector 's Edition '' with added content and an art book titled Destroyed सौंदर्य that विस्तृत much of the game 's back-story.
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity, a Microsoft Windows version of the game was developed in conjunction with People can Fly and released a year बाद, featuring new content including additional campaign स्तर, a new एकाधिक game mode, and Games लिये Windows Live कार्यक्षमता.
The game focuses on the troops of डेल्टा Squad as वे wield a हताश, last-ditch attempt to save the बाकी human inhabitants of the fictional ग्रह sera from a relentless and seemingly unstoppable subterranean enemy known as the टिड्डी Horde.
The player assumes the role of Marcus Fenix ( but can also खेल as Dominic Santiago ), a former कैदी and war-hardened soldier.
the game is based on the use of कवर and strategic fire for the player to अग्रिम through the scenarios ; a second player can play cooperatively through the main campaign to assist.
the खेल also features several online एकाधिक game modes for up to eight players.
गियर्स of War बेची over three million copies in just ten सप्ताह and was the fastest-selling वीडियो खेल of 2005 as खूब as the second-most played game over Xbox Live during.
It currently stands as the 5th best selling Xbox 360 खेल of all time.
The game रै चूंकि sold over पाँच million copies by सितंबर 2008.
the game was well received by आलोचकों, जो praised its gameplay and विस्तृत visuals, and it won several `` Game of the Year '' awards in 2006.
The success of the game has led to the development of the Gears of युद्ध मताधिकार, including the 2008 sequel Gears of War 2 and its follow-up, Gears of युद्ध 3, which was released on September 20, 2011, after having initially been set to have महरूम released on April 5, 2011, the date upon which एपिक खेल ' Cliff Bleszinski was a अतिथि on लेट Night साथ Jimmy Fallon.
adaptations to books, कॉमिक्स, as well as a feature फिल्मी are to be expected.
A Tree Grows in Brooklyn is a 1943 novel written by Betty Smith.

World मैप with the intertropical zone highlighted in red.
तीव्र जलवायु zones of the Earth where all twelve months have mean temperatures ऊपर 18 °C ( 64 °f ).
The tropics is a region of the धरती surrounding the equator.
it is limited in latitude by the tropic of Cancer in the northern गोलार्ध at approximately N and the tropic of Capricorn in the southern गोलार्ध at S ; these latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth.
The tropics are also referred to as the tropical मण्डल and the torrid zone ( see geographical zone ).
The tropics include all the areas on the Earth where the Sun reaches a point directly overhead at least once दौरान the solar year.
the tropics हैं distinguished इससे the other climatic and biomatic regions of धरती, the middle latitudes and the polar regions on either पक्ष of the equatorial zone.

PlayhouseSquare, in the Cleveland थिएटर District in downtown Cleveland, Ohio, is the second-largest theater जटिल in the संयुक्त राज्य, second only to New यॉर्क City 's Lincoln Center ).
constructed in a span of 19 months in the जल्दी 1920s, the थिएटर were subsequently बंद down, but were revived through a grassroots प्रयत्न.
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a new era of शहर revitalization in क्लीवलैंड, and was called `` one of the top ten successes in Cleveland history. ''

An airbag is a vehicle safety device.
It is an occupant restraint system consisting of a flexible fabric envelope or cushion designed to inflate rapidly during an automobile collision.
Its purpose is to cushion occupants during a crash and provide protection to उनके bodies जब वे strike interior वस्तुएँ such as the steering wheel or a window.
Modern vehicles may contain multiple एयरबैग modules in various side and frontal locations of the passenger seating positions, and सेंसर may deploy one or more airbags in an प्रभाव मण्डल at variable rates आधारित on the type, angle और गंभीरता of impact ; the airbag is designed to only inflate in moderate to कठोर frontal crashes.
Airbags are normally designed साथ the intention of supplementing the सुरक्षा of an occupant जो is correctly restrained साथ a seatbelt.
Most designs are inflated through pyrotechnic means and can only be operated once.
Newer side-impact airbag modules consist of संपीडित air सिलेंडर that हैं triggered in the इवेंट of a पक्ष impact गाडी impact.
The first commercial designs यहूद introduced in passenger ऑटोमोबाइल during the 1970s with limited success.
व्यापक commercial adoption of airbags occurred in many बाज़ार during the late 1980s and जल्दी 1990s with a ड्राइवर airbag, and a front passenger airbag as well on some गाड़ियाँ ; and many आधुनिक vehicles अभी include four or more units.
IRS tax forms are प्रयुक्त for taxpayers and tax-exempt organizations to report वित्तीय information to the Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ) of the United States.
They are used to report income, calculate taxes to be सशुल्क to the federal government of the United States, and disclose अन्य information as required by the आतंरिक Revenue Code ( IRC ).
There are over 800 various forms और schedules.
the best-known of these is रूप 1040 used by individuals.
In the United States, driver 's licenses are issued by each individual state ( including Washington, D.C. and territories ), rather than the federal सरकारी because of the political concept of federalism.
Drivers are normally required to obtain a license इससे their state of residence and all states recognize each other 's licenses for अस्थाई विज़िटर subject to normal age requirements.
A state may also suspend an individual 's driving विशेषाधिकार within its borders for traffic violations.
Many states share a common system of license classes, with some exceptions, and commercial license classes are standardized by federal विनियमन at 49 CFR part 383.
China has महरूम the source of अनेक inventions, including the Four Great आविष्कारों : papermaking, the कम्पास, gunpowder, और printing ( both woodblock and movable type ).
The list नीचे contains these and other inventions.
the Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics, hydraulics, and mathematics applied to horology, metallurgy, astronomy, कृषि, engineering, music theory, craftsmanship, nautics, and warfare.
By the Warring States काल ( 403–221 BC ), they had advanced metallurgic प्रौद्योगिकी, including the blast furnace और cupola भट्टी, while the finery forge and puddling process were known by the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – ad 220 ).
A sophisticated economic system in चीन gave birth to inventions such as पेपर money during the Song Dynasty ( 960–1279 ).
the आविष्कार of gunpowder by the 10th century led to an array of inventions such as the आग lance, land mine, naval mine, हाथ cannon, exploding गोलों, multistage rocket, and rocket बम with aerodynamic wings और explosive payloads.
With the navigational aid of the 11th-century compass and ability to steer at high sea with the 1st-century sternpost rudder, premodern Chinese sailors sailed as दूर as ईस्ट Africa and Egypt.
In water-powered clockworks, the premodern Chinese था used the escapement mechanism since the 8th century and the अंतहीन power-transmitting chain drive in the 11th सदी.
They also made विशाल mechanical puppet theaters चलित by waterwheels and carriage wheels और wine-serving automatons चलित by paddle wheel boats.
The contemporaneous Peiligang and pengtoushan संस्कृतियों represent the oldest Neolithic cultures of China and were formed around 7000 bc.
Some of the पहला आविष्कारों of Neolithic, prehistoric China include semilunar and आयताकार stone knives, stone hoes and spades, the cultivation of millet, rice and the soybean, the refinement of sericulture, the building of rammed earth structures साथ लाइम -plastered house floors, the creation of the potter 's wheel, the creation of pottery with cord-mat-basket designs, the creation of pottery tripods और pottery steamers, and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination.
Francesca ब्रे argues कि the domestication of the ox and buffalo दौरान the Longshan culture ( c. 3000–c. 2000 BC ) period, the अनुपस्थिति of Longshan-era सिंचाई or high-yield फसलों, full evidence of Longshan cultivation of dry-land cereal फसलों which gave ऊँची yields `` only when the soil was carefully cultivated, '' suggest that the plow was known at least by the Longshan culture काल and explains the high agricultural production yields which अनुमत the rise of Chinese civilization during the Shang राजवंश ( c. 1600–c. 1050 BC ).
With बाद inventions such as the multiple-tube seed drill and heavy moldboard iron plow, China 's agricultural output could sustain a much larger जनसांख्यिकी.
लिये the purposes of this list, inventions are regarded as technological firsts विकसित in China, and as such करता not include विदेशी technologies which the Chinese acquired through contact, such as the पवनचक्की from the Middle East or the telescope from जल्दी modern Europe.
It also does not include technologies developed elsewhere और बाद invented separately by the चाइनीज, such as the odometer and chain pump.
Scientific, mathematic or natural discoveries, परिवर्तन in minor concepts of design or style and artistic innovations can not be regarded as inventions and do not appear on the list.

वैश्वीकरण ( or globalisation—see spelling differences ) is the प्रक्रम of international integration arising from the interchange of world दृश्य, products, विचार, and अन्य aspects of culture.
put in simple terms, globalization refers to processes that promote world-wide exchanges of national and cultural resources.
Advances in परिवहन and telecommunications अवसंरचना, including the वृद्धि of the Internet, are major factors in globalization, generating further interdependence of economic and cultural activities.
हालांकि several scholars प्लेस the origins of globalization in modern times, others trace its history long before the European age of discovery and voyages to the New संसार.
Some even trace the origins to the तीसरा मिलेनियम BCE.
Since the beginning of the 20th century, the pace of globalization has intensified at a रैपिड rate, especially during the Post Cold War era.
The term globalization has महरूम in increasing use चूंकि the mid-1980s and especially since the mid-1990s.
in 2000, the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) identified four basic aspects of globalization : trade and transactions, capital and investment movements, माइग्रेशन and movement of people and the dissemination of knowledge.
further, environmental चुनौतियां ऐसे as climate change, cross-boundary water and air pollution, and over-fishing of the ocean are linked with globalization.
Globalizing processes affect and are प्रभावित by business and work organization, economics, socio-cultural resources, and the natural environment.

`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a traditional jamaican mento folk song, the best-known संस्करण of जिससे was sung by Harry Belafonte and an alternate version interspersed with another jamaican folksong, Hill और Gully सवार, by Dame Shirley Bassey.
Despite the सोंग 's mento influences, `` Day-O ( The Banana नाव Song ) '' is widely known as an उदाहरण of calypso music.
It is a work सोंग, from the point of view of dock workers working the night shift loading bananas onto ships.
Daylight has come, the shift is over and they want उनके work to be counted up so कि they can go home.
World War i ( WWI ) थी a global war centred in Europe कि began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly पुकारा the World युद्ध or the ग्रेट War इससे its occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939, and the First World War or संसार War I thereafter.
It शामिल all the संसार 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, फ़्रांस and रूस ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary और Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive विरूद्ध the agreement, इटली did not डालें into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as अधिक nations entered the war : इटली, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman साम्राज्य and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
ultimately, more than 70 million सैन्य personnel, सहित 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely क्युकी of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or गतिशीलता.
it was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world इतिहास, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations शामिल.
One of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the war थी the resurgence of imperialism in the विदेशी policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला decades were invoked.
भीतर weeks, the major powers यहूद at war और, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 जुलाई, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as तैयारी for the आक्रमण of Serbia.
While the russians mobilised, the germans invaded neutral Belgium and ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's declaration of war विरूद्ध Germany.
बाद the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench लकीर that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern सामने, the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians, लकिन was stopped in इसके invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman साम्राज्य joined the war, opening up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
in Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 जर्मनी offensive along the पश्चिमी front, the Allies drove वापस the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble साथ revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory for the allies.
Events on the home fronts were as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic संसाधन to fight a कुल war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to मौजूद.
The successor states of the former two खोया a great amount of territory, जबकि the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of सेंट्रल Europe was redrawn into अनेक smaller states.
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism शाखित by the war and the ब्रेकअप of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are सहमत to be कारकों contributing to World War ii.
Nurse जैकी is an American series that premiered on June 8, 2009, on Showtime, फिल्म Central and The Movie Network.
The श्रेणी सितारों edie Falco as the title अक्षर Jackie Peyton, an आपात विभाग nurse at सब संतो ' Hospital in नई York City.
For जैकी, `` Every day is a high wire act of juggling patients, doctors, fellow नर्स and उसके own indiscretions. ''
Keeping Up with the Kardashians ( often referred to simply as The Kardashians ) is an American reality television series कि premiered on October 14, 2007, on E !.
It follows the lives of the Kardashian/Jenner family, including sisters Kourtney, Kim, and Khloé कार्दशियन.
