अफगानिस्तान ( ; ; ), officially the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan, is a landlocked sovereign राज्य forming part of South एशिया, Central Asia, and to some extent Western Asia.
It has a population of around 30 million inhabiting an area of approximately, बनाना it the 42nd most populous and 41st largest स्वदेश in the world.
it is bordered by Pakistan in the south and the east, Iran in the west, तुर्कमेनिस्तान, Uzbekistan and Tajikistan in the north, और China in the far northeast.
Afghanistan has been an ancient focal point of the Silk Road and human migration.
Archaeologists have found प्रमाण of human habitation from as far back as the मध्य Paleolithic.
Urban सभ्यता may have begun in the area as early as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE.
Sitting at an important geostrategic location that connects the Middle East संस्कृति with सेंट्रल Asia and the भारतीय subcontinent, the land has been घर to various peoples through the ages and witnessed many military अभियान, notably by Alexander the Great, Genghis Khan, and in modern era Western forces.
The land भी परोसा as a source from which the Greco-Bactrians, Kushans, Hephthalites, Saffarids, ghaznavids, Ghorids, Khiljis, Timurids, Mughals, Durranis, और others have risen to रूप प्रमुख empires.
The political history of the modern state of Afghanistan begins in 1709, जब the hotaki dynasty थी established in Kandahar followed by Ahmad Shah Durrani 's rise to शक्ति in 1747.
In the late 19th century, Afghanistan became a buffer state in the `` ग्रेट Game `` between the British and Russian empires.
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War, King Amanullah began a European style modernization of the country लकिन was stopped by the ultra-conservatives.
During the ठंडा War, after the withdrawal of the British from neighboring इण्डिया in 1947, the United States and the Soviet Union began spreading influences in Afghanistan, जिससे led to a bloody war between the US-backed mujahideen forces and the Soviet-backed Afghan सरकारी in which over a million Afghans lost their lives.
This थी followed by the 1990s civil war, the rise और fall of the extremist Taliban government और the 2001–present war.
In December 2001, the संयुक्त Nations Security परिषद authorized the creation of the International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) to help maintain security in Afghanistan and assist the Karzai administration.
Three decades of war made अफगानिस्तान one of the world 's most dangerous countries, including the largest producer of refugees and asylum seekers.
While the international जातियाँ is rebuilding war-torn Afghanistan, terrorist groups such as the Haqqani Network और Hezbi Islami are actively involved in a देशभर Taliban -led insurgency, which includes hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks.
According to the संयुक्त Nations, the insurgents were responsible for 80 % of civilian casualties in 2011 and 2012.
The अमरीकी सिविल War ( acw ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil युद्ध ( see नामकरण ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) और अनेक Southern slave राज्य that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` दक्षिण '' ).
The war था its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign powers did not intervene.
After four years of bloody कॉम्बैट that left over 600,000 soldiers dead और destroyed much of the दक्षिण 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, और the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed slaves began.
in the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by अब्राहम Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James बुकानन and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural address declared his प्रशासन would not initiate civil war.
आठ remaining slave राज्य continued to reject calls for secession.
Confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous federal forts भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A सलाम Conference failed to find a सुलह, and दोनो sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed कि European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` कि they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a कुंजी fort आयोजित by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called लिये each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; नतीजतन, four more स्लेव राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border states और established a नवल blockade कि crippled the southern economy.
the Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union राज्य ) ended साथ Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln जारी the Emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending slavery a war लक्ष्य.
To the वेस्ट, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate नदी नेवी, then much of their western armies, and the संघ at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in दो at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, विलियम T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure साथ the way.
the संघ marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox अदालत House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War थी एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
it remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 सैनिको and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death टोल at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern श्वेत males aged 18–40.
Cost of goods sold ( COGS ) refer to the inventory costs of those goods a business has sold दौरान a particular period.
लागत हैं associated साथ particular goods using one of अनेक formulas, including specific identification, first-in first-out ( FIFO ), or औसत cost.
Costs include all costs of purchase, costs of conversion और other लागत incurred in bringing the inventories to their present location और condition.
लागत of goods बना by the business include material, labor, और allocated overhead.
The costs of those goods not yet बेची are deferred as लागत of inventory until the inventory is sold or written bas in value.

A confectionery store ( more commonly referred to as a sweet shop in the United Kingdom, a candy store in the North America, or a lolly shop in Australia ) sells confectionery और is प्रायः targeted to children.
Most confectionery stores are भर with an assortment of sweets far larger than a grocer or convenience store could accommodate.
They प्रायः offer a selection of old fashioned treats, and sweets इससे different countries.
Very often unchanged in layout since उनके inception, confectioneries are known for their वार्मिंग and nostalgic feel.
The village of Pateley Bridge claims to have the oldest confectionery store in England.

Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state स्तिथ in West South Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 United राज्य.
The state 's name is derived from the choctaw words okla and humma, meaning `` रेड people '', and it is known informally by its nickname, The Sooner State.
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and भारतीय territory on November 16, 1907, Oklahoma was the 46th state to enter the union.
Its residents are known as Oklahomans or, informally `` Okies '', and इसके capital and largest नगर is Oklahoma City.
A प्रमुख producer of प्राकृतिक गैस, oil, and agriculture, ओक्लाहोमा relies on an economic base of aviation, energy, दूरसंचार, and biotechnology.
It has one of the तीव्रतम growing economies in the nation, ranking among the top states in per capita आय growth and gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma नगर और तुलसा serve as Oklahoma 's प्राथमिक economic anchors, with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living within their metropolitan statistical areas.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, and eastern वनों, most of Oklahoma lies in the Great Plains and the U.S. आंतरिक Highlands —a प्रदेश especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of English, German, स्कॉटिश, आयरिश and Native American ancestry, more than 25 Native American languages are spoken in Oklahoma, second only to कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three प्रमुख American सांस्कृतिक regions और historically served as a route for cattle drives, a destination for दक्षिणी settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory लिये देशी Americans.
Stacked and खड़ा car tires
a tire ( or tyre ) is a ring-shaped covering that fits around a wheel 's rim to protect it and enable better vehicle performance.
Most tires, such as those for ऑटोमोबाइल and साइकिल, provide traction between the vehicle and the road जबकि providing a flexible cushion that absorbs shock.
the materials of modern pneumatic टायर are synthetic rubber, natural rubber, fabric and तार, along with carbon black और other chemical compounds.
वे consist of a tread and a body.
the tread provides traction while the body provides containment लिये a मात्रा of compressed air.
Before rubber थी developed, the पहला संस्करण of टायर were simply bands of metal that fitted around wooden पहियों to prevent wear and tear.
Early रबर tires were solid ( not pneumatic ).
Today, the majority of tires are न्यूमेटिक inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped body of रस्सियाँ और wires encased in रबर and generally filled with compressed air to form an inflatable cushion.
न्यूमेटिक tires हैं used on अनेक types of vehicles, including गाड़ियाँ, bicycles, motorcycles, trucks, earthmovers, और aircraft.
Metal tires are still used on इंजनों and railcars, and solid rubber ( or other polymer ) टायर are still used in विभिन्न non-automotive applications, such as some casters, carts, lawnmowers, and wheelbarrows.
Dr. Joseph वारेन ( जून 11, 1741 – June 17, 1775 ) थी an American doctor who played a leading भूमिका in American patriot organizations in बोस्टन in early days of the American Revolution, आखिरकार serving as अध्यक्ष of the revolutionary मैसाचुसेट्स Provincial Congress.
वारेन enlisted पॉल Revere and William Dawes on April 18, 1775, to leave Boston and स्प्रेड the सचेतक that the British garrison in Boston was setting आउट to raid the town of concord and arrest विद्रोही नेताओ John Hancock and Samuel एडम्स.
Warren participated in the next day 's लड़ाइयों of lexington and Concord, which are commonly considered to be the opening engagements of the American Revolutionary युद्ध.
Warren था been commissioned a Major General in the colony 's militia shortly before the June 17, 1775 बैटल of Bunker Hill.
Rather than exercising his रैंक, Warren served in the battle as a private सिपाही, and was killed in combat जब British troops stormed the redoubt atop नस्ल 's हिल.
His death, immortalized in John Trumbull 's painting, The मौत of सामान्य Warren at the Battle of Bunker 's Hill, जून 17, 1775, galvanized the rebel forces, and he has been memorialized in अनेक place names in the United States.
STM image of self-assembled supramolecular जंजीरों of the organic सेमीकंडक्टर Quinacridone on Graphite.
an organic semiconductor is an organic material with सेमीकंडक्टर properties, that is, साथ an electrical conductivity between that of insulators and that of metals.
Single molecules, छोटी कड़ी ( oligomers ) और organic polymers can be semiconductive.
Semiconducting small अणुओं ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) शामिल the polycyclic aromatic compounds pentacene, anthracene, and rubrene.
Polymeric organic semiconductors include बहु ( 3-hexylthiophene ), poly ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as well as polyacetylene and its derivatives.
There हैं two प्रमुख अतिव्यापी वर्ग of सशुल्क semiconductors.
These are organic charge-transfer complexes and various linear-backbone conductive polymers निकला from polyacetylene.
Linear रीढ़ organic semiconductors include polyacetylene itself और its derivatives polypyrrole, and polyaniline.
At least locally, charge-transfer देवालय often exhibit similar conduction mechanisms to inorganic semiconductors.
Such mechanisms arise इससे the presence of hole और electron conduction layers separated by a बैंड gap.
While such classic mechanisms हैं महत्वपूर्ण locally, as with inorganic amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, localized states, mobility gaps, and phonon -assisted hopping भी significantly contribute to conduction, विशेषकर in polyacetylenes.
Like inorganic semiconductors, organic semiconductors can be doped.
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping ऐसे as polyaniline ( Ormecon ) और are also ज्ञात as organic metals.
ठेठ वर्तमान carriers in organic semiconductors are holes and electrons in π-bonds.
Almost all organic solids are insulators.
But जब their constituent molecules have π-conjugate systems, electrons can मूव via π-electron बादल overlaps, especially by hopping, tunnelling और related mechanisms.
polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine salt crystals are examples of this प्रकार of organic semiconductor.
Mainly due to low गतिशीलता, even unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer complexes.
Such unpaired electrons can function as current carriers.
This type of semiconductor is also obtained by pairing an electron donor molecule with an electron acceptor अणु.
मादा ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by इंसान महिलाओं from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these are माना to be different phenomena in कुछ research publications.
The exact source and nature of the द्रव continue to be a topic of debate among medical पेशेवर, which is भी related to doubts over the existence of the g-spot.
the FIFA Women 's World Cup is an international संघ football competition contested by the senior women 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four सालो since the inaugural tournament in 1991.
Japan won the 2011 tournament in a penalty shootout.
The वर्तमान format of the tournament involves 16 teams competing लिये the title at venues within the मेजबान nation ( s ) over a period of about three weeks ; – this phase is often called the World कप Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three years, is used to determine which teams qualify for the टूर्नामेंट together with the host nation ( s ).
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the most important International competition in महिलाओं 's फ़ुटबॉल and is played amongst women 's नेशनल football teams of the member राज्य of FIFA, the sport 's global शासी body.
The first Women 's World Cup टूर्नामेंट, named the महिलाओं 's World Championship, was held in 1991, sixty-one सालो after the men 's first FIFA संसार कप tournament in 1930.
The six संसार Cup tournaments have been won by four different national teams.
The next World Cup will be hosted by कनाडा in 2015.

'son of man ' is the translation of various यहूदी and Greek phrases used in both the Hebrew Bible and the New Testament.
It रै विविध meanings, ranging from a normal human being to a prophesied eternal, दैवी ruler.
The Hebrew expression `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears एक hundred and seven times in the यहूदी Bible.
This is the most आम Hebrew construction for the singular but is used mostly in Ezekiel ( 93 times ) and 14 times elsewhere.
in thirty two cases the phrase appears in intermediate plural form `` sons of men '', i.e. human beings.
As generally interpreted by Jews, it denotes humankind generally.
In the Koine Greek of the New Testament, `` the son of man '' is invariably used as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article.
The use of the definite article in `` the son of man '' in the Christian gospels is novel, and before its use there, no रिकॉर्ड of its use in any of the surviving Greek documents of antiquity मौजूद.
Geza Vermes has stated कि `` the Son of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is unrelated to Hebrew Bible usages.
in ईसाई उपयोग, unlike the Son of God title, which रै महरूम an essential element of ईसाई creeds चूंकि the Apostolic age, the proclamation of `` Jesus as the Son of man '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity.
The interpretation of the use of `` the Son of man '' in the New Testament has remained challenging and after 150 years of debate no consensus on the समस्या has उभरा among विद्वानों.
Master of foxhounds लीड the field from powderham Castle in Devon, England, with the hounds in front.
Fox hunting is an activity involving the tracking, chase, and sometimes killing of a fox, traditionally a red फॉक्स, by trained foxhounds or other सैंट hounds, and a समूह of निहत्थे followers led by a master of foxhounds, who follow the hounds on foot or on horseback.
Fox शिकार originated in the form practised until recently in the United किंगडम in the 16th century, but is practised सब over the world, including in Australia, Canada, France, आयरलैंड, Italy और the United States.
In Australia, the term भी refers to the hunting of foxes with firearms similar to spotlighting or deer hunting.
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to सुनाना to any खेल animals or weapons ( e.g., deer hunting with bow and arrow ) ; in Britain and Ireland, `` शिकार '' without qualification implies फॉक्स शिकार ( or other forms of hunting with hounds- beagling, stag hunting, mink hunting, drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described यहाँ.
The खेल is controversial, particularly in the uk, where it was banned in Scotland in 2002, and in England और Wales in November 2004 ( law enforced इससे फ़रवरी 2005 ), हालांकि shooting foxes as vermin remained legal.
proponents of fox hunting दृश्य it as an important part of ग्रामीण culture and useful for reasons of conservation और pest control, while प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue that it is cruel and unnecessary.

it is now one of the most highly regulated फ़ॉर्म of marketing.
Some or all forms of tobacco advertising are banned in many countries.
बल्ली technologies, Inc. is a manufacturer of slot machines and other gaming प्रौद्योगिकी based in लास Vegas, Nevada.

Inferno ( इतालवी लिये `` नरक `` ) is the first part of दांते Alighieri 's 14th-century epic poem Divine कॉमेडी.
It is followed by Purgatorio and paradiso.
It is an allegory telling of the journey of Dante through Hell, guided by the Roman poet Virgil.
in the poem, Hell is चित्रित as nine circles of suffering located within the Earth.
Allegorically, the Divine Comedy represents the journey of the soul towards God, with the Inferno describing the recognition and अस्वीकृति of sin.

The घोषणा and Resolves of the First Continental Congress ( also known as the Declaration of Colonial Rights, or the Declaration of Rights ), थी a statement adopted by the First Continental कॉंग्रेस on October 14, 1774, in response to the असहनीय Acts passed by the British पार्लियामेंट.
the Declaration outlined colonial objections to the असहनीय Acts, सूचीबद्ध a colonial bill of rights, and provided a विस्तृत list of grievances.
It was similar to the Declaration of Rights and Grievances, passed by the Stamp अधिनियम Congress a decade पहले.
the Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress 's plans : to डालें into a boycott of British trade ( the Continental Association ) until उनके grievances were redressed, to publish पता to the people of ग्रेट Britain and British अमेरिका, and to send a petition to the किंग.
Pulse pressure is the pressure that is लगा when feeling the pulse.
Measured in millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), the pressure अंतर between the systolic and diastolic pressures is the pressure change to create the pulse, which is the pulse pressure.
If resting रक्त pressure is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of mercury ( mmhg ), pulse दबाव is 40.

In poker, bad ताल is a subjective term for a hand in which a player with कया appear to be strong cards nevertheless loses.
It most often occurs where एक खिलाड़ी bets the clearly stronger hand and their opponent makes a ग़रीब call that eventually `` hits '' and wins.
There is no consensus among पोकर खिलाड़ी as to what exactly constitutes a bad ताल and often players will disagree परिचय whether a particular hand was a bad beat.
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater fish in the family Cyprinidae of अनुक्रम Cypriniformes.
It was one of the earliest fish to be domesticated, और is one of the most commonly kept aquarium मछली.
a relatively small member of the carp family ( which also includes the koi carp और the crucian कार्प ), the goldfish is a domesticated version of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east एशिया.
It थी first domesticated in चीन more than a thousand years ago, और several distinct breeds have since महरूम developed.
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in आकार, body आकार, जोडे configuration and coloration ( various combinations of श्वेत, yellow, नारंगी, red, brown, and black are known ).
uncooked Rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade, singular : roulade ) is a German meat roulade usually consisting of bacon, onions, mustard and pickles wrapped in thinly sliced beef जिससे is then cooked.
In कुछ countries, the roulade is भी known as `` beef olive ''.
Beef or वील is used as meat हालांकि some food scholars tend to believe that the original version was probably venison or pork, and pork is still popular in some areas.
The beef rouladen as we जान them today have become popular over the last century.
The cut is प्रायः topside beef or silverside since this is the cheaper cut.
The अधिक expensive संस्करण would be the round steak, also known as rump स्टीक.
the meat is cut into large, पतला slices.
The filling is a मिश्रण of smoked and cooked pork belly, chopped onions और chopped pickles ( gurken ) which is at times varied by adding minced मांस, sausage meat, पाइन nuts and mustard.
the mixture varies from प्रदेश to region.
Rouladen are traditionally served for dinner.
रेड wine is often served with this dish.
ठेठ eukaryotic cell.
Cellular respiration is the नियत of the metabolic reactions and processes कि लो place in the cells of जीवों to convert biochemical energy from nutrients into adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ), and then release waste products.
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic प्रतिक्रियाएँ, जिससे ब्रेक large molecules into smaller ones, releasing energy in the process as कमजोर so-called `` high-energy '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products.
Respiration is one of the key ways a cell gains useful energy to fuel cellular activity.
Cellular respiration is considered an ऊष्माक्षेपी redox प्रतिक्रिया.
The overall प्रतिक्रिया is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs in the body, most of which are रेडॉक्स reactions themselves.
Although technically, cellular श्वसन is a combustion reaction, it clearly does not resemble one when it occurs in a जीना cell.
This difference is because it occurs in many separate steps.
While the overall प्रतिक्रिया is a combustion reaction, no single reaction कि comprises it is a combustion reaction.
Nutrients that are commonly used by animal and plant cells in respiration include शुगर, amino acids and fatty acids, और a common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular ऑक्सीजन ( O2 ).
The energy stored in ATP ( its third फास्फेट समूह is weakly bonded to the rest of the molecule and is cheaply broken allowing stronger bonds to form, thereby transferring energy for use by the cell ) can then be used to drive processes requiring energy, सहित biosynthesis, locomotion or transportation of अणुओं across cell membranes.
Countries by 2011 GDP ( नाममात्र ) according to the CIA World Factbook.
This article includes a सूची of countries in the संसार sorted by their gross domestic product ( GDP ), the मार्केट value of all final goods और services from a nation in a दिए साल.
The जीडीपी डालर estimates presented यहाँ are calculated at market or government official exchange rates.
Several economies जिससे हैं not considered to be countries ( world, the EU, and कुछ dependent territories ) are शामिल in the lists because they appear in the sources.
These economies are not ranked in the charts here, but are listed where applicable.
The figures presented here do not लो into account differences in the cost of living in different countries, and the results can vary greatly from one year to another based on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency.
ऐसे fluctuations may बदलें a country 's ranking from एक year to the अगला, even though they often make little or no difference to the standard of जीना of its population.
Therefore these आंकड़े should be used with caution.
Some countries/regions may have citizens which are on average wealthy.
These countries/regions could appear in this सूची as having a small GDP.
This would be because the country/region listed has a small population, and therefore छोटी total economy ; the GDP is calculated as the population times the wealth per capita.
Comparisons of national wealth are also frequently made on the basis of खरीदना power parity ( PPP ), to adjust for differences in the cost of living in different countries.
( देखिए List of countries by GDP ( PPP ) )
PPP largely removes the exchange rate problem, but रै its अपना drawbacks ; it does नहीं reflect the value of economic output in international trade, and it also requires more estimation than nominal GDP.
On the whole, PPP per capita figures are more narrowly spread than nominal GDP प्रति capita figures.
The first list includes data compiled by the United Nations Statistics Division for 2011.
The second list largely includes data ( estimate ) compiled by the International Monetary Fund for 2012.
the तीसरा list shows the World Bank 's mostly 2011 estimates, and the fourth list includes mostly 2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook.
Lapping is a machining process, in which two surfaces are rubbed together with an abrasive between them, by hand movement or by way of a machine.
This can take दो forms.
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ), typically involves rubbing a brittle material such as glass against a surface such as iron or glass itself ( also ज्ञात as the `` गोद '' or grinding tool ) with an abrasive ऐसे as aluminum oxide, jeweller 's rouge, optician 's रूज, emery, silicon कार्बाइड, diamond, etc., in between them.
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the abrasive rolls about between the two surfaces और removes material from both.
The other form of lapping involves a softer material such as pitch or a ceramic for the lap, which is `` charged '' with the abrasive.
The lap is then used to काटें a harder material—the workpiece.
The abrasive embeds within the softer सामग्री which holds it and permits it to score across and cut the harder material.
लिया to a finer limit, this होगा produce a polished surface ऐसे as with a polishing cloth on an automobile, or a पॉलिशिंग cloth or पॉलिशिंग pitch upon glass or स्टील.
Taken to the परम limit, साथ the aid of accurate interferometry and specialized polishing machines or skilled hand polishing, lensmakers can produce surfaces that are flat to better than 30 nanometers.
This is one twentieth of the wavelength of light from the commonly used 632.8 nm हीलियम नियॉन laser light source.
Surfaces this flat can be molecularly bonded ( optically contacted ) by bringing उन्हें together under the right conditions.
( This is नहीं the same as the wringing effect of Johansson blocks, although it is similar ).
The पद `` अमेरिका 's टोली '' is a popular nickname in the संयुक्त States that refers to the Dallas Cowboys in the नेशनल Football League.
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film, जहाँ the narrator opens with the following परिचय : the term is recognized और often used by media आउटलेट, including ईएसपीएन, Yahoo !, एचबीओ Sports, and खेल Illustrated.
my दाई 's a Vampire ( French : Ma gardienne est un पिशाच ) is a 2011 Canadian television series, based on the television film of the same name.
In Canada, the series premiered in French on Télétoon on February 28, 2011, in English on Teletoon on March 14, 2011, and on Disney Channel in the संयुक्त राज्य on June 27, 2011.
The show थी created by Fresh TV, creators of 6teen and Total Drama.

In the film, he learns he is able to have visions और his best dost Benny Weir ( Atticus Mitchell ) is a spellmaster.
the series follows the three as they take on supernatural forces and have adventures, साथ occasional सहायता इससे fellow vampires Rory ( cameron कैनेडी ) and Erica ( केट Todd ), जबकि dealing with the troubles of नियमित high school life.
A second season was confirmed to start production in September 2011 और it first premiered on डिज़्नी Channel on June 29, 2012, it premiered on Teletoon September 6, 2012.

A pickup ट्रक or pick-up, often simply referred to as a pickup, is a light motor vehicle with an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
in North America, the term pickup is used for light trucks with a हल्का duty chassis and factory built, integrated bed, as well as for coupé utility vehicles, often आधारित on a निजी car chassis, but also often on a special dedicated chassi for ऐसे use.
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup, such as ute in Australia and New जीलैंड, or bakkie in South Africa.
विशाल पिकअप trucks are somewhat rare in यूरोपीय, where वैन and light lorries are commonly used for समान roles.
The अध्यक्ष of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
the president लीड the कार्यपालिका branch of the संघीय सरकारी and is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
आलेख ii of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges उसे with the execution of federal law, alongside the responsibility of appointing federal executive, diplomatic, regulatory, और judicial officers, and concluding treaties with foreign शक्तियां, with the advice and consent of the Senate.
The अध्यक्ष is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves, and to convene और adjourn either or both घरों of कॉंग्रेस under असाधारण circumstances.
चूंकि the founding of the United States, the power of the president और the संघीय government have grown substantially and each modern अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no औपचारिक legislative शक्तियां परे signing or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his पार्टी and the foreign and domestic policy of the United राज्य.
The president is अक्सर described as the most powerful person in the संसार.
The president is indirectly elected by the लोगों through the Electoral कॉलेज to a four-year term, and is one of only two nationally elected संघीय officers, the other being the Vice अध्यक्ष of the United States.
The Twenty-second Amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे ever being elected to the presidency for a third full पद.
It भी prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than once if that person previously had served as president, or acting president, for more than two सालो of another person 's term as president.
in all, 43 individuals have served 55 four-year terms.
On जनवरी 20, 2009, Barack Obama became the 44th और वर्तमान president.
On नवम्बर 6, 2012, he was re-elected and is अनुसूचित to serve until January 20, 2017.
Bottled mineral water
बोतलबंद water is drinking water ( e.g., खूब water, distilled water, Mineral water, or spring जल ) packaged in plastic or glass water बोतलों.
Bottled water may be कार्बोनेटेड or not.
Sizes range from छोटी single सेवारत bottles to large carboys for water coolers.
Map of the major rivers, lakes, and टंकी in India
Map showing rivers and बाढ़ prone areas in India
Rivers of India खेल an important role in the lives of the Indian people.
The river systems provide irrigation, potable water, cheap transportation, electricity, and the livelihoods for a large number of लोगों all over the देश और to rural areas.
This easily explains क्यों nearly all the major cities of India are located by the बैंको of rivers.
the नदियाँ also have an important role in Hindu mythology और are considered holy by all Hindus in the देश.
Seven प्रमुख rivers साथ साथ their numerous tributaries make up the नदी system of India.
Most of the rivers डालना their waters into the Bay of Bengal ; however, some of the rivers whose courses take them through the western part of the country and towards the east of the state of Himachal Pradesh empty into the Arabian समुद्र.
Parts of Ladakh, northern parts of the Aravlli range and the arid भाग of the Thar Desert have inland नाले.
Dr.Francis बुकानन surveyed the courses of the rivers of India along with their tributaries and शाखाओं in 1810-11 AD and presented a minute खाता of it.
The shifting of the courses और bed over the centuries is very उल्लेखनीय.
अनेक of the channels mentioned in that survey have now become dead, dried or even extinct.
All major नदियाँ of India originate from एक of the three main watersheds :
The Himalaya and the Karakoram सीमाएँ
Vindhya and Satpura ranges और Chotanagpur plateau in central India
Sahyadri or Western ghats in western इण्डिया
The Bretton Woods system of monetary management established the rules for वाणिज्यिक and financial relations among the world 's major industrial states in the mid-20th century.
The Bretton Woods system was the first example of a fully negotiated monetary अनुक्रम intended to govern monetary संबंध among independent nation-states.
Preparing to rebuild the international आर्थिक system as World War II was स्टिल raging, 730 delegates from all 44 Allied nations gathered at the Mount Washington होटल in Bretton Woods, New Hampshire, United States, for the United Nations Monetary and Financial Conference.
The delegates deliberated during 1–22 July 1944, और signed the Agreement on its final दिन.
Setting up a प्रणाली of rules, institutions, and procedures to regulate the international monetary system, the planners at Bretton Woods स्थापित the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक Fund ( IMF ) and the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Bank for Reconstruction and Development ( IBRD ), which today is part of the World बैंको Group.
These organizations became operational in 1945 after a sufficient number of countries had ratified the agreement.
The मुख्य features of the Bretton Woods system were an दायित्व for each country to adopt a monetary policy that कायम the exchange rate by tying its करेंसी to the U.S. dollar और the ability of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments.
On 15 August 1971, the United राज्य unilaterally terminated convertibility of the US $ to gold.
This brought the Bretton वुड्स system to an end and saw the डालर become fiat currency.
इस कार्रवाई, referred to as the Nixon shock, created the हालात in जिससे the United राज्य dollar became a reserve currency used by अनेक states.
At the वही time, अनेक fixed currencies ( ऐसे as GBP, for example ), also became free floating.
Ducati Motor पकड़कर S.p.A. is an Italian कम्पनी that designs and manufactures मोटरसाइकिल.
Headquartered in Bologna, Italy, Ducati is owned by Audi through its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini.
A credit score is a numerical expression based on a statistical analysis of a person 's credit files, to represent the creditworthiness of that person.
A credit score is primarily based on credit रपट information typically sourced from credit bureaus.
Lenders, such as बैंको and credit card companies, use credit scores to evaluate the संभावित रिस्क posed by lending money to consumers and to mitigate नुकसान due to bad कर्ज़.
Lenders use credit scores to determine जो qualifies for a ऋण, at what interest rate, और what credit limits.
Lenders भी use credit scores to determine जिससे ग्राहक are likely to लाओ in the most revenue.
The उपयोग of credit or identity scoring prior to authorizing access or granting credit is an implementation of a trusted system.
Credit scoring is not limited to banks.
Other organizations, such as mobile phone companies, insurance companies, landlords, and government departments employ the same techniques.
क्रेडिट scoring भी has a lot of overlap साथ आंकड़ा mining, which uses many similar techniques.
These techniques combine thousands of factors लकिन they are more or कम similar or the same.
The seven si base units and the interdependency of their definitions : for example, to extract the definition of the metre इससे the speed of लाइट, the definition of the second must be ज्ञात while the ampere and candela हैं both dependent on the definition of energy which in फेरे is defined in terms of length, mass and time.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of इकाई ( SI ) defines सात इकाई of measure as a basic नियत from which all other SI इकाई हैं derived.
These SI base units और उनके physical quantities are:
metre for लंबाई ( US English : meter )
किलोग्राम for द्रव्यमान ( note : not the gram )
दूसरी for time
ampere for इलेक्ट्रिक current
kelvin for temperature
candela लिये luminous intensity
mole for the amount of पदार्थ.
The SI base quantities form a set of mutually स्वतंत्र dimensions as जरूरी by dimensional analysis commonly employed in विज्ञान and technology.
However, in a given realization of these इकाई वे may well be interdependent, i.e. defined in terms of each other.
The names of SI units are written in lowercase वर्ण ( the 'degree Celsius ' meets this rule, as 'degree ' is the unit, and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ).
The प्रतीकों of units are लिखा in lowercase ( e.g. metre has the symbol m ), except that symbols for units named बाद persons are written साथ an आरंभिक capital अक्षर ( e.g., the hertz रै the uppercase symbol hz ).
अनेक other इकाई, such as the litre ( us English : liter ), हैं formally not भाग of the SI, but are accepted for use साथ SI.
स्मारक Canyon
Colorado नेशनल स्मारक ( locally referred to as the Monument ) is a part of the National Park सेवा near the city of Grand जंक्शन, Colorado.
Spectacular canyons काटें deep into sandstone and भी granite–gneiss–schist rock formations, in some areas.
This is an area of desert जमीन high on the Colorado Plateau, with pinion and juniper forests on the plateau.
The park hosts a चौड़ी range of वन्यजीव, including red-tailed hawks and golden eagles, ravens, jays, desert bighorn sheep, and coyotes.
Activities शामिल hiking, horseback riding, road bicycling, and scenic drives ; a visitor center on the west side contains a प्राकृतिक history museum और gift shop.
There हैं magnificent views from trails and the रिम Rock Drive, which हवाएँ along the plateau.
Nearby are the Book cliffs, and the largest flat-topped mountain in the संसार, the Grand Mesa.
इसके feature attraction is Monument Canyon, which runs the width of the park, and includes rock formations ऐसे as स्वतंत्रता Monument, the Kissing Couple, and Coke चूल्हों.
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 square miles ), much of which रै been अनुशंसित to Congress for designation as wilderness.

The Uniforms of the United राज्य Marine Corps serve to distinguish Marines इससे members of other services.
Among current uniforms in the United States Armed Forces, the marines ' वर्दी have been in service the longest.
the Marine Dress Blue वर्दी has, with few changes, been worn in essentially its current form since the 19th century.
North American telephone area कोड 419 और 567 serve the northwest quadrant of the U.S. state of ओहियो.
The largest नगर served by these क्षेत्रफल कोड is Toledo ( and its suburbs of Holland, maumee, Northwood, Oregon, Ottawa Hills, Perrysburg, Rossford, Sylvania, Swanton, waterville, and Whitehouse ).
अन्य शहरों served by these area codes include एडीए, Ashland, bellevue, Bluffton, बोलिंग Green, Bryan, Bucyrus, Celina, Clyde, Crestline, Defiance, delphos, Edison, erastus, Findlay, Fostoria, Fremont, Galion, Kenton, लीमा, Mansfield, Mount Gilead, Napoleon, Norwalk, Oak हार्बर, Port Clinton, Sandusky, शेल्बी, St. Marys, Tiffin, Upper Sandusky, Van Wert, Wapakoneta, Wauseon, Willard.
अन्य areas served include the झील erie Islands north of बंदरगाहों Clinton and west of sandusky.
The main क्षेत्रफल code, 419, थी निर्मित as एक of the original क्षेत्रफल codes in October 1947 ; the overlay area कोड 567 थी निर्मित on January 1, 2002.
Despite the presence of Toledo, the state 's fourth-largest city, 419 was the पिछला of ओहियो 's असली four area codes to have been split or overlaid.
मिकी Leroy Gilley ( born March 9, 1936 ) is an अमरीकी country music singer and संगीतकार.
Although he प्रारंभ out singing straight-up country and western material in the 1970s, he स्थानांतरित towards a अधिक पॉप -friendly sound in the 1980s, bringing him further success on not just the country charts, but the pop charts as खूब.
Among उसके biggest हिट्स are `` Room Full of Roses, '' `` Do n't the Girls All Get Prettier at closing समय, '' और the remake of the आत्मा hit `` स्टैंड by Me ``.
he is भी the cousin of Jerry Lee लुईस, Carl McVoy, Jim Gilley और Jimmy Swaggart.
According to the Federal Aviation प्रशासन, Gilley is a licensed pilot, who holds an यंत्र rating साथ वाणिज्यिक pilot privileges for multi-engine airplanes, as खूब as private pilot privileges for single engine aircraft.
The September 11 attacks ( भी referred to as September 11, September 11th, or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated आतंकवादी attacks शुभारम्भ by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in New York नगर and the Washington, d.C. area on September 11, 2001.
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19 al-Qaeda terrorists so they could be flown into buildings in suicide attacks.
दो of those planes, अमरीकी एयरलाइंस Flight 11 and United Airlines Flight 175, were क्रैश into the North and South towers, respectively, of the World Trade Center complex in New York City.
Within two hours, both मीनारें collapsed साथ debris and the resulting fires causing आंशिक or पूरा पतन of all other buildings in the wtc complex, as well as major damage to ten other विशाल surrounding structures.
a third plane, American Airlines Flight 77, was crashed into the Pentagon ( the headquarters of the United States Department of Defense ), leading to a आंशिक पतन in its western side.
the fourth plane, United Airlines Flight 93, was targeted at the United States Capitol in Washington, d.C., but crashed into a field near Shanksville, Pennsylvania, after its passengers आजमाया to overcome the hijackers.
In total, almost 3,000 people died in the attacks, including the 227 नागरिकों and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes.
suspicion जल्दी fell on al-Qaeda.
हालांकि the group 's leader, Osama बिन Laden, initially denied any involvement, in 2004 he claimed responsibility for the attacks.
Al-Qaeda और bin Laden cited u.S. support of Israel, the presence of u.S. troops in Saudi Arabia, and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the attacks.
The United States responded to the attacks by launching the War on आतंक and invading Afghanistan to depose the Taliban, which had harbored al-Qaeda.
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism legislation और expanded law प्रवर्तन powers.
Having evaded capture for years, bin Laden थी located and killed by U.S. forces in May 2011.
The destruction of the Twin Towers and other properties caused serious damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and had a significant effect on global markets.
क्लीनअप of the World Trade Center site was completed in may 2002, और the प्रस्तुतीकरण was repaired भीतर a year.
Numerous memorials have महरूम constructed, including the National सितंबर 11 Memorial & Museum in New यॉर्क, the Pentagon मेमोरियल, and the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania.
After a lengthy विलंब, the One World Trade Center is expected to be completed at Ground Zero in New York City in 2013.
ढूंढना Nemo is a 2003 American computer-animated comedy-drama adventure फिल्मी written और directed by एंड्रयू Stanton, released by Walt Disney Pictures, और the fifth film produced by Pixar Animation studios.
It tells the स्टोरी of the over-protective clownfish नामित Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who, along with a regal tang named Dory ( Ellen degeneres ), searches for his abducted बेटे Nemo ( सिकंदर Gould ) all the way to Sydney Harbour.
Along the way, Marlin learns to take risks और let nemo take care of himself.
It is Pixar 's first film to be released in cinemas in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध summer.
the फिल्मी थी re-released for the first time in 3D on September 14, 2012, and it was released on Blu-ray on December 4, 2012.
A sequel, Finding dory, is currently in विकास, set to be released on नवम्बर 25, 2015.
The film received universal critical acclaim और won the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature, and was nominated in three more categories सहित Best Original पटकथा.
It was the दूसरी highest-grossing film of 2003, कमाई a total of $ 921 लाख worldwide.
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling DVD of all time, with over 40 million copies sold as of 2006, and थी the highest-grossing g-rated film of सब समय before Pixar 's own Toy स्टोरी 3 overtook it.
It is also the 23rd highest-grossing film of all time, as well as the 3rd highest-grossing animated film.
In 2008, the American Film Institute named it the दसवाँ greatest animated film कभी made during their Top 10.

in the United States, Social Security refers to the old-age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance ( oasdi ) संघीय कार्यक्रम.
The असली Social Security Act ( 1935 ) और the current version of the अधिनियम, as amended, encompass several सोशल welfare and social insurance programs.
Social सुरक्षा is primarily funded through dedicated payroll कर called Federal बीमे Contributions अधिनियम tax ( FICA ).
Tax जमा are formally entrusted to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust निधि, the Federal विकलांगता Insurance Trust Fund, the Federal Hospital बीमे Trust Fund, or the संघीय Supplementary Medical Insurance Trust Fund जिससे comprise the Social Security विश्वास निधि.
Upward redistribution of income is responsible लिये परिचय 43 % of the projected Social सुरक्षा shortfall over the अगला 75 years.
According to economist Martin Feldstein, the combined बिता for all social insurance programs in 2003 constituted 37 % of government expenditure and 7 % of the gross domestic उत्पाद.
सोशल Security is currently estimated to keep roughly 40 percent of all Americans age 65 or older out of गरीबी.
The Social Security Administration is headquartered in Woodlawn, मेरीलैंड, just west of Baltimore.
The alcohol by volume shown on a बोतल of absinthe.
दारू by volume ( abbreviated as ABV, abv, or alc/vol ) is a standard measure of how much alcohol ( ethanol ) is contained in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ).
The ABV standard is प्रयुक्त विश्वव्यापी.
In some countries, alcohol by volume is referred to as degrees Gay-Lussac ( after the French chemist Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac ).

The population was 1,952 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Charles John Huffam Dickens ( ; 7 February 1812 – 9 June 1870 ) was an अंग्रेज़ी writer and social critic.
He created some of the world 's सबसे memorable fictional characters और is generally regarded as the greatest novelist of the Victorian period.
During his life, his works enjoyed unprecedented fame, and by the बीसवीं सदी his literary प्रतिभाशाली थी broadly acknowledged by आलोचकों and scholars.
His novels और short stories continue to be widely लोकप्रिय.
Born in Portsmouth, England, डिकेंस left school to work in a factory after his father was thrown into debtors ' थाना.
हालांकि he had little औपचारिक education, उसके early impoverishment drove him to succeed.
Over उसके career he edited a weekly journal for 20 years, wrote 15 novels, 5 novellas और hundreds of short कहानियां and non-fiction articles, lectured और performed extensively, was an indefatigable letter writer, and campaigned vigorously लिये children 's अधिकारों, education, and अन्य social reforms.
Dickens sprang to कीर्ति with the 1836 serial publication of The Pickwick papers.
भीतर a few सालो he had become an international literary celebrity, प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके humour, satire, and keen observation of character and society.
His novels, most प्रकाशित in मासिक or weekly instalments, pioneered the serial publication of narrative fiction, जिससे became the dominant Victorian mode लिये अनोखा publication.
the किस्त format allowed Dickens to evaluate उसके दर्शक 's reaction, and he प्रायः परिवर्धित his plot and character विकास based on such प्रतिक्रिया.
लिये example, when उसके wife 's chiropodist expressed distress at the way मिस mowcher in David Copperfield seemed to reflect her disabilities, Dickens गई on to improve the character with धनात्मक lineaments.
fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence Ikey Solomon ; His caricature of Leigh Hunt in the figure of Mr Skimpole in Bleak House was likewise toned down on advice from some of his friends, as they read एपीसोड.
In the same novel, both Lawrence Boythorne and Mooney the beadle हैं drawn from real life – boythorne from Walter Savage Landor and Mooney इससे 'Looney ', a beadle at Salisbury वर्गाकार.
His plots were carefully constructed, and Dickens प्रायः wove in elements from topical events into उसके narratives.
masses of the illiterate poor chipped in ha'pennies to have each new मासिक episode पढ़ा to them, opening up और inspiring a नई class of readers.
डिकेंस was regarded as the साहित्यिक colossus of his age.
His 1843 novella, A Christmas कैरोल, is one of the most influential works कभी लिखा, and it remains popular and continues to inspire adaptations in प्रत्येक कलाकारी विधा.
His creative genius has been praised by fellow writers—from Leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton and George Orwell —for इसके realism, कॉमेडी, गद्य style, unique characterisations, and social criticism.
On the अन्य hand Oscar Wilde, Henry James and Virginia Woolf complained of a lack of psychological गहराई, loose writing, and a vein of saccharine sentimentalism.

The civil rights movement was a series of worldwide राजनैतिक movements लिये समता before the विधि that peaked in the 1960s.
In अनेक situations it took the form of campaigns of civil प्रतिरोध aimed at achieving change by nonviolent forms of resistance.
In कुछ situations it was accompanied, or followed, by civil unrest और हथियारबंद rebellion.
The process थी long and tenuous in many countries, and many of these movements did not fully achieve their goals हालांकि, the efforts of these movements किया lead to improvements in the विधिक rights of previously oppressed समूह of people.
The main aim of the civil अधिकारों movement included, and include, ensuring कि the rights of all people हैं equally protected by the law, including the अधिकारों of minorities.
Civil अधिकारों movements ranging इससे the global lgbt rights movement to the global Women 's rights movement to various racial minority rights movements around the संसार continue.
the 2010 FIFA World कप was the 19th फीफा World Cup, the world championship for मेन 's national association football teams.
It took प्लेस in South अफ़्रीकी from 11 जून to 11 July 2010.
The bidding process for hosting the tournament फाइनल was open only to अफ़्रीकी nations ; in 2004, the international football federation, FIFA, selected South अफ़्रीकी over Egypt and Morocco to become the first African nation to host the फाइनल.
the matches were played in ten stadiums in नौ host cities around the country, साथ the final played at the Soccer City stadium in South Africa 's largest city, Johannesburg.
Thirty-two teams यहूद selected लिये participation via a worldwide qualification tournament that began in August 2007.
In the first गोलाकार of the टूर्नामेंट finals, the teams competed in round-robin groups of four teams for points, with the top two teams in each group proceeding.
ये sixteen teams advanced to the नॉकआउट stage, where three rounds of play decided which teams would participate in the final.
In the final, Spain, the European champions, पराजित third-time finalists the Netherlands 1–0 after extra time, with Andrés Iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute giving Spain their first world शीर्षक, becoming the eighth nation to जीत the tournament, and the पहला European स्वदेश to win the tournament outside इसके home continent.
Host स्वदेश South Africa, 2006 world champions Italy and 2006 runners-up France were all eliminated in the पहला round of the tournament.
It was the first time that the hosts were eliminated in the first round.
New जीलैंड with उनके तीन draws were the only undefeated team in the टूर्नामेंट, but यहूद also eliminated in the first round.

New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a प्रमुख United States port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the राज्य of Louisiana.
the population of the city was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The नई Orleans metropolitan area ( नई Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United राज्य.
the New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa संयुक्त Statistical Area, a larger trading area, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
the नगर is named after Orléans, a नगर located on the Loire नदी in केन्द्र, France, and is well ज्ञात for इसके पृथक फ्रेंच Creole वास्तुकला, as खूब as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.

The city is often referred to as the `` most unique '' in America.
नई Orleans is located in southeastern Louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The city and ऑरलियन्स Parish ( ) हैं.

The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election, held on मंगलवार, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, former Vice-President Richard Nixon, won the election over the Democratic nominee, incumbent vice-president Hubert Humphrey.
निक्सन ran on a अभियान that promised to restore law और order to the nation 's शहरों, torn by riots और crime.
विश्लेषकों have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the New सौदे Coalition that था वर्चस्व presidential राजनीती for 36 years.
Coming चार years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson जीती in a historic landslide, the election saw the incumbent president forced out of the रेस and a रिपब्लिकन elected लिये the first time in twelve years.
it was a wrenching नेशनल experience, conducted दौरान a साल of violence that शामिल the assassination of civil rights leader Martin लूथर King, jr., and subsequent race riots across the nation, the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy, widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses, and violent confrontations between police and anti-war प्रदर्शनकारियों at the 1968 लोकतांत्रिक National सम्मेलन as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election प्रदर्शित the strongest तीसरा पार्टी effort since 1912 by former Alabama Governor जार्ज वालेस, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's अभियान opposed संघीय intervention in the South to end school पृथक्करण, he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the उत्तर.
इस was the पिछला election in which नई York had the most votes in the electoral college ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 census, California gained the most electoral votes and has remained the most populous state since then.
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without carrying the vice presidential candidate 's home state.

Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) was an American musician and कलाकार, बेहतरीन known as the lead singer, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the Seattle music scene, having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the बैंड मिला breakthrough success with `` Smells जैसे Teen Spirit `` from इसके second album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
following the success of nevermind, Nirvana was labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप band '' of Generation X, and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and frustrated, believing his संदेश और artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public, with his personal issues often विषय to media attention.
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio album In utero ( 1993 ).
दौरान the पिछला सालो of his life, कोबेन struggled with heroin addiction, illness and depression.
He भी had difficulty coping with his fame and पब्लिक image, and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his wife, musician Courtney Love.
on April 8, 1994, Cobain was मिला dead at his home in Seattle, the victim of what was officially ruled a आत्महत्या by a self-inflicted shotgun घाव to the head.
The circumstances of his death at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
चूंकि उनके debut, निर्वाण, with कोबेन as a songwriter, has बेची over 25 million albums in the U.S., and over 50 million worldwide.
a millwright is a craftsman or tradesman engaged with the construction and maintenance of मशीनरी.
अधिक generally in the अंग्रेज़ी speaking संसार, जल्दी millwrights were विशेषज्ञ carpenters who erected मशीने प्रयुक्त in agriculture, food processing and प्रसंस्करण lumber and paper.
In the early part of the Industrial Revolution, उनके skills were pressed into service building the earliest powered textile mills.
आधुनिक millwrights कार्य with steel and other materials in जोड to लकडी and must often combine the कौशल of several skilled ट्रेड in order to successfully fabricate industrial machinery or to assemble machines from pre-fabricated भाग.
The modern millwright must also be able to पढ़ा blueprints और other schematics to सहायता him in the निर्माण of जटिल systems.
Millwrights are frequently unionized, with around 45 % unionized in the US, although experienced millwrights often set themselves up as independent contractors.

Sodium azide is the inorganic यौगिक with the formula nan3.
This colorless salt is the gas-forming component in many car airbag systems.
It is used लिये the preparation of अन्य azide compounds.
It is an ionic पदार्थ, is highly घुलनशील in water, और is very acutely toxic.
Double rainbow and supernumerary rainbows on the inside of the primary arc.
the छाया of the photographer 's head on the नीचे marks the केन्द्र of the रेनबो वृत्त ( antisolar point ).
a rainbow is an optical and meteorological phenomenon कि is caused by प्रतिबिंब of light in water droplets in the Earth 's atmosphere, resulting in a spectrum of light appearing in the sky.
It takes the form of a multicoloured arc.
rainbows caused by sunlight always appear in the खण्ड of sky directly opposite the sun.
in a `` प्राथमिक rainbow '', the arc shows red on the outer part and बैंगनी on the inner side.
इस rainbow is caused by light being refracted while प्रवेश a droplet of water, then reflected inside on the back of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it.
In a double rainbow, a second चाप is देखी outside the primary चाप, and रै the order of its colours reversed, red facing toward the other one, in both rainbows.
This second rainbow is caused by light reflecting twice अंदर water droplets.
The Conservative Party, officially the Conservative and Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the Tories, is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of conservatism and अंग्रेजों unionism.
it is the largest political party in the संयुक्त किंगडम, being the largest single party in the House of Commons with 303 MPs, the largest party in लोकल government with 9,391 councillors, and the largest British party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs.
It governs in coalition with the Liberal Democrats, with party leader David cameron as प्रधान Minister.
The रूढ़िवादी Party was founded in 1834, और was one of two dominant parties in the 19th century, along साथ the Liberal Party.
It changed its name to the Conservative and यूनियनिस्ट Party in 1912 after merging with the उदार Unionist Party, although that name is rarely used and it is generally referred to as बस the Conservative Party.
In the 1920s, the Liberal vote greatly diminished and the Labour Party became the Conservatives ' main rivals.
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57 years of the 20th सदी, including Winston चर्चिल ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) और Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic उदारीकरण and saw the Conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the three major parties.
The पार्टी was returned to सरकारी in गठबन्धन, having failed to win a majority, in 2010 under the more `` liberal '' leadership of David Cameron.
In the European पार्लियामेंट, the conservatives are the largest British party साथ 25 MEPs, who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives and Reformists ( ECR ) parliamentary group, while the party itself is a member of the Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists ( aecr ) Europarty.
They are the third-largest party in the Scottish Parliament और second-largest in the Welsh Assembly.
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist पार्टी ( UUP ) as part of the Ulster Conservatives and unionists arrangement, with the UUP currently participating in the five-party उत्तरी Ireland Executive.
नियति 's Child was an American R & b girl group whose फाइनल, and शायद सबसे recognizable, line-up comprised बेयोंस Knowles, Kelly Rowland and Michelle विलियम्स.
Formed in 1990 in Houston, Texas, Destiny 's Child members began their musical endeavors as लड़की 's Tyme comprising, among others, Knowles, Rowland, latavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett.
After years of limited success, they were signed to Columbia Records as Destiny 's Child.
Destiny 's Child was शुभारम्भ into mainstream recognition following the release of their best-selling second album, the Writing 's on the Wall, which contained the number-one singles `` Bills, बिल्स, Bills `` and `` Say My Name ``.
Despite critical and commercial success, the group was plagued by internal विरोध and legal turmoil, as roberson and Luckett attempted to split इससे the group 's manager mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles and rowland, his बेटी और niece, respectively.
दोनो Roberson and Luckett were जल्द replaced साथ Williams and Farrah Franklin ; however, in 2000, Franklin was dismissed, leaving उन्हें as a trio.
Their third album, उत्तरजीवी, which contains themes the public interpreted as a channel to the group 's experience, contains the worldwide hits `` Independent Women ``, `` Survivor `` and `` bootylicious ``.
in 2002, they announced a hiatus and re-united two years later for the रिलीज of their fourth studio album, नियति fulfilled ( 2004 ).
Destiny 's Child has sold more than 50 million रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी to date.
बिलबोर्ड magazine ranks the समूह as एक of the महानतम musical trios of all time, the ninth most successful artist/band of the 2000s, and placed the समूह 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists list in 2008.
the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United States federal agency under the Department of Health and Human सेवाएं headquartered in Druid Hills, unincorporated dekalb County, Georgia, in Greater Atlanta.
It works to protect public health and safety by providing information to enhance health decisions, and it promotes health through partnerships with राज्य स्वास्थ्य विभाग और other संगठन.
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention and control ( especially संक्रामक diseases और foodborne pathogens and other microbial infections ), environmental health, occupational safety and health, health promotion, injury prevention and education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the United States.
the सीडीसी is the United States ' national public health institute and is a founding member of the International Association of National Public Health संस्थान.
Earthquake prediction `` is प्रायः defined as the specification of the time, स्थान, and magnitude of a future earthquake within stated limits '', and particularly of `` the next दमदार earthquake to occur in a region. ''
This can be विशिष्ट इससे earthquake forecasting, which is the probabilistic assessment of सामान्य earthquake hazard, सहित the frequency और परिमाण of damaging earthquakes, in a given area over periods of सालो or decades.
This can be further distinguished from real-time भूकंप warning systems, which, upon detection of a severe earthquake, can provide neighboring regions a few सेकेंड चेतावनी of potentially significant shaking.
to be उपयोगी, an earthquake prediction must be precise enough to वारंट the cost of increased एहतियात, सहित disruption of ordinary activities and commerce, and timely enough that तैयारी can be made.
Predictions must भी be reliable, as गलत alarms and cancelled alarms are not तभी economically costly, but seriously undermine confidence in, and thereby the effectiveness of, any kind of warning.
With over 7,000 भूकंप around the world प्रत्येक year with a magnitude of 4.0 or वृहद, trivial success in earthquake prediction is easily प्राप्त using sufficiently broad parameters of time, location, or magnitude.
However, such नगण्य `` successful predictions '' are not useful.
Major भूकंप हैं प्रायः followed by reports that they यहूद predicted, or at least anticipated, but no claim of a कामयाब prediction of a major भूकंप has बच close inquiry.
in the 1970s there was intense आशावाद amongst scientists that some method of predicting भूकंप might be found, but by the 1990s continuing failure led अनेक वैज्ञानिकों to question whether it was भी संभावित.
While अनेक scientists still hold that, given पर्याप्त resources, prediction might be possible, many others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible.

stührling Tourbillon Movement ( ).
In horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an addition to the mechanics of a watch escapement.
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet from an earlier idea by the अंग्रेज़ी chronometer maker John Arnold, a tourbillon aims to counter the effects of gravity by mounting the escapement और balance wheel in a घूर्णन cage, to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position.
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy, tourbillons are स्टिल included in some expensive modern watches as a novelty and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
The mechanism is usually exposed on the watch 's face to दिखाएँ it off.
The Windows installer ( previously known as Microsoft Installer ) is a तन्त्र component used for the installation, maintenance, and removal of तन्त्र on आधुनिक Microsoft Windows systems.
the installation information, and often the files themselves, are packaged in installation पैकेज, loosely relational databases structured as COM Structured Storages and commonly known as `` MSI files '', from उनके default file extension.
Windows Installer contains significant परिवर्तन इससे इसके predecessor, सेटअप API.
New सुविधाएँ include a GUI framework and automatic generation of the uninstallation अनुक्रम.
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone executable installer frameworks ऐसे as older संस्करण of InstallShield और NSIS.
Microsoft encourages third parties to use Windows installer as the basis for installation frameworks, so that they synchronize correctly with other installers and keep the internal database of installed products consistent.
Important features such as rollback and versioning depend on a consistent internal database for reliable operation.
Furthermore, खिड़कियाँ Installer facilitates the principle of least privilege by performing software installations by proxy for unprivileged users.
Four लोको is a line of alcoholic पेय, originally marketed as energy drinks, sold by Phusion Projects of Chicago, इलिनोइस.
Phusion operates as पेय Four Brewing Company.
Four Loko, the कम्पनी 's most popular beverage, debuted in the संयुक्त States market in 2005.
it is now sold in 48 states, और in Canada, The Bahamas, Bolivia, होंडुरास, और Europe.
the नाम `` Four '' is निकला from the original energy drink 's four main संघटक : alcohol, caffeine, taurine, और guarana.
Four branded products have been the object of legal, ethical, and स्वास्थ्य concerns related to the company allegedly marketing them to the underaged and the purported खतरे of combining alcohol और caffeine.
After the beverage was banned in several states, a product reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed caffeine, taurine, और guarana as ingredients, and the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an उर्जा पेय.
The neck of a guitar showing the नट ( in the background, coloured white ) and first four metal frets.
A fret is a raised element on the neck of a stringed instrument.
Frets usually extend across the full width of the neck.
On most modern western fretted यंत्र, frets हैं metal strips inserted into the fingerboard.
On some historical यंत्र and non-European instruments, frets are made of pieces of string tied around the neck.
frets divide the गर्दन into fixed segments at intervals related to a musical framework.
On instruments such as guitars, each fret represents one semitone in the standard पश्चिमी system where one अष्टक is divided into twelve semitones.
fret is often प्रयुक्त as a क्रिया, meaning simply `` to press down the string behind a fret. ''
Fretting प्रायः refers to the frets and/or their प्रणाली of अवस्थिति.
There was consumption of alcohol both during और after prohibition.
The 18th Amendment निषिद्ध the production, distribution and sale of alcoholic beverages in the United States और was widely supported by the American public when it went into effect in 1920.
The temperance गति had popularized the विश्वास that alcohol was the major cause of most निजी and सोशल problems and prohibition was seen as the समाधान to the स्वदेश 's poverty, crime, violence, and other ills.
Upon ratification of the amendment, the प्रसिद्ध evangelist Billy Sunday said that `` The slums होगा soon be only a memory.
We will turn our prisons into कारखानों and our jails into storehouses and corncribs. ''
( Compare Christianity and alcohol. )
Since दारू थी to be banned और since it was seen as the cause of सबसे, if नहीं all, crime, कुछ communities sold their jails.
the स्वदेश थी highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the संयुक्त States Congress confidently asserted that `` There is as much chance of repealing the Eighteenth amendment as वहीँ is लिये a hummingbird to fly to the planet Mars with the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( मीटर in अमरीकी English ), ( SI unit symbol : m ; SI dimension symbol : l ), is the fundamental unit of लंबाई in the International System of Units ( SI ).
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the distance इससे the Earth 's equator to the उत्तर ध्रुव ( at समुद्र level ), its definition has been periodically refined to reflect growing knowledge of metrology.
Since 1983, it रै been defined as `` the length of the path travelled by light in vacuum during a time interval of 1/299,792,458 of a दूसरी. ''

a geologist is a scientist who studies the ठोस और liquid पदार्थ that constitutes the धरती as well as the प्रक्रियाओं और history कि has shaped it.
Geologists प्रायः engage in studying geology.
Geologists, studying more of an लागू science than a सैद्धांतिक one, must approach Geology using physics, chemistry and biology as well as other sciences.
Geologists, compared to scientists engaged in other fields, are generally more exposed to the outdoors than रहकर in laboratories ; although some geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab.
geologists are सगाई in exploration for mining companies in search of metals, oils, and other Earth resources.
They हैं also in the forefront of natural जोखिमों and disasters warning and mitigation, studying earthquakes, volcanic activity, tsunamis, weather storms, and the like ; their studies are प्रयुक्त to warn the सामान्य public of the occurrence of these कार्यक्रम.
Currently, geologists are also सगाई in the discussion of climate change, as वे study the history and evidence लिये this धरती process.

Modern vacuum tubes, ज़्यादातर miniature स्टाइल
In electronics, a vacuum ट्यूब, इलेक्ट्रॉन ट्यूब ( in उत्तर America ), thermionic valve, tube, or valve is a device controlling इलेक्ट्रिक वर्तमान through a vacuum in a sealed container.
The container is often thin transparent glass in a roughly cylindrical आकार.
The simplest vacuum ट्यूब, the diode, is essentially an incandescent light bulb with an added electrode inside.
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot, electrons are `` boiled '' off इसके surface और into the vacuum inside the bulb.
If the electrode -- called a `` plate '' or `` anode '' -- is बना more धनात्मक than the hot filament, a सीधा current flows through the वैक्यूम to the एलेक्ट्रोड ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ).
As the current only बहती in one direction, it makes it possible to convert an alternating वर्तमान applied to the filament to direct current.
the introduction of a third electrode, a grid between the filament and the plate, yields another function.
a voltage applied to the ग्रिड controls the current flowing from the filament to the plate.
Thus, it allows the device to be used as an electronic amplifier.
Vacuum tubes are thus प्रयुक्त for rectification, amplification, switching, or similar processing or creation of electrical signals.
The vast majority of modern day tubes consist of a sealed container with a vacuum inside, and essentially rely on thermionic emission of electrons from a hot फिलामेंट or a कैथोड heated by the filament.
Some exceptions to this are dealt with in the खण्ड about gas-filled tubes below.
Vacuum tubes were critical to the development of electronic technology, which drove the expansion and commercialization of रेडियो broadcasting, television, रडार, ध्वनि reinforcement, sound recording and reproduction, large telephone networks, analog and डिजिटल computers, and industrial process control.
Although some applications had counterparts using पहले technologies such as the चिंगारी gap transmitter or mechanical computers, it थी the आविष्कार of the vacuum tube with three electrodes ( पुकारा a triode ) and इसके capability of electronic amplification कि बना these technologies widespread and practical.
in most applications, solid-state devices such as transistors और other semiconductor devices have replaced tubes.
solid-state devices पिछला longer and are smaller, more कुशल, more reliable, and cheaper than tubes.
tubes can be fragile, sometimes generate significant unwanted heat, and can take अनेक seconds—many मिनट्स in critical applications—after powering on to warm to a temperature जहाँ वे perform within operational tolerance.
However, tubes still ढूँढें uses where solid-state devices have not महरूम developed, हैं impractical, or जहाँ a tube has superior performance, as with some devices in professional ऑडियो and high-power radio transmitters.
Tubes are स्टिल produced लिये such applications.
tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be destroyed by the electromagnetic pulse produced by नाभिकीय विस्फोट और geomagnetic storms produced by giant solar flares.
Skittles is a brand of fruit-flavoured sweets, currently produced and marketed by the Wm. wrigley Jr. Company, a division of Mars, Inc.
वे have hard शुगर shells which carry the letter S.
The inside is mainly शुगर, corn syrup, and hydrogenated palm kernel oil along with fruit रस, citric acid, and natural और artificial flavours.
The confectionery has महरूम sold in a variety of flavour collections, such as Tropical and Wild Berry.
Sir Winston Leonard spencer-churchill, ( 30 November 1874 – 24 January 1965 ) was a British politician who was the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955.
Widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th सदी, Churchill was also an officer in the अंग्रेजों Army, a इतिहासकार, a writer, and an artist.
He is the only British प्रधान Minister in history to have received the नोबेल Prize in Literature, और was भी the first person to be made an मानद Citizen of the United States.
Churchill was born into an aristocratic family as the पोता of the 7th ड्यूक of Marlborough.
उसके पिता, Lord Randolph चर्चिल, was a charismatic राजनेता who served as चांसलर of the exchequer ; his mother, Jennie Jerome, was an American socialite.
As a young army officer, he saw action in British इण्डिया, The Sudan, and the दूसरी बोअर War.
He gained कीर्ति as a war correspondent and लिखा books परिचय his campaigns.
At the forefront of politics for पचास years, he held many राजनैतिक and कैबिनेट positions.
पहले the First World युद्ध, he served as President of the Board of Trade, घर Secretary, और First रब of the Admiralty as part of the Asquith उदार government.
During the युद्ध, he continued as First Lord of the Admiralty until the disastrous Gallipoli Campaign caused his प्रस्थान इससे government.
he then briefly resumed क्रियाशील army service on the Western सामने as कमांडर of the 6th बटालियन of the Royal Scots Fusiliers.
He returned to government as Minister of Munitions, Secretary of State लिये War, और Secretary of राज्य for एयर.
After the War, चर्चिल served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative ( baldwin ) सरकारी of 1924–29, controversially returning the pound sterling in 1925 to the gold standard at its pre-war parity, a मूव widely seen as creating deflationary pressure on the uk economy.
Also controversial was his विपक्ष to increased home rule for इण्डिया और his प्रतिरोध to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII.
Out of office और politically `` in the wilderness '' दौरान the 1930s, Churchill took the lead in warning about नाजी Germany और in campaigning for rearmament.
On the outbreak of the Second World War, he थी again appointed First Lord of the Admiralty.
Following the resignation of नेविली Chamberlain on 10 may 1940, चर्चिल became Prime Minister.
His steadfast refusal to consider defeat, surrender, or a compromise peace helped inspire British resistance, especially दौरान the difficult early days of the War when Britain stood alone among European countries in its active विपक्ष to Adolf हिटलर.
Churchill was particularly विख्यात for उसके speeches and radio broadcasts, जिससे helped inspire the अंग्रेजों people.
He led Britain as Prime Minister until victory over Nazi Germany had been secured.
बाद the रूढ़िवादी Party lost the 1945 चुनाव, he became Leader of the Opposition to the Labour ( Attlee ) government.
After winning the 1951 election, he again became Prime मंत्री, before retiring in 1955.
Upon his death, एलिज़ाबेथ II granted him the इज्ज़त of a state funeral, which saw one of the largest assemblies of संसार statesmen in history.
Named the महानतम briton of सब time in a 2002 poll, चर्चिल is widely regarded as होने among the most influential people in British history.
