The घाट Focus is a compact car ( C-segment in Europe ) manufactured by the Ford Motor Company since 1998.
Ford began sales of the Focus to यूरोपीय in July 1998 और in North America during 1999 for the 2000 मॉडल year.
In Europe, South America, उत्तर America and South Africa, the Focus replaced the various versions of the Ford Escort sold in those markets.
In एशिया and Australasia, it replaced the घाट Laser.
As of the first half of 2012, the Focus surpassed the Toyota Corolla to become the world 's बेहतरीन selling ऑटोमोबाइल nameplate.
The Focus has been considered एक of the 50 महानतम गाड़ियाँ of the past fifty years by British magazine CAR.
An agar plate -- an example of a bacterial growth medium.
Specifically, it is a streak plate ; the नारंगी lines and dots are formed by bacterial colonies.
a growth medium or culture medium is a liquid or gel designed to support the growth of microorganisms or cells, or small plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens.
There are different types of media for growing अलग प्रकार of कोशिकाएं.
वहीँ are two major types of विकास media : those used for कोशिका culture, which use specific cell types derived from plants or animals, और microbiological culture, which are used for growing microorganisms, such as bacteria or yeast.
the most common growth media लिये microorganisms are nutrient broths और आगर plates ; specialized मीडिया are sometimes जरूरी for microorganism and cell culture growth.
कुछ जीवों, termed fastidious organisms, require specialized environments due to complex nutritional requirements.
Viruses, for उदाहरण, हैं obligate intracellular परजीवी and require a growth मीडियम containing living cells.
A talent agent, or booking एजेंट, is a person who finds jobs for actors, authors, film निर्देशकों, musicians, models, producers, professional athletes, writers and other people in various entertainment व्यवसायों.
an agent भी defends, supports and promotes the interest of his/her clients.
Agents can not produce their own shows due to विरोध of interest.
A talent agent जरूर be परिचित with their clients.
An agent has to know कया kind of कार्य the क्लाएंट can and can not do in order to match them with विभिन्न jobs.
Having an agent is not required, but does help the artist in getting jobs.
In many मामले casting directors, or other businesses, go to talent agencies to ढूँढें कलाकारों they are looking for.
The agent is paid a percentage of the star 's earnings ( typically 10 % ).
Agents sometimes होगा be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There are different regulations कि govern different types of एजेंटों that are established by artist 's unions और the legal jurisdiction in जिससे the agent operates.
There are also professional organizations that अनुज्ञा talent agencies.
Since the decline in viewership in theaters, from the 1950s to 1960s, this caused a monumental shift in how studios would उपज films and thus reducing the लागत of विशेष and महंगी actors.
Actors and actresses were working for the studios but were not owned by एक major studio entity and so were able to कार्य on within उनके time and with अन्य studios.
Because of this, agents were now seen as a necessity बजाय of an option.
एजेंटों अभी became third parties that negotiated between studios and clients, this making their services imperative between each party.
Since talent agencies हैं working with lucrative contracts, all talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया Labor Code, which calls an agent a `` person or corporation who engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, promising, or attempting to procure नियुक्ति for कलाकार or artists. ''
Mars रै two known moons, phobos and Deimos, which are thought to be captured asteroids.
दोनो satellites were discovered in 1877 by Asaph हॉल and are named after the characters Phobos ( panic/fear ) and deimos ( terror/dread ) who, in Greek mythology, accompanied उनके पिता Ares, god of war, into battle.
Ares was known as Mars to the Romans.
it is possible that Mars may have moons smaller than 50 - 100 meters and a dust ring between Phobos and Deimos may be present but none have महरूम discovered.
in law प्रवर्तन parlance, the term murder book refers to the case file of a murder investigation.
Typically, murder books include crime scene photographs and sketches, autopsy और forensic रिपोर्ट्स, transcripts of investigators ' टीप and witness interviews.
The murder book encapsulates the पूरा paper trail of a murder investigation, from the time the murder is first reported through the arrest of a suspect.
Law enforcement agencies typically guard murder books carefully, and it is unusual for नागरिकों to be given unfettered access to ये kinds of records, especially for unsolved मामले.

Melon balls are गेंदें of melon made using a melon baller कि varies from around 1 centimeter to 3 centimeters ( परिचय 3/8 inch to 1 inch ).
They हैं generally प्रयुक्त in फल salad.
A ksa, or Knowledge, कौशल, and abilities, is a series of narrative statements that are जरूरी when applying to United States संघीय सरकारी जॉब उद्घाटन.
KSAs हैं used to determine, along with resumes, who the बेहतरीन applicants are जब several candidates qualify लिये a job.
The ज्ञान, skills and abilities ( KSAs ) necessary for the successful performance of a position हैं contained on each job vacancy announcement.
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked federal agencies to stop requiring job applicants to भरण out the questionnaires, to be phased out within a year.
KSAs are brief and focused essays about one 's career and educational background कि presumably qualify एक to perform the duties of the position being applied for.
A knowledge, skills, और abilities ( KSA ) is a concise essay परिचय एक 's talent and expertise and सम्बन्धित अनुभवों ( work, education, स्वयंसेवी ) and accomplishments.
A series of KSA statements हैं usually required when applying for most federal सरकारी and कुछ राज्य and city government jobs.
ksas are used as a yardstick to assess the capabilities of a prospective applicant in terms of likely क्षमता to perform the duties of the job.
Most government hiring officials look for a short, crisp and clear KSA कि emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in previous work.
KSA statements are also known as Evaluation Factors.
Other agencies sometimes call them `` Rating Factors '', `` Quality Ranking Factors '', `` Knowledge, Abilities, skills and अन्य Characteristics '', or `` Job Elements ''.
The name can be just a name but often it influences content and length of the essay.
प्रत्येक agency has its own regulations but most of the time the each KSA फ़ैक्टर should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 पृष्ठों long.
The below definitions are defined by the U.S. Office of Personnel Management :
ज्ञान, कौशल, and Abilities ( KSAs ) - the attributes required to perform a job and are generally demonstrated through qualifying service, education, or training.
Knowledge - Is a body of information applied directly to the प्रदर्शन of a फलन.
Skill - Is an observable competence to perform a learned psychomotor act.
Ability - Is competence to perform an observable behavior or a behavior that results in an observable product.
the scoring of ksa essays is based on a स्केल of from एक to 100.
Job applicants must score ऊपर 70 to be considered for the position.
High scores are निकला through answering the KSA question as specifically as possible, providing उदाहरण from previous employment or training कि clearly demonstrate you meet the qualifications.
When applying to संघीय government स्थितियाँ, a Federal Resume is usually required in जोड to KSA statements.

Love Always is the debut album of American r & B duo K-Ci & JoJo, released on June 17, 1997, by MCA Records.
it was recorded at विभिन्न studios in New York and the Los एंजिल्स area in 1996 and 1997.
it was produced by JoJo and अनेक अन्य, including DeVante Swing, जेम्स Mtume, and Jeff Redd.
The duo were originally a part of Jodeci before this album.
The album peaked at sixth on the US Billboard 200 and also appeared on international charts.
The सिंगल `` सब My जीवन `` charted क्रमांक one in multiple countries, and सब four of the album 's singles peaked above the top 25 in the US Hot R & b/hip-hop Songs and the New Zealand Top 40 Singles.
Love Always थी received favorably by critics, who praised the brothers ' गायन ability and the production.
The album has been certified three times platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) and gold by Music Canada और IFPI Sweden.
As of June 1999 it had sold 2.9 million copies in the संयुक्त States.
A variable-rate mortgage, adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ), or tracker mortgage is a mortgage ऋण with the interest रेट on the note periodically समायोजित based on an index which reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets.
The loan may be offered at the lender 's standard variable चूहाe/ आधार rate.
There may be a direct और legally-defined link to the underlying index, but जहाँ the lender offers no specific link to the underlying market or index the rate can be बदला at the lender 's discretion.
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most आम outside the United States, whilst in the United States, `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is most common, and implies a mortgage regulated by the Federal government, with caps on charges.
In many countries, adjustable rate mortgages are the norm, and in such स्थान, may simply be referred to as mortgages.
Among the most आम indices are the rates on 1-year constant-maturity Treasury ( CMT ) securities, the Cost of Funds Index ( COFI ), and the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ).
A few lenders use their own cost of funds as an index, rather than using other indices.
This is किया to ensure a steady margin for the lender, whose अपना cost of funding will usually be सम्बन्धित to the index.
Consequently, payments made by the borrower may change over time with the बदलना interest रेट ( alternatively, the term of the ऋण may change ).
This is पृथक from the ग्रैजुएट payment mortgage, which offers changing payment amounts but a fixed interest रेट.
Other फ़ॉर्म of mortgage loan include the interest तभी mortgage, the फिक्स्ड rate mortgage, the ऋणात्मक amortization mortgage, and the balloon payment mortgage.
Adjustable rates ट्रांसफ़र part of the ब्याज rate रिस्क from the lender to the borrower.
They can be प्रयुक्त where unpredictable interest rates मेक fixed रेट loans difficult to obtain.
The borrower benefits if the interest rate falls लकिन loses if the interest rate increases.
The borrower benefits from reduced margins to the underlying cost of borrowing compared to फिक्स्ड or capped rate mortgages.
The assassination of रॉबर्ट Francis `` Bobby '' कैनेडी, a United States Senator and brother of assassinated President John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy, took place shortly after midnight on June 5, 1968, in लॉस Angeles, California, दौरान the campaign season for the United States Presidential election, 1968.
बाद winning the California and South Dakota primary elections for the Democratic नामांकन for अध्यक्ष of the United States, Kennedy was शॉट as he walked through the kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel and died in the Good सामरी हॉस्पिटल twenty-six घंटों later.
sirhan Sirhan, a 24-year-old Palestinian / जार्डन immigrant, was convicted of Kennedy 's murder and is सेवारत a life sentence for the crime.
sirhan 's lawyers have released statements claiming evidence कि he was framed.
the shooting was recorded on audio tape by a freelance समाचारपत्र reporter, and the aftermath was captured on film.
Kennedy 's देह lay in repose at St. Patrick 's Cathedral in नई York for two दिनों before a funeral द्रव्यमान was held on June 8.
उसके body was interred near his brother John at आर्लिंगटन National Cemetery.
His death prompted the protection of अध्यक्षीय candidates by the United राज्य रहस्य Service.
ह्यूबर्ट Humphrey went on to win the Democratic nomination लिये the presidency, लकिन ultimately narrowly lost the election to Richard Nixon.
as with his brother Jack 's मौत, bobby 's assassination and the हालातों surrounding it have spawned a variety of conspiracy theories.
As of 2013 Kennedy remains एक of only दो बैठे United States Senators to be assassinated ( the other being Huey Long ).
the Modern Age of कॉमिक Books is an informal name for the काल in the history of mainstream American comic books generally माना to last from the mid-1980s until उपस्थित day.
In this period, comic book characters generally became darker and more psychologically जटिल, creators became better-known and active in changing the industry, independent comics flourished, and larger publishing houses became more commercialized.
An alternate name for इस काल is the अंधेरा आयु of कॉमिक Books, due to the popularity और artistic influence of grim titles, such as and Watchmen.
When Harry मिले Sally... is a 1989 American romantic comedy film written by Nora Ephron और directed by Rob reiner.
It stars Billy क्रिस्टल as Harry and Meg Ryan as सैली.
The story follows the शीर्षक वर्ण from the समय they meet just before sharing a cross-country drive, through बारह सालो or so of chance encounters in New York नगर.
The film raises the सवाल `` can men and women ever just be friends ? '' and advances many ideas about relationships that became household अवधारणाओं, such as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person ''.
The origins of the film आए from reiner 's return to सिंगल life after a divorce.
An interview ephron conducted साथ Reiner provided the basis for Harry.
Sally was based on Ephron and some of her friends.
Crystal came on board and made his अपना योगदान to the screenplay, making Harry funnier.
Ephron supplied the ढांचा of the film with much of the dialogue based on the real-life दोस्ती between reiner and Crystal.
The soundtrack consists of standards performed by Harry Connick, Jr., with a बिग band and orchestra arranged by Marc Shaiman.
Connick जीती his first Grammy Award for बेहतरीन Jazz Male Vocal प्रदर्शन.
Columbia तस्वीरें released the film using the `` platform '' तकनीक, which involved opening it in a few select cities, letting positive word of mouth generate ब्याज, और then धीरे expanding वितरण over subsequent weeks.
When हैरी Met Sally... grossed a total of US $ 92.8 million in North अमेरिका.
Ephron received a British Academy Film Award, an Oscar nomination, and a Writers Guild of America Award नामांकन for her screenplay.
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years... 100 Laughs सूची of the top comedy films in अमरीकी सिनेमा and number 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 funniest Movies ''.
In early 2004, the film was adapted लिये the stage in a production starring Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan.

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged food उत्पाद primarily consisting of boxed pasta bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings.
The contents of प्रत्येक बक्सा are combined with browned ground beef, water and milk to बनाएँ a complete dish.
The उत्पाद line also features products with other starches such as rice or आलू instead of pasta.
It is made by General Mills.
हालांकि the क्लासिक boxed हैमबर्गर हेल्पर products only सप्लाई the starch item और the sauce packets, some varieties of the उत्पाद include ground बीफ.
These शामिल a frozen खाना line, जिससे सुविधाएँ some of the brand 's classic varieties in a complete meal kit form, with frozen ground beef और frozen sauce packaged separately from the नूडल्स in the same bag.
There is भी an `` instant '' संस्करण of Hamburger Helper containing dehydrated meat, नूडल्स and seasonings in a small थैली, requiring only water to be added.
The हैमबर्गर Helper mascot is the `` Helping Hand '', an anthropomorphic animated, four fingered left-hand glove, which appears in the product 's television commercials and on the packages.

A dwarf ग्रह is a planetary-mass object that is neither a planet nor a उपग्रह.
More explicitly, the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf ग्रह as a celestial body in direct orbit of the Sun that is massive enough for its shape to be controlled by gravitation, but that unlike a ग्रह has not साफ its कक्षीय प्रदेश of other objects.
The term dwarf ग्रह was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of bodies orbiting the Sun, brought about by an increase in discoveries of trans-Neptunian objects that rivaled Pluto in size, और आखिरकार precipitated by the डिस्कवरी of an even अधिक विशाल object, Eris.
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the neighbourhood of their orbit are defined as planets, while those that are not massive पर्याप्त to be rounded by their own गम्भीरता are defined as छोटी Solar System bodies.
बौना planets come in between.
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the roster of planets by the iau रै been both praised और criticized ; it was said to be the `` right decision '' by Mike Brown, who discovered and other new dwarf planets, but has been rejected by Alan Stern, जो had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990.
The IAU currently recognizes five dwarf planets in the सौर System :, Pluto,,, और.
however, तभी two of these bodies, Ceres and Pluto, have been observed in पर्याप्त विवरण to demonstrate that they fit the definition.
Eris रै been accepted as a dwarf planet because it is more massive than Pluto.
The IAU subsequently decided कि बेनाम trans-neptunian objects with an absolute magnitude brighter than +1 ( and hence a diameter of ≥838 km assuming a geometric albedo of ≤1 ) हैं to be named under the assumption that they are dwarf ग्रह.
The तभी two such objects known at the time, Makemake and Haumea, went through this naming procedure and were declared to be dwarf planets.
it is suspected that another hundred or so known वस्तुएँ in the सौर System हैं dwarf planets.
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be found when the entire प्रदेश known as the Kuiper बेल्ट is explored, and that the number may exceed 10,000 when objects scattered बाहर the Kuiper belt हैं माना.
Individual astronomers recognize several of ये, और in August 2011 Mike Brown प्रकाशित a list of 390 प्रत्याशी objects, ranging इससे `` nearly निश्चित '' to `` possible '' dwarf planets. '
Brown identifies nine ज्ञात वस्तुएँ – the five accepted by the iau plus,,, and – as `` virtually certain '', with another two दर्जन highly likely, and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total.
The classification of bodies in other ग्रहीय systems with the characteristics of बौना planets has not been addressed.
A डेबिट card ( also known as a bank card or जाँच कार्ड ) is a plastic भुगतान card that provides the cardholder electronic access to his or her bank account ( s ) at a वित्तीय institution.
कुछ cards have a भंडारित value with which a payment is made, while most relay a message to the cardholder 's bank to withdraw funds from a payee 's designated bank account.
the card, where accepted, can be प्रयुक्त instead of cash when making purchases.
In some cases, the primary account number is आबंटित exclusively for use on the Internet and there is no physical card.
In अनेक देशों, the use of डेबिट ताश has become so फैली कि their volume has overtaken or entirely replaced cheques और, in some उदाहरण, नकदी transactions.
The विकास of डेबिट cards, नापसंद credit ताश and charge ताश, has generally been country specific resulting in a number of different प्रणालियों around the world, जिससे यहूद प्रायः असंगत.
Since the mid-2000s, a number of initiatives have अनुमत debit ताश issued in एक country to be used in other countries and allowed उनके use for internet और phone purchases.
Unlike credit and चार्ज cards, payments using a debit card are immediately transferred इससे the cardholder 's designated bank account, instead of them paying the धन back at a later date.
Debit cards usually also allow लिये instant वापसी of cash, acting as the ATM कार्ड for withdrawing नकदी.
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities to customers, where a ग्राहक can withdraw cash along with their purchase.
Francois Henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( September 26, 1914 - January 23, 2011 ) was an American fitness, exercise, और nutritional expert and motivational स्पीकर who is sometimes called `` the godfather of fitness '' और the `` पहला फ़िटनेस superhero. ''
He वर्णित himself as being a `` sugarholic '' and a `` junk food junkie '' until he was 15.
He भी had behavioral problems, but `` turned his life around '' after listening to a public lecture by Paul Bragg, a well-known nutrition speaker.
दौरान his करियर, he came to believe that the country 's overall स्वास्थ्य depended on the health of its population, लिखने that `` शारीरिक culture and nutrition — is the salvation of America. ''
Decades before स्वास्थ्य and fitness began being promoted by celebrities जैसे Jane Fonda and Richard Simmons, LaLanne थी already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of नियमित exercise and a good आहार.
He published numerous books on fitness and hosted a fitness टेलीविज़न show between 1953 and 1985.
As early as 1936, at age 21, he opened एक of the nation 's पहला fitness gyms in Oakland, California, which became a prototype लिये दर्जनों of similar gyms using his name.
One of his 1950s television exercise programs was aimed toward women, whom he भी encouraged to join his health clubs.
He invented a क्रमांक of exercise machines, including leg-extension and pulley devices.
besides producing उसके own श्रेणी of वीडियो, he coached the elderly and disabled not to forgo exercise, believing it would enable them to enhance their strength.
LaLanne भी gained recognition for his success as a bodybuilder, as well as for his prodigious feats of strength.
Arnold Schwarzenegger once stated, `` That जोकर LaLanne 's an एनिमल !, '' after LaLanne, at 54, beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an अनौपचारिक contest.
on the अवसर of LaLanne 's मौत, Schwarzenegger credited lalanne for being `` an apostle लिये fitness '' by प्रेरणादायी `` billions all over the world to live healthier lives, '' and, as governor of California, था earlier लगाई him on his Governor 's Council on Physical Fitness.
स्टीव Reeves credited LaLanne as उसके प्रेरणा to build his muscular physique जबकि keeping a slim waist.
he was inducted to the California Hall of Fame and रै a star on the हॉलीवुड Walk of Fame.

However, the RAF and the air शक्तियां of many राष्ट्रमंडल countries, or those formerly under a अंग्रेजों influence, उपयोग a different set of बाँधने loosely आधारित on naval equivalents ; लेफ्टिनेंट, कमांडर, Captain and Commodore are prefixed for air फ़ोर्स use with Flight, wing, Group and एयर, respectively ( the पहला three being the इकाई कि they used to कमांड ).
Penélope Cruz Sánchez ( ; born April 28, 1974 ) is a Spanish actress.
Signed by an agent at age 15, she made her acting debut at 16 on television and her feature film debut the following year in Jamón, jamón ( 1992 ), to critical acclaim.
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your Eyes ( 1997 ), The hi-lo Country ( 1999 ), The Girl of अपना Dreams ( 2000 ) and स्त्री on शीर्ष ( 2000 ).
Cruz हासिल recognition for her सीसे roles in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky and Blow.
She रै since built a successful career, appearing in films from a wide range of genres, including the कॉमेडी Waking up in Reno ( 2002 ), the thriller Gothika ( 2003 ), the Christmas movie Noel ( 2004 ), and the action एडवेंचर सहारा ( 2005 ).
She has received critical acclaim for her roles in Volver ( 2006 ) and नौ ( 2009 ) receiving सुनहरी Globe and Academy पुरस्कार nominations for each.
She won the Academy Award for Best supporting Actress in 2008 लिये Vicky Cristina Barcelona.
She was the first Spanish actress in history to receive an Academy Award and the first Spanish actress to receive a star at the Hollywood Walk of कीर्ति.
Cruz रै modeled for कंपनियाँ such as Mango, Ralph Lauren and L'Oréal.

She has donated both her time and धन to charities.
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda और India, where she spent one सप्ताह working for Mother Teresa ; she donated her salary from ' to help fund the late nun 's मिशन.

File Explorer, previously known as खिड़कियाँ Explorer, is a file manager application and also a navigation औजार that is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows operating system from खिड़कियाँ 95 onwards.
It provides a graphical user interface for accessing the संचिका systems.
It is also the घटक of the operating system that presents अनेक user interface items on the मॉनिटर such as the taskbar and desktop.
Controlling the कंप्यूटर is संभावित without Windows Explorer कार्यशील ( लिये उदाहरण, the File | Run कमांड in कार्य Manager on NT-derived संस्करण of Windows will function without it, as होगा commands typed in a command prompt window ).
स्तिथ in the C : \Windows निर्देशिका, it is sometimes referred to as the Windows shell, explorer.exe, or बस “Explorer”.

Interstate 70 ( i-70 ) is an Interstate Highway in the संयुक्त States that runs इससे Interstate 15 near Cove फोर्ट, यूटा, to a Park and Ride near Baltimore, Maryland.
It was the पहला Interstate Highway प्रोजेक्ट in the संयुक्त States.
i-70 approximately traces the path of u.S. Route 40 ( and also the बूढ़ा National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains.
West of the Rockies, the route of i-70 was derived from multiple sources.
I-70 is the fifth longest Interstate Highway, after I-90, I-80, I-40, और I-10.
the construction of I-70 in Colorado and Utah is considered an engineering marvel as the route passes through the आइज़नहावर Tunnel, Glenwood Canyon, and the San राफेल swell.
The Eisenhower Tunnel is the उच्चतम पाइंट along the Interstate Highway system with an elevation of.
The sections of the interstate in मिसौरी and Kansas have laid claim to be the first अंतरराज्यीय in the United States.
Though disputed, the संघीय राजमार्ग Administration has claimed the section of I-70 through Glenwood canyon, completed in 1992, थी the पिछला टुकड़ा of the Interstate Highway प्रणाली, as originally नियोजित, to open to traffic.
Photo of 1999 कुल eclipse
as seen from the Earth, a solar eclipse occurs when the चंद्रमा गुजरता between the सूर्य और Earth, और the Moon fully or partially ब्लॉक ( `` occults `` ) the Sun.
This can happen तभी at new moon, when the Sun and the Moon are in conjunction as seen from Earth in an संरेखण referred to as syzygy.
In a total ग्रहण, the disk of the Sun is fully obscured by the Moon.
In partial and annular eclipses only part of the Sun is obscured.
If the Moon were in a perfectly circular orbit, a little closer to the Earth, and in the same orbital plane, वहीँ would be कुल solar eclipses every single month.
however, the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at more than 5 degrees to Earth 's orbit around the Sun ( देखिए ecliptic ) so its छाया at new moon usually misses Earth.
धरती 's orbit is called the ecliptic plane as the Moon 's कक्षा जरूर cross इस प्लेन in order for an ग्रहण ( both solar as well as lunar ) to occur.
In addition, the Moon 's वास्तविक orbit is elliptical, often लेने it far enough away from धरती कि its apparent size is नहीं large enough to block the Sun totally.
the orbital planes cross each year at a line of nodes resulting in at least two, और up to five, solar eclipses occurring each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses.
However, total solar eclipses are rare at any particular location because totality exists only along a narrow path on Earth 's surface traced by the Moon 's छाया or umbra.
An eclipse is a natural phenomenon.
Nevertheless, in some ancient और modern cultures, solar eclipses have been attributed to अलौकिक causes or regarded as bad शकुनों.
A total solar ग्रहण can be frightening to people जो are unaware of its astronomical स्पष्टीकरण, as the Sun seems to disappear during the day and the sky darkens in a पदार्थ of minutes.
Because it is dangerous to look directly at the सूर्य, observers should उपयोग special नजर protection or indirect viewing techniques जब viewing a partial eclipse, or the partial phases of a कुल eclipse.
it is safe to view the total phase of a कुल solar eclipse with the unaided eye और without protection, however.
लोगों referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles will travel to remote locations to observe or witness predicted central solar eclipses.
A political party ( इससे, Genitive partis, `` part '', `` portion '' ) is a political organization that typically seeks to influence, or entirely control, government policy, usually by nominating candidates with लकीर political views and trying to seat them in राजनैतिक office.
Parties participate in चुनावी campaigns and शैक्षणिक outreach or protest actions.
Parties often espouse an ideology or vision, expressed in a पार्टी कार्यक्रम, bolstered by a written platform with specific लक्ष्य, forming a coalition among disparate interests.
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to the genus Mangifera, consisting of numerous tropical fruiting trees in the flowering plant family Anacardiaceae.
The mango is native to South Asia, from जहाँ it has been distributed worldwide to become one of the सबसे cultivated fruits in the tropics.
While other Mangifera species ( e.g. horse mango, M. foetida ) हैं also grown on a more localized basis, mangifera indica – the 'common आम ' or 'Indian आम ' – is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical और subtropical regions.
It is the national fruit of India, पाकिस्तानी and Philippines.
In several cultures, its fruit और leaves are ritually प्रयुक्त as पुष्पक decorations at weddings, public celebrations और religious ceremonies.
Gill Arnette byrd, < ref name > http : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1961 in San Francisco, California ) is a former professional American football खिलाड़ी.
he was a two समय Pro Bowl cornerback in 1991 and 1992 for the San Diego chargers after graduating from San Jose State University.
byrd थी inducted into the chargers हॉल of Fame in 1998.
He was an all-city running back और defensive वापस at Lowell ऊँची School ( सैन फ्रांसिस्को ), helping to lead the Cardinals to the city championship in उसके वरिष्ठ season of 1978.
World map showing the Tropic of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer, also referred to as the उत्तरी tropic, is the circle of latitude on the Earth कि marks the सबसे northerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead at इसके zenith.
This event occurs once प्रति year, at the time of the June solstice, when the Northern गोलार्ध is tilted toward the Sun to its maximum extent.
it currently ( Year 2013 ) lies at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ उत्तर of the Equator.
इसके Southern Hemisphere बंटवारा, अंकन the most southerly स्थिति at which the Sun may appear directly overhead, is the Tropic of मकर.
These tropics are two of the five major degree उपायों or प्रमुख circles of अक्षांश that mark maps of the Earth, besides the Arctic और Antarctic Circles and the equator.
the positions of these circles of latitude ( other than the Equator ) are dictated by the tilt of the Earth 's axis of रोटेशन relative to the plane of its orbit.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs, and is currently the dominant consumer वीडियो format in Asia, North America, Europe, और ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a dvd drive and an h.262/mpeg-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g., a dvd player, or a computer DVD drive साथ a software DVD player ).
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and ऑडियो of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ).
Typically, the data rate for dvd movies ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, और the bit rate is usually adaptive.
It was first available for retail around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification was निर्मित by DVD Forum and can be obtained from DVD Format/Logo लाइसेंसिंग Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly available, because प्रत्येक subscriber must चिह्न a non-disclosure अनुबंध.
निश्चित information in the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential.
In कम्प्यूटिंग और specifically Internet, a leech is एक जो लाभ, usually deliberately, इससे others ' information or प्रयत्न but does not offer anything in return, or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid होने called a जोंक.
In economics, इस type of behavior is called `` फ़्री सवारी '' and is associated with the फ़्री rider problem.
Depending on context, leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of computer resources, but often instead to लालची use according to etiquette : to wit, using too much of what is freely given without contributing a reasonable amount back to the community कि provides it.
The name derives from the leech, an animal कि sucks रक्त और then tries to leave unnoticed.
अन्य terms are used, such as `` freeloader '', but leech is the सबसे common.
The full त्रिभुज logo, used in various संस्करण from 1970 to 1993.
the United States Postal Service ( USPS ), also known as the पोस्ट Office और U.S. मेल, is an independent agency of the United States संघीय government जिम्मेदार for providing postal service in the United States.
It is one of the few government agencies explicitly प्राधिकृत by the United States Constitution.
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the दूसरी महाद्वीपीय Congress, where Benjamin Franklin थी नियुक्त the first postmaster general.
The cabinet-level पोस्ट दफ्तर विभाग was created in 1792 from Franklin 's operation and रूपांतरित into its current form in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization Act.
The USPS employs over 574,000 मजदूर और operates over 260,000 vehicles.
The USPS is the ऑपरेटर of the largest vehicle fleet in the world.
The USPS is legally obligated to serve all Americans, regardless of geography, at uniform दाम and quality.
the USPS has विशेष अभिगम to अक्षर बाक्स marked `` U.S. Mail '' and personal letterboxes in the United States, but still competes against निजी package डिलीवरी services, such as UPS और FedEx.
The USPS has not सीधे प्राप्त taxpayer-dollars since the जल्दी 1980s with the minor exception of subsidies for costs associated with the disabled and विदेशी मतदाता.
Since the 2006 all-time शिखर mail volume, after which Congress passed the Postal Accountability and Enhancement Act ``, ( which mandated $ 5.5 billion प्रति year to be paid into an account to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 years into the भविष्य, a requirement अद्वितीय among organizations और businesses in the U.S. ), revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail आवाज़, prompting the postal service to look to other sources of revenue while cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit.
Washington, d.C. has been the capital of the United राज्य since 1800.
Eight other cities have परोसा as the meeting प्लेस for कॉंग्रेस and हैं therefore considered to have once been the capital of the United States.
in addition, each of the 50 U.S. states and the पाँच principal territories of the United States maintains its अपना capital.
राजकुमारी cut डायमंड नियत in a रिंग
The राजकुमारी cut is the second सबसे popular cut shape for diamonds, next to a round brilliant.
The face-up shape of the princess cut is square or rectangular and the प्रोफ़ाइल or side-on shape is similar to that of an inverted pyramid with four beveled sides.
the princess काटें is a relatively new diamond cut, having been created in the 1960s.
it has gained in popularity in recent years as a more distinctive alternative to the more popular round brilliant cut, in which the top of diamond, called the क्राउन, is cut with a round face-up shape और the bottom, पुकारा the pavilion, is shaped समान to a cone.
A राजकुमारी cut साथ the same width as the diameter of a round brilliant will weigh अधिक as it has four corners which would otherwise have been cut off और rounded to form a round brilliant.
The राजकुमारी काटें is sometimes referred to as a square modified brilliant.
However, while displaying the वही high degree of brilliance, its faceting style is unique and completely different from कि of a round brilliant.
The राजकुमारी cut था इसके origins in the early `` French '' cut, having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or `` क्रॉस '' cut crown and a series of अद्वितीय, chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion which combine to give a पृथक cross-shaped reflection when the stone is viewed directly through the table.
Effectively, the Princess काटें combines the high degree of light return of a round brilliant cut with a distinctive square or rectangular shape.
The वर्गाकार princess cut diamond is usually slightly सस्ता than गोलाकार शानदार cut diamonds of the same carat वज़न because it retains about 80 % of the अशिष्ट diamond, as opposed to the round brilliant जिससे retains only about 50 % of the अशिष्ट.
The ability to retain अधिक crystal वज़न makes this shape popular amongst diamond cutters.
Accredited gem Appraisers ( AGA ) और American Gem Society Laboratory ( AGSL ) and European Gem laboratories-usa ( EGL-USA ) are फिलहाल the only labs that grade the राजकुमारी काटें for cut.
There is no universal definition of what माप make an ideal princess cut diamond and many diamond manufacturers market आदर्श diamonds साथ differing facet पैटर्न and angles as `` ideal काटें ''.
In contrast to the AGSL, AGA, and egl-usa the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has stated कि there is नहीं enough industry consensus or empirical data to specify cut grading मानकों for राजकुमारी cut diamonds and to do so is at the risk of consumers जो may be deceived by diamonds accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut ग्रेड.
The name `` राजकुमारी Cut '' was originally प्रयुक्त in connection साथ another diamond cut, otherwise known as the `` Profile '' cut, designed by Arpad Nagy, a London cutter, in 1961.
The वही name थी बाद used and made popular by ygal पर्लमैन, Betzalel Ambar, और Israel Itzkowitz in इसराईल in 1979.
A similar cut with only 49 facets, as opposed to the original 58 facets of the princess काटें, was later branded the `` Quadrillion '' और initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in लॉस Angeles.
Three years of optical research yielded a square स्टोन साथ faceting similar to that of a गोलाकार brilliant काटें diamond.
A Comparison
The number of chevrons can affect the overall outlook of a princess cut diamond.
इस can usually be determined by the तार diagram that is plotted in diamond grading रिपोर्ट्स.
By adding अधिक chevrons on the pavilion side of the diamond, the individual facets of the डायमंड होगा now be टूटा down into छोटी facets.
As a result, it can दे a princess cut diamond a `` crushed ice '' look.
Vice versa, when a princess cut diamond has lesser chevrons, it tends to give the diamond a chunky outlook due to broader facets.
The घरेलू श्वान ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the gray wolf ( Canis lupus ), a member of the Canidae family of the mammalian order Carnivora.
The term `` domestic dog '' is generally used लिये both domesticated and feral varieties.
The dog रै been the first animal to be domesticated and has महरूम the most widely kept working, शिकार, और pet animal in human history.
The शब्द `` dog '' may also mean the पुरूष of a canine species, as opposed to the word `` bitch '' for the female of the species.
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage और the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000 years ago लकिन,, the oldest fossil specimens genetically linked to the modern श्वान 's lineage तिथि to लगभग 33,000-36,000 years ago.
Dogs ' value to जल्दी human hunter-gatherers led to उन्हें quickly becoming ubiquitous across world संस्कृतियों.
कुत्तो perform अनेक roles लिये लोगों, ऐसे as शिकार, herding, pulling loads, protection, assisting police and military, companionship, और, अधिक recently, aiding handicapped individuals.
This impact on human society has given them the nickname `` man 's Best Friend '' in the पश्चिमी world.
In some संस्कृतियों, dogs are also a सोर्स of meat.
In 2001, there were estimated to be 400 million कुत्तो in the world.
Most breeds of dogs are at most a few सौ years old, having been artificially selected for particular morphologies and व्यवहार by people for specific functional roles.
Through this selective breeding, the dog has developed into hundreds of varied breeds, and shows more behavioral and morphological variation than any other land mammal.
For example, ऊँचाई measured to the withers ranges इससे in the Chihuahua to परिचय in the Irish Wolfhound ; color varies from श्वेत through grays ( usually called `` blue '' ) to black, and browns from light ( tan ) to dark ( `` red '' or `` chocolate '' ) in a wide variation of patterns ; coats can be short or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, straight, curly, or smooth.
It is common for सबसे breeds to शेड this coat.
Diagram of a transmission electron microscope
A 1973 Siemens electron microscope, Musée des Arts et métiers, Paris
An electron सूक्ष्मदर्शी ( EM ) is a type of microscope that uses an electron beam to illuminate a नमूना and produce a magnified image.
an EM रै वृहद resolving power than a light microscope and can reveal the structure of smaller objects because electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible लाइट photons.
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal light microscopes हैं सीमित by diffraction to about 200 nm resolution and useful magnifications below 2000x.
The electron microscope uses electrostatic and electromagnetic lenses to control the electron beam and focus it to form an image.
ये electron optical lenses are analogous to the glass lenses of a light ऑप्टिकल microscope.
Electron microscopes are used to investigate the ultrastructure of a wide दायरा of biological and inorganic specimens including microorganisms, cells, large molecules, biopsy samples, metals, and crystals.
Industrially, the इलेक्ट्रॉन microscope is often प्रयुक्त लिये quality control and failure analysis.
Modern electron microscopes produce electron micrographs, using specialized digital cameras or frame grabbers to capture the image.
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a कड़ी of fried chicken तेज़ food restaurants founded in 1972 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as popeyes Chicken & Biscuits or Popeyes Chicken & Seafood, It was acquired by Sandy Springs, जॉर्जिया -based AFC Enterprises, originally America 's Favorite मुर्गा Company, in 1993.
According to a company press release dated जून 29, 2007, Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service chicken restaurant group, measured by number of units '', साथ more than 1,800 restaurants in more than 40 states और the District of Columbia, and over 22 countries worldwide including Turkey, Northern Cyprus, बहरीन, China, हांग Kong, इराकी, Indonesia, जॉर्डन, कुवैत, United अरब Emirates, Japan, Malaysia, Saudi अरब, South Korea, Singapore, Canada, Jamaica, गुयाना, सूरीनाम, Mexico, Trinidad, Puerto Rico, होंडुरास, वियतनाम, Panama, Peru, and Costa Rica.
About thirty स्थितियाँ are company-owned, the rest franchised.
The leg press is a weight training exercise in which the individual pushes a weight or resistance away इससे them using उनके legs.
The term leg press also refers to the apparatus used to perform इस exercise.
The लेग press can be used to evaluate an athlete 's overall lower body strength ( from घुटना joint to hip ).
using the diagonal sled-type leg दबायें machine.
There हैं two main types of leg press:
The diagonal or लंबवत 'sled ' type leg press.
Weight disks ( plates ) are attached directly to the sled, जिससे is mounted on rails.
The user sits below the sled and pushes it upward साथ their feet.
ये machines normally include adjustable safety brackets कि prevent the user from being trapped under the weight.
The 'cable ' type leg press, or 'seated leg press ', commonly found on multigyms.
The user sits upright और pushes forward with उनके feet onto a plate that is attached to the weight stack by means of a long steel केबल.
Wendy Williams Hunter ( born वेन्डी Joan Williams ; July 18, 1964 ) is an American media personality, actress और author.

`` दे me liberty, or give me death ! '' is a quotation attributed to Patrick हेनरी from a speech he made to the वर्जिनिया सम्मेलन.
On कि day, at St. John 's गिरिजाघर in Richmond, Virginia, और is credited साथ having swung the balance in convincing the Virginia House of Burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary युद्ध.
Among the delegates to the convention were future US Presidents Thomas Jefferson and George Washington.
Newfoundland and Labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada.
Situated in the country 's Atlantic प्रदेश, it incorporates the island of Newfoundland and mainland labrador to the उत्तरपश्चिम, with a संयुक्त area of.
In 2011, the province 's population was 514,536.
Approximately 92 percent of the province 's population जीवनदान on the Island of Newfoundland ( including its associated smaller islands ), of which more than half live on the Avalon Peninsula.
The province is Canada 's most linguistically homogenous, with 97.6 % of निवासियों रिपोर्टिंग English ( Newfoundland English ) as their mother tongue in the 2006 census ;.
Historically, Newfoundland was also home to अद्वितीय किस्में of French, and Irish, as well as the now-extinct beothuk language.
In Labrador, local dialects of innu-aimun और inuktitut are also spoken.
Newfoundland and Labrador 's पूंजी and largest नगर, St. जॉन 's, is कनाडा 's 20th-largest जनसांख्यिकी Metropolitan Area, and is घर to almost 40 प्रतिशत of the province 's population.
St. John 's is the seat of सरकारी, home to the House of Assembly of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and Labrador and the highest अदालत in the jurisdiction, the Newfoundland and Labrador Court of अपील.
A former उपनिवेश and dominion of the United Kingdom, Newfoundland and Labrador became the tenth province to enter the Canadian Confederation on March 31, 1949, as Newfoundland.
On December 6, 2001, an amendment was made to the Constitution of Canada to change the province 's official name to Newfoundland और Labrador.
in day-to-day conversation, however, Canadians generally स्टिल refer to the प्रांत itself as Newfoundland and to the region on the Canadian mainland as Labrador.
Theodore `` t.r. ''
Roosevelt, jr. ( ; October 27, 1858—january 6, 1919 ) was the 26th President of the United States ( 1901–1909 ).
He is noted for his exuberant व्यक्तित्व, दायरा of interests and achievements, and his leadership of the प्रगतिशील Movement, as well as his `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity.
He थी a leader of the Republican Party and founder of the पहला incarnation of the short-lived Progressive ( `` Bull Moose '' ) Party of 1912.
Before becoming President, he held offices at the city, state, और federal स्तर.
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist, explorer, hunter, लेखक, and soldier हैं as much a part of his कीर्ति as any office he held as a politician.
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of the United States in 1901, making him the youngest president कभी ; he beat out the youngest elected president, John F. Kennedy, by only one year.
Roosevelt was also the first of only three बैठे presidents to have जीती the Nobel Peace पुरस्कार.
The Teddy bear is named after him, despite his अवमानना लिये being called `` Teddy ''.
Born into a wealthy family in New York नगर, रूज़वेल्ट was a sickly child who suffered इससे asthma and stayed at home studying natural history.
To overcome उसके physical weakness, he embraced a strenuous life.
Home-schooled, he became an eager student of nature.
he attended Harvard विश्वविद्यालयों, where he studied जीवविज्ञान, boxed and developed an interest in नवल affairs.
In 1881, एक year out of Harvard, he was elected to the New York राज्य सभा, where he became a leader of the reform faction of his रिपब्लिकन Party ( the `` GOP '' ).
उसके The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established his professional प्रतिष्ठा as a serious historian ; he wrote numerous books on hunting, the outdoors, and current political मुद्दे, as खूब as frontier history.
in 1884, his first wife and his mother died on the same day.
He temporarily left politics and went to the frontier, becoming a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas.
Returning to New York City, he ran for mayor in 1886, finishing third साथ 60,000 मत.
he later gained fame by taking vigorous charge of the city पुलिस.
At the नेशनल level, he थी a leader in civil service reform.
the Spanish–American युद्ध broke आउट in 1898 while Roosevelt was, effectively, running the Department of the Navy.
He promptly resigned and formed the अशिष्ट Riders – a volunteer cavalry regiment that fought in क्यूबा.
the war नायिका was elected governor in 1898 and in 1900 was nominated for vice अध्यक्ष.
He सफलतापूर्वक energized the GOP आधार as a highly दृश्य campaigner to reelect President William McKinley on a platform of high tariffs, the gold standard, imperialism, prosperity at home and victory विदेश.
In 1901, President William McKinley was assassinated and Roosevelt became President.
He attempted to move the रिपब्लिकन Party ( GOP ) toward Progressivism, including trust busting और increased regulation of businesses.
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended to the Presidency ( from the vice-presidency ) upon the death of his पूर्ववर्ती, winning the largest percentage of the लोकप्रिय vote since the uncontested election of 1820.
Roosevelt coined the phrase `` Square Deal `` to describe his domestic agenda, emphasizing that the average citizen would get a fair share under उसके नीतियों.
As an outdoorsman and naturalist, he promoted the conservation movement.
On the world stage, Roosevelt 's policies यहूद characterized by his slogan, `` बोलो softly and carry a big stick ``.
A cousin is a relative with जिसको a person shares one or more common ancestor ( s ) ( अन्य than a parent, child/descendant, sibling, child/descendant of a सहोदर, or sibling of a parent/ancestor ).
however in आम parlance, `` cousin '' normally specifically अर्थात् `` first cousin ''.
Systems of `` degrees '' and `` removals '' हैं प्रयुक्त in the English-speaking संसार to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the व्यापक sense ) and the ancestor they have in common.
Various सरकारी entities have established systems लिये legal use that can more precisely specify kinships with common ancestors existing any number of generations in the past, though common usage often eliminates the degrees and removals और refers to लोगों with common ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` रिश्तेदारों ''.
वेबस्टर is an American हालात comedy that aired on ABC इससे September 16, 1983 जबतक May 8, 1987, और in first-run syndication from सितंबर 21, 1987 until March 10, 1989.
The श्रेणी was created by Stu Silver.
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy who, after खोने उसके अभिभावक, is adopted by his NFL -pro गॉडफादर, portrayed by Alex Karras, और his new socialite wife, निभाई by Susan Clark.
The focus was largely on how this impulsively married couple had to adjust to their new lives and sudden parenthood, but it was the congenial Webster himself who drove much of the plot.
The series was produced by Georgian Bay Ltd., emmanuel Lewis Entertainment Enterprises, inc. ( 1986-1989 ) और Paramount Television.

Three types of cell division
कोशिका division is the process by which a जनक cell divides into two or अधिक daughter cells.
कोशिका division usually occurs as part of a larger cell cycle.
In eukaryotes, there are दो पृथक type of cell division : a vegetative division, whereby each daughter cell is genetically identical to the parent कोशिका ( mitosis ), and a reductive कोशिका division, whereby the क्रमांक of chromosomes in the daughter cells is reduced by हाफ, to उपज अगुणित gametes ( meiosis ).
Both of these कोशिका division cycles are जरूरी in sexually reproducing organisms at some point in their life cycle, and both are believed to be present in the last eukaryotic common ancestor Prokaryotes also undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary परिवर्द्धन, where उनके जेनेटिक सामग्री is segregated equally into दो बेटी कोशिकाएं.
All कोशिका divisions, regardless of organism, are preceded by a single round of DNA replication.
For simple एककोशिकीय organisms such as the amoeba, one cell division is equivalent to reproduction – an entire new organism is निर्मित.
On a larger scale, mitotic कोशिका प्रभाग can create progeny from multicellular organisms, such as plants that grow from cuttings.
Cell प्रभाग also enables sexually reproducing organisms to develop from the one-celled zygote, which itself was produced by cell division from gametes.
और बाद growth, cell division allows for continual construction and repair of the organism.
A human being 's body अनुभवों about 10,000 trillion cell divisions in a lifetime.
Cell division has been modeled by finite subdivision rules.
the primary concern of cell division is the maintenance of the original cell 's genome.
Before division can occur, the genomic information that is stored in chromosomes जरूर be replicated, and the duplicated genome जरूर be अलग cleanly between cells.
a great deal of cellular infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic information consistent between `` generations ''.

Howard Jones ( born John Howard Jones, 23 February 1955, Southampton, Hampshire, England ) is a अंग्रेजों musician, singer and songwriter.
According to the Guinness Book of British Hit Singles & Albums, `` जोन्स is an accomplished singer-songwriter who थी a regular chart visitor in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop.
Jones, who was equally popular in the U.S., appeared at सजीव Aid ``.
Allmusic journalist, Stephen Thomas Erlewine adds, `` Jones was one of the defining figures of mid-1980s synthpop.
His music मिलाया the technology intensive ध्वनि of New Wave with the cheery optimism of hippies और late 1960s pop.
Jones racked up a string of hits in the mid and late 1980s, before he retreated into being a cult figure in the 1990s ''.
the International Isle of Man TT ( Tourist Trophy ) Race is a मोटरसाइकिल रेसिंग event held on the आइल of Man and थी for अनेक years the सबसे prestigious motorcycle race in the संसार.
The event was part of the FIM Motorcycle Grand Prix World Championship during the काल 1949–1976 before being transferred to the United Kingdom after safety concerns and run by the FIM as the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season.
the आइल of Man TT दौड़ became भाग of the TT Formula 1 चैंपियनशिप from 1977 to 1990 to preserve the event 's रेसिंग status.
From 1989 the racing रै been developed by the Isle of Man Department of Tourism as the Isle of man TT Festival.
The रेस is run in a time-trial format on public roads बंद for रेसिंग by the provisions of an Act of Tynwald ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ).
The first race was आयोजित on मंगलवार 28 may 1907 and was called the International Auto-Cycle Tourist ट्रॉफी.
The event was organised by the Auto-Cycle Club over 10 laps of the St John 's छोटी Course of 15 miles 1,470 yards लिये road-legal touring motorcycles साथ exhaust silencers, saddles, pedals and mud-guards.
the winner of the single-cylinder class, and overall winner of the first event in 1907, was Charlie Collier riding a matchless motorcycle in a time of 4 hours, 8 minutes and 8 सेकेंड at an average race speed of 38.21 mph.
the winner of the twin-cylinder class was Rem Fowler riding a Peugeot engined Norton in a time of 4 hours 21 minutes और 52 seconds at an average race speed of 36.21 mph.
The ट्रॉफी presented to Charlie Collier as the विजेता of the 1907 Isle of Man tt Race, was donated by the Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars.
It featured a stylised version of Olympic God Hermes by Giovanni Da Bologna as a चांदी figurine astride a winged wheel.
The trophy was similar in डिज़ाइन to the 18 कैरेट gold Montague Trophy presented to John Napier ( Arrol-Johnston ) as the inaugural winner of the आइल of man Tourist Trophy car race in 1905 now ज्ञात as the RAC Tourist ट्रॉफी.
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars Trophy is अभी presented annually to the winner of the Isle of man वरिष्ठ TT Motor-Cycle Race.
The 2007 Isle of Man TT was the centenary event which ran between 26 May and 8 June 2007 and featured a special Re-enactment of the 1907 Isle of Man TT Race held on the village green next to Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007.
The vintage parade of 100 क्लासिक motorcycles for the Centenary Re-enactment on the असली St जॉन 's Short कोर्स थी flagged away by पूर्व World motor-cycle Champion ज्यॉफ ड्यूक.
The first of the participants to be flagged away was the recently लौटी twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by Rem Fowler during the पहला Isle of Man tt Race in 1907.
भी participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT race competitor Guy मार्टिन riding a 1938 Triumph Tiger 100 500 cc and other former TT competitors including Alan Cathcart, Sammy Miller, Nick Jefferies and Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment गोद.
