Unemployment ( or joblessness ) occurs when people हैं बगैर work और actively seeking work.
The unemployment rate is a measure of the prevalence of unemployment and it is calculated as a percentage by dividing the number of unemployed individuals by सब individuals currently in the labor फ़ोर्स.
During periods of recession, an economy usually अनुभवों a relatively high unemployment rate.
According to अंतरराष्ट्रीय Labour Organization report, अधिक than 197 million people globally are out of work or 6 % of the world 's workforce यहूद without a job in 2012.
वहीँ remains considerable theoretical debate regarding the causes, consequences and solutions for बेरोजगारी.
Classical अर्थशास्त्र, New classical economics, and the Austrian School of economics argue कि market mechanisms are reliable means of resolving unemployment.
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the labor market from the outside, such as unionization, न्यूनतम मजदूरी कानून, taxes, और other regulations that they अर्जी discourage the hiring of workers.
Keynesian economics emphasizes the cyclical nature of unemployment और recommends government interventions in the economy that it claims will reduce unemployment दौरान recessions.
This theory focuses on recurrent shocks that suddenly reduce aggregate माँग for goods and services and thus reduce demand for workers.
Keynesian models recommend government interventions designed to increase demand for workers ; these can include financial stimuli, publicly funded job creation, and expansionist monetary नीतियों.
In addition to these comprehensive theories of unemployment, वहीँ are a few categorizations of unemployment that are used to more precisely model the प्रभाव of unemployment within the economic प्रणाली.
The main types of unemployment शामिल structural unemployment which focuses on संरचनात्मक problems in the economy और inefficiencies inherent in श्रमिक markets, including a mismatch between the supply और demand of laborers with necessary skill सेट.
Structural arguments emphasize causes and solutions related to disruptive technologies and globalization.
Discussions of frictional बेरोजगारी focus on voluntary decisions to कार्य based on each individuals ' valuation of their own work and कैसा कि compares to वर्तमान wage rates plus the time और effort required to find a job.
Causes and solutions for frictional unemployment often पता job entry threshold और wage rates.
Behavioral अर्थशास्त्रियों highlight individual biases in निर्णय making, और often involve problems and solutions concerning sticky मजदूरी और efficiency wages.
Collectivism is कोई philosophic, political, religious, economic, or सोशल आउटलुक that emphasizes the interdependence of every human होने in a society or civilization.
Collectivism is a मौलिक cultural element कि exists as the reverse of individualism in human nature ( in the वही way high context संस्कृति exists as the reverse of कम context संस्कृति ).
Collectivist orientations stress the importance of cohesion within social groups ( such as an `` in-group '', in what specific context it is defined ) and in some cases, the priority of group goals over individual goals.
Collectivists often focus on community, society, स्वदेश or देश.
it has been used as an तत्व in many different और diverse types of government and political, economic and educational तत्त्वज्ञान throughout इतिहास और सबसे human societies in practice contain elements of दोनो individualism और collectivism.
Some examples of collectivist cultures include India and Japan.
Collectivism can be divided into horizontal collectivism and vertical collectivism.
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among equal individuals, and is यूँ usually based on decentralization and egalitarianism.
Vertical collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of power और on moral और cultural conformity, and is therefore based on centralization and पदानुक्रम.
A सहकारी enterprise would be an example of horizontal collectivism, whereas a military hierarchy would be an example of vertical collectivism.
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( ADEM ) is an immune mediated disease of the brain.
It प्रायः occurs following a viral infection but may appear following vaccination, bacterial or parasitic संक्रमण, or even appear spontaneously.
as it involves autoimmune demyelination, it is similar to अनेक काठिन्य, and is माना भाग of the Multiple sclerosis borderline diseases.
the incidence रेट is about 8 प्रति 1,000,000 people per year.
Although it occurs in all ages, most reported मामले हैं in children and adolescents, with the average age around 5 to 8 years old.
The mortality rate may be as high as 5 %, full रिकवरी is seen in 50 to 75 % of cases, while up to 70 to 90 % recover with some नाबालिग residual disability.
The average time to recover is one to छह months.
ADEM produces multiple inflammatory lesions in the brain and spinal cord, particularly in the white matter.
प्रायः these are found in the subcortical and central white matter और cortical gray-white जंक्शन of both दिमागी hemispheres, cerebellum, brainstem, and स्पाइनल cord, लकिन periventricular white matter और धूसर matter of the cortex, thalami and basal ganglia may also be शामिल.
जब the patient पीड़ित more than एक demyelinating episode, it is called recurrent disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ).
The stomach is a muscular, hollow, dilated part of the digestion system which functions as an महत्वपूर्ण अंग of the digestive ट्रैक्ट in कुछ animals, सहित vertebrates, echinoderms, insects ( mid-gut ), and molluscs.
It is involved in the second phase of पाचन, following mastication ( chewing ).
the stomach is located between the ग्रासनाल and the small आंत.
It secretes protein-digesting enzymes called protease and strong acids to aid in खाना digestion, ( sent to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through smooth muscular contortions ( पुकारा segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the छोटी intestines.
The word stomach is derived from the Latin stomachus which is derived from the Greek word stomachos ( στόμαχος ), ultimately from stoma ( ), `` मुँह ''.
The words gastro- and gastric ( meaning सम्बन्धित to the stomach ) are both निकला from the Greek word gaster ( ).
1940 Pontiac Special Series 25 woodie
A woodie is a car body style, especially a station wagon, where the rear bodywork is constructed of लकडी फ्रेमवर्क with infill panels of wood or painted metal.
After the demise of actual wood construction, manufacturers प्रयुक्त simulated woodgrain sheet vinyl—sometimes augmented with three-dimensional, अनुकरण framework—to recall wood construction.
In 2008, wood construction was evoked abstractly on the Ford Flex with a श्रेणी of side and rear आड़ा grooves.
A pearl is a hard object produced within the soft tissue ( specifically the mantle ) of a living shelled mollusc.
बस like the shell of a clam, a pearl is made up of कैल्सियम carbonate in minute crystalline form, which has been deposited in concentric परतों.
The ideal पर्ल is perfectly गोलाकार and smooth, but many other shapes of pearls ( बरॉक pearls ) occur.
The finest quality प्राकृतिक pearls have been highly valued as रत्नों and objects of सौंदर्य for many centuries, और because of this, the word pearl has become a metaphor लिये something बहुत rare, ठीक, admirable, and valuable.
The most मूल्यवान मोती occur spontaneously in the wild, लकिन they are extremely rare.
ये जंगली pearls are referred to as natural मोती.
Cultured or farmed pearls from pearl oysters and freshwater mussels make up the majority of those कि are currently sold.
Imitation pearls are भी widely sold in inexpensive आभूषण, but the quality of their iridescence is usually very poor, and often, artificial pearls are easily distinguished from वास्तविक मोती.
Pearls have been harvested and cultivated primarily for use in jewelry, but in the past they were भी सिले onto lavish clothing.
Pearls have also been कुचल और प्रयुक्त in कॉस्मेटिक्स, medicines, and in paint formulations.
whether जंगली or संस्कारी, gem quality pearls are लगभग सदा nacreous and, as is the interior of the shell that produces them.
However, almost all species of shelled molluscs are capable of producing मोती ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by some sources ) of lesser shine or less spherical shape.
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological labs and also under U.S. Federal Trade Commission rules, and are formed in the same way, most of them have no मान, except as curiosities.
Bing ( known previously as Live ढूंढें, Windows सजीव Search, and MSN Search ) is a web search engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine `` ) from microsoft.
Bing was unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer on may 28, 2009 at the All Things Digital conference in San Diego for रिलीज on June 1.
Notable परिवर्तन include the listing of search suggestions while queries are entered and a list of सम्बन्धित searches ( called `` Explore pane '' ) based on semantic technology from Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008.
On July 29, 2009, Microsoft and Yahoo ! announced a deal in which Bing would power याहू ! Search.
All Yahoo ! Search वैश्विक ग्राहक and साझेदार हैं expected to have made the transition by early 2012.
in October 2011, Bing announced it was working on new back-end search infrastructure, with the goal of delivering faster and slightly more प्रासंगिक search परिणाम for उपयोक्ता.
Known as `` बाघ '', the new index-serving technology रै been incorporated into bing globally, since August 2011.
In May 2012, Bing घोषित another redesign of its search engine कि includes `` साइडबार '', a social feature that searches users ' सोशल संजाल for information प्रासंगिक to the search क्वैरी.
A diagram showing an I गठन on offense and a 4-3 गठन on defense
in American football, each team रै eleven players on the field at one time.
The specific भूमिका that a player takes on the field is called their position.
Under the modern rules of American football, teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions, that is teams may change any number of players after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the टोली with the ball, who is trying to score ), the defense ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring, and to take the ball from उन्हें ), and the special टीमों ( जो play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, various specific positions exist depending on what the player 's main जॉब is.
The Irish people ( or na hÉireannaigh ; ulster-scots : Airish fowk ) हैं an ethnic समूह who originate in Ireland, an island in northwestern Europe.
आयरलैंड has been populated लिये around 9,000 years ( according to पुरातत्व studies, see प्रागैतिहासिक Ireland ).
The Irish people 's earliest पूर्वजो are recorded in legends – they हैं claimed to be descended from groups such as the nemedians, Fomorians, Fir Bolg, Tuatha dé danann and the Milesians.
Lebor gabála Érenn, a book of Irish mythology tells that milesians यहूद स्काइथियन वंशजों.
The प्रमुख groups कि interacted with the Irish in the Middle Ages include the Picts, Scots, and the वाइकिंग्स.
Due to this contact, icelanders हैं noted for having some Irish descent.
The Anglo-Norman आक्रमण of the High Middle आयु, the अंग्रेज़ी plantations और the subsequent अंग्रेज़ी नियम of the country introduced the normans and Flemish into Ireland.
Welsh, Picts, Bretons, and small parties of Gauls and even Anglo-Saxons are ज्ञात in आयरलैंड इससे much earlier टाइम्स.
वहीँ have महरूम many notable Irish people throughout history.
The 6th century Irish monk and missionary Columbanus is regarded as one of the `` fathers of Europe '', followed by Kilian of Würzburg and vergilius of साल्जबर्ग.
The scientist रॉबर्ट Boyle is considered the `` father of रसायन ``.
Famous आयरिश explorers include Brendan the Navigator, Robert mcclure, अर्नेस्ट Shackleton and Tom crean.
By कुछ accounts, the first European child born in North America had Irish descent on both sides ; and an Irishman was the first European to set पैर on American मृदा in Columbus ' expedition of 1492.
There are descendants of Irish people living in many western countries, particularly in English-speaking countries.
historically, emigration has been caused by politics, famine और economic issues.
An estimated 50 to 80 million people हैं descendants of आयरिश people, primarily in the United Kingdom, the United States, Australia, Canada and Iceland ; there are भी smaller संख्याएँ in Argentina, Chile, Mexico, Jamaica, Barbados, South Africa, New जीलैंड, France, जर्मनी और Brazil.
The largest number of descendants of Irish लोगों live in the United राज्य.
The number of people living in Australia who are of Irish descent is higher, as a प्रतिशत of total population, than that of any other country.
Approximately forty percent of the settlement population of Iceland came from Ireland or Scotland.
The very first inhabitants of Iceland were Irish.
The Hubble Space दूरदर्शी ( HST ) is a space telescope कि थी carried into orbit by a स्पेस Shuttle in 1990 and remains in आपरेशन.
a aperture telescope in low Earth orbit, Hubble 's four main instruments observe in the near पराबैंगनी, visible, and near infrared.
the telescope is named बाद the astronomer Edwin Hubble.
Hubble 's orbit outside the distortion of Earth 's atmosphere allows it to take extremely sharp images with almost no background light.
Hubble 's गहन Field have महरूम some of the most detailed visible-light images ever, allowing a deep view into space and time.
Many Hubble observations have led to breakthroughs in astrophysics, such as accurately determining the rate of विस्तार of the universe.
Although not the first स्पेस दूरदर्शी, Hubble is one of the largest and most बहुमुखी, और is well known as दोनो a vital research tool and a पब्लिक संबंध बून for astronomy.
the HST was built by the संयुक्त States space agency NASA, with contributions from the European Space एजेंसी, और is operated by the Space Telescope Science Institute.
the hst is one of नासा 's Great Observatories, along with the कॉम्पटन Gamma Ray Observatory, the Chandra X-ray Observatory, and the Spitzer Space Telescope.
स्पेस telescopes were proposed as early as 1923.
Hubble was वित्तपोषित in the 1970s, साथ a proposed launch in 1983, लकिन the प्रोजेक्ट थी घिरा by technical delays, budget problems, और the Challenger विपत्ति.
जब finally launched in 1990, scientists found that the main mirror had महरूम ground incorrectly, compromising the telescope 's सामर्थ्य.
The telescope was restored to its intended विशेषता by a servicing मिशन in 1993.
Hubble is the only दूरदर्शी designed to be serviced in space by astronauts.
Between 1993 and 2002, four missions repaired, upgraded, and replaced systems on the telescope ; a fifth mission was रद्द on safety grounds following the Columbia विपत्ति.
However, after spirited public चर्चा, नासा administrator माइक griffin approved one final servicing mission, समाप्त in 2009 by स्पेस शटल Atlantis.
The दूरदर्शी is now expected to फलन जबतक at least 2013.
Its scientific successor, the James Webb Space दूरदर्शी ( JWST ), is to be launched in 2018 or possibly बाद.
anti-inflammatory refers to the property of a substance or treatment that reduces inflammation.
Anti-inflammatory दवाएँ make up about हाफ of analgesics, remedying pain by reducing inflammation as opposed to opioids, जिससे affect the central बेचैन system.
The Tonight दिखाएँ is a US late-night talk show that has aired on एनबीसी since 1954.
it is the longest currently running regularly scheduled entertainment program in the US and the तीसरा longest-running show on एनबीसी बाद मिलें the Press और आज.
The Tonight दिखाएँ was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ), Jack Paar ( 1957–1962 ), Johnny Carson ( 1962–1992 ), Jay Leno ( 1992–2009, 2010–present ), और Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ).
Several guest hosts भी appeared, particularly during the Paar और Carson eras.
The longest-serving मेजबान to date थी Johnny Carson, who hosted The tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson for 30 seasons from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1992.
The current मेजबान of the show is Jay Leno, जो had previously hosted the show इससे 1992 to 2009 and began his second tenure on March 1, 2010.
On April 3, 2013, NBC घोषित Jimmy Fallon would become the new host of The Tonight Show.
The tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon will premiere February 24, 2014, the day after the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter ओलंपिक.
SS Andrea Doria.
Pronounced was an समंदर liner for the Italian लकीर ( Società di navigazione Italia ) घर ported in Genoa, Italy, most famous for इसके sinking in 1956, when 52 people died ( 51 from तात्कालिक impact ).
Named after the 16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea Doria, the ship had a gross register tonnage of 29,100 and a capacity of about 1,200 passengers and 500 crew.
For a country attempting to rebuild its economy और reputation after World War II, Andrea Doria थी an icon of Italian national pride.
Of all Italy 's जहाजों at the time, Andrea Doria थी the largest, तीव्रतम और supposedly safest.
Launched on 16 June 1951, the जलयान undertook its maiden voyage on 14 January 1953.
On 25 July 1956, while the Andrea Doria was approaching the coast of Nantucket, मैसाचुसेट्स, bound for New यॉर्क City, the eastbound of the स्वीडिश American Line collided with it in what became one of history 's most infamous maritime disasters.
struck in the side, the top-heavy Andrea डोरिया immediately started to list severely to स्टारबोर्ड, जिससे left half of its lifeboats unusable.
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant loss of life, but the efficiency of the ship 's technical design allowed it to stay afloat for over 11 hours बाद the ramming.
the good behavior of the crew, improvements in communications और the रैपिड response of other ships averted a disaster similar in scale to कि of the in 1912.
1,660 passengers and crew यहूद rescued and survived, जबकि 46 people died as a consequence of the collision.
The evacuated luxury लाइनर capsized और sank the following morning.
This accident remains the worst maritime disaster to occur in United States waters since the sinking of the in 1915.
the incident और its aftermath were heavily covered by the news media.
While the बचाव efforts were दोनो successful और commendable, the cause of the collision साथ the स्टॉकहोम and the loss of Andrea Doria उत्पन्न much interest in the media और many lawsuits.
Largely because of an out-of-court उपनिवेश agreement between the two शिपिंग कंपनियाँ during hearings तत्काल after the विपत्ति, no determination of the कारण ( s ) was ever formally published.
हालांकि greater blame appeared initially to fall on the Italian लाइनर, more recent discoveries have indicated that a misreading of radar on the स्वीडिश ship may have initiated the collision course, अग्रणी to errors on both ships.
Andrea Doria was the last major transatlantic यात्री vessel to sink before वायुयान became the preferred method of travel.
Dialysis tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of सेमi- or partially permeable membrane tubing made from regenerated cellulose or cellophane.
It can be प्रयुक्त for diffusion with solutes or परासरण if प्रयुक्त with जल only.
Osmosis is when जल passes through a semi-permeable layer to reach equilibrium.
Diffusion, on the अन्य hand, allows the movement of molecules from high concentration to low विशेषज्ञता.
It will only allow molecules to pass through a semi-permeable membrane or layer if the अणु is small enough to fit through the membrane or a membrane 's pore.
This usually results with the प्रभाव of diffusion through a membrane तभी really affects small molecules, and almost never larger molecules.
Dialysis tubing is used in clinical circumstances to ensure a filtered flow of अणुओं, preventing the प्रवाह of larger solute अणुओं.
छोटी अणुओं can be `` washed '' आउट of a solution जिससे is pumped through the tubing into a solvent, usually water, which surrounds it और in जिससे they can be flushed दूर.
in demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes, a solution containing several types of molecules, usually glucose और starch, is placed into a semi-permeable dialysis bag, such as a cellulose झिल्ली with छिद्र, and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band.
The sealed डायलिसिस थैला is placed in a container of a different solution, or water.
Molecules small enough to pass through the tubing ( water, salts, monosaccharides, and other small molecules ) tend to move into or आउट of the dialysis थैला in the direction of decreasing concentration, therefore displaying diffusion.
Larger molecules ( such as प्रोटीन, or polysaccharides ) कि have dimensions significantly greater than the pore diameter are retained अंदर the dialysis bag.
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic समाधान ( a solution that has a lesser solute concentration than the solution it is संदर्भित to ) will cross a semi-permeable membrane, जैसे डायलिसिस tubing, into a hypertonic solution ( a समाधान that has a higher solute विशेषज्ञता than the solution it is referenced to ) in an attempt to reach equilibrium, जहाँ the solute concentration of each solution is in equilibrium.
Mercury प्रयोगशाला thermometer
A thermometer ( from the Greek, thermos, meaning `` hot '' and μἐτρον, metron, `` measure '' ) is a device कि उपायों तापमान or temperature gradient using a variety of different principles.
A थर्मामीटर has दो important elements : the temperature sensor ( e.g. the बल्ब on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) in which some physical change occurs with temperature, plus some अर्थात् of converting this physical बदलें into a numerical मान ( e.g. the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ).
There are many types and many uses for thermometers, as detailed नीचे in भाग of this article.
Snow White और the Seven Dwarfs is a 1937 अमरीकी animated musical fantasy film उत्पादित by Walt Disney and released by rko Radio Pictures.
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm, it is the first full-length cel animated feature film and the earliest in the Walt डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड Classics श्रेणी.
The story was adapted by storyboard कलाकारों Dorothy Ann Blank, Richard Creedon, मेरिल de मारिस, Otto Englander, Earl Hurd, लंड Rickard, Ted Sears and Webb स्मिथ.
David Hand was the supervising निदेशक, while William Cottrell, Wilfred Jackson, Larry Morey, perce pearce, और बेन Sharpsteen निर्देशित the film 's individual sequences.
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre on December 21, 1937, followed by a nationwide release on February 4, 1938, and साथ international आय of $ 8 लाख during its initial release briefly assumed the record of highest grossing sound फिल्मी at the time.
The popularity of the फिल्मी रै led to it being re-released theatrically many times, until इसके home video release in the 1990s.
Adjusted for inflation, it is one of the top ten performers at the North American box office.
at the 11th Academy Awards, Walt डिज़्नी थी awarded an honorary Oscar, and the film was nominated for Best Musical Score.
It was added to the United States National Film Registry in 1989 and is ranked in the American Film Institute 's सूची of the 100 greatest अमरीकी films, who also named the film as the greatest American animated film of all time in 2008.
Disney 's लो on the fairy टेल has had a big cultural प्रभाव, resulting in a popular theme पार्क attraction, a video game, and a Broadway musical.
Childbirth, labour, delivery, birth, partus, or parturition is the culmination of a pregnancy काल with the expulsion of एक or more नवजात infants from a woman 's uterus.
The process of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour : the shortening और dilation of the cervix, descent and जनम of the शिशु, and जनम of the placenta.
In many cases and साथ increasing frequency, प्रसव is achieved through induction of labor or caesarean section, which is the removal of the neonate through a surgical incision in the abdomen, बल्कि than through vaginal birth.
प्रसव by C-Sections increased 50 % in the U.S. from 1996 to 2006, and comprise nearly 32 % of births in the U.S. और Canada.
With respect to induced labor, more than 22 % of women undergo induction of labour in the संयुक्त States.
Medical professional policy makers find that induced births और elective cesarean can be harmful to the fetus and neonate as खूब as harmful or बगैर benefit to the mother, and have established strict guidelines for non-medically indicated induced births and elective cesarean before 39 weeks.

The show ran for 5 seasons between 2003 और 2005.
Flushed Away is a 2006 british/american computer animated action / adventure comedy फिल्मी निर्देशित by David Bowers and Sam Fell.
It थी बना in the partnership between Aardman Animations and DreamWorks Animation, और is Aardman 's first completely computer-animated विशेषता as opposed to the usual stop-motion.
The film stars the voice talents of Hugh जैकमैन, Kate Winslet, Andy Serkis, Bill Nighy, Ian McKellen, Shane Richie and जां Reno.
The story was by sam Fell, Peter Lord, लंड Clement, and Ian La Frenais, and the screenplay was written by Dick Clement, Ian la Frenais, Christopher Lloyd, Joe Keenan, and William Davies.
The film was released in US on 3 November 2006, and in UK on December 1 2006, and थी वितरित by Paramount Pictures, except for Switzerland, Spain, and the Netherlands, which were handled by सार्वभौमिक तस्वीरें.
The अटलांटा Braves are a professional baseball team based in Atlanta.
The Braves हैं a member of the Eastern Division of प्रमुख लीग Baseball 's National League.
The braves have played in Turner Field चूंकि 1997.
the `` Braves '' name, which थी first used in 1912, originates from a term for a Native American warrior.
वे are nicknamed `` the bravos '', and प्रायः referred to as `` America 's Team `` in reference to the team 's games होने broadcast on the nationally available TBS इससे the 1970s until 2007, gaining a wide fanbase.
From 1991 to 2005 the braves यहूद one of the most कामयाब franchises in baseball, जीतना प्रभाग titles an unprecedented 14 consecutive times in that period ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 season in which there यहूद no official division champions ).
The braves won the NL West 1991–93 and the nl East 1995–2005, और returned to the playoffs as the National League Wild Card in 2010.
the Braves उन्नत to the World Series five times in the 1990s, winning the title in 1995.
Since their debut in the National लीग in 1876, the franchise has won 16 divisional titles, 17 National लीग pennants, as well as three World Series championships—in 1914 as the Boston braves, in 1957 as the Milwaukee Braves, and in 1995 in Atlanta.
the Braves हैं the only MLB मताधिकार to have जीती the World Series in तीन different home cities.
The club is one of the नेशनल League 's दो remaining charter franchises ( the other being the Chicago शावक ) और was founded in Boston, Massachusetts, in 1871 as the Boston Red Stockings ( नहीं to be confused with the American League 's Boston Red Sox ).
They are considered `` the oldest continuously playing team in प्रमुख North अमरीकी खेल. ''
There is an argument as to who is actually पुरानी because although the Cubs are a full season `` older '' ( formed as the Chicago White Stockings in 1870 ) शिकागो lost two seasons to the Great Chicago Fire, thus the braves have played more consecutive seasons.
After various name changes ( such as the Boston Beaneaters ), the team operated as the Boston Braves for most of the first half of the 20th century.
In 1953, the टोली moved to Milwaukee, Wisconsin and became the Milwaukee Braves, followed by the move to अटलांटा in 1966.
the team 's tenure in Atlanta is famous for Hank Aaron breaking बेब रुथ 's career home run record in 1974, हालांकि the majority of Aaron 's home रनों यहूद hit while the team was in Milwaukee.
उसके record stood जबतक 2007, when San Francisco left क्षेत्ररक्षक Barry Bonds broke the record.

3d rendering of a μCT scan of a पत्ता piece, resolution circa 40 μm/ voxel.
a leaf is an अंग of a vascular संयंत्र, as पारिभाषित in botanical terms, and in particular in plant morphology.
Foliage is a mass noun that refers to leaves as a feature of plants.
Typically a leaf is a पतला, flattened अंग borne above ground और specialized for photosynthesis, but अनेक types of leaves are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those terms : some are not flat ( लिये example अनेक succulent leaves और conifers ), some हैं not above ground ( such as bulb scales ), and कुछ हैं without major photosynthetic function ( consider for example cataphylls, spines, और cotyledons ).
Conversely, many structures of non-vascular plants, or भी of some lichens, जिससे हैं not plants at सब ( in the भाव of being members of the kingdom Plantae ), do look and function much like leaves.
furthermore, several structures found in vascular plants dekh like leaves but are not दरअसल leaves ; they differ from leaves in their structures और origins.
Examples शामिल phyllodes, cladodes, and phylloclades.
Title card for the 1937 Our Gang comedy Rushin ' Ballet.
Our Gang ( also known as The Little दुष्टों or एचएएल रोच 's दुष्टों ) are a series of American कॉमेडी short films about a समूह of poor neighborhood children और their adventures.
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach, the श्रेणी is noted लिये showing children behaving in a relatively natural way, as Roach and original director Robert F. mcgowan worked to film the unaffected, raw nuances apparent in नियमित children rather than have them imitate वयस्क acting styles.
In जोड, Our Gang notably put boys, लड़कियों, whites and blacks together in a group as बराबरी, कुछ that `` broke new ground, '' according to फिल्मी historian Leonard Maltin.
Such a thing had never been done before in cinema but has since been repeated after the success of Our Gang.
The first production at the Roach studio in 1922 was a श्रेणी of मूक छोटी subjects.
When Roach changed distributors from Pathé to Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer ( mgm ) in 1927, and परिवर्तित the series to ध्वनि in 1929, the श्रेणी took off even further.
उत्पादन continued at the Roach studio until 1938, when the श्रेणी was sold to MGM, who then continued producing the comedies until 1944.
The Our Gang series includes a कुल of 220 shorts and one feature film, सामान्य Spanky, featuring over forty-one child actors.
As MGM retained the rights to the Our Gang trademark following their purchase of the production rights, the 80 Roach-produced `` talkies '' were syndicated for टेलीविज़न under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955.
दोनो Roach 's The Little Rascals पैकेज ( now owned by CBS टेलीविज़न Distribution ) and MGM 's Our Gang package ( now owned by Warner Bros. Entertainment ) have चूंकि remained in syndication, with periodic new productions based on the shorts surfacing over the सालो, including a 1994 Little Rascals feature film released by Universal Pictures.
Zacharias Janssen ( भी zacharias जानसन or sacharias Jansen ) ( b.1580-88, d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) was a Dutch spectacle-maker इससे Middelburg संबद्ध with the invention of the पहला optical telescope.
Janssen is sometimes also credited for inventing the first truly compound microscope.
However, the origin of the microscope, बस like the origin of the telescope, is a matter of debate.
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is a large freshwater lake in the Sierra Nevada of the United States.
at a surface उन्नयन of, it is located along the किनारा between कैलिफ़ोर्निया and Nevada, west of Carson City.
झील Tahoe is the largest alpine lake in North America.
Its depth is, बनाना it the United State 's second-deepest ( the deepest is crater Lake in ऑरेगॉन, being deeper, at ).
Additionally, झील Tahoe is listed as the 26th largest lake by volume in the world at.
The lake was formed about 2 million years ago और is a भाग of the Lake Tahoe जलाशय साथ the modern lake being shaped during the बर्फ ages.
It is known for the clarity of its जल and the panorama of surrounding mountains on all sides.
The area surrounding the lake is also referred to as Lake Tahoe, or simply Tahoe.
Lake Tahoe is a major tourist attraction in both Nevada and California.
It is home to a number of ski रिसॉर्ट, summer outdoor recreation, and tourist attractions.
Snow and स्कीइंग are a significant part of the area 's economy और प्रतिष्ठा.
Mountain and lake scenery are attractions throughout the year.
The Nevada side also includes large casinos.
Highways provide year-round access from Reno, Carson City, और Sacramento.

the Twenty-seventh amendment ( Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any law कि increases or decreases the सैलरी of members of the Congress इससे taking effect until the प्रारंभ of the next नियत of शर्तें of office for प्रतिनिधि.
it is the most हाल amendment to the United States Constitution.
It was submitted to the states for ratification in 1789 and was adopted in 1992.

The Four Thirds system is a मानक created by Olympus और Kodak for digital single-lens reflex camera ( DSLR ) design and development. < ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a standard that, with डिजिटल cameras and lenses available from multiple manufacturers, allows for the इंटरचेंज of lenses and bodies from different manufacturers.
seems to cover the मानक.
Proponents describe it as an open standard, but companies may तभी use it under a non-disclosure agreement.
नापसंद older slr systems, Four Thirds has been designed from the मैदान up to be entirely डिजिटल.
Many lenses are extensively computerized, to the point that Olympus offers firmware updates लिये many of them.
लेंस design has been tailored to the requirements of digital sensors, most notably through telecentric designs.
The size of the सेंसर is significantly छोटी than for most DSLRs and this implies that lenses, especially telephoto lenses, can be smaller.
For उदाहरण, a चार Thirds lens with a 300 mm focal length would cover about the same angle of view as a 600 mm focal लंबाई lens लिये the 35 mm film standard, and is correspondingly more कॉम्पैक्ट.
Thus, the Four Thirds System has crop फ़ैक्टर ( focal length multiplier ) of about 2, और while this enables longer फोकल length लिये greater आवर्धन, it does n't सहायता the manufacture of चौड़ी angle lenses.
The image sensor स्वरूप, generally intermediate between those of larger SLRs and छोटी compact cameras, generally gives levels of cost, performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes.
HVAC systems use वेंटिलेशन air ducts installed throughout a building to supply conditioned air to a room through outlet vents, पुकारा diffusers ; and ducts to हटाएँ air through return-air grilles.
HVAC ( heating, ventilation, and air conditioning ) is the technology of indoor और automotive environmental सुकून.
HVAC system डिज़ाइन is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering, based on the principles of thermodynamics, द्रव mechanics, and ऊष्मा transfer.
प्रशीतन is sometimes added to the field 's abbreviation as HVAC & R or HVACR, or ventilating is dropped as in HACR ( ऐसे as the designation of HACR-rated सर्किट breakers ).
HVAC is महत्वपूर्ण in the design of medium to विशाल औद्योगिक and office buildings such as skyscrapers and in marine environments such as aquariums, where सुरक्षित and healthy building शर्तें are regulated with respect to temperature and humidity, using fresh air from outdoors.
Ventilation on the downdraught system, by impulsion, or the 'plenum ' principle, लागू to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
हीटिंग, ventilating, and एयर conditioning is based on inventions and discoveries बना by Nikolay lvov, Michael फैराडे, Willis Carrier, Reuben Trane, James जूल, William Rankine, Sadi Carnot, और अनेक अन्य.
the invention of the components of HVAC systems went hand-in-hand with the industrial क्रान्ति, and new methods of modernization, उच्चतर efficiency, और system control are constantly introduced by companies and inventors worldwide.
The तीन central functions of heating, ventilating, and air-conditioning हैं interrelated, विशेषकर with the need to provide थर्मल comfort and acceptable indoor air quality within उचित संस्थापना, operation, and मेंटेनेंस लागत.
hvac systems can provide ventilation, reduce air infiltration, and maintain pressure relationships between spaces.
The अर्थात् of air डिलीवरी and हटाना from spaces is known as room air distribution.
the starting point in carrying आउट an estimate both for cooling and heating depends on the exterior climate and आंतरिक specified शर्तें.
However before taking up the heat load calculation, it is necessary to find भैस air requirements for each area in detail, as pressurization is an important consideration.
In modern buildings the design, संस्थापना, and control systems of these functions are integrated into one or more HVAC systems.
लिये very छोटी buildings, contractors normally capacity इंजीनियर और चुनें HVAC systems and equipment.
For larger buildings, building services designers और engineers, such as mechanical, architectural, or building सेवाएं engineers analyze, design, and specify the HVAC systems, and specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them.
Building permits and code-compliance inspections of the installations are normally required for all sizes of buildings.
The HVAC उद्योग is a worldwide enterprise, with roles सहित operation और मेंटेनेंस, प्रणाली design and निर्माण, equipment manufacturing and बिक्री, and in शिक्षा and research.
The HVAC industry was historically regulated by the manufacturers of HVAC उपकरण, लकिन regulating and standards organizations such as HARDI, ASHRAE, SMACNA, ACCA, Uniform Mechanical कोड, International Mechanical Code, and amca have been established to support the उद्योग and encourage high standards and उपलब्धि.
Royal Navy Commander James बंध, CMG, RNVR, is a fictional character created by अंग्रेजों पत्रकार and novelist Ian Fleming in 1953.
He is the protagonist of the James Bond series of novels, films, comics and video games.
Fleming wrote twelve Bond novels and two छोटी story collections पहले his death, although the last दो books— the Man with the Golden गन and octopussy and the जीना Daylights —were published posthumously.
The Bond अक्षर is a Secret सेवा agent, code number 007, residing in London लकिन active internationally.
Bond थी a composite character who was based on a number of commandos whom फ्लेमिंग knew during his सेवा in the Naval Intelligence Division during World War II, to whom Fleming added his own style and a क्रमांक of his अपना tastes ; Bond 's name was appropriated इससे American ornithologist James बंध.
Bond रै a number of character traits which run throughout the books, including an enjoyment of गाड़ियाँ, a love of food and drink, और an average intake of sixty custom-made सिगरेट a day.
चूंकि Fleming 's death in 1964, वहीँ have महरूम other authorised लेखक of Bond material, including John Gardner, who wrote चौदह novels and two novelizations and Raymond Benson, who wrote six novels, three novelizations and तीन short stories.
There have also been three authors who wrote one book प्रत्येक, किंग्सले Amis ( लिखने as Robert markham ), Sebastian Faulks and Jeffery Deaver.
Additionally a series of novels based on Bond 's youth— Young Bond —was written by Charlie Higson.
As spin-offs from the literary works, there was a television adaptation of the first novel, Casino Royale, in which Bond थी played as an American एजेंट.
A कॉमिक strip series also ran in the Daily एक्स्प्रेस समाचारपत्र.
There have also been twenty-five बंध films ; seven actors have played Bond in these films.
`` प्रकृति Boy '' is a song by Eden Ahbez, published in 1947.
The song tells a fantasy of a `` strange enchanted boy... who wandered बहुत दूर '' only to learn that `` the greatest thing... was बस to love और be loved in return ''.
Nat किंग कोल 's 1948 recording of the सोंग was a major hit and `` Nature Boy '' has since become a pop and jazz मानक, with dozens of major artists interpreting the song.
Louisiana ( or ;, ; Louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a राज्य located in the southern प्रदेश of the United States of America.
Louisiana is the 31st सबसे extensive और the 25th सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
Its capital is Baton Rouge and largest city is New Orleans.
Louisiana is the तभी state in the U.S. with political subdivisions termed parishes, which are local government 's समतुल्य to counties.
The largest parish by population is East Baton Rouge Parish, and the largest by जमीन area is Cameron Parish.
Much of the state 's lands were formed from sediment washed down the Mississippi River, leaving enormous deltas और vast areas of तटीय marsh and swamp.
These contain a rich southern biota ; typical examples include birds such as ibis and egrets.
There हैं also many प्रजाति of पेड़ मेंढक, and fish such as sturgeon and paddlefish.
In more elevated areas, fire is a प्राकृतिक process in the लैंडस्केप, and has produced extensive areas of longleaf pine वन and wet savannas.
These support an exceptionally large number of plant प्रजाति, including many species of orchids और carnivorous plants.
कुछ Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural, multilingual विरासत, being so strongly influenced by an admixture of 18th-century French, Spanish, देशी अमरीकी ( Indian ) and African संस्कृतियों that they are माना to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S.
Before the American खरीदें of the territory, the current louisiana State था महरूम both a Spanish and French colony.
In addition, the पैटर्न of development included importing numerous African स्लेव in the 18th सदी, with अनेक इससे the same region of West Africa, यूँ concentrating their संस्कृति.
In the post-Civil युद्ध environment, Anglo-Americans increased the pressure for anglicization, and in 1915, English was made the only official भाषा of the state.
Women 's rights हैं the अधिकारों and entitlements claimed for women and girls of many societies worldwide.
In some स्थान these rights are institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, and behaviour, whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed.
वे differ from broader notions of human rights through claims of an inherent historical and traditional bias against the exercise of rights by women और girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly संबद्ध with notions of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the right : to bodily अखंडता and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ; to मेला wages or equal अदा ; to own प्रॉपर्टी ; to education ; to serve in the सैन्य or be conscripted ; to डालें into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental and religious rights.
The कानून of science or scientific laws are statements that describe, predict, and perhaps explain why, a range of phenomena behave as they appear to in nature.
The term `` law '' has विविध usage in many cases : सन्निकट, accurate, broad or narrow theories, in all natural scientific disciplines ( physics, chemistry, biology, geology, astronomy etc. ).
An analogous term लिये a वैज्ञानिक law is a principle.
Scientific laws:
summarize a large collection of facts determined by experiment into a single statement,
can प्रायः be formulated mathematically as one or several statements or equation, or at least stated in a single sentence, so that it can be used to भविष्यवाणी the outcome of an experiment, दिए the आरंभिक, boundary, and other physical conditions of the प्रक्रियाओं which take place,
are strongly supported by empirical evidence - they are scientific knowledge कि प्रयोग have repeatedly verified ( और never falsified ).
Their accuracy does not change when new theories are worked out, but rather the scope of application, चूंकि the equation ( if any ) representing the विधि does नहीं बदलें.
as साथ other scientific knowledge, they do not have निरपेक्ष certainty like गणितीय theorems or पहचान, और it is always possible लिये a law to be overturned by future observations.
are often quoted as a fundamental controlling influence rather than a वर्णन of observed facts.
I.e. `` the कानून of motion require that ''
कानून differ from hypotheses and postulates, जिससे are proposed during the scientific process before and during validation by experiment और observation.
These are not laws चूंकि they have not been verified to the same degree and may not be sufficiently general, although they may lead to the formulation of laws.
A विधि is a अधिक solidified and औपचारिक statement, distilled from दोहराया experiment.
Although the concepts of a law or principle in प्रकृति is borderline to philosophy, and presents the depth to which mathematics can describe nature, वैज्ञानिक laws हैं considered इससे a scientific perspective and follow the scientific method ; they `` serve their purpose '' rather than `` questioning reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` कथन of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ).
For example, whether a विधि `` refers to reality '' is a philosophical समस्या, rather than वैज्ञानिक.
Fundamentally, all scientific laws follow from physics, laws which occur in other sciences ultimately follow from शारीरिक laws.
Often, इससे mathematically fundamental viewpoints, universal स्थिरांक emerge इससे scientific laws.

Introduction into other world markets was delayed by a shortage of diodes for use in the Blu-ray disc player ; the device was launched in European and other संसार markets in the पहला half of 2007.
Lauren Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly Williams और grainger ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the CBS soap operas The यंग and the Restless और The Bold और the Beautiful, portrayed by Tracey E. Bregman.

Much of Lauren 's इतिहास has revolved around her romances with Paul Williams, स्कॉट Grainger, Sr., और Michael Baldwin among many others causing a fierce rivalry साथ Traci Abbott Connolly.

the 2010 NBA फाइनल was the नेशनल Basketball Association ( NBA ) championship series for the 2009–10 season.
the best-of-seven playoff was लडे between the Los Angeles लेकर्स, champions of the Western Conference and defending NBA champions, and the Boston Celtics, champions of the पूर्वी Conference.
The Lakers पराजित the Celtics, four खेल to three, to win the franchise 's 16th NBA championship.
The 64th edition of the championship श्रेणी was played between June 3 and June 17, was broadcast on एबीसी, और was watched by an average of 18.1 लाख people.
The Celtics earned their berth into the playoffs by winning the Atlantic प्रभाग.
The Lakers जीती the Pacific Division to earn their berth.
The Celtics reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Miami Heat in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference पहला गोलाकार, the Cleveland cavaliers in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Semifinals, और defending Eastern conference champion Orlando Magic in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Finals.
The Lakers reached the NBA फाइनल by defeating the Oklahoma नगर थंडर in the best-of-seven Western Conference First Round, the यूटा Jazz in the best-of-seven Western Conference Semifinals, and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven Western Conference Finals.
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the प्रमुख League Baseball World Series 2–3–2 seven game format, साथ the Lakers possessing home-court advantage as a reward for finishing with better regular season रिकार्ड than the Celtics.
Repeated baskets from starters Kobe Bryant, pau gasol, और Ron artest brought the Lakers close to विजय in Game 1.
a record breaking performance from Ray Allen 's आठ three-point baskets ensured the Celtics a Game 2 triumph.
Derek Fisher ’s 11 अंक in the fourth quarter helped the Lakers win Game 3.
The Celtics won Game 4 ; it did n't hurt that they netted an excellent performance in baskets by the team’s reserves, while Paul Pierce led the team to a Game 5 win with 27 points on 57 % shooting from the floor.
The Lakers avoided elimination by winning a decisive Game 6 with 24 points contributed by their bench.
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 points जल्दी in the तीसरा quarter, the Lakers rallied and won their second consecutive चैंपियनशिप by लेने over an exciting Game 7 aided by late contributions on offense by Pau Gasol and Artest और rebounding.
Bryant was named सबसे Valuable Player of the Finals लिये his second consecutive trophy.
This was the first NBA फाइनल to go the full seven games since और only the fourth since the NBA Finals returned to a 2–3–2 format in.
The Laker franchise has 16 NBA Championships ( Five in Minneapolis, 11 in Los एंजिल्स ) trailing the Celtics ' seventeen championships.
the NBA Finals used the `` World Series '' स्वरूप in 1949 Minneapolis लेकर्स defeated the Washington Capitols 4 games to 2 ; in 1953 Minneapolis defeated the नई York Knicks 4 games to 1 ; in 1954 Minneapolis defeated the Syracuse Nationals 4 खेल to 3 ; and in 1955 Syracuse Nationals defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3.
The NBA would return to the 2–2–1–1–1 National Hockey League seven game series format until 1985.
ब्लैक pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the family Piperaceae, cultivated लिये its fruit, which is usually सूखी and used as a spice and seasoning.
The fruit, known as a peppercorn जब dried, is approximately in diameter, dark रेड when fully mature, और, जैसे सब drupes, contains a सिंगल seed.
peppercorns, and the मैदान pepper derived from उन्हें, may be described simply as pepper, or more precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( cooked और dried unripe fruit ), green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ).
Black pepper is native to south इण्डिया, और is extensively cultivated there and elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the संसार 's largest producer and निर्यातक of pepper, producing 34 % of the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried ground pepper has been प्रयुक्त since antiquity for both its फ्लेवर and as a medicine.
Black pepper is the world 's most traded spice.
It is one of the most आम spices added to European cuisine and its descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine, नहीं to be confused with the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs.
It is in the modern world, often paired with नमक.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection fraction ( EF ) represents the volumetric भिन्न of blood pumped out of the ventricle ( heart ) with प्रत्येक दिल beat or हृदय cycle.
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary circulation or the left ventricle which ejects via the aortic वाल्व into the systemic circulation.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art that allows meaningful गणितीय expression धमक EF.
Noninvasive cardiac इमेजिंग has become a worldwide utility enabling study of cardiac प्रदर्शन reproducibly and inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection fraction is a mathematical product allowed by हृदय imaging.
as a mathematical term, Ejection भिन्न is an एक्सटेंशन of the work of Adolph Fick in cardiac आउटपुट.
Dedicated प्रौद्योगिकी such as Echocardiography, Computed टोमोग्राफी, Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA scanning have definitively allowed clinically relevant mathematics regarding ischemia, Congenital Heart Disease and Heart Failure.
The prosecutor is the chief legal representative of the prosecution in देशों साथ either the common विधि adversarial system, or the civil law inquisitorial system.
the prosecution is the legal party responsible for presenting the case in a criminal trial against an individual अभियुक्त of breaking the law.

Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib इब्न Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ), also transliterated as Muhammad ( ), was a religious, political, and military leader from मक्का who एकीकृत Arabia into a single धार्मिक polity under Islam.
he is believed by Muslims और Bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of परमेश्वर.
Muhammad is almost universally considered by Muslims as the last prophet sent by God for mankind.
non-muslims regard Muhammad as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider उसे to be the restorer of an unaltered असली monotheistic faith of Adam, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and other prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian नगर of Mecca, he was अनाथ at an early age and brought up under the care of उसके ताऊ Abu Talib.
He later worked mostly as a merchant, as खूब as a shepherd, and was पहला married by age 25.
होने in the आदत of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains for several nights of seclusion and prayer, he later reported that it was वहीँ, at age 40, that he received उसके first revelation इससे God.
Three years after इस event Muhammad started उपदेश these खुलासे publicly, proclaiming that `` God is One ``, that पूरा `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God, और that he himself was a नबी and messenger of God, in the same रग as other Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few followers early on, and was met with hostility इससे some meccan tribes ; he और his followers यहूद treated harshly.
to एस्केप persecution, Muhammad sent some of his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then ज्ञात as Yathrib ) in the साल 622.
This इवेंट, the Hijra, marks the beginning of the Islamic calendar, which is also known as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, Muhammad united the tribes under the Constitution of Medina.
After eight years of fighting with the Meccan tribes, उसके अनुसरणकर्ता, जो by then had grown to 10,000, took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He नष्ट the pagan idols in the नगर and then sent his followers out to destroy सब of the बाकी pagan temples in Eastern Arabia.
in 632, a few महीने बाद returning to Medina from The Farewell यात्राएं, Muhammad fell ill and died.
By the time of his death, most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam, and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity.
the revelations ( or Ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — जिससे मुहम्मद reported receiving जबतक his death – रूप the verses of the Quran, regarded by मुसलमान as the `` शब्द of God '' and around जिससे the religion is आधारित.
Besides the Quran, Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are भी upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss Muhammad और other नबियों of Islam with reverence, adding the phrase सलाम be upon उसे whenever their names हैं mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom और premodern times were largely negative, appraisals in आधुनिक history have been far less so.
The Great Books ( second edition )
ग्रेट Books of the Western World is a series of books originally published in the United States in 1952 by Encyclopædia Britannica Inc. to present the Great Books in a single package of 54 आयतन.
the series is now in its दूसरी edition और contains 60 आयतन.
The original editors of the series chose तीन criteria for inclusion : a book must be प्रासंगिक to contemporary issues, and not only important in its historical context ; it must बदला rereading ; and it must be a part of `` the great conversation about the great ideas, '' relevant to at least 25 of the 102 great ideas identified by the editors.
Books were not chosen on the basis of ethnic or cultural inclusiveness, historical influence, or the editors ' अनुबंध with the views expressed.
`` Cocaine '' is a song written and recorded by JJ Cale in 1976, लकिन also known as a cover version अंकित by eric Clapton.
Allmusic काल्स the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] सबसे enduringly popular hits '' and notes that `` even for an artist like Clapton with a huge body of high-quality work, 'Cocaine ' ranks among his best. ''
Glyn Johns, who had previously worked with the जो, led zeppelin and The Rolling Stones, produced the Clapton recording, which was released on Clapton 's 1977 album Slowhand and as a single in 1980.
The सजीव version of `` Cocaine '', from the Just One रात्रि album अंकित in टोकियो, charted on the Billboard Hot 100 as the B-side of `` Tulsa समय ``, which was a No. 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine '' was one of several of Cale 's songs recorded by Clapton, including `` After Midnight `` and `` Travelin ' लाइट ''.
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the Japanese Imperial सामान्य Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning ) and the Battle of पर्ल Harbor ) was a आश्चर्य military स्ट्राइक conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at पर्ल Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from दखल with military क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of Japan was planning in Southeast Asia विरूद्ध overseas territories of the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States.
The आधार was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters, bombers and torpedo planes in two waves, शुभारम्भ from six aircraft carriers.
All eight U.S. नेवी battleships were damaged, with चार being sunk.
Two of these यहूद later raised, and with the remaining four repaired, six battleships returned to service later in the war.
The Japanese also sank or damaged three cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft प्रशिक्षण ship, and one minelayer.
188 U.S. aircraft were नष्ट ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded.
Important आधार installations such as the power station, shipyard, मेंटेनेंस, and ईंधन and torpedo भंडार facilities, as well as the submarine piers और headquarters building ( भी home of the प्रज्ञा section ) were not attacked.
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft और five midget submarines lost, and 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One Japanese sailor थी captured.
The attack आए as a profound shock to the American people and led directly to the American entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters.
The following day ( December 8 ), the United States घोषित war on जापानी.
Domestic support for non-interventionism, which had been strong, disappeared.
clandestine support of Britain ( for example the Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance.
Subsequent operations by the u.S. prompted Germany and Italy to घोषित war on the U.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the u.S. the same day.
There were numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents लिये unannounced military action by जापानी.
However, the lack of any औपचारिक चेतावनी, particularly while negotiations were still जाहिर ongoing, led अध्यक्ष Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim दिसम्बर 7, 1941, `` a date which होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
Project Runway Season 2 was the second season of Bravo 's successful Project Runway, a reality competition for fashion designers.
ऋतु 2 began airing on December 7, 2005.
Following a nationwide search earlier in the साल, sixteen designers were चुनी as semi-finalists and brought to नई York नगर in June, 2005.
After the first challenge, called `` Road To The Runway '', चौदह went on to compete as finalists.
The winning designer, Chloe Dao, received $ 100,000 in seed money to सहायता launch her own line, a 2007 शनि Sky roadster, a स्प्रेड in ELLE magazine, and a mentorship with the Banana Republic Design टोली.
Winning alongside Dao was her model, Grace kelsey, who received the elle Magazine स्प्रेड.
Michael kors and Nina Garcia returned as न्यायाधीशों for the second season.
the चौथी judging seat rotated each week, based on the challenge.

Kara Janx later appeared in Project रनवे : All सितारों in 2012, where she finished 7th out of 13.
andrae Gonzalo, in the same year, competed in the दूसरी season of the All Stars edition placing 10th out of 13.

In numismatics, a mule is a सिक्का or पदक minted with obverse and reverse डिजाइन नहीं normally seen on the same piece.
These can be जानबूझकर or उत्पादित by error.
This प्रकार of गलती is highly sought after, और उदाहरण can लाने steep prices इससे collectors.
The earliest mules are found among ancient Greek and Roman coins.
Opinion is विभाजित between those who think that they are accidental, the result of an गलत combination of a new die with एक that had officially been withdrawn from use, or the work of coiners working with dies चुराया from an official mint, perhaps at a समय when one of them should have महरूम destroyed.
The name derives इससे the mule, the hybrid offspring of a horse and a donkey, due to such a सिक्का having two sides intended for different coins, much as a mule has parents of two different species.
इस page दस्तावेज़ the tornadoes and tornado outbreaks of 2010.
The majority of tornadoes form in the U.S., but they can occur almost anywhere अंतर्गत the right conditions.
A lesser number occur बाहर the U.S., most notably in भाग of neighboring southern Canada दौरान the उत्तरी Hemisphere 's summer season, but are also ज्ञात in South अमेरिका, यूरोपीय, Asia, और Australia.
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the United States in 2010 ( of जिससे at least 1,266 यहूद confirmed ), with 45 confirmed fatalities.
elsewhere in the world, 11 people were killed in tornadoes, six in Argentina, three in the Bahamas, one in बांग्लादेश, and one in जर्मनी.
The year was near औसत for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early spring period, however such changed बाद a huge upswing starting in late अप्रैल and a व्यस्त late वसन्त and summer काल.
the autumn months were थोड़ा above average.
a lymphocyte is a type of white रक्त cell in the vertebrate प्रतिरक्षा system.
अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, lymphocytes can be divided into large lymphocytes and छोटी lymphocytes.
विशाल granular lymphocytes include natural killer cells ( NK cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of T cells and b कोशिकाएं.
Windows PowerShell is Microsoft 's कार्य automation framework, consisting of a command-line shell and associated scripting language built on.NET Framework.
PowerShell provides full access to COM and WMI, enabling administrators to perform प्रशासनिक कार्य on both local and remote Windows systems.
In PowerShell, administrative tasks हैं generally performed by cmdlets ( pronounced command-lets ), which हैं specialized.NET classes implementing a particular operation.
Sets of cmdlets may be combined साथ in scripts, executables ( which are standalone applications ), or by instantiating regular.NET classes ( or WMI/COM Objects ).
These work by accessing data in different data stores, like the filesystem or registry, which are made available to the PowerShell runtime via Windows PowerShell providers.
Windows PowerShell also provides a hosting API with which the Windows powershell runtime can be embedded inside other applications.
These अनुप्रयोग can then use Windows PowerShell कार्यक्षमता to implement निश्चित operations, सहित those exposed via the आलेखीय interface.
This capability has been used by Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 to expose its management functionality as PowerShell cmdlets and providers and implement the आलेखीय management tools as PowerShell hosts which invoke the जरुरी cmdlets.
Other Microsoft अनुप्रयोग including Microsoft SQL Server 2008 also expose उनके management interface via PowerShell cmdlets.
साथ PowerShell, graphical interface-based management अनुप्रयोग on Windows are layered on top of खिड़कियाँ PowerShell.
A PowerShell scripting interface for Windows products is mandated by the Common अभियान्त्रिकी Criteria.
Windows powershell includes its अपना extensive, console-based help, similar to man pages in Unix shells, via the get-help cmdlet.
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical film starring Julie एंड्रयूज, Dick Van Dyke, David Tomlinson, और Glynis Johns, produced by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी, and based on the Mary Poppins किताबे series by P. L. Travers.
The film थी directed by Robert Stevenson and written by Bill Walsh and Don dagradi, with गीतों by the Sherman Brothers.
it was shot at Walt Disney Studios in Burbank, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
जूली Andrews won the अकादमी Award for Best Actress लिये उसके performance as Mary Poppins and the फिल्मी also won ऑस्कर for Best Film Editing, Original म्यूज़िक Score, Best Song for `` Chim Chim cher-ee '' और Best Visual प्रभाव, and प्राप्त a total of 13 nominations.
A स्टोरी arc is an विस्तारित or continuing storyline in episodic storytelling media ऐसे as television, comic books, comic स्ट्रिप्स, boardgames, वीडियो games, and in कुछ cases, films.
On a television program, for example, the story would unfold over many एपीसोड.
In television, the use of the story चाप is much अधिक common in dramas than in comedies, विशेषकर in soap operas.
Webcomics हैं more likely to उपयोग स्टोरी arcs than newspaper comics, as most web comics have readable archives online that a newcomer to the strip can read in order to understand what is going on.
हालांकि story arcs have existed for दशकों, the term `` स्टोरी arc '' was coined in 1988 in संबंध to the television series wiseguy, and was quickly adapted for अन्य उपयोग.
Many American comic book series are now written in four or six-issue arcs, within a continuing series.
Short story arcs हैं easier to पैकेज as trade paperbacks for resale, and more accessible to the casual रीडर than the never-ending निरंतरता that once characterised comics.
Black शुक्रवार is the day following थैंक्सगिविंग Day in the United States, often regarded as the शुरूआत of the Christmas shopping season.
In recent years, most प्रमुख retailers have opened अत्यधिक early and offered promotional sales to kick off the holiday shopping season, समान to Boxing Day sales in many Commonwealth राष्ट्र.
Black Friday is नहीं an official पब्लिक अवकाश as such, but many non-retail employees and schools have both Thanksgiving and the day after off, followed by a weekend, thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers.
It has routinely been the busiest खरीदारी day of the year since 2005, although news reports, जिससे at that समय were inaccurate, have described it as the busiest shopping दिन of the year for a much longer period of time.
The day 's name originated in Philadelphia, where it originally थी used to describe the भारी and disruptive pedestrian and गाडी traffic which होता occur on the day बाद Thanksgiving.
उपयोग of the term started before 1961 and began to see broader use outside Philadelphia around 1975.
Later an alternative explanation began to be offered : that `` Black Friday '' indicates the point at which retailers begin to फेरे a profit, or हैं `` ''.
For many सालो, it was common लिये retailers to open at 6:00 a.m., but in the late 2000s many had crept to 5:00 or even 4:00.
This was taken to a new extreme in 2011, when several retailers ( including Target, kohl 's, Macy 's, बेहतरीन Buy, and Bealls ) opened at midnight for the पहला समय.
In 2012, Walmart and several अन्य रिटेलर announced that they would open most of their स्टोर्स at 8:00 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day ( except in states where opening on Thanksgiving is निषिद्ध due to ब्लू laws, such as Massachusetts where they स्टिल opened around midnight ), prompting काल्स for a walkout among some मजदूर.
Black Friday shopping is known for attracting aggressive crowds, with annual reports of assaults, shootings, and throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to get the best deal on a product before supplies run out.
The परिवार That Preys is a 2008 अमरीकी movie drama लिखा, produced, and directed by Tyler पेरी.
the screenplay focuses on two families, one wealthy and the other working class, whose lives are intertwined in both love और business.
The movie is the second of चार in which Perry 's signature character, madea, does not make an appearance.
It is भी the दूसरी Perry-directed फिल्मी ( alongside Daddy 's Little Girls ) that is not आधारित on any of the filmmaker 's स्टेज plays.
Net 10, Net 15, Net 30 और जाल 60 ( also Net 10 days, et al ) are forms of trade credit which specify that the net amount ( the total outstanding on the invoice ) is expected to be paid in full and received by the seller within 10, 15, 30 or 60 days after the goods हैं dispatched or service is completed.
Net 30 or Net 60 शर्तें are often coupled with a क्रेडिट for early payment.
The word net in इस sense means `` total after all discounts. ''
It originally गर्भाशयी from the Latin nitere ( to shine ) and nitidus ( सुरुचिपूर्ण, trim ), and more recently from the French जाल ( sharp, neat, clean ).

The अंग्रेजों West Indies were the islands in and around the Caribbean that were part of the British Empire.
In 1912, the British West Indies were divided into eight colonies : the Bahamas, बारबाडोस, British Guiana, British Honduras, जमैका ( with इसके dependencies the Turks और Caicos Islands और the Cayman Islands ), Trinidad और Tobago, the Windward आइलैंड्स and the Leeward आइलैंड्स.
Between 1958 and 1962, all of the द्वीप territories except the British Virgin आइलैंड्स, the Bahamas, British Honduras and British Guiana were organised into the West Indies Federation.
It was hoped that the Federation होता become स्वतंत्र as a सिंगल स्वदेश, लकिन it था limited powers, अनेक practical problems, and a lack of popular support.
नतीजतन, the West Indies Federation थी dissolved.
Most of the territories, including all the larger ones, are now स्वतंत्र as पृथक देशों, with membership to many अंतरराष्ट्रीय forums such as the Organization of American States, the Association of Caribbean States, the World व्यापार संगठन, the United राष्ट्र, the caribbean Community, the Commonwealth of राष्ट्र और the caribbean Development Bank among अन्य.
The remainder are British overseas territories.
All the former राष्ट्र of the British West Indies, except the राष्ट्रमंडल of Dominica, गुयाना and Trinidad and Tobago, हैं Commonwealth Realms.
The term is still used for British Overseas Territories in the Caribbean, ऐसे as the Cayman Islands.

`` What a Wonderful World '' is a song written by Bob Thiele ( as `` जार्ज Douglas '' ) and जार्ज दाउद Weiss.
It was first recorded by Louis Armstrong and released as a सिंगल in 1967.
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent in the music world ( Thiele as a producer and Weiss as a composer/performer ).
Armstrong 's recording was inducted in the Grammy हॉल of कीर्ति in 1999.
the publishing for this song is controlled by Memory Lane Music Group, Carlin Music Corp., and Bug Music, inc.

The उद्घाटन of the president of the United States is a ceremonial event marking the commencement of a new four-year term of a president of the United States.
The दिन a presidential उद्घाटन occurs is known as `` Inauguration Day '' and occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ).
( Prior to the बीसवीं Amendment, the date थी March 4, the day of the year on which the Constitution of the United States पहला took effect in 1789 ; the पिछला inauguration to लो place on the पुरानी date was Franklin D. Roosevelt 's first one on March 4, 1933. )
The most recent public presidential inauguration रस्म, the swearing in of अध्यक्ष बराक Obama to begin उसके second four-year term in office, took place on Monday, January 21, 2013.
The तभी inauguration element mandated by the United States संविधान is that the president make an शपथ or affirmation before that व्यक्ति can `` डालें on the Execution '' of the दफ्तर of the presidency.
However, over the years, various traditions have arisen कि have expanded the inauguration from a simple oath-taking ceremony to a day-long event, including parades, speeches, और balls.
From the presidency of Andrew Jackson through that of Jimmy कार्टर, the प्राथमिक Inauguration Day ceremony took प्लेस on the Capitol 's ईस्ट Portico.
Since the 1981 inauguration of रोनाल्ड Reagan, the ceremony has been आयोजित at the Capitol 's वेस्ट Front.
The inaugurations of विलियम Howard taft in 1909 and Reagan in 1985 were स्थानांतरित indoors at the कैपिटल due to cold weather.
The War of 1812 and World War II caused two inaugurations to be held at other locations in Washington, D.C.
When George Washington was inaugurated, the oath was administered by Robert Livingston, चांसलर of New York State, in 1789, और by William Cushing, संबद्ध Justice of the Supreme Court, in 1793.
चूंकि Chief Justice Oliver Ellsworth swore in President John Adams, no chief justice has missed an उद्घाटन Day.
जब उद्घाटन Day has fallen on a Sunday, the chief justice has administered the शपथ to the president on the Sunday privately and then again the next day सरेआम.
जब a new अध्यक्ष takes over mid-term due to the death or resignation of a president, the oath of office is administered but औपचारिक, public inauguration events have not been held.
Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta ( ; born March 28, 1986 ), ज्ञात by her stage name Lady Gaga, is an American singer, songwriter, record producer, dancer, activist, businesswoman, fashion designer, actress and philanthropist.
Born and उठाया in New York नगर, वो primarily studied at the कान्वेंट of the Sacred Heart and briefly attended New York University 's Tisch स्कूल of the Arts before withdrawing to फ़ोकस on her musical career.
She soon began performing in the rock music scene of Manhattan 's Lower East Side.
By the end of 2007, record कार्यपालिका और producer विंसेंट Herbert signed her to his label Streamline Records, an imprint of Interscope Records.
Initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records, her vocal abilities captured the attention of recording कलाकार Akon, who also signed her to Kon Live वितरण, उसके own label under Interscope.
Lady गागा came to prominence as a recording artist following the release of her debut album, The Fame ( 2008 ), which was a critical and commercial success that topped charts around the world and शामिल the international number-one singles `` Just Dance `` and `` Poker Face ``.
After embarking on the The Fame Ball Tour, she followed the album साथ The Fame Monster ( 2009 ), which शाखित the worldwide hit singles `` ख़राब Romance ``, `` टेलीफोन ``, and `` Alejandro ``.
The Fame Monsters success allowed her to embark on the eighteen-month long Monster Ball Tour, जिससे later became one of the highest-grossing concert tours of all time.
Her सबसे recent एल्बम, Born This रास्ता ( 2011 ), topped the charts of most major markets and generated more international chart-topping singles, सहित `` Born This रास्ता ``, `` Judas ``, and `` The Edge of Glory ``.
Influenced by Britney Spears, David Bowie, Michael Jackson, Madonna, and Queen, Lady Gaga is recognized for उसके flamboyant, diverse and outré contributions to the म्यूज़िक industry through her fashion, performances and म्यूज़िक videos.
as of अक्तूबर 2011, she has sold an अनुमानित 23 लाख albums and 64 million singles विश्वव्यापी and her singles are some of the best-selling worldwide.
उसके उपलब्धियाँ include five Grammy Awards and 13 MTV वीडियो Music Awards.
Lady Gaga रै consecutively appeared on Billboard पत्रिका 's Artists of the Year ( स्कोरिंग the निर्णायक title in 2010 ), ranked fourth in VH1 's सूची of 100 Greatest Women in Music, is the sixth best selling digital singles artist in US according to RIAA, is regularly placed on lists composed by फोर्ब्स magazine and was named one of the most influential people in the world by Time पत्रिका.
besides her musical करियर, she involves herself with humanitarian causes and lgbt activism.

the Florida Gators बेसबॉल team represents the University of Florida in the खेल of baseball.
The Florida Gators compete in Division i of the नेशनल Collegiate एथलेटिक्स Association ( NCAA ), and the Eastern Division of the southeastern सम्मेलन ( सेक ).
They play their home games in अल्फ्रेड A. McKethan स्टेडियम on the university 's Gainesville, Florida campus, और are currently led by head कोच Kevin O'Sullivan.
in the ninety-eight season इतिहास of the gators baseball program, the team has जीती बारह SEC championships and has appeared in eight College World Series tournaments.

A political अभियान is an organized effort which seeks to influence the decision making process within a specific group.
In democracies, political campaigns often refer to electoral campaigns, wherein representatives are chosen or referendums are decided.
In modern politics, the most high profile राजनैतिक अभियान are focused on उम्मीदवार for head of state or head of government, often a President or Prime मंत्री.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton and उसके बेटी, Harriot
एलिज़ाबेथ Cady Stanton ( November 12, 1815 – अक्तूबर 26, 1902 ) was an American social activist, abolitionist, and अग्रणी figure of the early women 's rights movement.
उसके घोषणा of Sentiments, presented at the first women 's rights convention held in 1848 in Seneca जलप्रपात, New York, is often credited with initiating the first organized women 's rights and women 's suffrage movements in the United States.
Before Stanton narrowed her political focus almost exclusively to women 's अधिकारों, she was an active abolitionist together with उसके husband, Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin, gerrit Smith.
नापसंद many of those involved in the women 's rights movement, Stanton addressed various issues pertaining to women beyond मतदान अधिकारों.
Her चिंताएं शामिल महिलाओं 's parental and custody rights, property rights, employment and आय rights, divorce, the economic स्वास्थ्य of the family, और birth control.
She थी also an outspoken supporter of the 19th-century temperance movement.
After the American Civil War, stanton 's commitment to female suffrage caused a schism in the महिलाओं 's rights movement when वो, together with Susan B. Anthony, अस्वीकृत to support passage of the Fourteenth and Fifteenth amendments to the United States संविधान.
She opposed giving added legal protection and voting rights to African American men while women, ब्लैक और white, were denied those same rights.
Her position on this issue, together with her thoughts on व्यवस्थित Christianity और महिलाओं 's issues परे voting rights, led to the formation of two separate women 's अधिकारों organizations that were finally rejoined, साथ Stanton as president of the joint organization, approximately twenty years बाद her break from the original women 's suffrage movement.
Stanton died in 1902 having authored both the स्त्री 's Bible और her autobiography, along साथ many आलेख and pamphlets concerning मादा suffrage and महिलाओं 's rights.
my Fair Lady is a musical based upon George बर्नार्ड Shaw 's Pygmalion and with किताब and lyrics by Alan jay Lerner और music by Frederick Loewe.
the story चिंताएं Eliza doolittle, a काकनी पुष्प girl who takes speech lessons from प्राध्यापक Henry Higgins, a phoneticist, so that she may pass as a well-born lady.
The musical 's 1956 Broadway production थी a hit, setting what was then the record for the longest run of any प्रमुख musical theatre production in history.
It थी followed by a hit लंदन production, a popular film version, and numerous revivals.
It has been called `` the perfect musical ''.
Deregulation is the act or process of removing or reducing राज्य regulations.
It is therefore opposite of regulation, which refers to the process of the सरकारी regulating certain activities.
The Boston Bruins Radio Network is a 25-station ( 17 A.M., 8 F.M. प्लस 2 F.M. अनुवादक ) CBS Radio network which carries live खेल प्रसारण of the Boston Bruins.
The network 's फ्लैगशिप station is WBZ-FM /98.5- Boston, Massachusetts.

Later कि same साल the story was included in Bradbury 's The Martian Chronicles ( 1950 ).

Ethnicity or जातीय group is a socially defined श्रेणी based on common culture or राष्ट्रीयता.
Ethnicity can, लकिन does not have to, शामिल common ancestry, रूप, cuisine, dressing style, heritage, history, language or dialect, religion, symbols, traditions, or other cultural factor.
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced through common characteristics जिससे set the group apart from अन्य groups.
