सौर energy, radiant light and heat from the sun, रै been harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar उर्जा technologies include सौर heating, सौर photovoltaics, solar thermal electricity, solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis, जिससे can make considerable योगदान to solving some of the most तात्कालिक उर्जा problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or active solar depending on the रास्ता वे capture, convert and distribute solar energy.
Active solar techniques include the use of photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials with favorable thermal द्रव्यमान or light dispersing properties, and designing spaces that naturally circulate एयर.
in 2011, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Energy Agency said that `` the विकास of affordable, inexhaustible और clean solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits.
It होगा increase countries’ energy security through रिलायंस on an indigenous, inexhaustible and ज़्यादातर import-independent resource, enhance sustainability, reduce pollution, lower the लागत of mitigating जलवायु change, and keep fossil fuel कीमतें lower than otherwise.
These advantages are global.
Hence the additional costs of the प्रोत्साहन for जल्दी deployment should be considered learning investments ; वे जरूर be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
The classical लैटिन alphabet or Roman वर्णमाला evolved इससे a western variety of the Greek alphabet called the cumaean alphabet, which थी adopted and modified by the Etruscans जो ruled early Rome.
The Etruscan alphabet was in turn adopted and further modified by the ancient Romans to write the लैटिन language.
दौरान the Middle Ages, the Latin वर्णमाला was adapted to Romance languages, direct descendants of Latin, as well as to Celtic, Germanic, Baltic, and कुछ Slavic languages.
With the आयु of colonialism and Christian evangelism, the Latin script थी स्प्रेड overseas, and applied to indigenous American, Australian, ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई, Austroasiatic, and African languages.
अधिक recently, linguists have also tended to prefer the Latin script or the International Phonetic वर्णमाला ( itself largely आधारित on लैटिन script ) when transcribing or creating written मानकों for non-European languages, such as the African reference वर्णमाला.
The term Latin वर्णमाला may refer to either the alphabet used to write Latin ( as described in this article ), or other alphabets based on the Latin script, which is the मौलिक set of letters आम to the various alphabets descended from the classical Latin one, such as the English वर्णमाला.
These Latin-derived alphabets may छोड़ें अक्षर, जैसे the rotokas वर्णमाला, or add new letters, like the Danish and Norwegian वर्णमाला.
Letter shapes have changed over the centuries, including the सृष्टि for मध्यकालीन Latin of lower case forms which did not exist in the Classical period.
The assassination of United States President Abraham Lincoln took प्लेस on शुभ Friday, अप्रैल 14, 1865, as the American Civil War was drawing to a close.
the assassination occurred five days after the commander of the Confederate Army of Northern Virginia, General Robert E. ली, surrendered to Lieutenant General ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac.
Lincoln was the first American अध्यक्ष to be assassinated, though an unsuccessful attempt had been made on एंड्रयू Jackson 30 years पहले in 1835.
The हत्या थी planned and carried out by the well-known stage कर्ता John wilkes बूथ, as part of a larger conspiracy in a bid to revive the Confederate cause.
Booth 's co-conspirators were Lewis पावेल and David Herold, जो were assigned to kill सचिव of State William H. Seward, and George Atzerodt who was to kill Vice President Andrew जॉनसन.
By simultaneously eliminating the top three people in the प्रशासन, Booth and his co-conspirators hoped to sever the continuity of the United States government.
Lincoln was shot while watching the play Our American cousin with his wife Mary Todd Lincoln at Ford 's Theatre in Washington, D.C. on the night of April 14, 1865.
He died early the next morning.
The बाकी of the conspirators ' plot विफल ; Powell only managed to wound Seward, while atzerodt, जॉनसन 's would-be हत्यारे, lost his nerve और fled Washington.

Club level seating is a special section of seating in modern sports stadiums.
The Club Level is usually स्तिथ towards the मध्य of the स्टेज of seating भाग, above the lower deck लकिन below the upper deck.
They are usually right next to the Luxury बाक्स, either right above, right below, or sandwiched between two स्तर of Luxury Boxes.
Club Level seating is considered as उच्चतर class than sitting anywhere else in the arena, लकिन lower class compared to the Luxury Boxes.
Unlike the लक्ज़री Boxes, most club levels do नहीं wrap entirely around the arena.
कुछ club स्तर रोकें at a certain point, giving रास्ता to an expansion of the Mezzanine, while अन्य give way to lower class Luxury Boxes ( ऐसे as `` Party Suites '' ).
A notable एक्सेप्शन to this is अमीरात स्टेडियम in London, which has a complete tier of club seating.
Club Levels allow fans multiple levels of entertainment.
Club Level seating is खोलें to the elements, as opposed to the entirely enclosed luxury बाक्स, which देता more of an outdoors छाप at roofless and open-roof stadiums and arenas.
क्लबों Level seating is normally bought on a contract basis to allow लिये maximum profit on the part of the stadium.
The Club Level provides fans with special access to an indoor part of the arena exclusive to fans with special tickets.
ये areas are air conditioned and allow access to खास restaurants, merchandise stands, और लाउंज areas of the stadium कि are not otherwise available.
Concession स्टैंड and vendors on the Club Level also often offer different menus than in अन्य स्टैंड to give more of a खास feel to the क्लबों.
ये areas are closed बंद to the बाकी of the stadium, and they usually can only be accessed through the विशेष, private club entrances.
Sophia Loren ( ; born Sofia Villani Scicolone ; 20 September 1934 ) is an इतालवी actress.
लोरेन is widely recognized as Italy 's most renowned and honored actress.
She was the first अभिनेत्री of the talkie era to win an Academy पुरस्कार लिये a non-English-speaking प्रदर्शन, for her portrayal of Cesira in vittorio De सिका 's Two Women.
उसके other पुरस्कार include a Grammy Award, पाँच special Golden Globes, a bafta Award and a लॉरेल Award.
In 1995 वो received the सेसिल B. DeMille Award for आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ, one of many such awards.
Her films include : Houseboat ( 1958 ), El Cid ( 1961 ), Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow ( 1963 ), विवाह Italian-Style ( 1964 ), and a खास Day ( 1977 ).

In 1994 वो starred in Robert altman 's prêt-à-porter, which earned her a Golden Globe नामांकन the same year.
She has also achieved critical और commercial success in TV फिल्मों such as Courage ( 1986 ).

Incidence of suicide is underreported due to both religious and सोशल pressures, and possibly completely unreported in कुछ areas.
Nevertheless, from reported cases, certain trends are apparent.
Since the आंकड़ा is skewed, comparing suicide rates between राष्ट्र is statistically unsound.
The trends themselves हैं not the cause, but may be indicative of a रूट cause.

Hospital Emergency Codes are used in hospitals worldwide to alert staff to various emergencies.
The use of codes is intended to convey अनिवार्य information जल्दी and with minimal misunderstanding to staff, while preventing stress and panic among visitors to the hospital.
These codes may be posted on placards throughout the hospital, or printed on employee पहचान badges लिये तैयार सन्दर्भ.
Back of a hospital ID badge showing disaster codes.
हॉस्पिटल emergency codes may denote अलग events at different hospitals, सहित nearby ones.
Because अनेक physicians work at more than one facility, this may lead to confusion in emergencies, so uniform systems have been proposed.
The route of the eifel aqueduct, with its average slope.
The Eifel Aqueduct was one of the longest aqueducts of the Roman Empire.
The aqueduct, constructed in AD 80, carried water कुछ इससे the hilly Eifel प्रदेश of what is now Germany to the ancient city of colonia Claudia Ara Agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ).
If the auxiliary spurs to additional springs are शामिल, the length was.
The construction थी almost entirely below ground, and the flow of the water थी produced entirely by gravity.
A few bridges, including एक up to in length, यहूद needed to pass over घाटियों.
Unlike some of the other famous Roman aqueducts, the Eifel aqueduct was specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from damage and freezing.
In chemistry, a disulfide bond ( br.e. disulphide bond ) is a covalent bond, usually derived by the coupling of two thiol समूह.
The linkage is also called an SS-bond or disulfide सेतु.
the overall connectivity is therefore R-S-S-R.
The terminology is widely used in biochemistry.
In formal terms, the connection is a persulfide, in analogy to इसके congener, peroxide ( R-O-O-R ), लकिन this terminology is obscure and is no longer प्रयुक्त ( except in reference to r-s-s-h or H-S-S-H compounds ).
Formal depiction of disulfide bond formation as an oxidation.

Religion in the United Kingdom and in the देशों that preceded it, रै been dominated, लिये over 1,400 years, by various फ़ॉर्म of Christianity.
According to कुछ सर्वेक्षण, a बहुमत of citizens still identify with Christianity, हालांकि नियमित church उपस्थिति has गिरे dramatically since the मध्य of the 20th century, and आव्रजन and जनसांख्यिकी बदलें have contributed to the growth of other faiths.
Religious affiliations of uk citizens are recorded by regular surveys, the four प्रमुख ones being the UK जनसांख्यिकी, the Labour Force Survey, the British सोशल Attitudes survey and the European Social सर्वेक्षण.
According to the 2001 UK जनसांख्यिकी, Christianity is the major religion, followed by Islam, Hinduism, Sikhism, Judaism and Buddhism in terms of number of adherents.
This, and the relatively large number of individuals with nominal or no religious affiliations has led commentators to variously describe the United Kingdom as a multi-faith, secularised, or post-Christian समाज.
The United किंगडम was formed by the union of previously independent countries from 1707, and consequently सबसे of the largest religious groups do not have UK-wide organisational structures.
While कुछ groups have separate structures for the individual countries of the United Kingdom, others may have a सिंगल structure covering England and वेल्स or Great Britain.
Similarly, due to the relatively recent creation of Northern Ireland in 1921, most major धार्मिक groups in Northern Ireland हैं organised on an all-Ireland आधार.
The 1967 न्यूर्क riots were a प्रमुख civil disturbance that occurred in the city of न्यूर्क, नई Jersey between July 12 and July 17, 1967.
The six दिनों of rioting, लूटने, and destruction बाएँ 26 dead and hundreds घायल.
in United States college athletics, redshirt is a delay or suspension of an athlete 's participation in order to lengthen उसके or her period of eligibility.
Typically, a student 's एथलेटिक eligibility in a given sport is four seasons, a number derived from the four years of अकादमिक वर्ग that are normally required to obtain a bachelor 's degree at an American college or university.
However, a student athlete may be offered the opportunity to redshirt for up to two years, which allows the खिलाड़ी to spread those four सालो of eligibility over five, or sometimes छह years.
in a redshirt year, a student athlete may attend classes at the कॉलेज or विश्वविद्यालयों, practice साथ an एथलेटिक team, and dress लिये खेल but he or she may not compete during the खेल.
using this mechanism, a student athlete has up to five academic years to use the four years of eligibility, thus becoming a fifth-year senior.
the term is used as a verb, noun, and adjective.
For example, a coach may चुनें to redshirt a player जो is then referred to as a redshirt freshman or simply a redshirt.
The opposite of इस is a `` true freshman. ''
World War I ( wwi ) was a वैश्विक war centred in यूरोपीय that began on 28 July 1914 और lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World युद्ध or the Great War इससे its occurrence जबतक the start of संसार War II in 1939, और the पहला World War or World War i thereafter.
It involved all the world 's ग्रेट शक्तियां, जिससे were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, फ़्रांस and Russia ) and the सेंट्रल Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had लिया the offensive विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, इटली did not enter into the युद्ध ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations डाला the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the उस्मानी Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
ultimately, more than 70 लाख military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 लाख combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding सुधार in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in संसार history, subsequently paving the रास्ता for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the राष्ट्र involved.
एक of the long-term causes of the युद्ध was the resurgence of imperialism in the विदेशी policies of the great शक्तियां of Europe.
More immediately, the हत्या of Archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis जब austria-hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
अनेक alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via their colonies, the conflict जल्द spread around the world.
On 28 जुलाई, the austro-hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
जबकि the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition साथ a trench line that changed little जबतक 1917.
on the Eastern Front, the रूसी army थी successful against the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of ईस्ट Prussia by the germans.
In November the उस्मानी Empire joined the war, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives और American forces began प्रवेश the trenches.
Germany, जिससे था its अपना trouble with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the war ended in विजय for the Allies.
कार्यक्रम on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the समाप्त of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the पूर्व two lost a great राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe थी redrawn into अनेक smaller states.
The लीग of राष्ट्र was formed in the hope of preventing another such विरोध.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's शिकस्त and समस्याएं साथ the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
Map of countries that declared themselves to be socialist राज्य अंतर्गत the Marxist–Leninist or Maoist definition - that is to say, `` Communist राज्य '' - between 1979 and 1983.
इस period marked the greatest territorial extent of Communist राज्य.
a communist state is a state where the means of production are collectively स्वामित्व by the society.
It has a form of government characterized by single-party rule or dominant-party rule of a communist party ( referred as Dictatorship of the proletariat by इसके proponents ) and a professed allegiance to a Leninist or marxist–leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state.
Technically, `` communist state '' is a contradictio in terminis as a communist society as defined by दोनो Marxists and anarcho-communists is in principle stateless.
From this perspective, the term marxist-leninist state is more appropriate.
Historically, a `` communist state '' referred to a system where public ownership of all or most means of उत्पादन by the Communist party -run state is deemed necessary to further the interests of the working क्लास ; today, a कम्युनिस्ट राज्य can also, for instance, refer to contemporary चीन and Vietnam, where a Communist Party-run state exists alongside a mixed economy.
according to Marxist–Leninists, the state is a tool in the hands of the ruling class, which in a socialist society is the working class, so a socialist state is, according to leninists, a state of the working class.
In practice, communist states do not actually refer to themselves as such.
They do this नहीं to disguise the फैक्ट that the ruling party is कम्युनिस्ट, लकिन rather क्युकी they do not consider themselves to be a communist society at present.
Instead, they constitutionally identify themselves as socialist states or workers ' states.
the primary goal of ये states, which also explains their आधिकारिक name, is to guide their संबंधित देशों in the process of building समाजवादी, ultimately leading to communism.
Communist states may have अनेक legal राजनैतिक parties, but the कम्युनिस्ट party is usually granted a खास or प्रबल role in government, often by statute or under the constitution.
Consequently, the institutions of the state और of the communist party become intimately entwined, such as in the development of समानांतर संस्थानों.
In the 20th century, most communist राज्य adopted planned economies.
However, there were अपवाद : The Soviet Union during the 1920s and late 1980s and Yugoslavia after World War II allowed limited markets and a degree of worker self-management, while चीन, Vietnam and Laos introduced far-reaching market reforms बाद the 1980s.
In the 21st सदी, China और Vietnam have allowed a mixed economy to develop.
the fundamental अवधारणाओं of communist states often diverge from the original socio-economic ideologies इससे which they develop.
As a परिणाम, many adherents of these ideologies प्रायः oppose the political systems commonly associated with these राज्य.
For उदाहरण, dissenting साम्यवादियों ऐसे as Trotskyists were often opposed to the communist states of the 20th century, claiming either that they था nothing to do साथ `` real '' communism or that the ideology of such states had reached a पाइंट of irrevocable भ्रष्टाचार.
Michael Fred Phelps II ( born June 30, 1985 ) is a रिटायर्ड American तैराक and the सबसे decorated ओलंपियन of all time, with a total of 22 medals.
Phelps also holds the all-time records लिये Olympic gold medals ( 18, double the second highest रिकार्ड holders ), Olympic gold medals in individual events ( 11 ), and Olympic medals in व्यक्तिगत events for a male ( 13 ).
In winning आठ सुनहरा medals at the 2008 Beijing Games, फेल्प्स took the record for the most first-place finishes at any सिंगल Olympic Games.
Five of those victories were in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम, tying the सिंगल Games record.
in the 2012 Summer ओलंपिक in London, फेल्प्स won four golds and two silver medals, making him the most successful athlete of the Games for the third Olympics in a row.
फेल्प्स is the long course world recordholder in the 100-meter butterfly, 200-meter butterfly and 400-meter व्यक्तिगत medley as well as the former long course world recordholder in the 200-meter freestyle and 200-meter व्यक्तिगत medley.
He has won a कुल of 71 medals in major international long-course competition, 57 gold, 11 चांदी, and तीन bronze spanning the Olympics, the World, and the Pan Pacific Championships.
फेल्प्स 's international titles and record-breaking performances have earned him the World Swimmer of the Year पुरस्कार सात times and American तैराक of the Year Award nine times as well as the फिना तैराक of the Year पुरस्कार in 2012.
His unprecedented Olympic success in 2008 earned Phelps Sports Illustrated पत्रिका 's Sportsman of the साल award.
After the 2008 गर्मियाँ Olympics, Phelps started the Michael Phelps Foundation, which focuses on growing the sport of swimming और promoting healthier lifestyles.
he expects to do further work साथ उसके foundation बाद the 2012 Olympics, which he रै said will be his last.
Lenovo समूह सीमित ( ) is a चाइनीज multinational कंप्यूटर hardware and electronics कम्पनी साथ its headquarters in बीजिंग, China and Morrisville, North कैरोलिना and its पंजीकृत office in Hong Kong, चीन.
Its products include personal कंप्यूटर, tablet computers, mobile phones, workstations, सर्वर, electronic भंडार devices, IT management software and smart televisions.
Lenovo is the world 's second-largest PC vendor by 2012 unit sales.
It markets the ThinkPad line of कोपी computers and the ThinkCentre line of desktops.
Lenovo has operations in more than 60 countries and बिकता इसके products in around 160 countries.
Lenovo थी founded in Beijing in 1984 and incorporated in Hong Kong in 1988 अंतर्गत its previous name, Legend.
Lenovo is सूचीबद्ध on the Hong Kong भण्डार एक्सचेंज and is a constituent of the Hang Seng China-Affiliated Corporations अनुक्रमणिका.
Slug is a common name for an apparently shell-less terrestrial gastropod mollusk.
The word `` slug '' is also often used as part of the आम नाम of any gastropod mollusc that has no shell, has a very reduced shell, or has only a small internal shell.
( This is in कंट्रास्ट to the common नाम `` snail ``, which is applied to gastropods that have a coiled shell that is large enough कि the soft parts of the animal can retract fully into it. )
Slugs exist on land and in the sea, और there is even one genus of freshwater slugs, Acochlidium.
The unadorned word `` slug '' is however applied primarily to land slugs, whereas slugs from the sea or from freshwater are usually referred to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs ''.
जमीन gastropods with a shell that is not quite vestigial, but is too small to retract into ( like many in the family Urocyclidae ), हैं known as semislugs.
the विभिन्न taxonomic families of slugs form part of several quite अलग evolutionary lineages जिससे also शामिल snails.
Thus, for example, the various families of land slugs हैं not very closely related to one another, despite a सतही समानता in the overall body form.
The shell-less condition has arisen many times independently during the विकासवादी past, और thus the category `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one.
Slugs, जैसे all other gastropods, undergo torsion ( a 180° twisting of the internal अंगों ) during विकास.
Internally, slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of this रोटेशन, but externally the bodies of land slugs appear to be अधिक or less symmetrical, मगर लिये the positioning of the pneumostome, which is on one side of the animal, normally the सही hand side.
The नरम, slimy bodies of slugs हैं prone to desiccation, so land-living slugs are confined to moist environments and must retreat to damp hiding places when the weather is शुष्क.
The subsequent information in this article applies to जमीन slugs.
is a Latin word कि means `` यूँ '' or, in writing, `` it was thus in the सोर्स सामग्री ''.

इम्पीरियल Standard of Napoleon I
Napoleon Bonaparte (, ; 15 August 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) was a French military और political leader जो rose to prominence during the latter stages of the फ्रेंच Revolution and its संबद्ध wars in Europe.
As Napoleon I, he was Emperor of the French from 1804 to 1815.
His legal reform, the Napoleonic Code, has been a major influence on अनेक सिविल विधि jurisdictions worldwide, but he is बेहतरीन remembered for his role in the wars led against France by a series of coalitions, the so-called napoleonic Wars.
He established hegemony over most of continental Europe और sought to spread the ideals of the French क्रान्ति, while consolidating an imperial monarchy which restored aspects of the deposed Ancien Régime.
Due to his success in ये युद्धों, often against numerically superior enemies, he is generally regarded as एक of the greatest military commanders of all time, और his campaigns are studied at military academies worldwide.
Napoleon was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble Italian ancestry जिससे था settled Corsica in the 16th century.
He trained as an तोपखाने अधिकारी in mainland France.
He rose to prominence under the French First Republic and led successful campaigns against the First और Second Coalitions arrayed against France.
he led a successful invasion of the इतालवी peninsula.
In 1799, he staged a coup d'état and installed himself as First Consul ; five years बाद the French Senate proclaimed him emperor, following a plebiscite in his favour.
In the first decade of the 19th सदी, the फ्रेंच Empire अंतर्गत नेपोलियन सगाई in a श्रेणी of conflicts—the napoleonic युद्धों —that involved every प्रमुख European शक्ति.
After a streak of victories, France secured a dominant position in continental यूरोपीय, and Napoleon maintained the French sphere of influence through the formation of extensive alliances और the appointment of friends and परिवार सदस्यों to rule other European countries as French क्लाएंट states.
The प्रायद्वीपीय युद्ध और 1812 French invasion of रूस marked turning points in Napoleon 's सौभाग्य.
उसके Grande Armée was badly damaged in the campaign and never fully बरामद.
In 1813, the छठे Coalition defeated his शक्तियां at Leipzig ; the following year the गठबन्धन invaded France, forced Napoleon to abdicate and exiled उसे to the island of एल्बा.
Less than a year later, he escaped Elba and returned to power, but थी defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in June 1815.
Napoleon spent the last six years of his life in confinement by the British on the island of Saint Helena.
an autopsy concluded he died of stomach cancer, but there has been some debate about the cause of his मौत, as some विद्वानों have speculated that he was a शिकार of arsenic poisoning.

United States Senators are popularly elected, for a six-year term, beginning January 3.
Elections are held the first Tuesday after November 1.

the दक्षिण Africa national rugby union team ( known as the Springboks ) represents South अफ़्रीकी in rugby union.
They compete in the सालाना Rugby Championship, along साथ southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina, Australia and New Zealand.
वे have won इस championship on three occasions in sixteen years.
They are currently ranked second in the world by the International Rugby Board, and were named 2008 World Team of the Year at the Laureus संसार Sports Awards.
हालांकि South Africa was इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the creation of the रग्बी World Cup प्रतियोगिता, the Springboks did not compete in the first two World cups in 1987 और 1991 क्युकी of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South Africa.
The team made its World कप debut in 1995, जब the newly democratic South Africa hosted the tournament.
The Springboks then पराजित the All Blacks 15–12 in the फाइनल, which is now remembered as one of the महानतम moments in South Africa 's sporting इतिहास, and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building प्रक्रम.
South Africa regained their शीर्षक as champions 12 years later, when they defeated England 15–6 in the 2007 final.
As a result of the 2007 World Cup tournament the Springboks were promoted to first प्लेस in the IRB World Rankings, a position they held until July the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot.
The Springboks play in green and सुनहरा jerseys, and their emblems are the springbok और the protea.
the side has been playing international rugby since 1891, when a British Isles side toured the nation, playing South Africa in उनके first Test on 30 जुलाई.
South Africa was coached by Jake White, who led the Boks to the 2007 World Cup title, announcing his resignation effectively from the end of 2007.
His replacement 's ( Peter de Villiers ) contract expired in 2011, following a 11–9 defeat to Australia in the Rugby संसार कप quarter-final, जो then stated he होता नहीं be signing a new deal.
The previous captain was John Smit, who पहले he रिटायर्ड in 2011 played hooker for most of his career, although he has also been a prop, mainly in 2008 and 2009.
Due to Smit being अनुपलब्ध for the November 2010 Tests after surgery, lock Victor Matfield took Smit 's place as captain लिये that tour.
The current captain is Jean de Villiers.
The Battle of Gettysburg (, with an sound ), was fought July 1–3, 1863, in and around the town of Gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
It was the battle with the largest number of casualties in the अमरीकी Civil युद्ध और is often वर्णित as the war 's turning point.
Union Maj. Gen. George गॉर्डन Meade 's Army of the Potomac defeated attacks by Confederate Gen. Robert E. ली 's Army of उत्तरी Virginia, समाप्ति Lee 's invasion of the North.
After his success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in May 1863, Lee led his फौज through the shenandoah घाटी to begin his second आक्रमण of the North—the Gettysburg Campaign.
साथ his army in high आत्माओं, ली intended to shift the focus of the summer campaign इससे war-ravaged northern Virginia and hoped to influence Northern politicians to give up their अभियोजन of the युद्ध by penetrating as far as Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, or even Philadelphia.
Prodded by President Abraham lincoln, Maj. Gen. Joseph वेश्या स्थानांतरित उसके army in pursuit, but was सुकून just three दिनों before the battle और replaced by Meade.
तत्व of the two armies initially collided at Gettysburg on July 1, 1863, as Lee urgently concentrated his forces वहीँ, his objective होने to engage the Union army and destroy it.
कम ridges to the northwest of कस्बा were defended initially by a Union cavalry division under Brig. Gen. जॉन Buford, and soon reinforced with two corps of संघ infantry.
However, two large confederate corps assaulted them from the उत्तरपश्चिम and north, collapsing the hastily विकसित Union lines, sending the defenders retreating through the गलियों of town to the hills just to the south.
On the second day of battle, most of both armies had समवेत.
The Union line was laid out in a defensive formation resembling a fishhook.
In the लेट afternoon of July 2, ली शुभारम्भ a heavy assault on the Union left flank, and fierce fighting raged at Little Round Top, the Wheatfield, शैतान 's डेन, and the Peach Orchard.
On the Union सही, demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on culp 's हिल और Cemetery Hill.
All across the battlefield, despite significant losses, the संघ defenders held their lines.
On the third day of बैटल, July 3, fighting resumed on Culp 's हिल, and cavalry लड़ाइयों raged to the east and south, but the main event was a dramatic infantry assault by 12,500 Confederates विरूद्ध the center of the Union line on Cemetery Ridge, known as पिकेट 's चार्ज.
The charge थी repulsed by Union rifle and artillery fire, at great losses to the Confederate फौज.
Lee led his फौज on a torturous retreat back to वर्जिनिया.
Between 46,000 and 51,000 soldiers from both armies were casualties in the three-day battle.
That November, President Lincoln प्रयुक्त the dedication ceremony for the Gettysburg National Cemetery to सम्मान the fallen Union सैनिको and redefine the purpose of the युद्ध in his historic Gettysburg Address.
An academic अनुशासन, or फ़ील्ड of पढ़ाई, is a branch of knowledge कि is taught और researched at the college or university level.
Disciplines are defined ( in part ), and recognized by the academic जर्नल्स in which research is published, and the learned societies and academic विभाग or faculties to which उनके practitioners belong.
However, there exists no formal criteria for when educational programs and scholarly journals रूप an academic discipline.
A विशाल अंतर exists between, on the one हाथ, खूब established disciplines that exist in almost सब universities all over the world, have a long history, and have a खूब established set of जर्नल्स and सम्मेलनों, and, on the other hand, सुझाव for new फ़ील्ड समर्थित only by few विश्वविद्यालयों and publications.
Fields of पढ़ाई usually have several sub-disciplines or शाखाओं, and the distinguishing lines between these are often both मनमानी and अस्पष्ट.
PHP is a server-side scripting भाषा designed लिये वेब विकास but भी प्रयुक्त as a general-purpose programming language.
PHP is now installed on more than 244 million websites and 2.1 लाख वेब servers.
originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995, the reference implementation of PHP is now produced by The पीएचपी Group.
While पीएचपी originally stood for निजी घर Page, it now stands for पीएचपी : Hypertext preprocessor, a recursive acronym.
PHP code is interpreted by a web सर्वर with a पीएचपी processor मोड्यूल which generates the resulting web page : पीएचपी commands can be embedded directly into an HTML source document rather than calling an external file to process आंकड़ा.
It has भी विकसित to include a command-line interface capability and can be used in standalone graphical applications.
पीएचपी is free तन्त्र released under the PHP License, जिससे is incompatible with the GNU General Public License ( GPL ) due to restrictions on the उपयोग of the term PHP.
PHP can be deployed on most web servers and also as a standalone shell on almost every operating प्रणाली और मंच, free of charge.
John Fitzgerald `` जोकर '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by his initials JFK, was the 35th President of the United राज्य, serving from 1961 until his death in 1963.
After military service as commander of the मोटर Torpedo Boats PT-109 और PT-59 during World War II in the South Pacific, Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the u.S. House of प्रतिनिधि from 1947 to 1953 as a डेमोक्रेट.
Thereafter, he served in the u.S. सीनेट from 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican प्रत्याशी Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. अध्यक्षीय election.
At 43 सालो of आयु, he is the youngest to have been elected to the office, the second-youngest President ( after Theodore रूज़वेल्ट ), and the first व्यक्ति born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A Catholic, Kennedy is the only non- Protestant अध्यक्ष, and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer पुरस्कार.
Events during उसके presidency included the Bay of Pigs आक्रमण, the क्यूबन मिसाइल Crisis, the building of the Berlin Wall, the स्पेस Race, the african-american Civil Rights गति, और early चरण of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the क्रमांक of military advisers, special आपरेशन forces, and helicopters in an effort to curb the स्प्रेड of साम्यवादी in दक्षिण East एशिया.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the Strategic हैमलेट Program which थी implemented by the South वियतनामी government.
It involved निश्चित forced relocation, village internment, और segregation of rural South वियतनामी from the northern और southern communist insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22, 1963 in डलास, Texas.
Lee Harvey ओसवाल्ड was चार्ज with the crime, but he was shot and killed by Jack Ruby दो days later, पहले a trial could लो place.
The FBI और the Warren Commission officially concluded that ओसवाल्ड was the lone हत्यारे.
However, the United राज्य House चुनें कमेटी on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and that कैनेडी was probably assassinated as the result of a षड्यंत्र.
However, ABC News in their investigation, The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond षड्यंत्र, पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted अलोन.
कैनेडी 's controversial Department of रक्षा TFX fighter bomber program led to a Congressional investigation कि lasted इससे 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s information concerning Kennedy 's private जीवन has come to light.
Details of Kennedy 's health समस्याएं in which he struggled have become better ज्ञात, especially since the 1990s.
Although initially kept secret from the general public, रिपोर्ट्स of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy ranks highly in public opinion दरजा of u.S. presidents.
`` Stand by Me '' is a song originally performed by Ben E. King and written by King, Jerry leiber, and Mike Stoller, inspired by the spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me, '' प्लस दो लाइनों rooted in Psalms 46:2–3.
वहीँ have been over 400 recorded versions of the song.
A political cartoon from an 1894 Puck magazine by illustrator S.D. Ehrhart, shows a फार्म woman labeled `` Democratic Party '' sheltering from a tornado of political बदलें.
a metaphor is a figure of speech that describes a subject by asserting that it is, on some point of comparison, the same as another otherwise unrelated ऑब्जेक्ट.
Metaphor is a type of analogy and is closely related to other rhetorical figures of वाक that achieve their प्रभाव via association, comparison or resemblance including allegory, hyperbole, and simile.
In simpler terms, a metaphor compares two objects or things without using the words `` like '' or `` as ''.
One of the most prominent examples of a metaphor in अंग्रेज़ी literature is the All the संसार 's a stage monologue इससे As You Like It :
All the world 's a स्टैगe,
And all the men and women merely players ;
They have their exits and their entrances ; — William Shakespeare, As You Like It, 2/7
This quote is a metaphor because the world is not वस्तुतः a stage.
by figuratively asserting कि the संसार is a स्टेज, शेक्सपियर uses the points of तुलना between the world and a stage to convey an understanding about the यांत्रिकी of the world and the lives of the people within it.

Printmaking is the process of बनाना artworks by printing, normally on paper.
Printmaking सामान्यतः covers only the process of creating prints with an element of originality, rather than just being a photographic reproduction of a painting.
Except in the मामला of monotyping, the process is capable of producing multiples of the वही piece, which is called a print.
Each print produced is not considered a `` copy '' but rather is माना an `` original ''.
This is क्युकी typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking process, and also because the imagery of a print is typically not simply a reproduction of another work but rather is often a अद्वितीय image designed from the प्रारंभ to be expressed in a particular printmaking technique.
A print may be ज्ञात as an impression.
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is not chosen only लिये its ability to produce multiple impressions, लकिन rather for the unique qualities कि each of the printmaking processes lends itself to.
Prints are निर्मित by transferring ink from a matrix or through a prepared screen to a sheet of पेपर or अन्य material.
आम types of matrices include : metal plates, usually copper or zinc, or polymer प्लेटों for engraving or etching ; stone, aluminum, or polymer for lithography ; blocks of wood for woodcuts and wood engravings ; and linoleum for linocuts.
Screens made of silk or synthetic fabrics are used for the screenprinting process.
Other प्रकार of matrix substrates और related processes are discussed below.
Multiple impressions printed from the same matrix रूप an edition.
Since the late 19th century, artists have generally signed individual impressions from an edition और often क्रमांक the impressions to form a सीमित edition.
Prints may also be printed in book form, such as illustrated books or artist 's books.
Il Divo is an अंग्रेज़ी multinational operatic pop vocal group created by music manager, कार्यपालिका, और reality tv star Simon Cowell.
formed in the United Kingdom, they हैं भी हस्ताक्षरित to Cowell 's रिकार्ड label, Syco Music.
Il Divo is a group of चार पुरूष singers : French pop सिंगर Sébastien izambard, Spanish baritone Carlos marín, American tenor David Miller, and Swiss tenor उर्स Bühler.
to date, they have बेची more than 26 लाख albums worldwide.
Su-15, one of the principal Soviet Air Defence interceptors in the 1970s and 1980s
An interceptor वायुयान ( or बस interceptor ) is a type of सेनानी aircraft designed specifically to prevent missions of enemy aircraft, विशेषकर bombers and reconnaissance aircraft, and destroy them, relying usually on great speed और powerful armament.
Being used since the पहला World युद्ध, after the late 1960s, interceptors became less important due to shifting from बमवर्षक to intercontinental ballistic missiles ( ICBMs ) लिये nuclear warfare.
A Vietnamese American ( ) is an American of Vietnamese descent.
They make up परिचय हाफ of all overseas Vietnamese ( Người Việt Hải ngoại ) and are the fourth-largest एशियाई American group.
Mass Vietnamese आव्रजन to the United राज्य started after 1975, after the समाप्त of the Vietnam War.
Early आप्रवासियों were refugee boat people fleeing persecution or poverty.
मजबूर to flee from उनके homeland and प्रायः thrust into poor urban neighborhoods, these newcomers have nevertheless managed to establish strong समुदायों in a छोटी amount of time.
More than sixty percent of Vietnamese Americans reside in the राज्य of California, Texas, वॉशिंगटन, Florida, and Virginia.
सामने page of the u.S. Armed शक्तियां समाचारपत्र, सितारों and Stripes, 2 May 1945
Adolf Hitler वचनबद्ध suicide by gunshot on 30 April 1945 in his Führerbunker in Berlin.
His wife Eva ( née braun ) committed suicide with him by ingesting cyanide.
That afternoon, in accordance with Hitler 's prior निर्देश, their remains were carried up the stairs through the bunker 's emergency exit, doused in petrol and set alight in the Reich Chancellery garden outside the बंकर.
The Soviet अभिलेख रिकार्ड that their burnt remains were recovered और interred in successive locations जबतक 1970 when वे were again exhumed, cremated and the ashes बिखरे.
Accounts differ as to the cause of death ; one that he died by poison only and another that he died by a self-inflicted gunshot, जबकि biting bas on a cyanide capsule.
Contemporary historians have अस्वीकृत these accounts as being either Soviet प्रचार or an attempted compromise in अनुक्रम to reconcile the different conclusions.
एक eye-witness recorded that the body showed signs of having been शॉट through the mouth, but this has महरूम सिद्ध unlikely.
There is भी controversy regarding the authenticity of skull and jaw fragments which यहूद बरामद.
in 2009, DNA परीक्षण were performed on a skull Soviet officials था long believed to be Hitler 's.
The tests revealed that the skull थी actually that of a woman कम than 40 सालो old.
Location of Missouri
The दारू laws of Missouri are among the least restrictive and most lax and permissive in the United States.
Missouri is known throughout the मिडवेस्ट for its largely laissez-faire दृष्टिकोण to दारू regulation, in sharp contrast to the very strict alcohol laws of कुछ of its पड़ोसी, like कान्सास and Oklahoma.
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF, commonly known as flesh-eating disease or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome, is a rare infection of the deeper layers of skin and subcutaneous tissues, easily spreading आरपार the fascial plane within the subcutaneous tissue.
necrotizing fasciitis is जल्दी progressing, having greater risk of developing in the immunocompromised due to conditions like मधुमेह, कर्कट, etc.
it is a severe disease of अचानक onset and is प्रायः treated immediately with ऊँची doses of intravenous antibiotics.
Type I describes a polymicrobial infection, whereas Type II describes a monomicrobial infection.
Many types of bacteria can cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g., Group A streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ), Staphylococcus aureus, Clostridium perfringens, bacteroides fragilis, Aeromonas hydrophila ).
Such infections हैं more संभावित to occur in people with compromised immune systems.
Historically, Group a streptococcus made up most cases of Type II infections.
However, since as early as 2001, another serious form of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis has been observed with increasing frequency, caused by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( मरसा ).
Some प्रकाशित case रिपोर्ट्स have implied a possible link between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs and NF, though the evidence of the link was said to be weak because of a small क्रमांक of मामला मरीजों and it was unclear whether the drugs बस नकाबपोश the symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se.
संसार War II ( WWII or WW2 ), also ज्ञात as the Second World युद्ध, was a global war that lasted from 1939 to 1945.
It involved the विशाल majority of the संसार 's राष्ट्र —including all of the great powers —eventually forming two opposing military alliances : the Allies और the Axis.
It was the most widespread युद्ध in history, with more than 100 million people serving in military इकाई from over 30 अलग countries.
In a state of `` total युद्ध ``, the major भागीदार placed their entire economic, industrial, and scientific सामर्थ्य at the service of the युद्ध प्रयत्न, erasing the भेद between civilian and military resources.
Marked by द्रव्यमान deaths of civilians, including the Holocaust and the only use of nuclear weapons in warfare, it resulted in 50 million to over 75 million fatalities.
These मौतों make World War ii by far the deadliest conflict in human history.
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was already at war with the Republic of China in 1937, but the world war is generally said to have begun on 1 सितंबर 1939 with the invasion of Poland by जर्मनी and subsequent घोषणाओं of युद्ध on Germany by France and ब्रिटेन.
From late 1939 to early 1941, in a series of campaigns and treaties, जर्मनी formed the Axis alliance with Italy, conquering or subduing much of continental यूरोपीय.
Following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact, Germany and the Soviet Union partitioned and annexed territories between themselves of their European neighbours, including Poland.
the United किंगडम and the other सदस्यों of the British Commonwealth were the only प्रमुख अलाइड forces continuing the fight against the Axis, with battles लेने प्लेस in North अफ़्रीकी as well as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic.
In June 1941, the European Axis launched an invasion of the Soviet Union, giving a start to the largest land theatre of war in history, which tied down the प्रमुख part of the Axis ' military forces for the rest of the war.
In December 1941, Japan joined the Axis, attacked the संयुक्त राज्य and European territories in the Pacific समंदर, and जल्दी conquered much of the पश्चिमी प्रशांत.
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942, after Japan खोया a series of naval battles and European Axis troops were defeated in North Africa and, decisively, at Stalingrad.
In 1943, with a श्रेणी of German defeats in पूर्वी Europe, the Allied invasion of Italy, और American victories in the Pacific, the Axis lost the initiative and undertook strategic retreat on all fronts.
in 1944, the Western allies invaded France, while the सोवियत संघ regained all of its territorial losses and invaded Germany and its allies.
During 1944 और 1945 the United States defeated the जापानी नेवी and captured key पश्चिमी Pacific आइलैंड्स.
the war in Europe ended with the capture of Berlin by Soviet and Polish सैनिकों and the subsequent जर्मनी unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945.
Following the Potsdam घोषणा by the Allies on 26 July 1945, the संयुक्त States dropped atomic bombs on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima on 6 अगस्त, and Nagasaki on 9 August.
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago imminent, and the Soviet संघ having declared war on Japan by invading Manchuria, Japan surrendered on 15 August 1945, ending the युद्ध in एशिया और cementing the total victory of the Allies over the Axis.
संसार युद्ध II altered the political alignment and social ढांचा of the world.
The United राष्ट्र ( UN ) was established to फोस्टर international cooperation and prevent future conflicts.
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the United States, the Soviet Union, China, the संयुक्त Kingdom, और France—became the permanent सदस्यों of the संयुक्त Nations Security परिषद.
The Soviet Union और the United States emerged as प्रतिद्वंद्वी superpowers, setting the stage for the Cold War, which lasted for the next 46 years.
Meanwhile, the influence of European ग्रेट शक्तियां started to decline, while the decolonisation of Asia and Africa began.
Most countries whose industries had been damaged स्थानांतरित towards economic recovery.
Political integration, especially in Europe, emerged as an effort to stabilise postwar संबंध and fight अधिक effectively in the Cold War.
a limited liability company ( LLC ) is a flexible रूप of enterprise that मिश्रणों तत्व of partnership and कॉरपोरेट structures.
Note than an llc is नहीं a corporation, and कॉलिंग an LLC a corporation is technically incorrect.
An llc is a legal form of company that provides सीमित liability to its owners in the vast majority of संयुक्त राज्य jurisdictions.
LLCs do not need to be organized for profit.
Five K-Cups
the inside of a used K-Cup, with the top foil और the used coffee grounds removed.
This shows the फिल्टर inside the K-Cup.
k-cup portion packs are used with Keurig or अन्य single cup brewing systems to brew a कप of coffee, tea, or hot chocolate.
Each K-Cup is a plastic container with a coffee filter inside.
Ground coffee beans are packed in the K-Cup and sealed air-tight with a संयोजन प्लास्टिक and foil lid.
When the K-Cup is placed in a Keurig brewer, the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom of the k-cup and forces hot water under pressure through the k-cup and into a mug.
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to coffee roasters and tea makers such as ग्रीन Mountain Coffee Roasters, Diedrich/ Gloria Jeans, Timothy 's World कॉफी, Van Houtte, हिरण Coffee, Celestial Seasonings, Bigelow Tea Company, twinings, Tully 's, Coffee लोगों and Newman 's Own.
Keurig 's patents on the original K-Cup डिज़ाइन expired in September 2012.
Keurig holds at least one additional, still-active us patent and another patent अनुप्रयोग, detailing सुधार कि have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup डिज़ाइन.

a chronograph is a specific type of watch that is प्रयुक्त as a stopwatch संयुक्त with a display watch.
A basic chronograph has an independent स्वीप दूसरी hand ; it can be प्रारंभ, रोका, and returned to zero by successive दबाव on the stem.
Louis Moinet invented the chronograph in 1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from परिधीय Component Interconnect, भाग of the पीसीआई Local Bus standard और प्रायः shortened to just पीसीआई ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a कंप्यूटर.
The PCI bus supports the functions मिला on a प्रोसेसर bus, but in a standardized format that is independent of कोई particular processor.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the प्रोसेसर to be कनेक्ट directly to the processor बस, और are आबंटित addresses in the processor 's address स्पेस.
Attached devices can take either the form of an एकीकृत circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself, called a planar device in the PCI specification, or an expansion card that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus थी first implemented in IBM pc compatibles, जहाँ it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration.
It has subsequently been adopted for other computer types.
PCI and pci-x are होने replaced by पीसीआई Express, but, most motherboards हैं still made साथ one or अधिक PCI स्लॉट, which are sufficient लिये many uses.
the PCI specification covers the physical आकार of the बस ( including the आकार और अंतरण of the सर्किट board किनारे electrical सम्पर्क ), विद्युत characteristics, bus timing, and protocols.
the specification can be purchased from the PCI Special ब्याज Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : संजाल cards, sound cards, modems, अतिरिक्त ports such as USB or serial, TV tuner cards and disk controllers.
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA ताश, until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew the सामर्थ्य of PCI ; the पसन्दीदा interface for video cards became AGP, and then पीसीआई Express.
PCI video ताश remain available for use with बूढ़ा PCs बगैर AGP or PCI Express slots.
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion ताश are now commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in सार्वभौमिक सीरियल bus and पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस संस्करण.
Michael Whitaker स्मिथ ( born अक्तूबर 7, 1957 ) is an अमरीकी contemporary Christian musician, who रै charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the mainstream charts.
His biggest success in mainstream music was in 1991 when `` Place in this World '' hit No. 6 on the Billboard Hot 100.

An American poster from the संसार युद्ध ii -era that was used to inform लोगों about what they चाहिए do if they suspect sabotage.
Sabotage is a deliberate action aimed at weakening another entity through subversion, obstruction, disruption, or विनाश.
In a workplace setting, sabotage is the conscious withdrawal of efficiency generally directed at causing some बदलें in workplace शर्तें.
One who engages in तोड़फोड़ is a saboteur.
As a rule, saboteurs try to conceal their पहचान because of the consequences of their actions.
For example, whereas an environmental pressure group might be happy to be identified with an act of sabotage, it would not want the individual identities of the perpetrators ज्ञात.
पैट्रिक Henry कॉलेज ( PHC ) is a private, independent college with an Evangelical Christian basis कि focuses on teaching classical liberal कला and government, located in Purcellville, Virginia, संयुक्त राज्य.
Patrick Henry is known for its conservative evangelical Christian focus.
As of अप्रैल 17, 2007, the college थी accredited by the transnational Association of Christian कॉलेजों and Schools, a नेशनल faith-related accrediting organization recognized by the Department of Education और the Council लिये Higher Education Accreditation.

the history of television comprises the work of numerous engineers and inventors in several देशों over many decades.
The earliest प्रस्ताव was in 1908, in a paper by A. A. Campbell-Swinton and postulated the उपयोग of कैथोड rays.
The first practical demonstrations of television, however, were developed using electromechanical methods to scan, transmit, and reproduce an image.
As electronic camera and display tubes were perfected, electromechanical television gave रास्ता to all-electronic systems in nearly all अनुप्रयोग.

A फिल्म theater ( also called a cinema, फिल्म house, फिल्मी house, film theater or चित्र house ) is a venue, usually a building, for viewing films.
Most but नहीं सब फिल्म theaters are commercial operations catering to the general public, जो attend by purchasing a ticket.
The movie is projected with a movie projector onto a विशाल projection screen at the front of the auditorium.
Most movie थिएटर are now equipped for डिजिटल cinema projection, removing the need to create और हस्तांतरण a physical film print.

Lyme disease, Lyme borreliosis is an infectious disease caused by at least three species of bacteria belonging to the genus Borrelia.
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main cause of Lyme disease in North America, whereas borrelia afzelii और Borrelia garinii cause most यूरोपीय cases.
The बीमारी is named after the towns of Lyme and Old Lyme, Connecticut, USA, जहाँ a number of cases were identified in 1975.
Although Allen steere realized that Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978, the cause of the disease remained a mystery जबतक 1981, when B. burgdorferi was identified by Willy Burgdorfer.
Lyme disease is the most common tick-borne disease in the Northern Hemisphere.
Borrelia is transmitted to humans by the bite of संक्रमित ticks belonging to a few प्रजाति of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ).
जल्दी symptoms may include fever, headache, fatigue, depression, and a characteristic गोलाकार स्किन खाज called erythema migrans ( EM ).
बाएँ untreated, later लक्षण may involve the joints, heart, and central बेचैन प्रणाली.
in most cases, the infection और its लक्षण are eliminated by antibiotics, विशेषकर if the बीमारी is treated जल्दी.
विलम्बित or अपर्याप्त treatment can lead to more गंभीर लक्षण, जिससे can be disabling and difficult to दावत.
Penises of minke whales on display at the Icelandic Phallological Museum
Penis ( plural penises or penes ) is a general term लिये the organs with जिससे male and hermaphrodite animals introduce sperm into receptive females दौरान copulation.
Such organs occur in many animals, both vertebrate and invertebrate, but males do नहीं भालू a शिश्न in every animal species, and in those species in जिससे the male करता bear a so-called penis, the penes in the various species हैं not necessarily समजात.
For उदाहरण, the penis of a mammal is at most analogous to the penis of a male insect or barnacle.
The term penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs, but not to all ; for example the intromittent organ of most cephalopoda is the hectocotylus, a specialised भुजा, and male spiders use their pedipalps.
In most species of animals in which there is an organ that might reasonably be described as a penis, it रै no major function अन्य than intromission, or at तनिक conveying the sperm to the female, but in the placental mammals the penis bears the distal part of the urethra, which discharges both urine during urination and semen during copulation as the अवसर requires.
Artists and repertoire ( A & R ) is the division of a record label or म्यूज़िक प्रकाशन company that is जिम्मेदार for talent scouting and overseeing the artistic development of recording artists and/or songwriters.
It also अधिनियमों as a liaison between artists and the record लेबल or publishing company ; every कार्यकलाप involving artists to the point of album release is generally considered अंतर्गत the purview of, और responsibility of, A & R.
A furlong is a measure of distance in imperial units and U.S. customary units बराबर to one-eighth of a mile, equivalent to 220 yards, 660 feet, 40 rods, or 10 chains.
The सटीक value of the furlong varies थोड़ा among English-speaking countries.
Five furlongs are लगभग 1 किलोमीटर ( 1.0058 km is a closer approximation ).
Since the original definition of the मीटर थी one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the परिधि of the धरती ( along the great circle coincident with the meridian of longitude passing through पेरिस ), the circumference of the Earth is परिचय 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs.

Lithium batteries are डिस्पोजेबल ( primary ) batteries that have lithium metal or lithium यौगिकों as an धनाग्र.
They stand apart from अन्य batteries in their high charge density ( long life ) और ऊँची cost per unit.
Depending on the design और रासायनिक यौगिकों used, lithium cells can produce voltages इससे 1.5 V ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or alkaline battery ) to about 3.7 V. Lithium batteries are widely used in products such as portable उपभोक्ता electronic devices.

Facebook on the Ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social नेटवर्किंग service, whose name stems from the colloquial नाम लिये the book given to students at the start of the अकादमिक year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each अन्य.
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his college roommates and fellow हार्वर्ड University students Eduardo Saverin, एंड्रयू McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership थी initially limited by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड students, लकिन was विस्तारित to other कॉलेजों in the Boston area, the Ivy League, and Stanford विश्वविद्यालयों.
it धीरे added support for students at various other universities before खोलने to high school students, और आखिरकार to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at least 13 years बूढ़ा to become पंजीकृत users of the साईट.
Users must register पहले using the site, after which they may create a personal profile, add other उपयोक्ता as friends, and एक्सचेंज messages, including automatic notifications जब वे update their profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by कार्यस्थल, स्कूल or college, or other विशेषताएँ, and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From कार्य '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of सितंबर 2012, Facebook रै over one billion क्रियाशील users.
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey, वहीँ are 7.5 million children under 13 with accounts and 5 million under 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
In may 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 लाख in Facebook, and जिम Breyer added $ 1 million of उसके अपना money to the pot.
A January 2009 Compete.com पढ़ाई ranked Facebook as the most used social networking service by विश्वव्यापी monthly क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता.
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` How on earth did we stalk our exes, remember हमारी co-workers ' जन्मदिन, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics, ऐसे as Facebook Detox, राज्य that Facebook रै turned into a national obsession in the United States, resulting in vast amounts of समय lost and encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million monthly अद्वितीय u.S. visitors in May 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in April 2010 an अनुमानित 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the U.S. population had a फेसबुक account.
Nevertheless, फेसबुक 's market growth started to स्टाल in some regions, with the site losing 7 million active users in the United States और Canada in May 2011.
फेसबुक eventually filed for an initial public offering on February 1, 2012, and was headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
Facebook inc. began selling भण्डार to the पब्लिक और trading on the NASDAQ on May 18, 2012.
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel ( 15 November 1891 – 14 अक्तूबर 1944 ), popularly known as The Desert फॉक्स ( Wüstenfuchs, ), was a German Field Marshal of संसार War II.
He earned the आदर of दोनो his own troops और the enemies he fought.
Rommel was a highly decorated अधिकारी in World War i and थी awarded the Pour le Mérite for his exploits on the Italian front.
In World War II, he further distinguished खुद as the commander of the 7th Panzer Division during the 1940 invasion of France.
His leadership of German and Italian forces in the North African campaign established him as एक of the most able कमांडरों of the war, and earned him the appellation of the Desert Fox.
He is regarded as one of the सबसे skilled commanders of मरुस्थल warfare in the conflict.
He later commanded the जर्मनी forces opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in Normandy.
His कार्यभार never took him to the Eastern Front.
Rommel is regarded as having been a humane and professional अधिकारी.
His afrika Korps थी never accused of war crimes, and soldiers captured during his Africa campaign were reported to have been treated humanely.
Orders to kill यहूदी सैनिको, नागरिकों and captured commandos यहूद उपेक्षित.
Late in the war, Rommel was linked to the conspiracy to assassinate एडोल्फ Hitler.
Since Rommel थी a नेशनल hero, Hitler desired to eliminate him quietly.
He forced Rommel to commit आत्महत्या साथ a cyanide pill, in return लिये assurances that Rommel 's family होता नहीं be persecuted following his death.

the seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven spiritual gifts originating with patristic authors, later elaborated by five intellectual virtues और four other groups of ethical characteristics.
They are : अक्ल, understanding, wonder and awe ( fear of the Lord ), counsel, knowledge, fortitude, and piety ( reverence ).
the Earth Day ध्वज, the latest प्रस्ताव of John McConnell for a flag of Earth Day
Earth Day is an annual event, मनाये on April 22, on which events हैं held विश्वव्यापी to demonstrate support for पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा.
It was first celebrated in 1970, और is now coordinated globally by the Earth Day Network, and मनाये in more than 192 countries each year.
In 1969 at a UNESCO Conference in सैन Francisco, the तिथि proposed was March 21, 1970, the first day of वसन्त in the उत्तरी hemisphere.
इस day of nature 's equipoise थी later मंजूर in a Proclamation signed by Secretary General U thant at the United Nations.
A month later a separate Earth दिन was संस्थापित by United States सीनेटर Gaylord नेल्सन as an पर्यावरणीय teach-in first आयोजित on April 22, 1970.
Nelson थी बाद awarded the Presidential Medal of स्वतंत्रता पुरस्कार in recognition of his work.
While this April 22 Earth दिन was focused on the United States, an organization launched by Denis Hayes, who was the original नेशनल coordinator in 1970, took it international in 1990 और organized events in 141 nations.
Numerous communities celebrate Earth Week, an संपूर्ण week of क्रियाएँ focused on environmental मुद्दे.
Iodine is a chemical element with symbol I and परमाणु number 53.
The name is from Greek ioeidēs, meaning violet or purple, due to the रंग of elemental iodine vapor.
Iodine और इसके यौगिकों are primarily used in nutrition, and industrially in the उत्पादन of acetic acid and निश्चित polymers.
Iodine 's अपेक्षाकृत high atomic number, low toxicity, and आसानी of attachment to सशुल्क compounds have made it a part of many X-ray contrast सामग्री in modern medicine.
Iodine has only एक stable समस्थानिक.
A number of iodine radioisotopes हैं also used in medical अनुप्रयोग.
Iodine is found on Earth mainly as the highly water-soluble iodide आयन, I−, जिससे concentrates it in oceans और brine pools.
Like the अन्य halogens, free iodine occurs mainly as a diatomic molecule I2, and then तभी momentarily after being oxidized from आयोडाइड by an oxidant like free ऑक्सीजन.
in the universe और on Earth, iodine 's high atomic number makes it a relatively rare element.
However, its presence in ocean water has दिए it a role in biology.
It is the heaviest essential element utilized widely by जीवन in biological functions ( only tungsten, employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria, is heavier ).
Iodine 's rarity in many soils, due to initial कम abundance as a crust-element, and also leaching of घुलनशील iodide by rainwater, रै led to अनेक deficiency problems in जमीन animals and inland human populations.
आयोडीन deficiency affects about two billion people and is the अग्रणी preventable cause of intellectual disabilities.
Iodine is required by उच्चतर animals, which use it to synthesize thyroid हार्मोन, जिससे contain the तत्व.
Because of this function, radioisotopes of iodine are concentrated in the thyroid gland along साथ nonradioactive iodine.
If inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, which has a ऊँची fission product yield, concentrates in the thyroid, लकिन is easily remedied साथ potassium iodide treatment.
Lobbying ( also लॉबी ) is the act of attempting to influence निर्णय made by officials in the government, most often legislators or members of regulatory agencies.
Lobbying is done by many different types of people और organized groups, including individuals in the private sector, corporations, fellow विधायक or government officials, or advocacy groups ( interest groups ).
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies, meaning a voter or bloc of मतदाता भीतर his or उसके electoral district, or not ; वे may engage in lobbying as a business, or not.
Professional lobbyists हैं लोगों whose business is trying to influence legislation on behalf of a group or individual who hires them.
individuals and nonprofit संगठन can भी lobby as an act of volunteering or as a small part of their normal जॉब ( for instance, a CEO meeting with a representative about a project important to his/her company, or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid क्षमता ).
Governments often define and regulate व्यवस्थित group lobbying that has become influential.
The आचार and morality of lobbying are.
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt, when the implication is कि people with inordinate socioeconomic power are corrupting the law ( twisting it away इससे fairness ) in order to serve their own विरोध of interest.
लकिन another side of lobbying is making यकीनन कि others ' रूचि are duly defended विरूद्ध others ' भ्रष्टाचार, or even simply making sure that minority interests are fairly defended विरूद्ध mere tyranny of the majority.
For example, a medical association, or a trade association of health insurance companies, may lobby a legislature in order to counteract the influence of tobacco companies, in which case the lobbying would be viewed by most people as justified ( duly defending against others ' corruption ).
The परेशानी in आरेखण objective लाइनों between which lobbyists are `` शुभ lobbyists '' और which ones are `` bad ones '' is compounded by the cleverness with which lobbyists or उनके clients can argue that their अपना lobbying is of the `` good '' kind.
At दिल, the effort to influence legislation is a power struggle.
as in other forms of शक्ति संघर्ष, such as war or law enforcement, motives दायरा from to self-defense to लड़ for justice, and the dividing line between predation and justice is subject to rationalization.
