Cream were a 1960s British rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce, guitarist/vocalist eric क्लैप्टन, and drummer Ginger Baker.
Their ध्वनि थी characterised by a hybrid of blues rock, मुश्किल rock and साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, combining the psychedelia-themed गीत, Eric Clapton 's blues guitar playing and vocals, Jack ब्रूस 's voice और prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming.
the group 's तीसरा album, Wheels of आग, was the world 's पहला platinum-selling दोगुना album.
Cream are widely regarded as being the world 's first successful supergroup.
In their career, they sold over 15 million albums worldwide.
Cream 's म्यूज़िक included songs based on परंपरागत blues such as `` Crossroads `` and `` Spoonful ``, and आधुनिक blues such as `` Born Under a Bad Sign ``, as well as more eccentric गीतों ऐसे as `` Strange काढ़ा ``, `` Tales of वीर Ulysses `` and `` Toad ``.
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I महसूस Free `` ( UK, number 11 ), `` Sunshine of Your Love `` ( US, क्रमांक 5 ), `` श्वेत रूम `` ( US, number 6 ), `` Crossroads '' ( US, number 28 ), and `` बैज `` ( UK, number 18 ).
Cream made a significant impact on the लोकप्रिय music of the time, and, along साथ Jimi हेंड्रिक्स, and Terry Kath of Chicago, popularised the use of the wah-wah pedal.
They provided a heavy yet technically निपुण musical theme कि foreshadowed और influenced the emergence of British bands such as The Jeff Beck समूह in the late 1960s.
The बैंड 's live performances influenced progressive चट्टान acts such as Rush.
Cream were inducted into the Rock और फेंकें Hall of Fame in 1993.
They were included in both Rolling स्टोन and vh1 's सूचियाँ of the `` 100 महानतम Artists of All Time ''.
They were also ranked number 16 on VH1 's `` 100 Greatest Artists of Hard Rock ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy फिल्मी written and निर्देशित by John waters, and starring Ricki Lake, सन्नी बोनो, डिब्बी Harry, Michael st. Gerard, Shawn Thompson, Colleen Fitzpatrick, जेरी Stiller, और in his last फिल्मी role, Divine.
Hairspray was a dramatic प्रस्थान इससे Waters ' earlier works, with a much broader intended audience.
In fact, Hairsprays pg is the mildest rating a Waters film रै प्राप्त ; सबसे of his पिछला films were rated X by the MPAA.
Set in 1962 Baltimore, Maryland, the film revolves around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' teenager Tracy Turnblad as she pursues stardom as a dancer on a local tv show and rallies विरूद्ध जातिगत segregation.
hairspray was तभी a moderate success upon its initial theatrical release, earning a modest gross of $ 8 million.
however, it managed to attract a larger audience on home video in the early 1990s and became a cult classic.
सबसे critics praised the film, हालांकि some यहूद displeased साथ the overall campiness.
In 2002, the film was adapted into a Broadway musical of the same name, which won eight Tony Awards, including Best Musical in 2003.
A second film version of Hairspray, an adaptation of the स्टेज musical, was also released by New लकीर Cinema in 2007, which included अनेक changes of scripted items from the original.
The film also ranks # 444 on साम्राज्य magazine 's 2008 list of the 500 greatest movies of all time.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body under a common नाम, structure, and doctrine within Christianity.
Some समूह included do नहीं consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the Catholic गिरिजाघर considers itself the one true गिरिजाघर and the अपोस्टोलिक See, and as pre-denominational ).
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being पुकारा a denomination and do not have any formal denominational structure, authority, or record-keeping beyond the local सभा ; several groups within Restoration Movement पतन into this category.
Some groups हैं large ( e.g. Catholics, lutherans, Anglicans or baptists ), while others are just a few small churches, और in most cases the relative आकार is नहीं evident in this list.
Modern movements such as Fundamentalist Christianity, Pietism, Evangelicalism, pentecostalism and the पवित्रता movement sometimes cross denominational लाइनों, or in some cases create नई denominations आउट of two or more continuing groups, ( as is the case लिये many United and uniting churches, for example ).
Such subtleties and complexities are not clearly चित्रित here.
Major विभाजन within Christianity.
Note : This is not a complete सूची, but aims to provide a comprehensible overview of the diversity among denominations of christianity.
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations, अनेक of which can not be verified to be significant, only those denominations साथ Wikipedia articles होगा be सूचीबद्ध in order to ensure that all entries on this list are notable और verifiable.
between denominations, theologians, and तुलनात्मक religionists there are considerable disagreements about which groups can be properly called ईसाई, disagreements arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups.
For the purpose of simplicity, this सूची is intended to reflect the self-understanding of each denomination.
Explanations of different opinions concerning their status as Christian denominations can be found at their respective articles.
There is no आधिकारिक recognition in सबसे parts of the world for religious लाशें, और there is no official clearinghouse which could determine the औकात or respectability of religious bodies.
Often there is considerable disagreement between विभिन्न चर्च about whether other churches should be labeled with pejorative terms ऐसे as `` cult '', or परिचय whether this or कि group enjoys some measure of respectability.
Such considerations often vary इससे प्लेस to place, जहाँ one religious group may enjoy majority status in one region, लकिन be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another part of the संसार.
Inclusion on this सूची does नहीं indicate any निर्णय about the size, importance, or character of a group or इसके members.
1804 map of `` Louisiana ``, edged on the west by the Rocky kyu.
The Louisiana Purchase ( `` बिक्री of Louisiana '' ) थी the acquisition by the United States of America in 1803 of of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana.
the U.S. सशुल्क 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) plus cancellation of debts worth 18 million francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), for a total sum of 15 लाख dollars ( less than 3 cents per acre ) for the louisiana territory ( $ million in डॉलर, less than 42 cents per acre ).
The Louisiana territory encompassed all or भाग of 15 present U.S. states और two कनाडाई provinces.
The land purchased contained सब of present-day Arkansas, Missouri, Iowa, ओक्लाहोमा, Kansas, और Nebraska ; parts of Minnesota that were west of the Mississippi River ; most of North Dakota ; most of South डकोटा ; northeastern New Mexico ; northern टेक्सास ; the portions of Montana, Wyoming, और कोलोराडो ईस्ट of the महाद्वीपीय divide ; Louisiana west of the Mississippi River, including the city of New Orleans ; और छोटी portions of जमीन that would eventually become part of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan.
France controlled this विशाल area from 1699 जबतक 1762, the year it gave the territory to इसके ally Spain.
Under नेपोलियन Bonaparte, France took back the territory in 1800 in the hope of building an empire in North America.
A स्लेव विद्रोह in Haiti and an impending war with Britain, however, led फ़्रांस to abandon these plans and sell the संपूर्ण territory to the संयुक्त States, जो था originally intended only to seek the खरीदें of New Orleans and its adjacent lands.
The खरीदें of the territory of Louisiana took place दौरान the presidency of Thomas जेफरसन.
At the time, the purchase faced domestic opposition because it थी thought to be असंवैधानिक.
Although he सहमत that the U.S. Constitution did not contain provisions लिये acquiring territory, Jefferson decided to go ahead with the purchase anyway in order to हटाएँ France 's presence in the region and to protect दोनो U.S. trade अभिगम to the port of New Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River.
Ceremony at Place d'Armes, New Orleans अंकन transfer of Louisiana to the संयुक्त States, 10 March 1804, as depicted by Thure de Thulstrup.
`` Cool झटका '' is a लोकप्रिय song written by Donald Storball and originally performed by The Capitols.
Released in 1966, it reached no. 2 on the American R & B chart and No. 7 on the पॉप chart.
The backing track लिये इस song was actually recorded ( secretly ) by the motown house बैंड The Funk Brothers.
Per one of the Funk Brothers, the song was originally to be called `` Pimp झटका. ''
This was taken from watching पड़ोस pimps, who होता dance in the क्लब, but यहूद too `` cool '' to do the झटका like नियमित folks.
Their version was subsequently named `` the Pimp Jerk. ''
The producer was afraid that a song with the word pimp in the title would be बैन or not receive much positive attention, and had the title changed to its current form.
The Go-Go 's, Todd Rundgren, Big Trouble, Human Sexual Response, The la De Da 's, The Creation, and The Coasters have covered the song.
टॉड Rundgren did his version in an odd time signature ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky महसूस to the सोंग.
The Go-Go 's covered the song for their 1982 album Vacation and later re-recorded it for उनके 1990 album Greatest.
In the feature film घर Alone 2 : Lost in New York, Uncle फ़्रैंक ( Gerry Bamman ) sings `` Cool Jerk '' in the shower.
A version of the song with different lyrics ( `` do the Cool Whip '' ) is used in Cool Whip commercials.
a recording of `` Cool Jerk '' by Ricardo Ray is featured in the feature फिल्मी Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ).
The song features in the film Standing in the Shadows of Motown, performed by the दुर्गंध भाइयो साथ सीसे vocals by Bootsy Collins.
The song is heard briefly in the animated विशेषता, Madagascar 3 : Europe 's Most चाही.
Despite इस reason, it is listed in some variations of the film 's soundtrack.
A league is a unit of length ( or, rarely, area ).
It was long common in Europe and Latin America, but it is no longer an official ईकाई in any nation.
The league originally referred to the अलहदा a person could walk in an hour.
Since the मध्य Ages, many values have been specified in several देशों.
In the context of nautical दूरियाँ, the 3 मील ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an observer of average height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can see when standing at sea level.
Thus, a ship traveling one `` लीग '' रै reached कया was previously the farthest दृश्य distance on the क्षितिज.
The lack of a ऐतिहासिक and global standard for the exact measure of a `` लीग '' can be accounted for by the variable elevation of the निरीक्षक ( i.e., sightings इससे a ship 's डेक vs. masthead ).
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free State, a dominion of the British Commonwealth, having seceded from the United Kingdom under the anglo-irish Treaty.
It comprises 26 of आयरलैंड 's 32 counties.
चूंकि 1949 it has existed as the गणतंत्र of Ireland.
From its foundation, the Irish Free State थी embroiled in a civil war between nationalists supporting the Treaty and opponents who supported a गणतंत्र.
the pro-Treaty side, organised as cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious from the विरोध and won subsequent elections.
They formed the government of the state until 1932, when they peacefully handed over power to the anti-Treaty faction in fianna Fáil, who defeated them in an election.
The Irish state, despite its हिंसक beginnings, रै remained a liberal democracy throughout its existence.
a new constitution in 1937 removed many of the links with Britain established under the Treaty and Ireland 's neutrality in the Second World युद्ध demonstrated its independence in foreign policy matters from Britain.
In 1948 Ireland formally left the अंग्रेजों Commonwealth and adopted the title of `` Republic ''.
in the economic sphere, the आयरिश state has had a मिश्रित performance.
On independence, it was one of the wealthier countries in यूरोपीय per head of population.
however it also inherited इससे British rule the समस्याएं of unemployment, करणों, uneven geographical development और lack of a native industrial आधार.
For much of its इतिहास, the state struggled to rectify ये problems.
Particular peaks of emigration were recorded दौरान the लेट 1930s, 1950s और 1980s, जब the Irish economy recorded little growth.
In the 1930s, Fianna Fáil सरकारें attempted to create आयरिश domestic industries using subsidies and protective tarifs.
in the late 1950s, ये policies were dropped in favour of free trade with selected countries and encouraging of foreign investment with low taxes.
This was expanded when Ireland entered the European Economic Community in 1972.
in the 1990s and 2000s, Ireland experienced an आर्थिक boom known as the Celtic Tiger, in which the देश 's GDP surpassed many of its European neighbours.
Immigration भी surpassed emigration, bringing the state 's population up to over 4 million.
However, चूंकि 2008, Ireland has experienced a कठोर crisis in the banking सेक्टर and with sovereign debt.
the resultant economic slump रै deepened the effect of the world recession on Ireland.
From 1937 to 1998, the Irish संविधान included a अर्जी on Northern Ireland as a part of the नेशनल territory.
However, the राज्य also opposed and used its सुरक्षा forces against those armed groups - principally the Provisional आयरिश Republican Army, जो आजमाया to unite Ireland by force.
This occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s और 1980s and has जारी on a reduced scale.
Irish सरकारें meanwhile tried to broker an agreement to the conflict known as The Troubles within उत्तरी आयरलैंड from 1968 to the लेट 1990s.
The British government officially recognised the right of the Irish government to be a party to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985.
In 1998, as part of the Good Friday Agreement, the Irish constitution was altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim to Northern Ireland and instead extend the सही of Irish citizenship to सब the people of the island चाहिए they wish to have it.
John Quincy Adams ( July 11, 1767February 23, 1848 ) was the sixth अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1825–1829 ).
he परोसा as अमरीकी diplomat, Senator, and Congressional representative.
He थी a member of the Federalist, Democratic-Republican, नेशनल रिपब्लिकन, and later anti-masonic और Whig parties.
Adams was the बेटे of former President John Adams और Abigail Adams.
As a diplomat, Adams played an important role in negotiating अनेक international treaties, most notably the Treaty of ghent, जिससे ended the War of 1812.
as सचिव of State, he negotiated with the संयुक्त Kingdom over America 's northern किनारा साथ Canada, negotiated with Spain the annexation of Florida, and authored the Monroe Doctrine.
इतिहासकारों agree he थी एक of the greatest diplomats और secretaries of state in American history.
As president, he sought to modernize the American economy and promoted शिक्षा.
Adams enacted a part of his कार्यसूची and paid off much of the national debt.
He was stymied by a कॉंग्रेस controlled by उसके enemies, and उसके lack of patronage networks helped politicians eager to undercut उसे.
He lost his 1828 bid for re-election to Andrew जैक्सन.
in doing so, he became the पहला president since his पिता to serve a single term.
Adams is बेहतरीन known as a diplomat who तराशा America 's foreign policy in line with his ardently nationalist commitment to America 's republican values.
More recently Howe ( 2007 ) portrayed Adams as the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization.
During एडम्स ' आजीवन, technological innovations and new अर्थात् of communication spread messages of religious पुनरुद्धार, social reform, और पार्टी politics.
Goods, money, and people traveled more rapidly और efficiently than ever before.
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative इससे Massachusetts after leaving office, serving for the last 17 years of his life with far greater acclamation than he had achieved as president.
He is, so far, the only अध्यक्ष later elected to the United States हाउस of Representatives ( हालांकि जॉन Tyler was elected to the House of Representatives of the Confederate राज्य just before his death in 1862 ).
एनिमेटेड by उसके growing revulsion against slavery, एडम्स became a leading प्रतिद्वन्दी of the Slave Power.
he पूर्वानुमानित that if a civil war यहूद to break out, the president could abolish slavery by using his युद्ध powers.
Adams also predicted the Union 's dissolution over the slavery issue, but said that if the South became independent वहीँ would be a series of bloody slave revolts.
खिड़कियाँ Internet एक्सप्लोरर 9 ( ie9 ) is a version of the Internet Explorer web browser from Microsoft.
It was released to the public on March 14, 2011.
Microsoft रै released Internet Explorer 9 as a major out-of-band version that is not tied to the release schedule of any particular version of Windows, unlike previous संस्करण.
It is the first संस्करण चूंकि अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 2 to not be bundled with a Windows operating प्रणाली, although some OEMs have installed it with Windows 7 on their PCs, as खूब as new Windows 7 laptops.
The system आवश्यकताएँ for अंतरजाल Explorer 9 are खिड़कियाँ 7, Windows Server 2008 r2, Windows Vista Service Pack 2 or Windows Server 2008 SP2 with the Platform Update.
Windows xp और earlier हैं not समर्थित.
Internet Explorer 9 is the पिछला संस्करण of अंतरजाल Explorer to be समर्थित on Windows Vista.
Both IA-32 and x64 builds are available.
Internet Explorer 9 supports several CSS 3 गुण, embedded आईसीसी v2 or v4 color profiles support via खिड़कियाँ रंग प्रणाली, and has improved JavaScript performance.
It is the पिछला of the five major web browsers to implement support for Scalable Vector Graphics ( svg ).
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D, hardware-accelerated text रेंडरिंग using DirectWrite, hardware-accelerated video rendering using Media Foundation, imaging support provided by Windows Imaging Component, and ऊँची fidelity printing powered by the XML Paper Specification ( XPS ) print pipeline.
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the HTML5 video and audio tags and the Web Open Font स्वरूप.
alka-seltzer is an effervescent antacid and pain reliever first marketed by the Dr. Miles Medicine Company.
It was developed by मौरिस Treener, head केमिस्ट at Miles, in Elkhart, इंडियाना.
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of नाबालिग aches, pains, inflammation, fever, headache, heartburn, खट्टा पेट, indigestion, and hangovers, while neutralizing excess stomach acid.
It थी शुभारम्भ in 1931.
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer made to relieve colds and flu, Alka-Seltzer Plus, was बाद introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant, Alka-Mints, was introduced in 1994 and discontinued in 1997.
Alka-Seltzer is currently owned by बायर Schering फार्मा AG, Germany.
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' रै been विस्तारित to incorporate an entire line of medications sold over the counter and taken by means of rapidly dissolving tablets that रूप a carbonated solution in water.

A stalactite (, ; from the यूनानी stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to drip '', और meaning `` कि which drips '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem ( secondary खनिज ) that hangs इससे the ceiling of limestone गुफाएं.
It is a type of dripstone.
the corresponding formation on the floor of the cave is ज्ञात as a stalagmite.
Degree abbreviations हैं used as an alternative way to बताएँ an academic उपाधि instead of spelling आउट the title in full, such as in reference books like Who 's Who and on business cards.
Many degrees have more than one abbreviation.
In the UK, it is not generally the custom to punctuate abbreviations for degrees with full stops ( e.g. `` BSc '' rather than `` b.sc. ``.
Race is a वर्गीकरण system used to categorize humans into large and distinct populations or groups by anatomical, cultural, ethnic, genetic, geographical, ऐतिहासिक, linguistic, religious, or social affiliation.
First used to denote national affiliations, the term began to be used to सुनाना to physical traits in the 17th century.
in the early 20th century the term थी often used, in a taxonomic sense, to denote genetically differentiated इंसान populations defined by phenotype.
While biologists sometimes उपयोग the concept of रेस to make distinctions among fuzzy sets of traits, others in the scientific community suggest that the विचार of race often is used in a भोली or simplistic way, i.e. that among humans, race रै no taxonomic significance : सब living इंसानो belong to the same species, Homo sapiens and subspecies, Homo sapiens sapiens.
Social conceptions and groupings of races vary over time, involving folk taxonomies
that define of individuals based on perceived traits.
Scientists consider biological essentialism obsolete, और generally discourage जातिगत explanations लिये collective differentiation in both physical and behavioral traits.
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with the ideologies और theories that grew out of the कार्य of 19th-century anthropologists and physiologists has led to the use of the word रेस itself becoming समस्यापूर्ण.
Although still used in general contexts, it is now often replaced by अन्य words which are कम ambiguous और emotionally चार्ज, such as populations, people ( s ), ethnic समूह or communities depending on context.
Lucy Stone ( August 13, 1818 – October 19, 1893 ) was a prominent American abolitionist and suffragist, and a vocal advocate and आयोजक promoting rights for महिलाओं.
In 1847, स्टोन became the first woman from Massachusetts to earn a college degree.
She spoke out for women 's rights and against slavery at a time जब women were हतोत्साहित and prevented from public speaking.
Stone was the first recorded अमरीकी woman to retain her own last नाम बाद marriage.
Stone 's organizational क्रियाएँ लिये the cause of महिलाओं 's rights yielded tangible gains in the difficult political environment of the 19th century.
Stone helped initiate the first National महिलाओं 's Rights सम्मेलन and वो समर्थित और sustained it annually along with a number of अन्य local, state and regional activist conventions.
Stone spoke in front of a क्रमांक of विधान bodies to promote कानून giving more rights to women.
वो assisted in establishing the Woman 's National Loyal League to help pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery, बाद which वो helped form the largest group of like-minded women 's rights reformers, the politically moderate American Woman Suffrage Association, which worked लिये decades at the state level in favor of women 's सही to vote.
Stone wrote extensively about a wide दायरा of women 's rights, publishing and distributing speeches by herself and others, and convention कार्यवाही.
In the long-running और influential स्त्री 's जर्नल, a weekly periodical कि she established and प्रचारित, Stone aired both her own and differing views about women 's rights.
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the स्त्री 's rights movement '', Stone delivered a speech which sparked Susan B. एंथोनी to take up the cause of women 's suffrage.
Elizabeth Cady stanton लिखा that `` Lucy Stone was the first person by whom the heart of the American public थी deeply stirred on the स्त्री question. ''
Together, Anthony, Stanton, and Stone have been called the 19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage and feminism.
In finance, a bond is an यंत्र of indebtedness of the bond issuer to the holders.
It is a कर्ज़ security, under which the issuer owes the holders a debt and, depending on the शर्तें of the bond, is obliged to pay them ब्याज ( the कूपन ) or to repay the principal at a later date, termed the maturity.
Interest is usually payable at fixed intervals ( semiannual, annual, sometimes monthly ).
Very often the bond is परक्राम्य, i.e. the ownership of the instrument can be transferred in the secondary market.
Thus a bond is a form of ऋण or IOU : the होल्डर of the bond is the lender ( creditor ), the issuer of the bond is the borrower ( debtor ), and the coupon is the interest.
Bonds provide the borrower with external funds to finance long-term investments, or, in the case of government bonds, to finance current expenditure.
प्रमाणपत्र of deposit ( cds ) or short term वाणिज्यिक paper are माना to be money market instruments and not bonds : the main difference is in the लंबाई of the term of the यंत्र.
Bonds and stocks are both प्रतिभूति, but the major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी ( i.e. they are owners ), whereas bondholders have a creditor stake in the company ( i.e. they are lenders ).
Another difference is कि bonds usually have a defined term, or maturity, after which the bond is redeemed, whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely.
An exception is an irredeemable बंध, such as Consols, जिससे is a perpetuity, i.e. a bond with no maturity.

A scale model is a physical model, a representation or copy of an object कि is larger or छोटी than the वास्तविक size of the object, which seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical आकार of the original object.
Very often the scale मॉडल is प्रयुक्त as a मार्गदर्शिका to बनाना the ऑब्जेक्ट in पूरा size.
Scale models are built or collected for many reasons.
The zune HD थी a पोर्टेबल media खिलाड़ी in the Zune उत्पाद परिवार released on September 15, 2009 by microsoft.
It was a direct competitor with the Apple iPod and iPhone series of mobile devices.

a 64 GB version was released on April 9, 2010.

the Zune HD utilized the Nvidia Tegra apx 2600 chip, allowing it to खेल 720p video through the वैकल्पिक HDMI Zune dock on a high-definition television.
Otherwise, सामग्री होता be scaled down to 480x272 pixels on the player 's OLED टचस्क्रीन.

Execution by electrocution, usually performed using an electric chair, is an execution method originating in the United States in which the condemned person is strapped to a विशेषकर built wooden chair और electrocuted through electrodes placed on the देह.
This execution method was created by employees of Thomas Edison during the युद्ध of currents, और has been used only in the United States and, for a period of several decades, in the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation, last in 1976 ).
historically, once the condemned व्यक्ति was attached to the chair, various cycles ( differing in voltage and duration ) of alternating वर्तमान would be passed through the individual 's देह, in order to कारण fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ).
The first jolt of electric current was designed to कारण तात्कालिक unconsciousness और brain death ; the दूसरी one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital अंगों.
Death was frequently caused by विद्युत overstimulation of the heart.
हालांकि in the United States the electric chair has become a प्रतीक of the death penalty, इसके use is in मनाही due to the rise of lethal injection, जिससे is widely believed to be a अधिक humane method of execution.
Although some states स्टिल maintain electrocution as a विधि of execution, today it is only maintained as a द्वितीयक method that may be chosen over lethal injection at the request of the prisoner.
as of 2010, electrocution is an optional form of execution in Alabama, Florida, South Carolina and Virginia.
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal इंजेक्शन as an alternative method.
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee, the electric chair has महरूम रिटायर्ड except for those whose capital crimes were committed prior to legislated dates in 1998 ( केंटकी : March 31, 1998 ; टेनेसी : December 31, 1998 ) and who chose electrocution.
In दोनो states, inmates who do not choose electrocution or inmates who committed their अपराधों बाद the designated date are killed by lethal इंजेक्शन.
the electric chair is an alternate form of निष्पादन स्वीकृत for potential उपयोग in Arkansas और Oklahoma if other forms of execution are found असंवैधानिक in the state at the समय of execution.
It is the sole method of निष्पादन in वर्मांट, where treason is the only capital crime.
On February 8, 2008, the Nebraska Supreme Court determined कि execution by electric chair थी a `` बेदर्द and unusual दंड '' under the state 's constitution.
This brought executions of this type to an end in Nebraska, the only remaining state to retain electrocution as its एकमात्र method of execution लिये murder.
The Maryland House of delegates is the lower हाउस of the General Assembly, the state legislature of the American State of Maryland, और is composed of 141 Delegates निर्वाचित from 47 districts.
The हाउस of Delegates कक्ष is located in the Maryland State House ( state capitol ) on State Circle in Annapolis, जिससे is the state capital.
The राज्य House also घरों the Maryland State Senate Chamber and the offices of the Governor and Lieutenant Governor of the State of Maryland.
प्रत्येक Delegate has कार्यालयों in Annapolis, in the nearby Casper R. टेलर, Jr. House Office Building.
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the Battle लिये Paris ) took place during World War II from 19 August 1944 until the आत्मसमर्पण of the occupying जर्मनी garrison on 25 August.
The मुक्ति of Paris प्रारंभ with an uprising by the French Resistance against the German गैरीसन.
On 24 अगस्त, the French Forces of the Interior ( Forces françaises de l'intérieur, FFI ) received reinforcements from the Free फ्रेंच Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third फौज under सामान्य Patton.
The पूंजी प्रदेश of France had been governed by नाजी Germany चूंकि the हस्ताक्षर of the Second Compiègne Armistice in जून 1940, when the German Army occupied northern and westernmost फ़्रांस, and when the कठपुतली regime of Vichy फ़्रांस was established in the town of vichy in central फ़्रांस.
This battle marked the liberation of Paris and the निर्वासन of the Vichy government to Sigmaringen in Germany.
However, there was स्टिल much heavy fighting to be done पहले France थी liberated, including the अभियान in दक्षिणी फ़्रांस during August-September ( in provence and extending into the southwestern region of the Vosges Mountains ), along the German-held seaports of western फ़्रांस ( such as at brest and Dunkirk ), in alsace and Lorraine in eastern France, and in northeastern फ़्रांस, such as along the राइन and moder Rivers.
The German Army and ss fought doggedly in these areas for the remainder of 1944 and into 1945.
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as `` Feeling Alright '' is a सोंग written by Dave Mason of the अंग्रेज़ी rock band Traffic from their eponymous 1968 एल्बम, Traffic.
The सोंग थी also a hit single for several performers : Joe cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, US # 33 ), Mongo santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) और Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971, us # 54 ).
It रै also महरूम recorded by तीन Dog Night ( 1969 ), The 5th Dimension ( 1970 ), Lou राल्स, Freddie किंग, Paul weller, Lulu, chairmen of the फलक ( 1970 ), Rare Earth, The इलेक्ट्रिक Concept Orchestra, Mother 's Finest ( 1973 ), The Ohio Players ( 1971 ), डायना Ross with the जैक्सन 5 ( 1971 ), Maceo Parker, Gladys Knight & the Pips, Widespread दहशत and The ब्लैक crowes.
A स्टील Drum version by Trinidad Oil कम्पनी was reissued on the dancefloor jazz compilation Blue Juice 2.
It was also featured in the 2000 film Duets, sung by Huey लुईस.

An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving अवधारणा defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information परिचय individual मरीजों or populations.
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically capable of being shared across different स्वास्थ्य परवाह जमावट.
In कुछ cases इस sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना systems और other सूचना networks or exchanges.
ehrs may include a range of data, including demographics, medical इतिहास, medication and allergies, immunization status, laboratory test results, radiology images, vital signs, निजी stats जैसे age and weight, and बिलिंग information.
ऋण origination is the process by which a borrower applies लिये a नई ऋण, and a lender processes that application.
Origination generally includes all the steps from लेने a loan application up to disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ).
Loan सर्विसिंग covers सबकुछ after disbursing the funds जबतक the loan is fully सशुल्क off.
Loan origination is a specialized version of नई account opening for वित्तीय services संगठन.
Certain people and organizations specialize in ऋण origination.
Mortgage brokers and अन्य mortgage originator companies serve as a prominent example.
There हैं many different types of loans.
लिये more information on loan types, see the loan and consumer lending articles.
Steps involved in originating a loan vary by loan type, various kinds of loan risk, नियामक, lender policy, and other factors.
Top left : The Tennessee Valley प्राधिकार, भाग of the New Deal, होने signed into law in 1933.
Top right : Franklin Delano Roosevelt, who was responsible लिये पहलों and programs collectively known as the नई Deal.
Bottom : a public mural इससे one of the artists employed by the New Deal.
The नई Deal was a series of economic programs enacted in the United States between 1933 and 1936.
They involved अध्यक्षीय कार्यपालिका orders or laws passed by कॉंग्रेस दौरान the first term of President फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt.
The कार्यक्रम were in response to the ग्रेट Depression, and केन्द्रित on what historians कॉल the `` 3 rs '' : Relief, Recovery, and Reform.
That is Relief लिये the unemployed and poor ; Recovery of the economy to normal levels ; and Reform of the financial system to prevent a repeat depression.
the New Deal उत्पादित a राजनैतिक realignment, बनाना the Democratic Party the majority ( as well as the पार्टी that held the White House for seven out of nine Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ), with its base in liberal ideas, the white South, traditional Democrats, big city machines, and the newly empowered labor संघ और ethnic minorities.
The republicans were split, साथ conservatives opposing the entire New Deal as an enemy of business and growth, and उदारवादियों accepting some of it and promising to make it more कुशल.
The realignment crystallized into the नई Deal Coalition that dominated most presidential elections into the 1960s, while the विपक्ष रूढ़िवादी Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963.
By 1936 the term `` liberal '' typically was used for supporters of the New Deal, and `` रूढ़िवादी `` for its opponents.
From 1934 to 1938, Roosevelt was assisted in his endeavours by a “pro-spender” majority in Congress ( drawn from two-party, competitive, non-machine, प्रगतिशील, और Left party districts ).
As विख्यात by Alexander Hicks, “Roosevelt, backed by rare, non-Southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-Southern Democrat प्रतिनिधि and 71 non-Southern Democrat सीनेटरों — spelled Second New Deal reform.”
Many इतिहासकारों distinguish between a `` First नई सौदे '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second New Deal '' ( 1935–38 ), साथ the second one more liberal and more controversial.
the `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt साथ diverse groups, from banking and railroads to industry और farming, all of which demanded सहायता लिये economic survival.
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration, for उदाहरण, provided $ 500 million for relief operations by राज्य और cities, while the short-lived CWA ( Civil Works Administration ) gave localities money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34.
the `` Second New सौदे `` in 1935–38 included the वेगनर Act to promote labor unions, the Works Progress प्रशासन ( wpa ) relief program ( जिससे made the संघीय government by far the largest single employer in the nation ), the Social Security अधिनियम, and नई programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers.
The final प्रमुख वस्तुएं of New Deal legislation were the creation of the संयुक्त राज्य Housing Authority and Farm Security Administration, both in 1937, and the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, which set maximum hours and minimum wages for most categories of मजदूर.
The economic downturn of 1937–38, and the bitter विभाजित between the AFL and cio labor unions led to प्रमुख Republican gains in Congress in 1938.
Conservative Republicans and डेमोक्रेट in Congress joined in the informal Conservative Coalition.
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs such as the WPA and CCC और blocked major liberal proposals.
Roosevelt खुद turned his ध्यान to the war effort, और won reelection in 1940 and 1944.
the Supreme अदालत declared the National रिकवरी Administration ( NRA ) and the पहला version of the agricultural Adjustment Act ( AAA ) unconstitutional, however the AAA थी rewritten and then upheld.
as the first रिपब्लिकन president elected बाद FDR, Dwight D. Eisenhower ( 1953–61 ) left the नई Deal largely intact, even expanding it in कुछ areas.
in the 1960s, Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the नई Deal as inspiration for a dramatic expansion of liberal programs, which Republican रिचर्ड M. Nixon generally retained.
बाद 1974, however, the call for deregulation of the economy gained bipartisan support.
the नई Deal विनियमन of बैंकिंग ( Glass–Steagall Act ) was suspended in the 1990s.
Many New सौदे programs remain क्रियाशील, with some स्टिल operating under the original names, सहित the संघीय Deposit Insurance Corporation ( fdic ), the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ), the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ), और the Tennessee Valley प्राधिकार ( TVA ).
the largest programs स्टिल in existence today are the Social Security System and the Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ).
A woman ( ), pl : women ( ) is a female human.
The term स्त्री is usually reserved for an adult, with the term girl being the usual term for a मादा child or adolescent.
however, the term woman is also sometimes used to identify a female human, regardless of age, as in phrases such as `` Women 's rights ``.
Women हैं typically capable of giving birth, though older women who have gone through menopause and some intersex महिलाओं can not.
`` I Do n't Want to मिस a Thing '' is a song performed by American चट्टान बैंड Aerosmith for the 1998 film Armageddon.
Written by Diane Warren, the song debuted at number one on the Billboard hot 100 ( the first # 1 for the band after 28 सालो साथ ).
the song stayed at number एक for चार सप्ताह from September 5 to September 26, 1998.
The सोंग भी stayed at number 1 for several weeks in several other countries.
In the UK, the song peaked at number चार, becoming Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the UK, जहाँ it was the 17th best-selling सिंगल of 1998, and रै sold over a million copies.
हालांकि not used by the majority of the world 's countries, daylight छायांकन time is आम in the पश्चिमी संसार.
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer time in British English — is the practice of advancing clocks during the lighter months so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have less.
Typically clocks are adjusted forward एक घंटा near the start of spring and are adjusted पिछड़ा in autumn.
The modern idea of daylight saving was first proposed in 1895 by George Vernon Hudson and it was first implemented during the First World War.
Many countries have used it at various times since then.
Much of the United States used DST in the 1950s और 1960s, and DST use expanded following the 1970s energy crisis and has been widely प्रयुक्त in उत्तर अमेरिका and Europe since तब.
the अभ्यास has महरूम दोनो praised and criticized.
Adding daylight to evenings लाभ retailing, sports, and other activities कि exploit sunlight after working hours, but can cause problems for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun.
Although an early goal of DST was to reduce संध्या usage of incandescent lighting ( formerly a primary use of electricity ), modern heating और कूलिंग usage patterns differ greatly, and शोध परिचय कैसा DST फिलहाल affects energy use is limited or contradictory.
DST क्लॉक shifts present अन्य चुनौतियां.
They complicate timekeeping, and can disrupt बैठक, travel, billing, record keeping, medical devices, heavy equipment, और sleep patterns.
Software can often adjust computer clocks automatically, but this can be limited और error-prone, particularly when dst dates are changed.

Montargis is a commune in the Loiret department in north-central फ़्रांस on the Loing river.
The town is located about दक्षिण of Paris and east of Orléans in the Gâtinais.
Montargis is the second largest नगर in the loiret, after Orléans.
It is near a large forest, and contains लाइट industry and farming, including saffron.
Due to इसके numerous canals और bridges, Montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` Venice of the gâtinais. ''
Though quite modern, it retains a medieval आकर्षण in its downtown area.
In कंप्यूटर storage, a logical unit number, or LUN, is a number used to identify a logical unit, जिससे is a device addressed by the SCSI protocol or protocols which encapsulate SCSI, ऐसे as fibre Channel or iSCSI.
A LUN may be प्रयुक्त with कोई device which supports read/write operations, such as a tape drive, but is most often used to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN.
हालांकि not technically correct, the term `` LUN '' is प्रायः also प्रयुक्त to refer to the logical disk itself.
The Gospel According to Mark (,, to euangelion kata Markon ), commonly shortened to the Gospel of Mark or बस Mark, is the second किताब of the New Testament.
This canonical account of the life of Jesus of Nazareth is one of the three synoptic gospels.
it was thought to be an epitome, which accounts for its प्लेस as the second gospel in the Bible.
however, most contemporary scholars now regard it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That Mark was प्रयुक्त as a source for the other synoptic gospels Gospel of Matthew and Gospel of Luke is widely held by many, although not all, New Testament scholars.
the Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of Jesus इससे his baptism by John the Baptist to his मौत and resurrection.
It focuses particularly on the last week of his life ( chapters 11–16 ) in Jerusalem.
Its swift narrative portrays Jesus as a heroic man of action, an exorcist, healer and miracle कार्यकर्ता.
An महत्वपूर्ण theme of Mark is the Messianic Secret.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, tries unsuccessfully to keep his मुक्तिदाता identity रहस्य, and conceals his message with parables.
Meanwhile, the disciples fail to understand दोनो the implication of the miracles of Jesus and the अर्थ of the things he predicts about his गिरफ़्तार, death and resurrection.
Most विद्वानों believe that the original टेक्स्ट of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 with the discovery of Jesus ' empty tomb and कि the following खाता of his resurrection दिखावे is a बाद जोड.
According to tradition and some early church लेखक, the author is Mark the Evangelist, the companion of the apostle पीटर.
The gospel, however, appears to rely on several underlying sources, varying in form and in theology, जिससे tells against the tradition कि the gospel थी आधारित on पीटर 's preaching.
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness खाते as खूब as known apostolic preachings, and pre-existing written records that do not exist today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century टीकाकारों.
Some of the कहानियां in the gospel may have been transmitted orally before being written down.
विभिन्न elements within the gospel सुझाएँ that the author wrote in Syria or Palestine लिये a non-jewish Christian community.
The Lord of the Rings is an epic high काल्पनिक novel written by English philologist and University of Oxford professor J. R. R. tolkien.
The स्टोरी began as a sequel to Tolkien 's 1937 children 's fantasy novel The Hobbit, but eventually developed into a much larger work.
It was written in stages between 1937 and 1949, much of it during World War II.
It is the second best-selling novel ever लिखा, साथ over 150 million नक़ल बेची.
The title of the novel refers to the स्टोरी 's main विपक्षी, the Dark Lord Sauron, who had in an earlier age created the One रिंग to rule the other Rings of Power as the ultimate हथियार in his अभियान to conquer and नियम all of Middle-earth.
इससे quiet beginnings in the Shire, a Hobbit land not unlike the English countryside, the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth, following the कोर्स of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters, notably the hobbits Frodo Baggins, Samwise `` Sam '' Gamgee, Meriadoc `` Merry '' Brandybuck और Peregrin `` pippin '' Took, but also the hobbits ' chief allies and यात्राएं companions : Aragorn, a Human Ranger ; boromir, a man from Gondor ; Gimli, a Dwarf warrior ; legolas, an Elven prince ; and Gandalf, a Wizard.
the work was initially intended by Tolkien to be one volume of a two-volume नियत, with the अन्य होने The Silmarillion, but this idea was dismissed by his publisher.
It was decided for economic reasons to प्रकाशित The Lord of the Rings as three volumes over the course of a year from 29 July 1954 to 20 October 1955, thus creating the now familiar Lord of the बजती त्रयी.
The three volumes यहूद entitled the फेलोशिप of the Ring, the Two Towers, and The Return of the किंग.
Structurally, the novel is विभाजित internally into six books, two प्रति volume, with several appendices of background material included at the end of the third volume.
The Lord of the Rings has since been reprinted numerous times and translated into many भाषाएं.
Tolkien 's work रै been the विषय of extensive analysis of its themes and origins.
Although a major work in itself, the story was तभी the last movement of a larger epic Tolkien था worked on चूंकि 1917, in a process he described as mythopoeia.
Influences on this पहले कार्य, and on the story of The Lord of the Rings, include philology, mythology, religion and the author 's distaste for the effects of industrialization, as well as earlier काल्पनिक works और tolkien 's experiences in World युद्ध I.
The Lord of the बजती in its turn is considered to have had a great effect on modern काल्पनिक ; the प्रभाव of Tolkien 's works is ऐसे that the use of the words `` Tolkienian '' and `` tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary.
The enduring popularity of The रब of the Rings has led to numerous references in popular culture, the founding of many समाजों by fans of tolkien 's works, and the publication of many books about Tolkien and his works.
The Lord of the Rings has inspired, and continues to inspire, artwork, music, films और television, video खेल, and subsequent literature.
award-winning adaptations of The Lord of the Rings have been made लिये radio, theatre, and फिल्मी.

The San फ्रांसिस्को 49ers conduct training camp at the टोली 's headquarters और अभ्यास facility in सांता Clara, California in August 2010.
The offense is wearing red jerseys with the exception of quarterback Alex Smith, who is in a black jersey ; the रक्षा in white.
in the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग, training camp refers to the time before the season commences.
दौरान this time, teams होगा sometimes congregate at an outside location, usually a विश्वविद्यालयों, to conduct training camp for at least the first few सप्ताह.
This is similar to baseball 's spring training.
Training camp is used in several different तरीके.
New players and coaches use it to acclimate themselves to नई teammates और systems.
For younger players, it serves as a period of evaluation ; for veterans, it is time to round back into form.
Training शिविर is divided into several different components.
The first is scrimmages.
These are pseudo-games where teams run nearly full games ' worth of plays.
Sometimes, two practice sessions are held on the वही day.
This concept is referred to as two-a-days.
अन्य parts of प्रशिक्षण शिविर include drills, meetings साथ कोच और other players at एक 's स्थिति, weight training, and pre-season games.
the latter half of प्रशिक्षण camp leads directly into the exhibition ऋतु.
With NFL training camps starting in late-July, the biggest concern has been dehydration.
in 2001, Minnesota Vikings player Korey Stringer died of a चिकित्सा condition based from dehydration and heatstroke.
The मौत of stringer prompted the एनएफएल to change their training policies.
At each practice, every टोली must have the team doctor और trainers on the फ़ील्ड ; additionally, an ambulance must be present during practices.
With एनएफएल training camps beginning in late July, severe weather can affect अभ्यास and exhibition खेल.
In 2002, a Cleveland Browns exhibition game ended due to बिजली निकट Cleveland भूरा Stadium, and severe storms have been known to disrupt training camps.
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training camp to catch an जल्दी dekh at the players ; admission to practices is often free or substantially less expensive than a game ticket, making प्रशिक्षण camp यात्राएँ a popular विकल्प लिये fans who can not attend अनेक खेल due to financial or other कारण.
एनएफएल teams often sell कलाकृतियां and concessions at camp sites along with offering क्रियाएँ and events to make training camp a more fan-friendly experience.
In computing, a file system ( or filesystem ) is a type of data store which can be used to store, retrieve और update a set of files.
the term could refer to the abstract आंकड़ा structures प्रयुक्त to define files, or to the actual software or firmware components that implement the abstract ideas.
Some file systems are used on local data storage devices ; others provide file अभिगम via a network protocol ( e.g. nfs, SMB, or 9p clients ).
कुछ file systems are `` आभासी '', in that the `` files '' supplied are computed on निवेदन ( e.g. procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a बैकिंग स्टोर.
The file system manages अभिगम to both the content of files and the मेटाडेटा about those files.
It is responsible for arranging storage space ; reliability, efficiency, और tuning with लिहाज़ to the physical storage medium are महत्वपूर्ण डिज़ाइन considerations.
William Howard Taft ( September 15, 1857 – कूच 8, 1930 ) was the 27th President of the United States ( 1909–1913 ) and बाद the दसवाँ Chief Justice of the United States ( 1921–1930 ).
He is the तभी person to have परोसा in दोनो of these offices.
Before becoming President, Taft, a Republican, थी selected to serve on the श्रेष्ठ Court of Cincinnati in 1887.
In 1890, Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the United States and in 1891 a judge on the United States अदालत of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
in 1900, President William mckinley appointed Taft governor-general of the Philippines.
In 1904, President Theodore रूज़वेल्ट appointed Taft सचिव of War in an effort to groom Taft, then his close political ally, into his handpicked अध्यक्षीय successor.
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving, assuming on some occasions the role of acting Secretary of State, while declining repeated offers from Roosevelt to serve on the Supreme Court.
सवारी a wave of popular support for fellow Republican Roosevelt, taft जीती an easy विजय in उसके 1908 bid for the presidency.
In his only term, taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting, civil service reform, strengthening the Interstate Commerce Commission, improving the प्रदर्शन of the postal service, and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment.
Abroad, Taft sought to further the आर्थिक development of राष्ट्र in लैटिन America and Asia through `` Dollar Diplomacy ``, और showed decisiveness and restraint in जवाब to revolution in Mexico.
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the political ramifications of उसके decisions, often alienated his अपना कुंजी constituencies, और was overwhelmingly पराजित in his बोली लिये a दूसरी term in the presidential election of 1912.
in surveys of presidential scholars, Taft is usually ranked near the मध्य of सूचियाँ of all American Presidents.
After leaving दफ्तर, Taft spent his time in academia, arbitration, and the search लिये संसार peace through his self-founded League to Enforce Peace.
in 1921, after the First World War, President वारेन G. Harding नियुक्त Taft Chief Justice of the United States.
taft परोसा in this capacity until shortly before his death in 1930.
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced और directed by सेसिल B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical स्टोरी of the Exodus, in which the hebrew-born Moses, an अपनाया Egyptian prince, becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves.
It starred Charlton हेस्टन in the सीसे role, Yul Brynner as his adoptive bhai, Pharaoh rameses ii, ऐनी Baxter as Nefretiri, Edward G. Robinson as Dathan, Yvonne de Carlo as sephora, Debra Paget as Lilia, and जॉन Derek as Joshua.
the supporting डाल includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke as Pharaoh सेती I, Nina foch as Bithiah, Martha Scott as Yoshebel, Judith एंडरसन as Memnet, Vincent Price as baka, and John Carradine as आरोन.
the film was released by Paramount Pictures in vistavision on अक्तूबर 5, 1956.
The Ten Commandments, which demille narrated, was the last film that he directed.
He was set to direct the 1958 remake of his 1938 film The Buccaneer, but his फाइनल बीमारी forced him to बाज़ the directing chores to his son-in-law, कर्ता एंथोनी Quinn.
DeMille had also planned to film the जीवन of Lord Baden पावेल, the founder of the Scout गति, with David Niven ; this project was never realized.
The Ten Commandments is a partial रीमेक of DeMille 's 1923 silent film.
Some of the cast and crew of the 1956 संस्करण worked on the original.
It रै since been remade as a television miniseries broadcast in April 2006.
The Ten Commandments is one of the सबसे financially successful films ever made, grossing over $ 65 million at the U.S. box office.
Adjusting for inflation, this makes it the छठे highest-grossing film domestically, with an adjusted total of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
The बक्सा दफ्तर website `` the Numbers '' सूचियाँ the domestic gross at $ 80 million.
In 1999, the Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States National Film रजिस्ट्री by the Library of Congress as होने `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
in June 2008, the American Film Institute revealed its `` Ten Top Ten `` —the बेहतरीन ten films in ten अमरीकी film genres—after polling over 1,500 people इससे the रचनात्मक community.
The Ten Commandments was listed as the tenth बेहतरीन film in the एपिक genre.
The फिल्मी received seven Academy Award nominations including Best Picture, और won the अकादमी पुरस्कार for Best विज़ुअल Effects.
Charlton Heston was nominated for a Golden Globe पुरस्कार for Best Motion Picture Actor in the drama category.
Yul Brynner जीती the National Board of Review पुरस्कार for Best Actor for उसके role as rameses, along with his other roles in The King and I and Anastasia.
Louisville (, or ) is a major city और the largest city in the U.S. state of केंटकी and the county seat of Jefferson County.
Since 2003, the city 's borders have been with those of the county because of a city-county merger.
The नगर 's total consolidated population at the 2010 census थी 741,096 ( Louisville 's balance total, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous towns and is the जनसांख्यिकी listed in most sources and national rankings ).
As of 2010, the Louisville metropolitan area ( MSA ) had a population of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally.
The मैट्रो area includes louisville-jefferson County and 12 surrounding counties, eight in Kentucky और four in Southern Indiana ( देखिए Geography below ).
The louisville Combined Statistical Area, having a population of 1,451,564, शामिल the MSA, hardin County and larue County in Kentucky, and Scott County, Indiana.
an important internal shipping port in the 19th century, Louisville आज is best ज्ञात as the location of the Kentucky Derby, the first of three annual thoroughbred horse races making up the ट्रिपल Crown.
a typical प्रायोगिक सेटअप for an aldol reaction.
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone कूलिंग bath ( −78 °C ) the temperature of which is होने monitored by a thermocouple ( the तार on the left ).
a cooling bath, in laboratory chemistry ( प्रायः but not always organic chemistry ) practice, is a liquid मिश्रण जिससे is प्रयुक्त to maintain low temperatures, typically between 13 °C and −196 °C.
These low temperatures are used to collect liquids after distillation, to remove solvents using a rotary evaporator, or to perform a रासायनिक reaction नीचे room तापमान ( देखिए : गतिज कंट्रोल ).
Cooling baths are generally एक of two types : ( a ) a ठंडा fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen, water, or even एयर ) — but most commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture of 3 components : ( 1 ) a कूलिंग agent ( ऐसे as dry ice or water ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid 'कैरीr ' ( such as liquid water, ethylene glycol, acetone, etc. ), which transfers ऊष्मा between the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid system.
( A परिचित example of इस is the उपयोग of an ice/rock-salt मिश्रण to freeze ice cream.
The phase-change of ice into liquid water requires energy, 'pulling ' heat इससे the system.
adding salt lowers the temp at which this happens, meaning more energy has to be absorbed इससे the environment in order to melt the ice.
इस effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it जरूर 'pull ' अधिक heat from its environment to become liquid. )
खाने disorders are conditions defined by असामान्य eating आदतें that may involve either insufficient or excessive खाना intake to the detriment of an individual 's physical and mental health.
Bulimia nervosa and anorexia nervosa are the most common विशिष्ट forms in the United Kingdom.
Other types of eating disorders शामिल binge खाने विकार and eating disorder not otherwise निर्दिष्ट.
bulimia nervosa is a disorder characterized by binge eating and purging.
Purging can include self-induce उल्टी, over-exercising, and the usage of diuretics, enemas, and laxatives.
एनोरेक्सिया nervosa is characterized by extreme food restriction to the point of self-starvation and excessive वज़न loss.
Though primarily विचार of as affecting महिलाओं ( an अनुमानित 5–10 लाख being affected in the U.K. ), eating disorders affect males as खूब.
An estimated 10 – 15 % of लोगों with eating disorders are males ( Gorgan, 1999 ).
( an estimated 1 million U.K. males होने affected ).
Although eating विकार are increasing सब over the world among both men and women, there is प्रमाण to suggest that it is women in the Western world who are at the उच्चतम risk of विकासशील them and the degree of westernization increases the risk.
Nearly half of सब Americans personally जान someone साथ an eating disorder.
The skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously चूंकि leptin was discovered, and the कौशल to observe the कृत्यों of the brain as well.
Interactions between motivational, homeostatic और self-regulatory कंट्रोल processes are involved in eating आचरण, which is a key component in खाने disorders.
The precise cause of eating disorders is नहीं entirely understood, but there is प्रमाण that it may be linked to other medical conditions and situations.
Cultural idealization of thinness और youthfulness have contributed to eating disorders affecting diverse populations.
One study showed that girls साथ ADHD have a greater chance of getting an eating disorder than those not affected by ADHD.
Another study suggested that women with PTSD, especially due to sexually related trauma, हैं अधिक likely to develop anorexia nervosa.
One study showed कि foster girls are more likely to develop bulimia nervosa.
Some think that पीर pressure and idealized body-types देखी in the media are also a significant फ़ैक्टर.
Some research show that for certain people वहीँ are जेनेटिक reasons why they may be prone to developing an eating disorder.
Recent studies have found evidence a correlation between patients with bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders.
In addition, anxiety disorders and personality disorders हैं आम occurrences with क्लाइंट of खाने disorders.
जबकि proper treatment can be अत्यधिक effective for अनेक suffering from specific types of eating disorders, the consequences of खाने विकार can be severe, including death ( whether from direct चिकित्सा effects of disturbed eating habits or इससे comorbid conditions ऐसे as suicidal सोच ).
Slavery in the United States existed from the early years of the colonial period ; it was firmly स्थापित by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776.
However, by 1804, all states north of the मेसन और Dixon Line had either abolished slavery outright or passed laws for the gradual abolition of slavery.
in 1787 Congress prohibited गुलामी in the उत्तरपश्चिम Territory.
But slavery gained new life in the South with the cotton industry after 1800, and expanded into the Southwest.
the nation थी polarized into स्लेव and free states along the Mason-Dixon Line, which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland.
The United States and Great Britain both निषिद्ध the international slave trade in 1808, but the domestic trade, साथ sales to the Deep South, expanded dramatically, and many captives यहूद shipped by the coastwise स्लेव trade.
पहले the 1840s, the South was vigorously defending slavery and its expansion into the territories.
In the North some abolitionists denounced it as sinful, and numerous anti-slavery forces rejected it as detrimental to the अधिकारों of free men.
After failed compromises and Abraham Lincoln 's चुनाव, in 1861 eleven slave states broke away to form the Confederate States of America, leading to the American Civil War.
The federal government in 1862 made abolition of slavery a युद्ध goal.
In January 1863 President lincoln freed स्लेव in the Confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation.
After the war, the Thirteenth amendment, effective December 1865, abolished slavery throughout the entire United States, सहित the किनारा states and the भारतीय territories.
From the 16th to the 19th centuries, an estimated 12 million Africans यहूद shipped as slaves to the Americas.
See Slavery in the Americas.
The great majority went to the शुगर plantations of the West Indies or Brazil, जहाँ मृत्यु was high.
About 645,000 were brought to what is now the संयुक्त States.
By the 1860 United राज्य जनसांख्यिकी, the slave population in the American South had grown to four million.
of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 स्लेव states, nearly 400,000 held slaves ( roughly one in four ), amounting to 8 % of सब American families.
जबकि some slaves worked as house servants and urban artisans, the great बहुमत worked on plantations or large farms, cultivating lucrative cash फसलों, such as rice, tobacco, sugar and, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
By 1860 most slaves were held in the Deep दक्षिण, जहाँ they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton.
In small operations, they worked with their owners.
In large plantations they were directed by white paid overseers.
Under the प्रणाली that became chattel गुलामी ( ownership of a human होने, and of his/her descendants ), a racial element थी आधारभूत : slaves were blacks of African descent and owned, almost universally, by whites of European descent.
In the 17th century, Virginia, followed by other southern colonies, enacted law that children of slave mothers were born into slavery.
Slaves could gain freedom तभी by कार्यशील away ( which was difficult and illegal to do ), or by manumission by owners, जिससे was regulated by राज्य, and became increasingly difficult or prohibited.
In the earliest era of chattel गुलामी, the colonies also organized work by a प्रणाली of bonded labor known as indentured servitude.
This typically lasted लिये several years लिये both ग़रीब Europeans and Africans alike, to pay off the लागत of transport to the colonies.
They contracted for such arrangements क्युकी of poor economies in their home countries.
Between 1680 and 1700, as कम Europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to import अधिक Africans as स्लेव.
Recognizing the importance of slavery, the House of Burgesses in Virginia enacted a new slave कोड in 1705 ; it combined a किस्में of विधान and added new provisions enforcing श्वेत supremacy in the law.
Schematic क्रॉस खण्ड of part of पत्ता, xylem shown as red वृत्त at figure 8.
Xylem is one of the two प्रकार of transport tissue in vascular पौधे ( phloem is the other ).
the word जाइलम is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is wood, though it is found throughout the plant.
इसके basic function is to transport water, लकिन it also transports कुछ nutrients through the plant.
This clock representation shows कुछ of the major units of geological time और definitive events of Earth history.
The Hadean eon represents the time before fossil रिकार्ड of life on Earth ; इसके अपर boundary is now regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion years पहले ).
Other subdivisions reflect the evolution of life ; the archean and Proterozoic are both eons, the Palaeozoic, Mesozoic and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic eon.
The two million year Quaternary period, the time of recognizable humans, is too small to be visible at this स्केल.
The geologic time स्केल is a system of कालानुक्रमिक मापन that relates stratigraphy to time, and is used by geologists, paleontologists, and other earth scientists to describe the timing and relationships between events that have occurred throughout Earth 's history.
The तालिका of geologic time spans presented here agrees साथ the dates and nomenclature set forth by the International आयोग on Stratigraphy standard color codes of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Commission on Stratigraphy.
प्रमाण from radiometric dating indicates that the Earth is about 4.54 billion years old.
The भूविज्ञान or deep time of Earth 's past has been organized into various units according to events which took प्लेस in each period.
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by changes in the संयोजन of strata which correspond to them, indicating major geological or paleontological कार्यक्रम, such as द्रव्यमान extinctions.
For example, the boundary between the Cretaceous काल and the Paleogene period is defined by the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event, which marked the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of जीवन.
Older time spans which predate the reliable चट्टान record ( before the Proterozoic Eon ) are पारिभाषित by absolute age.
The TI-82 is a graphing calculator made by Texas Instruments.
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a stripped down, more user friendly version of the ti-85, and as a बदलना लिये the TI-81.
It was the सीधा predecessor of the TI-83.
It shares with the TI-85 a 6 MHz zilog z80 microprocessor.
Like the TI-81, the TI-82 features a 96x64 पिक्सेल प्रदर्शक, and the core feature set of the TI-81 with many नई features.
The cast of characters of the King of सेनानी XI.
The King of Fighters fighting game series, produced by SNK Playmore, includes a wide cast of वर्ण, some of which are taken from other SNK games.
The स्टोरी takes place in a fictional universe in which an सालाना series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held.
The पहला game in the series introduces the initial main character of the series, kyo Kusanagi, a young जापानी fighter who is the heir to a powerful समूह of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities.
Kyo झगड़े against the kusanagi clan 's दुश्मनों, his rival Iori Yagami, and the god Orochi and its human अनुसरणकर्ता, among others.
The पहला four खेल in the series revolve about these झगड़े, while The King of Fighters '99 introduces a नई story arc, revolving around K ', a young man who seeks to नष्ट the रहस्यमय NESTS organization because वे kidnapped him at an early age and stripped him of उसके past यादें, so कि they could force him to be a सेनानी under their control.
In The King of सेनानी 2003, a new अक्षर named Ash Crimson enters the टूर्नामेंट, to steal the powers of the clans who sealed the Orochi in the पास्ट for an अनजान reason.
A new group of antagonists, known as Those From the Past, also appears in the series ; they want to obtain orochi 's power for the purpose of giving it to their unknown master.
The plot and the characters came इससे the Yamata no Orochi legend.
वहीँ हैं also several वर्ण in the खेल that are parodies or homages to several popular anime, manga, and films.
merchandise based on the characters has also महरूम released, including action figures and keychains.
The characters have garnered praise इससे several वीडियो game publications for the quality of उनके designs and movesets.
टिप्पणी focused on the कमी of improvements in some of the characters, लकिन added that the roster is greatly diverse.

the program follows Paul वाटसन, founder of the समुद्र Shepherd Conservation Society, as he और the crew aboard their various बरतन harass Japanese whalers off the coast of Antarctica.
On January 5, 2013, Animal Planet renewed the series for a sixth season.
The Harpy Eagle ( harpia harpyja ) is a Neotropical प्रजाति of eagle.
It is sometimes known as the American harpy त्रिभुज to distinguish it इससे the Papuan Eagle जिससे is sometimes known as the New गिनी Harpy त्रिभुज or Papuan harpy त्रिभुज.
It is the largest and सबसे powerful raptor मिला in the Americas, and among the largest extant प्रजाति of eagles in the world.
It usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the upper ( emergent ) canopy layer.
Destruction of इसके प्राकृतिक habitat रै seen it vanish इससे अनेक parts of its former range, and it is nearly extirpated in सेंट्रल America.
Biological classification, or scientific classification in biology, is a method of scientific taxonomy प्रयुक्त to group and categorize जीवों into groups such as genus or species.
ये groups हैं known as taxa ( एकवचन : टैक्सोन ).
Modern biological classification has its रूट in the work of Carolus Linnaeus, who grouped species according to साझा शारीरिक characteristics.
These groupings have since been revised to improve संगति with the Darwinian principle of common descent.
साथ the परिचय of the cladistic method in the late 20th century, phylogenetic taxonomy in which organisms are grouped based purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness, ignoring morphological similarity, रै become common in some areas of biology.
Molecular phylogenetics, जिससे उपयोग DNA sequences as data, रै also driven many हाल revisions and is संभावित to continue doing so.
Biological वर्गीकरण belongs to the विज्ञान of biological systematics.
Lennon 's signature
John Winston Ono Lennon, ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 अक्तूबर 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार, singer and songwriter जो rose to worldwide fame as a founder member of the Beatles, one of the most commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the इतिहास of popular म्यूज़िक.
With पॉल McCartney, he formed one of the most celebrated songwriting partnerships of the 20th century.
Born और raised in Liverpool, as a किशोरावस्था Lennon became involved in the skiffle craze ; his first band, the quarrymen, विकसित into the Beatles in 1960.
as the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade, Lennon embarked on a solo career that produced the critically acclaimed एल्बम जॉन Lennon/Plastic Ono Band and Imagine, and iconic songs such as `` Give Peace a मौका `` and `` Imagine ``.
After उसके marriage to योको Ono in 1969, he changed his name to John ओनो लेनन.
Lennon disengaged himself from the music business in 1975 to devote समय to उठाने his infant son Sean, but re-emerged with ओनो in 1980 with the new एल्बम Double Fantasy.
he was murdered three weeks after इसके रिलीज.
Lennon revealed a rebellious nature and acerbic wit in उसके music, writing, drawings, on film और in साक्षात्कार.
Controversial through his राजनैतिक और peace activism, he moved to नई यॉर्क City in 1971, जहाँ उसके criticism of the Vietnam War resulted in a lengthy attempt by Richard Nixon 's administration to deport him, while some of his songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement.
As of 2012, Lennon 's सोलो एल्बम sales in the United States exceed 14 million units, और as writer, co-writer or performer, he is responsible for 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 chart.
In 2002, a BBC पोल on the 100 Greatest Britons voted him eighth, और in 2008, Rolling स्टोन क्रमित him the fifth-greatest singer of सब समय.
he was posthumously inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994.

`` Rip वैन Winkle '' is a छोटी story by American author Washington Irving published in 1819, as well as the name of the story 's fictional protagonist.
Written while Irving was living in बर्मिंघम, England, it was part of a collection entitled The Sketch किताब of Geoffrey Crayon.
Although the story is नियत in नई York 's Catskill Mountains, Irving later admitted, `` When I wrote the story, I था never been on the Catskills. ''

pee-wee Herman is a comic fictional character created and portrayed by American comedian Paul Reubens.
He is बेहतरीन ज्ञात for उसके two television series and film series during the 1980s.
The childlike Pee-wee Herman character विकसित as a stage अधिनियम that जल्दी led to an HBO special in 1981.
As the स्टेज performance gained further popularity, reubens took the character to motion picture with Pee-wee 's बिग Adventure in 1985, toning down the adult innuendo for the appeal of children.

Another film, Big Top pee-wee, थी released in 1988.
