Kansas ( ) is a U.S. राज्य located in the Midwestern United States.
it is नामित after the Kansas नदी जिससे flows through it, which in turn was named after the Kansa Native American जनजाति, which inhabited the area.
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often कहा to mean `` people of the wind '' or `` people of the south wind, '' although this was संभवतः not the पद 's original अर्थ.
Residents of Kansas are called `` Kansans. ''
For thousands of years what is now Kansas थी घर to numerous and diverse देशी American जनजातियों.
Tribes in the Eastern part of the राज्य generally lived in गांवों along the river valleys.
Tribes in the Western part of the state were semi- nomadic and hunted large herds of bison.
कान्सास was first settled by European अमेरिकी in the 1830s, but the pace of settlement त्वरित in the 1850s, in the midst of political wars over the गुलामी issue.
जब officially opened to settlement by the U.S. government in 1854, abolitionist Free-Staters from New इंग्लैण्ड और pro-slavery settlers from neighboring मिसौरी rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a slave राज्य.
यूँ, the area was a hotbed of violence and chaos in its early days as these forces collided, and was known as Bleeding Kansas.
the abolitionists आखिरकार prevailed and on January 29, 1861, कान्सास entered the Union as a free state.
After the Civil War, the जनसांख्यिकी of Kansas grew rapidly, जब waves of immigrants turned the प्रेयरी into farmland.
Today, Kansas is one of the most productive agricultural states, producing high yields of wheat, sorghum and sunflowers.
कान्सास is the 15th most extensive और the 33rd most populous of the 50 United States.
Psychology is an academic and applied discipline कि involves the वैज्ञानिक study of mental कृत्यों and behaviors.
Psychology रै the तात्कालिक लक्ष्य of understanding individuals and groups by both establishing सामान्य सिद्धान्त and researching specific cases, और by अनेक accounts it ultimately aims to benefit society.
in this field, a professional or researcher is called a psychologist and can be वर्गीकृत as a social, behavioral, or cognitive scientist.
psychologists attempt to understand the role of दिमागी functions in individual and social बर्ताव, while also exploring the physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors.
Psychologists explore concepts such as perception, cognition, ध्यान, emotion, phenomenology, प्रेरणा, brain functioning, personality, behavior, and interpersonal relationships.
Psychologists of विविध stripes also consider the unconscious mind.
Psychologists employ अनुभवजन्य methods to infer causal and correlational relationships between psychosocial variables.
in addition, or in opposition, to employing empirical और deductive methods, some—especially नैदानिक and counseling psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon सांकेतिक interpretation and other inductive तकनीकों.
Psychology has महरूम described as a `` hub science '', साथ psychological findings linking to research and perspectives इससे the सोशल sciences, natural sciences, medicine, and the humanities, such as दर्शनशास्त्र.
While मनोवैज्ञानिक knowledge is प्रायः applied to the assessment and treatment of mental health समस्याएं, it is also directed towards understanding and solving problems in अनेक different spheres of इंसान कार्यकलाप.
the majority of psychologists are involved in some kind of therapeutic role, practicing in clinical, counseling, or school जमावट.
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to दिमागी processes and behavior, और typically work in university psychology विभाग or teach in अन्य academic settings ( e.g., medical schools, hospitals ).
Some are employed in industrial and organizational settings, or in other areas ऐसे as human development and aging, sports, health, and the media, as खूब as in forensic investigation and other aspects of विधि.
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13, 1743 ( April 2, 1743 O.S. ) – July 4, 1826 ) was an American Founding Father, the प्रिंसिपल author of the Declaration of Independence ( 1776 ) और the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ).
At the शुरूआत of the American Revolution, he परोसा in the Continental Congress, representing वर्जिनिया और तब served as a wartime Governor of वर्जिनिया ( 1779–1781 ).
Just बाद the war ended, इससे mid-1784 Jefferson served as a diplomat, stationed in Paris.
In May 1785, he became the United States Minister to France.
Jefferson was the first United राज्य Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) serving under अध्यक्ष जार्ज Washington.
With his close friend James Madison he organized the Democratic-Republican पार्टी, and subsequently resigned from Washington 's cabinet.
Elected वाइस President in 1796, जब he आए in दूसरी to जॉन Adams of the Federalists, Jefferson opposed एडम्स and with मैडिसन secretly wrote the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions, which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts.
Elected president in what Jefferson पुकारा the क्रान्ति of 1800, he oversaw the purchase of the vast Louisiana Territory from France ( 1803 ), and sent the Lewis and Clark expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the नई west.
उसके दूसरी term was beset साथ troubles at home, such as the failed देशद्रोह trial of his पूर्व Vice President आरोन Burr.
With escalating trouble with ब्रिटेन जो was challenging American neutrality and threatening शिपिंग at समुद्र, he tried economic warfare साथ his embargo laws which only क्षतिग्रस्त अमरीकी trade.
In 1803, President Jefferson initiated a process of Indian tribal removal and relocation to the Louisiana Territory west of the Mississippi River, in order to open lands for eventual American settlers.
A leader in the Enlightenment, Jefferson was a polymath who spoke five languages fluently and was deeply interested in science, invention, वास्तुकला, धर्म and philosophy, रूचि that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia बाद his प्रेसिडेंसी.
He designed उसके own large mansion on a 5,000 acre वृक्षारोपण near Charlottesville, Virginia, जिससे he named Monticello.
जबकि not a notable orator, Jefferson थी a skilled writer और corresponded with many influential people in America and Europe throughout उसके adult life.
Though Jefferson owned many स्लेव, he opposed the institution all his life और consequently treated and took care of उन्हें very खूब और अपेक्षित उन्हें to work no more than free किसानो.
Since 1802 historians and others have been विभाजित over the विवाद of whether Jefferson was the father of one or more children belonging to Sally Hemings, a स्लेव at Monticello. ''
इतिहासकारों हैं also in disagreement साथ कैसा much जेफरसन थी committed to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, President जेफरसन signed into विधि a bill that banned the importation of slaves into the संयुक्त राज्य.
बाद Martha Jefferson, his wife of eleven years, died in 1782, Jefferson remained a widower for the बाकी of his life ; their marriage produced six children, of whom दो survived to adulthood.
Though Jefferson has been criticized by many आधुनिक day विद्वानों over the issue of गुलामी, he remains रेटेड as one of the greatest u.S. presidents.
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song लिखा by Steven Van Zandt, produced by वैन Zandt and Arthur Baker और अंकित by Artists United Against Apartheid to convey opposition to the South अफ़्रीकी policy of apartheid.
The primary means of that विपक्ष is to declare that all the artists शामिल would refuse any and all offers to perform at Sun City, a resort which was located in Bantustan of Bophuthatswana, one of a number of internationally unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states created by the दक्षिण African government to forcibly relocate इसके black population.

The National Basketball Association ( NBA ) is a major पेशेवर basketball league in North अमेरिका.
It थी founded in 1946 as the बास्केट Association of अमेरिका ( BAA ).
The league adopted its वर्तमान name at the start of the when it merged with the National Basketball लीग ( NBL ).
The NBA फाइनल is the championship series for the NBA and the conclusion of the sport 's postseason.
The winning टोली of the series receives the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy.
खिलाड़ी from the winning team usually प्राप्त championship बजती इससे the टोली honoring their contribution.
However, in some विरल अवसर, the टीमों opted to gave other commemorative items, ऐसे as wrist watches, instead of बजती.
The number of championships won by एनबीए सुपरस्टार is प्रायः used as a measurement of their विशालता.
Boston Celtics बीच Bill Russell holds the record for the सबसे NBA championships won with 11 titles during his 13-year playing career.
He won his first championship साथ the Boston Celtics in his rookie year.
afterwards, he went on to win 10 championships in the next 12 years, including eight लगातार championships इससे 1959 to 1966.
He जीती the last two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach.
रसेल 's teammate, Sam Jones, won 10 championships from 1959 to 1969, the second सबसे in NBA इतिहास.
Four Celtics players, Tom Heinsohn, K. C. Jones, Satch Sanders और John Havlicek, won eight championships each.
Two other सेल्टिक्स, जिम Loscutoff and Frank रैमसे, won सात championships each.
Four players, Bob Cousy, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Michael Jordan and Scottie Pippen, जीती six championships प्रत्येक.
जॉर्डन and pippen are सदस्यों of the Chicago Bulls team who won three consecutive championships twice in the 1990s.
Robert Horry और जॉन Salley are the only players to have जीती the championships with three different teams.
Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets, the Los Angeles Lakers and the सैन Antonio स्पर्स, while Salley won four championships with the Detroit पिस्टन्स, the Bulls and the Lakers.

Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester Royals and the Minneapolis Lakers in the 1950s, while केर won consecutive championships with the Bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
Accuracy indicates proximity of measurement परिणाम to the true value, precision to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the measurement
In the fields of science, engineering, industry, and statistics, the accuracy of a measurement प्रणाली is the उपाधि of closeness of measurements of a quantity to that quantity 's actual ( true ) value.
The precision of a measurement प्रणाली, also called reproducibility or repeatability, is the degree to which repeated measurements under unchanged शर्तें show the same results.
हालांकि the दो शब्द reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial use, वे are deliberately contrasted in the context of the scientific विधि.
A measurement system can be accurate but not precise, precise but not accurate, neither, or both.
For example, if an experiment contains a व्यवस्थित error, then increasing the sample size generally increases precision but करता not improve accuracy.
The result would be a सतत yet inaccurate स्ट्रिंग of परिणाम from the flawed experiment.
Eliminating the systematic error improves accuracy but करता not change precision.
A measurement system is designated valid if it is both सटीक and precise.
Related terms शामिल bias ( non- random or directed effects caused by a फ़ैक्टर or कारकों unrelated to the independent variable ) and error ( random variability ).
the terminology is भी applied to indirect measurements—that is, values प्राप्त by a computational procedure from observed data.
In जोड to accuracy and precision, measurements may also have a measurement resolution, जिससे is the smallest change in the underlying physical quantity that produces a response in the measurement.
In the मामला of पूरा reproducibility, such as when rounding a number to a representable floating point number, the word परिशुद्धता has a meaning नहीं related to reproducibility.
For example, in the IEEE 754-2008 standard it means the number of bits in the significand, so it is used as a measure लिये the relative सटीकता साथ which an arbitrary number can be represented.
बकवास in its literal meaning refers to the अधिनियम of sexual intercourse.
it is an English word कि is प्रायः used as a profanity, either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier.
the origin of the word is obscure.
It is usually considered to be first attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
in modern उपयोग, बकवास and its derivatives ( ऐसे as fucker और fucking ) can be used in the position of a noun, a verb, an adjective or an adverb.
वहीँ are many common phrases which make use of the शब्द, as well as a number of compounds incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Animated, color-coded map प्रर्दशित the various continents and regions.
Depending on the convention and मॉडल, some continents may be consolidated or subdivided : for example, Eurasia is most often subdivided into Europe and Asia ( red शेड्स ), while North and South America are sometimes पहचाना as one American continent ( green shades ).
a continent is एक of several बहुत large landmasses on Earth.
वे are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria, with up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they are ( इससे largest in आकार to smallest ) : Asia, Africa, उत्तर America, South America, Antarctica, Europe, and ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
In geology, continents are described by means of tectonic प्लेटों.
Plate tectonics is the process and study of the movement, collision and division of continents, earlier ज्ञात as continental बहाव.

Community property is a marital property regime कि originated in civil law jurisdictions और is now also found in some common law jurisdictions.
The राज्य of the संयुक्त States that recognize जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी are primarily in the वेस्ट ; it was inherited इससे Mexico 's ganancial community system, जिससे itself थी inherited from Spanish law ( a रोमन -derived civil law प्रणाली ) and ultimately from the Visigoths.
While under Spanish rule Louisiana adopted the ganancial community system of acquests and gains, which replaced the traditional फ्रेंच जातियाँ of movables and acquests in its civil law system.
मैप of the United States with community property states highlighted in red.
In addition to the highlighted states, अलास्का is a पृथक property state कि permits couples to ऑप्ट into a community property arrangement.
In a community property jurisdiction, most property acquired during the विवाह ( except for gifts or inheritances ) —the community, or communio bonorum—is स्वामित्व jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce, annulment or मौत.
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by विधि in the absence of specific evidence कि would point to a contrary निष्कर्ष for a particular piece of property.
Division of community property may take place by item, by splitting सब items or by value.
In some jurisdictions, such as California, a 50/50 division of जातियाँ property is strictly mandated by statute, meaning कि the focus then शिफ्ट to whether particular वस्तुएं are to be classified as community or separate property.
In other jurisdictions, such as Texas, a divorce court may decree an `` निष्पक्ष distribution `` of community property, जिससे may result in an unequal division of such.
In non-community property states property may be divided by equitable distribution.
Generally speaking, the property that each संगी brings into the marriage or receives by gift, bequest or मक्कारी during marriage is called पृथक प्रॉपर्टी ( i.e., not community property ).
See division of प्रॉपर्टी.
Division of community debts may not be the same as division of community property.
For example, in California, community property is required to be divided `` equally '' while community debt is required to be विभाजित `` equitably ''.
Property that is owned by one जीवनसाथी before the marriage is the separate प्रॉपर्टी of that spouse, जबतक the property is `` transmuted '' into community property.
The नियम for इस vary from jurisdiction to jurisdiction.
The ड्यूक and Duchess of Cambridge waving to the भीड at The Mall shortly after the wedding.
the wedding of Prince William, Duke of कैम्ब्रिज, और Catherine मिडलटन took place on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London.
the groom, Prince William, Duke of कैम्ब्रिज, is the eldest son of Charles, प्रिंस of Wales, and is second in the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार to the अंग्रेजों Throne and the तख्तों of fifteen other Commonwealth realms.
the बहू, Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is the eldest of three children of Michael and carole Middleton of Bucklebury, Berkshire.
The डीन of वेस्टमिंस्टर, John Hall, presided at the सेवा ; the Archbishop of Canterbury, Rowan Williams, conducted the marriage ; Richard Chartres, the Bishop of London, preached the sermon ; and a reading थी given by the bride 's brother, James.
William 's best man was his brother, प्रिंस Harry, while the bride 's sister, Pippa, was maid of honour.
The ceremony was attended by the bride 's and groom 's families, as well as many foreign रॉयल्स, diplomats, and the couple 's चुनी personal guests.
After the ceremony, the couple made the परंपरागत appearance on the balcony of Buckingham Palace.
As Prince William was not the heir apparent to the सिंहासन, the wedding थी not a full state occasion and अनेक details were left to the couple to decide, ऐसे as much of the guest list of about 1,900.
प्रिंस विलियम and Kate Middleton met in 2001.
Their engagement on 20 October 2010 थी announced on 16 November 2010.
the build-up to the wedding और the occasion itself attracted much मीडिया attention, being compared in many ways with the 1981 marriage of William 's parents.
the occasion was a public holiday in the United Kingdom and featured many ceremonial aspects, including use of the state carriages and roles for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry.
Events were held around the राष्ट्रमंडल to mark the विवाह ; संगठनों and hotels held events across Canada, over 5,000 street पार्टियों were held throughout the United Kingdom, and one million people lined the route between वेस्टमिंस्टर Abbey और Buckingham Palace.
The ceremony was viewed live by tens of millions more around the world, including 72 million on the YouTube royal चैनल.
in the United किंगडम, television audiences peaked at 26.3 million viewers, with a total of 36.7 लाख watching भाग of the coverage.

A hand ( मेड. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity located at the समाप्त of an भुजा or forelimb of primates and इंसानो, chimpanzees, monkeys, और lemurs.
A few other vertebrates such as the koala ( which has two opposable thumbs on प्रत्येक `` hand '' and fingerprints remarkably similar to human fingerprints ) हैं often described as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs.
हैंड्स are the main structures for physically manipulating the पर्यावरण, used लिये both gross मोटर कौशल ( such as grasping a large ऑब्जेक्ट ) and fine motor skills ( such as picking up a small pebble ).
the fingertips contain some of the densest areas of nerve endings on the body, are the richest source of tactile feedback, and have the महानतम positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated साथ हैंड्स.
Like other paired organs ( eyes, फीट, legs ), प्रत्येक hand is dominantly controlled by the opposing brain गोलार्ध, so that handedness, or the preferred हाथ चुनाव for single-handed activities such as लिखने with a पेंसिल, reflects individual brain functioning.
कुछ evolutionary anatomists उपयोग the term हाथ to refer to the appendage of digits on the forelimb more generally — for example, in the context of whether the three अंक of the bird hand शामिल the same समजात loss of दो अंक as in the dinosaur hand.
the human hand has 27 bones, not including the sesamoid हड्डियों which number varies between people.
14 of which are the phalanges ( proximal, intermediate and distal ) of the fingers.
the metacarpals हैं the bones that connects the fingers and the कलाई.
Each इंसान hand रै 5 metacarpals और 8 carpal bones.

The चिह्नित in the top-left of the display indicates that the time is 4:00pm, not 4:00am.
A 1969 रेडियो alarm क्लॉक ( Sony digimatic 8FC-59W ) साथ an early mechanical-digital display.
A डिजिटल क्लॉक is a type of क्लॉक कि displays the time digitally, i.e. in numerals or other symbols, as opposed to an analog clock, where the time is indicated by the positions of rotating हैंड्स.
Digital clocks are often associated with electronic ड्राइव, but the `` digital '' वर्णन refers only to the प्रदर्शक, नहीं to the drive mechanism.
( Both एनालॉग and digital clocks can be driven either mechanically or electronically, but `` clockwork '' mechanisms with डिजिटल displays हैं rare. )
the biggest digital clock is the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` Light समय स्तर '' ) on the टेलीविज़न tower rheinturm Düsseldorf, जर्मनी.
परिवार Guy creator Seth macfarlane भी provides the voices of Peter Griffin, Stewie griffin, Brian Griffin, और Glenn Quagmire.
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that सुविधाएँ five main voice actors, और numerous नियमित cast and recurring guest stars.
The principal voice cast consists of show निर्माता Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila kunis ( who replaced Lacey Chabert बाद the पहला ऋतु ) and Mike Henry और now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice अभिनेताओं include पैट्रिक warburton, Adam West, John G. ब्रेनन, निकोल Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly, और repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and फिल LaMarr.
Many cast members provide voices for अनेक वर्ण.
The voice actors, in portraying the various अक्षर personalities on the show, draw प्रेरणा from celebrities and pop culture.
परिवार Guy characters have been played by more than एक actor, after members of the show left the श्रेणी or had conflicting obligations.
Kunis थी nominated for an Annie पुरस्कार for voicing Meg griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` और MacFarlane has also won an Emmy Award लिये Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television उत्पादन, though no other cast सदस्य has won an पुरस्कार लिये their work on the series.
The five sets of the फलक खेल Monopoly चित्रित here दिखाएँ the evolution of the game 's artwork and designs in the संयुक्त States from 1935–2005.
The history of the board game एकाधिकार can be traced वापस to the early 20th सदी.
The earliest known design थी by the American, Elizabeth Magie, patented in 1904 but existing as early as 1902.
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to illustrate an economic principle, namely the Georgist concept of a single land value tax.
A series of board games were developed इससे 1906 through the 1930s that involved the खरीदे और selling of land और the development of that land.
by 1934, a board game had been created much like the version of Monopoly sold by Parker Brothers और its related companies through the rest of the 20th century, and into the 21st.
Several people, mostly in the Midwestern United States and near the East Coast, contributed to the game 's design and evolution.
By the 1970s, the विचार that the game had been created solely by Charles Darrow had become popular folklore ; it was printed in the game 's instructions for many years, in a 1974 book devoted to Monopoly, and was cited in a सामान्य book परिचय toys even as recently as 2007.
Even a मार्गदर्शिका to family खेल प्रकाशित for Reader 's Digest in 2003 only gave credit to Darrow और Elizabeth Magie, erroneously stating that Magie 's original game was created in the 1800s, and not acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the game, और the eventual publication by Parker भाइयो.
Also in the 1970s, प्राध्यापक Ralph Anspach, who had खुद published a board game intended to illustrate the principles of both monopolies and trust busting, लड़ा Parker Brothers and इसके then जनक company, General Mills, over the trademarks of the Monopoly board game.
Through the research of Anspach and others, much of the early history of the खेल was `` rediscovered ''.
Anspach confronted maxine ब्रैडी, author of the 1974 किताब the Monopoly Book : रणनीति and Tactics of the World 's Most Popular Game over the actual history of the game on Barry farber 's नई York City talk दिखाएँ in 1975.
Because of the lengthy court प्रक्रम, including appeals, the legal status of पार्कर Brothers ' trademarks on the game was not settled जबतक 1985.
The game 's name remains a registered trademark of Parker भाइयो, as do its specific design तत्व.
At the conclusion of the court case, the खेल 's logo and ग्राफिक design elements became भाग of a larger Monopoly brand, licensed by Parker Brothers ' parent कंपनियाँ onto a variety of items through the present day.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game 's जल्दी history in the 1970s and 1980s, और several books and journal articles on the subject, हास्ब्रो ( Parker Brothers ' current जनक company ) did not acknowledge any of the game 's history before Charles Darrow on its official Monopoly website as recently as June 2012.
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge anyone other than Darrow in materials published or sponsored by उन्हें, at least as recently as 2006.
International tournaments, first held in the early 1970s, continue to the present, with the next world championship likely scheduled for 2013.
Starting in 1985, a new generation of spin-off board games and कार्ड games appeared on both पहलू of the अटलांटिक Ocean.
In 1989, the first of many video game and computer खेल संस्करण was published.
Since 1994, many official variants of the खेल, based on स्थितियाँ other than Atlantic City, नई Jersey ( the official U.S. setting ) or London ( the official Commonwealth सेटिंग, excepting Canada ), have been published by Hasbro or its licensees.
In 2008, Hasbro permanently changed the रंग scheme and some of the gameplay of the मानक u.s. Edition of the खेल to मैच the UK Edition, although the U.S. standard संस्करण maintains the Atlantic City प्रॉपर्टी names.
हास्ब्रो also परिवर्धित the official logo to दे the `` Mr. Monopoly '' character a 3-d computer-generated look, which has चूंकि महरूम अपनाया by licensees USAopoly, Winning Moves और Winning Solutions.
And Hasbro has also been सहित the Speed Die, introduced in 2006 's Monopoly : The Mega Edition by Winning Moves Games, in versions produced directly by Hasbro ( such as the 2009 चैंपियनशिप Edition ).
In baseball, a sacrifice मक्खी is a batted ball कि satisfies four criteria:
There are fewer than दो outs when the ball is hit.
The ball is hit to the outfield ( fair or foul ), or to infield foul territory.
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield, or foul territory ) catches the ball on the fly ( alternatively if the batter would have been आउट if not for an error or if the outfielder drops the ball and another runner is put out ).
A runner जो is already on base scores on the खेल.
It is called a `` sacrifice '' fly because the batter presumably intends to cause a teammate to score a run, जबकि sacrificing his own ability to do so.
Minnesota ( ) is a U.S. state located in the Midwestern United राज्य.
Minnesota was carved out of the eastern half of the Minnesota Territory and admitted to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11, 1858.
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 Lakes '', the state 's name comes from a Dakota word for `` sky-tinted water ''.
those waters, together with forests, parks, and wilderness areas, प्रस्ताव निवासियों and tourists a variety of बाहरी recreational opportunities.
Minnesota is the 12th सबसे extensive and the 21st most populous of the U.S. राज्य.
Nearly 60 % of इसके residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan क्षेत्रफल ( known as the `` Twin Cities '' ), the बीच of transportation, कारोबार, उद्योग, education, government और home to an internationally known arts जातियाँ.
The शेष of the state consists of पश्चिमी prairies now given over to intensive agriculture ; deciduous forests in the southeast, now cleared, farmed and settled ; and the कम populated North वुड्स, used लिये खनन, forestry, and मनोरंजन.
Minnesota is known for its relatively मिश्रित social and political orientations, and रै a high rate of civic participation and voter turnout.
Minnesota ranks among the healthiest राज्य, and has a highly literate population.
The large majority of residents हैं of Scandinavian and जर्मनी descent.
The state is known as a center of Scandinavian American संस्कृति.
जातीय diversity has increased in recent decades.
Substantial influxes of एशियाई, African, and Latin American immigrants have joined the descendants of European settlers and the असली देशी अमरीकी inhabitants.
Grants are non-repayable funds by one party ( grant makers ), often a government department, corporation, foundation or trust, to a, often ( लकिन नहीं सदा ) a nonprofit entity, educational institution, business or an individual.
In order to receive a grant, some form of `` Grant Writing '' often referred to as either a proposal or an application is usually required.
Most grants are made to fund a specific project and require some level of compliance and reporting.
The grant writing process involves an आवेदक submitting a proposal ( or submission ) to a potential funder, either on the applicant 's अपना initiative or in response to a निवेदन for Proposal from the funder.
Other grants can be given to individuals, such as victims of natural disasters or individuals who seek to open a small business.
sometimes grant makers require grant seekers to have some form of tax-exempt status, be a registered nonprofit organization or a local government.
लिये उदाहरण, tiered funding for a freeway are बहुत large grants negotiated at government policy level.
however छोटी अनुदान may be provided by a government एजेंसी ( e.g. municipal government ).
Project-related funding involving governments, business, communities, and individuals is प्रायः arranged by application either in writing or online.
Naturally occurring cobalt ( co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope, 59Co. 28 radioisotopes have महरूम characterized with the most stable being 60Co with a half-life of 5.2714 years, 57Co साथ a half-life of 271.79 days, 56Co with a half-life of 77.27 days, and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 दिनों.
All of the remaining रेडियोसक्रिय isotopes have half-lives that are less than 18 घंटों and the बहुमत of ये have half-lives that are less than 1 second.
इस element also has 11 meta states, all of which have half-lives less than 15 minutes.
The isotopes of कोबाल्ट range in परमाणु weight from 47Co to 75Co.
the प्राथमिक क्षय mode for isotopes with atomic द्रव्यमान unit values less than that of the सबसे abundant stable isotope, 59Co, is electron capture and the primary mode of क्षय for those of वृहद than 59 atomic द्रव्यमान units is beta decay.
The primary decay products before 59co हैं आयरन isotopes और the primary products after are nickel isotopes.
Standard atomic द्रव्यमान : 58.933195 ( 5 ) u
Who Moved My Cheese ?
An अद्भुत Way to Deal with बदलें in Your Work and in Your Life, published in 1998, is a motivational किताब by Spencer Johnson written in the स्टाइल of a parable or business fable.
It describes change in one 's work and life, and four typical reactions to said change by two mice और two `` littlepeople '', दौरान their हंट for cheese.
a New York टाइम्स business bestseller चूंकि release, Who Moved my चीज ?
remained on the list for लगभग five years and खर्च over 200 weeks on Publishers Weekly 's hardcover nonfiction list.
It has बेची more than 26 million copies विश्वव्यापी in 37 languages and remains to be one of the best-selling कारोबार books.
Nikita sergeyevich khrushchev ( – September 11, 1971 ) led the Soviet Union during part of the Cold War.
He served as First Secretary of the Communist पार्टी of the Soviet Union इससे 1953 to 1964, and as Chairman of the Council of Ministers, or Premier, इससे 1958 to 1964.
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-stalinization of the सोवियत संघ, for backing the progress of the जल्दी सोवियत स्पेस program, and for several relatively उदार reforms in areas of घरेलू नीति.
Khrushchev 's पार्टी colleagues removed him from शक्ति in 1964, replacing him साथ लियोनिद Brezhnev as पहला Secretary and एलेक्सी Kosygin as Premier.
Khrushchev was born in the रूसी village of Kalinovka in 1894, close to the present-day border between Russia and Ukraine.
He was employed as a metalworker in उसके youth, और दौरान the Russian Civil युद्ध was a राजनैतिक commissar.
With the help of Lazar Kaganovich, he worked his way up the Soviet पदानुक्रम.
He supported Joseph Stalin 's purges, और approved thousands of arrests.
In 1939, Stalin sent him to govern युक्त, और he जारी the purges there.
दौरान what was ज्ञात in the Soviet Union as the ग्रेट Patriotic War ( Eastern Front of World War II ), Khrushchev was again a commissar, serving as an intermediary between स्टालिन and his generals.
Khrushchev थी उपस्थित at the bloody defense of stalingrad, a फैक्ट he took great pride in throughout his जीवन.
After the war, he returned to Ukraine पहले being recalled to Moscow as one of Stalin 's close advisers.
In the power struggle triggered by Stalin 's death in 1953, Khrushchev, after several years, emerged victorious.
On फ़रवरी 25, 1956, at the 20th Party Congress, he delivered the `` Secret Speech, '' denouncing Stalin 's purges and ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet Union.
His domestic policies, aimed at bettering the जीवनदान of ordinary नागरिकों, यहूद प्रायः ineffective, especially in the area of agriculture.
Hoping eventually to rely on missiles लिये national defense, Khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional forces.
Despite the cuts, Khrushchev 's rule देखी the tensest सालो of the ठंडा War, culminating in the Cuban Missile Crisis.
Some of khrushchev 's policies were seen as erratic, विशेषकर by his उभरते rivals, who quietly rose in strength और अपदस्थ him in October 1964.
He did not suffer the deadly fate of कुछ previous losers of Soviet power struggles, but was pensioned off with an apartment in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside.
His lengthy memoirs were smuggled to the West and प्रकाशित in part in 1970.
Khrushchev died in 1971 of heart disease.
Upper gastrointestinal ( gi ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the अपर gastrointestinal tract.
the anatomic cut-off for अपर gi bleeding is the ligament of Treitz, which connects the fourth portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon.
Upper GI bleeds are considered medical emergencies, और require प्रवेश to hospital for तात्कालिक diagnosis and management.
Due to advances in medications and endoscopy, upper GI hemorrhage is now usually treated बगैर surgery.
World population estimates इससे 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, orange, green ) and US Census Bureau ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
वास्तविक अंकित population figures are in blue.
According to the highest estimate, the world population may rise to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The world population is the total number of living humans on धरती.
As of today, it is estimated to क्रमांक अरब by the United States Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund, it reached इस milestone on October 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced continuous विकास since the end of the Great अकाल and the ब्लैक Death in 1350, जब it stood at around 370 million.
The highest दरों of विकास – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly दौरान the 1950s, and लिये a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total सालाना births यहूद highest in the लेट 1980s at about 138 million, and are now expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million, जबकि deaths number 56 million per साल, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections दिखाएँ a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 अरब by 2050.
विभिन्न longer-term estimates predict further विकास, stagnation, or even overall मनाही in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world जनसांख्यिकी विकास, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food supplies, and उर्जा संसाधन.

Knuckle mnemonic for the number of days in प्रत्येक माह of the Gregorian Calendar.
प्रत्येक projecting knuckle represents a 31-day माह.
A mnemonic (, with a silent `` m '' ), or mnemonic device, is any learning technique कि aids सूचना retention.
Mnemonics aim to translate information into a form that the human brain can retain बेहतर than इसके original रूप.
Even the process of applying इस conversion might already aid the transfer of information to long-term memory.
commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in auditory form, ऐसे as short poems, acronyms, or memorable वाक्यांश, but mnemonics can also be लिये other types of information and in visual or kinesthetic फ़ॉर्म.
Their use is based on the अवलोकन that the human दिमाग more easily remembers स्थानिक, personal, surprising, physical, sexual, humorous, or otherwise 'relatable ' information, बल्कि than अधिक अमूर्त or impersonal forms of information.
The word mnemonic is derived from the Ancient Greek word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), meaning `` of memory '' and is related to Mnemosyne ( `` remembrance '' ), the name of the देवी of memory in Greek mythology.
Both of these words are derived from μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` remembrance, memory ''.
Mnemonics in antiquity were most often considered in the context of what is today known as the Art of memory.
Ancient Greeks and Romans विशिष्ट between two types of memory : the 'natural ' memory and the 'artificial ' memory.
the former is inborn, और is the one that everyone uses automatically and without thinking.
The artificial memory in contrast रै to be trained and developed through the learning और practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques.
mnemonic systems are special तकनीकों or strategies consciously used to improve memory, it helps employ information already stored in long-term memory to make memorization an easier कार्य.
President Bush signing the No Child Left Behind Act at Hamilton h.s. in Hamilton, Ohio.
The no Child बाएँ Behind Act of 2001 ( NCLB ) is a United States Act of कॉंग्रेस that is a reauthorization of the Elementary और Secondary Education अधिनियम, which included Title I, the government 's फ्लैगशिप aid program for सुविधाहीन students.
NCLB supports standards-based education reform based on the premise that setting high standards and establishing measurable goals can improve individual outcomes in education.
The अधिनियम requires राज्य to develop assessments in मौलिक skills.
States must give these assessments to all students at select grade levels in order to प्राप्त federal school funding.
The Act does नहीं assert a national achievement standard ; standards are set by each व्यक्तिगत state.
NCLB expanded the federal role in public शिक्षा through annual testing, annual academic progress, report cards, टीचर qualifications, and funding changes.
The bill passed in the u.S. Congress with bipartisan support.

A पिकअप truck or pick-up, often simply referred to as a pickup, is a light motor गाडी with an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used लिये light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory built, integrated bed, as well as for coupé utility vehicles, often based on a personal car chassis, but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
कुछ countries have their own terms similar to pickup, ऐसे as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया and New Zealand, or bakkie in South अफ़्रीकी.
Large pickup ट्रक are somewhat rare in Europe, where वैन and लाइट lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
This 15th-century depiction of Charlemagne and Pope Adrian I shows a well-bred medieval horse with मेहराबदार neck, refined head and elegant gait.
Horses in the Middle Ages differed in size, build and नस्ल from the modern horse, and were, on average, smaller.
They were also more central to society than their modern counterparts, being essential for war, agriculture, and transport.
Consequently, specific types of घोड़ा विकसित, many of which have no modern equivalent.
While an understanding of आधुनिक horse breeds and equestrianism is vital for any analysis of the medieval horse, शोधकर्ताओं also need to consider documentary ( both written और pictorial ) and archaeological evidence.
Horses in the Middle Ages were rarely differentiated by breed, but rather by use.
This led उन्हें to be described, for example, as `` chargers `` ( युद्ध horses ), `` palfreys `` ( riding घोड़े ), कार्ट horses or packhorses.
Reference is also दिए to their place of origin, ऐसे as `` Spanish horses, '' but whether इस referred to one breed or several is unknown.
another difficulty arising during any study of medieval documents or literature is the flexibility of the medieval languages, where several words can be used for एक thing ( or, conversely, several objects are referred to by एक शब्द ).
शब्द such as ' courser ' and 'charger ' are used interchangeably ( even within एक दस्तावेज़ ), and where एक epic may speak disparagingly of a rouncey, another praises its skill and swiftness.
Significant technological अग्रिम in equestrian equipment, often introduced from other cultures, allowed for significant changes in both warfare and agriculture.
in particular, improved designs for the solid-treed saddle as well as the arrival of the stirrup, नाल and horse कॉलर यहूद significant advances in medieval society.
Consequently, the assumptions और theories developed by इतिहासकारों are not definitive, और debate still rages on many issues, ऐसे as the breeding or size of the horse, and a number of sources must be consulted in अनुक्रम to समझे the breadth of the subject.
The म्यूज़िक Man is a musical with book, music, and lyrics by मेरेडिथ willson, based on a story by willson and फ्रैंकलिन Lacey.
The plot concerns con man Harold Hill, who poses as a boys ' band organizer and नेता and बिकता band instruments and वर्दी to naive townsfolk before skipping town with the cash.
In River City, Iowa, prim librarian and पियानो teacher marian paroo sees through him, लकिन when हिल helps उसके younger bhai overcome his भय of social interactions due to his lisp, Marian begins to fall in love साथ Harold.
Harold, in turn गिरना for Marian, risks being caught to win her.
In 1957, the show became a hit on Broadway, winning पाँच Tony Awards, सहित Best Musical, and running for 1,375 प्रदर्शन.
The cast album won the पहला Grammy Award for `` बेहतरीन Original Cast Album '' and was number one on the Billboard charts for 245 weeks.
The show 's success led to revivals and a popular 1962 film adaptation and a 2003 television रीमेक.
it अक्सर is उत्पादित by both professional and amateur theater companies.
Surveyor 's wheel
a निरीक्षक 's wheel, also called a clickwheel, hodometer, waywiser, trundle व्हील, measuring wheel, or perambulator is a device for measuring distance.

बालू dunes in the Rub ' al Khali ( `` Empty quarter '' ) of Saudi Arabia.
Makhtesh रेमन, Negev desert, Israel
a desert is a landscape or region of land that is बहुत शुष्क क्युकी of low rainfall amounts ( precipitation ), often has little coverage by plants, और in which streams dry up unless they are supplied by water from बाहर areas.
Deserts can also be described as क्षेत्रों where अधिक water is lost by evapotranspiration than falls as वर्षण.
Desert plants must have special adaptations to survive साथ इस little water.
Deserts generally receive less than 25 cm of rain ( precipitation ) प्रत्येक year.
semideserts or steppes are regions which receive between and.
In the Köppen जलवायु classification system, रेगिस्तान हैं classed as BWh ( hot desert ) or BWk ( temperate desert ).
In the thornthwaite climate classification system, deserts would be वर्गीकृत as arid megathermal climates.
World War I ( WWI ) was a global युद्ध centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great युद्ध from इसके occurrence until the प्रारंभ of World युद्ध ii in 1939, और the पहला World युद्ध or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the संसार 's great powers, जिससे were assembled in दो opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the संयुक्त Kingdom, France और Russia ) and the Central शक्तियां ( originally the Triple Alliance of जर्मनी, Austria-Hungary और Italy ; but, as austria–hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
ये alliances यहूद both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the युद्ध : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central शक्तियां.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 लाख combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements कि led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations शामिल.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the पुनरुत्थान of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More तत्काल, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the वारिस to the throne of austria-hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a राजनयिक crisis when austria-hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
अनेक alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war और, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
on 28 जुलाई, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as तैयारी for the invasion of सर्बिया.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded न्यूट्रल Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition साथ a trench लकीर कि changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the उस्मानी Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the russians to शर्तें साथ the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western सामने, the Allies drove back the germans in a series of successful offensives and American शक्तियां began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble साथ revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory लिये the allies.
Events on the घर fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their जनशक्ति और economic resources to fight a total war.
By the समाप्त of the war, four प्रमुख imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two lost a ग्रेट amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe was redrawn into several छोटी states.
the League of Nations थी formed in the आशा of preventing another such विरोध.
The यूरोपीय राष्ट्रवाद spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to संसार War II.
`` Girls Just want to Have Fun '' is a 1979 सोंग originally written by Robert Hazard and बना famous by सिंगर Cyndi Lauper.
It थी the first major single released by lauper as a solo artist और the lead-off single from her debut एल्बम She 's So Unusual.
lauper’s संस्करण gained recognition as a feminist anthem और promoted by an award-winning video.
It has महरूम covered on either an album or in live कॉन्सर्ट by over 30 other artists.
the single was lauper 's भेदन hit, reaching # 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 and becoming a worldwide hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984.
It remains one of Lauper 's signature songs and was a widely लोकप्रिय song during the era of its release, the 1980s.
The `` Rolling Stone & MTV : '100 Greatest Pop Songs ' : 1-50 '', `` Rolling Stone : `` The 100 शीर्ष Music वीडियो '' '' and the `` VH1 : 100 Greatest Videos '' सूचियाँ ranked the song at # 22, # 39 and # 45, क्रमशः.
The song received a ग्रैमी Award nomination for Record of the Year and बेहतरीन Female पॉप गायन Performance.
View of defibrillator electrode position and placement.
Defibrillation is a आम treatment for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical energy to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of device used or needed.
Some external units, known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms, meaning that lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little, or in some मामले no training at all.
The केटो Institute is an American libertarian think टैंक headquartered in Washington, D.C.
it was founded as the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by मरे rothbard, Ed Crane and Charles Koch, chairman of the board and chief executive officer of the conglomerate Koch Industries, inc..
In July 1976, the name was changed to the केटो Institute.
according to the 2011 Global Go To Think टैंक Index, Cato is the 6th most influential US based think tank, रैंकिंग 3rd in Economic नीति and 2nd in Social Policy.
The संस्थान 's stated mission is `` to बढ़ाएँ the understanding of public policies based on the सिद्धान्त of limited government, free markets, individual liberty, and peace.
The Institute will use the most effective means to originate, एडवोकेट, promote, and disseminate applicable नीति प्रस्ताव that create फ़्री, open, and civil societies in the United States and throughout the संसार. ''
Cato scholars were नाजुक of George W. Bush 's Republican administration ( 2001–2009 ) on several issues, including the Iraq War, civil liberties, education, agriculture, उर्जा policy, and excessive सरकारी spending.
On other issues, they समर्थित Bush administration initiatives, most notably health care, Social Security, global warming, tax policy, and immigration.
During the 2008 U.S. presidential election, Cato विद्वानों criticized both major-party candidates, जॉन McCain and बराक ओबामा.
Cato has criticized President ओबामा 's stances on नीति issues चूंकि his inauguration, such as fiscal stimulus, healthcare reform, foreign policy, और the War on Drugs, while supporting उसके stance on the repeal of Do n't Ask, do n't बताना and liberal immigration policy.
Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror अनोखा by Irish author Bram Stoker.
Famous लिये introducing the character of the पिशाच गिनती Dracula, the novel tells the story of Dracula 's attempt to relocate इससे transylvania to England, और the battle between Dracula और a छोटी समूह of men and women led by Professor अब्राहम Van Helsing.
Dracula रै been assigned to many साहित्यिक genres including vampire literature, horror fiction, the गोथिक novel and invasion literature.
the novel touches on themes such as the role of महिलाओं in Victorian culture, sexual conventions, आव्रजन, colonialism, और post-colonialism.
Although Stoker did नहीं invent the पिशाच, he पारिभाषित its modern form, and the अनोखा रै spawned numerous नाट्य, film और television interpretations.
Quidditch is a competitive खेल in the wizarding world of the Harry Potter ब्रह्मांड, and is from the series of children 's novels and फिल्मों.
It is an extremely rough but very popular semi-contact sport, played by wizards and witches.
Matches हैं played between two teams of seven players riding flying broomsticks, using four balls और six elevated ring-shaped लक्ष्य, three on each side of the Quidditch pitch ( field ).
in the हैरी Potter ब्रह्मांड, quidditch holds a fervent following similar to the स्थिति that association football holds as a globally popular sport.
The sport is स्मारकीय throughout the wizarding world.
Harry plays an important position for उसके house team at Hogwarts : he is the seeker and becomes the कप्तान in his sixth year there.
Regional and international competitions are mentioned throughout the series.
In Goblet of Fire, Quidditch at Hogwarts is cancelled for the tri-wizard Tournament, but Harry and the Weasleys attend the Quidditch World Cup.
In addition, Harry uses his Quidditch skills to कैप्चर a golden egg from a dragon called the Hungarian Horntail ( in the first task of the Tri-Wizard Tournament ), to capture a flying key in Philosopher 's Stone, and on two key occasions in deathly Hallows — getting hold of Ravenclaw 's Diadem, and during the final fight with Voldemort — the `` unerring कौशल of the Seeker '' is useful to उसे in snatching the Elder wand out of the air.
Harry कुम्हार has owned two broomsticks, the Nimbus 2000 and the Firebolt, both of which are नष्ट by the series ' end.
the game has been adopted in the रियल world in the रूप of मगलू quidditch.
The United States Congress is the bicameral विधानमंडल of the federal government of the United States consisting of two घरों : the निम्नतर house known as the House of Representatives and the upper house known as the Senate.
Congress meets in the कैपिटल in Washington, D.C.
Both representatives and सीनेटरों are चुनी through direct चुनाव.
Congress has a total of 535 voting members : 435 members in the House of Representatives and 100 members in the सीनेट.
Members of the House of Representatives serve two-year शर्तें representing the people of a district.
congressional districts are apportioned to राज्य by population using the United States जनसांख्यिकी results, each state in the संघ having at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि in the हाउस of Representatives.
Regardless of population, each of the 50 states रै two senators ; the 100 senators each serve a six-year term.
The terms are staggered so every two years लगभग one-third of the सीनेट is up for चुनाव.
प्रत्येक staggered group of one-third of the senators हैं called 'classes '.
No state of the United States रै two senators from the same क्लास.
Most incumbents seek re-election, और their ऐतिहासिक likelihood of winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 प्रतिशत.
In August 2012, a gallup poll reported that congress’s स्वीकृति rating amongst Americans was at 10 %, matching a 38-year low reached in November 2011.
`` a Little अधिक Country than That '' is the title of a song written by जॉय + Rory 's Rory ली Feek, Wynn Varble, and डॉन Poythress, and recorded by American देश artist Easton Corbin.
It was released in August 2009 as Corbin 's debut single और is included on his self-titled debut एल्बम.

It रै been certified Gold by the riaa.
The BlackBerry is a line of बेतार handheld devices and सेवाएं designed and marketed by Research In गति Limited ( RIM ) operating as BlackBerry.
The first BlackBerry device, an email pager, was released in 1999 ; the most recent BlackBerry devices, the z10 and Q10, were announced on January 30, 2013.
The user interface varies by model ; सबसे feature a शारीरिक QWERTY keyboard, जबकि newer पीढियां have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard.
A BlackBerry can shoot वीडियो, take photos, खेल music, and perform online functions such as web-browsing and emailing.
They can also भेजें and receive push email and तत्काल संदेश जबकि maintaining a high level of security through on-device message एन्क्रिप्शन, and are designed to फलन as personal digital assistants.
BlackBerry डिवाइस support a large किस्में of instant messaging features, with the most popular being the मालिकाना ब्लैकबेरी मेसेंजर service.
The BlackBerry PlayBook is a tablet कंप्यूटर offered by the company.
The 100 millionth BlackBerry smartphone was shipped in June quarter of 2010 and the 200 millionth smartphone was shipped in सितंबर quarter of 2012.
BlackBerry accounts for 3 % of mobile device sales worldwide in 2011, making its manufacturer the sixth most popular यंत्र maker ( 25 % of मोबाईल यंत्र sales are स्मार्टफ़ोन ).
the consumer BlackBerry Internet सेवा is available in 91 देशों विश्वव्यापी on over 500 mobile सेवा operators using विभिन्न मोबाईल technologies.
As of September 2012, वहीँ were eighty million subscribers worldwide to ब्लैकबेरी.
in 2011 the Caribbean and Latin अमेरिका had the highest penetrations of BlackBerry smartphones worldwide, साथ up to about 45 per cent in the region having a RIM device.
BlackBerry, iPhone, Android, और Windows Phone are considered the चार प्रमुख smartphone brands.
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry '' in the United States, जिससे alludes to its excessive use by its owners and is a सन्दर्भ to the addictiveness of crack cocaine.
Use of the term CrackBerry became so फैली कि in नवम्बर 2006 Webster 's New World कॉलेज Dictionary named `` crackberry '' the `` नई Word of the Year. ''
An example of a demand curve shifting.
The शिफ़्ट इससे D1 To d2 अर्थात् an increase in माँग with consequences लिये the other variables
in अर्थशास्त्र, the demand curve is the आलेख depicting the relationship between the price of a निश्चित commodity and the amount of it that उपभोक्ता हैं willing और able to खरीदें at that given price.
It is a graphic प्रतिनिधित्व of a demand schedule.
the demand curve for सब consumers together follows from the माँग curve of every व्यक्तिगत consumer : the व्यक्तिगत demands at each price are added together.
Demand वक्र are used to estimate behaviors in competitive बाज़ार, and are often combined with supply curves to अनुमान the संतुलन price ( the price at जिससे sellers together are willing to sell the same amount as buyers साथ are willing to buy, also known as market clearing price ) and the equilibrium मात्रा ( the amount of कि good or service that will be उत्पादित and bought without surplus/excess supply or shortage/excess demand ) of that market.
In a monopolistic market, the माँग curve facing the monopolist is simply the market demand curve.
Historia
by nikolaos Gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from यूनानी - historia, meaning `` inquiry, knowledge acquired by investigation '' ) is an umbrella term कि relates to पास्ट events as खूब as the डिस्कवरी, collection, संगठन, and presentation of information about ये events.
the term includes लौकिक, geologic, and organic history, but is often generically implied to mean human इतिहास.
Scholars who write about इतिहास are called इतिहासकारों.
History can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a narrative to examine and analyse a अनुक्रम of past events, और objectively determine the patterns of cause and प्रभाव कि determine them.
इतिहासकारों sometimes debate the nature of history and its उपयोगिता by discussing the पढ़ाई of the अनुशासन as an end in itself and as a रास्ता of providing `` perspective '' on the problems of the present.
Stories common to a particular culture, but not supported by external sources ( such as the tales surrounding King Arthur ) are प्रायः classified as cultural heritage or legends, because they do not support the `` disinterested छानबीन '' जरूरी of the discipline of history.
कार्यक्रम occurring prior to written रिकार्ड are considered prehistory.
Herodotus, a 5th century B.C. Greek historian is माना within the Western tradition to be the `` father of history '', और, along साथ his समकालीन Thucydides, helped form the मूलाधार for the modern study of human history.
Their कार्य continues to be पढ़ा today and the divide between the culture-focused हिरोडोटस and the military-focused Thucydides remains a पाइंट of contention or approach in modern ऐतिहासिक लिखने.
In the पूर्वी tradition, a state chronicle the वसन्त and Autumn annals was ज्ञात to be compiled इससे as early as 722 BCE although only 2nd century bce texts survived.
Ancient influences have helped spawn रूपांतर interpretations of the nature of इतिहास which have evolved over the centuries और continue to बदलें today.
The modern study of history is wide-ranging, and शामिल the study of specific regions and the पढ़ाई of certain topical or thematical तत्व of historical investigation.
Often history is taught as part of primary and secondary education, and the academic study of history is a major अनुशासन in University studies.
Malcolm X ( ; may 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm छोटी and also known as el-hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ), was an African-American मुस्लिम minister और इंसान rights activist.
To his admirers, he was a courageous advocate for the अधिकारों of blacks, a man who indicted श्वेत America in the harshest terms for its crimes विरूद्ध black Americans.
Detractors accused him of उपदेश racism, black supremacy, and हिंसा.
he has been called one of the greatest and most influential अफ़्रीकी Americans in history.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he was young, and at तनिक one of his uncles was lynched.
When he was 13, his mother थी placed in a mental hospital, and he was placed in a series of foster homes.
in 1946, at age 20, he गई to prison for breaking and entering.
In prison, Malcolm X became a member of the स्वदेश of islam ; after his parole in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of its leaders.
For a dozen years, Malcolm x was the public face of the controversial group, but disillusionment साथ Nation of Islam सिर Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the स्वदेश in कूच 1964.
After a period of सफर in Africa and the Middle East, he returned to the संयुक्त States, where he संस्थापित Muslim मस्जिदे, Inc. and the संगठन of Afro-American Unity.
In February 1965, less than a साल after leaving the Nation of Islam, he was assassinated by three members of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over time.
As a spokesman लिये the Nation of Islam he taught black सर्वोच्चता and advocated separation of black and श्वेत Americans —in contrast to the civil rights गति 's emphasis on integration.
After breaking साथ the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association साथ it, `` I किया many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain दिशा and told to कूच '' —and बनने a सुन्नी Muslim, he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to कार्य with civil rights leaders, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, और self-defense.
Henry merritt `` Hank '' Paulson, jr. ( born कूच 28, 1946 ) is an American banker who served as the 74th United States Secretary of the Treasury.
He had served as the Chairman and Chief Executive अधिकारी of Goldman Sachs, and is now chairman of the Paulson Institute, which he संस्थापित in 2011 to promote चिरस्थायी economic growth and a क्लीनर environment around the संसार, with an initial focus on the संयुक्त States and चीन.
a virtual machine ( vm ) is a software implemented abstraction of the underlying हार्डवेयर, which is presented to the application layer of the प्रणाली.
आभासी machines may be based on विशेषताएँ of a काल्पनिक कंप्यूटर or emulate the computer architecture and functions of a real world कंप्यूटर.
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that have eight legs and chelicerae with fangs that इंजेक्ट venom.
They are the largest order of arachnids and rank seventh in total प्रजाति diversity among all अन्य groups of organisms.
मकड़ियों are found worldwide on every continent except for Antarctica, और have become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at तनिक 43,678 spider species, and 109 families have महरूम recorded by taxonomists ; however, वहीँ has been भ्रम within the scientific community as to how all these families should be classified, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been प्रस्तावित since 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from other arthropods in कि the usual body segments हैं fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax and abdomen, and joined by a small, बेलनाकार pedicel.
Unlike insects, spiders do नहीं have antennae.
in all मगर the most primitive group, the Mesothelae, spiders have the सबसे centralized nervous systems of all arthropods, as all उनके ganglia are fused into एक mass in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, मकड़ियों have no extensor मांसपेशियां in उनके limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens भालू appendages कि have महरूम modified into spinnerets कि extrude silk from up to six types of silk glands भीतर their abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in size, आकार and the amount of sticky thread प्रयुक्त.
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be एक of the earliest forms, and spiders that produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant और diverse than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about, but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have been found in Carboniferous rocks from, and are बहुत similar to the सबसे आदिम surviving order, the Mesothelae.
the main groups of modern spiders, Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae, first appeared in the Triassic period, पहले.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was वर्णित in 2008, लकिन all other ज्ञात species हैं predators, mostly preying on insects और on other spiders, although a few large species also लो पक्षियों and lizards.
Spiders use a चौड़ी range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it साथ sticky bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid detection, or running it down.
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations, but the active hunters have acute vision, और hunters of the genus Portia show signs of intelligence in their चुनाव of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, और they liquidize their food by flooding it साथ digestive enzymes and पीस it साथ the bases of their pedipalps, as they do नहीं have true jaws.
Male spiders identify themselves by a variety of complex courtship rituals to avoid being खाया by the females.
males of most species survive a few matings, limited mainly by their short life spans.
Females weave silk egg-cases, each of which may contain hundreds of अंडे.
महिलाओं of अनेक species परवाह for their यंग, for उदाहरण by carrying them around or by sharing food with उन्हें.
A minority of species हैं social, building communal webs that may हाउस anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior सीमाएँ from precarious toleration, as in the widow मकड़ियों, to co-operative hunting and food-sharing.
Although most spiders live for at most दो years, tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can live up to 25 years in captivity.
जबकि the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans, scientists are now researching the उपयोग of मकड़ी venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a संयोजन of lightness, strength and elasticity that is superior to that of सिंथेटिक materials, and spider रेशा जीनों have been inserted into स्तनधारियों and plants to see if these can be used as silk factories.
As a result of their wide range of behaviors, spiders have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of patience, cruelty and creative powers.

Portrayed by Laura Prepon, Donna is the love interest to Eric forman.
US county household median income 2009.
Median US household आय, 2001-2011
household आय is a measure commonly used by the United States सरकारी and निजी institutions.
Each household is measured by the income of every resident over the age of 15.
Income शामिल मजदूरी and salaries, unemployment बीमे, विकलांगता payments, child support payments received, regular rental receipts, as well as कोई personal business, investment, or other kinds of income received routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household आय had been increasing almost every year from 1945 to 1999, it has since been चपटा and even decreased recently.
U.S. median household income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
चरम गरीबी in the United राज्य, meaning households living on less than $ 2 प्रति दिन before government लाभ, doubled from 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011, including 2.8 million children.
the residents of the household do नहीं have to be related to the head of the household for their earnings to be considered part of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a similar economic कॉन्टेक्स्ट, the use of household income remains among the most widely accepted measures of income.
कि the size of a household is not commonly लिया into account in such measures may distort कोई analysis of fluctuations within or among the household आय categories, and may render direct comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible.
A पंजीकृत एजेंट, also ज्ञात as a resident agent or statutory agent, in संयुक्त States business law, is a business or individual designated to receive service of process ( SOP ) when a कारोबार एंटिटी is a party in a legal action such as a lawsuit or summons.
The registered agent 's address may also be where the state will भेजें the paperwork for the yearly renewal of the business entity 's charter.
The पंजीकृत agent for a business entity may be an individual member of the company, or ( more often ) a third party, ऐसे as the organization 's lawyer or a service company.
Failure to properly maintain a registered agent can affect a company negatively.

The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable अधिकारों '' with जिससे all human beings are endowed by their creator for their protection of which they संस्थान governments.
Fencing, is typically divided into Olympic fencing, Classical fencing and historical fencing,.
The sport of fencing ( commonly पुकारा olympic fencing or competitive fencing ) is divided into तीन weapon श्रेणी : foil, sabre and épée.
Classical fencing uses the same three weapons, but approaches fencing as a martial art.

The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed muscle of the femur `` ), also पुकारा simply the quadriceps, quadriceps extensor, quads, is a large muscle group that includes the four प्रचलित muscles on the front of the thigh.
it is the great extensor muscle of the knee, forming a large fleshy mass जिससे covers the front and पहलू of the femur.
The proper Latin plural form of the adjective quadriceps would be quadricipites.
In modern English usage, quadriceps is used in both singular and बहुवचन.
the singular form quadricep, produced by hypercorrection, is frequently used.
RMS टाइटैनिक was a British passenger liner that sank in the North Atlantic समंदर on 15 April 1912 after colliding with an iceberg during her maiden voyage from Southampton, UK to New York City, US.
the डूब of Titanic caused the deaths of 1,502 people in एक of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in modern history.
the RMS Titanic थी the largest ship afloat at the समय of her maiden voyage.
She was the second of तीन Olympic क्लास समंदर liners operated by the श्वेत Star लकीर, and she was built by the Harland और Wolff shipyard in Belfast with Thomas Andrews, who perished with the ship, as her नवल architect.
On her maiden voyage, वो carried 2,224 passengers and क्रू.
Under the command of Edward Smith, her यात्री included some of the wealthiest people in the world, as well as सैंकड़ों of emigrants from Great Britain and Ireland, Scandinavia and elsewhere throughout Europe seeking a new जीवन in North America.
The ship थी designed to be the पिछला word in comfort and luxury, with an on-board gymnasium, तैराकी pool, पुस्तकालयों, high-class restaurants and opulent cabins.
She also had a powerful wireless टेलीग्राफ provided for the convenience of passengers as well as for operational use.
हालांकि she had advanced safety features such as watertight compartments and remotely activated watertight द्वार, वो lacked enough lifeboats to accommodate all of those aboard.
Because of outdated maritime safety regulations, she carried तभी enough lifeboats for 1,178 people—slightly more than हाफ of the number travelling on the maiden voyage, and one-third her total passenger and crew capacity.
After leaving Southampton on 10 April 1912, Titanic called at Cherbourg in फ़्रांस और Queenstown ( अभी cobh ) in Ireland before heading westwards towards New York.
On 14 April 1912, four days into the क्रासिंग and about 375 मील ( 600 km ) south of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड, she hit an हिमशैल at 11:40 pm ship 's time.
The glancing collision caused titanics hull plates to buckle inwards along her starboard side and opened five of her सोलह watertight compartments to the sea ; the ship gradually filled with water.
Meanwhile, यात्री and some crew members यहूद evacuated in lifeboats, many of which यहूद launched only partly loaded.
A disproportionate number of men were बाएँ सवार because of a `` महिलाओं and children first `` प्रोटोकॉल followed by some of the officers loading the lifeboats.
By 2:20 AM, she broke apart and foundered, with well over one thousand people still aboard.
Just under two hours after the टाइटैनिक foundered, the cunard लाइनर rms carpathia arrived on the scene of the sinking, where she brought aboard an अनुमानित 705 survivors.
The disaster थी greeted with विश्वव्यापी shock और outrage at the huge loss of life और the regulatory और operational failures that had led to it.
Public inquiries in Britain and the United राज्य led to major improvements in maritime सुरक्षा.
One of उनके most important legacies थी the establishment in 1914 of the International Convention for the सुरक्षा of Life at Sea ( SOLAS ), जिससे still governs maritime safety today.
additionally, several new wireless regulations were passed around the world in an effort to learn इससे the many missteps in बेतार communications -- -which could have saved अनेक अधिक passengers.
Many of the survivors lost all of their money and possessions and were left destitute ; many families, विशेषकर those of crew members from Southampton, खोया their प्राथमिक bread-winners.
They were helped by an outpouring of public sympathy and charitable donations.
Some of the male survivors were अभियुक्त of कायरता for leaving the ship जबकि people were still on board ; the White Star Line 's chairman, J. Bruce Ismay, faced social ostracism for the rest of उसके life.
The wreck of the टाइटैनिक remains on the seabed, split in two and gradually disintegrating at a depth of.
Since its डिस्कवरी in 1985, thousands of artefacts have been recovered and put on display at museums around the world.
Titanic has become one of the most famous ships in history, her मेमोरी kept alive by numerous books, folk songs, films, exhibits, and memorials.

Legs are used for standing, walking, कूद, running, kicking, and similar activities, and constitute a significant portion of a person 's mass.

जेम्स Madison, Jr. ( March 16, 1751 ( o.s. कूच 5 ) – June 28, 1836 ) was an American statesman and political theorist, the fourth President of the United States ( 1809–1817 ).
He is hailed as the “father of the Constitution” लिये होने instrumental in the drafting of the United States Constitution और as the कुंजी champion and author of the United States विधेयक of Rights.
He served as a politician much of his adult life.
After the constitution had महरूम drafted, Madison became one of the leaders in the movement to ratify it.
His collaboration साथ Alexander Hamilton and John jay produced the Federalist Papers ( 1788 ).
Circulated only in New York at the समय, they would later be considered among the most important polemics in support of the Constitution.
He was also a delegate to the वर्जिनिया संवैधानिक ratifying सम्मेलन, and was instrumental to the successful अनुसमर्थन effort in वर्जिनिया.
Like most of his contemporaries, Madison changed his political दृश्य दौरान उसके life.
During the drafting and अनुसमर्थन of the संविधान, he favored a strong नेशनल सरकारी, though later he grew to एहसान stronger state सरकारें, before settling between the two extremes late in his जीवन.
In 1789, मैडिसन became a leader in the new House of Representatives, drafting many मौलिक laws.
He is notable for drafting the पहला ten amendments to the Constitution, and thus is known as the `` Father of the Bill of Rights ``.
Madison worked closely साथ अध्यक्ष George Washington to organize the new federal सरकारी.
तोड़कर with Hamilton और what became the Federalist Party in 1791, Madison and Thomas Jefferson organized what they called the Republican Party ( later called by historians the Democratic-Republican पार्टी )
as Jefferson’s Secretary of State ( 1801–1809 ), Madison supervised the Louisiana खरीदें, which doubled the nation’s size.
After his election to the presidency, he presided over renewed prosperity for several years.
As president ( 1809–17 ), after the failure of diplomatic protests और a व्यापार embargo against Great Britain, he led the nation into the War of 1812.
He was responding to British encroachments on American honor and rights ; in addition, he wanted to end the influence of the British among their Indian allies, whose resistance blocked United States settlement in the Midwest around the Great Lakes.
Madison found the war to be an administrative दुःस्वप्न, as the United States had neither a strong army nor वित्तीय system ; as a result, he afterward supported a stronger national government and a strong सैन्य, as well as the national बैंको, which he had long opposed.
जैसे other वर्जिनिया statesmen in the slave society, he was a slaveholder who inherited his plantation ज्ञात as Montpelier, and owned hundreds of slaves during his lifetime to cultivate tobacco and other फसलों.
Madison supported the three-fifths compromise that allowed three-fifths of the enumerated population of slaves to be counted for representation.
