Hydraulic fluid होने poured.
Hydraulic fluids, also पुकारा hydraulic liquids, हैं the medium by which शक्ति is transferred in hydraulic मशीनरी.
Common hydraulic fluids are based on mineral oil or water.
उदाहरण of equipment कि might उपयोग hydraulic fluids include excavators and backhoes, हाइड्रोलिक brakes, power steering प्रणालियों, transmissions, garbage ट्रक, aircraft उड़ान कंट्रोल प्रणालियों, lifts, and औद्योगिक machinery.
Hydraulic systems जैसे the ones mentioned above will work most efficiently if the हाइड्रोलिक fluid used has no compressibility
Mahindra Tractor
Mahindra Tractors, the फार्म equipment division of Mahindra & महिंद्रा, builds and स्त्रोत tractors that are sold विश्वव्यापी across six continents.
Mahindra is also among the top three tractor manufacturers in the संसार.
Mahindra has a huge consumer आधार in India, China and America and a growing आधार in Australia.
The company builds more tractors in India than any अन्य manufacturer, and has the capacity to build 150,000 tractors a साल.
In 1963, M & M formed a joint venture साथ International Harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the Mahindra nameplate लिये the भारतीय मार्केट.
Armed साथ engineering, tooling and manufacturing know-how gained from this relationship, M & M developed इसके first tractor, the b-275.
महिंद्रा Tractors with sales of nearly 85,000 units annually is one of the largest ट्रैक्टर companies in the world, and is number एक in sales in India - the largest tractor market in the world.
To expand into the growing tractor market in China, महिंद्रा acquired majority stake in Jiangling.
to raise awareness about महिंद्रा in the US, Mahindra यूएसए announced its new sponsorship in the nascar Nationwide Series with R3 मोटरस्पोर्ट, जिससे is participating with a # 23 Mahindra tractors शेवरलेट.
The car will be चलित by Robert रिचर्डसन, Jr. Mahindra USA, Inc. announced a 17-race primary and 18-race संबद्ध sponsorship for the 2009 NASCAR देशभर Series.
साथ this sponsorship, महिंद्रा was the पहला Indian company to sponsor a car in NASCAR.
in 2008, Mahindra was a sponsor of the McDonald मोटरस्पोर्ट team which ran the # 81 car in the NASCAR देशभर Series.
The power6 is a microprocessor developed by ibm that implemented the शक्ति isa v.2.03.
When it became available in प्रणालियों in 2007, it succeeded the POWER5+ as IBM 's flagship Power microprocessor.

The American middle class is a social class in the United राज्य.
While the concept is typically ambiguous in popular opinion और common language use, contemporary social scientists have put forward several, more or less congruent, theories on the American middle class.
Depending on class मॉडल used, the मध्य class may constitute anywhere इससे 25 % to 66 % of households.
One of the पहला प्रमुख studies of the middle class in America was श्वेत Collar : The अमरीकी Middle वर्ग, published in 1951 by sociologist C. Wright Wright_Mills मिलों Wright_Mills.
Later sociologists ऐसे as डेनिस Gilbert of Hamilton College commonly divide the middle class into two sub-groups.
constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the अपर or professional middle class consisting of अत्यधिक educated, salaried professionals and managers.
Constituting roughly one third of households is the lower middle class consisting ज़्यादातर of semi-professionals, skilled craftsmen and lower-level management.
Middle-class persons commonly have a आरामदायक standard of living, significant economic security, considerable work autonomy and rely on their expertise to sustain themselves.
Members of the middle class belong to diverse groups which overlap साथ each other.
Overall, middle-class व्यक्तियों, especially upper-middle-class individuals, are characterized by conceptualizing, creating and consulting.
Thus, college शिक्षा is one of the main indicators of middle-class status.
Largely attributed to the nature of middle-class occupations, middle class values tend to emphasize independence, adherence to मूलभूत मानकों, valuing innovation और respecting non-conformity.
नीतियां more active than अन्य demographics, college शिक्षित मध्य class professionals are split between the two प्रमुख parties.
Income varies considerably from near the national median to well in excess of $ 100,000.
Household income figures, however, do not सदा reflect class status and standard of living, as they are largely बहकावे by the number of income earners and fail to recognize household आकार.
It is इसलिए possible for a large, dual-earner, lower middle class household to out-earn a small, one-earner, अपर middle class household.
The मध्य classes हैं very influential, as they encompass the majority of मतदाता, writers, teachers, पत्रकारों, and editors.
Most societal trends in the US originate within the middle classes.

Ruins from the 1906 San फ्रांसिस्को earthquake, remembered as one of the worst natural disasters in United States history
A disaster is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) hazard resulting in an event of substantial extent causing significant शारीरिक क्षति or destruction, loss of life, or drastic change to the environment.
A disaster can be ostensively defined as any tragic event stemming from events such as earthquakes, floods, अनर्थकारी accidents, fires, or explosions.
It is a phenomenon कि can cause damage to जीवन and property और destroy the economic, सोशल and cultural life of people.
In contemporary academia, disasters are seen as the consequence of inappropriately managed risk.
These risks are the उत्पाद of a संयोजन of दोनो hazard/s and vulnerability.
Hazards कि strike in areas with low vulnerability will never become disasters, as is the case in uninhabited regions.
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – अधिक than 95 percent of all मौतों caused by disasters occur in developing countries, और losses due to natural disasters हैं 20 टाइम्स greater ( as a percentage of GDP ) in विकासशील देशों than in industrialized countries.
in computing, booting ( भी ज्ञात as booting up ) is the initial नियत of operations कि a computer system performs when electrical power to the CPU is switched on.
The process begins जब a computer is turned on for the first time or is re-energized after being turned off, and ends when the computer is ready to perform its normal operations.
On modern general purpose computers, this can take tens of seconds and typically involves performing a power-on self-test, locating and initializing peripheral devices, and then finding, loading and starting an operating प्रणाली.
Many कंप्यूटर systems also allow these operations to be initiated by a software कमांड without cycling शक्ति, in what is ज्ञात as a soft reboot, though कुछ of the initial परिचालन might be skipped on a soft reboot.
A boot loader is a कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम that loads the main operating system or runtime environment for the computer after completion of the self-tests.
The computer term बूट is short for bootstrap or bootstrap load and derives इससे the phrase to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps.
The usage calls attention to the requirement that, if most software is loaded onto a computer by other तन्त्र already running on the computer, some mechanism must exist to load आरंभिक software onto the computer.
जल्दी कंप्यूटर used a variety of ad-hoc methods to get a small program into memory to solve this problem.
the आविष्कार of integrated circuit read-only memory ( rom ) of various प्रकार solved this paradox by allowing computers to be shipped with a start up program that could नहीं be erased.
Growth in the capacity of rom has अनुमत ever more elaborate start up प्रक्रियाओं to be implemented.
on general purpose computers, the boot process begins with the execution of an आरंभिक कार्यक्रम stored in boot roms or read in another fashion.
In कुछ older कंप्यूटर, the initial program might have been the application to चलाएं, if no operating system was used, or the operating प्रणाली.
in other computers, the initial program is a boot loader that may तब लोड into random-access memory ( RAM ), from nonvolatile secondary storage ( such as a hard डिस्क drive ) or, in some older computers, from a मीडियम ऐसे as punched cards, punched tape, or magnetic tape in older computers, the binary कोड of an operating system or runtime पर्यावरण and then execute it.
If the boot loader is limited in its size and capabilities, it may, instead, लोड a larger और more capable secondary boot loader, जिससे होता तब load the operating system or runtime environment.
Some embedded systems do not require a noticeable boot sequence to शुरू functioning and जब turned on may simply run operational programs that are stored in ROM.
Firebird is an open source SQL relational database management system that runs on लिनक्स, Windows, and a variety of Unix.
the database forked from Borland 's खोलें source edition of InterBase in 2000, but चूंकि firebird 1.5 the code has महरूम largely rewritten.
Outsourcing is the contracting out of an internal business process to a third-party organization.
the practice of contracting a business process out to a third party rather than staffing it internally is common in the modern अर्थव्यवस्था.
The term `` outsourcing '' became popular in the United राज्य निकट the turn of the 21st century.
Outsourcing sometimes involves transferring कर्मचारी and assets from one firm to another, but not always.
The definition of outsourcing includes both foreign and domestic contracting, और sometimes includes offshoring, which means relocating a कारोबार function to another देश.
Financial savings from lower international मजदूर rates is a बिग motivation लिये outsourcing/offshoring.
The opposite of outsourcing is called insourcing, which entails bringing processes handled by third-party firms in-house, and is sometimes accomplished via vertical integration.
However, a business can provide a contract service to another business बगैर necessarily insourcing that कारोबार process.
Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that कल्याणकारी acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ( AIDS ), a condition in humans in which progressive failure of the immune प्रणाली allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive.
संक्रमण with HIV occurs by the ट्रांसफ़र of blood, semen, vaginal fluid, pre-ejaculate, or स्तन milk.
Within these bodily fluids, hiv is present as both free virus particles and virus within infected प्रतिरक्षा cells.
HIV infects vital cells in the human immune प्रणाली such as helper T cells ( specifically CD4 + t cells ), macrophages, and dendritic कोशिकाएं.
HIV infection leads to low levels of CD4+ T cells through a number of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander cells, direct viral हत्या of infected cells, और killing of infected cd4+ t cells by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes कि recognize infected cells.
When cd4+ t कोशिका संख्याएँ decline below a critical स्तर, cell-mediated immunity is lost, and the body becomes progressively अधिक susceptible to opportunistic infections.
The firepole in a fire station in Toronto
A fireman 's pole ( also पुकारा a sliding pole or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal tube or pipe installed between floors in आग स्टेशन, allowing firefighters responding to an alarm to quickly descend to the ground floor faster than by using a standard staircase.
The device was invented in the 1870s by David Kenyon, in शिकागो, Illinois, although it is often incorrectly credited to the बोस्टन Fire Department.
Mary Poppins is the शीर्षक अक्षर of a series of children 's books written by P. L. ट्रेवर्स.
Throughout the Mary Poppins series, which lasted from 1934 to 1988, Mary shepard was the illustrator and acted as a second author.
The books centre on a magical अंग्रेज़ी nanny, Mary Poppins.
She is blown by the East wind to Number Seventeen Cherry Tree Lane, London, and into the बैंको ' household to care for their children.
मुठभेड़ों with चिमनी sweeps, shopkeepers and various adventures follow until Mary poppins abruptly leaves, i.e., `` pops-out ''.
the adventures लो place over a total of eight किताबे.
however, only the first three books feature Mary poppins arriving and leaving.
The later five books recount previously unrecorded adventures from her असली three visits.
as P. L. Travers explains in उसके introduction to Mary poppins in the पार्क, `` She can not forever arrive and depart. ''
The किताबे were adapted in 1964 into a musical Disney फिल्मी starring Julie एंड्रयूज and Dick Van Dyke.
In 2004, Disney नाट्य produced a stage musical adaptation in the West End theatre.
The stage musical was transferred to Broadway in 2006 where it ran until इसके closing on March 3, 2013.
It रै been highly कामयाब, as was the 1964 film.
The Last Song is a 2010 American coming of आयु teen romantic drama film developed alongside Nicholas Sparks ' novel by the same name.
The film was directed by Julie Anne Robinson in उसके feature फिल्मी directorial debut and co-written by Sparks and Jeff Van Wie.
The पिछला Song stars Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth, and ग्रेग Kinnear and follows a troubled teenager as वो reconnects with उसके estranged father और जलप्रपात in love during a summer in a quiet Southern United राज्य beach town.
The फिल्मी is distributed by Touchstone Pictures.
Sparks was approached to write both the फिल्मी 's screenplay and the अनोखा.
Sparks completed the screenplay in January 2009, prior to the completion of the novel, बनाना The Last Song उसके पहला script to be optioned for film.
The setting, originally in उत्तर Carolina जैसे the novel, moved to जॉर्जिया after the states had campaigned for months to मेजबान production.
Upon beginning production in Tybee Island, Georgia and nearby Savannah, The Last सोंग became the first movie to be both shot and set in Tybee Island.
Filming lasted इससे June 15 to August 18, 2009 with much of it occurring on the island 's beach and बांध.
The Last सोंग was originally अनुसूचित लिये wide release on जनवरी 8, 2010, but थी postponed to March 31, 2010.
Written Simlish
simlish is a fictional language featured in ea Games ' Sim series of games.
It debuted in SimCopter, and रै been especially prominent in the Sims, The Sims 2 and The Sims 3.
The सीम development team created the unique simlish भाषा by experimenting साथ fractured Ukrainian, French, Latin, Finnish, English, Fijian, Cebuano, and Tagalog.
Simlish can also be heard in simcity 4, SimCity Societies and simcity 2013, but far less अक्सर.
Civilized जीव in Spore can भी be taught to speak Simlish.
it is also प्रदर्शित to an extent in firaxis खेल ' Sid Meier 's simgolf.
Designer Will Wright was सचेत of the need लिये dialogue in the खेल, but विचार कि using a real language होता make it sound too repetitive and would also be too costly to hire translators for world languages.
Initially, inspired by the Native American code talkers of संसार War ii, Sims निर्माता Will Wright and language expert मार्क Gimbel suggested experimenting with the Navajo language to create Simlish.
However, they ultimately decided कि Simlish worked best as a `` भाषा '' made up of gibberish words that could n't be translated, so that its meaning would be left open to the imagination of the खिलाड़ी.
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense language '' turned out to be the right विकास choice, as people were capable of imagining it more realistically than a computer could simulate a real एक.
The actual sound of Simlish was created improvisationally by voice अभिनेताओं Stephen kearin और Gerri Lawlor.
An उदाहरण of Ultrasonic Testing ( UT ) on ब्लेड जड़ें of a V2500 IAE aircraft इंजन.
Step 1 : The UT probe is placed on the root of the blades to be inspected साथ the सहायता of a special borescope tool ( वीडियो probe ).
Step 2 : Instrument settings हैं input.
Step 3 : The probe is scanned over the blade root.
In this मामला, an indication ( शिखर in the data ) through the red line ( or gate ) indicates a good blade ; an indication to the left of that दायरा indicates a crack.
Principle of अल्ट्रासोनिक testing.
LEFT : A probe भेजना a sound wave into a test material.
There हैं two indications, one from the initial pulse of the probe, और the second due to the back wall गूंज.
सही : a defect creates a third indication and simultaneously reduces the amplitude of the back wall indication.
The depth of the defect is determined by the ratio d/e
In ultrasonic परीक्षण ( UT ), very short ultrasonic pulse-waves साथ center बारंबारता ranging from 0.1-15 MHz and occasionally up to 50 MHz are launched into materials to detect internal खामियां or to characterize सामग्री.
A आम example is ultrasonic thickness measurement, which tests the thickness of the test object, for उदाहरण, to monitor pipework corrosion.
अल्ट्रासोनिक testing is प्रायः performed on steel and other metals and alloys, though it can also be used on concrete, लकडी and composites, albeit with कम resolution.
It is a form of non-destructive testing used in many industries including aerospace, automotive and other transportation sectors.
The vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ), also called ductus deferens ( Latin : `` carrying-away vessel '' ; plural : ductus deferentes ), is part of the male anatomy of many vertebrates ; they transport sperm from the epididymis in anticipation of ejaculation.
vascular ischemia of the toes with characteristic cyanosis.
In medicine, ischemia, भी spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia, ( ; from यूनानी भाषा ισχαιμία, ischaimía ; isch- root denoting a restriction or thinning or to मेक or grow thin/lean, haema रक्त ) is a restriction in blood supply to tissues, causing a shortage of oxygen and ग्लूकोज needed for cellular metabolism ( to keep tissue alive ).
Ischemia is generally caused by problems with blood vessels, with resultant damage to or dysfunction of tissue.
It also means local anemia in a given भाग of a body sometimes resulting from congestion ( such as vasoconstriction, thrombosis or embolism ).
bas सिंड्रोम ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome, also known as trisomy 21, is a जेनेटिक disorder caused by the presence of सब or part of a third copy of chromosome 21.
Down syndrome is the most आम chromosome abnormality in humans.
It is typically associated with a delay in cognitive क्षमता ( mental retardation, or mr ) and physical growth, and a particular set of facial characteristics.
The average iq of यंग adults with bas syndrome is around 50, whereas young adults बगैर the condition typically have an IQ of 100.
( MR has historically been defined as an IQ below 70. )
A large proportion of individuals with bas सिंड्रोम have a severe degree of बौद्धिक विकलांगता.
bas syndrome is named after John Langdon Down, the अंग्रेजों physician जो वर्णित the syndrome in 1866.
the condition was clinically described earlier by Jean Etienne dominique Esquirol in 1838 और Edouard Seguin in 1844.
Down syndrome was identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy by Dr. Jérôme Lejeune in 1959.
bas syndrome can be identified in a baby at birth or before birth by prenatal screening.
Pregnancies with this निदान are often terminated.
The सीडीसी estimates that about one of every 691 babies born in the United States each year is born with Down syndrome.
Many children with Down सिंड्रोम are educated in regular school classes while अन्य आवश्यकता specialised educational सुविधाएं.
Some children graduate from high school, and, in the US, there हैं increasing opportunities लिये participating in post-secondary education.
Education and proper care has been shown to improve quality of life significantly.
Many adults साथ Down Syndrome are able to work at paid employment in the जातियाँ, जबकि others require a more sheltered कार्य environment.
Hot flashes ( भी ज्ञात as hot flushes, or night sweats if they happen at रात्रि ) are a symptom which may have several other causes, but which is often caused by the changing hormone levels कि are characteristic of menopause.
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L. 78-346, 58 Stat. 284m ), known informally as the G.I. Bill, was a law that provided a range of लाभ for returning World War II दिग्गजों ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ).
लाभ included low-cost mortgages, low-interest loans to प्रारंभ a business or farm, cash payments of ट्यूशन and living expenses to attend college, high स्कूल or vocational शिक्षा, as well as एक year of unemployment compensation.
It was available to every veteran who had been on active duty during the युद्ध years for at least ninety days and था not been dishonorably discharged ; कॉम्बैट was not required.
By the end of the program in 1956, roughly 2.2 million veterans had used the G.I. Bill education benefits in order to attend colleges or universities, and an अतिरिक्त 6.6 million used these benefits for some kind of training program.
Since the original 1944 law, the term रै come to include other veteran लाभ programs created to assist veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service.
Historians and अर्थशास्त्रियों consider the G.I. Bill a प्रमुख political success—especially in contrast to the treatments of संसार War I veterans—and a major contribution to America 's stock of human capital that sped long-term economic growth.
The Watergate scandal was a political scandal कि occurred in the United राज्य in the 1970s as a result of the June 17, 1972 break-in at the Democratic National कमेटी headquarters at the Watergate office complex in Washington, d.C., and the Nixon administration 's attempted cover-up of its involvement.
The कांड eventually led to the resignation of रिचर्ड Nixon, the President of the United States, on August 9, 1974 — the only resignation of a U.S. अध्यक्ष.
The कांड also resulted in the indictment, trial, conviction, and incarceration of forty-three persons, dozens of whom यहूद Nixon 's top प्रशासन officials.
The affair began with the arrest of five men for breaking and entering into the Democratic National Committee ( DNC ) headquarters at the Watergate जटिल on June 17, 1972.
the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) कनेक्ट cash found on the burglars to a slush fund used by the Committee for the Re-Election of the President, the आधिकारिक organization of Nixon 's campaign.
In July 1973, as evidence आरोहित विरूद्ध the president 's स्टाफ, including testimony provided by former स्टाफ members in an investigation conducted by the Senate Watergate कमेटी, it was नाज़िल that President Nixon था a tape-recording system in his offices and he had recorded अनेक conversations.
रिकार्डिंग from these tapes implicated the president, revealing he had attempted to कवर up the questionable ( and illegal ) goings-on that था taken place during उसके administration, both before and after the break-in.
After a protracted श्रेणी of bitter court लड़ाइयों, the U.S. Supreme Court unanimously ruled that the अध्यक्ष था to hand over the tapes to सरकारी investigators ; he ultimately complied.
Facing near-certain महाभियोग in the House of प्रतिनिधि and a दमदार possibility of a conviction in the सीनेट, Nixon resigned the प्रेसिडेंसी on August 9, 1974.
His successor, Gerald Ford, तब issued a pardon to उसे.
Elizabeth Imogene webber ( formerly Lansing and Spencer ) is a fictional अक्षर on the ABC Daytime soap opera General Hospital.

the United States प्रेसिडेंसी of रोनाल्ड Reagan, भी known as the reagan administration, was a रिपब्लिकन प्रशासन headed by Ronald Reagan from January 20, 1981, to January 20, 1989.
Domestically, the administration favored reducing सरकारी programs and introduced the largest across-the-board tax cuts in American history.
The economic policies enacted in 1981, ज्ञात as `` Reaganomics ``, were an उदाहरण of supply-side economics.
Reagan aimed to encourage entrepreneurship and limit the growth of social spending, as well as the कटौती of regulation and inflation.
Economic growth saw a strong recovery in the 1980s, helping reagan to win a landslide re-election.
The national debt increased significantly, however.
Regarding foreign policy, the administration was steadfastly anti-communist, कॉलिंग the Soviet Union an `` evil empire `` और ending 1970s détente.
Reagan accelerated the विशाल buildup of the military प्रारंभ by his पूर्ववर्ती, including an invasion of Grenada, the first major overseas action by u.S. troops since the end of the वियतनाम War.
The `` reagan Doctrine `` controversially granted aid to paramilitary forces seeking to फेकने communist governments, particularly in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan.
Reagan भी promoted नई technologies such as missile defense प्रणालियों in order to confront the Soviets and their allies.
in diplomacy, Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher, and he met with Soviet General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev four times, aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals.
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` Reagan Revolution '', or the Age of Reagan in recognition of the political realignment both भीतर and beyond the u.S. in favor of उसके brand of conservatism and his आस्था in फ़्री markets.
The Reagan administration worked toward the collapse of Soviet Communism, and it किया collapse just as he left office.
Victory in the Cold War led to a unipolar संसार with the u.S. as the world 's sole महाशक्ति.
While the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed several Reagan aides during his second term, reagan खुद बाएँ दफ्तर with a 63 percent स्वीकृति rating, one of the higher approval ratings of दूँ presidents.
After years of unstinting तारीफ़ from the right, और unrelenting criticism from the बाएँ, historian David Henry पाता that by 2009 a consensus था emerged among विद्वानों कि Reagan revived conservatism and turned the स्वदेश to the right by demonstrating a `` pragmatic conservatism '' that promoted ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political system.
Furthermore, says Henry, the consensus viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the presidency and American self-confidence, and contributed critically to ending the Cold War.
Crude death rate by country ( 2006 ).
Mortality rate is a measure of the number of deaths ( in general, or due to a विशिष्ट कारण ) in a population.
Scaled to the आकार of that population, प्रति unit of time.
Mortality rate is typically expressed in units of deaths प्रति 1000 individuals per year ; thus, a mortality रेट of 9.5 ( out of 1000 ) in a population of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire जनसांख्यिकी, or 0.95 % out of the कुल.
It is distinct from morbidity rate, which refers to the number of individuals in poor health during a given time period ( the व्यापकता rate ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the disease per unit of time ( incidence rate ).
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately used to refer to the number of deaths among a set of diagnosed हॉस्पिटल cases लिये a disease or injury, rather than लिये the general population of a country or जातीय समूह.
This disease mortality statistic is अधिक precisely referred to as `` मामला fatality rate `` ( CFR ).
One distinguishes:
The crude death rate, the total number of deaths per year per 1000 people.
the crude death रेट for the पूरे world is about 8.37 per 1000 per year according to the current CIA World Factbook.
The perinatal mortality rate, the sum of neonatal deaths and fetal deaths ( stillbirths ) per 1000 births.
The maternal mortality अनुपात, the number of maternal deaths per 100,000 live births in same time period.
The maternal mortality रेट, the number of मातृ मौतों प्रति 1,000 महिलाओं of reproductive आयु in the population ( generally defined as 15–44 years of age ).
The शिशु mortality rate, the number of deaths of children less than 1 साल old per 1000 live births.
the child mortality रेट, the क्रमांक of मौतों of children कम than 5 सालो old per 1000 live births.
the standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) - This represents a proportional comparison to the numbers of deaths that would have been expected if the जनसांख्यिकी had been of a standard संयोजन in terms of age, gender, इत्यादि.
The age-specific mortality rate ( ASMR ) - This refers to the total number of deaths per year per 1000 लोगों of a given आयु ( e.g. age 62 पिछला जन्मदिवस ).
In regard to the or failure of medical treatment or procedures, एक would भी distinguish:
The early mortality रेट, the total number of deaths in the early चरण of an ongoing treatment, or in the period immediately following an treatment.
The late mortality rate, the total number of मौतों in the late stages of an ongoing treatment, or a significant length of time after an acute treatment.
Note that the crude death rate as defined ऊपर and applied to a whole population can give a misleading impression.
The crude death रेट depends on the age ( and gender ) specific mortality rates and the age ( and लिंग ) distribution of the population.
the number of deaths per 1000 लोगों can be higher for developed nations than in less-developed countries, despite life expectancy being higher in developed countries due to standards of स्वास्थ्य being better.
This happens because विकसित countries typically have a completely अलग population age distribution, with a much higher proportion of older people, due to both lower recent birth rates and lower mortality rates.
A more complete picture of मृत्यु is given by a जीवन table which shows the mortality rate separately for each आयु.
a life table is necessary to give a good estimate of जीवन expectancy.
an otoacoustic emission ( oae ) is a sound which is generated from भीतर the भीतरी ear.
having been predicted by Thomas सुनहरा in 1948, its existence was पहला demonstrated experimentally by David Kemp in 1978 and otoacoustic emissions have since महरूम shown to arise by a number of different सेल्यूलर mechanisms within the inner ear.
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear after the भीतरी ear has been damaged, so oaes are प्रायः used in the laboratory and the clinic as a measure of inner ear health.
Broadly speaking, there are two types of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( SOAEs ), which can occur without बाह्य stimulation, and जगाई otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ), which require an evoking stimulus.
Hurricane Tomas was the nineteenth नामित storm and बारहवीं hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season.
Tomas विकसित from a tropical wave east of the windward Islands on October 29.
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane, it moved through the Windward Islands and passed very near संत लूसिया.
बाद reaching Category 2 status on the Saffir-Simpson स्केल, Tomas जल्दी weakened to a tropical storm in the central Caribbean Sea, due to strong wind shear and dry air.
Tomas later regained hurricane status as it reorganized निकट the Windward passage.
Throughout the hurricane 's path, 71 people are known to have been killed, 14 of जिसको यहूद in Saint Lucia.
Monetary losses throughout the Windward Islands were estimated at us $ 588 million, मुख्यतः in Saint Lucia.
In the wake of the storm in Haiti, flooding intensified an ongoing cholera outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities.
According to a report released in दिसम्बर 2010, 55 people were killed in Cuba और Hispanola, though the distribution of these fatalities are unknown.
overall damage इससे the storm was at least $ 741 लाख.
Victoria Jackson ( born अगस्त 2, 1959 ) is an अमरीकी comedian, actress, satirist, singer and internet blogger best known as a डाल member of the NBC television sketch comedy श्रेणी शनिवार रात्रि Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992.
She रै received attention as a vocal critic of President Barack ओबामा, और is an क्रियाशील participant in the चाय Party movement.
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by भारी reliance on techniques like fragmentation, paradox, and questionable narrators, and is often ( हालांकि not exclusively ) defined as a style or trend जिससे emerged in the post–World War II era.
Postmodern works हैं seen as a प्रतिक्रिया against Enlightenment thinking and Modernist approaches to literature.
Postmodern literature, like postmodernism as a whole, tends to resist definition or classification as a `` गति ''.
Indeed, the convergence of postmodern literature with various modes of critical theory, particularly reader-response and deconstructionist approaches, and the subversions of the implicit contract between लेखक, text and रीडर by which its works हैं often characterised, have led to pre-modern fictions such as Cervantes ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy होने retrospectively inducted into the fold.
जबकि there is little consensus on the precise विशेषताएँ, पैमाना, और महत्व of postmodern साहित्य, as is often the case with artistic movements, postmodern literature is commonly defined in relation to a precursor.
For उदाहरण, a postmodern साहित्यिक work tends not to conclude with the neatly tied-up समाप्ति as is often मिला in modernist literature, but often parodies it.
Postmodern authors tend to celebrate chance over craft, and further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's प्राधिकार.
Another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of भेद between high and कम culture through the उपयोग of pastiche, the combination of subjects और जाति not previously deemed fit for literature.

The romanian-born Cretu conceived the पहेली project while working in Germany, but based his recording studio A.R.T. Studios in Ibiza, Spain, इससे the early 1990s जबतक May 2009, where he has recorded all of पहेली 's studio releases to तिथि.

scooby-doo is an American एनिमेटेड कार्टून franchise, comprising several animated television series produced इससे 1969 to the present दिन.
The original series, Scooby-Doo, Where हैं You !
, थी created for Hanna-Barbera Productions by writers Joe माणिक्य और केन Spears in 1969.
This Saturday morning cartoon श्रेणी प्रदर्शित four teenagers— Fred Jones, Daphne Blake, velma Dinkley, and Norville `` Shaggy '' Rogers — और their talking brown Great डेन dog named Scooby-Doo, who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural creatures through a श्रेणी of हरकतों और missteps.
Following the success of the original श्रेणी, hanna-barbera and इसके successor Warner Bros. Animation have produced numerous follow-up and spin-off animated श्रेणी and अनेक related works, including television specials और telefilms, a line of direct-to-video films, and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films.

and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo Get a a Clue ! ] ], aired as part of बच्चे WB on the WB संजाल and its successor, The CW संजाल, इससे 2002 जबतक 2008.

Mystery incorporated, aired on Cartoon Network from 2010 to 2013.

Call of Duty is a first-person and third-person shooter computer/ video game franchise.

Several spin-off खेल have भी महरूम released.

Beginning with Modern Warfare, which is set in modern times, the series has shifted focus away इससे संसार War II.

Black ops 2 ( released November 13, 2012 ) takes place in the year 2025.
The Call of Duty games are published and owned by Activision with Aspyr Media publishing it for Apple OS X.

As of November 11, 2011, the Call of Duty series have sold over 100 million copies.

Over 1.6 billion hours of online gameplay have been logged Modern warfare 3 since its 2011 release.
The एस्टेट tax in the United States is a tax imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person, whether such property is transferred via a will, according to the state laws of intestacy or otherwise made as an incident of the मौत of the owner, such as a transfer of property from an intestate estate or trust, or the payment of certain life बीमे benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries.
The estate tax is one part of the Unified Gift and Estate Tax system in the United States.
The other भाग of the system, the तोहफा tax, imposes a tax on transfers of property दौरान a person 's life ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate tax should a person want to give away his/her estate.
in addition to the federal government, many states भी impose an estate tax, with the state version called either an estate tax or an inheritance tax.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों of the estate tax call it the `` death कर ''.
If an एसेट is left to a spouse or a Federally recognized charity, the tax usually does not apply.
in addition, up to $ 5,250,000 can be दिए by an individual, before and/or upon their death, without incurring federal gift or estate taxes.
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी actor and संगीतकार, known as the lead singer and rhythm guitarist of the rock band Bush.

Raffaello Sanzio da Urbino ( April 6 or कूच 28, 1483 – April 6, 1520 ), better known simply as राफेल, was an Italian painter and architect of the High Renaissance.
उसके work is admired for इसके स्पष्टता of रूप और ease of composition and for its विज़ुअल achievement of the Neoplatonic ideal of इंसान grandeur.
साथ साथ Michelangelo और Leonardo da Vinci, he forms the traditional trinity of great masters of that period.
Raphael was enormously productive, कार्यशील an unusually large workshop, and despite his death at 37, a large body of his कार्य remains.
Many of his works हैं found in the Vatican Palace, where the frescoed Raphael कक्ष were the central, और the largest, work of his करियर.
The best known work is The स्कूल of Athens in the Vatican stanza della Segnatura.
After his early years in रोम much of his work थी self-designed, but for the सबसे भाग executed by the workshop from his drawings, with considerable loss of विशेषता.
He was extremely influential in उसके lifetime, though outside रोम his work was mostly known from his collaborative printmaking.
बाद his death, the influence of his great rival Michelangelo was more widespread जबतक the 18th and 19th सदियां, when Raphael 's more निर्मल and harmonious qualities were again regarded as the highest मॉडल.
His career falls naturally into तीन phases और three styles, first described by giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria, then a period of about four years ( इससे 1504–1508 ) absorbing the artistic परंपराओं of Florence, followed by his पिछला hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome, working for two Popes and their close associates.
Julia Fiona Roberts ( born October 28, 1967 ) is an American actress.
वो became a Hollywood star बाद headlining the romantic comedy pretty Woman ( 1990 ), which grossed $ 464 million worldwide.
After receiving सुनहरी Globe Awards and Academy Award nominations लिये Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) and Pretty Woman, she won the Academy Award for Best Actress लिये her performance in एरिन Brockovich ( 2000 ).
उसके films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ), My Best Friend 's विवाह ( 1997 ), Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ), Notting हिल ( 1999 ), Runaway Bride ( 1999 ), Ocean 's ग्यारह ( 2001 ), समंदर 's Twelve ( 2004 ), Charlie Wilson 's युद्ध ( 2007 ), Valentine 's Day ( 2010 ), खा Pray प्रेम ( 2010 ), and दर्पण दर्पण ( 2012 ) have collectively brought box office receipts of over $ 2.6 billion, making her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box दफ्तर receipts.
रॉबर्ट्स had become एक of the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in the world, topping The Hollywood पत्रकारों annual `` power list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006.

As of 2010, Roberts 's net worth was estimated to be $ 140 million.

In 2011, she was named one of the `` 100 hottest Women of All-Time '' by Men 's Health.
In 2001, Ladies Home जर्नल ranked her as the 11th most शक्तिशाली woman in the United States.
चिह्नित Elliot Zuckerberg ( born May 14, 1984 ) is an American computer programmer and Internet उद्योगों.
He is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as one of five co-founders of the social networking website Facebook.
as of अप्रैल 2013, zuckerberg is the chairman और chief executive of Facebook, inc. and in 2013 his personal wealth थी estimated to be US $ 13.3 billion.
साथ with his कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड University students एडुआर्डो saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes, Zuckerberg launched Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory rooms.
The group then introduced Facebook onto other campuses nationwide and moved to Palo आल्टो, California, United States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards.
In 2007, at the आयु of twenty-three सालो, Zuckerberg became a billionaire as a result of Facebook और the क्रमांक of Facebook उपयोक्ता worldwide reached a total of one billion in 2012.
Zuckerberg थी involved in various legal disputes that were initiated by others in the group, who claimed a share of the company आधारित upon their involvement during the development phase of Facebook.
Since 2010, Zuckerberg has been named among the 100 wealthiest and most influential लोगों in the world by Time magazine as a part of its व्यक्ति of the Year accolade.
Zuckerberg was played by कर्ता Jesse eisenberg in the 2010 Hollywood film the Social Network in जिससे the rise of फेसबुक is portrayed.

Committee of Ways and अर्थात् is the chief tax -writing कमेटी of the United States House of Representatives.
सदस्यों of the तरीके और Means Committee हैं not अनुमत to serve on any other हाउस समितियों unless they apply for a waiver from their पार्टी 's congressional नेतृत्व.
The Committee has jurisdiction over all taxation, tariffs and other revenue-raising measures, as well as a number of other programs including:
Social Security
Unemployment benefits
Medicare
Enforcement of child support laws
Temporary Assistance for Needy Families, a federal welfare कार्यक्रम
Foster care and adoption programs
The u.S. Constitution requires that all बिल्स regarding कराधान must originate in the हाउस of Representatives.
Since House procedure is that all bills regarding taxation must go through this कमेटी, the कमेटी is very influential, as is its Senate counterpart, the u.S. Senate Committee on Finance.
The तरीके and Means Committee in the 111th Congress was chaired by Charlie Rangel, who had taken a leave of अनुपस्थिति as अध्यक्ष until House ethics violations were resolved.
However, his leave of absence as chairman was ruled to be a resignation.
पीट Stark resigned as acting अध्यक्ष, so Sander Levin आयोजित कि स्थिति until the start of the 112th Congress.
Dave Camp became the committee chair for the 112th Congress, after the Republicans won control of the House in the 2010 election.
The blue whale ( balaenoptera musculus ) is a marine mammal belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( पुकारा mysticeti ).
at in लंबाई and or अधिक in weight, it is the largest known एनिमल to have कभी existed.
Long and slender, the blue व्हेल 's body can be various shades of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat lighter underneath.
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic and North प्रशांत, B. m. intermedia of the Southern समंदर and B. m. brevicauda ( also known as the pygmy blue whale ) found in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean.
B. m. इंडिका, मिला in the Indian समंदर, may be another subspecies.
as with other baleen whales, इसके diet consists almost exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill.
Blue whales were abundant in nearly सब the महासागर on Earth until the beginning of the twentieth सदी.
For over a century, they were hunted almost to extinction by whalers until protected by the international community in 1966.
A 2002 report estimated there were 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales worldwide, located in at least पाँच groups.
अधिक हाल research into the Pygmy subspecies suggests this may be an underestimate.
Before whaling, the largest population was in the Antarctic, numbering approximately 239,000 ( दायरा 202,000 to 311,000 ).
वहीँ remain only much छोटी ( around 2,000 ) concentrations in each of the eastern North प्रशांत, Antarctic, and Indian Ocean groups.
There हैं two more groups in the North Atlantic, and at least two in the Southern Hemisphere.
The ग्लोब artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a variety of a प्रजाति of thistle cultivated as a food.
The edible matter is कलियों that रूप भीतर the flower heads before the flowers come into bloom.
the buds go away or change to a coarse, barely edible form when the flower blooms.
The uncultivated or wild variety of the species is called a cardoon.
It is a perennial plant देशी to the Mediterranean region.
The United राज्य one hundred-dollar विधेयक ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of United States currency.
U.S. statesman, inventor, और diplomat Benjamin Franklin is currently featured on the obverse of the विधेयक.
On the reverse of the banknote is an चित्र of Independence Hall.
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has महरूम printed चूंकि July 13, 1969, when the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 were retired.
The Bureau of Engraving और Printing says the average जीवन of a $ 100 bill in circulation is 90 महीने ( 7.5 सालो ) before it is replaced due to wear and tear.
The bills हैं also commonly referred to as `` Benjamins '', in reference to the use of बेंजामिन Franklin 's portrait on the denomination, or `` C-Notes '', आधारित on the Roman numeral for 100.
The bill is one of two denominations printed today that does not feature a President of the United States ; the अन्य is the $ 10 bill, featuring Alexander हैमिल्टन.
The time on the clock of स्वतंत्रता Hall on the reverse, according to the u.S. Bureau of Engraving and मुद्रण, shows approximately 4:10.
One hundred hundred-dollar bills are delivered by Federal Reserve बैंको in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled on अप्रैल 21, 2010, and was to be issued to the public on फ़रवरी 11, 2011, but उत्पादन was shut down in December 2010 because as अनेक as 30 % were अनुपयोगी due to a manufacturing flaw.
A vertical crease in the paper reveals a रिक्त space on the bill when pulled आउट.
In their replacement, and continuing the high demand of this denomination, the श्रेणी 2006a was launched retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ).
on April 24, 2013, the Federal Reserve announced the नई $ 100 bill would enter circulation on October 8, 2013.

दाउद ( ; आईएसओ 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : daveed ) according to the Hebrew Bible, थी the second किंग of the United Kingdom of Israel, and according to the New Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke, an ancestor of Jesus.
His जीवन is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE, his reign over Judah c. 1010–1002 bce, and उसके reign over the United Kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE.
the Books of Samuel, 1 Kings, and 1 Chronicles are the only sources of information on दाउद, although the tel Dan stele ( dated c. 850–835 BCE ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), read as `` House of दाउद '', which most विद्वानों take as confirmation of the अस्तित्व in the mid-9th century bce of a judean royal dynasty called the House of David.
He is depicted as a righteous king, हालांकि नहीं without faults, as well as an acclaimed warrior, musician, and poet, traditionally credited for composing अनेक of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms.
दाउद is central to यहूदी, Christian, and इस्लामी doctrine and culture.
Biblical tradition maintains that a direct descendant of David होगा be the मसीहा.
In islam he is considered to be a prophet और the king of a nation.
काठमांडू ( ; ) is the capital and largest urban agglomerate of Nepal.
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu Metropolitan नगर at its कोर, and its sister cities patan, Kirtipur, Thimi, and Bhaktapur.
It also includes the recently recognized urban areas of Shankhapur, Karyabinayak, और champapur.
Banepa, Dhulikhel, और Panauti are satellite urban areas of Kathmandu located just outside the Kathmandu valley.
Kathmandu is also ज्ञात informally as `` KTM '' or the `` tri-city ''.
According to a census conducted in 2011, Kathmandu metropolis अलोन has 975,453 निवासियों ; and the agglomerate has a population of अधिक than 2.5 million निवासियों.
the metropolitan city area is and has a population density of 19,250 per km2.
The city stands at an elevation of approximately in the bowl-shaped Kathmandu घाटी of central Nepal.
It is surrounded by four major mountains : shivapuri, Phulchoki, Nagarjun, and Chandragiri.
काठमांडू Valley is part of three districts ( Kathmandu, Lalitpur, और भक्तपुर ), has the highest population घनत्व in the country, and is home to about a बारहवीं of Nepal 's population.
During Rana and Shah eras, the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the काठमांडू Valley ; it थी what people who lived outside the valley called it.
During this period, British historians पुकारा the valley itself `` Nepal Proper ''.
Today, Kathmandu is not only the capital of the संघीय Democratic Republic of Nepal, but also the मुख्यालय of the Central Development Region of Nepal.
The सेंट्रल Region comprises three zones : Bagmati, Narayani, and Janakpur.
Kathmandu is located in the Bagmati Zone.
Kathmandu is the gateway to tourism in Nepal.
it is also the nerve center of the country 's economy.
it has the most advanced अवसंरचना of any urban area in Nepal, and इसके economy is focused on पर्यटन, जिससे accounted लिये 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96.
( Tourism in Kathmandu declined thereafter during a period of राजनैतिक unrest, but since then has improved. )
The city रै a rich history, spanning nearly 2000 years, as inferred from inscriptions found in the valley.
Religious and cultural festivities form a major part of the lives of people residing in Kathmandu.
सबसे of Kathmandu 's people follow Hinduism and अनेक others follow Buddhism.
There are people of other religious beliefs as well, giving Kathmandu a cosmopolitan संस्कृति.
Nepali is the most commonly spoken भाषा in the city.
Nepal Bhasa is the indigenous language spoken by the Newar people.
हिंदी is widely understood and English is understood by Kathmandu 's educated residents.
The city 's साक्षरता रेट is 98 %.
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( ललितपुर patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural heritage, tourism industry, and अर्थव्यवस्था ; therefore UNESCO 's World विरासत साईट lists all three शहरों ' monuments और attractions together under one heading, `` Kathmandu valley- UNESCO World विरासत Site ``.
Field hockey, usually referred to बस as hockey, is a team खेल of the hockey family which is played between two teams of eleven खिलाड़ी with hockey sticks and a hard, solid plastic ball.
At the turn of the 21st century, the game is played globally, with particular popularity throughout Europe, एशिया, महासागरीय, and South अमेरिका – in addition to being the national sport of Pakistan and India.
the term `` field हॉकी '' is used primarily in Canada, the संयुक्त States, and other regions of the world where the sport of बर्फ hockey is more popular.
During play, goal keepers are the only players who are allowed to टच the ball with any part of their body ( with the exception of a player 's hand considered 'part of the स्टिक ' ), with इस only applying भीतर the shooting circle ( भी known as the d, or shooting arc, or just the circle ), जबकि field players खेल the ball with the flat side of their stick.
The team कि scores the सबसे goals by the समाप्त of the match wins.
If the score is tied at the end of the खेल, either a draw is declared or the game goes into extra time and/or a दंड shootout, depending on the प्रतियोगिता 's format.
the governing body of हॉकी is the International हॉकी Federation ( FIH ), with मेन and women होने represented internationally in competitions including the Olympic games, राष्ट्रमंडल games, Hockey World Cup, Champions ट्रॉफी and Junior Hockey World कप, with अनेक countries running extensive junior, वरिष्ठ, and मास्टर्स ' club competitions.
the FIH is also responsible for organising the Hockey Rules Board and developing the rules for the sport.
A popular variant of field hockey is अंदर hockey, which differs in a number of respects while embodying the primary सिद्धान्त of hockey.
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side variant, with a field which is reduced to approximately 40m × 20m.
With many of the rules remaining the same, including obstruction and feet, there are अनेक कुंजी विसंगतियाँ - Players may not उठाएँ the बॉल unless shooting on goal, players may not hit the बॉल ( instead utilising pushes to transfer the ball ), and the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers which the ball will rebound off.
ethan `` Cane '' ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी CBS soap opera the Young और the Restless.
He is portrayed by Australian कर्ता Daniel Goddard, जो originally auditioned for Brad Snyder on as the World Turns but थी recommended for a role on The यंग and the Restless instead.
The role was to be portrayed as an अमरीकी, लकिन Goddard 's Australian descent influenced the character 's background.
Former head writer lynn मारी Latham introduced उसे during the episode airing on January 12, 2007 as an Australian bartender in search of his family, a debut that received a mixed response.
Latham created Cane as the बेटे of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly rhodes ) and jill Foster Abbott ( Jess Walton ) but the अक्षर 's background was rewritten by मरिया Arena Bell in 2009, reestablishing him as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers और Genie Francis ).
Though characterized as `` रहस्यमय '', Cane is `` वफ़ादार and dedicated '', while Goddard described the character as a `` typical Australian, working-class kind of guy ''.
He was the first member of the Atkinson family to appear on the series, followed by his अभिभावक and identical twin brother.
Soon after his debut, he became a leading character, a decision praised by viewers and critics.
The character has been involved with Amber मूर ( Adrienne Frantz ), Chloe Mitchell ( एलिज़ाबेथ Hendrickson ) and सबसे notably Lily Winters ( Christel Khalil ), a रोमांस that garnered significant fan attention.
in 2009, cane and Lily were शादीशुदा ; वैश्विक BC would later call Lily the love of Cane 's life.
The pair had two children, Charlie and mattie ashby.
In 2011, the actor थी fired, and cane was shot to death onscreen.
However, Goddard was rehired soon after viewers campaigned for his return, revealing that Cane 's identical twin brother was in fact the man जो died.
इस sacrificed his marriage to Lily, but the couple were remarried on Valentine 's Day in 2012.
Goddard रै been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; canyon News said that he portrays the character honestly, and is `` always dependable, on fire and exciting ''.
John Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp ii ( born जून 9, 1963 ) is an American actor, फिल्मी producer, और musician.
He has won the Golden Globe Award and Screen Actors Guild award लिये Best Actor.
Depp rose to prominence on the 1980s टेलीविज़न series 21 Jump Street, becoming a टीन idol.
असंतुष्ट with that status, Depp turned to film for more challenging roles ; he played the title अक्षर of the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and बाद found box office success in films such as Sleepy खोखला ( 1999 ), चार्ली and the चॉकलेट Factory ( 2005 ), Alice in Wonderland ( 2010 ), Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the caribbean film series ( 2003–present ).
He has collaborated with director और friend Tim Burton in eight films ; the most recent being अंधेरा Shadows ( 2012 ).
Depp has gained acclaim लिये his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood, Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco, Hunter S. Thompson in Fear and Loathing in लास वेगास, George Jung in Blow, और the बैंको robber John Dillinger in Michael Mann 's Public Enemies.
Films featuring Depp have grossed over $ 3.1 billion at the United States box office and over $ 7.6 अरब worldwide.

he also has garnered a sex symbol status in American cinema, being twice named as the `` Sexiest Man जिंदा `` by People magazine in 2003 and 2009.
He has been listed in the 2012 Guinness Book of World रिकॉर्ड as the highest paid actor, with $ 75 million.
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3, commonly ज्ञात as the web ), is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
With a web browser, एक can view web pages that may contain text, images, वीडियो, and other multimedia, and navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his पहले hypertext प्रणालियों like ENQUIRE, British engineer, कंप्यूटर scientist and at that time employee of the CERN, Sir टिम Berners-Lee, now Director of the World चौड़ी Web Consortium ( W3C ), wrote a proposal in March 1989 for कया would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the किनारा between France and स्विट्ज़रलैंड, berners-lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to use हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to link and access information of various kinds as a वेब of nodes in which the user can browse at होगा '', and they publicly introduced the प्रोजेक्ट in December of the same साल.
Mark Travis John Sanchez ( born November 11, 1986 ) is an American football quarterback for the New York Jets of the National Football लीग ( NFL ).
He was drafted in the first round of the 2009 एनएफएल Draft as the पांचवां overall selection by the Jets and the दूसरी quarterback taken overall.
he played college football at the University of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया ( USC ).
Sanchez grew up in a well-disciplined and athletic family.
In the आठवीं ग्रेड, he began to play football और learn the intricacies of the quarterback position, प्रशिक्षण with his father, Nick.
A well-regarded prospect, Sanchez committed to Southern California following his successful high school career in which he led his team to a championship शीर्षक during his final season.
At USC, Sanchez was relegated as the backup quarterback दौरान his first three years though he rose to prominence due to his brief appearances on the field in 2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback जॉन David बूटी.
सांचेज़ also became लोकप्रिय within the community due to उसके mexican-american heritage.
Named the starter in 2008, Sanchez led USC to a 12–1 record and जीती the Rose Bowl against Penn State for which Sanchez was awarded the Most Valuable खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार for his performance on offense.
Although many considered उसे too inexperienced, Sanchez घोषित his intention to डालें the 2009 NFL Draft.
He was selected by the jets after they traded up with the Cleveland Browns, and थी named the starting quarterback prior to the start of the ऋतु.
Despite a subpar performance, सांचेज़ led the jets to the AFC Championship Game, a losing effort to the इंडियानापोलिस Colts, becoming the fourth rookie quarterback in NFL history to win his first playoff खेल and the second to win two playoff games.
In his second season, Sanchez continued to develop और led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second consecutive AFC Championship खेल where they narrowly lost to the Pittsburgh Steelers, 24–19.
With the win over the New England Patriots the week prior, Sanchez tied four other quarterbacks for the second most post-season road victories by a quarterback in NFL history.
In leading the jets to two consecutive conference championships, Sanchez joined quarterback Ben Roethlisberger as the only two quarterbacks in NFL history to पहुँचें the सम्मेलन चैंपियनशिप in their first दो seasons in the league.
The अगला two सीज़न would be a स्लोप for both the team and Sanchez as they failed to reach the playoffs.
प्रशंसक and मीडिया आलोचकों called for a struggling सांचेज़ to be benched.
He eventually थी replaced towards the end of the 2012 season with Greg McElroy.
Paul एवेरी ( April 2, 1934December 10, 2000 ) was an American पुलिस reporter, best known for his stories on the infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac, and later for उसके work on the Patricia hearst kidnapping.
A small submersible AC sump pump with a गार्डन नली connector
A sump पंप is a pump used to remove water that रै accumulated in a water collecting sump जलाशय, commonly found in the basement of homes.
the water may enter via the घेरा drains of a basement waterproofing system, funneling into the basin or because of rain or प्राकृतिक ground water, if the तहखाने is below the water तालिका level.
sump pumps are used where basement flooding happens regularly and to remedy dampness where the water table is above the न्यास of a home.
Sump pumps भेजें water away from a house to any place where it is no longer problematic, such as a municipal storm drain or a dry खूब.
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary sewer in older संस्थापना.
Once considered acceptable, this practice may now violate the plumbing code or municipal bylaws, because it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system.
Municipalities urge homeowners to disconnect and reroute sump pump निर्वहन away from sanitary sewers.
Fines may be imposed for noncompliance.
Many homeowners have inherited उनके sump pump configurations and do not realize that the pump discharges to the सीवर.
if the discharge is fed to a laundry डूबना in the basement, it 's likely going to the sewer.
Usually hardwired into a home 's electrical system, sump pumps may have a बैटरी backup.
The home 's pressurized water supply powers some pumps, eliminating the need for electricity at the expense of using potable water, potentially making उन्हें more महंगी to operate than electrical pumps and creating an additional water disposal प्रॉब्लम.
चूंकि a sump जलाशय may overflow if not constantly pumped, a बैकअप system is important for cases when the प्रमुख power is आउट for prolonged periods of समय, as during a severe storm.
There are generally दो types of sump pumps — pedestal and submersible.
The pedestal पंप 's मोटर is mounted above the sump, where it is अधिक easily सर्विस, but is भी more conspicuous.
The pump impeller is चलित by a long, लंबवत extension shaft and the impeller is in a scroll housing in the base of the pump.
The submersible pump is entirely mounted inside the sump, और is specially sealed to prevent electrical short circuits.
sump pump systems are also utilized in industrial and commercial applications to control water table -related समस्याएं in surface soil.
an आर्टेसियन aquifer or periodic high water table situation can cause the ground to become unstable due to जल saturation.
as long as the पंप कृत्यों, the surface soil will remain stable.
ये sumps are typically ten feet in depth or more ; lined with corrugated metal pipe that contains perforations or drain holes throughout.
They may include electronic control systems with visual and audible alarms and are usually covered to prevent debris and animals from falling in.
Bleeding Kansas, Bloody कान्सास or the किनारा युद्ध, थी a series of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters and pro-slavery `` Border Ruffian `` elements, that took प्लेस in the Kansas Territory and the neighboring towns of Missouri between 1854 and 1861.
At the heart of the conflict was the question of whether Kansas होता enter the Union as a फ़्री state or slave state.
As such, Bleeding Kansas was a प्रॉक्सी war between Northerners and Southerners over the issue of गुलामी in the United States.
The पद `` bleeding कान्सास '' was coined by Horace Greeley of the New York Tribune ; the events it encompasses directly presaged the अमरीकी Civil युद्ध.
Congress had long struggled to balance the interests of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery forces.
The events later known as Bleeding कान्सास were set into motion by the Kansas–Nebraska अधिनियम of 1854, which nullified the Missouri Compromise and instead implemented the अवधारणा of popular प्रभुता.
an ostensibly democratic idea, लोकप्रिय sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it होता be a free or slave state ; however, this resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas by activists from दोनो पहलू.
At one point, Kansas had two separate governments, each with its अपना constitution, although only one was federally recognized.
On January 29, 1861, Kansas was admitted to the Union as a free state, less than three months before the Battle of Fort Sumter जिससे began the Civil War.
Benzene is an organic रासायनिक यौगिक with the molecular formula C6 H|Hydrogen|H6.
Its molecule is composed of 6 कार्बन atoms joined in a ring, with 1 hydrogen atom संलग्न to प्रत्येक carbon atom.
Because its molecules contain तभी carbon and hydrogen atoms, benzene is classed as a hydrocarbon.
Benzene is a natural constituent of crude oil, and is एक of the most basic petrochemicals.
बेंजीन is an aromatic hydrocarbon और the second [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a cyclic हाइड्रोकार्बन साथ a निरन्तर pi bond.
It is sometimes abbreviated ph –h. Benzene is a colorless and अत्यधिक flammable liquid with a sweet smell.
It is mainly used as a precursor to heavy रसायन, such as ethylbenzene and cumene, which are produced on a billion kilogram स्केल.
Because it has a ऊँची octane number, it is an महत्वपूर्ण component of gasoline, composing a few प्रतिशत of its mass.
Most non-industrial applications have been limited by benzene 's carcinogenicity.
giovanni virginio Schiaparelli ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an Italian astronomer and science historian.
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo 's Wii game console to run software that has नहीं been authorized by Nintendo.
it achieves इस by defeating the Wii 's नक़ल protection and code signing measures.
in अधिक general terms, Wii Homebrew refers to the use of the Wii 's हार्डवेयर, accessories and software for उद्देश्य बाहर those intended by the manufacturer.
असली efforts focused on using the वी रिमोट as a इंगित device on other operating systems, or कार्यशील web-based games in the built-in वेब browser.
subsequent developments in games कारनामे, ऐसे as the `` गोधूलि hack ``, `` Bannerbomb '' and its later incarnation `` LetterBomb '', `` Smash Stack '', `` Indiana Pwns '', `` Yu-Gi-OWNED '', `` bathaxx '', और `` वापसी of the Jodi '', बना installing the `` Homebrew चैनल `` संभावित.

Stephen John Hadley ( born February 13, 1947 ) was the 21st u.S. Assistant to the President for National सुरक्षा Affairs ( commonly referred as नेशनल सुरक्षा सलाहकार ), serving अंतर्गत President George W. बुश.
Take identical growing पौधे and give fertilizer to half of them.
If there are differences between the निषेचित plant group and the unfertilized `` control '' group, ये differences may be due to the fertilizer.
a scientific कंट्रोल is an experiment or observation designed to minimize the प्रभाव of variables अन्य than the single independent variable.
इस increases the reliability of the परिणाम, often through a comparison between control measurements और the other measurements.
Scientific नियंत्रण are a part of the scientific method.
For example, दौरान drug परीक्षण, scientists होगा कोशिश to control two groups to keep them as identical as possible, then allow one समूह to कोशिश the drug.
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by giving it to only half the plants in a garden : the plants that receive no उर्वरक are the control समूह, because they establish the बेसलाइन level of growth that the fertilizer-treated plants will be compared against.
Without a control group, the experiment can not determine whether the fertilizer-treated plants grow more than they would have if अनुपचारित.
ideally, all variables in an experiment होगा be controlled ( accounted for by the कंट्रोल माप ) और none होगा be uncontrolled.
in ऐसे an experiment, if all the नियंत्रण work as expected, it is possible to conclude कि the experiment is working as intended and that the results of the प्रयोग are due to the प्रभाव of the variable होने tested.
That is, scientific controls allow an अन्वेषक to make a claim like `` Two परिस्थितियों were identical until factor X occurred.
चूंकि factor X is the only difference between the दो situations, the new outcome was caused by factor x. ''

John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. October 19, 1735 ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) was the दूसरी president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier served as the first vice president of the संयुक्त States.
An American Founding Father, he was a statesman, diplomat, and a leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain.
Well educated, he was an Enlightenment राजनैतिक theorist who promoted republicanism and wrote prolifically about his often seminal ideas, both in published works and in letters to उसके wife and key adviser अबीगैल as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the early stages of the American Revolution.
A lawyer and public figure in Boston, as a delegate from Massachusetts to the Continental Congress, he played a leading भूमिका in persuading Congress to declare independence.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of Independence in 1776, and was its primary advocate in the Congress.
Later, as a diplomat in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual peace सन्धि with ग्रेट Britain, और थी responsible for obtaining vital सरकारी loans इससे Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist and historian, Adams largely लिखा the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, which together with his earlier Thoughts on सरकारी, influenced American राजनैतिक thought.
One of his महानतम भूमिकाएँ was as a न्यायधीश of character : in 1775, he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief, और 25 years बाद nominated John Marshall to be मुख्य Justice of the संयुक्त States.
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George Washington 's vice president and his अपना चुनाव in 1796 as the दूसरी president.
During उसके एक term, he encountered ferocious हमले by the Jeffersonian Republicans, as well as the dominant faction in his own Federalist पार्टी led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton.
Adams signed the विवादास्पद Alien and Sedition Acts, and built up the फौज and navy especially in the face of an undeclared नवल war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of उसके presidency was his शांतिपूर्ण resolution of the conflict in the face of हैमिल्टन 's opposition.
In 1800, Adams थी defeated for re-election by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts.
He बाद resumed his friendship with Jefferson.
He and his बीवी, Abigail Adams, founded an accomplished family line of politicians, diplomats, और historians now referred to as the Adams political family.
एडम्स was the father of जॉन Quincy Adams, the sixth President of the United राज्य.
His उपलब्धियाँ have प्राप्त वृहद recognition in modern times, हालांकि his contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other संस्थापकों.
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the building कि eventually became known as the White House.
A Watt steam इंजन.
the steam engine, fuelled primarily by कोयले, propelled the Industrial Revolution in Great Britain and the world.
The Industrial Revolution थी the transition to new manufacturing प्रक्रियाओं that occurred in the काल from परिचय 1760 to some time between 1820 and 1840.
This transition included going from हाथ उत्पादन methods to machines, new रासायनिक manufacturing और आयरन production processes, improved efficiency of जल power, the increasing use of steam शक्ति and development of machine tools.
The परिवर्तन also included the change from लकडी and other bio-fuels to कोयले.
The Industrial revolution began in Britain and within a few decades spread to Western Europe and the United States.
The औद्योगिक Revolution marks a major turning point in history ; almost प्रत्येक पहलू of रोज़ life was influenced in कुछ way.
Most notably, average income and population began to प्रदर्शनी unprecedented sustained growth.
in the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert E. Lucas, Jr., `` लिये the first time in इतिहास, the living standards of the masses of ordinary people have begun to undergo sustained विकास... Nothing remotely like this आर्थिक behavior is mentioned by the classical economists, भी as a theoretical possibility. ''
William Bell Scott Iron and कोयले, 1855-60
The period of time covered by the Industrial Revolution varies with different historians.
Eric Hobsbawm आयोजित that it 'broke आउट ' in Britain in the 1780s and was not fully felt until the 1830s or 1840s, while T. S. Ashton held कि it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830.
कुछ 20th-century historians such as John Clapham and Nicholas Crafts have argued that the process of economic and social change took place gradually and the term revolution is a misnomer.
This is still a subject of debate among historians.
जीडीपी प्रति capita was broadly stable पहले the Industrial Revolution and the emergence of the modern capitalist economy.
The Industrial क्रान्ति began an era of per-capita economic growth in capitalist economies.
Economic historians are in agreement that the onset of the Industrial Revolution is the most important इवेंट in the history of humanity since the domestication of animals and plants.
The पहला Industrial Revolution evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the transition years between 1840 and 1870, जब technological and आर्थिक progress gained आवेग with the increasing adoption of steam-powered boats, जहाजों and railways, the large scale manufacture of machine tools और the increasing उपयोग of steam संचालित कारखानों.
जूलियट AnnMarie Huddy ( born September 27, 1969 ), is an American टेलीविज़न news reporter, currently appearing on Fox News Channel.
This list ranks U.S. cities by जमीन area ( not including bodies of water ).
Total क्षेत्रों ( including water ) are also दिए, but नोट that, when ranked by total area, a number of coastal cities appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
San Francisco is an चरम उदाहरण ; जल makes up nearly 80 % of its total area of 232 square miles ( 601 km2 ).
नोट भी that in many मामले a city may be geographically large primarily because its municipal government has merged with the सरकारी of the surrounding county.
in some cases the काउंटी no longer exists, while in others the arrangement has formed a Consolidated city–county ( or city- बरो in Alaska, or city- मोहल्ला in Louisiana ).

The large intestine ( or bowel, colon ) is the last part of the digestive system in vertebrate animals.
Its फलन is to absorb water इससे the बाकी indigestible food matter, और then to pass useless waste सामग्री from the देह.
This article is primarily about the human gut, though the information about its processes are directly लागू to most mammals.
The large intestine consists of the cecum, rectum and anal कनाल.
It starts in the right iliac region of the pelvis, just at or below the right waist, जहाँ it is joined to the bottom end of the छोटी intestine.
From here it continues up the abdomen, then across the width of the abdominal cavity, and then it turns down, continuing to its endpoint at the anus.
the विशाल intestine is about long, जिससे is about one-fifth of the पूरे length of the intestinal canal.
In Terminologia Anatomica the विशाल आंत includes the cecum, कोलन, rectum, and anal कनाल.
However, some sources exclude the anal canal.
The Green Bay Packers are an American फ़ुटबॉल team based in ग्रीन Bay, विस्कॉन्सिन.
They are members of the North प्रभाग of the National फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( एनएफएल ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the NFL, having been organized and playing in 1919.
The Packers are the तभी non-profit, community-owned major league पेशेवर खेल team in the United States.
The पैकर्स are the last vestige of `` small कस्बा teams '' that यहूद once common in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the टोली plays ) और George Whitney Calhoun, the ग्रीन Bay Packers can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green खाड़ी dating back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the पैकर्स competed as a semi-professional football team against clubs from around Wisconsin and the Midwest.
They joined the American Professional फ़ुटबॉल Association ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known today as the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
Although ग्रीन Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team, its local fan आधार and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the टोली also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any अन्य team in the NFL ), सहित नौ NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era and four Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ), 1968 ( Super Bowl II ), 1997 ( सुपर Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( सुपर Bowl xlv ).
the Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries with उनके NFC उत्तर ( formerly the NFC Central ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, the Chicago Bears, Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions.
The bears-packers फंसने is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL history, डेटिंग वापस to 1921.
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The घाटी '' ) is an urbanized valley स्तिथ in the Los Angeles metropolitan area of दक्षिणी California, United States, पारिभाषित by the mountains of the Transverse सीमाएँ circling it.
घर to 1.76 million लोगों, it lies north of the larger and अधिक populous लॉस Angeles Basin.
Nearly two तिहाई of the Valley 's land area is part of the City of Los Angeles.
The other incorporated cities in the valley are Glendale, Burbank, San Fernando, Hidden Hills and Calabasas.

सुसान Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born September 26, 1971 ) is an American woman sentenced to life in थाना for murdering her children.
born in Union, South Carolina, and a former student of the University of South Carolina Union, she was convicted on July 22, 1995 for murdering her दो sons, 3-year-old Michael डेनियल Smith, born अक्तूबर 10, 1991, and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler स्मिथ, born August 5, 1993.
The case gained worldwide attention shortly after it developed, due to her claiming that a black man stole her car and kidnapped her बेटे.
She बाद claimed that वो suffered from mental health मुद्दे that impaired her judgment.
