She is incarcerated at दक्षिण Carolina 's Leath Correctional Institution, निकट greenwood.
माउंट McKinley ( भी known as Denali taken from the Inuit koyukon Athabaskan language अर्थ `` The Great One '' ) is the उच्चतम mountain peak in the United राज्य and in North America with a summit elevation of above sea स्तर.
At some, the base to peak वृद्धि is considered the largest of any mountain situated entirely above sea level.
Measured by topographic prominence, it is the third most prominent शिखर after Mount Everest and Aconcagua.
Located in the अलास्का Range in the interior of us राज्य of Alaska, it is the centerpiece of Denali National Park and Preserve.
The first European to document sighting the mountain was George Vancouver in 1794.
In 1903, जेम्स Wickersham recorded the first attempt at चढ़ाई McKinley which was unsuccessful.
In 1906, Frederick Cook claimed the first ascent which was later proven to be गलत.
The पहला verifiable ascent to mckinley 's summit was achieved on June 7, 1913 by climbers Hudson Stuck, Harry Karstens, Walter Harper, and Robert टैटम.
In 1951, Bradford washburn pioneered the West buttress route considered to be the safest and easiest route and therefore the सबसे popular currently in use.
the Honda S600 is an automobile manufactured by Honda.
it was launched in कूच 1964.
उपलब्धियाँ as a roadster – bearing strong resemblance to the होंडा s500 – and as a fastback coupé – introduced in March 1965 – the s600 was the पहला होंडा available in two trim levels.
During इसके उत्पादन run up to 1966, the model styling would remain pretty much the same, with the most notable changes coming to the front grille, bumper, and headlights.
Powered by a dohc, water-cooled, four-cylinder inline engine with four carburetors, the इंजन capacity was increased to 606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc.
The engine produced at 8,500 rpm and had a top speed of.
साथ the convertible weighing in at mere, the extra sheet मेटल of the कूप only added to the overall weight.
बर्खास्तगी was स्वतंत्र with sealed roller कड़ी drive to each पश्च wheel.
The S600 was the first mass marketed Honda car.
First offered only in right-hand drive, it जल्द became available in left-hand drive to appeal to export markets.
There were a few pre-production S500s manufactured in left hand drive, two or three even being shown in some early sales brochures.
Both the S600 roadster and coupé were available in standard trim and a खास, upgraded package called the SM600 which included, among other वस्तुएं, special paint colors, exclusive badging, a standard radio and speaker, a special antenna in the passenger side sun visor, standard reversing lights, a मानक cigarette हल्का, a standard heater, better cushioned seats, and a detachable seat track for जल्दी removal of the passenger सीट.
Honda निर्मित 3,912 roadsters in 1964, with production climbing to 7,261 convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965.
उत्पादन dropped off in 1966 ( as they यहूद shifting to the S800 ) with तभी 111 roadsters and 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles और 1,800 coupes for the 3 year span.
Everybody Hates Chris is an अमरीकी television period sitcom that depicts the teenage अनुभवों of comedian Chris Rock ( जो is भी the narrator ) while growing up in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn, नई York.
The show is set between 1983 and 1987 ; however, Rock खुद was a teenager between 1978 and 1983.
Rock grew up with a boy named Kenny Montero, whom he has often referred to as the inspiration for a lot of the एपीसोड.
In many interviews, Rock has described Kenny as the reason he got into comedy in the पहला place.
The दिखाएँ 's title parodies the CBS sitcom Everybody loves Raymond.
Rock stated : `` everybody Loves Raymond लकिन Everybody hates Chris ! ``.
The show 's सीसे actors are Tyler James Williams, टेरी Crews, Tichina Arnold, Tequan Richmond, Imani Hakim, and Vincent Martella.

On May 21, 2009, The CW announced that it had cancelled everybody Hates Chris.
Prior to this, executive producer Chris Rock announced that the end of season 4 matched up with his अपना past—dropping out of ऊँची school to become a comedian—and that it थी time to end the show.
Pleural effusion is excess fluid that accumulates between the two pleural layers, the fluid-filled space that surrounds the lungs.
Excessive amounts of such fluid can impair breathing by limiting the expansion of the फेफड़े during ventilation.
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional title of an Old अंग्रेज़ी heroic epic poem consisting of 3182 alliterative long lines, set in Scandinavia, commonly cited as एक of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature.
It survives in a single manuscript known as the Nowell Codex.
Its composition by an anonymous Anglo-Saxon poet is dated between the 8th and the जल्दी 11th century.
In 1731, the manuscript was badly damaged by a आग कि swept through a building housing a collection of Medieval manuscripts assembled by Sir Robert Bruce Cotton.
the poem fell into obscurity लिये decades, and its existence किया not become widely known again जबतक it was मुद्रित in 1815 in an edition prepared by the Icelandic-Danish scholar Grímur Jónsson thorkelin.
In the poem, Beowulf, a hero of the Geats in Scandinavia, comes to the help of Hroðgar, the king of the Danes, whose mead hall ( in Heorot ) has महरूम under attack by a monster known as Grendel.
After बियोवुल्फ़ जानबूझ उसे, Grendel 's माँ attacks the hall and is then also defeated.
Victorious, Beowulf goes home to geatland in Sweden और बाद becomes king of the Geats.
बाद a काल of fifty years has passed, Beowulf defeats a dragon, लकिन is fatally wounded in the बैटल.
After उसके death, his attendants bury him in a tumulus, a burial mound, in geatland.

Shem ( ; sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም, Sēm ; `` renown ; prosperity ; name '' ) was एक of the sons of Noah in the यहूदी Bible as well as in Islamic literature.
He is सबसे popularly regarded as the ज्येष्ठ son, though some परंपराओं regard him as the second son.
Genesis 10:21 refers to relative ages of Shem and his brother Japheth, but with sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different translations.
The श्लोक is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also, the पिता of all the children of eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born. ``.
However, the New American Standard Bible gives, `` भी to Shem, the father of all the children of Eber, and the older brother of Japheth, children यहूद born. ''
उत्पत्ति 11:10 records that Shem was स्टिल 100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad, ( but nearly 101 - see Chronology note, ) two years after the flood, बनाना him barely 99 at the time the flood began ; and that he lived for another 500 years after this, making his आयु at मौत 600 सालो.
The children of Shem were ईलम, Asshur, arphaxad, Lud, and Aram, in जोड to daughters.
अब्राहम, the patriarch of the Hebrews and Arabs, was one of the descendants of Arphaxad.
इस्लामी literature describes Shem as one of the believing sons of नूह.
Some sources even पहचानो Shem as a prophet in his own right और that he was the next prophet after his पिता.
In one मुस्लिम legend, Shem was एक of the people that God made Jesus resurrect as a sign to the Children of Israel.
The 1st सदी historian Flavius Josephus, among many others, recounted the tradition that these five sons were the progenitors of the nations of Elam, Assyria, Chaldea, लीडिया, and सीरियाई, respectively.
सामीती is still a commonly used term लिये the सामीती भाषाएं, as a subset of the Afro-Asiatic languages, denoting the common भाषाई heritage of Arabic, aramaic, Akkadian, Ethiopic, Hebrew and Phoenician languages.
according to some Jewish traditions ( e.g., B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; Numbers Rabbah 4:8. ), shem is believed to have been Melchizedek, King of Salem whom Abraham is recorded to have met after the battle of the four kings.
In a few of the many extra-biblical sources that describe him, Shem is also credited with हत्या Nimrod, son of Cush.
Shem is mentioned in Genesis 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; also in 1 Chronicles 1:4.
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus, c. 100 AD ; Japheth 's sons shown in red, Ham 's sons in ब्लू, Shem 's बेटे in green.
Go Daddy or Go Daddy Group Inc. is a privately held company that is primarily an internet domain रजिस्ट्रार and web होस्टिंग company.
Go पापा Group Inc. filed for an IPO in 2006, but later canceled it, due to `` market uncertainties ''.
In जोड to domain registration and hosting go Daddy also sells e-business related software और services.
On जून 24, 2011, the Wall गली Journal reported कि private-equity firms KKR and Silver Lake साझेदार, साथ with a तीसरा investor, were nearing a deal to buy the company for between $ 2–2.5 billion.

The Andorran coat of arms at the Andorran parliament.
Andorra ( ;, ), officially the Principality of Andorra ( ), भी called the principality of the Valleys of अंडोरा, ( ), is a landlocked microstate in Southwestern Europe, located in the eastern Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain and France.
It is the sixth smallest nation in Europe, having an क्षेत्रफल of and an estimated population of 85,000 in 2012.
Its capital, अंडोरा la वेला, is the highest capital city in Europe, at an elevation of above sea level.
The आधिकारिक language is Catalan, although Spanish, Portuguese, and French are भी commonly spoken.
Created under a charter in 988, the present Principality थी formed in 1278.
It is known as a principality as it is a monarchy headed by two co-princes – the बिशप of urgell and the President of France.
Andorra is a prosperous country मुख्यतः because of its tourism industry, which services an estimated 10.2 million visitors annually, and also because of इसके status as a tax haven.
It is not a member of the European Union, but the euro is the de facto currency.
The लोगों of Andorra have the 4th highest human जीवन expectancy in the world — 82 years at birth.

वास्तविकता television series keeping Up with the Kardashians, and इसके subsequent spin-offs, including Kourtney and Kim Take New York and कोर्टनी and Kim Take Miami.

That October, Kardashian filed for divorce following 72 दिनों of marriage.

oahu ( ) or oahu, ज्ञात as `` The Gathering प्लेस '', is the third largest of the Hawaiian Islands and the सबसे populous of the islands in the U.S. state of हवाई.
The state पूंजी, Honolulu, is on Oahu 's southeast coast.
Including छोटी close-in offshore islands such as घाट द्वीप and the islands in Kaneohe खाड़ी and off the पूर्वी ( windward ) coast, it has a total land area of, making it the 20th largest island in the United States.
In the greatest आयाम, इस volcanic island is long और across.
The length of the shoreline is.
The island is the result of two separate shield volcanoes : waianae and Koolau, with a broad `` valley '' or saddle ( the सेंट्रल Oahu Plain ) between them.
The highest point is Mt. ka'ala in the Waianae Range, rising to above sea level.
The आधार currency of the संयुक्त States is the U.S. डालर, and is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1, $ 2, $ 5, $ 10, $ 20, $ 50, and $ 100.
At एक time, however, U.S. currency included five larger denominations.
Notes in the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 यहूद मुद्रित for general use, and a $ 100,000 note was printed for certain internal transactions.
British Honduras was a British colony in Central America.
in 1981, the colony gained full independence, और is now the independent nation of बेलीज़.
First colonised by Spaniards in the 17th century, the territory on the east coast of सेंट्रल America, south of Mexico, became a British crown colony in 1862.
In 1964, it became a self-governing उपनिवेश.
Belize became fully independent from the United किंगडम in 1981.
बेलीज़ was the last continental possession of the संयुक्त Kingdom in the Americas.
Spelt, भी known as dinkel गेहूं, or hulled गेहूं, is an प्राचीन प्रजाति of wheat इससे the पांचवां millennium bc.
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe from the Bronze आयु to medieval times ; it now survives as a relict crop in सेंट्रल Europe and northern Spain and has मिला a new मार्केट as a health खाना.
spelt is sometimes considered a subspecies of the closely related species common wheat ( T. aestivum ), in which case its botanical name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp. spelta.
It is a hexaploid wheat, जिससे means it रै six sets of chromosomes.
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional detective created by लेखक and physician Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.
A London-based `` consulting detective '' whose abilities border on the fantastic, Holmes is प्रसिद्ध for his astute logical reasoning, his ability to adopt लगभग any भेस, and उसके use of forensic science skills to solve मुश्किल मामले.
holmes, who first appeared in publication in 1887, was featured in four novels and 56 छोटी stories.
The first अनोखा, A Study in Scarlet, appeared in Beeton 's Christmas Annual in 1887 और the second, The Sign of the Four, in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890.
The character grew tremendously in popularity with the first series of छोटी stories in The Strand Magazine, beginning with A Scandal in Bohemia in 1891 ; further श्रेणी of short stories और two novels प्रकाशित in serial form appeared between then और 1927.
The stories cover a period from around 1880 up to 1914.
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's dost and biographer, Dr. John H. Watson ; two are narrated by Holmes खुद ( `` the Blanched Soldier `` और `` the Lion 's Mane `` ) और two अन्य हैं written in the third व्यक्ति ( `` The Mazarin स्टोन `` and `` His पिछला Bow `` ).
In two stories ( `` the Musgrave Ritual `` and `` The Gloria Scott `` ), Holmes tells Watson the main story from his memories, while Watson becomes the narrator of the फ़्रेम story.
The first and चौथी novels, A Study in स्कारलेट and the Valley of Fear, each include a long interval of omniscient narration recounting events अनजान to either Holmes or Watson.
the United राज्य हाउस of Representatives is एक of the two घरों of the संयुक्त राज्य Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is frequently referred to as the House.
The other house is the सीनेट.
The composition and powers of the House are established in Article एक of the United राज्य Constitution.
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the हाउस and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each कक्ष ).
The House रै several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue बिल्स, to impeach officials, and to elect the u.S. President in case there is no majority in the चुनावी College.
प्रत्येक U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its population but is entitled to at least one representative.
The most populous state, California, currently has 53 representatives.
The कुल number of voting representatives is fixed by law at 435.
Each representative serves for a two-year term.
The Speaker of the संयुक्त राज्य House of Representatives, who presides over the कक्ष, is elected by the members of the House, and is therefore traditionally the नेता of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक Caucus or the House Republican Conference, whichever पार्टी has more voting सदस्यों.
The House meets in the south wing of the United States Capitol.

The brand 's popularity has led to it being used as a generic term for gelatin dessert आरपार the U.S. and Canada.
Kennywood is an amusement park located in West Mifflin, Pennsylvania, a suburb of Pittsburgh.
The park first opened in 1898 as a `` ट्राली park '' आकर्षण at the समाप्त of the Mellon family 's Monongahela Street Railway.
The park थी खरीदा in 1906 by F. W. henninger and Andrew McSwigan और thus began the kennywood Entertainment company that has remained a closely held परिवार business for over 100 years.
This traditional amusement park still has structures and यात्राएँ dating back to its opening और the early 1900s.
साथ with Rye Playland Park, it is one of only दो amusement parks listed in the नेशनल Register of ऐतिहासिक स्थान.
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood Entertainment Company, जिससे until दिसम्बर 2007 थी a closely held family business owned by the Henninger और McSwigan families.
Kennywood Entertainment is now operated by California-based Palace Entertainment, a subsidiary of parques Reunidos, an अंतरराष्ट्रीय amusement park company आधारित in मैड्रिड, Spain.
Parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of Candover Investments, an investment fund based in the UK.
A Social सुरक्षा कार्ड issued by the रेलरोड Retirement Board in 1943 to a now deceased person.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, a सोशल सुरक्षा number ( ssn ) is a nine-digit क्रमांक issued to U.S. citizens, permanent residents, and अस्थाई ( working ) residents under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security Act, codified as.
the number is issued to an individual by the सोशल Security Administration, an independent agency of the संयुक्त States सरकारी.
Its primary purpose is to track individuals for सोशल Security purposes.
A Social Security number may be obtained by applying on Form SS-5, `` Application for A Social Security Number Card ''.
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of आर्ट and डिज़ाइन, especially visual art और music, where the work is set out to expose the essence or identity of a subject through eliminating all non-essential फ़ॉर्म, features or concepts.
minimalism is any design or स्टाइल in which the simplest and fewest elements are used to create the maximum effect.
as a specific movement in the arts it is identified with developments in post–World War ii Western Art, most strongly with American visual कला in the 1960s and early 1970s.
Prominent कलाकारों associated with this गति शामिल Donald Judd, John mccracken, Agnes Martin, Dan Flavin, रॉबर्ट Morris, Anne Truitt, and Frank Stella.
It is rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism, and is often interpreted as a reaction against अमूर्त expressionism and a bridge to Postminimal art practices.
The terms have expanded to encompass a movement in म्यूज़िक which सुविधाएँ repetition and iteration, as in the रचनाएं of La Monte यंग, Terry Riley, Steve Reich, Philip Glass, and John Adams.
अल्पतम compositions are sometimes ज्ञात as systems music.
the term `` अल्पतम '' is often applied colloquially to designate anything that is spare or stripped to its essentials.
It रै भी been used to describe the plays and novels of सैमुएल Beckett, the films of Robert Bresson, the stories of Raymond Carver, और भी the ऑटोमोबाइल डिजाइन of Colin Chapman.
The word was पहला प्रयुक्त in English in the early 20th सदी to describe the Mensheviks.
In chemistry and physics, Dalton 's law ( also called Dalton 's law of partial pressures ) states that the total pressure exerted by the mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases.
This empirical law थी observed by John डाल्टन in 1801 and is सम्बन्धित to the ideal gas कानून.
Mathematically, the दबाव of a मिश्रण of gases can be पारिभाषित as the summation
or
where represent the partial pressure of each component.
It is assumed that the gases do not react with each other
where is the mole भिन्न of the i-th घटक in the total mixture of n components.
The relationship below provides a way to determine the volume based विशेषज्ञता of any individual gaseous component
where is the concentration of the i-th component expressed in ppm.
Dalton 's law is not exactly followed by real gases.
Those deviations are considerably large at high pressures.
In such conditions, the volume occupied by the molecules can become significant compared to the फ़्री space between them.
In particular, the short average distances between molecules raises the intensity of intermolecular forces between गैस molecules enough to substantially change the pressure exerted by them.
Neither of those effects are considered by the ideal gas model.

Enrollment is the योग of the headcount of undergraduate and ग्रैजुएट विद्यार्थी
Enrollment is counted by the Integrated Post-secondary Education प्रणाली within the U.S. Department of Education.
Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the number of unique students who attended the university during the साल.

`` Right Round '' is a song performed by American rapper Flo Rida, released as the सीसे single from his दूसरी studio album, R.O.O.T.S. ( 2009 ).
The song features guest vocals from Kesha.
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 और was digitally released on 10 February by Poe लड़के Entertainment and Atlantic Records.
The song lyrically speaks of Flo rida 's जाल बॉल referee enthusiasm, while adapting the कोरस of the 1984 मुर्दे or Alive song `` You Spin Me Round ( Like a Record ) `` in its hook.
According to one of the song 's writers, the chorus refers to oral sex.
kesha contributed guest vocals to the song, but in the United States, during the run atop the चार्ट, Kesha was uncredited.
The song received mostly negative reviews from critics, who claimed it was kitsch and misogynistic.
however, it was a commercial success, reaching the top ten of the चार्ट in उन्नीस countries worldwide.
In the संयुक्त States, it became Flo Rida 's दूसरी number-one single and broke the record for first-week sales when it was released to digital retailers.
The single 's accompanying music video was निर्देशित by Malcolm Jones and मनोनीत for an MTV Video म्यूज़िक Award.
the song has been used in several movies, such as The Hangover, The Ugly Truth and the Telugu movie pilla Zamindar.
In the movie Pitch Perfect, the song is performed by the a cappella group the treblemakers.
The मुख्य Justice of the United States is the head of the United States federal court प्रणाली ( the judicial branch of the federal सरकारी of the संयुक्त States ) और the chief judge of the Supreme Court of the United States.
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court justices ; the other eight are the Associate justices of the परम् Court of the United States.
इससे 1789 until 1866, the office थी ज्ञात as the Chief Justice of the परम् Court.
The मुख्य Justice is the highest judicial अधिकारी in the country, and acts as a chief administrative officer for the federal courts and as head of the न्यायिक Conference of the संयुक्त States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts.
The मुख्य Justice also serves as a spokesperson for the judicial branch.
The मुख्य Justice लीड the business of the Supreme Court.
He presides over oral arguments before the court.
When the अदालत renders an opinion, the Chief Justice—when in the majority—decides जो writes the court 's opinion.
The Chief Justice also रै significant agenda-setting power over the court 's meetings.
In the case of an impeachment of a President of the United States, which has occurred twice, the Chief इंसाफ presides over the trial in the Senate.
In modern tradition, the Chief Justice has the ceremonial duty of administering the oath of दफ्तर of the President of the United States.
The पहला Chief Justice was John Jay.
the 17th and current Chief Justice is John G. Roberts, Jr.

Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is a large oil field on Alaska 's North Slope.
It is the largest आयल फ़ील्ड in both the संयुक्त States और in North America, covering and originally containing approximately of oil.
The राशि of recoverable oil in the field is more than double कि of the next largest field in the United राज्य, the East Texas oil field.
The field is operated by BP ; साझेदार हैं ExxonMobil and conocophillips Alaska.
Labor unions are legally recognized as representatives of workers in अनेक industries in the United States.
उनके activity today centers on सामूहिक bargaining over wages, benefits, and working conditions for their membership, and on representing their members in disputes with management over violations of अनुबंध provisions.
Larger संघ also typically engage in lobbying activities and electioneering at the state and federal level.
Most unions in America are aligned with one of two larger umbrella organizations : the AFL-CIO created in 1955, and the Change to Win Federation which split from the afl-cio in 2005.
Both एडवोकेट policies and legislation on behalf of मजदूर in the United States and कनाडा, and take an active role in politics.
The AFL-CIO is especially concerned with global trade issues.
In 2010, the percentage of workers belonging to a union in the United राज्य ( or total labor union `` density '' ) थी 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in जर्मनी, 27.5 % in Canada, and 70 % in फिनलैंड.
Union membership in the private sector has fallen under 7 % — levels not seen since 1932.
Unions allege that employer-incited opposition has contributed to this मनाही in membership.
the सबसे prominent unions are among पब्लिक sector employees such as teachers और पुलिस.
Members of unions are disproportionately older, male and residents of the Northeast, the Midwest, and California.
Union workers average 10-30 % higher pay than non-union in America बाद controlling for individual, job, and labor market characteristics.
Although much छोटी compared to their peak membership in the 1950s, अमरीकी unions remain a prominent political फ़ैक्टर, both through mobilization of their own memberships और through coalitions with like-minded activist organizations around issues ऐसे as अप्रवासी rights, trade policy, health परवाह, and living wage अभियान.
To fight alleged employer anti-union programs, unions are currently advocating नई `` card check `` federal legislation that would require employers to bargain with a संघ if more than 50 % of workers signed forms, or `` ताश, '' stating they wish to be represented by that संघ.
the current procedure involves waiting 45 to 90 days for a federally supervised secret-ballot employee referendum on the subject.
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted कि, `` Strong unions have helped to reduce inequality, whereas weaker unions have made it easier for CEOs, sometimes working with market forces कि they have helped shape, to increase it. ''
The decline in unionization since WWII in the United States has been संबद्ध with a pronounced rise in आय and माल inequality.
A Christian Lacroix fashion boutique
A boutique is a small shopping आउटलेट, especially one कि specializes in elite and फैशनेबल items ऐसे as कपडे and jewelry.
The शब्द is फ्रेंच for `` shop '', via Latin from Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
The पद entered into everyday English उपयोग in the late 1960s जब, for a brief period, London was the centre of the fashion trade.
Carnaby Street और the Kings सड़क were the focus of much media ध्यान as home to the most fashionable boutiques of the era.
Now the East of London has महरूम regenerated और more Boutiques pop up in fashionable areas, such as Tower Bridge Road.
It can भी refer to a specialised firm such as a boutique investment bank or boutique law firm.
The शब्द is often प्रयुक्त to describe a property in the independent section of the होटल market ( such as The Rockwell in London ) in order to distinguish themselves from larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ).
in ऐसे cases the establishments aim to convey the idea that the आपरेशन is elite and highly specialised.
in the strictest भाव of the word, boutiques would be one-of-a-kind but अधिक generally speaking, some chains can be referred to as boutiques if they specialize in particular शैलियाँ.
Recently, the term `` boutique '' has started being applied to normally-mass-market items that are either niche or produced in intentionally small numbers at very high prices.
इस may be referred to as बुटीक manufacturing.
For example, before the रिलीज of the Wii, a Time Magazine article suggested that Nintendo could become a `` boutique video-game कम्पनी '', producing games लिये niche audiences, rather than trying to compete directly साथ Microsoft and Sony.
In the traditional luxury- देखें industry scalfaro International is considered as the precursor in manufacturing and बिक्री of bespoke watches.
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible boutique manufacturing site, which allows producing small series or even अद्वितीय timepieces.
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made items and अन्य truly one-of-a-kind items, others simply produce t-shirts, stickers, and other fashion accessories in artificially small रनों and बेचें them at unusually high prices.
In the early 1990s Selena प्रारंभ निर्माण उसके अपना line of women 's clothing.
खोलने two boutiques labeled as `` Selena Etc. बुटीक & Salon '' One located in Corpus Christi and one located in San Antonio, Texas.
One was due to open in Monterrey, Mexico, in 1995 but due to उसके death it was नहीं opened.
Around 1999 the San अंतोनियो location closed and the Corpus Christi location was closed in 2009.
In late 1990s some यूरोपीय retail traders developed the विचार of tailoring a shop towards a जीवनशैली theme, in the form of `` concept stores '', which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments.
One of the first concept stores was 10 Corso Como in Milan, Italy followed by Colette in Paris and Quartier 206 in Berlin.
Several well-known अमरीकी जंजीरों such as Urban Outfitters, D-A-S-H, and the Gap, Australian chain Billabong and, though कम common, रब & टेलर adapted to the concept store trend after 2000.
Navy संघीय Credit Union ( or Navy Federal ) is a क्रेडिट union headquartered in Vienna, Virginia, chartered और regulated under the authority of the National Credit Union Administration ( NCUA ) of the U.S. federal government.
Navy Federal is the largest natural सदस्य ( or retail ) क्रेडिट union in the world, both in asset आकार and in membership.
As of September 2012, Navy Federal had over $ 50 billion usd in assets, and over 4 million members.
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13, 1950 as Stevland Hardaway Judkins ), ज्ञात by his stage name स्टीवी अचरज, is an American singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist, a child prodigy जो developed into one of the most creative musical figures of the late 20th सदी.
Blind since shortly after birth, Wonder signed with Motown 's Tamla label at the age of eleven, and continues to perform and record for motown to this day.
Among Wonder 's best known works are singles such as `` Superstition ``, `` Sir Duke ``, `` You Are the Sunshine of My जीवन `` and `` i Just Called to Say I प्रेम तुम ``.
Well known एल्बम भी include Talking Book, innervisions and गीतों in the कुंजी of जीवन.
he has recorded more than thirty U.S. शीर्ष ten hits and प्राप्त twenty-two ग्रैमी Awards, the सबसे ever awarded to a male सोलो artist.
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist लिये political causes, including his 1980 campaign to make Martin Luther King, Jr. 's birthday a holiday in the United राज्य.
In 2009, Wonder थी named a संयुक्त Nations Messenger of सलाम.
in 2008, Billboard पत्रिका released a list of the Hot 100 All-Time शीर्ष Artists to celebrate the US singles chart 's fiftieth anniversary, with Wonder at number five.
By लोकप्रिय vote, Stevie थी inducted into The SoulMusic Hall of Fame at SoulMusic.com in December 2012.
Psychosis ( from the Greek ψυχή `` psyche '', for mind/soul, और -ωσις `` -ओएसआईs '', for abnormal condition or derangement ) refers to an abnormal condition of the mind, and is a जेनेरिक मनोरोग term लिये a mental state often वर्णित as involving a `` घाटा of contact with वास्तविकता ``.
People suffering from psychosis are described as psychotic.
मनस्ताप is given to the अधिक कठोर forms of मनोरोग disorder, during which hallucinations and delusions, gross excitement or stupor और impaired insight may occur.
The term `` psychosis '' is very व्यापक और can mean anything from relatively सामान्य aberrant experiences through to the complex और catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and द्विध्रुवी type 1 disorder.
Moreover a wide variety of central nervous system diseases, इससे both बाह्य substances and internal physiologic बीमारी, can उपज लक्षण of मनस्ताप.
This led many professionals to say कि psychosis is not विशिष्ट enough as a diagnostic पद.
Despite this, `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in normal behavior ( negative signs ) और more commonly to विविध प्रकार of hallucinations or delusional beliefs ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs may be described as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas one exhibiting very subtle signs could be classified in the श्रेणी of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome ''.
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the positive symptoms of psychosis, especially those of schizophrenia.
This is thought to occur through a mechanism of aberrant salience of environmental stimuli.
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled ट्रायल of ये drugs, however, show either no significant difference between drug and placebo, or a बहुत small effect size, suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more complex than an overactive dopamine system.
People experiencing psychosis may exhibit कुछ personality changes and thought disorder.
Depending on its severity, this may be accompanied by असामान्य or bizarre बर्ताव, as well as difficulty साथ social interaction and impairment in carrying out daily life activities.
सामान्य Grievous is a fictional character in the Star Wars universe.
a recurring antagonist, he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, a राजनैतिक faction of planetary systems waging युद्ध on the Galactic Republic.
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber combat by Count dooku, he is a ruthless and powerful warrior devoted to जेडी 's destruction during the Clone Wars.
उसके acts of wanton aggression and high Jedi body count would prompt the galaxy to give उसे the उपनाम the Knightslayer.
हालांकि the बदनाम Jedi slayer was the being in the galaxy during the Clone Wars who had killed the most Jedi in single combat, he did not hesitate to भागो from लड़ाइयों he knew he would खोना.
Statistics play an महत्वपूर्ण role in summarizing बेसबॉल performance and evaluating players in the sport.
Since the flow of a baseball खेल has natural ब्रेक to it, और सामान्यतः players act individually rather than performing in क्लस्टर, the sport lends itself to easy record-keeping and statistics.
Statistics have been kept for professional बेसबॉल since the creation of the National League and American लीग, अभी part of Major League Baseball.
Many statistics are also उपलब्धियाँ इससे outside of Major League बेसबॉल, from leagues ऐसे as the नेशनल Association of Professional आधार Ball Players and the Negro Leagues.

USA annual real GDP from 1910–60, with the सालो of the Great अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The unemployment रेट in the us 1910–1960, with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression was a कठोर worldwide economic depression in the decade preceding World War II.
The timing of the ग्रेट Depression varied across nations, but in सबसे countries it started in 1930 and lasted until the late 1930s or मध्य 1940s.
It was the longest, most widespread, and deepest depression of the 20th century.
In the 21st century, the Great Depression is commonly प्रयुक्त as an example of कैसा far the world 's economy can decline.
The depression originated in the U.S., after the fall in stock prices that began around September 4, 1929, और became worldwide news with the stock market क्रैश of October 29, 1929 ( known as Black Tuesday ).
the Great अवसाद had devastating effects in countries rich and poor.
निजी income, tax revenue, profits and prices dropped, while international trade plunged by more than 50 %.
बेरोजगारी in the U.S. rose to 25 %, और in some देशों rose as ऊँची as 33 %.
Cities all around the world were hit hard, especially those निर्भर on heavy industry.
Construction was वस्तुतः halted in many countries.
Farming and rural areas suffered as क्रॉप prices fell by approximately 60 %.
Facing plummeting demand with few alternate sources of jobs, areas dependent on primary sector उद्योग such as cash cropping, खनन and logging suffered the most.
Some economies started to recover by the mid-1930s.
In many countries, the ऋणात्मक effects of the Great Depression lasted until the end of World युद्ध II.
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ), also known as a premature ventricular जटिल, ventricular premature contraction ( or complex or complexes ) ( VPC ), ventricular premature beat ( VPB ), or ventricular extrasystole ( VES ), is a relatively आम event जहाँ the heartbeat is initiated by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node, the normal heartbeat initiator.
The electrical events of the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a PVC to be easily distinguished from a normal दिल ताल.
A PVC may be perceived as a `` skipped beat `` or felt as palpitations in the chest.
In a normal heartbeat, the ventricles अनुबंध after the atria have helped to fill उन्हें by contracting ; in इस way the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood दोनो to the lungs and to the rest of the body.
In a PVC, the ventricles contract first and before the atria have optimally filled the ventricles with blood, which means that circulation is inefficient.
However, सिंगल beat PVC arrhythmias do not usually pose a danger and can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.
William Gary Busey ( born June 29, 1944 ), better known as Gary Busey, is an American फिल्मी and stage actor, and artist.

The Anti-Counterfeiting व्यापार Agreement ( ACTA ), is a multinational treaty लिये the purpose of establishing international standards लिये intellectual प्रॉपर्टी rights प्रवर्तन.
the agreement aims to establish an international विधिक framework for targeting नकली goods, जेनेरिक medicines and copyright infringement on the Internet, and would create a new governing body outside existing forums, such as the World Trade Organization, the World बौद्धिक Property Organization, or the संयुक्त Nations.
The agreement was signed in अक्तूबर 2011 by Australia, Canada, Japan, Morocco, नई Zealand, सिंगापुर, South कोरियाई, and the United राज्य.
In 2012, Mexico, the European Union and 22 देशों which are member states of the European Union signed as खूब.
One signatory ( Japan ) रै ratified ( formally approved ) the agreement, which would come into force in countries कि ratified it बाद ratification by six countries.
Supporters have described the agreement as a response to `` the बढ़ाएँ in वैश्विक trade of counterfeit goods और pirated कापीराइट सुरक्षित works ''.
Trades Unions representing workers in the music, film and TV industries और large intellectual property-based organizations such as the Motion Picture संघ of America और Pharmaceutical Research और Manufacturers of America were active in the treaty 's development.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों say the convention adversely affects fundamental अधिकारों सहित freedom of अभिव्यक्ति and privacy.
ACTA has also been criticised by डॉक्टर Without सीमायें for endangering access to medicines in developing countries.
the secret nature of negotiations has excluded civil समाज groups, developing countries and the सामान्य public from the अनुबंध 's negotiation process and it has महरूम described as policy laundering by critics including the Electronic Frontier न्यास and the Entertainment Consumers Association.
the signature of the EU और अनेक of its member states resulted in the resignation in protest of the European पार्लियामेंट 's नियुक्त chief अन्वेषक, rapporteur Kader Arif, as खूब as widespread protests आरपार यूरोपीय.
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, British mep David Martin, recommended against the treaty, stating : `` The intended लाभ of this international agreement are दूर outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties ''.
on 4 जुलाई 2012, the European Parliament rejected the अनुबंध in plenary session, साथ 478 voting against the treaty, 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining.

A semi-trailer ट्रक is an articulated गाडी कि consists of a towing engine, known as a ट्रैक्टर in the United States and truck in many other places, attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry freight.
It is also known as a transport in Canada, prime mover in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, semi, tractor-trailer, truck और trailer, transfer truck, 18-wheeler, mack truck, big rig in the United States, or artic, short लिये articulated lorry, in Britain और Ireland.
A semi-trailer करता not ट्रेल completely behind the towing गाडी, but is attached at a point कि is just forward of the rear-most axle of the towing unit.
This is done so that a fraction of the weight of the ट्रेलर is carried by the prime mover.
This arrangement means कि दोनो tractor and semi-trailer होगा have a distinctly different डिज़ाइन than a rigid truck and trailer.
The पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स are a professional football team based in Pittsburgh, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
The team currently belongs to the North Division of the American Football सम्मेलन ( AFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
Founded in, the Steelers are the oldest franchise in the AFC.
Pittsburgh has won more Super कटोरी titles ( six ), won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and played in ( पंद्रह ) and hosted more ( eleven ) conference championship games than कोई other afc or NFC टोली.
The स्टीलर्स share the record for most Super Bowl दिखावे with the डलास Cowboys ( eight ).
The Steelers जीती their most recent championship, Super Bowl xliii, on फ़रवरी 1, 2009.
the Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on जुलाई 8, 1933, by Art Rooney, taking इसके original नाम इससे the baseball team of the same name, as was common practice for NFL teams to do at the time.
The ownership of the Steelers has remained within the Rooney परिवार since its founding.
The वर्तमान मालिक is Art 's son, Dan Rooney, जो has given much control of the franchise to his son Art Rooney II.
Long one of the NFL 's flagship teams, the Steelers आनंद a large, फैली fanbase nicknamed Steeler Nation.
The Steelers फिलहाल खेल their home खेल at Heinz Field on Pittsburgh 's उत्तर Side in the North Shore neighborhood, which also होस्ट the विश्वविद्यालयों of Pittsburgh पैंथर्स.
Built in 2001, the stadium replaced Three नदियाँ Stadium जिससे hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons.
Prior to तीन Rivers, the स्टीलर्स had played their खेल in pitt Stadium and Forbes Field.
Three different kinds of गेहूं और rye flour
Flour is a powder which is made by grinding cereal grains, or other seeds or roots ( like Cassava ).
It is the main संघटक of bread, which is a स्टेपल food for many संस्कृतियों, making the उपलब्धता of पर्याप्त supplies of flour a major आर्थिक and political issue at various times throughout history.
Wheat flour is एक of the most important भोजन in यूरोपीय, North American, Middle Eastern, Indian and North African cultures, and is the defining ingredient in सबसे of their styles of breads and pastries.
While wheat is the most common base for flour, मकई flour has been important in Mesoamerican cuisine since ancient times, and remains a staple throughout the Americas.
Rye flour is an महत्वपूर्ण constituent of bread in much of central यूरोपीय, and rice can भी be used in flour, though this is relatively uncommon.
Heart rate is the number of heartbeats प्रति unit of time, typically expressed as beats per minute ( bpm ).
Heart rate can vary as the body 's need to absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide परिवर्तन, ऐसे as during physical exercise, sleep, illness, or as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous system stimulants such as amphetamines increase heart rate.
Central nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases the दिल rate ( apart from some particularly strange ones with equally strange effects, such as ketamine which can cause - amongst many अन्य things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia ).
वहीँ are अनेक ways in which the heart rate speeds up or slows down.
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the brain, अनेक of which are those that are 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion और processing of drugs.
Due to individuals having a constant blood volume, एक of the physiological ways to deliver more oxygen to an organ is to increase heart रेट to permit blood to pass by the अंग अधिक often.
Normal resting दिल rates दायरा from 60-100 bpm.
मंदनाड़ी is defined as a resting heart rate below 60 bpm.
However, दिल दरों from 50 to 60 bpm are आम among healthy people और do नहीं necessarily require special attention.
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart रेट above 100 bpm, though persistent rest rates between 80-100 bpm, mainly if वे are उपस्थित दौरान sleep, may be लक्षण of हाइपरथाइरॉयडिज़्म or रक्ताल्पता ( see below ).

a carriage is a wheeled vehicle for people, usually horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) और सेडान chairs are excluded, since they are wheelless vehicles.
the carriage is especially designed for private passenger उपयोग and लिये comfort or elegance, though some are भी used to transport goods.
It may be लाइट, smart और fast or भारी, large and आरामदायक.
carriages सामान्यतः have बर्खास्तगी using leaf springs, अंडाकार springs ( in the 19th सदी ) or leather strapping.
A public यात्री vehicle would नहीं usually be called a carriage – terms for such include stagecoach, charabanc and omnibus.
working वाहनों such as the ( four-wheeled ) वैगन और ( two-wheeled ) cart share important parts of the history of the carriage, as is the fast ( two-wheeled ) chariot.
the 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust earthquake that occurred at 00:58:53 utc on संडे, 26 December 2004, with an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra, Indonesia.
The quake itself is ज्ञात by the scientific community as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake.
the resulting सुनामी was given विभिन्न names, including the 2004 भारतीय Ocean tsunami, South एशियाई tsunami, Indonesian tsunami, and the Boxing दिन tsunami.
The earthquake थी caused by subduction and triggered a series of devastating tsunamis साथ the coasts of most landmasses bordering the Indian समंदर, killing over 230,000 people in fourteen countries, and inundating coastal communities with लहरें up to high.
it थी one of the deadliest natural आपदाओं in recorded history.
Indonesia was the hardest-hit देश, followed by Sri लंका, India, and Thailand.
With a परिमाण of Mw 9.1–9.3, it is the third largest earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph.
the earthquake था the longest duration of faulting ever observed, between 8.3 and 10 minutes.
It caused the entire planet to हिलना as much as and triggered other earthquakes as far दूर as Alaska.
Its epicentre was between Simeulue and mainland Indonesia.
The plight of the affected people और देशों prompted a विश्वव्यापी humanitarian जवाब.
In all, the worldwide community donated more than $ 14 billion ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid.
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
Geothermal energy is थर्मल energy उत्पन्न and stored in the Earth.
Thermal energy is the उर्जा that determines the temperature of पदार्थ.
the Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the original गठन of the planet ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal अनुपात, जिससे is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and its surface, drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the कोर to the सतह.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek जड़ें γη ( ge ), meaning धरती, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the Earth, thermal उर्जा is created by radioactive decay and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °f ).
ऊष्मा conducts from the core to surrounding cooler rock.
The high तापमान and pressure cause some rock to melt, creating magma convection upward चूंकि it is हल्का than the solid rock.
The magma heats rock and water in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal energy has been प्रयुक्त for स्नान since Paleolithic times and लिये space heating since ancient Roman times, but it is now better known for विद्युत generation.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is ऑनलाइन in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal हीटिंग क्षमता is installed for district हीटिंग, space heating, spas, औद्योगिक processes, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, sustainable, and environmentally दोस्ताना, but has historically been limited to क्षेत्रों निकट tectonic थाली सीमाएँ.
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the दायरा and size of viable resources, विशेषकर लिये applications such as घर heating, opening a potential for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases फंस deep within the earth, लकिन these emissions are much lower प्रति energy unit than those of चट्टान fuels.
as a result, geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate global warming if widely deployed in place of चट्टान fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate to supply humanity 's energy needs, but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
खुदाई and exploration for गहन resources is very महंगी.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal शक्ति depend on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी, energy कीमतें, subsidies, and ब्याज दरों.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green शक्ति Program show that ग्राहक would be willing to अदा a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal.
But as a result of सरकारी assisted research और उद्योग अनुभव, the cost of generating geothermal power रै decreased by 25 % over the past two decades.
In 2001, geothermal energy cost between दो और ten cents per kwh.
the पद cubic foot is an Imperial and US customary ( non- metric ) unit of volume, प्रयुक्त in the United States and the संयुक्त किंगडम.
It is defined as the आवाज़ of a cube साथ पहलू of one पैर ( 0.3048 m ) in length.
to calculate cubic feet multiply लंबाई X चौडाई X height.
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation :, Southern Vietnamese pronunciation : ) ; 19 May 1890 – 2 सितंबर 1969 ), born Nguyễn Sinh cung and भी known as Nguyễn Tất Thành और nguyễn Ái Quốc, थी a Vietnamese communist revolutionary leader who was prime minister ( 1945–1955 ) and president ( 1945–1969 ) of the लोकतांत्रिक Republic of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ).
He थी a key फिगर in the न्यास of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945, as well as the People’s Army of वियतनाम ( pavn ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or vc ) during the वियतनाम War.
He led the Việt मिन्ह independence गति from 1941 onward, establishing the communist -नियमd Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945 and defeating the French Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện biên Phủ.
He officially stepped down from power in 1955 due to health problems, but remained a highly visible figurehead and inspiration for those Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united, communist vietnam—until his death.
After the war, Saigon, पूंजी of the गणतंत्र of Vietnam, थी renamed hồ Chí मिन्ह City.
All Roads Lead Home is a feature फिल्मी released on September 26, 2008.
Directed by डेनिस Fallon, it stars Peter Boyle, Patton Oswalt, Jason London, Vivien Cardone, Vanessa Branch, Peter Coyote, स्टीफन Milton, and Allan Kayser.
The फिल्म was फिल्माया in और around Kansas City, Missouri.
The movie made its संसार Premiere January 27 at the Santa बारबरा International Film पर्व.
The फिल्मी has also recently महरूम in several फिल्मी festivals, and has received ख़राब reviews.
Peter Boyle died before the फिल्म 's release.
It थी the last movie he appeared in.
Sales कर in the United States are taxes placed on the sale or पट्टे of goods and services in the United States.
While no national general sales tax exists, the federal government levies several national selective sales taxes on the बिक्री or lease of particular goods and सेवाएं.
Furthermore, forty-five राज्य, the District of Columbia, and Guam थोपने general बिक्री taxes that apply to the बिक्री or lease of most goods और some services, and states also may लेवी selective sales taxes on the बिक्री or पट्टे of particular goods or सेवाएं.
States may also प्रतिनिधि to local सरकारें the authority to impose additional general or selective sales taxes.
Sales tax is calculated by multiplying the purchase price by the लागू tax rate.
Tax rates vary widely by क्षेत्राधिकार and range from less than 1 % to over 10 %.
बिक्री tax is collected by the seller at the समय of sale.
Use tax is स्वः assessed by a buyer who has not paid sales tax on a taxable purchase.
Unlike the value added tax, a बिक्री tax is imposed only once, at the retail level.
However, in cases where items हैं sold at retail अधिक than once, such as used cars, the sales tax can be charged on the same item indefinitely.
the definition of retail sales और what goods and services are taxable vary among the states.
nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous श्रेणी of goods and services that are exempt from बिक्री tax, or taxed at reduced rates.
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or लिये resale is uniformly exempt from बिक्री tax.
Most jurisdictions exempt food sold in किराना stores, prescription medications, and अनेक agricultural supplies.
Sales कर, including those imposed by local governments, are generally administered at the state level.
States imposing sales tax require खुदरा विक्रेता to collect कर इससे customers, file returns, and remit the tax to the state.
Procedural rules vary widely.
Sellers generally जरूर collect tax from in-state purchasers unless the purchaser provides an exemption प्रमाणपत्र.
Most states allow or require इलेक्ट्रॉनिक remittance.
a central प्रसंस्करण unit ( cpu ), भी referred to as a central प्रोसेसर unit, is the hardware within a कंप्यूटर कि carries out the instructions of a कंप्यूटर program by performing the basic arithmetical, logical, और input/output operations of the system.
The term has been in उपयोग in the computer industry at least चूंकि the early 1960s.
The रूप, design, and implementation of CPUs have changed over the course of their इतिहास, but their fundamental operation remains much the same.
A computer can have more than one CPU ; this is called multiprocessing.
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain multiple CPUs on a single chip ; those ICs are called multi-core processors.
Two typical components of a CPU are the arithmetic logic unit ( ALU ), जिससे performs arithmetic and logical operations, और the control unit ( CU ), जिससे extracts निर्देश from memory and decodes and executes them, कॉलिंग on the ALU जब necessary.
Not all computational systems rely on a central processing unit.
An array प्रोसेसर or वेक्टर processor has multiple parallel computing तत्व, with no one unit considered the `` center ''.
In the वितरित computing model, problems are solved by a वितरित interconnected set of processors.
RFID chip next to a grain of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number when queried by a रीडर device.
This small type is incorporated in consumer products, and implanted in pets, for पहचान purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक fields to transfer data, लिये the purposes of automatically identifying and ट्रैकिंग tags attached to objects.
The tags contain electronically stored information.
Some tags are संचालित और read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic प्रेरण ).
Others उपयोग a लोकल power source ऐसे as a battery, or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM field, और then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at ऊँची frequencies ).
Battery powered tags may operate at hundreds of meters.
Unlike a बार code, the tag does नहीं necessarily need to be within लकीर of sight of the reader, and may be embedded in the tracked object.
RFID tags are used in many उद्योग.
an RFID tag संलग्न to an ऑटोमोबाइल during production can be used to track its प्रगति through the assembly line.
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and पालतु may have tags injected, allowing धनात्मक identification of the animal.
चूंकि RFID टैग can be attached to clothing, possessions, or even implanted within people, the possibility of पढना personally-linked सूचना बगैर consent has raised privacy concerns.
Overtime is the amount of time someone works परे normal working hours.
Normal hours may be determined in several ways:
by custom ( what is considered healthy or reasonable by society ),
by practices of a दिए trade or profession,
by legislation,
by agreement between employers और मजदूर or their representatives.
Most nations have overtime labor कानून designed to dissuade or prevent employers from forcing their कर्मचारी to work excessively long hours.
These laws may take into account other considerations than the humanitarian, ऐसे as preserving the health of workers so that they may continue to be productive, or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy.
One common approach to regulating ओवरटाइम is to require employers to pay workers at a उच्चतर hourly rate for overtime कार्य.
कंपनियाँ may choose to अदा workers higher overtime pay even if नहीं obliged to do so by law, particularly if they मानना that they फेस a backward झुकने supply curve of श्रमिक.
Overtime pay rates can cause workers to कार्य longer hours than वे होता at a flat hourly rate.
ओवरटाइम laws, attitudes toward overtime and hours of कार्य vary greatly from country to country and between different economic sectors.
Visualization of links between पृष्ठों on a wiki using a force-directed layout.
Force-directed graph drawing algorithms are a class of algorithms for आरेखण graphs in an aesthetically pleasing रास्ता.
Their purpose is to स्थिति the नोड of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so that all the edges are of more or less equal length and वहीँ are as few crossing edges as possible, by assigning forces among the नियत of किनारे and the set of nodes, आधारित on their relative positions, and then using these forces either to simulate the motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize उनके energy.
While graph आरेखण can be a difficult problem, force-directed algorithms, being physical simulations, प्रायः require no खास knowledge about graph theory such as planarity.
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively called adjusted for महंगाई ) is the amount of goods or services that can be purchased साथ a unit of currency.
For example, if you था taken एक dollar to a store in the 1950s, तुम होता have been able to buy a greater number of वस्तुएं than you would today, indicating that you होता have had a greater purchasing power in the 1950s.
Currency can be either a commodity धन, like gold or चांदी, or fiat currency, or free-floating market-valued currency जैसे us dollars.
As Adam Smith noted, having money gives एक the ability to `` command '' others ' मजदूर, so purchasing शक्ति to some extent is power over other people, to the extent कि वे are willing to trade their labor or goods for धन or currency.
if one 's monetary आय stays the same, but the price level increases, the purchasing शक्ति of कि income falls.
Inflation does not always imply falling purchasing power of one 's money income चूंकि it may rise faster than the price level.
A higher real income means a उच्चतर purchasing power since रियल आय refers to the income adjusted for inflation.
लिये a price index, इसके value in the आधार year is usually सामान्यीकृत to a value of 100.
The purchasing शक्ति of a unit of currency, say a डालर, in a given year, expressed in dollars of the base year, is 100/P, जहाँ P is the price index in that year.
So, by definition the खरीदना power of a dollar decreases as the दाम level उदय.
The purchasing power in today 's money of an amount C of money, t years into the future, can be computed with the सूत्र for the उपस्थित value :
where in this case i is an assumed future annual महंगाई rate.
Education in South कोरियाई is viewed as being crucial for success and प्रतियोगिता is consequently very heated and fierce.
A central administration oversees the process for the education of children from kindergarten to the तीसरा and final साल of ऊँची school.
Mathematics, विज्ञान, Korean, अंग्रेज़ी, and social studies are generally considered to be the most important subjects.
Normally physical शिक्षा is not considered important as it is नहीं recognised, by the generally academic elitist South Korean populace, as education and therefore many स्कूलों lack high-quality gymnasiums और varsity athletics.
South कोरियाई थी the first country in the world to provide high-speed internet access to all primary, junior, और high schools.
Although South Korean students प्रायः रैंक अत्यधिक on international comparative assessments when compared to विद्यार्थी of most Western education systems, the South Korean education system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning और memorisation.
The दक्षिण Korean education प्रणाली is rather notably strict and overly structured as compared to its counterparts in most पश्चिमी societies.
भी, the prevalence of non-school for-profit private संस्थान such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ), which too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual understanding, in students are criticised as a major social problem.
The my Lai Massacre (, ;,, or ) was the Vietnam War mass हत्या of between 347 and 504 unarmed civilians in South वियतनाम on March 16, 1968, by United States Army soldiers of `` चार्ली '' Company of 1st Battalion, 20th Infantry रेजीमेंट, 11th Brigade of the Americal प्रभाग.
Victims included women, men, children, and infants.
Some of the women were gang-raped and their bodies were later found to be mutilated and many women were allegedly raped prior to the हत्याओं.
While 26 u.S. soldiers were initially charged with दण्ड offenses for their क्रियाएँ at Mỹ Lai, only Second Lieutenant William Calley, a प्लाटून leader in Charlie Company, थी convicted.
Found guilty of हत्या 22 villagers, he was originally दिए a life sentence, but only served तीन and a half years under house arrest.
The massacre took place in the hamlets of My Lai and My Khe of Son my गाँव.
The event is also known as the Son my Massacre, विशेषकर in the वियतनामी राज्य media.
The U.S. military codeword for the `` Viet Cong stronghold '' थी `` Pinkville ''.
the incident prompted global outrage when it became public knowledge in 1969.
The massacre also increased domestic opposition to the U.S. भागीदारी in the Vietnam War.
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre और protect the wounded were initially denounced by several u.s. Congressmen as traitors.
They received नफ़रत मेल and death threats and found mutilated animals on their doorsteps.
The तीन were later widely praised and decorated by the Army for their heroic actions.
The hijackers in the September 11 attacks were 19 men संबद्ध with al-Qaeda, और 15 of the 19 were citizens of Saudi Arabia.
Others यहूद from मिश्र, Lebanon, और the UAE.
The hijackers were व्यवस्थित into four teams, each led by a pilot-trained hijacker with four `` muscle hijackers '' who were trained to help subdue the पायलटों, passengers, and crew.
The first hijackers to arrive in the United राज्य were खालिद al-Mihdhar and Nawaf al-Hazmi, who settled in the San Diego area in January 2000.
They were followed by three hijacker-pilots, Mohamed Atta, Marwan al-Shehhi, और Ziad Jarrah early in the गर्मियाँ of 2000 to undertake उड़ान training in south Florida.
The fourth hijacker-pilot, hani hanjour, arrived in San Diego in December 2000.
The rest of the `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' arrived in the spring and early summer of 2001, just months before the September 11 attacks.
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad इब्न ʿAbd Allāh इब्न ʿabd al-Muṭṭalib ibn hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ), also transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), was a religious, राजनैतिक, and military leader इससे Mecca जो एकीकृत अरब into a सिंगल religious polity under Islam.
He is believed by Muslims and bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर and prophet of God.
Muhammad is almost universally माना by Muslims as the last नबी sent by परमेश्वर लिये mankind.
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider उसे to be the restorer of an unaltered असली monotheistic faith of आदम, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, और other prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca, he थी orphaned at an early age and brought up under the care of his uncle abu Talib.
he later worked ज़्यादातर as a merchant, as well as a shepherd, and थी first married by age 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains for several nights of seclusion and prayer, he later reported that it was there, at age 40, that he received his first रहस्योद्घाटन from God.
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly, proclaiming कि `` God is One ``, that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the only रास्ता ( dīn ) acceptable to God, और that he himself was a prophet and messenger of God, in the same vein as other Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few अनुसरणकर्ता early on, and was met with hostility from some Meccan tribes ; he and his followers were treated harshly.
To escape persecution, Muhammad sent कुछ of his अनुसरणकर्ता to Abyssinia पहले he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the beginning of the Islamic calendar, which is भी ज्ञात as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, Muhammad united the tribes under the Constitution of Medina.
After eight years of fighting with the meccan tribes, his followers, who by then had grown to 10,000, took control of Mecca in the largely शांतिपूर्ण Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the नगर और then sent his followers out to destroy all of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern अरब.
In 632, a few months बाद returning to Medina from The Farewell Pilgrimage, मुहम्मद गिरी ill and died.
By the time of his death, most of the Arabian प्रायद्वीप था converted to Islam, and he had united अरब into a single मुस्लिम religious polity.
The revelations ( or Ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his death – form the verses of the Quran, regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of परमेश्वर '' and around which the religion is based.
Besides the Quran, मुहम्मद 's जीवन ( सिरा ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are also upheld by मुसलमान as the sources of sharia विधि.
वे discuss Muhammad and other नबियों of Islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase सलाम be upon him whenever उनके names are उल्लेखित.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern टाइम्स were largely negative, appraisals in modern history have been दूर less so.
इस is a सूची of tables of the सत्यापित oldest people in the world in ordinal rank, such as oldest person or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is माना 'verified ' if उसके or her अर्जी has been validated by an international body that specifically deals in longevity research, such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is कि of Jeanne calment of फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 years, 164 days.
She मिले Vincent van Gogh जब she was 12 or 13.
This led to न्यूज media attention in 1985, after Calment turned 110.
Subsequent छानबीन मिला documentation for Calment 's age, परे any उचित question, in the records of her native city, Arles, France.
More evidence of Calment 's जीवनकाल has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; her case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan लिये male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon किमुरा, who currently जीवनदान in Japan and is आयु as of.
Since the मौत of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States, on 17 December 2012, किमुरा, born 19 April 1897, is the oldest जीना person in the world whose age can be documented.
He has also been the oldest जीना man since the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the मौत of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013, the oldest living woman has been -year-old Misao Okawa, also इससे Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
इस is a timeline of the African-American Civil Rights Movement.
The Civil Rights movement was a स्वतंत्रता struggle by अफ़्रीकी Americans in the 1950s and 1960s to gain equality.
The goals of the movement यहूद freedom from discrimination, equal अवसर in employment, education and housing, the right to vote और equal access to public facilities.
Heavy metal ( often referred to as metal ) is a genre of rock music that विकसित in the late 1960s और early 1970s, largely in the United किंगडम and in the संयुक्त States.
With roots in blues rock and psychedelic चट्टान, the bands that created heavy metal विकसित a thick, massive ध्वनि, characterized by highly amplified distortion, extended guitar solos, emphatic बीट्स, and overall loudness.
Heavy metal lyrics and performance शैलियाँ are generally associated साथ masculinity and machismo.
The first भारी मेटल bands such as Led Zeppelin, Deep Purple और ब्लैक sabbath attracted large ऑडियंस, though they were often derided by critics, a status common throughout the इतिहास of the विधा.
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's evolution by discarding much of its blues influence ; Motörhead introduced a punk rock sensibility और an increasing emphasis on speed.
bands in the नई Wave of British Heavy मेटल such as Iron Maiden followed in a similar vein.
Before the end of the decade, heavy मेटल fans became ज्ञात as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
During the 1980s, glam metal became a commercial force with groups जैसे Mötley crüe and ज़हर.
Underground दृश्यों produced an array of more extreme, aggressive styles : thrash metal broke into the मुख्यधारा with bands such as मेटालिका, मेगाडेथ, Slayer, and Anthrax, while other styles of the most extreme subgenres of मेटल like death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena.
Since the mid-1990s, popular styles such as nu metal, which often incorporates elements of grunge and hip हॉप ; and metalcore, जिससे blends extreme metal with hardcore punk, have further expanded the definition of the विधा.
the far-right ( also ज्ञात as the extreme right ) refers to the highest degree of rightism in right-wing politics.
Far सही politics involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in society, and supports supremacy of certain individuals or groups deemed to be innately superior or preferable who are to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable.
The far right 's वकालत of supremacism is based on what its adherents perceive as innate characteristics of people that can नहीं be changed.
This stands as a point of अंतर साथ the centre-right 's आरोपण of behaviours, ऐसे as laziness or decadence, as the primary स्त्रोत of social inequalities.
the centre right—unlike the दूर right—claims कि people can end their behavioural हीनता through changing their आदतें and choices.
The original far सही, which emerged in France after the French Revolution, refused to accept the French Republic and supported a counter-revolution to restore the फ्रेंच monarchy and aristocracy.
the far सही is commonly associated with persons or groups who hold extreme nationalist, xenophobic, racist, religious fundamentalist or प्रतिक्रियावादी views.
The most extreme-right आंदोलनों have pursued oppression and genocide against groups of लोगों on the basis of their alleged inferiority.
थामस Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 अप्रैल 1588 – 4 December 1679 ), in some older texts Thomas हाब्स of malmsbury, थी an English पारस, बेहतरीन known today लिये his work on political philosophy.
उसके 1651 book Leviathan established the न्यास for सबसे of Western political philosophy from the perspective of सोशल अनुबंध theory.
hobbes थी a champion of absolutism for the sovereign, but he भी developed some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the right of the व्यक्तिगत ; the natural equality of all men ; the artificial character of the political order ( which led to the later distinction between civil society and the state ) ; the view that all legitimate political power must be `` representative '' and based on the consent of the people ; and a उदार निर्वचन of विधि which पत्ते people फ़्री to do whatever the law does नहीं explicitly forbid.
He was one of the founders of modern political philosophy.
His understanding of humans as being matter और motion, obeying the same physical laws as other matter and motion, remains influential ; और his account of इंसान प्रकृति as self-interested cooperation, and of political communities as being based upon a `` social contract `` remains एक of the major topics of political philosophy.
In addition to political philosophy, Hobbes also contributed to a diverse array of other फ़ील्ड, including history, geometry, the physics of gases, धर्मशास्त्र, ethics, and general दर्शनशास्त्र.
Emotional intelligence ( ei ) is the ability to पहचानो, assess, and control the emotions of oneself, of others, and of groups.
it can be divided into ability ei and trait EI.
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and रै stronger relationships with traditional intelligence, whereas trait EI is usually measured using self-report questionnaires and रै stronger relationships with personality.
आलोचनाओं have centered on whether EI is a real प्रज्ञा and whether it has incremental validity over IQ and the Big पाँच व्यक्तित्व traits.
Heredity is the passing of traits to offspring from its parents or ancestor.
This is the प्रक्रम by जिससे an औलाद cell or organism acquires or becomes predisposed to the characteristics of इसके parent cell or organism.
through heredity, variations exhibited by individuals can accumulate and cause some species to evolve.
The study of आनुवंशिकता in जीवविज्ञान is called आनुवंशिकी, जिससे includes the field of epigenetics.
For United राज्य individual income tax, adjusted सकल आय ( AGI ) is total सकल आय minus specific reductions.
Taxable income is adjusted gross income minus allowances for personal exemptions and itemized deductions.
For सबसे individual tax उद्देश्य, agi is more relevant than gross income.
सकल income is sales price of goods or property, minus cost of the property sold, प्लस अन्य income.
It includes wages, ब्याज, dividends, कारोबार income, rental income, and all other types of आय.
Adjusted gross income is gross income less deductions from a business or rental activity and 21 other specific items.
Several deductions ( e.g. चिकित्सा expenses और विविध itemized deductions ) are limited based on a percentage of AGI.
Certain phase outs, including those of निम्नतर कर दरों and itemized deductions, are based on स्तर of AGI.
Many states base state income कर on AGI साथ certain deductions.

The band performed the song on the Late दिखाएँ with दाउद Letterman, The Tonight Show with Jay लीनो, Later साथ Jools हॉलैंड, and पिछला Call साथ Carson Daly.
The song is a playable track on Rock Band 2 और Guitar Hero : World दौरे.
