This version was प्रदर्शित on their demo CD ( which featured early versions of four tracks ).
A टेलीफोन prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone क्रमांक ; in the North अमरीकी Numbering Plan countries ( country code 1 ), it is the पहला three अंक of a seven-digit phone number.
In अन्य countries both the prefix and the क्रमांक may have different lengths.
It shows which exchange the remaining संख्याएँ refer to.
A full telephone क्रमांक is प्रायः made up of country code ( required for international calls तभी ), area code ( जरूरी for calls between telephone areas ), उपसर्ग, and subscriber number.
कुछ places सीमित certain prefixes to fax numbers or cell phones only ; in अन्य places such dedicated prefixes हैं not used.
as telephone technology advanced, the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many places ; 485 in London, UK, was once the GULliver exchange, but now 44207485xxxx is बस considered one of many number blocks served by the clken Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another.
Metformin ( BP, pronounced, ; originally sold as Glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class.
It is the first-line drug of चुनाव for the उपचार of प्रकार 2 मधुमेह, in particular, in overweight and obese people और those with normal kidney function.
इसके use in gestational diabetes has been limited by safety concerns.
It is also used in the उपचार of polycystic ovary सिंड्रोम, and रै been investigated for अन्य diseases where insulin resistance may be an important factor.
Metformin works by suppressing ग्लूकोज production by the liver.
Metformin is the तभी antidiabetic drug that has महरूम conclusively दिखाया to prevent the cardiovascular जटिलताओं of diabetes.
It helps reduce LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels, and is not संबद्ध with weight gain.
, metformin is एक of only two oral antidiabetics in the World स्वास्थ्य संगठन मॉडल List of अनिवार्य Medicines ( the other होने glibenclamide ).
जब prescribed appropriately, metformin causes few adverse effects ( the most common is जठरांत्र परेशान ) and is associated साथ a low रिस्क of hypoglycemia.
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a serious concern in overdose and जब it is prescribed to people with contraindications, but otherwise, there is no significant रिस्क.
पहला synthesized and found to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s, metformin was forgotten for the next two decades as शोध shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs.
ब्याज in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports कि it could reduce blood sugar स्तर in people, और in 1957, French physician Jean Sterne published the first clinical trial of metformin as a treatment for मधुमेह.
it was introduced to the United Kingdom in 1958, Canada in 1972, and the United States in 1995.
metformin is now believed to be the सबसे widely विहित antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United States alone, more than 48 million prescriptions were filled in 2010 for its जेनेरिक formulations.
The Mount Rushmore National मेमोरियल is a sculpture carved into the granite face of Mount Rushmore near Keystone, दक्षिण Dakota, in the संयुक्त States.
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son, Lincoln Borglum, Mount Rushmore features sculptures of the heads of four United States presidents : जार्ज Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham lincoln.
The entire memorial covers and is above sea level.
The tallest mountain in the region is harney Peak ( ).
दक्षिण Dakota historian दोने Robinson is credited साथ conceiving the idea of नक्काशी the likenesses of famous people into the ब्लैक Hills region of South डकोटा in order to प्रचार tourism in the region.
Robinson 's initial idea was to sculpt the Needles ; however, Gutzon borglum rejected the Needles site क्युकी of the poor quality of the granite and strong opposition from पर्यावरणविद and Native American groups.
They settled on the माउंट Rushmore location, which also has the लाभ of facing southeast for maximum sun exposure.
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and Clark, Red बादल और भैंस Bill Cody but Borglum decided the sculpture should have a अधिक नेशनल फ़ोकस, and chose the चार राष्ट्रपतियों whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain.
After securing संघीय funding, construction on the memorial began in 1927, and the presidents ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939.
Upon Gutzon Borglum 's death in March 1941, his son Lincoln Borglum took over construction.
Although the initial concept called for each president to be चित्रित from head to कमर, lack of funding forced निर्माण to समाप्त in late अक्तूबर 1941.
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the memorial in 1933, while it was स्टिल under construction, और has प्रबंधित the मेमोरियल to the present day.
It attracts nearly तीन million people annually.
Charvet पोशाक shirt from the 1930s, Norsk Folkemuseum, ओस्लो.
A shirt, dress shirt, button-front, button-front shirt, or button-up shirt is a garment साथ a collar, a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the हेम, और sleeves with cuffs.
Shirts are predominantly used by मेन, चूंकि women usually wear blouses.
The सामने opening is fastened using बटन or studs, and the cuffs close with buttons or cuff links.
शर्ट are normally made from woven cloth, and हैं often accompanied by a jacket और tie, for example with a suit or formalwear, but shirts are also worn अधिक casually.
In British English, पोशाक shirt means specifically the more formal evening garment worn with black- or white- tie, also discussed below.
Some of these formal shirts have stiff fronts और detachable collars attached with collar studs.
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of shirt which रै a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes प्रयुक्त in error to लागू to all shirts ( with or बगैर buttoned down छल्लों ), being used as a synonym for `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also ज्ञात as Secretaries दिन or Admin दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In उत्तर America, it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last full week of अप्रैल ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in April ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is celebrated on the first शुक्रवार in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) was the अग्रणी painter of the classical फ्रेंच Baroque style, although he खर्च सबसे of his working life in रोम.
His work is characterized by clarity, लॉजिक, और order, and favors लकीर over color.
जबतक the 20th century he remained a major inspiration for ऐसे classically उन्मुख artists as Jacques-Louis David, Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres and पॉल Cézanne.
he worked in Rome for a circle of अग्रणी collectors there and elsewhere, except for a छोटी period when Cardinal Richelieu ordered him back to France to serve as First Painter to the किंग.
Most of his works are history paintings of धार्मिक or पौराणिक subjects that very often have a large landscape element.

Whitley 's brief करियर in mainstream country म्यूज़िक lasted from 1984 until his death in 1989, but he continues to influence an संपूर्ण generation of singers and songwriters.

A statute is a formal written enactment of a legislative प्राधिकार that governs a state, नगर, or county.
Typically, statutes कमांड or prohibit something, or declare policy.
The word is often used to distinguish law बना by legislative bodies from case law, decided by courts, and regulations जारी by सरकारी agencies.
Statutes are sometimes referred to as legislation or `` black letter विधि. ''
as a source of विधि, statutes are considered प्राथमिक authority ( as opposed to secondary authority ).
Ideally all statutes must be in harmony with the fundamental law of the land ( constitutional ).
This word is प्रयुक्त in contradistinction to the common विधि.
Statutes acquire उनके force from the time of their passage, however unless वरना provided.
Statutes are of अनेक kinds ; namely, Public or private.
declaratory or remedial.
Temporary or perpetual.
A अस्थाई statute is one which is limited in its duration at the time of its enactment.
It continues in force until the time of its limitation has expired, unless sooner repealed.
A perpetual statute is one for the continuance of which there is no limited time, हालांकि it may not be expressly declared to be so.
If, however, a statute which did not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another which is temporary only, the former will also be temporary and dependent upon the existence of the latter.
पहले a statute becomes law in some countries, it must be agreed upon by the highest executive in the government, and आखिरकार प्रकाशित as part of a code.
in many countries, statutes are organized in topical arrangements ( or `` codified '' ) within publications called codes, ऐसे as the United States Code.
In many nations statutory law is distinguished from and subordinate to संवैधानिक law.
The external iliac arteries are two major arteries which bifurcate off the common iliac arteries अग्रवर्ती to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis.
They proceed anterior and अवर along the medial border of the psoas major मांसपेशियां.
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to the inguinal ligament about एक third laterally from the insertion पाइंट of the inguinal ligament on the pubic tubercle at which पाइंट they are referred to as the femoral arteries.
The external iliac artery is usually the artery used to attach the renal artery to the प्राप्तकर्ता of a गुर्दा transplant.
भाप is a digital distribution, digital rights management, multiplayer और communications platform विकसित by वाल्व Corporation.
It is used to वितरित games और related मीडिया online, from small independent डेवलपर to larger तन्त्र houses ; in अक्तूबर 2012, Valve expanded the service to include non-gaming software.
Steam provides the उपयोक्ता with संस्थापना and automatic management of software across अनेक computers, community features such as friends lists and groups, cloud saving, and in-game आवाज़ and गपशप कार्यक्षमता.
The software provides a freely available application प्रोग्रामिंग interface, Steamworks, that developers can take advantage of to integrate अनेक of Steam 's functions within their software products, सहित नक़ल protection, networking and matchmaking, in-game achievements and micro-transactions, and support लिये user-created content through भाप Workshop.
Though initially developed for उपयोग on microsoft Windows, the client has expanded to शामिल OS X और लिनक्स versions, and clients with limited functionality on the प्लेस्टेशन 3 console and for both iOS and Android मोबाईल devices.
In addition to being a सेंट्रल hub for gaming software, Valve has created a version of Steam with altered functionality to be used in स्कूलों for शैक्षणिक software, including a modified version of Portal 2 लिये teaching science and नाजुक thinking lessons.
, there are nearly 2000 games उपलब्धियाँ through Steam, and 54 million active user accounts.
As of January 2013, Steam has देखी over 6.6 million concurrent खिलाड़ी.
Steam has an estimated 50–70 % share of the digital distribution market for video games.
The भाप logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank और rod from the Walschaerts valve गियर of a भाप locomotive.
जेरी लुईस ( born कूच 16, 1926 ) is an American comedian, actor, सिंगर, film producer, screenwriter and film director.
He is known for his slapstick humor in film, television, stage and radio.
He was originally युग्म up with Dean Martin in 1946, forming the famed कॉमेडी team of Martin and लुईस.
In addition to the duo 's popular nightclub work, they starred in a कामयाब series of comedy films लिये Paramount Pictures.
लुईस is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons and position as नेशनल chairman लिये the Muscular Dystrophy Association ( MDA ).
Lewis has won several awards लिये lifetime achievements from The American कॉमेडी Awards, Los Angeles फिल्मी Critics Association, and Venice Film पर्व, and he has two सितारों on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
In 2005, he प्राप्त the Governors Award of the Academy of टेलीविज़न कला & Sciences Board of राज्यपालों, जिससे is the highest Emmy Award presented.
on February 22, 2009, the अकादमी of गति Picture Arts and Sciences awarded Lewis the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian पुरस्कार.
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs इससे the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern Swiss ऐल्प्स through जर्मनी and eventually flows into the North Sea coast in the Netherlands and is the twelfth longest river in Europe, at about, with an average discharge of more than.
The Rhine and the Danube formed most of the northern inland frontier of the Roman साम्राज्य and, since those दिनों, the Rhine has been a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods गहन inland.
It has also परोसा as a defensive feature and has महरूम the आधार for क्षेत्रीय and international borders.
The many castles and prehistoric fortifications along the Rhine testify to इसके importance as a waterway.
River traffic could be stopped at these locations, usually for the purpose of collecting tolls, by the state कि controlled that portion of the नदी.

श्री ( Devanagari : श्री, iast ; Śrī ), also transliterated as Sree or Shri or Shree is a word of Sanskrit origin, used in the Indian subcontinent as polite रूप of पता equivalent to the English `` Mr. '' in written and बोला language, or as a title of veneration for deities ( usually अनूदित as `` Holy '' ).

Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals with the design, construction, and maintenance of the physical and naturally built पर्यावरण, सहित works like roads, bridges, canals, dams, and इमारतें.
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline after military engineering, and it was defined to distinguish non-military engineering from military अभियान्त्रिकी.
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering, geotechnical engineering, geophysics, geodesy, control engineering, संरचनात्मक engineering, biomechanics, nanotechnology, transportation engineering, earth science, atmospheric sciences, forensic engineering, municipal or urban engineering, water resources engineering, सामग्री engineering, coastal engineering, सर्वेक्षण, and construction engineering.
Civil engineering takes place on all levels : in the पब्लिक sector from municipal through to national governments, and in the private sector from individual homeowners through to अंतरराष्ट्रीय companies.

Katherine Dunham ( जून 22, 1909 – May 21, 2006 ) was an अमरीकी dancer, कोरियोग्राफर, लेखक, educator, और social activist.
Dunham had one of the most successful नृत्य करियर in American and यूरोपीय theater of the 20th century, and directed उसके own नृत्य कम्पनी for many years.
She has been called the `` matriarch and queen mother of ब्लैक dance ''.
During her heyday in the 1940s और 1950s, dunham was renowned throughout Europe और लैटिन America and was widely popular in the United States, where the Washington Post called her `` dancer Katherine the ग्रेट ''.
For almost thirty सालो she maintained the कैथरीन Dunham Dance Company, the तभी self-supported American black dance troupe at that समय, and over her long career she choreographed अधिक than नब्बे individual dances.
Dunham was an innovator in African-American आधुनिक dance as well as a leader in the फ़ील्ड of dance anthropology, or ethnochoreology.
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses, commonly called peat moss due to इसके prevalence in wet habitats जहाँ it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
Sphagnum accumulations can स्टोर जल, चूंकि both living and dead plants can hold large quantities of water inside their cells ; पौधे may थाम from 16-26 टाइम्स as much water as उनके dry weight depending on the species.
the empty cells help retain water in drier conditions.
Hence, as sphagnum moss grows, it can slowly spread into drier conditions, forming larger peatlands, both raised bogs and blanket bogs.
These peat accumulations then provide आवास for a wide array of peatland plants, including sedges and ericaceous shrubs, as खूब as orchids and carnivorous plants.
Sphagnum and the peat formed from it do not decay readily because of the phenolic यौगिकों embedded in the moss 's cell walls.
In addition, bogs, like सब wetlands, develop anaerobic soil conditions, which produces slower anaerobic decay rather than aerobic microbial action.
Peat moss can also acidify its surroundings by लेने up cations, such as calcium और magnesium, और releasing hydrogen ions.
अंतर्गत the right conditions, peat can accumulate to a depth of अनेक meters.
अलग species of Sphagnum have अलग tolerance limits for flooding and ph, so any one peatland may have a क्रमांक of different sphagnum species.
Individual peat moss plants consist of a main stem, with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles प्रायः consisting of दो or तीन spreading branches and दो to four hanging शाखाओं.
The शीर्ष of the plant, or capitulum, has compact clusters of young branches.
Along the stem हैं scattered पत्ते of विभिन्न shapes, named stem leaves ; the आकार varies according to species.
The leaves consist of two kinds of कोशिकाएं ; small, green, living cells ( chlorophyllose cells ), and large, साफ, structural, dead cells ( hyaline कोशिकाएं ).
The latter have the large water-holding capacity.

The introduction of the weekday न्यूनतम fare condition in 2002 resulted in a minor change : the रेड `` r '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard.
This version is still in use as of 2007.
The Network railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by British रेल, upon the creation of उनके संजाल SouthEast area around London, England.
The card is intended to प्रोत्साहित leisure सफर by rail by offering discounts for adults and accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares.
The दायरा of discounts उपलब्धियाँ, और the price of the card, have varied since कि time, but the कार्ड has always been valid for a year 's unlimited use.
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National रेल station or Rail Appointed Travel Agent, by completing an application form - no photographic identification or other documentation is needed to buy or use the कार्ड.
it is एक of a number of concessionary fare schemes available on the British railway प्रणाली.
The United Nations ( un ; French : संगठन des Nations Unies, ONU ) is the संसार 's largest, foremost, and सबसे prominent अंतरराष्ट्रीय organization.
The stated aims of the United Nations include promoting और facilitating cooperation in international law, international security, economic विकास, social प्रगति, human rights, civil अधिकारों, civil liberties, राजनैतिक freedoms, democracy, and the achievement of lasting world peace.
the UN was founded in 1945 after World War II to replace the League of Nations, to stop युद्धों between countries, and to provide a platform for संवाद.
It contains multiple subsidiary संगठन to carry out its missions.
At इसके founding, the UN had 51 member states ; as of 2011, there हैं 193.
इससे its offices around the world, the UN and इसके specialized agencies decide on सत्य and administrative issues in regular meetings held throughout the year.
the organization has six principal अंगों : the सामान्य Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the सुरक्षा Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security ) ; the Economic and Social Council ( for assisting in promoting अंतरराष्ट्रीय आर्थिक और social cooperation and development ) ; the सचिवालय ( for providing studies, information, and facilities needed by the UN ) ; the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Court of Justice ( the प्राथमिक judicial organ ) ; and the United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ).
Other prominent UN System agencies include the World Health Organization ( WHO ), the World Food Programme ( WFP ) and United राष्ट्र children 's निधि ( UNICEF ).
The UN 's most prominent स्थिति is that of the office of Secretary-General which has been held by Ban Ki-moon of South Korea since 2007.
the United Nations मुख्यालय resides in international territory in New York City, with further main offices at Geneva, Nairobi, and वियना.
The organization is financed from assessed and voluntary contributions from its member states, and has छह आधिकारिक languages : Arabic, Chinese, अंग्रेज़ी, French, Russian, और Spanish.
South Beach, also nicknamed SoBe, is a neighborhood in the नगर of Miami बीच, Florida, संयुक्त States, located due east of Miami नगर proper between Biscayne Bay और the Atlantic Ocean.
The क्षेत्रफल encompasses all of the barrier islands of Miami Beach south of Indian Creek.
This area थी the first section of Miami Beach to be developed, starting in the 1910s, thanks to the विकास प्रयत्न of Carl G. Fisher, the Lummus Brothers, and John S. Collins, the latter whose construction of the Collins सेतु provided the first vital land link between mainland Miami and the beaches.
The area has gone through numerous artificial और natural changes over the सालो, including a booming regional अर्थव्यवस्था, increased tourism, and the 1926 hurricane, which destroyed much of the area.
As of 2010, about 39,186 residents live in South Beach.
the United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय election, held on Tuesday, November 8, 1960.
The रिपब्लिकन Party nominated लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड Nixon, while the Democratic पार्टी मनोनीत John F. Kennedy, Senator इससे Massachusetts.
The incumbent President, रिपब्लिकन Dwight D. आइज़नहावर, was not eligible लिये re-election after serving the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment.
Kennedy was elected with a सीसे of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the लोकप्रिय vote, giving him a विजय of 303 to 219 in the Electoral कॉलेज, the closest since 1916.
This was the first election in जिससे all fifty of the current संयुक्त States participated.
A number of factors explain why the election was so close.
Kennedy gained since there was an economic मंदी which hurt the incumbent Republican, and he had the advantage of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans.
furthermore, the नई votes that कैनेडी gained among Catholics almost neutralized the new votes Nixon gained among Protestants.
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
In the समाप्त, Nixon 's emphasis on उसके experience carried little वज़न, and he wasted energy by campaigning in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states.
कैनेडी used his large, well-funded campaign organization to win the nomination, secure endorsements, और, with the aid of the last of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate lyndon B. Johnson to थाम the South और used television effectively.
This election is notable as होने the first समय in u.S. history that two sitting U.S. Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as अध्यक्ष and vice-president, a phenomenon कि has been repeated एकबार, by Barack Obama और Joe बिडेन in 2008 ( in both cases, the president was the younger, more junior senator ).
A poster for a c. 1884 American production of Macbeth, starring Thomas W. keene.

Macbeth is a play written by William Shakespeare.
It is considered one of उसके darkest and most शक्तिशाली tragedies.
नियत in Scotland, the play dramatizes the corroding psychological and political effects produced जब इसके protagonist, the स्कॉटिश lord मैकबेथ, chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition लिये power.
he commits regicide to become king and then furthers उसके moral descent with a reign of murderous terror to stay in power, eventually plunging the country into सिविल war.
In the end, he loses everything that gives अर्थ and purpose to उसके life before खोने his life itself.
The खेल is believed to have been written between 1603 और 1607, and is most commonly dated 1606.
The earliest account of a performance of what was probably Shakespeare 's play is April 1611, when Simon Forman recorded seeing such a play at the Globe Theatre.
It was first प्रकाशित in the Folio of 1623, possibly from a prompt book.
It was most likely written दौरान the reign of James I, who had been James VI of स्कॉटलैंड before he succeeded to the English throne in 1603.
James थी a patron of shakespeare’s acting company, and of all the plays Shakespeare wrote during James’s reign, Macbeth most clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship with the sovereign.
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy, और tells the स्टोरी of a brave Scottish general named Macbeth who receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he होगा become King of स्कॉटलैंड.
Consumed by ambition and spurred to कार्रवाई by his बीवी, Macbeth हत्याएं King डंकन and takes the throne लिये himself.
His reign is racked with guilt and paranoia, और he जल्द becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is forced to commit more and more murders to protect himself from enmity and suspicion.
The bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth और महिला Macbeth into realms of arrogance, madness, and death.
Shakespeare 's source लिये the tragedy is the account of King मैकबेथ of Scotland, Macduff, and Duncan in Holinshed 's Chronicles ( 1587 ), a history of England, Scotland और Ireland परिचित to Shakespeare and उसके contemporaries, although the events in the play differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth.
In the बैकस्टेज world of थिएटर, some मानना that the play is cursed, and will not mention its title aloud, referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play ``.
Over the course of many centuries, the play रै attracted some of the most renowned अभिनेताओं to the roles of Macbeth और Lady Macbeth.
It has been adapted to film, टेलीविज़न, opera, novels, comic books, और other media.
The Milton Hershey स्कूल is a private philanthropic ( pre-K through 12 ) boarding स्कूल in Hershey, Pennsylvania.
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School, the संस्था थी founded and funded by chocolate industrialist Milton Snavely Hershey and उसके wife, Catherine स्वीनी Hershey.
The school was originally स्थापित for impoverished, healthy, caucasian, male orphans, while today it serves students of various backgrounds.
The मिल्टन hershey School Trust, which funds the school, owns controlling interest in the Hershey Company and owns the Hershey Entertainment and Resorts Company ( herco ) जिससे oversees many of the area होटल along साथ a theme park called Hersheypark.
With over six अरब dollars in assets, the Milton Hershey स्कूल is एक of the wealthiest schools in the world.
The school is overseen by a Board of Managers.
The school currently serves 1,818 students, and plans to grow to 2,100 students by 2013.
A member of CORE : गठबन्धन for Residential Education, it is the largest residential education program in the US.

The Controlled Substances अधिनियम ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक II of the व्यापक ड्रग Abuse Prevention और Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under जिससे the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, उपयोग and वितरण of certain substances is regulated.
the Act भी परोसा as the national implementing legislation लिये the सिंगल Convention on Narcotic दवाएँ.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications for a substance to be शामिल in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration और the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, and कॉंग्रेस has sometimes scheduled other substances through विधान such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000, which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification decisions are required to be made on मापदण्ड including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, और international treaties.
Second-language acquisition or second-language सीखना is the process by which लोगों learn a second language.
Second-language acquisition ( प्रायः abbreviated to SLA ) भी refers to the वैज्ञानिक discipline devoted to studying कि process.
Second language refers to any language learned in addition to a व्यक्ति 's first language ; although the concept is नामित second-language acquisition, it can also incorporate the learning of तीसरा, fourth, or subsequent languages.
second-language acquisition refers to what learners do ; it करता not refer to practices in language teaching.
The academic discipline of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline of लागू linguistics.
It is broad-based and relatively नई.
as well as the विभिन्न branches of भाषाविज्ञान, second-language acquisition is also closely related to मनोविज्ञान, cognitive psychology, and शिक्षा.
To separate the academic अनुशासन from the learning प्रक्रम itself, the शर्तें second-language acquisition research, second-language studies, and second-language acquisition studies हैं also used.
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary field, and क्युकी of this it is difficult to identify a precise starting date.
However, it करता appear to have developed a great deal since the mid-1960s.
The term acquisition was originally प्रयुक्त to emphasize the subconscious nature of the learning process, but in recent years learning and acquisition have become largely synonymous.
Second-language acquisition can incorporate heritage language learning, but it does नहीं usually incorporate bilingualism.
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as being the end result of learning a भाषा, not the process itself, और see the पद as referring to native-like fluency.
लेखक in fields such as शिक्षा and psychology, however, often उपयोग bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of multilingualism.
second-language acquisition is also not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a विदेशी language ; rather, the सीखना of second languages and the learning of विदेशी languages involve the same fundamental processes in different situations..
There रै been much debate about exactly how भाषा is learned, and अनेक issues are still unresolved.
There are many theories of second-language acquisition, but none are स्वीकृत as a complete explanation by सब SLA researchers.
Due to the interdisciplinary nature of the field of second-language acquisition, this is not expected to happen in the foreseeable future.
Forbes list of billionaires is an सालाना ranking of the world 's wealthiest लोगों, compiled and published by Forbes, an American national business magazine.
The total net worth of each individual on the सूची is estimated, in United राज्य dollars, आधारित on उनके assets और हिसाब लिये debt.
The list only represents each person 's valuation on a सिंगल day, due to daily fluctuations among एक्सचेंज rates and भण्डार valuations.
the United States Secret Service is a U.S. संघीय विधि enforcement agency that is part of the United राज्य Department of मातृभूमि Security.
The sworn members are divided among the Special Agents and the Uniformed Division.
Until कूच 1, 2003, the Service was भाग of the United States Department of the Treasury.
The U.S. रहस्य Service has two पृथक क्षेत्रों of responsibility:
वित्तीय Crimes, covering missions such as रोकथाम and investigation of counterfeiting of U.S. currency and U.S. राजकोष securities, और investigation of major fraud.
Protection, which entails ensuring the safety of current and former नेशनल leaders and their families, such as the President, past presidents, vice presidents, अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार, visiting heads of राज्य, and विदेशी embassies ( प्रति an agreement with the U.S. State Department 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign मिशन ( OFM ), इत्यादि. )
The Secret Service 's आरंभिक responsibility was to investigate counterfeiting of u.S. currency, which थी rampant following the U.S. सिविल War.
The एजेंसी then evolved into the United States ' first घरेलू intelligence and counterintelligence एजेंसी.
Many of the agency 's missions यहूद later taken over by subsequent एजेंसियों such as the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( एफबीआई ), Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives ( ATF ), Immigration और Customs प्रवर्तन ( ICE ), and आतंरिक Revenue Service ( IRS ).
`` me and Bobby McGee '' is a song written by Kris Kristofferson and Fred Foster, originally performed by Roger Miller.
Others performed the song later, including Kristofferson himself, और Janis Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart with the song in 1971 after her death, बनाना the song the second posthumous number-one single in U.S. chart इतिहास after `` ( Sittin ' On ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding.
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by his initials, FDR, was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a time of worldwide आर्थिक depression and कुल war.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only अमरीकी अध्यक्ष elected to अधिक than two terms, he निर्मित a New सौदे Coalition that realigned American राजनीती after 1932, as his domestic policies defined अमरीकी liberalism लिये the मध्य third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy लोकप्रिय song `` Happy Days Are Here again `` as his campaign theme, FDR पराजित incumbent Republican हर्बर्ट Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
सक्रिय by उसके personal victory over पोलियो, FDR 's unfailing optimism और activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit.
He worked closely with British Prime Minister विंस्टन Churchill और Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the allies against Germany and Japan in World War II, and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his पहला सौ days in office, जिससे began कूच 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a किस्में of programs designed to produce राहत ( government jobs for the unemployed ), recovery ( economic विकास ), and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street, बैंको and transportation ).
the economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, but तब relapsed into a deep मंदी.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme अदालत or passing any considerable विधान ; it abolished many of the relief programs when unemployment diminished during संसार War ii.
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85, except लिये the विनियमन of Wall Street by the Securities and एक्सचेंज Commission, which still exists.
Along with several smaller programs, major surviving programs include the Federal जमा Insurance Corporation, जिससे थी created in 1933, and Social Security, which Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the जापानी invasion of China and the आक्रामकता of Nazi Germany, FDR gave strong diplomatic और वित्तीय support to China and Great Britain, जबकि बाकी officially neutral.
His goal थी to make America the `` Arsenal of लोकतंत्र `` which would supply munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional स्वीकृति, provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very strong national support, he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor on दिसम्बर 7, 1941, calling it a `` date which होगा live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war effort.
As an active military leader, रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall war रणनीति on two fronts that ended in the शिकस्त of the Axis Powers and the development of the संसार 's first atom बमबारी.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American नागरिकों.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the औद्योगिक अर्थव्यवस्था grew rapidly to नई heights as लाखो of people स्थानांतरित to नई jobs in war centers, and 16 million मेन and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt dominated the American राजनैतिक scene not only during the twelve years of उसके presidency, but also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System.
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united मजदूर unions, big city मशीने, white ethnics, African Americans and rural white Southerners.
He भी influenced the later सृष्टि of the United Nations and Bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently रेटेड by विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष three U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, साथ with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington.
A liberal डेमोक्रेट, Roosevelt defined उसके वैचारिक position as `` a little बाएँ of बीच. ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS, Mara, and MS-13 ) is a transnational दण्ड gang that originated in Los Angeles and has स्प्रेड to other parts of the संयुक्त States, कनाडा, Mexico, और सेंट्रल America.
The majority of the गिरोह is ethnically रचित of Central Americans और क्रियाशील in urban और suburban areas.
In the u.S., the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in लॉस Angeles काउंटी and the San Francisco Bay क्षेत्रफल in Northern कैलिफ़ोर्निया ; the Washington, d.C. metropolitan areas of Fairfax काउंटी, Virginia, Montgomery काउंटी, Maryland, और प्रिंस George 's County, Maryland ; Long Island, नई York ; the Boston, Massachusetts क्षेत्रफल ; Charlotte, उत्तर Carolina ; and Houston, Texas.
वहीँ is also a presence of MS-13 in Toronto, ओंटारियो, Canada.
Members of ms distinguish themselves by tattoos covering the body and भी प्रायः the face, as well as the उपयोग of their अपना sign language.
वे are notorious for their use of violence और a subcultural moral code that predominantly consists of merciless revenge and बेदर्द retributions.
This क्रूरता of the distinguished members of the `` Maras '' or `` Mareros '' earned them a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa कार्टेल battling against Los Zetas in an ongoing ड्रग war south of the संयुक्त States border.
उनके wide-ranging क्रियाएँ have drawn the attention of the FBI and Immigration and Customs Enforcement, who have initiated wide-scale छापे against ज्ञात and suspected gang members – netting hundreds of arrests across the देश.
हड्डियों is an American crime comedy-drama television series that premiered on the Fox network in the United States on September 13, 2005.
The show is based on forensic anthropology and forensic पुरातत्व, with each episode focusing on an FBI case file concerning the mystery behind human remains brought by FBI Special Agent Seeley Booth ( दाउद boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel ).
The rest of the main cast includes Michaela Conlin, T. J. Thyne, eric Millegan, Tamara टेलर, Jonathan Adams, and John Francis डाले.
Created by Hart Hanson, the श्रेणी is very loosely based on the life and writings of उपन्यासकार and forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs, who भी produces the show.
Its title character, Temperance Brennan, is named after the समर्थक of Reichs ' crime novel श्रेणी.
conversely, Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels based around a fictional ( in the Bones ब्रह्मांड ) forensic anthropologist named Kathy Reichs.
Bones is a संयुक्त उत्पादन by Josephson Entertainment, Far Field Productions and 20th सदी फॉक्स Television.
The series रै completed airing its eighth season and has been renewed for a ninth season.
सुपर Bowl XXV was an American football खेल between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Buffalo Bills और the नेशनल Football सम्मेलन ( NFC ) champion New York दिग्गज to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 1990 season.
The Giants defeated the Bills by the score of 20–19, winning their second ever Super Bowl.
It is the तभी Super Bowl decided by एक point.
the खेल थी held at Tampa Stadium in Tampa, फ्लोरिडा, on January 27, 1991, during the height of the Gulf War.
It was thus played अंतर्गत much patriotic fervor.
The कार्यवाही included a rousing rendition of `` The Star-Spangled Banner `` by Whitney Houston during the pregame ceremonies.
The Bills and their विस्फोटक no-huddle ठोकर यहूद making their first Super Bowl appearance after finishing the regular season with a 13-3 record, and leading the league in total अंक scored साथ 428.
In advancing to their second सुपर Bowl, the Giants also posted a 13-3 regular season रिकार्ड, but साथ a ball-control offense and a defense that allowed a league low 211 points.
The खेल is best remembered for Bills placekicker Scott नॉर्वुड 's last-second field goal attempt which went wide right of the uprights, leading to a दिग्गज विजय, and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills.
the Giants set a Super कटोरी रिकार्ड holding possession of the ball लिये 40 minutes and 33 seconds.
New York also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, and made a 75-yard touchdown drive that consumed a सुपर Bowl record 9:29 off the clock.
Giants running back Ottis Anderson, जो carried the बॉल 21 times for 102 yards and one touchdown, थी named सुपर Bowl mvp.
He was the first awardee to receive the newly नामित `` Pete rozelle ट्रॉफी '' ( नामित for the पूर्व commissioner ).
Anderson also recorded one reception for seven yards.
मैल्कम x ( ; May 19, 1925february 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little and also known as el-hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ), was an African-American Muslim minister और इंसान rights activist.
to his admirers, he was a courageous advocate for the rights of अश्वेतों, a man who indicted white America in the harshest terms for इसके crimes against black Americans.
Detractors accused him of preaching racism, black सर्वोच्चता, and हिंसा.
He has been called one of the greatest और most influential African Americans in इतिहास.
मैल्कम X 's पिता died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he थी young, and at least one of his uncles was lynched.
जब he was 13, his mother थी placed in a mental hospital, and he was placed in a series of foster homes.
In 1946, at age 20, he गई to prison for तोड़कर and entering.
In थाना, मैल्कम X became a member of the Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952, he quickly रोज़ to become one of its नेताओ.
For a dozen years, Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group, लकिन disillusionment with Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led उसे to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a काल of travel in Africa और the Middle ईस्ट, he returned to the United States, where he founded Muslim Mosque, Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity.
in February 1965, less than a year after leaving the Nation of Islam, he was assassinated by three members of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over time.
As a प्रवक्ता for the Nation of Islam he taught ब्लैक supremacy and advocated separation of black और white Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's जोर on integration.
After breaking साथ the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association with it, `` I did अनेक things as a [ ब्लैक ] Muslim कि I 'm sorry for now.
I थी a zombie तब... pointed in a certain direction and told to कूच '' —and बनने a Sunni Muslim, he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work साथ civil rights नेताओ, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, और self-defense.
