Elizabeth ii ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the Commonwealth realms, and their territories and dependencies, और सिर of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
वो is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and, in some of her realms, carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 February 1952, एलिज़ाबेथ became Head of the Commonwealth और महारानी regnant of seven independent राष्ट्रमंडल countries : the United Kingdom, कनाडा, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan और Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first four aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, संत Lucia, संत Vincent and the grenadines, Belize, अण्टीगुआ and Barbuda and संत Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 सालो.
Elizabeth was born in London and educated privately at home.
Her father acceded to the throne as जार्ज VI in 1936 on the abdication of his bhai Edward VIII, इससे which time वो थी the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake पब्लिक duties दौरान the Second संसार War, in जिससे वो served in the Auxiliary Territorial सेवा.
in 1947, she married प्रिंस Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, साथ whom वो has four children : Charles, Anne, Andrew, and एडवर्ड.
Her राजतिलक service took place in 1953 and was the first to be televised.
The Queen 's many ऐतिहासिक visits and meetings include a state visit to the गणतंत्र of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms, such as devolution in the संयुक्त Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of निजी significance have included the births and marriages of उसके children, the births of her grandchildren, the investiture of the Prince of Wales, and the जश्न of milestones such as उसके Silver, Golden, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, क्रमशः.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in उत्तरी आयरलैंड, the Falklands War, wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the assassination of Prince फिलिप 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed उसके annus horribilis ), the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, and the मौतों of her mother और sister in 2002.
The महारानी has occasionally faced severe press आलोचना of the royal परिवार and republican sentiments, but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high.
The 2010 United States Senate election in Florida took प्लेस on November 2, 2010 along साथ अन्य elections to the United राज्य Senate in other states as खूब as all elections to the United राज्य House of Representatives and various state and local चुनावों.
Republican Marco rubio, former Speaker of the Florida हाउस of Representatives, defeated independent Charlie Crist and डेमोक्रेट Kendrick Meek in a three-way race.
One term Senator Mel Martinez was elected in a very close रेस against Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote.
Martinez announced on December 2, 2008 that he would नहीं seek re-election to the Senate, and would resign prior to the end of his term.
In August 2009, Governor Charlie Crist announced that he would appoint his former Chief of Staff, George LeMieux, a Republican, to the सीनेट सीट being vacated by मार्टिनेज.
Governor Crist publicly announced he was कार्यशील for the seat in mid-2009.
At the time he प्राप्त many Republican endorsements, such as the National रिपब्लिकन Senatorial कमेटी, मार्टिनेज, and the 2008 Republican presidential nominee John McCain.
His support of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 hurt उसके लोकप्रियता among conservatives, and प्रत्याशी Marco Rubio surged.
In April 2010 Crist announced he would drop आउट of the Republican primary and चलाएं as an independent.
The नेशनल रिपब्लिकन senatorial Committee withdrew इसके endorsement of Crist and demanded a refund of its अभियान funds कि it provided for the Crist campaign.
Congressman Kendrick Meek was the first Democrat to declare his intention to run.
Alexander Snitker was the पहला member of the Libertarian Party on the ballot लिये senator in फ्लोरिडा 's history.
Satellite view of Doha
Doha (, ' or ', literally : `` the big tree '' ) is the capital city of the राज्य of Qatar.
Located on the coast of the Persian Gulf,
it had a population of 998,651 in 2008, and is also one of the municipalities of Qatar.
Doha is Qatar 's largest नगर, with over 60 % of the nation 's जनसांख्यिकी residing in Doha or its surrounding suburbs, और is also the economic centre of the country.
दोहा also serves as the seat of government of Qatar, which is शासित by शेख़ Hamad bin Khalifa al Thani.
Doha is home to the शिक्षा नगर, an area devoted to research and education.
Doha was the site of the पहला ministerial-level meeting of the Doha Development Round of संसार Trade Organization negotiations.
The city of Doha आयोजित the 2006 Asian Games, which was the largest Asian Games ever held.
Doha भी hosted the 2011 Pan Arab Games and सबसे of the खेल at the 2011 AFC एशियाई Cup.
Doha hosted the UNFCCC Climate Negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012 and होगा host a large number of the venues लिये the 2022 फीफा World Cup.
The World Petroleum Council held the 20th संसार पेट्रोलियम Conference in Doha in December 2011.
paranasal sinuses are a समूह of four paired air-filled spaces that surround the nasal cavity ( maxillary sinuses ), above the eyes ( frontal sinuses ), between the आँखें ( ethmoid sinuses ), and पीछे the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ).
The sinuses are named for the facial हड्डियों in which they are located.
Lean निर्माण, झुकना एंटरप्राइज़, or lean production, often simply, `` Lean, '' is a production practice that considers the व्यय of resources for any goal other than the creation of value for the end ग्राहक to be wasteful, and thus a target लिये elimination.
Working from the परिप्रेक्ष्य of the customer who consumes a product or service, `` value '' is defined as कोई action or process that a customer would be willing to pay for.
Essentially, lean is centered on preserving मान with less work.
Lean निर्माण is a प्रबन्धन philosophy derived mostly इससे the Toyota Production System ( TPS ) ( hence the term Toyotism is also प्रचलित ) और पहचाना as `` Lean '' तभी in the 1990s.
TPS is प्रसिद्ध लिये its focus on reduction of the original Toyota सात wastes to improve overall ग्राहक value, but there are varying perspectives on how this is best achieved.
The steady growth of Toyota, from a छोटी कम्पनी to the world 's largest automaker, has focused ध्यान on कैसा it has हासिल इस success.
iCarly logo
iCarly is an American sitcom कि airs on Nickelodeon, which premiered on September 8, 2007.
निकलोडियन promoted many episodes so far ऐसे as `` ido '', `` iHire an Idiot '', `` ipity the Nevel '', `` idate Sam & Freddie '', etc. as specials, despite their being regular episodes.
Every episode title begins with a lower case i which represents the internet, as in `` iCarly ''.
The show थी nominated for an Emmy award for Outstanding Children 's Program in 2009.
the series starring Miranda cosgrove as Carly Shay, a 13-year-old who becomes an Internet star.
The series ended on November 23, 2012 साथ the one-hour special episode `` iGoodbye ''.
A total of 7 seasons and 109 episodes were broadcast.
The largest audience of the series थी 11.2 लाख दर्शक, with the special episode `` iSaved Your Life '' premiered in January 2010.
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and उसके sassy best dost Sam ( Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at a school हुनर show audition, tech-savvy Freddie ( नाथन Kress ) tapes it and posts it online without telling उन्हें.
After seeing the लड़कियों ' strong रसायन और banter, the online audience clamors लिये अधिक and the iCarly वेबकास्ट is born.
While grappling साथ typical issues of adolescence, Carly, Sam, and Freddie find out कि they have also become online celebrities as their show – which सुविधाएँ talent contests, recipes, problem-solving, and random dancing – garners international accolades.
Carly lives in Seattle, Washington with her 26-year-old brother and guardian Spencer ( Jerry Trainor ) and produces the show in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in their apartment.
Their mother रै never महरूम seen or mentioned, but their father, Steven Shay ( David Chisum ), is a U.S. एयर फ़ोर्स officer temporarily stationed on a submarine, and is प्रायः mentioned but is only seen in person during the series finale episode, `` iGoodbye ''.
Westlife were an आयरिश boy बैंड which formed in 1998 और disbanded in 2012.
Originally signed by Simon Cowell and managed by Louis Walsh, the group 's final line-up consisted of Nicky Byrne, Kian Egan, Mark Feehily and Shane Filan.
Brian mcfadden was a member from 1998 until his departure in 2004.
westlife sold over 50 million records worldwide, a total that शामिल studio albums, singles, video releases, और compilation albums.
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the third-highest in uk history ), tying with Cliff Richard and ranking just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley.
वे achieved a total of 26 top ten singles over their 14-year करियर.
By 2010, Westlife was listed in the गिनीज World रिकॉर्ड, as the UK 's top-selling album group of the 21st century.
They also जीती The Record of the Year ( the तभी music award आधारित on पब्लिक votes in the UK ) a record-breaking four times and in 2012, the Official Charts Company listed Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music history.
despite their European and Asian success, westlife never managed to break into the U.S. market, achieving only one hit single in 2000 : `` कसम It Again ``.
In October 2011, Westlife announced their intention to विभाजित in 2012, following their महानतम Hits Tour and the release of their Greatest Hits album.
The boyband 's final कॉन्सर्ट were held on 22 and 23 June 2012 at croke पार्क Stadium in Dublin.
The first farewell concert, offering 85,000 tickets, sold आउट in a record-breaking 5 मिनट्स and the latter screened live in cinemas worldwide.
Vitamin a is a group of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons, जिससे include retinol, retinal, retinoic acid and अनेक provitamin A carotenoids among which beta-carotene is the most important.
Vitamin A has multiple functions, it is महत्वपूर्ण for growth and development, for the maintenance of the प्रतिरक्षा system and good vision.
विटामिन A is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of retinal, which combines with protein opsin to रूप rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule, कि is जरुरी for both low-light ( scotopic vision ) और color vision.
Vitamin A also functions in a very different role as an irreversibly oxidized form of retinol known as retinoic acid, which is an important hormone-like growth factor for epithelial और other cells.
in भोजन of animal origin, the प्रमुख रूप of vitamin A is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, which is converted to रेटिनॉल ( chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine.
The रेटिनॉल form functions as a storage form of the vitamin, and can be परिवर्तित to and from इसके visually active aldehyde form, retinal.
The associated acid ( retinoic acid ), a metabolite that can be irreversibly synthesized from vitamin A, रै only partial vitamin A activity, और does not function in the retina लिये the visual cycle.
Retinoic acid is used for growth और cellular differentiation.
All forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone ring to which an isoprenoid chain is attached, पुकारा a retinyl group.
Both structural features are essential लिये vitamin activity.
The orange pigment of carrots – beta-carotene – can be represented as two connected retinyl groups, which are used in the body to contribute to vitamin A levels.
Alpha-carotene और gamma-carotene also have a सिंगल retinyl group, which give them कुछ vitamin activity.
None of the other carotenes have vitamin activity.
the carotenoid शर्तa- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group and रै vitamin activity in humans.
Vitamin A can be मिला in two principal forms in भोजन :
रेटिनॉल, the form of vitamin A absorbed when eating animal food sources, is a पीला, fat-soluble substance.
Since the pure alcohol form is अस्थिर, the vitamin is found in ऊतकों in a form of retinyl ester.
It is also commercially produced and administered as esters such as retinyl acetate or palmitate.
The carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone rings ), but no other carotenoids, function as provitamin A in herbivores and omnivore animals, which possess the enzyme ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) जिससे cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol.
In general, carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, और pure carnivores such as cats और ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase and can नहीं convert कोई carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being forms of vitamin A for these species ).
Selena Marie Gomez ( born July 22, 1992 ) is an American singer और actress.
वो बना her debut as a चाइल्ड actress in Barney & Friends.
In 2007, Gomez came to prominence as a starring cast member in the television श्रेणी wizards of Waverly Place.
वो signed to Hollywood Records the following year, and became the संस्थापक and lead singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene.
Their studio albums चुंबन & Tell ( 2009 ), A Year Without Rain ( 2010 ), and When the Sun goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified सुनहरा by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) और have spawned Platinum-certified singles `` Naturally ``, `` Who Says ``, and `` प्रेम You like a प्रेम सोंग ``.
After the रिलीज of television films और their accompanying soundtracks, Gomez made her theatrical film डेब्यू in ramona and beezus in 2010 and starred in Monte Carlo in 2011.
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of waverly Place and the hiatus of Selena Gomez & the Scene in 2012, वो focused on her film career, serving as a voice actress in Hotel Transylvania और अभिनीत in Spring Breakers the following year.
Her debut solo album is tentatively scheduled to be released in summer 2013, and is preceded by इसके सीसे single `` Come & Get It ``.
Outside of her work in the entertainment उद्योग, गोमेज़ is involved in philanthropic activities through charity work and various social and environmental causes.
Tracie Monique Spencer ( born July 12, 1976 ) is an अमरीकी r & b and pop singer-songwriter, अभिनेत्री, and मॉडल.
sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of California and the seat of government of Sacramento County.
It is स्तिथ at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the अमरीकी River in the northern portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive सेंट्रल घाटी.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the 35th largest नगर in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural और economic center of the Sacramento metropolitan area which includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its महानगर area is the fourth largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया after the Greater लॉस Angeles Area, सैन Francisco Bay Area, और the San Diego metropolitan area, as well as the 25th largest in the United States.
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as अमेरिका 's most ethnically and racially integrated नगर in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the स्विस immigrant जॉन Sutter, Sr., his son John sutter, Jr., and जेम्स W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's Fort, which was स्थापित by Sutter in 1839.
During the California सुनहरा Rush, Sacramento was a major distribution point, a commercial और agricultural center, and a terminus लिये wagon trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony एक्स्प्रेस, and the First transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, Sacramento, अधिक commonly known as Sacramento State or Sac State, is the largest local university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य University प्रणाली.
Drexel विश्वविद्यालयों Sacramento is located in शहर, Sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge स्कूल of Law is स्तिथ in the ओक Park neighborhood.
In addition, the University of California, डेविस is located in nearby Davis, वेस्ट of the पूंजी.
The UC Davis Medical Center, a world-renowned research hospital, is located in the city of Sacramento.
Memorial Day is a United States federal holiday which occurs every year on the final Monday of May.
Memorial दिन is a day of remembering the men and women who died जबकि serving in the संयुक्त States Armed Forces.
Formerly known as Decoration Day, it originated after the American Civil War to commemorate the संघ and Confederate soldiers who died in the Civil War.
By the 20th century Memorial Day had been विस्तारित to honor सब Americans जो have died in all युद्धों.
It typically marks the start of the summer vacation season, while मजदूर Day marks its end.
अनेक people visit cemeteries और memorials, विशेषकर to सम्मान those who have died in सैन्य service.
Many volunteers place an American flag on each संगीन in नेशनल cemeteries.
By the early 20th century, मेमोरियल Day was an occasion for more general expressions of memory, as लोगों visited the graves of their मृतक relatives in church cemeteries, whether they था served in the military or not.
It भी became a long वीकेंड increasingly devoted to खरीदारी, family महफिलों, fireworks, trips to the beach, and national media events.
Annual Decoration Days for particular cemeteries are held on a Sunday in late spring or early summer in कुछ rural areas of the American दक्षिण, notably in the mountains.
in मामले involving a family graveyard जहाँ remote ancestors as खूब as those जो were deceased more recently are दफ्न, this may take on the character of an extended family reunion to which some people travel hundreds of miles.
People gather on the designated day and put पुष्प on graves and renew सम्पर्क साथ kinfolk and अन्य.
वहीँ often is a धार्मिक service and a `` dinner on the मैदान, '' the परंपरागत term for a potluck meal in which people प्रयुक्त to spread the बर्तन out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass.
It is believed that this practice began before the अमरीकी Civil War and thus may reflect the real origin of the `` memorial day '' विचार.
Memorial Day is नहीं to be उलझन साथ Veterans दिन ; Memorial दिन is a दिन of remembering the men and महिलाओं जो died while serving, जबकि Veterans Day मनाता the service of all U.S. सैन्य veterans, living or dead.
mt. Zion Church state history marker निकट Philadelphia, Mississippi.
Freedom गर्मियाँ ( also known as the Mississippi Summer Project ) was a campaign in the संयुक्त States launched in June 1964 to attempt to पंजीकरण as अनेक African American मतदाता as possible in Mississippi, जिससे था historically excluded सबसे अश्वेतों from voting.
The प्रोजेक्ट also set up dozens of Freedom स्कूलों, Freedom Houses, and जातियाँ centers in छोटी कस्बों throughout Mississippi to aid the local black population.
the project was व्यवस्थित by the परिषद of Federated संगठन ( COFO ), a coalition of the Mississippi शाखाओं of the four major civil rights organizations ( SNCC, CORE, NAACP and SCLC ).
Most of the impetus, leadership, and financing for the Summer प्रोजेक्ट came from the SNCC.
रॉबर्ट Parris Moses, SNCC field सचिव and co-director of COFO, directed the summer project.
Blues is the name given to both a musical form and a music विधा that originated in communities of primarily the `` Deep South `` of the United States around the end of the 19th century from spirituals, कार्य songs, फ़ील्ड hollers, shouts and chants, and rhymed simple narrative ballads.
The blues रूप, सर्वव्यापी in jazz, rhythm and blues, and rock and फेंकें is characterized by specific chord progressions, of which the twelve-bar ब्लूज़ chord progression is the most common.
the ब्लू notes that, for expressive purposes हैं सुंग or played flattened or gradually bent ( minor 3rd to major 3rd ) in relation to the pitch of the major scale, हैं भी an important भाग of the sound.
the ब्लूज़ genre is आधारित on the blues रूप but possesses other विशेषताएँ such as specific lyrics, bass lines, and instruments.
Blues can be subdivided into several subgenres ranging from country to urban blues that were more or less popular during different periods of the 20th century.
Best known are the Delta, piedmont, Jump, और Chicago blues styles.
World War II चिह्नित the transition from ध्वनिक to इलेक्ट्रिक ब्लूज़ and the progressive opening of blues music to a wider audience, especially white listeners.
In the 1960s और 1970s, a hybrid form पुकारा blues-rock evolved.
The term `` the blues '' refers to the `` blue devils '', meaning वेदना and sadness ; an early use of the term in this sense is found in George Colman 's one-act तमाशा Blue शैतानों ( 1798 ).
Though the उपयोग of the phrase in African-American music may be older, it has been attested to since 1912, जब हार्ट Wand 's `` Dallas Blues `` became the पहला copyrighted blues संयोजन.
In गीत the phrase is often प्रयुक्त to describe a depressed mood.
A quarter dollar, commonly shortened to quarter, is a coin लायक 1⁄4 of a United States डालर or 25 cents.
The quarter has been उत्पादित since 1796.
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination, as opposed to 20¢ जिससे is more आम in other parts of the world, originated साथ the practice of dividing Spanish Milled Dollars into eight wedge shaped खण्ड ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ).
At one time `` two bits ``, i.e. two wedges, each wedge an eighth, thus a quarter of the स्पेनी real, was a common nickname for a quarter.
Day of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican अवकाश celebrated throughout मैक्सिको और around the world in other cultures.
The holiday focuses on gatherings of family and friends to pray for और remember friends और family members जो have died.
It is particularly मनाये in मैक्सिको, जहाँ it is a national holiday, और सब banks are closed.
The जश्न takes place on November 1 and 2, in connection साथ the Catholic holidays of All Saints ' दिन and All Souls ' Day.
परंपराओं कनेक्ट with the holiday include building private altars honoring the deceased using शुगर skulls, marigolds, and the favorite foods and beverages of the departed and visiting graves with these as उपहार.
They also leave possessions of the deceased.
विद्वानों trace the origins of the आधुनिक Mexican holiday to स्वदेशी observances dating back hundreds of years और to an Aztec festival dedicated to the देवी Mictecacihuatl.
the holiday रै spread throughout the world : in Brazil, Dia de Finados is a public holiday कि अनेक Brazilians celebrate by visiting cemeteries and churches.
in Spain, there are त्यौहार and parades, and, at the समाप्त of the day, people एकत्रित at कब्रिस्तान और pray for their dead loved ones.
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe, and similarly themed celebrations appear in many Asian and अफ़्रीकी cultures.
ANITA Mk viii.
The ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators were launched simultaneously in late 1961 as the world 's first all- electronic desktop calculators.
Designed and built by the Bell Punch co.
in Britain, और marketed through इसके Sumlock Comptometer division, वे used vacuum tubes and cold-cathode switching tubes in उनके logic circuits and nixie tubes for उनके numerical displays.
They were the first of a series of desktop और hand-held electronic calculators कि the कम्पनी was to develop and sell under the ANITA name into the mid-1970s.
जार्ज Washington ( –, 1799 ) was the first President of the United राज्य ( 1789–1797 ), the commander-in-chief of the Continental Army during the अमरीकी Revolutionary War, and one of the Founding Fathers of the United States.
He presided over the सम्मेलन that drafted the Constitution, which replaced the Articles of Confederation and established the position of President.
Washington was elected President as the unanimous choice of the 69 निर्वाचक in 1788, और he served दो शर्तें in office.
He oversaw the creation of a strong, well-financed national government that maintained neutrality in the wars raging in Europe, suppressed rebellion, and जीती acceptance among Americans of all प्रकार.
His leadership style स्थापित many forms and संस्कार of government that have been प्रयुक्त since, such as using a cabinet प्रणाली and delivering an inaugural address.
Further, the शांतिपूर्ण transition from his presidency to the प्रेसिडेंसी of John Adams established a tradition that continues into the 21st century.
Washington was hailed as `` father of his country `` भी during his आजीवन.
वॉशिंगटन थी born into the provincial gentry of Colonial Virginia ; his wealthy planter परिवार owned तम्बाकू plantations and slaves.
After both his father and older brother died when he थी young, Washington became personally and professionally attached to the powerful William Fairfax, who प्रचारित his career as a surveyor and soldier.
Washington quickly became a senior अधिकारी in the colonial forces दौरान the first stages of the French और Indian War.
चुनी by the Second Continental Congress in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the Continental Army in the American Revolution, Washington managed to force the British out of Boston in 1776, but was defeated and almost captured later that year जब he खोया New York नगर.
After crossing the Delaware River in the dead of winter, he defeated the अंग्रेजों in two battles, retook New Jersey and restored momentum to the Patriot cause.
Because of उसके strategy, Revolutionary forces captured two major अंग्रेजों armies at Saratoga in 1777 और Yorktown in 1781.
Historians laud Washington for his selection and supervision of उसके generals, encouragement of morale and ability to hold together the army, coordination साथ the state governors and state militia units, relations with Congress and attention to supplies, logistics, and training.
In battle, however, Washington was repeatedly outmaneuvered by British generals with larger armies.
बाद victory had been finalized in 1783, वॉशिंगटन resigned as commander-in-chief rather than seize power, proving his opposition to dictatorship and उसके commitment to American republicanism.
Dissatisfied साथ the weaknesses of the Articles of Confederation, in 1787 Washington presided over the संवैधानिक Convention that drafted the United States Constitution.
निर्वाचित unanimously as the first President of the United States in 1789, he attempted to bring rival गिरोहों together to unify the nation.
he supported सिकंदर Hamilton 's कार्यक्रम to pay off सब state and national debt, to implement an effective कर system and to create a नेशनल bank ( despite opposition from Thomas जेफरसन ).
Washington proclaimed the United States neutral in the wars raging in यूरोपीय after 1793.
He avoided war with Great Britain and guaranteed a decade of सलाम and profitable trade by securing the Jay Treaty in 1795, despite intense विपक्ष from the Jeffersonians.
Although never officially joining the Federalist Party, he supported इसके programs.
Washington 's Farewell Address was an influential primer on republican virtue and a warning against partisanship, sectionalism, and भागीदारी in foreign युद्धों.
He रिटायर्ड from the presidency in 1797 और लौटे to his home, Mount Vernon, and उसके domestic life where he प्रबंधित a variety of enterprises.
He freed सब his slaves by his final होगा.
Washington had a दृष्टि of a ग्रेट and शक्तिशाली nation that होता be built on republican lines using संघीय power.
He sought to use the national government to preserve liberty, improve infrastructure, open the western lands, promote commerce, found a permanent capital, reduce क्षेत्रीय tensions and प्रचार a स्पिरिट of American nationalism.
at his death, Washington was eulogized as `` first in war, first in peace, and पहला in the hearts of his countrymen '' by Henry Lee.
The Federalists made him the प्रतीक of their party but लिये many years, the Jeffersonians continued to distrust his influence and delayed building the वॉशिंगटन Monument.
as the leader of the first successful क्रान्ति against a colonial साम्राज्य in world history, Washington became an international icon for liberation and राष्ट्रवाद, especially in France and Latin America.
Fiscal Year 2012 U.S. Federal बिता – Cash or बजट आधार.
Fiscal साल 2012 U.S. संघीय Receipts.
The Budget of the United States सरकारी often begins as the अध्यक्ष 's proposal to the U.S. Congress जिससे recommends funding levels for the next fiscal year, beginning October 1.
however, Congress is the body required by law to pass a बजट annually and to submit the budget passed by both houses to the President for signature.
congressional decisions are governed by rules and legislation regarding the federal budget प्रक्रम.
Budget समितियों set spending limits लिये the हाउस and Senate समितियों और for Appropriations subcommittees, which तब approve individual appropriations bills to allocate funding to various federal programs.
If Congress fails to pass an annual budget ( as has been the case since 2009 ), a series of Appropriations bills must be passed as `` stop gap '' measures.
After Congress approves an appropriations bill, it is sent to the President, who may sign it into law, or may veto it ( as he होता a budget when passed by the Congress ).
A vetoed bill is sent back to Congress, which can pass it into law with a two-thirds majority in प्रत्येक chamber.
Congress may also combine all or कुछ appropriations bills into an omnibus reconciliation bill.
In जोड, the अध्यक्ष may request and the कॉंग्रेस may pass supplemental appropriations bills or emergency supplemental appropriations bills.
अनेक government एजेंसियों provide बजट data और विश्लेषण.
These शामिल the Government Accountability Office ( gao ), Congressional Budget Office, the Office of Management and Budget ( OMB ) and the U.S. Treasury Department.
These agencies have reported that the federal government is facing a श्रेणी of important financing challenges.
In the short-run, tax revenues have declined significantly due to a severe recession and tax policy choices, जबकि expenditures have expanded for wars, unemployment insurance और other safety net spending.
In the long-run, expenditures related to healthcare programs such as Medicare and Medicaid are projected to grow faster than the economy overall as the जनसांख्यिकी matures.
New Guinea ( भी, Tok Pisin : Niugini, Dutch : nieuw गिनी, and ; historically : पापुआ ) is the world 's दूसरी largest island, बाद Greenland, covering a जमीन area of 786,000 km2.
Located in the दक्षिणपश्चिम Pacific समंदर, it lies geographically to the east of the Malay Archipelago, with जिससे it is sometimes included as part of a वृहद Indo-Australian Archipelago.
Geologically it is a part of the same tectonic plate as Australia.
When world sea levels were low, the two साझा shorelines ( which अभी lie 100 to 140 metres below sea level ), combining with lands now inundated into the tectonic continent of Sahul, भी known as Greater Australia.
The दो landmasses became separated when the area now known as the टोरेस Strait flooded बाद the end of the last glacial period.
Anthropologically, New Guinea is considered भाग of Melanesia.
Politically, the western हाफ of the island comprises two Indonesian provinces : पापुआ and West Papua.
The eastern half forms the मेनलैंड of the country of पापुआ New Guinea.
The island has a population of about 7.5 लाख, with a very low population density of तभी 8 inh/km2.
नई Guinea is differentiated from इसके drier, flatter, and less fertile दक्षिणी counterpart, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, by its much higher rainfall और इसके क्रियाशील volcanic geology, with its उच्चतम point, puncak jaya, reaching an उन्नयन of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ).
Yet the two जमीन masses share a similar animal fauna, with marsupials, including wallabies और possums, and the egg-laying monotreme, the spiny anteater, or echidna.
अन्य than bats and some two dozen indigenous rodent genera, there are no pre-human indigenous placental mammals.
Pigs, several additional species of rats, and the ancestor of the New Guinea Singing श्वान यहूद introduced with इंसान colonization.
the human presence on the island dates वापस at तनिक 40,000 सालो to the oldest human migrations out of Africa.
Research indicates कि the highlands were an जल्दी and independent center of agriculture, with प्रमाण of irrigation going वापस at least 10,000 सालो.
Because of the समय depth of its inhabitation and its highly fractured landscape, an unusually high number of languages are बोला on the island, with some 1,000 भाषाएं ( a figure उच्चतर than that of most continents ) having been catalogued out of an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian कुल of 6,000 human dialects.
सबसे are classified as Papuan languages, a generally accepted geographical term which a minority of लेखक hold to be a genetic एक.
A number of Austronesian languages are spoken on the coast and on offshore islands.
in the 16th century Spanish explorers खोजा the island and called it Nueva Guinea.
In हाल history western New Guinea was included in the Dutch ईस्ट Indies उपनिवेश.
The germans annexed the northern coast of the eastern half of the द्वीप as German New गिनी in their pre–World युद्ध I effort to establish themselves as a colonial power, whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain.
Following the Treaty of Versailles, the German portion was awarded to Australia ( which was already governing the अंग्रेजों अर्जी, named the Territory of Papua ) as a League of राष्ट्र mandate.
The eastern half of the island was granted independence from Australia as Papua नई Guinea in 1975.
The western half gained स्वतंत्रता from the Dutch in 1961, but became part of Indonesia soon afterwards in controversial हालातों.
`` The वैन buren Boys '' is the 148th एपीसोड of the sitcom Seinfeld, and name of a fictional New York street gang.
उनके sign is crossing the hands, with one hand with सब the fingers 'up ' and स्प्रेड out.
the other hand has all लकिन the thumb और pointer उंगली up, for a total of eight ( 8 ).
The gang is नामित for the 8th President of the United राज्य, Martin वैन Buren ( who was the first अध्यक्ष from New यॉर्क ).
This was the 14th एपीसोड लिये the 8th season.
It aired on फ़रवरी 6, 1997.
Bevo sign
Bevo was a non-alcoholic malt पेय, or निकट बियर, brewed in the United States by the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century.
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success during the time of prohibition, when बियर, wine and distilled liquors, यहूद made illegal for thirteen years.
The anheuser-busch कम्पनी started brewing bevo when alcoholic beverages यहूद prohibited in 1916 by the United States armed शक्तियां.
Production rose greatly साथ नेशनल prohibition in 1919, and bevo थी by far the most popular of the अनेक `` cereal beverages '' or `` near beers '' of the समय.
at the शिखर of its लोकप्रियता in the जल्दी 1920s, more than five लाख मामले of Bevo were sold annually.
renard साथ a mug of Bevo, depicted in terra cotta on the interior दीवारें of the Bevo भवन, St. Louis
Labels on the बोतलों billed it as `` Bevo the Beverage ''.
The name `` Bevo '' was coined from the word `` beverage '' and the Slavic language word for beer `` pivo '', and was pronounced `` Bee-vo ''.
Some Bevo advertising प्रदर्शित the character `` Renard the Fox `` ( आधारित on the protagonist of a medieval French folk-tale ), and promotional मग with this character were manufactured.
in 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a series of boat-bodied cars in its St. Louis shops called the `` bevo Boats '' which were प्रयुक्त लिये promotion.
Seven are believed to have been built on Pierce-Arrow 8-cylinder chassis while one surviving उदाहरण was based upon 1930 कैडिलैक 353 V8.
बिलबोर्ड advertising Bevo in Trenton, नई Jersey, 1917
A contemporary advertisement read `` Cooling and invigorating, Bevo the Beverage.
Order by the case from अपना पंसारी, druggist, or डीलर. ''
The paper label on the वापस of the बोतल read `` The All-Year-Round Soft Drink.
Appetizing - Healthful - Nutritious - Refreshing.
Milk or water may contain जीवाणु.
BEVO never does. ''
Bevo became part of the लोकप्रिय culture of the समय, and is mentioned in various popular songs and Vaudeville skits of the era.
This led to द्वितीयक slang uses of the word ; लिये example, in American सैन्य slang a यंग and अनुभवहीन अधिकारी was called a `` Bevo ''.
the University of टेक्सास named its mascot `` Bevo '', a नाम which has stuck to this day.
Irving Berlin included a paean to the पेय, `` तुम Ca n't Stay Up on Bevo '', in उसके 1917 army revue, Yip Yip Yaphank.
In the late 1920s smuggled bootleg बियर और liquor as well as `` homebrew ``, काटें into Bevo 's marketshare.
With sales flattening to 100,000 cases by 1929, Anheuser-Busch रोका production.
The Bevo Mill, St. Louis, in 2008
the Bevo भवन, with the renard character prominently प्रदर्शित at the corners, still operates as a bottling facility at उनके main brewery in St. Louis, Missouri.
the landmark Bevo Mill, constructed by August Anheuser Busch, sr. in 1917.
It थी closed in 2009, लकिन it reopened in October 2009 under नई स्वामी.
Bevo is also mentioned in the छोटी story `` The Killers `` by अर्नेस्ट Hemingway ; as well as in babbitt by Sinclair लुईस.

A कांच of pasteurized cow milk
मिल्क is a white liquid produced by the mammary glands of mammals.
it is the primary source of nutrition for young mammals before they are able to digest other types of food.
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum, which carries the माँ 's antibodies to the baby और can reduce the risk of many रोगों in the baby.
It भी contains many other nutrients.
As an agricultural product, milk is निकाली from mammals और used as food लिये इंसानो.
Worldwide, dairy farms produced about 730 लाख tonnes of मिल्क in 2011.
India is the world 's largest producer and उपभोक्ता of मिल्क, yet neither exports nor imports मिल्क.
New Zealand, the European Union 's 27 member states, Australia, and the United States हैं the world 's largest निर्यातक of milk and milk products.
China and रूस are the world 's largest importers of milk and milk products.
Throughout the world, there are more than 6 billion consumers of मिल्क और milk products.
Over 750 million people live within dairy खेती households.
Milk is a key contributor to improving nutrition and food security particularly in विकासशील countries.
Improvements in livestock and दुग्ध प्रौद्योगिकी offer significant promise in reducing poverty and malnutrition in the world.
Motorcycle स्पीडवे, usually referred to as speedway, is a motorcycle sport involving four and sometimes up to six राइडर्स competing over four anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit.
Speedway मोटरसाइकिल use only one gear and have no brakes and racing takes place on a flat oval track usually consisting of मैल or loosely packed shale.
Competitors use this surface to slide उनके machines बगलों, powersliding or broadsiding into the bends.
On the straight sections of the track the motorcycles reach speeds of up.
the exact origins of the sport are unknown but there is evidence of a type of speedway racing being practised in the USA before the First World युद्ध and in Australia in the late 1910s and early 1920s.
There are अभी both domestic and international competitions in a number of countries including the Speedway World Cup whilst the highest overall स्कोरिंग individual in the Speedway Grand Prix events is pronounced the world champion.
Speedway is popular in सेंट्रल and northern यूरोपीय and to a lesser extent in Australia and North America.
A रूपांतर of track racing, speedway is administered internationally by the fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme ( fim ).
घरेलू speedway events are regulated by FIM affiliated नेशनल मोटर खेल federations.
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible for intestinal absorption of calcium and फास्फेट.
In humans, the most important related compounds of vitamin d are vitamin d2 and vitamin D3.
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin d3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 ) हैं unique as they constitute what we जान as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
the body can also synthesize vitamin D ( from cholesterol ) when sun exposure is adequate ( hence its nickname, the `` sunshine विटामिन '' ).
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin, it is not actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict भाव, as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most स्तनधारियों exposed to sunlight.
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize vitamin D efficiently and must receive it in their diet. )
An सशुल्क chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically called a विटामिन when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from their diet.
However, as with other यौगिकों commonly called vitamins, vitamin D was discovered in an प्रयत्न to find the dietary पदार्थ that was lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the childhood form of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like अन्य compounds called vitamins, in the developed world vitamin D is added to staple foods, such as milk, to avoid बीमारी due to deficiency.
उपायों of serum स्तर प्रतिबिंबित endogenous संश्लेषण from exposure to sunlight as well as intake इससे the diet, and it is believed कि संश्लेषण may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations.
the evidence indicates कि the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop कि prevents toxicity but, because of uncertainty about the cancer risk इससे sunlight, no recommendations are issued by the Institute of Medicine, USA, for the राशि of सूर्य exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements.
Accordingly, the Dietary Reference intakes लिये vitamin D assume that no synthesis occurs and that सब of a person 's vitamin D is from their आहार, although that होगा rarely occur in practice.
In the liver vitamin D is परिवर्तित to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific विटामिन D metabolite कि is measured in serum to determine a व्यक्ति 's vitamin D status.
Part of the calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of विटामिन D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood, regulating the विशेषज्ञता of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream और promoting the healthy विकास and remodeling of bone.
calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys लिये other purposes, such as the proliferation, differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular फलन and inflammation.
Beyond its उपयोग to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the प्रमाण for other स्वास्थ्य effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
The best evidence of benefit is for bone health and a decrease in मृत्यु in elderly women.

The 6.6-liter Duramax is उत्पादित by DMAX, a joint venture between gm and Isuzu in Moraine, Ohio.

In 2006, production at Moraine थी reportedly limited to approximately 200,000 engines per year.

Balto ( 1919 – कूच 14, 1933 ) was a Siberian Husky sled श्वान who led उसके team on the final leg of the 1925 सीरम run to Nome, in which diphtheria antitoxin was transported from Anchorage, Alaska, to Nenana, अलास्का, by train and then to nome by श्वान sled to कॉम्बैट an outbreak of the disease.
The चलाएं is commemorated by the annual Iditarod Trail sled श्वान Race.
Balto थी named after the Sami explorer सैमुएल Balto.
Balto died at the age of 14.

The origins of the उच्चिष्ट began in July 1976 as the Datsun 810, an upscale six-cylinder version of the Bluebird, and was spun into its अपना line in 1981, having been made continuously since then.
the `` Maxima '' name was applied धीरे, beginning in 1981.

Propolis as hive sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture that मधु bees collect इससे tree buds, sap flows, or अन्य botanical स्त्रोत.
It is used as a sealant for unwanted open spaces in the hive.
Propolis is used लिये small gaps ( approximately or less ), जबकि larger spaces are usually filled with beeswax.
Its color varies depending on इसके वनस्पति source, the most common being अंधेरा brown.
Propolis is sticky at और above रूम तापमान,.
At lower temperatures, it becomes hard और very brittle.
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; कूच 26, 1948 ) is an American सिंगर, songwriter, और multi-instrumentalist, बेहतरीन known as the frontman and lead singer of the Boston -based चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ, in which he also plays the harmonica, और occasional piano and percussion.
He is known as the `` Demon of Screamin ' '' due to his high screams और his wide गायन range.
he is also known for उसके on-stage acrobatics.
During his high-energy performances, he प्रायः dresses in उज्जवल, रंगीन outfits with his trademark scarves hanging from उसके microphone स्टैंड.
In the 1970s, Tyler rose to prominence as the frontman of Aerosmith, जिससे released such पड़ाव hard rock albums as खिलौने in the Attic and Rocks.
in the लेट 1970s और early 1980s, Tyler had a heavy drug and alcohol addiction, and the band 's popularity waned.
He completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently maintained sobriety for over 20 years, but had a relapse साथ prescription painkillers in the लेट 2000s, for which he successfully received treatment in 2009.
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late 1980s and early 1990s with the albums Permanent Vacation, Pump, and Get a Grip, टायलर became a household नाम and has remained a relevant rock icon.
As a result, he रै since embarked on several सोलो endeavors including guest appearances on other artists ' music, फिल्मी and TV roles ( including as a judge on American Idol ), authoring a bestselling किताब, और solo कार्य ( सहित a Top 40 hit single in 2011 ).
However, he रै continued to रिकार्ड music and perform with एरोस्मिथ, बाद more than 43 सालो in the बैंड.
the बैंड 's latest album, Music from Another आयाम !
, was released on नवम्बर 6, 2012.
Tyler is शामिल among रोलिंग Stones 100 Greatest Singers.
He was also ranked 3rd on Hit Parader 's Top 100 Metal Vocalists of All Time.
In 2001 he was inducted into the चट्टान and Roll Hall of Fame साथ Aerosmith, and he was the presenter जब AC/DC थी inducted into the Hall of कीर्ति in 2003.
In 2013, Tyler and उसके songwriting partner Joe Perry will be प्राप्तकर्ता of the ASCAP Founders Award and will also be inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame.
The liver produces urea in the यूरिया cycle as a waste उत्पाद of the पाचन of protein.
सामान्य इंसान adult blood should contain between 7 to 21 mg of यूरिया nitrogen प्रति 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood.

The यहूदियों ( ISO 259-3 Israeli उच्चारण ), also known as the यहूदी people, हैं a nation and an ethnoreligious group, originating in the Israelites or Hebrews of the Ancient Near East.
the Jewish ethnicity, nationality, and religion are strongly interrelated, as Judaism is the traditional faith of the यहूदी nation.
converts to Judaism, जिनकी status as Jews within the Jewish ethnos is बराबर to those born into it, have been absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the millennia.
in Jewish परंपरा, Jewish ancestry is traced to the biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac and Jacob in the second millennium BCE.
the modern State of Israel was established as a Jewish nation-state, और defines itself as such in its मौलिक Laws.
Its Law of Return grants the right of citizenship to any Jew who requests it.
Israel is the only country where Jews हैं a majority of the जनसांख्यिकी.
Jews also enjoyed political autonomy twice पहले in ancient history.
the first of these periods lasted from 1350 to 586 BCE, and encompassed the अवधि of the Judges, the संयुक्त Monarchy, and the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of Israel and Judah, ending with the destruction of the First Temple.
The second was the period of the Hasmonean Kingdom spanning इससे 140 to 37 BCE.
Since the destruction of the First Temple, सबसे Jews have lived in diaspora.
A अल्पसंख्यक in every देश in which they live ( except Israel ), they have अक्सर अनुभवी persecution throughout history, resulting in a population कि has fluctuated both in संख्याएँ और distribution over the centuries.
The world Jewish population reached a peak of 15 million prior to the Second संसार War, लकिन six million Jews were killed in the Holocaust.
Since then the जनसांख्यिकी रै risen again and, was estimated at 13.4 लाख by the North American Jewish Data Bank, or less than 0.2 % of the total world population ( roughly one in every 514 people ).
according to this report, about 42.5 % of all Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ), and 39.3 % in the United States ( 5.3 million ), with most of the शेष living in Europe ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ).
These numbers include all those who consider themselves Jews, whether or not they are affiliated with a Jewish organization.
The total world Jewish population, however, is मुश्किल to माप.
In addition to issues with census methodology, there are halakhic disputes regarding who is a Jew and secular, political, और ancestral identification कारकों कि may affect the figure considerably.

Corpus Domini redirects here.
For other uses see Corpus Domini ( disambiguation )
The feast of Corpus Christi ( Latin for Body of Christ ), also known as कॉर्पस Domini, is a Latin Rite liturgical solemnity celebrating the tradition and belief in the देह and blood of यीशु Christ और his Real Presence in the Eucharist.
It emphasizes the joy of the institution of the Eucharist, which was observed on Holy गुरुवार in the somber atmosphere of the nearness of Good Friday.
In the present Roman Missal, the feast is designated the solemnity of the Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ.
it is also celebrated in some Anglican, Lutheran, and Old Catholic Churches that hold similar beliefs regarding the Real उपस्थिति.
The feast is liturgically celebrated on the Thursday after Trinity Sunday or, `` जहाँ the Solemnity of the सबसे Holy Body and रक्त of Christ is not a Holy Day of Obligation, it is assigned to the Sunday after the Most पावन Trinity as its proper day ''.
at the समाप्त of पावन Mass, वहीँ is प्रायः a बारात of the Blessed sacrament, generally displayed in a monstrance.
The procession is followed by Benediction of the Blessed Sacrament.
A notable Eucharistic बारात is that presided over by the Pope प्रत्येक year in Rome, where it begins at the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran और makes its रास्ता to the Basilica of Saint Mary Major, जहाँ it concludes with Benediction.
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood, the levels of which rise in response to inflammation ( i.e. C-reactive protein is an acute-phase protein ).
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the surface of मुर्दे or dying cells ( and some types of bacteria ) in order to activate the complement प्रणाली via the C1Q complex.
CRP is synthesized by the liver in जवाब to factors released by macrophages और fat cells ( adipocytes ).
It is a member of the pentraxin family of प्रोटीन.
It is not related to C-peptide or protein C.
C-reactive protein was the first pattern recognition receptor ( PRR ) to be identified.
The start of the systematic European colonization of the Americas is typically दिनाँक to 1492, when a Spanish expedition headed by Christopher Columbus sailed लिये इण्डिया to खोलें trade but inadvertently discovered the Americas.
European conquest, large-scale exploration and colonization जल्द followed.
Seeing that Europe was preoccupied with many internal wars और was slowly recovering from the many मौतों कि the bubonic plague caused, the रैपिड expansion at which it grew in wealth और शक्ति was unforeseeable in the early 1400s.
The first रिझाने occurred along the caribbean coasts on the islands of Hispaniola, प्यूर्टो Rico और क्यूबा, और बाद 1500 extended into the interiors of both North and South America.
In 1497, sailing from the north on behalf of इंग्लैण्ड, John Cabot उतरा on the उत्तर अमरीकी coast, and a year later, Columbus 's third voyage reached the South American coast.
France founded colonies in much of eastern North America, on a क्रमांक of Caribbean islands, और in South America.
Portugal colonized ब्राज़ील.
Eventually, the entire पश्चिमी Hemisphere came under the control of यूरोपीय governments, leading to profound परिवर्तन to its landscape, population, and plant and animal life.
in the 19th century alone over 50 million people left Europe for the Americas.
The post-1492 era is known as the period of the Columbian एक्सचेंज.
कैथ Richards ( born 18 December 1943 ) is an English संगीतकार, singer-songwriter और founder member of the English rock band the रोलिंग Stones.
रोलिंग Stone magazine कहा Richards had निर्मित `` चट्टान 's greatest single body of riffs '', ranking उसे 4th on its list of 100 best guitarists.

Testosterone is a steroid hormone from the androgen group and is मिला in mammals, reptiles, birds, and अन्य vertebrates.
in mammals, testosterone is primarily secreted in the testicles of males and the ovaries of females, हालांकि small amounts are also secreted by the adrenal glands.
It is the principal male sex hormone और an anabolic steroid.
In men, testosterone plays a कुंजी role in the development of male reproductive tissues such as the testis और prostate as well as promoting द्वितीयक sexual विशेषताएँ ऐसे as increased muscle, bone mass, और the growth of body hair.
In addition, टेस्टोस्टेरोन is essential for health and well-being as खूब as the रोकथाम of osteoporosis.
on औसत, in adult human males, the प्लाज्मा concentration of testosterone is about 7–8 times as great as the concentration in adult इंसान females ' plasma, but as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in males is greater, the रोज़ production is about 20 times वृहद in men.
महिलाओं also हैं more sensitive to the hormone.
टेस्टोस्टेरोन is observed in most vertebrates.
Fish make a slightly different form called 11-ketotestosterone.
Its counterpart in insects is ecdysone.
These ubiquitous steroids सुझाएँ that sex हार्मोन have an प्राचीन evolutionary history.
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used when `` natural '' but अपेक्षाकृत homogeneous groupings are evident in a statistical population.
it is often used in marketing research.
In इस technique, the total population is divided into these groups ( or clusters ) and a simple यादृच्छिक sample of the groups is selected.
Then the required information is collected इससे a simple random sample of the तत्व within प्रत्येक selected group.
This may be done लिये every element in these groups or a subsample of elements may be selected within each of ये groups.
A आम motivation for cluster sampling is to reduce the total number of interviews and costs given the desired accuracy.
Assuming a fixed नमूना size, the तकनीक देता more accurate परिणाम when most of the विभिन्नता in the population is within the groups, not between them.

The population was 3,382 at the 2010 census.

Copper is a chemical element साथ the symbol Cu ( from ) and atomic number 29.
It is a ductile मेटल साथ बहुत high thermal और electrical conductivity.
pure copper is soft and malleable ; a freshly exposed surface has a reddish-orange color.
It is used as a कंडक्टर of heat and electricity, a building material, and a constituent of various metal alloys.
The metal and its alloys have been used for हज़ारों of years.
in the Roman era, copper was principally mined on Cyprus, hence the origin of the name of the मेटल as сyprium ( मेटल of Cyprus ), later shortened to сuprum.
Its यौगिकों are commonly encountered as copper ( II ) salts, which often impart ब्लू or green colors to खनिज such as azurite and turquoise and have been widely used historically as pigments.
Architectural structures built with copper corrode to दे green verdigris ( or patina ).
सजावटी आर्ट prominently features copper, both by itself and as part of pigments.
Copper is essential to सब living organisms as a trace dietary खनिज because it is a key constituent of the respiratory enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase.
In molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent of the रक्त pigment hemocyanin, which is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin in fish and other vertebrates.
the main areas जहाँ तांबे is found in vertebrates are liver, muscle and bone.
In sufficient concentration, copper compounds are poisonous to higher organisms and are used as bacteriostatic substances, fungicides, and wood preservatives.
The major professional sports leagues, or simply प्रमुख leagues, in the संयुक्त States and Canada are the highest पेशेवर competitions of team sports in the two countries.
Although individual sports such as golf, tennis, and auto racing are भी very popular, the term is usually सीमित to team खेल.
the term `` major league '' was पहला used in 1921 in reference to Major लीग Baseball ( MLB ), the शीर्ष level of professional American baseball.
Today, the प्रमुख northern North अमेरिका professional team खेल leagues हैं Major League Baseball ( MLB ), the National Basketball Association ( एनबीए ), the National Football League ( NFL ), और the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
Other notable leagues शामिल Major League Soccer ( MLS ), the Canadian Football League ( cfl ), the Arena Football League, Major League Lacrosse, the National Lacrosse League and the महिलाओं 's National Basketball Association.
The NFL, MLB, NBA, and NHL are commonly referred to as the Big Four.
Each of these is the richest professional club competition in its sport worldwide.
the best players can become सांस्कृतिक icons in both countries और elsewhere in the world, because the leagues enjoy a significant प्लेस in लोकप्रिय culture in the US and कनाडा.
The एनएफएल has 32 टीमों, और the others have 30 each.
the विशाल majority of major league teams are concentrated in the most populous महानगर areas of the United राज्य.
Baseball, football, हॉकी, and सॉकर have had professional leagues for over 100 years ; early leagues such as the National Association, Ohio League, and National Hockey Association formed the basis of the modern एमएलबी, NFL and NHL respectively.
Soccer was first professionalized in 1894, but लीग suffered greatly इससे कमी of स्थिरता and seldom lasted अधिक than a decade.
सॉकर 's महानतम successes were in the form of the American सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ), the original North American Soccer League ( 1968-1984 ), the National Professional Soccer लीग ( 1984-2001 ) और, currently, Major लीग Soccer ( 1996-present ).
Basketball is a relatively new development ; the NBA evolved इससे the National Basketball League and its splinter group the Basketball संघ of America, taking on its current रूप in 1949.
Every major league averages 15,000 fans in attendance per game or उच्चतर as of 2011.
Meridian Altitude is an खगोलीय navigation method of calculating an observer 's latitude.
Earned मान management ( EVM ), or अर्जित value project/performance management ( EVPM ) is a project प्रबन्धन technique लिये measuring project performance और progress in an objective manner.
Because EVM रै the ability to combine माप of :
scope
अनुसूची
and cost,
in a single एकीकृत system, Earned Value Management is able to provide accurate forecasts of project performance problems, which is an important contribution for project management.
Early EVM research showed that the areas of planning and control are significantly impacted by its use ; and similarly, using the methodology improves both scope definition as well as the analysis of overall प्रोजेक्ट performance.
More हाल research अध्ययन have shown that the principles of evm are positive predictors of project success.
Popularity of EVM has grown significantly in recent years परे government contracting, in जिससे sector its importance continues to rise ( e.g., हाल new dfar नियम ), in भाग because EVM can also surface in and सहायता substantiate contract विवादों.

Spring is one of the four conventional temperate seasons, following winter and preceding summer.
There are various technical परिभाषाएं of spring, but local usage of the term varies according to local जलवायु, cultures and customs.
When it is spring in the northern hemisphere, it होगा be autumn in the southern hemisphere.
At the spring विषुव, days are close to 12 hours long with day length increasing as the ऋतु progresses.
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season, and also to ideas of rebirth, rejuvenation, renewal, resurrection, and regrowth, with festivals such as Carnival, Easter and Holi being celebrated at this time.
Jamestown was a settlement in the Colony of Virginia, the first permanent English उपनिवेश in the Americas.
Established by the Virginia Company of लंदन as `` James Fort '' on may 14, 1607 ( O.S., may 24, 1607 N.S. ), it followed several पहले failed attempts, including the Lost Colony of Roanoke.
Jamestown served as the पूंजी of the colony लिये 83 years, from 1616 until 1699.
the settlement was located within the territory of a राजनैतिक entity ज्ञात as Tsenacommacah, the state of the Powhatan confederacy, with around 14,000 native inhabitants, and specifically थी in part of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe.
The natives initially सत्कार the colonists साथ नाचना, feasting and tobacco ceremonies, and they provided crucial provisions and support for the अस्तित्व of the colonists, who were नहीं agriculturally inclined, although relations with the newcomers also soured fairly जल्दी on, leading to the total annihilation of the Paspahegh in warfare within 3 years.
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding, the Virginia Company brought Polish and Dutch colonists to help improve the settlement.
In 1619, the first documented Africans were brought to Jamestown, though the modern conception of slavery in the future United राज्य did not begin in Virginia until 1660.
When the colony was subdivided into the original आठ shires of वर्जिनिया in 1634, the town became located in the eponymous James City Shire.
the लंदन कम्पनी 's second उपनिवेश, Bermuda, claims to be the साईट of the oldest town in the English नई World, as St. George 's, Bermuda थी officially established ( as New London ) in 1612, whereas James Fort, in Virginia, was not to be converted into James towne जबतक 1619, and further did not survive into the present day.
In 1699, the capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is today Williamsburg, after जिससे Jamestown ceased to exist as a settlement, existing today only as an archaeological साईट.
Today, jamestown is one of तीन locations comprising the Historic Triangle of Colonial Virginia, along with Williamsburg and Yorktown, with two primary heritage sites.
Historic Jamestowne, the archaeological site on jamestown Island, is a cooperative effort by Jamestown नेशनल Historic साईट ( part of औपनिवेशिक National Historical Park ), and Preservation Virginia.
The Jamestown Settlement, a living history interpretive site, is operated by the jamestown Yorktown Foundation in conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia.

Deere & Company, most commonly known by its नाम John Deere, is an अमरीकी corporation based in Moline, Illinois, and one of the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in the world.
In 2012, it थी सूचीबद्ध as 97th in the सौभाग्य 500 अमेरिका 's ranking and 190th in the Fortune 500 Global ranking.
deere and Company agricultural products, sold under the जॉन Deere name, include tractors, combine harvesters, cotton harvesters, balers, planters / seeders, sprayers, and UTVs.
The company is also a manufacturer of निर्माण equipment and वानिकी equipment, as well as a supplier of diesel engines और drivetrains ( axles, transmissions, gearboxes ) प्रयुक्त in heavy equipment.
additionally, John deere manufactures equipment used in lawn, grounds, और turf care, such as walk-behind lawn mowers, zero-turn लॉन mowers, lawn tractors, और snowthrowers.
To support the core businesses, John Deere also provides financial services and other related activities.
the company 's slogan is `` nothing Runs Like a deere '' and has a चित्र of a leaping deer as a logo, a word play pun on `` nothing runs जैसे a deer ''.
कार्ल westby coined the phrase `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' for a विपणन campaign to बेचें snowmobiles.
the company 's उत्पाद are also identifiable by its distinctive shade of green paint, usually augmented by yellow trim.
The संयुक्त राज्य ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States करेंसी.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander हैमिल्टन, is फिलहाल featured on the obverse of the विधेयक, जबकि the U.S. राजकोष Building is featured on the रिवर्स.
( हैमिल्टन is one of two non-presidents प्रदर्शित on currently issued U.S. bills.
The other is Benjamin Franklin, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is एक of only चार people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who was not born in the continental United States, as he was इससे the West Indies.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष Note ) ; and Robert मॉरिस, England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ).
In addition, Kamehameha I, appears on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter. )
All $ 10 बिल्स जारी today are संघीय Reserve Notes.
the ब्यूरो of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 10 विधेयक in circulation is 18 months पहले it is replaced due to wear.
Approximately 6 % of all US banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills are delivered by Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps.
the source of the फेस on the $ 10 bill is John trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait संग्रहण of New York City Hall.
the $ 10 विधेयक is the only U.S. पेपर currency in circulation in जिससे the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 विधेयक featured a portrait of Woodrow विल्सन facing to the left, लकिन थी प्रयुक्त तभी for intra-government transactions ).

She has lived in ऑस्ट्रेलिया since 1992, when वो married Steve इरविन.

Heliocentrism, or heliocentricism, is the astronomical model in which the Earth and planets revolve around a relatively stationary सूर्य at the center of the Solar प्रणाली.
The शब्द comes from the Greek ( helios `` सूर्य '' और kentron `` center '' ).
Historically, heliocentrism was opposed to geocentrism, which placed the Earth at the center.
The notion that the Earth revolves around the सूर्य had been proposed as early as the 3rd सदी BC by Aristarchus of Samos, लकिन Aristarchus 's heliocentrism attracted little attention until Copernicus revived and elaborated it.
Lucio Russo, however, argues that this is a भ्रामक impression resulting from the loss of वैज्ञानिक works of the hellenistic Era.
Using indirect evidence he argues that a heliocentric view was expounded in Hipparchus 's work on gravity.
It was नहीं until the 16th सदी that a fully predictive गणितीय मॉडल of a heliocentric system was प्रस्तुत, by the पुनर्जागरण mathematician, astronomer, and Catholic cleric Nicolaus कोपरनिकस of Poland, leading to the Copernican Revolution.
In the following सदी, Johannes Kepler elaborated upon और expanded इस model to include अंडाकार orbits, and supporting observations made using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei.
With the observations of William Herschel, Friedrich Bessel, और others, astronomers realized that the sun was not the center of the ब्रह्मांड and by the 1920s Edwin Hubble था दिखाया that it was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way ) that was तभी one of many अरबों.
Norah Jones ( born Geetali Norah Jones Shankar ; March 30, 1979 ) is an American singer-songwriter, pianist, and actress.
She is the daughter of Indian sitar player रवि Shankar and Sue Jones.
She is also Anoushka Shankar 's half-sister.
In 2002, she शुभारम्भ her solo music करियर साथ the release of the commercially successful and critically acclaimed album Come Away साथ Me, a fusion of country म्यूज़िक और pop with तत्व of jazz which was certified diamond album, selling over 26 million नक़ल.
The रिकार्ड earned Jones five Grammy पुरस्कार, सहित the Album of the Year, Record of the Year, and Best नई Artist.
Her subsequent studio एल्बम, Feels Like Home, released in 2004, Not too Late, released in 2007, the same year she made her film debut in My Blueberry Nights, and her 2009 release the पतन all gained Platinum status, selling over a million copies and were generally खूब received by critics.
Jones ' पांचवां studio album, Little Broken दिल, was released on April 27, 2012.
Jones has जीती nine ग्रैमी Awards and was 60th on Billboard magazine 's artists of the 2000–2009 decade chart.
Throughout her करियर, Jones has won numerous awards and रै sold अधिक than 50 million albums worldwide.
बिलबोर्ड named her the top jazz कलाकार of the 2000–2009 decade.
Not to be confused साथ Dimension of a physical quantity.
For other uses, see Dimension ( disambiguation ).
From बाएँ to right, the square, the cube, and the tesseract.
The square is bounded by 1-dimensional लाइनों, the cube by 2-dimensional areas, and the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes.
A projection of the cube is given since it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen.
The same applies to the tesseract, which additionally can तभी be दिखाया as a projection भी in three-dimensional space.
A diagram showing the first four spatial dimensions.
in physics and गणित, the dimension of a स्पेस or ऑब्जेक्ट is informally defined as the minimum number of coordinates needed to बताएँ any point भीतर it.
Thus a line has a dimension of one क्युकी only one coordinate is needed to specify a point on it ( लिये example, the point at 5 on a number लकीर ).
A surface such as a plane or the surface of a cylinder or sphere रै a dimension of two because two coordinates are needed to specify a point on it ( for example, to locate a point on the सतह of a sphere you need दोनो इसके latitude and its longitude ).
The inside of a cube, a cylinder or a sphere is three-dimensional because three निर्देशांक are needed to locate a पाइंट within ये spaces.
In physical terms, आयाम refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume ) और its स्थिति in time ( आभास as a अदिश dimension along the t-axis ), as well as the spatial constitution of objects within—structures that correlate with both particle and फ़ील्ड conceptions, interact according to relative properties of द्रव्यमान —and हैं fundamentally mathematical in description.
These, or other axes, may be referenced to uniquely identify a point or structure in इसके attitude और relationship to other objects and occurrences.
शारीरिक theories that incorporate time, such as general आपेक्षिकता, are said to कार्य in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``, ( defined as a Minkowski space ).
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' including quantum field and string theories.
The state-space of quantum mechanics is an infinite-dimensional function space.
The अवधारणा of आयाम is not restricted to physical वस्तुएँ.
High-dimensional स्पेसेस occur in mathematics and the sciences for many reasons, frequently as configuration spaces such as in Lagrangian or Hamiltonian यांत्रिकी ; ये are abstract spaces, independent of the physical space we सजीव in.
fontana ( ) is a city of 200,762 residents in San Bernardino County, California.
Founded in 1913, it remained essentially ग्रामीण जबतक World War ii, जब entrepreneur Henry J. Kaiser built a large steel मिल in the क्षेत्रफल.
It is now a regional हब of the trucking industry, with Interstate 10 and राज्य Route 210 transecting the city from ईस्ट to west, and Interstate 15 passing diagonally through its northwestern quadrant.
It is home to the largest of the San bernardino County system libraries, a renovated ऐतिहासिक theater, a municipal park, and the स्वचालित Club Speedway on the site of the Kaiser स्टील Mill.
Fontana भी hosts the Fontana दिनों Half Marathon और 5K run.
This race is the fastest half-marathon course in the world.
The U.S. 2012 Census reported that Fontana 's population was 200,762 in 2012, making it the second most populous city in San Bernardino county काउंटी and 14th in the state.
Cowboys Stadium is a स्टेडियम साथ a retractable roof in Arlington, Texas.
It serves as the घर of the National फ़ुटबॉल League 's Dallas Cowboys.
it replaced the partially covered टेक्सास Stadium, which opened in 1971, and served as the Cowboys ' home through the 2008 season.
It was समाप्त on May 27, 2009.
The stadium seats 85,000, making it the third largest stadium in the NFL by seating capacity.
The maximum क्षमता of the stadium, including standing room, is 105,000.
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections are पीछे seats in each end मण्डल and on a श्रेणी of six elevated platforms connected by stairways.
It has the world 's largest column-free interior and the fourth largest high definition video स्क्रीन, which hangs from 20 यार्ड line to 20 यार्ड लकीर.
the सुविधा can also be used for a variety of other activities outside of its main purpose ( पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल ) such as concerts, basketball games, boxing matches, college फ़ुटबॉल and high school football contests, soccer matches, and motocross races.
Canadian historians until the 1980s tended to focus on economic history, including labour history.
In part this is क्युकी कनाडा has had far fewer political or military conflicts than अन्य societies.
This was विशेषकर सच्चा in the first हाफ of the twentieth century when economic history was overwhelmingly dominant.
Many of the most prominent English Canadian historians from this काल यहूद आर्थिक इतिहासकारों, ऐसे as हेरोल्ड Innis, Donald Creighton and Arthur R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian history were वारिस to the traditions that developed in Europe and the United राज्य, लकिन frameworks that worked well elsewhere often failed in Canada.
The heavily Marxist influenced economic इतिहास that dominates Europe has छोटी relevance to most of Canadian history.
A focus on class, urban areas, and उद्योग fails to address Canada 's rural and resource based economy.
Similarly, the monetarist स्कूल that is dominant in the United States also has been difficult to transfer north of the border.
the study of आर्थिक history in Canada became highly focused on economic भूगोल, and for many years the प्रबल school of thought has been the staples thesis.
This school of thought bases the study of the Canadian economy on the study of natural resources.
This approach has since also become used outside of Canada in Australia and in many developing nations.
Before the आगमन of europeans, the First राष्ट्र of what would become कनाडा had a large and vibrant व्यापार संजाल.
Furs, tools, decorative items, and other goods were often transported thousands of किलोमीटर, ज़्यादातर by canoe throughout the many rivers and झीलों of the region.
The early European history of the Canadian economy is usually studied through the स्टेपल्स लेख जिससे argues the Canadian economy developed through the exploitation of a श्रेणी of staples that would be exported to Europe.
Carbon-14, 14C, or radiocarbon, is a रेडियोसक्रिय समस्थानिक of carbon with a केंद्रक containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons.
Its उपस्थिति in organic सामग्री is the आधार of the radiocarbon dating method pioneered by Willard Libby and colleagues ( 1949 ) to तिथि archaeological, geological and hydrogeological नमूने.
Carbon-14 was discovered on 27 February 1940, by Martin कामेन और Sam रूबेन at the University of California Radiation Laboratory in Berkeley, although its अस्तित्व had been suggested by Franz Kurie in 1934.
There हैं three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12, 1 % is carbon-13, and carbon-14 occurs in ट्रेस amounts, i.e., बनाना up about 1 part per trillion ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the कार्बन in the atmosphere.
The half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 years.
Carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through beta decay.
The प्राथमिक natural source of carbon-14 on Earth is cosmic ray action upon nitrogen in the atmosphere, and it is therefore a cosmogenic nuclide.
however, open-air nuclear testing between 1955–1980 contributed to this pool.
The अलग isotopes of carbon do not differ appreciably in उनके रासायनिक properties.
This is used in chemical and biological research, in a technique called carbon labeling : carbon-14 atoms can be used to replace nonradioactive कार्बन, in order to ट्रेस chemical and biochemical reactions involving कार्बन atoms from any given organic compound.
बिजली is a highly visible form of energy transfer
Lightning strikes are electrical discharges on a massive scale between the atmosphere और an earth-bound object.
वे ज़्यादातर originate in thunderclouds and terminate on the मैदान, called Cloud to Ground ( CG ) बिजली.
However, they may also be initiated from a बहुत tall grounded ऑब्जेक्ट और reach into the clouds.
Although `` a lightning strike '' is commonly प्रयुक्त to describe all lightning, it is rather erroneous and a misnomer, as तभी about 25 % of all lightning events worldwide हैं CG, the large bulk of lightning events are intracloud ( IC ) or बादल to बादल ( CC ), where discharge तभी occurs high in the atmosphere.
the वैज्ञानिक नाम for the complete process of a single lightning इवेंट is a and it is a very complex, multiple stepped interaction, which is नहीं completely understood.
सबसे CG flashes तभी `` strike '' one physical location, referred to as a termination.
The primary conducting channel, the bright coursing लाइट you may देखिए and call a `` स्ट्राइक '', is only परिचय 1 inch in व्यास, हालांकि to our eyes it looks much larger.
They हैं miles long, upwards of tens of miles.
And the entire फ्लैश, lasts only a few fractions of a second, most of which is not visible to human आँखें.
Thunder is always produced by lightning.
बस like lightning, that deceives हमारी eyes, usually looking larger or closer than it really is, the धरती 's atmosphere and our brain 's perception of the outside world, ultimately determines whether it is `` सुना '' or not.
Lightning can not happen in a वैक्यूम devoid of ions, nor can थंडर occur without molecules to vibrate.
Thunder is a physical absolute for every single flash of lightning.
Contrary to popular belief, a lightning strike itself is usually not responsible लिये multiple deaths or injuries from a single event.
It होता be नामुमकिन given the प्राकृतिक tendencies of a flash, unless लोगों or animals were stacked on top of each other, or they यहूद somehow arranged खड़ा and part of the flash channel.
When lightning ignites an available fuel सोर्स and an explosion occurs, it is the शॉक wave or fire causing the injuries, not the स्ट्राइक itself.
Ground Currents, also called step potential, of an धरती termination is कया truly causes सबसे injuries or death to humans and animals.
The near instantaneous rush of surface charges, induced by the overhead thundercloud itself, race to the strike point from hundreds to हज़ारों of feet away during discharge.
This current, caused during each stroke, takes the path of least resistance, which may be ion rich human or एनिमल legs, over poorly conducting धरती.
This is क्यों it is best to crouch, with फीट close together, if कभी caught in the open दौरान a thunderstorm.
Unfortunately, most reports do नहीं draw a distinction between the real cause of injury or मौत, be it the strike itself, a resulting explosion or fire, or प्रायः responsible step potential.
