Sealing is an ordinance ( अनुष्ठान ) performed in Latter दिन Saints मंदिरों by a person holding the sealing authority.
The purpose of this ordinance is to मुहर familiar relationships, बनाना संभावित the existence of परिवार relationships throughout eternity.
lds teachings place great importance on the specific authority required to perform these sealings.
गिरिजाघर doctrine teaches that this authority, पुकारा the Priesthood, corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in.
Sealings are typically performed as marriages or as sealing of children to parents.
वे were performed prior to the death of Joseph स्मिथ, Jr. ( the main founder of the latter दिन Saint movement ), and are currently performed in The Church of यीशु मसीह of Latter-day Saints.
Although some other denominations, such as the Community of Christ, दृश्य sealing as an artifact of Smith 's practice of plural marriage, some do still perform them.
The 2000s, pronounced `` two thousands '', was a decade that began on जनवरी 1, 2000, और ended on December 31, 2009.
Globalization, which had accelerated after the early 1990s पतन of communism, जारी to be a force in the 2000s.
The विकास of the Internet was one of the prime contributors to globalization during the decade, making it possible for people to interact with other लोगों, express ideas, introduce others to different cultures and backgrounds, use goods and services, sell and ख़रीदे online, research और learn about things, साथ with experiencing the संसार बगैर having to leave home.
The institutions, linkages और technologies that emerged or were redefined earlier would subsequently in this decade benefit many देशों, in particular China and India.
However, in other भाग of the संसार ऐसे progress failed to address ongoing struggles with modernity, most notably characterized by the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist समूह.
The सितंबर 11 attacks in 2001 led to the संयुक्त States, United Kingdom, स्पेन, Canada and other nations invading Afghanistan, as well as implementing various anti-terrorist measures at home and abroad in what थी ज्ञात as the War on Terror.
The European Union देखी further संयोजन and विस्तार throughout much of Europe.
The economic growth of the 2000s had considerable पर्यावरणीय consequences, raised माँग for diminishing उर्जा resources, and was स्टिल shown to be vulnerable as demonstrated during the वैश्विक Financial Crisis of the late 2000s.
The Gunfight at the O.K. Corral was a gunfight that took place at परिचय 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday, October 26, 1881, in Tombstone, Arizona Territory, and is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the अमरीकी Old वेस्ट.
The gunfight, believed to have lasted तभी about thirty सेकेंड, was fought between the outlaw cowboys Billy Claiborne, आइक and Billy Clanton, और Tom and Frank McLaury, and the opposing town Marshal Virgil earp and उसके brothers Assistant Town Marshal Morgan and अस्थाई lawman Wyatt, aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary मार्शल by Virgil.
Ike Clanton and Billy Claiborne भागा from the fight unharmed, but आइक 's brother Billy Clanton was killed, along with both McLaurys.
Lawmen Virgil और Morgan Earp and Doc Holliday were wounded.
Only Wyatt earp आए through the fight unharmed.
The fight has आइये to represent a time in American इतिहास when the frontier was open range for outlaws opposed by law enforcement that was spread पतला over विशाल territories, leaving some क्षेत्रों unprotected.
The gunfight was not well known to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published what has since been determined to be a largely fictionalized जीवनी, Wyatt Earp : Frontier Marshal, two years after Earp 's death.
झील retold his स्टोरी in a 1946 book that director John Ford developed into the movie My darling Clementine.
After the movie gunfight at the O.K. Corral was released in 1957, the shootout came to be known by that name.
चूंकि तब, the conflict has been portrayed with varying डिग्री of accuracy in numerous पश्चिमी films and किताबे.
despite its name, the gunfight actually occurred in a narrow lot six doors west of the पश्च entrance to the o.k. Corral on fremont गली, और भी in the street.
The two opposing parties were initially only about अलावा.
About thirty shots यहूद fired in thirty seconds.
Ike Clanton filed murder charges विरूद्ध the Earps and दस्तावेज़ Holliday but they यहूद eventually exonerated by a local judge after a 30-day प्रारंभिक सुनना and then again by a local grand जूरी.
On December 28, 1881, Virgil Earp was maimed in an हत्या attempt by the outlaw cowboys, and on March 18, 1882, they assassinated Morgan Earp.
The suspects furnished solid alibis, and newly appointed Deputy U.S. मार्शल व्याट Earp took matters into उसके own hands during the Earp Vendetta Ride, ironically धड़ा by county शेरिफ Johnny behan with warrants लिये the Earp 's गिरफ़्तार.
HDMI ( High-Definition Multimedia Interface ) is a कॉम्पैक्ट audio/video interface for transferring uncompressed video आंकड़ा and compressed/uncompressed digital audio data इससे a hdmi-compliant device ( `` the source device '' ) to a compatible computer monitor, वीडियो projector, digital television, or digital audio device.
HDMI is a डिजिटल replacement for मौजूदा analog video standards.
There are a number of hdmi-standard cable connectors available, each of which can be used for any uncompressed TV or PC video format, including standard, enhanced, ऊँची definition, and 3d video signals ; up to 8 channels of compressed or uncompressed digital audio ; a cec ( Consumer Electronics कंट्रोल ) connection ; and an Ethernet data connection.
HDMI implements the EIA/CEA-861 standards, which define video formats and waveforms, transport of compressed, uncompressed, and LPCM audio, auxiliary data, और implementations of the VESA EDID.
the CEC allows HDMI devices to कंट्रोल each other when necessary and allows the उपयोक्ता to operate multiple devices with one remote control handset.
Because HDMI is electrically compatible with the CEA-861 signals used by digital visual interface ( DVI ), no सिग्नल परिवर्तन is necessary, nor is वहीँ a loss of video quality when a dvi-to-hdmi adapter is used.
as an uncompressed CEA-861 connection, hdmi is स्वतंत्र of the various digital television standards used by individual devices, such as atsc and DVB, as ये हैं encapsulations of compressed MPEG video streams ( which can be decoded and output as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ).
Production of consumer HDMI उत्पाद started in लेट 2003.
in Europe either dvi-hdcp or HDMI is included in the HD तैयार in-store labeling specification for TV sets for HDTV, formulated by EICTA with SES Astra in 2005.
HDMI began to appear on consumer HDTV camcorders and digital still cameras in 2006.
As of January 8, 2013, which is ten years after the release of the first HDMI specification, over 3 billion HDMI डिवाइस have shipped since the लॉन्च of the hdmi standard.
Bree Van de Kamp ( née Mason ; also known in the series as Bree Hodge and Bree Weston ) is a fictional character और one of the four protagonists on the ABC television श्रेणी Desperate Housewives.
She is played by actress Marcia Cross, who has received multiple awards and nominations for her portrayal, including an Emmy Award nomination, three Golden ग्लोब Award nominations, and two Screen Actors Guild Awards.
Cross 's portrayal of Bree has been widely praised by आलोचकों and fans.
Cross originally auditioned for the भूमिका of मरियम ऐलिस Young, but series creator Marc Cherry thought she was better suited for the role of Bree.
दाना Delany, who eventually was cast as Katherine Mayfair, was originally चुनी for the भूमिका but turned it down, saying it was too similar to उसके role in Pasadena.
Bree 's main struggle throughout the series has been उसके attempts to maintain a perfect life despite various obstacles ऐसे as widowhood, divorce, and alcoholism hindering उसके.
She has been married three times ; to Rex Van de Kamp ( स्टीवन Culp ), orson होज ( Kyle maclachlan ) and Trip Weston ( Scott Bakula ).

The Hangover Part II is a 2011 अमरीकी comedy film produced by Legendary Pictures और distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures.
It is the sequel to 2009 's the hangover and the दूसरी film in The Hangover franchise.
Todd Phillips directed the फिल्मी in addition to co-authoring the script साथ Craig mazin, और scot आर्मस्ट्रांग.
The film stars Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Ken Jeong, Jeffrey Tambor, Justin Bartha and Paul Giamatti.
the Hangover Part ii tells the story of फिल, Stu, Alan, and Doug as वे travel to थाईलैंड for Stu 's wedding.
After the bachelor party in लास वेगास, Stu takes no chances and opts लिये a safe, subdued pre-wedding brunch.
However, things do not go as planned, resulting in another bad hangover साथ no memories of the previous night.
Development of The Hangover भाग ii began in April 2009, two months before the Hangover was released.

the English Renaissance was a cultural and artistic movement in इंग्लैण्ड dating from the late 15th and early 16th centuries to the early 17th century.
It is associated with the pan-european Renaissance that is usually regarded as beginning in इटली in the late 14th century.
Like most of northern Europe, England saw little of ये developments until अधिक than a century later.
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken, as a convenience, to be 1485, when the Battle of Bosworth Field ended the Wars of the Roses और inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty.
Renaissance style and ideas, however, were slow in penetrating England, and the Elizabethan era in the second half of the 16th century is usually regarded as the height of the अंग्रेज़ी Renaissance.
Elizabeth Ann bloomer Warren `` Betty '' घाट ( April 8, 1918 – July 8, 2011 ), was First महिला of the United States from 1974 to 1977 दौरान the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford.
As First Lady, she थी active in social policy और created precedents as a नीतियां active presidential wife.
Throughout her husband 's term in office, वो maintained ऊँची स्वीकृति ratings despite opposition from कुछ conservative Republicans who objected to उसके more moderate and liberal स्थितियाँ on social issues.
घाट थी noted for raising breast cancer awareness following her 1974 mastectomy and was a passionate supporter of, and activist लिये, the Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA ).
pro-choice on abortion and a leader in the महिलाओं 's Movement, she gained कीर्ति as one of the most candid first महिलाओं in history, commenting on every hot-button issue of the time, including नारीवाद, equal अदा, the ERA, sex, drugs, abortion, and gun control.
She also उठाया awareness of व्यसन when वो announced her long-running battle with alcoholism in the 1970s.
following her श्वेत House years, she continued to lobby for the era and remained active in the feminist movement.
वो was the संस्थापक, and served as the first chair of the board of निर्देशकों, of the Betty Ford Center for substance abuse और addiction and is a recipient of the congressional Gold Medal ( co-presentation with उसके husband, Gerald R. Ford, October 21, 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( alone, presented 1991, by George H. W. Bush ).

anglo-saxon इंग्लैण्ड refers to the period of the history of the part of Britain that became known as England, lasting from the end of Roman occupation and स्थापना of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms in the 5th सदी until the Norman conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror.
Anglo-Saxon is a general पद referring to the germanic peoples who came to Britain during the 5th and 6th centuries, including Angles, Saxons, Frisii, और jutes.
the पद also refers to the language spoken at the time in England, which is अभी पुकारा बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी, and to the culture of the era, which has long attracted लोकप्रिय and scholarly attention.
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the Heptarchy, the kingdoms of Northumbria, Mercia, East Anglia, Essex, Kent, Sussex, and Wessex.
In शर्तें of धर्म the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism during the जल्दी period, but converted to Christianity during the 7th century.
paganism had a final stronghold in a period of Mercian आधिपत्य during the 640s, ending with the death of पेंदा of mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of Viking invasions, the House of Wessex became dominant during the 9th century, under the rule of Alfred the Great.
दौरान the 10th सदी, the individual kingdoms unified under the rule of Wessex into the Kingdom of England, which stood opposed to the Danelaw, the Viking kingdoms स्थापित from the 9th century in the north and east of England.
The Kingdom of England fell in the Viking आक्रमण from डेनमार्क in 1013 and was ruled by the House of डेनमार्क until 1042, जब the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored.
The पिछला Anglo-Saxon king, Harold Godwinson, थी killed in 1066 at the बैटल of Hastings.

Smoked salmon is a तैयारी of salmon, typically a fillet कि has been cured and hot or cold smoked.
due to its moderately high price, smoked salmon is considered a कोमलता.
Although the term lox is sometimes applied to smoked salmon, they are अलग products.
View of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड position and placement.
Defibrillation is a common उपचार for life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of electrical energy to the प्रभावित heart with a यंत्र पुकारा a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of device used or needed.
Some external units, ज्ञात as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the diagnosis of treatable लय, meaning that lay responders or bystanders हैं able to उपयोग उन्हें successfully with little, or in कुछ cases no training at all.
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel ( August 19, 1883 – January 10, 1971 ) थी a French fashion designer and founder of the चैनल brand.
She थी the only fashion designer to appear on समय magazine 's list of the 100 most influential people of the 20th century.
साथ with Paul Poiret, चैनल was credited with liberating महिलाओं इससे the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' and popularizing the acceptance of a sportive, कैज़ुअल chic as the feminine standard in the post- संसार War i era.
A सफल fashion creator, Chanel 's influence extended परे couture कपडे.
Her design aesthetic was realized in jewelry, हैंडबैग, and महक.
Her हस्ताक्षर scent, Chanel No. 5, रै become an iconic product.
Chanel was known for her lifelong determination, ambition and उर्जा which she applied to उसके पेशेवर and social life.
वो achieved both success as a businesswoman and social prominence thanks to the connections she बना through her कार्य.
ये शामिल many artists and craftspeople to whom वो became a संरक्षक.
however, Chanel 's अत्यधिक competitive, opportunistic व्यक्तित्व led her to make questionable life choices which have generated controversy around her reputation, particularly her behaviour during the German occupation of France in World War II.

A gristmill ( also : grist mill, मकई mill or आटा mill ) grinds grain into flour.

Romania ( ; dated spellings Roumania and Rumania ; ) is a country located at the intersection of Central and Southeastern Europe, bordering on the Black Sea.
Romania साझा a border with Hungary and Serbia to the west, Ukraine and Moldova to the northeast and ईस्ट, और Bulgaria to the south.
At, Romania is the आठवीं largest country of the European Union by area, and has the seventh largest population of the European Union with more than 19 million लोगों.
Its capital and biggest नगर is Bucharest, the 11th largest city in the EU.
The United principalities emerged when the territories of Moldavia and wallachia were united under Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859.
In 1866 Prince karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was पुकारा to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the Romanian Principate and in 1881 he was आखिरकार crowned as King Carol i the first monarch of the किंगडम of Romania.
स्वतंत्रता from the Ottoman Empire was घोषित on 9 May 1877, and was internationally recognized the following year.
At the end of संसार War I, Transylvania, Bukovina and Bessarabia united with the Kingdom of Romania.
World War ii gave cause to the rise of a सैन्य dictatorship in Romania under fascist सामान्य Ion Antonescu, who chose to fight on the side of the Axis शक्तियां इससे 1941 to 1944.
After उसके removal, Romania switched sides in 1944 और joined the allies.
By the end of the war, some formerly Romanian northeastern territories were occupied by the Soviet Union, with Red Army units stationed on Romanian मृदा.
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a People 's Republic ( 1947-1965 ) और a सदस्य of the Warsaw अनुबंध.
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became General सचिव of the Romanian Communist पार्टी, and the हर्ष austerity measures, political repression, and cult of personality he implemented led to the Socialist Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist पुलिस state in the Eastern bloc.
आखिरकार his सत्तावादी सरकारी was toppled in December 1989 during the Romanian Revolution of 1989.
With the पतन of the Iron Curtain, रोमानिया began its परिवर्तन towards democracy और a capitalist market अर्थव्यवस्था.
After a decade of post-revolution economic problems और living-standards decline, extensive reforms fostered economic recovery.
as of 2010, Romania is an upper-middle-income country with a high human development अनुक्रमणिका.
Romania joined नाटो on 29 March 2004, and the European Union on 1 January 2007.
it is also a member of the : लैटिन संघ, Francophonie, OSCE, WTO, BSEC, संयुक्त Nations, इत्यादि.
Today, Romania is a unitary semi-presidential republic, in जिससे the executive branch consists of the President और the Government.
`` Ancient '' redirects here.
लिये other uses, see प्राचीनता ( disambiguation ).
The times पहले writing belong either to protohistory or to प्रागितिहास.
Khafre 's Pyramid ( 4th dynasty ) और Great Sphinx of Giza ( c. 2500 bc or perhaps earlier )
Ancient history is the पढ़ाई of the written past from the beginning of recorded human history to the Early Middle Ages.
The span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 years, साथ Cuneiform script, the oldest discovered रूप of coherent writing, from the protoliterate काल around the 30th century BC.
इस is the beginning of history, as opposed to prehistory, according to the definition used by सबसे historians.
The term classical antiquity is often used to refer to इतिहास in the बूढ़ा World from the beginning of recorded Greek history in 776 BC ( पहला ओलंपियाड ).
This roughly coincides with the traditional date of the founding of रोम in 753 BC, the beginning of the इतिहास of ancient Rome, and the beginning of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece.
हालांकि the ending date of ancient history is disputed, some Western scholars use the fall of the पश्चिमी रोमन Empire in 476 AD, the closure of the Platonic अकादमी in 529 AD, the death of the emperor जुस्तिनियन I, the coming of Islam or the वृद्धि of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history.
In इण्डिया, the period includes the जल्दी period of the Middle Kingdoms, and, in China, the time up to the Qin Dynasty is शामिल.
methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a रूप of vitamin B12.
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12, occurring as dark red crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent समाधान in water.
विटामिन b12, vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12, also called cobalamin, is a water-soluble vitamin with a कुंजी role in the normal functioning of the दिमाग और बेचैन system, and for the formation of blood.
It is one of the eight b विटामिन.
it is normally शामिल in the metabolism of every कोशिका of the human body, especially affecting डीएनए synthesis and regulation, but भी fatty acid synthesis और energy production.
Neither fungi, plants, nor animals are capable of producing vitamin B12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its संश्लेषण, हालांकि अनेक foods हैं a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The विटामिन is the largest and सबसे structurally complicated vitamin and can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin b12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), all of which have विटामिन activity.
It contains the biochemically rare तत्व cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( which usually produce hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन conversion between अलग forms of the विटामिन can be accomplished in the human body.
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in nature, लकिन is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in अनेक pharmaceuticals and supplements, and as a food additive, because of इसके stability and lower production cost.
In the body it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the cyanide, albeit in minimal concentration.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements.
The extra utility of these is फिलहाल debated.
Vitamin B12 was खोजा from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia, which is an autoimmune disease in जिससे parietal कोशिकाएं of the stomach responsible लिये secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic फ़ैक्टर is crucial for the सामान्य absorption of b12, so a lack of intrinsic factor, as seen in pernicious रक्ताल्पता, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
Many other subtler kinds of विटामिन B12 deficiency and their biochemical effects have since महरूम elucidated.
the Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient रोमन civilization, characterised by an autocratic रूप of government और large territorial holdings around the भूमध्यसागरीय in Europe, Africa, और Asia.
the 500-year-old Roman Republic, जिससे preceded it, had महरूम destabilized through a series of civil wars.
Several events marked the transition इससे गणतंत्र to साम्राज्य, सहित जूलियस Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the रोमन सीनेट ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the साम्राज्य were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity ज्ञात as the pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ).
it reached its महानतम expanse दौरान the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a crisis कि threatened its existence, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors aurelian और diocletian.
ईसाइयों rose to power in the 4th सदी, during जिससे time a system of dual rule was developed in the लैटिन West और Greek East.
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century, the पूर्वी half continued as what would later be known as the Byzantine साम्राज्य.
Because of the साम्राज्य 's vast extent and long endurance, the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the development of language, धर्म, वास्तुकला, philosophy, law, and forms of government in the territory it governed, particularly Europe, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Total देह surface area ( TBSA ) is an मूल्यांकन measure of burns of the skin.
In adults, the `` नियम of nines '' is प्रयुक्त to determine the कुल percentage of क्षेत्रफल burned for each प्रमुख section of the देह.
In कुछ cases, the burns may cover more than एक body part, or may not fully कवर ऐसे a part ; in ये cases, burns are measured by using the casualty 's ताड़ as a reference पाइंट for 1 % of the body.
For children और infants, the lund-browder chart is used to assess the burned देह surface area.
Different percentages are used because the ratio of the संयुक्त surface area of the head and neck to the surface area of the limbs is typically larger in children than that of an adult.
Typical values for common groups of humans follow.
( Due to rounding, values may not add to 100 %. )

The degree symbol ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is used, among अन्य things, to represent डिग्री of arc ( e.g. in geographic coordinate systems ), hours ( in the medical फ़ील्ड ), or degrees of temperature.
The symbol consists of a small raised वृत्त, historically a zero glyph.
In Unicode it is encoded at.
This is a list of जड़ें, suffixes, and prefixes used in medical terminology, their meanings, and their etymology.
There हैं a few rules when using चिकित्सा roots.
firstly, prefixes and प्रत्यय, primarily in Greek, लकिन भी in Latin, have a droppable -o-.
As a general नियम, this -o- almost always अधिनियमों as a joint-stem to कनेक्ट two consonantal जड़ें, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
लकिन generally, the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = arthritis, instead of arthr-o-itis.
Secondly, medical roots generally go together according to language : यूनानी prefixes go with Greek प्रत्यय और Latin prefixes साथ Latin suffixes.
Although international वैज्ञानिक vocabulary is not stringent about segregating combining forms of different languages, it is advisable जब coining new words not to मिक्सर different lingual roots.
Stomach कर्कट, or gastric cancer, refers to कर्कट arising from any part of the stomach.
Stomach cancer कल्याणकारी about 800,000 मौतों विश्वव्यापी per year.
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) because most patients उपस्थित with advanced बीमारी.

The Berlin blockade ( 24 June 1948 – 12 May 1949 ) थी one of the first major international crises of the Cold War.
दौरान the multinational occupation of post–World युद्ध II Germany, the Soviet Union अवरोधित the Western allies ' railway, सड़क, and canal access to the sectors of Berlin under Allied कंट्रोल.
Their aim was to force the western powers to allow the सोवियत zone to प्रारंभ supplying बर्लिन साथ food and fuel, thereby giving the soviets practical control over the entire city.
In response, the Western Allies व्यवस्थित the Berlin airlift to carry supplies to the people in West Berlin.
Aircrews इससे the United States Air Force, the अंग्रेजों Royal Air फ़ोर्स, the Royal Australian Air Force, the Royal Canadian Air Force, the Royal New Zealand Air Force, and the South African Air फ़ोर्स उड़ाया over 200,000 flights in one year, providing up to 4700 tons of daily necessities ऐसे as fuel and food to the Berliners.
By the spring of 1949, the effort was clearly succeeding और, by April, the airlift was delivering more कार्गो than had previously been transported into the city by रेल.
The success of the Berlin Airlift brought embarrassment to the Soviets who had refused to believe it could मेक a difference.
the blockade was lifted in may 1949 and resulted in the सृष्टि of two पृथक जर्मनी states.
The Federal Republic of Germany ( West जर्मनी ) and the German Democratic Republic ( East जर्मनी ) विभाजित up Berlin.
In स्मरण of the एयरलिफ्ट, तीन एयरपोर्ट in the former western zones of the city served as the primary gateways to जर्मनी for another fifty सालो.

The euro sign is the currency sign used for the euro, the आधिकारिक currency of the eurozone in the European Union ( EU ).
The design was presented to the पब्लिक by the यूरोपीय Commission on 12 December 1996.
The international three-letter कोड ( according to ISO standard ISO 4217 ) for the euro is EUR.
In Unicode it is encoded at.
In English, the चिह्न precedes the value.
In कुछ styleguides, but not others, the euro sign is unspaced.
mate (, ; sometimes also spelled maté ), भी ज्ञात as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a traditional South American infused drink, विशेषकर in Argentina, Uruguay, पैराग्वे and the southern states of Brazil and to a lesser degree in south of Chile, the Bolivian Chaco, सीरियाई and Lebanon.
It is prepared from steeping dried leaves of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, known in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot water.
Mate is served with a metal straw from a shared hollow calabash gourd.
The स्ट्रॉ is called a bombilla in some Latin American countries, a bomba in Portuguese, and a bombija or, more generally, a masassa ( type of straw ) in अरबी.
The straw is traditionally made of silver.
Modern, commercially उपलब्धियाँ straws are typically बना of निकल silver, called Alpaca ; stainless steel, or hollow-stemmed cane.
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while in Brazil, it has the specific name of cuia, or भी cabaça ( the नाम for indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in अन्य regions of Brazil, स्टिल used for general खाना and drink in remote regions ).
Even if the water is supplied इससे a modern thermos, the infusion is traditionally drunk from mates or cuias.
as with other brewed herbs, yerba mate leaves are dried, chopped, and मैदान into a powdery मिश्रण पुकारा yerba.
The bombilla acts as दोनो a straw and a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, with small holes or slots that allow the brewed liquid in, लकिन block the चंकी पदार्थ कि makes up much of the mixture.
A modern bombilla design uses a straight tube with holes, or वसन्त sleeve to act as a sieve.
`` tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have been on the market in अर्जेंटीना, Paraguay and Uruguay for many years under ऐसे trade names as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina, `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in पैराग्वे, and in Brazil अंतर्गत the name `` Mate Leão ''.
This is considered a completely different drink.
It is never drunk from cuias or called chimarrão, nor is it associated with the gaucho/gaúcho culture.
The ऑटोमोटिव industry is a term that कवर a wide range of companies and organisations involved in the design, development, manufacture, marketing, and selling of motor vehicles, towed vehicles, motorcycles और mopeds.
it is one of the world 's most महत्वपूर्ण economic sectors by revenue.
The पद automotive उद्योग usually does not include industries समर्पित to the maintenance of automobiles following delivery to the end-user, such as repair shops and motor fuel filling stations.
The term ऑटोमोटिव was निर्मित इससे Greek autos ( स्वः ), and Latin motivus ( of motion ) to represent any form of self-powered vehicle.
This term was proposed by SAE member Elmer Sperry.

हेनरी T. Thomas Sampson, Jr. ( born in Jackson, Mississippi in 1934 ) is an African-American आविष्कारक.
He graduated from ऊँची school in 1951 from Lanier High School in Jackson, Mississippi.

हैलोवीन or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ), also known as सब Hallows ' Eve, is a yearly celebration observed in a number of countries on October 31, the संध्या of the Western Christian feast of All hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to many scholars, All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally बहकावे by western European harvest festivals, and त्यौहार of the dead with possible pagan roots, particularly the सेल्टिक Samhain.
Other विद्वानों maintain कि it originated independently of Samhain and has solely ईसाई roots.
Typical festive हैलोवीन activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), उपस्थित costume parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
स्वतंत्रता of speech is the राजनैतिक सही to communicate one 's opinions और ideas using one 's body and property to anyone who is willing to receive उन्हें.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, but includes any act of seeking, receiving and imparting information or ideas, regardless of the मीडियम used.
In practice, the right to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country and the right is commonly विषय to सीमाएं, as with libel, slander, obscenity, sedition ( including, लिये उदाहरण inciting ethnic hatred ), copyright violation, revelation of information कि is classified or otherwise.
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right अंतर्गत Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in international human rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without हस्तक्षेप '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to तलाश, receive and impart information and ideas of सब kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the रूप of art, or through any other मीडिया of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these अधिकारों carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to निश्चित restrictions '' when जरुरी `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of पब्लिक order ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक legal प्रणालियों and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to कारण religious offense, such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
सिडनी Harbour इससे the air, प्रर्दशित the Opera हाउस, the सीबीडी, Circular quay, the Bridge, the Parramatta River, North Sydney और Kirribilli in the foreground
The सिडनी Harbour Bridge is a स्टील through arch bridge across Sydney harbour that carries rail, vehicular, bicycle and pedestrian traffic between the Sydney central business district ( CBD ) and the North shore.
the dramatic view of the सेतु, the harbour, और the nearby सिडनी Opera हाउस is an iconic image of Sydney, New South वेल्स, and Australia.
The bridge is nicknamed `` The Coathanger '' क्युकी of its arch-based design.
अंतर्गत the दिशानिर्देश of Dr J.J.C. Bradfield of the NSW Department of Public Works, the bridge was designed और built by अंग्रेजों कड़ dorman Long and Co Ltd of Middlesbrough और खोली in 1932.
The bridge 's design was बहकावे by the Hell Gate Bridge in New York.
it was the world 's widest long-span bridge, at 48.8 meters ( 160 feet ) चौड़ी, until construction of the नई Port Mann Bridge in Vancouver.
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch bridge in the world, और it is the tallest steel arch सेतु, measuring इससे top to water level.
Until 1967 the harbour सेतु was Sydney 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic hotspot located near the namesake Hawaiian Islands, in the northern Pacific Ocean.
एक of the most well-known और heavily पढ़ाई hotspots in the world, the हवाई plume is जिम्मेदार for the creation of the हवाई – Emperor seamount chain, an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi ) long कड़ी of volcanoes, four of which हैं active, two of which are dormant, and more than 123 of which are extinct, many having चूंकि been मैदान beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls.
The chain extends इससे दक्षिण of the island of Hawaii to the edge of the Aleutian Trench, near the eastern किनारे of Russia.
While most ज्वालामुखी are created by geological activity at tectonic plate सीमाएँ, the Hawaii हॉटस्पॉट is स्तिथ दूर from nearby plate boundaries ; the classic hotspot सिद्धान्त, first proposed in 1963 by John Tuzo Wilson, proposes that a single, फिक्स्ड mantle plume builds ज्वालामुखी that then, cut off इससे उनके source by the movement of the Pacific Plate, become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over लाखो of years.
According to this सिद्धान्त, the nearly 60° bend separating the Emperor and हवाई segments of the chain was caused by a अचानक शिफ़्ट in the गति of the Pacific Plate.
in 2003, fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a mobile hotspot theory, suggesting that hotspots are mobile, not fixed, and that the 47 million year old बेंड थी caused by a शिफ़्ट in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's.
Ancient Hawaiians were the first to recognize the increasing age and weathered state of the volcanoes to the उत्तर as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands.
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and their constant battle with the sea was a प्रमुख तत्व in Hawaiian mythology, embodied in Pele, the देवता of ज्वालामुखी.
After the arrival of europeans on the island, in 1880-1881 James Dwight Dana directed the first formal geological study of the hotspot 's volcanics, confirming the relationship long observed by the natives.
1912 चिह्नित the founding of the हवाई ज्वालामुखी Observatory by volcanologist Thomas Jaggar, initiating continuous scientific observation of the islands.
In the 1970s, a mapping project थी initiated to gain more information about the complex भूविज्ञान of Hawaii 's seafloor.
The hotspot रै since been tomographically imaged, प्रर्दशित it to be wide and up to deep, and ओलीवाइन and garnet -आधारd studies have shown its magma chamber is approximately.
In its at least 85 million years of कार्यकलाप the hotspot has produced an estimated of rock.
The chain 's rate of drift has slowly increased over time, causing the amount of time each individual volcano is active to decrease, from 18 million years for the 76 million year बूढ़ा Detroit Seamount, to बस under 900,000 for the एक million year-old Kohala ; on the अन्य hand, eruptive आवाज़ has increased from per year to about.
overall, this has caused a ट्रेंड towards more active लकिन quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas volcanoes on the near side of the hotspot overlap each other ( forming such superstructures as Hawaii island and the ancient Maui Nui ), the oldest of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as far as apart.

Osteonecrosis of the jaw ( ONJ ) is a severe bone disease that affects the maxilla and the mandible.
Various forms of ONJ have been वर्णित over the last 160 सालो, and a क्रमांक of causes have महरूम suggested in the literature.
Osteonecrosis of the जबड़े associated with bisphosphonate therapy, required by some cancer उपचार regimens, has been identified और defined as a pathological entity since 2003.
The संभावित risk इससे lower oral doses of bisphosphonates, लिया by patients to prevent or treat osteoporosis, remains uncertain.
Various treatment options have been explored, however कठोर मामले of onj still require सर्जिकल removal of the affected bone.
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and संभावित sites of dental infection are जरूरी to सहायता prevent the condition, especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered.
The बोस्टन Red sox हैं a professional baseball team based in Boston, मैसाचुसेट्स, and a member of प्रमुख League बेसबॉल 's अमरीकी League Eastern प्रभाग.
Founded in as one of the American League 's eight चार्टर franchises, the Red Sox 's home ballpark रै महरूम fenway Park since.
the `` रेड Sox '' name थी चुनी by the team owner, जॉन I. Taylor, around, following previous Boston teams कि had been known as the `` Red Stockings ``.
They have played in 11 World Series, winning 7.
Boston was a प्रबल टोली in the new league, defeating the Pittsburgh Pirates in the first World Series in and जीतना four more championships by.
However, they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in baseball history, called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged beginning with the Red Sox 's sale of Babe Ruth to the rival Yankees दो years after their संसार championship in 1918, an 86-year wait before the team 's sixth World Championship in.
However, the team 's history during that period थी hardly one of futility, लकिन was rather punctuated साथ some of the most memorable moments in World श्रेणी history, सहित enos Slaughter 's `` mad dash `` in, the `` Impossible Dream `` of, Carlton फिस्क 's home चलाएं in, and विधेयक Buckner 's error in.
Red Sox history has भी been चिह्नित by the team 's intense rivalry साथ the New York Yankees, arguably the fiercest and सबसे historic in North American professional sports.
the Boston रेड Sox हैं owned by Fenway Sports Group, जो also own Liverpool Football Club of the Premier League in England.
the Red sox are consistently one of the top एमएलबी टीमों in average सड़क attendance, जबकि the small capacity of Fenway Park रोकता them from leading in overall attendance.
इससे May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the Red Sox बेची out प्रत्येक home game-a कुल of 820 games ( 794 regular season ) for a major professional sports record that lasted almost a decade.
Mince pie भर with mincemeat
Mincemeat is a mixture of chopped सूखी फल, distilled spirits and spices, and sometimes beef suet, beef, or venison.
Originally, mincemeat always contained meat.
Many modern recipes contain beef suet, though सब्ज़ी shortening is sometimes used in its place.
Variants of mincemeat are found in Australia, Brittany, Canada, northern Europe, Ireland, दक्षिण Africa, the United Kingdom and the संयुक्त States.
In some देशों the term mincemeat refers to minced or ground meat.
डायना, Princess of Wales ( Diana Frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961 – 31 August 1997 ) थी the पहला wife of Charles, Prince of Wales, the eldest son and वारिस apparent of Queen Elizabeth II.
वो was well known for उसके fund-raising work for international charities और as an eminent celebrity of the लेट 20th century.
Her wedding to the प्रिंस of वेल्स on 29 July 1981 was held at St Paul 's Cathedral और seen by a global television audience of over 750 million.
While married she bore the titles Princess of वेल्स, Duchess of Cornwall, duchess of Rothesay, Countess of चेस्टर और Baroness of Renfrew.
the marriage produced दो sons, the princes William and Harry, who became second and तीसरा in line to the British throne.
Diana was born into an aristocratic English family with royal ancestry.
She थी the fourth चाइल्ड of John Spencer, 8th Earl Spencer and his wife frances, बेटी of Maurice Roche, 4th Baron Fermoy.
वो became a public figure with the announcement of her engagement.
She also received recognition for her charity कार्य and for her support of the International Campaign to Ban Landmines.
From 1989, she was the अध्यक्ष of the Great ormond Street Hospital लिये children, in addition to dozens of अन्य charities.
Diana remained the object of worldwide media scrutiny during and after her marriage, which ended in divorce on 28 August 1996.
Media attention and public mourning यहूद considerable following her death in a car crash in पेरिस on 31 August 1997.
अर्जेंटीना, officially the Argentine Republic ( ), is the second largest देश in both South America and the लैटिन America प्रदेश.
The country is a federation of 23 provinces and the autonomous city of Buenos Aires, its capital and largest city.
It is the eighth -largest country in the world by land area and the largest among Spanish-speaking nations by भौगोलिक area of 2,780,400 km2 and is the fourth by population, with over 41 million people.
Argentina is a founding member of the United राष्ट्र, Mercosur, the Union of South American Nations, the Organization of Ibero-American States, the World Bank Group और the World Trade संगठन, and is one of the G-15 और g-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in South America, bordered by Chile to the वेस्ट and south, Bolivia and Paraguay to the north and Brazil and Uruguay to the northeast.
Argentina claims प्रभुता over part of Antarctica, the Falkland Islands ( ) and South Georgia and the South Sandwich आइलैंड्स.
Argentina is the successor राज्य of the Viceroyalty of the río de la Plata, an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire.
अर्जेंटीना declared independence during the Argentine War of Independence, which was followed by the Argentine Civil Wars during most of the 19th century.
The country faced several military coups और political instability during the 20th century, साथ with periodic economic crisis कि continue to this दिन.
A recognized Southern Cone शक्ति, and middle power, Argentina is लैटिन America 's third-largest economy, with a `` very high '' rating on the Human development index.
Within लैटिन America, Argentina has the fifth highest nominal जीडीपी per capita and the highest in purchasing power terms.
The Legatum संस्थान have argued that the country has a `` न्यास लिये भविष्य growth due to इसके market आकार, levels of foreign direct निवेश, and percentage of high-tech exports as share of total manufactured goods '', and it is classed by investors as middle उभरते economy.
Argentina is the लैटिन American देश with the most Nobel Prizes, for a total of five, all obtained during the second half of the twentieth century.
The country has तीन नोबेल prizes in science और दो of peace.
The most important aspects of science and technology in Argentina हैं concerned साथ medicine, nuclear physics, biotechnology, nanotechnology, space and प्रक्षेपास्त्र technology और अनेक fields related to the country 's Main आर्थिक क्रियाएँ.
the country also has the mega exhibition center of science, technology, industry and art that हैं Latin अमेरिका 's largest.

The city 's 2010 estimated जनसांख्यिकी is 40,010.
Hickory is the principal city in the hickory-lenoir-morganton MSA, in which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497.
polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated PET, PETE, or the obsolete PETP or PET-P, is a thermoplastic पॉलिमर resin of the polyester family and is used in synthetic fibers ; beverage, food और other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in संयोजन with glass रेशा.
the term polyethylene terephthalate is a source of confusion because this substance, PET, does नहीं contain polyethylene.
Thus, the वैकल्पिक form, poly ( ethylene terephthalate ), is प्रायः used in scholarly journals for the sake of accuracy and clarity.
depending on its processing और thermal history, polyethylene terephthalate may exist दोनो as an amorphous ( transparent ) and as a semi-crystalline polymer.
the semicrystalline material might appear transparent ( कण size < 500 nm ) or opaque और श्वेत ( particle size up to a few microns ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size.
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic acid and ethylene glycol साथ water as a byproduct, or by transesterification reaction between ethylene ग्लाइकोल and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct.
Polymerization is through a polycondensation reaction of the monomers ( done immediately बाद esterification/transesterification ) with जल as the byproduct.
the बहुमत of the world 's PET production is for synthetic fibers ( in excess of 60 % ), with bottle production हिसाब for around 30 % of वैश्विक demand.
In the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of textile अनुप्रयोग, पालतु is referred to by इसके आम name, `` polyester, '' whereas the acronym `` PET '' is generally used in relation to packaging.
Polyester makes up परिचय 18 % of संसार polymer production and is the third-most-produced polymer ; polyethylene ( PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are first and second, respectively.
PET consists of polymerized इकाई of the monomer ethylene terephthalate, साथ repeating C10H8O4 units.
PET is commonly recycled, and रै the क्रमांक `` 1 '' as its recycling प्रतीक.

Its current senators हैं Democrat मरियम Landrieu and Republican David Vitter.
Black pudding, blood pudding or blood sausage is a type of sausage made by cooking blood or dried blood with a filler जबतक it is thick enough to congeal जब cooled.
The dish exists in विभिन्न cultures इससे Asia to Europe and the Americas.
Pig, cattle, शीप, बतख, and goat blood can be used depending on different countries.
In Europe and the Americas, typical fillers include meat, fat, suet, ब्रैड, cornmeal, sweet potato, प्याज, chestnuts, barley, and oatmeal.
in Spain, Portugal and Asia, potato is often replaced by rice.
Stakeholder may refer to:
Stakeholder ( कॉरपोरेट ), a person, group, organization, member or system who affects or can be affected by an संगठन 's actions
शेयरधारक, an एंटिटी कि can be affected by the results of कि in which they are कहा to be हितधारकों, i.e., that in जिससे they have a stake.
Project stakeholder, a person, group or संगठन with an interest in a project
Stakeholder सिद्धान्त, a theory that identifies और मॉडल the groups which हैं stakeholders of a निगम or project
शेयरधारक analysis, the प्रक्रम of identifying those affected by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ), a third party जो temporarily holds money or property while its owner is still being determined
जोकर smight ( March 9, 1925 - September 1, 2003 ) थी an American theatre and फिल्मी निदेशक.
Smight was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota and went to school with भविष्य कर्ता Peter Graves.
His फिल्मी credits शामिल The Traveling Executioner, खरगोश, Run, मीत Couples, Midway, Harper, Airport 1975, Damnation Alley and the Emmy पुरस्कार -winning Eddie, as खूब as many एपीसोड of television series such as The गोधूलि मण्डल and the Alfred Hitchcock Hour.
He also directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th Cousin and composed the music for the फिल्मी adaption of फेंकें of Thunder Hear My Cry.
Smight died from कर्कट in लॉस एंजिल्स, California.
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 February 1834 – 2 February 1907 O.S. 27 January 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) was a रूसी chemist and inventor.
He formulated the आवधिक Law, created his own version of the periodic table of तत्व, and प्रयुक्त it to correct the properties of some already discovered elements और भी to भविष्यवाणी the properties of elements yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ), officially the City of modesto, is the county seat and largest city of Stanislaus County, California, United राज्य.
With a population of approximately 201,165 at the 2010 census, Modesto ranks as the 18th largest city in the state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The Modesto Census काउंटी Division, which शामिल the cities of ceres and Riverbank, has a population of 312,842 as of 2010.
Modesto is located in the central valley area of उत्तरी California, 90 miles north of Fresno, 92 miles east of San Francisco, 68 miles south of the राज्य capital of sacramento, 66 miles west of Yosemite National Park, and 24 miles दक्षिण of स्टॉकटन.
modesto, a 29-time पेड़ City USA honoree, is surrounded by rich farmland, lending to a ranking for the county as 6th among सब California counties in farm production.
Led by milk, almonds, मुर्गियों, walnuts, and corn silage, the काउंटी grossed nearly $ 3.1 billion in agricultural production in 2011.
Modesto थी immortalized in the 1973 George लुकास film American graffiti.
the award winning film captured the spirit of `` cruising '' and दोस्ती on 10th and 11th Streets in 1962 and led to the revival of 1950 's nostalgia कि included the TV दिखाएँ Happy Days and the other spin-offs.
Ron Howard, Harrison Ford and Richard Dreyfuss स्ट्रक्चर in the फिल्मी.
The soundtrack was a huge success.
Director George Lucas is a native of Modesto, graduating from Downey ऊँची School in 1962.
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being अनुक्रमणिका for 2011, which interviews 1,000 participants daily and asks individuals to assess their jobs, finances, physical health, emotional राज्य of mind and communities, ranked Modesto 126 out of the 190 शहरों surveyed.
In दिसम्बर 2009, Forbes ranked modesto 48th out of 100 among `` Best Bang-for-the-Buck Cities ''.
In this ranking, Modesto ranked 8th in आवास affordability and travel time but also ranked 86th in job forecast growth and 99th in foreclosures.
Independence दिन, commonly ज्ञात as the Fourth of July, is a federal holiday in the United States commemorating the adoption of the घोषणा of Independence on जुलाई 4, 1776, declaring independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain.
Independence Day is commonly associated with fireworks, parades, barbecues, carnivals, fairs, picnics, concerts, baseball games, family reunions, and political speeches and ceremonies, in addition to various other public and निजी events celebrating the history, government, and परंपराओं of the United States.
Independence Day is the national day of the United States.
A gender प्रतीक denotes the sex of an organism or characterizes an agent by लिंग.
The two standard gender प्रतीकों denoting पुरूष ♂ and female ♀ हैं derived from astrological प्रतीकों, denoting the classical planets Mars and Venus, respectively.
These symbols have been in use चूंकि the Renaissance भी denoting elements in alchemy, specifically the metals iron and तांबे.
They यहूद पहला used to denote the effective gender of plants ( i.e. sex of individual in a given crossbreed, since most plants are hermaphroditic ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751.
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a अस्थाई right to hold जमीन or property in which a lessee or a किरायेदार holds अधिकारों of real property by some form of title इससे a lessor or landlord.
हालांकि a tenant करता hold rights to रियल property, a leasehold estate is typically माना personal property.
Leasehold is a रूप of land tenure or property tenure जहाँ one party buys the right to occupy जमीन or a building लिये a given length of time.
As lease is a legal estate, leasehold एस्टेट can be bought and बेची on the open market.
A leasehold यूँ differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is खरीदा outright and thereafter held for an indeterminate length of time, and also differs from a tenancy where a property is let ( rented ) on a periodic आधार such as weekly or monthly.
Until the end of the lease period ( often measured in decades or centuries ; a 99 year lease is quite common ) the leaseholder रै the सही to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed किराया to the owner.
Terms of the agreement are contained in a lease, which has elements of अनुबंध और property विधि intertwined.
The term एस्टेट लिये years may occasionally be used.
This refers to a leasehold estate for any specific period of time ( the शब्द `` years '' is misleading ).
An estate लिये years is not automatically नवीनीकृत.
colloquially, `` lease '' and `` leasing `` are often a formalization of a longer, विशिष्ट period as compared with a `` rental '' that created a tenancy at होगा, terminable or renewable at the समाप्त of a short काल.
Olivia ( also known as Welcome to the World of the सुअर Olivia ) is a british-american children 's animated television श्रेणी produced by media company chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books.
It is seen on Nick Jr. in the US, Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the UK and Ireland, and Disney जूनियर in लैटिन अमेरिका and ब्राज़ील, Treehouse TV in कनाडा.
The show has won a silver Parents ' Choice Award लिये इसके positive स्टोरी lines and वर्ण.
Location of Panama between Pacific ( bottom ) and Caribbean ( top ), with कनाल at शीर्ष बीच
the Panama Canal ( ) is a ship कनाल in Panama that connects the अटलांटिक Ocean ( via the caribbean Sea ) to the Pacific Ocean.
The canal cuts across the Isthmus of पनामा and is a key conduit for अंतरराष्ट्रीय maritime व्यापार.
There are ताले at each end to lift ships up to Gatun झील ( above sea-level ).
Gatun Lake was created to reduce the राशि of work required for the canal.
The current locks are wide.
A तीसरा, wider lane of locks is being built.
France began कार्य on the canal in 1881, but had to stop because of engineering problems and high मृत्यु due to disease.
The United राज्य ( US ) later took over the project and took a decade to complete the canal in 1914, enabling ships to avoid the lengthy Cape Horn route around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the Drake ड्योढ़ी ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan.
One of the largest and most difficult engineering projects कभी undertaken, the Panama Canal shortcut made it possible for ships to travel between the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans in half the time previously जरूरी.
the shorter, तेज़, safer route to the US West Coast and to nations in and along the प्रशांत Ocean allowed those places to become more एकीकृत साथ the world अर्थव्यवस्था.
दौरान this समय, स्वामित्व of the territory कि is now the Panama Canal थी first कोलम्बियाई, तब फ्रेंच, and then American ; the United States completed the construction.
The canal was taken over in 1999 by the Panamanian government, as long planned.
Annual traffic has risen from about 1,000 ships when the कनाल opened in 1914, to 14,702 vessels in 2008, the latter measuring a total of 309.6 million Panama canal/universal Measurement System ( pc/ums ) tons.
By 2008, अधिक than 815,000 vessels था passed through the कनाल, many of them much larger than the original planners could have envisioned ; the largest ships that can पारगमन the canal today हैं called Panamax.
The American Society of सिविल इंजीनियर्स has named the पनामा Canal one of the seven wonders of the आधुनिक world.
Benjamin फ्रैंकलिन ( April 17, 1790 ) was one of the Founding Fathers of the United States.
a विख्यात polymath, Franklin was a अग्रणी author, printer, political theorist, politician, postmaster, scientist, संगीतकार, inventor, satirist, civic activist, statesman, and diplomat.
as a scientist, he was a प्रमुख figure in the American आत्मज्ञान and the इतिहास of physics for his discoveries and theories regarding विद्युत.
He invented the lightning rod, bifocals, the Franklin stove, a carriage odometer, and the glass 'armonica '.
He facilitated many civic organizations, including a fire department और a university.
Franklin अर्जित the title of `` The First American '' for his early and indefatigable campaigning लिये colonial unity ; as an author और spokesman in London for several colonies, then as the first United States दूत to France, he exemplified the emerging अमरीकी nation.
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift, मुश्किल कार्य, education, community spirit, self-governing institutions, and opposition to authoritarianism both political and religious, साथ the scientific और tolerant values of the Enlightenment.
In the words of historian Henry Steele Commager, `` In a फ्रैंकलिन could be merged the virtues of Puritanism without its defects, the illumination of the Enlightenment without its heat. ''
To वाल्टर isaacson, this makes Franklin `` the सबसे संपन्नता American of his age and the most influential in inventing the type of society America would become. ''
फ्रैंकलिन, always proud of his working class roots, became a कामयाब newspaper editor and printer in Philadelphia, the leading city in the colonies.
He थी also साझेदार with William Goddard and Joseph गैलोवे the three of whom published the Pennsylvania वृत्तान्त, a newspaper कि was known for its revolutionary sentiments and criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies.
he became धनवान publishing Poor Richard 's Almanack and The Pennsylvania Gazette.
Franklin gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय renown as a scientist for his famous experiments in electricity and for उसके many inventions, especially the lightning लाठी.
He played a प्रमुख role in establishing the University of Pennsylvania और थी elected the first president of the American Philosophical Society.
Franklin became a national hero in अमेरिका when he spearheaded the प्रयत्न to have Parliament repeal the unpopular Stamp Act.
An accomplished diplomat, he was widely admired among the French as American minister to पेरिस and was a major फिगर in the development of positive Franco-American relations.
For many years he was the British postmaster for the colonies, which enabled him to set up the first national communications network.
He was क्रियाशील in community affairs, colonial and राज्य politics, as well as नेशनल and international अफेयर्स.
From 1785 to 1788, he served as governor of Pennsylvania.
Toward the end of उसके life, he freed his स्लेव और became one of the most prominent abolitionists.
उसके colorful जीवन and legacy of वैज्ञानिक and political achievement, and status as one of America 's most influential Founding Fathers, have देखी Franklin honored on coinage and money ; warships ; the names of many towns, काउंटी, educational institutions, namesakes, and companies ; and more than two centuries after his death, countless cultural references.
Criminal Minds is an अमरीकी police प्रक्रियात्मक टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम that premiered September 22, 2005, on CBS.
The series follows a team of profilers from the FBI 's Behavioral Analysis Unit ( bau ) based in Quantico, Virginia.
The bau is भाग of the FBI नेशनल Center for the Analysis of Violent Crime.
The show differs इससे many procedural dramas by focusing on profiling the criminal, rather than the अपराधों itself.
The show is produced by The Mark Gordon Company in संघ with CBS Television Studios ( originally Paramount Network Television then CBS Paramount Network Television ) and ABC Studios ( originally Touchstone Television ).
सीबीएस announced in October 2009 that Legacy Interactive would develop a वीडियो game आधारित on the show.
The game होता require players to examine crime scenes for clues to help solve murder mysteries.
The interactive पहेली game was released in 2012, लकिन did नहीं feature कोई of the voices of the show 's cast, nor was the cast involved साथ the project.
On March 14, 2012, CBS renewed दण्ड Minds for an eighth season, which premiered on September 26, 2012.
`` Heart-Shaped बक्सा '' is a song by the American grunge band Nirvana, written by vocalist और guitarist Kurt Cobain.
The सोंग was released as the first single from the group 's third और final studio album, in Utero, in 1993.
It was एक of two गीतों from the एल्बम mixed by Scott Litt in order to augment the original production by निर्माता Steve Albini.
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a physical single लिये sale in the United States, `` Heart-Shaped बक्सा '' received much अमरीकी radio airplay, reaching number one on the Billboard आधुनिक Rock Tracks chart.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय release of the सिंगल reached number five on the UK Singles Chart.
The song 's music video, directed by Anton Corbijn, garnered critical plaudits.
The कक्षीय speed of a body, generally a planet, a natural satellite, an artificial satellite, or a multiple स्टार, is the speed at जिससे it orbits around the barycenter of a system, प्रायः around a more massive body.
It can be used to refer to either the mean कक्षीय speed, the औसत गति as it completes an orbit, or instantaneous orbital speed, the गति at a particular पाइंट in its orbit.
The orbital speed at any स्थिति in the कक्षा can be computed from the अलहदा to the सेंट्रल body at that स्थिति, और the specific orbital उर्जा, which is स्वतंत्र of स्थिति : the kinetic उर्जा is the total energy ऋण the potential उर्जा.
भूरा Palace आंतरिक and अलिंद
Brown Palace Hotel is the second-oldest operating होटल in Denver, Colorado and is one of the first atrium-style hotel ever built.
It is now operated by Quorum होटल and Resorts.
It was निर्मित in 1892, one year बाद than the Oxford Hotel.
It was named for इसके original owner, Henry C. Brown, and was designed with its odd triangular shape by architect फ़्रैंक edbrooke.
The होटल is located at 321 17th St, Denver, CO between 17th गली, Broadway and tremont Street/Pl in downtown Denver पीछे the Republic Plaza.
The main entrance door is on Tremont Street.
DVD-Video is a consumer वीडियो स्वरूप used to स्टोर digital video on DVD discs, and is currently the dominant consumer video format in Asia, North America, Europe, and Australia.
discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 भाग 2 decoder ( e.g., a dvd खिलाड़ी, or a कंप्यूटर DVD drive with a तन्त्र dvd player ).
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel स्वरुप as described below ).
Typically, the data रेट लिये dvd movies ranges इससे 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s, and the bit रेट is usually adaptive.
It was पहला available for खुदरा around 1997.
the DVD-Video specification थी created by DVD Forum and can be obtained from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly available, क्युकी every subscriber must चिह्न a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the DVD किताब is proprietary and confidential.
The nautical mile ( symbol M, NM or nmi ) is a unit of length that is about one minute of arc of latitude measured साथ any meridian, or about एक मिनट of arc of longitude at the equator.
By international agreement it has been set at 1,852 metres exactly ( परिचय 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- SI ईकाई ( although accepted for use in the International प्रणाली of Units by the BIPM ) used especially by navigators in the shipping and aviation industries, and also in polar exploration.
It is commonly प्रयुक्त in international law और treaties, especially regarding the limits of territorial waters.
It विकसित इससे the sea mile और the related भौगोलिक mile.
The nautical mile remains in use by sea and air navigators worldwide क्युकी of its convenience when working with charts.
Most nautical charts use the Mercator projection whose scale varies by about a factor of six from the equator to 80° latitude, so charts covering large areas can not use a single linear scale.
The nautical मील is nearly equal to a minute of latitude on a chart, so a distance measured साथ a चार्ट divider can be roughly converted to nautical miles using the चार्ट 's latitude स्केल.
Shippensburg is a बरो in Cumberland and Franklin counties in the u.S. state of Pennsylvania.
Settled in 1730, Shippensburg lies in the Cumberland Valley, 41 miles ( 66 km ) west-southwest of Harrisburg, and is part of the Harrisburg– carlisle Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल.
in 1900, 3,228 people lived वहीँ ; in 1910, 3,457 ; और in 1940, 5,244 people lived वहीँ.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,492 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Shippensburg was incorporated as a borough on January 21, 1819.
In the past, there were furniture कारखानों, engine और pump works, and अन्य industrial works located within the town.
Shippensburg is also the home of the Beistle Company, the oldest and largest निर्माता of decorations and पार्टी goods, which sells its distinctive honeycomb paper decorations worldwide.
It is also the स्थान of pague and Fegan, the oldest continuously operated hardware स्टोर in Pennsylvania.
In May 2012, Volvo Construction Equipment began a $ 100 million expansion project to bring इसके American headquarters to shippensburg.
Shippensburg is भी घर to shippensburg University of Pennsylvania, one of 14 विश्वविद्यालयों of the Pennsylvania State System of उच्चतर Education.
वार्षिक the last full सप्ताह of July, the Shippensburg Community Fair is आयोजित.
Begun in 1958, the fair bills itself as Pennsylvania 's largest bi-county मेला.
the मेला includes agricultural exhibits, a craft show, खाना vendors, and carnival rides amongst अन्य things.
Every गर्मियाँ on the last Saturday of August, shippensburg holds the Corn Festival, an event that brings regional artisans and vendors to operate stands शहर.
the शहर is closed to traffic for at least 5 blocks for most of the day.
Average attendance at the festival is estimated at 60,000 - 70,000 each year.
Black hairy जीभ ( BHT, also termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a condition of the tongue where the filiform papillae elongate with black or brown discoloration, giving a black and hairy appearance.
The appearance may be alarming, but it is a harmless condition.
predisposing factors include smoking, xerostomia ( dry mouth ), soft diet, poor मौखिक hygiene and certain medications.
Management is by improving oral hygiene, especially scraping or brushing the जीभ.
The IEEE 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is a serial बस इंटरफ़ेस standard for high-speed communications और isochronous real-time data ट्रांसफ़र.
It थी developed in the late 1980s and early 1990s by Apple, who पुकारा it FireWire.
The 1394 interface is comparable to USB, and प्रायः those two technologies are considered together, though usb has more market share.
Apple first included firewire in some of its 1999 models, and सबसे Apple computers since the साल 2000 have included FireWire ports, हालांकि, as of 2013, nothing परे the 800 संस्करण ( IEEE-1394b ).
The interface is also ज्ञात by the brand i.LINK ( सोनी ), and Lynx ( Texas यंत्र ).
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel scsi in many अनुप्रयोग, because of lower implementation costs and a simplified, अधिक adaptable cabling system.
The 1394 standard also defines a backplane interface, though this is not as widely used.
IEEE 1394 is the high-definition Audio-Video Network Alliance ( HANA ) standard connection interface लिये a/v ( audio/visual ) component communication and control.
FireWire is also available in wireless, fiber optic, and coaxial versions using the isochronous protocols.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) was an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by his initials srv, Vaughan is best known as a founding member और leader of दोगुना Trouble.
साथ साथ वादक क्रिस layton and bassist टॉमी Shannon, they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
With a career spanning सात years, Vaughan और Double Trouble consistently sold out concerts जबकि their albums अक्सर गई सुनहरा.
he थी born और raised in Dallas, टेक्सास, and for a short period of समय lived in Graham, Texas.
As the younger bhai of jimmie Vaughan, vaughan प्रारंभ playing the guitar at age सात and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
at age 17, he dropped out of high स्कूल and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical career, joining groups ऐसे as krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, और the Cobras.
in 1977, he formed Triple threat Revue, a band that eventually विकसित into Double Trouble और regularly performed around Austin.
in 1982, vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the Montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland, catching the attention of musicians दाउद Bowie and जैक्सन Browne.
बोवी asked Vaughan to play on his आगामी studio album Let 's Dance, जबकि Browne offered the band free उपयोग of his personal studio in Los Angeles to रिकार्ड an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and दोगुना Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran record निर्माता John हैमंड Sr. and released their debut album, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the समूह released the एल्बम, Could n't Stand the Weather ( 1984 ) and Soul to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans.
Although उसके career had progressed सफलतापूर्वक, Vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास hospital in Atlanta, Georgia to give up a कोका और alcohol habit और returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, In Step was released और अर्जित them a Grammy Award for Best समकालीन Blues Performance.
On August 27, 1990, Vaughan was मारे in a helicopter crash following a प्रदर्शन in East ट्रॉय, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense style was निकला from a variety of musical genres.
He was बहकावे by blues musicians including Albert King, फ्रेडी King, ओटिस Rush, और Muddy waters, and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the classic blues and pentatonic scales.
He has received wide critical recognition for his गिटार playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011.
he was posthumously inducted into the ब्लूज़ Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in ऑस्टिन 's ऑडिटोरियम Shores park.
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be एक of the greatest musicians to come from the state of Texas.

In कंप्यूटर networking, gigabit ईथरनेट ( GbE or 1 GigE ) is a term describing various technologies for transmitting Ethernet frames at a rate of a gigabit per second ( 1,000,000,000 बिट्स per second ), as defined by the आईईईई 802.3-2008 standard.
It came into use beginning in 1999, धीरे supplanting Fast Ethernet in तार local networks, where it performed considerably faster.
the cables and equipment are बहुत similar to previous standards और were very common and economical by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit links connected through hubs हैं allowed by the specification, but full-duplex usage with switches is much more common.
