A postage stamp is a छोटी टुकड़ा of पेपर कि is purchased and displayed on an मद of mail as evidence of payment of postage.
Typically, stamps are made from special paper, with a नेशनल designation और denomination ( दाम ) on the face, and a gum adhesive on the reverse side.
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other प्राधिकृत विक्रेता and हैं used to अदा for the costs involved in moving mail as well as other business necessities such as insurance and registration.
The stamp’s shape is usually that of a छोटी rectangle of varying proportions, though त्रिकोण or other shapes are occasionally प्रयुक्त.
The stamp is affixed to an लिफाफा or other डाक कवर ( i.e., पैकेट, box, mailing बेलन ) that the ग्राहक wishes to send.
the item is तब processed by the postal system, where a postmark, sometimes known as a cancellation mark, is usually applied over the स्टैम्प and cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as प्रयुक्त, which prevents its reuse.
The postmark indicates the तिथि and point of origin of the mailing.
The mailed item is then delivered to the पता that the customer has applied to the envelope or कवर.
Postage stamps have facilitated the delivery of मेल since the 1840s.
पहले this time, ink and hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ), usually बना from wood or cork, were often used to frank the मेल and confirm the payment of postage.
The first adhesive postage stamp, commonly referred to as the Penny Black, was issued in the संयुक्त Kingdom in 1840.
The invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve the postal system in the United किंगडम of Great Britain and Ireland, which in the early 19th सदी थी in disarray और rife with corruption.
There are varying खाते of the inventor or inventors of the stamp.
Before the introduction of postage stamps, mail in the UK was paid लिये by the प्राप्तकर्ता, a system that was associated with an irresolvable problem : the लागत of delivering मेल यहूद नहीं recoverable by the postal service when प्राप्तकर्ता were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items, and senders had no incentive to सीमित the number, size, or वज़न of items sent, whether or not they होता ultimately be paid for.
The postage stamp resolved इस issue in a simple and elegant manner, with the additional benefit of room for an element of सौंदर्य to be introduced.
Later related inventions include डाक stationery ऐसे as prepaid-postage envelopes, पोस्ट cards, lettercards, aerogrammes and wrappers, postage मीटर, and, more recently, specialty बाक्स and envelopes provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service लिये priority or express mailing.
The postage स्टैम्प afforded convenience for both the मेलर and postal officials, more efficiently recovered costs लिये the postal service, and ultimately resulted in a better, faster डाक system.
With the conveniences stamps offered, their use resulted in greatly increased mailings during the 19th and 20th सदियां.
Postage stamps during this era यहूद the सबसे popular way of paying for mail, but by the end of the 20th century were rapidly होने आत by the use of metered postage and bulk mailing by व्यवसायों. )
the same result साथ respect to communications by private parties occurred over the पिछला decade of the 20th सदी and the first decade of the 21st due to declining cost of long distance telephone communications and the development and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems had.
As postage stamps with their engraved imagery began to appear on a widespread basis, historians and collectors began to take सूचना.
The study of postage stamps and their उपयोग is referred to as philately.
Stamp collecting can be दोनो a hobby and a रूप of historical study and reference, as government-issued postage stamps and their mailing systems have सदा been involved साथ the इतिहास of nations.
The विश्वविद्यालयों of Alabama at बर्मिंघम ( UAB ) is a public university in Birmingham in the U.S. state of Alabama.
विकासशील from an extension center स्थापित in 1936, the संस्था became an autonomous संस्था in 1969 and is today one of तीन institutions in the विश्वविद्यालयों of Alabama System.
uab offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic divisions leading to bachelor 's, निपुण 's, doctoral, and professional degrees in the social और behavioral sciences, the liberal arts, कारोबार, education, engineering, and health-related fields ऐसे as medicine, dentistry, optometry, nursing, और public health.
the school is highly renowned for its medical शोध and natural sciences programs.
the UAB Health System, one of the largest academic medical centers in the United States, is affiliated with the university.
UAB Hospital sponsors residency programs in various medical specialties, including internal medicine, न्यूरोलॉजी, surgery, radiology, और anesthesiology.
uab Hospital is the only ACS verified Level I आघात center in Alabama, as rated by the American College of अध्येतावृत्ति आघात Program.
UAB is the state 's largest employer, with more than 18,000 faculty and स्टाफ and over 53,000 jobs at the university और in the health system.
An estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan Area and 1 in 33 jobs in the state of Alabama are सीधे or indirectly related to UAB.
The university 's overall annual economic प्रभाव was estimated to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
in the fall of 2012, the University of अलबामा at Birmingham नामांकित 17,999 students इससे more than 110 countries, including 1,605 freshmen.
There are योजनाएँ to commence with an `` आक्रामक '' growth in enrollment at UAB.
The current UAB President is Dr. रे L. Watts.
Tofu, also called bean curd, is a food made by coagulating soy रस and then pressing the resulting curds into soft white blocks.
It is a component in many East Asian and southeast Asian cuisines.
वहीँ are many different varieties of टोफू, including fresh टोफू and tofu that रै been processed in some रास्ता.
Tofu has a subtle flavor and can be used in savory and sweet बर्तन.
It is often seasoned or marinated to suit the dish.
Tofu originated in ancient चीन कुछ 2,000 years पहले.
Chinese legend ascribes इसके invention to prince Liu an ( चाइनीज : 劉安 Liú ān, 179–122 BC ).
Tofu और its production technique were introduced into Korea and then जापानी दौरान the Nara period.
It spread into other parts of East Asia as well.
This spread likely coincided with the spread of Buddhism क्युकी it is an महत्वपूर्ण सोर्स of protein in the vegetarian diet of ईस्ट Asian Buddhism.
Li Shizhen in the Ming Dynasty described a विधि of making tofu in Bencao gangmu.
Tofu has a low calorie count, relatively large amounts of protein, and छोटी fat.
it is high in iron and depending on the coagulant used in manufacturing, may also be high in calcium and/or magnesium.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanzee, known for being the one-time pet of American recording artist Michael Jackson, who bought the primate from a Texas research सुविधा in the early 1980s.
the animal was a frequent travel companion to the सिंगर, whose attachment to the animal led to media mockery and, among other factors, to a पब्लिक बोध of Jackson as an eccentric.
During the Bad World दौरे, लिये example, Jackson brought Bubbles with him to जापानी, where वे both drank tea with the महापौर of Osaka.
Bubbles थी initially kept at the Jackson family 's home in Encino, Los Angeles, but was स्थानांतरित to Neverland Ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in Jackson 's bedroom, used the singer 's toilet, और ate candy in the Neverland movie theater.
In 2003 the public learned that, जैसे सब खिलाते chimpanzees, Bubbles had matured into a विशाल and aggressive adult chimp unsuitable as a companion एनिमल.
He थी sent to a California animal प्रशिक्षक, जहाँ he थी reported to have attempted suicide.
When the trainer shut down his operation in 2004, Bubbles थी moved to the Center for Great Apes, a अभयारण्य in Wauchula, Florida, where he has lived since 2005.
चिंतन are an अंग्रेज़ी rock band from Teignmouth, Devon, which formed in 1994.
The बैंड consists of school friends Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals, lead गिटार, piano, keyboards, keytar ), Christopher Wolstenholme ( बास, vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar, harmonica ) and डोमिनिक Howard ( drums, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the release of their 2006 album Black Holes and Revelations, keyboardist and percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band.
Muse are ज्ञात for their energetic and extravagant live प्रदर्शन and their संलयन of many music genres, सहित space rock, progressive rock, alternative rock, heavy metal, classical music and electronica.
Muse have released six studio albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ), Origin of Symmetry ( 2001 ), Absolution ( 2003 ), Black Holes and खुलासे ( 2006 ), The प्रतिरोध ( 2009 ) and the 2nd Law ( 2012 ).
They have भी issued three live albums, Hullabaloo Soundtrack ( 2002 ), जिससे is also a संकलन of B-sides, Absolution Tour ( 2005 ), and HAARP ( 2008 ), which documents the band 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007.
Black छेद और खुलासे earned the band a Mercury Prize नामांकन and a third place finish in the NME एल्बम of the Year सूची for 2006.
चिंतन have also जीती a collection of music awards throughout their इतिहास, including पाँच MTV यूरोपीय Music Awards, छह Q Awards, eight NME Awards, two ब्रिट Awards —winning `` Best British Live Act '' twice, an MTV Video Music पुरस्कार, four Kerrang !
Awards और an अमरीकी Music Award.
They were also मनोनीत for five Grammy Awards, of which they जीती Best Rock Album, for उनके fifth studio album The Resistance ( 2009 ).
Muse have sold over 15 million albums worldwide.
Bloemfontein (, ; Dutch for `` fountain of flowers '' ) is the पूंजी city of the फ़्री राज्य Province of South अफ़्रीकी ; and, as the judicial capital of the nation, one of South Africa 's three national capitals – the other दो being Cape Town, the legislative capital, और Pretoria, the administrative capital.
bloemfontein is popularly and poetically ज्ञात as `` the city of roses ``, owing to the abundance of these flowers and the annual रोज़ पर्व आयोजित there.
The city 's Sesotho name is mangaung, meaning `` प्लेस of cheetahs `` and it has महरूम शामिल in the mangaung Local Municipality since 2000.
Bloemfontein is situated on शुष्क grassland at, at an altitude of above sea level.
The city is home to 369,568 निवासियों, while the Mangaung Local Municipality has a population of 645,455.

the meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the significance of life or existence in general.
It can also be expressed in अलग forms, such as `` Why are we here ? ``, `` What is life सब about ? ``, and `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
it has been the subject of much philosophical, scientific, and theological speculation throughout history.
There have been a large number of proposed answers to these questions from many different cultural and ideological पृष्ठभूमि.
The meaning of जीवन is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence, social ties, consciousness, and happiness, and borders on many other issues, such as symbolic meaning, ontology, value, purpose, ethics, good and evil, free will, the existence of one or multiple Gods, conceptions of God, the आत्मा, and the afterlife.
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing related empirical facts about the universe, exploring the कॉन्टेक्स्ट and पैरामीटर्स concerning the 'how ' of life.
Science भी studies and can provide recommendations for the pursuit of well-being and a related धारणा of नैतिकता.
an alternative, humanistic approach poses the question `` What is the meaning of my life ? ''
the value of the question pertaining to the purpose of life may coincide with the achievement of ultimate वास्तविकता, or a feeling of oneness, or even a अहसास of sacredness.
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides the voices of Peter Griffin, Stewie Griffin, ब्रायन Griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
परिवार Guy is an अमरीकी animated sitcom that features five प्रमुख voice actors, और numerous regular डाल and recurring guest stars.
The principal आवाज़ cast consists of show निर्माता Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new कर्ता Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice अभिनेताओं include Patrick Warburton, आदम West, John G. Brennan, Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly, और repeat guest stars शामिल फिलिस Diller, चार्ल्स Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
अनेक cast members provide आवाज़ें लिये multiple वर्ण.
The आवाज़ actors, in portraying the various character personalities on the दिखाएँ, चित्रण inspiration from celebrities and pop culture.
परिवार guy characters have been played by more than one actor, after members of the show left the series or had conflicting obligations.
kunis was मनोनीत for an Annie पुरस्कार लिये voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` मुश्किल Legal `` and MacFarlane रै also won an एमी Award for Outstanding Voice-Over प्रदर्शन and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production, though no other cast member रै won an award for their work on the series.

`` The राजकुमारी and the Pea '' ( ; literal translation : `` the Princess on the मटर '' ) is a literary fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen about a यंग woman whose royal पहचान is established by a test of her physical sensitivity.
The tale was first published with three others by andersen in an inexpensive booklet on 8 May 1835 in Copenhagen by C.A. Reitzel.
Andersen had सुना the story as a child, और it संभावित has its source in folk material, संभवतः originating from Sweden as it is unknown in the डैनिश oral tradition.
Neither `` the Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen 's अन्य tales of 1835 यहूद well received by Danish आलोचकों, who disliked उनके casual, chatty style, and their कमी of morals.
In 1959 `` The Princess और the Pea '' was adapted to the musical stage in a production पुकारा Once upon a Mattress starring Carol Burnett.
जर्मनी Americans ( ) are citizens of the संयुक्त States जो were either born in जर्मनी or are of जर्मनी ancestry.
They comprise about 50 लाख people, making them the largest ancestry group ahead of Irish Americans, African Americans and English Americans.
They comprise about 1/3 of the German diaspora all over the world.
None of the German states had नई World colonies.
Not जबतक the 1670s did the first significant groups of German immigrants arrive in the British colonies, settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania.
आव्रजन continued in very large संख्याएँ during the 19th century, with कुछ eight लाख आमद from Germany.
They were pulled by the attractions of जमीन and religious freedom, and pushed out of यूरोपीय by shortages of land and धार्मिक or political दमन.
Many arrived seeking धार्मिक or political freedom, others for economic opportunities greater than those in Europe, and others simply for the chance to प्रारंभ fresh in the New World.
The arrivals before 1850 were mostly farmers who sought आउट the most productive land, where their intensive farming techniques would अदा off.
After 1840, many आए to शहरों, where `` Germania '' —German-speaking districts—soon emerged.
जर्मनी अमेरिकी established the first kindergartens in the United States, introduced the Christmas पेड़ परंपरा, and originated popular American foods ऐसे as hot dogs and hamburgers.
German American celebrations are held throughout the country, one of the most well-known होने the German-American Steuben Parade in New York नगर, आयोजित प्रत्येक third Saturday in September.
There are also major annual events in Chicago, Cincinnati, Milwaukee, Pittsburgh, St. Louis and अन्य cities.
Like many other immigrants that came to the United States, an overwhelming number of लोगों of German or आंशिक German descent have essentially become Americanized.
the प्रस्तावना to the United राज्य Constitution is a brief introductory बयान of the Constitution 's आधारभूत purposes और guiding principles.
It states in सामान्य terms, और courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning and कया they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to सब of the people of the United States.
as the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the नई government originates from the लोगों of the संयुक्त States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to that vast जनसांख्यिकी concerning the individual rights और equality among सब people ; this can be देखी most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social लोकतंत्र.
The इतिहास of the Internet began with the development of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक computers in the 1950s.
The public थी first introduced to the concepts that would सीसे to the Internet जब a message was भेजा over the ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of California, Los Angeles ( UCLA ), after the second piece of network equipment was संस्थापित at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ).
पैकेट switched networks such as arpanet, Mark I at NPL in the UK, CYCLADES, Merit Network, Tymnet, और telenet, were developed in the लेट 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of प्रोटोकॉल.
The ARPANET in particular led to the विकास of protocols लिये internetworking, in which multiple separate networks could be joined together into a संजाल of networks.
In 1982, the Internet protocol suite ( tcp/ip ) थी मानकीकृत, और consequently, the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks, पुकारा the अंतरजाल, was introduced.
अभिगम to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science संजाल ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations.
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned, removing the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the अंतरजाल has had a क्रांतिकारी impact on culture and commerce, including the rise of near-instant संचार by electronic मेल, instant messaging, Voice over Internet Protocol ( voip ) `` phone calls '', two-way interactive video calls, and the संसार Wide Web with its discussion forums, blogs, social नेटवर्किंग, and online खरीदारी sites.
The research and education community continues to develop and use advanced संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत high speed रीढ़ Network Service ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of आंकड़ा हैं transmitted at higher और higher speeds over fiber optic networks operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's takeover over the वैश्विक communication landscape was almost तत्काल in historical शर्तें : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in the year 1993, already 51 % by 2000, and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
आज the Internet continues to grow, driven by ever greater amounts of online information, कॉमर्स, entertainment, और सोशल नेटवर्किंग.
दक्षिणपश्चिम Airlines Co. ( ) is a major u.S. airline and the world 's largest low-cost वाहक, headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
It was स्थापित in 1967 और adopted its वर्तमान नाम in 1971.
The airline रै more than 46,000 employees and operates more than 3,400 फ़्लाइट प्रति day.
As of June 5, 2011, it carries the most domestic यात्री of any u.S. airline.
as of April 2013, Southwest एयरलाइंस has अनुसूचित service to 84 destinations in 41 states and Puerto Rico.
Southwest Airlines has solely संचालित बोइंग 737s, except for a few years in the 1970s and 1980s, जब it संचालित Boeing 727s.
As of अगस्त 2012, Southwest is the largest ऑपरेटर of the 737 विश्वव्यापी with over 550 in service, each operating an average of छह flights per day.
In May 2011, the airline acquired AirTran Airways, with संयोजन of the carriers expected to be complete by 2014.
On March 1, 2012, the company was issued a single operating certificate, technically becoming one एयरलाइन.
Rolling Rock is a 4.6 % abv pale lager launched in 1939 by the Latrobe Brewing कम्पनी.
Although संस्थापित as a local beer in Western Pennsylvania, it was marketed aggressively और eventually became a नेशनल product.
The brand was बेची to Anheuser-Busch of St. लुई, Missouri, in मिड 2006, which transferred brewing परिचालन to New Jersey.
Benedict XVI (,, ; born Joseph aloisius ratzinger on 16 April 1927 ) is पोप emeritus of the Catholic गिरिजाघर.
He served as Pope from 2005 to 2013.
In that position, he was both the leader of the Catholic Church और Sovereign of the Vatican City राज्य.
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave, मनाये his Papal Inauguration Mass on 24 अप्रैल 2005, and took possession of his गिरजाघर, the archbasilica of St. John Lateran, on 7 May 2005.
Ordained as a priest in 1951 in his native बायर्न, Ratzinger established himself as a highly regarded विश्वविद्यालयों theologian by the late 1950s और was appointed a full प्राध्यापक in 1958.
After a long career as an academic, सेवारत as a professor of theology at अनेक German universities—the last होने the विश्वविद्यालयों of Regensburg, where he served as वाइस President of the university in 1976 and 1977—he was appointed Archbishop of Munich and Freising and cardinal by Pope पॉल VI in 1977, an unusual promotion for किसी साथ little pastoral अनुभव.
In 1981, he settled in Rome when he became Prefect of the Congregation लिये the Doctrine of the Faith, one of the most important dicasteries of the Roman Curia.
From 2002 until his election as pope, he was also डीन of the College of Cardinals, and as such, the primus इंटर pares among the cardinals.
Prior to becoming pope, he was `` a प्रमुख figure on the Vatican stage लिये a quarter of a century '' as `` एक of the most respected, influential and विवादास्पद members of the College of Cardinals '' ; he had an influence `` second to none जब it came to सेटिंग church priorities and directions '' as एक of पोप John Paul ii 's closest confidants.
He was originally a उदार theologian, but adopted रूढ़िवादी views बाद 1968.
His prolific writings defend traditional Catholic doctrine and values.
During his papacy, बेनेडिक्ट xvi advocated a return to fundamental Christian values to counter the increased secularisation of many Western countries.
He views relativism 's denial of उद्देश्य truth, and the denial of moral truths in particular, as the सेंट्रल problem of the 21st century.
He सिखाया the importance of both the Catholic Church and an समझना of परमेश्वर 's redemptive love.
Pope बेनेडिक्ट भी revived a number of traditions including elevating the Tridentine Mass to a more prominent position.
he नवीनीकृत the संबंध between the कैथोलिक Church और art, viewing the use of सौंदर्य as a path to the sacred, promoted the use of Latin, and reintroduced traditional papal garments, लिये जिससे reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics ''.
He has been described as `` the main intellectual force in the Church '' since the mid-1980s.
Several of Pope Benedict 's students इससे his academic career are also prominent churchmen today and confidantes of him, notably Christoph Schönborn.
On 11 February 2013, Pope Benedict announced his इस्तीफा in a speech in लैटिन before the cardinals, citing a `` lack of strength of mind and body '' due to his advanced age.
His resignation became effective on 28 February 2013.
He is the first पोप to इस्तीफा चूंकि Pope Gregory बारहवीं in 1415, and the first to do so on उसके अपना initiative since Pope Celestine V in 1294.
As pope emeritus, Benedict retains the स्टाइल of His Holiness, and the title of Pope, and will continue to dress in the papal रंग of white.
He was succeeded by Pope फ्रांसिस on 13 March 2013, and he moved into the newly renovated Mater Ecclesiae मठ for उसके रिटायरमेंट on 2 May 2013..

Stereoscopy ( भी called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique for creating or enhancing the illusion of depth in an image by अर्थात् of stereopsis for binocular vision.
The शब्द stereoscopy derives इससे the Greek `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` firm, solid '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to look '', `` to see ''.
Most stereoscopic methods present two offset बिंब separately to the left and right eye of the viewer.
ये two-dimensional images are then combined in the brain to give the perception of 3D depth.
इस technique is distinguished इससे 3d displays that display an चित्र in three full आयाम, allowing the observer to increase सूचना about the 3-dimensional objects being प्रदर्शित by सिर and eye movements.
John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( o.s. October 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier served as the first vice अध्यक्ष of the United States.
An अमरीकी Founding Father, he was a statesman, diplomat, और a leading advocate of American independence इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन.
खूब educated, he was an Enlightenment political theorist who promoted republicanism and wrote prolifically about his often seminal ideas, दोनो in प्रकाशित works and in letters to his बीवी and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the जल्दी stages of the American Revolution.
A lawyer and पब्लिक figure in Boston, as a प्रतिनिधि इससे Massachusetts to the Continental Congress, he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare स्वतंत्रता.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of Independence in 1776, और was its primary advocate in the कॉंग्रेस.
Later, as a राजनयिक in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual peace सन्धि with ग्रेट Britain, और was जिम्मेदार for obtaining vital governmental loans इससे Amsterdam bankers.
a political theorist and historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, which together with his पहले Thoughts on Government, influenced American political विचार.
One of his greatest भूमिकाएँ was as a judge of character : in 1775, he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief, and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States.
Adams ' क्रांतिकारी credentials secured him two terms as George वॉशिंगटन 's वाइस president and his own election in 1796 as the second president.
During his one पद, he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans, as well as the dominant faction in his own Federalist पार्टी led by his कड़वा enemy सिकंदर हैमिल्टन.
एडम्स हस्ताक्षरित the controversial Alien और Sedition अधिनियमों, and built up the army and navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval war ( पुकारा the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of his presidency was उसके peaceful रेज़ोल्यूशन of the विरोध in the फेस of Hamilton 's विपक्ष.
In 1800, Adams was पराजित for re-election by Thomas Jefferson and रिटायर्ड to मैसाचुसेट्स.
He later resumed his friendship with Jefferson.
He and his wife, अबीगैल Adams, संस्थापित an संपन्नता family line of politicians, diplomats, and historians now referred to as the Adams political परिवार.
एडम्स was the father of John Quincy Adams, the sixth अध्यक्ष of the United States.
His achievements have received वृहद recognition in modern times, हालांकि his contributions were not initially as मनाये as those of other Founders.
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the building कि eventually became known as the White House.
The संयुक्त राज्य ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States करेंसी.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander Hamilton, is currently featured on the obverse of the bill, while the u.S. Treasury Building is प्रदर्शित on the reverse.
( Hamilton is एक of two non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills.
the other is Benjamin फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is एक of तभी four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who थी not born in the continental United States, as he was from the West Indies.
The others हैं : Albert gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; and Robert Morris, England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver प्रमाणपत्र ).
In addition, Kamehameha I, appears on the 2008 हवाई state क्वार्टर. )
All $ 10 bills issued today are संघीय आरक्षित Notes.
The Bureau of नक्काशी और Printing says the average life of a $ 10 विधेयक in circulation is 18 months पहले it is replaced due to wear.
Approximately 6 % of all US banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills हैं delivered by Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is जॉन Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait संग्रहण of New York नगर Hall.
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in परिसंचरण in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow विल्सन facing to the left, but was used only for intra-government transactions ).

A jetboat is a boat propelled by a जेट of water ejected from the वापस of the शिल्प.
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that उपयोग a propeller in the water नीचे or behind the नाव, a jetboat draws the water इससे अंतर्गत the boat into a पंप अंदर the boat, तब expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
jetboats were originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who developed a waterjet in 1954 ) for operation in the fast-flowing और उथले rivers of New Zealand, specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking rocks in such waters.
Previous कोशिशें at waterjet propulsion had very short lifetimes, generally due to the inefficient डिज़ाइन of the units and the फैक्ट that they offered few लाभ over conventional propellers.
Unlike these previous waterjet developments, such as Campini 's और the Hanley hydrojet, Hamilton had a specific need for a propulsion system to operate in very-shallow जल, and the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution.
From this, the लोकप्रियता of the jet unit और jetboat increased rapidly.
Through further developments, it थी found the waterjet offered several other advantages over propellers for a wide range of vessel types, and as such, waterjets हैं प्रयुक्त widely आज for many high-speed बरतन, including passenger ferries, rescue craft, patrol boats और offshore supply vessels.
Jetboats are highly maneuverable, and many can, इससे पूरा speed, be reversed and brought to a रोकें within little more than their own लंबाई, in a maneuver known as a `` क्रैश stop ''.
The well known हैमिल्टन turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre where the boat 's engine throttle is cut, the steering is turned sharply और the throttle opened again, causing the boat to spin quickly around with a large spray of water.
वहीँ is no engineering limit to the size of jetboats, हालांकि the validity of their use depends a lot on the प्रकार of अनुप्रयोग.
क्लासिक prop-drives are generally more efficient and किफायती at low speeds, up to about, but as boat speed increases beyond this, the extra hull resistance generated by struts, rudders, shafts ( etc. ) means waterjets are more efficient in the 20-50 गांठ range ( up to ).
Also, in परिस्थितियों with बहुत विशाल propellers turning at slow speeds ( ऐसे as tug boats ), the equivalent size waterjet होता be too big to be practical.
For these reasons, the विशाल majority of waterjet units are installed in high-speed vessels और in particular situations जहाँ shallow draught, maneuverability, and load flexibility are main चिंताएं.
The biggest jet-driven vessels are found in सैन्य उपयोग or the high-speed passenger/car ferry उद्योग.
South अफ़्रीकी 's s ( approximately long ) हैं the biggest jet-propelled vessels so far.
Even these German-built vessels are capable of performing `` crash stops ''.
Uveitis is broadly पारिभाषित as inflammation of the uvea.
the uvea consists of the middle, pigmented, vascular structures of the eye और includes the iris, ciliary body, और choroid.
Uveitis requires an तात्कालिक referral and thorough परिक्षा by an ophthalmologist or optometrist साथ with urgent treatment to control the inflammation.

The Shining is a 1980 मनोवैज्ञानिक हॉरर film उत्पादित and निर्देशित by Stanley Kubrick, co-written with novelist Diane Johnson, और starring Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Scatman Crothers, और डैनी Lloyd.
The film is based on the Stephen King अनोखा The जगमगाता.
A लेखक, Jack Torrance, takes a job as an off-season कार्यवाहक at an isolated hotel.
His young son possesses psychic abilities और is able to see things from the past and future, such as the ghosts who inhabit the होटल.
Soon after settling in, the family is फंस in the hotel by a snowstorm, and Jack gradually becomes influenced by a supernatural presence ; he descends into madness and attempts to murder his wife and बेटे.
Unlike previous Kubrick films, which विकसित an audience gradually by building on word-of-mouth, the Shining was released as a mass-market film, खोलने at first in just two शहरों on Memorial Day, then nationwide a month later.
हालांकि initial response to the फिल्मी थी mixed, later critical assessment थी more favorable and it is now viewed as a classic of the horror genre.
Film director Martin Scorsese, writing in The Daily Beast, ranked it as one of the 11 scariest horror movies of सब time.
फिल्मी आलोचकों, film students, and Kubrick 's producer, Jan Harlan, have remarked on the enormous influence the film has had on लोकप्रिय culture.
The आरंभिक European release of The Shining थी 25 मिनट्स shorter than the अमरीकी version, achieved by removing most of the scenes taking place outside the environs of the hotel.
आँगन Cola Bottle
Patio Diet Cola was a brand of आहार soda introduced by Pepsi in 1963.
It थी created in response to Diet Rite Cola, which was the first diet cola on the मार्केट.
Fitness प्रवर्तक Debbie Drake was Patio आहार कोला 's प्रवक्ता.
In 1964, Patio released orange, grape, और रूट बियर जायका.
This flavor line was not meant to compete with brands like Orange crush, लकिन rather fill out the लकीर.
Patio sodas were उपलब्धियाँ in the cold-bottle मार्केट : grocery and mom-and-pop stores.
विज्ञापन लिये आँगन was comparatively scarce ; at the time, bottlers were regionally franchised, और सम्बन्धित advertising थी necessarily local.
In 1964, आँगन diet cola became Diet Pepsi.
The newly branded diet सोडा was advertised alongside Pepsi with the tagline `` Pepsi either रास्ता '', which replaced the slogan `` Dances साथ flavor ''.
The short life span of Patio Diet cola makes it a ग्रेट addition for bottle collectors.
सबसे of the remaining आँगन line of flavors were phased आउट by the जल्दी 1970s, while a few survived until the मिड 70s
Infrastructure is basic शारीरिक and organizational structures needed लिये the operation of a society or enterprise, or the services and facilities necessary for an economy to function.
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural तत्व that provide framework supporting an संपूर्ण structure of development.
It is an important term for judging a देश or region 's development.
The term typically refers to the technical structures that support a society, ऐसे as roads, bridges, जल supply, sewers, electrical grids, telecommunications, and so forth, and can be defined as `` the physical components of interrelated systems providing commodities and services essential to enable, sustain, or बढ़ाएँ societal living conditions. ''
Viewed functionally, अवसंरचना facilitates the उत्पादन of goods और सेवाएं, and also the वितरण of finished उत्पाद to markets, as well as मौलिक social services such as schools and hospitals ; for example, roads enable the transport of raw materials to a फैक्टरी.
In military parlance, the term refers to the buildings and स्थाई installations जरुरी for the support, redeployment, and operation of military forces.
to make it simple, अवसंरचना is anything कि is needed everyday, an रोज item.
A graphical representation of the आदर्श human karyotype
Mitochondrial DNA.
Human genetic variation is the genetic differences both within and among populations.
There may be multiple variants of any given जीन in the human population ( genes ), leading to polymorphism.
Many genes are not बहुरूपी, meaning that only a single allele is present in the population : the जीन is then said to be fixed.
no two इंसानो are genetically identical.
Even monozygotic twins, who develop इससे one zygote, have infrequent जेनेटिक differences due to mutations occurring during development and gene copy number variation.
Differences between individuals, even closely सम्बन्धित individuals, are the key to techniques such as genetic fingerprinting.
Alleles occur at अलग frequencies in different human populations, with populations that हैं अधिक geographically and ancestrally remote tending to differ more.
Causes of differences between individuals include the exchange of genes during meiosis and various mutational events.
वहीँ are at तनिक two reasons क्यों genetic variation exists between populations.
Natural चयन may confer an adaptive advantage to individuals in a specific environment if an allele provides a competitive advantage.
Alleles under selection are likely to occur only in those geographic regions जहाँ they confer an लाभ.
The second main cause of genetic variation is due to the high degree of neutrality of सबसे mutations.
Most mutations do नहीं appear to have any selective प्रभाव one way or the other on the organism.
The main कारण is genetic drift, this is the effect of random changes in the gene pool.
In humans, founder प्रभाव and past small population size ( increasing the likelihood of genetic drift ) may have had an important influence in neutral differences between populations.
The theory that humans recently migrated आउट of Africa supports इस.
the study of human genetic variation has both evolutionary significance and medical अनुप्रयोग.
It can help scientists understand ancient human population migrations as well as कैसा अलग human groups are biologically related to one another.
For medicine, study of human genetic variation may be important because कुछ disease-causing alleles occur more often in people from specific geographic regions.
New findings show that प्रत्येक इंसान has on average 60 new mutations compared to their अभिभावक.
अलावा from mutations, many जीनों that may have aided humans in प्राचीन टाइम्स प्लेग इंसानो today.
For example, it is suspected that जीनों that allow humans to अधिक efficiently process food are those that make people susceptible to obesity and diabetes आज.
Tea Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol and the National Mall at the Taxpayer March on वॉशिंगटन on September 12, 2009.
The Tea Party movement is an American political गति that advocates strict adherence to the United States Constitution, reducing U.S. government spending and कर, and reduction of the u.S. नेशनल debt और federal budget deficit.
The movement has been पुकारा partly conservative, partly libertarian, and partly populist.
The movement has sponsored protests and समर्थित political candidates चूंकि 2009.
The name of the movement is derived from the Boston Tea Party of 1773, an iconic event in American history.
Anti-tax प्रदर्शनकारियों in the United States have often referred to the असली Boston Tea Party for inspiration.
References to the Boston Tea Party यहूद part of Tax Day protests held throughout the 1990s and पहले.
By 2001, a custom had developed among some conservative activists of mailing tea बैग to legislators and other officials as a symbolic अधिनियम.
The currencies of प्यूर्टो Rico closely follow the historic development of Puerto रीको.
As a colony of स्पेन and the United States, प्यूर्टो रीको was granted the use of both foreign and प्रांतीय currencies.
following the Spanish colonization in 1502, Puerto Rico became an important port, with इसके own supply of gold.
However, as the mineral reserves ran empty within the सदी, the archipelago 's economy suffered.
The Spanish क्राउन issued the Situado Mexicano, which meant that a semi-regular shipment of gold इससे the viceroyalty of New Spain would be sent to the island, as a रास्ता to provide economic support.
Between 1636 and 1637, Philip iv of Spain imposed a tax which had to be paid using a revenue stamp.
प्रेरित by this, Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766, becoming the first उपनिवेश to print 8- real banknotes in the स्पेनी Empire and which in the Spanish सरकारी 's स्वीकृति of subsequent issues.
The situado थी discontinued दौरान the 19th सदी, creating an economic crisis, as a result of मैक्सिको gaining its independence from Spain.
Salvador Meléndez Bruna, the औपनिवेशिक governor in office, ordered the समस्या of provincial banknotes, creating the प्यूर्टो rican peso.
However, मुद्रण of ये banknotes ceased after 1815.
During the following दशकों, विदेशी coins became the widespread currency.
In the 1860s and 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
On February 1, 1890, the Banco Español de Puerto Rico was inaugurated and began issuing banknotes.
The bank designed four series और placed three in circulation under Spanish rule.
In 1895, a royal Decree ordered the उत्पादन of provincial peso coins.
on August 13, 1898, the Spanish-American War ended साथ Spain ceding प्यूर्टो Rico to the United States.
The banco Español de प्यूर्टो Rico was renamed Bank of पोर्टो Rico and issued बिल्स समतुल्य to the United States डालर, creating the Puerto Rican dollar.
In 1902, the First National Bank of पोर्टो Rico issued banknotes in a parallel manner.
Two more series were issued until 1913.
बाद Puerto Rico 's economy और monetary system was fully integrated into the United राज्य ' economic and मौद्रिक system, the Puerto Rican dollars were redeemed for those issued by the United States Treasury.
the peso and डालर have महरूम followed by other contemporary issues, सहित commemorative banknotes, निजी currency, and a quarter coin designed with फोर्ट San Felipe del Morro in the face.
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi, formerly stylized in अपरकेस as PEPSI ) is a carbonated soft drink that is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo.
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's Drink, it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28, 1898, तब to Pepsi in 1961.
The Book of Ezekiel is the तीसरा of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew बाइबल, following the books of यशायाह and Jeremiah and preceding the किताब of the बारह.
( The order is somewhat different in the Christian Old Testament ).
It derives its name from, and records the visions of, the 6th century BC priest and prophet Ezekiel.
According to the book, the prophet, exiled in Babylon, experienced a series of seven visions during the 22 years from 593 to 571 BC, a period which spans the फाइनल destruction of Jerusalem in 586.
the visions, and the book, हैं structured around तीन themes : ( 1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) judgment on the राष्ट्र ( अध्याय 25-32 ) ; और future blessings for Israel ( अध्याय 33-48 ).
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a major United States port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana.
The population of the city was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. जनसांख्यिकी.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States.
The नई Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined सांख्यिकीय Area, a larger trading area, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
The city is named बाद Orléans, a city located on the loire River in Centre, France, and is well known for इसके पृथक French क्रियोल architecture, as खूब as its cross-cultural and multilingual विरासत.
नई Orleans is also famous for इसके cuisine, music ( विशेषकर as the birthplace of jazz ), and its सालाना celebrations and त्यौहार, most notably Mardi Gras.
The नगर is often referred to as the `` most unique '' in अमेरिका.
नई Orleans is located in southeastern Louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The city and ऑरलियन्स Parish ( ) हैं.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of st. Tammany to the north, St. Bernard to the east, Plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the दक्षिण and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of which is included in the city limits, lies to the north and झील Borgne lies to the east.
the नेशनल Birth कंट्रोल League थी a birth control organization in the संयुक्त States.
It was founded in March 1915 by Mary dennett, Clara Gruening Stillman and Jessie एशले.
इसके main purpose was to overturn the laws which banned contraceptives from the U.S. mails.
अभियान यहूद आरोहित in नई यॉर्क, but in 1919 the League was disbanded and reformed into the Voluntary Parenthood League.
Cancer, known medically as a malignant neoplasm, is a broad समूह of विभिन्न diseases, all involving unregulated cell growth.
In cancer, cells divide and grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, and invade nearby parts of the body.
The cancer may भी spread to more दूर भाग of the body through the lymphatic system or bloodstream.
नहीं all tumors are cancerous.
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably, do not invade neighboring tissues, और do not spread throughout the body.
There are over 200 different ज्ञात cancers that afflict humans.
determining what कल्याणकारी cancer is जटिल.
अनेक things हैं known to बढ़ाएँ the risk of cancer, including tobacco उपयोग, certain infections, radiation, lack of शारीरिक activity, obesity, and environmental pollutants.
These can directly damage genes or combine साथ existing जेनेटिक faults within कोशिकाएं to cause the disease.
Approximately five to ten percent of cancers are entirely hereditary.
Cancer can be detected in a number of ways, including the presence of certain signs and लक्षण, screening परीक्षण, or चिकित्सा imaging.
Once a possible cancer is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic examination of a tissue sample.
Cancer is usually treated with कीमोथेरेपी, radiation therapy and surgery.
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the type और location of the कर्कट और the extent of disease at the start of treatment.
While cancer can affect people of all ages, and a few types of cancer are more common in children, the risk of developing cancer generally increases with आयु.
In 2007, cancer caused about 13 % of all human मौतों विश्वव्यापी ( 7.9 million ).
Rates are rising as अधिक people live to an old age and as mass जीवनशैली changes occur in the developing world.

Skiing is a recreational activity और competitive sport in which the participant attaches long runners or skis to boots or shoes on the feet and uses उन्हें to सफर on top of snow.
Aside from मनोरंजन और competition, skiing has महरूम used for military purposes and even यात्राएं in areas that अनुभव heavy snowfall.
Many types of competitive skiing events are recognized by the International ओलम्पिक Committee, and the International स्की संघ.
John Maynard Keynes, 1st Baron Keynes, CB, FBA ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 अप्रैल 1946 ) थी a British economist जिनकी विचार have fundamentally affected the theory and practice of modern macroeconomics, and informed the economic policies of governments.
He निर्मित on और greatly refined earlier कार्य on the causes of business cycles, और is widely considered to be one of the संस्थापकों of modern macroeconomics and the सबसे influential economist of the 20th century.
उसके ideas are the basis for the school of thought known as Keynesian economics, as खूब as its various offshoots.
In many ways, subsequent developments in 20th century economics can be viewed as either भवन on Keynes ' ideas or reacting विरूद्ध उन्हें.
in the 1930s, keynes spearheaded a क्रान्ति in economic thinking, overturning the पुरानी ideas of neoclassical economics that held कि free markets would, in the short to medium term, automatically provide full नियुक्ति, as long as मजदूर were flexible in their wage demands.
Keynes instead argued that aggregate demand संकल्पित the overall स्तर of economic activity, and that inadequate aggregate माँग could lead to prolonged periods of ऊँची unemployment.
He advocated the use of fiscal and monetary measures to mitigate the प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of economic recessions and depressions.
Following the outbreak of the दूसरी World युद्ध, Keynes 's ideas concerning economic policy were adopted by leading Western economies.
In 1942, Keynes was awarded a hereditary peerage as Baron Keynes of Tilton in the काउंटी of ससेक्स.
Keynes died in 1946, but during the 1950s and 1960s the success of keynesian economics resulted in almost सब पूंजीवादी governments adopting इसके policy recommendations.
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s, partly as a परिणाम of problems that began to afflict the Anglo-American economies इससे the start of the decade, and partly because of critiques from Milton Friedman and other अर्थशास्त्रियों who were pessimistic परिचय the ability of governments to विनियमित the business साईकिल with fiscal policy.
However, the आगमन of the वैश्विक financial संकट in 2007 caused a resurgence in Keynesian thought.
Keynesian economics provided the theoretical underpinning for आर्थिक नीतियों undertaken in response to the संकट by Presidents George W. बुश and Barack Obama of the United States, Prime Minister Gordon Brown of the United Kingdom, and other heads of सरकारें.
In 1999, Time magazine included Keynes in their list of the 100 most important and influential people of the 20th century, commenting कि : `` His radical idea that governments should spend money they do n't have may have saved capitalism. ''
In जोड to being an अर्थशास्त्री, Keynes थी also a सिविल servant, a director of the British Eugenics Society, a director of the बैंको of England, a patron of the arts और an आर्ट collector, a भाग of the Bloomsbury Group of intellectuals, an advisor to अनेक charitable trusts, a writer, a philosopher, a private investor, and a farmer.
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by Jekuthiel Sofer emulated the 1675 Ten Commandments at the Amsterdam Esnoga synagogue.
The Ten आयतें, भी known as the Decalogue, are a set of biblical कानून relating to ethics and इबादत, which play a fundamental role in Judaism, Islam and Christianity.
They include instructions to worship तभी God, to keep the sabbath holy and prohibitions against idolatry, इनकार, हत्या, theft, deception and व्यभिचार.
Different groups follow slightly different traditions for interpreting and numbering them.
The Ten Commandments appear twice in the यहूदी Bible, in the books of Exodus और Deuteronomy.
according to the story in Exodus, God inscribed them on two stone tablets, which he दिया to Moses on माउंट Sinai.
Modern scholarship has found likely प्रभाव in hittite and Mesopotamian laws और treaties, but is विभाजित over exactly when the टेन Commandments were written and who wrote them.
The discography of the English alternative चट्टान band The Smiths consists of four studio albums, एक extended play ( EP ), one सजीव album, ten compilation albums, twenty singles, one video album and fourteen म्यूज़िक videos on the Rough Trade, Sire और WEA record labels.
The band was formed in 1982 in Manchester by vocalist morrissey, guitarist Johnny Marr, bass खिलाड़ी Andy Rourke और drummer Mike Joyce.
Despite being championed by BBC Radio 1 disc jockey John Peel, the band 's debut single, `` हाथ in Glove `` ( may 1983 ), विफल to चार्ट.
इसके follow-up, `` This आकर्षक Man `` ( October 1983 ), met साथ critical acclaim और पहुँचे क्रमांक twenty-five on the UK Singles Chart.
The Smiths ' cult status was followed by mainstream success in 1984, as they पहुँचे number twelve in the uk with the `` What Difference करता It Make ? `` सिंगल and reached क्रमांक दो on the UK Albums Chart साथ their debut album, The Smiths ( 1984 ).
Their next तीन singles all reached the top twenty of the charts in the UK, helping to consolidate उनके previous chart success.
The अगला studio एल्बम, Meat Is Murder ( 1985 ), reached the top of the British चार्ट ; however, the तभी single to be released from the album, `` That चुटकुला Is n't Funny Anymore `` ( 1985 ), विफल to break the UK Top 40.
Returning to form, The Smiths ' next six singles all पहुँचे the higher than क्रमांक thirty in the uk and their third एल्बम, The Queen Is मुर्दे ( 1986 ), reached number two in the uk.
despite the band 's चार्ट success, marr left the group in August 1987 due to a strained relationship साथ morrissey.
Failing to ढूँढें a बदलना, The Smiths disbanded by the time उनके फाइनल studio एल्बम, Strangeways, Here we आइये, थी released in September कि year.
Strangeways, Here We Come reached number two in the UK and became the band 's highest-charting release in the संयुक्त राज्य जब it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200.
In जल्दी 1992, wea acquired the entire back catalogue of The Smiths and produced two compilations – Best... I and... बेहतरीन II – the first of which reached the top of the UK Albums Chart.
WEA released two further singles compilations in 1995 and 2001, साथ a further compilation, The Sound of The Smiths, released in November 2008.
Gone with the Wind is a novel written by Margaret Mitchell, first प्रकाशित in 1936.
It is often placed in the literary sub-genre of the ऐतिहासिक romance novel.
However, it has महरूम argued the अनोखा is a `` near miss '' and does not contain all of the elements of the रोमांस genre, making it simply a historical अनोखा.
The story is set in क्लेटन County, जॉर्जिया, and Atlanta during the American Civil War and Reconstruction.
it depicts the experiences of Scarlett O'Hara, the spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner, who जरूर उपयोग every means at her disposal to आइये out of the poverty she पाता herself in after शरमन 's `` March to the Sea ''.
Margaret Mitchell began writing Gone साथ the Wind in 1926 to pass the time while recovering from an auto-crash injury that refused to heal.
In April 1935, Harold Latham of Macmillan, an editor who was looking for new fiction, read कया she था written and saw that it could be a best-seller.
After लैथम agreed to publish the किताब, Mitchell worked लिये another छह months checking the historical references, और rewrote the खोलने chapter several times.
Mitchell and her husband जॉन Marsh, a copy editor by trade, edited the final version of the अनोखा.
Mitchell wrote the book 's final moments first, and then wrote the events that led up to it.
As to what became of her lovers, Rhett and Scarlett, after the novel ended, Mitchell did not know, and कहा, `` For all i जान, Rhett may have found someone else जो was less मुश्किल. ''
Mitchell प्राप्त the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction लिये the book in 1937.
The book थी adapted into a 1939 American फिल्मी.
Gone with the Wind is the only अनोखा by Mitchell published during her आजीवन.
Endodontics ( from the Greek endo `` अंदर '' ; और odons `` tooth '' ) is one of the dental specialties recognized by the American Dental Association, royal College of Dentists of Canada, and Royal Australasian कॉलेज of Dental अध्येतावृत्ति, and deals साथ the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a tooth.
endodontists perform a किस्में of procedures including endodontic चिकित्सा ( commonly ज्ञात as `` रूट canal therapy '' ), endodontic retreatment, surgery, treating cracked दांत, and treating dental trauma.
Root canal चिकित्सा is one of the most common procedures.
If the pulp ( containing nerves, arterioles, venules, lymphatic tissue, और fibrous tissue ) becomes diseased or घायल, endodontic treatment is required to save the दाँत.
सीरियल Attached SCSI ( SAS ) is a point-to-point serial protocol that moves data to and from कंप्यूटर भंडार devices such as hard drives and टेप drives.
SAS replaces the पुरानी समानांतर scsi ( pronounced `` scuzzy '' ) bus technology that first appeared in the mid-1980s.
SAS, like its predecessor, उपयोग the standard SCSI command set.
SAS offers backward compatibility with second-generation SATA ड्राइव.
SATA 3 Gbit/s ड्राइव may be connected to SAS backplanes, but SAS drives can not connect to SATA backplanes.
The T10 तकनीकी committee of the International Committee for Information प्रौद्योगिकी Standards ( INCITS ) develops और maintains the SAS protocol ; the SCSI Trade Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology.

औकात as a natural-born citizen of the United राज्य is one of the eligibility requirements established in the United राज्य Constitution लिये election to the office of President or वाइस अध्यक्ष.
This requirement थी intended to protect the nation from foreign influence.
The Constitution does not define the phrase natural-born citizen, and various opinions have been offered over time regarding its precise meaning.
A 2011 Congressional Research सेवा report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause रै महरूम उल्लेखित in passing in several decisions of the संयुक्त राज्य Supreme अदालत and निम्नतर courts dealing with the question of पात्रता for citizenship by birth, but the Supreme Court has never directly addressed the सवाल of a specific presidential or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as a natural-born नागरिक.
Kurtis यूजीन `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June 22, 1971 ) is a former अमरीकी football player.
He निभाई quarterback for तीन National Football League ( NFL ) teams : the St. Louis Rams, the New York Giants, and the Arizona Cardinals.
he थी originally हस्ताक्षरित by the Green Bay Packers as an undrafted free agent in 1994 after playing कॉलेज football at Northern Iowa.
Warner होता go on to be considered the best undrafted player of all time, following a 12-year career regarded as one of the greatest stories in एनएफएल इतिहास.
Warner first attained stardom while playing for the St. Louis Rams इससे 1998 to 2003, where he won two एनएफएल MVP awards in 1999 and 2001 as well as the Super कटोरी MVP award in Super Bowl XXXIV.
he led the 2008 एरिज़ोना Cardinals to Super Bowl XLIII ( the franchise 's first Super Bowl berth ), and owns the तीन highest single-game passing yardage योग in सुपर Bowl history.
Warner फिलहाल holds the seventh-highest career passer rating of all-time ( 93.7 ), and the third-highest career completion percentage in NFL इतिहास with 65.5 %.
in 13 career playoff games, Warner ranks first all-time in completion प्रतिशत ( 66.5 % ), yards प्रति attempt ( 8.55 ), and second in passer दरजा ( 102.8 ).
He also holds the उच्चतम completion प्रतिशत for a single game during the regular season, at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ), on September 20, 2009, against the Jacksonville Jaguars.
He announced his retirement on January 29, 2010. < ref name='CNN 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven Hagan ( ; born May 26, 1953 ) is the junior United राज्य Senator from North Carolina, in office since जनवरी 2009.
Previously she served in the North Carolina Senate from 1999 to 2009.
She is a member of the Democratic Party and is viewed as a moderate member of उसके party.
When Hagan defeated रिपब्लिकन incumbent Elizabeth Dole in the 2008 United States Senate election, वो became the first woman to defeat an incumbent woman in a Senate चुनाव.
the Heisman Memorial ट्रॉफी Award ( usually known colloquially as the Heisman Trophy or the Heisman ), is awarded annually to the player deemed the most outstanding player in कॉलेजिएट फ़ुटबॉल.
It was निर्मित in 1935 as the शहर Athletic Club trophy and renamed in 1936 following the death of the Club 's एथलेटिक director, John Heisman ( former Brown University and University of Pennsylvania player ; head football कोच at Oberlin कॉलेज, Auburn University, Clemson University, राइस University, and the विश्वविद्यालयों of Pennsylvania ; और football, बास्केट, and बेसबॉल सिर कोच and athletic निदेशक at Georgia तकनीक ).
The award is प्रस्तुत by the Heisman Trophy Trust in early December before the postseason bowl games.
it is the oldest of अनेक overall awards in college football, including the Maxwell Award, Walter शिविर Award, and the AP Player of the Year.
the Heisman और the ap Player of the Year are the only awards to honor the most outstanding खिलाड़ी, while the Maxwell Award and Walter Camp Award recognize the best player, and the Archie Griffin पुरस्कार recognizes the most valuable player.
The United Nations Command ( UNC ) is the unified command ढांचा for the बहुराष्ट्रीय military forces supporting the Republic of Korea ( South Korea or ROK ) during and after the Korean युद्ध.
After troops of the Democratic People 's Republic of Korea ( North Korea or DPRK ) invaded South Korea on June 25, 1950, the संयुक्त Nations सुरक्षा Council adopted Resolution 82 calling on North Korea to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th समानांतर.
On June 27, 1950, it अपनाया Resolution 83, recommending that members of the United Nations provide सहायता to the गणतंत्र of Korea `` to repel the armed attack and to restore international peace and security to the area ''.
Security Council Resolution 84, adopted on July 7, 1950, recommended कि सदस्यों providing सैन्य forces and other assistance to South Korea `` make such forces and अन्य सहायता उपलब्धियाँ to a unified command under the United States of अमेरिका ''.
Although the resolutions suggested the forces under the UNC यहूद `` संयुक्त Nations forces '', और संयुक्त राष्ट्र itself could be considered a belligerent, in practice the United Nations exercised no कंट्रोल over the कॉम्बैट शक्तियां, which were controlled by the United राज्य.
Most observers concluded that the forces under the UNC were not in विधि United Nations सैनिकों, and the acts of the UNC were not the acts of the United राष्ट्र.
The UNC can be regarded as an alliance of national armies, operating अंतर्गत the सामूहिक right of self-defense.
on August 29, 1950, the British Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry ब्रिगेड arrived at Busan to join the UNC, which जबतक then included only ROK और U.S. शक्तियां.
The 27th Brigade स्थानांतरित into the naktong River line west of Daegu.
Troop units from other countries of the UN followed in rapid succession ; Australia, belgian United Nations कमांड, Canada, Colombia, Ethiopia, France, Greece, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, New Zealand, the फिलीपीन, Thailand and Turkey.
The Union of South Africa provided air units which fought alongside the air forces of other member nations.
Denmark, इण्डिया, Norway, और स्वीडन provided medical units.
इटली provided a hospital, even though it was not a UN member.
The United Nations Command and the Chinese-North Korean Command signed the कोरियाई Armistice अनुबंध on 27 July 1953, ending the heavy fighting.
The armistice अनुबंध established the सैन्य Armistice Commission ( MAC ), consisting of representatives of the two signatories, to supervise the implementation of the armistice शर्तें.
The North korean-chinese MAC has been replaced by Panmumjon Representatives under exclusive उत्तर Korean management.
Regular meetings have महरूम रोका, although duty अधिकारियों of Joint Security Area, commonly ज्ञात as the Truce Village of panmunjom, from each side meet regularly.

it is a dangerous place to raise a family, and through the many trials the family goes through, they soon learn that settling in is not as easy as it seems.
While Officer Sutton struggles to cope with every day life as a गली cop in लॉस Angeles, his बच्चे try to अनुरूप in at their new schools and with their new neighbors.

It was approved for a second season, which premiered September 4, 2007.

the show 's theme song थी written and performed by bassist Stanley Clarke and singer-songwriter Blaire reinhard.
On January 29, 2010, ABC Family घोषित the cancellation of the series बाद four seasons.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body under a आम name, structure, and doctrine within Christianity.
In the Orthodox tradition, churches are divided प्रायः along ethnic and linguistic lines, into separate churches और traditions.
Technically, विभाजन between one group और another are defined by doctrine and church authority.
Issues such as the nature of Jesus, the authority of apostolic succession, eschatology, and papal primacy पृथक one denomination from another.
The रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर is the largest denomination with over 1.1 billion सदस्यों, over half of all Christians worldwide, making it the largest denomination for any religion worldwide ( हालांकि the church करता not view itself as a denomination, लकिन as the असली pre-denominational church ).
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of Christians worldwide, and together the Catholics, Protestants, Anglicans, और other closely related denominations comprise Western Christianity.
The Eastern Orthodox Church, Oriental Orthodox Churches and the Assyrian Church of the ईस्ट are माना Eastern Christian denominations.
Western ईसाई denominations prevail in Western यूरोपीय and इसके पूर्व colonies.
Eastern Christian denominations are represented ज़्यादातर in Eastern Europe, the मध्य East and North Africa.
Christians have विभिन्न doctrines about the Church, the body of faithful कि they मानना was established by यीशु Christ, and how the divine church corresponds to Christian denominations.
दोनो the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider each of themselves solely to faithfully represent the One Holy कैथोलिक और अपोस्टोलिक Church to the exclusion of the other.
Protestants separated from the Catholic Church because of theologies and practices कि they माना to be in violation of their interpretation.
Generally, members of the विभिन्न denominations acknowledge each other as Christians, at least to the extent that वे have mutually recognized baptisms and acknowledge historically orthodox views including the Divinity of Jesus and doctrines of sin and salvation, even हालांकि doctrinal और ecclesiological obstacles रोकते full communion between churches.
चूंकि the reforms surrounding वेटिकन II, the Catholic गिरिजाघर has referred to Protestant communities as `` denominations '', while reserving the term `` church '' for apostolic churches, सहित the पूर्वी Orthodox ( see subsistit in and branch theory ).
वहीँ are however some non-denominational Christians who do not follow any particular branch.
The पांडा ( Ailuropoda melanoleuca, lit.
`` black and white cat-foot '' ), भी known as the giant पांडा to distinguish it इससे the unrelated red panda, is a भालू native to central-western and दक्षिण western China.
it is easily recognized by the large, distinctive black patches around its eyes, over the कानों, and across its round body.
Though it belongs to the order Carnivora, the पांडा 's आहार is 99 % bamboo.
Pandas in the wild होगा occasionally eat अन्य grasses, wild tubers, or even meat in the form of birds, rodents or carrion.
In captivity, they may प्राप्त honey, eggs, मछली, yams, shrub leaves, संतरे, or bananas along साथ specially prepared खाना.
the दानव panda lives in a few mountain ranges in central China, मुख्यतः in Sichuan province, but also in the Shaanxi and गांसू provinces.
As a परिणाम of खेती, deforestation और other development, the panda has been चलित out of the lowland areas where it एकबार lived.
The panda is a संरक्षण reliant endangered species.
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas living in captivity inside China और another 27 outside the देश.
Wild population estimates vary ; one अनुमान shows that there are about 1,590 individuals living in the wild, while a 2006 study via डीएनए analysis estimated that this figure could be as high as 2,000 to 3,000.
Some reports also show that the number of pandas in the wild is on the वृद्धि.
However, the IUCN करता नहीं believe वहीँ is पर्याप्त certainty yet to reclassify the species from Endangered to Vulnerable.
While the dragon has प्रायः served as China 's national emblem, internationally the panda appears at तनिक as commonly.
As such, it is becoming widely used within चीन in international contexts, for example the five Fuwa mascots of the Beijing Olympics.
The Kite Runner is a 2007 अमरीकी drama film directed by Marc Forster based on the novel of the same name by Khaled hosseini.
It tells the story of Amir, a well-to-do लड़के from the Wazir Akbar खान ज़िला of काबुल, who is tormented by the guilt of abandoning his friend Hassan, the son of his father 's hazara servant.
The story is set against a backdrop of tumultuous events, इससे the fall of the monarchy in Afghanistan through the सोवियत military हस्तक्षेप, the mass exodus of Afghan refugees to Pakistan and the United States, and the Taliban शासन.
Though most of the film is set in Afghanistan, these भाग were mostly shot in Kashgar, China, due to the dangers of filming in Afghanistan at the time.
The majority of the film 's dialogue is in जमींदारी, with the remainder spoken in English.
The child अभिनेताओं are native अध्यक्षों, but अनेक adult actors had to learn Dari.
Filming लपेटा up on दिसम्बर 21, 2006, and the फिल्मी was expected to be released on नवम्बर 2, 2007.
However, after चिंता लिये the safety of the young अभिनेताओं in the film due to fears of हिंसक reprisals to the sexual nature of some scenes in जिससे they appear, इसके release date was pushed back six weeks to दिसम्बर 14, 2007.
The Kite Runner थी released on DVD on कूच 25, 2008.
A HD DVD release थी announced लिये the same date, but was canceled following the स्वरूप 's demise.
The film was nominated for the सुनहरी Globe Award for Best विदेशी Language Film in 2007.
The film 's score by Alberto Iglesias थी nominated for बेहतरीन असली Score at the Golden Globes और the Academy Awards.
The legality of कैनबिस varies from country to country.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most countries और has been since the beginning of widespread cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s.
However, many countries have decriminalized the possession of छोटी quantities of cannabis, particularly in North America, दक्षिण अमेरिका and Europe.
Furthermore, possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands, उत्तर Korea and होता be in the U.S. states of कोलोराडो और Washington if it were not for federal law, जिससे governs व्यक्तियों in all राज्य.
The औषधीय use of cannabis is legal in a number of countries, including Canada, the Czech Republic और Israel.
While संघीय law in the United States bans all sale and possession of कैनबिस, enforcement varies widely at the राज्य level and some राज्य have established औषधीय marijuana कार्यक्रम in कि contradict संघीय law ; two states ( Colorado और Washington ) have repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them with a नियामक regime, also contrary to federal statute.
Some countries have laws that are not as vigorously prosecuted as अन्य लकिन, apart इससे the countries कि offer अभिगम to चिकित्सा marijuana, most देशों have various penalties ranging from lenient to very severe.
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than others in regard to the cultivation, use, कब्ज़ा or transfer of cannabis for recreational use.
A few jurisdictions have lessened दंड for possession of small quantities of cannabis, making it punishable by confiscation and a fine, rather than कारावास.
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory treatment programs for young or frequent users, with freedom from narcotic drugs as the goal and a few jurisdictions permit कैनबिस use for औषधीय purposes.
There are भी changes in a more restrictive दिशा as in Canada.
Drug tests to detect cannabis are increasingly common in many countries और have resulted in jail sentences and people losing their jobs.
However, simple possession can carry long jail sentences in some countries, particularly in parts of ईस्ट Asia and Southeast Asia where the बिक्री of cannabis may सीसे to a sentence of life in prison or even execution.
Loxahatchee is a community स्तिथ in ताड़ Beach County, Florida, United States.
It is located in the areas north of Wellington and वेस्ट and उत्तरपश्चिम of Royal Palm Beach, फ्लोरिडा and approximately west of West Palm Beach.
Loxahatchee is भी the नाम of the Post Office that serves this area, which is under the zip code of 33470.
The name Loxahatchee means `` turtle river. ''
Loxahatchee is located भीतर the Indian Trails सुधार District और the Loxahatchee groves Water Control ज़िला.

In 2006, the state of Florida स्वीकृत incorporation of part of Loxahatchee as the Town of Loxahatchee Groves to become the 38th municipality in Palm Beach County.
the प्रमुख reason लिये incorporating was to बेहतर protect the क्षेत्रफल from encroaching growth and to preserve the rural अक्षर of the neighborhood.
Perhaps the most ग्रामीण area within a बंद proximity to वेस्ट Palm बीच, with lot sizes range from 1-20 acres.
Along with The Acreage, it is notable for loose land restrictions and the native and exotic animal presence is quite notable.
Seminole Ridge High School serves the area.

The परीक्षण is available in both French and English, the official भाषाएं of Canada.

it was headquartered in Fort Lauderdale, फ्लोरिडा.
epithelium is one of the four मौलिक types of एनिमल tissue, साथ with connective ऊतक, muscle tissue और nervous ऊतक.
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and सतहों of structures throughout the body, and भी रूप many glands.
Functions of epithelial cells include secretion, selective अवशोषण, protection, transcellular transport and detection of सनसनी.
In Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means `` on '' or `` upon '', and `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple ''.
Epithelial layers are avascular, so they must receive nourishment via diffusion of substances इससे the underlying connective tissue, through the basement झिल्ली.
Epithelia can also be organized into clusters of कोशिकाएं that function as exocrine and endocrine glands.
Kent E. Hovind ( born January 15, 1953 ) is an American young Earth creationist.
Hovind has बोला on creation science और has aimed to convince listeners to reject theories of evolution, geophysics, और cosmology in favor of his interpretation of the Genesis creation narrative इससे the Bible.
Hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence and some of उसके ideas have also been criticized by young Earth creationist organizations such as Answers in Genesis.
Hovind established the Creation Science Evangelism in 1991, and frequently spoke on young Earth creationism at seminars at private schools and churches, debates, and on radio और टेलीविज़न प्रसारण.
Since January 2007, hovind has महरूम serving a ten-year थाना sentence बाद being convicted of 58 federal counts, सहित 12 tax offenses, one count of obstructing federal agents, and 45 counts of structuring नकदी transactions.
He is incarcerated at the Federal Correctional Institution at Berlin, New Hampshire.
Bride with बिंदी decorated माथे
a बिंदी (, from Sanskrit bindu, meaning `` a drop, small particle, dot '' ), or a pottu/bottu ( in Tamil, Telugu, and मलयालम ) is a forehead decoration worn in South Asia ( particularly India, बांग्लादेश, Nepal, Sri Lanka और मॉरीशस ) and Southeast Asia.
Traditionally it is a bright dot of red रंग applied in the center of the माथे close to the eyebrows, but it can भी consist of a चिह्न or piece of jewelry worn at this स्थान.

The comanche are a Plains Indian tribe whose historic territory, known as Comancheria, consisted of उपस्थित day eastern New Mexico, southern कोलोराडो, northeastern Arizona, दक्षिणी कान्सास, all of Oklahoma, and most of northwest Texas.
the Comanche people are enrolled in the federally recognized Comanche Nation, in Oklahoma.
Historically, the Comanches were hunter-gatherers with a horse culture.
There may have महरूम as अनेक as 45,000 Comanches in the late 18th सदी.
Today, the comanche Nation Comanche tribal enrollment numbers 15,191 with approximately 7,763 members residing in the Lawton – Fort Sill and surrounding areas of Southwest Oklahoma.
The Comanche Nation Homecoming Powwow is आयोजित annually in Walters, Oklahoma in mid-july.
The Comanche spoke the Comanche language, a Numic भाषा of the Uto-Aztecan family, sometimes वर्गीकृत as a Shoshone dialect ; however, only परिचय 1 % of Comanches बोलो it today.
