Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores, रेस्तरां, और vending machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola कम्पनी of Atlanta, Georgia, and is often referred to simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the संयुक्त States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton, Coca-Cola was bought आउट by businessman asa Griggs Candler, whose marketing tactics led Coke to its दबदबा of the world soft-drink मार्केट throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the संसार.
The bottlers, who थाम territorially exclusive अनुबंध with the कम्पनी, produce finished product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then बेचें, distribute और merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending मशीने.
Such bottlers शामिल Coca-Cola Enterprises, which is the largest सिंगल Coca-Cola bottler in North America and western Europe.
The Coca-Cola Company also बिकता concentrate for soda fountains to प्रमुख रेस्तरां and food service वितरकों.
The Coca-Cola Company रै, on occasion, introduced other cola drinks अंतर्गत the Coke brand नाम.
The most common of these is Diet कोक, साथ others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, coca-cola Zero, Coca-Cola वैनिला, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
आधारित on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, Coca-Cola was the world 's most मूल्यवान ब्रांड.
प्रकार of bar-lines
In musical notation, a bar ( or measure ) is a segment of time पारिभाषित by a given क्रमांक of beats, each of जिससे हैं assigned a particular note value.
dividing music into bars provides regular reference अंक to pin पाइंट locations within a piece of music.
it also makes written music easier to follow, since each bar of staff symbols can be read and निभाई as a batch.
typically, a piece consists of several bars of the same length, and in modern musical notation the number of beats in each bar is specified at the शुरूआत of the score by the top number of a time signature ( such as 3/4 ), while the bottom number indicates the नोट value of the beat ( the beat has a quarter नोट मान in the 3/4 example ).
The word bar is more आम in British अंग्रेज़ी, and the शब्द measure is more common in American English, although musicians generally understand both usages.
In अमरीकी English, although the शब्द बार और measure हैं often प्रयुक्त interchangeably the correct use of the word 'bar ' refers तभी to the vertical line itself, while the word 'measure ' refers to the beats contained between bars.
In international usage, it is equally correct to speak of bar numbers and माप numbers, e.g. ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm. 9–16’.
Along the same lines, it is हिकमत to reserve the abbreviated form ‘bb.
3–4’ इत्यादि. for beats only ; bars should be referred to by name in full.
The पहला metrically complete माप within a टुकड़ा of म्यूज़िक is पुकारा ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’.
When the टुकड़ा begins with an anacrusis ( an incomplete measure at the head of a piece of music ), ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’ is the following measure.
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can सप्लाई power 24 hours a दिन.
Solar energy, radiant light and heat from the सूर्य, has been harnessed by humans since प्राचीन times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
सौर energy technologies include solar heating, solar photovoltaics, solar thermal electricity, solar architecture and कृत्रिम photosynthesis, जिससे can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent उर्जा problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or active solar depending on the way वे capture, convert and वितरित solar energy.
Active solar techniques include the use of photovoltaic panels and सौर thermal collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties, और designing स्पेसेस that naturally circulate air.
in 2011, the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of affordable, inexhaustible and clean solar energy technologies will have विशाल longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy सुरक्षा through reliance on an indigenous, inexhaustible and mostly import-independent resource, enhance sustainability, reduce pollution, निम्नतर the costs of mitigating जलवायु change, और keep चट्टान fuel कीमतें lower than otherwise.
These advantages are global.
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for जल्दी deployment should be considered learning investments ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
प्राथमिक care may be provided in community स्वास्थ्य centres.
Primary care is the health care given by a health care provider.
Typically this provider acts as the principal पाइंट of परामर्श for patients भीतर a स्वास्थ्य care system और coordinates other specialists that the रोगी may need.
Such a professional can be a प्राथमिक परवाह physician, such as a general practitioner or family physician, or depending on the locality, health system organization, and patient 's discretion, they may see a pharmacist, a physician assistant, a nurse practitioner, a nurse ( such as in the United Kingdom ), a नैदानिक officer ( such as in parts of Africa ), or an आयुर्वेदिक or other परंपरागत medicine professional ( such as in parts of Asia ).
Depending on the nature of the health कंडीशन, patients may then be referred for secondary or tertiary care.

it was released in February 2004 as the second single from Ocean Avenue and the तीसरा track.

The name of Ocean Avenue in Jacksonville is actually Beach Boulevard.
They left उनके original base behind when they moved to Los Angeles.
The song थी featured on the Much Music संकलन album Big Shiny Tunes 9.
A psychiatrist is a physician who specializes in psychiatry.
A psychiatrist specializes in the उपचार of mental disorders.
Psychiatrists are authorized to prescribe medicine, conduct physical examinations, order and interpret प्रयोगशाला tests, उपयोग psychotherapy and may order brain imaging studies such as computed tomography ( CT/CAT Scan ), magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ), और positron उत्सर्जन टोमोग्राफी ( PET ) scanning.
भीतर the framework of the संसार स्वास्थ्य Organization 's ( WHO ) definition of health as a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity, reproductive health, or sexual health/hygiene, addresses the reproductive processes, कृत्यों and system at all stages of life.
Reproductive health, therefore, implies that लोगों are able to have a responsible, संतोषजनक and safer sex life and that they have the capability to reproduce and the freedom to decide if, जब and how often to do so.
One interpretation of this implies that men और women ought to be सूचित of and to have access to safe, effective, affordable and acceptable methods of birth कंट्रोल ; also access to appropriate स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं of यौन, reproductive medicine and implementation of health education programs to stress the महत्व of women to go सकुशल through pregnancy and childbirth could provide couples with the best chance of having a healthy infant.
on the other hand individuals do face inequalities in reproductive health services.
inequalities vary based on socioeconomic status, शिक्षा level, age, ethnicity, religion, और resources available in their environment.
it is possible for example, that low आय individuals lack the संसाधन for appropriate health सेवाएं and the ज्ञान to know what is उचित for maintaining reproductive स्वास्थ्य.
according to the जो, `` Reproductive and sexual ill-health accounts for 20 % of the global burden of ill-health for women, and 14 % for men. ''
Reproductive health is a part of यौन and reproductive health और rights.

Core 2 is a ब्रांड encompassing a range of Intel 's उपभोक्ता 64-bit x86-64 single-, dual-, and quad-core microprocessors based on the Core microarchitecture.
The single- and dual-core models are single- die, whereas the quad-core models comprise two dies, each containing two cores, packaged in a multi-chip मोड्यूल.
The परिचय of Core 2 relegated the Pentium brand to the mid-range market, और reunified laptop और desktop CPU lines, which previously had been divided into the Pentium 4, pentium D, और Pentium m ब्रांड्स.
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 जुलाई 2006, comprising the Solo ( single-core ), Duo ( dual-core ), Quad ( quad-core ), और in 2007, the Extreme ( dual- or quad-core CPUs लिये enthusiasts ) subbrands.
Intel Core 2 processors साथ vPro technology ( designed लिये व्यवसायों ) include the dual-core और quad-core branches.
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the नेशनल Football लीग ( एनएफएल ), the highest level of professional American football in the United States, culminating a ऋतु कि begins in the लेट summer of the पिछला calendar साल.
The Super Bowl uses Roman numerals to पहचानो प्रत्येक game, rather than the year in which it is आयोजित.
For example, Super Bowl I थी निभाई on January 15, 1967, following the 1966 regular season, जबकि सुपर Bowl XLVII was played on February 3, 2013, following the 2012 season.
The game was निर्मित as part of a merger अनुबंध between the एनएफएल and its then-rival league, the American Football League ( AFL ).
It was agreed that the दो leagues ' चैंपियन teams would play in an AFL–NFL World Championship Game until the merger was to officially begin in 1970.
After the merger, each league was redesignated as a `` conference ``, and the game was then played between the conference champions.
Currently, the नेशनल Football Conference ( NFC ) leads the श्रेणी साथ 25 विन्स to 22 wins for the American Football Conference ( AFC ).
The day on which the Super कटोरी is निभाई, now considered by some a de facto American national holiday, is called `` Super Bowl संडे ``.
It is the second-largest day for U.S. food consumption, after Thanksgiving दिन.
In addition, the Super Bowl has अक्सर been the most watched American television broadcast of the साल.
सुपर Bowl XLV, played in 2011, became the most-watched American television program in history, drawing an औसत audience of 111 लाख viewers और taking over the स्पॉट held by the previous year 's सुपर Bowl, which itself had taken over the # 1 स्पॉट held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H.
The Super Bowl is also among the most देखी sporting events in the world, almost all being North American ऑडियंस, and is second to संघ football ’s UEFA champions League final as the most watched सालाना sporting event worldwide.
Because of its ऊँची viewership, commercial airtime दौरान the Super Bowl broadcast is the most expensive of the year.
Due to the high cost of investing in advertising on the Super Bowl, companies regularly develop their most expensive advertisements for this broadcast.
As a result, watching and discussing the broadcast 's commercials has become a significant aspect of the इवेंट.
In addition, many लोकप्रिय गायकों and संगीतकारों have performed during the event 's pre-game और halftime ceremonies because of the exposure.
Fiona is a feminine given name.
The name Fiona was invented, and first used, by the Scottish poet James Macpherson ( 1736–96 ), author of the Ossian poems, which he claimed यहूद अनुवाद from ancient Gaelic sources ( sources, जब challenged, he never produced ).
The name थी subsequently used as a pseudonym by William Sharp ( 1855–1905 ), who authored अनेक romantic works under the name `` फिओना Macleod ''.
The name has चूंकि become लोकप्रिय in इंग्लैण्ड, स्कॉटलैंड and Ireland.
The name is considered to be a Latinised रूप of the गैलिक शब्द fionn, meaning `` white '', `` fair ''.
The name Fiona is also sometimes प्रयुक्त as an Anglicisation of the irish-language name Fíona, although these names are वरना unrelated ( as Fíona is derived from an तत्व meaning `` vine '' ).
There is also a modern tendency to equate the authentic Scottish Gaelic feminine name Fionnghal with Fiona.
The नाम फिओना is rising in popularity particularly in जर्मनी -speaking countries.
Fiona थी the 49th सबसे लोकप्रिय name for baby girls born in 2008 in Germany.
फिओना was tied for third प्लेस in the ranking of सबसे लोकप्रिय names for baby girls born in the छोटा principality of Liechtenstein in 2008.
The name was the 347th most popular name for लड़कियों born in the United States in 2008, जहाँ it has क्रमित among the top 1,000 most popular names लिये लड़कियों चूंकि 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999.
the name फिओना has been particularly popular लिये girls of Asian or Pacific Islander descent in New York City, जहाँ फिओना क्रमित as the ninth most लोकप्रिय name for girls from those groups in 2007.
Many languages are प्रयुक्त, or historically have been used in the United राज्य.
The most commonly used language is English.
There हैं also many languages indigenous to North America or to U.S. states or holdings in the Pacific region.
भाषाएं brought to the country by colonists or आप्रवासियों from Europe, Asia, or other भाग of the world make up a large portion of the languages फिलहाल प्रयुक्त ; several languages, सहित creoles और चिह्न भाषाएं, have also विकसित in the संयुक्त States.
Approximately 337 languages are spoken or हस्ताक्षरित by the population, of which 176 are indigenous to the क्षेत्रफल.
Fifty-two भाषाएं formerly spoken in the country 's territory are now extinct.
The variety of English spoken in the United States is known as American English.
English is the de facto नेशनल language of the संयुक्त States, with 80 % of the population claiming it as a mother tongue, and some 95 % claiming to speak it `` खूब '' or `` very well ''.
However, no official language exists at the federal level.
There have been several proposals to make English the national language in amendments to immigration reform bills, but none of these bills has become law with the amendment intact.
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels, with some states mirroring the संघीय policy of adopting no official language in a de jure क्षमता, others adopting English alone, others officially adopting English as well as local languages, and still others adopting a नीति of de facto bilingualism.
Spanish is the second most common भाषा in the country, and is spoken by over 12 % of the population.
The संयुक्त States holds the संसार 's पांचवां largest Spanish-speaking population, outnumbered only by मैक्सिको, Spain, Colombia, and Argentina.
throughout the Southwestern United States, long-established Spanish-speaking communities coexist with large numbers of more हाल Hispanophone आप्रवासियों.
Although many new Latin American immigrants are less than fluent in English, nearly all second-generation Hispanic Americans speak English fluently, while only about half still speak स्पेनी.
According to the 2000 us census, people of जर्मनी ancestry make up the largest सिंगल ethnic group in the United States, and the German language बाँधने fifth.
इतालवी, Polish, and French are still widely spoken among populations descending from immigrants from those देशों in the early 20th century, but the use of these languages is dwindling as the older generations die.
रूसी is also spoken by immigrant populations.
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over one million speakers each in the United राज्य, almost entirely within recent immigrant populations.
Both languages, along साथ the varieties of the Chinese भाषा, Japanese, और Korean, are now प्रयुक्त in elections in Alaska, California, Hawaii, Illinois, New York, Texas, और Washington.
Native American languages are spoken in smaller pockets of the country, but these populations are decreasing, and the भाषाएं are almost never widely used outside of reservations.
Hawaiian, although having few देशी speakers, is an official language along with English at the state level in Hawaii.
The राज्य सरकारी of Louisiana offers सेवाएं और documents in French, as does New मैक्सिको in Spanish.
besides English, Spanish, French, German, Navajo and other Native American भाषाएं, सब other languages are usually learned इससे अप्रवासी पूर्वजो that came बाद the time of independence or learned through some form of education.

On an automobile, a quarter फलक ( or rear wing as it is known in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) is प्रायः considered the देह panel जिससे goes between the पश्च door and the trunk and typically wraps around the व्हील well ; however, the similar front section Fender ( vehicle ), between the द्वार and the हुड, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel.
The quarter panel is typically made of चादर metal, but is sometimes made of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced plastic ; although, this varies with different makes and models.
A क्वार्टर panel is typically a welded on घटक of the uni-body structure or monocoque.
Replacement of a sheet metal quarter फलक typically requires it to be cut off the vehicle and a बदलना part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle.
Due to this high amount of specialized labor, a quarter panel may often be repaired rather than replaced by hammering आउट the damage, and a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the original सतह.
shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated, in print only, Shrops ) is a county in the West Midlands region of England.
It borders वेल्स to the west, Cheshire to the उत्तर, staffordshire to the east, Worcestershire to the south-east and herefordshire to the south.
A unitary authority ( shropshire Council ) थी created on 1 April 2009, लेने over इससे the previous county council and 5 ज़िला councils, and covers most of the काउंटी.
The बरो of Telford और Wrekin has महरूम a पृथक unitary प्राधिकार since 1998 but continues to be included in the ceremonial county.
The county 's population and economy is centred on five towns : the काउंटी कस्बा of Shrewsbury, which is culturally और historically important and is located in the centre of the county ; telford, a नई town in the ईस्ट which was constructed around a क्रमांक of पुरानी towns, most notably Wellington, dawley and Madeley, which is today the most populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west, Bridgnorth just to the south of Telford, and Ludlow in the दक्षिण.
The county रै many further market towns, सहित whitchurch in the north, Newport बस to the north-east of Telford, and Market Drayton in the north-east of the county.
The Ironbridge Gorge क्षेत्रफल is a UNESCO World Heritage साईट, covering Ironbridge, Coalbrookdale and a part of Madeley.
वहीँ हैं, additionally, other notable historic औद्योगिक साइट located around the county, such as at Shrewsbury, broseley, Snailbeach और Highley as well as the Shropshire संघ Canal.
The shropshire Hills क्षेत्रफल of Outstanding Natural सौंदर्य कवर about a quarter of the county, mainly in the दक्षिण.
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely populated counties, with the population density of the Shropshire Council area होने बस 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
The Wrekin is one of the most प्रसिद्ध natural landmarks in the काउंटी, though the highest hills are the Clee Hills, Stiperstones और the Long mynd.
Wenlock Edge is another significant geographical and geological landmark.
In the low-lying northwest of the काउंटी ( and overlapping the border with Wales ) is the fenn 's, whixall and Bettisfield Mosses National Nature Reserve, one of the सबसे important and बेहतरीन preserved bogs in Britain.
The River Severn, Great Britain 's longest river, runs through the county, exiting into Worcestershire via the severn Valley.
Shropshire is landlocked, and with an area of, is इंग्लैण्ड 's largest अंतर्देशीय काउंटी.
The county flower is the round-leaved sundew.
For Eurostat purposes, the काउंटी ( less the unitary district of telford and wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 region ( code ukg22 ).
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering all of the ceremonial county ), together with the authorities covering the ceremonial county of Staffordshire, comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region.

The show centers on five characters : roommates शेल्डन Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter, two Caltech physicists ; Penny, a waitress and aspiring अभिनेत्री who lives across the हॉल ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist राजेश Koothrappali.

The A-Team is an American action-adventure television series, running from 1983 to 1987, about a fictional समूह of ex– United States Army Special Forces personnel who कार्य as soldiers of सौभाग्य, while on the चलाएं from the Army after होने branded as war अपराधियों for a `` crime they did n't commit ``.
A feature film based on the series was released by 20th Century Fox on June 11, 2010.

Wat Phra Kaew, Bangkok, थाईलैंड
There is no आधिकारिक state religion in the Thai constitution, which guarantees religious freedom for all Thai citizens, though the king is required by विधि to be बौद्ध.
According to the last census ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of thais are Buddhists of the थेरवाद tradition.
Muslims are the second largest religious group in Thailand at 4.6 %.
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani, Yala, Narathiwat and part of Songkhla Chumphon have dominant मुस्लिम populations, consisting of दोनो ethnic Thai और Malay.
The southern टिप of Thailand is mostly ethnic Malays.
ईसाइयों, mainly Catholics, represent 0.7 % of the जनसांख्यिकी.
A small but influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and some Hindus also live in the country 's शहरों, and are heavily engaged in retail कॉमर्स.
वहीँ is भी a small Jewish community in Thailand, dating back to the 17th सदी.
Since 2001, Muslim कार्यकर्ताओं, generally वर्णित by the Thai government as terrorists or separatists, have rallied against the central government because of alleged भ्रष्टाचार और ethnic bias on the part of officials.
Thailand 's Department of Religion, currently अंतर्गत the Ministry of Culture, is formally जिम्मेदार लिये the registration of religious groups in Thailand URL_http जिससे hold properties through legally established foundations.
It has oversight, along with the Immigration पुलिस, over the कार्य permits of missionaries who are `` प्रवासी religious workers '' of सब धर्मों.
A मान added tax ( VAT ) is a form of consumption tax.
From the perspective of the buyer, it is a tax on the purchase price.
इससे that of the विक्रेता, it is a tax तभी on the value added to a product, material, or service, from an accounting point of view, by this stage of इसके manufacture or वितरण.
The manufacturer remits to the government the अंतर between ये two amounts, and retains the rest for themselves to offset the कर they था previously paid on the inputs.
The value added to a product by or with a कारोबार is the sale price charged to its ग्राहक, ऋण the cost of सामग्री and other taxable inputs.
A VAT is like a sales tax in that ultimately only the end consumer is taxed.
It differs from the sales tax in that, साथ the latter, the tax is collected and remitted to the सरकारी तभी एकबार, at the point of खरीदें by the end consumer.
With the vat, collections, remittances to the सरकारी, and credits लिये taxes already paid occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases products.
a रेफरी calling a high-sticking penaltyhigh
-sticking is the name of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that may occur जब a player intentionally or inadvertently plays with his or her stick above the height of the कन्धों or ऊपर the cross bar of a hockey goal.
This can result in a stoppage of play or in a दंड.
in the rules of the National Hockey लीग, high-sticking is defined as a penalty in नियम 60 and as a non-penalty foul in नियम 80.
A stoppage in play results if a high stick comes in contact with the पक and the team जो touched it regains control of the puck.
However, play usually continues if a खिलाड़ी touches the puck with a high stick and the opposing team gains कंट्रोल of the पक.
If the पक goes into the opposing net after coming into सम्पर्क with a high स्टिक, the goal is disallowed.
The level at which a स्टिक is considered too ऊँची for a goal is the crossbar of the net.
However, if a player knocks the puck into उसके own net साथ a high stick, the लक्ष्य is allowed.
A penalty is assessed if a player strikes another player with a high stick.
The player is दिए a minor दंड जबतक his ऊँची स्टिक caused an injury, in which case the रेफरी has the option to assess a double-minor, major or match penalty.
It is the referee 's discretion which penalty to assess : the rule काल्स for a double नाबालिग for an accidental injury, or a match दंड for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition player was दरअसल injured ).
चोट is usually decided by the high stick causing bleeding, लकिन the presence of blood does not automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded.
Some referees have been known to पुरस्कार an extra दंड बगैर the presence of blood if the referee determines that the injury sustained थी sufficient to warrant a double-minor दंड.
Typical modern memory card reader, संगत with many common formats
A मेमोरी card रीडर is a device, typically having a USB इंटरफ़ेस, for accessing the data on a memory card ऐसे as a CompactFlash ( CF ), Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( mmc ).
Most card पाठक भी offer write capability, and together साथ the card, this can function as a pen drive.
Some printers and निजी computers have a built-in card reader.
A multi card reader is प्रयुक्त for communication with more than one type of flash memory card.
Multi कार्ड पाठक do नहीं have built-in memory capacity, but हैं समर्थ to accept multiple types and शैलियाँ of memory cards.
The number of compatible memory cards varies from reader to reader and can शामिल more than 20 different types.
The number of different मेमोरी cards that a multi कार्ड reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1, with x होने a figure of merit indicating the क्रमांक of memory cards स्वीकृत, such as 35-in-1.
There are three categories of card readers sorted by the type and quantity of the card slots : single card reader ( e.g. 1x sd-only ), मल्टी card reader ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) और श्रेणी card reader ( e.g. 4x sd only ).
Some kinds of memory cards साथ their own USB functions do not need the card रीडर, such as the Intelligent स्टिक memory card, which can plug directly into a USB slot.
The USB यंत्र class used is 0x08.
Bullying is detrimental to students ' well-being and development.
Bullying is the use of force or coercion to abuse or intimidate अन्य.
The behavior can be habitual और involve an imbalance of social or शारीरिक power.
It can include verbal harassment or threat, physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular victims, शायद on grounds of race, religion, gender, sexuality, or ability.
If bullying is done by a समूह, it is पुकारा mobbing.
The victim of bullying is sometimes referred to as a `` target ''.
Bullying can be defined in many अलग तरीके.
the uk currently has no legal परिभाषा of bullying, while some U.S. states have कानून against it.
Bullying consists of three basic प्रकार of गाली – emotional, verbal, and physical.
It typically involves subtle methods of coercion such as intimidation.
Bullying ranges from simple one-on-one bullying to more complex bullying in which the bully may have one or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in his or her bullying क्रियाएँ.
Bullying in school और the workplace is also referred to as peer abuse.
Robert W. Fuller has analyzed धमकाना in the context of rankism.
A bullying culture can develop in any context in जिससे human beings interact with each other.
This includes स्कूल, church, family, the workplace, home, and पड़ोस.

rae leigh was the first child in the U.S. to be बरामद as a result of an AMBER Alert when वो was 8 weeks old in November 1998.
an AMBER Alert or a Child abduction Emergency ( SAME कोड : CAE ) is a चाइल्ड abduction alert system originating in 1996, now employed in 9 countries.
AMBER is officially a backronym लिये America 's Missing : Broadcasting Emergency जवाब, named for Amber Hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in आर्लिंगटन, Texas in 1996.
Alternate regional alert names were once प्रयुक्त ; in Georgia, `` Levi 's Call '' ( named बाद Levi Frady ) ; in Hawaii, `` Maile Amber Alert '' ( after Maile Gilbert ) ; और अरकंसास, `` Morgan उपनाम Amber Alert '' ( in memory of मॉर्गन Chauntel Nick ).
AMBER Alerts हैं distributed via commercial radio stations, Internet radio, satellite radio, television स्टेशन, and cable TV by the Emergency Alert प्रणाली and noaa मौसम Radio ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` एम्बर चेतावनियाँ '' ).
The alerts are also issued via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition लक्षण, the LED billboards जिससे are located बाहर of newer Walgreens locations, along साथ the LED/LCD signs of billboard कंपनियाँ such as Clear चैनल Outdoor, CBS Outdoor and लैमर, or through wireless device SMS text messages.
एम्बर Alert has also teamed up with Google and Facebook to relay information regarding an एम्बर चेतावनी to an ever growing demographic.
Those दिलचस्पी in subscribing to प्राप्त AMBER चेतावनियाँ in their area via SMS संदेश can visit Wireless Amber Alerts, which are offered by law as free messages.
In some states, the display scrollboards in सामने of lottery terminals are also used.
the निर्णय to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each पुलिस organization ( in many मामले, the state police or highway patrol ) which investigates प्रत्येक of the abductions.
Public information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the नाम and description of the abductee, a description of the suspected abductor, और a वर्णन and license plate number of the abductor 's vehicle, if उपलब्धियाँ.
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born जुलाई 23, 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United States President विधेयक Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 और 1996.
The affair and its repercussions ( which included Clinton 's impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
हाउस of Night is a series of vampire -themed काल्पनिक novels by American author P. C. Cast and her daughter kristin डाल.
it follows the adventures of Zoey Redbird, a sixteen-year-old girl जो has just become a `` fledgling vampyre '' and is जरूरी to attend the हाउस of Night boarding school in तुलसा, Oklahoma.
The series has been on the New यॉर्क Times Best Seller सूची for 63 weeks and there हैं over seven million copies in print in North America alone.
The छठे novel, Tempted, जिससे गई on sale on अक्तूबर 27, 2009 साथ a first printing of a million copies, डाला the यूएसए Today bestseller list कि week at # 1.
In January, 2010, Gezeichnet, a German translation of Marked, पहुँचे the # 1 spot on the Der Spiegel bestseller list.
The series रै so far sold more than ten million books in 39 देशों.
Burned was released on April 27, 2010, and like Tempted, it entered the यूएसए Today बेस्टसेलर list that week at # 1.
Awakened, released in January, 2011, also entered the list at # 1.
The series, जिससे is published by st Martin 's Press is planned to शामिल twelve किताबे.

The tenth book in the series, Hidden, was released on अक्तूबर 16, 2012.

Book ग्यारह is फिलहाल called नाज़िल, and the Casts have announced that दो अधिक novellas, Neferet’s Curse, नियोजित to be released February 19, 2013, और a prequel novel about Kalona, are to be released to coincide साथ the eleventh and बारहवीं किताबे.
in Greek mythology, the trojan War was waged विरूद्ध the city of Troy by the Achaeans ( यूनानियों ) बाद Paris of ट्रॉय took Helen from her husband Menelaus किंग of Sparta.
the war is one of the most important कार्यक्रम in Greek mythology and has been narrated through many works of Greek साहित्य, most notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey.
The इलियड relates a part of the last year of the घेरा of Troy ; the Odyssey describes odysseus 's यात्रा home.
Other भाग of the war are contained in a cycle of एपिक poems, which have बच through fragments.
एपीसोड from the युद्ध provided सामग्री लिये यूनानी tragedy and other works of यूनानी literature, and for रोमन poets including Virgil और Ovid.
the war originated इससे a quarrel between the goddesses Athena, hera, and Aphrodite, after Eris, the goddess of strife and discord, gave them a सुनहरी apple, sometimes ज्ञात as the Apple of अनबन, marked `` for the fairest ''.
Zeus sent the goddesses to Paris, who judged कि Aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', चाहिए receive the ठहराना.
In exchange, aphrodite बना Helen, the most beautiful of all महिलाओं और wife of Menelaus, fall in love with Paris, who took her to Troy.
agamemnon, king of Mycenae और the bhai of हेलेन 's husband menelaus, led an expedition of achaean troops to Troy and besieged the city लिये ten सालो क्युकी of Paris ' insult.
After the मौतों of अनेक नायक, including the Achaeans Achilles and Ajax, और the Trojans हेक्टर and Paris, the city fell to the ruse of the Trojan Horse.
the Achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except लिये कुछ of the women and children whom they kept or sold as slaves ) and desecrated the मंदिरों, thus earning the gods ' wrath.
Few of the Achaeans returned safely to their homes and many founded colonies in distant shores.
the Romans later traced their origin to Aeneas, one of the Trojans, who was said to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy.
The ancient Greeks thought that the Trojan War was a historical event that था taken place in the 13th or 12th century bc, and believed that Troy थी स्तिथ in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles.
By modern times, both the war and the city were widely believed to be non-historical.
in 1868, however, the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert, who convinced schliemann that ट्रॉय was at Hissarlik and Schliemann took over Calvert 's excavations on property belonging to calvert ; this अर्जी is now accepted by most विद्वानों.
Whether there is any historical reality पीछे the Trojan War is an खोलें सवाल.
Many विद्वानों believe that there is a historical core to the tale, though this may simply mean कि the Homeric stories are a fusion of various किस्से of sieges और expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks दौरान the Bronze Age.
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a विशिष्ट historical conflict usually तिथि it to the 12th or 11th centuries BC, often preferring the dates given by Eratosthenes, 1194–1184 bc, which roughly corresponds with archaeological evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy viia.
anarchists have employed निश्चित symbols लिये their cause, including most prominently the circle-A और the black flag, although anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political movement.
Since the पुनरुद्धार of अराजकतावाद around the start of the 21st-century concurrent with the rise of the anti-globalization movement, anarchist cultural symbols are widely present.
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the skull that transmits the greater palatine artery, vein, and nerve between the pterygopalatine fossa and the मौखिक cavity.
Surface temperature of Antarctica in winter और summer from the European Centre for Medium-Range मौसम Forecasts
The जलवायु of Antarctica is the coldest on the whole of धरती.
अंटार्कटिक has the lowest naturally occurring तापमान कभी recorded on the ground on Earth : −89.2 °C ( −128.6 °F ) at Vostok Station.
It is भी extremely dry ( technically a desert ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of precipitation per year.
Even so, on most parts of the continent the हिम rarely melts and is eventually compressed to become the glacial बर्फ कि makes up the बर्फ sheet.
Weather fronts rarely penetrate दूर into the continent.
सबसे of Antarctica has an ice cap climate ( köppen EF ) with very cold, generally extremely dry मौसम throughout the year and no month averaging ऊपर 0 °C ( 32 °F ).
कुछ fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( Köppen ET ) with a short summer averaging above freezing, and much उच्चतर precipitation.
Current head coach माइक Tomlin, दौरान the 2007 season
The पिट्सबर्ग Steelers franchise has had 16 head coaches throughout its history.
Founded as the Pittsburgh pirates in, the name was बदला to the स्टीलर्स prior to the season to celebrate the city 's heritage of producing steel.
Joe Bach परोसा दो separate terms as head coach and Walt Kiesling served तीन पृथक terms.
During the and seasons, due to the amount of players who fought in संसार War II, the Steelers संयुक्त their team with फिलाडेल्फिया and Chicago, क्रमशः.
During ये seasons, स्टीलर्स ' coach Walt Kiesling shared कोचिंग duties with Greasy Neale and Phil Handler, who have नहीं been शामिल within this list.
Struggling for much of the franchise 's जल्दी years, the team 's first ऋतु with more wins than losses थी coached by Jock Sutherland in.
in, under Sutherland, the Steelers played their first playoff game विरूद्ध the Philadelphia Eagles.
Ten of the 16 head कोच खर्च their entire professional कोचिंग careers with the मताधिकार, including John McNally, Walt Kiesling and Chuck noll, who have also महरूम voted into the Pro फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of Fame.
One of only four men to coach the same team for 23 years, Chuck Noll retired in.
Noll is also the तभी coach in National Football लीग history to win four Super Bowls.
Bill Cowher, Noll 's replacement, coached the Steelers to their fifth Super Bowl victory, in 2005.
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win came in Super Bowl XLIII, while head coached by Mike Tomlin, the team 's current head coach.
in criminal law, fraud is intentional deception बना for personal gain or to damage another व्यक्तिगत ; the related adjective is fraudulent, and verb is defraud.
Fraud is a crime और a civil law violation, though the specific criminal law परिभाषा varies by legal क्षेत्राधिकार.
Defrauding people or entities of धन or valuables is a common purpose of धोखाधड़ी.
A hoax भी involves deception, but without the intention of gain or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a defense in a civil action for breach of अनुबंध or specific प्रदर्शन of a contract.
धोखाधड़ी is a basis लिये equitable jurisdiction.
Passover, or pesach ( इससे : in Hebrew, Yiddish ), Tiberian :, Modern यहूदी : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah, Pesakh, Yiddish : Peysekh, Paysakh, paysokh ) is an important Biblically -derived Jewish festival.
Historically, साथ साथ Shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) and Sukkot ( `` झोपड़ियों '' ), passover is एक of the three यात्राएं festivals ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire population of the kingdom of यहूदा made a pilgrimage to the Temple in जेरूसलम.
Samaritans स्टिल make this pilgrimage to Mount Gerizim, but only मेन participate in public इबादत.
passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew month of Nisan और lasts for either seven days ( in Israel ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ).
In Judaism, a दिन commences at संध्या and lasts until the following dusk, thus the पहला day of passover only begins after dusk of the 14th of Nisan and ends at dusk of the 15th day of the month of Nisan.
The rituals unique to the passover celebrations commence with the Passover Seder जब the 15th of nisan has begun.
in the Northern गोलार्ध Passover takes place in spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] वसन्त '' ( בחדש האביב ).
It is one of the सबसे widely observed Jewish holidays.
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 years पहले by God from slavery in ancient Egypt कि थी ruled by the pharaohs, and their जनम as a nation under the नेतृत्व of Moses.
It commemorates the story of the Exodus as described in the Hebrew बाइबल especially in the किताब of Exodus, in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt.
In the कथा of the Exodus, the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery in मिश्र by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient Egyptians before the Pharaoh would release उसके Israelite slaves ; the tenth and worst of the plagues थी the death of the Egyptian first-born.
The israelites were instructed to चिह्नित the doorposts of their homes साथ the blood of a slaughtered spring lamb and, upon seeing इस, the स्पिरिट of the रब knew to pass over the first-born in these homes, hence the name of the holiday.
वहीँ is some debate over where the term is actually derived from.
When the Pharaoh freed the Israelites, it is said that वे left in such a hurry that they could नहीं wait लिये bread dough to rise ( leaven ).
In commemoration, for the duration of Passover no leavened bread is eaten, for जिससे reason it is पुकारा `` The Festival of the Unleavened ब्रैड ''.
Thus Matzo ( चपटा unleavened bread ) is eaten during Passover और it is a प्रतीक of the holiday.
हैली 's धूमकेतु or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible इससे धरती every 75–76 सालो.
Halley is the only short-period धूमकेतु कि is clearly visible to the naked नजर इससे धरती, and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter और more spectacular, but होगा appear only once in thousands of years.
हैली 's रिटर्न to the inner Solar System have been observed and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by चाइनीज, Babylonian, and medieval European chroniclers, but were not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The धूमकेतु 's periodicity was पहला determined in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer Edmond Halley, after whom it is now named.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
दौरान its 1986 apparition, हैली became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the first observational आंकड़ा on the structure of a comet nucleus and the यांत्रिकी of coma और tail formation.
These observations supported a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction, particularly Fred Whipple 's `` dirty स्नोबॉल '' model, which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, carbon डाइऑक्साइड and ammonia – and dust.
The missions भी provided आंकड़ा which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is अभी understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile materials, and that only a small portion of it is icy.
Anti-communism is opposition to communism.
व्यवस्थित anti-communism developed in reaction to the rise of communism, especially बाद the 1917 October Revolution in Russia and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War.
Most anti-communists अस्वीकृत the concept of historical materialism, which is a central विचार in Marxism.
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief कि capitalism will be followed by socialism and communism, just as सामंतवाद was followed by पूंजीवाद.
Anti-communists question the वैध of the Marxist claim कि the socialist state होगा `` wither दूर '' when it becomes unnecessary in a सच्चा communist समाज.
Anti-communists argue that the repression in the early years of bolshevik नियम, while not as extreme as that during Joseph Stalin 's rule, was still severe by reasonable standards, citing examples ऐसे as Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret पुलिस, जिससे eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions, and the brutal crushing of the kronstadt rebellion और Tambov विद्रोह.
कुछ anti-communists refer to both Communism and fascism as totalitarianism, seeing similarity between the क्रियाएँ of कम्युनिस्ट and fascist governments.
Historian Robert Conquest has argued that Communism was responsible for tens of millions of deaths during the 20th century.
Opponents argue that Communist parties that have come to शक्ति have tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition.
ये opponents claim कि most Communist countries have shown no signs of advancing from मार्क्स 's socialist stage of economy to an ideal communist stage.
Rather, Communist governments have been accused of creating a new ruling class ( a Nomenklatura ), with powers and privileges greater than those previously enjoyed by the upper वर्ग in the non- communist regimes.
Gil बगुला ( 9 April 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) was a Jamaican पेशेवर footballer.

The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( uk ) ( glycine max ) is a species of legume native to East Asia, widely grown लिये its खाद्य bean which has numerous उपयोग.
The plant is classed as an oilseed बल्कि than a pulse by the UN Food and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant and cheap source of प्रोटीन for animal feeds and अनेक prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable oil is another product of प्रसंस्करण the soybean crop.
For example, soybean products such as textured vegetable protein ( TVP ) are ingredients in many meat और दुग्ध analogues.
Soybeans produce significantly more protein प्रति acre than most other उपयोग of जमीन.
Traditional nonfermented food uses of soybeans include soy milk, and इससे the latter tofu and tofu skin.
Fermented foods include सोया sauce, fermented bean paste, natto, and tempeh, among अन्य.
the oil is used in many industrial applications.
The main producers of soy are the United States ( 35 % ), Brazil ( 27 % ), Argentina ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) और India ( 4 % ).
the beans contain significant amounts of phytic acid, alpha-linolenic एसिड, and isoflavones.
Harrison Ford ( born July 13, 1942 ) is an American फिल्मी actor and producer.
He is famous लिये his performances as Han सोलो in the original Star Wars trilogy and the title अक्षर of the Indiana Jones फिल्मी series.
Ford is also ज्ञात for his roles as Rick Deckard in Blade Runner, John Book in Witness and Jack Ryan in Patriot Games and Clear और Present खतरे.
उसके career has spanned छह decades and includes roles in several Hollywood blockbusters, including Presumed निर्दोष, The Fugitive, Air Force One, and What झूठ Beneath.
at one पाइंट, four of the शीर्ष six box-office hits of all time included one of his भूमिकाएँ.
Five of his films have been inducted into the National Film Registry.
In 1997, Ford was ranked No. 1 in Empire `` The शीर्ष 100 Movie Stars of All Time '' list.
, the United States domestic बक्सा office grosses of घाट 's films total over US $ 3.5 billion, with worldwide grosses surpassing $ 6 अरब, making Ford the third highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office star.
Ford is the husband of अभिनेत्री Calista Flockhart.
a ट्यूब of ChapStick
ChapStick is a brand नाम for lip balm manufactured by फाइजर Consumer Healthcare और used in many countries worldwide.
It is intended to सहायता treat and prevent chapped होठ ; hence the नाम.
Many varieties also include सनस्क्रीन in order to prevent sunburn.
Due to its popularity, the पद has become a genericized trademark.
It popularly refers to any lip balm contained in a lipstick-style tube and लागू in the same manner as lipstick.
However, the term is still a पंजीकृत trademark, with rights exclusively owned by Pfizer.
in स्वीडन and in the संयुक्त किंगडम, the product 's प्रमुख competitor is lypsyl, made by Novartis Consumer Health, जिससे is वितरित in similar packaging to ChapStick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of cloyne ), was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose primary achievement was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ).
इस theory झुठलाए the existence of material पदार्थ और instead contends कि familiar वस्तुएँ like tables और कुर्सियां are only ideas in the minds of perceivers, और as a result can नहीं मौजूद without being perceived.
Thus, as Berkeley famously put it, लिये physical objects `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ).
Berkeley is also known लिये his critique of abstraction, an important आधार in his argument for immaterialism.
In 1709, Berkeley published उसके पहला major work,, in which he discussed the सीमाएं of human vision and advanced the सिद्धान्त that the proper objects of sight are not material objects, but light and रंग.
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical कार्य A Treatise Concerning the सिद्धान्त of Human Knowledge in 1710 which, after its poor reception, he rewrote in dialogue form and published अंतर्गत the title तीन Dialogues between Hylas and Philonous in 1713.
In इस book, Berkeley 's views यहूद represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover of दिमाग ' ), while Hylas ( Greek : 'मैटr ' ) embodies the आयरिश thinker’s opponents, in particular जॉन locke.
Berkeley argued against Sir Isaac Newton 's doctrine of absolute स्पेस, समय और motion in de Motu ( on गति ), published 1721.
His arguments were a precursor to the views of Mach and आइंस्टीन.
In 1732, he published alciphron, a Christian apologetic against the free-thinkers, and in 1734, he published The Analyst, an empiricist critique of the मूलाधार of infinitesimal calculus, जिससे was influential in the development of गणित.
उसके last major philosophical work, Siris ( 1744 ), begins by advocating the औषधीय use of तारकोल water, and then continues to discuss a wide range of topics including science, philosophy, and theology.
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World War ii, because he tackled many of the issues of सर्वोपरि ब्याज to philosophy in the 20th century such as the problems of perception, the difference between primary and secondary qualities, and the importance of भाषा.
चिंगदाओ ( ), historically known as Tsingtao, is a major city in eastern Shandong province, Eastern China, with a population of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ).
Its built up area, made of 6 शहरी districts and 4 county-level cities, is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010.
It borders Yantai to the northeast, weifang to the west and Rizhao to the दक्षिणपश्चिम.
Qīng ( ) in Chinese means `` green '' or `` रसीले '', while dǎo ( ) means `` island ''.
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial level.
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the Yellow Sea, Qingdao is a major seaport, naval आधार, and industrial centre.
it is also the site of the Tsingtao Brewery.
The world 's longest sea bridge, the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge, links the main urban area of चिंगदाओ with Huangdao district, straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas.
Qingdao is named China 's most livable city.
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified प्रजाति नामित Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ), or is a group of phylogenetically related large viruses ( designated usually MimiN ).
In colloquial speech, apmv is अधिक commonly referred to as just `` mimivirus ''.
Until October 2011, when a larger virus Megavirus chilensis was described, it था the largest capsid व्यास of all known viruses.
Mimivirus has a large and complex genome compared with most other viruses.
Mimivirus, short for `` mimicking microbe '', is so called to reflect its large size and apparent Gram-staining properties.
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed विरोध between the लोगों of Mexico and the Spanish औपनिवेशिक अधिकारियों which started on September 16, 1810.
The movement, which became known as the Mexican War of Independence, थी led by Mexican-born Spaniards, Mestizos and Amerindians who sought स्वतंत्रता from Spain.
It started as an idealistic peasants ' विद्रोह against their colonial मास्टर्स, but ended as an unlikely गठबंधन between Mexican ex-royalists and Mexican guerrilla insurgents.
Crohn 's disease, also known as Crohn सिंड्रोम and क्षेत्रीय enteritis, is a type of inflammatory bowel disease that may affect any part of the जठरांत्र tract from मुँह to गुदा, causing a wide किस्में of symptoms.
It primarily causes abdominal पीड़ा, diarrhea ( which may be bloody if inflammation is at इसके worst ), vomiting ( can be continuous ), or weight loss, but may also cause जटिलताओं outside the gastrointestinal tract ऐसे as skin rashes, गठिया, inflammation of the eye, tiredness, and lack of विशेषज्ञता.
crohn 's बीमारी is caused by interactions between environmental, immunological and bacterial कारकों in genetically susceptible individuals.
This results in a दीर्घकालिक inflammatory disorder, in which the body 's immune system attacks the जठरांत्र tract possibly directed at microbial antigens.
crohn 's disease रै wrongly महरूम वर्णित as an असंक्राम्य disease in the past ; recent investigators have described it as an immune deficiency state.
There is a genetic association with Crohn 's disease, primarily with variations of the NOD2 gene और इसके protein, जिससे senses bacterial cell दीवारें.
Siblings of affected individuals are at higher risk.
Males and females are equally affected.
Smokers are two times more likely to develop crohn 's disease than nonsmokers.
Crohn 's बीमारी affects between 400,000 और 600,000 people in उत्तर America.
Prevalence estimates for Northern Europe have ranged from 27–48 per 100,000.
crohn 's disease tends to उपस्थित initially in the teens and twenties, with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies, although the disease can occur at any age.
There is no known pharmaceutical or surgical cure for Crohn 's disease.
Treatment options are restricted to controlling symptoms, maintaining remission, and preventing relapse.
The disease थी नामित after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn, who, in 1932, together with two other colleagues at माउंट Sinai हॉस्पिटल in नई यॉर्क, described a series of patients with inflammation of the terminal ileum, the area most commonly affected by the illness.

It is located west of Grass Valley, California, approximately 62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento.

YouTube is a video-sharing जालस्थल, निर्मित by three former PayPal employees in February 2005, on which users can upload, view and share videos.
the company is आधारित in San ब्रूनो, California, and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to प्रदर्शक a wide किस्में of user-generated वीडियो content, including movie clips, tv clips, and music videos, as खूब as amateur content such as video blogging, short original वीडियो, and शैक्षणिक videos.
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals, although media corporations including CBS, the BBC, Vevo, Hulu, and other organizations offer some of their material via the site, as part of the YouTube partnership कार्यक्रम.
अपंजीकृत users can watch वीडियो, while registered users can upload an unlimited क्रमांक of videos.
Videos considered to contain potentially अप्रिय content are available तभी to registered उपयोक्ता at least 18 years बूढ़ा.
In November 2006, YouTube, LLC थी खरीदा by Google for us $ 1.65 billion, and operates as a subsidiary of Google.

Microsoft DirectX is a collection of अनुप्रयोग programming interfaces ( APIs ) for हैंडलिंग tasks related to मल्टीमीडिया, विशेषकर game programming and video, on Microsoft platforms.
Originally, the names of these APIs all began with Direct, such as Direct3D, DirectDraw, DirectMusic, DirectPlay, DirectSound, and so forth.
The name DirectX was coined as shorthand term for सब of these APIs ( the X standing in for the particular api names ) and soon became the नाम of the collection.
When Microsoft later set out to develop a gaming console, the X was used as the basis of the name Xbox to indicate that the console was based on DirectX technology.
the X आरंभिक रै been carried forward in the नामकरण of api designed for the Xbox such as xinput और the Cross-platform Audio Creation Tool ( XACT ), while the DirectX pattern रै been continued for Windows APIs such as Direct2D and DirectWrite.
direct3d ( the 3D graphics API भीतर DirectX ) is widely used in the विकास of वीडियो खेल for microsoft Windows, Microsoft Xbox, Microsoft Xbox 360 and some Sega dreamcast games.
direct3d is भी used by other software applications लिये visualization and graphics tasks such as CAD/CAM अभियान्त्रिकी.
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized component of डाइरेक्टएक्स, it is common to see the names `` DirectX '' and `` Direct3D '' प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
The डाइरेक्टएक्स software development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable binary form, along with accompanying documentation and headers for use in coding.
Originally, the runtimes were only installed by खेल or explicitly by the user.
Windows 95 did नहीं launch with DirectX, but DirectX was included with Windows 95 OEM Service रिलीज 2.
Windows 98 and Windows NT 4.0 both shipped with DirectX, as has every version of Windows released since.
The SDK is available as a free download.
While the runtimes हैं proprietary, closed-source तन्त्र, source code is provided लिये most of the SDK नमूने.
Starting with the release of Windows 8 Developer Preview, DirectX sdk रै been एकीकृत into खिड़कियाँ SDK.
direct3d 9Ex, Direct3D 10, and Direct3D 11 are only उपलब्धियाँ for खिड़कियाँ Vista and newer because each of these नई versions was built to depend upon the new Windows Display Driver Model that was introduced for Windows Vista.
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a नई video memory manager supporting virtualization of graphics hardware for various applications and services जैसे the डेस्कटॉप Window Manager.
Quetzaltenango, also commonly known by its indigenous name, Xelajú, or more commonly, Xela, is the second largest city of Guatemala.
It is both the capital of Quetzaltenango Department and the municipal सीट of Quetzaltenango municipality.
It has an अनुमानित population of 224,703.
The population is about 61 % indigenous or Amerindian, 34 % Mestizo or ladino और 5 % European.
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley at an उन्नयन of 2,330 meters ( 7,655 ft ) above sea level at its न्यूनतम भाग.
It may reach above 2,400 meters within the city.
The Municipality of Quetzaltenango consists of an area of.
Municipalities abutting the municipality of Quetzaltenango include : Salcajá, cantel, Almolonga, zunil, El Palmar, concepción Chiquirichapa, San Mateo, la esperanza, Olintepeque, and San Andrés xecul.
सब these municipalities are part of the Department of Quetzaltenango, except San Andrés Xecul which is a part of the विभाग of Totonicapán.
The Epic of Gilgamesh, an epic poem इससे Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), king of Uruk.
Four of ये were used as source material for a combined epic in Akkadian.
इस first combined epic, ज्ञात as the `` Old Babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th century BC and is titled after its incipit, Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have बच.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates इससे the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc and bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ).
Fragments of लगभग two तिहाई of this longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
Some of the बेहतरीन copies were discovered in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
The स्टोरी centers on a friendship between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk.
Together, they journey to the देवदार Mountain to defeat humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later वे kill the Bull of Heaven, which the goddess इश्तार sends to punish Gilgamesh for spurning her advances.
As a punishment for these क्रियाएँ, the देवताओं sentence Enkidu to death.
The दूसरी हाफ of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's मौत, and his क्वेस्ट for immortality.
In order to learn the secret of eternal जीवन, Gilgamesh undertakes a long and perilous journey.
He learns that `` The life that you are seeking तुम will never ढूँढें.
When the gods created man they allotted to उसे death, but जीवन वे retained in their अपना keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old babylonian संस्करण of the epic, and then attributed to the immortal बाढ़ hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic.
Nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's fame जिया on after his death, क्युकी of उसके great building projects, and उसके account of what utnapishtim told him happened दौरान the flood.
The स्टोरी has been translated into many अलग languages, and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction.
There are numerous debates over who निर्मित the first वीडियो game, with the answer depending largely on how video games हैं defined.
The एवोल्यूशन of वीडियो खेल represents a tangled web of several अलग industries, including scientific, computer, arcade, and consumer electronics.
The `` video '' in `` video game `` traditionally refers to a raster प्रदर्शक यंत्र.
With the लोकप्रिय catch phrase उपयोग of the term `` video game '', the term अभी implies सब display types, formats, and platforms.
Historians have also sought to bypass the issue by instead using the अधिक specific `` digital खेल '' descriptive.
इस term leaves out the earlier analog-based computer games.
This is a list of best-selling video game franchises that have sold or shipped at least 5 million copies.
Unless otherwise stated, संख्याएँ indicate विश्वव्यापी units sold, ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the same amount.
The exception are the ones specifying shipments, which have lower precedence than others listing बिक्री.
Franchise sales शामिल expansion packs भी though they हैं not considered पूरा वीडियो games.

Dorothy Ann Willis रिचर्ड्स ( September 1, 1933 – September 13, 2006 ) was an अमरीकी politician and the 45th Governor of टेक्सास.
She first came to नेशनल attention as the state कोषाध्यक्ष of Texas, when she वितरित the keynote address at the 1988 Democratic नेशनल Convention.
Richards served as the 45th Governor of Texas from 1991 to 1995 and was defeated for re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush.
ऐन रिचर्ड्स थी the second मादा governor of Texas.
Data Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a security feature included in modern ऑपरेटिंग systems.
It is known to be उपलब्धियाँ in Linux, Mac os X, iOS, Microsoft खिड़कियाँ and एंड्रॉइड operating systems and is intended to prevent an अनुप्रयोग or service from निष्पादित code from a non-executable memory region.
This helps prevent certain exploits that स्टोर code via a buffer अतिप्रवाह, for example.
DEP रनों in दो modes : hardware-enforced dep for CPUs that can mark memory पृष्ठों as nonexecutable, और software-enforced DEP with limited सुरक्षा for cpu that do not have hardware support.
Software-enforced DEP करता not protect against execution of code in data pages, but instead counters seh overwrite, another प्रकार of attack.
DEP थी introduced on Linux in 2004 ( kernel 2.6.8 ), on Windows in 2004 with Windows xp Service Pack 2, while ठहराना introduced DEP when they moved to x86 in 2006.

, is the Japanese शब्द for hermaphroditism, which is भी प्रयुक्त in a broader sense for androgyny.
Beyond Japan the term is प्रयुक्त to describe a commonly pornographic genre of computer games, comics और एनिमेशन, which शामिल characters that show both primary sexual विशेषताएँ.
But in आज 's language it refers almost exclusively for वर्ण who have an overall feminine appearance.
In that case the term is भी often abbreviated as futa ( s ), which is occasionally also used as term लिये the works itself.
Early CAPTCHAs such as these, generated by the EZ-Gimpy program, were प्रयुक्त on Yahoo !
a modern CAPTCHA, rather than attempting to बनाएँ a distorted background and high levels of warping on the text, might फ़ोकस on बनाना segmentation मुश्किल by adding an angled line.
Another way to make segmentation difficult is to crowd symbols together, as in Yahoo ! 's current CAPTCHA format.
Some CAPTCHAs try to utilize the क्षमता of people to see three-dimensional objects.
On this image, प्रतीकों are drawn with lines of different मोटाई to make an effect of extrusion.
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response test used in computing as an attempt to ensure that the response is generated by a human being.
The process प्रायः involves a computer asking a user to complete a simple test which the computer is able to grade.
These tests are designed to be easy for a कंप्यूटर to generate but difficult for a computer to solve, but again easy for a इंसान.
If a correct solution is received, it can be presumed to have been डाला by a human.
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the user to type letters and/or digits from a distorted image that appears on the screen.
Such परीक्षण are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites, चूंकि a normal human can easily पढ़ा a CAPTCHA, while the bot can not process the image letters और इसलिए, can not जवाब properly, or at all.
Although most captchas are letter pictures randomly generated, अनेक of उन्हें have become difficult even लिये a human to read, so picture CAPTCHAs यहूद निर्मित in which a human is shown a simple test to show a picture of a certain animal ( given few animal pictures ), which is simple for a इंसान being to प्रक्रम, and इसलिए आसान to pick, जबकि a bot can not process and solve the question क्युकी although it can analyze the चित्र, it can not easily guess the animal.
The term `` CAPTCHA '' was coined in 2000 by Luis von Ahn, Manuel Blum, Nicholas J. Hopper, and John langford ( all of Carnegie Mellon University ).
it is an acronym based on the word `` capture '' और standing for `` completely Automated पब्लिक Turing test to tell कंप्यूटर and इंसानो अलावा ''.
Carnegie Mellon University attempted to trademark the term on 15 October 2004, but the trademark अनुप्रयोग was abandoned on 21 April 2008.
a CAPTCHA is sometimes वर्णित as a reverse Turing test, because it is administered by a machine and targeted at a human, in contrast to the standard turing test that is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine.
jacques-yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in English as Jacques cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval officer, एक्सप्लोरर, conservationist, filmmaker, innovator, scientist, फ़ोटोग्राफ़र, author और researcher जो पढ़ाई the समुद्र and सब फ़ॉर्म of life in water.
He co-developed the Aqua-Lung, pioneered marine conservation and was a सदस्य of the Académie française.
KFC ( केंटकी fried Chicken ) is a fast food restaurant chain headquartered in louisville, Kentucky, United States, which specializes in fried chicken.
An `` अमरीकी प्रतीक '', it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as measured by sales ) बाद McDonald 's, with over 18,000 आउटलेट in 120 countries और territories.
The कम्पनी is a subsidiary of Yum !
ब्रांड्स, a restaurant कम्पनी which भी owns Pizza Hut and Taco Bell.
KFC was founded by harland सैंडर्स, who began selling fried मुर्गा इससे his roadside restaurant in कोर्बिन, Kentucky during the ग्रेट Depression.
Sanders थी एक of the first people to देखिए the संभावित of the रेस्तरां फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग अवधारणा, with the first `` Kentucky Fried मुर्गा '' franchise खोलने in Utah in 1952.
The मताधिकार popularized chicken in the तेज़ खाना industry, thereby diversifying the market and challenging the दबदबा of the hamburger.
Marketing himself as `` Colonel Sanders '', he became a legendary figure of American cultural history, and his image is still prominently used in KFC branding.
The company 's rapid expansion saw it grow too large for Sanders to manage, and in 1964 he sold the कम्पनी to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown, Jr. and Jack Massey.
KFC was one of the first fast food chains to expand internationally, opening outlets in England, Mexico और Puerto रीको by the mid-1960s.
Throughout the 1970s and 1980s, केएफसी experienced mixed fortunes domestically, as it went through a series of corporate owners who had little or no अनुभव in the restaurant कारोबार.
In the early 1970s, KFC was sold to the spirits firm Heublein, who were लिया over by the R.J. Reynolds food and tobacco conglomerate, जो sold the chain to PepsiCo.
the कड़ी continued to expand overseas however, and in 1987 केएफसी became the first पश्चिमी restaurant chain to open in China.
The chain रै since expanded rapidly in China, and the country is अभी the company 's most profitable market.
पेप्सिको spun बंद its restaurants division as tricon वैश्विक Restaurants, जिससे बाद बदला its name to Yum !
ब्रांड्स.
केएफसी primarily sells fried chicken pieces and variations such as chicken सैंडविच और wraps, salads और side dishes ऐसे as French फ्राइज़ and coleslaw, desserts और soft drinks, प्रायः supplied by PepsiCo.
Its most famous product is दबाव fried मुर्गा pieces, seasoned with Sanders ' `` असली Recipe '' of 11 herbs and spices.
the exact nature of these ingredients is unknown, and represents a notable व्यापार रहस्य.
Larger portions of fried chicken are served in a distinctive cardboard `` bucket '', which has become a signature of the chain चूंकि होने introduced by franchisee Pete Harman.
KFC is famous for the slogan `` finger lickin ' good '', which has since been replaced by `` Nobody does chicken जैसे KFC '' and `` So शुभ ''.
Cnidaria ( with a silent c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 species of animals found exclusively in aquatic and mostly समुद्री environments.
Their distinguishing feature is cnidocytes, specialized cells कि they use मुख्यतः for capturing prey.
Their लाशें consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like substance, sandwiched between two layers of epithelium that are mostly one cell thick.
They have दो मौलिक body forms : swimming medusae and sessile polyps, both of which are radially symmetrical with mouths surrounded by tentacles that bear cnidocytes.
Both forms have a single orifice और body गुहा that are used लिये digestion और श्वसन.
Many cnidarian species उपज colonies that are single organisms composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or both.
cnidarians ' क्रियाएँ are समन्वित by a decentralized nerve net and simple receptors.
Several free-swimming Cubozoa and Scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, और कुछ have simple eyes.
नहीं सब cnidarians reproduce sexually.
Many have complex lifecycles with asexual polyp stages and sexual medusae, but some omit either the polyp or the medusa stage.
Cnidarians were लिये a long time grouped with Ctenophores in the phylum Coelenterata, but increasing awareness of their differences caused them to be placed in separate phyla.
Cnidarians are classified into four प्रमुख groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( समुद्र anemones, corals, sea पेन ) ; swimming scyphozoa ( जेलीफ़िश ) ; cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; और Hydrozoa, a diverse group that includes all the freshwater cnidarians as well as many marine forms, and has both स्थानबद्ध सदस्यों such as Hydra और colonial swimmers such as the Portuguese Man o ' War.
Staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in their own right rather than a sub-group of Scyphozoa, and there is बहस about whether Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa are cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( अधिक complex animals ).
Most cnidarians prey on organisms ranging in आकार इससे plankton to animals several times larger than themselves, लकिन many obtain much of their nutrition from endosymbiotic algae, and a few are parasites.
Many are preyed upon by अन्य animals including starfish, sea slugs, fish and turtles.
Coral reefs, whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic algae, support some of the world 's most productive ecosystems, and protect vegetation in tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides.
While corals हैं almost entirely प्रतिबंधित to warm, shallow समुद्री waters, other cnidarians सजीव in the depths, in polar समंदर and in freshwater.
चट्टान cnidarians have been found in rocks formed about, और other fossils show that corals may have been present shortly before and diversified a few million years बाद.
Fossils of cnidarians that do not निर्माण mineralized structures are very rare.
Scientists currently सोचो that cnidarians, ctenophores and bilaterians are more closely related to calcareous sponges than these are to अन्य sponges, and that anthozoans are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians, और the most closely related to bilaterians.
हाल analyses have concluded that cnidarians, हालांकि considered more `` आदिम '' than bilaterians, have a wider range of genes.

The Aztec लोगों यहूद certain ethnic groups of central Mexico, particularly those groups who spoke the Nahuatl language and who dominated large parts of मेसोअमेरिका from the 14th to 16th centuries.
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) और aztecah ( plural ) mean `` people from Aztlan ``, a पौराणिक place for the Nahuatl-speaking culture of the time, and बाद adopted as the word to define the Mexica लोगों.
Often the पद `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the Mexica people of Tenochtitlan ( now the स्थान of Mexico नगर ), situated on an island in Lake Texcoco, who referred to themselves as Mexica Tenochca or Cōlhuah Mexica.
Sometimes the term भी शामिल the inhabitants of Tenochtitlan 's two principal allied city-states, the acolhuas of Texcoco and the Tepanecs of Tlacopan, जो together with the Mexica formed the Aztec Triple Alliance which controlled what is often ज्ञात as `` the Aztec Empire ''.
In other contexts, Aztec may refer to all the various city राज्य and their peoples, who shared विशाल parts of उनके ethnic इतिहास and cultural traits with the Mexica, Acolhua and Tepanecs, और who प्रायः also used the Nahuatl language as a lingua franca.
In this meaning it is संभावित to talk about an एज़टेक सभ्यता सहित all the particular cultural patterns आम for most of the peoples inhabiting सेंट्रल Mexico in the late postclassic period.
From the 13th century, the Valley of Mexico was the heart of Aztec civilization : here the capital of the Aztec ट्रिपल Alliance, the नगर of Tenochtitlan, थी built upon उठाया islets in Lake Texcoco.
The Triple Alliance formed a tributary साम्राज्य expanding its राजनैतिक hegemony far beyond the Valley of मैक्सिको, conquering अन्य city states throughout Mesoamerica.
At इसके pinnacle, Aztec culture था rich and complex पौराणिक और religious परंपराओं, as well as reaching remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments.
In 1521 Hernán Cortés, along with a large number of Nahuatl speaking indigenous allies, conquered Tenochtitlan and defeated the एज़टेक Triple Alliance अंतर्गत the leadership of Hueyi Tlatoani moctezuma ii.
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement of Mexico City on the site of the ruined Aztec capital, from where they proceeded with the प्रक्रम of colonizing सेंट्रल America.
एज़टेक culture and history is primarily known through पुरातत्व evidence मिला in excavations such as कि of the renowned templo Mayor in मैक्सिको City ; from स्वदेशी छाल paper codices ; from eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors such as hernán Cortés and बर्नल Díaz del Castillo ; and especially इससे 16th and 17th century descriptions of Aztec culture and history written by Spanish clergymen and literate Aztecs in the Spanish or Nahuatl भाषा, such as the famous florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous एज़टेक informants.
Anderson Hays Cooper ( born June 3, 1967 ) is an American journalist, author, and television personality.
He is the primary anchor of the CNN news show Anderson कूपर 360°.
The program is normally broadcast live इससे a नई York City studio ; however, Cooper प्रायः broadcasts सजीव on location for breaking news कहानियां.
As of September 2011, he also serves as host of उसके own eponymous syndicated दिन talk show, Anderson Live, which will be cancelled at the end of the second season.
A plot of a normal distribution ( or bell-shaped वक्र ) where प्रत्येक band has a width of 1 standard विचलन – See भी : 68-95-99.7 rule
संचयी probability of a normal distribution with expected value 0 and standard deviation 1.
In statistics and संभाव्यता सिद्धान्त, मानक deviation ( represented by the प्रतीक sigma, σ ) shows how much variation or dispersion exists इससे the औसत ( mean ), or expected value.
A low standard deviation indicates that the data points tend to be very बंद to the औसत ; ऊँची standard deviation indicates that the आंकड़ा points are spread out over a विशाल range of values.
The standard deviation of a यादृच्छिक variable, सांख्यिकीय population, data नियत, or probability distribution is the square root of इसके variance.
It is algebraically simpler though practically less robust than the average absolute deviation.
A useful property of standard deviation is that, नापसंद variance, it is expressed in the same units as the data.
Note, however, that for measurements with percentage as unit, the standard विचलन will have प्रतिशत अंक as unit.
In addition to expressing the variability of a population, standard deviation is commonly used to measure confidence in सांख्यिकीय conclusions.
For example, the margin of error in polling data is determined by calculating the अपेक्षित standard deviation in the results if the same poll यहूद to be conducted multiple times.
The reported हाशिया of error is typically about twice the standard deviation ­– the radius of a 95 percent confidence interval.
In science, researchers commonly report the standard deviation of experimental data, and only effects that fall far बाहर the दायरा of standard deviation are माना statistically significant – normal random गलती or variation in the measurements is in इस way distinguished from causal variation.
Standard deviation is also महत्वपूर्ण in finance, where the standard deviation on the rate of return on an investment is a measure of the volatility of the investment.
When only a sample of data from a population is available, the standard deviation of the population can be अनुमानित by a modified quantity called the `` sample मानक विचलन ''.
When the नमूना is the entire population, its unmodified standard deviation is पुकारा the `` population मानक deviation ''.
Ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( Ullucus tuberosus ) is a plant grown primarily as a root vegetable, secondarily as a leaf vegetable.
The ulluco is one of the most widely grown और economically important root crops in the Andean region of South America, दूसरी only to the potato.
It is known there with the common नाम of papa lisa, but also by the regional names melloco ( Ecuador ), olluco ( Peru ), chugua ( कोलंबिया ) or ruba ( Venezuela ), among others.
The पत्ता and the tuber are edible, similar to spinach and the potato, क्रमशः.
They are known to contain high स्तर of protein, calcium, and carotene.
Papalisa were used by the incas prior to arrival of europeans in South अमेरिका.
Ulluco tubers are marketed as `` Earth रत्नों '' in New Zealand, by Halfords Exotic Produce.

an April 24, 1851 poster warning the `` colored लोगों of Boston '' about पुलिसकर्मियों एक्टिंग as slave catchers.
The Fugitive स्लेव विधि or भगोड़े Slave Act was passed by the United States Congress on September 18, 1850, as part of the Compromise of 1850 between Southern slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers.
इस थी एक of the most controversial acts of the 1850 compromise और heightened Northern fears of a `` slave power conspiracy ''.
it declared कि सब runaway स्लेव were, upon capture, to be returned to their masters.
Abolitionists nicknamed it the `` bloodhound विधि '' for the dogs that were used to track down runaway slaves.
