Trin-i-tee 5:7 is a इन्जील duo from New ऑरलियन्स, louisiana in the United राज्य.
The group was marketed as a gospel alternative to R & b लड़की groups such as नियति 's Child and TLC.
Trin-i-tee 5:7 has sold over 2.5 million albums.
in 1998, the group released उनके पहला album entitled Trin-i-tee 5:7 जिससे debut at # 1 on the Top Gospel charts.
The album प्रदर्शित the songs `` God 's Grace '' and the कवर song `` Oh !
Mary do n't तुम Weep ''.
The album later became certified gold.
In 1999, Terri भूरा left the group और was बाद replaced by singer एड्रियन एंडरसन.
दौरान that साल, the group recorded और released उनके second album, Spiritual Love.
the एल्बम became the group 's second # 1 album on the Top Gospel charts.
The album contained the singles `` Put Your Hands '' and `` My देह ''.
In 2002, the समूह released their third album The Kiss which debuted at # 2 on the Top Gospel charts.
in 2007, the group left GospoCentric रिकॉर्ड and हस्ताक्षरित a record deal with Spirit Rising म्यूज़िक.

the United राज्य federal earned income tax credit or earned income credit ( EITC or EIC ) is a refundable tax credit for low- and medium-income individuals and couples, primarily for those who have qualifying children.
When the credit exceeds the amount of कर owed, it results in a tax refund to those who claim the credit.
This credit is provided to offset the burden of social security taxes and भी to promote an incentive to कार्य.
In अनुक्रम for a person or couple to claim one or more persons as their qualifying child ( ren ), the age, relationship, और shared रेसिडेंसी requirements must be met, as well as some अन्य requirements.
U.S. कर forms 1040EZ, 1040A, or 1040 can be used to claim EIC बगैर qualifying children.
To claim the credit with qualifying children, 1040A or 1040 जरूर be used, as खूब as attaching Schedule eic.
EIC phases in slowly, रै a medium-length plateau, and then phases out more slowly than it phased in.
Since the क्रेडिट phases out at 21 % ( for two children और for तीन or more qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( for एक qualifying child ), it is always preferable to have one more dollar of actual salary or wages ( although technically, since the EIC table चालें by fifty dollar increments, it 's always preferable to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ).
लिये कर year 2011, the maximum EIC for a single व्यक्ति or couple filing without qualifying children थी $ 464.
The maximum EIC with one qualifying child was $ 3,094, साथ two children was $ 5,112, and with तीन or more qualifying children was $ 5,751.
These amounts are indexed annually for inflation.
The earned income tax credit has been part of political debates in the United States regarding whether उठाने the minimum wage or increasing EIC will बेहतर address a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs.
The following is a सूची of halftime shows held at the नेशनल Football League 's championship game, the Super कटोरी.
While halftime shows are a tradition during football games at all levels of competition, the सुपर Bowl halftime show represents a fundamental link to पॉप संस्कृति, which helps broaden the television audience and nationwide interest.
In most सालो since the mid-1980s, the halftime show of the Super Bowl रै featured popular रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकारों and other well-known celebrities.
It has measurably increased टेलीविज़न viewers during and after the halftime show.
The performance is regarded one of the most-watched events in American टेलीविज़न annually with over 100 million viewers in the United राज्य alone.
Musical genres over the सालो have represented a broad range of music types, including pop, rock, classic rock, country, hip हॉप, rap, blues, and soul.
In some सालो, short skits or drama scenes are acted out on a stage.
The performance group Up with People has performed at the most सुपर Bowl halftime shows, starring in four during the 1970s and 1980s.
According to Nielsen दरजा, Super Bowl xlvi मध्यांतर show headlined by Madonna in 2012 remains the most-watched मध्यांतर दिखाएँ in history, with 114 लाख दर्शक or about 3 million अधिक than the actual game.
Beyonce 's 2013 halftime show performance थी the दूसरी most viewed show in इतिहास.
it is listed on the Guinness World Records as the largest TV audience लिये a सुपर Bowl half-time performance.
International Men 's Day ( IMD ) is an annual international event मनाये on 19th November.
Inaugurated in 1999 in Trinidad and Tobago, the day और its events ढूँढें support from a variety of individuals and groups in Australia, the Caribbean, North America, Asia, Europe and Africa.
Speaking on behalf of UNESCO, Director of महिलाओं and Culture of Peace ingeborg Breines said of IMD, `` This is an excellent idea और होता give कुछ gender balance. ''
She added that युनेस्को was looking forward to cooperating with the organizers.
The objectives of celebrating an International मेन 's दिन include focusing on men 's और लड़कों ' health, improving gender relations, promoting gender equality, and highlighting positive पुरूष role models.
it is an occasion to highlight discrimination against men and boys and to celebrate उनके achievements and contributions, in particular लिये their contributions to community, family, marriage, and child care.
The broader and ultimate aim of the event is to promote basic humanitarian मान.
अंतरराष्ट्रीय Men 's Day is celebrated in over 60 countries, including Trinidad और Tobago, Jamaica, Australia, India, China, United States, Romania, Singapore, Malta, संयुक्त Kingdom, South Africa, Tanzania, Zimbabwe, Botswana, Seychelles, बुरुंडी, Hungary, Ireland, Isle of Man, Ghana, Canada, Denmark, Norway, ऑस्ट्रिया, बोस्निया और हर्ज़ेगोविना, Ukraine, France, Italy, पाकिस्तानी, Cuba, अण्टीगुआ and Barbuda, St. किट्स and Nevis, St. Lucia, Grenada and Cayman Islands, on 19 November, and global support for the जश्न is व्यापक.

Village is a district in the San Fernando Valley region of Los Angeles, California.

developmental psychology is the scientific study of changes that occur in human beings over the course of उनके life span.
originally concerned with infants and children, the field has विस्तारित to include किशोरावस्था, adult development, aging, और the संपूर्ण life span.
This फ़ील्ड examines change across a broad range of topics including motor skills and other psycho-physiological processes ; cognitive development involving areas ऐसे as problem solving, moral understanding, and conceptual समझना ; language acquisition ; social, personality, and emotional development ; and self-concept and identity गठन.
Developmental psychology includes issues such as the extent to which development occurs through the क्रमिक accumulation of knowledge versus stage-like development, or the extent to which children are born with स्वाभाविक mental structures versus learning through experience.
Many शोधकर्ताओं are interested in the interaction between निजी characteristics, the individual 's behavior, and environmental factors including social context, और their impact on विकास ; others लो a अधिक narrowly-focused approach.
Developmental psychology informs several applied फ़ील्ड, including : educational psychology, child psychopathology, and forensic developmental psychology.
Developmental psychology complements several other basic research fields in psychology including social psychology, cognitive psychology, ecological psychology, and comparative psychology.
Joseph Michael `` Joey '' Stivic is a fictional character who first appeared on the 1970s American sitcom All in the Family.
Joey Stivic was the son and only child of Mike Stivic ( played by Rob Reiner ) and ग्लोरिया Stivic ( निभाई by Sally Struthers ), and the पोता of Archie Bunker ( कैरल o'connor ) and Edith Bunker ( Jean Stapleton ).
The character first appeared as a newborn baby in a two-part episode of सब in the Family which aired in December 1975.
बाद many appearances on सब in the Family until reiner and struthers left the श्रेणी in 1978 ( by that time, Joey had been played most often by alternating twins Jason and Justin Draeger ), the Joey Stivic character next appeared on the All in the परिवार spin-off series ( some call it a continuation of the original ) Archie Bunker 's प्लेस in a guest appearance in the November 1979 episode `` Thanksgiving Reunion. ''
In this instance, the character was played by चाइल्ड actor Dick billingsley and थी appropriately pre-school आयु.
With ग्लोरिया now separated from Mike, she returned to Archie बंकर 's Place साथ Joey in the February 1982 एपीसोड `` Gloria Comes Home. ''
in this episode, Joey was played by Christopher Johnston.
Joey Stivic was a regular character on the All in the परिवार spin-off series ग्लोरिया in 1982 and 1983.
On इस series, in which the now-divorced ग्लोरिया Bunker character had moved to Upstate New यॉर्क in order to work as an assistant veterinarian, the part of Joey Stivic थी played by ten-year-old actor ईसाई Jacobs.
After Gloria was canceled in 1983, Joey Stivic disappeared from prime time टेलीविज़न for 11 years, जबतक the character made one last appearance on 704 Hauser, a short-lived 1994 series about a black family who था moved into the बूढ़ा बंकर home, years after Bunker had sold it.
In this appearance, the Joey Stivic character थी played by Casey siemaszko, an actor born in 1961 ( 14 years before जॉय Stivic 's fictional birth ).
In 1976 the Ideal Toy Company released a 14-inch `` Joey Stivic गुड़िया '' ( called `` Archie बंकर 's Grandson '' ) which was billed as the `` पहला anatomically सही male doll. ''
the doll प्रेरित mild controversy at the time, and is a collectors ' item today.
The 2011 Rose कटोरी was the 97th संस्करण of the सालाना bowl game निभाई on January 1, 2011, as भाग of the 2010 कॉलेज football season.
Played in Pasadena, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, the TCU Horned Frogs of the पहाड़ West सम्मेलन defeated the Wisconsin Badgers of the बिग Ten Conference by a score of 21 – 19.
The Pasadena टूर्नामेंट of गुलाब संघ was the organizer of the game.
vizio Inc. was the corporate प्रायोजक और the game was officially named `` The Rose Bowl खेल presented by Vizio ''.
This game marked the पहला time a team from a non-Automatic qualifying Conference played in, and won, the Rose कटोरी in इसके 97 years.
the contest was broadcast on केबल टेलीविज़न station ESPN with a radio broadcast on ईएसपीएन Radio and XM Satellite Radio and ESPN3 streaming video over the internet.
Coverage began at 1:30 PM ( PST ) with kickoff at 2:10 PM ( PST ).
इस marked the first time कि the खेल was not broadcast nationally `` over-the-air '' ( terrestrial television ) since the खेल prior to the 1952 Rose Bowl, which was the first nationally televised college football game.
The Rose Bowl Game, themed Building Dreams, Friendships, & यादें, was a contractual sell-out, with 64,500 टिकटें आबंटित to the participating teams and conferences.
Ticket कीमतें for all seats in the रोज़ Bowl are listed at $ 145.
The बाकी टिकटें went to the Tournament of Roses members, sponsors, City of Pasadena residents, और the general public.
The Rose Bowl स्टेडियम capacity is listed at approximately 91,000.
the घोषणा of Independence is a statement adopted by the Continental Congress on July 4, 1776, which घोषित that the thirteen अमरीकी colonies, then at युद्ध with Great Britain, regarded themselves as independent राज्य, and no longer a part of the British Empire.
Instead they now formed a new nation—the United States of America.
John Adams was a नेता in pushing लिये independence, which was unanimously स्वीकृत on July 2.
A कमेटी था already drafted the formal declaration, to be ready when congress voted on independence.
Adams persuaded the committee to select Thomas जेफरसन to compose the original draft of the document, which congress would edit to उपज the final version.
The Declaration was ultimately a formal explanation of why Congress had voted on July 2 to declare independence from Great Britain, more than a year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War.
The national जन्मदिवस, the Independence Day is मनाये on July 4, although Adams wanted July 2.
After ratifying the टेक्स्ट on जुलाई 4, Congress जारी the Declaration of Independence in several फ़ॉर्म.
It was initially published as the printed Dunlap broadside that was widely distributed and पढ़ा to the public.
the most प्रसिद्ध version of the Declaration, a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the Declaration of Independence, is प्रदर्शित at the National Archives in Washington, D.C.
Although the wording of the Declaration was approved on जुलाई 4, the date of its signing was August 2.
The original जुलाई 4 United राज्य Declaration of Independence manuscript was lost while all other नक़ल have been derived from this original document.
The sources and interpretation of the Declaration have been the subject of much scholarly inquiry.
The Declaration जायज the independence of the संयुक्त States by listing colonial grievances against King George III, and by asserting certain natural and विधिक अधिकारों, including a सही of revolution.
Having served its original purpose in announcing independence, the text of the Declaration was initially ignored after the American Revolution.
Since then, it has आइये to be considered a major statement on human rights, particularly its second sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all मेन are निर्मित equal, कि they are endowed by their Creator साथ certain unalienable Rights, that among these are Life, Liberty and the pursuit of सुख.
This has been पुकारा `` एक of the best-known वाक्य in the English भाषा '', containing `` the सबसे potent and consequential words in American history. ''
The ड्योढ़ी आए to represent a moral standard to which the संयुक्त States should नीयत.
This view थी notably promoted by अब्राहम Lincoln, जो considered the Declaration to be the foundation of his political philosophy, and argued that the घोषणा is a statement of principles through which the United States Constitution should be interpreted.
It has inspired work for the rights of अधिकारहीन people throughout the world.
Chitty Chitty बंग Bang is a 1968 British musical film loosely आधारित on Ian फ्लेमिंग 's novel.

Irwin Kostal supervised and conducted the म्यूज़िक, while the musical numbers यहूद staged by Marc breaux and Dee Dee Wood.
A region is arid when it is characterized by a severe lack of उपलब्धियाँ water, to the extent of hindering or preventing the growth and development of plant and animal life.
Environments subject to arid climates tend to कमी vegetation and are called xeric or desertic.
Most `` arid '' climates surround the equator ; these places include most of Africa and parts of South अमेरिका and Central अमेरिका.
Cancer ( ♋ ) is an astrological चिह्न, which is associated साथ the constellation Cancer.
It spans the 90-120th degree of the zodiac, between 90 and 125.25 degree of celestial longitude, which the सूर्य transits this area on average between June 22 to July 22 each year.
And under the sidereal zodiac, it is currently from July 21 to August 9.
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial presidential election, held on Tuesday, November 8, 1960.
The Republican Party nominated लाज़िम Vice-President Richard Nixon, while the Democratic Party nominated John F. Kennedy, सीनेटर इससे Massachusetts.
the incumbent President, Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower, थी not eligible for re-election after serving the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment.
कैनेडी थी elected with a lead of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the popular vote, giving उसे a victory of 303 to 219 in the Electoral College, the closest since 1916.
This was the first चुनाव in which all fifty of the current संयुक्त राज्य participated.
A क्रमांक of factors explain why the election थी so close.
Kennedy gained since there थी an economic मंदी जिससे hurt the incumbent Republican, और he had the लाभ of 17 लाख more registered Democrats than Republicans.
Furthermore, the new votes कि Kennedy gained among catholics almost neutralized the new votes Nixon gained among Protestants.
कैनेडी 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
in the end, निक्सन 's emphasis on his experience carried little वज़न, and he wasted energy by campaigning in सब 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states.
कैनेडी used his large, well-funded campaign organization to win the nomination, सुरक्षित endorsements, and, with the सहायता of the last of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson to hold the दक्षिण and used television effectively.
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting u.s. Senators ( Kennedy और जॉनसन ) were elected as अध्यक्ष and vice-president, a phenomenon that has महरूम दोहराया once, by बराक Obama और जो Biden in 2008 ( in both cases, the president was the younger, more junior senator ).

The USA PATRIOT Act of 2001 is an Act of the U.S. कॉंग्रेस that was signed into law by President George W. Bush on October 26, 2001.
The शीर्षक of the अधिनियम is a टेन letter acronym ( यूएसए PATRIOT ) that stands for uniting ( और ) Strengthening America ( by ) Providing उचित Tools Required ( to ) Intercept ( and ) Obstruct Terrorism Act of 2001.
the act, as a response to the terrorist attacks of सितंबर 11th, significantly reduced restrictions in law enforcement agencies ' महफ़िल of प्रज्ञा within the United States ; expanded the Secretary of the Treasury’s authority to regulate financial ट्रांजेक्शन, particularly those involving foreign individuals and entities ; and broadened the discretion of law enforcement and immigration अधिकारियों in detaining और deporting immigrants suspected of terrorism-related अधिनियमों.
The अधिनियम भी विस्तारित the definition of terrorism to include domestic आतंक, thus enlarging the number of activities to which the यूएसए PATRIOT act’s expanded law enforcement powers can be applied.
On May 26, 2011, अध्यक्ष Barack Obama used an Autopen to sign the PATRIOT Sunsets एक्सटेंशन अधिनियम of 2011, a four-year extension of तीन key provisions in the USA PATRIOT Act while he was in France : roving wiretaps, searches of business रिकॉर्ड ( the `` library records provision `` ), and conducting निगरानी of `` lone wolves '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related activities नहीं linked to आतंकवादी groups.
Republican leaders questioned if the use of the Autopen met the constitutional requirements for signing a bill into law.

snohomish is a city in Snohomish County, Washington, संयुक्त States.
The population थी 9,098 at the 2010 census.
The mayor of Snohomish is karen Guzak, और the नगर Manager is Larry bauman.
snohomish prides itself for इसके historical downtown, and was once known for its many antique दुकानें जब it was ज्ञात as the `` Antique Capital of the Northwest. ''
the historic business और आवासीय center of the town constitutes the Snohomish Historic ज़िला, which is listed on the National Register of Historic Places.
Many houses bear plaques with the year the house थी built and the name of the family or व्यक्तिगत who originally occupied it.
Once every year, the city gives tours of the historic houses ; एक of them, the blackman हाउस, is a year-round museum.
A general aviation airfield, Harvey Airfield, is less than one mile दक्षिणपश्चिम of Downtown Snohomish.
Dave matthews Band ( dmb ) is an अमरीकी rock band that was formed in charlottesville, Virginia, United States, in 1991.
the founding members were singer-songwriter और guitarist Dave Matthews, bassist Stefan Lessard, drummer /backing vocalist Carter Beauford और saxophonist LeRoi मूर.
Boyd Tinsley was added to the band as a violinist soon बाद the band थी formed.
Moore died suddenly in अगस्त 2008 due to जटिलताओं from injuries sustained in an ATV accident.
ग्रैमी Award -winner जेफ़ Coffin of Béla fleck and the Flecktones has since filled Moore 's spot as the band 's saxophonist.
rashawn रॉस and Tim Reynolds have also become full-time touring members of the band.
The band 's 2009 album बिग Whiskey and the GrooGrux King ( the first album since मूर 's death ) debuted at number one on the Billboard 200, कमाई the band their पांचवां consecutive number-one debut— making them the second band behind Metallica to do so.
Their most recent album, Away from the World, थी released in 2012, and also debuted at number one on the Billboard chart.
As of 2010, the Dave Matthews Band has sold over 30 million records worldwide.
The band is known for उनके annual summer-long tours of the United States and Europe, featuring lengthy improvisational renditions of their songs, accompanied by an elaborate video and lighting दिखाएँ.
This portion of the दौरे रै become a stamp of DMB and has grown with the band since Fenton Williams began working with उन्हें in the early 1990s.
After twenty consecutive years of touring the band announced कि it would take the summer of 2011 off.
Dave Matthews Band has जीती one GRAMMY Award, and was awarded the NAACP Chairman 's Award.
According to Julian Bond, `` वे sell out the largest arenas on Earth, लकिन frequently दे their music away. ''
Transcendental जंगली Oats : A Chapter from an Unwritten Romance is a prose satire written by Louisa may Alcott, about her परिवार 's involvement साथ the Transcendentalist community Fruitlands in the जल्दी 1840s.
The work was पहला published in a New यॉर्क newspaper in 1873, and reprinted in 1874, 1876, और 1915 और after.
In her account, alcott provides the real people involved साथ पतला pseudonymous disguises.
Her father अमोस Bronson Alcott is `` Abel Lamb, '' while his partner and जातियाँ co-founder Charles लेन is `` Timon Lion ; '' Abigail May Alcott, louisa 's mother and Bronson 's wife, is `` Sister Hope. ''
Alcott depicts her father as वर्चस्व by his अधिक forceful partner, and दोनो मेन as feckless and अव्यवहारिक dreamers.
The men of the community spend their time in pointless debates जबकि Sister Hope works from dawn to dusk to maintain their existence.
A crisis arises at harvest time, when the grain crop is threatened by an approaching तूफ़ान.
In alcott 's words, `` परिचय the समय the अनाज was ready to house, some call of the Oversoul wafted all the men दूर. ''
Sister Hope organizes the only उपलब्धियाँ सहायता, three little लड़कियों and a boy, और manages to save the crop.
The little community collapses as soon as the weather turns cold, when it becomes clear that उनके provisions are too meager to last the coming winter.
Timon Lion and his son abscond to जुड़ें the Shakers — though Timon is unhappy to learn कि जीवन among उन्हें is `` all work and no play. ''
Abel is crushed by the failure of the enterprise ; बाद दिनों of despair he begins to eat again only when he realizes that उसके family needs him.
Sister Hope finds a way for them to subsist and persevere.
Alcott 's view of male arrogance and female exploitation in इस piece is paralleled in उसके novel, published in the same साल as `` Transcendental Wild Oats. ''
`` Transcendental Wild Oats '' रै been reprinted in several modern editions.
माउंट of the पावन Cross is the northernmost 14,000-foot पहाड़ in the Sawatch Range, part of the Rocky Mountains in Colorado.
It is located in the Holy Cross wilderness near the ghost town of Holy Cross City and in Eagle County.
It थी named for the distinctive cross-shaped snowfield on the northeast face.
Under यूएसडीए Forest Service administration, the mountain was proclaimed `` Holy क्रॉस National स्मारक '' by Herbert हूवर on May 11, 1929.
The monument was transferred to the National Park सेवा in 1933.
In 1950, it was लौटे to the Forest Service and खोया its National Monument status—the number of visitors to the mountain and the nearby `` Pilgrim 's Hut '' था waned, and the expense of full-time staff could not be justified.
This mountain has been the subject of painters, photographers and even a poem by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, ( The Cross of हिम ).
The first सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ photograph थी published in नेशनल भौगोलिक magazine.
Thomas Moran चित्रित the mountain in an आयल पेंटिंग, which अभी is part of the collection of the Museum of the American West, part of the Autry National Center in Los Angeles, California.
it is स्टिल much photographed लकिन it is not as खूब known आज as it was in the past.
Nearby features शामिल कटोरी of Tears Lake, directly under the east फेस of the peak, Tuhare Lakes, in a cirque कि lies south of a significant subpeak, and several other lakes.
Notable locations within शामिल the dotsero ज्वालामुखी ( near Interstate 70 ), Vail and Aspen.
US 24 रनों near the peak through Gilman.
Photochrom छपाई of Mount of the पावन Cross c. 1900.
This image is a reversed view of the mountain compared to how it actually appears.
the first recorded ascent of Holy Cross was in 1873, by F. V. Hayden and photographer W. H. Jackson during एक of Hayden 's geographical surveys.
However, the peak may well have महरूम ascended previously by miners or American Indians.
The first winter ascent of the peak थी made in 1943 by Russel Keene and Howard freedman of the 10th Mountain Division, then stationed at Camp hale.
Holy Cross can be climbed by at least four different routes, with the easiest and most common route being the North Ridge, which involves of लंबवत gain over and is rated yds क्लास 2 for मॉडरेट scrambling.
The Cross Couloir route forms the vertical portion of the famous cross विशेषता, and provides an advanced snow climb or extreme ski descent.
Mount of the Holy Cross has a history of endangering the जीवनदान of many hikers.
Primarily, the hikers जो require rescue are unfamiliar with the risks of entering wilderness areas and do not लाओ adequate equipment and आपूर्तियाँ to respond to emergency conditions.
हालांकि the summit on माउंट of the पावन क्रॉस is अक्सर पहुँचे on a long दिन hike, unprepared hikers are frequently stranded or lost due to changing पर्यावरणीय conditions and confusion regarding the surrounding landscape, especially on the descent of North Ridge.
Thorough research and reasonable planning should prevent सबसे tragedies.
Mount of the पावन cross is accessible from Tigiwon Road, south of Minturn, Colorado.
The हाफ Moon Pass Trail is the standard route to the summit of माउंट of the Holy Cross via the North Ridge.
Following the पतन Creek Trail to an ascent of Notch Mountain Trail provides the best view of the Holy Cross snow feature from Notch Mountain लकीरें.
the GSM लोगो is used to identify compatible handsets and equipment
GSM ( Global System for Mobile Communications, originally ' ), is a standard set विकसित by the यूरोपीय Telecommunications Standards Institute ( etsi ) to describe protocols for second generation ( 2G ) डिजिटल सेल्यूलर networks प्रयुक्त by mobile phones.
It became the de facto global standard for मोबाईल communications with over 80 % market share.
The जीएसएम standard was विकसित as a बदलना for first generation ( 1G ) analog cellular networks, and originally described a digital, सर्किट switched network optimized लिये full duplex voice telephony.
This was expanded over time to include data संचार, first by circuit switched transport, then packet data transport via GPRS ( General Packet रेडियो Services ) and EDGE ( Enhanced आंकड़ा दरों for GSM एवोल्यूशन or EGPRS ).
further improvements यहूद made when the 3GPP developed third generation ( 3g ) umts मानकों followed by fourth generation ( 4G ) LTE उन्नत standards.
`` GSM '' is a trademark owned by the जीएसएम Association.
अध्यक्ष Franklin D. Roosevelt signs the Lend-Lease विधेयक to give aid to Britain and China ( 1941 )
the Lend Lease act was an act where the United States had समर्थित its allies.
Lend-Lease ( ) was the law that started a program under which the United राज्य of अमेरिका supplied the United Kingdom, the USSR, Republic of China, Free फ़्रांस, and अन्य Allied nations with materiel between 1941 and 1945.
It was signed into law on March 11, 1941, a साल and a half after the outbreak of World War II in Europe in सितंबर 1939.
This was nine months पहले the U.S. डाला the war in December 1941.
Formally titled An Act to Further Promote the Defense of the United States, the Act effectively ended the United राज्य ' pretense of neutrality.
a total of $ 50.1 अरब ( equivalent to $ today ) worth of आपूर्तियाँ were shipped : $ 31.4 अरब to Britain, $ 11.3 अरब to the Soviet Union, $ 3.2 billion to France, $ 1.6 अरब to चीन, and छोटी sums to other Allies.
Reverse Lend-Lease comprised सेवाएं such as किराया on air bases that गई to the U.S., and totaled $ 7.8 billion ; of this, $ 6.8 billion आए इससे the British and the Commonwealth.
The terms of the agreement provided that the materiel was to be used until time for their return or destruction.
आपूर्तियाँ बाद the termination तिथि were sold to Britain at a large discount for £1.075 अरब using long-term loans from the United States.
कनाडा संचालित a समान program that sent $ 4.7 billion in आपूर्तियाँ to the United Kingdom and the Soviet Union.
The United States किया not charge लिये सहायता supplied अंतर्गत this legislation.
This program was a decisive step away from non-interventionist policy, which had dominated United States foreign relations since the समाप्त of World War I, towards international involvement.
The Jerusalem artichoke ( helianthus tuberosus ), also called sunroot, sunchoke, earth apple or topinambour, is a species of सूरजमुखी native to eastern North America, and found from eastern Canada and Maine west to North Dakota, and south to उत्तरी फ्लोरिडा and Texas.
It is also cultivated widely across the शीतोष्ण zone for its tuber, which is used as a root vegetable.
Castillo San Felipe del morro भी known as Fort San Felipe del morro or morro Castle, is a 16th-century citadel located in San Juan, Puerto Rico.
stonehenge is a प्रागैतिहासिक स्मारक in विल्टशायर, इंग्लैण्ड, परिचय west of Amesbury and उत्तर of Salisbury.
एक of the most famous sites in the world, stonehenge is the remains of a ring of standing stones set within earthworks.
It is in the middle of the सबसे dense complex of Neolithic और Bronze आयु स्मारक in England, including several hundred burial mounds.
Archaeologists believe it was built anywhere from 3000 BC to 2000 BC.
Radiocarbon dating in 2008 suggested that the first stones were raised between 2400 and 2200 BC, whilst another theory suggests that bluestones may have महरूम raised at the site as early as 3000 bc.
The surrounding circular earth bank और ditch, which constitute the earliest phase of the स्मारक, have been dated to about 3100 BC.
The site and its परिवेश यहूद added to the युनेस्को 's list of World Heritage Sites in 1986 in a co-listing with Avebury Henge.
it is a national legally protected Scheduled Ancient Monument.
Stonehenge is owned by the Crown and managed by English Heritage, while the surrounding land is owned by the National Trust.
Archaeological प्रमाण मिला by the Stonehenge Riverside Project in 2008 indicates that Stonehenge could have been a burial ground इससे its earliest beginnings.
The डेटिंग of cremated remains found on the site indicate that deposits contain इंसान bone from as जल्दी as 3000 BC, when the ditch and बैंको were पहला dug.
Such deposits continued at Stonehenge for at तनिक another 500 years.
The site is a place of religious significance and pilgrimage in Neo-Druidry.
The NCAA Women 's Division I Championship is an annual कॉलेज basketball tournament लिये women.
Held प्रत्येक April, the Women 's Championship was inaugurated in the 1981–82 season.
The NCAA tournament was preceded by the AIAW Women 's Basketball Tournament, which was आयोजित annually from 1972 to 1982.
Basketball was one of twelve women 's sports added to the NCAA championship कार्यक्रम for the 1981-82 school year, as the NCAA engaged in battle with the Association for Intercollegiate Athletics लिये Women for sole governance of women 's collegiate खेल.
The AIAW continued to conduct its स्थापित championship program in the same twelve ( and अन्य ) खेल ; however, after a year of dual women 's championships, the NCAA prevailed, while the aiaw disbanded.
Attendance and interest in the Women 's Division I Championship have grown over the years, especially since 2003, when the final championship game was स्थानांतरित to the Tuesday following the Monday men 's championship game.
The women 's championship game is अभी the final overall game of the college basketball season.
Before that, the Women 's फाइनल Four was प्रायः played on the Friday before the Men 's Final Four or the hours before the men played on the final Saturday of the tournament.
The final थी usually played the Sunday afternoon following the Men 's Final Four.
The टूर्नामेंट bracket is made up of champions इससे each प्रभाग I conference, जिससे प्राप्त automatic बोलियों.
The remaining slots are at-large bids, साथ teams chosen by an ncaa selection कमेटी.
The selection process and टूर्नामेंट seedings are based on several factors, including team rankings, win-loss records and Ratings Percentage Index ( rpi ) आंकड़ा.
नापसंद the men 's tournament, वहीँ are तभी 32 at-large bids ( as of the next tournament in 2014 ), and no play-in game.
The महिलाओं 's tournament, like the men 's, is staged in a सिंगल elimination format, and is भाग of the मीडिया and public frenzy known colloquially as March Madness or the Big Dance.
सब 63 खेल have महरूम broadcast on टेलीविज़न since 2003 on ईएसपीएन and ESPN2.
Similar to the pre-2011 मेन 's tournament coverage on CBS, local teams हैं shown on each channel when available, साथ `` whip-around '' coverage designed to showcase the most competitive contests in the बाकी of the country.
The Rosetta Stone in the अंग्रेजों Museum
the Rosetta Stone is an ancient Egyptian granodiorite stele inscribed with a decree issued at Memphis in 196 BC on behalf of King Ptolemy v.
The decree appears in three scripts : the अपर text is Ancient Egyptian चित्रलिपि, the middle portion Demotic script, and the lowest Ancient Greek.
Because it presents essentially the same text in all तीन scripts ( with some minor मतभेद between them ), it provided the key to the modern understanding of Egyptian hieroglyphs.
Originally displayed भीतर a टेम्पल, the stone was probably moved दौरान the early ईसाई or medieval period and eventually used as building सामग्री in the construction of Fort Julien near the कस्बा of Rashid ( Rosetta ) in the nile Delta.
It was rediscovered वहीँ in 1799 by a सिपाही, Pierre-François bouchard, of the French expedition to Egypt.
As the पहला Ancient Egyptian bilingual text बरामद in modern टाइम्स, the Rosetta Stone aroused widespread public ब्याज with its potential to decipher this hitherto untranslated ancient language.
Lithographic नक़ल और plaster casts began circulating among European museums और विद्वानों.
meanwhile, British troops पराजित the French in Egypt in 1801, and the असली stone came into British possession under the Capitulation of Alexandria.
Transported to London, it has been on public display at the British Museum since 1802.
It is the most-visited object in the British Museum.
कभी चूंकि its rediscovery, the stone has been the focus of राष्ट्रवादी rivalries, including इसके transfer from French to British possession during the Napoleonic Wars, a long-running dispute over the relative value of Young 's and Champollion 's contributions to the decipherment, and since 2003, मांगे लिये the स्टोन 's return to Egypt.
Study of the डिक्री was already under way as the first full translation of the यूनानी टेक्स्ट appeared in 1803.
It was 20 years, however, before the transliteration of the Egyptian स्क्रिप्ट was announced by jean-françois Champollion in पेरिस in 1822 ; it took longer still पहले scholars were समर्थ to read Ancient मिश्र inscriptions and साहित्य confidently.
Major advances in the डिकोडिंग यहूद : recognition that the stone offered three versions of the same text ( 1799 ) ; that the demotic text used phonetic characters to वर्तनी foreign names ( 1802 ) ; that the hieroglyphic टेक्स्ट did so as खूब, and had pervasive similarities to the demotic ( Thomas Young, 1814 ) ; और that, in addition to being used for foreign names, phonetic वर्ण were also used to spell native Egyptian words ( Champollion, 1822–1824 ).
Two अन्य fragmentary copies of the same डिक्री were discovered later, and several similar Egyptian bilingual or trilingual inscriptions हैं now known, including two थोड़ा पहले Ptolemaic डिक्री ( the डिक्री of Canopus in 238 BC, और the मेम्फिस decree of Ptolemy IV, ca. 218 bc ).
The rosetta Stone is therefore no longer unique, but it थी the essential key to modern understanding of Ancient मिश्र literature and civilization.
The term Rosetta Stone is now प्रयुक्त in other contexts as the नाम for the essential clue to a new field of ज्ञान.
ज़हर dart frog ( also dart-poison frog, poison frog or formerly poison arrow frog ) is the आम name of a group of frogs in the family Dendrobatidae which are native to Central और South अमेरिका.
These species are diurnal and often have brightly colored लाशें.
Although all wild dendrobatids are at least somewhat toxic, levels of toxicity vary considerably from one species to the अगला and from one population to another.
Many species are threatened.
These amphibians are often called `` dart मेंढक '' due to the Amerindians ' indigenous use of their to poison the tips of blowdarts.
However, of over 175 species, only four have been documented as being used for this purpose ( curare plants are more commonly used ), all of which आइये from the Phyllobates genus, which is characterized by the relatively विशाल size and high levels of toxicity of its members.
Cajeta is a Mexican confection of thickened सिरप usually बना of sweetened caramelised milk.
According to chef Rick Bayless, the name for cajeta came from the Spanish phrase al punto de cajeta, which means `` a द्रव thickened to the point at which a spoon drawn through the liquid reveals the bottom of the pot in which it is being cooked ''.
Another hypothesis is that it takes its name from the small लकड़ी boxes in which it was traditionally packed.
मैक्सिकन cajeta is considered a specialty of the city of Celaya in the state of Guanajuato, although it is also produced with the traditional method in several towns of the state of Jalisco, such as Mazamitla, sayula, and Atotonilco el Alto.
Cajeta is made by simmering बकरी 's milk, or occasionally a sweetened द्रव, stirring frequently, until it becomes very viscous due to evaporation of water, और caramelized.
While बकरी milk is the most usual आधार, other liquids or juices may be प्रयुक्त.
In Celaya, and eventually the rest of मैक्सिको, the confection of half goat 's milk and half cow 's milk became known by the name cajeta, but elsewhere, the मिल्क candy became known as leche quemada, dulce de leche, etc.
It रै cousins in the अनेक Indian milk-based sweets जैसे pera और the milk fudge burfi, and in the opera fudge of the u.S. Cajeta is eaten on इसके own as a मीठी, as a spread or filling for breads और pastries, such as churros, और as a टॉपिंग लिये ice मलाई.
निश्चित liquors are added to special recipes called cajeta envinada.
In addition, cajeta envinada especial is enriched with raisins, बादाम, pecans or nuts.
Often it is प्रयुक्त as a topping for crêpes, as a मीठी sauce boiled and softened down with milk to soak the crepes, resulting in a tasty dessert.
In मैक्सिको many ब्रांड्स मेक cajeta but the सबसे आम brand is coronado.
it is also very common to place cajeta between obleas to make a परंपरागत Mexican dessert.
Prince विलियम, Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ), is the elder son of चार्ल्स, Prince of Wales, and Diana, राजकुमारी of Wales, and third-eldest पोता of Queen एलिज़ाबेथ ii और Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh.
he is second in the line of succession, behind his father, to the thrones of sixteen independent sovereign states ज्ञात as the Commonwealth realms : the संयुक्त Kingdom, Canada, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, New Zealand, Jamaica, बारबाडोस, The Bahamas, Grenada, पापुआ New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, तुवालू, Saint लूसिया, Saint विंसेंट and the Grenadines, Belize, अण्टीगुआ and Barbuda, and Saint किट्स और Nevis.
प्रिंस William was educated at four schools in the संयुक्त Kingdom and obtained a उपाधि from the University of St Andrews.
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile, बेलीज़, Tanzania, and कीनिया where he has जिया and holidayed several times.
Prince William has भी taken Kiswahili अध्ययन at universities in Kenya and Tanzania.
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the ब्लूज़ और Royals रेजीमेंट of the Household Cavalry —serving with his brother प्रिंस Harry —and, two years later, earned his wings by completing पायलट training at Royal Air Force कॉलेज Cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the royal एयर फ़ोर्स, was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and underwent helicopter flying training in order to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force.
in 2010, he समाप्त his general and special-to-type helicopter training और went on to RAF Valley on No. 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter.
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend, Catherine मिडलटन, on 29 April 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर Abbey.
घंटों prior to his विवाह, Prince William was created Duke of Cambridge, Earl of Strathearn, and सामन्त carrickfergus.
माली is a multilingual country.
The languages बोला there reflect प्राचीन settlement patterns, migrations, and its long history.
Ethnologue counts 50 languages.
Of these, French is the official भाषा and Bambara is the most widely बोला.

Rogers Building, the headquarters of Rogers Communications
Rogers Communications Inc. is a diversified public Canadian communications and media कम्पनी.
it is particularly in the field of wireless संचार, cable television, telephone, and Internet connectivity with significant additional telecommunications and mass मीडिया assets.
The company is headquartered in the Rogers भवन in Toronto, Ontario.
The company claims the heritage of the Rogers Vacuum Tube Company, founded in 1925 by एडवर्ड रोजर्स, which started the CFRB radio स्टेशन in Toronto, which was later acquired by outside interests.
The present enterprise dates to 1960, जब Rogers ' बेटे, Ted Rogers, founded Rogers Radio Broadcasting Ltd.
That कम्पनी acquired chfi that year, as well as aldred-rogers Broadcasting, a साझेदारी साथ Joel Aldred which helped launch CFTO in 1961.
Rogers later bought out Aldred और started the वर्तमान cable and बेतार operations, known as Rogers Cablesystems ltd.
The मुख्य competitor to the company is घंटी Canada, which has a similarly extensive portfolio of radio and television मीडिया assets, as well as wireless, television वितरण, and telephone services, particularly in Eastern and Central Canada ; the two companies हैं often देखी as having a duopoly on communications services in उनके regions.
However, the company also competes nationally with Telus for wireless सेवाएं, और primarily indirectly with शॉ Communications for television service.
The company भी competes साथ a number of अन्य media companies in the broadcasting industry.
the Internet is a global system of interconnected कंप्यूटर networks that use the standard Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) to serve अरबों of उपयोक्ता worldwide.
It is a network of networks that consists of millions of private, public, academic, business, and government networks, of local to global पैमाना, that are linked by a broad सरणी of electronic, wireless and ऑप्टिकल नेटवर्किंग technologies.
the अंतरजाल carries an extensive range of information resources and services, such as the inter-linked hypertext documents of the World Wide Web ( WWW ) और the infrastructure to support email.
Most traditional communications media including telephone, music, film, and television are being reshaped or redefined by the अंतरजाल, giving जनम to new services such as आवाज़ over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) and Internet Protocol television ( IPTV ).
Newspaper, book and other print publishing are adapting to Web site technology, or हैं reshaped into blogging and web feeds.
The अंतरजाल has enabled and accelerated नई forms of human interactions through instant messaging, Internet forums, and social नेटवर्किंग.
Online shopping रै boomed both for major खुदरा outlets and small शिल्पकार और traders.
Business-to-business और financial सेवाएं on the अंतरजाल affect supply chains across संपूर्ण industries.
the origins of the Internet reach back to शोध commissioned by the संयुक्त States government in the 1960s to build robust, fault-tolerant communication via कंप्यूटर networks.
The funding of a नई U.S. backbone by the नेशनल Science Foundation in the 1980s, as well as private funding for other commercial backbones, led to worldwide participation in the development of new networking technologies, और the merger of many networks.
The commercialization of what was by the 1990s an international network resulted in its popularization and incorporation into virtually प्रत्येक aspect of modern human जीवन.
, अधिक than 2.4 billion people—over a third of the world 's इंसान population —have used the सेवाएं of the Internet ; approximately 100 times more लोगों than were using it in 1995, जब it was mostly used by tech-savvy middle and upper class people in the United राज्य और several other countries.
The अंतरजाल has no centralized governance in either technological implementation or policies for अभिगम and usage ; each constituent network सेट its own policies.
Only the overreaching definitions of the two principal name स्पेसेस in the Internet, the Internet Protocol address space and the डोमेन Name System, are directed by a maintainer organization, the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names और Numbers ( ICANN ).
The तकनीकी underpinning and standardization of the core प्रोटोकॉल ( ipv4 and IPv6 ) is an activity of the Internet Engineering Task Force ( ietf ), a non-profit organization of loosely affiliated international participants कि anyone may associate with by contributing technical विशेषज्ञता.
the 2006 Winter Olympics, officially known as the XX ओलम्पिक Winter Games, was a winter multi-sport event which was celebrated in Turin, Italy from फ़रवरी 10, 2006, through फ़रवरी 26, 2006.
This marked the second time Italy hosted the Olympic Winter Games, the first being the VII Olympic शीत Games in Cortina d'Ampezzo in 1956.
Italy भी hosted the Games of the xvii Olympiad in रोम in 1960.
Turin was selected as the host city for the 2006 games in 1999.
The official logo displayed the name `` Torino '', the Italian name of the city ; the नगर is ज्ञात as `` Turin '' in both English and the local traditional language, Piedmontese.
The Olympic mascots of Torino 2006 यहूद neve ( `` snow '' in Italian ), a female snowball, and gliz, a male ice cube.
The official motto of the xx Olympic शीत Games was `` Passion lives यहाँ ''.
`` Help ! '' is a song by the Beatles that परोसा as the title सोंग for both the 1965 film and its soundtrack album.
it was also released as a single, and was number one लिये three weeks in both the United States और the संयुक्त Kingdom.
`` Help ! '' was written primarily by जॉन Lennon, लकिन credited to Lennon–McCartney.

siegfried bing ( 26 February 1838 – 6 September 1905 ), जो usually gave his name as S. Bing, और थी thus प्रायः referenced erroneously as `` Samuel Bing '' ( सैमुएल Otto Bing, 1850–1905, थी his brother ) was a German art dealer who lived in Paris as an वयस्क, and who helped introduce जापानी art and artworks to the West and was a factor in the विकास of the Art Nouveau style during the late nineteenth century.

Kennewick is a नगर in Benton County in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of Washington, near the Hanford nuclear site.
It is the most populous of the three cities collectively referred to as the tri-cities ( the others होने Pasco and Richland ).
Kennewick is located along the southwest bank of the Columbia River, opposite Pasco and just दक्षिण of the confluence of the कोलंबिया and Yakima rivers.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 73,917 at the 2010 census.
April 1, 2012 estimates from the Washington State Office of Financial Management put the नगर 's population at 75,160.
The nearest commercial विमानक्षेत्र is the Tri-Cities Airport in Pasco, a regional commercial and निजी विमानक्षेत्र.
Forbes magazine named Kennewick the # 2 area in the United States for job growth, जबकि nearby Yakima was named # 1.
The आलेख cites the number of scientists employed by the Pacific Northwest नेशनल Laboratory और area farmland for this outlook.
The prothrombin time ( PT ) and इसके derived measures of prothrombin ratio ( PR ) and international सामान्यीकृत ratio ( INR ) हैं measures of the extrinsic pathway of coagulation.
This test is also called `` ProTime INR '' and `` PT/INR ''.
They are used to determine the clotting tendency of blood, in the माप of warfarin dosage, जिगर damage, और vitamin K status.
PT measures factors I ( फाइब्रिनोजेन ), II ( prothrombin ), v, VII, और X.
It is used in संयोजन with the activated partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) which measures the intrinsic pathway.
`` I 'm in the मनोदशा for प्रेम '' is a popular सोंग.
The music was written by jimmy mchugh, the lyrics by Dorothy Fields.
The song was प्रकाशित in 1935.
It थी introduced by frances Langford in the movie Every Night at आठ released that साल.
The song was प्रदर्शित in the 1936 Our Gang ( Little दुष्टों ) short, The Pinch Singer, सुंग by Carl `` Alfalfa '' Switzer, और in the 1936 film ताड़ Springs.
It is often known to be Switzer 's signature song.
James मूडी 's saxophone सोलो on a 1952 रिकॉर्डिंग of this song inspired the song `` Moody 's मनोदशा for Love ``.
हिप hop artist Prince Paul sampled the song as the basis for the track `` Mood for Love '' on उसके एल्बम A Prince Among Thieves ( 1999 ), with Don Newkirk singing its original lyrics.
the song 's title inspired the English title of Wong kar wai 's movie In the Mood for Love.
Cross-cultural psychology is the scientific study of human behavior and mental processes, including both their variability and invariance, under diverse cultural conditions.
through expanding research methodologies to recognize cultural variance in behavior, language, and meaning it seeks to extend and develop psychology.
Since psychology as an academic अनुशासन was विकसित largely in उत्तर अमेरिका, some psychologists became concerned that constructs accepted as universal were not as invariant as previously assumed, especially चूंकि many कोशिशें to replicate notable experiments in other cultures had varying success.
Since there are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes, such as affect, संज्ञान, conceptions of the self, and issues ऐसे as psychopathology, anxiety, and depression, may lack external validity when `` exported '' to other सांस्कृतिक contexts, cross-cultural psychology re-examines them using methodologies designed to factor in cultural differences so as to account for cultural variance.
Although some critics have pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural psychological research and अर्जी that serious shortcomings in the theoretical and methodological bases used impede rather than help the वैज्ञानिक search for universal principles in psychology, cross-cultural psychologists are turning more to the study of how differences ( variance ) occur, बल्कि than searching लिये universals in the style of भौतिकी or chemistry.
In 1972 the International Association of Cross-Cultural Psychology ( IACCP ) थी established.
This branch of psychology रै जारी to विस्तार as there has been an increasing popularity of incorporating culture and diversity into studies.
cross-cultural psychology is differentiated from सांस्कृतिक psychology.
The latter is the branch of मनोविज्ञान कि holds that human behavior is significantly बहकावे by cultural differences, meaning that psychological phenomena can only be compared with each अन्य आरपार cultures to a बहुत limited extent.
In contrast, cross-cultural psychology includes a search for possible universals in behavior और mental processes.
वाल्टर J. Lonner, writing लिये Eye on Psi Chi, has stated that `` cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान can be thought of as a type research methodology, बल्कि than an entirely separate field भीतर psychology ( 2000 ). ''
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga, from her second studio एल्बम Born This Way ( 2011 ).
It was released by interscope Records on अप्रैल 15, 2011, four days ahead of इसके scheduled release.
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne, `` Judas '' is a नृत्य and electro house song about a woman in love साथ a man who betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents कि have haunted Gaga in the past, and its core meaning refers to the negative भाग of her life कि she ca n't एस्केप.
Gaga has further explained that the song was also about honoring one 's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the light.
The artwork for the single was designed by गागा in Microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing प्रभाव on several धार्मिक समूह, the song was generally well received by critics, who likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single.
The song has a similar ध्वनि to गागा 's पिछला redone-produced tracks, सहित `` Poker Face ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` ख़राब रोमांस '', और `` Alejandro ``.
it contains three पृथक hooks and a house -influenced break down.
Gaga explained that the lines बोला during the breakdown talk about उसके as beyond मोचन, regarding the traditional दृश्य of what a woman should be.
`` यहूदा '' initially had a strong sales opening, लकिन was less successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's पिछला singles.
The song reached the top टेन of the charts in सबसे major म्यूज़िक markets, और also reached the top of the चार्ट in South Korea.
A music वीडियो for the song थी filmed in April 2011, co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman reedus.
It has a biblical storyline where Reedus played Judas Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene.
The video portrays उन्हें as आधुनिक day प्रचारकों going to Jerusalem.
It शामिल the biblical story of Judas betraying Jesus, और ended with गागा as magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before इसके रिलीज, the Catholic League condemned Gaga for the alleged use of religious imagery and her role in the video.
however, critics generally praised the video, नहीं ढूंढना any offensive content.
The video was nominated for two awards at the 2011 MTV वीडियो Music Awards.
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a क्रमांक of television shows, सहित The Graham Norton Show, Saturday Night Live, शुभ Morning Americas `` Summer Concert Series '', the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or AVC ( Advanced Video Coding ) is a standard for video compression, और is currently one of the सबसे commonly used formats for the recording, compression, and distribution of high definition वीडियो.
the final drafting work on the पहला version of the मानक थी completed in May 2003.
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -based codec standard developed by the ITU-T Video Coding Experts समूह ( VCEG ) together with the iso/iec jtc1 Moving चित्र Experts Group ( MPEG ).
The project partnership effort is known as the Joint वीडियो Team ( jvt ).
the itu-t H.264 standard and the ISO/IEC mpeg-4 AVC मानक ( formally, iso/iec 14496-10 – MPEG-4 Part 10, Advanced Video Coding ) are jointly maintained so that they have identical technical content.
H.264 is perhaps बेहतरीन known as being one of the codec standards for blu-ray Discs ; all Blu-ray Disc players must be समर्थ to decode h.264.
It is also widely used by streaming internet स्त्रोत, such as वीडियो from vimeo, YouTube, and the iTunes स्टोर, वेब software such as the Adobe Flash Player and Microsoft Silverlight, and also विभिन्न HDTV broadcasts over terrestrial ( atsc, ISDB-T, dvb-t or dvb-t2 ), केबल ( DVB-C ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ).
non-binding arbitration is a type of arbitration in which the arbitrator makes a determination of the rights of the पार्टियों to the विवाद, लकिन this determination is not binding upon them, and no enforceable arbitration award is issued.
The `` award '' is in effect an सलाहकार opinion of the arbitrator 's view of the respective merits of the parties cases.
Non-binding arbitration is used in connection with कोशिशें to reach a negotiated settlement.
The role of an arbitrator in non-binding arbitration is, on the surface, समान to that of a mediator in a mediation.
However, the प्रिंसिपल distinction is that whereas a मध्यस्थ will कोशिश to help the parties find a middle मैदान to compromise at, the arbitrator remains totally removed from the उपनिवेश process और will तभी give a determination of देयता and, if उचित, an indication of the quantum of क्षतिपूर्ति payable.
Subsequent to a non-binding arbitration, the पार्टियों remain free to pursue their claims either through the courts, or by रास्ता of a binding arbitration, although in practice a settlement is the most common outcome.
The पुरस्कार and reasoning in a non-binding arbitration is almost invariably inadmissible in any subsequent action in the courts or in another arbitration tribunal.
non-binding मध्यस्थता is utilised mostly in the United राज्य and Canada.
It is largely unknown in Europe, हालांकि in the United Kingdom there is a practice of parties who are seeking a settlement to jointly instruct a महारानी 's counsel for an opinion on the merits and likely quantum of a claim, and then to negotiate on the basis of the दृश्य expressed in that राय.
Augustine Volcano is a लावा Dome Complex on अगस्टाइन Island in southwestern Cook Inlet in the kenai Peninsula बरो of southcentral coastal अलास्का, दक्षिणपश्चिम of Anchorage.
The अलास्का Volcano Observatory currently rates Mount अगस्टाइन as Level of Concern Color कोड Green for aviation and the Volcano चेतावनी Level is at Normal.
Augustine Island has a जमीन area of, while West Island, just off अगस्टाइन 's पश्चिमी shores, has.
The island is made up मुख्यतः of past eruption deposits.
Scientists have महरूम able to discern that past dome collapse रै resulted in large avalanches.
A map of Belize.
The country of बेलीज़ has roughly 386 km of coastline, and has many coral reefs, cays, और islands in the caribbean Sea.
Most of these form the Belize Barrier रीफ, the longest in the western गोलार्ध stemming approximately.
The reef and its islands have been a युनेस्को World Heritage Site since 1996.
The following is a list of oceanic islands of Belize, arranged according to प्रदेश लकिन सब of which are in the Caribbean Sea.
Most of the आइलैंड्स variate in स्पेलिंग between `` cay '' and `` caye '', and also उपयोग the स्पेनी `` cayo ''.
नदी islands have not been listed.
Drive अक्षर Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued commercial packet लिखने application for the Microsoft Windows operating system that allows optical disc आंकड़ा भंडार devices to be used in a manner similar to फ्लॉपी disks.
DLA is a packet writing प्रौद्योगिकी लिये CD and DVD media that uses the UDF file system.
DLA is not compatible with खिड़कियाँ Vista and newer, although a patch exists to fix this issue अंतर्गत Windows विस्टा.
roxio Burn was introduced on April 30, 2009.
As a replacement लिये dla, it remedies compatibility issues Internet Explorer 8.

अलास्का ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the northwest extremity of the North American continent, with the international boundary with Canada to the east, the Arctic Ocean to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south, साथ Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
अलास्का is the largest state in the संयुक्त States by area, the 4th least populous और the least densely populated of the 50 United States.
लगभग half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents live within the anchorage metropolitan area.
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil, natural gas, and फ़िशिंग उद्योग ; it has these resources in abundance.
Alaska थी purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, for $ 7.2 लाख ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at लगभग two cents प्रति acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several administrative परिवर्तन before becoming an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the u.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian औपनिवेशिक period, when it was used only for the प्रायद्वीप and is derived इससे the Aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the mainland '' or, more literally, `` the object towards which the action of the समुद्र is directed ''.
It is also ज्ञात as alyeska, the `` ग्रेट land '', an Aleut word derived इससे the same root.
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan विश्वविद्यालयों ( NMMU ) is a South African tertiary education institution with its main administration in the coastal नगर of Port Elizabeth.
A merging of three institutions founded NMMU in January 2005 but इसके इतिहास dates back to 1882 with the foundation of Port Elizabeth Art स्कूल.
The University draws international students from all over the world.
There are over 3000 international students and शामिल विद्यार्थी from the United States, France, चीन, Germany, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom and many other countries.
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering पेशेवर and vocational training.
The University has six campuses - five in बंदरगाहों एलिज़ाबेथ and one in George.
The प्रमुख campus is the South Campus.
Students at NMMU can study towards diplomas and degrees up to and सहित डॉक्टरेट स्तर qualifications.
a number of courses include workplace experience as part of the curriculum.
covergirl is an अमरीकी कॉस्मेटिक्स ब्रांड founded in Maryland, by the Noxzema Chemical कम्पनी ( later called noxell ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989.
The Noxell Company advertised this cosmetics line by allowing `` cover girls '', fashion models who appear on the front cover of women 's magazines, to wear its उत्पाद.
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct individual customer service by providing a wide variety of cosmetics available at उचित prices.
On the उत्पत्ति of Species, published on 24 नवम्बर 1859, is a work of scientific literature by चार्ल्स Darwin which is माना to be the foundation of evolutionary biology.
Its full title थी On the Origin of Species by Means of Natural चयन, or the संरक्षण of Favoured दौड़ in the Struggle for Life.
For the sixth edition of 1872, the short title थी changed to The Origin of Species.
डार्विन 's book introduced the वैज्ञानिक theory that populations evolve over the course of पीढियां through a प्रक्रम of natural selection.
It presented a body of evidence कि the diversity of life arose by common descent through a branching pattern of एवोल्यूशन.
डार्विन included evidence कि he had gathered on the Beagle expedition in the 1830s और his subsequent findings from शोध, correspondence, and experimentation.
Various evolutionary विचार had already been proposed to explain new findings in biology.
There was growing support for ऐसे ideas among dissident anatomists and the general public, लकिन during the first half of the 19th century the English वैज्ञानिक establishment was closely tied to the Church of इंग्लैण्ड, जबकि science was part of natural धर्मशास्त्र.
Ideas about the transmutation of species were controversial as they conflicted with the beliefs कि species were unchanging parts of a designed पदानुक्रम and that इंसानो were unique, unrelated to अन्य animals.
The political and theological implications यहूद intensely debated, but transmutation was not accepted by the scientific mainstream.
The book was written for non-specialist पाठक and attracted widespread interest upon its publication.
As Darwin थी an eminent वैज्ञानिक, his findings were taken seriously and the evidence he presented generated scientific, philosophical, and religious discussion.
The debate over the book contributed to the campaign by T.H. Huxley and उसके fellow members of the X Club to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism.
भीतर दो decades there was widespread scientific agreement that evolution, with a branching pattern of common descent, had occurred, but वैज्ञानिकों were slow to give natural selection the significance that Darwin thought appropriate.
दौरान the `` ग्रहण of Darwinism `` from the 1880s to the 1930s, various other mechanisms of एवोल्यूशन were given more क्रेडिट.
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s, Darwin 's अवधारणा of evolutionary adaptation through प्राकृतिक चयन became सेंट्रल to modern evolutionary सिद्धान्त, now the unifying concept of the life sciences.
Charles Dillon `` Casey '' स्टेंगल ( ; July 30, 1890 – September 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` The Old Perfessor '', was an American Major लीग Baseball outfielder and manager.
He was elected to the Baseball Hall of Fame in.
Stengel was born in Kansas City, Missouri, and originally nicknamed `` Dutch '', a common nickname at that time for Americans of जर्मनी ancestry.
After उसके प्रमुख लीग करियर began, he acquired the nickname `` Casey '', which originally came इससे the आद्याक्षर of his hometown ( `` K. C. '' ), जिससे evolved into `` Casey '', influenced by the wide popularity of the poem केसी at the Bat.
In the 1950s, sportswriters dubbed उसे with yet another nickname, `` The Old Professor '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ), लिये his sharp wit and his ability to talk at लंबाई on anything baseball -related.
Although उसके baseball career spanned a क्रमांक of teams and cities, he is primarily संबद्ध साथ clubs in New York City.
Between playing and managing, he is the तभी man to have worn four of New York 's प्रमुख लीग क्लब ' uniforms.
He was the first of four men ( through the season ) to manage both the नई यॉर्क Yankees and New York Mets ; Yogi berra, Dallas Green, and Joe टोरेस are the अन्य.
Like Torre, he also managed the Braves and the Dodgers.
He ended उसके baseball करियर as the beloved manager for the then विस्तार New York Mets, जिससे won over the दिल of New York partly due to the unique character of their veteran नेता.
June ( ) is the sixth month of the year in the Julian and gregorian calendars and one of the four months साथ a length of 30 दिनों.
Ovid provides दो etymologies for June 's name in his कविता concerning the months हकदार the Fasti.
The first is that the month is named बाद the Roman देवी Juno, wife of Jupiter and equivalent to the Greek goddess Hera ; the second is that the name comes इससे the Latin word iuniores, अर्थ `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for जिससे the preceding month may may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ).
See : Months in various calendars also called the season of the जून is the month with the longest daylight hours of the year in the Northern गोलार्ध और the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere.
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the seasonal equivalent to December in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere and वाइस versa.
in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध, the beginning of the meteorological summer is 1 June.
In the Southern hemisphere, the शुरूआत of the meteorological winter is 1 June.
At the start of June, the sun rises in the constellation of Taurus ; at the समाप्त of June, the sun rises in the constellation of Gemini.
however, due to the precession of the equinoxes, June begins with the sun in the astrological sign of मिथुन, and ends with the sun in the astrological चिह्न of Cancer.
June is known लिये the large number of विवाह कि occur over the course of the month.
According to one etymology, June is named after Juno ( Hera ).
Juno was the देवी of marriage and a married युगल 's household, so some consider it good लक to be married in this माह.
According to another etymology provided by the Roman कवि Ovid, June is named for the iuniores, latin for `` young people '' ( Fasti VI.88 ) और that the माह of May is named for the maiores, Latin for `` elders ''.
in Iceland, folklore says that if you bathe नग्न in the morning dew on the morning of June 24, तुम हैं supposed to keep वृद्धावस्था at bay for longer.
A constitution is a set of fundamental principles or स्थापित precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed.
ये rules together make up, i.e. constitute, what the entity is.
When these principles हैं written down into a single दस्तावेज़ or set of legal documents, those documents may be said to embody a written constitution ; if they are written down in a single comprehensive document, it is said to embody a codified constitution.
Constitutions concern different स्तर of organizations, from sovereign states to companies and unincorporated associations.
A treaty जिससे establishes an international organization is भी its संविधान, in that it would define how कि organization is constituted.
Within states, whether sovereign or federated, a constitution defines the principles upon which the राज्य is based, the procedure in which कानून are made and by whom.
Some constitutions, especially codified constitutions, also act as limiters of state power, by establishing lines जिससे a state 's rulers can नहीं cross, such as fundamental rights.
जार्ज Washington at Constitutional Convention of 1787, signing of U.S. Constitution.
The Constitution of India is the longest लिखा constitution of any sovereign देश in the संसार, containing 448 articles, 12 schedules and 100 amendments, साथ 117,369 words in इसके English language version, while the United States Constitution is the shortest written constitution, at 7 आलेख and 27 amendments.
