Engineering management is a specialized रूप of management that is concerned with the application of अभियान्त्रिकी principles to business practice.
अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबन्धन is a career that brings together the technological problem-solving savvy of engineering and the organizational, administrative, and planning abilities of प्रबन्धन in order to oversee जटिल enterprises from conception to completion.
उदाहरण areas of अभियान्त्रिकी are product development, manufacturing, construction, design engineering, industrial engineering, technology, production, or any अन्य field that employs personnel who perform an अभियान्त्रिकी function.
Successful engineering managers typically आवश्यकता प्रशिक्षण and experience in business and engineering.
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support by their technical team, and non-commercial managers tend to lack commercial सूझबूझ to deliver in a मार्केट economy.
Largely, engineering managers manage engineers who are driven by non-entrepreneurial thinking, यूँ require the जरुरी people skills to coach, mentor and motivate technical professionals.
Engineering professionals joining manufacturing कंपनियाँ sometimes become engineering प्रबंधक by डिफॉल्ट after a period of time.
They are जरूरी to learn how to मैनेज once they हैं on the जॉब, though this is usually an ineffective रास्ता to develop managerial abilities.
In an insurance policy, the deductible is the amount of expenses that जरूर be paid आउट of pocket before an insurer will pay any खर्च.
In general usage, the term deductible may be प्रयुक्त to describe एक of several types of clauses ( see below ) कि are used by insurance companies as a threshold for policy payments.
deductibles are typically used to deter the large number of trivial claims कि a consumer can be reasonably expected to भालू the cost of.
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant पर्याप्त to incur large costs, the insurance firm expects to अदा आउट slightly छोटी amounts much less frequently, incurring much higher savings.
As a result, insurance premiums are typically cheaper when वे involve higher deductibles.
Deductibles are normally provided as clauses in an insurance policy that dictate how much of an insurance-covered expense is borne by the policyholder.
वे are normally quoted as a फिक्स्ड मात्रा and is a part of most policies covering नुकसान to the policy holder.
The insurer then becomes liable for claimable expenses that exceed this amount ( subject to the अधिकतम sum claimable indicated in the contract ).
Depending on the policy, the deductible may लागू per covered घटना, or per year.
For policies जहाँ incidences are not easy to delimit ( for example health बीमे ), the deductible is typically applied per year.
Several deductibles can be set by the insurer based on the cause of the claim.
For example, a single housing बीमे policy may contain multiple deductible amounts लिये loss or damage arising from चोरी, fire, natural calamities, evacuation etc.
There are also deductible reimbursement कार्यक्रम that reimburse a deductible in the event of an स्वचालित, home, boat/yacht or health insurance claim.
an invoice or bill is a वाणिज्यिक दस्तावेज़ जारी by a seller to a buyer, indicating the products, quantities, and agreed prices for उत्पाद or सेवाएं the seller has provided the buyer.
An invoice indicates the sale लेनदेन only.
Payment terms हैं independent of the invoice and are negotiated by the buyer और the seller.
Payment terms are usually included on the invoice.
The buyer could have already paid for the products or services listed on the invoice.
खरीदार can also have a maximum number of days in which to pay for these goods and is sometimes offered a छूट if paid before the due date.
In the rental उद्योग, an invoice must शामिल a specific reference to the अवधि of the time being billed, so in addition to quantity, price और छूट the invoicing amount is also based on duration.
Generally each line of a rental invoice will refer to the actual hours, days, weeks, months, etc., होने billed.
From the पाइंट of दृश्य of a seller, an invoice is a sales चालान.
From the पाइंट of दृश्य of a खरीदार, an invoice is a purchase invoice.
The document indicates the buyer and seller, but the term invoice indicates money is owed or owing.
In English, the context of the term invoice is usually used to clarify इसके meaning, ऐसे as `` we sent them an invoice '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We received an invoice from them '' ( we owe them money ).
The right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus, or right principal bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system.
It is wider, shorter, and more vertical in दिशा than the बाएँ.
it is about 2.5 cm long, and enters the right फेफड़ों nearly opposite the fifth thoracic vertebra.
the azygos vein arches over it from behind ; and the right pulmonary धमनी झूठ at first नीचे and तब in front of it.
About 2 cm इससे इसके शुरुआत it देता off a branch to the upper lobe of the right lung.
This is termed the eparterial branch of the bronchus, because it arises above the right pulmonary artery.
The bronchus now passes नीचे the artery, and is known as the hyparterial branch ; it divides into two branches for the middle and lower lobes.
if a foreign body in the airway passes through the श्वासनली, it will most likely enter the सही main bronchus instead of the left, due to the straighter alignment of the right bronchus to the श्वासनली.
Squash is a racquet sport played by two ( singles ) or four players ( doubles ) in a four-walled अदालत with a small, hollow rubber बॉल.
The players must alternate in striking the ball with उनके racquet and hit the ball onto the playable सतहों of the four दीवारें of the court.
The खेल was formerly पुकारा squash racquets, a reference to the `` squashable '' soft ball used in the game ( compared with the fatter ball used in its parent खेल racquets or rackets ).
Squash is पहचाना by the IOC and supporters are lobbying for its incorporation in a future Olympic program.
In 2003, Forbes रेटेड squash as the क्रमांक एक healthiest sport to play.
अवशेष oil is oil found in low concentrations naturally or in बेहाल oil fields.
Often mixed with water, it can not be recovered by conventional techniques.
however, it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced आयल recovery ( co2 EOR ) which involves injecting carbon dioxide into the well reducing viscosity and enhancing flow of the oil.
the technique is नहीं new लकिन रै नहीं महरूम used extensively on residual oil zones, low-grade deposits of petroleum ऐसे as the 38 square miles in the permian Basin of टेक्सास leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr.
The तकनीक is limited by availability of carbon dioxide.
it करता not result in sequestration of the carbon dioxide but the gas is recycled as much as possible.
संयुक्त States reserves of residual oil are estimated to be 100 billion barrels.
कलाकार 's rendering of the fire, by John R. Chapin, originally printed in Harper 's साप्ताहिक ; the view faces northeast across the Randolph गली सेतु.
The Great Chicago Fire was a conflagration that burned from संडे, अक्तूबर 8, to जल्दी Tuesday, अक्तूबर 10, 1871, हत्या hundreds and destroying about in शिकागो, इलिनोइस.
Though the fire was one of the largest U.S. disasters of the 19th century, the rebuilding कि began helped develop Chicago as एक of the सबसे populous and economically important American cities.
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) was king of England इससे 21 April 1509 until his death.
He थी lord, और later किंग, of Ireland, as well as continuing the nominal claim by the English monarchs to the किंगडम of France.
हेनरी was the second monarch of the ट्यूडर dynasty, succeeding his father, Henry VII.
Besides his six marriages, Henry VIII is ज्ञात for his भूमिका in the separation of the Church of England from the रोमन Catholic गिरिजाघर.
Henry 's struggles साथ Rome led to the separation of the Church of England from papal authority, the Dissolution of the Monasteries, and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological teachings, even after his excommunication from the Roman कैथोलिक Church.
Henry oversaw the legal union of England और वेल्स with the कानून in वेल्स Acts 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new king अलाइड with the पावन Roman Emperor, Maximillian I, और invaded France in 1513 with a large, well-equipped army, लकिन हासिल छोटी at a considerable financial cost.
Maximillian, for his भाग, used the अंग्रेज़ी invasion to his own ends, and this prejudiced England 's ability to शिकस्त the फ्रेंच.
This foray would prove the start of an obsession for Henry, जो invaded again in 1544.
This time, Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne, but again the Holy Roman Emperor, Charles V, supported Henry only as long as he needed to and इंग्लैण्ड, strained by the enormous लागत of the war, ransomed the city back for peace.
His contemporaries माना हेनरी in उसके prime to be an attractive, educated और accomplished king, and he has been described as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne ''.
Besides ruling with absolute power, he also engaged himself as an लेखक and composer.
उसके ख्वाहिश to provide England साथ a पुरूष वारिस – which stemmed partly from personal वैनिटी and partly because he believed a daughter would be unable to consolidate the Tudor राजवंश and the नाजुक peace कि existed following the युद्धों of the Roses – led to the two things for which Henry is most remembered : his six विवाह और the English Reformation.
Henry became morbidly मोटे और his health suffered, contributing to उसके मौत in 1547.
He is frequently characterised in his later life as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, और असुरक्षित king.
La reina del सूर ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by the United राज्य television network Telemundo, in conjunction साथ the Antena 3 network and RTI Producciones.
आधारित on a novel of the वही name by Spanish author Arturo Pérez-Reverte, the drama depicts the rise of Teresa Mendoza ( केट del Castillo ), a young woman from Mexico who becomes the most powerful drug trafficker in दक्षिणी Spain.
Patricio Wills, the president of Telemundo टेलीविज़न studios, थी the executive निर्माता.
Though La Reina del Sur was nominated for Novela of the Year, पसंदीदा सीसे अभिनेत्री, and Best Bad Luck Video, it won no awards.
साथ a $ 10 लाख budget, La Reina del Sur was the most महंगी telenovela ever उत्पादित by Telemundo.
The program 's premiere on February 28, 2011, was the network 's उच्चतम rated premiere लिये a telenovela to date.
The program frequently dominated its time slot, even over English language programming on other major U.S. networks.
La Reina डेल Sur completed इसके 63 episode run on Telemundo and its 13 एपीसोड run on Antena 3 simultaneously on May 30, 2011.
The final episode थी the highest rated broadcast in Telemundo 's 19-year history ( 4.2 million दर्शक ), and beat all of the English language U.S. television संजाल to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic.
The program 's कामयाबी spurred Telemundo to launch its first अभियान to gain the series an Emmy Award nomination.
a one-night special featuring several cast members aired on May 31, 2011, और चिह्नित the telemundo debut of noted Latina television personality Cristina saralegui.
la Reina del Sur is broadcast in several other markets, सहित Serbia, Colombia, Chile, Cyprus, Nicaragua, Costa Rica, Mexico, Albania, Hungary, Slovenia, क्रोएशिया, Romania, ( among others ).

A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and organizations to मेक their website accessible via the संसार चौड़ी वेब.
Web होस्ट are companies that provide स्पेस on a server owned or leased for उपयोग by clients, as well as providing Internet कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a आंकड़ा बीच.
Web hosts can also provide आंकड़ा बीच space और connectivity to the Internet for other servers located in their data center, called colocation, भी known as Housing in Latin अमेरिका or फ़्रांस.
The scope of web hosting services varies greatly.
The most basic is web पेज and small-scale file hosting, where files can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
The files are usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or साथ minimal processing.
Many Internet service प्रदाताओं ( ISPs ) offer this service free to subscribers.
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web page hosting from alternative सेवा providers.
Personal web site होस्टिंग is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often रै a उच्चतर expense depending upon the size and type of the website.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient for personal web pages.
A complex site calls for a अधिक comprehensive package that provides database support और application development platforms ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These सुविधाएं allow customers to write or install स्क्रिप्ट for applications like forums and content management.
Also, सुरक्षित Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce.
the host may also provide an interface or कंट्रोल panel for managing the वेब server and installing scripts, as well as other modules and सेवा applications like e-mail.
कुछ hosts specialize in निश्चित software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), which हैं commonly used by larger companies कि outsource network अवसंरचना.
मैडेन NFL ( known as जॉन Madden Football before 1993 ) is an American football वीडियो game series developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon for ea Sports.
The game series is named after Pro फ़ुटबॉल Hall of Famer John Madden, a well-known former सुपर Bowl –winning coach of the Oakland Raiders and color कमेंटेटर.
The श्रेणी is the best selling EA Sports series.
The खेल have consistently been a best seller, और रै even spawned TV shows where खिलाड़ी compete.
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks and player statistics, और voice commentary कि allows खिलाड़ी to hear the game as if it were a real TV broadcast.
the Madden एनएफएल series has been nicknamed the एनएफएल 's 33rd मताधिकार.
The series was originally conceived by Electronic कला संस्थापक Trip Hawkins, who then approached Madden in 1984 for his endorsement and expertise.
Due to Madden 's insistence कि the game be as यथार्थवादी as possible, the first version of जॉन मैडेन फ़ुटबॉल was नहीं released until 1988.
The second version of the game was released in 1990, साथ annual संस्करण since then.
The श्रेणी ' name थी changed to Madden NFL in 1993 after EA acquired the rights to use एनएफएल teams and players.
Despite Madden 's retirement as a broadcaster in 2009, he continues to lend his name and provide expertise for the game.
सिंडी Lee Miller Sheehan ( born July 10, 1957 ) is an American antiwar activist whose son, u.S. Army Specialist केसी Sheehan, थी killed by दुश्मन action during the Iraq War.
She आकर्षित national and international मीडिया attention in August 2005 for उसके extended antiwar protest at a makeshift camp outside President George W. बुश 's Texas ranch —a stand that खींचा both passionate support and angry criticism.
Sheehan ran unsuccessfully for Congress in 2008.
She is a vocal critic of President Barack ओबामा 's foreign policy.
Her memoir, Peace Mom : a Mother 's यात्रा Through Heartache to Activism, was published in 2006.
Sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the Peace और स्वतंत्रता Party.
Wyclef Jeanelle Jean ( ; ; born अक्तूबर 17, 1969 ) Wyclef Dumped From हैती 's Presidential Ballot – TIME, Aug 21, 2010.
`` Before he announced on August 5 that he was running for अध्यक्ष of हैती, wyclef Jean थी still लिस्टिंग उसके age as only 37 years old.
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate, the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided to come साफ and confirm that he थी really 40. '' is a three-time Grammy Award -winning Haitian-American rapper, singer-songwriter, musician, रिकार्ड निर्माता, and politician.
At age nine, Jean moved to the संयुक्त राज्य with his family and has spent much of his जीवन in the country.

wyclef Jean to appeal against Haiti election सत्ताधारी – बीबीसी News, Aug 22, 2010.
Haiti 's electoral आयोग said that Mr Jean was ineligible to stand as the Haitian constitution requires उम्मीदवार to have lived in the देश for five years prior to an election.

in law, a set-off is a statutory रक्षा to the whole or to a portion of a अभियोक्ता 's claim.
It had no existence under the English common law, being created by 2 Geo. II c. 22 for the relief of insolvent debtors, although set-off was recognized in equity.
Such a defense could be pleaded तभी in आदर of mutual debts of a definite character, and किया not apply to cases in जिससे क्षतिपूर्ति were claimed, nor to equitable claims or demands.
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX. r. 3 ) a defendant in an action may set off or नियत up any सही or claim by way of counterclaim against the दावा of a plaintiff, and such set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action.
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the अन्यायपूर्ण हालात whereby a person ( `` पार्टी A '' ) जो owed money to another ( `` Party B '' ) could be sent to debtors prison, despite the fact that Party B भी owed money to Party A.
The law thus allows both parties to defer payment जबतक their respective claims have महरूम heard in court.
Upon judgment, दोनो claims are extinguished and replaced by a single जाल sum owing ( e.g. If Party A owes Party B 100 and पार्टी B owes Party A 105, the two रकम are set बंद and replaced साथ a single obligation of 5 from Party b to Party a ).
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual agreement so that, where a party defaults, the mutual amounts owing are automatically set बंद and बुझे.
In certain jurisdictions ( including the UK ), set-off takes place automatically upon the insolvency of a company.
This means that, for each party which is दोनो a creditor और debtor of the insolvent company, परस्पर debts are set-off विरूद्ध each other, and then either the दिवालिया 's creditor can claim the balance in the bankruptcy or the trustee in दिवालियापन can ask for the संतुलन remaining to be paid, depending on which side owed the most.
इस has महरूम criticized as an undeclared security interest that violates the principle of pari passu.
The alternative, where a creditor has to pay all its debts, लकिन receive only a limited portion of the leftover moneys that other unsecured लेनदारों get, poses the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies.
The right to नियत off is particularly important when रिपोर्टिंग a बैंको 's exposures to regulatory अधिकारियों.
The situation जहाँ a bank has to report कि it has lent a large योग to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed, क्युकी there is a risk that the borrower might default thereby leading to the घाटा of the bank 's or its depositors ' money ) is thus replaced ( where the bank has taken security over साझा or securities of the borrower ) with an एक्सपोज़र of the धन lent ऋण the मान of the security taken.
Jennifer Joanna एनिस्टन ( born February 11, 1969 ) is an American actress, film director, and producer.
Aniston gained विश्वव्यापी recognition in the 1990s for portraying Rachel ग्रीन on the टेलीविज़न sitcom मित्रों, a role which earned उसके an Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a Screen Actors Guild Award.
Aniston has also enjoyed a कामयाब Hollywood फिल्मी career.
She gained critical acclaim for her performances in the स्वतंत्र films She 's the One ( 1996 ), Office Space ( 1999 ), The Good Girl ( 2002 ) and Friends with धन ( 2006 ).
She has had her महानतम commercial successes with the films Bruce Almighty ( 2003 ), The Break-Up ( 2006 ), Marley & Me ( 2008 ), Just Go with It ( 2011 ) और Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ).
Aniston received a star on the Hollywood चलना of Fame on February 22, 2012.

A White बाघ at Tobu Zoo, in Saitama, Japan.
The white tiger is a recessive mutant of the Bengal tiger, which was reported in the wild from time to time in असम, बंगाल, Bihar and especially from the former राज्य of Rewa.
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect, part of the PCI Local बस standard and often shortened to बस PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a कंप्यूटर.
The PCI बस supports the functions found on a processor बस, but in a standardized स्वरूप that is independent of any particular processor.
डिवाइस connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly to the processor bus, and are assigned addresses in the processor 's address space.
Attached devices can take either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself, called a planar device in the PCI specification, or an expansion card that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in IBM PC compatibles, where it विस्थापित the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus विन्यास.
It has subsequently been adopted for अन्य computer प्रकार.
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express, but, सबसे motherboards हैं still made with one or अधिक PCI slots, which are sufficient for अनेक uses.
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board किनारे electrical contacts ), electrical characteristics, bus timing, and protocols.
The specification can be purchased इससे the PCI Special Interest समूह ( PCI-SIG ).
ठेठ पीसीआई cards used in PCs include : network cards, ध्वनि ताश, modems, extra ports ऐसे as USB or सीरियल, TV ट्यूनर cards and disk controllers.
PCI video cards replaced ISA and vesa cards, until growing bandwidth आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface लिये video cards became AGP, and then PCI Express.
PCI video cards remain उपलब्धियाँ लिये use with old PCs without AGP or PCI एक्स्प्रेस स्लॉट.
Many डिवाइस previously provided on PCI विस्तार cards हैं now commonly integrated onto motherboards or available in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions.
Caffeine is a bitter, white crystalline xanthine alkaloid that अधिनियमों as a stimulant ड्रग.
कैफीन is found in varying quantities in the seeds, leaves, और fruit of some plants, where it अधिनियमों as a natural pesticide that paralyzes और मारता निश्चित कीट feeding on the plants, as well as बढ़ाना the बदला memory of pollinators.
It is most commonly consumed by humans in infusions extracted इससे the बीज of the coffee plant and the पत्ते of the tea bush, as well as from विभिन्न foods and drinks containing products निकला इससे the कोला नट.
Other sources शामिल yerba maté, guarana जामुन, guayusa, and the yaupon holly.
In humans, caffeine acts as a central nervous system stimulant, temporarily warding off drowsiness और restoring alertness.
it is the world 's most widely consumed psychoactive drug, लकिन unlike many other psychoactive substances, it is legal and unregulated in nearly all parts of the world.
Beverages containing कैफीन, ऐसे as coffee, tea, soft drinks, और energy drinks, enjoy great लोकप्रियता.
In उत्तर America, 90 % of adults consume caffeine daily.
भाग of the reason caffeine is classified by the Food and Drug Administration as GRAS ( generally recognized as safe ) is that toxic doses ( over 10 grams ) are much higher than typically used doses ( कम than 500 milligrams ).
Ordinary consumption can have कम health risks, even जब carried on for सालो – वहीँ may be a modest protective effect विरूद्ध some diseases, including Parkinsons Disease, and certain types of cancer.
Caffeine can have both positive and negative effects on चिंता disorders.
Some people experience sleep disruption if वे consume कैफीन, especially during the संध्या घंटों, but others show little disturbance and the effect of caffeine on sleep is highly variable.
Evidence of a रिस्क to गर्भावस्था is equivocal, but कुछ authorities have concluded that prudent advice is for गर्भवती women to limit consumption to the equivalent of दो cups of कॉफी प्रति day or less.
The अमरीकी Congress of Obstetricians and Gynecologists ( ACOG ) concluded in 2010 that caffeine consumption is सुरक्षित up to 200 mg per day in pregnant महिलाओं.
Caffeine रै pressor and mild diuretic effects when administered to people who are not used to it, but नियमित users develop a tolerance to this effect, and अध्ययन have generally failed to support the common ख़्याल that ordinary consumption contributes significantly to निर्जलीकरण.
साथ heavy उपयोग, सहिष्णुता develops rapidly to autonomic effects such as elevated heart rate and muscle twitching, लकिन नहीं to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine.
The degree to जिससे कैफीन can produce clinically significant physical और mental dependence remains a विषय of controversy in the चिकित्सा literature.

The Coast सीमाएँ of California span इससे हम्बोल्ट County, कैलिफ़ोर्निया south to सांता Barbara County.
the other three coastal कैलिफ़ोर्निया mountain सीमाएँ हैं the Transverse सीमाएँ, Peninsular Ranges और the Klamath Mountains.
Physiographically, they are a section of the larger Pacific Border province, जिससे in turn are part of the larger प्रशांत पहाड़ System physiographic division.
UNESCO रै included the `` California Coast Ranges Biosphere Reserve `` in its Man और the Biosphere Programme of World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983.

An automobile, autocar, मोटर car or car is a wheeled motor vehicle प्रयुक्त for transporting passengers, which also carries its own engine or motor.
Most परिभाषाएं of the term specify that automobiles are designed to run primarily on roads, to have seating लिये one to eight people, to typically have चार wheels, और to be constructed principally for the हस्तांतरण of लोगों बल्कि than goods.
The term motorcar रै also been used in the context of electrified रेल systems to denote a car which कृत्यों as a small locomotive लकिन also provides स्पेस for passengers and baggage.
ये locomotive गाड़ियाँ were often used on suburban रूट by दोनो interurban और intercity railroad systems.
It थी estimated in 2010 that the number of automobiles had risen to over 1 billion वाहनों, up from the 500 million of 1986.
The numbers are increasing rapidly, विशेषकर in China and India.
John fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by उसके initials JFK, was the 35th President of the संयुक्त States, serving इससे 1961 जबतक his death in 1963.
After military service as commander of the मोटर Torpedo Boats pt-109 and PT-59 दौरान World War II in the South Pacific, कैनेडी represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of प्रतिनिधि from 1947 to 1953 as a डेमोक्रेट.
Thereafter, he served in the U.S. Senate from 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican candidate रिचर्ड Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have महरूम elected to the office, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद Theodore Roosevelt ), and the first व्यक्ति born in the 20th century to serve as अध्यक्ष.
A Catholic, कैनेडी is the only non- Protestant president, and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
Events during his presidency included the खाड़ी of Pigs Invasion, the Cuban मिसाइल Crisis, the building of the Berlin Wall, the स्पेस Race, the African-American Civil Rights Movement, और early stages of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the number of military advisers, special operation forces, and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia.
The Kennedy administration अपनाया the policy of the Strategic Hamlet Program which was implemented by the South Vietnamese government.
It involved certain forced relocation, village internment, और segregation of rural दक्षिण वियतनामी from the northern and southern कम्युनिस्ट insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22, 1963 in Dallas, Texas.
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime, but he was shot और killed by Jack Ruby two days later, before a विचारण could लो place.
The FBI और the Warren Commission officially concluded कि Oswald थी the lone assassin.
However, the United States House Select Committee on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, ABC News in their investigation, The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy, confirmed the findings of the वारेन आयोग ; having concluded Oswald acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber program led to a Congressional investigation that lasted इससे 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s सूचना concerning Kennedy 's निजी life has आइये to light.
Details of Kennedy 's health समस्याएं in जिससे he struggled have become better known, विशेषकर चूंकि the 1990s.
Although initially रखा secret from the सामान्य पब्लिक, reports of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy बाँधने highly in public opinion ratings of u.S. presidents.

a Fire Alarm Control फलक ( FACP ), or Fire Alarm कंट्रोल Unit ( FACU ), is the controlling component of a Fire Alarm System.
The फलक receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated with fire, monitors their operational अखंडता and provides लिये automatic control of उपकरण, and transmission of सूचना necessary to prepare the सुविधा for fire based on a predetermined sequence.
The panel may भी सप्लाई electrical energy to operate any associated sensor, control, transmitter, or relay.
There are four basic types of panels : coded panels, conventional panels, addressable panels, and multiplex systems.

Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( भी known as katunayake International Airport and Colombo International Airport ) is one of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय airports serving the city of Colombo, the other is Ratmalana International Airport.
Mattala राजपक्षे International Airport located in दक्षिणी city of Hambantota is the other international airport in श्री Lanka.
Bandaranaike International Airport is located in Katunayake, 22 miles ( 35 km ) उत्तर of Colombo.
It is administered by Airport and Aviation Services ( श्री Lanka ) Ltd.
It is the hub of श्रीलंकन Airlines, the नेशनल carrier of Sri Lanka, and mihin Lanka, the budget एयरलाइन of Sri लंका.
Black Swan is a 2010 American psychological thriller and horror film निर्देशित by Darren aronofsky और अभिनीत Natalie पोर्टमैन, Vincent Cassel, and Mila Kunis.
the plot revolves around a production of Tchaikovsky 's Swan झील ballet by a prestigious New York City company.
The production requires a ballerina to play the innocent and fragile White Swan, for जिससे the committed dancer Nina ( Portman ) is a पूर्ण fit, as well as the dark and sensual Black Swan, which are qualities embodied by the new arrival लिली ( Kunis ).
नीना is overwhelmed by a अहसास of immense pressure when she finds herself competing for the part, causing her to lose her tenuous grip on वास्तविकता and descend into a जीना nightmare.
aronofsky conceived the premise by connecting his viewings of a production of Swan Lake with an unrealized screenplay about understudies and the notion of being haunted by a double, समान to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers.
aronofsky cites Fyodor Dostoyevsky 's `` The Double `` as another प्रेरणा लिये the film.
The director also considered Black Swan a companion टुकड़ा to उसके 2008 film The Wrestler, with दोनो films involving demanding performances for different kinds of आर्ट.
he and Portman first discussed the प्रोजेक्ट in 2000, और बाद a brief attachment to Universal Studios, Black Swan was produced in नई York City in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures.
Portman and Kunis trained in ballet लिये several महीने prior to फिल्मांकन, and notable आंकड़े from the ballet world helped with फिल्मी production to shape the ballet प्रस्तुतीकरण.
The film premiered as the opening film for the 67th Venice International फिल्मी Festival on सितंबर 1, 2010.
It had a limited release in the United States starting December 3, 2010 and खोली nationwide on December 17.
Black Swan received critical praise upon its release, particularly for पोर्टमैन 's performance and Aronofsky 's direction, and was a significant box office success, grossing $ 329 million worldwide.
The फिल्मी received five Academy Award nominations and Portman won the Best Actress award for the film, as well as many other बेहतरीन Actress पुरस्कार in several guilds and त्यौहार, जबकि Aronofsky was nominated for बेहतरीन Director.
In addition, the film itself प्राप्त a nomination for बेहतरीन चित्र.
The world’s पहला ice-calorimeter, used in the winter of 1782-83, by एंटोनी Lavoisier and Pierre-Simon लाप्लास, to determine the ऊष्मा शामिल in various chemical परिवर्तन ; calculations which were based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of अदृश्य heat.
These experiments mark the न्यास of thermochemistry.
A calorimeter ( from Latin calor, meaning heat ) is an object used लिये calorimetry, or the process of measuring the heat of chemical reactions or शारीरिक changes as well as heat क्षमता.
Differential स्कैनिंग calorimeters, isothermal microcalorimeters, titration calorimeters and accelerated रेट calorimeters are among the most आम types.
A सरल calorimeter just consists of a थर्मामीटर attached to a metal संग्राहक full of water निलंबित above a combustion कक्ष.
To find the enthalpy change per mole of a पदार्थ A in a reaction between दो substances a और b, the substances are added to a calorimeter and the initial and final temperatures ( before the प्रतिक्रिया started and after it रै finished ) are noted.
Multiplying the temperature बदलें by the mass and specific heat capacities of the substances gives a value लिये the energy given बंद or absorbed during the reaction.
Dividing the energy change by how many moles of a were present gives इसके enthalpy change of reaction.
This method is used primarily in academic teaching as it describes the theory of कैलोरीमिति.
It does not खाता for the heat loss through the container or the heat capacity of the thermometer and container itself.
in addition, the object placed inside the calorimeter shows that the objects transferred their heat to the calorimeter और into the liquid, and the heat absorbed by the calorimeter और the liquid is equal to the heat given off by the metals.
A pair of green flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri, thongs, jandals, or a variety of other names throughout the world ) हैं a type of open-toed sandal typically worn in casual situations, such as outside or at the beach.
They consist of a flat एकमात्र held loosely on the foot by a y-shaped strap that passes between the first and second toes and around either side of the पैर.
They may also be आयोजित to the foot with a single strap over the front of the foot rather than a thong.
The name `` flip-flop '' originated because of the sound कि is made by slapping between the sole of the foot and the floor when walking.
This स्टाइल of footwear has been worn by the लोगों of many संस्कृतियों throughout the संसार, originating as जल्दी as the ancient Egyptians in 4,000 b.c.
The modern flip-flop descends from the Japanese zōri, which became popular बाद World War ii when soldiers returning to the United States brought them back.
They became लोकप्रिय in casual settings दौरान the 1960s, 1990s, और 2000s, and some varieties have even मिला उनके way into अधिक formal attire, despite criticism.
The use of flip-flops can result in अनेक pains and injuries, including ankle sprains and broken bones.
Some individuals who walk for long अवधि report pain in the feet, ankles, and lower legs.
The lack of support provided by flip-flops often results in over-pronation injuries, caused by the foot slipping inwards further than normal.
इस can lead to flat feet and tendonitis.
Other injuries कि may result are due to the footwear 's open-toed nature, such as stubbed toes, cuts, and bruises.
Doctors सुझाएँ purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned सोल्स, as well as those that have a strap that is not canvas और कि comes back almost to the टखने.
The owners of hanjin ओसाका, seen here transiting the Panama Canal in 2008, घोषित general average following an explosion in the जलयान 's engine room on.
The law of general औसत is a legal principle of मेरीटाइम law according to which all parties in a sea venture proportionally share any losses resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the whole in an आपात.
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea, crew members often have precious little time in which to determine precisely whose cargo they are jettisoning.
Thus, to avoid quarrelling that could waste valuable time, there arose the equitable practice whereby all the merchants जिनकी cargo landed सकुशल would be called on to योगदान a portion, based upon a share or percentage, to the merchant or व्यापारियों whose goods had been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril.
While सामान्य average traces its origins in ancient maritime law, still it remains part of the admiralty law of most countries.
The first codification of सामान्य average was the York Antwerp Rules of 1890.
American companies accepted it in 1949.
General average requires तीन तत्व which are clearly stated by Mr. Justice grier in Barnard v. Adams:
`` 1st.
a common danger : a खतरे in जिससे vessel, cargo and crew सब participate ; a danger imminent and apparently 'inevitable, ' मगर by voluntarily incurring the loss of a portion of the whole to save the remainder. ''
`` 2nd. वहीँ must be a voluntary jettison, jactus, or casting away, of some portion of the joint concern for the purpose of avoiding this imminent peril, periculi imminentis evitandi causa, or, in other words, a transfer of the peril इससे the whole to a particular portion of the whole. ''
`` 3rd.
This attempt to avoid the imminent common peril जरूर be successful ''.
Example Polish call लिये टीकाकरण against Diphtheria and Tetanus.
A vaccination schedule is a series of vaccinations, including the timing of all doses, which may be either recommended or compulsory, depending on the country of residence.
a vaccine is an antigenic preparation प्रयुक्त to उपज active प्रतिरक्षण to a disease, in order to prevent or reduce the effects of infection by any natural or `` wild '' pathogen.
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum effectiveness, either to उपज sufficient initial immune जवाब or to boost response कि fades over time.
For example, tetanus vaccine boosters are often recommended every 10 years.
Vaccine schedules are developed by governmental एजेंसियों or physicians groups to achieve maximum effectiveness using required and recommended टीके for a locality while minimizing the number of health care system interactions.
Over the पास्ट two decades, the recommended vaccination schedule रै grown rapidly and become more complicated as अनेक new vaccines have been developed.
Some vaccines are recommended only in निश्चित areas ( countries, subnational क्षेत्रों, or at-risk populations ) where a disease is common.
लिये instance, yellow fever vaccination is on the routine टीका अनुसूची of French Guiana, is अनुशंसित in निश्चित regions of Brazil but in the United States is only given to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease.
In developing countries, vaccine recommendations also take into account the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य care access, the cost of टीके and issues साथ vaccine availability and भंडार.
नमूना vaccinations schedules discussed by the World Health Organization show a विकसित country using a schedule which extends over the first five years of a child 's जीवन and उपयोग टीके जिससे cost over $ 700 including administration costs while a developing country उपयोग a schedule providing vaccines in the first 9 months of life और costing only $ 25.
इस अंतर is due to the lower cost of स्वास्थ्य care, the lower लागत of many टीके provided to विकासशील nations, and that more महंगी vaccines, प्रायः for less common diseases, are नहीं utilized.
In 1900, the smallpox vaccine was the only one administered to children.
By the early 1950s, children routinely received four vaccines, for protection विरूद्ध ( diphtheria, pertussis, tetanus, polio, and smallpox ), and as many as five shots by दो years of आयु.
Since the mid-1980s, many vaccines have been added to the schedule.
, the US centers for Disease कंट्रोल and Prevention ( CDC ) now recommends vaccination against at least fourteen diseases.
By two years of आयु, U.S. children प्राप्त as many as 24 vaccine injections, और might receive up to पाँच shots during one visit to the doctor.
The use of संयोजन vaccine products अर्थात् that,, the संयुक्त Kingdom 's immunization program consists of 10 injections by the age of two, बल्कि than 25 if vaccination for each disease was given as a separate injection.

the Trinidad and Tobago Carnival is an annual event आयोजित on the Monday and Tuesday before Ash Wednesday, and is well known for भागीदार 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations.
कार्निवल in Trinidad और Tobago is the most significant event on the आइलैंड्स ' cultural and tourism calendar, with numerous cultural कार्यक्रम कार्यशील in the सीसे up to the street परेड on Carnival Monday and Tuesday.
It is said that if the islanders हैं not celebrating it, तब they are preparing for it, while reminiscing about the past year 's festival.
The heart of the musical जश्न has been calypso ; recently soca has replaced कैलिप्सो as the most celebrated type of music.
Costumes, stickfighting और limbo प्रतियोगिताओं are भी important components of the festival.
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad and Tobago is also celebrated in cities worldwide.
These सहित Toronto 's caribana, Miami 's Miami Carnival, Houston Carifest, लंदन 's Notting Hill Carnival as well as New York City 's Labor Day कार्निवल to नाम a few.
Carnival was created जब West African slaves mimicked their French owners who where known for their lavish वेशभूषा balls.
Forbidden to partake in these festivities और confined to their quarters, स्लेव combined elements from their own संस्कृतियों to their master 's fete.
Hence the creation of characters such as jab Jab or jab Molassie ( Devils ), मध्यरात्रि लुटेरों, Imps, Lagahroo, Soucouyant, La diablesse and Demons.
With the abolition of गुलामी in 1838, freed Africans took उनके version of Carnival to the streets through expression of drums, riddim sections like tamboo bamboo and as each new immigrant population entered Trinidad, Carnival evolved into कया we know आज.
The city of Chicago, Illinois held a nonpartisan mayoral चुनाव on Tuesday, February 22, 2011.
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley, a सदस्य of the Democratic Party जो had महरूम in office since 1989, did not seek a seventh term as mayor.
Candidates needed to collect 12,500 याचिका signatures by नवम्बर 22, 2010 to qualify for a place on the ballot.
April 5, 2011 was scheduled to be a runoff election date if no प्रत्याशी received an absolute majority.
rahm Emanuel won the रेस for mayor with more than 55 % of the vote.
He was inaugurated on May 16, 2011.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' is a सोंग by American इंडी pop band फोस्टर the People.
It थी released as the group 's debut single in September 2010, and the following year was included on their EP फोस्टर the People and their डेब्यू एल्बम Torches.
`` उत्तेजित Up Kicks '' became the group 's breakthrough hit and was one of the सबसे लोकप्रिय songs of 2011.
The song was लिखा and recorded by frontman Mark Foster while he थी working as a commercial झंकार writer.
Contrasting with the upbeat musical composition, the lyrics describe the homicidal thoughts of a troubled youth.
the track प्राप्त considerable attention बाद it was posted online in 2010 as a free डाउनलोड, and it helped the group garner a multi-album रिकार्ड deal साथ Columbia Records imprint Startime अंतरराष्ट्रीय.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' proved to be a स्लीपर hit ; in 2011, बाद receiving significant airplay on आधुनिक rock stations, the सोंग crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations.
the song खर्च eight consecutive सप्ताह at number three on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in the United राज्य, making it the first Billboard वैकल्पिक Songs number-one single to crack the U.S. top 5 since Kings of लिओन 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009.
The song was widely praised by आलोचकों, and it has महरूम licensed for use in a wide range of लोकप्रिय मीडिया चूंकि its release.
`` उत्तेजित Up Kicks '' received a Grammy Award nomination for Best Pop Duo/Group प्रदर्शन.
The राज्य Fair of West Virginia is an annual state fair लिये West Virginia.
It is held annually in mid-August on the राज्य Fairgrounds in Fairlea, near Lewisburg, West Virginia in the southeastern part of the state.
The State Fairgrounds consists of a large खोलें field for carnivals और exhibitions, a horse track, grandstands, and several exhibition इमारतें.
Free parking is provided adjacent to the fairgrounds and, जबतक 2006, free camping was भी available in a विशाल field with running-water toilets and showers, but no hookups.
Campers हैं now charged a small fee.
the White House, the president 's official residence and center of the administration
Under the United States Constitution, the अध्यक्ष of the United States is the head of राज्य and head of government of the United States.
As chief of the कार्यपालिका branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the highest political office in the संयुक्त राज्य by influence and recognition.
The president is भी the commander-in-chief of the United राज्य Armed Forces.
The अध्यक्ष is indirectly elected to a four-year पद by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives should the Electoral College fail to पुरस्कार an absolute majority of votes to any व्यक्ति ).
चूंकि the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United राज्य Constitution in 1951, no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice, and no एक who has served more than two सालो of a term to which किसी else was निर्वाचित may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, resignation, or removal from office of an incumbent President, the Vice President assumes the office.
The President must be at least 35 years of age and a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the संयुक्त States.
This list शामिल only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the ratification of the United States संविधान, which took प्रभाव on March 4, 1789.
For American leaders पहले this अनुसमर्थन, see President of the Continental Congress.
The list does not शामिल any एक्टिंग Presidents अंतर्गत the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution.
There have महरूम 43 people sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals निर्वाचित as अध्यक्ष, four died in office of natural कल्याणकारी ( William Henry Harrison, Zachary Taylor, Warren G. हार्डिंग, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड, William McKinley, and John F. Kennedy ) and एक resigned ( रिचर्ड Nixon ).
जार्ज Washington, the first president, was inaugurated in 1789 बाद a unanimous vote of the Electoral College.
William Henry Harrison खर्च the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841, and Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट spent the longest साथ over twelve years, but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than two शर्तें, and a constitutional amendment, affecting presidents after Harry Truman, was passed to सीमा the number of टाइम्स an individual can be elected अध्यक्ष.
Andrew Jackson, the सातवाँ president, was the first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 बाद most laws barring non-land-owners from मतदान यहूद repealed.
Warren Harding was the पहला elected after women gained voting rights in 1920.
History रिकॉर्ड four presidents – John Q Adams, रदरफोर्ड B. Hayes, Benjamin हैरिसन और George W. बुश – who lost the popular vote but assumed office.
John F. Kennedy रै been the तभी president of रोमन Catholic आस्था, and the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, Barack Obama, is the first president of अफ़्रीकी descent.
`` लोम्बार्डी ट्रॉफी '' redirects here.
For the पुरस्कार awarded annually to the best कॉलेज football lineman or linebacker, देखिए Lombardi पुरस्कार.
The विंस Lombardi ट्रॉफी is the trophy awarded each year to the जीतना टोली of the National Football League 's championship game, the Super Bowl.
The trophy is नामित in honor of legendary NFL कोच Vince Lombardi.
इस is a list of tables of the सत्यापित oldest people in the world in ordinal rank, such as oldest व्यक्ति or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an international body that specifically deals in longevity शोध, such as the जराविद्या Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously documented human जीवनकाल is that of Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at आयु 122 years, 164 days.
She met Vincent van Gogh when she was 12 or 13.
इस led to news media attention in 1985, after Calment turned 110.
subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age, beyond कोई reasonable सवाल, in the records of उसके native नगर, Arles, France.
More evidence of Calment 's जीवनकाल has been उत्पादित than for any other supercentenarian ; her case serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan लिये male supercentenarians is कि of jiroemon Kimura, who currently जीवनदान in Japan and is age as of.
चूंकि the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United राज्य, on 17 December 2012, Kimura, born 19 April 1897, is the oldest living व्यक्ति in the world whose age can be documented.
He has भी महरूम the oldest living man since the death of 114-year old वाल्टर Breuning on 14 April 2011.
चूंकि the मौत of 115-year old koto Okubo of Japan on 12 जनवरी 2013, the oldest जीना woman has been -year-old Misao Okawa, also from जापानी, born on 5 March 1898.
the People 's Court is an American arbitration-based reality court show, currently presided over by retired Florida राज्य Circuit Court Judge Marilyn Milian, in which छोटी claims disputes हैं संभाला.
The People 's Court is the first court show to use binding arbitration, introducing the format into the genre in 1981.
The प्रणाली has been duplicated by most of the show 's successors in the न्यायिक genre.
Moreover, The People 's Court is the first popular, long-running reality in the judicial genre.
it was preceded तभी by a few short-lived हकीकत in the genre ; these short-lived predecessors were only loosely related to judicial proceedings, except for one : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings.
Prior to The People 's Court, the vast majority of TV courtroom shows प्रयुक्त actors, और recreated or fictional मामले ( as did radio before that ).
Among उदाहरण of ये प्रकार of अदालत shows शामिल Famous जूरी ट्रायल and अपना Witness.
The People 's Court has had two contrasting lives.
The show 's पहला life was presided over solely by former Los एंजिल्स काउंटी Superior Court न्यायधीश Joseph Wapner.
His tenure lasted from the show 's डेब्यू on September 14, 1981, until May 21, 1993, when the दिखाएँ was cancelled due to low दरजा.
This बाएँ the दिखाएँ साथ a total of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes and 12 seasons.
The show was taped in Los Angeles दौरान इसके पहला जीवन.
After होने cancelled, reruns aired जबतक सितंबर 9, 1994.
On September 8, 1997, after being आउट of production for four years, The People 's अदालत was revived लिये a second जीवन in first-run अनुप्रयोग as a 60-minute program.
Former lawyer and Mayor of New York Ed koch थी chosen as arbiter, जिससे he कायम for 2 seasons from the 1997–98 ऋतु through the 1998–99 ऋतु ( the present life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ).
By the 1999–00 season, husband of जूडिथ Sheindlin ( who presides over Judge Judy ) and पूर्व New यॉर्क State Supreme अदालत Judge Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch.
Sheindlin lasted one and a half seasons as he थी replaced towards the end of the 2000–01 season ( present life 's 4th season and overall show 's 17th ).
Beginning in spring 2001, Florida न्यायधीश Marilyn Milian took over the People 's Court and has presided over the show कभी since.
Once milian completes the 2012–13 season, she will have served as longest arbiter over the श्रेणी with 12 and a हाफ seasons.
As of the present, however, her years on the कार्यक्रम tie Wapner at 12 seasons.
In the 2009-10 टेलीविज़न season, The People 's Courts 2nd/present जीवन outlasted its first when it reached 13 seasons.
जबकि the दिखाएँ taped in New York नगर for the first 15 seasons of its second जीवन, it now टेपों in Stamford, Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season.
On September 3, 2012, The People 's Court 's 2nd/present life डाला its 16th season ( 28th overall season ).

Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho : Wo'tééneihí ' ) is a state in the पश्चिमी संयुक्त States.
It became the 45th राज्य admitted to the Union on January 4, 1896.
Utah is the 13th-largest, the 34th-most populous, and the 10th-least-densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately 80 % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the wasatch Front, centering on Salt Lake नगर, leaving विशाल expanses of the state nearly uninhabited and making the population the sixth most urbanized in the U.S. Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east, Wyoming on the northeast, idaho on the north, एरिज़ोना on the south, और Nevada on the west.
It also touches a कोने of New मैक्सिको on the southeast.
Utah is the most religiously homogeneous state in the Union.
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The गिरिजाघर of Jesus Christ of latter-day संतो or LDS ( Mormons ), which greatly influences यूटा culture और daily life.
The world headquarters of The Church of Jesus मसीह of latter-day संतो ( LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's state capital.
The state is a center of transportation, education, information technology and research, government services, mining, और a major tourist destination for बाहरी recreation.
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population estimates, Utah is the पांचवां fastest-growing state in the United States as of 2012.
st. George, was the fastest–growing metropolitan area in the United राज्य इससे 2000 to 2005.
A 2012 Gallup national survey मिला Utah overall to be the `` best राज्य to live in '' based on 13 forward-looking measurements including विभिन्न economic, lifestyle, and health-related आउटलुक metrics.

The hard palate is a thin horizontal बोनी plate of the skull, located in the छत of the मुँह.
It spans the arch formed by the upper teeth.
It is formed by the palatine process of the maxilla and horizontal थाली of palatine bone.
It forms a partition between the nasal passages and the mouth.
Also on the anterior portion of the roof of the hard तालु is the rugae which are the irregular ridges in the mucous झिल्ली that help facilitate the movement of food backwards towards the pharynx.
This partition is जारी deeper into the mouth by a fleshy extension पुकारा the soft palate.
पूरा set of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The tanakh (, or ; also tenakh, Tenak, Tanach ) is a name प्रयुक्त in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
The Tanakh is also known as the Masoretic Text or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching '', also ज्ञात as the Five Books of Moses ), Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
the नाम `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), meaning `` that जिससे is read '', is an वैकल्पिक यहूदी term for the Tanakh.
The books of the tanakh यहूद relayed with an accompanying oral tradition passed on by each पीढी, called the Oral Torah.

ड्राइविंग under the influence ( DUI ), driving जबकि intoxicated ( dwi ), शराबी driving, नशे driving, पेय driving, operating अंतर्गत the influence, drinking and driving, or impaired ड्राइविंग is the crime of ड्राइविंग a motor vehicle with blood levels of दारू in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol सामग्री '', or `` bac '' ).
Similar regulations cover driving or operating certain types of machinery while affected by drinking alcohol or taking अन्य दवाएँ, including, but not सीमित to prescription drugs.
This is a दण्ड offense in most nations.
convictions do नहीं necessarily involve actual driving of the vehicle.
in most jurisdictions a measurement such as a blood alcohol content ( bac ) in excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज स्तर, ऐसे as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the ठोकर, with no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol.
In कुछ jurisdictions, वहीँ is an aggravated category of the offense at a higher level e.g. 0.12 %.
In सबसे countries, anyone who is convicted of injuring or killing someone while under the influence of alcohol or drugs can be heavily fined, as in France, in addition to होने given a lengthy prison sentence.
कुछ कार्य have their own rules and BAC limits, for example commercial pilot, and the Federal Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % सीमा for train crew.
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC ; लिये example, the state of California has a 0.08 % BAC limit, जिससे is lowered to 0.04 % if the operator holds a commercial driver 's license.
The California bac limit is 0.01 % for those younger than 21 years of आयु and those on probation for a previous DUI conviction.
Some large corporations have their अपना नियम ; Union Pacific Railroad रै their own BAC limit of 0.02 % कि, if violated during a random test or a for-cause test — for उदाहरण, after a traffic दुर्घटना — can result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire.
Many states in the U.S. and provinces in Canada have adopted truth in sentencing laws that enforce strict दिशानिर्देश on sentencing, differing from previous practice where prison time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued.
Some jurisdictions have judicial guidelines requiring a अनिवार्य minimum sentence.
Penalties लिये DUI आरोप range from expensive शुल्क to forfetiruree of your license plates and in some गंभीर हालातों, your vehicle.
A drunk driving simulator in Montréal, कनाडा
The specific criminal offense may be called, depending on the jurisdiction, driving under the influence [ of alcohol or other drugs ] ( DUI ), ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत intense influence ( DUII ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), operating अंतर्गत the influence ( OUI ) operating while intoxicated ( OWI ), operating a मोटर vehicle while intoxicated ( OMVI ), ड्राइविंग under the combined influence of alcohol and/or other drugs, driving अंतर्गत the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a गाडी ].
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling, boating, piloting aircraft, use of motile फार्म equipment such as tractors और combines, riding horses or driving a horse-drawn vehicle, or bicycling, संभवतः साथ different BAC स्तर than driving.
In some jurisdictions वहीँ are separate charges depending on the vehicle प्रयुक्त, ऐसे as BWI ( bicycling while intoxicated ), which may carry a lighter sentence.
in the United States, लोकल law enforcement agencies made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for driving under the influence of alcohol in 1996, compared to 1.9 million such arrests during the peak year in 1983.
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 DWI offenders यहूद in थाना or jail, down from 593,000 in 1990 and up इससे 270,100 in 1986.

Law enforcement in the United राज्य is one of three major components of the criminal justice system of the United States, along with courts और corrections.
Although there exists an inherent interrelatedness between the different समूह that make up the criminal justice system based on their अपराधों deterrence purpose, each घटक operates independently from one another.
however, the न्यायपालिका is vested साथ the power to मेक legal determinations regarding the conduct of the other two components.
अलावा from maintaining अनुक्रम and service functions, the purpose of policing is the investigation of suspected दण्ड कार्यकलाप and the referral of the परिणाम of investigations और of suspected criminals to the courts.
Law enforcement, to varying degrees at different levels of government और in अलग agencies, is also commonly charged with the responsibilities of deterring criminal activity and of preventing the successful आयोग of crimes in progress ; the service और enforcement of वारंट, writs and other आदेश of the courts.
Law enforcement agencies are also involved in providing first response to emergencies and अन्य खतरे to public safety ; the protection of certain public facilities और infrastructure ; the maintenance of public order ; the सुरक्षा of पब्लिक officials ; and the आपरेशन of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ).

Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion Robert Morrison ; May 26, 1907 – June 11, 1979 ), better ज्ञात by उसके stage नाम John Wayne, was an American film actor, director and producer.
an अकादमी Award -winner, वेन was among the top box दफ्तर draws for three decades, and was नामित the all-time top money-making star.
An enduring अमरीकी प्रतीक, he epitomized rugged masculinity and is famous for his demeanor, including his distinctive calm voice, walk, and ऊँचाई.
Wayne was born in Winterset, Iowa but his family relocated to the greater Los Angeles क्षेत्रफल when he was four years old.
He मिला कार्य at local film studios जब he lost his football scholarship to यूएससी as a परिणाम of a bodysurfing accident.
Initially working for the Fox Film Corporation, he mostly appeared in small bit भाग.
His first अग्रणी role came in the widescreen epic the बिग Trail ( 1930 ), which led to leading roles in numerous films throughout the 1930s, many of them in the western genre.
His career rose to further heights in 1939, with John Ford 's stagecoach making him an instant superstar.
वेन होता go on to star in 142 pictures, primarily typecast in Western films.
Among his best ज्ञात later films are The शांत Man ( 1952 ), जिससे follows उसे as an irish-american boxer and his प्रेम affair with a fiery spinster played by Maureen o'hara ; The Searchers ( 1956 ), in which he plays a Civil War veteran who seeks आउट उसके abducted niece ; Rio Bravo ( 1959 ), playing a Sheriff with Dean Martin ; True Grit ( 1969 ), playing a humorous u.s. मार्शल who sets out to avenge a man 's death in the भूमिका that won वेन an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ), उसके final screen performance in which he plays an aging gunslinger battling कर्कट.
Wayne moved to Orange काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया in the 1960s, and was a prominent Republican in Hollywood, supporting anti-communist positions.
He died of stomach cancer in 1979.
in June 1999, the अमरीकी Film संस्थान named Wayne 13th among the Greatest Male Screen Legends of सब Time.
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February 1564 – 8 जनवरी 1642 ), थी an Italian physicist, mathematician, astronomer, and philosopher who played a major भूमिका in the वैज्ञानिक क्रान्ति.
उसके achievements शामिल improvements to the telescope and consequent astronomical observations and support for Copernicanism.
Galileo has महरूम called the `` father of modern observational astronomy ``, the `` father of modern physics ``, the `` पिता of science '', and `` the Father of Modern Science ''.
His योगदान to observational astronomy include the telescopic पुष्टि of the phases of Venus, the discovery of the four largest satellites of Jupiter ( named the Galilean moons in his honour ), and the observation and analysis of sunspots.
गैलीलियो also worked in applied science and प्रौद्योगिकी, inventing an improved military compass and अन्य instruments.
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial within his आजीवन, when most subscribed to either geocentrism or the Tychonic प्रणाली.
He मिले with opposition from astronomers, who doubted heliocentrism due to the absence of an observed stellar parallax.
The matter was investigated by the Roman Inquisition in 1615, and वे concluded that it could be supported as तभी a सम्भावना, not an established फैक्ट.
गैलीलियो बाद defended his views in Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief संसार Systems, जिससे appeared to आक्रमण पोप Urban VIII and thus alienated him and the jesuits, जो had both supported Galileo up जबतक this point.
He was आजमाया by the Inquisition, found `` vehemently suspect of heresy '', forced to recant, and खर्च the rest of his life under house arrest.
It was while Galileo was under house arrest that he wrote एक of his finest works, Two नई Sciences, in which he summarised the work he had done some forty years earlier, on the two sciences now called kinematics और शक्ति of materials.

An oled ( organic light-emitting diode ) is a light-emitting diode ( LED ) in which the emissive electroluminescent layer is a फिल्मी of organic compound which emits लाइट in response to an electric current.
This layer of सशुल्क semiconductor is situated between two electrodes.
Generally, at least one of these electrodes is पारदर्शी.
oleds are used to create digital displays in devices such as television screens, computer monitors, portable systems such as mobile फोन, handheld games consoles and PDAs.
A major area of शोध is the development of white oled devices for use in solid-state lighting applications.
There are two main families of oleds : those based on छोटी अणुओं and those employing polymers.
adding mobile ions to an OLED creates a light-emitting electrochemical cell or लैक, which has a slightly different mode of आपरेशन.
OLED displays can use either passive-matrix ( PMOLED ) or active-matrix addressing schemes.
active-matrix OLEDs ( AMOLED ) require a thin-film transistor backplane to switch each individual pixel on or off, but allow for उच्चतर resolution and larger प्रदर्शक sizes.
An OLED display works without a backlight.
Thus, it can display deep black levels और can be thinner and lighter than a liquid crystal display ( LCD ).
In low ambient light conditions such as a dark रूम an OLED स्क्रीन can achieve a higher contrast ratio than an LCD, whether the LCD uses ठंडा cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight.

Eggnog, or egg nog, is a sweetened dairy -based beverage traditionally made with मिल्क and/or cream, sugar, and whipped अंडे ( which gives it a frothy texture ).
Brandy, rum, व्हिस्की, bourbon, vodka, or a combination of liquors are often added.
The finished serving is often garnished with a sprinkling of ground cinnamon or nutmeg.
it was भी known as the egg milk punch.
Eggnog is a popular drink throughout the United States and Canada, and is प्रायः associated with क्रिसमस.
Eggnog may be added as a flavoring to food or पेय ऐसे as कॉफी and चाय.
Eggnog as a custard can भी be प्रयुक्त as an ice cream आधार.
a pasty (, ), ( sometimes known in Britain as a cornish pasty, and in the United States as a pastie or British pasty ) is a baked pastry, a traditional किस्में of which is particularly associated with Cornwall, the westernmost county in England.
It is बना by placing uncooked filling typically of मांस and सब्जियां, without meat in vegetarian versions, on a flat pastry circle और folding it to wrap the filling, crimping the edge to form a seal.
After baking, the result is a raised semicircular comestible.
the traditional cornish pasty, which रै Protected Geographical Indication ( pgi ) status in Europe, is filled with beef, sliced or diced potato, swede ( भी known as a yellow शलजम or rutabaga – referred to in Cornwall as शलजम ) और onion, seasoned with salt and pepper, and is baked.
Today, the pasty is the खाना सबसे संबद्ध साथ Cornwall, it is regarded as the national dish, and it accounts for 6 % of the Cornish food अर्थव्यवस्था.
pasties with many अलग fillings हैं made ; some दुकानें specialise in selling सब sorts of pasties.
The origins of the pasty are unclear, though there are many references to them throughout ऐतिहासिक documents and fiction.
The pasty is now popular world-wide due to the spread of Cornish miners, and variations can be found in Australia, the United राज्य, Mexico and elsewhere.
The ( ortho- ) sympathetic nervous system ( SNS ) is एक of three major parts of the autonomic nervous system : the others होने the enteric और parasympathetic systems.
Its general action is to mobilize the body 's nervous system fight-or-flight response.
it is, however, constantly क्रियाशील at a basic level to maintain homeostasis.
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable डिवाइस, ऐसे as mobile phones, digital कैमरे, GPS navigation devices, and tablet computers.
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the SD Card Association ( SDA ).
sd technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens of उत्पाद categories and अधिक than 8,000 models.
The Secure Digital format includes चार card families available in three अलग form factors.
the four परिवारों are the original standard-capacity ( SDSC ), the High-Capacity ( sdhc ), the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ), and the SDIO, which combines input/output functions with आंकड़ा storage.
The three form factors are the original size, the `` mini '' size, and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are many combinations of form कारकों and यंत्र families.
Electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a smaller कार्ड in a मेजबान device built to hold a larger card.
मेजबान devices that comply with नए versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards, but this article explains several कारकों कि can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer कार्ड may प्रस्ताव वृहद capacity than the host device can handle.
A newer कार्ड may use a file system the host यंत्र can नहीं navigate.
Use of an SDIO card requires the host यंत्र be designed for the input/output functions the कार्ड provides.
The संगठन of the card थी changed starting with the SDHC family.
Some विक्रेता produced SDSC cards above 1 GB before the SDA had मानकीकृत a method of doing so.
the SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with its specifications and assure users of compatibility.

Daniel लॉरेंस Whitney ( born February 17, 1963 ) best known by his stage name and character Larry the Cable Guy, is an American stand-up हास्य, actor, देश music artist, आवाज़ actor, and पूर्व radio personality.
He was one of the members of the Blue Collar Comedy Tour, a comedy troupe which included Bill engvall, रॉन श्वेत, and Jeff foxworthy ( with whom he has starred on Blue Collar TV ).
Whitney has released seven comedy albums, of which three have been certified सुनहरा by the RIAA लिये shipments of 500,000 नक़ल.
In addition, he has स्ट्रक्चर in three Blue Collar Comedy Tour-related फिल्मों, as खूब as in the films Larry the Cable guy : Health इंस्पेक्टर, डेल्टा तमाशा, and witless Protection, as खूब as voicing Mater in the Cars franchise.
Whitney 's catchphrase : `` Git-R-Done ! '' is also the title of his book.

The first episode of the series aired on फ़रवरी 8, 2011.
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible लिये intestinal absorption of कैल्सियम and phosphate.
In इंसानो, the most important related compounds of vitamin D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3.
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 ) are unique as they constitute कया we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can also synthesize vitamin d ( from cholesterol ) when sun exposure is adequate ( hence its nickname, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
Although vitamin d is commonly पुकारा a विटामिन, it is नहीं actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense, as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त amounts by most mammals exposed to धूप.
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize vitamin D efficiently and must receive it in their आहार. )
An organic chemical यौगिक ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of compounds ) is only scientifically called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव, and जरूर be obtained from their diet.
However, as with other compounds commonly called vitamins, विटामिन d was discovered in an प्रयत्न to ढूँढें the dietary substance that थी lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the childhood form of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like other compounds called vitamins, in the developed world vitamin D is added to staple foods, such as milk, to avoid disease due to deficiency.
उपायों of serum levels प्रतिबिंबित endogenous synthesis from exposure to धूप as well as सेवन इससे the diet, and it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations.
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D इससे sun exposure works in a प्रतिक्रिया loop that prevents toxicity but, because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from धूप, no सुझाव are issued by the Institute of Medicine, USA, for the amount of sun exposure required to मिलें विटामिन D requirements.
Accordingly, the dietary सन्दर्भ Intakes for विटामिन D assume that no synthesis occurs and that all of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन D is इससे उनके आहार, although that will rarely occur in practice.
In the जिगर विटामिन D is converted to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the विशिष्ट vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status.
Part of the calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the गुर्दे to calcitriol, the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood, regulating the concentration of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of अस्थि.
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other उद्देश्य, such as the proliferation, differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation.
Beyond इसके use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the प्रमाण for other स्वास्थ्य effects of vitamin d supplementation in the general population is असंगत.
The best प्रमाण of benefit is for bone health और a decrease in मृत्यु in elderly महिलाओं.
Standard रूप of the periodic तालिका.
The colors represent different categories of elements explained below.
The periodic table is a table display of the chemical elements, organized on the basis of their परमाणु numbers, electron configurations, and recurring रासायनिक गुण.
Elements are प्रस्तुत in अनुक्रम of increasing atomic क्रमांक ( number of protons ).
The मानक form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or प्रमुख देह of elements, positioned ऊपर a smaller double row of elements.
The table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block to the बाएँ, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the middle, and the f-block below that.
The rows of the table are पुकारा periods ; the columns of the s-, d-, and p-blocks are पुकारा groups, with some of these having names ऐसे as the halogens or the noble gases.
चूंकि, by परिभाषा, a periodic तालिका incorporates recurring trends, any such table can be used to derive संबंध between the गुण of the तत्व और predict the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
As a परिणाम, a periodic table—whether in the मानक form or some other variant—provides a useful framework for analyzing chemical behavior, and such tables are widely used in रसायन and other sciences.
Although precursors exist, Dmitri Mendeleev is generally credited with the publication, in 1869, of the first widely recognized periodic table.
he developed his table to illustrate periodic trends in the properties of the then-known तत्व.
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown elements that would be expected to fill gaps in इस table.
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the तत्व in question were subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since महरूम विस्तारित and refined साथ the discovery or synthesis of further new elements and the development of new सैद्धांतिक मॉडल to explain chemical behavior.
All elements from परमाणु numbers 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized.
The elements इससे 1 to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम found to exist naturally, although some are found तभी in trace amounts and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
the elements after 98 have तभी been synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is होने pursued, साथ the question of how the periodic table may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have also been produced in laboratories.
Minimum wage by U.S. state and U.S. territory ( American Samoa, Guam, प्यूर्टो Rico, Virgin Islands ), as of jan. 1, 2013.
in the संयुक्त States, मजदूर are generally हकदार to be paid no कम than the statutory minimum wage.
The federal government mandates a nationwide minimum wage स्तर of $ 7.25 per घंटा, while some states and municipalities have नियत minimum wage levels higher than the federal level, with the highest राज्य minimum wage being $ 9.19 per hour in Washington as of 2013.
Among those paid by the घंटा in 2012, 1.6 million were reported as earning exactly the prevailing संघीय न्यूनतम wage.
About 2.0 million were reported as earning wages below the minimum.
साथ, these 3.6 million workers साथ wages at or नीचे the minimum made up 4.7 percent of all hourly-paid workers.
