The Uniform Commercial Code ( UCC or the Code ), first published in 1952, is one of a number of uniform acts that have been promulgated in संयोजन साथ efforts to harmonize the law of sales and other commercial transactions in सब 50 states within the United राज्य of America.
multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of climbing routes साथ one or more stops at a belay station.
Each section of actual climbing between stops at the belay stations is called a pitch.
The leader ascends the pitch, placing gear and stopping to anchor themselves to the belay station.
the reason for the stops can be determined by choice, convention or necessity.
For example:
The रस्सी is too short to do the संपूर्ण route in one pitch ( necessity ).
The leader has चलाएं out of सुरक्षात्मक gear ( necessity ).
There is a convenient protectable ledge, or fixed bolts placed by previous चढना, at the location लिये a belay station ( convention ).
The नेता chooses to rest or exchange leads before the अगला खण्ड of the climb ( choice ).
The general purpose of these stops is to allow the second to ascend to the पाइंट of the lead climber while collecting the protective gear from the route in the course of the lead climber 's ascent.
At the belay station, the protective gear is एकत्रित, possibly exchanged to a नई leader, and the leader of the अगला pitch ascends the route.
A diagram showing an i Formation on offense and a 4-3 Formation on defense
In American फ़ुटबॉल, प्रत्येक टोली has eleven players on the field at one time.
the specific role that a player takes on the field is पुकारा their position.
Under the modern rules of American फ़ुटबॉल, टीमों are allowed असीमित subsititutions, that is teams may change any क्रमांक of players after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the टोली साथ the ball, जो is trying to score ), the defense ( the टोली trying to prevent the other टोली from स्कोरिंग, and to take the ball from them ), and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ).
भीतर those platoons, various specific positions exist depending on what the player 's main job is.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United States as Title ii of the Comprehensive ड्रग गाली Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug नीति under जिससे the manufacture, importation, possession, use and वितरण of निश्चित substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The विधान created पाँच schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications for a substance to be included in प्रत्येक.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration और the Food और ड्रग प्रशासन, determine which substances are added to or removed इससे the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग, and Congress रै sometimes अनुसूचित other substances through legislation ऐसे as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape रोकथाम Act of 2000, which लगाई gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule i. Classification decisions हैं required to be made on criteria सहित potential for गाली ( an undefined term ), currently स्वीकृत medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a नई जर्सी पारगमन park-and-ride station in वेन, New Jersey along the Montclair-Boonton Line that provides bus service to New यॉर्क City and various other points in the area as well as Montclair-Boonton Line train सेवा to New यॉर्क, Hoboken, और intermediate अंक साथ the line between Hackettstown and Montclair राज्य University.
It is located off of the southbound गलियों of New जर्सी Route 23 on West Belt Road, near the interchange where Route 23, Interstate 80, and U.S. Route 46 meet, across from the Willowbrook Mall.
The station opened in January 2008 and has 1,000 parking स्पेसेस.

In addition, the construction of the station was meant to also ease the congestion at what was then Route 23 Park & Ride, a bus depot on रूट 23 North कि has since been renamed Mother 's Park & Ride, and the Willowbrook Mall Park & Ride ; the now-Mother 's साईट had limited parking while NJT was having trouble with overfull पार्किंग areas at Willowbrook.
The Wayne township bus garage is located on the opposite side of Route 23.

The at sign @ is also commonly called the at प्रतीक, ampersat, apetail or commercial at in English—and less commonly a wide range of अन्य शर्तें.
The फैक्ट that there is no single word in English for the symbol has prompted some writers to उपयोग the French arobase or Spanish and Portuguese arroba—or to सिक्का new words ऐसे as asperand, ampersat—but none of ये has achieved चौड़ी currency.
Originally an accounting और commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g. 7 widgets @ $ 2 = $ 14 ), it was not included on the keyboard of the earliest commercially कामयाब typewriters, but was on at least one 1889 model और the very successful Underwood models from the `` underwood No. 5 '' in 1900 onward.
It is now universally शामिल on computer keyboards.
In हाल years, its meaning has grown to include the भाव of being `` located at, '' `` and, '' or `` directed at '', especially in email addresses and सोशल media, particularly Twitter.
the mark is encoded at.
the Catcher in the Rye is a 1951 novel by J. D. salinger.
Originally published for adults, it has चूंकि become popular with adolescent पाठक for its विषयवस्तु of teenage angst और alienation.
It has been translated into लगभग all of the world 's major languages.
Around 250,000 copies are sold each year with total sales of more than 65 million books.
The novel 's protagonist and antihero, Holden caulfield, रै become an icon for teenage rebellion.
The अनोखा was शामिल on Times 2005 list of the 100 best English-language novels written since 1923, and it was named by Modern पुस्तकालयों and its पाठक as एक of the 100 best english-language novels of the 20th century.
It has been frequently challenged in the United States और other countries for its liberal use of profanity और portrayal of sexuality.
It also deals with जटिल मुद्दे of identity, belonging, connection, and alienation.
skeletal muscles होमो sapiens
इस is a table of मांसपेशियां of the इंसान anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles भीतर the typical human, and लगभग प्रत्येक muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical द्विपक्षीय muscles, मिला on both पहलू, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as different भाग of a सिंगल muscle or as several muscles.
Examples range from 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of groups which include muscles relating to the head and neck, muscles of the धड़ or ट्रंक, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
the action refers to the action of each muscle from the standard anatomical position.
In अन्य स्थितियाँ, other actions may be performed.

The Iowa Senate is the upper house of the आयोवा General Assembly.
वहीँ are 50 seats in the Iowa Senate, representing 50 single-member जिले across the state with populations of approximately 60,927 प्रति constituency,.
Each Senate district is रचित of two House districts.
the Senate meets at the आयोवा State कैपिटल in Des moines.
नापसंद the lower house, the Iowa House of Representatives, Senators serve four-year terms, with half of the सीनेट staggered for re-election प्रत्येक two years.

Mechanical repair
Maintenance, repair, और operations ( MRO ) or maintenance, repair, and overhaul involves fixing any sort of mechanical, plumbing or electrical device should it become out of अनुक्रम or broken ( known as repair, unscheduled or casualty maintenance ).
It also शामिल performing दिनचर्या actions which keep the device in working order ( known as scheduled maintenance ) or prevent trouble from arising ( preventive maintenance ).
mro may be पारिभाषित as, `` All actions which have the objective of retaining or restoring an item in or to a state in which it can perform its required function.
The actions include the combination of all technical and सम्बन्धित administrative, managerial, and supervision actions. ''
mro operations can be categorised by whether the product remains the property of the ग्राहक, i.e. a service is होने offered, or whether the product is खरीदा by the reprocessing organisation and sold to कोई customer wishing to मेक the purchase ( Guadette, 2002 ).
In the former case it may be a backshop operation भीतर a larger organisation or smaller operation.
The former of these represents a closed लूप supply chain और usually has the पैमाना of maintenance, repair or of the product.
The latter of the categorisations is an open लूप supply chain और is typified by refurbishment and remanufacture.
The main characteristic of the closed loop system is that the demand for a product is matched with the supply of a प्रयुक्त product.
neglecting asset write-offs और exceptional activities the कुल population of the product between the customer and the service provider remains constant.
Prince William, Duke of Cambridge ( William आर्थर Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ), is the elder son of Charles, Prince of Wales, and Diana, Princess of Wales, and third-eldest grandchild of Queen एलिज़ाबेथ II and Prince फिलिप, Duke of Edinburgh.
He is second in the लकीर of succession, पीछे उसके father, to the thrones of सोलह स्वतंत्र sovereign states known as the Commonwealth realms : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Jamaica, Barbados, The Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, तुवालू, Saint Lucia, Saint विंसेंट और the Grenadines, बेलीज़, Antigua and Barbuda, and Saint Kitts and नेविस.
Prince William was educated at चार स्कूलों in the United Kingdom and obtained a degree इससे the University of St Andrews.
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile, Belize, Tanzania, and कीनिया where he has lived and holidayed several times.
Prince विलियम has also taken kiswahili studies at universities in Kenya and Tanzania.
he थी commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the household Cavalry —serving साथ his brother Prince Harry —and, दो years later, earned his विंग्स by completing pilot training at royal एयर Force College cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the Royal Air Force, was promoted to Flight Lieutenant और underwent helicopter flying training in order to become a full-time pilot साथ the Search and Rescue Force.
In 2010, he completed his general and special-to-type हेलीकाप्टर training and went on to RAF Valley on No. 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter.

DeAndre cortez Way ( born July 28, 1990 ), better known by उसके stage name soulja Boy Tell 'Em, or simply Soulja Boy, is an अमरीकी rapper, record निर्माता, actor, और entrepreneur.
in September 2007, his single `` Crank That ( Soulja Boy ) `` reached number one on the Billboard hot 100.
The single was initially self-published on the अंतरजाल, और it later became a number-one hit in the संयुक्त States for seven non-consecutive weeks starting in September 2007.
On अगस्त 17 Way was listed at # 18 on the Forbes list of Hip-Hop नकदी Kings of 2010 earning $ 7 million for that year.
Way has currently released three studio albums and one independent album : his debut studio album Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was certified platinum by the RIAA.
However, उसके next two albums, iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) did not match the commercial success of his debut, the latter तभी selling 100,000 copies, despite the success of several singles across दोनो albums, such as `` Kiss me Thru the फोन `` and `` Turn my swag On `` ( iSouljaBoyTellem ) and `` pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ).
This was mainly due to negotiation problems with Interscope Records which meant a limited amount of records were made available to the public.
As of 2011, Way has confirmed he is working on his fourth studio album, entitled USA DRE, which will be released in 2013.
The electron transport chain in the mitochondrion is the site of oxidative phosphorylation in eukaryotes.
The NADH and succinate generated in the citric एसिड साईकिल are oxidized, providing उर्जा to power ATP synthase.
Photosynthetic इलेक्ट्रॉन transport chain of the thylakoid membrane.
An electron transport chain ( ETC ) couples electron transfer between an electron donor ( ऐसे as NADH ) and an electron acceptor ( ऐसे as o2 ) with the ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions ( protons ) across a membrane.
The resulting electrochemical प्रोटॉन gradient is used to generate chemical energy in the form of adenosine ट्राइफॉस्फेट ( ATP ).
Electron transport chains are the सेल्यूलर mechanisms used लिये extracting energy इससे sunlight in photosynthesis and also from redox reactions, ऐसे as the ऑक्सीकरण of sugars ( respiration ).
In chloroplasts, light drives the conversion of जल to oxygen and NADP+ to NADPH with transfer of H+ ions across chloroplast membranes.
in mitochondria, it is the परिवर्तन of oxygen to water, NADH to NAD+ और succinate to fumarate that हैं required to generate the proton gradient.
Electron transport chains are major sites of premature electron leakage to oxygen, generating superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative तनाव.
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip, Ryzolt, Ultracet, Ultram in the यूएसए, Ralivia, Zytram XL Durella { cr-100/200 mg } in Canada or Adolonta in Spain ) is a centrally acting synthetic analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain.
The ड्रग has a wide range of अनुप्रयोग, सहित उपचार of rheumatoid arthritis, बेचैन legs सिंड्रोम, मोटर neurone disease and fibromyalgia.
It was launched और marketed as tramal by the German pharmaceutical company Grünenthal GmbH in 1977.
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist कि also induces serotonin release और inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine.
Tramadol is metabolized to O-desmethyltramadol, a significantly more potent μ-opioid agonist.
Tramadol and its major metabolite ( s ) are distinguished from other अधिक potent opioid agonists by relative selectivity for μ-opioid receptors.
Bernard Lawrence `` Bernie '' madoff ( ; born April 29, 1938 ) is an अमरीकी former stockbroker, निवेश advisor, financier, और white collar criminal.
He is the पूर्व non-executive अध्यक्ष of the NASDAQ भण्डार मार्केट, and the admitted operator of a Ponzi scheme that is considered to be the largest financial fraud in u.S. history.
Madoff संस्थापित the Wall Street firm Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC in 1960, and was its chairman until his गिरफ़्तार on December 11, 2008.
The firm was एक of the शीर्ष market maker businesses on Wall Street, जिससे bypassed `` विशेषज्ञ '' firms by directly executing आदेश over the काउंटर from retail brokers.
he employed at the firm his brother Peter as Senior Managing Director and Chief अनुपालन Officer ; Peter has since been sentenced to 10 years in prison.
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm 's rules and compliance अधिकारी and attorney, और his sons Andrew and Mark ( Mark committed suicide by hanging exactly two years after his father 's गिरफ़्तार ).
On दिसम्बर 10, 2008, madoff 's sons बताई authorities that their father had confessed to them that the asset management unit of his firm was a विशाल पेन्शन scheme, and quoted him as describing it as `` one बिग झूठ. ''
The following day, FBI agents arrested madoff और charged him with one count of securities fraud.
The U.S. Securities and Exchange आयोग ( SEC ) had previously conducted investigations into Madoff 's business practices, but किया not uncover the massive fraud.
In March 2009, Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 संघीय felonies and admitted to turning his wealth management business into a massive Ponzi scheme that झांसे हज़ारों of investors of अरबों of dollars.
Madoff said he began the पेन्शन scheme in the early 1990s.
However, संघीय investigators believe the धोखाधड़ी began as early as the 1970s, और those charged with recovering the लापता money believe the investment आपरेशन may never have been legitimate.
The amount missing from client accounts, including fabricated gains, was almost $ 65 billion.
The court-appointed trustee estimated actual losses to निवेशकों of $ 18 billion.
On June 29, 2009, he was sentenced to 150 years in prison, the अधिकतम allowed.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several देशों to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other प्रशासनिक support professionals.
in North America, it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last full week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in April ( अप्रैल 18 in 2013 ).
in Australia it is celebrated on the first Friday in may
A quasi-judicial body is an entity ऐसे as an arbitrator or tribunal board, generally of a public administrative agency, which has powers and प्रक्रियाओं resembling those of a court of law or judge, और which is obligated to objectively determine facts and चित्रण conclusions इससे them so as to provide the basis of an आधिकारिक action.
Such क्रियाएँ are able to remedy a हालात or थोपने legal penalties, and may affect the विधिक अधिकारों, कर्तव्य or privileges of specific parties.

Tycho Brahe ( 14 December 154624 October 1601 ), born Tyge Ottesen Brahe, was a Danish nobleman known for his accurate and comprehensive astronomical and planetary observations.
He was born in Scania, then part of Denmark, now part of modern-day Sweden.
tycho was well ज्ञात in उसके lifetime as an astronomer and alchemist.
In his De nova स्टेला ( on the new star ) of 1573, he refuted the Aristotelian विश्वास in an unchanging celestial realm.
His precise measurements indicated that `` new सितारों, '' ( stellae novae, now known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572, lacked the parallax expected in sub-lunar phenomena, and यहूद इसलिए not `` atmospheric '' tailless comets as previously believed, लकिन यहूद above the atmosphere and moon.
Using similar measurements he दिखाया that धूमकेतुओं were also not atmospheric phenomena, as previously thought, और must pass through the supposedly `` immutable '' celestial spheres.
As an astronomer, Tycho worked to combine what he saw as the geometrical benefits of the Copernican system with the philosophical लाभ of the Ptolemaic system into उसके own मॉडल of the ब्रह्मांड, the Tychonic system.
furthermore, he was the पिछला of the major naked नजर astronomers, working without telescopes for उसके observations.
tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the island of hven and the funding to निर्माण the Uraniborg, an early research संस्थान, where he built large astronomical instruments and took many careful measurements, and बाद Stjerneborg, underground, when he discovered कि उसके instruments in the former were नहीं sufficiently steady.
On the island ( on which he demonstrated autocratic character और behavior toward the residents ) he founded manufactories such as paper-making to provide सामग्री for printing उसके results.
After मतभिन्नता with the नई Danish king Christian IV in 1597, he was आमंत्रित by the Bohemian king and पावन Roman emperor Rudolph II to Prague, where he became the official imperial astronomer.
He निर्मित the नई observatory at benátky nad Jizerou.
Here, इससे 1600 until his मौत in 1601, he was assisted by Johannes Kepler who later used Tycho 's astronomical आंकड़ा to develop Kepler 's laws of planetary motion.
guro District ( Guro-gu ) is a ज़िला of सियोल, South कोरियाई, which was separated from Yeongdeungpo ज़िला on April 1, 1980.
स्तिथ in the southwestern भाग of the city, जहाँ besides Yangcheon ज़िला and Geumcheon ज़िला guro District has an important position as a transport link which contains railroads, land routes from the बाकी of सियोल to the south of the country.
The Gyeongbu and gyeongin railway lines connect Seoul to Busan and Incheon.
In जोड, Seoul महानगर Subway लाइनों 1, 2, and 7, and प्रमुख highways प्रतिच्छेद in Guro District.
The name Guro originates from the legend कि nine ( ) old मेन ( Korean : ro ) enjoyed longevity in the district.
A digital industrial complex is located in Guro District.
The Guro Digital औद्योगिक Complex, which played a अग्रणी industrial role mainly with textile manufacturing, dressmaking और other labour-intensive industries in 1967, has महरूम rapidly changed into an IT industrial complex.
इस complex played a pivotal भूमिका in the economic growth of the South कोरियाई 's development era, referred to as the `` Miracle on the Han River ``, and भी contributed 10 प्रतिशत of नेशनल export in the 1970s.
Twenty-one percent of the कुल area of Guro District is a restricted zone to be used as a greenbelt साथ the only arboretum in Seoul.
the zone is changing into a lively district as विशाल labour-intensive factories are moving from the क्षेत्रफल और the council is developing what it terms इसके four zones.
An `` e-government `` system based on this hosted the international e-participation forum on February 7–9, 2007, with the participation of more than thirty-seven countries.
The forum थी launched with the theme `` promoting लोकतंत्र and क्षेत्रीय Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André santini ( Issy-les-Moulineaux, France ), केविन Foy ( Chapel हिल, US ), apirak kosayothin ( Bangkok, Thailand ), Uvais Mohamed Emthiyas ( Colombo, श्री Lanka ), and world experts such as dr William H. Dutton ( Director of Oxford Internet Institute at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Oxford, UK ) and Dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere, Finland ) participated in the forum.
The Guro Declaration, adopted during the forum, aims to set up a portal site लिये e-government development और to establish a कंक्रीट project in order to सेतु the digital divide among the world 's शहरों.
This practice has been recognised लिये providing a new important step in the development of e-democracy.
The e-participation forum was a कुंजी factor for Guro to play the leading role in bridging the digital divide among cities, to provide i.t. enterprises located in guro डिजिटल औद्योगिक Complex the opportunity to लॉन्च into the international मार्केट, to improve इसके image और become a global leader to concrete e-democracy.

A wonton ( also spelled wantan, wanton, or wuntun in transcription from Cantonese ; Mandarin : húndùn ) is a प्रकार of पकौड़ी commonly मिला in a number of Chinese व्यंजन.
Many people were involved in the invention of रेडियो as we now know it.
Several possible methods of wireless संचार were considered, including inductive and capacitive induction and transmission through the मैदान, however the विधि used for radio today exclusively involves the transmission और reception of electromagnetic लहरें.
After early अटकलें on the विषय, experimental work on the कनेक्शन between electricity and magnetism began around 1820 with the work of Hans Christian ओर्स्टेड and continued with the work of André-Marie Ampère, Joseph Henry, and Michael Faraday.
These investigations culminated in the पूरा सिद्धान्त of electromagnetism developed by James Clerk Maxwell.
This सिद्धान्त वर्णित the theoretical basis of the propagation of electromagnetic waves.
After Maxwell 's theory was published many people experimented साथ बेतार communication, कुछ intentionally using Maxwell 's theory some not.
It is considered likely that the first intentional transmission of a सिग्नल by means of electromagnetic waves was performed by David Edward Hughes around 1880, हालांकि this was considered to be induction at the समय.
the first systematic and unequivocal transmission of EM waves was performed by Heinrich रुडॉल्फ Hertz and described in papers published in 1887 और 1890.
हर्ट्ज़ famously considered these परिणाम as होने of little practical value.
बाद Hertz 's work many लोगों were involved in the development of components and theory involved साथ the transmission and रिसेप्शन of electromagnetic waves.
Others, notably Guglielmo Marconi, were concerned with व्यावहारिक improvements and the commercial application of रेडियो to wireless telegraphy.
Later on Reginald A. Fessenden became the first to send an audio signal by अर्थात् of electromagnetic waves.
Scurvy is a बीमारी resulting from a deficiency of vitamin C, which is required लिये the synthesis of collagen in humans.
The रासायनिक नाम for vitamin c, ascorbic acid, is निकला इससे the Latin name of scurvy, scorbutus, which also provides the क्रियाशील scorbutic ( `` of, characterized by or having to do with स्कर्वी '' ).
स्कर्वी often presents itself initially as symptoms of malaise and lethargy, followed by formation of spots on the skin, spongy gums, and bleeding from the mucous membranes.
Spots are most abundant on the thighs and legs, and a person with the ailment looks pale, feels depressed, and is partially immobilized.
As scurvy advances, there can be open, suppurating wounds, loss of teeth, jaundice, fever, neuropathy and death.
Scurvy थी at one समय common among sailors, pirates and others aboard ships at sea longer than perishable फल and सब्जियां could be stored ( subsisting instead तभी on cured और salted meats and सूखी grains ) and by soldiers similarly deprived of these foods for extended periods.
It was described by हिपोक्रेटिस ( c. 460 BC–c. 380 bc ), और herbal cures for scurvy have been known in अनेक native cultures चूंकि prehistory.
Scurvy was एक of the limiting factors of marine travel, often killing large numbers of the passengers and क्रू on long-distance voyages.
This became a significant issue in Europe from the beginning of the modern era in the Age of Discovery in the 15th century, continuing to play a significant role through संसार युद्ध i in the 20th century.
While today scurvy is known to be caused by a nutritional कमियां, until the isolation of vitamin C और direct evidence of its link to स्कर्वी in 1932, numerous theories and treatments यहूद proposed, often on little or no प्रायोगिक data.
This inconsistency is attributed to the कमी of vitamin c as a distinct अवधारणा, an inability to reliably link अलग foods ( notably उपस्थित in fresh citrus, watercress, और organ meat ) to scurvy.
An additional concept required to समझे scurvy was the degradation of विटामिन C by exposure to air and copper and other transition metal salts ऐसे as those of आयरन, thus changing the links of foods to scurvy over time.
उपचार by fresh food, particularly citrus fruit, थी periodically implemented, as it था महरूम since antiquity.
However जबतक the 1930s, उपचार was inconsistent, with many ineffective treatments प्रयुक्त into the 20th century.
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy, James Lind who first proved it could be treated with citrus फल in experiments he described in his 1753 book, A Treatise of the Scurvy, though his advice was not implemented by the Royal नेवी for several decades.
In infants, scurvy is sometimes referred to as barlow 's disease, named after Sir थामस Barlow, a British physician who described it.
However, Barlow 's disease may also refer to mitral valve prolapse.
Other eponyms for scurvy include moeller 's disease and Cheadle 's बीमारी.
Scurvy does not occur in most animals क्युकी they can synthesize their अपना vitamin C.
However, humans और other higher primates ( the simians - monkeys and apes - और tarsiers ), guinea सूअर, most or all bats, and कुछ species of पक्षियों and fish lack an एंजाइम ( L-gulonolactone oxidase ) necessary for ऐसे synthesis and must obtain vitamin C through their आहार.
विटामिन c is फैली in plant tissues, साथ विशेषकर high एकाग्रता occurring in citrus फल ( oranges, lemons, limes, grapefruits ), tomatoes, potatoes, cabbages, और ग्रीन peppers.
आयरन is a chemical element with the symbol Fe ( from ) और परमाणु number 26.
It is a metal in the first transition series.
It is the most common तत्व ( by mass ) forming the ग्रह Earth as a whole, forming much of Earth 's outer और inner core.
It is the चौथी most common element in the धरती 's crust.
Iron 's very common presence in रॉकी planets like Earth is due to इसके abundant production as a result of fusion in high-mass सितारों, where the production of nickel-56 ( which decays to the most common isotope of iron ) is the पिछला nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic.
This causes radioactive nickel to become the पिछला element to be produced before collapse of a supernova leads to the explosive events that scatter this precursor radionuclide of iron abundantly into space.
जैसे other समूह 8 elements, आयरन exists in a wide range of ऑक्सीकरण states, −2 to +6, although +2 और +3 हैं the most common.
Elemental iron occurs in meteoroids and other low ऑक्सीजन environments, but is प्रतिक्रिया to oxygen and जल.
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray, but oxidize in normal एयर to give hydrated आयरन आक्साइड, commonly known as rust.
Unlike many अन्य metals जिससे रूप passivating oxide layers, iron oxides occupy more volume than iron metal, and thus iron oxides flake off और expose fresh सतहों for corrosion.
Iron metal has महरूम used since ancient टाइम्स, though copper alloys, which have lower melting temperatures, were used first in history.
pure iron is soft ( softer than aluminium ), but is unobtainable by smelting.
The material is significantly hardened और strengthened by impurities from the smelting process, such as carbon.
A certain proportion of carbon ( between 0.002 % और 2.1 % ) produces steel, which may be up to 1000 times harder than pure आयरन.
Crude iron मेटल is produced in blast furnaces, where ore is reduced by coke to pig iron, which has a high कार्बन content.
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon सामग्री to the correct proportion to make steel.
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with अन्य metals ( मिश्रधातु steels ) हैं by दूर the most common metals in industrial use, due to उनके ग्रेट range of desirable properties and the प्रचुरता of iron.
आयरन chemical यौगिकों, जिससे include ferrous and ferric यौगिकों, have many uses.
Iron oxide mixed with aluminium powder can be ignited to create a थर्माइट reaction, used in welding and purifying ores.
it forms binary compounds with the हैलोजन्स and the chalcogens.
Among इसके organometallic compounds is ferrocene, the पहला sandwich compound discovered.
आयरन plays an महत्वपूर्ण role in biology, forming complexes with molecular ऑक्सीजन in hemoglobin and myoglobin ; these two compounds are common oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates.
Iron is also the मेटल प्रयुक्त at the active site of many important redox enzymes dealing with cellular श्वसन and ऑक्सीकरण और reduction in plants and पशु.
The ब्लू Cross Blue Shield Association ( BCBSA ) is a federation of 38 separate स्वास्थ्य insurance organizations and companies in the United States.
Combined, they directly or indirectly provide health बीमे to over 99 million Americans.
the history of Blue Cross dates back to 1929, while the इतिहास of Blue Shield dates to 1939.
The Blue Cross Association dates back to 1960, while its Blue Shield counterpart was created in 1948.
The two organizations merged in 1982, forming the current association.
A potato chip ( ज्ञात as a chip in American, Australian, New Zealand, कनाडाई, Singaporean, Hong Kong, South African and Jamaican English ; as a कुरकुरे in British English and Hiberno-English, and as either a chip or wafer in Indian English ) is a पतला slice of potato कि is deep fried or baked until crunchy.
Potato chips are commonly served as an appetizer, पक्ष डिश, or snack.
The basic chips are cooked and salted ; additional किस्में are manufactured using विभिन्न flavorings and ingredients including seasonings, herbs, spices, cheeses, and कृत्रिम additives.
`` Crisps '', however, may भी refer to many different types of savory snack products बेची in the United Kingdom और Ireland, कुछ बना from potato, but may also be बना from maize, tapioca or other cereals.
an example of ये kinds of savory snacks is दानव Munch.
आलू चिप्स are a predominant part of the snack food मार्केट in English-speaking countries and numerous other Western nations.
the global potato चिप मार्केट उत्पन्न कुल revenues of US $ 16.4 billion in 2005.
This accounted for 35.5 % of the कुल savory snacks market in that साल ( US $ 46.1 billion ).
Henry Clay, Sr. ( अप्रैल 12, 1777 – June 29, 1852 ) was a lawyer, politician and skilled orator who represented Kentucky in both the Senate and in the House of Representatives.
He served three different terms as Speaker of the United States House of प्रतिनिधि and was also Secretary of State from 1825 to 1829.
He lost his campaigns for president in 1824, 1832 and 1844.
Clay was a dominant फिगर in both the First and Second Party प्रणालियों.
As a अग्रणी war hawk in 1812, he favored war with Britain और played a significant role in अग्रणी the स्वदेश to युद्ध in the War of 1812.
in 1824 he ran for अध्यक्ष and lost, but threw his electoral votes to John क्विंसी एडम्स, who made him secretary of state as the Jacksonians denounced what वे माना a `` corrupt bargain. ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 and 1844 as the प्रत्याशी of the Whig Party, which he founded और प्रायः dominated.
Clay थी the foremost proponent of the American System, fighting for an बढ़ाएँ in tariffs to foster industry in the United States, the use of federal funding to build और maintain infrastructure, और a strong national bank.
he opposed the annexation of Texas, fearing it would inject the slavery issue into politics.
Clay also opposed the Mexican-American War and the `` Manifest Destiny `` policy of Democrats, जिससे cost him votes in the close 1844 election.
Dubbed the `` ग्रेट Pacificator, '' Clay brokered important compromises during the Nullification Crisis and on the गुलामी issue.
As part of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal Trio, '' along with his colleagues Daniel Webster and John C. Calhoun, he was instrumental in formulating the मिसौरी Compromise of 1820 and the Compromise of 1850.
He was viewed as the primary प्रतिनिधि of Western रूचि in this group, और थी given the names `` Henry of the वेस्ट '' and `` The Western Star. ''
A plantation owner, Clay आयोजित slaves दौरान his lifetime but freed them in his Will.
अब्राहम Lincoln, the Whig leader in Illinois, was a great admirer of Clay, saying he was `` my ideal of a great man. ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly supported Clay 's economic programs.
In 1957, a Senate Committee चयनित मिट्टी as एक of the five greatest U.S. Senators, along with Daniel Webster, John C. Calhoun, Robert la Follette, and Robert Taft.
BJ 's Wholesale Club, Inc., commonly referred to simply as BJ 's, is a membership-only गोदाम club chain operating on the United States East Coast, as well as in the state of Ohio.
The कम्पनी is ranked # 232 on सौभाग्य magazine 's 2010 listing of America 's 500 largest पब्लिक corporations.
The Wizard of Oz, ज्ञात during उसके शासनकाल as the Great and शक्तिशाली Oz, is the epithet of Oscar Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman Henkel emmannuel Ambroise Diggs, a fictional अक्षर in the Land of Oz, created by American author L. Frank Baum.
the character was further popularized by the classic 1939 movie, wherein his full नाम is नहीं mentioned.

Marvin gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born Marvin Pentz gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter और musician.
Gaye helped to आकार the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How मीठी It is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary कुएं और Tammi Terrell, बाद earning the titles `` प्रिंस of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye अंकित the concept एल्बम कया 's going On and Let 's Get It On and became among the first artists in motown to break दूर from the reins of its production company.
Gaye 's बाद recordings influenced several R & B subgenres such as शांत storm और neo-soul.
following a काल in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 Grammy award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye has been मरणोपरांत honored by many institutions, including the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.

The Chernobyl विपत्ति (, chornobylska Katastrofa – chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in Ukraine ( then officially the यूक्रेनी SSR ), which थी under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union.
an explosion and fire released large quantities of radioactive अणु into the माहौल, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the western USSR and Europe.
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history, and is one of तभी दो classified as a level 7 event on the International Nuclear Event स्केल ( the other being the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately involved over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles.
the official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has महरूम disputed, and long-term effects such as cancers and deformities are still being accounted for.

HijackThis ( also HiJackThis or hjt ) is an open source enumerating tool for microsoft Windows originally created by merijn Bellekom, and later sold to Trend सूक्ष्म.
The program is notable for targeting browser-hijacking methods, बल्कि than relying on a database of known स्पाइवेयर.
It scans a user 's computer quickly, and प्रदर्शक browser hijacking locations, showing what entries are there.
HijackThis is प्रयुक्त primarily लिये diagnosis of browser hijacking, as uninformed use of इसके removal facilities can cause significant software क्षति to a computer.
HijackThis करता नहीं remove or detect स्पाइवेयर ; it lists most common locations where browser hijacking activity can occur.
Browser hijacking can cause malware to be संस्थापित on a computer.
On February 16, 2012, Trend Micro released the HijackThis source code as open source और it is now available on the SourceForge site.
Saddle Creek रिकॉर्ड is an American record label आधारित in Omaha, Nebraska.
Started as a college क्लास project on entrepreneurship, the label was founded by माइक Mogis and जस्टिन Oberst in 1993 ( as Lumberjack Records ).
Mogis soon turned over his role in the company to Robb Nansel.
The label is named after काठी Creek Road, a street that कटौती through the east side of midtown Omaha, और the beginnings of a scene whose members included Conor Oberst ( then a solo कलाकार, currently of Bright Eyes, conor Oberst and the Mystic Valley Band, Desaparecidos and Monsters of Folk ), टिम Kasher ( then of Slowdown Virginia, currently of कर्सिव और The Good Life ), and others.
Collectively, they were known unofficially as the `` creekers ''.
Saddle Creek first appeared in छपाई on a show flyer, offering to `` Spend an evening with Saddle Creek '' ( बाद to be the title of the label 's DVD. )
Saddle Creek became an incorporated entity as a result of a class project on उद्यमिता.
वितरण is handled by the वैकल्पिक वितरण Alliance, which is under the Warner Music समूह छतरियाँ.
Saddle Creek रिकॉर्ड continues to be the flagship label of a style of music called `` the Omaha Sound ``, characterized by a slight country twang.
This is increasingly inaccurate, though, with the वृद्धि of अधिक electronic sounds such as those favored by The Faint and Broken Spindles.
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's disparate member bands is somewhat समझाया by their history ; a number of the असली members of the लेबल attended grade school साथ.
A `` sister label '', of sorts, to काठी Creek is Team प्रेम, प्रारंभ by Conor Oberst in 2004.
The label opened arms to their first bands not आधारित in Omaha in 2001 with releases by Now It 's ओवरहेड and Sorry About Dresden.
अन्य non-Nebraskan artists followed, including Los एंजिल्स 's Rilo Kiley, Eric Bachmann ( formerly leader of Archers of Loaf and Crooked Fingers इससे North Carolina ), Georgie James ( Washington d.C. ), Two Gallants ( सैन Francisco ), and most recently Tokyo Police Club ( Toronto ).
In 2005, Spend an Evening with Saddle Creek, a documentary detailing the पहला ten years of the record लेबल 's history, थी released.
The dvd सुविधाएँ extensive interviews with the Saddle Creek bands, archival footage, and rare live performances.
On June 8, 2007, the label opened their own music venue named Slowdown ( after the समूह Slowdown Virginia ), located in downtown Omaha, Nebraska.

In total, there were 192 episodes filmed for the show over the course of its आठ seasons, इससे 1987 to 1995.
Full House is a situation comedy which chronicles a widowed पिता 's struggles of raising his three young daughters and the lives that they have छुआ.
The patriarch of the family, Danny ( Bob Saget ), invites his brother-in-law जेसी ( जॉन Stamos ) and his best friend Joey ( Dave Coulier ), to help raise his children ( candace Cameron, Jodie Sweetin, और मरियम Kate/Ashley Olsen ), after his wife was killed during an automobile दुर्घटना involving a drunk driver.
After एपीसोड 88 और 89, Jesse marries बेकी ( Lori Loughlin ), and they move into the attic.

The series ends with episode 192, `` Michelle Rides Again Part 2 '', when Michelle loses her memory और the family कोशिशें to restore it.
Notice of Stamp Act of 1765 in समाचारपत्र
American newspapers reacted to the स्टैम्प Act with anger और predictions of the demise of journalism.
The स्टैम्प Act 1765 ( short title कर्तव्य in American Colonies अधिनियम 1765 ; 5 George III, c. 12 ) imposed a direct tax by the अंग्रेजों Parliament specifically on the colonies of British America, and it required that अनेक printed सामग्री in the colonies be उत्पादित on stamped पेपर produced in London, carrying an embossed revenue stamp.
ये printed materials were legal दस्तावेज़, magazines, newspapers and many other प्रकार of paper प्रयुक्त throughout the colonies.
Like previous taxes, the stamp tax था to be सशुल्क in valid British currency, not in colonial paper money.
The purpose of the कर was to सहायता pay for troops stationed in उत्तर America after the British victory in the Seven Years ' War.
The British government लगा कि the colonies were the प्राथमिक beneficiaries of this military presence, and should pay at least a portion of the expense.
The Stamp Act met great resistance in the colonies.
The colonies sent no representatives to Parliament, and therefore had no influence over what taxes were उठाया, how they यहूद levied, or how they would be spent.
Many colonists considered it a violation of उनके अधिकारों as Englishmen to be taxed without उनके सहमति —consent that only the colonial legislatures could grant.
Colonial assemblies sent petitions and protests.
The Stamp Act Congress held in New York City, reflecting the first significant joint colonial response to कोई British measure, भी petitioned Parliament और the King.
Local protest समूह, led by colonial merchants and landowners, established connections through पत्राचार कि created a loose coalition कि विस्तारित from New England to जॉर्जिया.
Protests and demonstrations initiated by the Sons of Liberty often turned violent and destructive as the masses became involved.
Very soon all स्टैम्प कर वितरकों यहूद सहमे into resigning their आयोग, and the tax was never effectively collected.
Opposition to the स्टैम्प Act was not सीमित to the colonies.
अंग्रेजों merchants and manufacturers, whose exports to the colonies were threatened by colonial economic समस्याएं exacerbated by the tax, also pressured Parliament.
The Act was repealed on March 18, 1766 as a matter of expedience, but Parliament affirmed its power to legislate for the colonies “in all मामले whatsoever” by also passing the declaratory अधिनियम.
There followed a series of new कर and regulations, likewise opposed by the colonists.
The episode played a major role in defining the grievances and enabling the organized colonial प्रतिरोध that led to the American Revolution in 1775.

PT नौकाएँ यहूद a variety of torpedo-armed fast attack craft used by the United States Navy in World War II to attack larger surface ships.
`` PT '' is the US hull classification symbol for `` Patrol Torpedo ''.
the pt boat squadrons were nicknamed `` the mosquito fleet ''.
The जापानी called them `` Devil Boats ''.
The original pre– World War I torpedo boats were designed with `` displacement '' hulls.
They displaced up to 300 टन and the top speed was.
The PT boats used in World War II were built using the planing -type hull form developed लिये racing boats.
वे were much smaller ( 30–75 टन ) and तेज़ ( 35–40 knots ).
दोनो प्रकार were designed to स्ट्राइक at larger warships with torpedoes, using relatively high speed to get close, and छोटी size to avoid होने spotted और hit by gunfire.
They यहूद much less expensive than large warships.
pt boats यहूद much faster, smaller, and cheaper than conventional ( displacement hull ) vessels.
दौरान World युद्ध II, अमरीकी pt boats engaged enemy destroyers and numerous other surface craft, ranging from small boats to विशाल supply ships.
PT boats also operated as gunboats विरूद्ध enemy छोटी शिल्प, such as armored barges used by the Japanese शक्तियां for inter-island transport.
Good शुक्रवार is a religious holiday observed primarily by Christians commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus Christ और his death at Calvary.
The holiday is observed दौरान Holy Week as part of the Paschal Triduum on the शुक्रवार preceding Easter Sunday, and may coincide with the Jewish observance of Passover.
It is भी ज्ञात as Holy Friday, Great Friday, Black शुक्रवार, or Easter Friday, though the latter properly refers to the Friday in ईस्टर week.
Based on the details of the canonical gospels, the Crucifixion of यीशु was most संभावित to have महरूम on a Friday ( the day before the Sabbath ) ( ).
The estimated year of the Crucifixion is ad 33, by two अलग groups, और originally as AD 34 by Isaac Newton via the differences between the Biblical and जूलियन calendars और the crescent of the moon.
A third method, using a completely different astronomical दृष्टिकोण based on a lunar Crucifixion darkness and eclipse मॉडल ( consistent साथ Apostle Peter 's reference to a `` चंद्रमा of blood '' in Acts 2:20 ), points to शुक्रवार, 3 अप्रैल AD 33.
The Great Basin is the largest क्षेत्रफल of endorheic watersheds in North America.
It is noted for both its arid conditions and its Basin और दायरा topography कि varies from the North American low point at Badwater Basin to the highest पाइंट of the संलग्न United राज्य, less than दूर at the समिट of Mount Whitney.
The region spans several physiographic divisions, biomes / ecoregions, और deserts.
रास्टर may refer to:
Raster graphics, graphical तकनीकों using arrays of pixel values
Raster graphics editor, a computer program
Raster scan, the pattern of image readout, हस्तांतरण, storage, and reconstruction in टेलीविज़न और computer images
Rasterisation, or rasterization, conversion of a vector image to a रास्टर image
Raster image प्रोसेसर, or RIP, a घटक of a मुद्रण प्रणाली that performs rasterisation

Raster to vector, an image conversion process

Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary Geatish नायिका और later turned king in the epic poem named after him, one of the oldest surviving pieces of literature in the English भाषा.
The आक्रमण on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii आपरेशन or Operation ai by the Japanese Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning ) and the बैटल of Pearl Harbor ) was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy विरूद्ध the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the आक्रमण commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the u.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with military actions the Empire of जापानी was planning in Southeast एशिया against overseas territories of the United किंगडम, the Netherlands, and the United States.
The base थी attacked by 353 जापानी fighters, bombers and torpedo planes in two waves, शुभारम्भ from six aircraft carriers.
All आठ U.S. नेवी battleships were damaged, with four being sunk.
Two of these were later उठाया, and with the remaining four repaired, छह battleships returned to service later in the war.
The Japanese also sank or क्षतिग्रस्त three cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft प्रशिक्षण ship, and one minelayer.
188 U.S. वायुयान यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 Americans यहूद killed and 1,282 wounded.
Important base installations such as the power station, shipyard, maintenance, and ईंधन and torpedo storage facilities, as well as the submarine पियर and मुख्यालय building ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked.
जापानी losses were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines lost, and 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One जापानी sailor was captured.
The attack came as a profound shock to the अमरीकी लोगों and led सीधे to the American entry into World War II in both the Pacific and यूरोपीय theaters.
The following day ( दिसम्बर 8 ), the United राज्य declared war on Japan.
Domestic support for non-interventionism, जिससे had महरूम दमदार, disappeared.
Clandestine support of Britain ( for example the Neutrality पैट्रोल ) was replaced by active alliance.
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and Italy to declare war on the u.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
There were numerous historical precedents लिये unannounced military कार्रवाई by Japan.
however, the lack of कोई formal warning, particularly while negotiations were still apparently ongoing, led President Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7, 1941, `` a date which will सजीव in infamy ``.
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85 ) is a north–south संयुक्त States राजमार्ग कि runs for in the Mountain - Northern Plains states of the संयुक्त States.
The दक्षिणी terminus of the route is at the United states-mexico border in El Paso, टेक्सास, connecting with Mexican संघीय Highway 45.
the northern terminus is at the United States-Canada किनारा in Fortuna, North Dakota, where the route continues north as Saskatchewan Highway 35.
In both the United States and Saskatchewan, Canada the route is known as the CanAm Highway.
भाग of US 85 are considered part of the Theodore Roosevelt एक्सप्रेसवे.
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election, held on Tuesday, नवम्बर 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, पूर्व Vice-President रिचर्ड Nixon, won the election over the Democratic nominee, लाज़िम Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
निक्सन ran on a अभियान that promised to restore law and order to the स्वदेश 's cities, torn by riots and crime.
विश्लेषकों have argued the चुनाव of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the New Deal गठबन्धन that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years.
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide, the election saw the लाज़िम president forced out of the race and a रिपब्लिकन निर्वाचित for the first समय in बारह years.
it was a wrenching नेशनल experience, conducted दौरान a साल of violence that included the assassination of civil rights नेता Martin Luther King, Jr., and subsequent race riots across the nation, the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक presidential candidate रॉबर्ट F. Kennedy, widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses, and हिंसक confrontations between police और anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National सम्मेलन as the लोकतांत्रिक party split again और again.
The election featured the strongest third party effort since 1912 by former अलबामा Governor George Wallace, a Democrat.
क्युकी Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to end school segregation, he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial जिले in the North.
This थी the last election in which नई York had the most मत in the electoral college ( 43 मत ).
After the 1970 census, California gained the सबसे electoral votes and has remained the most populous state since तब.
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won बगैर carrying the वाइस presidential candidate 's home राज्य.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft खिड़कियाँ nt family of operating systems that provides limited सूचना about computer performance and running applications, processes and cpu usage, commit charge and मेमोरी सूचना, network कार्यकलाप and statistics, logged-in users, and system services ( and as often is the case with software टूल्स provided by Microsoft for Windows, 3rd party software is available which fills the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly, e.g, `` Process Explorer '', `` Extended Task मैनेजर '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities, प्रोसेसर affinity, forcibly terminate processes, and shut down, restart, hibernate or log off इससे Windows.
Windows Task Manager was introduced साथ Windows NT 4.0.
Previous versions of Windows NT शामिल the Task सूची application, which had far fewer features.
The कार्य list was capable of लिस्टिंग currently running processes and killing उन्हें, or creating a new process.
In खिड़कियाँ XP only, a Shutdown मेनू is also present कि allows access to Standby, Hibernate, Turn off, Restart, Log Off and Switch उपयोक्ता.
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft Windows 3.x, Windows 95, Windows 98 ) had a program known as कार्य to display the programs currently running.
This file थी executed by running the taskman.exe file from the C : \Windows directory.
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that हैं used in the आधुनिक Japanese writing system along साथ hiragana ( ひらがな, ), katakana ( カタカナ, ), Hindu-Arabic numerals, and the occasional use of the Latin alphabet.
The Japanese term कांजी ( ) for the Chinese characters वस्तुतः means `` Han वर्ण '' and is written using the वही characters as the Chinese hanzi ( ).
John R Williams ( may 4, 1782 – October 20, 1854 ) was an अमरीकी soldier, merchant, and politician जो is most well ज्ञात for serving as the first mayor of Detroit, Michigan.
In कुल, he served as Detroit 's mayor for five other शर्तें.
He also थी a brigadier general in the United States Army during the Black हॉक War.

A smartphone that can be used as a compass because of the magnetometer inside.
An iPhone कि can be प्रयुक्त as a geological compass because of the 3-axis teslameter and 3-axis accelerometer inside it
A military compass that was used during संसार War i.
A कम्पास is a navigational instrument that shows directions in a frame of reference that is stationary सापेक्ष to the surface of the earth.
The frame of reference defines the four cardinal directions ( or points ) – north, south, ईस्ट, and west.
Intermediate directions are also पारिभाषित.
Usually, a diagram पुकारा a compass रोज़, जिससे shows the directions ( with their names usually abbreviated to initials ), is marked on the compass.
When the compass is in use, the रोज़ is aligned with the real directions in the फ़्रेम of reference, so, लिये example, the `` N '' mark on the rose really points to the north.
Frequently, in addition to the rose or sometimes instead of it, angle markings in degrees are shown on the कम्पास.
North corresponds to zero डिग्री, and the angles increase clockwise, so east is 90 degrees, south is 180, and west is 270.
These numbers allow the compass to show azimuths or बियरिंग, which are commonly stated in this notation.
the magnetic compass was first invented as a यंत्र for भविष्यवाणी as early as the Chinese Han राजवंश ( चूंकि about 206 BC ).
The compass was प्रयुक्त in Song Dynasty चीन by the military for navigational orienteering by 1040-1044, और was used for maritime नेविगेशन by 1111 to 1117.
The उपयोग of a कम्पास is recorded in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय between 1187 and 1202, and in Persia in 1232.
The dry compass was invented in यूरोपीय around 1300.
This was supplanted in the early 20th century by the liquid-filled magnetic compass.
The Inca Empire or inka Empire ( Quechua : Tawantinsuyu ) was the largest empire in pre-Columbian America.
The administrative, political and military center of the साम्राज्य was located in Cusco in modern-day पेरू.
The Inca civilization arose from the हाइलैंड्स of Peru sometime in the early 13th century.
From 1438 to 1533, the Incas used a variety of विधि, from conquest to शांतिपूर्ण assimilation, to चरितार्थ a large portion of पश्चिमी South America, केन्द्रित on the Andean पहाड़ ranges, सहित, besides Peru, large भाग of आधुनिक Ecuador, पश्चिमी and south central Bolivia, northwest Argentina, north and सेंट्रल Chile, and southern Colombia into a राज्य comparable to the ऐतिहासिक empires of Eurasia.
The आधिकारिक language of the empire was Quechua, हालांकि hundreds of local languages and dialects of Quechua were spoken.
the Inca referred to उनके empire as tawantinsuyu which can be translated as The Four Regions or the चार संयुक्त Provinces.
There were many local forms of worship, most of them concerning local पवित्र `` Huacas ``, but the Inca leadership encouraged the worship of Inti —the सूर्य god—and imposed इसके sovereignty above other cults such as कि of Pachamama.
the Incas considered उनके King, the sapa इन्का, to be the `` child of the sun. ''
The kidneys हैं organs that serve several essential regulatory roles in most पशु, सहित vertebrates and कुछ invertebrates.
They are essential in the urinary system and also serve homeostatic functions such as the regulation of electrolytes, maintenance of acid–base balance, and regulation of रक्त दबाव ( via maintaining नमक and water balance ).
They serve the body as a प्राकृतिक filter of the blood, और remove wastes which are diverted to the urinary bladder.
In producing मूत्र, the गुर्दे excrete wastes such as urea and ammonium, and they हैं भी responsible for the reabsorption of जल, glucose, and amino acids.
The kidneys also produce hormones including calcitriol, erythropoietin, and the enzyme renin.
Located at the rear of the abdominal cavity in the retroperitoneum, the kidneys receive blood इससे the paired renal arteries, and drain into the paired renal veins.
Each गुर्दा excretes urine into a ureter, itself a paired structure that empties into the urinary bladder.
Renal physiology is the study of kidney function, while nephrology is the medical specialty concerned with kidney diseases.
Diseases of the गुर्दा are विविध, but individuals with kidney disease frequently display characteristic clinical features.
Common clinical शर्तें involving the kidney include the nephritic और nephrotic syndromes, renal cysts, acute kidney चोट, chronic kidney disease, urinary tract infection, nephrolithiasis, और urinary ट्रैक्ट obstruction.
Various cancers of the kidney exist ; the most आम वयस्क renal cancer is renal cell carcinoma.
Cancers, cysts, and कुछ other renal conditions can be managed with removal of the kidney, or nephrectomy.
When renal function, measured by glomerular filtration rate, is persistently poor, dialysis and kidney transplantation may be treatment options.
Although वे हैं not severely harmful, kidney पत्थरों can be painful and a nuisance.
The हटाना of kidney stones involves ultrasound treatment to break up the stones into smaller टुकड़े, which are then passed through the urinary tract.
एक common symptom of kidney पत्थरों is a शार्प pain in the medial/lateral segments of the निम्नतर back.

In addition to इसके Kansas City, Missouri headquarters, Lockton operates 60 locations in 17 countries.
Lockton is currently home to more than 4,450 Associates worldwide.
The कम्पनी was founded by Jack Lockton in 1966 and has चूंकि become the world’s 9th largest insurance brokerage कड़.
Lockton serves a wide array of उद्योग with services that शामिल risk प्रबन्धन, casualty, surety, professional indemnity and more.
For 46 years, Lockton posted extraordinary organic growth, with वैश्विक revenues reaching $ 915 million in fiscal 2012.
Lockton Benefits Group : Lockton’s Employee Benefit’s टोली works closely with insurance carriers and administrators to create comprehensive और integrated लाभ रणनीति for clients.
The Lockton Benefits Group provides services including compliance, executive लाभ, health and welfare, health रिस्क समाधान, retirement and more.

In यूरोपीय, Lockton International is a partner in EOS RISQ, Europe’s leading insurance broking and risk management consultancy.
EOS risq is an equity-based European partnership of major independent insurance brokers साथ over 3,500 employees based in more than 30 countries in Europe.
lockton International provides specialized समाधान for personal lines, SME’s and major multi-national क्लाइंट.
White chocolate is a chocolate derivative.
It commonly consists of cocoa मक्खन, sugar, milk solids और salt, and is characterized by a pale yellow or आइवरी appearance.
The melting point of cocoa मक्खन, its प्राथमिक cocoa bean घटक, is ऊँची enough to keep श्वेत chocolate ठोस at room temperature.

He परोसा in those roles from November 30, 2000, until दिसम्बर 31, 2010.
Blankenship is an active वित्तीय backer of the Republican party and भागीदार in local and राज्य politics, especially in his home state of West वर्जिनिया.
He रै frequently spoken out सरेआम परिचय politics, the environment, unions, and coal उत्पादन.
U.S. प्रतिभूति and Exchange आयोग filings show Blankenship was paid $ 17.8 लाख in 2009, the highest in the coal industry.
उसके 2009 अदा represents a $ 6.8 लाख raise over 2008 and almost double his compensation package in 2007.

On December 3, 2010, Blankenship announced that he was retiring as CEO at the end of the year, और would be succeeded by Massey President Baxter F. Phillips Jr.

लापरवाही ( lat. negligentia, from neglegere, to neglect, literally `` not to pick up कुछ '' ) is a विफलता to exercise the care that a reasonably prudent person होता exercise in like circumstances.
the area of tort law ज्ञात as लापरवाही involves harm caused by carelessness, नहीं intentional harm.
According to Jay M. Feinman of the Rutgers University School of Law ;
`` The core idea of negligence is that people चाहिए exercise reasonable care when वे act by taking account of the potential harm that वे might foreseeably cause harm to other people. ''
`` those who go personally or bring property where they know कि वे or it may come into collision with the persons or property of others have by law a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to avoid such a collision. ''
Fletcher v Rylands ( [ 1866 ] LR 1 Ex 265 )
Through civil litigation, if an घायल व्यक्ति proves that another person acted negligently to cause their injury, they can recover क्षतिपूर्ति to compensate for their harm.
Proving a मामला for लापरवाही can potentially entitle the घायल plaintiff to compensation for harm to उनके देह, property, mental well-being, financial status, or intimate relationships.
However, क्युकी negligence मामले are very fact-specific, इस सामान्य definition does not fully explain the concept of when the विधि will आवश्यकता one person to compensate another for losses caused by accidental injury.
Further, the विधि of लापरवाही at common law is only एक पहलू of the law of liability.
Although resulting damages must be सिद्ध in order to recover मुआवजे in a negligence कार्रवाई, the nature और extent of those damages are नहीं the primary फ़ोकस of लापरवाही cases.
A melanocytic nevus ( भी known as `` Nevocytic nevus '' ) is a प्रकार of lesion that contains nevus cells ( a प्रकार of melanocyte ).
Some sources equate the term mole with `` melanocytic nevus ''.
Other sources reserve the पद `` mole '' for अन्य purposes.
The majority of moles appear during the first two decades of a person’s जीवन, जबकि about एक in प्रत्येक 100 शिशु is born with औज़ार.
Acquired moles हैं a form of benign neoplasm, while congenital moles, or congenital nevi, हैं considered a minor malformation or hamartoma and may be at a higher risk लिये melanoma.
A mole can be either subdermal ( under the skin ) or a pigmented विकास on the skin, formed mostly of a type of cell ज्ञात as a melanocyte.
The high concentration of the body’s pigmenting एजेंट, मेलेनिन, is responsible for their dark color.
Moles are a member of the family of skin lesions known as nevi.
The comprehensive metabolic फलक, or रासायनिक स्क्रीन, ( CMP ; cpt code 80053 ) is a panel of 14 blood tests which serves as an initial broad medical screening tool.
The CMP provides a rough check of kidney function, liver फलन, and electrolyte and fluid balance, but it is far from perfect.
Abnormal values from a cbc may be a result of false positives and thus the CBC may need to be repeated for a रोगी ( or replaced with a more specific परीक्षण ).
The CMP is an expanded version of the basic metabolic panel ( bmp ), जिससे does not include liver tests.
A CMP ( or bmp ) can be ordered as part of a दिनचर्या physical परिक्षा, or may be used to monitor a patient साथ a chronic disease, such as diabetes mellitus or hypertension.
Previous names लिये the फलक of tests have been Chem 12, Chemistry panel, Chemistry screen, sma 12, SMA 20 and SMAC ( Sequential Multiple विश्लेषण - Computer ).
The tests are performed on machines आधारित on the AutoAnalyzer invented in 1957.

Natural gas is a naturally occurring हाइड्रोकार्बन gas mixture consisting primarily of methane, but commonly सहित varying amounts of अन्य hydrocarbons, कार्बन dioxide, nitrogen, and हाइड्रोजन sulfide.
प्राकृतिक gas is an energy source प्रायः used for heating, cooking, and electricity generation.
It is also used as fuel for vehicles और as a chemical फर्टिलाइजर in the manufacture of plastics and other commercially important organic chemicals.
Natural gas is मिला in गहन underground natural rock formations or associated साथ अन्य hydrocarbon टंकी in coal beds and as methane clathrates.
Petroleum is also another resource found in proximity to and with natural gas.
Most natural gas was created over time by दो mechanisms : biogenic और thermogenic.
Biogenic gas is created by methanogenic organisms in marshes, bogs, landfills, और shallow sediments.
Deeper in the earth, at greater temperature and pressure, thermogenic gas is निर्मित इससे buried organic material.
Before natural gas can be used as a ईंधन, it must undergo processing to remove impurities, सहित water, to meet the specifications of marketable natural gas.
The by-products of processing include ethane, propane, butanes, pentanes, and उच्चतर molecular weight hydrocarbons, hydrogen sulfide ( which may be converted into pure sulfur ), कार्बन dioxide, water vapor, and sometimes हीलियम and nitrogen.
प्राकृतिक gas is often informally referred to बस as गैस, especially जब compared to अन्य energy स्त्रोत such as oil or coal.
This page is about the Imagination Movers band.
For information परिचय the TV दिखाएँ अभिनीत the बैंड, see Imagination मूवर्स ( TV series ).
Imagination Movers is a band formed in New Orleans, Louisiana, in 2003.
The lineup includes Rich कॉलिन्स, Scott Durbin, Dave Poche, and Scott `` Smitty '' Smith.
Members of the group were longtime मित्रों and neighbors.
The group started as a television/music concept which was pitched to लोकल PBS affiliates in नई Orleans.
WLAE-TV was the first to लो an interest in the group और later introduced them to Beth Courtney, the अध्यक्ष & Chief Executive Officer at Louisiana Public Broadcasting.
Soon after, LPB began airing one-minute videos produced by the Imagination Movers themselves.
the Movers built a sizable regional following by setting educational songs for kids to melodies and rhythms that adults appreciate as well.
They sold अधिक than 100,000 copies of their self-produced CDs और DVDs.
Their three इंडी CDs : `` शुभ Ideas, '' `` Calling All Movers, '' and `` Eight फीट '' साथ with उनके ग्रास roots DVD `` Stir It Up '' have, combined, जीती fourteen national पुरस्कार, from such groups as the National संघ of Parenting Publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' Choice.
In early 2005, Disney took सूचना, और initiated negotiations to add the Movers to the company 's roster.
ये यहूद बाधित in August when the flood protection designed और built by the Army Corps of Engineers to protect New Orleans failed.
The resulting floodwater claimed the band 's दफ्तर, as well as the घरों of Collins, durbin and Poche – but the deal was signed in the spring of 2006.
In 2008, वॉल्ट Disney रिकॉर्ड introduced the Imagination Movers ' music to the nation with the release of the Movers ' first nationally-released CD, `` Juice Box Heroes. ''
In सितंबर 2008, a 30-minute दिखाएँ featuring the group began airing on the Disney Channel 's preschool programming block known as Playhouse डिज़्नी, और currently airs on Playhouse Disney 's बदलना, Disney Junior.
the Movers लिखें and perform all the गीतों on their show.
Moreover, the कल्पना Movers have received critical kudos for their live कॉन्सर्ट performances.
In October 2009, the Imagination Movers started the `` Live from the Idea Warehouse Concert Tour 2009 ''.
traveling from mid-October to mid-December 2009 their live performances include lots of their favorite songs और नाचना, as well as video appearances of Warehouse Mouse.
शुरूआत in early-february 2011 and wrapping up in late May 2011, the Imagination Movers presented their `` In a Big Warehouse Concert Tour, '' playing more than 100 shows in 50+ cities आरपार North America.
From March to October 2012, the Imagination Movers toured North America on उनके post-Disney `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour.
The show maintained several elements of the original TV concept, such as an on-stage `` विचार आपात '' and several sets from their older catalogue ; however, साथ the प्रस्थान of Wendy Calio back to उसके native Hawaii, the अक्षर `` Nina '', along with her musical numbers, is not present.
The दौरे promotes the Imagination Movers ' new album/dvd release, `` Rock-O-Matic '', which features सब नई music इससे the बैंड.
The album itself is produced independently of Disney and has a notably more mature, contemporary rock-and-roll sound, हालांकि still very appropriate for children.
Several performance dates were moved to later in 2012 to benefit from the increased exposure of the Imagination मूवर्स TV show अभी playing daily on Disney Junior.
The platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern Australia, including तस्मानिया.
Together with the four species of echidna, it is one of the five extant species of monotremes, the only स्तनधारियों that lay eggs instead of giving birth.
It is the sole जीना representative of its family ( ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ), हालांकि a number of related species have महरूम मिला in the fossil record.
The असामान्य appearance of this egg-laying, duck -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed स्तनधारी baffled European naturalists when they first encountered it, with कुछ considering it an elaborate fraud.
It is one of the few विषैला mammals, the male platypus having a spur on the hind foot कि delivers a venom सक्षम of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus मेक it an important subject in the study of evolutionary जीवविज्ञान and a recognisable और iconic symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a mascot at नेशनल events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the animal emblem of the state of नई South Wales.
Until the जल्दी 20th century, it was hunted for its फर, but it is अभी protected throughout its range.
Although खिलाते breeding programmes have था only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of pollution, it is not अंतर्गत any तात्कालिक threat.
the Chupacabra or chupacabras (, from chupar `` to suck '' और cabra `` goat '', literally `` goat sucker '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit parts of the americas.
it is संबद्ध more recently with sightings of an allegedly unknown animal in Puerto Rico ( where these sightings were पहला reported ), मैक्सिको, and the United राज्य, especially in the latter 's लैटिन American communities.
the name comes from the एनिमल 's reported habit of attacking and drinking the blood of पशुधन, especially goats.
Physical descriptions of the प्राणी vary.
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as जल्दी as 1995 in Puerto Rico, और have चूंकि been reported as far उत्तर as Maine, and as far south as Chile, और even being spotted outside the Americas in countries जैसे Russia and The Philippines.
It is supposedly a heavy creature, the size of a छोटी भालू, with a row of spines reaching from the neck to the आधार of the tail.
Sighting reports of the Chupacabra have been disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking evidence, while most रिपोर्ट्स in northern Mexico and the southern United States have been verified as canids afflicted by mange.
biologists और wildlife management officials view the chupacabra as a contemporary legend.
The North American Free व्यापार अनुबंध ( NAFTA ) is an agreement signed by Canada, Mexico, and the United States, creating a trilateral trade bloc in North अमेरिका.
The agreement came into force on January 1, 1994.
It superseded the Canada–United States Free Trade Agreement between the U.S., Canada, और Mexico
nafta रै two supplements : the North American Agreement on Environmental Cooperation ( NAAEC ) and the North अमरीकी अनुबंध on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ).
Thermal सुकून is the condition of दिमाग that expresses satisfaction with the thermal environment and is assessed by subjective evaluation ( ANSI / ASHRAE मानक 55 ).
Maintaining this standard of thermal comfort लिये occupants of इमारतें or अन्य enclosures is one of the महत्वपूर्ण goals of HVAC ( heating, ventilation, और air conditioning ) design इंजीनियर्स.
The पूर्वानुमानित Mean Vote ( PMV ) model स्टैंड among the most recognized thermal comfort models.
It was developed using principles of ऊष्मा संतुलन and experimental data collected in a controlled climate कक्ष under steady state conditions.
Because the PMV model was derived from data collected in a controlled climate, it is not suitable for applications in naturally ventilated spaces which often have high levels of air movement.
This shortcoming motivated the विकास of a परिवार of empirical statistical models of thermal comfort in naturally ventilated spaces known as अनुकूली models.
अनुकूली मॉडल of thermal comfort consider occupants as dynamically interacting with their पर्यावरण, and controlling their thermal comfort by means of clothing or window-opening and closing.
This is in contrast to thermal comfort in sealed buildings, in which occupants experience the environment passively.
Thermal comfort is प्रभावित by heat conduction, convection, radiation, और evaporative ऊष्मा loss.
Thermal comfort is maintained जब the heat उत्पन्न by इंसान metabolism is allowed to dissipate, thus maintaining थर्मल equilibrium with the surroundings.
It has been long recognized that the sensation of अहसास hot or cold is not just dependent on एयर temperature alone.
थर्मल comfort calculations according to ANSI/ASHRAE मानक 55 can be freely performed साथ the cbe Thermal Comfort Tool for ASHRAE-55.
Durante degli एलीगियरी, simply referred to as Dante (, ; ; c. 1265–1321 ), was a major Italian poet of the Middle आयु.
His Divine Comedy, originally called ' and later called ' by Boccaccio, is widely considered the greatest literary work composed in the Italian language and a masterpiece of world साहित्य.
In इटली he is known as ' ( `` the Supreme Poet '' ) or बस '.
he, Petrarch and Boccaccio are also known as `` the three fountains '' or `` the three crowns ''.
Dante is also called the `` Father of the Italian language ''.
