( ) is a tire and rubber company based in Japan.
it is part of the Sumitomo Group.
the company traces its origins to 1909, जब the Sumitomo Group made an निवेश in Dunlop Japan, the newly formed Japanese subsidiary of the British company Dunlop रबर.
Over the सालो Sumitomo and Dunlop developed a close business relationship, and in 1963 the Sumitomo Group acquired control of Dunlop Japan and renamed it Sumitomo Rubber Industries ltd.
In 1985, when Dunlop Rubber थी लिया over by btr पीएलसी, the company acquired the ऑटोमोबाइल tire assets of Dunlop, including the right to use the dunlop brand on automobile tires.
The अधिग्रहण did not शामिल the US और Australian व्यवसायों, which were separately स्वामित्व, लकिन in 1986 Sumitomo also acquired the Dunlop Tire Corporation of the US from इसके management.
In 1997, Sumitomo formed a joint venture with goodyear Tire and Rubber Company, by which goodyear and Sumitomo agreed to manufacture tires for each अन्य 's markets, including Dunlop branded tires.
As part of the agreement, goodyear acquired 75 % interests in Dunlop Tyres, the UK company which Sumitomo था formed, and in Dunlop Tire Corporation.
Goodyear और Sumitomo भी made investments in प्रत्येक other.
Today, the कम्पनी makes a wide range of rubber based products, including automobile tires, golf balls and tennis balls.
microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware integrated विकास environments ( आईडीई ) developed by Microsoft that हैं lightweight versions of the Microsoft Visual Studio product लकीर.
Express Editions were conceived beginning with Visual Studio 2005.
The idea of Express editions is to provide streamlined, easy-to-use and easy-to-learn ides for users अन्य than professional software developers, ऐसे as hobbyists and students.
The Alps are one of the ग्रेट पहाड़ दायरा systems of Europe stretching approximately आरपार eight Alpine देशों from ऑस्ट्रिया and Slovenia in the east, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, जर्मनी, France to the west और Italy and Monaco to the south.
The mountains were formed over hundreds of millions of सालो as the African और Eurasian tectonic plates collided.
Extreme shortening caused by the event resulted in marine sedimentary rocks rising by thrusting and folding into high mountain peaks ऐसे as Mont blanc और the Matterhorn.
Mont Blanc spans the french–italian border, and at is the highest mountain in the Alps.
The Alpine region क्षेत्रफल contains अनेक peaks higher than, ज्ञात as the `` four-thousanders ``.
The altitude and size of the range affects the climate in Europe ; in the mountains precipitation levels vary greatly and climatic conditions consist of distinct zones.
Wildlife such as ibex सजीव in the higher peaks to elevations of, and plants such as edelweiss grow in rocky areas in lower elevations as खूब as in higher elevations.
Evidence of human habitation in the Alps goes back to the Paleolithic era.
A mummified man, संकल्पित to be 5,000 years old, was खोजा on a glacier at the austrian–italian किनारा in 1991.
By the 6th century BC, the सेल्टिक La tène culture was well established.
Hannibal may have crossed the Alps with a herd of हाथियों, and the Romans had settlements in the region.
In 1800 नेपोलियन crossed one of the mountain passes साथ an army of 40,000.
The 18th and 19th centuries saw an influx of naturalists, writers, and artists, in particular the romantics, followed by the golden age of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the peaks.
In World War II the Third Reich invaded the अल्पाइन देशों, साथ the exception of Switzerland and liechtenstein ; Adolf Hitler kept a base of आपरेशन in the Bavarian Alps throughout the war.
The Alpine प्रदेश has a strong cultural identity.
the traditional culture of farming, cheesemaking, और woodworking still exists in Alpine villages, although the tourist उद्योग began to grow जल्दी in the 20th century and expanded greatly बाद संसार War II to become the dominant उद्योग by the end of the century.
The शीत Olympic Games have been hosted in the Swiss, French, Italian, Austrian and German ऐल्प्स.
At present the region is home to 14 लाख लोगों and रै 120 million annual visitors.
लोइस patrice Griffin ( née Pewterschmidt ) is a character इससे the animated television श्रेणी Family Guy.
She is voiced by writer Alex Borstein and first appeared on television, along with the rest of the परिवार in the 15-minute short on December 20, 1998.
Lois was created and designed by series creator Seth MacFarlane.

After the pilot was given the green light, the Griffin family appeared on the एपीसोड `` मौत Has a Shadow ``.
Lois is the mother of the Griffin परिवार.
With her husband Peter, she has had three children : Meg, क्रिस, and stewie.
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother, despite her admitting to being a drug user, a recovering meth नशेड़ी kleptomaniac.
Lois has also had अनेक affairs, one of जिससे allegedly resulted in the धारणा of Meg.
She has appeared in other media relating to परिवार Guy—including a वीडियो game, commercials and books—and inspired an entire लकीर of merchandise.
लोइस 's distinctive नई York एक्सेंट originated इससे a character in a stage show that Alex Borstein had performed in, which was largely प्रेरित by a relative who grew up on Long Island, New यॉर्क.
Family transmission of Basque language ( Basque as आरंभिक language )
प्रतिशत of students पंजीकृत in Basque भाषा schools ( 2000–2005 ).
Location of the basque-language प्रांतों भीतर Spain and France
Basque ( endonym :, ) is the ancestral language of the Basque लोगों, who inhabit the Basque Country, a region spanning an area in northeastern Spain और southwestern France.
It is spoken by 27 % of Basques in all territories ( 714,136 out of 2,648,998 ).
of these, 663,035 live in the Spanish भाग of the Basque country and the remaining 51,100 live in the French भाग.
in academic discussions of the distribution of Basque in Spain and France, it is प्रथागत to refer to three ancient provinces in France and four Spanish provinces.
Native speakers are concentrated in a contiguous क्षेत्रफल including parts of the Spanish autonomous communities of the Basque Country and नावारा and in the western हाफ of the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques.
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic Basque Country incorporating the traditional Spanish प्रांतों of Biscay, gipuzkoa, and Álava, which retain their अस्तित्व as politico-administrative divisions.
ये provinces and many areas of Navarre are heavily populated by जातीय Basques, लकिन बास्क was, at तनिक until the 1990s, नहीं spoken as a native language in most of álava, western parts of Biscay और सेंट्रल and southern areas of Navarre, either because it had been replaced by Spanish साथ the सदियां, in some areas, or क्युकी it had never been spoken there, in other areas.
In southwestern France, the ancient basque-populated provinces were labourd, Lower नावारा, and Soule.
वे and other regions were संचित into a single département in 1790 under the name basses-pyrénées, a नाम which persisted until 1970.
a मानकीकृत रूप of the Basque language, called Euskara Batua, was developed by the Basque Language Academy in the late 1960s.
Euskara Batua was created so that Basque language could be used—and easily understood by सब Basque speakers—in formal परिस्थितियों ( education, mass media, literature ), and this is its प्रमुख use today.
The role of this standard बास्क language depends on the भाषाई शैक्षणिक मॉडल of each region and each school.
in most areas of the Spanish Basque Country, the educational Model D, where all subjects are taught in Basque, except `` Spanish भाषा and literature '' ( which is taught in Spanish ) is now the predominant model.
in फ़्रांस, the Basque language school Seaska and the association for a दुभाषिया ( Basque और फ्रेंच ) schooling Ikasbi meet a चौड़ी range of Basque language शैक्षणिक needs up to the छठे Form, while often struggling to surmount financial and प्रशासनिक constraints.
Apart from this standardized version, there are five main Basque dialects : Bizkaian, Gipuzkoan, और अपर Navarrese in स्पेन, और Navarrese–Lapurdian and zuberoan ( in France ).
Although they लो their names इससे the उल्लेखित ऐतिहासिक provinces, the dialect सीमाएँ are not congruent with प्रांत boundaries.
The President, निर्देशकों और Company, of the बैंको of the United States, commonly known as the First Bank of the संयुक्त States, was a सेंट्रल bank, chartered for a term of twenty years, by the संयुक्त States Congress on February 25, 1791.
Establishment of the बैंको was included in a three-part विस्तार of federal fiscal और मौद्रिक power ( along with a federal mint and excise taxes ) championed by सिकंदर Hamilton, पहला Secretary of the Treasury.
Hamilton believed a सेंट्रल bank थी necessary to stabilize and improve the स्वदेश 's credit, and to improve हैंडलिंग of the financial कारोबार of the United States government under the newly enacted Constitution.
Officially proposed to the first session of the First Congress in 1790, Hamilton 's Bank faced फैली resistance from opponents of increased federal power.
Secretary of State Thomas Jefferson and James Madison led the opposition, which claimed that the bank was unconstitutional, and that it benefited merchants and investors at the expense of the majority of the population.
the पहला Bank building is now a National Historic Landmark located in Philadelphia, पेन्सिलवेनिया within Independence National Historical Park.
James Wesley Marsters ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an American actor and musician.
Marsters पहला came to the attention of the general public playing the लोकप्रिय character Spike, a platinum-blond yobbish English vampire in the टेलीविज़न series Buffy the Vampire slayer and its spin-off series, Angel, from 1997 to 2004.

In molecular biology, इंसान chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized egg after conception.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta, and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors produce this हार्मोन ; therefore, elevated levels measured when the patient is नहीं pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
However, it is not known whether इस production is a contributing cause or an effect of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hCG, known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ), is produced in the pituitary gland of males and महिलाओं of all ages.
, the FDA has निषिद्ध the sale of `` homeopathic '' और over the counter hCG आहार products and declared उन्हें fraudulent and illegal.
बेयोंस Giselle Knowles-Carter, known by उसके स्टेज नाम Beyoncé ( ; born September 4, 1981 ), is an American singer, songwriter, dancer, and actress.
Born and raised in Houston, Texas, she performed in singing and नाचना प्रतियोगिताओं as a चाइल्ड before forming in 1990 a group with Kelly Rowland और LaTavia Roberson that was eventually named Destiny 's Child.
Once signed to Columbia Records, the girls subsequently became एक of the संसार 's best-selling girl समूह of all time.
The group was plagued by internal conflict and legal turmoil and Knowles suffered from depression that lasted लिये a number of years.
During the group 's hiatus, नॉलेस released her debut solo album Dangerously in Love ( 2003 ), which अर्जित her five Grammy Awards and has sold a कुल of 4.9 million copies in the US alone.
It शाखित बिलबोर्ड क्रमांक one singles `` Crazy in प्रेम, '' माना by VH1 to be the `` Greatest Song of the 00 's, '' and `` Baby लड़के. ''
Following the disbandment of Destiny 's Child in 2005, Knowles 's second solo album B'Day ( 2006 ) contained the top five singles `` déjà Vu ``, `` अपूरणीय ``, और `` Beautiful Liar ``.
Her प्रदर्शन in dreamgirls ( 2006 ) earned her two Golden ग्लोब nominations.
Knowles ' work playing Etta James in that film inspired her subsequent album I am...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) which spawned hits `` if i Were a Boy ``, `` Single Ladies ( Put a Ring on It ) ``, `` Halo ``, and `` मीठी Dreams ``.
The album also helped Knowles earn six Grammys in 2010, तोड़कर the record लिये most Grammy Awards won by a female artist in one night.
उसके चौथी एल्बम 4 ( 2011 ) deviated towards traditional R & B and became her fourth consecutive क्रमांक one album on the Billboard 200.
In January 2012, Knowles gave birth to daughter Blue आइवी Carter, उसके first child with husband Jay-Z.
Knowles has sold over 13 million albums in the US and 118 million records worldwide ( as well as a further 50 million records with Destiny 's Child ), and is एक of the best-selling music artists of सब time.
The रिकॉर्डिंग Industry Association of अमेरिका ( RIAA ) recognized Knowles as the Top Certified कलाकार of the 2000s.
In 2009, Billboard named her the Top Radio गीतों Artist of the decade and ranked her the Top Female Artist and the fourth Artist of the Decade.
Beyoncé Knowles is the सबसे nominated woman in Grammy Award history, receiving 17 awards ; other accolades include 12 एमटीवी Video Music पुरस्कार, 7 Billboard Awards including a Millennium Award, and a star on the हॉलीवुड Walk of Fame as part of Destiny 's Child.

The Sons of Liberty was a group consisting of अमरीकी patriots कि originated in the pre-independence North American British colonies.
the group थी formed to protect the rights of the colonists और to take to the streets against the taxes by the अंग्रेजों government.
They are best known for undertaking the Boston Tea Party in 1773, which led to the Intolerable Acts ( an intense crackdown by the British government ), and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots.
Osaka castle
is a city in the Kansai region of Japan 's main island of Honshu, a designated city under the Local Autonomy विधि, the capital city of Osaka Prefecture और also the largest भाग of the Keihanshin metropolis, which comprises तीन major cities of Japan, Kyoto, Osaka and कोबे.
स्तिथ at the mouth of the yodo नदी on Osaka खाड़ी, Osaka is Japan 's third largest city by population after टोकियो ( special wards ) और yokohama.
Keihanshin is the दूसरी largest metropolitan area in Japan by population and one of the largest महानगर areas highly ranked in the world, with nearly 19 million people, and by GDP the second largest area in जापानी and the seventh largest area in the world.
Historically the commercial center of Japan, Osaka functions as one of the command centers for the Japanese अर्थव्यवस्था.
The अनुपात between daytime and night time population is 141 %, the उच्चतम in जापानी, highlighting its status as an economic बीच.
Its nighttime population is 2.6 million, the third in the country, but in daytime the population surges to 3.7 million, second only बाद Tokyo ( combining the special wards of Tokyo, which is not a single incorporated city, for statistical purposes ; see the Tokyo आलेख for more information on the definition और makeup of Tokyo ).
Osaka used to be referred to as the in feudal Edo काल क्युकी it was the centre of trading for राइस, creating the first आधुनिक futures exchange market in the world.
The Little मरमेड is a 1989 American animated musical fantasy film उत्पादित by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt डिज़्नी Pictures.
Based on the डैनिश fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen, The Little Mermaid tells the story of a beautiful mermaid who dreams of becoming human.
Written, निर्देशित, and produced by Ron Clements and जॉन Musker, साथ music by Alan Menken and Howard Ashman, the फिल्मी features the voices Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, पैट Carroll, सैमुएल E. Wright, जेसन Marin, Kenneth Mars, Buddy Hacket, and Rene Auberjonois.
the 28th film in the Walt डिज़्नी Animated Classics श्रेणी, The Little Mermaid थी released to theaters on November 14, 1989 to largely positive reviews, garnering $ 84 million at the box office during its initial रिलीज, and $ 211 million in कुल lifetime gross.
After the कामयाबी of the 1988 Disney / Amblin film Who Framed Roger Rabbit, The Little Mermaid is given credit for breathing life back into the art of Disney animated feature films after a string of critical or commercial failures produced by डिज़्नी that दिनाँक back to the early 1970s.
It भी marked the प्रारंभ of the era known as the Disney Renaissance.
A stage अनुकूलन of the film with a book by डग Wright and additional songs by Alan Menken और नई lyricist Glenn स्लेटर opened in Denver in July 2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10, 2008.

जामुनी drank is a कठबोली term लिये a recreational drug popular in the hip hop community in the दक्षिणी United States, originating in Houston, Texas.
Its main ingredient is नुस्खा -strength cough syrup containing codeine and promethazine.
Cough syrup is typically mixed with संघटक such as Sprite soft drink or Mountain Dew and टुकड़े of Jolly Rancher candy.
The purplish hue of purple पिया आता from dyes in the cough syrup.
There are numerous slang terms for purple drank, including sizzurp, lean, सिरप, drank, barre, जामुनी jelly, Texas tea, and Tsikuni.
First/given, middle, और last/family/surname diagram साथ J. S. Bach as example.
J. S. Bach shared his given name with six immediate family members और many extended परिवार सदस्यों.
He shared उसके परिवार नाम with most family members.
A given name, in पश्चिमी contexts प्रायः referred to as a first नाम, is a personal name that specifies और differentiates between members of a group of individuals, विशेषकर in a family, all of whose सदस्यों usually share the same family name ( उपनाम ).
a given name is purposefully given, usually by a child 's parents at or near जनम, in contrast to an inherited one such as a family name.
A given name is sometimes legally changed through a name change.
Given names are often used in a familiar and friendly manner in informal situations.
In more औपचारिक situations the surname is प्रयुक्त instead, unless it is necessary to distinguish between people साथ the same surname.
The idiom `` on a first-name आधार '' ( or `` on first-name शर्तें '' ) alludes to the familiarity of addressing another by a given name.
the western style of having both a family नाम ( उपनाम ) and a given name is far इससे universal.
In अनेक countries it is common for ordinary people to have तभी one name ( a mononym ).
Hydrochloric acid is a साफ, colourless समाधान of hydrogen chloride ( h Cl ) in water.
It is a highly corrosive, strong mineral acid with many industrial uses.
Hydrochloric acid is found naturally in gastric acid.
Historically called muriatic acid, and आत्माओं of salt, hydrochloric acid थी produced from vitriol ( sulfuric acid ) और आम salt.
It first appeared दौरान the Renaissance, और तब it was प्रयुक्त by chemists such as glauber, प्रीस्टलि and डेवी in their scientific research.
With major production starting in the Industrial Revolution, hydrochloric acid is used in the chemical उद्योग as a chemical reagent in the large-scale production of vinyl chloride for पीवीसी plastic, और MDI / TDI for polyurethane.
It has numerous smaller-scale applications, सहित household cleaning, उत्पादन of जिलेटिन और other food additives, descaling, and चमड़े processing.
परिचय 20 million टन of hydrochloric एसिड are produced annually.
Wheat ( triticum spp. ) is a cereal grain, originally from the levant region of the Near East and Ethiopian Highlands, but now cultivated worldwide.
in 2010, world production of गेहूं was 651 million tons, making it the third most-produced cereal after maize ( 844 लाख tons ) and rice ( 672 million टन ).
Wheat was the second most-produced cereal in 2009 ; world उत्पादन in that year थी 682 million टन, after maize ( 817 million tons ), और with rice as a close third ( 679 लाख tons ).
This अनाज is grown on more land area than any other commercial food.
World trade in wheat is greater than लिये all other crops combined.
Globally, गेहूं is the leading source of सब्ज़ी protein in human खाना, having a higher protein content than soybeans or the अन्य major cereals, maize ( corn ) or rice.
in शर्तें of कुल production tonnages प्रयुक्त for food, it is currently second to rice as the main human food क्रॉप and ahead of मक्का, after allowing for maize 's more extensive use in animal feeds.
गेहूं was a key factor enabling the emergence of city-based societies at the start of civilization because it was one of the first crops that could be easily cultivated on a large scale, and had the additional advantage of yielding a harvest that provides long-term storage of food.
Wheat contributed to the emergence of city-states in the Fertile crescent, including the Babylonian और Assyrian empires.
Wheat grain is a स्टेपल food प्रयुक्त to मेक flour for leavened, flat and steamed breads, बिस्कुट, cookies, cakes, breakfast cereal, पास्ता, noodles, couscous और for fermentation to मेक बियर, अन्य alcoholic beverages, or biofuel.
Wheat is planted to a limited extent as a forage crop for livestock, and its straw can be used as a निर्माण material for roofing thatch.
The whole grain can be milled to leave just the endosperm लिये white flour.
The by-products of this are bran and germ.
The पूरे grain is a concentrated सोर्स of विटामिन, minerals, and protein, जबकि the refined grain is mostly starch.
Printing
To publish is to मेक content available to the general public.
While specific use of the term may vary among countries, it is usually लागू to text, images, or other audio-visual सामग्री on any परंपरागत मीडियम, including पेपर ( newspapers, मैगज़ीन, कैटलॉग, etc. ).
The word प्रकाशन means the act of publishing, and also refers to any मुद्रित copies.

The Dharma wheel, often used to represent the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold पाथ
The Noble Eightfold पाथ (, ) is one of the principal teachings of the Buddha, who described it as the way leading to the cessation of suffering ( dukkha ) and the achievement of self-awakening.
It is used to develop insight into the true nature of phenomena ( or reality ) और to eradicate लोभ, द्वेष, and delusion.
the Noble Eightfold Path is the चौथी of the Buddha 's Four Noble Truths ; the first element of the Noble Eightfold Path is, in फेरे, an understanding of the Four प्रतिष्ठित Truths.
it is भी ज्ञात as the Middle पाथ or Middle Way.
All आठ elements of the Path begin with the word `` right '', which translates the शब्द samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in Pāli ).
These denote पूर्णता, एकजुटता, and coherence, and can भी suggest the senses of `` perfect '' or `` ideal ''.
'Samma ' is also अनूदित as `` wholesome '', `` wise '' and `` skillful ''.
In बौद्ध symbolism, the प्रतिष्ठित Eightfold Path is often represented by अर्थात् of the dharma wheel ( dharmachakra ), whose आठ तीलियां represent the eight तत्व of the path.
The Grammy Award लिये Song of the साल is an honor presented at the Grammy Awards, a ceremony that was established in 1958 and originally पुकारा the Gramophone Awards.
Awards in several categories are distributed annually by the National अकादमी of Recording Arts and Sciences of the संयुक्त States to `` honor artistic उपलब्धि, technical proficiency and overall excellence in the रिकॉर्डिंग industry, without regard to एल्बम sales or chart position. ''
Economics is the social विज्ञान that analyzes the उत्पादन, distribution, और खपत of goods और services.
The term economics comes इससे the प्राचीन Greek ( ', `` management of a household, प्रशासन '' ) इससे ( ', `` house '' ) + ( ', `` custom '' or `` law '' ), hence `` rules of the house ( hold ) ''.
Political economy was the पहले name for the subject, but economists in the late 19th century suggested `` economics '' as a shorter term for `` आर्थिक विज्ञान '' that also avoided a narrow political-interest connotation and as similar in form to `` mathematics ``, `` ethics '', and so forth.
A focus of the subject is how economic agents behave or interact and कैसा economies कार्य.
Consistent with this, a primary textbook distinction is between microeconomics and macroeconomics.
Microeconomics examines the behavior of basic तत्व in the economy, including individual agents ( such as households and firms or as buyers and sellers ) and markets, and their interactions.
Macroeconomics analyzes the entire economy and मुद्दे affecting it, including unemployment, inflation, economic growth, and मौद्रिक and fiscal policy.
Other broad distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing `` what is '' ) and normative अर्थशास्त्र ( advocating `` what ought to be '' ) ; between economic theory and applied economics ; between rational और behavioral अर्थशास्त्र ; and between mainstream अर्थशास्त्र ( more `` orthodox '' and dealing साथ the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium नेक्सस '' ) and heterodox economics ( more `` radical '' and dealing with the `` institutions-history-social structure nexus '' ).
Economic analysis may be लागू throughout समाज, as in कारोबार, वित्त, health care, and government, but also to ऐसे विविध subjects as crime, शिक्षा, the family, law, politics, religion, सोशल institutions, युद्ध, and science.
At the turn of the 21st century, the expanding डोमेन of अर्थशास्त्र in the social sciences has been described as economic imperialism.
An increasing number of economists have called for increased जोर on environmental sustainability ; this area of research is known as ecological economics.
This is a list of Schedule iv drugs अंतर्गत the Controlled substances Act for the संयुक्त States.
जरूरी निष्कर्षों for दवाएँ to be placed in this schedule:
The drug or other substance रै a low potential for abuse relative to the drugs or other substances in schedule iii.
The drug or other substance has a currently स्वीकृत medical उपयोग in treatment in the United States.
Abuse of the ड्रग or other पदार्थ may lead to limited physical dependence or psychological dependence सापेक्ष to the drugs or other substances in schedule III.
The complete सूची of Schedule IV drugs are as फ़ॉलो.
The Administrative Controlled Substances कोड Number for each drug is included.
US county household मध्य income 2009.
Median US household income, 2001-2011
household income is a measure commonly used by the संयुक्त States government and निजी संस्थानों.
Each household is measured by the income of every resident over the age of 15.
Income includes wages and salaries, unemployment insurance, disability भुगतान, child support payments प्राप्त, regular rental रसीदें, as well as any निजी business, investment, or other kinds of income received routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had been increasing almost every year from 1945 to 1999, it has since been flat and even decreased recently.
u.S. median household income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
चरम poverty in the संयुक्त States, meaning households living on less than $ 2 per दिन before government benefits, doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011, सहित 2.8 million children.
The निवासियों of the household do not have to be सम्बन्धित to the head of the household लिये उनके earnings to be considered भाग of the household 's income.
as households tend to share a समान economic कॉन्टेक्स्ट, the use of household income remains among the most widely accepted measures of income.
That the size of a household is नहीं commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any analysis of fluctuations within or among the household income श्रेणी, and may render direct comparisons between quintiles मुश्किल or even impossible.
The बीतने rate is पारिभाषित as the rate of decrease with height for an atmospheric variable.
The variable involved is temperature जबतक specified otherwise.
The terminology arises from the word lapse in the sense of a decrease or decline.
While सबसे often applied to Earth 's atmosphere the concept can be विस्तारित to कोई gravitationally supported ball of gas.
Blue Mountain State is an अमरीकी comedy series कि premiered on Spike on January 11, 2010.
the series producers शामिल Chris Romano and Eric Falconer, and it is produced by Lionsgate Television.
The श्रेणी is about a fictional university, Blue पहाड़ State, और its football team, `` The Mountain Goats. ''
It portrays निश्चित aspects of American university life, including फ़ुटबॉल, sex, binge drinking, drugs, जंगली partying, and hazing.
In February 2012, it was reported that Blue पहाड़ State would not be renewed for a fourth season.
In कूच 2013, Ed Marinaro stated कि he is working on a ब्लू Mountain State फिल्मी.
Apple inc., formerly Apple Computer, Inc., is an American बहुराष्ट्रीय corporation headquartered in Cupertino, California that designs, develops, and बिकता consumer electronics, computer software and personal computers.
Its best-known hardware products are the Mac line of computers, the iPod music player, the iPhone smartphone, and the iPad tablet computer.
Its तन्त्र शामिल the OS X और आईओएस operating प्रणालियों, the itunes मीडिया browser, the Safari web browser, and the iLife and iWork creativity और production suites.
The company was संस्थापित on April 1, 1976, and incorporated as Apple Computer, Inc. on जनवरी 3, 1977.
The word `` Computer '' was removed इससे its name on जनवरी 9, 2007, reflecting its shifted focus towards consumer electronics after the introduction of the iPhone.
Apple is the world 's second-largest information technology company by revenue after Samsung Electronics, and the world 's third-largest mobile phone maker after Samsung and Nokia.
Fortune magazine named Apple the most admired company in the संयुक्त States in 2008, and in the world from 2008 to 2012.
However, the company रै received criticism for its contractors ' मजदूर practices, and for Apple 's own environmental and कारोबार practices.
, Apple maintains 394 retail stores in fourteen देशों as well as the online ठहराना स्टोर and iTunes Store.
It is the second-largest publicly traded निगम in the world by market capitalization, with an estimated value of US $ 414 billion as of January 2013.
, the कम्पनी था 72,800 permanent full-time employees and 3,300 temporary full-time employees worldwide.
इसके worldwide annual revenue in 2012 totalled $ 156 billion.
Section 8 housing in the South Bronx
खण्ड 8 of the Housing Act of 1937 ( ), प्रायः simply known as Section 8, as repeatedly amended, authorizes the payment of rental आवास सहायता to निजी landlords on behalf of approximately 3.1 लाख low-income households.
It operates through several programs, the largest of जिससे, the Housing चुनाव Voucher program, pays a विशाल portion of the rents and utilities of about 2.1 लाख households.
The US Department of Housing and Urban विकास manages the Section 8 कार्यक्रम.
The Housing Choice Voucher कार्यक्रम provides `` tenant-based '' rental सहायता, so a tenant can मूव from one ईकाई of at least minimum housing quality to another.
It also allows individuals to लागू उनके monthly वाउचर towards the खरीदें of a घर, with over $ 17 billion going towards such purchases each year ( from ncsha.org analysis ).
The maximum allowed voucher is $ 2200 a month.
Section 8 also authorizes a variety of `` project-based '' rental assistance programs, under which the मालिक reserves कुछ or all of the units in a building लिये low-income tenants, in return for a Federal government गारंटी to make up the difference between the किरायेदार 's contribution और the rent for 1 cent in the owner 's contract with the सरकारी.
A tenant who leaves a subsidized project होगा lose access to the project-based subsidy.
The United States Department of आवास और Urban Development और United States Department of दिग्गजों Affairs have a special खण्ड 8 program called VASH ( Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing ), or HUD-VASH, which gives out a certain number of Section 8 vouchers to eligible homeless and otherwise vulnerable US armed forces veterans.
